<pb n="001"/>
<head>śivābhyāṃ namaḥ ।</head>
<head>śrīkaṇṭhācāryakṛtau</head>
<head>brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye</head>
<head>atha dvitīyasyādhyāyasya</head>
<head>prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।</head>
<head>atha smṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<sutra>।।sū॰।। smṛtyanavakāśadoṣaprasaṅga iti cennānyasmṛtyanavakāśadoṣaprasaṃgāt ।।1।।</sutra>
atīte'dhyāye saccidānandasvarūpe sarvajñatvasarvaśaktitvādisvarūpalakṣaṇe sa-
kalajagajjanmādyupalakṣaṇe sarvavilakṣaṇe sarvātmani virūpākṣatvakṛṣṇapiṃgalatvanīla-
kaṇṭhatvādiviśiṣṭalīlāmaṃgalasvarūpasvabhāve bhavaśivaśarvamahādevaparameśvaraśabdā-
dimukhyavācake paramakāruṇike parabrahmaṇi śive nikhilavedāṃtavākyānāṃ tadanugu-
ṇānāṃ smṛtyādīnāṃ ca tātparyeṇa samanvayo'bhihitaḥ । idānīmanenādhyāyena tasya
samanvayasya vedāṃtaviruddhasmṛtitarkādibhirvirodhaḥ parihriyate । prathamaṃ sāṃkhyasmṛti-
virodhaḥ parihriyate । asmin sarvatra pūrvoktaḥ samanvayo viṣayaḥ । iha vaidikasamanva-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha śivārkamaṇidīpikāyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha smṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<p>vṛttavartiṣyamāṇayoradhyāyayoḥ pratipādyaṃ saṃgatisūcanārthamupanyasya uttarādhyāyamavatārayati
<pratika>atīte'dhyāya iti</pratika> । bhagavatā sūtrakāreṇa <quote>‘athāto brahmajijñāse’</quote>ti <ref>(bra॰1.1.1. sū)</ref>
brahmavicāraṃ pratijñāya jagajjanmādikaṃ saccidānandarūpatvavigrahaviśeṣaviśiṣṭatvādikaṃ ca brahmaṇo
lakṣaṇaṃ pradarśya pradarśitalakṣaṇaviśiṣṭe tasminvedāṃtatadupabṛṃhaṇasmṛtyādīnāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ pratijñāya
pratijñātārthopapādanāya teṣāṃ brahmaṇyeva tātparyeṇa samanvayaḥ prathamādhyāyenābhihitaḥ na tu śive
ityāśaṅkaya <quote>‘parabrahmaṇi śiva’</quote> iti viśeṣitam । tasya parabrahmatvopapādanāya brahmasvarūpataṭastha-
lakṣaṇānāṃ tatraiva paryavasānaṃ <quote>‘līlāmaṅgalasvarūpasvabhāva’</quote> ityantairdarśitam । sarvavidhatadupapāda-
kopalakṣaṇatayā <quote>‘śivabhave’</quote> tyādi viśeṣaṇaṃ kṛtam । śivasya svopāsanānuguṇanikhilaphala-
pradānonmukhasvabhāvatvena upāsanāsiddha‍yarthamupāsakasaulabhyaṃ <quote>‘paramakāruṇika’</quote> iti viśeṣa-
ṇena sūcitam । <pratika>tasya samanvayasyeti</pratika> । tathā ca samanvaye nirūpite tasya smṛtitarkādibhiḥ
virodhenākṣepastatsamādhānaṃ cāvakāśaṃ labhata iti samanvayādhyāyānantaryamasyādhyāyasyeti
saṃgatiriti bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘smṛtitarkādibhi’</quote> rityādiśabdena bhūtabhautikasṛṣṭyādiviṣayasmṛtīnāṃ
parasparavirodhaḥ parigṛhyate । samanvayasya saṃbhāvitasakalavirodhaparihāro'dhyāyārtha ityadhyā-
yārthaikyamiti bhāvaḥ । pādārthabhedastvagre pradarśayiṣyate । prathamādhikaraṇārthamāha—<pratika>prathamamiti ।
asmintsarvatreti</pratika> । asminnadhyāye sarveṣvapyadhikaraṇeṣu prathamādhyāyavyavasthāpitassamanvayo
viṣaya ityarthaḥ । <pratika>iheti</pratika> । ihādhikaraṇe brahmaviṣayasya vedāntasamanvayasya pradhānaviṣayayā kapila-
<pb n="002"/>
yasya sāṃkhyasmṛtyā saṃkoco'sti na veti saṃdehaḥ । katham। brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatvaṃ vedo-
'bhidhatte । kapilasmṛtiḥ pradhānasya । kapilo hi mahātapasvī । tatastadvacanamapi
pramāṇameva । vedo'pi bhagavānakhilapramāṇasārvabhaumaḥ । sa cāprāmāṇyagaṃdhamapi
na sahate । tadanayoḥ kasya kena bādha iti saṃśayaprāptiḥ । tatra sāṃkhyasmṛteranavakā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
smṛtyā bādhyatvamanyaparatvena neyatvalakṣaṇamasti na veti saṃśaya ityarthaḥ । nanu, nāyaṃ saṃśayaḥ
vadānteṣva'pi <quote>‘pradhānakṣetrajñapatirguṇeśaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘akṣarātparataḥ para’</quote> ityādau pradhānaprasiddhisattvena
seś‍varasāṃkhyamate brahmaprasiddhisattvena ca virodhābhāvāt tatsattve'pi śrutismṛtyorvirodhe śrutyā
smṛtirbādhyetyauduṃbarīsparśasarvaveṣṭanasmṛtyādiṣu sampratipannatvāccetyākṣipati —<pratika>kathamiti</pratika> ।
prathamasyākṣepasyottaraṃ <pratika>brahmaṇa iti</pratika> । kapilasmṛtirvedāntavat brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatvaṃ na prati-
pādayati । vedāntāḥ kapilasmṛtivat pradhānasya svatantrakāraṇatvaṃ na pratipādayanti iti
asti tāvadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ । dvitīyasyottaramāha—<pratika>kapila iti</pratika> । <quote>‘ṛṣiṃ prasūtaṃ kapilaṃ
yastamagre jñānairbibharti jāyamānaṃ ca paśye’</quote> diti kapilasya hiraṇyagarbhasyeva jāyamānāvasthā-
prasṛtaparameśvarakaṭākṣalabdhāpratighajñānātiśayatvaṃ prasiddham । tathā tapobalavaśīkṛtaparameśvara-
prasādalabdhasārvajñyasya kapilasya vacanamapramāṇamiti vaktumayuktamiti sarvaveṣṭanasmṛtyādyapekṣa-
yāsti viśeṣa iti bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘tatra sāṃkhyasmṛte’</quote> rityādipūrvapakṣabhāṣyasyāyamāśayaḥ । śruti-
smṛtyorna śrutismṛtitvakṛtaṃ niyataṃ prābalyadaurbalyaṃ kiṃ tu balābalavaiparītyakāraṇāntarābhāva-
sāpekṣamautsargikam । ata eva <quote>‘vedaṃ kṛtvā vedi’</quote> riti padārthadharmabhūtakramaviṣayaśrutitaḥ
<quote>‘kṣuta ācāme’</quote> diti smṛterdharmibhūtapadārthaviṣayatvaṃ prābalyakāraṇamastīti balābalavaiparītya-
māśritam । yathoktaṃ vārtikakāraiḥ—<quote>‘durbalasya pramāṇasya balavānāśrayo yadā । tadāpi
viparītatvaṃ śiṣṭākope yathoditam । atyantabalavanto'pi paurajānapadā janāḥ । durbalaireva
bādhyante puruṣaiḥ pārthivāśritai’</quote> riti । ihāpyastyagnihotrādidharmaviṣayatvena sāvakāśāyāḥ
śrutito niravakāśatvaṃ kapilasmṛteḥ prābalyakāraṇam । klṛp‍taṃ ca sāvakāśāt <quote>‘yatkiṃcitprā-
cīnamagnīṣomīyāttenopāṃśu caraṃtī’</quote>tyupāṃśusvaravidhānā<quote>‘nmandraṃ prāyaṇīyāyāmanubrūyāt mandra-
taramātithyāyā’</quote>miti prāyaṇīyādigatasvarāntaravidhānasya niravakāśatvena prābalyam ।
tasmādyadyapi śrutismṛtyorbalābalamautsargikam । kiṃ bahunā । smārtaśrutyapekṣayāpi vaidikaṃ
liṃgamātraṃ balavadityutsargaḥ । ata eva vārtike yatra punaḥ śrutirānumānukī liṃgaṃ pratyakṣaṃ
tatra kathaṃ yathāśruti vaidikaliṃgavirodha iti praśnamudbhāvya tatra smṛtermūlāntaramapi saṃbhāvyate
na tu vaidikaliṃgasyeti tadeva balavadityanusartavyamityuktam । tathāpyatra niravakāśatvarūpa-
syāpavādasya sadbhāvāt nātrotsargaḥ pravartate । siddhāṃtino'pi hi <quote>‘asya lokasya kā gati-
riti ākāśa iti hovāce’</quote> tyādiṣu vākyeṣu śrutiliṃgādipāradaurbalyotsargo na pravartate ।
ākāśādiśrutito'nantatvādiliṃgaprābalyahetorapavādasya sadbhāvādityabhyupagantavyam ।
api ca । sāvakāśaniravakāśatveneva avyavasthitārthatvavyavasthitārthatvamapi balābalavaipa-
rītyakāraṇam । ata eva <quote>‘yadṛcāstuvata tadasurā anvavāyan yatsāmnāstuvata tadasurā
nānvavāyan ya evaṃ vidvān sāmnā stuvīte’</quote>tyurksāmastutividhirūpayorupakramopasaṃhārayoraśva-
<pb n="003"/>
śatvena prabalatvāt vedasya dharmeṇa sāvakāśatayā durbalatvādanavakāśayā smṛtyā
vedasya saṃkoco yukta iti cedvadati pūrvapakṣī vayamapi neti vadāmaḥ । katham ?
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pratigraheṣṭigatayoriva prāptasya prābalyadaurbalyotsargasya <quote>‘yadṛcāstuvate’</quote> tyādīnāmasurāgamahetu-
tayā nindyatā uta vaśīkartumaśakyānāmasurāṇāma'pi vaśīkaraṇahetutayā stutyatā iti
saṃdehāvakāśasadbhāvena upakramasyāvyasthitārthatvaṃ sāmavidhiparatvenopasaṃhārasya vyavasthitā-
rthatvaṃ cāpavādakamastītyupasaṃhārānusāreṇa upakramasya niṃdāparatvamāśritam । astyatra tadapi
balābalavaiparītyakāraṇam । atigaṃbhīrā hi vedāṃtāḥ svalpamatīnāmaśakyārthaniścayāḥ। <quote>‘kaśchaṃda-
sāṃ yogamāveda dhīra’</quote> iti śrutyaiva ca vedānāmaśakyārthaniścayatvamuktam । viśiṣya ca
vedāṃtavedyasya jagatkāraṇasyāśakyanirṇayatvaṃ<quote>‘ko addhā veda ka iha pravocadiyaṃ visṛṣṭiryata āba-
bhūveti’</quote> pratipāditam । vādināṃ ca vedāṃtārthe bhūyasī vipratipattirdṛśyate । evamavyavasthi-
tārthā vedāntāḥ । kapilasmṛtistu pradhānakāraṇatvaikaviṣayā vyavasthitārthā । tasmādvyavasthi-
tārthayā kapilasmṛtyā upabṛṃhaṇīyā vedāntā api tadekaviṣayā ityeva yuktam । na ca, brahmaika-
kāraṇatvavādinyo manusmṛtyādayo'pi vyavasthitārthāḥ । <quote>‘yadvai kiṃca manuravadattadbheṣaja’</quote> miti
manorapyāptatamatvaṃ śrutiprasiddham । ato manusmṛtyādibhirupabṛṃhaṇaṃ bhavediti vācyam ।
dharmapratipādanaparāṇāṃ smṛtīnāṃ karmakāṃḍopabṛṃhaṇena sāvakāśatvāt । ata eva manorāptata-
matvaṃ karmakāṃḍādāveva varṇyate na tu kapilasyeva vedāṃtabhāge । tasmādanavakāśakapilasmṛtya-
nusāreṇa vedāṃtānāmarthanayanaṃ yuktam । sainyasya pratipakṣajetṛtvaṃ rājñīva pradhānasya jagadracayi-
tṛtvaṃ puruṣe samāropya vedāṃteṣu brahmakāraṇavādāḥ pravṛttāḥ iti prāpte siddhāntamāha—<pratika>vayamapīti</pratika> ।
ayamāśayaḥ । manvādayastāvat brahmaṇa eva jagatkāraṇatāṃ smaranti । te ca bahavaḥ । na tu kapila-
tadāśayāsuripaṃcaśikhādivat katipaye svasvapratīyamānavedāntārthānuvartinaḥ śakādivat
tadviruddhārthavādinaḥ । tatra ca mano <quote>‘ryadvai kiṃca manuravadattadbheṣaja’</quote> miti śrutau <quote>‘yatkiṃce’</quote>
ti vīpsāsamānārthena śabdena <quote>‘bheṣaja’</quote> mityuktyā ca svokte sarvasminnarthe bhrāṃtivipralaṃbha-
rāhityaṃ darśitam । kapile tu jñānamātramuktam । tat katipayaviṣayajñānavattvenāpi caritārtham ।
na sarvathā bhrāṃtipratikṣepakam । na vā sāṃkhyavak‍taiva kapilaḥ śvetāśvataramantreṇānūdita ityatra
pramāṇamasti । <quote>‘yadvai kiṃca manuravada’</quote> dityatra smṛtivaktaivānūdita ityatra pramāṇaṃ vak‍tṛtvenā-
nuvādaḥ । na hi mānavadharmaśāstravyatirekeṇa manuvak‍tṛkaḥ kaścit granthaḥ prasiddho'sti ।
manvanuvartinaśca sarva'pi smartāraḥ । ata eva smṛtiṣu saṃgṛhītasya sarvasyā'pi dharmajātasya
<quote>‘mānavo dharma’</quote> iti purāṇeṣu prasiddhirdṛśyate । <quote>‘manvarthaviparītā tu yā smṛtissā na śasyate ।’</quote>
iti ca smaryate । yājñavalkyādīnāmapi vedāṃtaniṣṇātatvaṃ bṛhadāraṇyakādiṣu prasiddham ।
tasmādāptatamabahupraṇītābhirupabṛṃhaṇīyānuguṇābhirmanvādismṛtibhireva vedāṃtānāmupabṛṃhaṇaṃ yuktaṃ
na tvatathābhūtayā kapilasmṛtyā । nanvanavakāśā kapilasmṛtiḥ ki <quote>‘mapa eva sasarjādā’</quote>
vityādayo manvādayassāvakāśāḥ । karmavidhibhissāvakāśā iti cenna । karmaṇāṃ brahmārādhanarūpa-
tvena tadvidhīnāmapi brahmapradhānatvāt । kūrmapurāṇe vyāsagītāsu smṛtyuktasakalācāranirūpaṇā-
naṃtara <quote>‘mityeṣa mānavo dharmo yuṣmākaṃ kathito mayā । maheśvarārādhanāya yajñayogaśca śāśvataḥ ।’</quote>
<pb n="004"/>
anyāsāṃ vedāvirodhinīnāṃ manvādismṛtyādīnāmanavakāśadoṣaprasaṅgāt । <quote>‘apa eva
sasarjādau tāsu vīryamavāsṛjat’</quote>ityādinā <quote>‘hiraṇyagarbhaṃ paśyata jāyamānam’</quote> ityā-
dipratyakṣaśrutisiddhabrahmakāraṇatvavādinībhirmanvādismṛtibhistadviruddhābhidhāyi-
myā anumeyaśrutimūlāyāḥ sāṅkhyasmṛtereva bādhaḥ prāmāṇikajanaparigrāhya iti ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। itareṣāṃ cānupalabdheḥ ।। 2 ।।</sutra>
itareṣāṃ ca manvādīnāṃ sarvajñānāṃ smṛtiṣu kapiladṛṣṭasya pradhānakāraṇatvādera-
nupalabdheḥ pradhānasmṛtiranāgamamūlaiveti vak‍tuṃ yuktam । ataḥ sāṅkhyasmṛtyā
samanvayasya na saṃkocaḥ ।। iti smṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ityanta upasaṃhārāt । na tu karmaṇāṃ brahmānārādhanatve'pi vedāntānāmupabṛṃhaṇaṃ kartumayuktam ।
etena vedāntānāṃ sāvakāśatvāvyavasthitārthatvaśaṃkāpi nirastā । karmavidhisamabhivyāhārābhāvena
tatstāvakatayā sāvakāśatvāsiddheḥ upāsanāvidhisamabhivyāhārasattve'pi tatsamabhivyāhārara-
hitasmṛtyādigatasvatantrabrahmakāraṇavādopabṛṃhaṇīyānāṃ teṣāmupāsanāvidhiviṣayastāvakatayā'-
pi sāvakāśatvāsiddheḥ nirapekṣatayā vibhramavipralaṃbhamūlatvenāpi sāvakāśatvāsiddheḥ anādi-
mīmāṃsāsiddhairnyāyairāptatamabahumunipraṇītānuguṇasmṛtītihāsapurāṇarūpairupabṛṃhaṇaiścārthāvyava-
sthityasiddheśca । tasmātsāṃkhyasmṛtyanusāreṇa na vedāntānāmanyathānayanaṃ kāryaṃ pratyuta smṛtyādi-
tadupabṛṃhaṇīyavedāntānusāreṇa sāṃkhyasmṛtitadanusāriṇoreva bādhaḥ svīkārya iti । <quote>‘apa eva
sasarjādā’</quote> vityādīni manusmṛtivacanāni ‘saṃjñāmūrtiklṛptyadhikaraṇe (2—4—17)
vyākariṣyante । nanu, yogaprabhāvasākṣātkṛtasakalavedārthatatvadarśī kapila eva na tu karmānu-
ṣṭhānavyagrā manvādayaḥ । ataḥ kapilasmṛtyaiva vedāntānāmupabṛṃhaṇaṃ yuktamityāśaṃkānirākara-
ṇārthaṃ sūtram---sū॰ ।। itareṣāṃ cānupalabdheḥ ।। 2 ।। yadi pradhānakāraṇavādo vedāntārtho'bha-
viṣyat tadā vedārthatatvanirṇayaprakāraṇeṣu manvādīnāṃ smṛtiṣvapi nibandha upālapsyata । na
copalabhyate । karmānuṣṭhānavyagrāṇāṃ manvādīnāṃ yogānuṣṭhānaṃ na sārvajñyasaṃpādakamiti cenna ।
kapilasya yogāṃgakarmānuṣṭhānābhāvāttadīyayogasyaiva vaikalyaprasaṃgena tasyā'pi karmānuṣṭhānapa-
ratvasyāvaśyavaktavyatvādityabhipretya sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>itareṣāmiti</pratika> । adhikaraṇārthamupasaṃha-
rati—<pratika>ata iti</pratika> ।। iti smṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</p>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha dvitīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha smṛtyadhikaraṇam ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। smṛtyanavakāśadoṣaprasaṅga iti cennānyasmṛtyanavakāśadoṣaprasaṅgāt । itareṣā cānupalabdheḥ ।। 2 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>uktassamanvayo'yaṃ kapilasmṛtivaiśasādupekṣārhaḥ । dharmeṇa sāvakāśādvedātprabalā hi sā niravakāśā ।। 87 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>santi smṛtayo'nyāḥ khalu śivakāraṇataikatātparyāḥ । vedānurodhinībhirbahvībhistābhireva sā bādhyā ।। 88 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti smṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<pb n="005"/>
<head>atha sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ dvitīyo'dhyāyaḥ ।</head>
<head>atha smṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<lg><l>sarveśe yatra sarvātmani paramaśive sarvaśakte sahāṃbe
sarvāsāṃ vedavācamanuguṇabahalasmṛtyupaṣṭaṃbhabhājām ।</l>
<l>aidaṃparyeṇa niṣṭhā lasati sughaṭitā tadvirodhāpanuttyā
nirbādhā śāṇalīḍhā maṇiriva sa vibhuśśodhayenme manīṣām ।।</l></lg>
<sutra>sū ।। smṛtyanavakāśadoṣaprasaṃga iti cennānyasmṛtyanavakāśadoṣaprasaṃgāt ।।1।। itareṣāṃ cānupalabdheḥ ।।2।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, prathamādhyāye'bhihitasya jagatkāraṇe sarvajñe jijñāsye'dvitīye parasminbrahmaṇi sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāṃ
samanvayasya smṛtyādivirodhaparihāro'nena kriyata ityanayoradhyāyayorviṣayaviṣayibhāvasaṃgatiḥ । pūrvamatideśādhikaraṇe
pradhānavadaṇvādīnāmapyaśabdatvamabhyadhāyi । adhunā pradhānasya smṛtirūpaśabdavattvamākṣipya pariharati—<pratika>sū ।। smṛtyana-
vakāśadoṣaprasaṃga ityādi</pratika> । uktasamanvayaḥ sāṃkhyasmṛtyā virudhyate uta neti saṃdehaḥ । maharṣipraṇītapradhānakāraṇa-
vādismṛtīnāmanavakāśarūpadoṣaprasaṃgātsamanvayo virudhyata iti tadaguṇatayaiva śrutisamanvayo neya iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> ।
cetanakāraṇatvavādinīnāmanyāsāṃ smṛtināmanavakāśarūpadoṣaprasaṃgāt, smṛtidvayavirodhe śrutyaviruddhasmṛtereva prābalyācca,
śrutiviruddhāpramāṇasāṃkhyasmṛtyā uktasamanvayo na kadāpi virudhyeteti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ</pratika> । itaśca sāṃkhyasmṛteranavakāśo na
doṣa ityāha---<pratika>sū ।। itareṣāṃ cānupalabdheḥ ।। 2 ।। itareṣām</pratika>=sāṃkhyasmṛtiprasiddhānāmanyeṣāṃ mahadāditatvānām ।
<pratika>anupalabdheḥ</pratika>=loke vede cānupalabhyamānatvācca sāṃkhyasmṛterapramāṇyānna tasyā anavakāśo doṣa ityatastadekadeśapradhāna-
smṛteraprāmāṇyamiti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, saṃdehapūrvapakṣasiddhāntādikaṃ prāyaḥ samānameva । dvitīyasūtrārthavarṇanaprakriyā paraṃ bhidyate । tathā hi—pūrvo-
ktasamanvayasya sāṃkhyasmṛtyā saṃkoco'sti vā na veti saṃdihya dharmeṇa sāvakāśādvedādanavakāśāyāssāṃkhyasmṛteḥ prabalatayā
tayā vedasya saṃkoco yukta iti pūrvapakṣaṃ kṛtvā vedāvirodhinīnāmanyāsāṃ manvādismṛtināmanavakāśadoṣaprasaṃgātpratyakṣaśruti-
siddhabrahmakāraṇavādinyā smṛtyā anumeyaśrutimūlāyāssāṃkhyasmṛtereva bādho yukta iti siddhāntaṃ cābhidhāya dvitīyasūtrārthaḥ
paramanyathā varṇitaḥ । itareṣāṃ manvādīnāṃ smṛtiṣu kapiladṛṣṭasya pradhānakāraṇatvāderanupalabdheḥ pradhānasmṛtiraprāmāṇikītyataḥ
kapilasmṛtyoktasamanvayasya nāsti saṃkoca iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, śrīkaṇṭhamatānna vailakṣaṇyamiti na pṛthakpratanyate ।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, asminnadhyāye prathamādhyāyapratipāditasamanvayasya yuktisamayaśrutisayuktikaśrutyavalaṃbanaṃ virodha-
catuṣṭayaṃ kramātpādacatuṣṭayena parihariṣyate । tatra jagadekakāraṇe nikhilaguṇaparipūrṇe nārāyaṇe pratipāditassamanvayo na
sidhyati । śaivakāpilahairaṇyagarbhādismṛtīnāṃ śivādipraṇītānāṃ niravakāśatvena tadvirodhinīnāmapauruṣeyatayā ghuṇākṣarakalpānāṃ
śrutīnāmevānyatāneyatvena niravakāśaprabalatarasmṛtivirodhena śrutyaprāmāṇyadoṣaprasaṃgāt । iti <pratika>pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>,
prasiddhatarasāmarthyaviṣṇvādipraṇītānāṃ pāñcarātrādismṛtīnāṃ śrutisaṃvāditayātyantāptimūlatvena prabalatvāttatsahakṛtānāṃ śruti-
girāmapi prābalyāt pāśupatādibhyo'nyāsāṃ pāñcarātrādismṛtīnāṃ rudrādijagatkartṛtvādāvanavakāśatvāt tadviruddhaśaivādismṛ-
tīnāmevāprāmāṇyākhyadoṣeṇa prakarṣeṇa saṃbandhābhyupagamācca tadvirodhasyākiṃcitkaratvena pūrvoktassamanvayo nirbādha iti । sūtramapi
vyākhyātam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। itareṣāṃ cānupalabdheḥ ।। 2 ।।</pratika> anupalabdherityāvartate । caśabdaḥ kiṃcitphalopalabdhyaṅgīkārasūcakaḥ । <pratika>anupa-
labdheḥ</pratika> । na vidyate upalabdhiryasyāsāvanupalabdhistasmātpratyakṣāyogyātpadārthāt । <pratika>itareṣāṃ</pratika>=bhinnānāṃ pratyakṣayogyānāṃ pā-
śupatādyuktaphalānāmaniṣṭānāṃ ca taduktakriyānuṣṭhānaparityāgayoḥ kṛtayorapi । <pratika>anupalabdheḥ</pratika>=pratyakṣato'darśanāt tāsāmevā-
prāmāṇyaṃ yuktamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। etena yogaḥ pratyuktaḥ ।। 3 ।। etena</pratika>—phalādarśanalakṣaṇapūrvoktahetunaiva । <pratika>yogaḥ</pratika>=bhogaśāstram । <pratika>pratyuktaḥ</pratika>—nira-
stamityarthaḥ । asminmate idaṃ sūtraṃ nādhikaraṇāntaramiti viśeṣaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ smṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<pb n="006"/>
atha yogapratyuktyadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। etena yogaḥ pratyuktaḥ ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
yogāṅgapratipādinī hiraṇyagarbhasmṛtirapi pradhānakāraṇatvameva vadati । tathā
ca yathā pradhānakāraṇatvavādinyā sāṅkhyasmṛtyā virodhāt vaidikasamanvayasya
saṃkoco nābhavat tathā'nayā'pi śrutyā saṃkoco na bhavati bhavati vā ।
iti sandehe bhavatīti vadāmaḥ । katham ? śvetāśvataropaniṣadi brahmasākṣātkā-
rahetutayā prapañcitā yogavidyā । tathā ca sāṃkhyasmṛteranumeyaśrutimūlatve'pi
pratyakṣaśrutimūlayā hiraṇyagarbhasmṛtyā pradhānakāraṇavādinyā brahmakāraṇavādinyāḥ
śruteḥ samanvayasya saṃkoco yuktaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p>sū॰ ।। etena yogaḥ pratyuktaḥ ।। 3 ।। atideśādhikaraṇasyāsya pūrvādhikaraṇarītyā pūrvo-
ttarapakṣau darśayati—<pratika>yogāṃgetyādinā</pratika> । nanu, kāsminnabhyadhikāśaṃkā ? yogaśāstrakartā hiraṇya-
garbhaḥ। sa kila kartā hiraṇyagarbhassakalavedapravartanādhikṛtaḥ tadarthatattvābhijña ityadhikāśaṃketi ।
na । <quote>‘hiraṇyagarbhaṃ paśyata jāyamāna’</quote> miti śrutau hiraṇyagarbhasyeva kapilasyā'pi <quote>‘jñānairbi-
bharti jāyamānaṃ ca paśye’</quote> diti śrutau sārvajñyopayogijāyamānāvasthālabdhaparameśvarakaṭākṣe-
kṣitatvaśravaṇāviśeṣāt । yogaśāstrādaraṇīyatvaheturīśvarāṃgīkāro'stīti cenna।kāṇādagautama-
matayorapyaparigrāhyatvasya śiṣṭāparigrahādhikaraṇe pradarśayiṣyamāṇatvena tena tasyādaraṇīyatā-
śaṃkānutthānāt, pūrvādhikaraṇanirastasāṃkhyapakṣe'pi tadaṃgīkārasatvācca । na ca nirīś‍varasāṃkhya
eva tatra nirākṛtaḥ । tatpakṣe vedāntānāṃ jīvaparatvamāśaṃkya <quote>‘adhikopadeśāttu bādarāyaṇasya’</quote>
<ref>(bra॰ 3—4—8)</ref> iti sūtreṇa jīvādhikaparameśvaraparatvaṃ vedāntānāṃ samarthitam । tasmādadhi-
kāśaṃkābhāvānnaitadadhikaraṇamāraṃbhaṇīyamityabhiprāyeṇāśaṃkate—<pratika>kathamiti</pratika> । yogāṃgapratipādi-
nīti prāgviśeṣaṇena sūcitāmadhikāśaṃkāṃ darśayati—<pratika>ś‍vetāś‍vatareti</pratika> । ś‍vetāś‍vatarāṇāṃ
maṃtropaniṣadupakramamārabhyāsamāpti śivameva jagatkāraṇatvajagadantaryāmitvādidharmavattayā
prapaṃcena pratipādayati । tatra dvitīyādhyāye śivasākṣātkāropayoginī śivayogavidyā nirūpi-
tā । saiva yogaśāstre prapaṃcitā । yogaśāstre hi ‘īśvarapraṇidhānādvā । <ref>(pā॰ 1 sū 23)</ref>
<quote>‘kleśakarmavipākāśayairaparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaviśeṣa īśvaraḥ। tatra niratiśayaṃ sarvajñabījam । sa pūrveṣāmapi
guruḥ kālenānavacchedāt । tasya vācakaḥ praṇavaḥ । tajjapastadarthabhāvanam । tataḥ pratyakceta-
nādhigamo'pyantarāyābhāvaśca ।’</quote> ityevamīśvaraviṣayāṇi sapta sūtrāṇi śivapurāṇe parame-
śvarapratipādakāni vacanānyanusṛtyaiva kṛtāni । śivapurāṇe hi vāyusaṃhitāyāṃ vacanāni
dṛśyaṃte—na śivasyāṇavo bandhaḥ kārmo māyeya eva ca । prākṛto vāthavā bandhaḥ ahaṃ-
kārātmakastathā । na rāgo na ca vidveṣaḥ śaṃbhoramitatejasaḥ । na vāpyabhiniveśo'sya
kuśalākuśalānyapi । sa puṃviśeṣaḥ kathitaḥ bhagavānantakāṃtakaḥ । loke sātiśayatvena
jñānaiśvarye vilokite । śivenātiśayatvena sthitiṃ prāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ । pratisargaṃ prasūtānāṃ
brahṇaṇāṃ śāstravistaram । upadeṣṭā sa evādau kālavacchedavartinām । kālāvacche-
<pb n="007"/>
iti prāpte brūmaḥ---na yogasmṛtyā śrutisamanvayasaṃkocaḥ । tasyā <quote>‘yogaścittavṛ-
ttinirodhaḥ’</quote> ityārabhya vaidikāṣṭāṅgayogapratipādanamātre hi tātparyaṃ nāvaidike
pradhānakāraṇavāde'pi । yadi tatrāpi tātparyaṃ, sāṅkhyasmṛtivadasyā api pratyākhyāna-
meva nyāyyam । tato hiraṇyagarbhasmṛtyā'pi pradhānakāraṇavādinyā brahmakāraṇavā-
diśrutisamanvayasya na saṃkoca iti yuktameva ।। iti yogapratyuktyadhikaraṇam ।।2।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dayuktānāṃ gurūṇāmapyasau guruḥ । sarveṣāmeva sarveśaḥ kālāvacchedavarjitaḥ । praṇavo vācaka-
stasya śivasya paramātmanaḥ । śivarudrādiśabdānāṃ praṇavo hi paraḥ smṛtaḥ । tajjapādapi yā
siddhiḥ sā paraiva na saṃśayaḥ ।’ iti । ato yogaśāstre upabṛṃhitā yogavidyā ś‍vetāś‍vatara-
nirūpitā śivayogavidyaiva । evaṃ ca yadyapi pradhānakāraṇavādismṛtyanusāreṇa vedāntā
netavyā iti pūrvapakṣe nirākaraṇamiha pūrvādhikaraṇe cāviśiṣṭam । tathāpi pradhānārthe pratyakṣa-
śrutimūlaṃ yogaśāstraṃ pradhānaṃ tu sāṃkhyaśāstra iva tatra na prādhānyena pratipādyaṃ kiṃtvatisūkṣma-
śivayogābhyāsārthaṃ tatpūrvapravartanīyasthūlayogalakṣyatayā । tathā ca pradhānārthe pratyakṣaśrutimūlaṃ
yogaśāstramatathābhūthātsāṃkhyaśāstrāt prabalamiti sāṃkhyaśāstrānusāreṇa vedāntānāmanyathā-
nayanāsiddhāvapyetadanurodhena tatsidhyatītyadhikāśaṃkāvakāśaḥ । tannirākaraṇārthamidamadhi-
karaṇam । nirākaraṇaprakārastu—pratyakṣaśrutimūlaśivayogābhyāso yadi tadarthaṃ pūrvaṃ lakṣīkarta-
vyasya pradhānasya tātvikatvamantareṇa na saṃbhavati tadā pratyakṣaśrutyāmnātapradhānapratipādakaṃ
yogaśāstramiti tadanusāreṇa vedāntānāmanyathānayanaṃ kalpyetāpi । na tvevam । tantrāṃtarasi-
ddhasya svataṃtrapradhānasya kalpitasyākalpitasya vedāntasiddhaparatantrapradhānasya vā sthūlayo-
galakṣyatvopapatteḥ । yadi yogaśāstraśraddhājaḍaḥ kaścana pradhāne'pi tātparyaṃ kalpayettadā tasya
pratyākhyānāya siddhāntātideśa iti bhāvaḥ ।</p>
<head>iti yogapratyuktyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha yogapratyuktyadhikaraṇam ।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। etena yogaḥ pratyuktaḥ ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>yogasmṛtyā tu bhavetsamanvayasyāsya bādhyatvam । sā hi pramāṇabhūtā śrautaṃ yogaṃ prapaṃcayati ।। 89 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>yoganirūpaṇamātre tātparyaṃ niṣṭhitaṃ tasyāḥ । na tu tatprakṛtiprabhṛtau tadvāratayānuvādye'pi ।। 90 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti yogapratyuktayadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha yogapratyuktyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। eteta yogaḥ pratyuktaḥ ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, asyātideśādhikaraṇatvānna pṛthaksaṃgatyapekṣā । uktasamanvayaḥ yogasmṛtyā virudhyate vā na veti
saṃdehe śrutisiddhayogapratipādakatvena prāmāṇyāt pradhānakāraṇavādinyā tayā samanvayo virudhyata iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । <pratika>siddhā-
ntastu, etena</pratika>=sāṃkhyasmṛtipratyākhyānena । <pratika>yogaḥ</pratika>=yogasmṛtirapi । <pratika>pratyuktaḥ</pratika>=pratyākhyātā veditavyā । śrutyaviruddhāṣṭā-
ṅgayoge tātparyavattvena prāmāṇye'pi tadviruddhapradhāne tātparyābhāvādapramāṇyamiti bhāvaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, anumeyaśrutimūlayā pradhānakāraṇavādinyā sāṃkhyasmṛtyā vaidikasamanvayasya saṃkocāsiddhāvapi brahmasākṣā-
tkārahetubhūtayogavidyāpratipādakaśvetāśvatarākhyapratyakṣaśrutimūlayā/?/ pradhānakāraṇavādinyā hiraṇyagarbhasmṛtyā saṃkoco bhavati
<pb n="008"/>
atha navilakṣaṇatvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
punarapi sāṅkhyatarkabādhyatāṃ samanvayasyāśaṅkya pariharati---
<sutra>।। sū ।। na vilakṣaṇatvādasya tathātvaṃ ca śabdāt ।। 4 ।।</sutra>
yathā sāṅkhyasmṛtyā samanvayasya na bādhaḥ tathā tattarkeṇāpi bādho'sti na vā---
iti saṃśaye pūrvapakṣaḥ pravartate । sarvathā tarkabādhyoyaṃ brahmakāraṇatāvādaḥ ।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha navilakṣaṇatvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p>yogādhikaraṇasyātideśatvāttadapahāya sāṃkhyasmṛtyadhikaraṇena saṃgatiṃ darśayannuttarādhi-
karaṇamavatārayati—<pratika>punarapīti</pratika> । yadyapi sāṃkhyasmṛtiḥ kartṛgauravādvedāntānāmanyathānayanaṃ
nāpādayet tathāpi tadupanyastabrahmakāraṇatvāsaṃbhavopapādakayuktibhistadāpādayedeva । <quote>‘yukti-
yuktaṃ vaco grāhyaṃ na tu pauruṣagaurava’</quote> miti puruṣagauravamanādriyamāṇānāmapi yuktigau-
ravasyādaraṇīyatvāditi śaṃkānirākaraṇārthamuttarādhikaraṇāraṃbha ityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। na vi-
lakṣaṇatvādasya tathātvaṃ ca śabdāt ।। 4 ।।</pratika> yattu sāṃkhyasmṛteḥ śrutavilakṣaṇatvena
śrutimūlatvāsaṃbhavānmūlāṃtarābhāvācca taduktapradhānakāraṇatvamayuktamiti । tanna । sāṃkhya-
smṛteḥ śrutivailakṣaṇyānna tanmūlatvamiti tvaduktarītyaiva prapaṃcasya brahmavailakṣaṇyāttadupā-
dānasyāpyanupapatteḥ smṛteḥ pratyakṣānumeyaśrutimūlatvābhāve'pi taduktasya sālakṣaṇyahetukānu-
mānasya vyāptipakṣadharmatārūpadṛḍhamūlavattvena prapaṃcasālakṣaṇyavataḥ pradhānasyaiva tatkāraṇatvauci-
tyāt ata eva smṛteranumānamūlatvena mūlāṃtarābhāvāsiddheśca ityevaṃ <quote>‘na vilakṣaṇatvādasye’</quote>
ti sūtrāṃśasyārthamabhipretya pūrvapakṣamāha—<pratika>sarvatheti</pratika> । <quote>‘prābalyamāgamasyaiva jātyā teṣu triṣu
smṛta’</quote> miti smṛtessakalapramāṇasārvabhaumasyāgamasya kathamapramāṇena tarkeṇa bādhanamupapadyata
ityāśaṃkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sarvatheti viśeṣaṇam । tarkeṇa bādhanaṃ nāprāmāṇyāpādanaṃ vivakṣitaṃ
kiṃ tu tadanusāreṇa grāhyārthatvam । tattvavaśyamevābhyupagaṃtavyam । <quote>‘yattalaṃ dṛśyate vyomni-
khadyoki havyavāḍiva । na talaṃ vidyate vyomni na khadyote hutāśanaḥ । tasmātpratyakṣadṛṣṭe'pi
yuktamarthaṃ parīkṣitum । parīkṣya jñāpayannarthānna dharmātparihīyate’</quote> iti tarkasya sarvapramāṇānugrā-
hakatvasmaraṇāt <quote>‘ārṣaṃ dharmopadeśaṃ ca vedaśāstrānurodhinā । yastarkeṇānusaṃdhatte sa dharmaṃ veda
netaraḥ’</quote> । iti viśiṣyāgamānugrāhakatvasmaraṇāt <quote>‘dharme pramīyamāṇe hi vedena karaṇātmanā ।
itikartavyatābhāgamanumā pūrayiṣyatī’</quote> ti vārtikokteśca । ata eva <quote>‘tredhā taṇḍulānvibhaje’</quote>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
na veti saṃdehe bhavatīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । <pratika>siddhāntastu</pratika>,<quote>‘yoga/?/ścittavṛttinirodha’</quote>ityārabhya vaidikāṣṭāṅgayogapratipādāne tātparyaṃśā-
linyā pradhānakāraṇavādinyā tayāpi brahmakāraṇavādiśrutisamanvayasya na saṃkoco yukta iti ।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, kiṃ vedāntānāṃ yogasmṛtyopabṛṃhaṇaṃ nyāyyam uta neti saṃśaye kṛts‍navedapravartanādhikṛtahiraṇyagarbhapraṇī-
tatvādyogasya īśvarasadbhāvābhyupagamācca tayā tadupabṛṃhaṇaṃ nyāyyamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> ।</p>
<p><pratika>siddhāntastu</pratika>, kapilasmṛtivadasyā api vedaviruddhatvāviśeṣāddhiraṇyagarbhasyāpi kṣatrajñatvena bhramapramādasaṃbhavācca
bhrāntimūlayā yogasmṛtyā na teṣāmupabṛṃhaṇaṃ nyāyyamiti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika> asya sūtrasya pūrvādhikaraṇaśeṣatvena pūrvasminnadhikaraṇe vyākhyātatvānna pṛthakprapañcanāvakāśa iti vijñeyam ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ yogupratyuktyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<pb n="009"/>
katham ? । brahmaṇaḥ prapañcasyāsya vilakṣaṇatvāt na tatkāryatvaṃ sambhavati ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dityādivākyānāṃ svarasapratītārthaparatve madhyamādivākyasiddhārthānuvāditvaṃ syāt ityādi-
tarkānusāreṇāsvārasiko'pi devatāpanayādirartho'bhyupagamyate । ato'trāpi tarkānusāreṇa
brahmakāraṇavādānāmanyathānayanaṃ yuktam । api cātra na kevalaṃ brahmakāraṇatāyāmaniṣṭāpāda-
nameva tarkaśabdena vivakṣitaṃ kiṃ tu brahmakāraṇatvapratikṣepakaṃ pradhānakāraṇatvavyavasthāpakaṃ ca
yadanumānaṃ tadapi vivakṣitam । tadapi dṛḍhavyāptipakṣadharmatāmūlam । atyantaniravakāśatvāt ।
na hi vedāṃtānāmiva yathākathaṃcit stāvakatvādinā tasyāvakāśaḥ kalpayituṃ śakyate ।
na ca, svataḥ prabalenāgamena virodhādanumānamapramāṇaṃ kalpanīyaṃ, tanmūlavyāptyādigrāhakapramā-
ṇānāmapi tadvirodhenaivābhāsīkaraṇasaṃbhavāt iti vācyam । <quote>‘śrotavyo maṃtavya’</quote> iti vedā-
ntāvagatārthapratiṣṭhāhetutvena śrutyaivānumoditasya mananāparaparyāyānumānasya pratikṣepāsaṃbhavena
kāryarūpeṣu vedārtheṣu anumānādāgamasya prābalye'pi siddhārtharūpe brahṇaṇi tasya tataḥ prāba-
lyābhāvāt samabalatve ca sati sāvakāśaniravakāśanyāyāvakāśāditi bhāvaḥ । evaṃ ca
<quote>‘sarvathā tarkabādhyo'ya’</quote> mityasya brahmakāraṇatāyāmiṣṭāpādanarūpeṇa brahmakāraṇatvapratikṣepakā-
numānarūpeṇa pradhānakāraṇatvavyavasthāpakānumānarūpeṇa vetyevaṃ sarvaprakāreṇā'pi tarkeṇa
bādhyo'yaṃ samanvaya ityarthaḥ । nanu, kathamatra vailakṣaṇyāvalaṃbanamanumānamaniṣṭāpādanaṃ vā
pravartate । jagadbrahmaprakṛtikaṃ na bhavati । tadvilakṣaṇatvāt । yadi jagat brahmaprakṛtikaṃ syāt
tadvilakṣaṇaṃ na syādityevamiti cenna । yadbrahmaprakṛtikaṃ tadbrahmavilakṣaṇamiti viśiṣya vyāpti-
grahe dṛṣṭāntābhāvāt yadyatprakṛtikaṃ tanna tadvilakṣaṇamiti sāmānyavyāpteryattadbha‍yāmananuga-
māt mṛtpiṃḍaprakṛtikasya ghaṭāderghaṭatvādinā mṛtpiṃḍavilakṣaṇatvena vyabhicārācca । yadbrahmavila-
kṣaṇaṃ na tat brahmaprakṛtikamiti vyāptigraha nityavastudṛṣṭāṃtasaṃbhave'pi mṛtpiṃḍavilakṣaṇasya ghaṭā-
dermṛtpiṃḍaprakṛtikatvavat brahmavilakṣaṇasya gaganāderbrahmaprakṛtikatvasaṃbhavenāprayojakatvāt tarkā-
numānayoraprayojakasahacāramātrāvalaṃbanatve brahmaniṣṭhānyonyābhāvapratiyogadharmāśrayatvarūpabra-
hmavailakṣaṇyāpekṣayā laghordharmāśrayatvādereva hetūkaraṇasaṃbhave sūtre vailakṣaṇyāditi gurudharmahetū-
kāraṇavaiyarthyaprasaṃgāt āśrayatvādihetorbrahmopādānakeṣu tadga‍uṇeṣu vyabhicāraḥ syāditi cenna ।
tasya vyabhicārasya sarveṣveteṣu pakṣeṣu tulyatvāt । tasmādvailakṣaṇyāvalaṃbanastarko'tra na prarvatata
ityabhipretyāśaṃkate—<pratika>kathamiti</pratika> । uttaramāha—<pratika>brahmaṇa iti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । gaganādikaṃ brahma-
prakṛtikadravya na bhavati । tadviśeṣaguṇacaitanyānugatiśūnyatvādityanumānam । yadi tat brahmapra-
kṛtikadravyaṃ tadā tadviśeṣaguṇānugatimat syāditi aniṣṭāpādanaṃ ca । sāmānyavyāptau
mṛtprakṛtikatvādirahito jalādirmṛtprakṛtiko ghaṭādiścātra dṛṣṭāntaḥ । yattadbha‍yāṃ sāmānya-
vyāptiḥ yo yasya granthasya praṇetā sa tasmādadhikaviṣayajñānavānityevamādirūpā siddhāṃtino-
'pyabhimatā na pratyākhyātuṃ śakyā । prakṛtivikāragatatadviśeṣaguṇatvāvacchedena nirṇīta-
sya hetuhetumadbhāvasya bhaṃgaprasaṃgo'nukūlastarka iti । nanu tarhi prapaṃce'pi caitanyamabhyupagamyate
ghaṭaḥ prakāśate sphurati bhātītyanubhavasattvāt । na ca vācyaṃ prakāśata ityādyanubhavaḥ caita-
nyaviṣayatvārthakaḥ na tu tadāśrayatvārthakaḥ anyathā mamedānīṃ ghaṭo na prakāśata ityādyanubha-
<pb n="010"/>
kuto vailakṣaṇyamavagatamiti cet—śabdādeva । <quote>‘vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ ca’</quote>
ityādiśabdo hi prapañcasya vikāraspadatvājñatvādyapuruṣārtharūpatvamabhidhatte । ataḥ
satyajñānānandarūpāt brahmaṇo'sya vailakṣaṇyaṃ siddham । kathamanayorgomahiṣayoriva
kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sambhavati ?
<sutra>।। sū ।। abhimānivyupadeśastu viśeṣānugatibhyām ।। 5 ।।</sutra>
yadyacetanatvena cetanāt brahmaṇo vilakṣaṇamidaṃ jagat, tatkathamasmin ‘taṃ
pṛthivyabravīt‘ ‘āpo vā akāmayanta‘ ‘śṛṇota grāvāṇo viduṣaḥ‘ ityādau
cetanakāryavyapadeśaḥ । tasmādidaṃ cetanameva sarvaṃ jagat । ato na brahmaprapañcayośceta-
nācetanarūpatayā na vailakṣaṇyamiti śaṅkyam । yatastathā sarvatra jñānakāryavyapadeśastu
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vābhāvaprasaṃgāditi । nīlati ś‍vetate lohitāyate ityādyanubhavānāṃ nailyādyāśrayatvaviṣayatvava-
t prakāśata ityādyanubhavānāmapi caitanyādyāśrayatvaviṣayataucityāt ghaṭādau caitanyasya
paratvāparatvavadavadhiviśeṣāpekṣaguṇatvena mama prakāśate mama na prakāśata iti vyavahāropapa-
tteśca । yadi ghaṭādiṣu caitanyasadbhāvaprayuktavyavahārādarśanāt ghaṭaḥ prakāśate na prakāśata
ityādivyavahārayostattatpuruṣagataghaṭādijñānasāmagrīsattvāsattvakālaprabhavatvācca tattadjñāna-
viṣayatvamevārthaḥ yathā mahyaṃ rocate modaka ityanubhavasya svatadicchāviṣayatvamartha itīṣyate
tathā'pi ghaṭādiṣu vṛkṣādiṣvivānudbha‍ūtaṃ caitanyamastu, śrutabrahmaprakṛtikatvānyathānupapattyā
tatkalpanasaṃbhavāt । na ca prapaṃcasya caitanyavattve siddha eva śrutyā brahmaprakṛtikatvamavadhāra-
ṇīyamityanyonyāśraya iti vācyam । yogyatāsaṃśaye'pi śābdajñānasaṃbhavāt । anyathā
jyotiṣṭomasya svargasādhanatvamapūrve kalpita evāvagaṃtavyamiti tatrāpyanyonyāśrayaprasaṃgāt
kāṣṭhajvālāt bhāṃḍatadgatavāristhatejaso dīpāttuṣāgneśca utpattidarśanāt tatrānudbha‍ūtarūpāvaya-
vāntarakalpanāyāṃ gauravāt । na ca puruṣeṣviva ghaṭādiṣvapi caitanyasattve cetanavyavahārā-
nupapattiḥ । caitanyopalaṃbhānupalaṃbhābhyāṃ tadupapatteḥ । ghaṭatṛṇādeḥ kartu/?/palaṃbhānupalaṃbhābhyāṃ
kṛtākṛtavyavahāradarśanāt । tasmādasiddhaṃ prapaṃcasya brahmavailakṣaṇyamityāśaṃkottaratvena <quote>‘tathātvaṃ
ca śabdā’</quote> diti sūtraśeṣamavatārayati—<pratika>kuta iti</pratika> । yaṃ vaidikaśabdamanusṛtya prapaṃcasya brahmaprakṛ-
tikatvaṃ vedaśraddhājaḍena tvayeṣyate tasmādeva vaidikaśabdāt <quote>‘vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ ca’</quote> <quote>‘kṣaraṃ tva-
vidyā hyamṛtaṃ tu vidyā vidyāvidye īśate yastu so'nyaḥ’</quote>ityevamādirūpātprapaṃcasya vikārāspadatvā-
dikamivācetanatvamapyavagamyata ityevaṃ sautraṃ caśabdamevakārārthamaṅgīkṛtya śabdādevetyuktam ।
<quote>‘kṣaraṃ tvavidye’</quote>ti viśiṣya jaḍavargasya vikāritvoktyā cetanavargasya nirvikāratvāt
jīvavat brahmaṇo'pi prapaṃcaprakṛtikatvamanupapannamiti darśayituṃ vā vikārāspadatvaviśeṣaṇam ।
ata<quote>‘ssatyajñāne’</quote>ti satyaśabdo'tra nirvikāraparaḥ । sattāśrayatvāderghaṭādisādhāraṇyāt । nanu
<quote>‘pṛthivyabravīt’</quote> ityādiśrutiṣu pṛthivyādīnāṃ caitanyakāryavyavahārādiśravaṇādastyeva piśā-
cādīnāmiva teṣāmasmadādyanavagataṃ caitanyam । atastadanusāreṇa <quote>‘vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ ce’</quote>
tyādiśrutiḥ kṛtākṛtavyavahāravannetavyetyāśaṃkya śrutayaḥ pṛthivyādyabhimānidevatāviṣayā
ityupapādanārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>।। sū ।। abhimānivyupadeśastu viśeṣānugatibhyām ।। 5 ।।</pratika>
<pb n="011"/>
tadabhimānidevatāviṣaya evetyavagamyate, <quote>‘hantāhamimāstisro devatāḥ’</quote> iti deva-
tāśabdaviśeṣāt ‘agnirvāgbhūtvā mukhaṃ prāviśat ‘ityādinā acidvastvabhi-
mānidevatānugateśca । tasmādacetanatvādinā vilakṣaṇameva jagat brahmaṇaḥ । tato'
sya kāryatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ kāraṇatvaṃ ca yuktibādhyameva ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। dṛśyate tu ।। 6 ।।</sutra>
siddhānta ucyate—vilakṣaṇayorapi brahmaprapañcayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sambhavati,
acetanādgomayāt cetanavṛścikotpattidarśanāt, cetanātpuruṣāt acetanakeśādyu-
tpattidarśanācca । ataḥ śuṣkatarko na bādhakaḥ śrutisamanvayasyeti nirṇayaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>devatāśabdaviśeṣāditi ।</pratika> devatāśabdena cetanavācinā pṛthivyādīnāṃ viśeṣitatvādi-
tyarthaḥ । <pratika>anugateriti</pratika> । anupraveśapratipādanādityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>sū ।। dṛśyate tu ।। 6 ।। tuśabdena</pratika>
pūrvapakṣo vyāvartyate । na tu pūrvasūtra iva siddhāṃtiśaṃkā । atassiddhāṃtasūtramidamityāha—<pratika>siddhāṃ-
ta iti ।</pratika> <quote>‘dṛśyate’</quote> iti kriyāpadam । brahmaprapaṃcayorvailakṣaṇye'pi upādānopādeyabhāvasaṃbhave
hetusamarpakatvena yojayati—<pratika>vilakṣaṇayoriti</pratika> । anena gomayapuruṣaguṇānugatirahitānāṃ
vṛścikakeśanakhādīnāṃ gomayapuruṣaprakṛtikatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti tarkānumānayorvyabhicāra uddhāṭitaḥ ।
nanu, gomayādva‍ṛścikaśarīrasyaivotpattirna cetanasya । śarīrādeva keśanakhādīnāmutpattirna tu ceta-
nāt । tathātve'pi gomayapuruṣayoḥ vṛścikakeśanakhādiṣu nimittanaiva nopādānatvamiti
ceducyate । gomayāt vṛścikaśarīrotpattau vṛścikasya jñānavikāsarūpāvasthāntarāpattyā tasyā-
'pi gomayādutpattistāvadasti । pūrvāvasthāprahāṇenāvasthāntarāpattireva hi dravyasyotpattiḥ ।
tatra ca gomayasyopādānatvaṃ pṛthak‌siddhakāryāvasthāśrayatvarūpatallakṣaṇānusāreṇa sidhyati ।
gomayākārapariṇatagavādyupayuktatṛṇādyanuśayijīvaviśeṣasyaiva vṛścikarūpeṇa prādurbhāvāt । tathā
puruṣasyā'pi keśanakhādiṣu kāraṇatvamasti । mṛtaśarīrāttadanutpatteḥ । tataśca tasya tadupādā-
natvamapi lakṣaṇamukhenāyāti । keśanakhādimataśśarīsya śarīryapṛthagbhāvāt । udāharaṇadvaye-
'pi acetanāṃśayoreva prakṛtivikārabhāvāṃgīkāre'pi vyabhicāro bhavatyeva । vṛścikaśarīre
keśādiṣu ca gomayaśarīragatagandharūpādyanuvṛttyabhāvāt । na ca prapaṃcasya brahmavailakṣaṇyaṃ
tadviśeṣaguṇānugatirāhityaṃ na vivakṣitaṃ kiṃ tu tadgatadravyatvasākṣādvyāpyajātyanugatirāhi-
tyamiti vācyam । prakṛtivikārayorguṇabhedavadavāntarajātibhedasyā'pi saṃbhavena uktarūpasya
vailakṣaṇyasya hetoraprayojakatvāt, araṇimaṇiveṇvādibhyaḥ pārthivebhyo vahneḥ samudrajalāt
pārthivasya muktāphalasya cotpattyā tathā vivakṣāyāmapi vyabhicāratādavasthyācca । na ca
tayorutpattau pārthivataijasāvāntarasannidhānaṃ kalpanīyam । gauravāt । samudrajalādyavayavānā-
meva śuktigarbhānupraveśanirmathanādisahakāribalāt pūrvāvasthāprahāṇenāvasthāntarāpattisaṃbha-
vāt । na ca sajātīyayorevopādānopādeyabhāvasya klṛptatvāt tatkalpanam । upādānopāde-
yabhāvagrahaṇe sājātyānupraveśasya vahnimuktāphalādiṣu sajātīyāvayavāṃtarakalpanāsāpekṣatve-
nānyonyāśrayāpatteḥ । tasmādanumānasya vyabhicārāt tarkasya mūlaśaithilyācca na śrutibādha-
katetyupasaṃharati—<pratika>ata iti । śuṣkatarka iti</pratika> । śuṣkaviśeṣaṇasyāyamāśayaḥ । yattadbhyāma-
<pb n="012"/>
punaḥ śaṅkitvā pariharati---
<sutra>।। sū ।। asaditi cenna pratiṣedhamātratvāta ।। 7 ।।</sutra>
<p>evaṃ kāryakāraṇayorvailakṣaṇyāt kāraṇe kāryamasadeva ‘asadvā idamagra āsīt
iti śruteriti cet---naivaṃ vācyam । sālakṣaṇyaniyamapratiṣedhamātraparatvācchuteḥ ।
ataḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ jagadbahmaṇoḥ vastvekatā na hīyata eva ।। iti navilakṣaṇatvā-
dhikaraṇ ।। 3 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nugatā sāmānyavyāptiriha tarkānumānayoḥ svataṃtratvābhimatayoraṃgam । yatta śrutyavagatasārva-
iyādidṛḍhīkaraṇārthamīśvaro vaidikadraṣṭetyādyanumānaṃ tattu buddhisaṃvādena śrutyavagatasārvajñyadṛ-
ḍhīkaraṇārthaṃ na svayameva kasyacidarthasya sādhanārthamiti buddhisaṃvādāya tatrānanugatāpi sāmā-
nyavyāptirādriyate । tadabhāve'pi hi <quote>‘yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṃḍene’</quote> tyādau dṛṣṭāṃtopanyāsamā-
treṇa buddhisaṃvādo jāyata iti । evaṃ brahmakāraṇatāpratikṣepake vailakṣaṇyāvalaṃbane tarkānumāne
dūṣite pradhānakāraṇatopapādakaṃ sālakṣaṇyāvalaṃbanamanumānaṃ tu dvitīyapāde nirākariṣyate ।
yadyapi sūkṣmacidacidviśiṣṭaṃ brahma kāraṇaṃ tadeva sthūlacidacidviśiṣṭaṃ kāryamiti siddhāṃte
kāraṇakoṭāvapyastyacetanāṃśānupraveśaḥ kāryakoṭāvapi cetanāṃśānupraveśaḥ । tathā'pi kāraṇa-
koṭau viśeṣyabhūtasya brahmaṇaḥ kāryakoṭau viśeṣaṇeṣvacetaneṣvapyupādānatvamupapādīnayam ।
anyathā tasya sarvopādānatvāsiddheḥ । teṣu ca vailakṣaṇyādupādānatvaṃ na saṃbhavatītyevamākṣepasa-
mādhānārthamidamadhikaraṇam । punaśśaṃkitveti । vailakṣaṇye'pyupādānopādeyabhāvamupapāda-
yatā tayodvaryākāratvamabhyupagataṃ syāt । vilakṣaṇayoraikyāyogāt । tathā ca kāraṇātmanā
sata eva kāryasya sthūlarūpāpattirutpattiriti satkāryavāda parityajya kāraṇātmanā prāgasadeva
kāryamutpadyata ityasatkāryavādo'bhyupagataḥ syāt । <quote>‘asadve’</quote> tyādiśruterapi yathāśrutārtha
evāṃgīkṛtaḥ syāt ityāśaṃkya parihiyata ityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। asaditi cenna pratiṣedhamātra-
tvāt ।। 7 ।।</pratika> <pratika>kāraṇe kāryamiti ।</pratika> kāraṇātmanā kāryamasadevetyarthaḥ । netyādiparihārāṃśaṃ
<pratika>vyācaṣṭe—naivaṃ vācyamiti</pratika> । <quote>‘dṛśyate’</quote>tvi ti sūtramupādānopādeyayossālakṣaṇyaniyamapratiṣe-
dhamātraparaṃ na tvekadravyatvapratiṣedhaparamapi । vailakṣaṇye'pyāraṃbhaṇādhikaraṇe vakṣyamāṇanyāyena
dravyaikyopapatteriti bhāvaḥ । ata evāraṃbhaṇādhikaraṇapratipāditanyāyānuvādamātraparamidaṃ
sūtram । śruterityanena <quote>‘dṛśyate tvi’</quote>ti sūtraśravaṇaṃ vivakṣitam । adhikaraṇārthamuparāṃharati—
ata iti ।</p>
<head>iti navilakṣaṇatvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha navilakṣaṇatvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। navilakṣaṇatvādasya tathātvaṃ ca śabdāt ।। 4 ।। abhimānivyapadeśastu viśeṣānugatibhyām
।। 5 ।। dṛśyate tu ।। 6 ।। asaditi cenna pratiṣedhamātratvāt ।। 7 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>jagato vilakṣaṇatvādacetanasyāsya sarvajñāt । na parīkṣakābhinaṃdyaṃ tadupādānatvametasya ।। 91 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>dṛṣṭā vailakṣaṇye'pyalino gomayata utpattiḥ । tadvassarvajñādapyutpattissaṃbhavejjagataḥ ।। 92 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti navilakṣaṇatvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<pb n="013"/>
atha apītau tadvatprasaṅgādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। apītau tadvatprasaṅgādasamañjasam ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
satkāryavādena kāryakāraṇayoḥ jagadbrahmaṇoḥ vastvekatve samanvayasya tarkabādhya-
tvamasti na vā ।
iti sandehe'stīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । kutaḥ ? yata eva jagadbrahmaṇoḥ vastvekatvamu-
ktam । tathā sati hi jagata iva brahmaṇo'pi vikārājñānādyaniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ samunmi-
ṣati । tato vedāntavākyānāṃ sāmarasyamasamañjasaṃ bhavati । ataḥ tarkeṇa samanva-
yabādha iti ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। na tu dṛṣṭāntabhāvāt ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha apītau tadvatprasaṃgādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। apītau tadvatprasaṃgādasamañjasam ।। 8 ।।</pratika> pūrvasūtraprasaktakāryakāraṇayorvastvaikyaśru-
tisamanvayasiddhaṃ brahmaṇo nirdoṣakalyāṇaguṇākaratvamākṣipya samādhīyata iti saṃgatimabhi-
pretya saṃśayaṃ darśayati—<pratika>satkāryavādeneti</pratika> । vastvaikyasya brahmaṇi prapañcadoṣāpādakatvānāpā-
dakatvābhyāṃ saṃśaya iti bhāvaḥ । tasya tadāpādakatvamupapādayati—<pratika>tathā satīti</pratika> । brahmapra-
paṃcayoraikye cetanācetanagatāssarve'pi doṣāḥ prapañca iva brahmaṇyapi prasajyeran । tataśca nirdo-
ṣakalyāṇaguṇākare samābhyadhikarahite brahmaṇi vedāṃtānāṃ samanvaya iti yadvyavasthāpitaṃ tada-
samañjasaṃ bhavedityarthaḥ । nanu prapañcasthitikāle taddoṣairduṣṭatve'pi tasya pralaye sati nirdoṣaka-
lyāṇaguṇayuktaṃ <pratika>brahmāvatiṣṭhata</pratika> iti tadviṣayatvaṃ vedāṃtavākyānāmupapadyate । <quote>‘caitrassukhī
jīvatī’</quote> tyādivākyānāmiva vyādhyādirāhityakālaviṣayatvamityāśaṃkānirākaraṇārthamapī-
tāviti pralayasya sūtre viśiṣya <pratika>grahaṇam</pratika> । pralaye'pi bhāvikalpabhogyaphalahetūnāṃ pāpmanāṃ
sūkṣmarūpāpanneṣu jīveṣu sattvāvaśyaṃbhāvāt tairduṣṭatvaṃ sthitikāla iva pralayakāle'pi brahmaṇaḥ
prasajyata ityapahatapāpmatvādiśrutīnāmasāmañjasyamanuddhāryamiti । nanu brahmaprapaṃcayorvastvekatvaṃ
nābhedaḥ kiṃ tu ghaṭapaṭayoriva svātantryābhāvenāpṛthaksattvarūpamananyatvamityāraṃbhaṇādhikaraṇe
samarthayiṣyate । tadabhiprāyeṇaiva pūrvasūtre sālakṣaṇyapratiṣedhamātraṃ na tatkṛtaṃ kāraṇaikyamityu-
ktam । na tvabhedābhiprāyeṇa । tasmānna brahmaṇi doṣaprasaṃga ityāha—<pratika>ata iti</pratika> । evamāntarga-
ṇikabhedāṃgīkāre'pi masūrikādimahārogaparavaśabahujanasamākrāṃtasya rogitvamiva duṣṭaprapaṃcā-
vṛtasya duṣṭatvamavarjanīyam । duṣṭasaṃsargamātramapi hi doṣāya kalpate kimu vaktavyaṃ tadapṛtha-
gbhāvo doṣāya kalpata iti । atha syādapṛthagbhāve'pi śarīragatadharmā bālatvayuvatvādayaśśa-
rīriṇaṃ na spṛśaṃtīti dṛṣṭaṃ, śarīraṃ cedaṃ brahmaṇaścetanācetanātmakaṃ jagadiṣyate । antaryāmi-
brāhmaṇe tathā pratipādanāt । atastaddoṣaiḥ brahmaṇo na duṣṭatvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti । naitada'pi yuktam ।
hastapādādisaṃsthānaviśeṣaśūnyasya prāṇadhāryatvarahitasya iṃdriyānāśrayasya brahma prati bhogāyata-
natvarahitasya jagatastaccharīratvāyogena tatra taccharīratvaśravaṇasya tanniyamyatvamātreṇaupacā-
rikatvāt । tasmāt prapañcabrahmaṇorabheda iva sārvadikasaṃsargarūpāpṛthagbhāve'pi prapaṃcadoṣaiḥ
brahmaṇo duṣṭatvamanivāryamiti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>sū । na tu dṛṣṭāṃtabhāvāt ।। 9 ।।</pratika> tuśabdena prapañcasya
<pb n="014"/>
neti pūrvapakṣaṃ vyāvartayati । <quote>‘yasyātmā śarīram’</quote> <quote>‘yasyāvyaktaṃ śarīram’</quote> ityā-
diśrutyā, <quote>‘vigrahaṃ devadevasya jagadetaccarācaram । etamarthaṃ na jānanti paśavaḥ pāśa-
gauravāt ।।’</quote> ityādipurāṇoktyā ca siddhaciṃdaciccharīrakasya parabrahmaṇaḥ śivasya
kāryatayā kāraṇatayā cāvasthāne guṇadoṣavyavasthāyāṃ dṛṣṭāntasadbhāvāt tatra
vedāntavākyasamanvayasāmarasyamasamañjasaṃ na bhavati । katham ? yathā śarīrasya
manuṣyādyātmano bālatvayuvatvasthaviratvādibhāve'pi bālatvādayaḥ śarīra eva,
sukhādayastvātmanyeva, tadvadatrāpi śarīrabhūtacidacidvastugatājñānavikārādyani-
ṣṭhāni śarīrabhūte cidacidvastunyeva tiṣṭhanti niravadyatvāvikāratvasārvajñyasa-
tyasaṅkalpatvādaya ātmabhūte parameśvara eva । tadevaṃ dṛṣṭāntabhāvācchrutyasāmañjasyaṃ
brahmaṇi nāstyeva ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। svapakṣadoṣācca ।। 10 ।।</sutra>
kevalaṃ tarkāvalambane svapakṣa eva pradhānakāraṇavādinaḥ nirvikārapuruṣasannidhi-
vaśāt prakṛtipravṛttau satyāmanyonyadharmādhyāsyā durupapādā bhavanti । anyatrā-
nyadharmānusandhānarūpo'dhyāso nirvikārasya puruṣasya na sambhavati । acetanāyāḥ
prakṛteścānusandhānarūpo'dhyāso na sambhavatyeva । ataḥ pradhānakāraṇavāda eva
tarkabādhyaḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। tarkāpratiṣṭhānāt ।। 11 ।।</sutra>
tarkasyāpratiṣṭhitatvāt pradhānakāraṇavādasya tanmūlatvāt tatra pratitarkasambha-
vāt tasyaiva tyājyatvaṃ na brahmakāraṇavādasyeti ।।
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। anyathā'numeyamiti cedevamapyanirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>brahmaśarīratvāsaṃbhavaśaṃkāvyāvṛttiḥ । tataśca dṛṣṭāṃtalābhādāpāditamasāmañjasyaṃ na bhavatītyevaṃ
sūtrārthamabhipretya vyācaṣṭe—</pratika>netīti । prapañcasya brahmaśarīratvaṃ <quote>‘sarvatra prasiddhopadeśā’</quote> <ref>(1.2.1.)</ref>
dityadhikaraṇabhāṣye pratipāditam । tatraivāsmābhiśśarīralakṣaṇapradarśanapūrvakaṃ tasya brahmaśarī-
ratvaṃ prapaṃcenopapāditam । tatsarvametadadhikaraṇanyāyasiddhārthānuvādarūpamityavadheyam <pratika>। sū ।।
svapakṣadoṣācca ।। 10 ।।</pratika> cakāramevakārārthaṃ kṛtvā sāṃkhyānāṃ svapakṣa eva doṣā bhavaṃti na
tvasmatpakṣe tadāpāditā doṣā iti sūtrārthamabhipretya tatpakṣe doṣaṃ darśayati—<pratika>kevalamiti ।</pratika>
puruṣasannidhānāt prakṛtirmahadahaṃkārādiprapaṃcasṛṣṭau pravartate । tataḥ prapañcapuruṣadharmāṇāmaddhyā-
sarūpassaṃsāra iti hi sāṃkhyaprakriyā । tasyāmanyatrānyadharmānusaṃdhānarūpo'dhyāso na tāvatpu-
ruṣasya saṃbhavati । tasya nirvikāratvāt । nāpi prakṛteḥ । tasyā acetanatvābhyupagamāt ।
ataḥ kevalatarkāvalaṃbane pradhānakāraṇavāda eva tarkabādhyaḥ syāditi dvitīyapāde sāṃkhyā-
dhikaraṇe vakṣyamāṇo doṣassaṃgrahārthamatra darśitaḥ ।। sū ।। tarkāpratiṣṭhānāt ।। 11 ।। kevalata-
rkāvalaṃbanaiḥ pradhānakāraṇavādibhirunnītāḥ svapakṣopapādakāstarkāḥ paramāṇukāraṇavādibhista-
thābhūtairdūṣyante te cānyairityevaṃ śuṣkatarkāṇāmapratiṣṭhitatvāt tadavalaṃbanapradhānakāraṇavādaṃ
parityajya śrutyanusāribrahmakāraṇavāda eva parigrāhya ityevaṃ sūtrārthamabhipretya vyācaṣṭe—tarka-
<pratika>syeti ।। sū ।। anyathānumeyamiti cedevamapyanirmokṣaprasaṃgaḥ ।। 12 ।।</pratika> yathedānīṃ sāṃkhyaiḥ
<pb n="015"/>
anyathā yathā pratitarkaparāhatiḥ na bhavati tathā prakārāntareṇa pradhānamanume-
yamiti vādo'pi yukto na bhavati । tatrāpyevaṃ pratitarkakalahasambhāvanayā prati-
ṣṭhitatvābhāvadoṣādanirmokṣa eva prasajyate । tataḥ śuṣkatarkamūlaḥ pradhānakāraṇa
vāda eva tyājyaḥ na tu prabalaśrutipramāṇasiddho brahmakāraṇavāda iti yuktam ।।
ityapītau tadvatprasaṃgādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pradhānakāraṇatvopapādakatayā upanyasyamānānāṃ tarkāṇāṃ naiyāyikāditarkaiḥ pratihatirbhavati
tathā yasminprakāre pratihatirna bhavati tathābhūtenānyādṛśena prakāreṇa pradhānamanumāsyāmaha itye-
tadapyabhimānamātram । yatastādṛśaḥ puruṣabuddhikalpitaḥ tarka eva na saṃbhavati । kena citkuśa-
lenonnītasya tarkasya kuśalatarānyonnītatarkeṇa pratihatisaṃbhavāt puruṣabuddhiprabhavakalpanānā-
mamaryādatvāt । atastarkāṃtaronnayanaprayāse'pyapratiṣṭhitatvadoṣādanirmokṣa eva prasajyata
ityevaṃ sūtrārthamabhipretya vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>anyatheti</pratika> । aśuṣkatarkāvalaṃbanena pradhānakāraṇavādasya
vyavasthāpanāsaṃbhavāt vedāṃtasiddhe brahmakāraṇavāde paronnītakutarkāprasarācca sa eva yukta
ityadhikaraṇārthamupasaṃharati—<pratika>tata iti</pratika> ।।</p>
<head>ityapītau tadvatprasaṃgādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha apītau tadvatprasaṃgādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। apītau tadvatprasaṃgādasamañjasam ।। 8 ।। na tu dṛṣṭāntabhāvāt ।। 9 ।। svapakṣadoṣācca ।। 10 ।।
tarkāpratiṣṭhānāt ।। 11 ।। anyathānumeyamiti cedevamapyanirmokṣaprasaṃgaḥ ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>satkāryavādinaste matamaikyaṃ kāryakāraṇayoḥ । tasmājjagata iva syāddoṣagaṇaśśaṃkarasyāpi । 93 ।</l></lg>
<lg><l>cidaciccharīrakasya hi kāryatvaṃ kāraṇatvamapi । na syuśśarīradoṣāśśarīriṇo bālyayauvanādinayāt ।। 94 ।।</l></lg>
<head>ityapītau tadvatprasaṃgādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha na vilakṣaṇatvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। na vilakṣaṇatvādasya tathātvaṃ ca śabdāt ।। 4 ।। abhimānivyapadeśastu viśeṣānugatibhyām
।। 5 ।। dṛśyate tu ।। 6 ।। asaditi cenna pratiṣedhamātratvāt ।। 7 ।। apītau tadvatprasaṅgādasamañjasam ।। 8 ।।
natu dṛṣṭāntabhāvāt ।। 9 ।। svapakṣadoṣācca ।। 10 ।। tarkāpratiṣṭhānādapyanyathānumeyamiti cedevamapya-
vimokṣaprasaṅgaḥ ।। 11 ।।</sutra>
<p>bhagavatpādamate, vedaviruddhasāṃkhyādismṛtīnāṃ mūlābhāvādaprāmāṇyasiddhāvapi vyāptipakṣadharmatāmūlakalokasiddhatarkeṇa
vaidikasamanvayo virudhyeta vā navesi saṃdehe, <pratika>na</pratika> jagat cetanaprakṛtikam । <pratika>asyā</pratika>cetanasya jagataḥ cetanā<pratika>dvilakṣaṇatvāt</pratika> ।
yat yadvilakṣaṇaṃ na tat tatprakṛtikam । yathā tantuvilakṣaṇo ghaṭo na tantuprakṛtikaḥ । atastarkeṇa virodhādvaidikasamanvayo na
yukta iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । nanu brahmajagatorvailakṣaṇyaṃ kuto'vagatamiti cet <pratika>tathātvaṃ ca</pratika>=vailakṣaṇyaṃ ca । <pratika>śabdāt</pratika>=<quote>‘vijñānaṃ cāvijñā naṃ
cābhavat’</quote> ityādiśrutito'vagatamityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>nanu <quote>‘te heme prāṇā ahaṃśreyase vivadamānā’</quote> ityādiśrutibhibrahmavajjagataścetanatvāvagamātra tayorvailakṣaṇyamityāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>sū ।।
abhimānivyapadeśastu viśeṣānugatibhyām ।। 6 ।।</pratika> uktaśaṅkānirāsārthastuśabdaḥ । uktaśrutibhirna jagataścetanatvaṃ
pratyetavyam । <quote>‘te heme prāṇā’</quote> ityādiṣu prāṇādyabhimāninīnāṃ devatānāṃ vyapadeśo bhavati na prāṇādimātrasya । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>viśeṣānugatibhyām</pratika>=<quote>‘etā havai devatā ahaṃśreyase vivadamānāḥ’</quote> iti prāṇānāṃ cetanavācinā devatāśabdena viśeṣitatvāt
<quote>‘agnirvāgbhūtvā mukhaṃ prāviśat’</quote> ityādimantrārthavādādiṣu sarvatra tadabhimānidevatānāmanugatiśravaṇāccetyarthaḥ । ato na cetanaṃ
jagat । tasmādacetanasya jagato <pratika>vailakṣaṇyānna cetanaprakṛtikatvam</pratika> ।</p>
<pb n="016"/>
<p><pratika>siddhāntastu—sū ।। dṛśyate tu ।। 6 ।।</pratika> tuśabdaḥ pūrvapakṣanirāsārthaḥ । yaduktaṃ cetanavilakṣaṇaṃ jaganna tatprakṛtikamiti ।
tanna । cetanātpuruṣāttadvilakṣaṇānāṃ nakhalomādīnāmacetanānām acetanācca gomayāccetanavṛścikādīnāmutpattiryato dṛśyate ata
ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>asatkāryavādaprasaṅgamāśaṅkya nirācaṣṭe—<pratika>sū ।। asaditi cenna pratiṣedhamātratvāt ।। 7 ।।</pratika> nanu tarhi cetanasya
nāmarūpādihīnasya acetananāmarūpādimajjagaddhetutve utpatteḥ pūrvaṃ jagadasadeva syāditi cet । na । kutaḥ । <pratika>pratiṣedhamātra-
tvāt</pratika>=<quote>‘asatsyā’</quote>diti yo'yaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ tanmātratvāt । na tu tasya pratiṣedhyamastītyarthaḥ । kāryasattāyāḥ kāraṇāvyatirekāt
sthitidaśāyāmivotpatteḥ pūrvamapi brahmātmakamevedaṃ jagaditi bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p>jagadbrahmaṇoruktaṃ kāryakāraṇatvamasahamānaścodayati—<pratika>sū ।। apītau tadvatprasaṅgādasamañjajam ।। 8 ।।</pratika> śuddhatvādiguṇakaṃ
brahma jagadupādānamityasamañjasam । kutaḥ <pratika>apītau</pratika>=pralayakāle । <pratika>tadvatprasaṅgāt</pratika>=kāryavat kāraṇasyāpi brahmaṇo'śuddhatvādi-
prasaṅgādityarthaḥ । ataḥ jagadbrahmaṇoruktaṃ kāryakāraṇatvamasamañjasamityarthaḥ । evamākṣepe pariharati—<pratika>sū ।। natu dṛṣṭāntabhāvāt
।। 9 ।।</pratika> tuśabda evakārārthaḥ । pūrvoktamasāmañjasyaṃ nāstyeva । kutaḥ । <pratika>dṛṣṭāntabhāvāt</pratika>=kāryaṃ kāraṇe līyamānaṃ svadharmeṇa
kāraṇaṃ na dūṣayatītyasminnarthe śataśo mṛddhaṭādīnāṃ dṛṣṭāntānāṃ sattvādityarthaḥ ।। itthaṃ svapakṣe doṣānparihṛtya tāneva parapakṣe
nirūpayati—<pratika>sū ।। svapakṣadoṣācca ।। 10 ।।</pratika> jagadbrahmaṇoḥ vilakṣaṇatvātprakṛtivikārabhāvānupapattiḥ utpatteḥ prāk jagato'-
sattvaprasaṅgaḥ pralaye kāryavatkāraṇasyāpi brahmaṇo'śuddhatvādiprasaṅgaḥ iti sāṃkhyenāsmatpakṣe ye doṣā udbhāvitāste śabdādihī-
nātpradhānācchabdādimato vilakṣaṇasya jagata utpattimaṅgīkurvatāṃ sāṃkhyānāmapi samānāḥ । vastutaḥ prapañcasatyatvavādināṃ
sāṃkhyānāṃ mata evaite doṣāḥ nānirvacanīyavādināmasmākaṃ mate iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p>itaśca na kevalena tarkeṇa vaidikasasmanvayo virudhyata ityāha—<pratika>sū ।। tarkāpratiṣṭhānādapyanyathānumeyamiti cedevama-
pyanirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ ।। 11 ।।</pratika> ekena tārkikeṇānumito'pyartho'nyena śreṣṭhatareṇānyathā nīyata iti kevalasya <pratika>tarkasya
apratiṣṭhānādapi</pratika>=apratiṣṭhitatvācca । na tena samanvayavirodhaśaṅketyarthaḥ । kasyacittarkasyāpratiṣṭhitatve'pi kasyacitpratiṣṭhi-
tatvasaṃbhavāt <pratika>anyathānumeyamiti cet</pratika>=apratiṣṭhitatarkādanyena prakāreṇa pratiṣṭhitatarkeṇa samanvayavirodhādikamanumeya-
miti cet atra samādhatte—<pratika>evamapi</pratika>=anyatra tarkasya pratiṣṭhitatve'pi prakṛte liṅgādihīne brahmaṇi vedaniraṇkṣesya tarkasyā-
pratiṣṭhitatvadoṣādavimokṣaprasaṃgaḥ । yadvā । <pratika>evamapi</pratika>=mahatāṃ kapilakaṇādādīnāṃ parasparavipratipannairāgamanirapekṣaistarkaistattva-
nirṇayābhāvādavimokṣaprasaṅgaḥ । mokṣābhāvaḥ prasajyeta । tasmādāgamavirodho tarko'pramāṇamiti na tena virodha iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti bhagavatpādamate nevilakṣaṇatvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika> <quote>‘na vilakṣaṇatvā’</quote>dityādicatuḥsūtrātmakamidaṃ na vilakṣaṇatvādhikaraṇam <quote>‘apītau tadvatprasaṅgā’</quote>dityādikā
tarkāpratiṣṭhānā’diti yogavibhāgavatī apiśabdavarjitā pañcasūtrī adhikaraṇāntaramityasti viśeṣaḥ । navilakṣaṇatvādhikara-
ṇīyaṃ saṃdehapūrvapakṣādikaṃ bhagavatpādīyamatādaviśiṣṭam । sūtrārthaścāviśiṣṭa eva prāyaśaḥ । <quote>‘asaditi’</quote> sūtrārthavarṇane paraṃ
<pratika>‘pratiṣedhamātratvāt</pratika>=vailakṣaṇya <ref>(sālakṣaṇya)</ref> niyamapratiṣedhamātraviṣayatvācchruteḥ’ iti vyākhyāya <quote>‘kāryakāraṇayorjagadbrahmaṇo-
rvastvekatā na hīyata eve’</quote>tyuktam ।। 3 ।।</p>
<head>athāpītau tadvatprasaṅgādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। apītau tadvatprasaṅgādasamañjasam ।। 8 ।।</pratika> satkāryavādena jagadbrahmaṇorvastvektvābhyupagame vaidika samanvayasya
<quote>‘tarkabādhyatvamasti na veti saṃdehaḥ । <pratika>apītau</pratika>=pralaye । <pratika>tadvat</pratika>=sthitikāla iva । <pratika>prasaṅgāt</pratika>=cetanācetanarūpaprapañcadharmāṇāṃ
vikārājñānādīnāṃ doṣāṇāṃ brahmaṇyapi prasakteḥ brahmakāraṇavādimatamasamañjasamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । siddhāntamāha—<pratika>sū ।। na tu-
dṛṣṭāntabhāvāt ।। 9 ।।</pratika> pūrvoktamasāmañjasyaṃ <pratika>na tu</pratika>=siddhyati । kutaḥ । <pratika>dṛṣṭāntabhāvāt</pratika>=sakalacetanācetanaprapañcaśarī-
rakasya parabrahmaṇaḥ śivasya kāraṇatayā kāryatayā cāvasthānasya śrutipurāṇābhyāmabhyupagame guṇadoṣavyavasthāyāṃ dṛṣṭāntasadbhā-
vāt vaidikasamanvayasya sāmañjasyamasamañjasaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ । yathā manuṣyādīnāṃ bālatvayuvatvasthaviratvādibhāve'pi bālatvādaya-
śśarīra eva sukhādayastvātmanyeva tathā śarīrabhūtacetanācetanaprapañcagatā ajñānavikārādayo doṣāḥ śarīrabhūte prapañca’</quote> eva tiṣṭhanti
niravadyatvasārvaṃjñyādayo guṇāstu ātmabhūte parameśvara eva । tasmādevaṃ dṛṣṭāntasadbhāvātpūrvoktaṃ śrutyasāmañjasyaṃ nāstyeveti bhāvaḥ ।
<pratika>sū ।। svapakṣadoṣācca ।। 18 ।।</pratika> cakāra evakārārthaḥ । kevalatarkāvalaṃbane <pratika>svapakṣa eva</pratika>=pradhānakāraṇavāda eva । <pratika>doṣāt</pratika>=
nirvikārapuruṣasānnidhyena prakṛtipravṛttau satyāmanyatrānyadharmānusaṃdhānarūpādhyāsasya nirvikāre puruṣe'nupapannatvāt acetanāyāṃ
prakṛtau cānusaṃdhānarūpādhyāsasyaivāprasakteśca anyonyadharmādhyāsarūpasaṃsārasyaivāsaṃbhavena doṣasaṃbhavātpradhānakāraṇavāda eva
<pb n="017"/>
tarkabādhyaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ । kiṃca । <pratika>sū ।। tarkāpratiṣṭhānāt ।। 11 ।।</pratika> pratitarkasaṃbhavena tarkasyāpratiṣṭhitatvasaṃbhavaccā
tanmūlakaḥ pradhānakāraṇavāda eva parityājyaḥ na tu brahmakāraṇavādaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। anyathānumeyamiti cedevamapyanirmokṣaprasaṃgaḥ ।। 12 ।। anyathā</pratika>=pratitarkairyathābhibhavo na saṃbhavati tathā
prakārāntareṇa । <pratika>anumeyamiti cet</pratika>=pradhānamanumeyamiti cet tadapi na yujyate । kutaḥ । tatrāpyevaṃ pratitarkakalahasaṃbhāva-
nayā apratiṣṭhitatvadoṣādanirmokṣa eva syāt । ataḥ śuṣkatarkamūlaḥ pradhānakāraṇavāda eva tyājyaḥ na tu brahmakāraṇavādaḥ
iti yuktam ।। <pratika>iti apītau tadvatprasaṃgādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, <quote>‘tarkāpratiṣṭhānādapi’</quote> iti yogavibhāgena apiśabdānuṣaṅgapāṭhayutaṃ sūtranavakātmakamidaṃ navilakṣaṇatvā-
dhikaraṇam । yadyapi na śrīkaṇṭhamatavadadhikaraṇāntaramatra । tathāpi sūtrārthavarṇanaprakārastu śrīkaṇṭhamatamevānusaratītīdamastīhā-
vadheyam । saṃdehapūrvapakṣasiddhāntādinirūpaṇaprakārastvanyādṛśa eva । vedāntānāṃ kiṃ jagatkāraṇatayā brahmaparatvamuta pradhānapa-
ratvamiti saṃśaye ajñatvādinā jagato brahmavilakṣaṇatvena brahmakāryatvapratipādanāsaṃbhavāt sālakṣaṇyena pradhānapratipādanasaṃbhavācca
pradhānaparatvamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, mākṣikādibhyaḥ krimyādīnāṃ vilakṣaṇānāmutpattidarśanāt brahmavilakṣaṇasya
jagataḥ tatkāryatvaṃ saṃbhavatyeveti । itthaṃ pūrvapakṣasiddhāṃtānurodhena śrīkaṇṭhīyaprakriyānusāreṇa ca sūtrārthavarṇanamasminmate
sūpapādamiti viramyate vistarataḥ ।। <pratika>iti rāmānujamate navilakṣaṇatvādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>’ idamadhikaraṇaṃ <quote>‘<pratika>na vilakṣaṇatvādasya tathātvaṃ ca śabdāt ।। 4 ।। dṛśyate tu ।। 5 ।।</pratika>’</quote> iti
sūtradvayātmakam । <quote>‘dṛśyate tu’</quote> iti sūtrapāṭho'dhiko'trānyamatebhyaḥ । phalādarśanarūpahetunā pāśupatādismṛteryadyaprāmāṇyaṃ
syādevaṃ kvacitkvacidvedoditakārīryādiphalasya vṛṣṭyāderasaṃbhavādvedasyāpyaprāmāṇyaṃ syādvā naveti saṃśaye kvācitkasya phalavi-
saṃvādasyobhayatra sādhāraṇyādvedasyāpyaprāmāṇyaṃ syāttato na samanvayasiddhiriti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, vedasya
tadanusārismṛtyādeśca svataḥprāmāṇyākhyetaravailakṣaṇyasattvāt kvācitkasya phalavisaṃvādasyobhayatra sādhāraṇye'pi svataḥ
pramāṇe vede tadanusārismṛtyādau cāṅgavaiguṇyakalpanayā tadupapatteranyatra pauruṣeyatayā svataḥprāmāṇyābhāvavatīṣu śaivādismṛtiṣu
tatkalpanāyā ayuktatvācca vedasya tathātvāsaṃbhavānna samanvayāsiddhiriti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, asya</pratika>=śrutitadanusārismṛtyādeḥ ।
<pratika>tathātvaṃ na</pratika>=śaivādismṛtivadaprāmāṇyaṃ na bhavati । kutaḥ । <pratika>vilakṣaṇatvāt</pratika>=svataḥprāmāṇyākhyetaravailakṣaṇyāt । kiṃca ।
śruternityatvākhyavailakṣaṇyavattvātsmṛteḥ śrutyanusāritvākhyavailakṣaṇyavattvāñca । tathātvamityasyobhayatrānvayaḥ । <pratika>tathātvaṃ ca</pratika>=
uktavailakṣaṇyavattvaṃ ca । <pratika>śabdāt</pratika>=<quote>‘vācā virūpanityaye’</quote>tyāgamānniścitamityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>sū ।। <pratika>dṛśyate tu ।। 5 ।।</pratika> tuśabdo viśeṣārthe । yataḥ tatphalayogyādhikāriviśeṣāṇāṃ śrutyādyuktaṃ phalaṃ <pratika>dṛśyate</pratika>=upala-
bhyate ato nāprāmāṇyamityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>ityānandatīrthamate navilakṣaṇatvādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>athābhimānyadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। abhimānivyapadeśastu viśeṣānugatibhyām ।। 6 ।। dṛśyate ca ।।</pratika> atrādhikaraṇe <quote>‘mṛdabravīt’</quote>
<quote>‘āpo'bruvan’</quote> ityādiyuktiviruddhārthābhidhāyakatvādvedavacasāmaprāmāṇya bhavati vā naveti saṃdehaḥ । mṛnna vakrī jaḍatvādityā-
diyuktivirodhādvedavacasāmaprāmāṇyaṃ syāt iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । tatra mṛdādipadānāṃ tattadabhimānidevatāparatvena virodhābhāvā-
daprāmāṇyaṃ na bhavatīti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu</pratika>, tuśabdo'vadhāraṇe । <pratika>abhimānivyapadeśaḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘mṛdabravī’</quote>dityādau
abhimāninaścetanasyaivoktiḥ na tvacetanasya । kutaḥ । munna vakrī jaḍatvāt iti yuktivirodhāt । tathā ca vedāprāmāṇyam ।
nanvabhimānino videhatvāyogena sadehatve tasyādarśamanyavastvadhiṣṭhānena vaktṛtvamanekābhimanyamānādhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ cetyādikaṃ
kathaṃ yujyate ityata āha—<pratika>viśeṣānugatibhyām=viśeṣaḥ</pratika>=viśiṣṭaṃ sāmarthyam <pratika>anugatiḥ</pratika>=sarvābhimanyamānavyāptiḥ ।
tābhyāṃ sarvaṃ yujyata ityarthaḥ । sū ।। <pratika>dṛśyate ca</pratika>=abhimānidevatāyāṃ sāmarthyaṃ yogibhirupalabhyate ca । ato'pi nāstyada-
rśanavirodha ityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>ityabhimānyadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>athāsadadhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p>atra <quote>‘<pratika>asaditi ce</pratika>’</quote>dityādiḥ <quote>‘<pratika>etena śiṣṭāparigrahā api vyākhyātāḥ ।</pratika>’</quote> ityantā ṣaṭsūtrī asadadhikaraṇatvena
vyapadiśyate । pūrvādhikaraṇe kevalayuktyavirodhāya hi mṛdādiśabdānāmaprasiddhārthaparatvakalpanena vedaprāmāṇyaṃ vyavasthāpitam ।
tathāpi pralaye sarvābhāvābhyupagamasya śrutyanumoditayuktisiddhatvādviś‍vaprāgabhāvasyaiva jagatkartṛtvamupapadyate na viṣṇoriti
<pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।</pratika> pralaye sarvābhāvānabhyupagamāt <quote>‘sadeveda’</quote> mityādibahuśrutivirodhāt pratiṣedhasya kartṛtvāsaṃbhavācca sarvābhāvapakṣe</p>
<pb n="018"/>
atha śiṣṭāparigrahādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। etena śiṣṭāparigrahā api vyākhyātāḥ ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
<p>yathedaṃ sāṃkhyadarśanaṃ tarkamūlatvenāpratiṣṭhitatvādinā pratyākhyātaṃ tathaiva tenaiva
hetunā śiṣṭānāmaparigrahāḥ kaṇabhakṣākṣapādādīnāṃ pakṣā aparigrāhyā iti
vyākhyātāḥ । etaduktaṃ bhavati—kaṇādādimatasiddhaparamāṇukāraṇavādo'pi nirā-
kṛta iti ।।
iti śiṣṭāparigrahādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha śiṣṭāparigrahādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। etena śiṣṭāparigrahā api vyākhyātāḥ ।। 13 ।।</pratika> etena tarkāpratiṣṭhitatvadūṣaṇena
śiṣṭānāṃ śuṣkatarkāvalaṃbiṣu kapilādiṣvavaśiṣṭānāṃ kaṇabhakṣādīnāṃ ye'parigrahāḥ vedaparigrahara-
hitāḥ pakṣāste'pi vyākhyātāḥ vaidikairaparigrāhyatvena upapāditaprāyā iti sūtrayojanāmabhi-
pretya vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>yatheti</pratika> । etenetyatideśādhikaraṇasyādhikaśaṃkāṃ <pratika>darśayati—etaduktamiti ।</pratika>
ādiśabdenākṣacaraṇakṣapaṇakasamantabhadrādayo gṛhyante । anena pradhānakāraṇavādāpekṣayā bahusaṃ-
matatvamekamadhikaśaṃkākāraṇaṃ sūcitam । paramāṇutvakīrtanenāpyanyadadhikaśaṃkākāraṇaṃ sūcita-
m । alpādhikaparimāṇayorhi taṃtupaṭādiṣūpādānopādeyabhāve dṛṣṭaḥ na tu vaiparītyaṃ dṛṣṭam ।
atastrisareṇuprabhṛtiṣu pṛthivīgolakādiparyaṃteṣu kāryeṣu paramāṇūnāmeva kāraṇatvaṃ yuktaṃ na tu
kāryebhyo'dhikaparimāṇasya pradhānāderiti । <pratika>nirākṛta iti</pratika> । apratiṣṭhitatarkamūlatvāviśe-
ṣeṇa paramāṇukāraṇavādināmeva paramāṇugatasatyatvāsatyatvabāhyatvāṃtaratvavyavasthāpakatarkāṇāṃ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dṛṣṭāntābhāvāñca vedaparigrahaśūnyāḥ aviśiṣṭā jīvakālasvabhāvādikartṛtvapakṣāssarve'pi nirastā ityatassiddhaṃ viṣṇorjagatkartṛṃ-
tvamiti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu sū ।। asaditi cenna pratiṣedhamātratvāt ।। 8 ।। asat</pratika>=viś‍vaprāgabhāva eva ।
jagatkartṛ, neś‍vara iti cenna । kutaḥ । <pratika>pratiṣedhamātratvāt</pratika>=abhāvadharmātmatāmantareṇa svarūpata eva niṣedhabuddhiviṣayatvā-
dityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। apītau tadvatprasaṃgādasamañjasam ।। 9 ।। apītau</pratika>=pralaye । <pratika>tadvatprasaṃgāt</pratika>=asanmātravattvaprasaṃgāt
asatkartṛtvamasamañjasamayuktamityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। na tu dṛṣṭāntabhāvāt ।। 10 ।।</pratika> tuśabdo'vadhāraṇe । pralaye sarvāsattvaṃ na yujyate । kutaḥ । tadā sarvapadārthasattva
eva <pratika>dṛṣṭāntasya bhāvāt</pratika> sadbhāvādityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। svapakṣadoṣācca ।। 11 ।। svapakṣe</pratika> pralaye sarvāsattvapakṣe <pratika>doṣāt</pratika>=dṛṣṭāntābhāvākhyadoṣācca na tatpakṣo yukta ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। tarkāṃpratiṣṭhānādanyathāpyanumeyamiti cedevamapyanirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ ।। 12 ।। tarkāpratiṣṭhānāt</pratika>=dṛṣṭāntābhā-
vādirūpatarkasyāpratiṣṭhānāt avyavasthitatvāt । <pratika>anyathāpi</pratika>=siddhāntyuktaprakārādanyarūpeṇāpi pratitarkeṇa <pratika>anumeyaṃ</pratika>=
sādhanīyamiti cet । neti śeṣaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>evamapi</pratika>=evaṃ sati tarkamātrasyāprāmāṇye sati । <pratika>anirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ</pratika>=
sarvasiddhāntibhiḥ svasvaśāstraprayojanatvenāṅgīkṛtasyāpi mokṣasyāpi lopaprasaṃgaḥ । kutaḥ । tasya vipratipannaṃ prati anumānenaiva
sādhanīyatayā tasyāpyevamaprāmāṇyoktisaṃbhavādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। etena śiṣṭāparigrahā api vyākhyātāḥ ।। 13 ।। etena</pratika>—svaparapakṣayoḥ dṛṣṭāntabhāvābhāvākhyahetunā
<pratika>aparigrahāḥ</pratika>=vedaparigrahaśūnyāḥ tadviruddhāśca । <pratika>śiṣṭāḥ</pratika>=aviśiṣṭāḥ jīvakālasvabhāvakartṛtvapakṣā api । <pratika>vyākhyātāḥ</pratika>
pratyākhyātāḥ dūṣitā ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmānandatīrthamate masadadhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<pb n="019"/>
atha bhokrāpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। bhokrāpatteravibhāgaścet syāllokavat ।। 14 ।।</sutra>
yaduktaṃ pūrvatra cidacitprapañcaviśiṣṭātmā śiva evādvitīyaḥ kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ ca
bhavatīti viśiṣṭaśivādvaitam, tasya samanvayasiddhasya yuktibādhāpattirasti na
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p>parasparapratighātena upādānopādeyayoralpādhikaparimāṇatvaniyamasya pracitaparimāṇatūlapiṃ-
ḍādyārabdheṣu................prabhṛtiṣu vyabhicāreṇa ca nirasta ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti śiṣṭāparigrahādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<head>atha bhokrāpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। bhokrāpatteravibhāgaścetsyāllokavat ।। 14 ।।</pratika> atideśādhikaraṇaṃ parityajya
pradhānena tatpūrvādhikaraṇena saṃgatiṃ vibhāvayituṃ tadarthamanuvadati—<pratika>yaduktamiti</pratika> । tatra sūkṣma-
cidacidviśiṣṭaśśivaḥ kāraṇaṃ sthūlacidacidviśiṣṭassa eva kāryamiti viśiṣṭaśivādvaitamā-
raṃbhaṇādhikaraṇe samarthayiṣyamāṇaṃ siddhaṃ kṛtvā kāryakāraṇāvasthayorviśeṣaṇabhūtasya cidacitpra-
pañcasya taccharīratvamupapāditaṃ manuṣyādiśarīragatabālatvayuvatvādinyāyena taddoṣāṇāṃ saṃspa-
rśaḥ śive na bhavatīti samarthanārtham । tataśca cidaciccharīrake brahmaṇi vedāṃtānāṃ samanvaya iti
paryavasitam । idaṃ nopapadyate । śarīraśarīridharmāṇāmasaṃkareṇa vyavasthādarśane'pi śarīriṇāṃ
śarīraprayuktasukhaduḥkhabhok‍tṛtvasyāpi darśanena brahmaṇo'pi śarīritve tathātvaprasaṃgādityā-
kṣepikī saṃgatiriti bhāvaḥ । cedityaṃtaṃ sūtraṃ śivasya śariritve sukhaduḥkhabhok‍tṛtvāpatterjīvā-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām ।</head>
<head>atha śiṣṭāparigrahādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। etena śiṣṭāparigrahā api vyākhyātāḥ ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>mābhūtpradhānavādassamanvayasyāsya bādhako yo'sau । aṇukāraṇavādastu syātkaṇabhakṣādibahumunipramitaḥ ।। 95 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>śūnyāśūnyakṣaṇikākṣaṇikatvādyunmukhaiḥ kutarkaśataiḥ । vyāhatamitaretaratastamapi śrutireva bādheta ।। 96 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti śiṣṭāparigrahādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha śiṣṭāparigrahādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। enena śiṣṭāparigrahā api vyākhyātāḥ ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, aṇvādikāraṇavāditārkikābhimatanyāyena brahmakāraṇavādivaidikasamanvayo virudhyate vā na veti
saṃdehe virudhyata iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । tārkikanyāyasya vedabādhitatvānna tena virudhyata iti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ</pratika> । idamatideśādhikaraṇam ।
<pratika>sūtrārthastu, etena</pratika>=manvādibhiḥ śiṣṭaiḥ kenacitsatkāryavādādyaṃśena parigṛhītasya pradhānakāraṇavādasya nirākaraṇaprakāreṇa ।
<pratika>śiṣṭāparigrahā api</pratika>=śiṣṭaiḥ kenacidapyaṃśenāparigṛhītāḥ aṇvādikāraṇavādā api । <pratika>vyākhyātāḥ</pratika>=nirastā
veditavyāḥ ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, yathedaṃ sāṃkhyadarśanaṃ tarkamūlatvenāpratiṣṭhitatvādinā nirākṛtaṃ yathā etena hetunā kaṇādākṣapādādibahusammataḥ
paramāṇukāraṇavādo'pi tarkamūlatvāviśeṣāt, śiṣṭāparigrahācca nirākṛto veditavyaḥ iti । sūtramapi vyākhyātam ।
<pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, śrīkaṇṭhamatānnāsti viśeṣa iti na pṛthakprapañcanāvasaraḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, idaṃ sūtraṃ pūrvasminnadhikaraṇa evāntarbhūtamiti tatraiva vyākhyātam ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ śiṣṭāparigrahādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<pb n="020"/>
<p>veti saṃśayaḥ । evaṃ sati pūrvapakṣaḥ pravartate । yadi cidaciccharīrakatvamiṣyate
parameśvarasya tadā śarīritvamasya siddham । tathā ca jīvavat saśarīratvena tasyāpi
śarīrasambandhaprayuktasukhaduḥkhabhoktṛtvāpatterasmāt saṃsāriṇo jīvāt tasya para-
meśvarasyāvibhāgaḥ prāpnoti । ato'yaṃ jīvaḥ ayamīśvara iti viśeṣānupapattyā
jagadviśiṣṭatvavāde parameśvarasya nirdoṣasvarūpāsiddhiprasaṅga ityevaṃ pūrvapakṣī manyate ।
nātra virodha iti siddhāntaḥ । syādeva vibhāgo jīvāt parameśvarasya niṣkala-
ṅkanikhilamaṅgalākāratvena । na khalu śarīritvaprayuktamaniṣṭabhoktṛtvaṃ, kintu parā-
dhīnatvaprayuktameva, yathā loke rājñaḥ saśarīratve'pyananyavaśyasya na svājñānanuvṛtti-
kṛtāniṣṭaprasaṅga iti । bhok‍tṛtvaṃ netarasamānam । <quote>‘jñojñau dvāvajāvīśānīśau’</quote> iti
jīveśvarayoḥ svātantryamasvātantryaṃ ca svataḥ siddhameva । ataḥ svatantrasya parameśva-
rasya jīvādasvatantrāccharīrasambandhasāmānyena nāvibhāgaprāptiḥ । nāto viśi-
ṣṭādvaitahāniḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti bhokrāpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p>vibhāgastadaviśeṣa āpadyate cedityarthamabhipretya pūrvapakṣayati—yadīti । <pratika>jagadviśiṣṭatvavāde</pratika>
jagaccharīrakatvavāde । <quote>‘syāllokava’</quote>diti sūtrāṃśaṃ siddhāṃtārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>syādeva vibhāga
ityādinā</pratika> । asyādhikaraṇasya guhādhikaraṇādiṣu brahmaṇaśśarīritvaprayuktaśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaira-
paunarukt‍yaṃ prathamādhyāya evāviṣkṛtaṃ tatra tatra ।।</p>
<head>iti bhoktrāpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām ।</head>
<head>atha bhokrāpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। bhokrāpatteravibhāgaścetsyāllokavat ।। 14 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>cidaciccharīritā cedīśasyeṣṭā śarīritvāt । duḥkhādibhok‍tṛtā syādityaviśeṣo bhavejjīvāt ।। 97 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>naivedaṃ jīvānāṃ saśarīratvādaniṣṭabhok‍tṛtvam । kiṃ tu parādhīnatvālloke rājña iva tacca nāsti vibhoḥ ।। 96 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti bhokrāpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha bhokrāpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। bhokrāpatteravibhāgaścetsyāllokavat ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, brahmaṇi tarkasyāpratiṣṭhitatve'pi jagadbhede tarkasahitapratyakṣasya pratiṣṭhitatvāttenādvitīyabrahmakāraṇavādī
vaidikasamanvayo virudhyate naveti saṃdehe pratyakṣasiddhasyāsya bhoktṛbhogyavibhāgasyābhāvaprasaṅgāttarkasahitapratyakṣeṇa virudhyata
<pratika>eveti pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । lokaṭṭaṣṭasamudrataraṅgādinyāyenaupādhiko bhoktṛbhogyalakṣaṇo vibhāga upapadyata eveti nāsti tarkasahitapra-
tyakṣeṇādvitīyabrahmakāraṇavādisamanvayasya virodha iti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu</pratika>, advitīyabrahmaṇo jagadupādānatve bhoktṛ-
bhogyaprapañcasya sarvasya brahmānanyatvena <pratika>bhok‍trāpatteḥ</pratika>=bhokturbhogyabhāvaḥ bhogyasya bhoktṛbhāva iti tayoritaretarabhāvāpatteḥ
<pratika>avibhāgaścet</pratika>=bhoktā devadatto bhojya odana iti vibhāgasya pratyakṣasiddhasyābhāvaḥ prasajyeta cet । <pratika>syāllokavat</pratika>=
advitīyabrahmopādānakatve'pi bhoktṛbhogyarūpaprapañcasya parasparaṃ vibhāgaḥ syādeva । katham । <pratika>lokavat</pratika>=yathā loke mṛdātmanā'
bhinnānāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ yathā vā samudrātmanā'bhinnānāṃ tadvikārāṇāṃ phenataraṃgādīnāṃ ca parasparaṃ bhedaḥ pratyakṣasiddha aupādhiko-
'sti tadvat । ato bhedasya aupādhikatvānna pratyakṣavirodha iti siddham ।।</p>
<pb n="021"/>
atha āraṃbhaṇādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
yadyapi svātantryāsvātantryādiviruddhadharmasambandhena jīveśvarayorvibhāga ucyate ।
tathā'pi tayoḥ kāryakāraṇayorananyatvamavyatiriktatvaṃ ca siddha‍yatyevetyāha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। tadananyatvamārambhaṇaśabdādibhyaḥ ।। 15 ।।</sutra>
iha kāryakāraṇayoḥ prapañcabrahmaṇoḥ samanvayasiddhamananyatvaṃ sandihyate yuktaṃ na
veti । sandehasya cetanācetanatvaparasparaviruddhadharmasambandhavailakṣaṇyaṃ kāraṇam ।
kathamanayorananyatvamupapadyate ? pūrvādhikaraṇe sarvajñatvādimatvena parameśvarasya
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha āraṃbhaṇādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p>saṃgatipradarśanapūrvakamuttarādhikaraṇamavatārayati—<pratika>yadyapīti</pratika> । pūrvādhikaraṇe śarīritva-
kṛtaṃ na bhavati sukhaduḥkhabhok‍tṛtvaṃ kiṃ tu pārataṃtryakṛtamiti paramasvataṃtrasya śivasya śarīri-
tve'pi tanna prasajyata ityuktam । tarhi mā bhūt brahmaṇaḥ prapaṃcaśarīratvāṃśe samanvayasya bhaṃgaḥ
prapaṃcānanyatvāṃśe tu syāt prapañcaśarīrakatvopapādakasya svātaṃtryāsvātaṃtryatatkṛtabhok‍tṛtvā-
bhok‍tṛtvādivibhāgarūpavailakṣaṇyasyaivānanyatvapratikṣepakatvāditi pratyudāharaṇasaṃgatyā pūrvaṃ
tatra tatra siddhavatkṛtya vyavahṛtasya prapaṃcaśivayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvenānanyatvasya vailakṣaṇyakṛ-
tāntargaṇikabhedāvirodhena nirūpaṇārthamuttarādhikaraṇāraṃbha ityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। tadananyatvamāraṃbha-
ṇaśabdādibhyaḥ ।। 13 ।। vailakṣaṇyaṃ kāraṇamiti</pratika> । yadi tadvailakṣaṇyamananyatvavirodhi tadā
tadyuktamityevamananyatvavirodhitvāvirodhitvābhyāṃ saṃdihyamānaṃ vailakṣaṇyamupanyastasaṃdehasya
kāraṇamityarthaḥ । bhedakasvabhāvasya vailakṣaṇyasya abhedavirodhitvādananyatvamayuktamiti pūrvapa-
kṣayati—<pratika>kathamiti</pratika> । yadi kiṃcidvilakṣaṇenāpi cetanavargeṇānanyatvamayuktaṃ tadā kimu vaktavya-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, parameś‍varasya cidaciccharīrakatvābhyupagame tasya saśarīratvasiddhau jīvavattasyāpi śarīrasaṃbandhaprayuktasukha-
duḥkhabhoktṛtvāpattessaṃsāriṇo jīvāttasya parameśvarasya avibhāgaḥ vailakṣaṇyābhāvaḥ prāpnoti । ato jīveśvarayorviśeṣānupapattyā
parameśvarasya nirdoṣasvarūpāsiddhi prasaṃgāt samanvayasiddhasya cidacitprapañcaśarīrakādvitīyabrahmakāraṇavādasya yuktibādhāpattiriti
<pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । yathā loke rājñaḥ saśarīratve'pi svataṃtrasya tasya svājñānuvṛttikṛtāniṣṭāprasakteḥ tadīyabhoktṛtvasyāsti vailakṣaṇyaṃ
tadvatparameśvarasya svataṃtrasya rājaśāsanavaśyānāṃ śarīriṇāmiva śarīrasaṃbandhasāmānyena nāsti svājñānuvṛttikṛtāniṣṭaprasaktiri-
ti vailakṣaṇyasya svatassiddhatvānnātra virodha iti siddhāṃtaḥ । ato na viśiṣṭādvaitahāniriti bhāvaḥ । iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, atrāpyadhikaraṇe nāsti śrīkaṇṭhamatādviśeṣaḥ । <pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, nanu<quote>‘karmāṇi vijñānamayaśca ātmā
pare'vyaye sarva ekībhavanti’</quote>iti bhokturjīvasya muktau brahmabhāvāpattiśravaṇāttatreva saṃsāre'pi tayorabhedādavibhāgaḥ prāpnoti ।
tataśca jagatkartṛtvarahitatayā pratyakṣasiddhena jīvenātyantābhedādbrahmaṇo jagatkartṛtvaṃ na saṃbhavati iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । yathā loke
udakadvayebhede'pi sthānaikyanubandhanaḥ udake udakāntarasyaikībhāvavyavahāraḥ evamayamapi muktau jīveśayorekībhāvavyavahāra
upacaritaḥ syāt । ato jīveśayorekībhāvasya <quote>‘sāyaṃ goṣṭhe gāva ekībhavantī’</quote>tivat sthānaikyanibandhatvapratītyā
jīveśayorbhedasya siddhau brahmaṇo jagatkartṛtvaṃ bhavatyeveti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ ।। sūtrārthastu, bhok‍tnā/?/patteḥ</pratika>=yasmādbhoktuḥ jīvasya
<quote>‘pare'vyaye sarva ekībhavantī’</quote>ti vākye brahmabhāvāpattiśravaṇāt tayoravibhāgaḥ bhedābhāvaḥ tasmādalpajīvābhinnabrahmaṇaḥ jagatkā-
raṇatvaṃ na yuktamiti cenneti śeṣaḥ । kutaḥ । yataḥ <pratika>lokavat</pratika> । yathā loke jale jalāntarasyaikībhāvoktistathātā/?/pi sthānaikyā-
dyālaṃbanena jīveśayorekībhavantītyaikyoktiḥ । <pratika>syāt</pratika>—upacaritā bhavet । ato noktadoṣa ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ bhok‍tā/?/pattyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<pb n="022"/>
bhoktṛtvājñatvādinā jīvasya cobhayorvibhāgo nirdiṣṭaḥ । cidacidvastunoratya-
ntavilakṣaṇatvādananyatvakathā dūrata eva । na hi kāryakāraṇatvamananyatvasādhakaṃ,
gomayavṛścikādau satyapi tasmin vailakṣaṇyadarśanāt । ghaṭamṛtpiṇḍādiṣvapyartha-
kriyādivyavahārabhedādabhedo nāstyeva । athavā—kāryakāraṇayoratyantābhede prapañca-
brahmaṇorakhaṇḍatayā sarvatra kartṛkarmakriyādivyavahāralopaḥ syāt ityevaṃ prāpte
brūmaḥ---kāraṇāt brahmaṇaḥ kāryaṃ jagadananyadeva । kathamavagamyate ? ārambhaṇaśabdā-
dibhyaḥ । yathā <quote>‘vācā''rambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyam’</quote> <quote>‘sadeva
somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam’</quote> <quote>‘tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti’</quote> <quote>‘aitadātmya-
midaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo’</quote> <quote>‘viśvaṃ bhūtaṃ bhuvanaṃ citraṃ
bahudhā jātaṃ jāyamānaṃ ca yat । sarvo hyeṣa rudraḥ’</quote> ityādiśabdebhyaḥ ।।
yaduktaṃ na hi kāryakāraṇatvamananyatvasādhakamiti tatrāha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। bhāve yo/?/palabdheḥ ।। 16 ।।</sutra>
ghaṭādikāryabhāve ca tadeva mṛddravyaṃ ghaṭa ityupalabhyate । tataḥ kāraṇādananyadeva
kāryam । tathā <quote>‘vācā''rambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyam’</quote> । iti
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
matyaṃtavilakṣaṇenācetanavargeṇetyāha—<pratika>cidacidvastunoriti</pratika> । nanvabhedavyāptenopādānopādeya-
bhāvena brahmaprapañcayorananyatvasiddhau ghaṭādiṣu śyāmaraktarūpādivailakṣaṇyavaddeśakālādyavaccheda-
bhedena svātaṃtryapārataṃtryādinā vailakṣaṇyamupapādanīyamityāśaṃkya vyabhicārāttasyābhedavyāpti-
rasiddhetyāha—<pratika>na hīti</pratika> । vastuto viruddho'yaṃ hetuḥ na tu kvacideva sādhyavyabhicārītyāha—
<pratika>ghaṭamṛtpiṇḍādiṣvapīti</pratika> । ghaṭenodakāharaṇaṃ kriyate mṛtpiṇḍena ghaṭaśarāvādikamityarthakri-
yābhedaḥ । ghaṭasya mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍacakrādi kāraṇaṃ mṛtpiṇḍasya jalasaṃyojanapūrvakamardanādīti
kāraṇabhedaḥ । pṛthubudhnodarākāraḥ piṇḍākāraścetyākārabhedaḥ । tadullekhī buddhibhedaḥ । tatpravṛ-
ttinimittakaśśabdabhedaḥ । idīnāṃ mṛtpiṇḍo'sti ghaṭo nāstīti satvāsatvabhedaḥ । mṛtpiṇḍo
dṛṣṭaḥ ghaṭaśarāvādikaṃ na dṛṣṭamiti jñātatvājñātatvabhedaḥ । bahavaḥ taṃtavaḥ ekaḥ paṭaḥ iti
saṃkhyābhedaḥ । evamarthakriyādibhedāt sarvatrāpyupādānopādeyabhāve bheda unnīyata iti viruddho
heturityarthaḥ । <pratika>athaveti</pratika> । kiṃcetyarthaḥ । <pratika>akhaṇḍatayeti</pratika> । atyaṃtaikyāpattyetyarthaḥ । <pratika>kartṛka-
rmeti</pratika> । kulālo ghaṭaṃ karotītyādivyavahāreṣu kartṛkarmakriyāṇāṃ bhedasya dṛṣṭatvena sarvatra kartṛka-
rmabhāvādīnāṃ bhedākṣepakatvāvagamādityarthaḥ । sādhyāhāraṃ sūtraṃ yojayan siddhāṃtamāha—<pratika>kāra-
ṇāditi</pratika> । āraṃbhaṇaśruteḥ brahmaprapaṃcanānyatvasādhakatvamuttarasūtre bhāṣyakāra eva spaṣṭīkari-
ṣyati । ādiśabdagṛhītaśrutīnāṃ tatsādhakatvaṃ tu sāmānādhikaraṇyādibhiḥ spaṣṭam । udā-
hṛtaśrutikalāpānugrāhakasyānanyatvasādhakānumānasya dṛṣṭāṃtaprasādhanārthatvena uttarasūtramavatā-
rayati—<pratika>yaduktamiti । sū ।। bhāve copalabdheḥ ।। 16 ।।</pratika> nanu, ghaṭādyutpattau satyāṃ tadevedaṃ
mṛddravyamiti pratyabhijñeyamarthakriyādibhedayuktibādhitatvād‍bhrāṃtetyāśaṃkya dravyaikye'pyavasthā-
bhedakṛtastadbheda iti śrutyaiva darśitamiti vibhāvayitumāraṃbhaṇaśruterarthamāha—<pratika>tatheti</pratika> । ekavi-

śrutyā'pi pratipādyate । vikāro nāmadheyaṃ ca vācārambhaṇaṃ vācāyāḥ abhilāpā-
rthakriyārūpavyavahārasya niṣpādakaṃ bhavati । mṛddravyasyaiva ghaṭādyavasthā ghaṭādinā-
madheyaṃ cārthakriyābhilāparūpavyavahāraniṣpattaye bhavatīti yāvat । vastuto ghaṭā-
dikamapi mṛttiketyeva satyaṃ prāmāṇikaṃ mṛdvyatirekeṇa ghaṭabhāvādarśanāt । athavā-
<quote>‘vācā''rambhaṇaṃ vikāraḥ’</quote>vikāro ghaṭo vācārambhaṇaṃ ghaṭo'yamiti vāgārambha-
viṣayamātram । mṛddravya eva vyavahārasiddha‍yarthaṃ jāyamānamavasthāntaram, na tu mṛdo
dravyāntaram । <quote>‘mṛttiketyeva nāmadheyaṃ satyaṃ’</quote> ghaṭādikaṃ mṛttiketi kṛtvaiva tatra sarvaṃ
mṛtpiṇḍādānāmadheyaṃ satyaṃ sati prāmāṇike'rthe sādhu, na tu dravyāntaramiti kṛtvā ।
