jñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñāya tadupapādanārthaṃ <quote>‘yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ vijñātaṃ
syā’</quote>diti dṛṣṭāṃta upanyastaḥ।tatra nāyaṃ dṛṣṭāṃta upapadyate।mṛtpiṇḍasya tadvikārāṇāṃ ghaṭaśarāvādīnāṃ
cābhilāpārthakriyādibhedenātyaṃtabhinnatayā mṛtpiṇḍajñānena tadvikārāṇāṃ jñātatvāyogādityā-
śaṃkāyāṃ tadupapādanārthaṃ vācāraṃbhaṇaśrutiḥ pravavṛtte । tatra pratijñādṛṣṭāṃtau prakṛtyadhikaraṇe
vyākhyātau । iha hetūkṛtā vācāraṃbhaṇaśrutirvyākhyāyate । vikāro ghaṭatvapṛthubudh‍nodaratvādiḥ ।
nāmadheyaṃ tatpravṛttinimittakaṃ ghaṭādipadaṃ cetyetat vācāraṃbhaṇaṃ vācā vāk ghaṭamānayetyādya-
bhilāpaḥ । tena tajjanyārthakriyāpi lakṣyate । ārabhyate anenetyāraṃbhaṇaṃ kāraṇam । vācāyā
āraṃbhaṇamabhilābhārthakriyayoḥ kāraṇamiti yāvat । napuṃsakānapuṃsakayoḥ napuṃsakaśeṣaikavadbhā-
vaśca । anenaitaduktaṃ bhavati । mṛtpiṇḍatadvikārāṇāṃ dravyairakye'pi piṇḍapṛthubudhnodarādyākāra-
bhedena tatpravṛttinimittakanāmadheyabhedena cārthakriyābhilāpabheda iti । nanu dravyabhedenaiva
tadbhedaḥ kimiti neṣyate ityāśaṃkyoktaṃ <quote>‘mṛttiketyeva satya’</quote> miti । ghaṭaśarāvādikamapi
mṛttiketyeva satyaṃ prāmāṇikaṃ mṛdevāyaṃ ghaṭa ityādipratyabhijñāpratyakṣasiddhaṃ gurutvadvaiguṇyā-
bhāvādiyuktisiddhaṃ ca । evaṃ pramāṇasiddhaikyanirvāhāyārthakriyābhilāpabhedasya vikāranāma-
dheyabhedopādhikatvaṃ kalpayituṃ yuktamiti bhāvaḥ । athavaivaṃ vākyayojanā— vācāraṃbhaṇaṃ
vikāraḥ ghaṭaśarāvādivikāraḥ ghaṭo'yamityādivyavahāraviṣayamātraṃ na tu mṛdo dravyāṃtaram ।
dravyāṃtarābhāve mṛdaḥ piṇḍatādaśāyāmapravṛttaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādi nāmadheyaṃ kathaṃ paścāt pravartata ityā-
śaṃkāyāmucyate —nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyam । mṛnnāmadheyamiva ghaṭaśarāvādināmadheyamapi
taddravyaṃ mṛttiketi kṛtvaiva sati prāmāṇike'rthe sādhu na tu dravyāṃtaramiti kṛtvā । pratyabhi-
jñāvirodhādinā dravyāṃtarasyāprāmāṇikatvāditi । asminpakṣe <quote>‘satye sādhau ca sacchabdaḥ’</quote> iti
smṛteḥ prāmāṇikārthavācisatyaśabdaparyāyāt sacchabdā<quote>‘ttatra sādhu’</quote>rityarthe yatpratyayaḥ ।
āraṃbhaṇaśabdo viṣayabhāvena niṣpādakaṃ vadanviṣayatvaparyavasāyī । tasya pulliṃgaviśeṣaṇatve'pi
liṃgasāmānyavivakṣayā napuṃsakaliṃganirdeśaḥ । dvigurekavacanamitivaditi viśeṣaḥ । bhāṣye
dvitīyavyākhyāne <quote>‘yato ghaṭo mṛdeve’</quote>ti vākyena mṛddhaṭayordravyaikye pratyabhijñārūpaṃ pramāṇaṃ
darśitam । prathamavyākhyāne <quote>‘mṛdvyatirekeṇa ghaṭabhāvādarśanā’</quote>diti vākyena mṛdvyatirekeṇa ghaṭe
gurutvādidharmāṇāmadarśanarūpā tatra yuktirdarśitā । evaṃ ca yadyapi mṛtpiṃḍaghaṭaśarāvādīnāma-
bhilāpārthakriyādibhedaścaitramaitrādīnāmiva dravyāṃtaratvenāpyupapadyate bālayuvasthavirāṇāmi-

<p>vāvasthābhedenā'pi । athāpyatrābhedenaiva tadupapādanaṃ kāryam । kāryakāraṇānanyatvasya yuktya-
nubhavānugrahaśrutisiddhatvādityupasaṃharati—<pratika>ata iti</pratika> । arthakriyādītyādiśabdena prāṅgi-
rdiṣṭā buddha‍yabhilāpādayassarve'pi gṛhyaṃte । nanu kāryasya ghaṭatvādyavasthāviśeṣaviśiṣṭatvena
buddha‍yabhilāpaviśeṣaviṣayatvājñātatvāsattvādikamupapadyatām ekatvānekatvarūpasaṃkhyābhedaḥ katha-
mupapadyate । ko'tra viśeṣaḥ । mṛdaḥ piṇḍatvāvasthāprahāṇena kuḍyatvāvasthāprāptivadanekatvāva-
sthāprahāṇena ekatvāvasthāpattiḥ । punaśca kuḍyatvāvasthāprahāṇena piṇḍatvāvasthāptivadekatvāva-
sthāprahāṇenānekatvāvasthāptiścetyāpadyata eva । nanu, viralataṃtvārabdhapaṭādiṣu kāraṇagatāneka-
tvasaṃkhyā na prahīyate । tatra kathaṃ dravyaikye tadviruddhānekatvasaṃkhyāpattiḥ । paṭatvarūpāvasthābhe-
deneti cenna । dravyaikye ghaṭakuḍyādiṣu mṛttvavat paṭe taṃtutvasyānuvṛtteravaśyaṃbhāvena tasya paṭavyā-
vṛttadharmavṛttyavacchedakatvāyogāt kāryagatapaṭatvavirodhitvāttannānuvartate ghaṭatvavirodhitvāt
piṇḍatvamiveti cettarhi tadvadeva prahīṇaṃ bhavet । na taṃtuṣvapyanuvarteta । kāryakāraṇayoraikye
prahīṇakāryānuvṛttobhayavidhāvasthāvyatirekeṇa tadubhayavyavasthitāvasthāṃtarasthityanupapatteriti
cenmaivam । taṃtuṣveva kuviṃdakāritasaṃyogaviśeṣāvacchedena paṭatvasya tadupādhikaikatvasya taṃtutvā-
bhāvasya ca vṛttyupapatteḥ kāryakāraṇabhedavāde'pyekasminneva ghaṭe kālarūpāvacchedabhedena śyāma-
raktarūpayoḥ deśabhedenaikasminneva vṛkṣe sthūlataratanutarādiparimāṇānāmekasminneva kadalīdale
śyāmaladhavalarūpayoḥ kaṭhinasukumārasparśayośca svasvaviruddhadharmābhāvasāhityena vṛttidarśanāt ।
teṣu viruddhadharmāvacchedakakāladeśānāṃ parasparāsaṃkīrṇatvamasti । nātra kuviṃda kṛtasaṃyogāstaṃtutvā-
saṃkīrṇā iti cenna । vahnāvārndreṃdhanaprabhavavahnitvāvacchedena vyāptimattvasya tadasaṃkīrṇavahni-
tvāvacchedena vyāptyabhāvasya ca ārdreṃdhanaprabhavavahnitvāvacchedena vyāpyatāvacchedakavadvahnike
aviśeṣitavahnisattvāvacchedena vyāpyatāvacchedakatvābhāvasya ca vṛttyabhyupagamāt । evaṃ
kāryakāraṇānanyatvavāde'pyekasminneva dravye tantutvaṃ svaprāpakāṃśusaṃyogaviśeṣāvacchedena tada-
vacchedenānekatvaṃ ca paṭatvāvasthāprāpakataṃtusaṃyogaviśeṣāvacchedena paṭatvaṃ tadavacchedenaikatvaṃ
ceti paṭatvataṃtutvayorekatvānekatvayośca samāveśopapatterna kaścidvirodhaḥ । evamupādānopāde-
yayostṛṇacchadiṣoriṣṭakāprākārayoścānanyatve'pi tṛṇatvacchadiṣṭvādisamāveśāvirodha unneyaḥ ।
iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ । chadiḥṣu tṛṇānāṃ dīrghatanutvādyākārasya prākāre iṣṭakānāṃ caturaśratvādyā-
kārasya cāviralataṃtvārabdhapaṭe taṃtutvasyevānupalaṃbhaḥ viralataṃtvārabdhapaṭe taṃtutvatadākṛti-
viśeṣatadanekatvānāmupalaṃbha iti । tasmādarthakriyādibhedahetoravasthābhedasyābhyupagamānna kaści-
dvirodha iti bhāvaḥ ।</p>
<p>idaṃ tu ciṃtyate । kāryakāraṇānanyatvavādinā kathamavasthābheda āgaṃtuko'bhyupaitavyaḥ ।
āgaṃtukasya prāk satā kāraṇenānanyatvāyogāt asatkāryavādapādaprasārikāpatteśca ।
na cāvasthābhedo'pi nityaḥ । tathā sati mṛtpiṇḍadaśāyāmapi ghaṭārthakriyādiprasaṃgāt,
daṇḍacakrādighaṭakāraṇakalāpavaiyarthyaprasaṅgācca । nanu, mṛdaḥ piṇḍatādaśāyāmanabhivyaktā
ghaṭāvasthā । abhivyaktaiva sārthakriyādyupayoginī । tadabhivyaktyarthaśca daṃḍacakrādiḥ kāraṇaka-
<pb n="025"/>
lāpaḥ । na ca tathā sati mṛtpiṇḍagataghaṭāvasthābhivyaktyarthena daṇḍacakrādivyāpāreṇa tadgata-
karakakapālamaṇimallikādyavasthānāmapavarakagataghaṭābhivyaktyarthāropitena dīpena tadgatakara-
kādīnāmivābhivyaktiprasaṃgaḥ, mṛtpiṃḍikādaśāyāṃ pradīpāropaṇena ghaṭādyabhivyaktiprasaṃgaśceti
vācyam । uccāraṇaviśeṣeṇa varṇaviśeṣābhivyaktiḥ uccaritavarṇaviśeṣābhivyaṃjakena śrotrama-
nassaṃyojanānukūlapavanādinoccāraṇaṃ vinā na varṇābhivyaktiriti vyavasthādarśanena tadvadi-
hāpyupapatteḥ । varṇānityatvapakṣe'pi ravikiraṇairyugadabhivyaṃgyayornailyotpalatvayoḥ pradīpapra-
bhayotpalatvasyaivābhivyaktiḥ kūpajalasya viyati vikṣepe ravikiraṇaiḥ tatra śauklyajalatvayossahā-
bhivyaktāvapi tasya kūpāntaravasthitisamaye (tailatvasye) jalatvasthaivābhivyaktirityādivyavasthā-
darśanena tadvadihāpi yathādarśanamabhivyaṃgyābhivyaṃjakabhāvavaicitryābhyupagamopapattiśceti cenmai-
vamavasthāvattadabhivyaktāvapi nityatvānityatvavikalpe pūrvoktadoṣānatipātāt । kiṃca keya-
mabhivyaktiḥ । jñānaṃ cettadā daṇḍakrādimelanasya ghaṭajñānakāraṇatvāpattyā tadapanayanānaṃtaraṃ
ghaṭajñānodayo na syāt । āvaraṇāpanayaścet ghaṭasāmagryā kimāvaraṇamapanīyate । nanu mṛdi
pūrvasthitā piṇḍāvasthā tasyāṃ nityameva sthitāyā api ghaṭāvasthāyā āvaraṇam । tadāvṛta-
tvātsā tadānīṃ na pratīyate । ghaṭasāmagryā piṇḍāvasthopamarde sati tilapīḍanena tailamivāvaghātena
taṇḍula iva dohanena paya iva khananena kūpajalamiva kṣālanena paṭaśauklyamiva pratīyate ।
na ca tathā sati mudgarapātānaṃtaramapi ghaṭāvasthāpratītiprasaṃgaḥ tadāvaraṇabhūtāyāḥ piṇḍāva-
sthāyāstirodhānāditi vācyam । tadā mudgarapātābhivyaṃgyakapālatvādyavasthāyāstadāvaraṇa-
tvāt kāraṇe abhivyaktāyāḥ kasyāścit kāryāvasthāyāstadgatasakalakāryāvasthāṃtarāvaraṇatvā-
bhyupagamāt । na ca tathā sati kapāleṣu kāraṇamelane ghaṭāvasthābhivyaktiprasaṃgaḥ । iṣṭāpatteḥ ।
kapālāni cūrṇīkṛtya jalamṛdaṃtarasaṃyojanamardanavyāpāraiḥ mārdavaṃ prāpayya daṇḍacakrādimelane
ghaṭābhivyaktidarśanāt । na ca paṭakāraṇānāṃ punaḥ paṭabhāvo na dṛśyate iti śaṃkanīyam ।
tadbhasmanāṃ kṣititalapatitānāṃ tatkṣitiprarūḍhakārpāsataruphalapariṇatau krameṇa teṣāṃ paṭabhāvo-
papatteḥ । na ca taṃtuṣu taṃtvavasthāyāḥ paṭāvasthāvaraṇatvasya vaktavyatvāt viralataṃtvārabdhapaṭe tatti-
rodhānaśaṃkānāspade paṭāvasthābhivyaktirna syāditi vācyam । phalabalena kuviṃdakṛtasaṃyogaviśe-
ṣarahitataṃtvavasthāyāḥ tadāvarakatvakalpanāt tasmādaviśeṣitā vā pūrvakāryāvasthaiva ghaṭapaṭādya-
vasthānāmāvaraṇamiti cet naitadyuktam । tathātathā pariṇāhaśālinī paṭāvasthā kuvindavyā-
pārāt prāgapi yathādṛṣṭena sthūlenaiva rūpeṇa satī taṃtutvenānubhūyate uta kurmāṃgavat saṃkuci-
tena rūpeṇa satī । nādyaḥ । yathādṛṣṭarūpāyāḥ paṭāvasthāyāḥ taṃtuṣu kuviṃdavyāpārāt prāk
vyasteṣu samasteṣu vā viprakīrṇeṣu saṃhateṣu vā paryāptavṛttyasaṃbhavāt । na dvitīyaḥ । yathādṛṣṭa-
paṭāvasthāyāḥ āgaṃtukatvāparihārāt । na ca vācyamanādireva sā paṭāvasthā adyataneṣu
taṃtuṣu na vartate kiṃtu mūlakāraṇa iti । tathā sati yatredānīṃ bhaviṣyatpaṭaprāgabhāvadeśe
tantavo na saṃti tatrāvaraṇābhāvenaṃ tadabhivyaktiprasaṃgāt । na ca tatra yā kācana kāryā-
vasthāsti saivāvaraṇaṃ syāditi vācyam । tasyāḥ kuviṃdavyāpārānaṃtaramapi sarvatrāvarjanī-
yatvena sarvadā paṭānabhivyaktiprasaṃgāt । kāryāvasthāssādaya evābhyupaitavyā iti kathaṃ kārya-
kāraṇānanyatvasamarthanaṃ asatkāryavādāpattiparihāraśceti ।</p>

atredamuttaraṃ vivakṣitam । atrāgaṃtukā evāvasthābhedāḥ । asato dravyānutpattiḥ satkāryavādaḥ ।

pañcaikyaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyam । pūrvādhikaraṇavirodhāpatteḥ । na ca sthūlasūkṣmaprapañcaviśiṣṭabra-
hmarūpakāryakāraṇaikyaṃ sādhanīyam । viśeṣyāṃśasya viśeṣyāṃśena aikyasādhane siddhasādhanāt
viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāve satyapyaikyābhāvena vyabhicārācca । na ca viśeṣyāṃśasyaiva
viśeṣyāṃśa upādānaṃ viśeṣaṇāṃśasya tu viśeṣaṇāṃśa iti śaṃkanīyam । brahmaṇassarvopā-
dānatvābhāvaprasaṃgāt । na ca viśeṣaṇāṃśayoraikyaṃ sādhyamiti vācyam । satyapyupādānopādeya-
bhāve brahmaprapañcayoraikyābhāvena tatra bya/?/bhicārāt pūrvapakṣodbhāvitagomayavṛścikādivyabhi-
cāratādavasthyācca । sthūlasūkṣmaprapañcaivayasādhanasya etadadhikaraṇakṛtyabrahmaprapañcānanyatvaviṣa-
yaśrutisamanvayasamarthanānupayogitvācca । na ca brahmaprapañcayorapṛthagbhāvarūpānanyatve śruti-
samanvayo na tvaikyarūpānanyatva iti vācyam। tatra mṛddhaṭadṛṣṭāṃtena sthūlaprapañcasya tadupādā-
nabrahmāpṛthagbhūtaparāparaśaktirūpasūkṣmaprapañcaikyasādhanamupayogīti vācyam । tayoraikyābhāve-
'pi mṛddhaṭabhedavādinaiyāyikarītyā kevalaṃ pṛthagbhāvenaiva brahmāpṛthagbhāvasyā'pi lābhādi-
tyāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>tato mṛddhaṭayoriveti</pratika> । atrāyamāśayaḥ । yathaika eva mṛtpiṇḍo ghaṭaśarāvādivyā-
pakaḥ । tadanusyūtimaṃto ghaṭaśarāvādayaḥ parasparavyāvṛttarūpāḥ tadvyāpyāḥ । evaṃ brahmaikameva viya-
dādisarvavikārānusyūtaṃ teṣāṃ vyāpakaṃ tadanusyūtimaṃto viyadādayassarve vikārāstasya vyāpyāḥ
ityevaṃ vyāpyavyāpakabhāvenāpṛthagbhāvarūṃpaṃ <quote>‘tenaikena tu tadvyāptaṃ mṛdā kuṃbhādikaṃ yathe’</quote> tyādi-
purāṇasiddhaṃ <quote>‘anyassanvyāptito'nanya’</quote> ityādyāgamaprasiddhaṃ <quote>‘sarvaṃ samāpnoṣi tato'si sarvaḥ’</quote>
iti bhagavadgītāsu ca pratipāditamananyatvaṃ mṛddhaṭadṛṣṭāṃtenopapādanīyam । tatra nāyaṃ dṛṣṭāṃta-
upapadyate । kaulālamṛtkūṭāt ghaṭaśarāvādinirmāṇasamayeṣu vibhaktānāṃ parasparavyāvṛttarūpāṇāṃ
tasmādbhinnānāṃ sūkṣmamṛtpiṇḍānāṃ ghaṭaśarāvādibhāvāpattyā teṣvekasyā mṛdva‍yakteranusyūtyasi-
ddheriti śaṃkāyāmitthamupapādanīyam । mahataḥ kulālamṛtkūṭādvibhajyavibhajya gṛhītāḥ sūkṣma-
mṛtpiṇḍāstato na bhidyaṃte sa eva mṛtkūṭaḥ etāvatsūkṣmamṛtpiṇḍātmatāṃ prāpta ityabhedapratyabhi-
jñānāditi vācāraṃmaṇavākyopapādanīye <quote>‘yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ vijñātaṃ
syā’</quote> diti dṛṣṭāṃte'pyuktaśaṅkāvatāre satyevamevopapādanīyam । tena dṛṣṭāṃtenopapādanīyāyāṃ
<quote>‘yenāśruta’</quote> mityādipratijñāyāṃ mṛddhaṭādidṛṣṭāṃteṣu vācāraṃbhaṇaśrutyupapāditaprakāreṇa dravyai-
kyānmṛdādijñāne tadabhinnasya ghaṭāderviṣayatve'pi brahmaprapañcayoraikyānaṃgīkārāt brahmajñāne
prapañcasya viṣayatvaṃ na saṃbhavatītyevaṃ dṛṣṭāṃtavaiṣamyaśaṃkāyāmitthamupapādanīyam । na kevala-
<pb n="027"/>
ghaṭa’ ityatra yathā mṛdva‍yāptirghaṭe dṛśyate tathā brahmedaṃ jagaditi brahmavyāptirna dṛśyata

brahmajñānena prapañcasya jñātatvamiha pratijñāyate । kiṃ tu sūkṣmaprapañcaviśiṣṭajñānena । <quote>‘sadeva
somyeda’</quote> mityupakrame brahmaṇi prayuktasya sacchabdasya sakalaprapañcopādānaśaktiviśiṣṭabrahmapa-
ratāyā īkṣatyadhikaraṇe varṇitatvāt । upādānopādeyabhūtau ca śaktiprapañcau na parasparabhinnau ।
mṛddhaṭavat । atra sāmānyenopādānopādeyabhāvamātraṃ na hetuḥ । brahmaprapañcayorgomayavṛścikādiṣu ca
vyabhicārāt । tathāpi pariṇāmipariṇāmabhāvarūpastadviśeṣo hetuḥ । evaṃ ca sacchabdoktaśakti-
viśiṣṭabrahmajñāne prapañcasya viṣayatvaṃ saṃbhavati parāparaśaktyupādānakasya tasya mṛddhaṭanyāyena
tadabhinnatvāditi । etadarthaṃ ya eko mṛtkūṭaḥ sthitassa evaitāvaddhaṭaśarāvādyātmatāṃ prāpta itya-
bhedapratyabhijñānenānumānadṛṣṭāṃtabhūtamṛddhaṭādyaikyamupapādanīyam । ato'sminsūtre śrutitadanu-
grāhakānumānāpekṣitaṃ mṛdāditadvikāraikyasamarthanaṃ saṃgatameveti । evamasya sūtrasyāraṃbhaṇaśru-
tyanugrāhakānumānopayogitvavadārambhaṇavākyārthavarṇanopayogitvamastītyāśayenaiva pūrvasūtrodā-
haraṇabhūtasyāpyārambhaṇavākyasya bhāṣyakārairetatsūtravyākhyānāvasare'rthapratipādanaṃ kṛtam ।
bhāṣye pariṇāmipariṇāmabhāvaliṃgena śaktiprapañcaikyāsādhakamevānumānam । śaktiśaktimatorabhe-
dopacārāt । prapañcabrahmaṇoruktarūpamananyatvaṃ na tena hetunā siddha‍yati । asiddheḥ । nāpyupādāno-
pādeyabhāvasāmānyena । nirvikāre brahmaṇi upādānatvasya vikāravadupādānāpṛthagbhūtādhi-
ṣṭhānatvasya vaktavyatayā tasyaivātra sāddha‍yatvaparyavasānādityāśaṅkāyāṃ taddharmānusyūtimattayā
brahmaprapañcānanyatvasādhakānumānamiti vyavahṛtam । na kevalamidaṃ bhāṣyameva tadabhedopacārā-
tpravṛttam । ‘navilakṣaṇatvā (2—1—4) dhikaraṇamapi tathaiva pravṛttam । tathaiva kṛtsnaprasaktya-
<ref>(bra॰ 2—1---26.)</ref> dhikaraṇamapi pravartayiṣyate । pariṇāmapariṇāmibhāvarūpe hyupādāno-
pādeyabhāve vailakṣaṇyānupapattiḥ kṛtsnaprasaktyādidoṣaścāpādāyituṃ śakyate । na tu
svayaṃ nirvikārasya sataḥ pariṇāmyupādānāpṛthagbhūtādhiṣṭhānabhāvamātrālaṃbanopādānopādeya-
bhāve । tadāpādakasyaikyasya pariṇāmapariṇāmibhāva iva tatrābhāvāt । nanu, brahma-
śakteḥ prapañcasya ca pariṇāmipariṇāmabhāvahetukaikyasiddhirastu prapañcabrahmaṇoruktarūpama-
nanyatvaṃ na tena hetunā sidhyati । asiddheḥ । nāpyupādānopādeyabhāvasāmānyena ।
nirvikāre brahmaṇyupādānatvasya vikāravadupādānāpṛthagbhūtādhiṣṭhānatvarūpasya vaktavyatayā
tasyaivātra sādhyatvaparyavasānādityāśaṃkāyāṃ taddharmānusyūtimattayā pramīyamāṇatvaṃ tatra sāmā-
nyavyāptyapekṣo heturityabhipretya tadasiddhimāśaṃkate—yathā mṛdva‍yāptiriti । <quote>‘san ghaṭassanpaṭa’</quote>
ityādipramāsu sattayā tāvadapṛthagbhāvasaṃbaṃdhaḥ pratīyate । sā ca brahmaśaktirūpā । <quote>‘sadeva so-
myeda’</quote>mityādiśrutiṣu brahmaṇi sacchabdasya pravṛttau nimittabhūtā brahmasattaiva । <quote>‘māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ
vidyā’</quote> diti jagatprakṛtitvenāvadhāritāyāstasyā eva tathābhūtapramāviṣayatvopapattau tadati-
riktajātirūpasattākalpane pramāṇābhāvāt । tāṃ kalpayatāmapi jātyādiṣu tadabhāvena
teṣvanugatasadva‍yavahārasya tayā nirvoḍhumaśakyatvāt sattaikārthasamavāyādisaṃbaṃdhāṃtareṇa tanni-
rvāhe ananugamāt rūpādirahitāyā api jātisattāyā iva brahmaśaktirūpasattāyāścākṣuṣa-
tvādyupapatteśca । na ca nīrūpadravyatvavat brahmaśakteścākṣuṣatvādyanupapattiḥ । aprayojakatvāt
<pb n="028"/>
iti cet, san ghaṭaḥ san paṭaḥ iti sarvatra dṛśyata eva sadrūpasya brahmaṇo vyāptiḥ ।
saccidrūpeṇa śivena yadi na vyāptaṃ jagat tadā sattāsphūrtibhyāṃ vinākṛtaṃ katha-
masti sphuratīti ca dṛśyeta ? avastveva bhavet । ato mṛdā ghaṭādikamiva kāraṇena
śivena kāryamidaṃ vyāptaṃ tadananyabhūtaṃ ceti siddham ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। sattvāccāparasya ।। 17 ।।</sutra>
kāryasya kāraṇe sattvācca kāraṇādananyadeva kāryam । ghaṭaśarāvādikaṃ pūrvaṃ mṛde-
vāsīditi hi ghaṭādikaṃ mṛdātmanopalabhyate ।।
<sutra>।।sū।।asadvyapadeśānneti cenna dharmāntareṇa vākyaśeṣāt yukteḥśabdāntarācca।।18।।</sutra>

tasyāḥ svābhinnaghaṭādirūpeṇa rūpavattvācca । na ca nīrūpasya rūpavattvāsaṃbhavaḥ । daśābhedenā-
virodhāt । kāryakāraṇabhedavādibhirapi prathamakṣaṇe nīrūpasya ghaṭāderanaṃtaraṃ rūpavattvasyābhyu-
pagamācca ityāśayena pariharati—<pratika>sanghaṭa iti</pratika> । na kevalaṃ prapañce sattārūpeṇaiva brahmaśaktyanu-
syūtiḥ api tu sphūrtirūpeṇāpītyāha—<pratika>saccidrūpeṇeti</pratika> । <quote>‘sanghaṭa’</quote> ityādyanubhave sattāviśi-
ṣṭatayeva <quote>‘sphurati ghaṭa’</quote> ityādyanubhave sphuraṇaviśiṣṭatayā prapañco viṣaya iti tāvatsarvānu-
bhavasiddham । tacca sphuraṇamupādānabhūtabrahmaśaktirūpameva paryavasyati । jaḍe sphuraṇāṃtarāsaṃ-
bhavāt । na ca <quote>‘sphuratī’</quote>tyasya sphuraṇaviṣayatvamarthaḥ । <quote>‘savitā sphurati bhāti prakāśata’</quote>
ityādiprayoge sphuraṇavatvārthakasya tasya <quote>‘sphuratī’</quote>tyādiprayoge'rthāṃtarakalpanāyogāt ।
na ca <quote>‘mamasphurati’</quote> <quote>‘mama na sphuratī’</quote> ti vyavahāradarśanāt tathārthakalpanam । viṣayasampa-
rkajanitavṛttiviśeṣābhivyaktasya brahmānaṃdasyeva cākṣuṣajñānādyabhivyaktasya brahmasphuraṇa-
syāpi pratiniyatavyavahāraviṣayatvopapatteḥ <quote>‘tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhātī’</quote>ti śrutyanusārya-
rthaviṣayatvakalpanasaṃbhave <quote>‘sphurati bhāti prakāśata’</quote> ityādyanubhavānāṃ viṣayāṃtarakalpanasyāyu-
ktatvācceti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>avastveva bhavediti</pratika> । yasya na sattvaṃ na vā sphuraṇaṃ na tadvastviti
bhāvaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। satvāccāparasya ।। 17 ।। kāraṇe sattvāditi</pratika> । kāraṇe tādātmyena sattvā-
dityarthaḥ । pūrvasūtre mṛdaḥ pāścātyaghaṭaśarāvādirūpatāpattiviṣayā pratijñodāhṛtā iha ghaṭa-
śarāvādīnā prācīnamṛdrūpatāpattiviṣayeti bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। asadvyapadeśānneti cenna dharmāṃtareṇa
vākyaśeṣādyukteśśabdāṃtarācca ।। 18 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘asadevedamagra āsī’</quote> dityādervaidikasyāsadvyapade-
śasyodāharaṇaṃ <quote>‘ya ete ghaṭaśarāvādaya idānīmutpannāḥ prāgiha nāsa’</quote>nniti laukikasyāpyasa-
dvyapadeśasyopalakṣaṇam । sadvyavahārārhasthūlatvavirodhi sūkṣmatvaṃ dharmāṃtaramasti । tata evāsadvyava-
hāraḥ । natūtpatteḥ prāgabhāvāditi pariharati—<pratika>neti</pratika> । nanu <quote>‘vāyorūpaṃ nāsti’</quote> ityāderivāsyā-
ṣyasadvyapadeśasyābhāvaviṣayatvaṃ yuktaṃ na tu sūkṣmāvasthāviṣayatvam । klṛptaviṣayaṃ vihāya viṣayāṃta-
rakalpane mānābhāvādityāśaṃkate—<pratika>kuta iti</pratika> । vaidikasya laukikasya cāsadvyapadeśasya viṣa-
yāṃtarakalpane krameṇa <quote>‘vākyaśeṣādyukteśce’</quote>ti sūtraśeṣoktaṃ hetudvayaṃ darśayan pariharati—<pratika>taditi</pratika> ।

vākyaśeṣāt । manaskāro hi vidyamānasyaiva bhavati । yuktirapitathā dharmāntarayo-
ganimittatāmasadva‍yapadeśasyāvagamayati । piṇḍatvaghaṭatvakapālatvarūpaiḥ paraspara-
virodhibhiḥ bhāvarūpaiḥ dharmaiḥ, ghaṭaḥ prāṅnāsīt, idānīmasti, tadānīṃ ca bhavipya-
tīti sadā vidyamānasyaiva mṛddravyasya asadādivyapadeśopapattau na tadva‍yatiriktaḥ
kaścidabhāvo nāma asadvayapadeśālambanaṃ dharmāntaraṃ kalpanīyamiti । tathā śabdā-
ntaraṃ ca <quote>‘taddhedaṃ tarhyavyākṛtamāsīt tannāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākriyata’</quote> ityādi ।। ayama-
bhiprāyaḥ---pūrvaṃ svābhinnanāmarūpavibhāgānarhasūkṣmacidacidrūpaparaśaktigarbhito hi
śivaḥ kevalo bhavati । punaḥ svātmikāṃ tādṛśīṃ śaktiṃ pūrvadaśāvirodhisthūla-
tvayuktanāmarūpavibhāgārhacidacidrūpāṃ bahirvistārayati । tatra śaktamataḥ śivasya
saṃkocāvasthā pralayaḥ । vikāsāvasthā sṛṣṭiriti । tathā āptavacanamapi---
<quote>‘cidātmaiva hi devo'ntaḥ sthitamicchāvaśādbahiḥ । yogīva nirupādānamarthajātaṃ
prakāśayet ।।’</quote> iti । nirupādānamiti anapekṣitopādānāntaraṃ svayamupādānaṃ
bhūtvetyarthaḥ । tataḥ paramakāraṇāt parabrahmaṇaḥ śivādabhinnameva jagat kāryamiti ।।
nidarśanāntaramucyate---
<sutra>।। sū ।। paṭavacca ।। 19 ।।</sutra>
yathā saṃkucitaḥ sūkṣmarūpaḥ paṭaḥ prasārito mahāpaṭakuṭīrūpeṇa kāryaṃ bhavati,
tathā brahmāpi saṃkucitarūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ prasāritarūpaṃ kāryaṃ bhavati ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। yathā ca prāṇādiḥ ।। 20 ।।</sutra>
yathā vāyureka eva vṛttiviśeṣeṇa prāṇādibhedaṃ bhajate, tathā brahmāpi śakti-
vyāpārabhedena sadāśivādiviśvarūpabhedaṃ bhajate । tato brahmaṇaḥ kāraṇādananyadeva
kāryaṃ jagaditi yuktam ।।

tat asadeva । satsyāmiti mano'kurutetyanvayaḥ । manaskāro mānasaḥ saṅkalpaḥ । <pratika>abhāvo

vatārayati—<pratika>nidarśanāṃtaramiti</pratika> । sthūlasūkṣmāvasthābhyāmekasyeva dravyasya kāryakāraṇabhāve
mṛddhaṭādidṛṣṭāṃtaḥ prākprasādhitaḥ । idānīmekadravyatve kāryakāraṇabhedavādināmapi lokasampra-
tipannaḥ paṭakuṭikādṛṣṭāntaḥ <quote>‘paṃcadhātmānaṃ pravibhajyaitadbāṇamavaṣṭabhya vidhārayāmi’</quote>iti śrute-
ssampratipannaḥ prāṇavāyuḥ dṛṣṭāṃtatayodāhriyata ityarthaḥ ।। sū ।। paṭavacca ।। 19 ।। <pratika> sū ।। yathā ca
prāṇādiḥ ।। 20 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘sadāśivādī’</quote>, tyādiśabdena maheśvaraśuddhavidyādipṛthivyaṃtatrayas‍triśatta-

uktamarthamākṣipya samādhatte---
<sutra>।। sū ।। itaravyapadeśāddhitākaraṇādidoṣaprasaktiḥ ।। 21 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘tattvamasi’</quote><quote>‘ayamātmā brahma’</quote>ityādinā kāryabhūtasya jīvasya kāraṇabhūtabrahmatva-
vyapadeśāt ananyatvamupāditam । evaṃ sati sarvajñasya parameśvarasya sarvagatasya
jagadakaraṇaṃ svasya hitarūpaṃ, tatkaraṇamahitarūpaṃ ca prasajyate । tataśca sarvajñaḥ
satyasaṃkalpa īśvaraḥ svasmādananyasya jīvasya tāpaḥ svasyeti jānan kathaṃ saṃsāranimi-
ttamahitaṃ jagatkaraṇamanuvartate, hitaṃ jagadakaraṇaṃ ca nānuvartate । tataśca jīvādana-
nyatve siddhe parameśvarasya sarvajñasyāpi svahitākaraṇe svāhitakaraṇe ca vivekaśū-
nyatvādidoṣaprasaktiḥ ।।

tvajātaṃ tatprabhavaṃ tanubhuvanabhogasthānabhogopakaraṇanikuruṃbaṃ ca gṛhyate । ṣaṭūtriṃśattatvamadhye sadā-

<quote>‘śivaśaktyādi bhūmyaṃtaṃ śarīrādi ghaṭādi ca । vyāpyādhitiṣṭhati śivastasmādviṣṇurudāhṛta’</quote> iti
śivapurāṇavacanāt <quote>‘śivāhantā śivamayī vidyānandaśarīriṇī । ṣaṭa‍triṃśattatvarūpatvamavāpya
bahurūpiṇī’</quote> tyāśvalāyanasmaraṇācca । idaṃ ca mataṃ bhāṣya eva pradeśāṃtare tatratatrāviṣkṛtam ।

venāpṛthagbhāvarūpaṃ na tvabhedarūpamiti prāgdarśitatvena śaṃkānavakāśādityāśaṅkyāvatārayati-
uktamarthamiti । adhikaṃ tvityuttarasūtrakarttavyena etacchaṅkāsamādhānena sthāsyantamarthamālocya
mṛddhaṭādidṛṣṭāṃtoktisaṅgatisamarthanasamaye tadupayogitayā bhāṣye paraṃ vyāpyavyāpakabhāvenā-
nanyadityuktam । sūtrakārastvetacchaṃkāsamādhānasamaya eva tamarthamāviṣkariṣyati ityasti
śaṅkāvakāśa iti bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। itaravyapadeśāddhitākaraṇādidoṣaprasaktiḥ ।। 21 ।।
upapāditāmiti</pratika> । āraṃbhaṇasūtra iti śeṣaḥ । nanu, brahmaṇaḥ svābhinnajīvasaṃsārahetuprapañcasa-
rgākaraṇaṃ hitaṃ tatkaraṇamahitaṃ ca bhavatu nāma । tathāpi prapañcaṃ sṛjatu dṛśyaṃte hi loke
svahitamakurvāṇā svāhitaṃ kurvāṇāśca tadvadbrahmāpi syādityāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>tataśceti</pratika> । svasya
hitāhitamajānanvā jānannapi pārataṃtryāt svasaṃkalpānusāreṇa kartumaśakto vā svasya hitaṃ
na kuryādahitaṃ ca kuryāt, brahma tu na tathā sarvajñatvātsatyasaṃkalpatvāccetyāśayaḥ । nanu sarvajñaṃ
satyasaṃkalpamapi brahma svasya hitaṃ mā karotu ahitaṃ ca karotu ko doṣaḥ na hi tena tasya sarvajñatvaṃ
satyasaṃkalpatvaṃ ca hīyate yena sa doṣaḥ syādityāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>tataśceti</pratika> । yathā strīputradārādiṣu
krodhena svayaṃ marttuṃ viṣaṃ bhakṣayataḥ krodhāndhasyeva tasya vivekaśūnyatvāpattyā sārvajñyameva
hīyeteti bhāvaḥ । evaṃ cāraṃbhaṇasūtrādananyatvamiti asadvyapadeśasūtrāccediti cānuvartya evaṃ
sūtrārtho varṇanīyaḥ । <quote>‘ayamātmā brahme’</quote>tyādiṣu jīvātmani brahmabhāvavyapadeśānanyatvaṃ cet
hitākaraṇādinā yo doṣaḥ vivekaśūnyatvaṃ tasya prasaktiriti । jīvabrahmaṇorananyatve saṃgati-
bhāṣyodāhṛtasvātaṃtryāsvātaṃtryādivyavasthāsiddhasya pūrvapakṣabhāṣyodāhṛtasraṣṭṛsṛjyabhāvādirūpa-
<pb n="031"/>
ataḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ jīveśvarayorananyatvamayuktamiti cedyuktamityucyate---
<sutra>।। sū ।। adhikaṃ tu bhedanirdeśāt ।। 22 ।।</sutra>
<p>kāryakāraṇayorananyatve'pi kāryabhūtāccidacitprapañcāt kāraṇamatrādhikameva śrū-
yate<quote>‘viśvādhiko rudro maharṣi’</quote>iti । tathā bhedanirdeśāt-tathāhi-jīveśvarayo rbhedo
nirdiśyate <quote>‘vidyāvidye īśate yastu so'nyaḥ’</quote><quote>‘kṣarātmānāvīśate deva ekaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘pṛthagā-
tmānaṃ preritāraṃ ca matvā’</quote> <quote>‘dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā’</quote> <quote>‘dve brahmaṇī veditavye paraṃ
cāparaṃ ca’</quote><quote>‘jñājñau dvāvajāvīśānīśau’</quote> <quote>‘nityo nityānāṃ cetanaścetanānām’</quote> <quote>‘antaḥ-
praviṣṭaśśāstā janānām’</quote> ‘māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram, <quote>‘asmā
nmāyī sṛjate viśvametat tasmiṃścānyo māyayā sanniruddhaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘juṣṭaṃ yadā paśyatya-
nyamīśam’</quote> <quote>‘pradhānakṣetrajñapatirguṇeśaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘yeṣāmīśe paśupatiḥ paśūnām’</quote> ityādibhi-
ranantaśrutibhiḥ । ato viśvasmādadhikameva śivāparanāmadheyaṃ brahma ।। nanu <quote>‘tada-
nanyatvam’</quote> ityabhedapratipādanāt <quote>‘adhikaṃ tu’</quote> iti bhedapratipādanāt prapañcabrahmaṇoḥ
bhedābhedaḥ sādhito bhavatīti cet-na, bhedābhedakalpanaṃ viśiṣṭādvaitaṃ sādhayāmaḥ।na vayaṃ
brahmaprapañcayoratyantameva bhedavādinaḥ ghaṭapaṭayoriva । tadananyatvaparaśrutivirodhāt ।
na vā'tyantābhedavādinaḥ śuktirajatayoriva । ekataramithyātvena tatsvābhāvikagu-
ṇabhedaparaśrutivirodhāt । na ca bhedābhedavādinaḥ, vastuvirodhāt । kiṃ tu śarī-
raśarīriṇoriva guṇaguṇinoriva ca viśiṣṭādvaitavādinaḥ । prapañcabrahmaṇorananyatvaṃ
nāma mṛddhaṭayoriva guṇaguṇinoriva ca kāryakāraṇatvena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvena ca vi-
nābhāvarahitatvam । na hi mṛdaṃ vinā ghaṭo dṛśyate, nīlimānaṃ vinā cotpalam ।
tathā brahma vinā na prapañcaśaktisthitiḥ śaktivyatirekeṇa na kadācidapi brahma
vijñāyate, vahnirivauṣṇayaṃ vinā । yena vinā yanna jñāyate tat tena viśiṣṭameva ।
tattvaṃ ca tasya svabhāva eva । ataḥ sarvathā prapañcāvinābhūtaṃ brahma tasmādananyādi-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kartṛkarmabhāvādivyavasthāsiddhasya ca bhedasya bhaṅgaprasaṃga iti doṣāṃtaraṃ sautreṇetarapadenāviṣkṛtam।
uktavyavasthābhiḥ vastuto jīvāditaradeva brahmeti tayorananyatvamayuktamiti bhāvaḥ ।</p>
<p>satyaṃ jīvāditaradbrahma tato'dhikaṃ ca । īśitrīśitavyādibhedaviṣayānekaśrutyanurodhāt ।
atastadavirodhyevānanyatvamabhedaśrutyartho na mukhyābheda iti na kaścidvirodha iti pradarśanārthaṃ sū-
tram<pratika>।।sū।।adhikaṃ tu bhedanirdeśāt।।22।।</pratika>nanvabhedaśrutyanusāreṇa<quote>‘tadananyatva’</quote>miti bheda śrutyanu-
soraṇā<quote>‘dhikaṃtvi’</quote>ti sūtritavatassūtrakārasya ko'bhiprāya ityākāṃkṣāyāṃ bhedābhedapakṣasya pṛthagbhā-
varūpātyantabhedapakṣasya mukhyābhedarūpātyaṃtābhedapakṣasyānyatarānirdhāryatvapakṣasya ca pramāṇaviru-
ddhatvāllaukikavaidikasakalapramāṇaprasiddhāṃtargaṇikabhedāpratikṣepakamapṛthagbhāvenānanyatvarūpaṃ vi-
śiṃṣṭādvaitamabheda śrutīnāmartha ityeva sūtrakārasyābhiprāya iti praśnottarābhyāṃ prapañcayati—<pratika>nanvi-
tyādinā</pratika>। evamāraṃbhaṇasūtrapratipāditānanyatvasvarūpaviśeṣanirdhāraṇārthatayā ida<quote>‘mitaravya-
padeśā’</quote>dityādisūtradvayaṃ vyākhyātam । evaṃ kimartham । tannirdhāraṇametatsūtradvayamanapekṣyāraṃ-
bhaṇasūtrasāmarthyenaiva siddhyati । idaṃ tu sūtradvayaṃ brahmaṇassadoṣajīvasaṃsargaprayuktaduṣṭatvaśaṃ-
<pb n="032"/>
tyucyate । bhedaśca svābhāvikaḥ । tataśca viśvasmādadhikameva paraṃ brahma । kāraṇatva-
kāryatvavyavasthā <quote>‘na tu dṛṣṭānta bhāvāt’</quote> (bra॰2-1-9-sū)ityatra nirūpitaiva । tasmādbhe-
dābhedaśrutīnāmaviruddha evāyaṃ mārgaḥ ।।</p>
<sutra>।। sū ।। aśmādivacca tadanupapattiḥ ।। 23 ।।</sutra>
<p>sarvathā jīveśvarayorabheda eva abhedaśrutibhiriti cet—na । anupapatteḥ । aśma-
kāṣṭhatṛṇāderacetanasyeva jīvasyāpyajñatvādinā sarvajñatvādiyuktādīśvarāt atya-
ntavijātīyatvaśravaṇāt tayorekabhāvānupapatteḥ । tasmādīśvaro jīvādarthāntarabhūta
eva । evaṃ cetanasyāpyadhikaguṇavaiṣamyādīśvarabhāvānupapattiḥ, kimutācetanasya
svarūpavilakṣaṇasyeti tātparyam । sarvathā śrutismṛtinyāyaiḥ kāryatvena svānanyabhū-
tādapi cetanācetanaprapañcāt viśvasmādadhika eva sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiḥ parameśvaraḥ ।।
ityāraṃbhaṇādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kānirākaraṇārthamadhikaraṇāṃtaraṃ vyākhyāyatāmityāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>kāraṇatveti</pratika> । <quote>‘apītau tadva-
tprasaṅgādasamañjasam’</quote> <ref>(bra॰ 2—1—8.)</ref> na tu dṛṣṭāṃtabhāvā <ref>(bra॰ 2—1—9.)</ref> diti pūrvo-
ttarapakṣasūtrābhyāṃ brahmaṇo jaḍajīvasaṃsargaprayuktaduṣṭatvanirākaraṇaṃ spaṣṭameva kṛtaṃ prāgityatispaṣṭaṃ
tādarthyamasya sūtradvayasya na yuktaṃ kiṃ tvāraṃbhaṇasūtrasya bhedasādhakasūtrāsāhityena bhedāviro-
dhyananyatvaparyavasāyitvaṃ na spaṣṭamiti tadviṣayatvenāraṃbhaṇādhikaraṇaśeṣatvamevāsya yuktamiti
bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। aśmādivacca tadanupapattiḥ ।। 23 ।।</pratika> sūtravyāvartyāṃ śaṃkāmāha—<pratika>sarvatheti ।</pratika>
<quote>‘tadananyatva’</quote>mityatyaṃtābheda ityeva yuktamabhedaśrutibāhulyādbhedaśrutīnāmaupādhikabhedaviṣayatvo-
papatteriti śaṃkārthaḥ । <pratika>anupapatteriti</pratika> । abhedaśrutirupapattiviruddhetyupapattisahakṛtā bheda-
śrutiḥ prabaletyarthaḥ । nanu <quote>‘aśmādiva’</quote>diti siddhavadda‍ṛṣṭāṃtīkaraṇamayuktam । <quote>‘sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma’</quote>
<quote>‘idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā’</quote>ityādiśrutyanusāreṇa brahmaṇyacetanābhedasyāpi śaṃkituṃ śakyatvāt
cetanācetanatvavailakṣaṇye'pyabhedasya śaktiprapañcābhedavādināṃ siddhāṃtināmavaśyamaṃgīkartavya-
tvāt ityāśaṃkya sūtratātparyamāha—<pratika>evaṃ cetanasyāpīti</pratika> । kaimutikanyāyenācetanavargasya
bhedaśrutitadanugrāhakopapattibhyāṃ bhedaṃ siddhaṃ hṛdi kṛtvā samuccayopamayāśmādivaditi sūtrita-
miti bhāvaḥ । avāṃtarārthopasaṃhāramukhenādhikaraṇārthamupasaṃharati—<pratika>sarvatheti ।</pratika></p>
<head>ityāraṃbhaṇādhikaraṇam ।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha āraṃbhaṇādhikaraṇam ।</head>
<sutra>sū॰।। tadananyatvamāraṃbhaṇaśabdādibhyaḥ ।। 15 ।। bhāve copalabdheḥ ।। 16 ।। satvāccāparasya ।। 17 ।।
asavdyapadeśānneti cenna dharmāntareṇa vākyaśeṣādyukteśśabdāntarācca ।। 18 ।। paṭavacca ।। 19 ।। yathā ca
prāṇādiḥ ।। 20 ।। itaravyapadeśāddhitākaraṇādidoṣaprasaktiḥ ।। 21 ।। adhikaṃ tu bhedanirdeśāt ।। 22 ।।
aśmādivacca tadanupapattiḥ ।। 23 ।।</sutra>
<p>naiva prapañcaśivayorananyatā kāryakāraṇāyattā । dharmairvipratiṣiddhaiḥ svahitākṛtyādidoṣaiśca ।। 99 ।।
śaṃbhurviśvādhiko nastadapi ca tadananyatvamasyānivāryaṃ śabdairāraṃbhaṇādyaiḥ sphurati saditi ca sphūrtisattānuvṛttyā ।
taccedaṃ sthūlasūkṣmākṛtiyutacidacidvigrahaśśaṃbhureva syātkāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ cetyubhayamadhigatānanyatā ceti yuktam ।। 100 ।।</p>
<head>ityāraṃbhaṇādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<pb n="033"/>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha ārambhaṇādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। tadananyatvamārambhaṇaśabdādibhyaḥ ।। 14 ।। bhāve copalabdheḥ ।। 15 ।। sattvāccāvarasya ।। 16 ।।
asadva‍yapadeśānneti cenna dharmāntareṇa vākyaśeṣāt ।। 17 ।। yukteśśabdāntarācca ।। 18 ।। paṭavacca ।। 19 ।।
yathā ca prāṇādi ।। 20 ।। itaravyapadeśāddhitākaraṇādidoṣaprasaktiḥ ।। 21 ।। adhikaṃ tu bhedanirde-
śāt ।। 22 ।। aśmādivacca tadanupapattiḥ ।। 23 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, <quote>‘tadananyatva’</quote> mityārabhya <quote>‘yathā ca prāṇādiḥ’</quote> ityantā saptasūtrī ārambhaṇādhikaraṇatvena vyapadiśyate,
<quote>‘itaravyapadeśā’</quote> dityādikaṃ sūtratrayamadhikaraṇāntaratveneti śrīkaṇṭhamatādasti viśeṣo'sminmate । itthamevādhikaraṇavibhāga
urarīkṛto rāmānujānandatīrthamatayorapi । śrīkaṇṭhamate paramidaṃ sūtradaśakamekamadhikaraṇam । ānandatīrthamate tvitaravyapa-
deśādhikaraṇe <quote>‘upasaṃhāradarśanā’</quote> dityādikamuparitanaṃ sūtratrayamapyantarbhavatītyasti viśeṣāntaramapi । pūrvaṃ pariṇāmavādama-
valaṃbyāpātataḥ <quote>‘syāllokava’</quote> diti samāhitam । atrāraṃbhaṇādhikaraṇe vivartavādarītyā paramaṃ samādhānamucyate—<pratika><quote>‘tadana-
nyatva’</quote> mityādinā</pratika> । advaitabrahmavādī vaidikasamanvayo bhedagrāhipratyakṣeṇa virudhyate na veti saṃdehe virudhyata iti
<pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, tata</pratika>=tasmātkāraṇāt । <pratika>ananyatvam</pratika>=brahmaṇaḥ kāryasya jagataḥ pṛthaksattārāhityaṃ siddham ।
<pratika>kutaḥ । āraṃbhaṇaśabdādibhyaḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘vācāraṃbhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyam’</quote> aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa
ātmā’ <quote>‘brahmaivedaṃ sarvam’</quote> ityādiśabdebhyaḥ ।। iti ।।</p>
<p>brahmavyatirekeṇa kāryasyābhāvamanumānato nirūpayati—<pratika>sū ।। bhāve copalabdheḥ ।। 15 ।। bhāve ca</pratika>=kāraṇasya brahmaṇa-
ssattve । <pratika>upalabdheḥ</pratika>=mṛdi satyāṃ ghaṭasyeva kāryasyopalabdheḥ । na hi mṛdva‍yatirekeṇa ghaṭo nāma kaścidupalabhyate । ataḥ
kāraṇavyatirekeṇa kāryaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>kāraṇavyatirekeṇa kāryasyābhāve śrutārthāpattiṃ pramāṇayati—<pratika>sū ।। sattvāccāvarasya ।। 16 ।। avarasya</pratika>=kāryasya ।
<pratika>sattvācca</pratika>=utpatteḥ prākkāraṇānanyatvena sattvācca । <quote>‘brahma vā idamagra āsī’</quote> dityādau sattvaśravaṇādutpattyanantaramapi
ananyatvaṃ siddhamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>prāgutpatteḥ kāraṇarūpeṇa kāryasya sattvamākṣipya samādhatte—<pratika>sū ।। asadva‍yapadeśānneti cenna dharmāntareṇa vākya-
śeṣāt ।। 17 ।। asadva‍yapadeśāt</pratika>=<quote>‘asadvā idamagra āsī’</quote> dityādinā prāgutpatterasadva‍yapadeśāt । <pratika>neti cet</pratika>=na
kāraṇarūpeṇa kāryasya sattvamiti cet । <pratika>na</pratika>=na hyatyantāsattvābhiprāyeṇāyamasattvavyapadeśaḥ । kiṃ tu <pratika>dharmāntareṇa</pratika>=avyā-
kṛtatvarūpadharmāntareṇa । kutaḥ । <pratika>vākyaśeṣāt</pratika>=<quote>‘tatsadāsīdi’</quote>ti vākyaśeṣāt । ataḥ kāraṇādananyatvaṃ kāryasya siddha-
mityarthaḥ ।। kiṃ ca ।। <pratika>sū ।। yukteśśabdāntarācca ।। 18 ।। yukteḥ</pratika>=mṛdātmanā pūrvaṃ ghaṭasyābhāve ghaṭārthinā mṛdeva nopādī-
yeta, asattvāviśeṣādyatkiṃcidevopādīyeta, ityevamādyāyā yukteḥ । <pratika>śabdāntarācca</pratika>=<quote>‘sadeva somyedamagra āsīt’</quote>ityevamādau
vidyamānasacchabdāntarācca prāgutpatteḥ kāryasya kāraṇānanyatvaṃ satvaṃ ceti siddham ।।</p>
<p>nanu mṛddhaṭau bhinnau vilakṣaṇapratītiviṣayatvāt ghaṭapaṭavat ityanumāne hetorvyabhicāraṃ nirūpayati—<pratika>sū ।। paṭavacca ।। 19 ।।</pratika>
yathā saṃveṣṭitaprasāritapaṭayoḥ vilakṣaṇapratītiviṣayatve'pi na bhedastathā mṛddhaṭayorityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu kāryamupādānādbhinnam, bhinnakāryakaratvātsaṃmatavat ityukte hetorvyabhicāramāha—<pratika>sū ।। yathā ca prāṇādi
।। 20 ।।</pratika> yathā ca prāṇāyāmādinā niruddhaḥ prāṇāpānādirjīvanamātraṃ 	kāryaṃ niṣpādayati aniruddhastvākuṃcanaprasāraṇādikaṃ
kāryaṃ nirvartayati, naitāvatā prāṇāderbhedo'sti । tasmātkāryakāraṇayorananyatvādadvaitabrahmasamanvaye na kaścidvirodha iti siddham ।।</p>
<head>iti bhagavatpādamate ārambhaṇādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<head>atha itaravyapadeśādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p>pūrvamekavijñānapratijñāsiddhaye kāryasya kāraṇādananyatvaṃ samarthitam । tarhi tenaiva nyāyena jīvabrahmaṇorapyabhedājjīvadharmā
hitākaraṇādayo doṣā brahmaṇi prasajyerannityākṣepasaṃgatyedamāha—<pratika>sū ।। itaravyapadeśādityādi</pratika> । yadi brahma jagajjanayet
tarhi na svāniṣṭaṃ janayediti tarkeṇa jīvābhinnaṃ brahma jagadupādānamiti bruvan samanvayo virudhyate vā na veti saṃdehe
<pratika>itaravyapadeśāt</pratika>=itarasya jīvasya <quote>‘tattvamasyā’</quote>dinā brahmatvavyapadeśāt, itarasya brahmaṇaḥ <quote>‘anena jīvenātmanānupraviśye’</quote>
tyādinā śārīratvavyapadeśādvā । <pratika>hitākaraṇādidoṣaprasaktiḥ</pratika>=brahmaṇaḥ sraṣṭṛtve jīvasyaiva sraṣṭṛtvāt nañ‌vyatyāsena ahi-
tajarāmaraṇādibahuvidhānarthakaraṇarūpadoṣasya prasaktirbrahmaṇassamāpatati ityatastasyābhrāntacetanatvenāniṣṭajagajjanakatvāyogā-
duktasamanvayo virudhyata iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> ।</p>
<p><pratika>siddhāntamāha—sū ।। adhikaṃ tu bhedanirdeśāt ।। 22 ।।</pratika> tuśabdaḥ pūrvapakṣaṃ vyāvartayati । yataḥ śārīrādadhikaṃ
sarvajñaṃ sarvaśakti brahma jagadupādānaṃ sraṣṭṛ ceti brūmaḥ ato na hitākaraṇādidoṣaprasaktiḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>bhedanirdeśāt</pratika>=<quote>‘ātmā
<pb n="034"/>
vā are draṣṭavya’</quote> ityādinā kalpitabhedasya vyapadeśāt । na hi brahmaṇo nityamuktasya hitamahitaṃ vāsti । yena sa doṣaḥ
prasajyeta । ataḥ kalpitabhedamādāyaiva sarvasyāsāṃkaryopapattiriti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanvekarūpabrahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatve kāryavaicitryaṃ na syāditi doṣamāśaṃkya dṛṣṭāntena pariharati---<pratika>sū ।। aśmādivacca
tadanupapattiḥ ।। 23 ।। aśmādivacca</pratika>=ekapṛthivījanyānāmaśmanāṃ yathā vajravaiḍ‌ryādibhedena vaicitryaṃ tathā brahmakāryāṇāṃ
svarūpavaicitryaṃ yujyate । ataḥ <pratika>tadanupapattiḥ</pratika>=tasyoktadoṣasyānupapattiḥ । tasmājjīvābhinnabrahmavādisamanvayo na virudhyata
iti siddham ।। <pratika>iti itaravyapadeśādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ siddhavatkṛtya vyavahṛtasya prapañcaśivayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvenānanyatvasya svātaṃtryāsvātaṃtryatatkṛtabho-
ktṛtvābhoktṛtvādirūpaparasparaviruddhadharmavailakṣaṇyavirodhaṃ nirūpayitumāha---<pratika>tadananyatvamārambhaṇaśabdādibhyaḥ ।। 16 ।।</pratika> iha
kāryakāraṇayoḥ prapañcaśivayorananyatvamupapadyate vā na veti saṃdehe buddhiśabdāntarādibalāt bhedakasvabhāvasya vailakṣaṇyasyābhe-
davirodhitvāccānanyatvamayuktamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, laukikavaidikasakalapramāṇaprasiddhāntargaṇikabhedāpratikṣepaka-
mapṛthagbhāvenānanyatvarūpaṃ viśiṣṭādvaitamabhedaśrutīnāmartha ityevaṃ sūtrakārasyābhiprāya ityavagamyamānatayā vācāraṃbhaṇaśrutyā-
dibahupramāṇabalena mṛdā dhaṭādikamiva kāraṇena śivena kāryamidaṃ jagadva‌yāptaṃ tadananyabhūtaṃ ceti sidhyati । avasthāntaravaśāt
buddhiśabdāntarādyupapatteḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ prapañcaśivayorananyatvaṃ yuktameveti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, tadananyatvam</pratika>=tasmātkāraṇā-
dbrahmaṇaḥ kāryasya jaṃgaṃto'nanyatvaṃ tadupapādayadbha‍yo vākyebhyaḥ ārambhaṇaśabdādibhyo'vagamyata ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। bhāve copalabdheḥ ।। 16 ।। bhāve</pratika>=ghaṭādikāryabhāve । <pratika>upalabdheḥ</pratika>=tadevedaṃ mūddravyamitthamavasthitamiti
kāraṇasyopalabdheśca kāraṇādananyatvaṃ kāryasyetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। sattvāccāparasya ।। 17 ।। aparasya</pratika>=kāryasya । <pratika>sattvācca</pratika>=satkāryavāde kāraṇe sattvācca kāraṇādananyatkārya-
mityarthaḥ । ghaṭaśarāvādirūpeṇāvasthitaṃ mṛddravyaṃ pūrvaṃ piṇḍākāramupalabdhamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। asadba‍yapadeśādityādi ।। 18 ।। asadvayapadeśāt</pratika>=<quote>‘idaṃ vāgre naiva kiṃcanāsī’</quote>diti kāraṇāvasthāyāṃ
kāryasyāsattvavyapadeśāt kāraṇe kāryamasaditi <pratika>cet na ।</pratika> saditivyapadeśārhasthūlatvavirodhisūkṣmatvarūpa<pratika>dharmāntareṇa
yogāt</pratika> asadvyapadeśa iti <quote>‘tadasadeva sanmano'kuruta’</quote> iti <pratika>vākyaśeṣabalāt</pratika>, ghaṭo'sti ghaṭo nāstīti sadasadva‍yapa-
deśayoḥ vaṭatvakapālatvayoḥ parasparavirodhidharmayoreva hetutve siddhe tadatiriktābhāvarūpadharmāntarakalpanānupapattirūpa<pratika>yukteḥ,</pratika>
taṃ<quote>‘ddhedaṃ tarhyavyākṛtamāsīttannāmarūpābhyāmeva vyākriyata’</quote> ityādisamānaprakaraṇasthā<pratika>cchrutyaṃtarāccā</pratika>vagamyate ityarthaḥ । ataḥ
kāraṇe kāryaṃ sadeveti siddham । tataḥ paramakāraṇātparabrahmaṇaḥ śivādabhinnameva jagatkāryamiti bhāvaḥ ।। ‘asadva‍yapadeśādi-
tyādi <quote>‘yukteśśabdāntarācce’</quote>tyantamekaṃ sūtramiti pūrvasmādviśeṣaḥ ।। dṛṣṭāntāntaramāha---<pratika>sū ।। paṭavacca ।। 19 ।।</pratika> yathā saṃku-
citaḥ paṭaḥ prasāritaḥ mahāpaṭakuṭīrūpeṇa kāryaṃ bhavati tadvadbrahmāpi ।। iti</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। yathā ca prāṇādiḥ ।। 20 ।।</pratika> yathā vāyureka eva vṛttiviśeṣeṇa prāṇāṣānādibhedaṃ bhajate tathā brahmāpi śakti-
vyāpārabhedena sadāśivādirūpabhedaṃ bhajate । tataḥ brahmaṇaḥ kāraṇādananyadeva kāryaṃ jagaditi yuktam ।।</p>
<p>uktamarthamākṣipati—<pratika>sū ।। itaravyapadeśādityādi ।। 21 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘tattvamasyayamātmā brahme’</quote> tyādinā kāryabhūtasya
jīvasya kāraṇabhūtabrahmavyapadeśāt jīvānanyatve parameśvarasya svahitākaraṇe svāhitakaraṇe ca vivekaśūnyatvādidoṣaprasaṃgaḥ ।
ataḥ kāryakāraṇayorjīveśvarayorananyatvamayuktamiti cet ।</p>
<p>yuktamityāha---<pratika>sū ।। adhikaṃ tu bhedanirdeśāt ।। 22 ।।</pratika> kāryakāraṇayorananyatve'pi kāryabhūtāccidacitprapañcātkā-
raṇaṃ brahmādhikamiti <quote>‘viśvādhiko rudro maharṣiḥ’</quote> iti śrutyā pratipādyate । tathā <pratika>bhedanirdeśāt</pratika>=<quote>‘vidyāvidye īśate yastu
so'nyaḥ’</quote> ityādibhiranantaśrutibhiḥ jīveś‍varayorbhedo nirdiśyate । tasmādviś‍vasmādadhikameva śivāparanāmadheyaṃ paraṃ brahma ।
evaṃ ca prapañcabrahmaṇorananyatvaṃ nāma mṛddhaṭayoriva guṇaguṇinoriva ca kāryakāraṇatvena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvena ca vinābhāvarahi-
tattvam । ataḥ sarvathā prapañcāvinābhūtaṃ brahma tasmādananyadityucyate । bhedastu svabhāvikaḥ । abhedaśrutīnāṃ bhedāvirodhyananya-
tvarūpaviśiṣṭadvaitaparyavasāyitvādabhedaśrutīnāmavirodha iti siddham <pratika>।। sū ।। aśmādivacca tadanupapattiḥ ।। 23 ।।</pratika>
aśmakāṣṭhatṛṇāderacetanasyeva jīvasyāpyajñatvādinā sarvajñatvādiyuktādīś‍varādvijātīyatvaśravaṇāttayorekabhāvānupapattirityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti śrīkaṇṭhamate āraṃbhaṇādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, brahmaśabdābhidheyavastumātrabhede'pi śrutyārthavarṇanādiprakriyāyāṃ nāsti vailakṣaṇyaṃ śrīkaṇṭhamatāt । adhi-
karaṇaracanāyāṃ tu bhagavatpādamatamevānusniyate'sminnadhikaraṇe । <quote>‘itaravyapadeśā’</quote> dityādisūtratrayamasminmate bhagavatpāda-
matavadadhikaraṇāntarameva । sūtrārthavarṇanādikaṃ prāyaḥ śrīkaṇṭhamataprakriyāmevānusarati viśiṣṭādvaitāviśeṣāt । āraṃbhaṇādhika-
raṇasūtrārthavarṇanasaṃdehapūrvapakṣasiddhāntādiṣu nāsti śrīkaṇṭhamatādviśeṣaḥ prāyaśaḥ । <pratika><quote>‘paṭavacca’</quote> <quote>‘yathā ca prāṇādiḥ’</quote></pratika> iti
sūtrayorarthavarṇane paramasti kiyāniva bhedaḥ—yathā—tantava eva vyatiṣaṃgaviśeṣabhājaḥ paṭa iti nāmarūpābhyāṃ kāryāntarādikaṃ
<pb n="035"/>
bhajante tadvadbrahmāpi iti vyākhyātamasminmate । <quote>‘yathā ca prāṇādiḥ’</quote> iti sūtre <quote>‘tathā’</quote> brahmāpi śaktivyāpārabhedena
sadāśivādirūpabhedaṃ bhajate’ ityetannāsti । evameva kvacitkvacitprātisvikāsādhāraṇamatasiddhāntavarṇanaprakriyāyāṃ paraṃ śrīkaṇṭha-
rāmānujamatayordṛśyate parasparaṃ vailakṣaṇyam । paramasiddhānte paramādviyata evānayossālakṣaṇyaṃ sarveṣvadhikaraṇeṣu ।।</p>
<head>iti rāmānujamate ārambhaṇādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<head>atha itaravyapadeśādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p>asminnadhikaraṇe brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatva saṃbhavati vā na veti saṃdihya <quote>‘ayamātmā brahma’</quote> <quote>‘tattvamasi’</quote> ityādisāmānādhikara-
ṇyanirdeśena jīvo brahmetyavagamāt hitākaraṇādidoṣaprasaktyā brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatvānupapatteśca jagatkāraṇatvaṃ na saṃbhavatīti
pūrvapakṣamudbhāvya <quote>‘asmānmāyī sṛjate viś‍vametat’</quote> <quote>‘pṛthagātmānaṃ preritāraṃ ca matvā’</quote> ityādibhiḥ pratyagātmano'rthāntarabhūtaṃ
brahmetyavagamāt brahmaṇo jagatsargasya līlāprayojanatvā <quote>‘tattvamasī’</quote> tyādisāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśasya jīvabrahmaṇośśarīra-
śarīribhāvaghaṭitatayā taccharīratayā jīvaprakārabrahmapratipādanaparatvāt sthūlacidacidvastuśarīraṃ brahma kāraṇāvasthaṃ sūkṣmaci-
dacidvastuśarīraṃ brahma kāryāvasthamiti kāryakāraṇayostayorananyatvopapatteśca brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatvaṃ saṃbhavatyeveti siddhāntitam ।
<pratika>itaravyapadeśāt</pratika>=brahmaṇo jīvatayā vyapadeśāditi ca vyākhyātam । itarasūtrārthavarṇane nāsti vailakṣaṇyaṃ śrīkaṇṭhamatāt ।
etadadhikaraṇaśarīrānuguṇyena <quote>‘jīvādarthāntarabhūtaṃ brahme’</quote> ti svasiddhāntānuguṇyena ca prāyaḥ śrīkaṇṭhamatavadeva vyākhyātamiti
nāsti pṛthakprapañcanāvakāśa iti ।। <pratika>iti rāmānujamate itaravyapadeśādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</pratika></p>
<p>ānandatīrthamate’ yadyapi rāmānujamatavadevādhikaraṇavibhāgaḥ । tathāpi itaravyapadeśādhikaraṇe <pratika><quote>‘upasaṃhāradarśanā-
nneti cenna kṣīravaddhi ।। 25 ।। devādivadapi loke ।। 26 ।। kṛtsnaprasaktirniravayavatvaśabdakopo vā
।। 27 ।।’</quote></pratika> ityetāni trīṇyapi sūtrāṇyantarbhavantīti matāntarebhyo viśeṣaḥ । atra viṣṇoḥ svatantrakāraṇāntaranirapekṣaṃ jaga-
tkartṛtvaṃ yuktaṃ na veti saṃdehaḥ । jagatsṛṣṭiḥ svatantrakāraṇasāpekṣā svataṃtrādhiṣṭhānasāpekṣā kartratiriktasvataṃtrakāraṇāpekṣā
sṛṣṭitvāt tathā sthityādikamapi ityādibahuyuktivirodhānna yuktamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । jagatsṛṣṭyādiṣu svataṃtrasādhanasya brahmā-
nanyatvameva । tadva‍yatirekeṇa tatra svataṃtrasādhanaṃ nāstīti yāvat । kutaḥ । <quote>‘kiṃ svidāsīdadhiṣṭhānaṃmāraṃbhaṇa’</quote> miti karaṇādhi-
ṣṭhānādyākṣepakaśrutivākyayuktibhyaḥ । brahmātiriktasvataṃtrasādhanasadbhāve vedeṣu tadupalabdhiprasaṃgācca । ato viṣṇoḥ sādhanā-
ntaranirapekṣaṃ kartṛtvaṃ yuktameveti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu</pratika>, <quote>‘avarasye’</quote> tyagre'bhidhānātsvataṃtrasādhanasyeti śeṣaḥ । svataṃ-
trasādhanasya <pratika>tadananyatvam</pratika>=brahmābhinnatvaṃ vācyam । kutaḥ । <pratika>āraṃbhaṇaśabdādibhyaḥ</pratika>=āraṃbhaṇapadopalakṣitakiṃsvidāsī-
dityadhiṣṭhānādyākṣepakavākyāt svātaṃtryādiyuktibhyaścetyarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। bhāve copalabdheḥ ।। 16 ।। bhāve ca</pratika>=īśvarānya-
svataṃtrasādhanasya sattve ca । <pratika>upalabdheḥ</pratika>=darśanasya prasaṃgāt । ato'pi nāstyanyatsvataṃtrasādhanamityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। sattvā-
ccāvarasya ।। 17 ।।</pratika> co'vadhāraṇe । <pratika>avarasya</pratika>=asvataṃtrasādhanasya । <pratika>sattvācca</pratika>=sattvādeva <quote>‘adbha‍yaḥ saṃbhūta’</quote> iti vākyaṃ
tatparaṃ bhavatīti na tadvirodha ityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। asadva‍yapadeśānneti cenna dharmāntareṇa vākyaśeṣāt ।। 18 ।।
asadva‍yapadeśāt</pratika>=<quote>‘nāsadāsī’</quote> dityanyasyāsattvavacanāt anyasattvaṃ na yuktamiti <pratika>cenna</pratika> । kutaḥ । <pratika>dharmāntareṇa</pratika>=svataṃ-
tratvādidharmāntareṇaivāsattvavyapadeśo na svarūpeṇetyarthaḥ । kuto mukhyārthatyāgaḥ । <pratika>vākyaśeṣāt</pratika>=<quote>‘tamaāsī’</quote> diti prakṛtyā-
disattvaparavākyaśeṣānyathānupapattyetyarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। yukteśśabdāntarācca ।। 19 ।। yukteḥ</pratika>=līlayā daṇḍamavaṣṭabhya gaṃtuḥ
paṃgutvābhāvavat, bhagavato'pi līlayā svādhīnasādhanāvalaṃbanasya yuktatvāt । <pratika>śabdāntarācca</pratika>=<quote>‘śakto'pi bhagavānviṣṇu’</quote>
rityādiśabdaviśeṣācca uktaṃ yuktamityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। paṭavacca ।। 20 ।।</pratika> paṭasṛṣṭivacca viś‍vasṛṣṭirapi kartṛbhinnasādhanāntarasādhye-
tyarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। yathā ca prāṇādiḥ ।। 21 ।।</pratika> yathā prāṇadehendriyādikaṃ na svataṃtram evaṃ prakṛtyādisādhanāntaramapītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>ityānandatīrthamate āraṃbhaṇādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<head>athānandatīrthamate itaravyapadeśādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। itaravyapadeśāddhitākaraṇādidoṣaprasaktiḥ ।। 22 ।।</pratika> atrādhikaraṇe asya kartā jīvo veś‍varo
veti saṃdehe loke ghaṭādikāryeṣu jīvasyaiva kartṛtvenānubhavasiddhatvāllāghavāttasyaiva samastajagatkartṛtvaucityāt <quote>‘jīvādbhavanti
bhūtāni’</quote> iti śrutyānukūlyācca jīvasyaiva svatantrakartṛtvānna viṣṇorjagatkartṛtvamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।</pratika> jīvasya svatantrakartṛtvāṅgī-
kāre tasya hitākaraṇāhitakaraṇādidoṣaprasaktyā na jīvaḥ svatantrakartā kiṃ tu parameś‍vara eveti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu,
itaravyapadeśāt=itarasya</pratika>=jīvakartṛtvasya । <pratika>vyapadeśāt</pratika>=<quote>‘jīvādbhavanti’</quote> ityādiśrutāvuktatvāt । <quote>‘yadi tarhi’ iti
śeṣaḥ । jīvaḥ svatantrakarte’</quote> ti yadyucyate tarhi tasya hitākaraṇamahitakaraṇaṃ cetyetaddoṣadvayaṃ prasajyeta । ato na jīvaḥ
svataṃtrakartetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। adhikaṃ tu bhedanirdeśāt ।। 23 ।।</pratika> tuśabdo jīvasāmyavyāvartakaḥ । brahma tu jīvāpekṣayā adhikam । kutaḥ।
<pratika>bhedanirdeśāt</pratika>=śrotā maṃte’ tyādau śrotṛtvādirūpaviśeṣasyoktatvāt ityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। aś‍mādivacca tadanupapattiḥ ।।</pratika>
<pb n="036"/>
atha upasaṃhāradarśanādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। upasaṃhāradarśanānneti cenna kṣīravaddhi ।। 24 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘ekamevādvitīyam’</quote> <quote>‘dyāvāpṛthivī janayan deva ekaḥ’</quote> ityādiṣu parameśvara eka
eva jagataḥ kāraṇamavagamyate । tasyāsyaikasya vicitrajagatkāraṇatvaṃ yuktaṃ na vā ।
iti saṃśaye na yuktamiti vadāmaḥ । tadasambhavāt । kāryametadākāśavāyva-
grisalilādirūpaṃ vicitram । kathametat kāraṇavaicitryamantareṇa sambhavati । dṛśyate
hi rathādikāryeṣu bahukārakopasaṃhāraḥ । tasmādekakāraṇatvaṃ na sambhavatīti cet---
naitadyuktam---ekasyāpi kāryarūpeṇa pariṇāmaḥ sambhavati, yathā kṣīrasyaikasyaiva
dadhibhāvena । tasmādbrahmaikakāraṇakaṃ jagatkāryam ।।
yaduktaṃ kāryavaicitryaṃ kāraṇavaicitryāpekṣamiti, tadasat, cetanādekasmāt
puruṣāt keśanasvādivicitrakāryaniṣpattidarśanāt । ato vicitrajagatkāryani-
rvāhe brahma na kāraṇāntarāpekṣamiti ।।
śaktimatāṃ sarvaṃ sambhāvyata evetyāha---</p>
<sutra>।। sū ।। devādivadapi loke ।। 25 ।।</sutra>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha upasaṃhāradarśanādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। upasaṃhāradarśanānneti cenna kṣīravaddhi ।। 24 ।। devādivadapi loke ।। 25 ।।</sutra>
<p>iha brahmaṇo jagadupādānatvādhiṣṭhātṛtvavādinaḥ samanvayasyopādānatvādhiṣṭhātṛtvayossahakārya-
ntarāpekṣāniyamasadbhāvāsadbhāvābhyāṃ yuktibādhyatvābādhyatvasaṃśaye brahmaprapañcayormukhyābhedā-
bhāve'pi śarīraśarīribhāvenāpṛthaksiddhaprakāraprakāribhāvena vā sāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśa-
syeva upādānatvaśravaṇasyādhiṣṭhātṛtvaśravaṇasya ca sahakāryantarābhāve kartuṃ na śakyaṃ prakārāṃ-
tareṇopapādanam । mṛtpiṇḍakulālādiṣu tayossahakāryapekṣāniyamadarśanāt vicitrakāryaja-
nane vicitrasahakāryapekṣāvaśyaṃbhāvācceti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । kṣīrapuruṣadevādīnāṃ dadhikeśanasvasaṃ-
kalpasṛjyakāryeṣūpādānatvādhiṣṭhātṛtvayossahakāryaṃtarānapekṣatvadarśanena vyabhicārāt nāstyeva
tanniyama iti siddhāṃtaḥ । atra ciṃtyate । prapañcasṛṣṭau brahmaṇassahakārīṇi santyeva siddhāṃta-
saṃmatāni । na hi lokasiddhāni mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍacakrādīni śrutisiddhāni māyākālakarmādīni
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
24 ।। caśabdo'piśabdārthaḥ । <pratika>aśmādivat</pratika>=pāṣāṇāderiva । <pratika>api</pratika>=jīvasya cetanatve'pi । <pratika>tadanupapattiḥ</pratika>=
asvātantryāt svataḥkartṛtvānupapattiḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। upasaṃhāradarśanānneti cenna kṣīravaddhi ।। 25 ।। upasaṃhāradarśanāt</pratika>=jīvenārabdhakāryasya samāpa-
nadarśanāt sa eva karteti uktabrahmakartṛtvaṃ neti cenna । kutaḥ । <pratika>hi=</pratika>yasmāt । <pratika>kṣīravat</pratika>=goṣu dṛśyamānakṣīrasya yathā
mukhyaprāṇakṛtatvaṃ tathā jīvakṛtopasaṃhāro'pi paramātmakṛta evetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। devādivadapi loke ।। 26 ।।</pratika> evaṃbhūteśvarasyāpi । <pratika>devādivat</pratika> adarśanaṃ yujyate । kathametadityata uktaṃ
<pratika>loka iti</pratika> । jagati piśācādīnāmapi adṛśyatvādiśaktirdṛṣṭā sarveś‍varasya tu kiṃ vācyamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। kṛtsnaprasaktirniravayavatvaśabdakopo vā ।। 20 ।।</pratika> vāśabdaḥ pakṣabhedena doṣāpādānasūcakaḥ । jīvasya svataḥ
kartṛtve sarvakārtsnyena pravartane aṅgīkṛte <pratika>kṛtsnaprasaktiḥ</pratika>=tṛṇādānādisarvakāryeṣvapi sarvasāmarthyapravṛttiprasaṃgaḥ । tatparihārāya
ekadeśena pravṛttyabhyupagame ca <pratika>niravayavatvaśabdakopaḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘nityo niravayava’</quote> iti śrutivirodhaḥ syādityarthaḥ ।। ato
na jīvaḥ svatantrakartā । kiṃ tvīś‍varādhīnakartā iti ।। <pratika>iti ānandatīrthamate itaravyapadeśādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmāraṃbhaṇādhikaraṇetaravyapadeśādhikaraṇe ।। 6 ।। 7 ।।</head>
<pb n="037"/>
<p>devādeḥ śāstrāvagataśakteryathā svāpekṣitanānārūpādibhāvaḥ, evaṃ śāstrāva-
gataśakteḥ parameśvarasya sarvamupapadyate । <quote>‘ya imān lokanīśata īśanībhiḥ jana-
nībhiḥ paramaśaktibhiḥ’</quote> iti parameśvarasya anantaśaktimattvaṃ śrūyate । tasya
kimasādhyam ।। ityupasaṃhāradarśanādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ca kāraṇāntarāṇi siddhāṃte tyajyaṃte । pratyutāraṃbhaṇasūtrādiparyālocanayā tathaiva tānyabhyupagatā-
nyavagamyaṃte । jagadvaicitryaṃ karmavaicitryamūlamiti ca <quote>‘vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvā’</quote> diti
<ref>(bra॰ 2-1-34)</ref> darśayiṣyate । ekamevetyādi vyaktanāmarūpasthūlaprapañcabhāvābhiprāya-
miti tatratatroktameva । kathaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prapañcasṛṣṭau sahakārivirahaṃ siddhavatkṛtya pūrvapakṣasi-
ddhāntau pravartitau ? । kathaṃ ca kṣīradṛṣṭāṃtena siddhāntopapādanaṃ kṛtam ? । <quote>‘payoṃ'buvacce’</quote> diti
<ref>(bra॰ 2-1-2.)</ref> sūtre hi kṣīrasya dadhibhāvāpattyādiṣu parameśvarādhiṣṭhānaṃ kāraṇāntarama-
stīti vakṣyate । kathaṃ ca <quote>‘devādivadapi loke’</quote> <ref>(bra॰ 2-1-25.)</ref> iti siddhānte dṛṣṭāntānta-
ramuktam । na hi parabrahmaṇo'pi sahakāryaṃtaraṃ vinā sraṣṭṛtvamanupapannamiti vivadamānaḥ pūrva-
pakṣī devādīnāṃ tadanumanyeta । kiṃ ca । bhūtavaśināṃ teṣāṃ sraṣṭṛtvamapi tatsaṅkalpānītapārthi-
vadravyādisahakāryapekṣamiti tatrā'pi na sahakārivirahasampratipattiriti । atredamuttaram ।
mṛtpiṇḍādīnāmupādānabhāve tavdyatiriktakulālādyadhiṣṭhānāpekṣā dṛṣṭā । kulālādīnāṃ nimi-
ttabhāve svasaṅkalpamātranadhīnasamavadhānasahakāryapekṣā dṛṣṭā । tadabhāvādbrahmaṇo nopādānatvaṃ
na vā nimittatvaṃ saṃbhavatīti manyamānasya pūrvapakṣaḥ । smṛtayaḥ kartra/?/gauravamātreṇānādaraṇī-
yatve'pi tadupanyastayuktigauraveṇādaraṇīyā iti kapilādismṛtyuktabrahmavādanirākaraṇārtha-
yuktyavalambanapūrvapakṣanirākaraṇārthāni khalviha pāde <quote>‘navilakṣaṇatvā’</quote> dhikaraṇamārabhyādhi-
karaṇāni । tatra kapilasmṛtyanusāriṇāṃ nirīśvaravādināṃ paryo'bunyāyena svata eva prakṛteḥ
prapañcasṛṣṭau pravṛttimavagacchatāṃ naivaṃ yuktirupapadyata iti kṣīravadityanenoktam । uktārthe
anyeṣāmapi nopa...............ātmarūpopādānābhinnakartṛkeṣu yāgopāsanādiṣu vyabhicārasya
spaṣṭatvāditi hiśabdena dyotitam । kartuḥ svasaṅkalpamātranadhīnasamavadhānasahakāryapekṣā-
niyamavyabhicāro <quote>‘devādiva’</quote> diti sūtreṇoddhāṭita iti । bhāṣye <quote>‘cetanādekasmātpuruṣā’</quote>
diti puruṣātiriktaparidṛśyamānakeśanasvādikāraṇābhāvābhiprāyaḥ ।।</p>
<head>ityupasaṃhāradarśanādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha upasaṃhāradarśanādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। upasaṃhāradarśanānneti cenna kṣīravaddhi ।। 24 ।। devādivadapi loke ।। 25 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>karturupādānasyāpyukaraṇāpekṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam । kathamīśo'nupakaraṇaḥ kuryādekaḥ prapañcamimam ।। 101 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>dṛṣṭaṃ hīnopakaraṇaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhibhāvamāpnoti । devādayo'pyabhimataṃ sṛjanti saṅkalpamātreṇa ।। 102 ।।</l></lg>
<head>ityupasaṃhāradarśanādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha upasaṃhāradarśanādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। upasaṃhāradarśanānneti cenna kṣīravaddhi ।। 24 ।। devādivadapi loke ।। 25 ।। bhagavatpādamate</pratika>,
pūrvamaupādhikajīvabhedāddhitakaraṇādidoṣo nāstītyuktam । saṃpratyupādhito'pi brahmaṇo vibhaktaṃ karaṇādikaṃ nāsti brahmanānā-
tvābhāvāditi pratyudāharaṇasaṃgatyedamāha---<pratika>sū ।। upasaṃhāradarśanānneti cenna kṣīravaddhi ।। 24 ।।</pratika> na brahma upādāna-
<pb n="038"/>
atha kṛtstnaprasaktyadhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। kṛtsnaprasaktirniravayavatvaśabdakopo vā ।। 26 ।।</sutra>
atra brahmaṇo jagadākāreṇa pariṇāmaḥ pūrvoktā yujyate na veti saṃdehaḥ ।
kathaṃ yujyate ! ekasyaiva jagadākāreṇa pariṇāma ityuktam । tasya kṣīrasyeva
dadhirūpeṇa sarvātmanā jagadākāreṇa pariṇāme kṛtsnasyāpi kāryatvaprasaktiḥ,
brahma nāvaśiṣyeta । kena cidaṃśena cettasya niravayavatvaśrutikopo vā bhavati ।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha kṛtsnaprasaktyadhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<p>sū॰ ।। kṛtsnaprasaktirniravayatvaśabdakopo vā ।। 26 ।। kṛtsnaprasaktyādidoṣaprasaṃgā-
prasaṃgābhyāṃ saṃśayaṃ darśayati—<pratika>atreti</pratika> । pūrvatrādhikaraṇe kṣīrasyeva dadhibhāvena brahmaṇaḥ prapañcabhāvena
pariṇāma uktaḥ । tarhi tadvadeva sarvātmanā pariṇāme brahmānavaśeṣaprasaṃga iti pradarśanapūrvakaṃ
sūtroditaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ darśayati—<pratika>kathamiti। nāvaśiṣyeteti</pratika>। tathā ca prapañcātītasya brahma-
ṇassārvādikasattābodhakānāṃ tatsākṣātkāropayuktavidyāvidhāyakānāṃ ca vākyānāṃ vaiyarthya-
prasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ । tatra phalādīnāmaṃśena pakvatāvadaṃśena brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmaḥ syādityāśaṃ-
kyāha—<pratika>kenaciditi</pratika>। brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmābhāve'pi cicchakteḥ pariṇāmo'stīti tadda‍ṛṣṭhyā
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kartṛ vā asahāyatvātsaṃmatavat iti nyāyena asahāyādbrahmaṇo jagatsargaṃ bruvan virudhyate na veti saṃdehe upa-
<pratika>saṃhāradarśanāt</pratika>=loke kulālasya kartuḥ daṇḍacakrādyupakaraṇadarśanāt mṛdo vā upādānasya svabhinnakulālādisahāyadarśanāt ।
<pratika>neti cet</pratika>=tadubhayavilakṣaṇasya brahmaṇo na jagatkartṛtvamupādānatvaṃ vā saṃbhavati । atassamanvayo virudhyata iti cet iti
<pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu’kṣīravaddhi</pratika>=hiśabdo hetvarthaḥ । yathā loke kṣīraṃ bāhyasādhanānyanapekṣya dadhyākāreṇa pari-
ṇamate tadvadbrahmāpi । śrutirapi brahmaṇo'sahāyasya kāryakāritvaṃ darśayati---<quote>‘na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ca vidyata’</quote> iti ।।</p>
<p>nanu, cetanatve satyasahāyatvaṃ hetuḥ ato na kṣīre vyabhicāra ityāśaṃkya cetanadṛṣṭāntena tasya vyabhicāramāha—<pratika>sū ।। devā-
divadapi loke ।। 25 ।।</pratika> lokyate'neneti lokaḥ mantrārthavādetihāsapurāṇādiḥ śabdaḥ । tasmin yathā devāḥ pitaraḥ ṛṣayaḥ
ityevamādayaścetanāḥ svasiddhisāmarthyātsādhanāntaraṃ bāhyamanapekṣya saṃkalpamātreṇaiva nānāvidhakāryakartāra upalabhyaṃte
tadvadbrahmāpyasahāyameva jagadupādānaṃ kartṛ ceti tadvācisamanvayo na virudhyata iti siddham ।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, <quote>‘ekamevādvitīyam’</quote> <quote>‘dyāvāpṛthivī janayandeva ekaḥ’</quote> ityādiśrutiṣu jagataḥ kāraṇatvena asahāyatvena ca śrūyamā-
ṇasya parameśvarasyaikasya viṃcitrajagatkāraṇatvaṃ yuktaṃ na veti saṃdehaḥ । ākāśavāyvagnisalilarūpaṃ vicitraṃ kāryaṃ jagadidaṃ kāraṇavai-
citryamantareṇa kathaṃ saṃbhavati । loke rathādikāryeṣu bahukārakopasaṃhāradarśanādekakāraṇatvaṃ na yuktamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>,
ekasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ vicitrakāryarūpeṇa kṣīrasyaikasya dadhibhāveneva pariṇāmaḥ saṃbhavati । tasmādbrahmaikakāraṇakaṃ jagatkāryameveti yuktamiti ।
cetanādekasmātpuruṣātkeśanakhādivicitrakāryaniṣpattidarśanāt vicitrajagatkāryanirvāhe brahma na kāraṇāntarāpekṣamiti ca ।।
<pratika>sūtrārthastu, upasaṃhāradarśanāt</pratika>=loke rathādikāryeṣu bahukārakopasaṃhāradarśanāt । <pratika>neti cet</pratika>=brahmaṇaḥ ekakāraṇatvaṃ na saṃbhavati
iti cet । <pratika>na</pratika>=naitadyuktam । <pratika>kṣīravat</pratika>=kṣīrasyaikasya dadhibhāveneva ekasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ kāryarūpeṇa pariṇāmaḥ saṃbhavati <pratika>hi</pratika> ।
iti ।। śaktimatāṃ sarvaṃ saṃbhāvyata evetyāha---<pratika>sū ।। devādivadapi loke ।। 25 ।।</pratika> śāstrāvagataśakterdevāderyathā svāpekṣita-
nānārūpādibhāvaḥ evaṃ śāstrāvagataśakteḥ parameśvarasya <quote>‘ya imām̐llokānīśata īśanībhiḥ jananībhiḥ paramaśaktibhiḥ’</quote> iti
parameśvarasyānantaśaktimattvaśravaṇātsarvamupapadyata eveti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, saṃdehapūrvapakṣādikaṃ prāyaḥ śrīkaṇṭhamatavadeva । kāryajananasamarthasyāpi vastunaḥ tattatkāryajanane'nekakakārako-
pasaṃhāradarśanādbrahmaṇo'pyasahāyasya janayitṛtvānupapattestasya jagatkāraṇatvaṃ na saṃbhavatīti pūrvapakṣaṃ kṛtvā kṣīrasya dadhibhā-
vadṛṣṭāntenānekakārakopasaṃhāraniyamo na dṛśyata iti brahmaṇo'nanyāpekṣasyaiva kāraṇatvaṃ saṃbhavatīti siddhāntitamiti nāsti
vailakṣaṇyamiti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, anayossūtrayoḥ pūrvādhikaraṇaśeṣatvena pūrvādhikaraṇa eva vyākhyātatayā nātra prapañcanāvasara iti
vedyam ।। <pratika>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmupasaṃhāradarśanādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="039"/>
tasmādbrahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmo na yuktaḥ ।। iti prāpte brūmaḥ
<sutra>।। sū ।। śrutestu śabdamūlatvāt ।। 27 ।।</sutra>
brahmaṇo jagatpariṇāmo yukta eva, tacchruteḥ । śrutirevātra pramāṇam, na pramā-
ṇāntaram । śabdamūlatvādeva tasya sakaletarapramāṇāvagatavastuvijātīyatvena
tatrādṛṣṭaśaktiyogena virodhābhāvāt । ataḥ paripūrṇasya tasyaiva kāryatvaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ
ca sambhavati । yathā jātivādināṃ jāteḥ khaṇḍamuṇḍādyatyantavilakṣaṇeṣvananteṣu
pratyekamekasyā eva parisamāpya vṛttiḥ na tatretaravastudṛṣṭāntena śaṅkā codyā ।
tasmāt brahmaṇaḥ svarūpanirūpaṇeṃ śabda eva mūlamiti na kaścidvirodhaḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। ātmani caivaṃ vicitrāśca hi ।। 28 ।।</sutra>
<p>jīvātmani ca aciddharmavirodhiciddharmayogo'pi vijātīyatvādeva bhavati ।
agnijalādayo'ṣyacidviśeṣā anyonyavilakṣaṇaśaktayo dṛśyante vicitrā eva ।
tato brahmāpi śabdaikapramāṇakaṃ vicitrānantaśaktikamiti tataḥ sarvāvirodhaḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। svapakṣadoṣācca ।। 29 ।।</sutra>
kṛts‍naprasaktyādidoṣā niravayave'citsajātīye pradhānādau, na brahmaṇi
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pūrvapakṣaḥ ।। sū॰ ।। śrutestu śabdamūlatvāt ।। 27 ।। naivaṃ śaṅkāvakāśo'sti । yato
niravayavameva brahma jagadākāreṇa pariṇamate ca svayaṃ ca yathāpūrvaṃ paripūrṇamavatiṣṭhate । tathā
śruteḥ । śrutimūle'sminnarthe ne kaścitkutarkāpādito virodhaḥ prabhavati । <quote>‘naiṣā tarkeṇa mati-
rāpanīye’</quote>ti śruteḥ । tarkāgocare brahmaṇi tarkasya rūpe śrotrasyeva sādhakatvavadbādhakatvasyā-
pyasaṃbhavāditi sūtroditaṃ siddhātaṃ darśayati—<pratika>brahmaṇa iti</pratika> । śrutimātreṇāpyaparituṣṭaṃ tārki-
kaṃmanyaṃ pratyāha—<pratika>yatheti</pratika> । jātirvyaktiṣu nāṃśena vartate niravayavatvavyākopāditi parisamāpya
vartata iti vaktavyam । tathā caikatra vyaktau parisamāpya sthitā jātirna pariśiṣyeteti
vyaktyaṃtare tadanupalambhaprasaṃgaḥ । atastatra yathādarśanaṃ vyaktiṣu parisamāpya sthitā'pi jātiḥ
pariśiṣyate tena vyaktyaṃtareṣvapi tadupalaṃbhaḥ ityupapādanīyam । evaṃ brahma yathāśruti jaga-
dākāreṇa pariṇamate yathāpūrvaṃ paripūrṇamavatiṣṭhate ca, na ca tatra kācidanupapattirupapadyata
ityarthaḥ । sū ।। <pratika>ātmani caivaṃ vicitrāśca hi ।। 28 ।।</pratika> ātmani caivamityaṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe—
<pratika>jīvātmanīti</pratika> । yathā brahmaṇi pariṇāmitve'pi paripūrṇatvalakṣaṇaścidacitprapañcadharmavila-
kṣaṇo dharma evaṃ jīvātmanyapi acitprapañcadharmavilakṣaṇaḥ kartṛtvabhok‍tṛtvādilakṣaṇo dharmaḥ । na
tasyācitprapañcadṛṣṭāṃtenāpahnavaḥ kartuṃ śakyata iti bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘vicitrāśca hī’</quote> ti sūtraśeṣaṃ
vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>agnijalādayo'pīti । vicitrā eveti</pratika> । na tu parasparadṛṣṭāntena paraspara-
vilakṣaṇadharmamūlā ityarthaḥ । hiśabdo'vadhāraṇārtha itibhāvaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। svapakṣadoṣācca ।। 29 ।।</pratika>
<pratika>niravayave iti ।</pratika> na ca pradhānasya satvarajastamāṃsyevāvayavāssaṃtīti vācyam । pratyeka-
mapi satvādīnāṃ sāṃkhyairupādānatayāṅgīkṛtatvāt । <pratika>acitsajātīye iti ।</pratika> mṛtpiṇḍā-
dijaḍadṛṣṭāṃtena kalpye tatsajātīya eva tatsādharmyāpādanamavakāśaṃ labhata iti bhāvaḥ ।
<quote>‘pradhānādāvi’</quote> tyādiśabdena paramāṇūnāṃ grahaṇam । tārkikairhi paramāṇavaḥ niṣpradeśāḥ saṃyo-
<pb n="040"/>
śāstrapramāṇake ।।
sarvaśaktimattvena sarvopapattimāha---
<sutra>।। su ।। sarvopetā ca taddarśanāt ।। 30 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘parā'sya śaktirvivadhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā ca ।।’</quote> <quote>‘māyāṃ tu
prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram । tasyāvayavabhūtena vyāptaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagat ।।’</quote>
ityādidarśanāt sarvā'pi śaktirbrahmāśriteti vijñāyate । ataḥ sarvaśaktimataḥ
tasya kiṃ na saṃbhavati ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। vikaraṇatvānneti cettaduktam ।। 31 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ca vidyate’</quote> iti brahmaṇo vikaraṇatvamucyate tato'sya
na kāraṇatvamiti cet—na, tasyottaraṃ <quote>‘śabdamūlatvā’</quote> diti pūrvamūktameva । vicitrā-
nantaśaktiśabalamāyāparamaśaktiviśiṣṭaḥ parameśvaraḥ svaśaktiśakalena prapañcākāraḥ
svataḥ prapañcātītaśca bhavatītyatra <quote>‘māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram ।
tasyāvayavabhūtena vyāptaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagat ।।’</quote> iti śrutireva bhagavatī pramāṇam ।
atra viṣaye purāṇaṃ ca---
<quote>‘viśvottarottaravicitramanorathasya yasyaikaśaktiśakale sakalaḥ samāptaḥ ।
adhvānamadhvapatimadhvavido vadanti tasmai namaḥ sakalalokavilakṣaṇāya ।।’</quote> iti ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
gapradeśavarttinaścābhyupagamyaṃte । tataśca paramāṇvossaṃyogasya kṛtsnaparamāṇutvavyāpitvaṃ vā
niṣpradeśayostayoḥ pradeśavattvaṃ vā tayossaṃyogābhāve'pi dvyaṇukajananaṃ vā dṛṣṭaviruddhaṃ taira-
bhyupagaṃtavyamāpadyate । na hi śāstrapramāṇake brahmaṇi śuṣkatarkāṇāṃ śāstravirodheneva śuṣka-
tarkapramāṇake pradhānādau kenacidupāyena teṣāṃ kutarkatvamupapādayituṃ śakyam । pradhānādika-
lpakatarkāṇāṃ tatpratikṣepakatarkāṇāṃ ca dṛṣṭasādharmyamūlatvasyāprayojakatvasya ca tulyatvāt
pratyuta tarkapratikṣepakatarkāṇāmeva prayojakatvācceti bhāvaḥ । uttarasūtramavatārayati—<pratika>sarvaśa-
ktimattveneti</pratika> । śrutibalena prākpariṇāmitve'pi paripūrṇatvamupapāditamidānīṃ śrutyavaga-
tasarvaśaktimattvena tadupapadyata iti bhāvaḥ । sū ।। sarvopetā ca taddarśanāt ।। 30 ।। <pratika>ataḥ
sarvaśaktimata iti</pratika> । alpaśaktimatāmapi hi prapañcāntargatacidacidvastūnāmatarkaṇīyā bahuvi-
dhavaicitrī dṛśyate, kimuta sarvaśaktimata iti bhāvaḥ । śaktimatāmapi cetanānāṃ karaṇakalebarava-
ttvaeva śak‍tyunmeṣo dṛṣṭaḥ । atastadrahitasya sadapi sarvaśaktimattvamadhyayanādirahitasya dhīśakti-
mattvamivāprayojakamityāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>vikaraṇatvānneti cettaduktam ।। 31 ।।</pratika>
karaṇagrahaṇaṃ kalebarasyāpyupalakṣaṇam । taduktaṃ tasya codyasya <quote>‘śrutestvi’</quote>ti sūtreṇottaramu-
ktamityarthaḥ । kalpyeśvaravāda evāyaṃ doṣo bhavet na tu śrauteśvaravāda iti bhāvaḥ ।
<pratika>svaśaktiśakaleneti</pratika> । śaktyavasthārūpasya puruṣasya śakalaśabdena grahaṇaṃ puruṣāvasthāpari-
ṇāme'pi śakteravaikalyadyotanārtham । <pratika>viśvottareti</pratika> । manorathaḥ saṅkalpaḥ । sakalaḥ ṣaḍvi-
dho'pyadhvā । samāptaḥ viśrāṃtaḥ । adhvavidaḥ vaidikaṃ sanmārgaṃ jānānāḥ trayīvidyāvidaḥ । <pratika>va-
danti</pratika> <quote>‘adhvanāmadhvapate śreṣṭhasyādhvanaḥ pāramaśīye’</quote> tyādiṣvāmanaṃti । adhikaraṇārthamupasaṃ-
<pb n="041"/>
evaṃ sakaladoṣakalaṅkarahitaśabdapramāṇaikasiddhasarvaśaktisaṃpadvilāse parameśvare śive
parabrahmaṇi sambhāvanā'smbhāvanāvicāraḥ sarvo'pi niravakāśa eva ।।
iti kṛtsnaprasaktyadhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>harati—evamiti । iti kṛtsnaprasaktyadhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha kṛtsnaprasaktyadhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। kṛtsraprasaktirniravayavatvaśabdakopo vā ।। 26 ।। śrutestu śabdamūlatvāt ।। 27 ।। ātma-
ni caivaṃ vicitrāśca hi ।। 28 ।। svapakṣadoṣācca ।। 29 ।। sarvopetā ca taddarśanāt ।। 30 ।। vikaraṇa-
tvānneti cettaduktam ।। 31 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>kṛtsnaṃ yadi pariṇamati brahma tadā nāvaśiṣyeta । aṃśena cettadānīṃ niraṃśatoktirvirudhyeta ।। 103 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>etādṛśāḥ pradhāne paramāṇvādau ca doṣāḥ syuḥ । yatnātsamarthanaṃ cecchrutimūlasyaiva tadyuktam ।। 104 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti kṛtsnaprasaktyadhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha kṛtsnaprasaktyadhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। kṛtsnaprasaktirniravayavatvaśabdakopo vā ।। 26 ।। śrutestu śabdamūlatvāt ।। 27 ।। ātmani caivaṃ
vicitrāśca hi ।। 28 ।। svapakṣadoṣācca ।। 29 ।। sarvopetā ca taddarśanāt ।। 30 ।। vikaraṇatvānneti
cettaduktam ।। 31 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ kṣīrādidṛṣṭāntakathanena brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmitvabhramotpatteḥ tannirasanamanena kriyata iti kāryakāraṇa-
bhāvasaṃgatyedamāha—<pratika>sū ।। kṛtsnaprasaktirityādi</pratika> । sāvayavasyaiva nānākāreṇa pariṇāma iti nyāyena niravayavādbrahmaṇo
jagatsargaṃ bruvansamanvayo virudhyate na veti saṃdehe <pratika>pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ</pratika> । brahmaṇo niravayavasya pariṇāmitvābhyupagame kṛtsnasya brahmaṇaḥ
kāryākāreṇa pariṇāmaprasaktyā kāryātiriktaṃ brahma na syāt, sāvayavasya tadabhyupagame ekāṃśapariṇāme'pyaparāṃśasthiti-
saṃbhavātkṛtsnaprasaktyabhāve'pi <quote>‘niṣkala’</quote>mityādiniravayatvaśabdakopaḥ syāt, ubhayapakṣe'pyanityatvaprasaṃgādbrahmaṇa upādā-
natvavādī samanvayo virudhyata iti । <pratika>siddhāntastu, sū ।। śrutestu śabdamūlatvāt ।। 27 ।।</pratika> tuśabdaḥ pūrvapakṣaṃ
nirāsayati । śrutau brahmaṇo jagadupādānatvaśravaṇāt <quote>‘tāvānasya mahime’</quote> tyādau kāryavyatirekeṇa sattāśravaṇācca vivartavādasya
śrutyaiva sphuṭīkṛtatvānna tāvatkṛtsnaprasaktiḥ । pariṇāmavāde kāryavyatirekeṇa sattābhāvāt noktadoṣāvakāśaḥ । nanu tarhi
uktayuktibādhitatvāt śrutirvā kathaṃ kāryavyatirekeṇa brahmaṇaḥ sattāṃ bodhayedityata āha---<pratika>śabdamūlatvāt</pratika>=brahmaṇaḥ śabdai-
kapramāṇakatvādyathāśabdaṃ kāryopādānatvaṃ tadatirekeṇa sattvaṃ cāviruddhamiti । jagato brahmavivartatvena svapnaprapañcavanmāyikatvā-
dbrahmaṇastadupādānatve'pi na kṛtsnaprasaktyādidoṣaḥ svapnasākṣiṇa ivetyāha---<pratika>sū ।। ātmani caivaṃ vicitrāśca hi
।। 28 ।। hi</pratika>=yasmāddhetoḥ । ekasminnātmani svapnadṛśi niravayave <quote>‘na tatra rathā rathayogāḥ’</quote> ityādau vicitrāḥ sṛṣṭayaḥ
śrūyante । yathā ca loke māyāvini svarūpānupamardenaiva hastyaś‍vādivicitrasṛṣṭayo dṛśyante । evamekasminnapi brahmaṇi vici-
trasṛṣṭirityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>kiṃca । <pratika>sū ।। svapakṣadoṣācca ।। 29 ।।</pratika> niravayavaṃ pradhānaṃ jagatpariṇāmi ityabhyupagacchatāṃ sāṃkhyādīnāṃ paramāṇudvaya-
saṃyogena dva‍yaṇukādisṛṣṭimurarīkurvatāmaṇuvāṃdināmapyayaṃ doṣaḥ samānaḥ । brahmavāde sa doṣo nāsti । tasmādupapanno brahmakāraṇa-
vāda iti ।। <pratika>iti bhagavatpādamate kṛtsnaprasaktyadhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha sarvopetādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<p>pūrvoktavicitrakāryaśaktimattvaviṣayaśaṃkānirāsena samarthanātmakatvādviṣayaviṣayibhāvasaṃgatyedamāha---<pratika>sū ।। sarvopetā ca
taddarśanāt ।। 30 ।।</pratika> aśarīrasya na māyeti nyāyena māyāśaktimato brahmaṇo jagatsargaṃ bruvan samanvayo virudhyate na
veti saṃdehe virudhyata iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika> parādevatā <pratika>sarvopetā</pratika>=sarvaśaktiyuktā । kutaḥ । <pratika>taddarśanāt</pratika>=
tasya sarvaśaktiyogasya <quote>‘sarvakarmā sarvakāma’</quote> ityādiśrutau darśanādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>pūrvapakṣamanubhāṣya dūṣayati---<pratika>sū ।। vikaraṇatvānneti cettaduktam ।। 31 ।।</pratika> sarvaśaktiyuktānāmapi devādīnāṃ ca-
kṣurādikaraṇavatāmeva vicitrakāryakartṛtvāvagamāt brahmaṇaḥ <quote>‘acakṣuṣkamaśrotra’</quote> mityādinā <pratika>vikaraṇatvāvagamācca na</pratika>
<pb n="042"/>
kartṛtvamiti <pratika>cet taduktam</pratika>=atra yadvaktavyamuttaraṃ tatpūrvameva <quote>‘navilakṣaṇatvā’</quote> dityādau uktam । athavā । <quote>‘apāṇipādo
javano grahītā’</quote> ityādiśrutyā uttaramuktamityarthaḥ । ataḥ śrutyekasamadhigamyatvānna tarkeṇa virodha iti siddham ।।</p>
<head>iti sarvopetādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, ekasyaiva brahmaṇo jagadākāreṇa pariṇāmaḥ pūrvokto yujyate vā na veti saṃdehaḥ । tasya kṣīrasyeva dadhi-
rūpeṇa sarvātmanā jagadākāreṇa pariṇāme kṛtsnasyāpi kāryatvaprasaktiḥ, na brahmapariśiṣyeta । kenacidaṃśena cittasya niravayava-
tvaśrutikopo vā bhavati । tasmādbrahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmo na yukta iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ। siddhāntastu</pratika>, brahmaṇaḥ svarūpanirūpaṇe śabdasyaiva
mūlatvāttatprāmāṇyena sakaletarapramāṇāvagatavastuvijātīyatvena tatrādṛṣṭaśaktiyogena virodhābhāvāt paripūrṇasya tasyaiva kāryatvaṃ
kāraṇatvaṃ ca saṃbhavatīti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sūtrārthastu</pratika>, brahmaṇaḥ jagadākāreṇa pariṇāme <pratika>kṛtsnaprasaktiḥ</pratika>=kṛtsnasya brahmaṇaḥ kāryatvenopayogaprasaṃgaḥ । niravayavatvāt ।
sāvayavatvābhyupagame <pratika>niravayavatvaśabdakopo vā</pratika> niravayavatvābhidhāyakaśrutivirodho vā bhavati । ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। śrutestu śabdamūlatvāt ।। 27 ।।</pratika> tuśabdaḥ pūrvapakṣaṃ vyāvartayati । <pratika>śruteḥ</pratika> prāmāṇyānnaivaṃ vaktuṃ yuktam ।
brahmaṇojagadākāreṇa pariṇāmo yukta evetyarthaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>śabdamūlatvāt</pratika>=śabdaikamūlatvena sakaletaravijātīyatvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ātmani caivaṃ vicitrāśca hi ।। 28 ।। ātmani ca</pratika>=jīvātmani ca acetanadharmavirodhikartṛtvabhoktṛtvā-
dicetanadharmayogaḥ bhavati । agnijalādayo hyacetanaviśeṣāḥ <pratika>vicitrāśca</pratika>=anyonyavilakṣaṇaśaktitvena vicitrā evaṃ dṛśyante ।
ataḥ śabdaikapramāṇakaṃ brahmāpi vicitrānantaśaktikamiti sarvamupapadyate । ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>kiṃca । <pratika>sū ।। svapakṣadoṣāśca ।। 29 ।।</pratika> niravayave acitsajātīye pradhānādāveva kṛtsnaprasaktyādayo doṣāḥ na brahmaṇi
śāstrapramāṇake ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>sarvaśaktitvena tasya sarvopapattimāha---</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। sarvopetā ca taddarśanāt ।। 30 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘parāsya śaktiḥ’</quote> <quote>‘māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyāt’</quote> ityādidarśanāt sarvāpi śaktirbahmā-
śriteti vijñāyate । atassarvaśaktimatastasya kiṃ na saṃbhavati ।। ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। vikaraṇatvānneti cettaduktam ।। 31 ।। vikaraṇatvāt</pratika>=<quote>‘na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ca vidyate’</quote> ityādinā
brahmaṇo vikaraṇatvāvagamāt <pratika>neticet</pratika>=nāsya jagatkāraṇatvamiti cet । <pratika>tat</pratika>=tasyottaram । <pratika>uktam</pratika>=<quote>‘śabdamūlatvā’</quote>diti pūrvamukta-
mevetyarthaḥ ।। ataḥ śabdapramāṇaikasiddhe sarvaśaktisaṃpanne parameśvare saṃbhāvanāsaṃbhāvanādivicārassarvo'pi niravakāśa iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatvaṃ saṃbhavati vā na veti saṃdihya na saṃbhavatīti pūrvapakṣamudbhāvya prāyaḥ śrīkaṇṭhamatā-
nusāreṇaiva sūtrāṇi vyākhyāya saṃbhavatīti siddhāntitam ।। prāyaḥ sūtrāṇi samānārthāni । <pratika><quote>‘ātmani caivaṃ vicitrāśca hi’</quote></pratika>
iti sūtre paraṃ <pratika>ātmani ca</pratika>=jīvātmani ca । <pratika>evam</pratika>=acetanadharmāprasaktiścaivamacetanavijātīyatvādeveti vyākhyātam ।
tatrāpi tātparyavailakṣaṇyaṃ nāstītītaratsarvamaviśiṣṭameva ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate, <quote>‘kṛtsnaprasakti’</quote></pratika> riti sūtramapi pūrvasmannitaravyapadeśādhikaraṇa eva taccheṣatayāntarbhāvitatvāttatraiva
vyākhyātam । ataḥ <quote>‘śrutestu śabdamūlatvā’</quote> dityārabhyādhikaraṇāntaratvena vibhāga iti viśeṣaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate.</pratika></p>
<head>atha śrutestu śabdamūlatvādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। śrutestu śabdamūlatvāt ।। 28 ।।</pratika> atra jīvasya svatantrakartṛtvāṅgīkāre pūrvamuktāḥ kṛtsnaprasaktyādayo doṣā
īśvarakartṛtvapakṣe'pi tulyāḥ । tasmādīśvarasya jagatkartṛtvaṃ yuktaṃ na veti saṃdehe na yuktamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>,
<quote>‘yo'sau viruddho'viruddho manuramanu’</quote> rityādiśrutyā lokadṛṣṭyā viruddhānāmapi dharmāṇāṃ paramātmanyavirodhena samavāyasya prami-
tatvāt neme doṣāstatra prasaranti । tasmādacintyaśaktiḥ parameśvara eva viruddhe apyabhedāṃśitvakṛtabahutve cetaneṣu viśeṣani-
mittenaiva samāveśya abhedena niravayavatvaśrutivirodhaṃ bahutvena kṛtsnaprasaktiṃ ca nirākṛtya kāryānurūpajīvena kārayatītyaṅgīkā-
rāt <quote>‘apāṇipāda’</quote> ityādiśrutatatkaraṇarāhityasya prākṛtendriyaviṣayatvācca īśvarasya svatantrakartṛtvapakṣe na ko'pi doṣa iti ।।
<pratika>sūtrārthastu</pratika>, īśvarakartṛtvapakṣe jīvakartṛtvapakṣoktayuktivirodho nāsti । kutaḥ । <pratika>śrutestu</pratika>=<quote>‘yo'sau viruddho'viruddho manuramanu’</quote>-
rityādiśrutereva । nanvetāvatā kathaṃ yuktivirodhaparihāra ityata āha---<pratika>śabdamūlatvāt</pratika>=īśvarataddharmāṇāṃ śabdaikapramāṇa-
gamyatvena yuktyaviṣayatvāt na tatra yuktivirodhaḥ pravartate । jīve tu na tathā । tasya pramāṇāntareṇāpi gamyatvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ātmani caivaṃ vicitrāśca hi ।। 29 ।।</pratika> ādyaścaśabdo'vadhāraṇe । dvitīyassamuccaye । hiśabdaḥ prasiddhau ।
tathā ca, <pratika>hi</pratika>=śabdāt । <pratika>ātmani ca</pratika>=īś‍vara eva । <pratika>evam</pratika>=sakalayuktivirodhanirāsakāḥ । <pratika>vicitrāḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘vicitraśakti’</quote>
ritiśrutiprasiddhāśśaktayaḥ/?/ santi । na jīve । tasmācca jīvapakṣa eva yuktivirodho neśvarapakṣa ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। svapakṣadoṣācca ।। 30 ।।</pratika> co'vadhāraṇe । tathā ca <quote>‘ye doṣā’</quote> iti śrutau jīvapakṣe yuktivirodhasya doṣatvasyaivokteḥ
nāsāvadoṣatāṃ netavyaḥ । kiṃ tu īś‍varapakṣa evādoṣatāṃ netavya ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<pb n="043"/>
atha līlākaivalyādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।
punaranyathā''kṣipya samādhatte---
<sutra>।। sū ।। na prayojanavattvāt ।। 32 ।।</sutra>
śāstrāvagatasarvaśakteḥ brahmaṇaḥ sarveṣu kāryeṣu kāraṇasāmarthyamastīti nirṇītam ।
tathā'pi sarvapravṛtteḥ prayojanavattvāt avāptasakalakāmasya parameśvarasya jagatsṛ-
ṣṭyāpivyāpāraḥ sambhavati na veti sandihyate ।।
atra kathaṃ sambhavati ? <quote>‘ānando brahma’</quote> <quote>‘vibhuṃ cidānandamarūpamadbha‍utam’</quote> । <quote>‘umā-
sahāyam’</quote> ityādibhiḥ niratiśayānandasvarūpo nityatṛpto hi śivaḥ śrūyate । katha-
masau sṛṣṭyādivyāpāreṣu prayojananirapekṣaḥ pravartteta । yadi saprayojanāsya
pravṛttiḥ nityatṛptatāhāniḥ syāt । anyathā jaḍādivadanucitakāritā syāt ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha līlākaivalyādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<p>nanūttarādhikaraṇenāvāptasamastakāmasya prekṣāvataḥ parameś‍varasya niṣprayojane jagatsṛṣṭyā-
divyāpāre pravṛttirnopapadyata ityākṣipya samādhīyate nāyamākṣepo'vakāśaṃ labhate parameśvara-
syāvāptasamastakāmatvavat sarvajñatvavat jagatsṛṣṭyādipravṛtterapi śrutisiddhatayā <quote>‘śrutestu
śabdamūlatvā’</quote>diti sūtreṇa tadarthasmaraṇārthena pūrvasūtreṇa ca dattottaratvādityāśaṃkyāvatārayati—
punaranyatheti । ayamāśayaḥ । alaukikeṣu vedaikagamyeṣvartheṣu tadvirodhiśuṣkatarko na pravartata
iti vaidikamaryādāyāmitthamākṣepānavakāśo'pi tadaśraddadhānānāṃ śuṣkatārkikāṇāmākṣepākāṃkṣā
na tāvatā śāmyati । ata eva <quote>‘śrutestvi’</quote>ti sūtre bhāṣyadarśitā jātipratibandha'pi śuṣka-
tārkikaśaṅkāvyāvṛttyarthaiva na tu śabdena vivakṣitā । pūrvasūtre <quote>‘tadukta’</quote> mityanena parameś‍varasya
sthūlasūkṣmaprapañcarūpaśarīravattvamaṃtaryāmyadhikaraṇādiṣūktaṃ, jñānakarmeṃndriyavattvaṃ tu nityasiddhasārva-
jñyasya devānsaṅkalpamātreṇa sraṣṭuṃ śaktasya tasya nāpekṣitamiti śāstrayonitvādhikaraṇādiṣū-
ktaprāyamityedapi vivakṣitam । iha tu tadākṣepākāṃkṣāśāṃtikāraṇaṃ prekṣāvatpravṛtteḥ prayojana-
vattvaniyamasya vyabhicāradarśanaṃ prāṅga/?/ kṛtamatastadarthamadhikaraṇāṃtarāraṃbha iti <pratika>। sū ।। na prayo-
janavattvāt ।। 32 ।।</pratika> saṃgatipūrvakaṃ saṃśayaṃ darśayati—<pratika>śāstrāvagateti</pratika> । sarvaśaktimattvahetunā
kṛtsnaprasaktyadidoṣanirākaraṇe'pi prekṣāvatpravṛtteḥ prayojanavattvaniyamanirākaraṇaṃ na saṃbha-
vatīti pratyudāharaṇalakṣaṇā saṃgatiḥ niruktaniyamasadbhāvāsadbhāvābhyāṃ saṃśayaścetyabhiprāyaḥ ।
parameśvarasya sraṣṭṛtvaṃ na saṃbhavati prekṣāvatpravṛtteḥ prayojanavattvaniyamāditi sūtroktapūrvapakṣaṃ
darśayati—<pratika>kathamiti । anyatheti</pratika> । niṣprayojanā cedityarthaḥ । na ca prekṣāvatāmapi niṣpra-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p><pratika>sū ।। sarvopetā ca taddarśanāt ।। 31 ।।</pratika> yataḥ paramātmākhyadevatā na kevalaṃ sāmānyato vicitraśaktimatī । kiṃ tu
<pratika>sarvopetā</pratika>=sarvaviṣayasārvakālikaśaktimatī ca । kutaḥ । <pratika>taddarśanāt</pratika>=<quote>‘sarvairyuktā śaktibhirdevatā sā’</quote> iti śrutau tathā
darśanāt । ato neśvare yuktivirodhaḥ śaṅkanīya ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। vikaraṇatvānneti cettaduktam ।। 32 ।।</pratika> netyāvartate । <pratika>vikaraṇatvāt</pratika>=<quote>‘apāṇipāda’</quote> iti śrutyā īśvarasya
hastādīndriyaśūnyatvāvagamāt । <pratika>neti cet</pratika>=īśvarasya kartṛtvaṃ na yuktamiti cet । <pratika>na</pratika> । kutaḥ । yasmāt <pratika>taduktama</pratika>=<quote>‘tasmi-
nnetasye’</quote> tyādyāgamena tatkaraṇarāhityasya prākṛtendriyaviṣayatvamuktaṃ tasmādityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti ānandatīrthamate śrutestuśabda-
mūlatvādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।। iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ kṛtsnaprasaktyadhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="044"/>
iti prāpte brūmaḥ---
<sutra>।। sū ।। lokavattu līlākaivalyam ।। 33 ।।</sutra>
yaduktaṃ nityatṛptasya prayojanābhāvādaprayojanā jagatsṛṣṭyādipravṛttirna sambha-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p>yojanā kaṃdukakrīḍādipravṛttirdṛṣṭeti śaṃkanīyam । tato'pi krīḍāparāṇāṃ tātkālikānaṃ-
dādiprayojanasyānubhavasiddhatvāt । na ca parameś‍varasya jagatsṛṣṭāvapi tādṛśaṃ prayojanaṃ
kalpyam । avāptasamastakāmatvaśravaṇavirodhāt । nanu na krīḍānaṃdārthā pravṛttirāptakāmatva-
virodhinī, avāptasamastakāmānāmapi rājñāṃ kandukrīḍādipravṛttidarśanāditi cenna । avā-
ptabhogāṃtaraprayuktasakalānaṃdānāmapi rājñāmanavāptakrīḍānaṃdānāmeva tatra pravṛtteḥ । na caivaṃ
parameśvare vaktuṃ śakyaṃ, tasya sarvātmanāvāptasarvakāmatvāditi bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। lokavattu līlākai-
valyam ।। 33 ।।</pratika> svārthikataddhitāṃtaḥ kaivalyaśabdaḥ । <quote>‘saṃbhogaprāptiriti cenna vaiśeṣyāt’</quote> ।
<ref>(bra॰ 1-2-8.)</ref> ityādau vaiśeṣyaśabdavat । tathā ca jagatsṛṣṭiḥ kevalaṃ līletyanvayaḥ ।
sukhitasya sukhānubhavaprayuktaśceṣṭādirlīlā । sā dvividhā tātkālikānandādyarthā prayojana-
līlā tadupyanuddiśya pravṛttā kevalalīlā ca । na dvītīyāyāmasamampratipattiḥ । duḥkhodreke
rodanavatsukhodreke hāsagānādeḥ prayojanarahitasya sarvānubhavasiddhatvāt । ata eva hasita-
ruditādiṣu kāraṇameva pṛcchaṃti na tu prayojanam । evaṃ loke dṛṣṭatvāttadvadeva pārameśvarī
jagatsṛṣṭirnityaniratiśayānaṃdānubhavaprayuktā kevalalīleti sūtrārthaḥ । ata evātra līlā-
śabdaḥ kriyāvācī na tu vilāsarūpakriyāviśeṣavācī । <quote>‘līlā kriyā vilāsaśce’</quote> tyubhayatrā'pi
