tasya śaktismaraṇāt । kaivalyaśabdaḥ pūrvavatprayojanoddeśyavyavacchedena svabhāvikatvalā-
bhārthaḥ । tathā ca yathā loke prāṇināṃ nimeṣādivyāpārāḥ svābhāvikāḥ yathā ca keṣāṃci-
dgānavyākhyānādiṣu śiro'ṅgulicālanādayaḥ svābhāvikāḥ na tu prayojanārthāḥ, tathaiva parame-
śvarasya sṛṣṭyādivyāpārā api svābhāvikā eva । <quote>‘svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyāce’</quote> ti jñāna-
balayoriva sṛṣṭyādikriyāyā api svābhāvikatvaśravaṇāt । <quote>‘krīḍārthaṃ sṛṣṭirityanye bhogā-
rthamiti cāpare । devasyaiva svabhāvo'yamāptakāmasya kā spṛhe’</quote> ti śravaṇācceti tātparyam ।
<quote>‘svabhāvameke kavayo vadanti kālaṃ tathānye parimuhyamānāḥ। devasyaivaiṣa mahimā tu loke yenedaṃ
bhrāmyate brahmacakra’</quote> miti ś‍vetāś‍vataramaṃtre saṃsārarūpaḥ prapañcaḥ svakīyādeva svabhāvātpravartate
iti pakṣāṃtarasya nirāsaḥ na tu pārameśvarātsvabhāvāditi pakṣasyeti na virodhaḥ । <quote>‘krīḍārthaṃ
sṛṣṭi’</quote> riti māṇḍūkyaśloke krīḍārthamityanena tātkālikānandaprayojanatvaṃ nirasitumanū-
ditaṃ na tu hāsagānādivallīlārūpatvamiti na tatrā'pi virodhaḥ । yadvā । līlāśabdo'trā-
nāyasakarmaparaḥ । līlāmātrametasya bhāratrayadhānyavahanamiti tatrā'pi prayogadarśanāt ।
kaivalyaśabdaḥ kiyato'pyāyāsasyānapekṣādyotanārthaḥ । tathā ca yathāṃgulicālanādayaḥ anā-
yāsasādhyāḥ kriyā na prayojanāpekṣāḥ । ata eva tatra na prayojanapraś‍naḥ । tatpraśne'pi tṛṣṇīmi-
tyevottaram । ata eva ca <quote>‘vṛthā ceṣṭāṃ na kurvīte’</quote> ti niṣedhasyārthavatvam । evaṃ parameśvara-
syā'pi anāyāsasādhyāḥ nisvāsitādikalpatayā śrutāḥ sṛṣṭyādikriyā na prayojanāpekṣā
iti tātparyam । evamarthaṃ manasi nidhāya siddhāṃtamāha—<pratika>yaduktamityādinā</pratika> । <quote>‘līlāmā-
treṇe’</quote> tyupalakṣaṇatṛtīyā । līlāmātrarūpetyarthaḥ । <pratika>līlāśabdaḥ</pratika> pradarśite'rthatraye'pi yoja-
<pb n="045"/>
vatīti । tanna । sambhavatyeva niṣprayojanā'pi pravṛttiḥ kevalalīlāmātreṇa parameśva-
rasya । yathā loke prayojanamantareṇāpi kevalaṃ līlayā kandukatāḍanādiṣu pravṛttiḥ,
tathā parameśvarasya avāptasakalakāmasyāpi līlayā sṛṣṭyādipravṛtteravirodha eva ।।
iti līlākaivalyādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nīyaḥ । <quote>‘kaṃdukatāḍanādiṣu’</quote> ityatrādiśabdaścānandānubhavaprayuktānāṃ svabhāvikānāmanāyāsa-
sādhyānāñca trividhānāmapyanuddiṣṭaprayojanānāṃ vyāpārāṇāṃ saṃgrāhako draṣṭavyaḥ । <quote>‘līlāmātreṇe’</quote>
tiśabdaḥ uktavyāpāratrayahetvānaṃdānubhavādiparatayā hetutṛtīyāṃto vā yojanīyaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti līlākaivalyādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha līlākaivalyādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। na prayojanavattvāt ।। 32 ।। lokavattu līlākaivalyam ।। 33 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>sṛṣṭissarvasyāpi prayojanāpekṣayā dṛṣṭā । kimapekṣya nityatṛptaḥ sṛjatī jagacchaṃkaro viṣamam ।। 105 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>tṛptasyaiva hi rājñaḥ kandukasṛṣṭyādikā līlā । dṛṣṭā loke tadvatsyādīśasyāpi sṛṣṭiriyam ।। 106 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti līlākaivalyādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha prayojanavattvādhikaraṇamathavā līlākaivalyadhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। na prayojanavattvāt ।। 32 ।। lokavattu līlākaivalyam ।। 33 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ śrutyavaṣṭaṃbheṇa sādhitaṃ sarvaśaktimato brahmaṇaḥ kartṛtvamākṣipya samādhānādākṣepasagatyedamāha---
<pratika>sū ।। na prayojanavattvāta ।। 32 ।।</pratika> brahma na phalena vinā sṛjati abhrāntacetanatvātsaṃmatavaditi nyāyena avāptasamasta-
kāmādbrahmaṇo jagatsargaṃ bruvansamanvayo virudhyate na veti saṃśaye <pratika>na</pratika> brahmaṇo jagatkartṛtvaṃ saṃbhavati nityatṛptatvena prayojanābhi-
saṃdhirahitatvāt । prekṣāvatpravṛtteḥ prayojanavattvābhyupagamātsamanvayo virudhyata iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> ।</p>
<p><pratika>siddhāntastu, sū ।। lokavattu līlākaivaly ।।33।।</pratika> tuśabdaḥ pūrvapakṣaṃ nirāsayati । yathā loke rājāmātyādīnāṃ
phalaṃ vinaiva kevalalīlārūpāḥ pravṛttayo dṛśyaṃte yathā vocchvāsādayaḥ svabhāvādevotpadyaṃte tathā brahmaṇo'pi vicitrakāryaracanā līlākai-
valyaṃ kevalalīlāmāttam । na phalasāpekṣam । kathaṃcidrājādīnāṃ phalasaṃbhave'pi nityatṛptasya brahmaṇo līlāmātrametadityabhiprāyaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, sarvaśakterbrahmaṇaḥ sarvasāmarthyābhyupagame'pi pravṛttisāmānyasya prayojanavattvāt nityatṛptasya parameś‍varasya
jagatsṛṣṭyādivyāpārassaṃbhavati na veti saṃdehe <quote>‘ānando brahma’</quote> <quote>‘vibhuṃ cidānandamarūpamadbha‍utam’</quote> ityādibhiḥ niratiśayānandatvena
śrutasya parameś‍varasya sṛṣṭyādivyāpārāprasaktyā sa na saṃbhavatīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । yathā loke prayojanamantareṇāpi rājāmātyādīnāṃ
kevalaṃ līlayā kaṃdukatāḍanādiṣu pravṛttiḥ tathā parameś‍varasyāvāptasamastakāmasyāpi līlayā sṛṣṭyādipravṛttyupapatteravirodha iti । <pratika>sū-
trārthastu, sū ।। na prayojanavattvāt ।।32।।</pratika> parameśvarasya jagatsṛṣṭyādivyāpāro na saṃbhavati । sarvapravṛtteḥ <pratika>prayojanavattvāt iti</pratika> ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। lokavattu līlākaivalyam ।। 33 ।।</pratika> kaivalyaśabdaḥ svārthikataddhitānto vaiśeṣyaśabdavat । <pratika>lokavat</pratika>=yathā loke
rājñaḥ kaṃtukatāḍanādyāraṃbhasya prayojanaṃ līlāmātraṃ tathā jagatsṛṣṭiḥ <pratika>līlākaivalyam</pratika>=līlāmātramityarthaḥ । yadvā । līlāśabdaḥ
anāyāsasādhyakarmavācī । jagatsṛṣṭiḥ anāyāsasādhyaniś‍vasitādisvābhāvikakarmakalpetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, idaṃ prayojanavattvādhikaraṇamāpādasamāpti pañcasūtrātmakamekamadhikaraṇamityata uttarādhikaraṇe prapañcanamarha-
tītīha na tatprapañcitam ।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, idamadhikaraṇaṃ naprayojanādhikaraṇamiti vyapadiśyate । pūrṇānandasyeś‍varasya viphalaṃ sraṣṭutvamupapadyate
vā na veti saṃdehe prāptaprāpyatvāttasya tādṛśaṃ sraṣṭṛtvaṃ nopapadyata iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, loke mattādipravṛttivadī-
ś‍varapravṛtteḥ kevalalīlārūpatvādupapadyata eveti ।। <pratika>sūtrārthastu</pratika>, īś‍varasya sṛṣṭyādau pravṛttiḥ <pratika>na</pratika> svaprayojanoddeśena bhavati ।
kutaḥ । <pratika>prayojanavattvāt</pratika>=pūrṇānandatvena prāptaprāptavyatvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। lokavattu līlākaivalyam ।। 34 ।।</pratika> tuśabda evārthe । <pratika>lokavat</pratika>=loke mattādipravṛtteriveś‍varapravṛtteḥ <pratika>līlā-
kaivalyam</pratika>=kevalalīlārūpatvameva na svaprayojanoddeśyatvamityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>ityānandatīrthamate naprayojanādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ prayojanavattvādhikaraṇamuta līlākaivalyādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<pb n="046"/>
atha vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāt tathā hi darśayati ।। 34 ।।</sutra>
prayojanābhāve'pi līlayā parameśvarasya jagatsṛṣṭyādiṣu pravṛttiriti nirūpi-
tam । tatra punaḥ saṃdihyate saiṣā sambhavati na veti ।
līlayā'pi parameśvarasya sṛṣṭirna sambhavati, paripūrṇatayā rāgadveṣādihīna-
tvāt । sakalasāmyena madhyastha eva hi parameśvaraḥ । tasya keṣāṃcit sukhamayaṃ
devādiśarīraṃ keṣāṃcidda‍uḥkhottaraṃ manuṣyādiśarīraṃ sṛjato vaiṣamyaṃ durvāram ।
kiñca—sṛṣṭeḥ saṃhārapūrvakatvāt sakalaṃ yugapat saṃharataḥ parameśvarasya nairghṛṇyaṃ ca
bhavet । tadevamapuruṣārthasambandhāpādinyā jagatsṛṣṭyā kiṃ parameśvarasya ? ।।
iti prāpte brūmaḥ—sarvathā jagatsṛjataḥ parameśvarasya vaiṣamyanairghaṇye na bhavataḥ ।
karmasāpekṣatvāt sṛṣṭivaiṣamyasya । (ta1thā hi darśayati śrutiḥ—<quote>‘ramaṇīyacaraṇā
ramaṇīyāṃ yonimāpadyante kapūyacaraṇāḥ kapūyām’</quote> iti ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। na karmāvibhāgāditi cennānāditvādupapadyate cāpyupalabhyate ca ।। 35 ।।</sutra>
<p>sṛṣṭeḥ prāk karma nāsti kṣetrajñābhāvāt । tadabhāvaśca <quote>‘sadeva somyedam’</quote> itya-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<p>sū ।। vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāttathā hi darśayati ।। 34 ।। pūrvādhikaraṇārthānu-
vādenākṣepikīṃ saṃgatiṃ darśayati—<pratika>prayojanābhāve'pīti</pratika> । sṛṣṭisaṃhārayaurvaiṣamyanairghṛṇyāpā-
dakatvānāpādakatvābhyāṃ saṃśayaṃ darśayati—<pratika>tatra punariti</pratika> । yujyeta līlārūpaḥ parameśvarasya
jagatsṛṣṭyādivyāpāra iti yadi sa tasya sarvānugrāhakasya vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyadoṣāpādako na syāt ।
tadāpādakastvayam । tasmādasamañjalīlāsadṛśo'yaṃ vyāpāraḥ parameśvarasya na yuktaḥ । na ca
vācyaṃ <quote>‘puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati pāpaḥ pāpene’</quote> ti śruteḥ karmaviśeṣamūlaṃ jagadvaiṣamya-
mīśvarastadutpattau sādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ yathā sasyotpattau parjanyaḥ sādhāraṇakāraṇam । tadbha‍ūyo'-
lpatvavrīhiyatvādivaiṣamyaṃ kṣetrabījādivaiṣamyakṛtam । evañca neśvarasya niravadyatvahāniriti ।
<quote>‘sadeva somyedamagra āsī’</quote> diti sṛṣṭeḥ prāgekatvāvadhāraṇena karmaṇāmabhāvāvagatyā sargādi-
kāle karmānapekṣayaiva prāthamikadevamanuṣyādiviṣamasṛṣṭiṃ kurvatastasya vaiṣamyadoṣāpattyaparihā-
rāt, kathaṃcida'pi nairghṛṇyādidoṣāparihārācca, kramikaviṣamasṛṣṭihetubhinnakālabhūyo'lpapuṇya-
pāparūpakarmavaiṣamyavatāṃ prāṇināṃ yugapadaviṣamasaṃsārahetukarmasāmyāsambhavena tatra karmāpekṣāyā
vaktumaśakyatvācca karmasāpekṣatve tasyānīśvaratvaprasaṅgācca <quote>‘eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati
taṃ yamebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate sa evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamadho ninīṣata’</quote> ityādi-
śrutyanusāreṇa karmaṇāmapi tatkāritatvāṃgīkāre vaiṣamyādidoṣatādavasthyācceti pūrvapakṣaṃ
diṅmātreṇa pradarśayati—<pratika>līlayetyādinā</pratika> । <quote>‘sāpekṣatvā’</quote> dityaṃtasūtrāṃśoktaṃ vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyāpa-
ttidoṣaparihāraṃ darśayan siddhāntayati—<pratika>sarvatheti</pratika> । prathamasṛṣṭau karmāsaṃbhavaśaṃkāparihāraṃ
<note>1. śrīkaṇṭhabhāṣye () etadrekhāṃkito bhāgaḥ anyamātṛkāsu na dṛśyate । śivārkamaṇidīpikāparyālocanāyāmapyayaṃ
bhāgo'dhikapāṭha ityavagamyate । maisūrūsaṃsthānamudritapustakapāṭhānusāreṇāyaṃ pāṭho'tra niveśita iti vijñeyam ।</note>
<pb n="047"/>
vadhāraṇāvagatādavibhāgāt iti cet—na,) <quote>‘jñājñau dvāvajāvīśānīśau’</quote> ityādi-
śruteḥ । yathā jīvānāmanāditvaṃ tathā tatkarmaṇāmapyanāditvaṃ dṛśyate hi । yataḥ
karmapravāhasiddho'yaṃ saṃsāraḥ । parameśvaro hi jīvānāṃ vicitraṃ karma sarvajñatayā-
tra/?/lokya svaśaktyā tattadanuguṇameva bhogāyatanaṃ devādiśarīraṃ sṛjati । tataḥ
karmamūlameva sṛṣṭivaiṣamyam । saṃhāraśca jīvānāṃ saṃsāravyāpārakhinnānāṃ suṣu-
ptivadviśrāntihetutayā parameśvarasya na nairghṛṇyāpādakaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu jīvānāṃ sukhaduḥkhādau karmaṇa eva prayojakatvāt kimaprayojakena parame-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<quote>‘tathā hi darśayatī’</quote> ti sūtrāṃśoktaṃ darśayati—<pratika>jñājñāviti</pratika> । <quote>‘jñājñau dvāvajāvīśānīśā’</quote> viti
śrutiḥ yathā jīvānāmanāditvaṃ darśayati tathā tatkarmaṇāmapyanāditvaṃ darśayati <quote>‘sūryācaṃdramasau
dhātā yathāpūrvamakalpaya’</quote> dityādiśrutiriti <quote>‘tathāhi darśayatī’</quote> ti sūtrāṃśasyārthaḥ । udāhṛta-
śrutiḥ karmaṇāmanāditvaṃ na pratipādayatīti āśaṃkāparihārārtho hiśabdaḥ । yasmādiyaṃ
śrutiridānīntanakalpatadviṣamasṛṣṭiyuktapūrvakalpasadbhāvaṃ darśayati tata evedānīṃtanasṛṣṭivaiṣa-
myasya pūrvakalpakṛtakarmavaiṣamyādhīnatvaṃ gamayati । anyathā tasyākasmikatvaprasaṃgāt kṛtahā-
nākṛtābhyāgamaprasaṃgācceti hiśabdasyārthaḥ । evaṃ ca <quote>‘sadekameve’</quote> tyavadhāraṇaṃ vyaktanāmarūpā-
bhāvābhiprāyamiti bhāvaḥ । evaṃ sūtrārthaṃ pradarśya karmasāpekṣatvāditi hetunā labdhaṃ vaiṣamyaparihāraṃ
darśayati—<pratika>parameśvaro hīti । karmamūlameveti</pratika> । evaṃ ca yathā narapatiḥ prajānāṃ vyavahāradarśane
tadīyayuktāyuktavacanānusāreṇānugrahanigrahaviśeṣaṃ kurvanpakṣapātitvalakṣaṇaṃ vaiṣamyaṃ na pratipadyate
evamīśvaro'pi tadīyakarmaviśeṣānusāreṇa viṣamasṛṣṭiṃ kurvan na tatpratipadyate pratyuta viṣama-
karmaṇāmekarūpasṛṣṭāveva yuktāyuktavādināmekarūpānugrahe vyavahāradraṣṭuriva parameśvarasya vaiṣamya-
māpadyeteti bhāvaḥ । evaṃ karmāpekṣayā vaiṣamyaparihāreṇaiva nairghṛṇyaparihāro'pi labdhaḥ । yadyapi
sṛṣṭikramavaiṣamyakāraṇaṃ karmakramavaiṣamyamiva saṃhārayaugapadyasāmyakāraṇaṃ karmayaugapadyasāmyaṃ na
saṃbhavati, tathāpi prāṇināṃ niśāsviva bhogaviśeṣaprāpaṇārthaṃ tattaccharīrasthāpakānāṃ karmaṇā
kālaviśeṣe yugapatsvāpassaṃbhavatyeva । karmaṇāṃ svāpo nāma prāṇināṃ pravṛttyanābhimukhyamiva
kāryānābhimukhyam tatsarvasampratipannam । anādibhavasañcitānāmanaṃtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ yugapatkāryā-
raṃbhakatvādarśanāt । tatra ca karmaṇāṃ svāpe phalānāmapāka iva kālaviśeṣaḥ kāraṇamiti
ṛtuviśeṣe jaṃbūphalādipākayaugapadyavatkālaviśeṣe karmaṇāṃ svāpayaugapadyaṃ nānupapannam । ato
viśeṣakarmodbodhāprekṣayā sṛṣṭivaiṣamye'pi parameśvarasya vaiṣamyamiva sarvakarmasvāpāpekṣayā saṃhā-
rasāmye'pi tasya nairghṛṇyaṃ na prasajyate । ayaṃ parihārassāpekṣatvādeva vaiṣamyavairghṛṇye prati-
kṣipatā sūtrakāreṇa darśitaḥ prāksaṃkṣipyopanyastaḥ <quote>‘parameśvarasya vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na bhavataḥ karma-
sāpekṣatvā’</quote>diti । svayaṃ parihārāntaramāha—<pratika>saṃhāraśceti</pratika> । na karmāpekṣāyāmīśvarasyānī-
ś‍varatvāpattirdoṣaḥ । bhaṃgyaṃtareṇāśaṃkate—<pratika>nanviti</pratika> । yadi karmavaicitryamūlaṃ jagadvaicitryaṃ tadā
karmādhīna eveśvaro vicitraṃ jagannirmātīti tasya karmapārataṃtryeṇa vyavahartṛgatayuktāyukta-
vacanapārataṃtryasya vyavahāradraṣṭuriva nāsti niratiśayasvātaṃtryalakṣaṇamīś‍varatvamiti prāptam ।
tathā sati kiṃ tena īśvara iti nāmamātraṃ bibhrāṇena vastuto'nīś‍vareṇa । jagadvaicitryasya
karmavaicitryeṇaiva siddhatayā tasyānupayuktatvāt । na ca tathāpi śrutisiddhatvādabhyupagaṃtavyaḥ ।
<pb n="048"/>
śvareṇeti cet—na, karmaṇo'pi tadadhīnatvāt tasya na svātantryāhāniḥ । punarapi
ghaṭṭakuṭīprabhātanyāyena karmaṇaḥ svātantryābhāve parameśvarasya vaiṣamyādidoṣāpatti-
riti na vācyam । karmaśaktīnāmanantānāṃ māyāgatānāṃ saṃsthāpakamātratvāt
parameśvarasya । karmaṇāmeva svaśaktivaśāt sṛṣṭivaiṣamyahetutve tadva‍yavasthāpakamātrasya
tasya na vaiṣamyam ।।
nanu jīvānāṃ śarīrasṛṣṭau acetanasya karmaṇaścetanānadhiṣṭhitasyāsāmarthyāccetana-
tvena parameśvara eva prayojaka iti vaktavyam । kathamasau sṛṣṭeḥ prāk saṃhṛta bhogasādha-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
niratiśayasvātaṃtryaviśiṣṭo hi sa śrutisiddhaḥ । tatra niratiśayasvātaṃtryarūpadharmāṃśe śrute-
rarthatyāge ko viśeṣo dharmyaṃśasya । yena tadaṃśe śrutiratyaktavyārthā syāditi śaṃkārthaḥ । karmā-
pekṣāmātreṇa svātaṃtryahānau khalvevamāśaṃkyeta । tattu nāsti <quote>‘eṣa hyeve’</quote> tyādiśrutyā karmaṇāṃ
tadadhīnatvāvagamāditi pariharati—<pratika>neti</pratika> । tarhi tadeva vaiṣamyamāpatetkāṃścitsādhu karma kāṃści-
dasādhu karma kārayataḥ parameśvarasyeti śaṃkāmudbhāvya bhaṃgyantareṇa samādhatte—<pratika>punarapītti ।</pratika>
ayamāśayaḥ । parameśvaro na svayaṃ sādhvasādhūni karmāṇi kārayati, taissukhaduḥkhādīni ca
notpādayati, yena tasya vaiṣamyamāpatet ।kiṃtu prāṇina eva tathābhūtāni karmāṇi yāni svasvarucya-
nusāreṇa pūrvasargeṣu kurvaṃti tānyeva punassargeṣu viṣamasṛṣṭihetavo bhavaṃti । parameśvarastu pūrvasargakṛ-
tānāṃ tattadaṃtaḥkaraṇadharmarūpāṇāṃ sādhvasādhukarmaṇāṃ pralaye sarvāṃtaḥkaraṇānāṃ vilīnatayā
māyāyāmeva vāsanārūpatayā lagnānāṃ kevalamasaṃkareṇa phalavyavasthāpakaḥ । anyathā māyāyāṃ
saṃkīrṇeṣu karmaphalamanyo gṛhṇīyāt । anyadīyakṛṣikarmaphalāni anyo haratīti loke dṛṣṭatvena
karmaṇāṃ kartṛgataphalajanakatvaniyamābhāvāt । vaidikakarmasu ātmanepadabalāttathā niyamo'va-
gamyata iti cetsatyam । śrutaniyamānyathānupapattyaiva śrutayāgasvargakāryakāraṇabhāvānyathānupa-
pattyā pūrvavadvyavasthāpakaḥ kalpayitavyaḥ । nanu, ṣaṭa‍triṃśattatvamadhye niyatyākhyaṃ tattvaṃ karmaphalā-
nāmasaṃkaravyavasthāpakamāgameṣu prasiddham । <quote>‘kālaḥ svabhāvo niyatiryadṛcche’</quote>ti ś‍vetāś‍vata-
ramantre'pi tatparāmṛṣṭam । ato na vyavasthāpakāntarāpekṣeti cenmaivam । loke kṛṣyādi-
phalāsaṃkarasya rājño vyavasthāpakatvadarśane niyatitatvasyā'pi sādhvasādhukarmaphalāsaṅkara-
vyavasthāpakaparameśvarājñārūpatvenaivābhyupagamāt । evaṃca <quote>‘eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayatī’</quote> tyādi-
śrutirapi tatkarmaphalāsaṃkaravyavasthāpakatvamātraviṣayā vyākhyeyā । <quote>‘eṣa seturvidharaṇa eṣāṃ
lokānāmasaṃbhedāye’</quote> ti śrutyaṃtaraprasiddha‍yanusārāt parameśvarasya vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyādisakaladoṣa-
rāhityaśrutyaṃtarānusārācca । na caivaṃ sati tasya rājādisamānayogakṣematvānniratiśayaiśvarya-
bhaṃgaprasaṃgaḥ । rājādīnāṃ katipayaviṣayasaṅkarāpādanamaiśvaryaṃ parameśvarasya tu asaṃkucitasarvavi-
ṣayamityeva tadaiśvaryasya niratiśayatvaviśeṣābhyupagamāditi । evaṃ matamanupapannamityāśaṃkate—
nanviti । jīvānāṃ devamanuṣyaśarīrādiviṣamasṛṣṭau parameśvarādhiṣṭhānaṃ vinā kevalaṃ karma
na prabhavati । acetanasya cetanādhiṣṭhānabhāne kāryākṣamatvasya <quote>‘racanānupapatte’</quote> rityanaṃtarādhi-
karaṇe vakṣyamāṇatvāt । ataḥ prasuptāni karmāṇi parameśvaraḥ svayamevodbodhya tadutpāditai-
śśarīraiḥ pralayaviśrāṃtān jīvān saṃyojya punarapi tāratamyena kleśayatītyaṃgīkartavyatvāt-
kathaṃ vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na syātām । na ca karmāṇi kartṛbhiravaśyaṃ bhoktavyānīti tadanusāreṇa
<pb n="049"/>
natayā saṃsārakleśarahitān sukhino jīvān punarapi saṃsārahetunā śarīreṇa
yojayati paramakāruṇiko'pi sanniti cet—
ucyate—sarvānugrāhakaḥ parameśvaro jīvānāṃ karmapākamantareṇa jñānānudayāt
jñānamantareṇa niratiśayānandamokṣābhāvāt, karmapākasya ca bhogamantare-
ṇānupapatteḥ, tatkarmaphalabhogāya punarapi teṣāṃ śarīrādikaṃ kalpayati । evaṃ
kramāt bhogena pakve svakarmaṇi śuddhāntaḥkaraṇānāṃ jīvānāṃ svaviṣayaṃ jñānamutpādya
niratiśayānandarūpāṃ mokṣalakṣmīṃ prakāśayati ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tānyadhiṣṭhāya tadutpāditaiśśarīraiḥ sukhaduḥkhe bhojayato na te prasajyeyātāṃ, vaivasvatasyeva
tasya samavṛttitvaṃ ca na hīyata iti vācyam । <quote>‘parāttu tacchrute’</quote> ri <ref>(bra॰ 2-3-40)</ref> tyadhi-
karaṇe karmaṇāmapīś‍vareṇa kāryamāṇatvasya vakṣyamāṇatayā kaiścitpuṇyakarmāṇi kaiścidapuṇya-
karmāṇi ca kārayiturvaiṣamyādiprasaṅgatādavasthyāt । na ca pūrvapūrvānādikarmapravāhāpekṣaḥ
kārayati,<quote>‘kṛtaprayatnāpekṣastu vihitapratiṣiddhāvaiyarthyādibhya’</quote> <ref>(bra॰ 2-3-41.)</ref> iti <quote>‘parāttu
tacchrute’</quote> ri <ref>(bra॰ 2-3-40.)</ref> tyadhikaraṇe tathā pratipādayiṣyamāṇatvāt ato na tatprasaṃga
iti vācyam । pūrvapūrvakarmaṇāmīśvarakāritatve tatprasaṅgāparihārāt tadakāritatve <quote>‘parāttu
tacchrute’</quote> rityadhikaraṇavirodhāt । nanu, tarhyubhayāvirodhena parameśvaraḥ kalpādau karaṇakale-
varāṇi datvā svayamudāste । tadā jīvaḥ svecchayā sādhu vāsādhu vā yatkarma karoti tadanu-
sāreṇa tadanaṃtaraṃ karmāṃtarāṇi kārayatīti kalpyate । tathā ca svecchākṛtakarmamūlatvādu-
ttarottarakarmapravāhasya na nairghṛṇyavaiṣamyadoṣaprasaṃgaḥ, <quote>‘parāttu tacchrute’</quote>rityadhikaraṇārthaśca dvitī-
yādiṣu pravṛttiṣu caritārtha iti cenmaivam । tathā kalpanāyāmapi ayamasādhu karma kārayatīti
jānataḥ parameśvarasya kūpe bālakaḥ patiṣyatīti jānata ivaudāsīnye nairghṛṇyānivāraṇāt
svecchayā kaścitsādhu karma prathamaṃ karoti kaścidasādhviti vaiṣamyasya pūrvakalpakṛtakarma-
viśeṣādhīnatvasyāvaśyavaktavyatvena tatkārayituḥ parameśvarasya vaiṣamyādiprasaṃgāparihārācca ।
nanvevaṃ vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyamaparihāryaṃ cetparameśvarasya tanna doṣa ityastu । na hi vidhiniṣedhapathā-
tītasya tasya pratyavāyakāraṇaṃ tat । nāpi sarvaniyaṃtuḥ kutaścidaniṣṭakāraṇam । kimarthaṃ tarhi
<quote>‘vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvā’</quote>diti sūtrakāreṇa tatparihṛtam । dvividhaṃ vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyam । ekaṃ
karmādikamanapekṣya svayameva viṣamasṛṣṭiyuktamaparaṃ tatsāpekṣatve'pi pūrvapūrvakarmapravāhasyāpi
parameśvarādhīnatvaprayuktam । tatrādyaṃ puṇyapāpayoḥ sukhaduḥkhasādhakatvāvedakasya vedasyāprā
māṇyāvahamiti tatprāmāṇyasaṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ parihṛtaṃ na tu dvitīyamiti cetkṛtamidaṃ sāmānyena
vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyamātradoṣa eveti tatparihārārthaṃ prayatya parihārānirvāhe punastadadoṣatvavacana-
makauśalamevāviṣkuryāt । paramakāruṇikatvavirodhi ca vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyaṃ sarvathā pariharaṇīya-
meva । tadaiva ca sūtrāñjasyamapi labhyate । tasmādyathā paramakāruṇikaṃ parameśvaraṃ vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyaṃ
kalayāpi na spṛśet yathā ca sūtrāñjasyaṃ bhavet tathā parihāro varṇanīya iti śaṃkābhi-
prāyaḥ । ucyata ityādeḥ parihāragraṃthasyāyamarthaḥ । paramakāruṇikaḥ parameśvaraḥ sakalacetanā-
nugrāhaka iti <quote>‘vyādhīnāṃ bheṣajaṃ yadva’</quote> dityādipaurāṇikabhaṇitiprasiddhaḥ । anugrahaḥ bandha-
nivartanena svasāmyaprāpaṇarūpaḥ । bandhaśca mukhyaḥ puṃsāṃ dṛkkriyācchādakaḥ svayameko'pi
<pb n="050"/>
evaṃśaktimān parameśvaraḥ paramakāruṇikaḥ kathaṃ vā yugapadeva sarvajīvānāṃ
karma pācayitvā samameva mokṣānandaṃ na prakāśayatīti cet—satyam, parameśvareṇa
samameva sarveṣāmanugrahe kriyamāṇe'pi ye pakvamalāste mucyante, apakvamalāḥ kāla-
kramādeva । yathā savitṛkiraṇasandohe samameva santate'pi pakvānyeva padmāni
vikasanti, nāpakvāni । tataḥ pūrṇo'pi parameśvaraḥ parārthāmeva sarvāṃ pravṛttiṃ
karoti । tathā paurāṇikī bhaṇitiḥ parameśvarasya sarvānugrāhakatvapratipādanamu-
khenoktaṃ sakalamarthaṃ spaṣṭayati---
‘ādityena yathā hīnaṃ tamobhūtamidaṃ jagat । śivenāpi vinā tadvat tamo-
bhūtamidaṃ jagat ।। vaidyaṃ vinā nirānandāḥ kliśyante rogiṇo yathā । śivaṃ vinā
nirānaṃdaṃ kliśyate hi jagattathā ।। vyādhīnāṃ bheṣajaṃ yadvat pratipakṣaṃ svabhāvataḥ ।
śivassaṃsāradoṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣaḥ svabhāvataḥ ।। yathā'nādiḥ pravṛtto'yaṃ ghoraḥ saṃsāra-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vicitrānaṃtaśaktikaḥ tāmrāśritakālikāvatsahajasiddhāvaraṇarūpaḥ । malākhyaḥ pariṇāmidra-
vyaviśeṣastu vraṇavat pakvo nivartanīyaḥ । pākaśca tasye vraṇasyauṣadheneva nityanaimittikakarmā-
nuṣṭhānene sāṃsārikakleśānubhavena ca saṃpādanīyaḥ । <quote>‘kaṣāye karmabhiḥ pakve tato jñānaṃ pravartate’</quote>
iti nityanaimittikakarmācaraṇena tasminpakve satyeva vairāgyaśivabhaktiśivajijñāsādipraṇā-
ḍikayā mocakajñānotpattismaraṇāt bhogena tatpākasyāgamaprasiddhatvācca । karmabhogaśca
tanukaraṇabhuvanabhogasādhanadravyadevatādikaṃ vinā na saṃbhavati । tatra ca prāṇināṃ vicitrāṇi
karmāṇi kāraṇamiti tadarthaṃ parameśvaraḥ karmāṇi kārayitvā karmavaicitryānusāreṇa vici-
trāṇi tanukaraṇādīni sṛṣṭvā kleśayuktāni karmāṇyanuṣṭhāya sukhaduḥkhāni ca bhojayatīti sarva-
metatkaruṇayopapadyate । ato na vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyaprasaktiḥ । na hi vraṇināṃ vraṇapākārthyaṃ tattadvraṇagu-
ṇānusāreṇa kṣāraṃ niveśya tāratamyena kṣāraniveśaprayuktaṃ kleśamanubhāvayataḥ kāruṇikasya
vaidyasya vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyaṃ prasajyate । parameśvarasya sarvatra karuṇāsāmye'pi vicitrasvabhāvānāṃ
tadāvaraṇamalaśaktīnāṃ vraṇānāmiva pākasyāniyatakālatvāt sarveṣāṃ mukterayaugapadyaṃ copa-
padyate iti । evaṃ ca sūtre <quote>‘sāpekṣatvā’</quote> dityasya malapākasāpekṣatvāditi vā tatpākopayo-
gisvakāritakarmasāpekṣatvāditi vārtho draṣṭavyaḥ । bhāṣye <quote>‘karmapākamantareṇe’</quote> tyādivākyeṣu karma-
śabdaḥ kriyate'nena saṃsāra iti karaṇavyutpattyā vā parameśvareṇa pakvaḥ kriyata iti karmavyutpattyā
vā malāvaraṇaparo draṣṭavyaḥ । ata evāgre bhāṣye <quote>‘ye pakvamalāste mucyaṃte apakvamalāḥ kālakramā-
deve’</quote>ti vakṣyate । <quote>‘karmapākasya ca bhogamaṃtareṇānupapatte’</quote> rityetatkarmānuṣṭhānamaṃtareṇānupapatteritya-
syāpyupalakṣaṇam । <quote>‘karmaphalabhogāyetye’</quote>tat karmānuṣṭhānāyetyasyāpyupalakṣaṇam । <pratika>parārthāmeveti</pratika> ।
parānugrahārthameva sakalamapi sṛṣṭyādivyāpāraṃ karotītyarthaḥ । nanu saṃhāro nānugrahārthaḥ pralaye
pākakāraṇayoḥ karmabhogayostadupayogino vā kasyacidvyāpārasyābhāvāt, pūrvaṃ bhāṣye saṃhārasya
viśrāṃtimātraprayojanatvenoktatvācca । <quote>‘saṃsārakhinnānāmakhilānāṃ prāṇināṃ prabhuḥ kriyayā kurute
mahārthasaṃhṛtiṃ teṣāmeva viśrāṃtyā’</quote> iti tasya tanmātraprayojanavattvenāgamavidbhirapyuktatvācca ।
maivam । pralaye'grimasṛṣṭyupayogino māyākarmādipākavyāpārasya sattvāt । uktaṃ hi mṛgendrasaṃhi-
tāyām—<quote>‘svāpe'pyāste bodhayanbodhayogyān rodhyānnuṃdhanpācayankarmikarma । māyāśaktīrvyakti-
<pb n="051"/>
maṇḍalaḥ । tathā'nādiḥ pravṛtto'yaṃ śivassaṃsāramocakaḥ ।’ ityādikā । ataḥ parame-
śvarasya sarvānugrahapravṛtteḥ jagatsṛṣṭyādivyāpāraḥ sambhavatyeva ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। sarvadharmopapatteśca ।। 36 ।।</sutra>
kiṃ bahunā ? pradhānaparamāṇukarmakālādīnāṃ ye dharmā anupapannāste sarve brahma-
ṇyupapadyante । ato brahmaiva sarvātiśāyi jagatsṛṣṭyādikāraṇamiti samañjasam ।।
iti vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।
iti śrīkaṇṭhaśivācāryaviracite brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye
dvitīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
yogyāḥ prakurvan paśyansarvaṃ yadyathāvastujāta’</quote> miti । adhikaraṇārthamupasaṃharati—<pratika>ataḥ
parameśvarasyeti । sū ।। sarvadharmopapatteśca ।। 36 ।।</pratika> pradhānaparamāṇvādīnāṃ svātaṃtryeṇa jaga-
tkāraṇatāyāṃ tadupayogino ye dharmāḥ pūrvaṃ tatrātatrānupapannatvena sūtritāḥ agrimapāde ca
prapañcayiṣyaṃte, te sarve brahmaṇyupapadyaṃta iti pādopasaṃhārārthamidaṃ sūtram । tathaiva pādārthamu-
pasaṃharati—<pratika>ata iti</pratika> । <quote>‘sarvātiśāyī’</quote> tyetadapi īkṣatyadhikaraṇādyupapāditanirdoṣatvādi-
saṃgrahārtham । <quote>‘jagatsṛṣṭyādikāraṇa’</quote> mityetannavilakṣaṇatvādhikaraṇādyupapāditopādānatvanimi-
ttatvasaṃgrahaṇārtham <pratika>।। iti vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</pratika></p>
<p>iti śrīśivātivādimūrdhanyaśivadarśanasthāpanadhuraṃdharasakaladevabhūdevapratiṣṭhāpaka
śrīmaccinnabommabhūpālahṛdayakamalakuharaviharamāṇaśrīsāmbaśivapreritasya
śrīmadbharadvājakulajaladhikaustubhaśrīviśvajidyājiraṃgarājādhvarivara-
sūnorappayadīkṣitasya kṛtau śrīkaṇṭhācāryaviracita-
brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāyāṃ śivādityamaṇi-
dīpikākhyāyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya</p>
<head>prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।। 1 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāttathā hi darśayati ।। 34 ।। (na karmāvibhāgāditi cennānādi-
tvādupapadyate cāpyupalabhyate ca ।। 35 ।।) sarvadharmopapatteśca ।। 36 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>rāgadveṣavihīnaḥ parakaruṇāsāgaro hi śivaḥ । uccāvacasukhaduḥkhā sṛṣṭiriyaṃ kathamamuṣya līlā syāt ।। 107 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>karmāṇyapekṣya bhavināṃ tatkṣapaṇāyaiva līlayā sṛjataḥ । mādhyasthyaṃ karuṇā vā na hīyate candracūḍasya ।। 108 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<head>iti śrīmadappayadīkṣitakṛtau caturmatasārasaṃgrahe nayamaṇimālākhye tṛtīyaparicchede
dvitīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।। 2 ।। 1 ।।</head>
<pb n="052"/>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāttathāhi darśayati ।। 34 ।। na karmāvibhāgāditi cennānāditvāt
।। 35 ।। upapadyate cāpyupalabhyate ca ।। 36 ।। sarvadharmopapatteśca ।। 37 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvamuktaṃ brahmaṇo māyāmayyā līlayā sraṣṭṭatvamākṣipya samādhānādākṣepasaṃgatyedamāha—<pratika>sū ।। vaiṣamyanairghṛ-
ṇye ityādi ।</pratika> yo yo viṣamasṛṣṭikartā sa sa sāvadya iti nyāyena niravadyādbrahmaṇo jagatsargāṃ bruvansamanvayo virudhyate na veti
saṃdehe brahmaṇo viṣamasṛṣṭikartṛtvātsarvasaṃhārakatvācca vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyadoṣaprasaktyā sāvadyatvaprasaṃgānniravadyasya brahmaṇo na jagatkartṛtva-
miti <pratika>pūrvaḥpakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, brahmaṇo <pratika>vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye</pratika> na syātām । kasmāt । <pratika>sāpekṣatvāt</pratika>=prāṇikarmasāpekṣa-
tvāt । nanu brahmaṇaḥ kasmātkarmasāpekṣatvamityata āha—<pratika>tathā hi darśayati</pratika>—<quote>‘eṣa hyeva sādhukarma kārayati’</quote> ityādyā śruti-
rityarthaḥ । ataḥ karmasāpekṣatvena niravadyasya brahmaṇo jagatkartṛtvamupapannameveti ।।</p>
<p>sāpekṣatvamākṣipya samādhatte—<pratika>sū ।। na karmāvibhāgāditi cennānāditvāt ।। 35 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘sadeva somyedamagra āsī-
dekameve’</quote> tyādinā sṛṣṭeḥ prāgavibhāgāvadhāraṇānna tadānīṃ karmāsti tataḥ karmāpekṣayā viṣamā sṛṣṭirityasaṃgatamiti cet <pratika>na
anāditvāt</pratika>=saṃsārasya bījāṃkuravaddhetuhetumadbhāvopapatterityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu kutaḥ saṃsārasyānāditvamityāha—<pratika>sū ।। upapadyate cāpyupalabhyate ca ।।</pratika> akasmādeva sṛṣṭyaṃgīkāre muktasyāpi
punarjanmaprasaṃgāt pūrvapūrvasṛṣṭisādṛśyānupapatteśca saṃsārasyānāditva<pratika>mupapadyate ca ।</pratika> <quote>‘dhātā yathāpūrvamakalpayat’</quote> <quote>‘na rūpamasyeha
tathopalabhyate nānto na cādirna ca saṃpratiṣṭhā’</quote> iti śrutismṛtyo<pratika>rupalabhyate ca</pratika> saṃsārasyānāditvamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti bhagavatpādamate vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<head>atha sarvadharmopapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</head>
<p>pūrvaṃ viṣamasṛṣṭiprayojakakarmaṇassattvādbrahmaṇo viṣamasṛṣṭihetutvamuktam । tadvadupādānatvaprayojakaguṇavattvasyābhāvānnopādānatva-
miti pratyudāharaṇasaṃgatyedamāha—<pratika>sū ।। sarvadharmopapatteśca ।। 37 ।।</pratika> yannirguṇaṃ tannopādānaṃ yathā gandha iti nyāyena nirgu-
ṇādbrahmaṇo jagatsargaṃ bruvansamanvayo virudhyate vā na veti saṃdehe virudhyata iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, jagatkāraṇatvasarva-
jñatvādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ kāraṇadharmāṇāṃ brahmaṇyevopapatterbrahmaiva jagatkāraṇamiti । nirguṇatve'pi brahmaṇo na vivartopādānatvaṃ viruddham ।
tasmānna kathaṃcidapi samanvayasya virodha iti siddham ।। 13 <pratika>।। atra pāde trayodaśā</pratika>dhikaraṇāni । sūtrāṇi <pratika>saptatriṃśat ।</pratika>
<pratika>।। 37 ।। iti sarvadharmopapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 13।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, paripūrṇatayā rāgadveṣādihīnasya parameśvarasya prayojanābhāve'pi līlayā jagatsraṣṭṛtvābhyupagame vaiṣamyādi-
doṣāpattyā parameśvarasya līlayā jagatsṛṣṭyādiṣu pravṛttirna saṃbhavatīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।</pratika> karmasāpekṣatvātsṛṣṭivaiṣamyasya parameśvarasya
jagatsṛṣṭyādipravṛttessarvānugrahārthatvena śrutipurāṇādiṣu spaṣṭīkṛtatvācca sarvathā parameśvarasya na vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyādidoṣaprasaktiriti
saṃbhavatyeva sarvānugrahapravṛtteḥ parameśvarasya jagatsṛṣṭyādivyāpāra iti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthaḥ</pratika> spaṣṭa eva । atra mate na <pratika>’karmā-
vibhāgāditi cennānāditvāt ।। 35 ।। upapadyate cāpyupalabhyate ca ।। 36 ।।’</pratika> iti sūtradvayaṃ nāstīti
pratibhāti । tathā cāsminmate <pratika>vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāttathā hi darśayati । sarvadharmopapatteśca’ ।।</pratika> iti sūtra-
dvayātmakamevedamadhikaraṇam । na śāṃkaramatavadatrādhikaraṇapṛthaktvam । pradhānaparamāṇukarmakālādīnāṃ ye dharmā anupapannāste sarve
brahmaṇyupapadyante ataśca brahma sarvātiśāyi jagatsṛṣṭyādikāraṇamiti cāntimasūtrasyārtha iti । <pratika>atra mate</pratika> sūtrāṇi <pratika>paṃcatriṃśat
35 ।।</pratika> adhikaraṇā<pratika>nyekādaśa</pratika> ।। 11 ।।</p>
<head>rāmānujamate, atha prayojanavattvādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। <quote>‘na prayojanavattvāt’</quote> ityārabhya <quote>‘sarvadharmopapatteśca’</quote></pratika> ityantā pañcasūtrī prayojanavattvādhikaraṇatvena vyapadiśyate ।
atrāpi pūrvādhikaraṇavat brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatvasaṃbhavāsaṃbhavābhyāṃ saṃdehe buddhipūrvakāraṃbhāṇāṃ saprayojanatvādīśvarasya svata evāvāpta-
samastakāmasya jagatsṛṣṭyāraṃbhe prayojanābhāvānna saṃbhavatīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāṃtastu</pratika>, paripūrṇasyāpīśvarasya kevalalīlāprayoja-
nāya loke mahārājasya paripūrṇasyāpi kevalalīlaikaphalāḥ kaṃtukādyāraṃbhā iva jagasṛṣṭyāraṃbhassaṃbhavatīti । sūtrārthavarṇanādikaṃ
prāyaḥ śrīkaṇṭhamatādaviśiṣṭameva । <pratika><quote>‘vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāttathāhi darśayatī’</quote></pratika>tyādikaṃ sūtratrayamapīdamadhikaraṇa-
śeṣatayā yojitamiti viśeṣaḥ । īśvarasya prayojanābhāve'pi līlayā jagatsraṣṭṛtvābhyupagame vaiṣamyādidoṣāpattiśaṃkottaratve-
nāsya sūtratrayasyāvatāritatvādaikādhikaraṇyam । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, sū ।। na prayojanavattvāt ।। 32 ।। prayojanavattvā</pratika>tsṛṣṭeḥ
īśvarasya svataḥ paripūrṇasya prayojanābhāvānna sraṣṭṛtvam ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। lokavattu līlākaivalyam ।। 33 ।। lokavat</pratika>= yathā loke rājñaḥ kantukādyāraṃbhe tadvat । <pratika>līlākaiva
lyam</pratika>=līlāyāḥ prayojanatve kaivalyaṃ saṃbhavati । kevalāyā līlāyāḥ sṛṣṭyāraṃbhaprayojanatvaṃ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<pb n="053"/>
<p><pratika>vaiṣamyetyādi । vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye</pratika>=īśvarasya jagatsṛṣṭau devādivaiṣamyaprayuktapakṣapāto duḥkhapradajagatsarge nairghṛṇyaṃ ca <pratika>na</pratika>=
na saṃbhavataḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>sāpekṣatvāt</pratika>=tasya kṣetrajñakarmasāpekṣatvāt । <pratika>tathāhi darśayati</pratika>=<quote>‘sādhukārī sādhurbhavati pāpakārī
pāpo bhavatī’</quote>ti śrutiḥ kṣetrajñānāṃ dehādiyogaṃ tattatkarmasāpekṣaṃ darśayati hi । iti <pratika>।। sū ।। na karmāvibhāgāditi ce-
nnānāditvādupapadyate cāpyupalabhyate ca ।।</pratika> itīdamekaṃ sūtram । karma sṛṣṭeḥ prāk <pratika>na</pratika> vidyate । kṛtaḥ । kṣetrajñābhāvāt ।
tadabhāvaśca <pratika>avibhāgāt</pratika>=<quote>‘sadeva somyeda’</quote> mityavadhāraṇāvagatādavibhāgāt iti cet <pratika>na</pratika> । <pratika>anāditvāt</pratika>=kṣetrajñānāṃ
tattatkarmapravāhāṇāṃ ca anāditvāt । <pratika>upapadyate ca</pratika>=kṣetrajñasvarūpānāditve'pi nāmarūpavibhāgābhāvādavibhāgaśrutirityarthaḥ ।
<pratika>upalabhyate ca</pratika>=śrutismṛtyoḥ kṣetrajñānāmanāditvamityarthaḥ ।। antimasūtrārthastu śrīkaṇṭhamatādaviśiṣṭaḥ <pratika>।। asminpāde</pratika>
sūtrāṇi <pratika>ṣaṭ‌triṃśat ।। 36 ।। adhikaraṇāni daśa ।। 10 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>iti rāmānujamate prayojanavattvādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, atra śāṃkaramatavadyogavibhāgena sūtratrayātmakamidaṃ vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyādhikaraṇamantimaṃ sūtraṃ tvadhikaraṇā-
ntaramiti vijñeyam ।। saṃdehapūrvapakṣasiddhāṃtādikaṃ prāyaḥ pūrvasmādaviśiṣṭam । sūtrārthavarṇanaprakriyāyāṃ paramasti kiyāniva bhedaḥ ।
<pratika>vaiṣamyanaiṃrghṛṇye na</pratika> staḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>sāpekṣatvāt</pratika>=īśvarasya karmāpekṣāvattvābhyupagamāt । tatkutaḥ । <pratika>hi</pratika>=yasmāt <quote>‘puṇyena puṇya’</quote>
mitiśrutiḥ <pratika>tathā darśayati</pratika>=pratipādayati tasmādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। na karmāvibhāgāditi cennānāditvāt ।।</pratika> īśenāpekṣaṇīyaṃ yatkarma tadeva karma nāsti । kutaḥ । <pratika>avi-
bhāvāt</pratika>=tasya karmaṇaḥ asvataṃtravastubhyo'vibhaktatvāt । asvataṃtratvāditi yāvat । tathā ca svādhīnakarmāpekṣayā vaiṣamyā-
deraparihāra <pratika>iti cenna</pratika> । kutaḥ । <pratika>anāditvāt</pratika>=karmaparaṃparāyā anāditvādityarthaḥ ।। tathā ceśvaraḥ pūrvapūrvamapekṣyottarottara-
karma jīvena kāraṇatītyaṅgīkāre karmaṇo'pekṣaṇīyatvāpatternoktadoṣa iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। upapadyate cāpyupalabhyate ca ।।</pratika> īś‍varasya karmāpekṣāyāmapi <pratika>upapadyate ca</pratika>=svātaṃtryaṃ yujyata eva । karmaṇaḥ
svādhīnatvāt । nanu tarhi svādhīnakarmasāpekṣatvakṛtavaiṣamyāpāta ityata āha---<pratika>upalabhyate ca</pratika>=<quote>‘sa kārayetpuṇyamathāpi
pāpaṃ na tāvatā doṣavānīśitāpi ।’</quote> iti śrutyā tādṛśavaiṣamyamadoṣatvena jñāyate cetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>ityānandatīrthamate vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<head>atha sarvadharmopapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। sarvadharmopapatteśca ।। 38 ।।</pratika> atra viṣṇossarvaguṇapūrṇatvaṃ yuktaṃ na veti saṃdehe na viṣṇoḥ sarvaguṇapūrgatvaṃ yuktam ।
cetanatvāt jīvavat iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāṃtastu</pratika> guṇadoṣābhāvavattvarūpāṇāṃ <pratika>sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇām upapatteḥ</pratika>=svātaṃ-
tryādinā brahmaṇi yuktatvāt । evaṃrūpasarvadharmopapādakaśruteśceti samuccayārthakaścaśabdaḥ । na tasya guṇapūrṇatve yuktivirodhaśśaṃ-
kanīya iti ।। asminmate atra pāde <pratika>ekādaśādhikaraṇāni ।। 11 ।। sūtrāṇi tu aṣṭatriṃśat ।।</pratika></p>
<lg><l>ityānandatīrthamate sarvadharmopapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>yaṃ prāsūta viśuddhaśīkamanaghaṃ vṛddhāṃtikākhyā satī
yaṃ mṛtyuṃjayaśarmaṇo budhamaṇerbhāgyaṃ vidussādhavaḥ ।</l>
<l>vādhūlānvayajanmano'sya sudhiyo hālāsyanāthāhvaya-
syeyaṃ satkṛtiredhatāmiha caturbhāṣyānugā candrikā ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>sūtrārthacandrikāyāmavirodhākhye dvitīyake'dhyāye । smṛtyavirodhāpādaka ādyaḥ pādo'yamabhyagātpūrtim ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>ādye matatraye'pi smṛtyavirodhābhidhānataḥ prathitaḥ । madhvācāryamate tu prokto yuktyavirodhapādaśabdena ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti hālāsyanāthakṛtau sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।। 2 ।। 1।।</head>
<pb n="054"/>
śivābhyā namaḥ ।
śrīkaṇṭhācāryakṛtau
brahmamīmāsābhāṣye
dvitīyasyādhyāyasya
atha dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।
atha racanānupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। racanānupapatteśca nānumānaṃ pravṛtteśca ।। 1 ।।</sutra>
pūrvapāde sāṅkhyāditarkavirodhamāśaṅkya svapakṣasādhanaṃ kṛtam । punariha tarkāva-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha śivārkamaṇidīpikāyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 2 ।।</head>
<head>atha racanānupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<sutra>।। sū ।। racanānupapatteśca nānumānaṃ pravṛtteśca ।। 1 ।।</sutra>
<p>vṛttavartiṣyamāṇayoḥ pādayorarthabhedopanyāsena pādabhedaṃ saṅgatiṃ ca darśayanpādāntarāraṃbhaṃ
pratijānīte—<pratika>pūrvapāda iti</pratika> । jagadabhinnanimittopādāne tadananye nirastanikhilāvadye
brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ samanvayaḥ prathamādhyāyena pratipāditaḥ । tasmin pradhānaparamāṇukāraṇa-
vādibhissāṃkhyavaiśeṣikādibhiḥ kevalatarkamavaṣṭabhyāpāditāni dūṣaṇāni asminnadhyāye
prathamapādena nirākṛtāni । tatrāpi praṇetṛgauraveṇa teṣāṃ tarkāṇāmupādeyatvaśaṅkā smṛtya-
dhikaraṇayogādhikaraṇābhyāṃ nirākṛtā । tattattarkasvarūpaparyālocanayā teṣāmupādeyatvaśaṅkā
navilakṣaṇatvādhikaraṇa <ref>(bra॰ 2—1—4.)</ref> mārabhya nirākṛtā । evamādyādhikaraṇayostṛ-
tīyādīnāṃ navānāmadhikaraṇānāṃ cāvāṃtarārthabhede'pi brahmavādapratikṣepakatarkanirākaraṇārtha-
tvenaikārthyam । asminpāde tu śuṣkatarkāvalambanāssāṃkhyādiparapakṣāstathābhūtaireva tarkairdū-
ṣyante । anyathā parapakṣāṇāmapratiṣṭhitatarkābhāsamūlatāmajānatāṃ mandadhiyāṃ teṣu prāmā-
ṇikatvaśaṅkyā brahmakāraṇavādaśraddhāśithilībhāvaprasaṅgāt । evaṃ svapakṣasthāpanārthaḥ prathama-
pādaḥ parapakṣapratikṣepārtho'yaṃ pāda iti pādabhedaḥ । svapakṣasthāpanamabhyarhitatvāt prathamaṃ
kṛtamiti tadānaṃtaryamasyeti bhāvaḥ । yadyapi tṛtīyacaturthayorapi kāryagocaraśrutivirodharū-
paparāpāditadūṣaṇaparihāreṇa svapakṣasthāpanaṃ kriyate । tathāpi kāraṇaviṣayatvena prathamadvitī-
yapādayossaṅgatiriti bhāvaḥ । prathamādhyāyagatairīkṣatyadhikaraṇādibhiḥ paunaruktyaśaṃkā
<quote>‘tarkāvalambanene’</quote>ti viśeṣaṇena nirastā । sāṃkhyādayaḥ svatantratarkaiḥ pradhānādikaṃ prasādhya
tatra bahubhavanasaṅkalpādivākyavirodho mā bhūditi tāni vākyāni svapakṣānuguṇyena vyāca-
kṣate <quote>‘īkṣitṛtvaṃ pradhānasya cidyogādupapadyate । aṃtaḥkaraṇavattasya karaṇatvādadoṣate’</quote> tyādi-
prakāreṇa । teṣāṃ tadvyākhyānanyāyānusāriṇā samyagvyākhyānena pūrvaṃ nirastamiha tu ye
svatantratarkaiḥ pradhānādikaṃ kalpayanti te tathābhūtaireva tarkāṃtarairnirasyanta iti na paunaruktya-
miti bhāvaḥ । brahmapārataṃtryeṇa pradhānasya kāraṇatvaṃ vedāntānumatamiti vaidikapakṣanediṣṭha-
ssāṃkhyānāmānumānikasvataṃtrapradhānakāraṇavādaḥ prathamādhikaraṇena nirākartavya iti tatprā-
<pb n="055"/>
lambena sāṃkhyādiparapakṣadūṣaṇaṃ kriyate । prathamaṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ pradhānakāraṇavādo
yukto na veti sandehaḥ । sendahabījaṃ sarvatra prasiddhamūhanīyam ।
pradhānakāraṇavāda eva yukta ityavagamyate । pradhānaṃ hi rajassattvatamorūpam ।
tadeva jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavitumarhati, sarvatra tatkāryasukhaduḥkhamohānvayadarśanāt ।
paṭādayo hyupalabdhāḥ prāvaraṇādihetutayā sukhātmakā bhavanti । anyāpahṛtā
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
thamyahetuṃ sūcayan saṃśayaṃ darśayati—<pratika>prathamamiti</pratika> । saṃśayabījaṃ tu kvacidapi viśiṣya nopa-
nyasanīyam । yadeva tatra pūrvapakṣasiddhāntayoryuktijātaṃ praseddha‍uṃ prakrāntaṃ tadeva balābalānava-
dhāraṇadaśāyāṃ tadbījamiti kvacidapi tadviśeṣayatno na kārya ityāha—<pratika>sandehabījamiti</pratika> ।
nanvanumānena mūlakāraṇakalpanāyāṃ paramāṇukāraṇavādamapahāya pradhānakāraṇavādāśrayaṇe kaḥ
pakṣapātaheturityāśaṅkya prapañcasya pradhānaikakāraṇamūlatvakalpanāyāṃ lāghavaṃ paricchinnasya
paramāṇorekasya sarvakāraṇatvāyogena tadbahutvakalpanāvaśyaṃbhāvāt gauravaṃ paricchinnasya
kāryatvaniyamena paramāṇorapi paricchinnatvena kāryatvāpattyā paricchinnatatkāraṇaparamparāka-
lpanādanavasthā cetyevaṃrūpaṃ pradhānakāraṇavāde pakṣapātahetuṃ <quote>‘paricchinnatvānna sarvopādāna’</quote>
mityādikāpilasūtroktaṃ sūcayanpūrvapakṣayati—<pratika>pradhāneti</pratika> । nanu saiddhāṃtike brahmakāraṇavāde'pi
kāraṇaikyalāghavādikamaviśiṣṭamityāśaṃkya nirguṇasya brahmaṇaḥ kāryānuguṇyaṃ nāstīti sūca-
yanpradhānasyaiva prapañcakāraṇatvena kalpanaṃ yuktamityāha—<pratika>pradhānaṃ hīti</pratika> । pradhānasya kāryā-
nuguṇyamupapādayati—<pratika>paṭādayo hīti</pratika> । paṭo yena prāpyate taṃ prati sattvaguṇodbhavātpaṭassu-
khātmako bhavati yadīyasso'nyenāpahriyate taṃ prati rajoguṇodbhavādda‍uḥkhātmako bhavati, yasya
tasminnapekṣayā nirīkṣaṇābhāvāddarśanameva nodeti taṃ prati tamoguṇodbhavānmohātmako bhavati ।
<quote>‘muha vaicitya’</quote> iti dhātvarthānugamāt । paṭenānye'pi tāvadbhāvā vyākhyātāḥ । evaṃ sukha-
duḥkhamohātmakasya prapañcasya tathābhūtameva kāraṇaṃ kalpayituṃ yuktam । kāryakāraṇayordravyayo-
rabhedena kāraṇasyātathātve kāryasya tathātvāyogāt । atastriguṇātmakaṃ pradhānaṃ tatkāraṇaṃ
kalpayituṃ yuktam । sattvarajastamoguṇarūpāstrayo guṇā hi sukhaduḥkhamohātmakāḥ । yathāhuḥ---
<quote>‘prītyaprītiviṣādātmakāḥ prakāśapravṛttiniyamārthāḥ । anyonyābhibhavāśrayajananamithuna-
vṛttayaśca guṇāḥ ।। sattvaṃ laghu prakāśakamiṣṭamupaṣṭambhakaṃ calaṃ ca rajaḥ । guru varaṇakameva
tamaḥ pradīpavaccārthato vṛttiḥ ।।’</quote> iti । ayamarthaḥ—guṇāḥ satvarajastamāṃsi prītyaprītivi-
ṣādātmakāḥ kramātsukhaduḥkhamohātmānaḥ kramādeva prakāśapravṛttiniyamaprayojanāḥ । puṃsaśca
satvaṃ prakāśayati । prakāśanakārye sattvaṃ pravarttayati rajoguṇaḥ । laghoḥ satvaguṇasya rajasā sarvatra
pravarttane prasakte gurutamoguṇo niyacchati । tataśca tamoniruddhaṃ rajaḥ sakṛdeva pravartata iti
tena kvacideva pravartitaṃ satvaṃ kiṃcideva prakāśayati । ato na sarvaṃ sarvadā sarvasya prakā-
śata iti vyavasthā । evaṃ guṇānāṃ svarūpaṃ prayojanañcoktam । teṣāṃ vyāpāra ucyate—<quote>‘anyo-
nyābhibhavāśrayajananamithunavṛttayaśca’</quote> । vṛttirvyāpāraḥ pratyekamabhibhavādibhissambadhyate ।
<quote>‘anyonyābhibhavavṛttayaśca guṇāḥ’</quote> eṣāmanyatamenārthavaśādudbha‍ūtenānyadabhibhūyate । tathā
hi—sattvaṃ rajastamasī abhibhūya śāntāmātmano vṛttiṃ pratilabhate । evaṃ rajaḥ satvatamasī
abhibhūya ghorāṃ svapravṛttiṃ tathā tamaḥ satvarajasī abhibhūya mūḍhāṃ svapravṛttimiti ।
<pb n="056"/>
duḥkhātmakā bhavanti । kāryābhāvādupekṣitā mohātmakāḥ । tadevaṃ sukhādyanva-
yāt triguṇameva pradhānaṃ jagatkāraṇam ।।
iti prāpte'bhidhīyate—na pradhānaṃ jagatkāraṇam, acetanatvāt ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<quote>‘anyonyāśrayavṛttayaśca guṇāḥ’</quote> । yadapekṣayā yasya vyāpāro bhavati sa tasyāśrayo vivakṣitaḥ ।
<quote>‘anyonyajananavṛttayaśca guṇāḥ’</quote> । anyatamenānyatamo janyate । jananamatra pariṇāma-
viśeṣaḥ । <quote>‘anyonyamithunavṛttayaśca anyonyasahacarāḥ avinābhūtā ityarthaḥ । ‘anyo-
nyamithunāssarve sarve sarvatra gāminaḥ । naiṣāmādissamprayogo viyogo vopalabhyata’</quote> iti hi
tadāgamaḥ । satvaṃ laghu prakāśakamiṣṭaṃ sāṃkhyācāryāṇām । tatrānalapavanādīnāmūrdhvajvala-
natiryakpavanādiheturdharmo lāghavam । sattvatamasī rajasā svakāryonmukhe kāryete ityetadra-
jasa upaṣṭambhakatvaṃ tadupapādakaṃ ca calamiti । rajaḥ sakriyamakriyayoḥ sattvatamasoḥ kāryo-
nmukhāvasthāpādakamiti calaviśeṣaṇena darśitam । tamastu guru । ata eva svayaṃ cañcalatayā
laghusatvamapi cālayadrajo guruṇā tamasā tatratatra pravṛttipratibaṃdhakena kvacideva pravṛttima-
tkriyata iti varaṇakaṃ niyāmakaṃ ca tasaḥ । parasparavirodhināmapyeṣāmekakāryakaratvamucyate ।
<quote>‘pradīpavaccārthato vṛttiḥ’</quote> yathā varttitaile pāvakaviruddhe api milite saha pāvakena rūpaprakā-
śanakāryaṃ kurutaḥ evaṃ satvarajastamāṃsi parasparaviruddhānyapyarthavaśāt saha kāryaṃ kurvanti ।
<quote>‘puruṣārtha eva hetuḥ na kenacitkāryate karaṇa’</quote> miti puruṣārthavaśādeva prakṛtipravṛtterabhyupaga-
māditi । evaṃ jagatastraiguṇyopapādanenānumānatastriguṇātmakapradhānasiddhiṃ sūcayanpūrvapakṣa-
mupasaṃharati—<pratika>tadevamiti</pratika> । idamihānumānamabhisaṃhitam । kāryaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakavastu-
prakṛtikaṃ tatsamanvitatvāt, sāmānyavyāptau mṛddravyasamanvitaghaṭaśarāvādivaditi । yadvā । sarvaṃ
kāryaṃ samaprakṛtikaṃ kāryatvāt viśeṣavyāptau ghaṭavat iti । lāghavādekaprakṛtikatvaṃ sidhyatīti
na paramāṇudvyaṇukādiprakṛtikatvenārthāṃtaraṃ nāpi siddhāṃtyabhimatabrahmaprakṛtikatvenārthāṃtaram ।
jaḍaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ kāryaṃ pratyatathābhūtasya prakṛtitvena siddhyanavakāśāt । na cāce-
tanasya cetanādhiṣṭhānābhāve kāryajanane svayameva pravṛttyanupapatterlāghavāt sarvajagatkartṛtvena
parameśvarasiddha‍yavaśyaṃbhāve tasyaiva sarvaśaktimattvena vilakṣaṇaṃ prapañcaṃ pratyupādānatvasyāpyupapa-
tterna tadvyatiriktaṃ pradhānaṃ tatprakṛtitvena siddha‍yatīti śaṃkanīyam । acetanasyāpi cetanānāṃ
bhogāpavargahetorvinā'pi cetanādhiṣṭhānaṃ svayameva pravṛttyupapatteḥ । vatsavivṛddhihetoḥ kṣīrasya
svayameva prasravaṇadarśanāt jaladamuktasya jalasya sasyavivṛddhihetoḥ svayaṃ nissaraṇadarśanācca,
kṣīrajalayordadhimauktikakarakādibhāvena svayameva pariṇatidarśanācca, bandhamokṣavataḥ puruṣasyaiva
cetanasya nirvyāpārasyā'pi sannidhānamātreṇāṃcetanapradhānapravartakatvopapatteśca, svayaṃ pravṛtti-
śaktirahitasya dṛkśaktimataḥ paṅgoḥ pravṛttiśaktimaṃtaṃ dṛkśaktirahitamandhaṃ prati pravartakatvadarśa-
nāt, ayaskāntamaṇeḥ sannidhānamātreṇāyaḥpravartakatvadarśanācca, ityevaṃ pūrvapakṣe prāpte sautra-
manumānapadaṃ karmaṇivyutpattau pradhānarūpapakṣanirdeśakaṃ neti padaṃ niṣedhyādhyāhāreṇa sādhya-
nirdeśakaṃ ca parigṛhya hetvadhyāhāreṇa svatantrapradhānakāraṇatvasādhakānumānasya bādhakamanu-
mānaṃ sūtrābhipretaṃ darśayan siddhāṃtayati—<pratika>na pradhānamiti</pratika> । <quote>‘pradhānakṣetrajñapatirguṇeśa’</quote> iti
śrutisiddhasya pradhānasya siddhāṃte aṃgīkṛtatvānnāśrayāsiddhiḥ । na ca tathāpyānumānikaṃ
<pb n="057"/>
tathā hi---dārvāderacetanasya rathaprāsādādiṣu tajjñānadhiṣṭhitasya racanānupapattirdṛ-
śyate । tajjñādhiṣṭhitasya racanāpravṛttiśca dṛśyate । ataścetanānadhiṣṭhitaṃ pradhānaṃ jaga-
tkāraṇaṃ bhavituṃ nārhati । yaduktaṃ sukhādyanvayāditi, tadasat । sukhādīnāmā-
ntaratvāt, paṭādīnāṃ bāhyatvāt । ataḥ pradhānakāraṇavādo na yuktaḥ ।।
āśaṅkya pariharati—
<sutra>।। sū ।। payo'mbuvaccettatrāpi ।। 2 ।।</sutra>
yathā payo'mbu dadhyādikarakādibhāve'dhiṣṭhānānapekṣaṃ, tadvatpradhānamapīti cet-
na । tatrāpyukta eva hetuḥ । tasyāpyacetanatvena pakṣīkṛtatvāt ।।
kiñca--- <sutra>।। sū ।। vyatirekānavasthiteścānapekṣatvāt ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
yadi prājñādhiṣṭhānānapekṣatvamacetanasya pravṛttau tadā sarvadā sṛṣṭiprasaṅgena tadvya-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
svataṃtrapradhānaṃ siddhāṃte nābhyupagatamiti sautrānumānapadanirdiṣṭapakṣāsiddhiśśaṃkanīyā ।
sāṃkhyānāmanumānaṃ sādhakaṃ cedapi pradhānamātraṃ sādhayituṃ kṣamate na tadgataṃ svātaṃtryamapi
sādhyānupraveśābhāvādityāśayena pakṣasyānumānapadena nirdeśāt । <quote>‘na jagatkāraṇa’</quote>miti sādhyasya
cetanādhiṣṭhānamanapekṣya svātaṃtryeṇa jagatkāraṇaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ । tathaivāgrimagraṃthapravṛtteḥ । <quote>‘raca-
nānupapatte’</quote>riti sūtrapadagṛhītāṃ vyāptiṃ sadṛṣṭāṃtaṃ darśayati—<pratika>tathā hīti ।</pratika> <quote>‘pravṛtte’</quote> riti
sūtrapadagṛhītaṃ tadanugrāhakaṃ tarkaṃ darśayati—<pratika>tajjñādhiṣṭhitasyeti</pratika> । acetanakāraṇatvāvacchedena
cetanādhiṣṭhānāpekṣā dṛṣṭeti kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahamūlānukūlatarkasahakṛtatvādidamanumānaṃ prabala-
miti bhāvaḥ । cakāreṇa pradhānānumānasya tatsvātaṃtryaparyaṃtasādhane'nukūlatarkābhāvassamuccī-
yate । ādyacakāreṇa samuccitāṃ hetvasiddhimupapādayituṃ sāṃkhyoktaṃ hetusiddhiprakāramanuva-
dati—<pratika>yaduktamiti । sukhādīnāmāṃtaratvāditi ।</pratika> paṭaprāptiharaṇābhyāṃ tatsvāminassukhaduḥ-
khe jāyete । tadupekṣakasya tadajñānamanuvartate । ityetāvadanubhavasiddham । na tu tadviṣayasya
sukhādyātmatvam । paṭassukhamityanubhavābhāvāt <quote>‘ahaṃ sukhī’</quote> tyādirūpasyaivānubhavasyodayācca ।
na ca viṣayasya sukhādirūpatvābhāve tajjñānādāntarasukhodayo na syāditi vācyam । viṣaya-
syecchādirūpatvābhāve'pi tajjñānādicchādveṣaprayatnodayavattadudayasyāpyupapatteḥ sukhajñānādi-
kāryavaśāt sukhaduḥkhamohātmatvavallāghavādikāryavaśādanyātmatvasyāpi kalpanāprasaṅgena traigu-
ṇyavyavasthābhaṃgaprasaṃgācca । na caṃ sukhalāghavaprakāśānāṃ duḥkhopaṣṭaṃbhapravarttanānāṃ mohagauravāva-
raṇānāṃ ca ekaikaguṇasaṃbaṃdhitvakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇamasti । yena traiguṇyavyavasthābhaṃgo na syāt ।
tathā sati sukhaduḥkhamohānāmapyekaguṇasaṃbaṃdhitvakalpanopapatteḥ virodhasya ca pratiyogibhedena
kālabhedena ca supariharatvāt pareṇāpi sukhādirūpodbhave tadbhedasyaiva śaraṇīkaraṇīyatvācceti
bhāvaḥ । evaṃ prabalānumānabādhitasya pradhānānumānasyānutthānāt sāṃkhyapakṣo na yukta i-
tyāha—<pratika>ata iti । āśaṃkyeti ।</pratika> payoṃ'bunorvyabhicāramāśaṃkyetyarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। payoṃ'buva-
ccettatrāpi ।। 2 ।।</pratika> <pratika>pakṣīkṛtatvāditi</pratika> । acetanatvahetunā tatrāpi pradhāna iva cetanādhi-
ṣṭhānasiddhisaṃbhavena pakṣasamatvāt pakṣe pakṣatulye vā vyabhicārābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। vyati-
rekānavasthiteścānapekṣatvāt ।। 3 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘pravṛtte’</quote>riti prathamasūtrāṃśena svataṃtrapradhānānumāna-
<pb n="058"/>
tirekasya pralayasyānavasthitiḥ prasajyeta । tato nācetanaṃ jagatkāraṇam ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
bādhakānumānasya vyāptigrāhakastarkaḥ pradarśitaḥ । viṣayapariśodhakastarkastu anena pradarśyate ।
yadi parameśvarādhiṣṭhānānapekṣaṃ svataṃtraṃ pradhānaṃ svataṃtrameva jagatsṛṣṭau pravarteta tadānīmapekṣaṇīyānta-
rābhāvāt sarvadā sṛṣṭiprasaṃgena tadvyatirekasya sṛṣṭivirāmasya pralayasyānavasthitirasattvaṃ prasajye-
tetyato hetorna svatantraṃ pradhānaṃ kāraṇamiti ।। nanu, parameśvarādhiṣṭhānāpekṣatvapakṣe'pi tulyo'yaṃ
doṣaḥ । tadadhiṣṭhānasyāpi sadāsattvāt । dharmādharmasāpekṣaṃ parameśvarasya sṛṣṭyādikartṛtvaṃ tada-
bhāvādayaṃndoṣo na bhaviṣyatīti cet tarhi sāṃkhyapakṣe'pi tadabhāvādeva pralaye na sṛṣṭiriti
tulyaḥ parihāraḥ । na tulyaḥ । sāṃkhyapakṣe pradhānameva sṛṣṭyādikāraṇaṃ, dharmādharmau kevalaṃ para-
sparapratibaṃdhāpanayārthau । <quote>‘nimittamaprayojakaṃ prakṛtīnāṃ varaṇabhedastu tataḥ kṣaitrikava’</quote> diti
pātañjalasūtroktasya teṣāmapyabhimatatvāt । nimittaṃ dharmādharmarūpaṃ prakṛtīnāṃ mūlaprakṛtermaha-
dādyavāṃtaraprakṛtīnāṃ cāprayojakaṃ svasvakāryajanane sahakāri na bhavati kiṃtu varaṇasya prati-
baṃdhakasya bhedo bhaṅgastato nimittādbhavati kṣaitrikavat । yathā hi kṣetrakārī kedārādapāṃ pūrṇāt
kedārāṃtaraṃ samaṃ nimnaṃ vā piplāvayiṣuḥ kevalaṃ varaṇaṃ tāsāṃ bhinatti bhinne tasminnāpaḥ svaya-
meva kedārāṃtaraṃ plāvayaṃtīti pātañjalasūtreṇoktamiti cet, kiṃ tataḥ । dharmādharmayossahakā-
ritvaṃ pratibandhakanirāsārthatvaṃ vāstu । tadapekṣā pakṣadvaye'pi tulyaiva । sāṃkhyapakṣe pralaye'pi
dharmādharmau vartete iti cet, kiṃ siddhāṃtapakṣe tau na vartete ? tathā sati hyagre tatsāpekṣā pārame-
śvarī sṛṣṭirna pravarteta । tathā'pi pārameśvarasya sṛṣṭisaṅkalpasya kādācitkatvena tadvirāmo
bhaviṣyatīti cenna । tatsaṅkalpasya sṛṣṭihetudharmādharmānusāritve satostayostadabhāvāyogāt
tadananusāreṇaiva kadācitsaṅkalpaḥ kadācinnetyaṃgīkāre dharmādharmayoḥ sṛṣṭyaunmukhyadaśāyāmapi
kadācittadasaṅkalpaḥ tadanaunmukhyadaśāyāmapi tatsaṅkalpa iti tatsāpekṣatvabhaṃgaprasaṃgāt keva-
lalīlayā saṅkalpasyāniyatakālatvena sṛṣṭipralayayoḥ kālavyavasthābhaṅgaprasaṅgācca । etena
yādṛcchikatṛṇacchedādipravṛttivannimittānapekṣā tasya sṛṣṭyādipravṛttirityapi nirastam । svabhāva-
viśeṣāt kālavyavasthayā parameśvarassṛjati saṃharati ceti cettathaiva pradhānamapītyastu । yadyucyeta
niraṃtaramanaṃtaramanaṃtaśarīrādijananenāpacitaśaktikaṃ pradhānaṃ kākavandhyānyāyena kadācitpra-
sotumakṣamamāste yathā niraṃtaralekhanakuṇṭhitalekhanasāmarthyā lekhinī kadācillikhitumaprabhava-
ntyavatiṣṭhate punaḥ pākākhyaṃ pariṇativiśeṣaṃ prāptaṃ tadyathāpūrvaṃ prasūte । dharmādharmayorapyeṣaiva
rītiḥ । avaśyaṃ ca dharmādharmayoravasthāviśeṣaḥ pākākhyo'bhyupagantavyaḥ । yāgahiṃsādibhirdha-
rmādharmotpattyanantarameva svarganarakānubhavādarśanāt । na cānaṃtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ viruddhaphalānāṃ yugapa-
tsvasvaphalānubhāvakatvāsaṃbhavena yathādarśanaṃ parasparapratibaddhyapratibandhakabhāvaḥ kalpanīya
iti kasmāccitpratibandhādeva tayoḥ kañcitkālaṃ phalajanakatvābhāvaḥ na tu pākākhyapariṇati-
viśeṣābhāvāditi vācyam । dharmādharmayorutpattiprabhṛti phalajananasāmarthyābhivyaktisadbhāve
svasvaphalabhogocitānekaśarīrasaṃpādanena svasvaphalabhojayitṛtvasyāviruddhatayā pratibaddhya-
pratibandhakabhāvasthākalpanīyatvādabhivyaktasāmarthyayordharmādharmayoḥ svarganarakādisukhaduḥkha-
vattaducitaśarīraviṣayādāvapi janakatvasya sarvasampratipannatvāditi । śakyaṃ vaktu-
midaṃ svataṃtrapradhānapakṣe'pi । na ca pākākhyaḥ pariṇativiśeṣaḥ cetanādhiṣṭhānaṃ vinā na
<pb n="059"/>
<sutra>।। sū ।। anyatrābhāvācca na tṛṇādivat ।। 4 ।।</sutra>
kṣīrāyamāṇadhenūpayuktatṛṇādivadacetanamapi pradhānaṃ kāraṇamiti vaktuṃ na yuktam ।
anaḍudādyupayukte kenāpyanupayukte ca tṛṇādau kṣīrapariṇāmābhāvāt tadapi prājñā-
dhiṣṭhitameva ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। puruṣāśmavaditi cettathāpi ।। 5 ।।</sutra>
acetanamapi pradhānaṃ praruṣasannidhānāt pravartayati, yathā paṅgurandhaṃ yathā vā-
yaskāntamaṇirayaḥ, tato na prājñāpekṣeti cet—tathāpi na pradhānasya pravṛttiḥ saṃbha-
vati । puruṣasyāvikṛtatvāt । paṃgvaśmādermārgopadeśāyassannihitadeśāntaraprāptyā-
diḥ kaścidvikāro bhavatyeva । tasmādavikṛtapuruṣasannidhiḥ pradhānapravṛttau na hetuḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। aṅgitvānupapatteśca ।। 6 ।।</sutra>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
saṃbhavatīti śaṃkyam । dhenūpayuktasya tṛṇādestajjāṭharāgnisaṃparkādhīne pāke cetanādhiṣṭhānābhā-
vāt । na hi dhenuḥ kṣīratāpattisaṅkalpapūrvakaṃ bhakṣitaṃ tṛṇādikaṃ jāṭharāgninā saṃyojya pāca-
yati । ataḥ svayameva jāṭharāgnikṛtatṛṇādipākavatkālaviśeṣakṛtaḥ pradhānasya karmaṇāṃ ca
pāko bhaviṣyati । tasmādīśvarādhiṣṭhitapradhānapakṣe svatantrapradhānapakṣe ca tulyo'sya doṣasya
parihāra ityāśaṃkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>anyatrābhāvācca na tṛṇādivat ।। 4 ।।</pratika> <pratika>ace-
tanamapi pradhānaṃ kāraṇamiti ।</pratika> cetanādhiṣṭhānarahitamapi pradhānaṃ kālaviśeṣamāsādya svaya-
meva pakvaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ । tṛṇādidṛṣṭāṃtaṃ nānumanyāmahe yatastatrāpi prājñādhiṣṭhānamaṃgīkurmahe ।
tvayāpi na tṛṇādimātrasya kṣīratāpattihetupākaviśeṣakāraṇatvamabhyupagantuṃ śakyate । kenā-
pyanupayukte tṛṇe tadabhāvāt । nāpi jāṭharāgnisaṃyuktasya tadabhyupagaṃtuṃ śakyate । anaḍudādyu-
payukte tadabhāvāt । na ca dhenūnāṃ jāṭharāgnau pākaviśeṣahetuḥ kaścidviśeṣo'sti । kāryānusāreṇa
kalpyate cet sa viśeṣaścetanādhiṣṭhānarūpa eva kalpayituṃ yuktaḥ, vyaṃjanādiṣu pākavaicitryasya
tadadhīnatvenaiva dṛṣṭatvādityabhipretyāha—<pratika>anaḍudādīti</pratika> ।। nanu, tathāpi karmapradhānayoḥ pāke
vā jagajjanane vā parameśvarādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāpekṣyate nirvyāpārasyāpi jīvarūpasya puruṣasyaiva sanni-
dhānamātreṇa tatpravartakatvasaṃbhavāditi sadṛṣṭāṃtāśaṃkāṃ dṛṣṭāṃtāsampratipattyā nirākarttuṃ sūtram—
<pratika>puruṣāśmavaditi cettathāpi ।। 5 ।।</pratika> tathāpītyasya śeṣamadhyāharati—<pratika>na pradhānasyeti ।।</pratika>
vyatirekānavasthitisūtreṇa svataṃtrapradhānakāraṇavāde pralayānupapattidoṣa uktaḥ । tadupapādaka-
tvena tadanaṃtarasūtradvayaṃ pravṛttam । tatredamāśaṃkyate । sāṃkhyamate satvarajastamasāmanyonyagu-
ṇapradhānabhāvamutsṛjya sāmyena yadavasthānaṃ sa pralayassaiva pradhānāvasthā । teṣāmutkarṣāpakarṣā-
tmakavaiṣamyarūpeṇāṃgāṃgibhāvena yadavasthānaṃ sā sṛṣṭissaiva vikārāvasthā । evañca sati jaga-
tkāraṇatvena sṛṣṭipūrvavartitayānumīyamānaṃ triguṇaṃ guṇasāmyāvasthātmakapradhānarūpeṇānume-
yamiti dharmigrāhakamānasiddhasāmyāvasthārūpaḥ pralayo na nirasituṃ śakyata iti tannirāka-
raṇārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>aṃgitvānupapatteśca</pratika> ।। 6 ।। tathā sati guṇasāmyāvasthaṃ pradhānaṃ kṣobhakace-
tanavyāpārābhāvāt svayameva guṇavaiṣamyāvasthāṃ prāptuṃ na kṣamate ataḥ sṛṣṭyanupapattiriti
dūṣaṇārthaḥ ।। yadi sukhaduḥkhamohātmakavaiṣamyāvasthaṃ jagadda‍ṛṣṭvā tadavasthāpannameva triguṇamanumīyate
<pb n="060"/>
guṇānāmutkarṣāpakarṣabhāvo'ṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ । tato jagatpravṛttirucyate sāṃkhyaiḥ ।
pratisargāvasthāyāṃ sāmyāvasthānāṃ guṇānāṃ vaiṣamyābhāvāt tatkṛtāṅgāṅgibhāvā-
nupapattiḥ । ataśca jagadārambho na yujyate pradhānakāraṇavāde ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। anyathānumitau ca jñaśaktiviyogāt ।। 7 ।।</sutra>
uktaprakārādanyaprakāreṇa pradhāne'numīyamāne'pi jñātṛtvaśaktiviyogādracanā-
nupapattistadavasthaiva ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। abhyupagame'pyarthābhāvāt ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
pradhānasyābhyupagame yadi prayojanaṃ, tadā yathākathaṃcidabhyupagacchāmaḥ । na
kimapi prayojanamasti । yataḥ puruṣasya nirvikāratvāt pradhānadarśanādirūpavikā-
rāsaṃbhavaḥ । ata eva prakṛtidharmādhyāsanimitto bhogaḥ tadvivekānusandhānakṛtaṃ
kaivalyaṃ ca na saṃbhavati । ataḥ prayojanābhāvātpradhānaṃ na svīkāryam ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tadā dharmigrāhakamānasiddhavaiṣamyāvasthāyā eva sadānuvṛttiḥ । pūrvoktadūṣaṇāvartanārtha-
ścakāraḥ । syādetat । triguṇaṃ na sāmyāvasthamanumīyate । nāpi vaiṣamyāvastham ।
kiṃtvanādisṛṣṭipralayapravāhamūladvividhasaṃskārānuvṛttisadbhāvāttattatsaṃskārodbodhānusārataḥ pa-
ryāyeṇa sāmyavaiṣamyabhāgubhayasvabhāvamanumīyate । na cāvyavahitasaṃskārasyaiva prabalasya
kāryakaratvāt sāmyavaiṣamyayoḥ paryāyabhavanānupapattiḥ । manuṣyajanmatastirvagjanmaprāptau vyava-
hitasaṃskārasyaiva kāryakaratvadarśanāt, ato na sṛṣṭernāpi pralayasyānupapattirityāśaṃkā-
nirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>anyathānumitau ca jñaśaktiviyogāt ।। 7 ।। racanānupapa-
ttiriti</pratika> । sautreṇa cakāreṇa jñātṛtvaśaktirāhityātpradhānasya jagadracayitṛtva ivādṛṣṭasaṃskā-
rayostatsāmyavaiṣamyāpādakatve'pyanupapattistadavastheti samuccīyate ।। evaṃ sāṃkhyābhimatasvata-
ntrapradhāne pramāṇaṃ nirastamatha tadabhimataṃ, tatprayojanaṃ nirasituṃ sūtram—<pratika>abhyupagame'pyarthā-
bhāvāt ।। 8 ।।</pratika> puruṣasya bhogāpavargau pradhānasya prayojanamiti sāṃkhyāḥ । yadāhuḥ—<quote>‘puruṣasya
darśanārthaṃ kaivalyārthaṃ tathā pradhānasya । paṃgvandhavadubhayorapi saṃyogastatkṛtassargaḥ ।।’</quote> iti ।
pradhānakarmakaṃ savikārapradhānaviṣayaṃ puruṣasya yaddarśanaṃ bhogarūpaṃ tadarthaṃ puruṣasya kaivalyārthañca
parasparāpekṣayoḥ pradhānapuruṣayoḥ paṃgvaṃdhavatsaṃyogaḥ tatkṛto mahadādiprapañcasarga ityarthaḥ ।
apavargaḥ pradhānasya prayojanemityetatprapaṃcena varṇayanti—<quote>‘vatsavivṛddhinimittaṃ kṣīrasya yathā
pravṛttirajñasya । puruṣavimokṣanimittaṃ tathā pravṛttiḥ pradhānasya । autsukyanivṛttyarthaṃ yathā
kriyāsu pravartate lokaḥ । puruṣasya vimokṣārthaṃ pravarttate tadvadavyaktam । nānāvidhairupāyairupakāri-
ṇyanupakāriṇaḥ puṃsaḥ । guṇavatyaguṇasya satastasyārthamapārthakañcarati’</quote> ।। iti । idaṃ dvividhamapi
prayojanaṃ nopapadyate ityāha—<pratika>yataḥ puruṣasyeti</pratika> । idamatra sāṃkhyānāṃ darśanam—puruṣaḥ caitanya-
mātravapuḥ kūṭastho nirvikāro nityamuktaḥ । ataḥ sāṃsārikasukhaduḥkhānubhavarūpabhogo na tasya
dharmaḥ । kiṃ tu pariṇāminyā buddherdharmaḥ । puruṣasya tu buddhicchāyāpattyā tadaikyamivāpannasya taddarśanaṃ
bhogaḥ । tena tasya vivekāgrahādādhyāsikaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ vivekakhyātyā bhoktṛtvādhyāsamātranivṛtti-
rmokṣaḥ । vastutaḥ puruṣo na baddho nāpi mokṣyate । mokṣopāyavidhayo'pi na svābhāvikabandha-
nivṛttyarthāḥ iti । tadetat <quote>‘na nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasya tadyogaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘tadyogādṛte na svabhā-
<pb n="061"/>
<sutra>।। sū ।। vipratiṣedhāccāsamañjasam ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
puruṣasya draṣṭṛtvabhoktṛtvanirvikāra tvādiviruddhadharmasahastrābhyupagamaśca dṛśyate ।
ato'pyasamañjasameva kāpilaṃ matam ।। iti racanānupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vato baddhasya mokṣasādhanopadeśaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘svabhāvanāśāt svarūpanāśaprasaṃgāt’</quote> ityādikāpilasū-
traiḥ<quote>‘vastusthityā na bandho'sti tadabhāvānna muktatā । vikalpaghaṭitāvetāvubhāvapi na kiñcana ।
ātmano na hi bandho'sti vastuto nirguṇatvataḥ । avivekādbandha iva tannāśaḥ śāstrato
bhavet’</quote> ।। <quote>‘tasmānna badhyate'ddhā na mucyate nāpi saṃsarati kaścit । saṃsarati badhyate mucyate ca
nānāśrayā prakṛti’</quote> rityādibhistadāgamavṛddhavacanaiśca pratipannam । tadetannopapadyate । bhogāśraya-
buddhyaikyadarśanarūpasya bhogasya tadvivekānusaṃdhānarūpasya mokṣajanakajñānasya ca puruṣe nirvi-
kāracaitanyātmanyudayāsaṃbhavāt । na ca tadapyubhayaṃ buddhidharma eveti vācyam । tāvatā
tasyādhyāsikasyāpi bhoktṛtvasyānirvāhāt mokṣopāyatvānirvāhācca । tasmātprayojanābhāvā-
dapi svataṃtraṃ pradhānaṃ na svīkaraṇīyamiti bhāvaḥ ।। syādetat । puruṣasya bhoktṛtvaṃ mokṣopāya-
vivekakhyātyarthaśravaṇādipravṛttimattvañca sāṃkhyaireva bhoktṛtvamokṣārthapravṛttibhyāmacetaneṣu buddhyā-
diṣvasaṃbhāvitābhyāṃ tadatiriktaṃ puruṣaṃ sādhayadbhirabhyupagatam । yadāhuḥ <quote>‘saṃghātaparārthatvāt
triguṇādiviparyayādadhiṣṭhānāt । puruṣo'sti bhoktṛbhāvātkaivalyārthapravṛtteśce’</quote>ti । ato na
prayojanaṃ pradhānābhyupagama ityāśaṃkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>vipratiṣedhāccāsamañjasam ।। 9 ।।
puruṣasyeti ।</pratika> itthaṃ puruṣasya draṣṭṛtvabhoktṛtvādikamabhyupagacchaṃta eva tasya nirvikāratvani-
tyamuktatvādikamapyabhyupagacchaṃtīti parasparaviruddhābhyupagamādasamañjasameva sāṃkhyamatam । na
hyadvaitavādibhiriva tairāvidyakaṃ draṣṭṛtvādikaṃ tātvikanirvikāratvādyavirodhīti samarthayituṃ
śakyamiti bhāvaḥ ।। <pratika>iti racanānupapattyadhikaraṇam</pratika> ।। 1 ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha dvitīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।</head>
<head>atha racanānupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। racanānupapatteśca nānumānaṃ pravṛtteśca ।। 1 ।। payo'mbuvaccettatrāpi ।। 2 ।। vyatirekānavasthite
ścānapekṣatvāt ।। 3 ।।। anyatrābhāvācca na tṛṇādivat ।। 4 ।। puruṣāśmavaditi cettathāpi ।। 5 ।। aṅgi-
tvānupapatteśca ।। 6 ।। anyathānumitau ca /?/śaśaktiviyogāt ।। 7 ।। abhyupagame'pyarthābhāvāt ।। 8 ।।
vipratiṣedhāccāsamañjasam ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>triguṇaṃ pradhānamasyopapadyate kāraṇaṃ jagataḥ । sarvatrānvayadṛṣṭeḥ kārye sukhaduḥkhamohānām ।। 109 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>iha cetanānadhiṣṭhitamacetanaṃ kvāpi na kurute kāryam । antaratayā sukhādarasti na kāryeṣu tadanugatiḥ ।। 110 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti racanānupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>śivābhyāṃ namaḥ ।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha dvitīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha racanānupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। racanānupapatteśca nānumānaṃ pravṛtteśca ।। 1 ।। payoṃ'buvaccettatrāpi ।। 2 ।। vyatirekānavasthiteścānapekṣa-
tvāt ।। 3 ।। anyatrābhāvācca na tṛṇādivat ।। 4 ।। puruṣāśmavaditi cettathāpi ।। 5 ।। aṅgitvānupapatteśca ।। 6 ।।
anyathānumitau ca śaśaktiviyogāt ।। 7 ।। abhyupagame'pyarthābhāvāt ।। 8 ।। vipratiṣedhāccāsamañjasam ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
<pb n="062"/>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, itthaṃ mumukṣoḥ samyagjñānotpādake vedāntasamanvaye parakalpitadoṣanirākaraṇena svapakṣaṃ pratiṣṭhāpyādhunā
parapakṣadūṣaṇāya pādāntaramārabhate । pūrvapādānte <quote>‘sarvadharmopapatteśce’</quote>tyanena brahmaṇi kāraṇadharmāṇāmupapattiruktā । teṣāṃ pradhāna
evopapattiḥ kiṃ na syādityākṣepasaṃgatyedamadhikaraṇamārabhyate---<pratika>racanānupapatterityādi ।</pratika> asminmate ādyaṃ sūtraṃ <quote>‘pravṛ-
tteśce’</quote>ti yogavibhāgena sūtradvayātmakam । acetanaṃ pradhānaṃ jagadupādānamiti sāṃkhyasiddhānto'tra viṣayaḥ । sa kiṃ pramāṇamūla
uta bhrāntimūla iti saṃdehe jagat sukhaduḥkhamohātmakavastūpādānakaṃ tadanvitatvāt mṛdanvitaghaṭādivat ityanumānena yatsu-
khādyātmakaṃ siddhaṃ tadeva triguṇātmakaṃ pradhānam । ataḥ prāmāṇikassāṃkhyasiddhānta iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, ānu-
mānam=</pratika>anumānasiddhaṃ pradhānam । <pratika>na</pratika>=jagadupādānaṃ na bhavati । kutaḥ । <pratika>racanānupapatteśca</pratika>=loke vicitraprāsādādiraca-
nāyā buddhikuśalaśilpyādikāryatvadarśanena acetanāt straṣṭavyajñānaśūnyātpradhānāt anekavidhavicitrajagadracanānupapatteḥ, sukhā-
dīnāmāṃtaratvapratipatterjagatastadanvitatvāsaṃbhaveta svarūpāsiddheśca । tasmānna prāmāṇikassāṃkhyasiddhānta iti ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। pravṛtteśca ।। 2 ।।</pratika> acetanarathādipravṛtterloke cetanādhīnatvadarśanāt cetanapreraṇamantareṇānupapannāyāḥ pradhānasya
sāmyāvasthāpracyutirūpapravṛtterabhyupagamācca na pradhānakāraṇavādaḥ prāmāṇikaḥ । iti ।।</p>
<p>anyatra vyabhicāramāśaṃkya pariharati—<pratika>sū ।। payoṃ'buvaccettatrāpi ।। 3 ।। payoṃ'buvat</pratika>=yathā acetanaṃ kṣīraṃ vatsa-
vivṛddhaye svayameva pravartate yathā vā jalaṃ svayameva syandate tadvat pradhānamapi svayameva pravartata iti <pratika>cet tatrāpi</pratika> <quote>‘yo'psu
tiṣṭha’</quote>nnityādinā parameśvaraḥ prerakaḥ śrūyate । tathā ca payoṃ'bunoḥ pakṣatvānna vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। vyatirekānavasthiteścānapekṣatvāt ।। 4 ।।</pratika> sāmyenāvasthitā guṇāḥ pradhānamiti sāṃkhyamate <pratika>vyatirekāna-
vasthiteḥ</pratika>=pradhānavyatirekeṇa sahakāryantarasyānavasthiteḥ । <pratika>anapekṣatvācca</pratika>=puruṣasyāsaṃgodāsīnatvena pravṛttau nivṛttau vā
anapekṣatvābhyupagamāccetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu sahakāryabhāve'pi acetanasya pravṛttiranyatra dṛṣṭetyata āha—<pratika>sū ।। anyatrābhāvācca na tṛṇādivat ।। 5 ।।</pratika>
yathā <pratika>tṛṇādikaṃ</pratika> nimittāntaranirapekṣameva kṣīrākāreṇa pariṇamate <pratika>tadvat</pratika> pradhānamapīti cet <pratika>na</pratika> । kutaḥ <pratika>anyatra</pratika>=dhenvā-
deranyatra balīvardādau । <pratika>abhāvācca</pratika>=tṛṇādeḥ kṣīrabhāvasyābhāvāccetyarthaḥ । ato nācetanasya sahakāryantarānapekṣā pravṛtti-
riti siddham ।</p>
<p>pradhānasya svataḥ pravṛttimabhyupetyāpi dūṣayati—<pratika>sū ।। abhyupagame'pyarthābhāvāt ।। 6 ।। abhyupagame'pi</pratika>=pradhā-
nasya svataḥ pravṛttyabhyupagame'pi । <pratika>arthābhāvāt</pratika>=pradhānamacetanaṃ cetanasya puruṣārthaṃ sādhayitumeva pravartate iti svasiddhāṃta-
virodhena puruṣārthasyāpekṣābhāvaprasaṃgādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। puruṣāśmavaditi cettathāpi ।। 7 ।। puruṣāśmavat</pratika>=loke yathā paṃguḥ puruṣaḥ svayamapravartamāno'pyaṃdhaṃ
pravartayati yathā ayaskāṃtaśilā saṃnidhimātreṇāyaḥ pravartayati tadvat puruṣaḥ pradhānasya pravartaka <pratika>iti cet tathāpi</pratika> pradhā-
nasya puruṣapreryatve svātantryābhyupagamavirodhaḥ puruṣasya pravartakatve kauṭasthyahānirityādidoṣaprasaṃgaḥ । brahmaṇastvāvidyakaṃ pravarta-
katvamiti na kauṭasthyahāniḥ ।।</p>
<p>apica <pratika>।। sū ।। aṅgitvānupapatteśca ।। 8 ।।</pratika> guṇatrayasāmyāvasthā pradhānamiti sāṃkhyamate pradhānasya kūṭasthatvābhyu-
pagame guṇānāṃ sāmyāvasthāpracyutyabhāvena parasparānapekṣatayā aṅgāṅgibhāvānupapatteḥ kāryānutpattiprasaṃgaḥ । vikāritvābhyupagame
ca svato vikāritve sadākāryaprasaṃgaḥ, parato vikāritve puruṣasyaudāsīnyabhaṃgaprasaṃgaḥ ityataḥ pracyutyabhāvena aṅgāṅgibhāvānupa-
patteḥ kāryābhāvaprasaṃga ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। anyathānumitau ca jñaśaktiviyogāt ।। 9 ।। guṇā anapekṣasvabhāvāḥ kūṭasthāśca nānumīyaṃte api tu
kāryotpattyānuguṇyenānyonyāpekṣā eva । evaṃmanumitau na prāguktadoṣaprasaktiriti cet na । jñaśaktiviyogāt</pratika>=guṇānāṃ
jñānaśaktirāhityādityarthaḥ । ataḥ svataḥpracyutyabhāvenāṅgāṅgibhāvānupapatteḥ kāryānudayaprasaṃgastadavastha evetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। vipratiṣedhāccāsamañjasam ।। 10 ।। vipratiṣedhācca</pratika>=kvacinmahatastanmātrasṛṣṭiḥ kvacidahaṃkārāt kvacide-
kādaśendriyāṇi kvacitsapta kvacittrīṇyantaḥkaraṇāni kvacidekamityādipūrvottaravirodhavattvācca sāṃkhyamatamasamaṃjasamityarthaḥ ।
tasmātsāṃkhyasiddhānto bhrantimūla eveti siddham ।। <pratika><quote>‘abhyupagame'pyarthābhāvā’</quote></pratika>diti sūtrasyāsminmate <pratika><quote>‘anyatrābhāvācca
na tṛṇādiva’</quote></pratika>diti sūtrasyānantaratayā pāṭha iti viśeṣaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika> tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate ca</pratika> saṃdehapūrvapakṣasiddhāntādikaṃ prāyaḥ pūrvasmādaviśiṣṭam । sūtrārthavarṇanaprakriyā
tṛbhayoranayoraviśiṣṭāpi keṣucitsūtreṣu pūrvasmādvailakṣaṇyavatītyatastanmātramiha pradarśyate—<pratika><quote>‘payoṃ'buva’</quote></pratika> dityasya acetanasya
payasoṃ'bunaśca yathā dadhyādibhāvena nārikelarasādibhāvena ca pariṇāmo dṛśyate tadvaditi vyākhyānādviśeṣaḥ । tathā <pratika><quote>‘vyati-
rekānavasthiteścānapekṣatvāt’</quote></pratika> ityasya anyānapekṣatvātpradhānasya sarvadā sṛṣṭiprasaṃgātsargavyatirekeṇa pralayāvasthayānava-
sthitiprasaṃgācca kevalaṃ pradhānaṃ na jagatkāraṇamiti, <pratika><quote>‘puruṣāśmavaditi cettathāpi’</quote></pratika> ityatra <pratika><quote>‘tathāpi’</quote></pratika> ityasya tathāpi
<pb n="063"/>
pradhānasya pravṛttirnopapadyate paṃgvaśmāderivātrāvikṛtapuruṣasaṃnidhānātirekeṇa tādṛśaḥ kaścidviśeṣo nāstyeveti, <pratika><quote>‘abhyu-
pagame'pyarthābhāvāt’</quote></pratika> ityasya puruṣasya nirvikāratvāt pradhānadarśanādirūpavikārāsaṃbhavena bhogāpavargāsiddheḥ pradhānābhyupa-
game prayojanasyābhāvānna pradhānamanumeyamiti, <pratika><quote>‘vipratiṣedhā’</quote></pratika> dityasya puruṣasya draṣṭṭatvabhoktṛtvanirvikāratvādiviruddhadharmasahastrābhyu-
pagamāditi cārthavarṇanātpūrvasmādanayorasti kiyadiva vailakṣaṇyam । anyacca । <pratika><quote>‘pravṛtteśce’</quote></pratika>ti nānayormatayoryogavibhāgaḥ
ityādikaṃ vaiśiṣṭyamihāvadheyam । iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, yogavibhāgasūtrapāṭhakramādikaṃ śāṃkaramatavadeva । pūrvaṃ sāmānyatassamayānāṃ nirākaraṇaṃ kṛtam idānīṃ
viśeṣeṇa tannirākaraṇārthamasminpāde samayāvirodhaḥ prātisvikatayā nirūpayiṣyate । tatrādye'sminnacanānupapattyadhikaraṇe īśvarani-
rapekṣācetanapradhānasyaiva mahadādikāryakaraṇe pravṛttiriti yannirīśvarasāṃkhyamataṃ tannirākriyate । idaṃ sūtradaśakamasminmate'dhika-
raṇapaṃcakātmatayā vibhaktamiti matāntarebhyo viśeṣaḥ । acetanasya pradhānasya vinaiva cetanapreraṇāṃ payaso dadhyākārapariṇāmavadaṃ-
buno gativacca svata eva jagadākārapariṇāmasaṃbhavāt kimīśvareṇa kartrantareṇeti yannirīśvarasāṃkhyamataṃ tadyuktaṃ na veti saṃdehe
yuktamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, jaḍasya svataḥ pravṛttyasaṃbhavāt sarvatra kārye cetanāpekṣāniyamadarśanāt payoṃ'bunorapīśvaṃ-
rapreraṇayaiva svasvakāryapravṛtteḥ īśvaravyatirekeṇa kasyāpi karmaṇo'navasthiterayaskāntādyudāharaṇasyāpi kuṇṭhanācca na yuktamiti ।
<pratika>sūtrārthastu, sū ।। racanānupapatteśca nānumānam ।। 1 ।।</pratika> anumīyata <pratika>ityanumānaṃ</pratika> sāṃkhyānumānakalpitaṃ pradhānaṃ na
jagatkartṛ । kutaḥ । <pratika>racanānupapatteḥ</pratika>=pradhānasya jaḍatvena svataḥpravṛttyanupapatteḥ । caśabdena acetanasya svataḥpravṛttau pramāṇā-
bhāvāccetyarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। pravṛtteśca ।। 2 ।।</pratika> ahaṃ karomīti cetanasyaiva pravṛtterdarśanācca na pradhānaṃ jagatkartṛ ityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। payoṃ-
'buvaccettatrāpi ।। 3 ।।</pratika> aviśiṣṭārthamidam । <quote>‘etasya havā akṣarasye’</quote>tyādiśrutivaśāttatrāpīśvaranimittakapravṛttisiddherityarthaḥ ।।
<pratika>sū ।। vyatirekānavasthiteścānapekṣatvāt ।। 4 ।। vyatirekānavasthiteḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘na ṛte tvatkriyate kiṃcanāre’</quote> iti
śrutyā īśvaravyatirekeṇa kasyāpi karmaṇo'sattvāvagamāt na tata evācetanasyaiva svataḥpravṛttiriti nirīś‍varasāṃkhyamatasyāprāmā-
ṇikatvāt ata eva <pratika>anapekṣatvāt</pratika>=sadbhiranādaraṇīyatvānna pradhānaṃ jagatkartṛ ityarthaḥ ।। ato'nupapannamacetanakāraṇavādini-
rīś‍varasāṃkhyamatamiti siddham ।। <pratika>ityānandatīrthamate racanānupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>athānyatrābhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p>atha seś‍varasāṃkhyamataṃ nirākaroti---<pratika>sū ।। anyatrābhāvācca na tṛṇādivat ।। 5 ।।</pratika> īś‍varasyāstitvābhyupagame'pi
na tasya svātaṃtryeṇa kartṛtvaṃ kiṃ tu pradhānājjagadutpattau pṛthivyāstṛṇādyutpattau parjanyasyeva kevalamanugrāhakatvaṃ tasyeti yatseś‍va-
rasāṃkhyamataṃ tadyuktaṃ na veti saṃdehe yuktamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, <quote>‘yacca kiṃcijjagatsarva’</quote>mityādiśrutismṛtibhiḥ
kāryakāraṇātmakasakalaprapaṃcasya tatsattāsvabhāvaśaktyādiniyanturīś‍varādanyatrābhāvena tasya tṛṇādau parjanyavadanugrāhakamātratvā-
yogān na yuktamiti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, tṛṇādivat</pratika>=yathā pṛthivījanyatṛṇādikārye parjanyassahakārimātraṃ tathā prakṛtija-
nyamahadādikārye'pīś‍varo'nugrāhako na svataṃtra iti seś‍varasāṃkhyapakṣo'pi na yuktaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>anyatrābhāvāt</pratika>=īś‍varādanyatra
tatpreraṇāṃ vinā jagato'bhāvādīś‍varasya prakṛtisattādipradatvāccetyarthaḥ ।। <pratika>ityanyatrābhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha abhyupagamādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p>cārvākamataṃ nirākaroti---<pratika>sū ।। abhyupagame'pyarthābhāvāt ।। 6 ।।</pratika> dharmādyatīṃdriyapadārthānāṃ tatsādhakaśrutyādiprā-
māṇyasya cānabhyupagamātpramāṇābhāveneś‍varasyaivābhāvādantareṇāpīś‍varaṃ pūrvapūrvasmāduttarottaravastūtpattisaṃbhavānna tasya jagatkāraṇatvaṃ
yuktamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।</pratika> tatsiddhāntarītyāpi viṣayaprayojanayorabhāvātsvavyāghātaprasakterna tatsiddhānto yuktaḥ ato nāsti tadvi-
rodho viṣṇujagatkāraṇatvasyeti siddhāntaḥ । <pratika>sūtrārthastu</pratika>, netyanuvartate । cārvākaiḥ svaśāstrasya siddhāntatvānabhyupagame siddha-
masmadiṣṭam । <pratika>abhyupagame'pi arthābhāvāta</pratika>=siddhāntatvavyāpakayorarthaśabditaviṣayaprayojanayorasattvāṅgīkārātsvavyāghātaḥ
syāditi na tatpakṣo'pi yukta ityarthaḥ ।। iti ।।</p>
<head>ityabhyupagamādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<head>atha puruṣāśmādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p>nirīś‍varasāṃkhyaikadeśināṃ cetanopasarjanakācetanapradhānakartṛtvavādināṃ mataṃ nirākaroti---<pratika>sū ।। puruṣāśmavaditi
cettathāpi ।। 7 ।।</pratika> yadyapyacetanasya pradhānasya svataḥ pravṛttirna saṃbhavati tathāpi tadanugrāhakatvena svataṃtratvena vā aś‍varo'ṅgī-
karaṇīyaḥ । puruṣasaṃbandhādeva tasyāḥ pravṛttyupapatteḥ । acetanasyāpi śarīrasyāśmādāne pravṛttidarśanāditi <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhā-
ntastu</pratika>, idamapyayuktam । <quote>‘na ṛte tvatkriyate kiṃcanāre’</quote> iti śrutyā śarīrapravṛtterapīś‍varādhīnatvena dṛṣṭāntāsiddheḥ śarīrasya
puruṣaṃ prati pradhānatvānupapatteśceti । <pratika>sutrārthastu, puruṣāśmavat</pratika>=yathā puruṣasaṃbaṃdhādacetanaṃ śarīramaśmānayanādau pravartate
tathā acetanaṃ pradhānaṃ cetanasaṃbandhāt pravartata iti cenna । kutaḥ । tatrāpi śarīrapravṛttāvapi cetanasyeś‍varasyaiva kartṛtve siddhe-
dṛṣṭāntābhāvāt iti ।</p>
<pb n="064"/>
<head>atha vaiśeṣikādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
evaṃ pradhānakāraṇavādo niṣpramāṇaka iti nirūpitam । ataḥ paraṃ paramāṇukā-
raṇavādanirasanāyādhikaraṇamārabhyate---
<sutra>।। sū ।। mahaddīrghavadvā hrasvaparimaṇḍalābhyām ।। 10 ।।</sutra>
atra vaiśeṣikamatasiddhaḥ paramāṇukāraṇavādo yukto na veti sandehaḥ ।
pradhānamate adhiṣṭhātṛparameśvarānaṅgīkārāt tatkāraṇavāde viruddhe'pi paramā-
ṇukāraṇavādo yujyate । tathā hi-pralīne jagati parameśvarasya sisṛkṣāyāṃ satyāṃ
prāṇikarmavaśānniścaleṣu paramāṇuṣu ādyaṃ karmotpadyate । tasmāt karmaṇaḥ ekaḥ
paramāṇuḥ paramāṇvantareṇa saṃyujyate । tasmācca saṃyogād‌dva‍yaṇukamārabhyate । tebhya-
stribhyo dva‍yaṇukebhyastryaṇukam, ityādikrameṇa sarvaṃ jagadutpadyate । ataḥ paramāṇu-
kāraṇavāde na virodhaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha vaiśeṣikādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p>pradhānavādavatparamāṇuvādo'pi vipratiṣedhādasamaṃjasa iti dṛṣṭāṃtasaṃgatimabhipretyāvatāra-
yati—<pratika>evamiti ।। sū ।। mahaddīrghavadvā hrasvaparimaṇḍalābhyām ।। 10 ।।</pratika> saṃśayaṃ pradarśya
pratyudāharaṇarūpasaṅgatyaṃtaramapi varṇayan pūrvapakṣayati—<pratika>atretyādinā</pratika> ।। nanu, parameśvarāṅgī-
kārādyadyapi racanānupapattirdūṣaṇaṃ na bhavati । tathāpi vyatirekānavasthitidūṣaṇaṃ bhavedeva ।
pralaye'pi satāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ sakriyāṇāṃ kriyābhiḥ parasparasaṃyogasyāvarjanīyatvena vdyaṇuko-
tpattervdyaṇukādibhistryaṇukādyutpatteścānivāraṇāt । na ca tadānīṃ parameśvarasya sisṛkṣābhāvātkri-
yāsaṃyogadvyaṇukādyanutpattiḥ । tadīyanityasarvaviṣayecchāyāḥ sarvadā sisṛkṣārūpatvādityāśaṃkya
pūrvapakṣamupapādayati—<pratika>tathā hīti</pratika> ।। <quote>‘prāṇikarmavaśā’</quote> dityetat kākākṣinyāyenobhayatrāpi
saṃbadhyate । tataśca parameśvarecchāyāssisṛkṣātvamapi sṛṣṭyunmukhaprāṇyadṛṣṭopahitatvarūpamiti
labhyate । evaṃ sāṃkhyāmatāpāditadūṣaṇāsparśanāt paramāṇukāraṇavādo yukta iti pūrvapakṣamupasaṃha-
rati—<pratika>ata iti</pratika> ।। sūtre pūrvasūtrādasamañjasamityanuvartate । vākāraścārthe vartamāno'ṇu-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p><pratika>sū ।। aṅgitvānupapatteśca ।। 8 ।।</pratika> puruṣasyāṅgatve'ṅgīkṛte aṅgamaṅgī samādāye’ti vākye aṅgitvasya prādhānyasya uktya-
nupapatteśca na puruṣopasarjanakaprakṛtikartṛtvapakṣe dṛṣṭānto'stītyarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti puruṣāśmādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha anyathānumityadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p>atha pradhānopasarjanakacetanakartṛtvavādināṃ nirīś‍varasāṃkhyaikadeśināṃ mataṃ nirākaroti---<pratika>sū ।। anyathānumitau ca
jñaśaktiviyogāt ।। 9 ।।</pratika> evaṃ tarhyacetanopasarjanakapuruṣakartṛkaṃ jagadanumīyate tatrāśmānayanadṛṣṭāntasaṃbhavātkimīś‍vareṇeti
pradhānopasarjanakapuruṣakartṛtvavāda eva yukta iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, puruṣasya śarīrapreraṇakriyāyāṃ śarīrasya sahakāritva-
prakṛtitvādyanupapatteḥ svataḥ puruṣasyāsāmarthye prakṛtiśarīravyatiriktasyāpi sahakāryantarasyāpekṣaṇīyatvenānavasthāparihārāya svataṃtra
eva sahakārī kaścidaṃgīkaraṇīyassa eva sakalaśrutismṛtisiddha īś‍vara ityaṃgīkartuṃ yuktamiti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu</pratika>, caśabdenāṅgitvānupa-
patterityasya samākarṣaḥ । <pratika>anyathā</pratika>=puruṣāśmavadityuktapakṣādvaiparītyena puruṣāśmavadacetanasaṃbandhāccetanaṃ pravartata ityevaṃrūpeṇa ।
<pratika>anumitau</pratika>=anumāne'pi tathā sādhyavaikalyam । kutaḥ । <pratika>aṅgitvānupapatteḥ</pratika>=jīvasyāṅgapadoktaśarīrasaṃbandhitvāyogāt ।
so'pi kutaḥ । <pratika>jñaśaktiviyogāt</pratika>=aṅgasaṃbandhena jñasya jñāturjīvasya sāmarthyāyogāt iti ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। vipratiṣedhāccāsamañjasam ।। 10 ।। vipratiṣedhāt</pratika>=evaṃ sakalaśrutismṛtiyuktiviruddhatvāccānīś‍varamatamasa-
mañjasamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>ityānandatīrthamate anyathānumityadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<pb n="065"/>
iti pūrvapakṣe siddhānta ucyate—hrasvaparimaṇḍalābhyāṃ mahattvadīrghatvayuktatryaṇu-
kāṇutvahrasvatvayuktadva‍yaṇukotpattirucyate kāṇādamate । kathametat saṃbhavati ? । tathā
hi---paramāṇavaḥ pārimāṇḍalyaparimāṇayuktāḥ, na tvaṇuparimāṇayuktāḥ । dvābhyāṃ
paramāṇubhyāṃ aṇuparimāṇarahitābhyāmaṇuparimāṇopetaṃ dva‍yaṇukamutpadyata ityabhyu-
pagamyate । tathā—hrasvaparimāṇopetāddīrghaparimāṇarahitaṃ dva‍yaṇukam । tādṛśebhya-
stribhyo dva‍yaṇukebhyo dīrghaparimāṇopetamaṇuparimāṇarahitaṃ tryaṇukamutpadyata itya-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
hrasvadvyaṇukavaditi dṛṣṭāṃtāṃtarasamuccayārthaḥ । evaṃ ca hrasvāt‌dvyaṇukānmahato dīrghasya tryaṇu-
kasyotpattivādavat parimaṇḍalātparamāṇoraṇorhrasvasya dvyaṇukasyotpattivādavaccānyadapi vaiśe-
ṣikamataprakriyāsiddhaṃ sarvamasamañjasamiti sūtrārthaḥ।tatra samuccayopamayā dṛṣṭāntīkṛtaparamāṇudvya-
ṇukaprakriyayorasāmaṃjasyamapyatraivopapādanīyaṃ vivakṣitamityabhipretya tadupapādayansiddhāntayati-
hrasvaparimaṇḍalābhyāmiti ।। <pratika>mahattvadīrghatvayukteti ।</pratika> nanvevaṃ sati mahaddīrghaśabdayossāmā-
nādhikaraṇyā<quote>‘dānmahatassamānādhikaraṇajātīyayo’</quote> riti <ref>(pā॰ 6.3.46)</ref> sūtreṇa mahādeva
ityatrevātvaṃ syāt । na ca vācyaṃ mahaddīrghaśabdau<quote>‘vdyekayo’</quote>ritivat bhāvapradhānau, tathaiva hrasvapa-
rimaṇḍalaśabdāvapi tathā ca hrasvatvaguṇānmahatvadīrghatvavat pārimaṇḍalyādaṇutvahrasvatvacceti
mahaddīrghavadvetyasyārthovivakṣitaḥ।ato'tra dvandvasamāsa iti sāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvānnātvaprasaṅga-
iti ।hrasvatvapārimāṇḍalyābhyāṃ mahattvāṇutvotpattervaiśeṣikairanaṃgīkṛtatvāt <quote>‘kāraṇabahutvāt kā-
raṇamahattvāt pracayaviśeṣācca maha’</quote>diti kaṇādasūtre mahatvakāraṇānāṃ parigaṇitatvāt samapari-
māṇadṛḍhasaṃyogavattaṃtvārabdhayoḥ paṭayormadhye yadanyatarasminmahattvamutkṛṣṭaṃ tasya kāraṇabahutvā-
dutpattiḥ, samasaṃkhyadṛḍhasaṃyogavattantvārabdhayostu kāraṇamahattvātsamaparimāṇasamasaṃkhyatantvāra-
bdhayoḥ praśithilāvayavasaṃyogarūpātpracayāditi tairvibhaktatvācca pārimāṇḍalyasya nityaparimā-
ṇamātrasya cānāraṃbhakatāyā manaḥparimāṇe gaganādiparimāṇeṣu ca saṃpratipannatvena kvacitpaṭā-
diparimāṇe taṃtvādisaṃkhyājanyatvasya klṛptatvena ca dvyaṇukaparimāṇe paramāṇudvitvaṃ janakaṃ na
tu pārimāṇḍalyamita tairvyavasthāpitatvācca । evaṃ tarhi mahatvadīrghatvādhikaraṇasya tryaṇuka-
syaikatve'pi padārthatāvacchedakabhedāt dvandvo'stviti cenna । padārthabhedaṃ vinā padārthatāva-
cchedakamātrabhedena dvaṃdvasya bhāṣyakṛtā nirākṛtatvāt । <quote>‘cārthe dvandva’</quote>iti <ref>(pā॰ 2.2.29)</ref>
sūtre hi bhāṣyakṛtā <quote>‘yājñikaścāyaṃ vaiyākaraṇaśce’</quote> tyādiṣu padārthatāvacchedakabhedāt dvaṃdvamāśaṃkya
<quote>‘śeṣo bahuvrīhi’</quote>riti <ref>(pā॰2.2.23)</ref> sūtrataḥ śeṣa ityasyānuvṛtteḥ tasya samānādhikaraṇasamā-
saviṣayatvena śeṣatvābhāvāttadaprāptirupapāditeti ceducyate।kāni cit tryaṇukāni mahāṃti kā-
niciddīrghāṇīti tryaṇukavyaktibhedavivakṣayeha dvaṃdvasamāsa āśrīyate । yadyapi sarvāṇi tryaṇukā-
ni mahānti dīrghāṇi ca।mahattvadīrghatvayoḥ samaniyatatvāt । tathāpi kānicitryaṇukāni parito
dvyaṇukasaṃyogairutpadyante kānicittiryak‌dva‍yaṇukasaṃyogaistatrādyāni dvitīyāpekṣayāmahānti dvitī-
