yānyādyāpekṣayā dīrghāṇīti ca pratyayayogyāni bhavaṃtīti tathābhūtatryaṇukavyaktidvaividhyā-
pekṣayā dvandva upapadyate । yadvā । mahaddīrghaśabdau mahattvadīrghatvaparau । tadupari matuppratyayaḥ na
tu vatipratyayaḥ । tato <quote>‘mahaddīrghava’</quote> dityanena mahatvadīrghatvādhikaraṇaṃ tryaṇukamucyate। vāśabdena
cārthenāṇutvahrasvatvādhikaraṇaṃ dvyaṇukamucyate।tataśca hrasvāt‌dvyaṇukāt mahaddīrghaṃ tryaṇukamutpadyate ।
<pb n="066"/>
bhyupagamyate । idaṃ sarvamasamañjasameva । tadabhyupagatakāraṇaguṇaprakriyāvirodhāt ।
avayavāśca svīyaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pārśvaiḥ saṃyujyamānāḥ pṛthutaramavayavinamārabhante । para-
māṇūnāṃ pārśvābhāvāt pṛthutaradravyārambhakāste na bhaveyuḥ । ataḥ paramāṇukāra-
ṇavādo na yuktaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
parimaṇḍalātparamāṇoḥ aṇu hrasvaṃ dvyaṇukamutpadyata ityetadasamaṃjasamityetāvaducyate na tu tadda‍ṛṣṭāṃ-
tena vaiśeṣikamatasiddhasya kasyacidanyasyāsāmaṃjasyam । bhāṣyamapyasminnevārthe svārasyavadda‍ṛśyate ।
<quote>‘avayavāśce’</quote> tyādibhāṣyeṇa paramāṇorvdyaṇukotpattau sūtrakṛtā vivakṣitamasāmaṃjasyāṃtaramuṃcyate
na tu pūrvapratipāditasyāsāmaṃjasyasya dārṣṭāntikamasāmaṃjasyamucyata iti tatratyena kiṃcetyarthena
cakāreṇaiva spaṣṭam । <pratika>tadabhyupagateti ।</pratika> nanu, <quote>‘kāraṇaguṇāḥ kārye guṇānārabhanta’</quote> itivaiśeṣika-
maryādā viśeṣaguṇaviṣayeti cenna । viśeṣaguṇatvānirvacanāt । svāśrayasamānādhikaraṇadravya-
vibhājakadharmātyaṃtābhāvasamānādhikaraṇaguṇāvṛttiguṇatvavyāpyajātimattvaṃ taditi cet ।
na । rūparasasparśāvyāpteḥ । teṣāṃ nīlarūpatvādinā viśeṣaguṇatvamiti cenna । pṛthivyāditraya-
sādhāraṇasya dhavalarūpasya viśeṣaguṇatvābhāvaprasaṃgāt । tasya ca pākajāpākajabhāsvarābhā-
svaratvena pṛthivyādiviśeṣaguṇatvamiti cenna । kiṃciddhavale dhavalatare ca pārthivadravye saṃyo-
jya peṣaṇenotpāditasyātidhavalarūpasya pṛthivīviśeṣaguṇatvābhāvaprasaṃgāttasyāpākajābhāsvarasya
jalasādhāraṇatvāt । na ca kiṃciddhavalaṃ dhavalataraṃ ca rūpadvayameva svāśrayasaṃvalanadoṣāttadubhaya-
vijātīyatayā pratīyate na tu tatra rūpāṃtaramutpadyata iti vācyam । abādhitarūpāṃtarapratī-
tyanusāreṇa haridrācūrṇayoriva jalabhūtalayoriva ca tayorapi saṃyojanena rūpāṃtarotpatterabhyupa-
gaṃtavyatvāt । na ca tatpākajamiti vaktuṃ śakyam । himajalena peṣaṇe virūpāntarotpatti-
darśanāt udbha‍ūtoṣṇasparśatejassādhyatvātpākasya । evaṃ dṛḍhatarāvarttitamṛdutarasparśataṃtusūtragata-
kaṭhinasparśe ca viśeṣaguṇatvābhāvaprasaṃgo draṣṭavyaḥ । tatra pṛthivīviśeṣaguṇatvaprayojakasya pāka-
prayojyajātiviśeṣavattvasyābhāvāt । na ca bahiriṃdriyavyavasthāpakaguṇatvaṃ viśeṣaguṇatva-
miha vivakṣitaṃ tacca cakṣustaijasaṃ gaṃdhāvyaṃjakatve sati rūpavyaṃjakatvāt saurālokavadi-
tyādiprakāreṇa yadga‍uṇavyaṃjakatayā bahirindriyāṇāṃ bhūtaprakṛtikatvamanumeyaṃ tattvamiti vā-
cyam । anumānānāmaprayojakatvena taijasatvādyasādhakatvāt । na ca saurālokādiṣu rūpaguṇamā-
travyaṃjakatvaṃ tejastvāvacchedena gṛhītamiti kāryakāraṇabhāvamūlastarko''stīti vācyam । saurā-
loke tasya udbha‍ūtarūpatejastvāvacchedena gṛhītatayā cakṣuṣo'pyudbha‍ūtarūpatvasiddhiprasaṃgāt ।
tasmāllokasiddhasya viśeṣaguṇatvasyābhāvāt pāribhāṣikasyāpyanugatasya nirvaktumaśakya-
tvāt kāraṇaguṇaprakriyā guṇamātraghaṭiteti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>ṣaḍbhiḥ pārśvairiti ।</pratika> yathā daśadik‌saṃ-
baṃdhidaśapradeśavantoṃ'gulyādayaḥ parasparaṃ saṃśleṣyamāṇāḥ ekayā mahādiśā vidikdvayena cāva-
cchinnaiḥ pratyekaṃ tribhistribhiḥ pradeśaiḥ saṃyujyante evaṃ tantavo'pi saṃśleṣyamāṇāḥ pratyekaṃ
saṃyuktasaptapārśvayuktāḥ svādhikaparimāṇaṃ paṭādi kāryamārabhaṃte । tathā niravayaveṣu paramāṇuṣu
saṃyujyamāneṣvasaṃyuktapradeśāsaṃbhavātteṣāṃ svādhikaparimāṇakāryāraṃbhakatvaṃ na syādityarthaḥ । nanu
paramāṇubhirvdyaṇukānāmāraṃbha iṣyate । teṣviṣṭa eva mahattvarūpasya pṛthutvasyābhāvaḥ । tryaṇu-
kaprabhṛtiṣu tadupapadyata eva । tadāraṃbhakeṣu dvyaṇukādiṣvavyāpyavṛttisaṃyogasaṃbhavāditi cenna ।

tathāpi dva‍yaṇukaparamāṇvorevāṇutvapārimaṇḍalyarūpaparimāṇaviśeṣābhāvaprasaṃgāt dva‍yaṇukasyāpi
paramāṇuvadeva parimaṇḍalatvaprasaṃgāt tribhiḥ parimāṇubhirārabdhe tryaṇuke mahattvābhāvaprasaṃ-
gācca । na ca dva‍yaṇukaireva tryaṇukamārabhyate na paramāṇubhiriti niyantuṃ śakyate । paramāṇuṣu
dvayoriva trayāṇāmapi saṃyogasya saṃbhavāt । nāyaṃ saṃbhavati । tathā satyekaikasminparamāṇāvekasmi-
nparamāṇau vā paramāṇudvayasaṃyogasyāṃgīkarttavyatvāpattiḥ । niraṃśaparamāṇusaṃyogānāṃ vyāpyavṛtti-
tayā mūrttānāṃ samānadeśatāvirodhena tadaṃgīkārāyogāditi cenna । dvyaṇukatrayeṇa tryaṇuko-
tpattyarthamapyekaikadvyaṇukāraṃbhakaparamāṇusaṃyogavatyeva tadāraṃbhakaparamāṇvaṃtare tadanāraṃbhakadvyaṇu-
kāṃtarāṃtargataparamāṇvaṃtarasaṃyogasyāṃgīkarttavyatvāt kāraṇākāraṇasaṃyogāt kāryākāryasaṃyoga
iti tvanmate yadavayavāvacchedenāvayavidvayasaṃyogastayoravayavayorapi saṃyogāvaśyaṃbhāvāt । nanu,
trayāṇāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ saṃyogasaṃbhave'pi teṣāṃ puñjāṃtargatataṃtūnāmiva saṃyogamātraṃ bhavet na kāryā-
raṃbhakṣamasaṃyogaḥ । sa tu tantūnāṃ kuviṃdavyāpārādiva parameśvarecchāvaśāddvayoreva bhavati na trayāṇā-
miti cenna । parameśvarecchā dvayorbhavati na triṣvityatra niyāmakābhāvāt । santu tarhi paramā-
ṇvārabdhāni tryaṇukānyaṇūnyeveti cettathā sati kāraṇabahutvātkārye mahattvamiti svābhyu-
pagataprakriyāvirodhāpatteḥ । tarhi paramāṇusaṃyogānāṃ vyāpyavṛttitve'pi kāraṇabahutvādeva
mahattvaṃ syāditi cenna । kāraṇānāṃ bahutve samāne'pyasaṃyuktakāraṇapradeśaparimāṇatāratamyena
kāryeṣu parimāṇatāratamyasya ddaśyamānatayā tasyāpyapekṣitatvāt । parasparāsaṃyuktakāraṇapradeśā-
bhāve kārye kāraṇādhikaparimāṇavattvasya dṛṣṭaviruddhatvāt । tasmāt paramāṇujanyeṣu tryaṇukeṣu
mahattvadīrghatvarūpaḥ prathimā nopapadyata iti dūṣaṇaṃ yuktameva । evameva dvyaṇukajanyeṣvapi trya-
ṇukeṣu prathimā nopapadyate । dvyaṇukānāṃ parasparasaṃyoge tadavayavānāmapi tadavaśyaṃbhāvena
ṣaṇṇāmapi paramāṇūnāmekaparamāṇumātratvāpatteḥ । tadāhuḥ—<pratika>ṣaṭkena</pratika> yugapadyogātparamāṇoṣṣaḍaṃ-
śatā । ṣaṇṇāṃ samānadeśatve piṇḍassyādaṇumātrakaḥ ।।’ iti । paramāṇuḥ prāgādyūrdhvādharade-
śavarttibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ paramāṇubhissaṃbadhyamānaṣṣaḍaṃśaḥ prāpnoti । bhinnadeśatvātsaṃbaṃdhānām । atha
samānadeśāssarve saṃbaṃdhāḥ, ṣaṇṇāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ piṇḍaḥ paramāṇumātraḥ prāpnotītyarthaḥ । samāna-
midaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ dvyaṇukebhyaḥ paramāṇubhyaśca tryaṇukotpattau । nanu, nānādigvartinaḥ paramāṇavaḥ
madhyagatenaikena paramāṇunā kathaṃ vyāpyavṛttisaṃbaṃdhaṃ labheran । na hi pūrvāparaparamāṇvostena
tadaparapūrvabhāgāvacchedena saṃbaṃdhaḥ saṃbhavatīti cet tyaja tarhi paramāṇorniraṃśatvābhimānam ।
sāṃśatvamevābhyupagamya tatsaṃyogasyāvyāpyavṛttitvamupapādaya । tasya sāṃśatāyāṃ tattadaṃśānā-
mapyāraṃbhakatvasiddhaye sāṃśatvamityanavasthā prasajyeta । atassāṃśatvamapi teṣāṃ svīkartuṃ na
śakyata iti cettarhi sāṃśatvaniraṃśatvapakṣadvaye'pi samāpataddoṣaṃ paramāṇukāraṇavyasanameva
tyaktvā sukhī bhava । nanu, kimarthaṃ tattyaktavyam ekasminparamāṇau nānādigvarttiparamāṇusaṃ-
yogāstattaddigavacchedena upapādyataṃ iti cenna । diksaṃyogānāmapi paramāṇau vyāpyavṛtti-
tvena diśāṃ mūlāgravadavyāpyavṛttisaṃyogāvacchedakatvāyogāt । na ca yathākathaṃcidavacche-
dakabhedasattvamātreṇāvyāpyavṛttitvam । tathā sati pṛthivyāṃ gandhādhāratvaṃ pṛthivītvenāva-
cchidyate sparśādhāratvamākāśetarabhūtatvenetyavacchedakabhedasattvena gandhādīnāmapyavyāpyavṛtti-
tayā saṃyogāviśeṣaprasaṃgāt । nanu, tattatparamāṇusaṃyogāvacchedena diksaṃyogā varttiṣyaṃta

punaranupapattimāha—
<sutra>।। sū ।। ubhayathā'pi na karmātastadabhāvaḥ ।। 11 ।।</sutra>
aṇugatādyakarmābhāvādeva tatkṛtāṇugatasaṃyogābhāvaḥ । jīvādṛṣṭānāṃ vipākā-
napekṣatve prāgapyaṇugatā karmotpattiḥ syāt । tadapekṣatve na tatkṛtakādācitkāṇu-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
iti cenna । anyonyāśrayāpatteḥ । nanu, tryaṇukarūpakāryaliṃgena dvyaṇukaparamāṇvanumānasya
pratikṣeptumaśakyatayā tryaṇukakāraṇatvena paramāṇudvyaṇukeṣvavyāpyavṛttiṣu tatsaṃyogeṣu cā-
vaśyasvīkarttavyeṣu kathaṃciddikparamāṇusaṃyogānāmanyonyāvacchedenaiva vṛttirabhyupeyate iti
cet yadyevaṃ kimityanyonyāśrayādabibhyadanavasthābhayāt sāṃśatvamatyākṣīḥ । sāṃśatve hi vṛkṣapa-
kṣisaṃyogavadavyāpyavṛttitvaṃ dṛṣṭaprakāreṇaiva sūpapādam । niraṃśatve tvasaṃyuktapradeśāvaśeṣasahiṣṇava-
vyāpyavṛttitvaṃ kathaṃcidapyupapādayitumaśakyamiti prathimānupapattidūṣaṇaṃ tadavastha meva syāt ।
nanu, sāṃśatve'pyaparyavasitānantāvayavaparaṃparayā merusiddhārthayoranaṃtāvayavārabdhatvāviśeṣāt
samānaparimāṇatvaprasaṃga iti dūṣaṇamastīti ceduktamevottaram । atra pakṣadvaye'pi dūṣaṇasa-
dbhāve paramāṇukāraṇavāda eva tyaktavya iti । api ca । sāṃśatve samāpatadda‍ūṣaṇamevaṃ parihartuṃ
śakyam । merusiddhārthayoranaṃtāvayavārabdhatve'pyānaṃtyaviśeṣāt parimāṇaviśeṣa upapadyata
iti । na hi pādmakalpātpūrvaṃ vārāhakalpātpūrvaṃ ca kālānaṃtyayoḥ pātālādūrdhvaṃ brahmāṃḍādūrdhvaṃ
ca deśānaṃtyayośca na tāratamyam । ānaṃtye viśeṣasadbhāvādeva cānaṃtakṣaṇaghaṭitayoravāṃtaraka-
lpamahākalpayoranaṃtaparamāṇughaṭitayorikṣukṣīrasamudrayośca tāratamyam । yadi tu paramāṇossā-
vayavatāyāmanityatvāpattyā svābhyupagatamūlakāraṇatvāsiddhiprasaṃgāt sāṃśatvaṃ neṣyate
tadā prathimānupapattidūṣaṇaṃ vajralepāyata eveti । asmindūṣaṇe sūtraṃ cārthena vākāreṇa karttavyaṃ
hrasvatvāṇutvadvyaṇukasamuccayaṃ nāpekṣate । kiṃ tu hrasvāt dvyaṇukāt parimaṇḍalāt paramā-
ṇośca dvyaṇukaparamāṇvaṃtarāsaṃyuktapradeśarahitānmahattvena dīrghatvena ca tadapekṣayādhikaparimāṇa-
vat‌tryaṇukamutpadyata ityetadyathaivāsamañjasaṃ tathānyadapi vaiśeṣikakalpitaṃ sarvamasamaṃjasamiti
sūtrārtha iti tadarthaṃ vākāraḥ ivakārārtho yojanīyaḥ । kimanyadasamañjasamityākāṃkṣāyāṃ tatpra-
paṃcayitumuttarasūtrāṇi । <pratika>punaranupapattimiti ।</pratika> dṛṣṭāṃtīkaraṇavyājoddhāṭitānupapattivyatirekeṇa
dārṣṭāṃtikatvenāpekṣitāmanupapattimāhetyarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। ubhayathāpi na karmātastadabhāvaḥ ।। 11 ।।</pratika>
paramāṇuṣu saṃyogotpattisaṃbhavamaṃgīkṛtya tatsaṃyogasyāvyāpyavṛttitvāsaṃbhavāt kārye prathimāsaṃ-
bhava uktaḥ । idānīṃ tasyā evāsaṃbhava ucyate । pralayakāle niścalāḥ paramāṇavaḥ saṃtiṣṭhante ।
sargādyakāle prāṇināṃ bhojakādṛṣṭavaśāt teṣvādyaṃ karma jāyate । tatasteṣāṃ saṃyoge sati dvyaṇu-
kādikrameṇa jagadutpattiriti hi vaiśeṣikairiṣyate । tadadṛṣṭaṃ vipākānapekṣamādyaṃ karma janayati
tadapekṣaṃ vā । ubhayathāpi tattato bhavituṃ nārhati । tataḥ pralayakāla iva paramāṇavassadā
niścalā evāvatiṣṭheranniti teṣāṃ saṃyogo na saṃbhavatīti sūtrārthaḥ । tatrānapekṣatvapakṣe karmā-
saṃbhavamupapādayati—<pratika>jīvādṛṣṭānāmiti ।</pratika> yadi vipākānapekṣamadṛṣṭaṃ karmotpādane samarthaṃ syāt
tadā pralaye'pi adṛṣṭasatvāt karmotpattiḥ syāt । na ca tadā tvayā seṣyate । ato vipākā-
napekṣātkarmaṇaḥ kālāṃtare'pi karma na syāditi bhāvaḥ । dvitīyapakṣe tadasaṃbhavamupapādayati---
<pratika>tadapekṣatva iti ।</pratika> harītakyāderauṣadhasya dhātusāmyādikāryopayogivipāka ivādṛṣṭasya
<pb n="069"/>
gatakarmasaṃbhavaḥ । vipāko nāmādṛṣṭagataḥ kaściddharmo na jāyate । kiṃtu karmavidhinā
kālaviśeṣaniyataphaladātṛtvaṃ yasya karmaṇaścoditaṃ tasya tatkālāgama eva vipākaḥ ।
aniyatakālaviśeṣāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ prabalakarmāntarapratibandhābhāvo vā vipākaḥ ।
adṛṣṭāni tattatkarmānuguṇaphaladānasvabhāvāni । ato'nantairātmabhirvividhakā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śāstrīyaphalopayogivipākaḥ pariṇativiśeṣarūpaḥ buddha‍yavasthāviśeṣarūpamadṛṣṭadravyamiti pakṣa iva
parapakṣe na saṃbhavatīti tatpakṣe tasyātmaguṇaviśeṣasyāpariṇāmitvādityāha—<pratika>vipāko nāmeti ।
na jāyata iti</pratika> । parapakṣa iti śeṣaḥ।kastarhi parapakṣe karmavipākaśabdārtho vaktavya ityākāṃkṣā-
yāmāha—<pratika>kiṃtviti ।। yasya karmaṇa iti</pratika> । yathā brahmahananasya taddehapātānantaraṃ kalpaparyaṃto
yātanānubhavaḥ tataḥ paraṃ saptasu janmasu kṣayarogādirūpataccihnānuvṛttiriti coditaṃ tasya
tatkālāgamaḥ vipāka ityarthaḥ । <pratika>adṛṣṭānīti ।</pratika> yānyadṛṣṭāni niyatakālaphalakarmajanyāni tāni
svakāraṇakarmānuguṇyena tatkālāgamaṃ pratīkṣyaiva phaladāyakāni na tu tataḥ pūrvam । yānyadṛṣṭāni
prabalakarmāṃtarapratibaddhyasvabhāvakarmajanyāni tāni tadānuguṇyena pratibandhakāpāyaṃ pratīkṣyaiva
phaladāyakāni na tu tatsattve'pītyarthaḥ । yadyapi pratibandhakāpāyapratīkṣaṇaṃ niyatakālaphalakarma-
janyādṛṣṭānāmapyaviśiṣṭaṃ tadvirodhiphalakaprabalakarmāṃtarapratibandhe sati phalakālāgame satyapi
phalodayāsaṃbhavāt aniyatakālaphalānāmeva pratibaṃdhakakarmāṃtarasaṃvalanamiti niyaṃtumaśakya-
tvāt । tathāpyaniyatakālaphalānāṃ pratibandhakāpāyamātrasya pratikṣaṇaṃ niyatakālaphalānāṃ
tu phalakālāgamasyāpītyabhiprāyeṇetthaṃ vibhāgaḥ kṛtaḥ । astvevaṃ ko doṣa ityākāṃkṣāyāmāha-
<pratika>ato'nantairiti</pratika> । nānākālānuṣṭhitānāṃ vicitrapratibandhakapratibaddhyānāṃ cānaṃtaprāṇika-
rmaṇāṃ phalakālāgamayaugapadyaṃ pratibandhakāpāyayaugapadyaṃ ca kadāpi na milatītyarthaḥ । na ca
pratiprāṇyanādibhavasaṃcitānāmanaṃtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ sattvāt teṣvekaikasya karmaṇaḥ phalakālāgamarū-
po'pratibandhatvarūpaśca vipākassargādyakāle yugapanmilediti vācyam । tathā karmānaṃtyasya pra-
layakāle'pyaviśiṣṭatvena tadānīmapi tanmelanaprasaṃgāt । siddhāṃte tu buddhivṛttibhedasyādṛṣṭasya
kāryānukūlapariṇativiśeṣo vipākaḥ । sa cetanādhiṣṭhānasādhyasaṃskārarūpo na svayameva bha-
vati । na ca tenaiva dravyeṇa karttuṃ śakyate । yathoktam—<quote>‘pākārhamapi tatpaktuṃ neśatyātmānamā-
tmanā । dharmassāmānya evāyaṃ sarvasya pariṇāminaḥ ।।’</quote> iti । sa tu bhiṣagvyāpāreṇauṣadhānā-
miva parameśvarasaṃkalpenādṛṣṭānāṃ kriyate । yadyapi pralayakāle'pi pratiprāṇi kānicidadṛṣṭā-
ni prāptaphalakālāni bhaveyuḥ tathāpi sargakālarūpe'hani niraṃtaragatāgatakhinnānāṃ prāṇināṃ
tatsamānaparimāṇaṃ kālaṃ śarvarīrūpaṃ kṛtvā tasmin tān mahāsuṣuptiṃ prāpayya viśiśramayiṣoḥ
parameśvarasyecchayā tāni pratibaddhaśaktikāni apakvānyeva santi । yathā sargādyakāle
pakvāni bhavanti tathā parameśvareṇa pācyamānānyavatiṣṭhaṃte । evaṃ ca keṣucit karmavidhiṣu
niyataphalakālaśravaṇamautsargikaṃ sargapralayakālamaryādāśrutyanusāreṇa pratibaṃdhakarahitakāla-
viṣayamavatiṣṭhate । praḻayāvyavahitapūrvakāle kṛtāś‍vamedhabrahmahananādikasya praḻayāraṃbhe taddeha-
pāte satyapi tadanaṃtarameva tatphalānubhavābhāvena satyapi kaṃcitkarmaphalakālāgame tadvirodhipha-
lakaprabalakarmāntarapratibandhe sati tatphalānubhavābhāvena ca tathotsargāpavādamaryādākalpanasyāva-
śyakatvāditi sarvamupapadyate । na caivaṃ parapakṣe'pyupapattiśśaṃkanīyā । tatpakṣe hi praḻaye sṛṣṭyabhāvaḥ
<pb n="070"/>
kasya kāraṇasya vaikalyenopapādanīyaḥ । na tāvadadṛṣṭavipākasya । tatpakṣe phalakālāgamapratibandhakaka-
rmābhāvasāhityasya vipākaśabdārthatvāt tasya sargakāla iva praḻayakāle'pi anaṃtaprāṇigatānaṃ-
takarmamadhye keṣucitkarmasvavarjanīyatvāt । nāpi parameśvarasisṛkṣāyāḥ । nityasarvaviṣayāyāḥ
tadicchāyāḥ kadāpi sisṛkṣārūpatvānapāyāt sṛṣṭyupayogyadṛṣṭavipākopadhānarūpasya pā-
ribhāṣikasisṛkṣātvasyāpi tasyāṃ praḻayasādhāraṇatvāt । na ca praḻayakālāṃtargatirahitaḥ phala-
kālāgamaḥ pratibandhakāpāyaśca vipākaḥ, ato'dṛṣṭavipākasya tadupahitaparameś‍varecchārūpasi-
sṛkṣāyāśca vaikalyaṃ vaktuṃ śakyamiti vācyam । keṣāṃcit karmaṇāṃ phalakālāgamapratibandhakā-
bhāvayossadātanatvena parapakṣe sarvadā sṛṣṭiprasaktyā pralayasyaivānavakāśāt । na ca siddhānta
iva parapakṣe parameśvarecchayā pralaya iti vaktuṃ śakyate । vaiṣamyāt । siddhānte pārameśvarī
jagatpravililāpayiṣārūpecchā cicchaktipariṇativiśeṣatvātkādācitkī tadāvirbhāvadaśāyāṃ
tadvirodhinī tadīyā prāṇyadṛṣṭavipācayiṣā na pravartata iti tadānīmadṛṣṭānāṃ vipāko'pi
na bhavati । atastadānīṃ pralayaḥ pravartata iti yujyate । na tu parapakṣe । tatpakṣe hi nityasa-
rvaviṣayā parameśvarecchā sarvadā pravililāpayiṣaiva । na ca tayā karmaṇāṃ phalakālāgamo vā
bhogādinā karmarūpapratibandhakābhāvo vā bhavanniroddha‍uṃ śakyate । na ca sisṛkṣāyāmadṛṣṭavipā-
kopahitatvaṃ tatpravililāpayiṣāyāṃ tadanupahitatvaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ vaktuṃ śakyate । kevalaphalakālāgamapra-
tibandhakābhāvarūpavipākopahitatvasya sarvadā sattvena tadanupahitasya kadāpyasaṃbhavāt pralayakā-
lāṃtargatirāhityaviśeṣitatadanupahitatvasyānyonyāśrayeṇa niveśayitumaśakyatvāt । na ca
yasminkālaviśeṣe vastutaḥ praḻayo'nuvartate tadaṃtargatirāhityaṃ svarūpato viśeṣaṇam । praḻayā-
dhikaraṇatvātirekeṇa tatkāle kālāṃtaravyāvṛttaviśeṣābhāvāt । na ca sūryāstamayādistadudayāva-
sānaḥ kālo rātririti madhyagatāṃ prāṇināṃ suṣuptimanapekṣya tadādyaṃtagatadharmadvayāvalaṃbanena rā-
treriva pralayamanapekṣya tadādyantagatayatkiṃciddharmadvayāvalambanena tasya kālasya kālāṃtaravyāvṛttaṃ
nirvacanaṃ saṃbhavati । pārameś‍varasakalasaṃjihīrṣāsiṃsṛkṣāvalaṃbanaṃ tu nirastaprāyam । etena
yadakṣapādasūtreṣu <quote>‘īśvaraḥ kāraṇaṃ puruṣakarmāphalyadarśanā’</quote> diti īśvarasya kāraṇatvaṃ pratijñāya <quote>‘na
puruṣakarmābhāve phalāniṣpatte’</quote> riti tatra bādhakahetumāśaṃkya <quote>‘tatkāritatvādahetu’</quote> riti sūtreṇa
tasya hetutvaṃ nirastam । yacca tannyāyavārttikādiṣūpapāditaṃ<quote>‘na brūmaḥ karmānapekṣa īśvaraḥ kāraṇa-
miti api tu karma puruṣasyeśvaro'nugṛhṇāti ko'nugrahārthaḥ yadyathābhūtaṃ yasya ca yadā pari-
pākakālaḥ tattathā ca tadā ca viniyuṃkte’</quote>ityādinā tatsarvaṃ pratyākhyātam । īśvarasya phalakā-
lāgamādirūpaṃ karmaparipākaṃ pratīkṣya karmaviniyoktṛtve praḻaye'pi keṣāṃcit karmaṇāṃ
paripākasyāvarjanītvena tadānīmapi sṛṣṭiprasaṃga ityādipūrvoktadūṣaṇānativṛtteḥ । syāde-
tat । praḻaye sargavyatirekaḥ tadānīṃ sargopayoginyāssisṛkṣāyā vyatirekādupapadyate । na hi
kāryecchā svayaṃ yadāyadā varttate tadātadā kāryaṃ janayitumīṣṭe । kiṃ tu yatkālāvacchinnakārya-
viṣayā sā tasminneva kāle । ata eva yauvanakālamārabhyānuvṛttāpi vārdhake tīrthānyaṭānī-
tīcchā vārghaka eva tīrthāṭanaṃ janayati । īśvarecchā ca kālaviśeṣāvacchinnasargaviṣayā
asminkāle sṛjeyamiti । ataḥ praḻaye'nuvarttamānāpi sā na tadānīṃ sargaṃ janayatīti
ceducyate । īśvarasya kasminkāle sṛjeyamitīcchā । na khalvakhaṇḍakālastatra viśeṣaṇam । praḻaye'pi
<pb n="071"/>
laphaladāyitvenānuṣṭhitānāmekadaikarūpavipāko na saṃbhavati । ataḥ paramāṇukā-
raṇavādo na yukta eva ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
sargānuvṛttiprasaṃgāt । na ca nityakālapariṇatibhedāḥ kṣaṇalavanimeṣādayaḥ kālaviśeṣā iti
siddhāṃtapakṣa iva parapakṣe svābhāvikaḥ kālaviśeṣo'sti । na ca sargādyakāle sūryakriyādayaḥ
santi, yadupādhikastasminkāle viśeṣastadicchāviṣayo bhavet । nanu, pūrvasargakālasamānapari-
māṇatvarūpaḥ punassargakāle viśeṣastadicchāviṣayo'stu । tataśca pūrvasargo yāvatkālamanuvṛttaḥ
tāvatkālasamānaparimāṇaṃ kālaṃ prāṇino viśramayya pūnastāvatkālasamānaparimāṇaṃ kālaṃ
sṛjeyamiti sisṛkṣāśarīraṃ bhavati । na ca sargecchākarmavipākayossarvadā sattvena pūrvasargā-
nuvṛttyavirāma eva prasajyate, ataḥ pūrvasargo yāvatparyaṃtamanuvṛtta ityavadhikroḍīkāro na saṃbha-
vatīti vācyam । pūrvasargapravāhasyānāditvena tadānīmapi tatpūrvasargasamānaparimāṇaṃ kālaṃ
sṛjeyamiti tadicchāvaśādeva sargakālaniyamopapatteḥ । na ca tattatsargādyakāle tattatpūrvaka-
lpakālaparimāṇaviṣayatvaṃ kramikaṃ sadā sarvaviṣayāyāmicchāyāṃ na saṃbhavatīti vācyam । sāmā-
nyataḥ pūrvakalpasamānaparimāṇaṃ kālaṃ punassṛjeyamityekarūpāyā eva sisṛkṣāyāssarvakalpānuyā-
yitvasaṃbhavāt iti cenmaivam । kiṃ pārameśvarī sisṛkṣā pūrvakalpasamānaparimāṇaṃ kālaṃ sṛjeya-
mityekenaiva rūpeṇa dviparārddhātmakakalpamadhyasṛjyasarvavastusṛṣṭau kāraṇamuta prativastvidami-
dānīṃ sṛjeyamidamidānīmiti vyavasthitena rūpāṃtareṇāpi tattadvastusṛṣṭau kāraṇam । ādye prati-
kalpameka eva hiraṇyagarbhaḥ eka eveṃdraḥ aṣṭāveva vasavaḥ ekādaśaiva rudrā ityādivyavasthā na
syāt । na hyasaṃkhyeṣu brahmeṃdravasurudramarutsādhyādipadaprāpakādṛṣṭavatsu niyatasaṃkhyānāmeva
tattatpadaprāpakādṛṣṭasya phalakālāgamarūpaḥ pratibandhakābhāvarūpo vā vipāko bhavatīti niyaṃtuṃ
śakyate । dvitīyakālopādhīnāṃ sṛṣṭirna sidhyet । asminkālaviśeṣe idaṃ sṛjeyamiti tatra
sisṛkṣāśarīranirūpaṇārthasya sṛjyavyatiriktasya kāle viśeṣakāntarasyābhāvāt । na ca kālo-
pādhivyatirikteṣveva niruktena rūpāṃtareṇāpi sisṛkṣā kāraṇam । kālopādhiṣu tu pūrvakalpa-
samānaparimāṇaṃ kālaṃ sṛjeyamiti sāmānyarūpeṇaiva sā kāraṇamiti vācyam । sarveṣāmapi
sṛvyānāṃ svasvakālaparicchedakatvena kālopādhivyatiriktasya sṛjyasyāprasiddheḥ । na hi tapanapa-
rispanda eva svakālasyāvacchedako nānya iti niyaṃtuṃ śakyate । <quote>‘hiraṇyagarbhasya kālo mahā-
kalpaḥ manoḥ kālo manvaṃtara’</quote>mityādipaurāṇikaprasiddhyā ca hiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ kālāvaccheda-
katvamavaśyābhyupagaṃtavyam । tapanaparispandamātrasya kālāvacchedakatve ca kasminkāle tapanaṃ
sṛjeyamiti tatsisṛkṣā bhavet । tatrāpi sisṛkṣāyāssāmānyarūpeṇaiva kāraṇatve tatpadaprāpakā-
nekādṛṣṭavipākayaugapadye ca yugapadanekatapanasṛṣṭiprasaṃgo durvāra ityeṣā dik ।। tasmāt sisṛ-
kṣāyāṃ viśeṣakalpanayā sṛṣṭiniyamopapādanāsaṃbhavāt karmavipākavyavasthayaiva sṛṣṭipraḻayavya-
vasthā vaktavyā । tatra yadi pratiprāṇi karmānaṃtyāt sargādyakāle sarvaprāṇikarmavipākayaugapadyaṃ
samarthyeta praḻaye'pi tata eva tatprasajyeteti tatparihārāya pralaye tadasaṃbhavasya samarthanīya-
tvāt । tathaiva sargādyakāle'pi tadasaṃbhavaḥ syāditi sarvaprāṇyupabhogārthamahābhūtasṛṣṭyupayogi-
paramāṇuṣvādyaṃ karma na syāditi bhāvaḥ । nanu, paramāṇukāraṇatvānupapattipradarśanaprastāve samavā-
yābhyupagamaprayuktadoṣavarṇanamasaṃgatamityāśaṃkya tadapi tadanupapattiparyavasāyītyavatārayati—

iyaṃ cātrānupapattirityāha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। samavāyābhyupagamācca sāmyādanavasthiteḥ ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
samavāya iti saṃbandho'bhyupagamyate । ata evāsamañjasametat । katham ? sama-
vāyasyāpi jātiguṇāderivāpṛthaksiddhahetvapekṣāsāmyādanavasthānāt । ataḥ kā-
ṇādamatamasamañjasam ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>iyaṃ ceti</pratika> ।। atra pūrvavākyanirdiṣṭe paramāṇukāraṇavāde <pratika>।। sū ।। samavāyābhyupagamācca
sāmyādanavasthiteḥ ।। 12 ।।</pratika> etatparamāṇukāraṇatvam । nanu samavāyābhyupagamena paramāṇukāra-
ṇatve kiṃ hīyate iti pṛcchati---<pratika>kathamiti ।। samavāyasyāpīti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । para-
māṇudvyaṇukādisamavāyikāraṇatvena jaganmūlakāraṇamabhyupagamyate । samavāyikāraṇasya ca
yatsamavetaṃ kāryamutpadyate tattvamiti lakṣaṇamucyate । tatra samavāyaḥ kāryasya viśeṣaṇam । ayutasi-
ddhaviśeṣaṇeṣu jātiguṇādiṣvayutasiddha‍yupapādakassamavāyo'bhyupagamyata iti savamāyasyāpya-
yutasiddha‍yupapādakassamavāyo'bhyupagamyata iti samavāyasyāpyayutasiddha‍yupapādakasaṃbadhāpekṣā
samānā । tatsāmye satyapi saṃbandhāntaraṃ nābhyupagamyate । ataḥ saṃbaṃdharahitasya samavāyasya
kārye'vasthitirna saṃbhavatīti paraprakriyayaiva dvyaṇukasya paramāṇusamavāyavattvābhāvāt na tasya
samavāyikāraṇamiti tanmatamasamaṃjasamiti । nanu, kāryasvarūpameva kāraṇasamavāyasya
saṃbaṃdhaḥ syāditi cet kiṃ saṃbaṃdhisvarūpamapi saṃbandho bhavitumarhati । arhatyevābhāvādiṣva-
bhyupagamyate ceti cet kimarthaṃ tarhyavayavaguṇakriyājātīnāṃ tadvatsu samavāyaḥ kalpyate ।
teṣāmapi hi saṃbaṃdhastadvatāṃ svarūpameveti vaktuṃ śakyate । saṃbaṃdhisvarūpāṇāmanaṃtatvā llāghavena
sarvānugata ekaḥ samavāyaḥ kalpyata iti cenna । ekasya anekeṣāṃ vā kalpanīyatve khalu
lāghavādekasya kalpanam । ihānekeṣāṃ klṛptatvāt tairupapanne prayojane kimarthamekasyāpi kalpanam ।
nanvavayavyādīnāṃ klṛptatve'pi teṣu saṃbadhatvaṃ kalpanīyam । yadyapi samavāye'pi tatkalpanī-
yam । tathāpi samavāyapakṣe samavāyastadgataṃ saṃbaṃdhatvaṃ ceti dvayameva kalpanīyam । svarūpasaṃbaṃ-
dhapakṣe tu avayavyādisvarūpānugatasya ekasya saṃbandhatvasyāsaṃbhavādanantāni saṃbaṃdhatvāni
kalpanīyānītyasti samavāyapakṣe lāghavamiti cenna । avayavyādiṣu tattadabhāvaṃ prati saṃbaṃdhatva-
syāpi klṛptatvāt । teṣvavayavādinirūpitasaṃbandhatvaklṛptirnāstīti tānyanaṃtāni kalpanīyānīti
cet kiṃ nirūpakabhedenāpi saṃbadhatvaṃ bhidyate? bhidyata iti cet evaṃ tarhi samavāye'pi tānyanaṃ-
tāni kalpanīyāni samavāyaśca kalpanīya iti samavāyapakṣa eva gauravaṃ syāt । nanu, avayava-
guṇakriyājātīstadvataścāyutasiddhatvena kroḍīkṛtyāyutasiddhanirūpitasaṃbaṃdhatvamekameva sama-
vāye kalpyata iti cet tarhi tena tāḥ kroḍīkṛtya tatsvarūpeṣveva saṃbaṃdhatvamekamaṃgīkurvan
samavāyakalpanāgauravaṃ parihṛtya sukhamāsva । pakṣadvaye'pi hi pratiyogināmanuyogināṃ cāyuta-
siddhatvena kroḍīkārastulyaḥ । samavāyapakṣe tatkalpanāgauravamatiricyate । etena svarūpasaṃbandha-
sthale saṃbandhinormadhye naikasya saṃbaṃdhatvam । vinigamanāvirahāt । nāpi dvayorapi pratyekam । gaura-
vāt । kiṃ tu tadubhayasamudāyasya vyāsajyavṛtti parasparapratiyogikamekameva tat । evaṃ cābhāvā-
dhikaraṇādisvarūpadvaye saṃbandhatvasya klṛptatve'pyavayavāvayavyādisvarūpadvaye tanna klṛptamityapi
śaṃkā nirastā । aklṛptatvasya klṛptayossamavāyatadgatasaṃbandhatvayoḥ kalpanādekasyāvayavāvayavyādi-
<pb n="073"/>
svarūpadvayagatasya saṃbaṃdhatvasya kalpane lāghavasya pratiṣṭhitatvāt । vastutastu, svarūpadvayagatamekaṃ
saṃbaṃdhatvamiti na yujyate ādhārādheyavyavasthityasiddhiprasaṃgāt । kiṃ tu bhūtalādiṣvabhāvādi-
nirūpitamādhāratvarūpaṃ saṃbadhatvamanyadabhāvādiṣu bhūtalādinirūpitamādheyatvarūpaṃ tadanyaditye-
vāstheyam । evaṃ tarhyavayavāvayavyādisvarūpeṣu saṃbandhatvakalpane gatamayutasiddhatayā kroḍīkāre-
ṇāvayavādiṣvavayavyādinirūpitamādhāratvarūpamavayavyādiṣvavayavādinirūpitamādheyatvarūpa-
miti sarvatra nirūpakabhedena bhinnabhinnasyaiva saṃbaṃdhatvasya vaktavyatvāditi cetsatyam । samavāya-
pakṣe'pi te na gatameva । samavāye'pi hi avayavādinirūpitamādhāratvarūpaṃ saṃbandhatvamanyadanya-
ccāvayavyādinirūpitādheyatvarūpamityaṃgīkarttavyatvāt । na hyādhārādheyavyavasthitissama-
vāyapakṣeṇopapādanīyā । yadyucyetāyutasiddhamātranirūpitaṃ samavāye saṃbandhatvamekameva ।
ādhārādheyavyavasthitistu bhūtalābhāvādiṣviva svarūpasaṃbadhenopapādyate । evaṃ ca vāyo rūpasa-
mavāyasattve'pi rūpādhāratvalakṣaṇasvarūpasaṃbaṃdhābhāvādeva tatra rūpavattvapratītyabhāvaḥ na tu sama-
vāyasya vāyuvṛttitvāvacchedena rūpādhāratvātmakarūpasaṃbaṃdhatvānadhikaraṇatvāditi tadā samavāya-
siddhipratyāśā samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitā syāt । avayavāvayavyādīnāmādhārādheyabhāvapratyayanirvā-
hakatvena hi tatsiddhiruktā kāṇādasūtre । <quote>‘ihedamiti yataḥ kāryakāraṇayossamavāya’</quote>iti ।
tasya cet svarūpasaṃbaṃdhena nirvāhaḥ kā tatsiddhipratyāśā । syādetat । iha sūtre varṇitapratya-
yanirvāhakatvena samavāyasiddhirukteti satyam । na tu tannirvāhakatvaṃ viṣayatayā vivakṣitam ।
tanmate samavāyasyāpratyakṣatvāt । kiṃ tu kāraṇatayā । avayavaguṇākriyādiviśiṣṭabuddhīnāmanu-
gatakāraṇāpekṣāyāmanugataṃ kiṃcitatkāraṇaṃ sidhyati sa samavāya iti । maivam । avayavādivi-
śiṣṭabuddhīnāṃ svayamananugatatvenānugatakāraṇāpekṣatvābhāvāt viśiṣṭabuddhitvenānugamo'stīti
cet na । daṇḍī puruṣaḥ ghaṭasya jñānaṃ ghaṭasyābhāvaḥ ityādiṣu dravyaviṣayapratiyogyādi-
viśiṣṭabuddhiṣu tasyātiprasaktatvāt । nanu, sphuṭataravivekarahitasaṃbandhidvayagocaravi-
śiṣṭapratyakṣatvena tāsāmanugamo'stīti cet । tarhi sphuṭataravivekaratitvenānugatīkṛtānāmava-
yavāvayavyādīnāmeva tatra kāraṇatvamastu । kṛtamatiriktasamavāyakalpanyā । abhāvādhikara-
ṇayorviśiṣṭabuddhāvatiprasaktañcedamavacchedakaṃ tathā pītaṃ suvarṇamiti suvarṇatadupaṣṭaṃbhakaviśi-
ṣṭabuddhāvapi । nanu, dravyādiviṣayaviśiṣṭabuddhisādhāraṇyena pratyakṣaviśiṣṭabuddhitvamātrā-
vacchedenānugataṃ kāraṇamanviṣyate anugatakāryasyānugatakāraṇaniyamyatvāt । tattu
nityatvādekatvācca sarvatra saṃbhavan samavāya eva kalpyate । viṣayabhāvaṃ vināpi sarvāsu
tāsu kāraṇatvasaṃbhavāt । na ca prameyatvādayaḥ santi paraśśataṃ dharmāḥ teṣāmanyatamasyātrānuga-
takāraṇatvasaṃbhave kutastadatiriktasya samavāyasya siddhiḥ syāditi vācyam । pratyakṣaviśi-
ṣṭabuddhitvāvacchedena lāghavādekasya kāraṇasyānumānatassiddhau prameyatvādiṣu vinigamakābhāvena
tadatiriktasya tasya siddheḥ phalamukhagauravasyādoṣatvāditi cenna । lāghavādaikyasiddherī-
śvarānumānanirāse pratikṣiptatvādiha saṃyogasyānugatakāraṇasya saṃbhavācca । santi hi cākṣuṣā-
diviśiṣṭapratyakṣeṣu grāhyaguṇāśrayatattaddavyendriyasaṃyogāḥ kāraṇatvena klṛptāḥ । śabdapratyakṣe'pya-
sti śrotramanassaṃyogaḥ tathābhūtaḥ । teṣāmeva saṃyogatvenāstu tatrānugatakāraṇatā । klṛptakāra-
ṇeṣvevāvacchedakāṃtareṇāpekṣitakaraṇatvāṃtarakalpane lāghavāt । ata eva vinigamanāviraho'pi
<pb n="074"/>
nirastaḥ । nirvikalpakasādhāraṇāste viśiṣṭapratyakṣatvāvacchedena na kāraṇamiti cet tarhi tata
eva samavāyo'pi na bhavet । yadi samavāyaniṣṭhakāraṇatā nirvikalpakavyāvṛttā kalpyate
tadā teṣu saṃyogatvāvacchinnakāraṇatāpi tathaiva kalpyatām । vastutastu, viśiṣṭajñānatvaṃ viśe-
ṣaṇajñānakāryatāvacchedakaṃ janyapratyakṣatvamindriyakāryatāvacchedakamityavacchedakāṃtaropapannakā-
ryatādhikaraṇavṛttitvānnīlaghaṭatvavadarthavaśasampannaṃ janyaviśiṣṭapratyakṣatvaṃ na kāryatāvacchedaka-
miti na tadavacchedenānugatakāraṇāpekṣāsti।etena tantukapālādināśe tanniṣṭhāvayaviguṇakriyā-
dikaṃ yannaśyati tatra tanniṣṭhāvayavyādināśatvena kāryatāvacchede'nanugamaḥ tatsaṃbaṃdhināśatvena
tadavacchede tatsaṃyuktasya tṛṇāderapi nāśaprasaṃga iti tāvadanugamakasaṃbandhaviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ yasya
saṃbandhaviśeṣasya tatra kāryatāvacchedake praveśassa samavāya ityapi nirastam । samavāyāṃgīkā-
re'pi tantunāśe taṃtusamavāyavatāmaṃśūnāṃ nāśaprasaṃgānivāraṇāt । na ca taṃtusamavāyavattve
sati tadādheyatvarūpaṃ tantusamavetatvamavacchedake <pratika>niveśanīyam</pratika> । tathāpi taṃtvāśritatṛṇādināśa-
prasaṃga ityatiprasaṃgatādavasthyāt samavāyasyaikatvena tantusamavāyasya tṛṇe'pi sattvātsamavāya-
saṃbandhenādheyatvaṃ vivakṣitam । tṛṇādikaṃ tu saṃyogasaṃbaṃdhena tantvādheyamiti cenna । saṃyogasya
samavāyasya vā tṛṇādisvarūpātmakādheyatvasabaṃdhāprayojakatvāt ayutasiddhādheyatvasyaivākli-
ṣṭasya kāryatāvacchedake niveśayituṃ yuktatvācca । na ca tathā sati taṃtunāśe tadayutasiddhādheya-
sya paṭadhvaṃsādernāśaprasaṃgaḥ । parapakṣe'pi tantusamavetajātyādināśaprasaṃgataulyāt । tantu-
nāśe tatsamavetasya kāryasya nāśa iti niyama iti cettarhi tannāśe tadayutasiddhādheya-
syānityasya nāśā iti niyamo'stu । na ca dhvaṃsanāśenāpi kiṃcidaniṣṭamāpadyate । prāgabhāva-
dhvaṃsasya ghaṭasyeva taddhvaṃsasyāpi dhvaṃsopapatteḥ । ghaṭataddhvaṃsayorubhayorapi prāgabhāvadhvaṃsatvāṃgī-
kāreṇa prāgabhāvasyānunmajjanasamarthane ghaṭataddhvaṃsataddhvaṃsaparaṃparāyā ghaṭadhvaṃsatvāṃgīkāreṇa ghaṭānu-
nmajjanaṃ samarthayemahi । tasmāt svarūpasaṃbadhāṃgīkāre samavāyāpalāpaprasaṃgāt samavāyamabhyupaga-
cchatā svarūpasaṃbandhastyaktavya iti samavāyasya kārye vṛttyabhāvena yatsamavetaṃ kāryamutpadyata iti
lakṣaṇāsaṃbhavāttadanusāreṇa paramāṇudvyaṇukādi kāraṇamityetadasamaṃjasam । yadi caivamapi lāgha-
valobhādekassamavāyo'vayavaguṇakriyādīnāṃ saṃbaṃdha ityabhyupagamyate tadā tata eva tryaṇukaprabhṛ-
tīnāṃ kāryāṇāmekameva brahma pradhānaṃ vā kāraṇamabhyupagantavyaṃ syāt । ekatvalāghavasyobha-
yatrāpyādaraṇīyatvasāmyāt । anyathā kvacillāghavādaro'nyatra tadanādara ityavyavasthāpra-
saṃgāt । na hi klṛpteṣu svarūpasaṃbaṃdheṣu satsvapi lāghavalobhādadhikaṃ samavāyamabhyupagacchatā tryaṇu-
kādīnāmekasminnanekasminnapyaklṛpte kāraṇe lāghavalobhādekameva kāraṇamiti na kalpa-
nīyam । yadi tvalpaparimāṇānekadravyamelane satyeva tadadhikaparimāṇadravyāraṃbha iti loke dṛṣṭa-
tvāt tryaṇukādyāraṃbhārthamanaṃtaparamāṇvabhyupagamastadā bahūnāṃ śilpināṃ samavāye satyeva rathago-
puraprāsādādinirmāṇamiti loke dṛṣṭatvāt kāryadravyeṣu anekārabhyatvaniyamasya dadhyādi-
ṣviva mahākāryeṣvanekakartṛkatvaniyamasya kvacidapi bhaṃgādarśanena sarvābhyupagatatvāt bhūdha-
rādeḥ mahākāryatvena tatsāmyāccānanteśvarābhyupagamo'pi kāryaḥ syāt । anyathā kvacit dṛṣṭa-
niyamānusaraṇamanyatra netyavyavasthāpatteḥ । na cānaṃteśvarābhyupagamo'sti । tasmāllāghavalobhena
<pratika>dṛṣṭaniyamamaprayojakīkṛtya īśvaraikyamabhyupagacchatastathaiva</pratika> jagadupādānaikyamapyabhyupagantavyam ।
<pb n="075"/>
<sutra>।। sū ।। nityameva ca bhāvāt ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
samavāyasya nityatvāṅgīkārāt saṃbandhinityatvamantareṇa tadanupapatteravayavāva-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tasmādasamaṃjasaḥ sarvathā paramāṇukāraṇavādaḥ।sarveṣveteṣu dūṣaṇaprakāreṣu sūtramāvṛttyā yojanīyam ।
anaṃtaraprakāre samavāyaśabdaḥ ekakāryārthabahupuruṣamelanaparaḥ । <quote>‘samājeṣu samāṃśeṣu samavāyeṣu
cocyace’</quote> ityādiprayogeṣu tasya tādarthyaṃ prasiddham । yadyanyatra lāghavalobhena dṛṣṭaniyamamanā-
driyamāṇo'pi paraḥ tryaṇukakāraṇaprakriyāyāṃ tanna parityajet tatredamuparitanaṃ sūtram—<pratika>sū ।।
nityameva ca bhāvāt ।। 13।।</pratika> yatkiṃcitsaṃbaṃdhināśe'pi saṃbaṃdhanāśa iti niyamassaṃyoge
dṛṣṭaḥ । tataśca tryaṇukādināśe samavāyanāśaprasaṃgena tannityatvamabhyupagacchatā tryaṇukādīnā-
mapi nityatvaṃ svīkaraṇīyamiti tryaṇukādikāraṇatvena paramāṇusādhanamapyasamaṃjasamityarthaḥ ।
yadi cāśrayanāśanāśyatve saṃyogatvaṃ prayojakaṃ lāghavānna saṃbaṃdhatvamupādhirūpamityucyeta tade-
tthamatraiva lāghavamanusaratā jaganmūlakāraṇānumāne'pyaikyalāghavamanusaraṇīyamiti na tena
paramāṇavassiddhyeyuḥ । na ca kāryadravyāṇāmavayavasaṃyogārabhyatvaniyamānnaikasmāddravyotpattiḥ
saṃbhavatītyatra lāghavamakiṃcitkaramiti vācyam । uktaniyamāsaṃpratipatteḥ । na ca paṭādīnāṃ
tantusaṃyogādyārabhyatvadarśanāt niyamoṃ'gīkaraṇīya iti vācyam । ekāvayavirūpeṇa kṣīreṇa
dadhyāraṃbhe niyamabhaṃgāt kṣīrāraṃbhakāvayavāḥ parasparaṃ viyujya punassaṃyogāṃtaraṃ labdhvā dadhyārabhante
na tu kṣīraṃ dadhyārabhata iti kalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt ।<quote>‘kṣīravināśe kāraṇānupalabdhivaddadhyu-
tpattivacca tadupapattiḥ । ‘na payasaḥ pariṇāmo guṇāṃtaraprādurbhāvā’</quote> dityakṣapādasūtrayoḥ pramā-
ṇamūlakatvābhāvāt । na ca <quote>‘vyūhāṃtarāt dravyāṃtarotpattidarśanaṃ pūrvadravyanivṛtteranumāna’</quote>miti
tadanaṃtara <ref>(nyāya॰a-3-ā-2-sū॰17)</ref> sūtradarśitamanumānaṃ tatra pramāṇam । kṣīrameva dadhyava-
sthāmāpadyata iti pariṇāmavādābhyupagame dravyāntarotpatterasiddheḥ dravyāṃtarasyāvayavasaṃyogāṃta-
rarūpavyūhāṃtarajanyatvaniyamasyāpi mahāpaṭadhvaṃsajanye khaṇḍapaṭe vyabhicāreṇāsiddheśca ta-
ntusaṃyogapaṭayossamānasāmagrīkatvena tulāntanamanonnamanarītyā samakālotpattikatayā
paṭasya tantusaṃyogārabhyatvāsaṃpratipatteśca । na ca taṃtusaṃyoganāśasya paṭanāśakāraṇatayā
tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo vaktavyaḥ akāraṇanāśenākāryanāśāsaṃbhavāditi vācyam ।
nāśayorapi samānasāmagrīkatvena samakālatvopapatteḥ । apica । paṭasya taṃtusaṃyogāra-
bhyatvasaṃpratipattāvapi na tryaṇukasyāvayavasaṃyogārabhyatvaṃ siddhyati । yadi tatra paṭatvena taṃ-
tusaṃyogatvena ca kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaḥ na tena prakṛtārthasiddhiriti spaṣṭam । yadi kārya-
dravyatvena saṃyogatvena ca tadgrahaḥ tadāpi nāsti prakṛtārthasiddhiḥ । ekena samavāyikāraṇena
yatkiṃcidāśritasaṃyogena ca tryaṇukotpattyupapatteḥ । kāryadravyatvena samavāyikāraṇasaṃyogatvena
ca tadgrahe'pi sa eva doṣaḥ । svasamavāyikāraṇatvapraveśane tvananugamaḥ svasamavāyikāraṇasyai-
kasyaiva yatkiṃciddravyāṃtarasaṃyogenāpi tryaṇukotpattirupapadyata iti prakṛtārthasiddhiśca । samavā-
yikāraṇamātragatatvapraveśane tvaprayojakatvam । bheryākāśasaṃyogāt śabdasyeva samavāyikāraṇata-
ditarasaṃyogādapi tryaṇukotpattyupapatteḥ । tasmāt tryaṇukasamavāyikāraṇasādhanaprakriyāyāṃ
kvacillāghavamanusaratānyatrāpi tadanusaraṇīyamityapratibaṃdhenoktalāghavena tadaikyasiddhirapra-
tyūheti bhāvaḥ । evaṃ tryaṇukādikāraṇānumānamanekaviṣayatvātpracyāvitam । atha rūpādima-
<pb n="076"/>
yavinorapi nityatvaprasaṅgādasamañjasameva tat ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। rūpādimattvācca viparyayo darśanāt ।। 14 ।।</sutra>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dviṣayatvātpracyāvayituṃ sūtram—<pratika>rūpādimatvācca viparyayo darśanāt ।। 14 ।।</pratika> jālasūrya-
marīcidṛśyātyantasūkṣmabhāgarūpaṃ tryaṇukaṃ samavāyikāraṇārabhyaṃ mahattve sati cākṣuṣatvāt ।
tadapi tryaṇukasamavāyikāraṇaṃ samavāyikāraṇārabhyaṃ mahadāraṃbhakatvādityanumānasiddhatayā para-
syābhimataṃ siddhāṃtino'pi saṃpratipannam । sakalajaganmūlakāraṇamiha pakṣaḥ । tatra rūpādimattvahe-
tunā nānityatvasāvayavatve prasāddhyete । siddhāṃtino'pyaniṣṭatvāt । kiṃtu tatra rūpādikāṃgī-
kāre paraṃ pratyaniṣṭāpādanārthaṃ tadabhyupagamopapādakaṃ rūpādimattvamityanūdyate । tathā ca yaji jaga-
nmūlakāraṇaṃ rūpādimatsyāt tadā tasmin sampratipannayornityatvaniravayavatvayorviparyayassyā-
diti tasya rūpādimattve bādhakastarko'tra vivakṣitaḥ । na ca tarkamūlavyāptau vipakṣabādhakābhā-
vāt praśithilamūlatvaṃ śaṅkanīyam । rūpādīnāṃ janyatve hi rūpatvādikaṃ prayojakameṣṭavyam ।
anugatatvāllaghutvācca । tathā ca paramāṇuṣvapi rūpādikāṃgīkāre agnisaṃyogajanyā rūpā-
dayaḥ svotpattau svāśrayakāraṇagatarūpādyapekṣā iti parābhyupagatarītyaiva jalaparamāṇugatarūpā-
dīnāṃ pārthivaparamāṇugataśyāmarūpasya cotpattāvapekṣitānāṃ rūpādīnāmāśrayatvena paramā-
ṇūnāṃ kāraṇībhūtā avayavāssidhyaṃto na nivārayituṃ śakyante । sāvayavatve cānityatvama-
pyanivāryameva । yadi cedṛgvidhaṃ vipakṣabādhakamiha rūpādimattvasiddhilobhāt nādriyate tadā
paramāṇusādhakānumānaṃ teṣu rūpādisādhakānumānañca vipakṣabādhakābhāvānna pravarteteti vṛddhi-
micchato mūlamapi hīyeta । tathā hi---tryaṇukakāraṇasādhakānumāne tāvadvipakṣabādhakamitthaṃ
parairucyate---mahattvaparimāṇasya janyatve mahattvāvāṃtarajātirūpāpakarṣamātraṃ prayojakam । na tu
tadutkarṣāpakarṣarūpatadavāṃtarajātidvayam । gauravāt । tathā ca tryaṇukamahattvasyāpakṛṣṭamahattva-
rūpatayā janyatvena kāraṇāpekṣāyāṃ tatra svāśrayasamavāyikāraṇagatasaṃkhyāparimāṇasaṃyogavi-
śeṣāṇāmeva kāraṇatvena tryaṇukasya samavāyikāraṇamavaśyamabhyupagaṃtavyamiti tryaṇukakāraṇeṣu
rūpādimatsamavāyikāraṇatvena rūpādimattvānumāne ca rūpādīnāṃ kāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvameva vipa-
kṣabādhakamucyate । tatra yadi rūpasya janyatve rūpatvaṃ prayojakaṃ neṣyate tadā mahattvasya janyatve'pi
kiṃcitprayojakaṃ nānviṣyeta । tatra prayojakāpekṣāyāmatrāpi tadapekṣā tulyā । kiñca । mahattvasya
janyatve prayojakamutkarṣāpakarṣarūpajātidvayarūpamanyallabhyate'pi । na ca rūpasya janyatve rūpatvā-
tirekeṇa gurvapyavacchedakāntaraṃ labhyate।na ca kāryagatarūpatvam । tathā pārthivaparamāṇurūpānanuga-
tatvāt । vastutastu, mahattvasya janyatve parimāṇāpakarṣaḥ prayojako yuktaḥ na tu mahattvāpakarṣaḥ ।
viśeṣarūpatvāt dairghyānanugatatvācca । tataśca tryaṇukāvayavakāraṇe yadyapakṛṣṭaparimāṇamabhyupa-
gamyeta tadā tasya janyatvena kāraṇaparimāṇāpekṣāyāṃ tasya sāvayavatvaṃ prasajyeteti tatpari-
hārāya tatra paramamahattvasyābhyupagantavyatvāt । parimāṇagatajanyatāprayojakarūpāpekṣayā jaga-
nmūlakāraṇānumāne pravṛttau tena paramamahadbrahmaiva tathātvenānumitaṃ bhavet । na ca kāryadravyasya
svanyūnaparimāṇadravyārabhyatvaniyamaḥ । dorghaistaṃtubhiḥ dṛḍhatarāvarttitaistannyūnaparimāṇasya viśā-
laiḥ paṭairāvartitaistannyūnaparimāṇasya ca sūtrasyāraṃbhadarśanāt । etena tryaṇukadvyaṇukakāraṇamanu-
mīyamānaṃ tadgataparimāṇahetubahutvadvitvasaṃkhyāśrayatayānekameva siddhyenna tu lāghavādekamityapi
<pb n="077"/>
paramāṇūnāmatra rūpādimattvamaṅgīkriyate । tatastannityatvādiviparyayaḥ । tathā
ghaṭādiṣu darśanāt । tasmādapyasamañjasam ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। ubhayathā ca doṣāt ।। 15 ।।</sutra>
anityatvādiparihārāya rūpādiśūnyatvāṅgīkāre kāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvāsiddhiḥ ।
tatsiddhaye punarapi rūpādimatvāṅgīkāre ca anityatvādyanarthāpattirityubhaya-
thā'pi doṣādasamañjasameva kaṇādamatam ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। aparigrahāccātyantamanapekṣā ।। 16 ।।</sutra>
<p>sāṅkhyapakṣasya śrutinyāyaviruddhasyāpi satkāryavādādau k‍vacidaṃśe vaidikapari-
graho'sti । kaṇādapakṣasya tu kenāpyaṃśenāparigrahādatyantamanapekṣaiva niśśreyasā-
rthibhiḥ kāryā ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śaṅkā nirastā । vipakṣabādhakānādare tatkāraṇānumānasyaivāpravṛtteḥ tadādare paramamahataḥ para-
brahmaṇa eva tatkāraṇatvena siddheḥ । tathā rūpādīnāṃ kāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvaniyamo yadi neṣyeta tadā
paramāṇūnāṃ rūpādimatkāraṇatvena rūpādimattvānumānaṃ na pravarteta । na ca kāryagatarūpāṇāmeva kāra-
ṇaguṇapūrvakatvaniyama ādriyata iti vācyam । kāryagatatvaviśeṣaṇānādareṇa rūpamātrasya janya-
tvasiddhāvagnisaṃyogājanyarūpādimātrasya kāraṇaguṇāpekṣatvāt । tasmāt parābhimatarītyaiva
upanyastatarkasya dṛḍhavyāptimūlatvāt pratikūlatarkaparāhataṃ mūlakāraṇasya rūpādimattvānumānaṃ
na pravartata iti na tatra rūpādimatvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ । atha mābhūdrūpādimatvasiddhiḥ paramā-
ṇurūpadharmisiddhiravikaleti tāvatāpi santoṣo mābhūdityāha—<pratika>sū ।। u bhayathā ca doṣāt ।। 15 ।।</pratika>
<pratika>kāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvāsiddhiriti</pratika> । rūpādimattvābhāve kāryapṛthivyādiṣu parābhimatarūpakāra-
ṇānupapādanāt svarūpamātrakāraṇopapādanena nābhimatasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>tatsiddhaya iti</pratika> ।
etadda‍ūṣaṇaṃ pūrvasūtroktameva । tṛtīyaprakārāsaṃbhavajñāpanārthaṃ tu sūtrabhāṣyayoruktadūṣaṇāvartanam ।
yadyapi sāṃkhyābhimataḥ pradhānakāraṇavādaḥ tārkikābhimataḥ paramāṇukāraṇavādaśca pratyākhyātaḥ
tathā pyayamevātyaṃtaṃ pāpīyānityāha—<pratika>sū ।। aparigrahāccātyaṃtamanapekṣā ।। 16 ।।</pratika> pradhānarūpakā-
raṇātmanā sadevākāśādi kāryaṃ sargādāvabhivyajyata iti vaidikānāmapyabhyupagamo'styeva ।
tasya svātantryaṃ paraṃ neṣyate । ato'sti pradhānakāraṇavādasya kathaṃcidvaidikaparigrahaḥ । asya tu na
kathaṃcidapyasti paramāṇūnāṃ svarūpata eva vaidikairanabhyupagatatvāt । na ca vaidikaprasiddhaparamāṇu-
śabdārthatayā tadabhyupagama āvaśyakaḥ । tryaṇukeṣveva tasya śabdasya viśrāṃteḥ । <quote>‘jā1lāṃtaragate
bhānubhānau yo dṛśyate rajaḥ । paramaṃ tatparaṃ sūkṣmaṃ paramāṇuṃ pracakṣate ।।’</quote> iti paurāṇikavacanāt ।
na ca tathāpi kathaṃ nyāyaśāstrasyātyantānādaraṇīyatvaṃ caturdaśavidyāsthānāṃtargatatvāditi
śaṅkanīyam । vaiśeṣikaśāstrasya sarvathaivānādaraṇīyatvopapatternyāyaśāstrasyāpi paramāṇukāraṇa-
vādābhyupagamāṃśe yogaśāstrasya pradhānasvātaṃtryābhyupagamāṃśa iva upekṣaṇīyatvopapatteḥ ।।</p>

<head>atha vaiśeṣikādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। mahaddīrghavadvā hasvaparimaṇḍalābhyām ।। 10 ।। ubhayathāpi na karmātastadabhāvaḥ ।। 11 ।। samavā-
yābhyupagamācca sāmyādanavasthiteḥ ।। 12 ।। nityameva ca bhāvāt ।। 13 ।। rūpādimattvācca viparyayo darśa-
nāt ।। 14 ।। ubhayathā ca doṣāt ।। 15 ।। aparigrahāccātyantamanapekṣā ।। 16 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>tarhyastu kāraṇatvaṃ paramāṇūnāṃ parasparaṃ yogāta । parameśvareṇa te khalvadhiṣṭhitāḥ kaṇabhujā kathitāḥ ।। 111 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>matamidamapyasamañjasamaṇunaḥ parimaṇḍalādanutpatteḥ । ādyasya karmaṇo'ṇuṣu tatsaṃyogasya cāyogāt ।। 112 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti vaiśeṣikādhīkaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha mahaddīrghādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। mahaddīrghavadvā hrasvaparimaṇḍalābhyām ।। 10 ।। ubhayathāpi na karmātastadabhāvaḥ ।। 11 ।। samavā-
yābhyupagamācca sāmyādanavasthiteḥ ।। 12 ।। nityameva ca bhāvāt ।। 13 ।। rūpādimattvācca viparyayo
darśanāt ।। 14 ।। ubhayathā ca doṣāt ।। 15 ।। aparigrahāccātyantamanapekṣā ।। 16 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ prapañcasya pradhānaniṣṭhāśabdatvādiguṇānanvayātpradhānānupādānakatvaṃ sādhitaṃ tadvadbrahmaguṇacetanatvānanva-
yādbrahmopādānakatvaṃ na syāditi dṛṣṭāṃtasaṃgatyedamārabhyate । idamadhikaraṇamekasūtrātmaka <pratika><quote>‘mubhayathāpī’</quote></pratika> tyādikaṃ sūtraṣaṭkamadhikara-
ṇāntaram । tacca <pratika>paramāṇujagadakāraṇatvādhikaraṇa</pratika>mubhayathādhikaraṇamiti ca vyapadiśyate । asyādhikaraṇasya cetanādbrahmaṇo
jagatsargaṃ bruvanvaidikasamanvayo viṣayaḥ । sa kiṃ <quote>‘kāraṇaguṇāḥ kārye svasamānajātīyaguṇāraṃbhakāḥ’</quote> iti vaiśeṣikābhimatena
nyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehaḥ । virudhyata iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, hrasvatvāṇutvayuktāt dva‍yaṇukānmahatvadīrdhatva-
yuktasya tryaṇukasyotpattiṃ dvayaṇukaniṣṭhahrasvatvāṇutvayostryaṇuke svasamānajātīyahrasvatvāṇutvānāraṃbhakatvaṃ dva‍yaṇukagatatritvasaṃkhyā-
yāstu tryaṇuke mahatvadīrghatvāraṃbhakatvaṃ tathā pārimāṇḍalyayuktātparamāṇoḥ hrasvatvāṇutvayuktasya dva‍yaṇukasyotpattiṃ paramāṇugatapā-
rimāṇḍalyaparimāṇasya dva‍yaṇuke tādṛśapārimaṇḍalyānāraṃbhakatvaṃ paramāṇugatadvitvasaṃkhyāyāstu dva‍yaṇuke hrasvatvāṇutvāraṃbhakatvaṃ ca
svanyāyaviruddhamabhyupagacchatāṃ teṣāṃ mate hrasvaparimaṇḍalābhyāṃ dva‍yaṇukaparamāṇubhyāṃ mahaddīrghavat caśabdārthakavāśabdāt hrasvā-
ṇuvacca cetanādbrahmaṇo'cetanaṃ jagadbhavatīti yojanayā tadupapatternāyaṃ samanvayastena virudhyata iti । sūtrārtho'pi vyākhyātaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti bhagavatpādamate mahaddīrghādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>atha paramāṇujagadakāraṇatvādhikaraṇamutobhayathādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</pratika> smṛtipādasaṃbandhinā'pyavāntaradṛṣṭāṃtasaṃga-
tyā prāsaṃgikenāvyavahitenādhikaraṇena nāsya saṃgatyapekṣā । vyavahitena tu cetanānadhiṣṭhitatvātpradhānasya kāraṇatvābhāve ukte tarhi
cetanādhiṣṭhitāḥ paramāṇavaḥ kāraṇaṃ jagataḥ syuriti pratyudāharaṇasaṃgatyedamārabhyate—<pratika>ubhayathāpītyādi ।</pratika> paramāṇuprakriyayā
jagadutpattiriti vaiśeṣikarāddhāṃto'tra viṣayaḥ । sa kiṃ pramāṇamūla uta bhrāntimūlo veti saṃdehe pramāṇamūla iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।
siddhāntastu</pratika>, sṛṣṭeḥ prāk niścalayoḥ paramāṇvoḥ karmaṇā saṃyoge dva‍yaṇukādyutpattiriti hi vaiśeṣikarmataprakriyā । tasya
karmaṇaḥ kiṃcinnimittamabhyupeyam । tacca kiṃrūpamiti vicāre jīvagataprayatnābhidhātādirūpaṃ na bhavati । sṛṣṭyuttarakālikasya tasya
sṛṣṭeḥ prāgasaṃbhavāt । tasya nirnimittatvābhyupagame karmaiva notpadyeta । <pratika>ata ubhayathāpi na karma</pratika> adṛṣṭasyācetanasya svataḥ karmā-
bhimukhyāyogāt । <pratika>ataḥ</pratika>—karmābhāvāttadabhāvaḥ=dva‍yaṇukādikrameṇa sṛṣṭyutpādasyābhāvaḥ । tasmādvaiśeṣikasiddhānto bhrāntimūla iti ।।</p>
<p>kiṃ ca <pratika>।। sū ।। samavāyābhyupagamācca sāmyādanavasthiteḥ ।। 12 ।।</pratika> tadabhāva ityanuvartate । <pratika>tadabhāvaḥ</pratika>=tasya
dva‍yaṇukādisṛṣṭyutpādasyābhāvaḥ । kutaḥ । paramāṇudva‍yaṇukānāṃ samavāyābhyupagamāt । astvabhyupagamaḥ kiṃ tena । <pratika>sāmyāda-
navasthiteḥ</pratika>=yathaiva hi aṇubhyāmatyaṃtabhinnaṃ sat dva‍yaṇukaṃ samavāyena tābhyāṃ saṃbadhyate evaṃ samavāyo'pi samavāyibhyo'tya-
ntabhinnassan atyantabhedasābhyāt anyena samavāyena samavāyibhissaṃbadhyeta । tataśca tasyānyo'nyassamavāyaḥ kalpanīya
ityanavasthādoṣaprasaṃgāt । evaṃ ca samavāyāsiddhyā samavetadva‍yaṇukādisṛṣṭyasiddhiḥ syādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>apica । <pratika>sū ।। nityameva ca bhāvāt ।। 13 ।।</pratika> paramāṇūnāṃ pravṛttisvabhāvatvāṅgīkāre pravṛtternityameva bhāvātpralayābhāvaḥ
prasajyeta । nivṛttisvabhāvatvāṅgīkāre nivṛtternityameva sattvātsṛṣṭyabhāvaḥ prasajyeta । tasmātparamāṇukāraṇavādo bhrāntimūla eveti ।।</p>
<p>itthaṃ paramāṇūnāṃ kāraṇatvaṃ nirākṛtya teṣāṃ niravayavatvādikaṃ nirākaroti—<pratika>sū ।। rūpādimattvācca viparyayo darśa-
nāt ।। 14 ।। darśanāt</pratika>=loke rūpādimataḥ paṭādeḥ sāvayavatvādidarśanāt । <pratika>rūpādimattvācca</pratika>=vaiśeṣikamate jagatkāra-
ṇaparamāṇūnāṃ rūpādimattvāṃgīkārācca । <pratika>viparyayaḥ</pratika>=niravayavatvāṇutvanityatvaviparyayaḥ sāvayavattvādiḥ prasajyeta ।।</p>
<pb n="079"/>
<p>kiṃca । <pratika>sū ।। ubhayathā ca doṣāt ।। 15 ।। ubhayathā ca</pratika>= vaiśeṣikamate paramāṇūnāmupacitānupacitaguṇātmakatva-
kalpane loke upacitānupacitaguṇātmakapṛthivyādeḥ svarūpopacayadarśanāt aṇutvaṃ vyāhanyeta । tadakalpane tatkāryapṛthivyādiṣu
rūpādikaṃ nopalabhyeteti ubhayathāpi <pratika>doṣāt</pratika> anupapannaḥ paramāṇukāraṇavādaḥ ।।</p>
<p>apica । <pratika>sū ।। aparigrahāccātyaṃtamanapekṣā ।। 16 ।।</pratika> paramāṇukāraṇavādasya kenacidapyaṃśena kaiścidapiśiṣṭairaparigrahācca
tatrātyantamanapekṣā śreyo'rthibhiḥ kāryā । tasmādvaiśeṣikarāddhānto bhrāntimūla eveti siddham ।।</p>
<head>iti bhagavatpādamate paramāṇujagadakāraṇatvādhikaraṇamutobhayathādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭharāmānujamatayoridaṃ</pratika> saptasūtryātmakamadhikaraṇaṃ <pratika>mahaddīrghādhikaraṇa</pratika>mathavā <pratika>vaiśeṣikādhikaraṇa</pratika>miti vyapa-
diśyate । <pratika>pūrvapakṣasiddhāntādikaṃ</pratika> pūrvasmādaviśiṣṭam । sūtrārthanirūpaṇaprakāramātre'sti kiyadiva vaiśiṣṭyam । parasparamana-
yornāsti vailakṣaṇyakaṇikāpi । ādyaṃ sūtraṃ pūrvasūtrādasamañjasaśabdānuvṛttyā hrasvaparimaṇḍalābhyāṃ mahaddīrghāṇuhrasvotpattivadanyacca
tadabhyupagataṃ sarvamasamañjasamityarthaparatayā vyākhyātam । atra paramāṇukāraṇavādivaiśeṣikamataṃ samañjasamasamañjasaṃ veti saṃdehe
samañjasamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣa</pratika>māpādya asamaṃjasamiti ca rāddhāntitam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ubhayathāpi na karmātastadabhāvaḥ ।। 1 ।।</pratika> paramāṇukāraṇavāde jagadutpattikāraṇībhūtaparamāṇugataṃ kiṃcidādyaṃ
karmādṛṣṭakāritamabhyupagamyate । tacca karma paramāṇugatādṛṣṭakāritaṃ vā jīvagatādṛṣṭakāritaṃ veti vicāre <pratika>ubhayathāpi</pratika> adṛṣṭasya
sadotpādakatvaprasaṃgātkarma na saṃbhavati । <pratika>ato</pratika> jagadutpatteḥ <pratika>tadabhāvaḥ</pratika>=aṇugatakarmapūrvakatvābhāvaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। samavāyābhyupagamācca sāmyādanavasthiteḥ ।। 12 ।।</pratika> vaiśeṣikamate samavāyākhyasaṃbandhābhyupagamācca tanmata-
masamañjasam । kutaḥ । <pratika>sāmyādanavasthiteḥ</pratika>=samavāyasyāpi avayavijātiguṇavadapṛthaksiddhahetvapekṣāsāmyāttasyāpi tathā
saṃbandhāntarāpekṣetyanavasthāprasaṃgādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। nityameva ca bhāvāt ।। 13 ।।</pratika> samavāyasaṃbandhasya nityatvābhyupagamāt saṃbandhinityatvamantareṇa tadanupapatte-
ravayavāvayavinorubhayorapi <pratika>nityameva ca bhāvāt</pratika>=nityatvaprasaṃgādasamañjasam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। rūpādimattvāccetyādi ।। 14 ।।</pratika> aviśiṣṭārthamidam । tasmādapyasamañjasamityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ubhayathāca doṣāt ।। 15 ।।</pratika> anityatvādibhayātparamāṇūnāṃ rūpādiśūnyatvāṅgīkāre kāryaguṇasya kāraṇaguṇapūrvaka-
tvāsiddhiḥ । tatsiddhaye punarapi rūpādimattvāṅgīkāre cānityatvādyanarthāpatirityubhayathāpi doṣasabhaṃvādasamañjasaṃ kāṇā-
damatamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। aparigrahāccātyantamanapekṣā ।। 16 ।।</pratika> pradhānakāraṇavādasya śrutinyāyaviruddhasyāpi satkāryavādādau kvacidaṃśe
vaidikaparigraho'sti । paramāṇuvādasya tu kenāpyaṃśena kaiścidapi śiṣṭairaparigrahānniśreyasārthibhiratyantamanapekṣā kāryā ।।</p>
<head>iti śrīṇṭharāmānujamatayormahaddīrghādhikaraṇamathavā vaiśeṣikādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<head>athānandatīrthamate vaiśeṣikādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika> asyaiva mahaddīrghādhikaraṇasya vaiśeṣikādhikaraṇatvena vyavahāraḥ । ye tu jadatkartāramīś‍vamabhyupagaccha-
nto'pi anantaguṇamaṣṭaguṇaṃ vadanti teṣāṃ, vaiśeṣikādīnāṃ tatkalpanā sarvāpyanupapannā । ato vaiśeṣikaprakriyāyā anupapannatvānna
tadvirodha īśvarānantaguṇatvasyeti vaiśeṣikamatanirākaraṇamanena kriyate । ādyasūtreṇa vaiśeṣikābhimatā samavāyikāraṇaprakri-
yā dūṣyate । <pratika><quote>‘ubhayathāpī’</quote></pratika> tyādisūtraistu tadabhimatanimittakāraṇaprakriyādidūṣaṇamupapādyate । sūtrārthavarṇanādiprakārastu
prāyo'viśiṣṭaśśāṃkaramatāt । ato yatrāsti vailakṣaṇyaṃ tanmātramiha pradarśyate । <pratika>sū ।। mahaddīrghavadvā hrasvaparimaṇḍalā-
bhyām ।। 10 ।। mahaddīrghavat</pratika>=vaiśeṣikamate tryaṇukādigatānmahattvāddīrghatvācca yathā caturaṇukādigataparimāṇamutpadyate
tathā <pratika>hrasvaparimaṇḍalābhyāmapi</pratika>=dva‍yaṇukaparamāṇūbhayagatahrasvatvapārimāṇḍalyaparimāṇābhyāmapi tryaṇukadva‍yaṇukagataparimā-
ṇotpattiḥ syāt । anyathā mahattvadīrghatvābhyāmapi kāryotpattirna syāditi vāśabdārthaḥ । tasmādvaiśeṣikamatamanupapannamityarthaḥ ।।
<pratika>sū ।। ubhayathāpi na karmātastadabhāvaḥ ।। 12 ।।</pratika> yataḥ <pratika>ubhayathāpi</pratika>=īś‍varecchāyā nityatvānityatvapakṣadvaye'pi । <pratika>na
karma</pratika>=na paramāṇuṣu kriyotpattisaṃbhavaḥ । <pratika>ataḥ tadabhāvaḥ</pratika>=tasmindva‍yaṇukādikāryābhāvaḥ syādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। samavāyābhyupagamācca sāmyādanavasthiteḥ ।। 13।।</pratika> idamaviśiṣṭārthaṃ śāṃkaramatāt ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। nityameva ca bhāvāt ।। 14 ।।</pratika> īśecchāparamāṇvādikāraṇānāṃ sadātvāt vaiśeṣikamate nityameva sarvadaivaṃ kāryo-
tpattiḥ syāt । na tu kadācidityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ubhayathā ca doṣāt ।। 15 ।।</pratika> vaiśeṣikamate <pratika>ubhayathā ca</pratika>=paramāṇunityatvānityatvarūpapakṣadvaye'pi <pratika>doṣāt=</pratika>
tadvatsarvanityatvakāraṇābhāvanimittakatadutpattyabhāvasya doṣasya sattvāt na tatpakṣoṃ yukta ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। aparigrahāccātyantamanapekṣa ।। 16 ।। aparigrahācca</pratika>=vaiśeṣikamatasya śrutyādiparigrahaśūnyatvāt tadviruddhatvācca
tatra atyantamanapekṣā=anādaraḥ kārya ityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>ityānandatīrthamate vaiśeṣikādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ mahaddīrghādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<pb n="080"/>
atha samudāyādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। samudāya ubhayahetuke'pi tadaprāptiḥ ।। 17 ।।</sutra>
vedikaikadeśināṃ mataṃ nirākṛtam । idānīṃ vedabāhyānāṃ mataṃ nirasyate ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha samudāyādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। samudāya ubhayahetuke'pi tadaprāptiḥ ।। 17 ।।</pratika> mādhyamikayogācārasautrāṃti-
kavaibhāṣikasaṃjñāścaturvidhā bauddhāḥ । te sarve'pyādibuddhasya śiṣyāḥ krameṇa sarvaśūnyatvabāhyā-
rthaśūnyatvabāhyārthānumeyatvabāhyārthapratyakṣatvavādinaḥ । tatra <quote>‘buddha‍yā vivicyamānānāṃ svabhāvo
nāvadhāryate । ato nirabhilapyāste niḥsvabhāvāśca deśikāḥ । yathā yathā vicāryaṃte viśīryante
tathā tathe’</quote> tyādinyāyairguruṇā sarvaśūnyatvaṃ bodhiteṣu śiṣyeṣu ye gurūktaṃ tathaivāṅgīkṛtya
paryanuyogaṃ nākurvan te gurūktasya śraddhayāṅgīkaraṇāduttamāḥ, tata upari paryanuyogākara-
ṇādadhamāśceti uttamādhamatvayogānmadhyamāṃ sthitimāsthitā mādhyamikāḥ । ye tu bāhyārthānāṃ
śūnyatvamaṅgīkṛtya kathaṃ vijñānasyāpi śūnyatvaṃ jagadāndhyaprasaṅgāditi paryanuyogamakurvan te
gurūktāṅgīkaraṇasyācārasaṃjñayā bauddhamate paribhāṣitasya tata upari paryanuyogasya yogasaṃjñayā
tanmate paribhāṣitasya ca sadbhāvādyogācārāḥ । guruṇā tānpra ‘tyāntaraṃ vijñānamātramasti,
tadeva nīlādyākāraṃ na tu tadva‍yatirekeṇa bāhyaṃ nīlādikamasti, sahopalambhaniyamena nīlādīnāṃ
tattadvijñānānāṃ cābhedasiddheḥ. bhede gavāśvavattanniyamābhāvaprasaṅgāt, tadeva vijñānākārātmakaṃ
nīlādikamanādivāsanāvaśāt bahirvadavabhāsata, iti bodhite kathaṃ sarvathaiva bāhyārthasya śūnya-
tvaṃ bāhyasya nīlāderavabhāsāt ahamullekhena vijñānasyāntaratayā idamullekhena nīlāderbāhya-
tayā ca bhede'vabhāsamāne sahopalambhaniyamamātrasyāprayojakasyābhedasādhanākṣamatvāt <quote>‘sahatvo-
ktyaiva bhedānumateśce’</quote> ti yaiḥ paryanuyuktaṃ tānprati <quote>‘satyamasti bāhyaṃ nīlādikam । na tu
tatpratyakṣam । anutpannasyāvidyamānasya pratyakṣatvāyogāt utpannasya kṣaṇikasya sthityabhāvāt ।
kiṃtūtpadyamānaṃ nīlādikaṃ vijñāne svākāramarpayitvā naśyati । tato vijñānagatenākāre-
ṇātītaṃ nīlādikamanumīyata’</quote> iti bodhite sati tai <quote>‘ritthaṃ śiṣyapraśnānurodhena kiyatparyantamupa-
deśasūtraṃ pravartiṣyata’</quote> iti sūtrasyāṃte pṛṣṭe guruṇābhihitaṃ<quote>‘bhavantaḥsūtrasyāntaṃ pṛṣṭavantaḥsautrāṃtikā
bhavaṃtviti।ataste sautrāṃtikāḥ।tato‘vijñānenānumeyaṃ bāhyamitīyaṃ viruddhā bhāṣā, tasyaiva vijñā-
nasya tadviṣayapratyakṣatvāt pratyakṣasya kasyacidarthasyābhāve vyāptisaṃvedanasthānābhāvenānumānāpra-
vṛtteśce’</quote> ti yaiḥ paryanuyuktaṃ te vaibhāṣikāḥ । tānprati bāhyapratyakṣatvamapyupadiṣṭam । evaṃ vineya-
buddha‍yanusāreṇa caturdhopadeśe'pi kṣaṇikatvādibhāvanayā sarve'pi krameṇa sarvaśūtyatvaṃ pratipa-
tsyaṃta iti gurorabhiprāyaḥ । tathā'pi paryanuyoktāro yathāśrutaṃ guroruttaravākyasyārthaṃ śradda-
dhānā matāṃtarāṇyāsthiṣata । tatra vaibhāṣikādikrameṇa caturvidhānapi bauddhānnirasituṃ catvā-
ryadhikaraṇāni । tataḥ kṣapaṇakānnirasitumekamadhikaraṇam । eteṣāmadhikaraṇānāṃ pūrvādhikara-
ṇābhyāṃ peṭikāsaṃgatimāha—<pratika>vaidiketi ।</pratika> vaidikatvena siddhāṃtapratyāsannatayā buddhisthāḥ kāpi-
lakāṇabhujākṣacaraṇāḥ pūrvaṃ nirākṛtāḥ । idānīmavaidikā nirasyanta iti peṭikāsaṅgatiḥ ।
ardhavaināśikanirāsānaṃtaraṃ sarvavaināśikā nirasyaṃta iti avāṃtarasaṅgatiḥ । keṣāñcitkṣaṇi-
<pb n="081"/>
prathamamiha bauddhasiddhāntasiddhaḥ samudāyakāraṇavādo yukto na veti saṃdehaḥ ।
yukta iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । tathā hyāmananti—dvau samudāyau bāhyābhyantarau । bāhyaḥ
pṛthivyādiḥ । āntaraścittacaittyātmakaḥ । samudāyadvayameva sarvaṃ jagat । tathā
hi—bāhyasamudāyasya paramāṇavaḥ kāraṇam । te ca caturvidhāḥ । pārthivāpyataijasa-

saṃśayaṃ darśayati—<pratika>prathamamiheti</pratika> । sūtroktadūṣaṇaṃ viśadayituṃ paramate dūṣaṇīyāṃśamanuvadati—<pratika>tathā
hīti । pṛthivyādiriti ।</pratika> bhūbhūdharasamudrādirviṣaya ityarthaḥ । <pratika>citteti</pratika> । cittavijñānacai-
tyāni skaṃdhāṃtarāṇi । <pratika>samudāyadvayameveti</pratika> । paramāṇava eva dvyaṇukādibhūtabhautikaparyaṃtaṃ
bāhyasamudāyarūpeṇa saṃhanyaṃte nāvayavinamārabhante । evaṃ pañca skaṃdhāḥ āṃtarasamudāyarūpeṇa

māṇatvāt āṃtarasamudāyamadhye parigaṇanamityabhiprāyeṇedaṃ viśeṣaṇam । yadvā । atra śabda-
sparśādaya ityanenāṃtarasamudāyāṃtargataśarīreṃdriyādirūpeṇa saṃhanyamānāni bhūtāni vivakṣi-
tāni । teṣu caittyaśabdapravṛttyarthamidaṃ viśeṣaṇam । <pratika>tadabhivyaktiriti</pratika> । rūpādyupalabdhiri-
tyarthaḥ । kecittu <quote>‘tatsyādālayavijñānaṃ yadbhavedahamāspadam । tatsyātpravṛttivijñānaṃ yannīlā-
dikamullikhe’</quote>diti bauddhairvibhaktaṃ dvividhamapi jñānaṃ pravāhāpannaṃ vijñānaskaṃdha ityāhuḥ । <pratika>tajjanyaṃ</pratika>

rvijñānaskandhaḥ । tajjanyaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedanāskandhaḥ । devadattādināma saṃjñāskandhaḥ । teṣāṃ

<pratika>duḥkhamiti ।</pratika> duḥkhagrahaṇaṃ sukhopekṣāvasthayorapyupalakṣaṇam । <pratika>devadattādināmeti</pratika> । kecettu
devadattādināmollekhī savikalpakapratyayassaṃjñāskaṃdha ityāhuḥ । tanmate nirvikalpakameva
vijñānaskandhaḥ । tebhya iti । uktebhyaḥ pañcabhyaḥ skaṃdhebhya ityarthaḥ । kecittu rūpaskaṃdho
bāhyaḥ tadvyatiriktameva skandhacatuṣṭayaṃ cittacaityātmakamityāhuḥ । sūtrasyāṇuskandhahetuke
dvividhe'pi samudāye samudāyabhāvāprāptirityarthamāviṣkurvannasminsādhye sūtrakārasyāśayasthitaṃ
hetumuttarasūtraparyālocanonneyaṃ darśayati—<pratika>te hītyādinā</pratika> । samudāyayorekaikāṇuskaṃdhahetukatve
melanārthavyāpārarahitataddhetukatve vā sadātanatvāpatteḥ melanahetuvyāpārāviṣṭānekahe-
tukatvaṃ vaktavyam । na ca tatkṣaṇikatvavādibhirupapādayituṃ śakyam । yeṣāṃ vyāpārāveśasteṣāṃ
melanakṣaṇe naṣṭatvāt yeṣāṃ melanaṃ teṣāṃ vyāpārakṣaṇe'nutpannatvāt keṣāṃcinmelanahetuvyāpā-
reṇānyeṣāṃ melanābhyupagame'tiprasaṃgāt । na ca vyāpāravatāṃ melanavatāṃ caikasaṃtānavartti-
tvādanatiprasaṃgaḥ । kṣaṇikasaṃtānivyatiriktasya tāvadanuyāyinaḥ sthirasya saṃtānasya sarvakṣa-
ṇikatvavādibhiranabhyupagatatvāditi bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। itaretarapratyayatvādupapannamiti cenna
saṃghātabhāvānimittatvāt ।। 19 ।।</pratika> asthireṣu sthiratvabhrāṃtirūpāvidyā rāgādihetuḥ,
rāgādipāravaśyaṃ ca taddheturityanubhavasiddham । evamitaretarahetutvenānubhavasiddhasyāvidyārā-
gādirūpasya saṃsāracakrasya śarīreṃdriyaviṣayādirūpasamudāyābhāve'nupapatteḥ tadākṣiptassamudāyaḥ
sidhyanpratikṣeptuṃ na śakyata iti śaṃkārthaḥ । sūtre pratyayaśabdastanmataparibhāṣayā hetuvācī ।
bhāṣye rāgādiśabdastanmate avidyākāryatvena parigaṇitānāṃ saṃskārādīnāṃ saṃgrāhakaḥ । te hi
parigaṇayaṃti—avidyā, saṃskāraḥ, vijñānaṃ, nāmarūpaṃ, ṣaḍāyatanaṃ, sparśaḥ, vedanā, tṛṣṇā,
upādānaṃ, bhavaḥ, jātiḥ, jarā, maraṇaṃ, śokaḥ, paridevanā, duḥkhaṃ, durmanastā, ityevaṃjātīya-
kān । tatra kṣaṇikakāryaduḥkhaśūnyeṣu sthāyinityasukhavastubuddhiravidyā । tato rāgadveṣamohāstato
dharmādharmasaṃskārā ityetatsarvaṃ saṃskāraḥ ।saṃskāravaśājjīvasya garbhāśayadravye vṛttilābho vijñāna-
m । vijñānasaṃsargādgarbhadravyasya kalalapeśyādyākāreṇābhivyaktirnāmarūpam । tadabhivyaktikrameṇa
ṣaḍindriyāyatanaśarīranirvṛttiṣṣaḍāyatanam । nirvṛttaśarīreṃdriyasya garbhagataviṣayendriyasaṃsargajaṃ
jñānaṃ sparśaḥ । tannimitte sukhaduḥkhe vedanā । sukhaprāptiduḥkhaparihārārthā viṣayopādānecchā
tṛṣṇā । tayā viṣayeṣu pravṛttirupādānam।tataḥ krameṇa garbhānniṣkramaṇaṃ bhavaḥ । nirgatasya manuṣya-

asthireṣu sthiratvabuddhirūpāyā avidyāyā rāgādīnāṃ cānyonyakāraṇatvāt
saṃghātabhāvādikamupapannamiti cet—na, avidyāyāḥ saṃghātabhāvānimittatvāt ।
