yuktyantaramāha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। uttarotpāde ca pūrvanirodhāt ।। 19 ।।</sutra>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dyabhiṣaṃgādantardāhaḥ śokaḥ । tadutthaḥ prakāpaḥ paridevanā । maraṇakleśo duḥkham । mānasaṃ
duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyamityādi vyācakṣate । <quote>‘na saṅghātabhāvānimittatvā’</quote> diti parihārasūtrāṃśaṃ
vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>netyādinā</pratika> । kāraṇābhāvena samudāyabhāvānupapattāvuktāyāṃ kāraṇapradarśanena hi
tadupapattissamarthanīyā । tatra kimavidyākāryarāgādimadhye samudāyadvayamapyaṃtarbhūtamityavidyaiva
kāraṇamiti śaṅkyate । utāvidyārāgadveṣādipravāhasyānubhavasiddhasya upapādanārthamavaśyāṃgīka-
raṇīye śarīreṃdriyaviṣayādirūpabāhyābhyantarasamudāyabhāve tatkāraṇaṃ kiṃcidavaśyaṃ kalpanī-
yamiti । ādya āha—<pratika>avidyāyā iti</pratika> । yadyavidyaiva kevalā paramāṇvādivyāpāranirapekṣā
samudāyahetuḥ syāt tadā śuktirajatabhrāṃtirūpayāpyavidyayā śukteśśuktirūpasamudāyatāpra-
hāṇena rajatarūpasamudāyatāpattiḥ syādityarthaḥ । avidyādīnāmitaretarapratyayatvamanupapanna-
mityāha—<pratika>viduṣa iti ।</pratika> anyasyāvidyayānyasya rāgādijanane'tiprasaṃga iti bhāvaḥ । dvitīye
tu kṣaṇikavāde paramāṇvādivyāpārarūpakāraṇāsaṃbhava ukta eveti bhāvaḥ ।। syādetat । nāyaṃ
kāraṇāsaṃbhavadoṣaḥ prasarati । viralaparamāṇubhyaḥ sannikṛṣṭāḥ paramāṇavo jāyante । paraspara-
saṃnikarṣa eva teṣāṃ samudāyabhāva ityabhyupagamāt । na caivamabhyupagame'nyeṣāṃ karmaṇānyeṣu saṃyoga-
janane'tiprasaṃga iti doṣaḥ prasarati । na hi bauddhamate kṣaṇikeṣu paramāṇvādiṣu karmasaṃyogo vā
jāyate । kiṃ tu deśāṃtarasthena deśāṃtarasthasyotpādaḥ karmapratyayasyālambanaṃ viprakṛṣṭadeśena sanni-
kṛṣṭadeśe tadutpādassaṃyogapratyayasya । tataśca yathā nyāyamate nānādikprabhavaśabdamūlakaśabdaparaṃ-
parājananakrameṇa bahūnāṃ śabdānāṃ melane sati kolāhalapratyayaḥ । evaṃ bahūnāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ tathā
tathā melane sati ghaṭo'yaṃ paṭo'yamityādi pratyakṣamupapadyate । dṛṣṭaṃ hi ekaikasya keśasya
dūre dṛśyatvābhāve'pi bahūnāṃ keśānāṃ kabaryādirūpeṇa puṃjībhāve sati tatsamudāyasya dṛśya-
tvam । na cādṛśyasamudāyasyādṛśyatvaniyamaḥ । aprayojakatvāt । ekaikasya taṃtoḥ syaṃda-
nākarṣaṇaśaktyabhāve'pi tatsamudāyasya tadākarṣaṇaśaktivadekaikasya paramāṇoradṛśyatve'pi
tatsamudāyasya dṛśyatvopapatteḥ । yadāhuḥ—<quote>‘pratyekaṃ dṛṣṭyayogyatve'pyaṇūnāṃ dṛśyatā bhavet । sāmagrye
sati taṃtūnāṃ naukādyākarṣaśaktivat ।।’</quote> iti । tasmānna kāraṇāsaṃbhavena samudāyabhāvānupa-
pattiḥ ityevamāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ yuktyaṃtaraparatvenottarasūtramavatārayati—<pratika>yuktyaṃtaramāheti ।</pratika>
<pratika>sū॰ ।। uttarotpāde ca pūrvanirodhāt ।। 19 ।।</pratika> ghaṭa eva kṣaṇo ghaṭakṣaṇaḥ । bauddhamate vastutaḥ
kālo nāsti । udyanneva svarasabhaṃguro ghaṭādiḥ kṣaṇaparikalpanāmātranimittaṃ bhavati । sa ca
ghaṭādiḥ svodayavināśaparikalpitakṣaṇavattvāt kṣaṇiko'pi bhavati । vapuṣmān śilāputraka
itivat । vastutaḥ svavyatiriktakṣaṇābhāvāt svayameva kṣaṇo'pi bhavatīti teṣāṃ prakriyā । nanu,
<pb n="084"/>
uttaraghaṭakṣaṇotpattau pūrvaghaṭakṣaṇasya naṣṭatvāt abhāvasyaivotpādakatvāviśeṣāta
sarvadā sarvatra sarvotpattirapi syāt ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। asati pratijñoparodho yaugapadyamanyathā ।। 20 ।।</sutra>
asati hetāvutpattau adhipatisahakāryādīnāṃ jñānahetutvapratijñāvirodhaḥ
syāt । tasyāpi sthityabhyupagame yugapat ghaṭadvayopalabdhiprasaktiḥ । asthitau
saṃprayogajñānādeḥ yaugapadyam ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
naṣṭasya na kāraṇatvāsaṃbhavaḥ । uktaṃ hi tatvasaṃgrahe—<quote>‘bhāvānāṃ kāraṇatvaṃ nānaṣṭatayā na sthitatayā vā
api tu bhūtatayā । bhūtaśca sthito vā bhavatu naṣṭo vā kāraṇāntarapauṣkalye sati svakāryamavilaṃbena
karoti । na ca naṣṭasyātyaṃtāsattvam । yena na hyasataḥ sataḥ kāryakriyā yujyata iti codyeta । svava-
rtamānakṣaṇe sattvāt । sataścāsadrūpatā nāsti । tasmāt svakīyena sadrūpeṇeha vā janmāṃ-
tare vā phaladāyako bhavati । yathā bīje kṛtasaṃskārāt puṣpaphalādiṣu varṇarasaviśeṣā madhyā-
vasthāsvadṛṣṭāssamutpadyanta’</quote> iti । tasmānnaṣṭatvena na kāraṇatve kiñcidaparādhyate ityāśa-
ṅkyāha—<pratika>abhāvasyeti</pratika> । bhāvarahitasya kāryakāle asata iti yāvat । tataśca yadi kāryada-
śāyāmasadapi yadā kadācitpūrvaṃ sattvamātreṇa kāraṇaṃ syāt tadā sarvadā sarvatra sarvasyāpyutpattiḥ
syāt । ghaṭotpattidaśāyāmaṃkurāderapyutpattiḥ syāt । anādau kālapravāhe naṣṭasya bījāde-
ssattvāt । na ca kṣetratatkarṣaṇādisahakāripauṣkalyābhāvaśśaṅkanīyaḥ । tasyā'pi naṣṭasya
sattvāviśeṣādityarthaḥ । ato naṣṭasya kāraṇatvāyogāt dohaḻadravyāṇāmapi yāvatkāryo-
tpatti sūkṣmarūpeṇānuvṛttiraṅgīkaraṇīyeti bhāvaḥ ।। syādetat । ciranaṣṭasya nirvyāpārasya mābhū-
tkāraṇatvam । svarūpeṇa svavyāpārarūpeṇa vā pūrvakṣaṇavarttinastu syāt । avaśyaṃ ca kāraṇasya
pūrvavarttitvaṃ vācyam । tenaiva kāraṇatvopapattau kiṃ kāryakālavarttitvena । loke ca vinaṣṭasyaiva
bījasyāṅkure kṣīrasya dadhni mṛtpiṇḍasya ghaṭe ca kāraṇatvaṃ sampratipannaṃ dṛśyate । yadi tu kāra-
ṇasya kāryakālavartitvamapekṣyate tadā bījādivināśo'ṅkurādikāraṇaṃ pūrvaghaṭakṣaṇādivināśaḥ
uttaraghaṭakṣaṇādikāraṇamityastvityāśaṃkānirākaraṇārthamagrimaṃ sūtratrayam । tatrādyaśaṃkānirāka-
<pratika>raṇārthamidaṃ sūtram—asati pratijñoparodho yaugapadyamanyathā ।। 20 ।।</pratika> <pratika>asatīti</pratika> ।
kāryadaśāyāmiti śeṣaḥ । <pratika>adhipatīti</pratika> । adhipatisahakāryālambanasamanaṃtarapratyayāḥ catvāraḥ
cittacaittyotpattihetava iti bauddhānāṃ pratijñā । tathā hi—buddhasūtram—<quote>‘caturvidhānhetūnpratītya
cittacaittyā utpadyaṃta’</quote> iti । adhipatiriṃdriyam । taddhi jñānasya rūpādiṣu paṃcasvekaikamātra-
viṣayatvaniyāmakam । niyāmakaśca loke adhipatirucyate । sahakāriālokādikam । ālaṃbanaṃ
ghaṭādirviṣayaḥ । samanantarapratyayaḥ pūrvajñānam । etāṃścaturvidhān hetūnprāpya cittaṃ jñānaṃ cettyāḥ
tadabhinnāḥ sukhādayaśca jāyanta iti pratijñārthaḥ । iyaṃ pratijñā hīyeta yadi pūrvottarakṣaṇava-
rttitvaṃ viṣayasya na syāt । pūrvakṣaṇavarttitvābhāve hi kāraṇatvaṃ bhajyeta uttarakṣaṇavarttitvā-
bhāve varttamānatvagrāhipratyakṣaviṣayatvam । anyathā etaddoṣasamādhānāya kāraṇasya viṣayatā-
siddha‍yarthaṃ tasyā'pi kāryotpattikṣaṇe sthityabhyupagame ghaṭadvayayaugapadyaṃ prasajyeta । kṣaṇikatvahāniśca
syāt । athaitaddoṣadvayaparijihīrṣayā kāraṇasya kāryotpattikṣaṇe sthitimanabhyupagamya kāraṇa-
kṣaṇa eva tasya viṣayatvamabhyupagamyeta tadā samprayogajñānayorhetuhetumatoryaugapadyaṃ syādityarthaḥ ।
<pb n="085"/>
<sutra>।। sū ।। pratisaṃkhyā'pratisaṃkhyānirodhāprāptiravicchedāt ।। 21 ।।</sutra>
nirodho niranvayavināśaḥ । sa sthūlaḥ sūkṣmaśca na saṃbhavati । kapālādibhāva-
rūpāvasthāprāptereva vināśaśabdavācyatvāt sato dravyasyāvicchedāt । tato
na kṣaṇikatvasiddhiḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>sū॰ ।। pratisaṃkhyā'pratisaṃkhyānirodhāprāptiravicchedāt ।। 21 ।।</pratika> yadyapi pratijño-
parodhādeva vināśakāraṇatvaśaṅkānirāso'pi siddha‍yati, tathāpi tatra hetvaṃtarapradarśanārthamidaṃ
sūtram <pratika>। nirodha iti ।</pratika> asatkāryavādināṃ bauddhānāṃ nānuvarttamānasya dravyasyāvasthāṃtaraprā-
ptirvināśaḥ kiṃtu niranvayo niranuvṛttiko vināśaḥ । sa tairnirodhaśabdena paribhāṣyate । sa
dvividhaḥ । sthūlaḥ sūkṣmaśca । mudgarapātādyanaṃtaraṃ sarvairupalabhyamāno ghaṭādīnāṃ vināśaḥ sthūlaḥ
pratisaṃkhyānirodha ityucyate । pratisaṃkhyā viṣayasattvapratikūlā tadasattvagrāhiṇī lauki-
kānāṃ buddhistadviṣayo nirodhaḥ ityavayavārthānvayāt । tadviparīto nirodhaḥ apratisaṃkhyāni-
rodhaḥ sūkṣmaḥ laukikopalabdhyayogyo bauddhairyuktyā sādhyamānaḥ pratikṣaṇavināśaḥ । tayoru-
bhayorapyaprāptirasaṃbhavaḥ । kutaḥ । avicchedāt । ghaṭādirūpeṇa sthitasya dravyasya svarūpato vicche-
dābhāvāt । na ca dravyānuvṛttau vinaṣṭo ghaṭa ityādipratītivyavahārayornirviṣayatvāpattiḥ ।
avasthāṃtaparāpattestadviṣayatvādityarthaḥ । atrāyamāśayaḥ । taṃtūnāṃ viyojane sati paṭanāśaḥ
taṃtusamudāyātmakasya paṭasya taṃtūnāṃ viprakarṣeṇa nāśa iti vā tantusamudāyārabdhasya paṭasya
taṃtusaṃyogarūpāsamavāyikāraṇanāśe nāśa iti vā yathākathañcidutprekṣyeta । naivaṃ ghaṭanāśaḥ
kapālasamudāyanāśa iti vā kapālasaṃyogarūpāsamavāyikāraṇanāśajanyanāśa iti votpre-
kṣituṃ śakyate । ghaṭotpattisamaye kapālānāṃ melanābhāvāt ghaṭotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ mṛtpiṇḍa-
syaiva ghaṭanāśānaṃtaraṃ kapālānāmeva ca vyavasthayā darśanāt । tasmādekasyaiva mṛddravyasya
kramabhāvipiṇḍaghaṭakapālacūrṇādyavasthāśālitvamityevābhyupagantavyam । evañca sa eva
mṛtpiṇḍo ghaṭarūpāpanno dṛśyate sa eva ghaṭaḥ kapālarūpāpanna iti pratyabhijñāpyanu-
gṛhītā bhavati । ataḥ paṭādiṣvapyavasthāntarāpattireva vināśaḥ na tu niranvayavinā-
śaḥ । ayaḥ pītajalādiṣvavasthāntarāpattyadarśane'pi sūkṣmāvasthāntarāpattiranumātavyā । evaṃ
pratisaṃkhyānirodhasyāpyasambhāvanāyāmapratisaṅkhyānirodho dūrāpāstaḥ । evaṃ ca bījādiṣu
pratisaṃṅkhyānirodharūpasya pūrvaghaṭakṣaṇādiṣvapratisaṅkhyānirodharūpasya cānekakṣaṇānuyāyino
vināśasyāprāmāṇikatvāt bījādivināśaḥ kāryasahabhāvena kāraṇamityetadayuktamiti ।
idaṃ ca nirodhābhāvasādhanaṃ kāryasahabhāvikāraṇanirāsa iva kṣaṇikatvanirāse'pyupayujyata iti
tena kṣaṇikatvābhāvo'pi siddha‍yatītyāha—<pratika>tata iti</pratika> । pratisaṅkhyāpratisaṅkhyānirodhayoḥ
aprāptiḥ kāraṇatvāsambhavaḥ । <quote>‘ākāśaṃ dvau nirodhau ca nityaṃ trayamasaṃskṛta’</quote> miti bauddhai-
rnityatvenāṅgīkṛtayoḥ tayoḥ kvacida'pi kadāpi vicchedābhāvena sarvadā sarvatra sarvakāryotpa-
ttiprasaṅgāt । na ca sahakārisamavadhānavaśāt deśakālaniyamaḥ । samānanyāyatayā sahakāri-
ṇāmapi nirodhayoreva kāraṇatvaprāpteḥ । na copādānatvābhimatakāraṇatvaviṣaya eva vināśakā-
raṇatvaniyamaḥ । niyāmakābhāvāt । vastutastu mṛttantusuvarṇādyupādānatvābhimatagatarūpaspa-
rśādisvabhāvānāṃ kārye'nuvṛttidarśanāt svabhāvavantaṃ vihāya svabhāvasyānuvṛttyasaṃbhavācca
upādānakāraṇatvameva vināśakāraṇatvapratikṣepakam । uttaraghaṭakṣaṇādiṣu pūrvaghaṭakṣaṇādisādṛśya-
<pb n="086"/>
<sutra>।। sū ।। ubhayathā ca doṣāt ।। 22 ।।</sutra>
utpannasya tucchatāpattau tucchādutpattau cābhāvādutpatyasaṃbhavāt । abhāvātmaka-
kāryotpattirūpāddoṣādasamañjasamidaṃ darśanam ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। ākāśe cāviśeṣāta ।। 23 ।।</sutra>
ākāśe ca na tucchatvamupapadyate । abādhitapratītisiddhatvādasya śyenādipata-
nadeśatvena ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
mātraṃ na tu tatsvabhāvānuvṛttiriti cet, astu nāmaivam । tathā'pi mṛdādīnāṃ ghaṭarūpādatyanta-
sadṛśarūpādimattve lokaprasiddha‍yanusārikāryānugatakāraṇatvarūpaṃ prayojakaṃ kalpayituṃ yuktam ।
kāraṇatvamātrasya daṇḍacakrādāvatiprasaktatvāt mṛttvāderananugatatvāt upādānatvasyāyu-
tasiddhigarbhatvena uktarūpānatirekāt । tasmādayuktaṃ nirodhayoḥ kāraṇatvamiti sūtrasyārthāṃ-
taramupanyastarītibhirunnetuṃ śakyamiti bhāṣye na pradarśinam । nirodhayoḥ kāraṇatvanirāse
hetvaṃtarapradarśanārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>sū ।। ubhayathā ca doṣāt ।। 22 ।।</pratika> cakāro bhinnakramaḥ । prakāra-
dvayena doṣaprasaṃgāccetyarthaḥ । bauddhāḥ kila kalpayaṃti <quote>‘buddhibodhyaṃ trayādanyatsaṃskṛtaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ ce’</quote>
ti । saṃskṛtamutpādyaṃ kiṃ tattrayaṃ yasmādanyadba‍uddhibodhyamutpādyaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ cetyākāṃkṣāyāṃ tadapi
trayaṃ te parigaṇayanti, <quote>‘pratisaṃkhyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhāvākāśaṃ ce’</quote> ti । tattrayamavastu abhā-
vātmakaṃ nirūpākhyaṃ tucchamiti manyaṃte । tatra pūrvotpannasya ghaṭakṣaṇasya tadānīmeva niruddhatva-
prāptyā tucchānnirodhādeva kāryaghaṭakṣaṇasyotpattiriti yadapyabhyupagamyate tatra tucchādutpattyasaṃbha-
vastāvadeko doṣaḥ । tucchādutpattyabhyupagame hi tucchasya nirviśeṣatvena kāraṇaviśeṣakṛtaḥ kārya-
viśeṣa iti vyavasthopapādanāsaṃbhavāt ghaṭakṣaṇānaṃtaraṃ sarvasya jagata utpattiḥ syāt । tathā
tucchādutpattāvutpadyamānaṃ kāryamapi tucchamevotpadyeta na tu sadrūpaṃ kāraṇānusāritvāt kārya-
syetyaparo doṣaḥ iti <pratika>। sū ।। ākāśe cāviśeṣāt ।। 23 ।।</pratika> yadyapyākāśasya tucchatvani-
rāsaḥ prakṛte kṣaṇikatvapratikṣepe nopayujyate tathā'pi nirodhaprasaṃgāt tatsahaparigaṇitasyā-
kāśasya buddhisthatayā prāsaṃgikastasya tannirāsaḥ । <quote>‘aviśeṣā’</quote> dityasya tātparyato vyākhyāna-
mabādhiteti । abādhitapratītisiddhatvena pṛthivyādyaviśeṣādityarthaḥ । anyathā pṛthivyā-
dikamapyapahnūyeteti bhāvaḥ <pratika>। śyenādīti ।</pratika> nanu <quote>‘iha śyenaḥ patatī’</quote>tyādipratītiṣu yaḥ śyenā-
dipatanadeśatvena viṣayassa ākāśa iti pratyakṣapramāṇamanenopanyasyate ? । uta śyenādipatane-
nāvakāśasādhyena liṃgenānumīyamāno'vakāśa ākāśa iti anumānapramāṇamupanyasyate ? ।
nādyaḥ । ālokasyaiva śyenapatanādhāratayā pratyakṣaviṣayatvopapatteḥ mahāndhakāre tasyaiva khadyo-
tapatanādhāratayā pratyakṣaviṣayatvopapatteśca । iha candra iha sūryaḥ ityādipratyakṣe caṃdrasūryā-
dyāśritasyālokasya tadādhāratayā viṣayatvaṃ na saṃbhavatīti cenna । <quote>‘vane tilaka’</quote> ityādi
pratītau vṛkṣasamudāyarūpasya vanasya tilakādyādhāratveneva tadāśritasyālokasya svarūpasaṃbadha-
viśeṣeṇoktapratītau tadādhāratayā viṣayatvopapatteḥ । ākāśasyā'pi hi śyenādhārātā
svarūpasaṃbaṃdhaviśeṣeṇaivopapādanīyā । nibiḍamūrttadravyasya bhūtalāderiva tasya mukhyādhāratvāsaṃ-
bhāvāt nīrūpadravyasyākāśasya pratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ na saṃbhavatīti tu viśeṣaḥ । na ca pañcīkaraṇe-
nākāśe'pi rūpamastīti vācyam । sparśāderapi sattvaprasaṃgāt trivṛtkaraṇasyaiva śrutisūtrasiddha-
<pb n="087"/>
tvācca । ākāśādivat pradīpāloko'pyapratyakṣaḥ । vinigamanāviraheṇa udbha‍ūtarūpavadudbha‍ūta-
sparśasyāpi bahirdravyapratyakṣatāprayojakatvāt iti cenna । ātmabhinnadravyapratyakṣatvarūpasya bahi-
rdravyapratyakṣatvasya pratyakṣasāmānyasāmagryāṃ satyāṃ tattadiṃdriyayogyaviṣayaviśeṣarūpaviśeṣakā-
raṇayogādarthavaśasampannasya ghaṭabhinnadravyapratyakṣatvasyeva bahirguṇapratyakṣatvasyeva ca kāryatānava-
cchedakatvāt । tasya kāryatāvacchedakatve'pi dravyacākṣuṣaprayojakasya udbha‍ūtarūpasya tatspārśa-
natvaprayojakodbha‍ūtasparśasya ca dravyagrāhakabahiriṃdriyavyavasthāpakodbha‍ūtaguṇatvenānugatena rūpeṇa
tatprayojakatvopapatteḥ lokasiddhaprabhāpratyakṣasaṃgrāhakatvenāsyaiva tatprayojakatvaucityāt prabhā-
pratyakṣatvānaṃgīkāre'pi pratyakṣasya tadīyarūpasyaiva śyenādipatanādhāratvapratītiviṣayatvopapa-
tteśca । svarūpasaṃbaṃdhaviśeṣamātreṇa dravyādyādhāratāyā niravayavadravya iva guṇe'pyavirodhāt ।
yadi tu nīrūpadravyasyāpyādhāratayā pratyakṣaviṣayatvamupapādyate tadā diśāmeva tathātvo-
papādanaṃ yuktam । iha prāgbhāge śyenaḥ pratyagbhāge kapota ityādipratītyanusārāt । api ca ।
ākāśasya iha pakṣī neha pakṣīti ādhāratvānādhāratvapratītidvayaṃ na svāvayavabhedāvacchedena
upapādayituṃ śakyam।tasya niravayavatvāt।kiṃ tu tatprasṛtālokāndhakārānyatarāvayavāvacchedena
digbhedāvacchedena vopapādanīyam । tato varamālokāṃdhakārayoreva svasvāvayavaviśeṣāvacchedenā-
dhāratvānādhāratvavyavasthā digviśeṣāṇāmeva vā । na ca tattadadhaḥkṣitibhāgabheda evāva-
cchedakabhedaḥ syāditi vācyam । ūrdhvādharadeśayoriha pakṣī neha pakṣītyādhāratvānādhāratva-
vyavasthāyāṃ tadbhedābhāvāt । tasmānnedaṃ bhāṣyamākāśasadbhāve pratyakṣapramāṇopanyāsaparaṃ nāpya-
numānopanyāsaparamiti yuktam । āvaśyakasya nibiḍamūrtadravyābhāvasyaivāvakāśarūpatvopapatteḥ ।
ākāśāṃgīkāre'pi hi tadabhāvo'pekṣitaḥ । anyathā kuḍyādyāvaraṇe'pyapratighātaśyenādipa-
tanāpatteḥ । na ca yatra kuḍyādyāvaraṇaṃ tatrākāśa eva nāstīti śaṃkyam । tasyāsarvagatatvaprasaṃ-
gādāvaraṇāpāye tatrāvakāśadarśanācca । na hyākāśastatrāsannāvaraṇāpāye samutpadyate । api
cāvakāśaḥ pratyakṣaḥ । cakṣurunmīlanānaṃtaramihāvakāśo'sti iha nāstītyasaṃdigdhāviparyastā-
nubhavadarśanāt । na ca nīrūpadravyasyākāśasya pratyakṣatvaṃ yuktam । yuktaṃ tu nibiḍamūrttadra-
vyābhāvasya pratyakṣaghaṭakuḍyādipratiyogikasya । mūrttadravyasya abhāvaḥ prāgabhāvaḥ pradhvaṃso vetyā-
divikalpastvatra na prasarati । pratyakṣayāvannibiḍamūrtadravyasaṃsargābhāvakūṭassa ityupapatteḥ । ākā-
śāṃgīkāre'pi śyenādipatanārthamapekṣitasya mūrttadravyābhāvasyaivaṃrūpasyaiva vaktavyatvāt ।
nanu, bhāvāṃtaramabhāvo nātirikta ityabhyupagamyate. tataśca sarvataḥ śyenādipatanārthaṃ mūrtadravyā-
bhāvātmā vyāpako yo'bhāvo'bhyupagamyate sa evākāśaḥ syāditi cenna । tatra tatra prasṛta-
syālokasyāndhakārasya vā tathātvopapattāvatiriktabhāvakalpanānapekṣaṇāt । tasmādanupapanna-
mivedaṃ bhāṣyamābhāti । atrocyate । prāgbhāge śyenaḥ patatītyādipratītiṣu prāgādideśarūpo
yaḥ śyenādyādhāro bhāsate sa evākāśaḥ । tadvyatirekeṇa diśo'naṃgīkārāt ।sa ca nīrūpadravya-
tve'pi idānīṃ śyena ityādipratītiṣu kāla iva śyenādyadhikaraṇatayā pratyakṣaviṣaya ityupapa-
dyate । na ca ālokādireva deśo'stu yadupādhisaṃbandhenākāśe prāgādivibhāgaḥ kāryaḥ tadupā-
dhisambandhasya tatrā'pi sambhavāditi vācyam । prāgbhāge caṃdrālokassamunmiṣati pratyagbhāge
tamo'nuvartata ityādipratītiṣu ālokāderapyādhāratvena prāgādideśapratibhāsāt । etenā-
<pb n="088"/>
kāśe'pyādhāratvānādhāratvavyavasthārthamavacchedakatvenālokapradeśāpekṣaṇamāvaśyakamityapi śa-
ṅkā nirastā । klaptaiḥ prāgādyupādhibhistadavacchedopapatteḥ । na ca prāgbhāge'vakāśo'stītyādi-
vyavahāradarśanenāvakāśātmakādākāśādapyanyastadādhāro deśaḥ syāditi vācyam । tatrāvakā-
śaśabdasyābhimatamūrttadravyāvasthānavirodhimūrtadravyāṃtaranirodhābhāvaparatvāt । ata eva prāgbhā-
ge'vakāśo'sti na pratyagbhāge bhuñjānairbāhmaṇairnibiḍa iti kvaciddeśabhede'vakāśaniṣedho'pi
dṛśyate । evaṃ ca mūrttadravyābhāvarūpa evāvakāśastattadupādhyavacchinnaḥ prāgādivyavahārālambanaṃ
syādityapi śaṅkā niravakāśā । tasya deśādheyatvena pratīteḥ prāgbhāge'vakāśo nāsti tatra
<quote>‘nīraṃdhramāsate dvijā’</quote> ityāvaraṇābhāvarūpāvakāśapratiṣedhe'pi prāgādideśasattvavyavahārācca ।
na caivamāvaraṇābhāvarūpāvakāśasyeva prāgbhāgādirūpadeśasyāpi deśādheyatvena pratītirasti
yena tato'pi vyatirikto deśaḥ siddha‍yet । ayaṃ prāgdeśaḥ ayaṃ pratyagdeśaḥ ityādireva
hi vyavahāraḥ na tvasmindeśe prāgdeśaḥ ityādirūpaḥ । ihākāśa iti pratītestadvyatirikto deśaḥ
syāditi cenna । laukikānāmākāśapratīteruparitalavadda‍ṛśyamāne paritaścāvāṅmukhendranīlamahā-
kaṭāhavadavabhāsamāne meruśikharaprabhāviśeṣatvenāgamasiddhe nīladravya eva vyavasthitatvāt
tasya deśaviśeṣādheyatvena pratītāvapi virodhābhāvāt deśarūpasyākāśasya vyāptasyedānīmiha ghaṭa
ityādipratītiṣu kālavatpadārthaviśeṣaṇatvena viṣayatvaṃ vinā kvacidapi laukikapratītau svātaṃ-
tryeṇa viṣayatvābhāvāt । tāṃtrikaiḥ svasvakalpitamaryādānusāreṇa niyamitāyāḥ pratīterartha-
tatvāvyavasthāpakatvāt।tasmādidaṃ bhāṣyamākāśe śyenādipatanādyādhāradeśāvagāhipratyakṣapramā-
ṇopanyāsaparamiti tāvadupapadyate । ata eva bhāṣye <quote>‘śyenādipatanadeśatvene’</quote> ti deśagraha-
ṇam । evamanumānapramāṇopanyāsaparamidaṃ bhāṣyamityapyupapadyate । na ca nibiḍamūrttadravyābhāve-
nārthāṃtaram । tadatiriktadeśānaṃgīkāre yatraikaḥ śyenaḥ patati tatraiva śyenāṃtarasyāpi patana-
prasaṃgāt । samīpe mūrttadravyābhāvasattvāt tatra sa nāstīti cet satyam । yatra nāstītyucyate
sa evākāśākhyo deśaḥ siddha‍yet । āloko'ndhakāro vā sa deśaḥ syāditi cenna । tadubhayāti-
riktasyāpi deśasyānaṃgīkāre yatra pradīpālokamaṇḍalamavatiṣṭhate tatrā'pi tamaḥprasaraṇaprasaṃgāt ।
ālokābhāvamapekṣya tamaḥ prasarati sa nāstīti cedyatra nāstītyucyate sa tābhyāmapyanyo
deśaḥ siddha‍yan ākāśaḥ paryavasyedityeṣā dik । tasmādyuktamidaṃ bhāṣya <quote>‘mabādhitapratī-
tisiddhatvādasya śenādipatanadeśatvene’</quote> ti । prasaṃgāgatamākāśasyāvastutvanirākaraṇamavasi-
tam । prakṛtaṃ kṣaṇikatvanirākaraṇamanuvartate । atreyaṃ śaṃkā samunmiṣati । pratyakṣānumānasi-
ddhaṃ bhāvānāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ pratikṣeptumaśakyam । pratyakṣaṃ tāvadvartamānavastuviṣayamavartamānādatī-
tāt pūrvakṣaṇavārttino'nāgatāccottarakṣaṇavarttinaḥ svaviṣayaṃ vyāvṛttamavagamayati yathā
nīlo ghaṭa iti jñānaṃ svaviṣayamaruṇādivyāvṛttam।tathānumānamapi ghaṭādiḥ kṣaṇikaḥ arthakriyā-
kāritvāt śarīrādivat vyatirekeṇa tucchavat । na cānvayadṛṣṭāṃtāsiddhiḥ । śīryate hi
pratikṣaṇaṃ śarīram । tathāhi—jātamātrasya śiśoḥ śarīraṃ pratidivasamupacitaparimāṇamanubhūyate ।
tadanubhavo varṣadhārāpūryamāṇataṭākasyeva sūkṣmatamasūkṣmatarādipraṇāḍikayā kramopacitadarśana-
yogyapūrvaparimāṇavailakṣaṇyasthūlaparimāṇaviṣayatayaiva samarthanīyaḥ । na tu jhaṭiti mṛtpiṇḍadva-
yasaṃyojanena jātasya mahāmṛtpiṇḍasyeva uktapraṇāḍīnirapekṣotpattikamahāparimāṇaviṣayatayā ।
<pb n="089"/>
<sutra>।। sū ।। anusmṛteśca ।। 24 ।।</sutra>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śarīre tathā mahāparimāṇotpatteradarśanāt । kramopacīyamānaparimāṇabhedāśca muhūrtanāḍi-
kādivyavadhānena lavanimeṣādivyavadhānena vā vilaṃbya vilaṃbya jāyaṃta ityatra na kiñciddhi-
nigamakamasti । tataḥ kramikeṣu kṣaṇeṣu pratikṣaṇaṃ jāyanta ityabhyupagantavyam । ekasminkṣaṇe
parimāṇadvayādarśanena kṣaṇabhedamātrasyāpekṣitatvāditi dehaparimāṇasya tāvatsiddhaṃ kṣaṇika-
tvam । ayaṃ nyāyaḥ kramasaṃvardhamānatṛṇatarugulmalatādiparimāṇeṣu kramikocchūnatāpattimannīrani-
kṣiptavrīhibījādiparimāṇeṣu ca yojanīyaḥ । parimāṇabhedaśca dravyabhedaniyataḥ tadbhedamavaga-
mayati । na cāprayojakatvam । prāgavasthāpekṣayāvayavasaṅkhyotkarṣaṃ praśithilāvayavasaṃyogaṃ vā
vinā tadasaṃbhavāt । āgaṃtukānāmavayavāṃtarāṇāṃ pūrvasiddhaṃ prati kāraṇatvāyogena dravyāṃta-
rotpatteḥ pūrvadravyanāśasya cāpyabhyupagaṃtavyatvāt nibiḍatarasaṃyogavināśaṃ vinā praśithilāvaya-
vasaṃyogotpattyasaṃbhavena pūrvasaṃyoganāśe satyasamavāyikāraṇanāśena pūrvadravyanāśasya dravyāṃtaro-
tpatteścābhyupagantavyatvācca । evañca parimāṇabhedādarśane'pi samudrādīnāṃ pratikṣaṇasamāpa-
tannadījalādirūpāvayavāntarānvayāt bhedaḥ kṣayarogagrastaśarīrādiṣu pratikṣaṇamavayavāpaca-
yāt bhedaḥ । samavāyikāraṇanāśasya dravyanāśakatvāt । tasmānnānvayadṛṣṭāṃtāsiddhiḥ । na
cāpi vyatirekadṛṣṭāṃtāsiddhiḥ । arthakriyākāritvameva sattvamiti <quote>‘tucchamasannārthakriyā-
kāri, nāpi kṣaṇikam, kiṃ tu nitya’</quote>miti bauddhasiddhāṃtādityevamāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ
sūtram—<pratika>sū ।। anusmṛteśca ।। 24 ।।</pratika> yathā khalvabhijñānaṃ viṣayasya vartamānakālasambaṃdhaṃ
viṣayīkaroti tathā pratyabhijñānaṃ vartamānakālasambaṃdhamapi viṣayīkaroti । tathā ca dvivi-
dhajñānaprāmāṇyādekasya vartamānāvartamānakāladvayasambaṃdhasiddhau dvayorapi kramikatvenāviro-
dhāvagamādvartamānakālasaṃbaṃdhaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ tadayogavyavacchedamātramavagamayet । nānyayogavyava-
cchedam । svāvacchedena vānyayogavyavacchedamavagamayet । na tu sarvātmanā । ata eva citrapaṭe
nīlo'yamiti jñānaṃ nānīlavyāvṛttiṃ gamayati pradeśaviśeṣāvacchedena vā tāṃ gamayati ityabhyupa-
gamyate । na hi dharmayorvirodho bhinnatvādeva kalpanīyaḥ । api tu sāmānādhikaraṇyapramityanu-
dayena । tadudaye tu svamanīṣikāmātrakalpito virodho na pramāṇaśaraṇānāṃ hṛdayaṃgamaḥ । anu-
mānamapi pratyabhijñāpratyakṣaviruddhaṃ kālātyayāpadiṣṭaṃ na kṣaṇikatvaṃ sādhayituṃ kṣamate । nanu
pratyabhijñeti naikaṃ jñānaṃ saṃbhavati । taddhi na tāvadaiṃdriyakānubhavarūpamiṃdriyāṇāmatītatattāṃśe
sāmarthyābhāvāt । nā'pi smṛtirūpaṃ saṃskārasyānanubhūtedantāṃśe sāmarthyābhāvāt । na ca
saṃskāreṃdriyayoḥ parokṣāparokṣajñānajanakayoḥ pratyakṣānumitisāmagryorivaikajñānajanakatvaṃ saṃbha-
vati । yena kāladvayaviśiṣṭābhedaviṣayaṃ tadekaṃ jñānaṃ syāt । tasmānniraṃtarotpannasmṛtyanubhava-
rūpajñānadvayātmikā sā । tatasso'yaṃ devadatta ityādivyavahāramātramiti yuktam । abheda-
jñānābhāve'pi hi sāmānādhikaraṇyavyavahāramātramasti । yathā śaiśavāvasthāṃ parāmṛśya vārdha-
ke'pi sa evāyaṃ caitra iti vyavaharaṃti । na khalu śiśuvṛddhadehayoratyantavilakṣaṇayoraikya-
pratyabhijñā kasyāpi bhavitumarhati । tadāhuḥ—<quote>‘smṛtiḥ pūrvānubhūte'rthe darśanaṃ vārtamānike ।
tayoratyantabhede ca kasyābhedaḥ pratīyatām । rūpaśaktyādibhedena bālādva‍ṛddho'sti bhedavān ।
darśanasmaraṇe cāpi yathāsvaṃ samavasthite । para smi/?/npūrvarūpasya na leśo'pyupalabhyate । para-
<pb n="090"/>
pratyabhijñānādapi na kṣaṇikatvasiddhiḥ । tadevedamiti sāmānādhikāraṇyenā-
tītavartamānakālaviśiṣṭaṃ vastvekamiti hi vijñāyate । sāmagrī ca tasyāḥ pūrvā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
syā'pi na pūrvatra kathamekaṃ tu tadbhavet । sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ bhede'pi vastunoḥ ।
tāvanmātrādabhede tu bhedaḥ syānnaiva kasyacit ।।’</quote> iti । astu vā yathākathaṃcit ekajñānarūpā
kāladvayaviśiṣṭābhedaviṣayā pratyabhijñā । bhrāṃtirūpaiva sā dṛśyate । kramasaṃvardhamāneṣu śarīrataru-
gulmādiṣu saṃtatasaṃtanyamānāvayavopacayāpacayavatsu bhūgolakagirinadīsamudrādiṣu ca ghaṭaku-
ḍyādiṣu kadācidavayavāpacayaṃ prāpteṣvapi tathaiva pratyabhijñā dṛśyate । yatrāvayavāpacayo na dṛṣṭaḥ
tatrāpi kiyatāpyavayavenāntataḥ paramāṇumātreṇa kadācidapacayo bhavan nāstīti na kenā'pi
niścetuṃ śakyate । ataḥ kūṭasākṣiṇī pratyabhijñā kutrāpi na viśvasanīyeti kathaṃ tadbalena
pratyakṣasya viṣayavyavasthānumānasya bādhaśca siddha‍yet ityāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>tadevedamiti</pratika> । ayamā-
śayaḥ । kāladvayaviśiṣṭābhedāvagāhi sarvānubhavasiddhaṃ tadidamityekaṃ jñānaṃ tāvannāpahnavā-
rham । tadanaṃtaraṃ tadarthina idamarthe purovarttini pravṛttidarśanāt । tasya jñānadvayarūpatvena purova-
rttini tattāvaiśiṣṭyāvagāhinaḥ kasyāpi jñānasyābhāve tadarthinaḥ purovarttini pravṛttyasaṃbhavāt ।
lāghavena viśiṣṭajñānasyaiva pravartakatayā bhedāgrahāt pravṛtteranupapatteḥ । tacca jñānaṃ pratyakṣam ।
<quote>‘tamimaṃ sākṣātkaromī’</quote> tyanubhavāt । ataḥ kāryabalāt tatra saṃskārasahitamiṃdriyaṃ kāraṇa-
miti kalpyate । yadi tattāṃśe neṃdriyasannikarṣaḥ, tadā tadaṃśe parokṣatvamastu । śuktirajatajñānasya
dharmyaṃśe pramātvavat saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇatāyāḥ sannikarṣatvakalpane tu nāparokṣatvasyāpyanupapattiḥ ।
tasya ca śarīrādiṣu bālyayauvanādyavasthābhede'pi na bhramatvam । avasthāvaddravyaikyaviṣa-
yatvāt । na hi bālyavārdhakāvasthādvayaikyaṃ pratyabhijñāviṣyaḥ । kiṃtvavasthāvaddravyaikyameva ।
tadapyaṃtataḥ pradarśitapratyabhijñābalādeva siddha‍yati । avasthānāmāgamāpāyitvenānuyā-
yyavasthāvadanaṅgīkāre pratyabhijñāyā nirviṣayatvāpatteḥ । etenāgamāpāvyavasthātirekeṇā-
vasthāvadanuyāyi dravyaṃ kvacidapi nāsti । paramāṇavo'pi kevalaṃ gandharasarūpasparśā-
tmakā ityaṅgīkṛtya yadbauddhāḥ pratyabhijñāyaḥ viṣayābhāvamupapādayaṃti <quote>‘avasthānāmayaṃ
bhedo nāvasthāturmato yadi । avasthā eva dṛśyaṃte na svapne'pi tato'parami’</quote>ti tannirastam ।
anuyāyyarthaviṣaye pramāṇe jāgrati tadanaṃgīkārāyogāt । nanu, avasthāvaddravyāṃgīkāre'pi
tadabhedaḥ pratyabhijñāviṣaya iti na śakyamupapādayitum । parimāṇarūpāvasthābhede tannirvāha-
kāvayavopacayāpacayakṛtadravyabhedāvaśyaṃbhāvāditi cetsyādayaṃ doṣastārkikāṇāmāraṃbhavāde
nāsmākaṃ pariṇāmavāde । avayavopacaye pūrvasiddhameva dravyamanekatvāvasthāmapahāya ekatvāva-
sthāmāpadyate tadapacaye punarapyanekatvāvasthāmiti hi pariṇāmavādaprakriyā prāgāraṃbhaṇādhi-
karaṇe pratipāditā । tasmādabādhitārthaviṣayayā pratyabhijñayā ghaṭādidravyasthairyasiddhirapra-
tyūhā । ātmaviṣayayā yo'haṃ bālya ityādirūpayā tayātmasthairyasiddhiratitarāmapratyūhā ।
kiñca । <quote>‘tasmādbhrāṃtiriyaṃ bhinneṣvabhedādhyavasāyataḥ । pratyabhijñā sadṛkṣeṣu jvālādiviṣayā
yathe’</quote>ti jvālālūnapunarjātakeśanakhādipratyabhijñādṛṣṭāṃtena ghaṭādipratyabhijñānāmapi sādṛśya-
nibandhanabhrāṃtitvamupapādayadbhirapyātmapratyabhijñāyāḥ pramātvamāstheyameva । pūrvāparānusaṃdhā-
tari tadanuyāyisādṛśyānusaṃdhātari cha sthirātmanyasati bhramarūpāyā api pratyabhijñāyā utpa-
<pb n="091"/>
nubhavajanitasaṃskāravataḥ puruṣasyendriyasaṃyogaḥ । tataḥ kṣaṇikatvādyanupapannārthā-
bhidhānāt asaṃbaddha eva samudāyakāraṇavādaḥ ।।
iti samudāyādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
atha dṛṣṭatvādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
bāhyārthāstitvavādiṣu goghaṭādīnāṃ pratyakṣatvavādino bauddhā nirastāḥ । jñānā-
numeyatvavādino nirasyante—
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ttyasaṃbhavāt । tathā kṣaṇikatvānumānamupapādayadbhirapi tatsthairyamāstheyam । sādhyasādhanabhūya-
ssahacāradarśanavyāptigrahapakṣagataliṃgadarśanavyāptismaraṇānumitīnāṃ vyadhikaraṇānāṃ hetuhetu-
madbhāve'tiprasaṃgāt । ataḥ pratyabhijñābhrāṃtitvānumānasyātmapratyabhijñāyāṃ ghaṭādikṣaṇika-
tvānumānasyātmani cāparihāryo vyabhicāraḥ । pratikūlatarkaparāhataṃ ca kṣaṇikatvānumānam ।
na hi kṣaṇikatve jñānecchākṛtiphalavyavasthā, anubhavasmaraṇavyavasthā, saṃśayanirṇayavyavasthā,
kiñcidarthanidhānatatpratyanumārgaṇavyavasthā, kiñcidarthadarśanatatkutūhalaviramaṇavyavasthā, karma-
phalabhogavyavasthā, baṃdhamokṣavyavasthā ceti saṃbhavati । anyasya jñānaṃ tato'nyasyecchetyā-
dyavyavasthāprasaṃgāditi ।। iti samudāyādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</p>
<head>atha dṛṣṭatvādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p>evaṃ vaibhāṣikamataṃ, nirākṛtya tatsaṃgatyā sautrāṃtikamatanirākaraṇārthamadhikaraṇāṃtaramava-
tārayati—<pratika>bāhyārtheti</pratika> । yadyapi samudāyabhāvanirākaraṇaṃ kṣaṇikatvanirākaraṇañca sautrāṃti-
kānāmapi samānaṃ tathāpi prāguktaḥ samudāyabhāvanirākaraṇamaheturna sautrāṃtikamate pravartate ।
tathāhi—kāraṇābhāvena tannirākaraṇaṃ kṛtam । asiddhaḥ kāraṇābhāvaḥ । pūrvapūrvakāraṇakṣaṇā-
nāmuttarottarakāryakṣaṇānprati pūrvavartanamātreṇa kāraṇatvasaṃbhavāt । tatra hi pakṣe vartamānatva-
grāhipratyakṣaviṣayasya tatkāraṇatvaṃ na syāditi pratyabhijñāvirodhamātramuktam । sā pratya-
bhijñā bāhyārthapratyakṣavādināmeva na tadanumeyatvavādinām । yattu kāraṇasya kāryātyanta-
sadṛśarūpādimattve tadanugatakāraṇatvamanugataṃ prayojakaṃ kalpyamityuktam । tatkalpanāpi
na pravartate । kṣaṇikatvānumānavirodhāt । bādhakābhāve hyanugataprayojakakalpanam ।
tathā kṣaṇikatvānumāne pratyabhijñayā vādha uktaḥ so'pi na pravartate । bāhyārtheṣu pratyakṣapratya-
bhijñāyā asiddheḥ । anumitirūpāyāḥ vipakṣabādhakatarkasahakṛtaprabalakṣaṇikatvānu-
mānavirodhenānutthānāt । vipakṣe vādhakatarkaścātra sattvocchittiprasaṃgaḥ । arthakriyā-
kāritvameva hi sattvram । na tato'nyajjātyādirūpam । pramāṇābhāvāt । tacca sthāyitvapakṣe</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha samudāyādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। samudāya ubhayahetuke'pi tadaprāptiḥ ।। 17 ।। itaretarapratyayatvādupapannamiti cenna saṃghātabhā-
vānimittatvāt ।। 18 ।। uttarotpāde ca pūrvanirodhāt ।। 19 ।। asati pratijñoparodho yaugaradyama-
nyathā ।। 20 ।। pratisaṃkhyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhāprāptiravicchedāt ।। 21 ।। abhayathā ca doṣāt ।। 22 ।।
ākāśe cāviśeṣāt ।। 23 ।। anusmṛteśca ।। 24 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>skaṃdhāṇuhetukau dvāvāntarabāhyau vadanti samudāyau । kṣaṇikatvatatvavādiṣu vaibhāṣikasaṃjñakāḥ kecit ।। 113 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>tatra yadi karturiṣṭiḥ so'pi kṣaṇika iti kartṛtāsya katham । tadaniṣṭau ca na kāryaṃ na saṃprayuktasya cekṣyamāṇatvam ।। 114 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti samudāyādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<pb n="092"/>
<sutra>।। sū ।। nāsato'dṛṣṭatvāt ।। 25 ।।</sutra>
<p>iha bauddhaikadeśino jñānānumeyatvavādo yukto na vā ।।
iti saṃśaye pūrvapakṣaprasaṅgaḥ—jñāne svākāraṃ samarpya vinaṣṭamarthaṃ jñānākāravaicitrye-
ṇānuminoti jñātā, tato jñānavaicitryeṇa bāhyārthavaicitryamanumīyata iti ।।
tadetanna saṃbhavati, arthasya kṣaṇikatvādasato vinaṣṭasya dharmiṇo dharmasaṃkrama-
ṇasyādṛṣṭatvāt ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
na saṃbhavati । tathāhi sthāyī bhāvaḥ svīyāmarthakriyāṃ kiṃ krameṇa kuryāt yugapadvā । ādye
kālāntarabhāvinīṃ pratyapi idānīṃ samartho na vā । prathame tāmapīdānīmeva kuryāt । sama-
rthasya kṣepāyogāt । dvitīye kālāntare'pi na kuryāt । idānīmasamarthaḥ kālāntare samartha
ityekasminviruddhadharmādhyāsastu na saṃbhavati । dvitīye tvidānīmeva kartavyasya sarvasya
kṛtatvāt kālāṃtare tasyāsattvaṃ bhavediti । nanu, kṣaṇikatve bahavaḥ pratikūlatarkāḥ prāgda-
rśitāḥ । kiṃ bahunā । ayamapi vipakṣabādhakatarkaḥ kṣaṇikatvapakṣe na pravartate । tadupayogyāpā-
dyāpādakabhūyassahacāradarśanopādhyabhāvāvadhāraṇavyāptigrahaṇādīnāmaikādhikaraṇyaniyamāt ।
maivam । evamādīnāmaikādhikaraṇyaniyame kṣaṇikatvavādināmasaṃpratipatteḥ । atiprasaṃgaśaṃkā
tu kāryakāraṇabhāvasya niyāmakatvābhyupagamena nivāraṇīyā । caitramaitrādayo hi pratyekaṃ kārya-
kāraṇabhāvāpannaniraṃtarasantanyamānālaya(vijñā1nāśritapravṛtti)vijñānakṣaṇanicayātmakāḥ yathā
caitrādimāsāḥ pratyekaṃ pūrvāparabhāvāpannanirantarasantanyamānadivasanicayātmakāḥ । tataśca
yathā tattanmāsavratānāmanekadivasāśrayāṇāmapi tattanmāsāntargateṣveva divaseṣu vyavasthitiḥ
nānyamāsāṃtargatadivasāśrayavrataviśeṣasya māsāntaradivasasaṃbaṃdhaḥ tathā caitramaitrādigatajñā-
necchānubhavasmaraṇādīnāmanekālayavijñānāśritānāmapi caitramaitrādyantargateṣveva teṣu vyava-
sthitiḥ । nānyapuruṣāṃtargatālayavijñānāśritapravṛttivijñānādikāryecchādīnāṃ puruṣāntarā-
ntargatālayavijñānasaṃbaṃdha iti yuktaiva vyavasthā । tasmānna kvāpyatiprasaṃga iti । evamadhi-
kāśaṃkānirākaraṇārthamadhikaraṇāṃtaram—<pratika>sū ।। nāsato'dṛṣṭatvāt</pratika> । atredaṃ sautrāṃtikamatam ।
jñānagatairnīlādyākārairbāhyārthagatāste'numīyaṃte । yadyapi nīlādijñānamaparokṣatayānubhūyate
iṃdriyavyāpārānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyi ca bhavati । tathāpi iṃdriyasannikṛṣṭena yenārthena
yat jñānaṃ jāyate na tajjhānaṃ tadviṣayakam । kiṃ tu svayamapyarthavannīlādyākāraṃ bhavati ।
tajjñānaṃ svaprakāśatayā svātmānaṃ viṣayīkurvat svagataṃ nīlādyākāramapi viṣayīkaroti ।
ato nīlādijñānasya nāparokṣyānubhavavirodhaḥ । na vā iṃdriyavyāpārānuvidhānavirodhaḥ ।
nīlādyarthino bahiḥpravṛttistu nāparokṣajñānāt kiṃ tu tadanaṃtarabhāvina anumānikajñānāt ।
yathā vāyuniṣevaṇārthinaḥ śākhācalanaṃ dṛṣṭvā vṛkṣamūle pravṛttirna cākṣuṣaśākhācalanajñānāt
kiṃ tu talliṃgakavāyusaṃcāraviṣayānumānikajñānāditi । atredaṃ dūṣaṇam । iṃdriyasannikṛṣṭabhā-
vakṣaṇānaṃtarakṣaṇe hi jñānaṃ jāyate । tatra yathā varttamānatvagrāhiṇyatītasya tasya bhāvasya
viṣayatvaṃ na yujyate । evaṃ svadharmasaṃkramaṇanimittatvamapi na yujyate । vidyamānasyaiva japāku-
sumādeḥ sphaṭikādiṣu svadharmasaṃkramaṇasya dṛṣṭatvāt । tathāpi nīlādisaṃkramaṇābhyupagame
<note>(1) etadrekhāṃkitaṃ kha. ga. pustakayornāsti ।</note>
<pb n="093"/>
<sutra>।। sū ।। udāsīnānāmapi caivaṃ siddhiḥ ।। 26 ।।</sutra>
kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamādanya evānuṣṭhātānya eva phalasvāmī । ato niṣpraya-
tnānāmapi sarvārthasiddhiḥ syāditi durupapādo'yaṃ vāda iti ।।
iti dṛṣṭatvādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tadgataṃ purovarttitvanedīyastvadavīyastvajaḍatvādikamapi saṃkrāmati । na vā saṃkrāmati cedā-
ntaratvajñānatvādestadvirodhino'vabhāso na syāt sphaṭike lauhityasaṃkrāṃtau tadvirodhina-
śśauklyasyeva । atha na saṃkrāmati darpaṇe mukhagataprāṅmukhatvanedīyastvādivattadā liṃ-
gābhāvena tadavabhāso na syāt । ataḥ kṣaṇikavāde bāhyārthapratyakṣatvasyeva tadanumeyatvasyā-
pyasaṃbhavāt bāhyārthavyavahārasiddhyarthaṃ teṣāṃ sthāyitvamevāṃgīkaraṇīyamiti vaibhāṣikasau-
trāṃtikasādhāraṇaṃ kṣaṇikavāde dūṣaṇamāha—sū ।। <pratika>udāsīnānāmapi caivaṃ siddhiḥ ।। 26 ।।</pratika>
nanūdāsīnānāṃ siddhirāpādayituṃ na śakyate teṣāṃ tatkāraṇakarmatajjanyavyāpārarahitatvāt ।
na ca kṣaṇikapakṣe yāgādyanuṣṭhānānaṃtaraṃ svargādiphalabhājāmapi tadrāhityaṃ tulyamiti vācyam ।
teṣāṃ sthāyivyāpārarahitatve'pi yāvatphalaprāptisantanyamānakṣaṇikavyāpāraśālitvādityā-
śaṃkya karmatadvyāpārakṣaṇikatvaprayuktaṃ nedamāpādanaṃ kiṃtvanuṣṭhātṛbhok‍tṛbhedaprayuktamiti sūtra-
tātparyamāha—<pratika>kṣaṇikatveti</pratika>। nanu kāryakāraṇabhāvenaikapravāhāntargatau satyāmihānyakṛ-
takarmaphalamanyo bhuṃkte iti niyamānnātiprasaṃga iti cet । satyapi kāryakāraṇabhāve'nyasya
phalabhogārthamanyasya bahuvittavyayāyāsasādhyeṣu karmasu pravṛttyanupapatteḥ । aikyabhramātpravṛttiḥ
syāditi cenna । kṣaṇikatvaniścayavataḥ pravṛttyanupapatteḥ । nanu satyapi bhedagrahe putrapautrādi-
paraṃparānubhāvyaphalecchayā karmasu pravṛttirdṛṣṭeti tadvadihāpi syāt tatra kāryakāraṇabhāva-
niyāmakasya klṛpteriti cettarhi pitṛkṛtānāmanyeṣāmapi karmaṇāṃ phalaṃ pitranubhavādikārya-
smaraṇādikaṃ ca putrapautrādiparaṃparāyāṃ bhavet । kāryakāraṇabhāvasaṃbandhasya svakīyavijñānasaṃ-
tāna iva putrapautrādisaṃtāne'pi sattvāviśeṣāt । tasmāt kāryakāraṇabhāvasyāniyāmaka-
tvāt karmatatphalādivyavasthāsiddhaye pratyabhijñāprāmāṇyanirvāhāya cātmano'nyeṣāṃ ca sthai-
ryamevāṃgīkaraṇīyam । kṣaṇikatvānumānasya vipakṣabādhakatarkastu na pravartate । samarthasyāpi
sahakārisamavadhānakramāt kramikakāryajanakatvopapatterityādiḥ kṣaṇikavādinirākaraṇaprapaṃca-
statratatra graṃthāṃtare draṣṭavyaḥ । nanu tathāpi kathaṃ sarvātmanā kṣaṇikatvanirākaraṇaṃ śarīrabhūgola-
kagirinadīsamudrādiṣu dravyasthairye'pi tadīyaparimāṇādirūpāvasthāviśeṣāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvasyā-
nivāryatvāditi cenmaivam । tadbhedasyāvayavopacayādyāgantukahetvadhīnatvāṃgīkāreṇa vaināśi-
kamata iva hetvaṃtaranirapekṣapratikṣaṇaniyatasvarasabhaṃgavatvarūpakṣaṇikatvāprāpteḥ । tarhi tārkikai-
śśarīrādidravyanāśo'pi sahetuka evāṃgīkṛta iti kathaṃ te'rdhavaināśikaparibhāṣayā vaināśika-
koṭau nikṣipyante ? । ucyate । dravyabhedāṃgīkāre atisthiratvena prasiddheṣvapyartheṣu vyaktyabhe-
dapratyabhijñā bhrāṃtā syāditi kūṭasākṣiṇyāḥ pratyabhijñāyāḥ kvacidapi vyaktisthairye pramāṇa-
yitumaśakyatvāt dravyabhedavādinaḥ sarvavaināśikapakṣa eva patitāḥ syuḥ । pratyabhijñaiva hi
sāramavalambanaṃ vyaktisthairyasiddhau । anena viśeṣeṇocyante ardhavaināśikāstārkikā iti ।।</p>
<head>iti dṛṣṭatvādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<pb n="094"/>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha dṛṣṭatvādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। nāsato'dṛṣṭatvāt ।। 25 ।। udāsīnānāmapi caivaṃ siddhiḥ ।। 26 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>svākāramarpayitvā jñāne viṣaye vinaṣṭe'pi । jñānākṛtivaicitryādvadanti sautrāṃtikāstadanumeyam ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>tadapi na yuktaṃ dharmiṇi naṣṭe taddharmasaṃkramaṇam । pratibiṃbanānuvṛtteḥ bimbe sthita eva dṛṣṭatvāt ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti dṛṣṭatvādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacaṃdrikāyām</head>
<head>atha samudāyādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<sutra>sū ।। samudāya ubhayahetuke'pi tadaprāptiḥ ।। 17 ।। itaretarapratyayatvāditi *cennotpattimātranimi-
ttatvāt ।। 18 ।। uttarotpāde ca pūrvanirodhāt ।। 19 । asati pratijñoparodho yaugapadyamanyathā ।। 20 ।।
pratisaṃkhyāpratisaṃkhyāprāptiravicchedāt ।। 21 ।। ubhayathā ca doṣāt ।। 22 ।। ākāśe cāviśeṣāt
।। 23 ।। anusmṛteśca ।। 24 ।। nāsato'dṛṣṭatvāt ।। 25 ।। udāsīnānāmapi caivaṃ siddhiḥ ।। 26 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika> pūrvamardhavaināśikavaiśeṣikamatanirākaraṇānantaraṃ pūrṇavaināśikamataṃ buddhisthaṃ nirākaraṇīyamityavāntarasaṃgatye-
damārabhate—<pratika>sū ।। samudāya ubhayahetuke'pi tadaprāptiḥ ।। 18 ।।</pratika> vaibhāṣikasautrāntikavijñānavādisarvaśūnyavādyākhyā-
ścatvāro buddhamuneśśiṣyāḥ । tatrādau vaibhāṣikasautrāntikayorbāhyārthāstitvāviśeṣāttanmatamekīkṛtya nirākriyate'sminnadhi-
karaṇe । atra vaibhāṣikasautrāntikayormataṃ pramāṇamūlaṃ vā bhrāntimūlaṃ veti saṃdehaḥ । pṛthivyādīni catvāri bhūtāni bhauti-
kāni viṣayendriyāṇi ca paramāṇupuñjasvarūpāṇi । tatra bāhyaḥ pṛthivyādisamudāyaḥ paramāṇuhetuka eva । ādhyātmiko rūpādi-
samudāyo rūpavijñānavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāralakṣaṇapañcaskaṃdhahetukaḥ । iti tanmataṃ prāmāṇikamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu,
ubhayahetuke'pi samudāye</pratika>=paramāṇuhetuke bāhyasamudāye skaṃdhahetuke adhyātmikasamudāye ca । <pratika>tadaprāptiḥ</pratika>=tasya
samudāyasyāsiddhiḥ । acetanānāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ skaṃdhānāṃ ca svataḥ samudāyāyogāt anyasya ca sthirasya samudāyakartuścetana-
syānabhyupagamāt । atastayormataṃ bhrāntimūlameveti siddham । iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। itaretarapratyayatvāditi cennotpattimātranimittatvāt ।। 19 ।।</pratika> <pratika>itaretarapratyayatvāt</pratika>=avidyāhetukā
janmādayo janmādihetukāścāvidyādaya iti mitho hetuhetumadbhāvāt । <pratika>iti cet=arthātsaṃghātasiddhiriti cet । na</pratika>=
tathā saṃghāto na siddhyati । kutaḥ । <pratika>utpattimātranimittatvāt</pratika>=avidyādīnāmitaretarotpattimātranimittatvāt kṣaṇi-
katvābhyupagamena bhokturabhāvācca na hi saṃghātaḥ siddhyediti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p>avidyādīnāmitaretarotpattimātranimittatvānna saṃghātasiddhirityuktam । tadapi na saṃbhavatītyāha—<pratika>sū ।। uttarotpāde
ca pūrvanirodhāt ।। 20 ।।</pratika> kāryakāle vidyamānasyaiva mṛdādeḥ kāraṇatvaṃ dṛśyate na tu naṣṭasya । bhavanmate tu uttarasya
kāryakṣaṇasya utpāde pūrvasya kāraṇakṣaṇasya nirodhāt vināśāṃgīkārāttaditaretarotpattikāraṇatvamapi anupapannamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu nirhetuka eva kāryotpādo'stu tathā na noktadoṣa ityāśaṃkyāha---<pratika>sū ।। asati pratijñoparodho yaugapadyama-
nyathā ।। 21 ।।</pratika> asati hetau kāryotpattirityaṅgīkāre <pratika>pratijñoparodhaḥ</pratika>=pūrvaṃ jñānacakṣurālokaviṣayeṣu caturṣu hetuṣu satsu
nīlādijñānaṃ jāyate ityasyāḥ pratijñāyā uparodho virodhaḥ syāt । <pratika>anyathā</pratika>=kāryasya sahetukatvāṅgīkāreṇa kāraṇasya
kāryaparyanta sthityaṃgīkāre । hetuphalayoḥ <pratika>yaugapadyam</pratika>=ekasminkāle sthitiḥ prasajyeta । evaṃ ca kṣaṇikatvapra-
tijñā virudhyeteti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p>itthaṃ tanmate samudāyakāryakāraṇabhāvakṣaṇikatvānupapattimupapādya adhunā tadabhyupagataṃ dvividhaṃ vināśaṃ nirācaṣṭe---<pratika>sū ।।
pratisaṃkhyā'pratisaṃkhyānirodhāprāptiravicchedāt ।। 22 ।।</pratika> vaināśikāḥ kila kalpayanti ‘bhāvānāṃ buddhipūrvaka-
nāśaḥ abuddhipūrvakanāśaḥ ākāśañceti । trayamapi caitadabhāvamātraṃ niḥsvarūpamityācakṣate । ākāśaṃ parastātpratyākhyāsyati ।
bhāvānāṃ buddhipūrvako vināśaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ abuddhipūrvakavināśo'pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ āvaraṇābhāvamātramākāśamiti
ca paribhāṣyate । <pratika>pratisaṃkhyā'pratisaṃkhyānirodhāprāptiḥ</pratika>=bhāvānāṃ buddhipūrvakābuddhipūrvakanāśayoḥ saṃtānasaṃtāniṣu
asaṃbhavaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>avicchedāt</pratika>=na tāvannirodhadvayasya saṃtānagocaratvaṃ saṃtānasyāvicchedāt । nāpi saṃtānigocaratvaṃ
saṃtānināṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ kṣaṇikatvena buddhipūrvakanāśāyogāt । nāpyabuddhipūrvakasamūlanāśastvadabhyupagatassaṃbhavati । mūlasya
mṛdādeḥ pratyabhijñāyamānatvāt । tasmānnirodhadvayasyānupapattirityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<note>*<quote>‘na saṃghātabhāvānimittatvāt’</quote> iti śrīkaṇṭharāmānujabhāṣyānusārī pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="095"/>
<p>pratisaṃkhyānirodhāntarbhūtamavidyānāśaṃ nirācaṣṭe—<pratika>sū ।। ubhayathā ca doṣāt ।। 23 ।।</pratika> kṣaṇikeṣu sthiratvādi-
bhrāntiravidyā । tasyāḥ kiṃ samyagjñānānnāśaḥ svato vā । pūrvasminvikalpe nirhetukavināśābhyupagamahāniprasaṃgaḥ । dvitīye
tu samyagjñānopadeśānarthakyamityubhayathā ca doṣaprasaṃgādasamaṃjasamidaṃ saugatamatamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>itthaṃ nirodhadvayaṃ nirasyākāśasya nirupākhyatvaṃ nirasyati---<pratika>sū ।। ākāśe cāviśeṣāt ।। 24 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘ātmana
ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ’</quote> iti śrutyā śabdaguṇatvena cākāśe'pi pṛthivyādivadvastutvapratipatteraviśeṣānna nirupākhyatvamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>adhunā ātmanaḥ kṣaṇikatvaṃ nirācaṣṭe—<pratika>sū ।। anusmṛteśca ।। 25 ।।</pratika> anubhavamanu utpadyamānā smṛtiḥ anusmṛtiḥ ।
tadbalādātmano'nubhavituḥ na kṣaṇikatvamityarthaḥ । anyānubhūte viṣaye'nyasya smaraṇāyogādityarthaḥ ।। kāraṇābhāvātkāryotpattiriti
tanmataṃ nirācaṣṭe---<pratika>sū ।। nāsato'dṛṣṭatvāt ।। 26 ।। asataḥ</pratika>= abhāvātkāryotpattirna yuktā । kutaḥ । <pratika>adṛṣṭatvāt</pratika>=
nirupākhyānnaraviṣāṇādeḥ kāryotpatteradṛṣṭatvāt । dṛṣṭatvāditi padacchede sata eva mṛdādeḥ ghaṭādikāryotpatterdṛṣṭatvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>adhunā pravṛttimātramapi na yuktamityāha—<pratika>sū ।। udāsīnānāmapi caivaṃ siddhiḥ ।। 27 ।। evam</pratika>=abhāvādbhāvo-
tpattirityaṃgīkāre <pratika>udāsīnānāṃ</pratika>=tattatkāryasādhaneṣvapravartamānānāmapi ca puṃsām । <pratika>siddhiḥ</pratika>=svasvābhimatakāryasiddhiḥ
syāt । ato vaibhāṣikasautrāntikayormataṃ bhrāntimūlameveti siddham ।।</p>
<head>iti bhagavatpādamate samudāyādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, vaidikaikadeśimatanirākaraṇānantaraṃ prasakte vedabāhyamatanirākaraṇe prathamamiha bauddhasiddhāntasiddhaṃ samu-
dāyakāraṇavādaṃ nirākareti---<pratika>samudāya ityādinā ।।</pratika> bauddhābhyupagatassamudāyakāraṇavādo yukto na veti saṃdehe yukta iti
<pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।</pratika> kṣaṇikatvavādināṃ teṣāṃ mate kāraṇānāṃ kṣaṇikatvena kāryotpādanāsamarthatvāt avidyāyāssaṃghātabhāvānimittatvāt
kṣaṇikatvādyanupapannārthābhidhānācca asaṃbaddha eva samudāyakāraṇavāda iti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu</pratika>, prāyaḥ pūrvasmādavi-
śiṣṭaḥ <pratika>।।sū।। ubhayathāca doṣāt ।।</pratika> utpannasya tucchatāpattau tucchādutpattau ca abhāvādutpattyasaṃbhavādabhāvātmakakāryotpatti-
rūpāddoṣāccāsamañjasamidaṃ matamityarthaḥ । iti viśeṣaḥ । anyatsamānam ।। <pratika><quote>‘anusmṛte’</quote></pratika> ścetyantamevedamadhikaraṇam । <pratika><quote>‘nāsata’</quote></pratika>
ityādisūtradvayamadhikaraṇāntaramityapyaparo viśeṣaḥ pūrvasmāt ।। <pratika>iti śrīkaṇṭhamate samudāyādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha dṛṣṭatvādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p>evaṃ bāhyārthāstitvavādiṣu vaibhāṣikamataṃ nirākṛtya jñānānumeyatvavādisautrāntikamataṃ nirākaroti—<pratika>sū ।। nāsato'dṛṣṭa-
tvāt ।। 26 ।।</pratika> sautrāntikābhyupagato jñānānumeyatvavādo yukto na veti saṃdehe jñāne svākāraṃ samarpya vinaṣṭo'rtho	 jñānā-
kāravaicitryeṇānumīyate iti yukto jñānānumeyatvavāda iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, arthasya kṣaṇikatvādasato vinaṣṭasya
dharmiṇo dharmasaṃkramaṇasyādṛṣṭatvāt kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamānniṣprayatnānāmapi sarvārthasiddhisaṃbhavāccāyukto jñānānumeyatvavāda iti ।।</p>
<head>iti śrīkaṇṭhamate dṛṣṭatvādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, bāhyārthāstitvavādinorvaibhāṣikasautrāntikayormate jagadutpattyādikaṃ sūpapādaṃ durupapādaṃ veti saṃśayaḥ ।
sūpapādamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika>। durupapādamiti siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthavarṇanādikaṃ sarvaṃ śrīkaṇṭhamatavadeva । adhikaraṇaracanā paraṃ
śāṃkaramatamevānukarotīti viśeṣaḥ ।। anyatsamānaṃ śrīkaṇṭhamatena <pratika>।। iti samudāyādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>ānaṃdatīrthamataṃ</pratika>, ghaṭādīnāmīś‍varanirapekṣakālakarmanimittakṣaṇikaparamāṇusamudāyarūpatvavādinorvaibhāṣikasautrāntikayo-
rmataṃ yuktaṃ naveti saṃdehe yuktamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । na yuktamiti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu, sū ।। samudāya ubhayahetuke-
'pi tadaprāptiḥ ।। 18 ।। samudāye</pratika>=paramāṇusamudāye anekatvasaṃkhyārūpe । <pratika>abhayahetuke'pi</pratika>=militānekaparamāṇu-
nimittake aṅgīkṛte satyapi viralānekahetuke vāṅgīkṛte sati । <pratika>tadaprāptiḥ</pratika>=tasya samudāyasya viralānekahetukasya aprāptiḥ
anupapattiḥ । kutaḥ । anyonyāśrayādidoṣāditi śeṣaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। itaretarapratyayatvādityādi ।। itaretarapratyayatvāt</pratika>=
paramāṇuparasparāpekṣābuddhinimittakatvāt । tathā ca tādṛśabudhdyabhāvakāle samudāyavyavahārāderasattvātpralayopapattiriti cenna ।
<pratika>utpattimātranimittatvāt</pratika>=paramāṇūnāṃ svasamudāyotpattimātranimittatvāt । na tebhyo'pekṣābuddhyāderapyutpattiḥ saṃbha-
vatīti mātraśabdārthaḥ । tathā ca tannimittakavyavahārādiḥ kṣaṇikamate na kadāpi saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। uttarotpāde ca
pūrvanirodhāt ।। 20 ।।</pratika> co'vadhāraṇe samuccaye ca । netyanuvartate । sāmarthyāditi śeṣaḥ । tathā ca na kevalaṃ kṣaṇikamate
samudāyavyavahārānupapattiḥ । kiṃ tu viśeṣakāryotpattiśca na yuktā । kutaḥ <pratika>uttarotpāde ca</pratika>=kāraṇasya sadṛśakāryajananasā-
marthyāt uttarasya svasadṛśakāryasyotpāde utpattau satyāmeva । <pratika>pūrvanirodhāt</pratika>=pūrvasya kāraṇasya nāśāt punavisadṛśakārya-
janakatvāsaṃbhava ityarthaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। asati pratijñoparodho yaugapadyamanyathā ।। 21 ।। asati</pratika> asati kāraṇe kāryamutpadyate
ityaṅgīkāre <pratika>pratijñoparodhaḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘tattasya kārya’</quote> miti siddhāntavyavahārasya hāniḥ syāt । <pratika>anyathā</pratika>=kāraṇe sati kārya-
mutpadyata ityaṅgīkāre । <pratika>yaugapadyam</pratika>=kāraṇena saha kāryāṇāmekadāvasthā prasajyeteti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<pb n="096"/>
atha upalabdhyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। nābhāva upalabdheḥ ।। 27 ।।</sutra>
iha bauddhānāṃ kevalavijñānavādo yukto na vā ।।
iti saṃśaye yukta iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । tathā hi—sākāraṃ vijñānameva tattvamānta-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha upalabdhyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। nābhāva upalabdheḥ ।। 27 ।।</pratika> kṣaṇikatve nīlādyarthānāṃ pratyakṣatvamanumeyatvaṃ vā
nopapadyata iti bāhyārthavyavahārārthaṃ teṣāṃ sthairyamāstheyamiti vaibhāṣikasautrāṃtikamatayoḥ
dūṣaṇamuktam । tadayuktam । nīlādyarthānāmāṃtaravijñānarūpatvena svaprakāśaistaireva vijñānaistatpra-
tyakṣīkaraṇasaṃbhavāt vijñānarūpāṇāmeva teṣāṃ bahirvadavabhāso bhrama iti tadvyatiriktānāṃ
bāhyārthānāmabhāvāditi yogācārapratyavasthānena saṃgatimabhipretya saṃśayaṃ darśayati—<pratika>iheti ।</pratika>
nanvahamidaṃ jānāmīti jñātṛjñeyajñānarūpāṃśatraye bhāsamāne kathañca vijñānamātrameva tattvamiti
vādaḥ pravṛtta ityāśaṃkya tanmatamupapādayati—<pratika>tathāhīti</pratika> । vijñānameva tattvaṃ nānyatparamā-
ṇusamudāyarūpaṃ tadārabdhāvayavirūpaṃ vā kiṃcidasti । paramāṇūnāmaprāmāṇikatvāt । teṣāṃ
kṣaṇikānāṃ samudāyabhāvāsaṃbhavāt paramāṇuṣu saṃyogasya vyāpyavṛttitvāvyāpyavṛttitvavika-
lpaduḥsthatvenāvayaveṣvavayavinaḥkṛtsnaikadeśavṛttivikalpaduḥsthatvena ca parasparasaṃyuktāvayavajanya-
tadāśritāvayavyasaṃbhavāt bāhyārthānāmāṃtaravijñānasaṃbaṃdhānirūpaṇena tadviṣayatvāsaṃbhavācca ।
saṃbaṃdhaṃ vinā viṣayatve sarvaviṣayāṇāmekasminneva jñāne'vabhāsaprasaṃgāt । na ca bāhyārthābhāve
nīlapītādijñānānāṃ nirālaṃbanatvāpātaḥ । jñānānāmeva nīlapītādyākāratvāt nīlapītā-
dikaṃ jñānābhinnaṃ bhāsamānatvāt jñānājñānasahopalaṃbhaniyatatvāt jñānavadityanumānāt ।
na ca sahatvasya bhedagarbhatvāt dvitīyaheturviruddha iti śaṃkanīyam । jñānopalaṃbhavyāpyopalaṃ-
bhaviṣayatvasya tadarthatvāt tadavinābhāvarūpasya tadvyāpyatvasyābhede'pi saṃbhavāt । na ca nīla-
tadvijñānayorabhede idaṃ janāmīti kriyākarmabhāvarūpabhedāvabhāsavirodhaḥ । tasya dvicaṃ-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>sū ।। pratisaṃkhyetyādi ।।</pratika> idamaviśirṣṭāṃtha pūrvasmāt <pratika>।। sū ।। ubhayathā cadoṣāt ।। 23 ।। ubhayathā ca=</pratika>kāraṇe
sati kāryaṃ bhavatyeveti niyamapakṣe tadabhāvapakṣe ca । <pratika>doṣāt</pratika>=kāryakāraṇaviśeṣakāryānutpattyākhyadoṣasattvāt kṣaṇikapakṣo
na yukta ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ākāśe cāviśeṣāt ।। 24 ।। ākāśe aviśeṣāt</pratika>=kṣaṇikatvasādhakatvena paroktaparimāṇaviśeṣā-
darśanādityarthaḥ । tathā ca satpratipakṣo'yaṃ heturiti na tena kṣaṇikatvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। anusmṛteśca ।। 25 ।।
anusmṛteśca</pratika>=<quote>‘tadeveda’</quote>miti pratyabhijñānācca kṣaṇikatvasādhanaṃ na yuktamityarthaḥ ।। asminmate adhikaraṇaracanā śrīkaṇṭha-
matavaditi viśeṣaḥ <pratika>।। iti samudāyādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>athādṛṣṭatvādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। māsato'dṛṣṭatvāt ।। 26 ।।</pratika> jagataśśūnyavivartatvavādino mādhyamikasya mataṃ yuktaṃ na veti saṃdehe yuktamiti
<pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । asataḥ</pratika>=śūnyasya jagatkartṛtvaṃ na yuktam । kutaḥ । pramāṇābhāvāditi śeṣaḥ । tatkutaḥ । <pratika>adṛṣṭatvāt</pratika>=kvāpya
sataḥ kāraṇatvādarśanāt ata evānumānāgamayorapyabhāvādityarthaḥ । <pratika>udāsīnānāmapi caivaṃ siddhiḥ ।। 27 ।। evaṃ sati</pratika>=
asataḥ kāryotpādakatve'ṅgīkṛte sati । <pratika>udāsīnānām</pratika>—heyopādeyatvabuddhyaviṣayāṇāṃ gaganakusumādīnāṃ sakāśādapi ।
<pratika>siddhiḥ</pratika>=saurabhyādikāryasiddhiḥ syādityarthaḥ । ato mādhyamikamatamayuktamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>ityānandatīrthamate adṛṣṭatyādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<pb n="097"/>
<p>ram, na bāhyāḥ padārthāḥ, svapne bāhyapadārthānanapekṣya kevalayā buddhyā vyavahāradarśa-
nāt । tadvat jāgradva‍yavahārasyāpi vyavasthā yujyate । tato vijñānamātraṃ tattvamiti ।।
evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—ghaṭaṃ jānāmīti kartuḥ karmatayārthasyopalabdhestadabhāvo
na śakyate vaktum । puruṣasyārthaviśeṣavyavahārānuguṇyāpādanameva hi jñānasyākāraḥ ।।
yaduktam, svapnadṛṣṭāntena jāgradva‍yavahārasyāpi śūnyatvaṃ, tatrāha—
<sutra>।। sū ।। vaidharmyācca na svapnādivat ।। 28 ।।</sutra>
kāraṇadoṣabādharāhityarūpavaidharmyācca na svapnādivajjāgaritajñānasya mithyātvam ।
ato na vijñānamātraṃ tattvam ।।
yuktyantaramāha—
<sutra>।। sū ।। na bhāvo'nupalabdheḥ ।। 29 ।।</sutra>
arthaśūnyasya jñānasya sadbhāvo na saṃbhavati, tasya kutrāpyanupalambhāt । svapna-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
drajñānavat bhrāṃtatvāt । tadāhuḥ—<quote>‘sahopalaṃbhaniyamādabhedo nīlataddhiyoḥ । bhedastu bhrāṃti-
vijñāne dṛśyetendāvivādvaye’</quote> ।। iti । bāhyasya nīlādeḥ kathamāntarajñānabhedāvabhāso
bhrama iti cet । bāhyatvāvabhāso'pi bhrama eva । upari sthitānāṃ nakṣatrādīnāmudyatāṃ bhū-
misthatvāvabhāsavat । etenāhaṃ jānāmīti kriyākartṛbhāvena bhedāvabhāso'pi vyākhyātaḥ ।
tadapyāhuḥ—<quote>‘avibhāgo'pi buddhyātmā viparyāsitadarśanaiḥ । grāhyagrāhakasaṃvittibhedavāniva
lakṣyate ।।’</quote> iti । itthaṃ pravṛtto vijñānavādaḥ । nanu bāhyārthatadavabhāsayorabhāve kathaṃ bā-
hyārthavyavahāraḥ ityāśaṃkya dṛṣṭāṃtenopapādayati—svapna iti । jñānātiriktasyārthasya nābhāvaḥ
upalabdheḥ pratyakṣopalabdhivirodhena jñānābhedānumānānutthānāditi sūtrārthaṃ darśayan siddhāṃ-
tayati—ghaṭaṃ <pratika>jānāmīti</pratika> । na ca dṛḍhavipakṣabādhakatarkānugṛhītānumānavirodhāt pratyakṣo-
palabdhireva bhrāṃtiriti śaṃkanīyam । vipakṣabādhakatarkāṇāṃ praśithilatvāt samudāyāraṃbha-
vādoktadoṣāṇāṃ śrutiparigṛhīte pariṇāmavāde prasarābhāvāt cicchaktipariṇāmarūpasya
pradīpaprabhāvaddravyasya jñānasya cakṣurādigolakadvārā bahirdīrghaprabhākāreṇa nirgatasya viṣayaiḥ
saṃyogasaṃbhavena jñānaviṣayasaṃbaṃdhānirūpaṇāsiddheśceti bhāvaḥ । syādetat । bāhyaṃ nīlādikamabhyu-
payadbhirapi jñānānāṃ nīlādyākāratvamanubhavasiddhamavaśyamaṃgīkaraṇīyam, tenaiva sarvavyava-
hāropapattau kiṃ bāhyārthakalpanayā, na hi nīlādyākāradvayamupalabhyata ityāśaṃkyāha—puru-
ṣasyeti । puruṣasya nīlādyarthaviśeṣeṣu yo vyavahāra icchāpravṛttyādirūpaḥ tadānuguṇyameva
jñānasya nīlādyākāraḥ, na tu bāhyārthasyeva mukhyaṃ nīlādyākāratvamasti । nīlapītaśītoṣṇā-
disamūhālaṃbanānāṃ parasparaviruddhānekarūpatvāpatteriti bhāvaḥ । svapnadṛṣṭāṃtena nīlādijñānānāṃ
bāhyārthaśūnyatvaṃ yaducyate tatsvapnamāyādīnāṃ bāhyārthaśūnyatvaṃ paramatānusāreṇābhyupagamyaiva
dṛṣṭāṃtavaidharmyapradarśanārtham । uttarasūtramavatārayati—<pratika>yaduktamiti । sū॰ ।।</pratika> vaidharmyācca na sva-
pnādivat ।। 18 ।। svapnādiṣu hi nidrādidoṣopaplutāni karaṇāni anaṃtaraṃ bādhaśca dṛśyate
naitadubhayaṃ nīlādijñāneṣvastīti vaidharmyamupapādayati—<pratika>kāraṇeti</pratika> । vastutaḥ kvacidapi jñānā-
nāmarthaśūnyatvaṃ saṃpratipannaṃ nāstīti svamatapradarśanārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>sū॰ ।। na bhāvo'nupala-</pratika>
<pb n="098"/>
jñānasyāpyarthavattā saṃbhavatyeva ।। tato vijñānamātravādo'nupapanna eva ।।
ityupalabdhyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
