<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>athopalabdhyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। nābhāva upalabdheḥ ।। 27 ।। vaidharmyācca na svapnādivat ।। 28 ।। na bhāvo'nupalabdheḥ ।। 29 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>bāhyārtha eva nāsti pratyakṣo vānumānagamyo vā । vijñānameva tatvaṃ svapnavadākāravaditi yogācāraḥ ।। 117 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>bāhyamupalabhyamānaṃ kathamarthamapahnuvīta sāhasikaḥ । kāraṇadoṣo nāsti svapneṣviva nāpi dṛśyate bādhaḥ ।। 118 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti upalabdhyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>athopalabdhyadhikaraṇamathavā abhāvādhikaraṇam ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। nābhāva upalabdheḥ ।। 27 ।। vaidharmyācca na svapnādivat ।। 28 ।। na bhāvo'nupalabdheḥ ।। 29 ।।
*kṣaṇikatvācca ।। 30 ।। sarvathānupapatteśca ।। 31 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika> anenādhikaraṇena, yogācārāṇāṃ vijñānavādināṃ tathā sarvaśūnyavādināṃ mādhyamikānāṃ ca mataṃ nirā-
kriyate । vijñānātiriktabāhyapadārthasyābhāva iti vijñānavādināṃ yogācārāṇāṃ siddhānto'tra viṣayaḥ । sa kiṃ pramāṇamūlaḥ uta
bhrāntimūla iti saṃśayaḥ । āntaraṃ vijñānamātramasti । tadeva nīlādyākāraṃ na tu tadva‍yatirekeṇa bāhyaṃ nīlādikamasti । tadeva
vijñānākārātmakaṃ nīlādikamanādivāsanāvaśādbahirvadavabhāsate । itīdaṃ mataṃ prāmāṇikamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, vijñā-
nātiriktaghaṭapaṭādipadārthānāmupalabhyamānatvāttadabhāve jñānavaicitryānupapatteḥ ālayavijñānasya kṣaṇikatvena vāsanānāṃ nirāśraya-
tāpattyā tadbalādapi jñānavaicitryasya durupapādatvāt <quote>‘paśyanā’</quote> <quote>‘tiṣṭhane’</quote> tyādyapaśabdaprayogādanyata uktakrameṇārthataśca sarvathāsya
matasyānupapatteśca bhrāntimūlameveti । sarvaśūnyavādimādhyamikamatanirāsaparatvenaitānyeva sūtrāṇi yojanīyāni । ato na
pṛthaksūtrāraṃbhaḥ । sūtrārthavarṇanaprakāra ittham—<pratika>sū ।। nābhāva upalabdheḥ ।। 27 ।। abhāvaḥ</pratika>= vijñānātiriktabāhyapadārthā
bhāvaḥ । <pratika>na</pratika>= na saṃbhavati । kutaḥ । <pratika>upalabdheḥ</pratika>= ghaṭapaṭādipadārthānāmanubhavasiddhatvāt ।। mādhyamikanirākaraṇapakṣe jñānārtha-
yorabhāvo na yuktaḥ । pramāṇatastayorupalabdherityādirītyā tanmataprakriyānusāreṇa vyākhyeyam । <pratika>sū ।। vaidharmyācca na svapnā-
divat ।। 28 ।। vaidharmyācca</pratika>= svapnajāgaritapratyayayoranyonyaṃ bādhitaviṣayatvābādhitaviṣayatvarūpaivadharmyāt svapne prātibhā-
sikaviṣayasattvena sādhyavaikalyācca । <pratika>svapnādivat</pratika>= svapnādidṛṣṭāntena । <pratika>na</pratika>= jāgaritajñānasya nirālaṃbanatvaṃ na yuktam । iti ।।
mādhyamikapakṣe <pratika>svapnādivat</pratika>= svapna ādiryasyāssuṣuptestadvat । <pratika>vaidharmyācca</pratika>= upalabdhyanupalabdhivaidharmyalakṣaṇābādhitajñā-
nārthopalabdhibādhāt tatrāpyātmajñānasattvena sādhyavaikalyācca jāgratsvapnayorjñānārthaśūnyatvaṃ nānumeyamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>arthānāmabhāve'pi vāsanāvaśāt jñānavaicitryaṃ syādityata āha— <pratika>sū ।। nabhāvo'nupalabdheḥ ।। 29 ।। bhāvaḥ</pratika>= vā-
sanānāṃ sadbhāvaḥ । <pratika>na</pratika>= na bhavati । kasmāt । <pratika>anupalabdheḥ</pratika>= tvatpakṣe bāhyārthānāmanupalabdherityarthaḥ । tathā ca bāhyārthānubha-
vasya vāsanāṃ prati kāraṇatvāt kāraṇabhāve kāryābhāvāt āśrayābhāvācca vāsanānupapattiriti bhāvaḥ । mādhyamikapakṣe nira-
dhiṣṭhānaniṣedhāyogāttanmate'dhiṣṭhānabhūtasya tatvasya mānato'nupalabdherna sadbhāva iti ।।</p>
<p>tarhi ahamityālayapratyaya eva vāsanāśrayo'sttvityata āha— <pratika>sū ।। kṣaṇikatvācca ।। 30 ।।</pratika> ālayavijñānasya kṣaṇi-
katvāṅgīkārānnāśrayatvamityarthaḥ । anyatra pakṣe śūnyatvavirodhikṣaṇikatvopadeśāccetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। sarvathānupapatteśca ।। 31 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘paśyanā’</quote> <quote>‘tiṣṭhane’</quote> tyādyapaśabdaprayogāt granthata uktakrameṇārthataścānupapatternāda-
raṇīyaṃ bhrāntimūlaṃ saugatamatamityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika> tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate ca <quote>‘nābhāva upalabdhe’</quote></pratika> ityādīni trīṇi
sūtrāṇi vijñānavādi<pratika>yogācāra</pratika>matanirāsaka<pratika>mupalabdhyedhikaraṇamiti</pratika> vyapadiśyaṃte । <pratika><quote>‘kṣaṇikatvācca’</quote></pratika> iti sūtra-
manayormatayornāsti । <pratika><quote>‘sarvathānupapatteśca’</quote></pratika> iti sūtraṃ tu sarvaśūnyavādimādhyāmikamatanirāsakamadhikaraṇāntaramiti ca
śāṃkaramatādviśeṣaḥ । pratipakṣimatanirākaraṇaprakriyā yadyapi sarvamatasādhāraṇā tathāpi sūtrārthanirūpaṇe paramanayoranyonyasalakṣaṇa-
<note>*iṃda sūtraṃ śāṃkarānandatīrthīyabhāṣyayoreva dṛśyate na śrīkaṇṭharāmānujabhāṣyayoriti vedyam ।।</note></p>
<pb n="099"/>
<head>atha sarvathānupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<sutra>।। sū ।। sarvathānupapatteśca ।। 30 ।।</sutra>
<head>ihādhikaraṇe sarvaśūnyavādo yukto na veti saṃdehaḥ ।।</head>
<p>yukta iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । tathā hi—sarvaṃ jaganna sat, bādhitatvāt । nāsat, pratī-
yamānatvāt । nobhayātmakaṃ, virodhāt । nānubhayātmakam, asaṃbhavāt । kiṃtu
catuṣkoṭivinirmuktaṃ sarvaṃ śūnyameva । pratyakṣāvabhāsastu saṃvṛtimūlaḥ । tasmācchū-
nyavādaḥ samīcīna iti ।।
evaṃ prāpte siddhānta ucyate—na saṃbhavati sarvaśūnyavādaḥ । kutaḥ? saditi
pratijñāyāmiva asaditi pratijñāyāmanyathā pratijñāyāṃ ca tucchatvānupapatteḥ
sadasadba‍uddhitacchabdānāṃ vastugatānyonyaviruddhabhāvābhāvarūpāvasthāviśeṣaviṣaya-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha sarvathānupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p>nirākṛto vijñānavādaḥ । atha bauddhasiddhāṃtarahasyabhūtaśūnyavādanirākaraṇārthamadhikaraṇāṃtaram
<pratika>sū ।। sarvathānupapatteśca ।। 30 ।।</pratika> mādhyamikāḥ kila kalpayaṃti śūnyameva tatvaṃ sugatasyābhimatam ।
śiṣyayogyatānusāreṇa tattadarthāstitvopadeśaḥ । vastutaḥ vijñānamātramapi na nirūpayituṃ śakyam ।
tathā hi—na tāvadvijñānaṃ sat nīlapītaśītoṣṇādyekānekasvabhāvatvavikalpadauḥsthyāt ।
asattvādipakṣāścāparokṣāvabhāsādiviruddhāḥ ।tataḥ śūnyameva tatvamiti । tadāhuḥ<quote>‘—neṣṭaṃ tadapi
dhīrāṇāṃ vijñānaṃ pāramārthikam । ekānekasvabhāvena 1viyogādviyadabjavat । na sannāsanna-
sadasat na vāpyanubhayātmakam । catuṣkoṭivinirmuktaṃ tatvaṃ mādhyamikā vidu’riti ।
śūnyasya sattvena pratyakṣāvabhāsaḥ sadvyavahāraviṣayatvādikaṃ ca saṃvṛtimahimnā । yayā śūnya-
tatvaṃ saṃmīyate sā saṃvṛtiḥ bhrāṃtivāsanārūpetyādyapi kalpayanti । atra dūṣaṇamuktaṃ sūtrakṛtā
sarvathānupapatteśce’</quote> ti । cakāro bhinnakramaḥ । sarvaprakāreṇa ca ityanvayaḥ । sattvādiprakā-
racatuṣṭayena hi niṣedhaḥ śūnyavādinā pratijñāyate <quote>‘catuṣkoṭivinirmukta’</quote>miti । tena sarve-
ṇāpi prakāreṇa niṣedhapratijñāyāṃ sarvaśūnyatvarūpaṃ tucchatvaṃ nopapadyate kiṃtvavaśyaṃ sadvastu-
pariśeṣassaṃpadyata ityato na yuktaḥ śūnyavāda iti sūtrārthaḥ । amuṃ sūtrārthamāviṣkurvan
siddhāṃtamāha—<pratika>na saṃbhavatīti । saditi pratijñāyāmiti । dṛṣṭāṃtoktiḥ । asaditi
pratijñāyāmiti ।</pratika> sanna bhavatīti pratijñāyāmityarthaḥ । <pratika>anyathā pratijñāyāmiti ।</pratika>
asannabhavati sanna bhavati sadasadvilakṣaṇaṃ na bhavatītyavaśiṣṭatrividhapratijñāyāmityarthaḥ ।
nanvāsu catasṛṣu pratijñāsu tāvadvilakṣaṇatvarūpaṃ tucchatvaṃ saṃpadyata eva kutastucchatvānupapa-
ttiruktetyākāṃkṣāyāṃ tatra sūtrakārāśayasthaṃ hetumāha—<pratika>sadasaditi</pratika> । yathā sadba‍uddhiśabdau
deśakālavastusvarūpānyatamavastugatabhāvarūpāvasthāviśeṣaviṣayau । evaṃ sattvaniṣedhādi-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
yorasti kiṃcidiva vailakṣaṇyaṃ śāṃkaramatāt । tacca dikpradarśananyāyeneha kiṃcidiva pradarśyate । yathā—<pratika>sū ।। nābhāva upalabdheḥ
।।27 ।।</pratika> vijñānātiriktabāhyapadārthasyābhāvo na śakyate vaktum । ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmīti jānāteḥ karmatayā kartṛtayā cārthasyopala
bdharityathaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। vaidharmyācca na svapnādivat ।। 28 ।।</pratika> karaṇadoṣabādharāhityarūpavaidharmyācca svapnajñānādivanna jāgarita-
jñānasya mithyātvaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। na bhāvo'nupalabdheḥ ।। 29 ।।</pratika> arthaśūnyasya jñānasya sadbhāvo na saṃbhavati ।
tasya kutrāpyanupalaṃbhāt । ityarthaḥ <pratika>।। iti śrīkaṇṭharāmānujayormate upalabdhyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</pratika>
<note>(1) <quote>‘virodhādviyadabjavat iti’</quote> <pratika>ka</pratika> pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="100"/>
tvāt । yattu saṃvṛtimūlaḥ pratyakṣāvabhāsa iti, tadapyapahāsyam । sarvasya śūnya-
tve kaḥ saṃvṛterāśrayaḥ ? yasyaivamavabhāsaḥ । tataḥ sarvaśūnyavādaḥ sarvaviruddha eva ।।
iti sarvathānupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
buddhiśabdāvapi tadgatābhāvarūpāvasthāviśeṣaviṣayau । tadyathā—idamihāsti idamidānī-
masti, idamevaṃrūpaṃ bhavatīti sattvabuddhiśabdau deśakālavastuparicchinnasattvaviṣayau । evamida-
miha nāsti idamidānīṃ nāsti idamevaṃrūpaṃ na bhavatītyasattvabuddhiśabdau deśakālavastupa-
ricchinnāsattvaviṣayāveva loke prasiddhau । nirupādhikastu sattvaniṣedhaḥ kvacidapi na prasiddhaḥ ।
asattvaniṣedhādiṣvapyeṣaiva rītiḥ । tasmātsarvātmanā jagatassattvāsattvādiniṣedho nopapadyata
iti bhāvaḥ । sarvasya śūnyatva iti । saṃvṛtirhi saṃvaraṇīyamāśrayati । sarvasya śūnyatve
saṃvṛteḥ kaścidāśraya eva nāsti yanniṣṭhā satī tadācchādyāsatyaṃ prapaṃcaṃ satyatayāvabhāsaye-
dityarthaḥ । <pratika>yasyaivamavabhāsa iti</pratika> । yasya vastuto niṣprapaṃcasya satyasyāsatyaprapaṃcātmanā-
vabhāso bhavet tādṛśaṃ kiṃcitsaṃvṛtiśabditāvidyāśrayabhūtamadhiṣṭhānaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ ।</p>
<head>iti sarvathānupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha sarvathānupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। sarvathānupapatteśca ।। 30 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>no bāhyamāṃtaraṃ vā kimapyataśśūnyameva paramārthaḥ । pratyakṣādyavabhāsassaṃvṛtimūla iti mādhyamikaḥ ।। 119 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>kassaṃvṛtimānpuruṣassarvasyaivāsya śūnyatve । yasya pratiniyatamahāprapaṃcaviṣayo'yamavabhāsaḥ ।। 120 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti sarvathānupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha sarvathānupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। sarvathānupapatteśca ।। 30 ।।</pratika> ihādhikaraṇe mādhyāmikoktassarvaśūnyavādo nirākriyate । sa yukto na veti saṃdehaḥ ।
sa yukta iti pūrvapakṣaḥ । sadasadbhāvayorvidyamānavastudharmatvopapādanāt saditi pratijñāyāmivāsaditi pratijñāyāmanyathāpratijñāyāṃca
sarvathāpi sarvaśūnyatvānupapatterna yukta iti siddhāntaḥ । idamapyadhikaraṇamaviśiṣṭamanyonyaṃ śrīkaṇṭharāmānujamatayoriti vedyam ।।</p>
<head>iti śrīkaṇṭharāmānujamatayossarvathānupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate, <quote>‘nābhāva upalabdheḥ’</quote> <quote>‘vaidharmyācca na svapnādivat’</quote></pratika> itīdaṃ, sūtradvayaṃ, pūrvādhikaraṇa-
śeṣatayā vyākhyātam । jagataśśūnyavivartatvavādimādhyamikamatanirāsake pūrvasminnadhikaraṇe pūrvasūtrābhyāṃ jagataśśūnya-
pariṇāmatvaṃ nirastaṃ tarhi śūnyavivartatvaṃ jagato'stvityāśaṃkya pariharati—<pratika>sū ।। nābhāva upalabdheḥ ।। 29 ।।</pratika> jagat
<pratika>abhāvaḥ</pratika>= asat । <pratika>na</pratika>= na bhavati । kutaḥ <pratika>upalabdheḥ</pratika>= saditi pratīya mānatvādityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। vaidharmyācca na svapnā-
divat ।। 29 ।।</pratika> jagat <pratika>svapnādivat</pratika>= svapnavat svāpnavastunyāropitajāgrattvādivadapi asat <pratika>na</pratika> bhavati । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>vaidharmyāt</pratika>= svāpnajāgrattvasya bādhyatvākhyavilakṣaṇadharmavattvāt jagati ca tadabhavādityarthaḥ । ato mādhyamikamatokto-
jagataśśūnyavivartatvavādo'yukta iti ।। <pratika>ityānandatīrthamate adṛṣṭatvādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>athānupalabdhyadhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। na bhāvo'nupalabdheḥ ।। 30 ।।</pratika> nityaṃ niraṃjanaṃ vijñānamekameva tattvaṃ na tadbhinnaḥ prapañco'stīti vādino
yogācārasya mataṃ yuktaṃ na veti saṃdihya yuktamiti pūrvapakṣe prāpte na yuktamiti siddhānta ucyate । yathā-jagat
<pratika>bhāvaḥ=</pratika> jñānātmakamapi, <pratika>na</pratika> bhavati । kutaḥ । <pratika>anupalabdheḥ</pratika>= jñānajñeyayorabhedānanubhavādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। kṣaṇikatvācca ।। 31 ।।</pratika> jñānasyaikakṣaṇāvasthāyitvāt jagataḥ sthāyitvāttadvirodhānna tayoraikyamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। sarvathānupapatteśca ।। 32 ।। sarvathā</pratika>= sarvaprakāreṇa <pratika>anupapatteśca</pratika>= bauddharāddhāntasya yuktiśūnyatvāt yukti-
viruddhatvācca na grāhyatvamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>ityānandatīrthamate'nupalabdhyadhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<pb n="101"/>
atha ekasminnasaṃbhavādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। naikasminnasaṃbhavāt ।। 31 ।।</sutra>
gatā hi bauddhāḥ । jainamataṃ nirasyate---
jainā hi saptabhaṅgīnyāyenaikasminnapi vastuni nānābhāvamupapādayanti । tade-
teṣāṃ mataṃ yuktaṃ na veti vicāraḥ ।।
evaṃ teṣāṃ prakriyā—jīvo'jīvaśceti dvau padārthau । jīvaścetanaḥ śarīrapari-
māṇaḥ sāvayavaḥ । ajīvaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ । vanamahīdharādirekaḥ । āsravasaṃvaranirjara-
bandhamokṣākhyāḥ pañca । āsravatyanena jīvo viṣayeṣvityāsrava indriyasaṃghātaḥ ।
saṃvṛṇoti vivekamityavivekādiḥ saṃvaraḥ । niśśeṣaṃ jīryatyanena kāmakrodhādi-
riti keśolluñchanataptaśilārohaṇādi tapo nirjaraḥ । karmāṣṭakenāpāditā
janmaparaṃparā bandhaḥ । catvāri ghātikarmāṇi pāparūpāṇi । catvāryaghātikarmāṇi
puṇyarūpāṇi । tebhyo muktasya jīvasya satatordhvagamanaṃ mokṣaḥ । ete sapta padārthāḥ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha ekasminnasaṃbhavādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। naikasminnasaṃbhavāt ।। 31 ।।</pratika> bauddhamatanirāsānaṃtaramavaśiṣṭāvaidikamatanirā-
sa iti saṃgatimāha—<pratika>gatā iti</pratika> । <quote>‘syādastī’</quote> tyādinā vakṣyamāṇaḥ saptabhaṃgīnyāyaḥ ।
tasya prathamasūtreṇa dūṣaṇaṃ kriyate । dvitīyādisūtrairjīvānāṃ jainābhimatasya dehaparimāṇa-
tvasya । tadda‍ūṣaṇaṃ jainaparigaṇitānāṃ jīvādīnāṃ sarveṣāmapi padārthānāṃ tadabhimataprakāradū-
ṣaṇasyopalakṣaṇam । tattu śiṣyairūhanīyamiti sūtrakṛtā na pradarśitam । tatsvarūpāvagatau
tatra dūṣaṇaṃ śiṣyaiḥ svayamevohituṃ śakyamiti tatparigaṇitān jīvādipadārthān saṃgraheṇa
upanyasyati—<pratika>evaṃ teṣāmiti । vanamahīdharādiriti</pratika> । jīvabhogyasya sarvasya vastujātasya
upalakṣaṇam । āsravatīti । viṣayendriyasaṃbaṃdhavaśāt jīvasya rūpādijñānapariṇāmi-
tvamāsravaṇam । kecittu āsravati jīve gacchati svayamapi sarvatrānugacchatīti karmabandha
āsrava ityāhuḥ । tadāha jinadattaḥ—<quote>‘āsravaḥ karmaṇā bandho nirjarastadvimocanam’</quote> । iti ।
<pratika>saṃvṛṇoti vivekamiti</pratika> । anye tu saṃvṛṇotīṃdriyapravṛttimiti guptisamityādikaṃ mokṣa-
kāraṇaṃ saṃvara ityācakṣate । yadāhuḥ—<quote>‘āsravaḥ srotasāṃ dvāraṃ saṃvṛṇotīti saṃvaraḥ । āsravo
bhavahetuḥ syāt saṃvaro mokṣakāraṇa’</quote> miti kāyavāṅmanonigraho guptiriti jainaiḥ paribhā-
ṣyate । bhūmigatajaṃtuhiṃsāparihārāya prahate mārge samyagādityaraśmiprakāśite nirīkṣya
saṃcaraṇaṃ mitabhāṣaṇaṃ niyatāhāraniṣevaṇamityādikaṃ samitiriti paribhāṣyate । <pratika>kāmakro-
dhādiriti ।</pratika> ādiśabdena tanmūlayoḥ puṇyapāpayoḥ grahaṇam । <pratika>catvārīti</pratika> । jñānadarśa-
nasukhavīryaguṇakasya jīvasya jñānādīnāṃ caturṇāṃ guṇānāṃ mokṣadaśāyāmāvirbhaviṣyatāṃ
saṃsāradaśāyāṃ pratighātakāni pravāhānādīni catvāri pāparūpāṇi ghātikarmāṇi śarīrasaṃ-
sthānatadabhimānatatsthititatprayuktasukhādinimittāni catvāryaghātikarmāṇi puṇyamiśri-
tatvātpuṇyarūpāṇi । <pratika>satatordhvagamanamiti</pratika> । bandhamuktasya hyūrdhvagamanaṃ svabhāvaḥ ।
yathā paṃjaramuktasya śukasya । yathā vā nirbhiṇṇasya pariṇatairaṇḍabījasya । yathā vā dṛḍha-
paṃkaliptasya jalanimajjanaprakṣīṇapaṃkalepasya śuṣkālābunaḥ । iha tvanādikāpravṛttabandhavi-
<pb n="102"/>
saptabhaṅgīnyāyena vyavasthāpyāḥ । syādasti, syānnāsti, syādasti ca nāsti ca,
syādavaktavyaṃ, syādasti cāvaktavyaṃ, syānnāsti cāvaktavyaṃ, syādasti ca
nāsti cāvaktavyam, iti saptabhaṅgīnyāyaḥ । syācchabda īṣadarthaḥ । ataḥ saptabha-
ṅgīnyāyāt saptapadārthasiddhiriti ।।
etadayuktam । kutaḥ ? ekasmin vastuni sattvāsattvanityatvānityatvabhedābhe-
dādīnāmasaṃbhavāt । paryāyabhāvinaśca dravyasyāstitvanāstitvādiśabdabuddhivi-
ṣayāḥ parasparaviruddhāḥ piṇḍatvaghaṭatvakapālatvādyavasthāvat yugapanna saṃbhavanti ।
ato viruddha eva jainavādaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
gamātsatatordhvagamanam । tanmate lokākāśasyoparyupari sthitānāṃ lokānāmaṃtarvartitve'pi
teṣāmupari sthitī niravadhiḥ alokākāśaḥ satatordhvagamanasyāvakāśaḥ । tathā paṭhanti-
<quote>‘gatvā gatvā mivartaṃte caṃdrasūryādayo grahāḥ । adyāpi na nivartaṃte tvalokākāśamārgagāḥ ।’</quote>
iti । anye tu vigatasamastakleśatadvāsanasyānāvaraṇajñānadarśanasukhavīryasyātmana upari-
deśāvasthānaṃ muktirityāhuḥ । <pratika>saptabhaṃgīnyāyeneti</pratika> । saptānāṃ bhaṃgānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ sattvādi-
niyamabhaṃgānāṃ vā samāhāraḥ saptabhaṃgī । ke te sapta bhaṃgāḥ tānāha—<pratika>syādastīti</pratika> । sattvāsa-
ttvasadasattvasadasadvilakṣaṇatvarūpānirvacanīyatvaviṣayāścatvāraḥ pakṣāḥ । punaścānirvacanīyatve
sattvāsattvasadasattvamelanaistrayaḥ pakṣā ityevaṃ sapta pakṣā vādibhirutprekṣituṃ śakyāḥ । sarve'pi
te pakṣāḥ jainairīṣadīṣat svāṃgīkṛteṣu sarveṣvapi padārtheṣu aṃgīkriyante । atra syācchabdasyārtha-
māha—<pratika>syāditi</pratika>।anaikāntyārtha iti kecit । ubhayathāpi tiṅantapratirūpakoyamavyayaśabdaḥ
phalatastvekārthaḥ । sattve pradarśitasya saptabhaṃgīnyāyasya nityatvabhinnatvādidharmāntareṣvapi
yojanamabhipretyopasaṃharati—<pratika>ata iti</pratika> । saptabhaṃgīnyāyo na yuktaḥ । ekasminvastuni viru-
ddhānekadharmasamāveśāsaṃbhavāditi sūtrārthamāviṣkurvan siddhāṃtayati—<pratika>etadayuktamiti</pratika> । nanve-
kasminnipi deśakālādyupādhibhedena yathā sattvāsattvādiviruddhadharmasamāveśaḥ tathopādhibhedaṃ
vināpyastu । tatra lokasiddhāni prāṇāni santīti cedihāpi santyeva prapañcasatyatvā-
satyatvādikaṃ vyavasthāpayadbhistaistairvādibhirupapāditāni pramāṇānītyāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>paryāya-
bhāvinaśceti</pratika> । sattvāsattvādayaḥ piṃḍatvaghaṭatvādivat paryāyabhāvina eva lokānubhava-
siddhāḥ । yāni tu vādibhirupanyastānyaparyāyeṇa sattvāsattvādikamupanayanti tāni sarvā-
ṇyapi pramāṇānītyetanna saṃbhavati । parasparavirodhena keṣāṃcidābhāsatvāvaśyaṃbhāvāt ।
anyathā prapañcasatyatvādivādibhistadasatyatvābhyupagame doṣāṇāmapyucyamānatvena teṣāmapya-
nurodhyatvāpattyā anekāntavādinaḥ tattadvādyuktadoṣabhāktvasyāpi prasaṃgāditi bhāvaḥ ।
etena yaduktaṃ syādvādamañjaryām—<quote>‘anyonyapakṣapratipakṣabhāvādyathā pare matsariṇaḥ pravādāḥ ।
nayānaśeṣānaviśeṣamicchanna pakṣapātī samayastathā naḥ ।।’</quote> iti tannirastam । apakṣapātena
samastasamayoktasattvādiviśeṣābhyupagame tattadudbhāvitāsattvādipakṣadoṣāṇāmapyabhyupagantavya-
tvāpatteḥ । ardhajaratīye niyāmakābhāvāt । nanu tarhi lokāvirodhenaiva saptabhaṃgīnayaṃ samartha-
yāmahe । sarvasaṃpratipanne tāvadekasya kālabhedena sattvāsattve । astayoḥ svasvakālavivakṣayā
asti nāstīti bhaṃgadvayamupapadyate । kramavivakṣayā sadasadidamiti tṛtīyabhaṃgo yujyate ।
<pb n="103"/>
yugapatsattvāsattvavivakṣayā'nirvacanīyamiti caturthabhaṃgo ghaṭate । na hi yugapadekasya sattva-
masattvaṃ ca nirvaktuṃ śakyam । yugapatsattvāsattvayoranirvacanīyatvena sahasattvasyāsattvasya kra-
mikobhayasya ca melane avaśiṣṭaṃ bhagaṃtrayaṃ saṃpadyate । tadāhānantavīryaḥ—<quote>‘tadvidhānavivakṣāyāṃ
syādastīti gatirbhavet । syānnāstīti prayogaḥ syāttanniṣedhe vivakṣite ।। krameṇobhayavāṃ-
chāyāṃ prayogassamudāyabhāk । yugapattadvivakṣāyāṃ syādavācyamaśaktitaḥ ।। ādyāvācyaviva-
kṣāyāṃ pañcamo bhaṃga iṣyate । aṃtyāvācyavivakṣāyāṃ ṣaṣṭhabhaṃgasamudbhavaḥ ।। samuccayena yuktaśca
saptamo bhaṃga ucyate’</quote> । iti । yadyevaṃ pāribhāṣiko'yaṃ saptabhaṃgīnayaḥ svīkriyata eva ।
ghaṭādiḥ svadeśe'sti anyadeśe nāsti svakāle'sti anyakāle nāsti svātmanāsti anyā-
tmanā nāstīti deśakālapratiyogirūpopādhibhedena sattvāsattvasamāveśe laukikaparīkṣa-
kāṇāṃ visaṃpratipattyabhāvāt । na caitāvatā parābhimataṃ vastvanaikāntyamāpadyate । svakāle
sadeva anyakāle asadeva ityādiniyamasya <pratika>bhaṃgābhāvāt</pratika> । nanu, vastuto deśakālādyupā-
dhibhedo nāpekṣyate । sa deśa iha nāsti sa kāla idānīṃ nāstītyādipratītau deśakālādyupā-
dhyaṃtarābhāvāt । tatrāpyupādhyaṃtarānveṣaṇe'navasthānāt । itarānaṃgīkārayituṃ paraṃ guḍaji-
hvikānyāyena deśakālādyupādhibhedamaṃtarbhāvya sattvāsattvapratītirupanyasyate । vastuto
vimṛśyamānā sā nirupādhikaiva sattvāsattvādisaṃkare pramāṇam । ata eva syādvādino
<quote>‘ghaṭo'sti ghaṭo nāsti paṭassan paṭo'san’</quote> ityādipratyakṣapratītimeva sattvāsattvādyanaikāntye
pramāṇamupagacchaṃti। sarvamanaikāṃtikaṃ vastutvāt citrapaṭavadityanumānamapi pramāṇayanti ।
na hi citrapaṭe nīlapītādyasaṃkarārthaṃ pradeśabheda āśrayitavyaḥ । pradeśabhedāsaṃkarārthamupā-
dhyaṃtarānveṣaṇe anavasthānāt । etena saṃyogatadabhāvādyasaṃkaro'pi pratyākhyātaḥ । tasmā-
tsarvaṃ vastvanaikāṃtikameveti syādvādarahasyamiti cet ucyate । parasparaviruddhadharmasa-
māveśe sarvānubhavasiddhastāvadupādhibhedo nāpahnotuṃ śakyate । lokamaryādāmanatikrama-
māṇena deśakālādisattvaniṣedhe'pi deśakālādyupādhyavacchedaḥ anubhūyata eva । ihātmā-
śrayaḥ parasparāśrayaḥ anavasthā vā na doṣaḥ । yathā prameyatvābhidheyatvādivṛttau yathā ca bī-
jāṃkurādikāryakāraṇabhāve viruddhadharmasamāveśe । sarvathopādhibhedaṃ pratyācakṣāṇasya cāyamasyāḥ
putraḥ asyāḥ patiḥ asyāḥ pitā asyāśś‍vaśura ityādivyavasthāpi na siddhyediti kathaṃ
tatra tatra syādvāde mātṛtvādyucitavyavahārān vyavasthayānutiṣṭhet । tasmātsarvabahiṣkā-
ryo'yamanekāntavāda ityalaṃ vistareṇa । itthaṃ jainābhimataḥ syādvādo dūṣitaḥ । atha tada-
bhimateṣu padārtheṣu prathamaparigaṇitasya jīvasya dehaparimāṇatvaṃ taduktamuttarasūtrairdūṣyate । taddhi-
sarvāṃgīṇasukhādiyuktyābhāsopanītam । tasmindūṣite prakriyāmātrasiddhamanyatsarvaṃ svayameva dū-
ṣitaṃ bhavatīti । na hi jīvadharmādharmapudgalakālākāśādīni ṣaḍdravyāṇi; eteṣu pudgalāṃ-
targatān paramāṇūn kālaṃ cāṇumapahāya jīvo dharmādharmau paramāṇuvyatiriktā mahābhūtacatu-
ṣṭayasthiratrasarūpeṇa ṣaḍvidhāḥ pudgalā ākāśaścetyete paṃcatāstikāyāḥ । jīvājīvāsravādayassapta
mokṣopāyatvenādhigantavyā’ ityādivibhāge siddhāṃtyabhimatapaśupāśādivibhāge ś‍vetāś‍va-
taropaniṣadādivat kimapi śraddheyaṃ pramāṇamasti । sarvajñapraṇītāgamamūlakatvakalpanāyāḥ
<quote>‘kapilo yadi sarvajñaḥ kaṇādo neti kā pramā । tāvubhau yadi sarvajñau matabhedaḥ kathaṃ bhave’</quote>
<pb n="104"/>
<sutra>।। sū ।। evaṃ cātmākārts‍nyam ।। 32 ।।</sutra>
evaṃ ca ātmākārts‍nyaṃ cānupapannam । ātmanaḥ śarīraparimāṇatve hi bṛhata-
śśarīrādalpīyasi praviśato vikalatvaṃ prasajyeta । ata ātmanaḥ śarīrapari-
māṇatvamayuktameva ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। na ca paryāyādapyavirodho vikārādibhyaḥ ।। 33 ।।</sutra>
tathāvidhālpatvāvasthāntarayogādapyavirodho na saṃbhavati; ghaṭādivadvikārā-
didoṣaprasaṅgāt ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। antyāvasthiteścobhayanityatvādaviśeṣaḥ ।। 34 ।।</sutra>
antyasya mokṣadaśāparimāṇasyaikarūpāvasthitestasya svābhāvikatvenātmata-
tparimāṇayorubhayorapi nityatayā pūrvāvasthāyāmapyaviśeṣaḥ । vividhadehaparimā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
diti nyāyenānādaraṇīyatvāt । nāpyevaṃbhūtā vibhāgāḥ taptaśilārohaṇādivratāni ca
kayācana yuktyopanetuṃ śakyante । tasmādyuktyābhāsāvalaṃbanamātmano dehaparimāṇatvamātra-
miha dūṣyate—<pratika>sū ।। evaṃ cātmākārts‍nyam ।। 32 ।।</pratika> yathaikasminsattvāsattvādiviruddhadharma-
saṃkaro'nupapannaḥ evamātmākārts‍nyamapyanupapannamiti sūtrārthaṃ darśayati—<pratika>evamiti</pratika> । evaṃśabdena
sattvāsattvādisaṃkaravatsūtrakaṇṭhoktigṛhītātmākārts‍nyavyatiriktamanyadapyevaṃprakāraṃ jinamata-
kalpitamanupapannamiti sūcyate । kiṃ tadakārts‍nyaṃ yadanupapannamiti pratijñāyate kutaśca tadanupapa-
nnamityākāṃkṣāyāmāha—<pratika>ātmanaśśarīraparimāṇatve hīti</pratika> । anena śarīraparimāṇatva-
makārts‍nyaṃ vivakṣitam । tadanupapattau ca mātaṃgadehānmaśakadehaṃ praviśatastatrāmāṃtamaṃśaṃ vihāya
praveśaḥ syāditi jīvasya pūrvāvasthāto vikalatvaṃ prasajyeta । evaṃ maśakadehānmātaṃgadehaṃ
praviśatastadvyāpanasamarthaparimāṇaṃ nāstīti tatra tasya sarvāṃgīṇasukhādikaṃ na syādityevaṃ-
rūpo heturvivakṣita iti darśitaṃ bhavati । akārts‍nyaśabdena dehaparimāṇatvamupādadānena dūṣa-
ṇāṃtaramapi vivakṣitam । yadi tattaddehaparimāṇo jīvastadā yogasiddhasya kāyavyūhaparigrahe
kṛtsnadehavyāpitvaṃ nāstīti tasyānekakāyādhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ na syāditi ghaṭamaṇikagṛhodarādi-
gatapradīpaprabhāvat jīvasya saṃkocavikāsarūpāvasthāviśeṣaśālitvaṃ syādityāśaṃkāparihā-
rārthaṃ sūtram ।<pratika>sū॰ ।। na ca paryāyādapyavirodho vikārādibhyaḥ ।। 33 ।।</pratika> paramate
paryāyaśabdo'vasthāsu pāribhāṣikaḥ । <pratika>alpatveti</pratika> । gajaśarīrānmaśakaśarīrapraveśe idamuktam ।
vaiparītye tu mahattvamavasthāṃtaraṃ draṣṭavyam । <pratika>vikārādīti</pratika> । vikāro janma vināśaśca ।
ādiśabdena sāvayavatvādikaṃ gṛhyate । jīvasya dehaparimāṇatvābhāve yuktyaṃtaramucyate—<pratika>sū॰ ।।
antyāvasthiteścobhayanityatvādaviśeṣaḥ ।। 34 ।।</pratika> mokṣadaśāyāṃ yajjīvasya parimāṇaṃ
tadantyam । tasya tathaivāvasthānaṃ bhavati । tadanaṃtaraṃ dehāntarābhāvena dehāntarocitaparimāṇā-
ntarāprasakteḥ । ato yathā mokṣadaśāvasthitameva jīvasvarūpaṃ pūrvamapyevaṃ tatparimāṇamapi tadeva
ityaviśeṣoṃ'gīkarttuṃ yuktaḥ । jīvavattatparimāṇasyāpi mokṣadaśāpannasyādehopādhikasya
nityatvāditi sūtrārthamāha—<pratika>antyasyeti</pratika> । siddhānte cicchaktessaṃsāradaśāyāṃ saṃkoca-
vikāsaśālitve'pi na svarūpato janmavināśau na vā sāvayavatvādikam । mokṣadaśāyāṃ
<pb n="105"/>
ṇatve hi vaikalyaṃ bhavedeva । ata ekasmin sattvāsattvādivādāt ātmanaḥ śarī-
raparimāṇavādācca jainamatamapi viruddhameva ।। ityekasminnasaṃbhavādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vyāpitve'pi na pūrvaṃ tatparimāṇamiti vyavasthāyāṃ jainābhimatajīvoktadoṣo na bhaviṣyati ।
<quote>‘śrutestu śabdamūlatvā’</quote> diti nyāyāt । jainānāṃ tu dṛṣṭānusāreṇa kalpayatāṃ jīvasya tathaiva
sāvayavatvādikamapi syāt । tathābhūtānāmeva prabhādīnāṃ saṃkocavikāsadarśanāt । tathā
mokṣadaśāpannaparimāṇameva prāgapi svābhāvikaṃ syāt । jīvasvarūpe tathādarśanāt iti
doṣaḥ prasajyate । evameva hyagrimādhikaraṇe svābhimatasyaiva śrutisiddhasya parameśvarasyānumā-
nikatvāṃgīkāre'dhiṣṭhātṛtvānupapattirvakṣyate ।। ityekasminnasaṃbhavādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām athaikasminnasaṃbhavādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। naikasminnasaṃbhavāt ।। 31 ।। evaṃ cātmākārts‍nyam ।। 32 ।। na ca paryāyādapyavirodho vikā-
rādibhyaḥ ।। 33 ।। antyāvasthiteścobhayanityatvādaviśeṣaḥ ।। 34 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>jīvājīvāsravamukhasaptapadārthātmakaṃ viśvam । syādastiprakriyayā saptākāraṃ vadaṃti jaināstu ।। 121 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>sadasattvādyekasminvastuni yugapatkathaṃ ghaṭate । tanumānatā ca jīve nānātanubhedabhāji katham ।। 122 ।।</l></lg>
<head>ityekasminnasaṃbhavādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām ata ekasminnasaṃbhavādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। naikasminnasaṃbhavāt ।। 32 ।। evaṃ cātmākārts‍nyam ।। 33 ।। na ca paryāyādapyavirodho vikā-
rādibhyaḥ ।। 34 ।। antyāvasthiteścobhayanityatvādaviśeṣaḥ ।। 35 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ muktakacchānāṃ bauddhānāṃ mate niraste muktāṃbarajainamatasya buddhisthatvenānantaropasthitikatvāttanmatamiha
nirākriyate । digaṃbaramataṃ pramāṇamūlamuta bhrāntimūlamiti saṃśayaḥ । <quote>‘syādasti syānnāsti’</quote> ityādisaptabhaṃgīnayamastitvanā-
stitvādiviruddhadharmadvayamādāya sarveṣu padārtheṣu yojayaṃto digaṃbarāḥ padārthamātrasyānekarūpatvāmācakṣata iti tanmataṃ prāmāṇikamiti
<pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, ekasminvastuni viruddhadharmāṇāmasaṃbhavena vastuno'nekarūpatvābhāvāt jīvasya dehaparimāṇatve
paricchinnatvavikāritvādidoṣaprasakteścārhataṃ matamapi saugatamatavadaprāmāṇikameveti । <pratika>।। sūtrārthasta, sū ।। naikasminnasaṃ-
bhavāt ।। 33 ।। ekasmin</pratika>=paramātmarūpe vastuni । <pratika>asaṃbhavāt</pratika>= viruddhadharmāṇāmasaṃbhavāt । <pratika>na</pratika>= anekarūpatvaṃ
nāstītyarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>dehaparimāṇa evātmeti yatteṣāṃ mataṃ tadda‍ūṣayati—<pratika>evaṃ cātmākārts‍nyem ।। 34 ।।</pratika> yathā syādvāde ekatra viruddhadharmāsaṃ-
bhavo doṣaḥ prasaktaḥ <pratika>evam ātmākārts‍nyaṃ ca</pratika>= ātmano jīvasyākārts‍nyaṃ paricchinnavamapi prasajyetetyarthaḥ । tataśca pari-
cchinnatvādanityatvaṃ syāt । kiṃ ca jīvasya dehaparimāṇatvāṃgīkāre manuṣyātmano gajaśarīre kṛtsnasyātmano maśakādiśarīre ca
praveśo na syāditi bhāvaḥ ।</p>
<p>ātmanassāvayavatvāṃgīkāreṇāvayavānāṃ vṛddhihrāsavattvāṅgīkārātkrameṇa praveśo'stvityata āha—<pratika>sū ।। na ca paryāyā-
dapyavirodho vikārādibhyaḥ ।। 36 ।।</pratika> paryāyeṇāpi avayavavṛddhihrāsābhyāṃ tattaccharīraparimāṇatvasyātmanyavirodha ityeta-
dapi । <pratika>na ca</pratika>=na bhavati । kutaḥ । <pratika>vikārādibhyaḥ</pratika>= vikārādidoṣaprasaṃgādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>kiṃ ca <pratika>।। sū ।। antyāvasthiteścobhayanityatvādaviśeṣaḥ ।। 36 ।। aṃtyāvasthiteḥ</pratika>=mokṣāvasthābhāvino jīvapari-
māṇasya nityatvenāvasthiteḥ । <pratika>ubhayanityatvāt</pratika>= tatpūrvayorādyamadhyamaparimāṇayornityatvaprasaṃgāt । <pratika>aviśeṣaḥ</pratika>= trayā-
ṇāmapi parimāṇānāṃ sāmyaṃ prasajyeta । ataḥ saugatamatavadārhatamatamapyaprāmāṇikameveti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate, rāmānujamate</pratika>, tathā <pratika>nandatīrthamate</pratika> cedamadhikaraṇaṃ jainamatanirākaraṇārthameva pravṛttamiti yadyapi saṃdeha-
pūrvapakṣādiṣu nāsti viśeṣaḥ tathāpi <pratika>ānandatīrthamate <quote>‘antyāvasthite’</quote></pratika> riti sūtre <pratika><quote>‘aviśeṣāt’</quote></pratika> iti pañcamya-
ntaṃtaiyā pāṭha ādṛtaḥ । tasminneva sūtre <pratika>śrīkaṇṭharāmānujamatayoḥ <quote>‘ubhayanityatvāt’</quote></pratika> ityasya ātmatatparimāṇayo-
rubhayorapi nityatvātpūrvāvasthāyāmapi na viśeṣa ityarthaḥ iti vyākhyātam । <pratika>ānandatīrthamate tu</pratika> muktigatātmaparimāṇasyā-
vasthitestadavacchedakatayā nityadehāvaśyaṃbhāvenobhayasya muktāvātmataddehayornityatvādadyatanadehānāmapi nityatvaṃ syāddehatvāviśe-
vāditi sūtrārtho vivata ityapi viśeṣaḥ । anyadaviśiṣṭam । <pratika>iti sūtrātharcandrikāyāmekasminnasaṃbhavādhikaraṇam ।</pratika>
<pb n="106"/>
atha pāśupatādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। patyurasāmañjasyāt ।। 35 ।।</sutra>
patyuḥ parameśvarasya śrutisiddhajagadubhayakāraṇatvasyāpi tadāgamaniṣṭhāstanmatā-
bhiprāyānabhijñā ekadeśinastāntrikāḥ kevalanimittatvaṃ vadanti । tadyuktaṃ na
veti saṃdehaḥ ।।
tatraivaṃ pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ—kulālādiranupādānabhūta eva daṇḍādikaṃ niyacchan kartā</p>

<head>atha pāśupatādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। patyurasāmañjasyāt ।। 35 ।।</pratika> ihādhikaraṇe parameśvarasyānumānātsiddhista-
syānumānatassiddhaṃ nimittatvameva kevalaṃ nopādānatvamapīti mataṃ nirākriyate । atre'yaṃ
śaṃkā samunmiṣati । śāstrayonitvādhikaraṇe śāstrameva parameśvare pramāṇaṃ nānumānamiti
vyavasthāpitam । śāstrataśca tasyopādānatvasyāpi siddhiḥ prakṛtyadhikaraṇe pratipāditā ।
anumānikeśvaravādināṃ kāṇabhujākṣacaraṇānāṃ mataṃ ca pūrvameva tarkāpratiṣṭhānavaidikāpari-
grahābhyāṃ nirākṛtam । kimatra nirākaraṇīyamavaśiṣyate yadartho'yamadhikaraṇāntarāraṃbha-
itīmāṃ śaṅkāṃ nirasanīyamataviśeṣopanyāsena pariharati—<pratika>patyuriti ।</pratika> ayamatra parihārā-
bhiprāyaḥ । parameśvarasyānumānikatvaṃ kevalaṃ nimittatvaṃ ca vaiśeṣikādiśāstreṣveva nocyate
sakalavedasāmarasyarahasyanidhānabhūteṣu śivāgameṣvapi pratiṣṭhāpyate । tatkathaṃ pratyākhyeyam । na
hi vedasamānaiḥ śivavākyaiḥ pūrvapūrvaśaivācāryapraṇītaistadvyākhyānaiśca mahatā prabaṃdhena prati-
ṣṭhāpitaṃ parameśvarasādhakānumānaṃ tasya kevalanimittatvaṃ ca katipayavedavākyavirodhena puruṣabu-
ddhiprabhavatarkavirodhena ca pratyākhyātuṃ yuktam । bahuvākyānurodhena katipayavākyānāmarthāṃ-
taravarṇanasyocitatvāt vedavirodheneva śivāgamavirodhenāpi kiṃpacānapuruṣabuddhiprabhavata-
rkāṇāmābhāsīkaraṇasyocitatvācceti śaṅkāṃtaranirākaraṇārthamidamadhikaraṇam । tannirākaraṇaṃ
tvittham—śivāgamānāṃ parameśvarasya svataṃtrānumānatassiddhau tasya kevalanimittatve ca na
tātparyam । tathāpyuttānahṛdayāḥ yathāśrutārthagrāhiṇastattātparyasārānabhijñāḥ kecana tāntrikā-
stadvyākhyātāraḥ tathā mataṃ pratyatiṣṭhipan । anādivyākhyānaparaṃparāprāptaṃ tanmataṃ śṛṇvatāṃ tatraiva
śivāgamānāmapi tātparyamiti bhrāṃtiḥ syāt, tannirākaraṇārtho'yamadhikaraṇāṃtarāraṃbhayatna
iti । yadyevaṃ śaivānāmapi pradhānakāraṇavāditvāt sāṃkhyādhikaraṇānaṃtaramanenādhikaraṇena
bhāvyam । satyam । avāṃtarasaṅgativaśādiha kṛtam । pūrvādhikaraṇe hi sattvāsattvayorviro
dhādekatrāsaṃbhava uktaḥ । evamevādhiṣṭhātṛtvopādānatvayorapyekatrāsaṃbhava ityatra pratyavasthāna-
miti । tathaiva pūrvapakṣamupapādayati—<pratika>kulālādiriti</pratika> । yadyapi prakṛtyadhikaraṇe'pyayaṃ
pūrvapakṣa upanyastaḥ tathāpi tatropādānatvaviṣayaśrutīnāṃ kevalanimittaviṣayatve pūrvapakṣyunnī-
tanyāyābhāso nirvikāratvaśrutivirodhotprekṣā ca mukhyaṃ pūrvapakṣāvalaṃbanam । ata eva
śrutyavaṣṭaṃbhānyeva tatra siddhāṃtasūtrāṇi । tadupaṣṭaṃbhakatayā paraṃ bhāṣyakṛtātratyā kulālamṛ-
tpiṃḍādidṛṣṭāṃtamūlā yuktistatropanyastā । atra tu saiva mukhyaṃ pūrvapakṣāvalaṃbanamiti na paunaru-

ataḥ parameśvaraḥ śarīrarahitaḥ śuddhamāyādhiṣṭhāteti tathābhūtamīśvaramanumānena sisādhayiṣataḥ

nnarthe tātparyamāviṣkartuṃ paramukhena śaṅkāmudbhāvayati—<pratika>pradhāneti । tadgatabhogādīti</pratika> ।
ādiśabdena puṇyapāpavattvamanekatvamabhavatvamasarvajñatvamityetāni gṛhyaṃte । adhiṣṭhānānupapa-

reveti</pratika> । <quote>‘anaśnannanyaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘na karmaṇā vardhate no kanīyān’</quote> <quote>‘dyāvabhūmī janayandeva ekaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘yaḥ
sarvajñaḥ sarvāvit’</quote> ityādiśrutirityarthaḥ । <pratika>parameśvara iti</pratika> । śakterapyupalakṣaṇam । <pratika>nirvikā-
ratvamapīti</pratika> । prakṛtyadhikaraṇe tathopa pāditatvāditi bhāvaḥ । evamanenādhikaraṇena nirākara-
ṇīyaḥ śivasya kevalanimittatvavādo nāgamamūlaḥ kiṃ tu tadabhiprāyānabhijñavyākhyātṛparaṃ-
parāmūlaḥ ityetadāviṣkartuṃ śivasyopādānatvasaṃpratipattau sarvajñānottarāgamamūlaṃ vāyusaṃhitā-
vacanajātamudāharati—<pratika>śaktiriti</pratika> । sūkṣmacidacidrūpāpannacicchaktiviśiṣṭaḥ sakalatatvā-
tītaśśiva eka eva sargādyasamaye'vatiṣṭhate । sisṛkṣostataḥ prathamaṃ śivatatvaparabiṃduparamā-
yāśuddhamāyāmahāmāyākuṭilākuṇḍalinyādiśabdālaṃbanatvena prasiddhā śuddhādhvagatasakala-

<lg><l>tato māyā tato'vyaktaṃ śivācchaktimataḥ prabhoḥ ।।</l>

yāmavatiṣṭhate । jalādyavyaktāṃtāni trayoviṃśatistatvāni pratiṣṭhāyām । puruṣādīni māyāntāni
sapta tatvāni vidyāyām । śuddhavidyā maheśvaraśca śāṃtikalāyām । sadāśivaśśaktiśca śāṃtya-
tītāyām । paraśaktistu tatvāṃtarāṇāṃ tattatpratiṣṭhitabhuvanānāṃ ca bhedopabhedairvinā ṣaṣṭisaṃ-

prathamasaṃbhūte’</quote></pratika>tyādibhiḥ ślokaiḥ । atra śaktiśabdaśśivattatvarūpaparaśaktiparaḥ । sa tatkā-

māyāparaḥ । sa tatkāryāṇāṃ kālādīnāṃ puruṣāṃtānāṃ miśratatvānāmapyupalakṣakaḥ । avyakta-

ttipadamudbhinnaṃ pratiṣṭhāpadataḥ kramāt’</quote> । iti gādhayā paraśaktitaḥ kalāpañcakotpattirvarṇitā ।

iti । tanniṣṭhānāṃ vaidikāparigrāhyatvañca tatraiva pratipāditam । <quote>‘buddhaśrāvakanirgandhāḥ pāñca-

dvedamārgāddhi yadanyadiha jāyate । tacchūdrakarma vijñeyaṃ raudraṃ śaucavivarjita’</quote> miti niśvā-

prāmāṇyaṃ bhavediti kiṃviṣayamidamadhikaraṇaṃ syāt ityākāṃkṣāyāmāha—<pratika>idamadhikaraṇa-
miti</pratika> । ācāryāṃtaroktamadhikaraṇasya viṣayamāha—<pratika>athaveti</pratika> । taṃtrāntaranirākaraṇārthaṃ neda-
madhikaraṇaṃ kiṃ tu yathā viyadādyutpattiśaṃkāparihārārthāni viyadadhikaraṇādīni evamidaṃ
kevalanimittatvaśaṃkāparihārārthamadhikaraṇam । na caivaṃ sati taṃtrāṃtaranirākaraṇārthe'sminpāde
saṃgatyabhāvo doṣaḥ syāditi vācyam । pādasaṃgatyabhāve'pi pūrvādhikaraṇanyāyaprasaktāvānta
raśaṃkāparihārāryatvena prāsaṃgikatvopapatterityarthaḥ । kimatra mataṃ grāhyamityākāṃkṣāyāmāha---
<pratika>sarvatheti</pratika> । kevalanimitteśvaravādanirākaraṇasyobhayathāpi siddhernaikatrābhiniveśe kiṃci-
tphalamastīti bhāvaḥ । pādasaṃgaterapi lābhāddhairaṇyagarbhaviṣayamiti mataṃ jyāya iti spaṣṭameva ।।</p>
<head>iti pāśupatādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha pāśupatādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। patyurasāmañjasyāt ।। 35 ।। adhiṣṭhānānupapatteśca ।। 36 ।। karaṇavaccenna bhogādibhyaḥ ।। 37 ।।
aṃtavattvamasarvajñatā vā ।। 38 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>kulālādirloke dṛṣṭaḥ kartā yathānupādānam । daṇḍādikaṃ niyacchan tathāyamīśo nimittamātraṃ syāt ।। 123 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>śrutinayavirodhavaśato'sāmañjasyānnimittatā na syāt । aśarīrasya tathopādānādhiṣṭhānasādhanāyogāt ।। 124 ।।</l></lg>
<pb n="114"/>
<lg><l>vaiphalye yuktisṛteśśrutiśaraṇena tvayāpi bhāvyamiha । *(1) śrutyā tu samādhāne tasya tathā prakṛtitāṃpi syāt ।। 125 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti pāśupatādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p>(1) atra nayamaṇimālāyām* idamaṅkitamantyamardhameva mātṛkayorupalabdham । pūrvatana idamadhikaraṇīyo grantho'śeṣastru-
ṭitaḥ । mātṛkāntarālābhādda‍urlabhaśca । tathāpi mayādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣādiparyālocanayā yathāmati svayaṃ paripūrya saṃyojitaḥ ।।
tadatra sahṛdayairguṇaikagrahayālubhirmātṛkāntaralābhena truṭitāṃśopalabdhau tatpreṣaṇenāhamapyanugrāhya ityarthaye savinayam ।।</p>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha patyadhikaraṇamathavā pāśupatādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। patyurasāmañjasyāt ।। *saṃbandhānupapatteśca ।। 37 ।। adhiṣṭhānānupapatteśca ।। 38 ।। karaṇavacce-
nna bhogādibhyaḥ ।। 39 ।। antavattvamasarvajñatā vā ।। 40 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ sattvāsattvayorekatra virodhādasaṃbhava ityuktam । tadvadupādānatvakartṛtvayorekatra virodhādasaṃbhavaḥ syādi-
ti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyedamārabhyate <pratika>sū ।। patyurasāmaṃjasyāt ।। 37 ।।</pratika> atra kevalamadhiṣṭhātā īśvaro jagato nopādānamiti
māheś‍varasiddhāntaḥ pramāṇamūla uta bhrāntimūla iti saṃśayaḥ । prāmāṇika iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu,</pratika> īś‍varasya jaga-
dupādānapradhānādiprerakatvena jagatsarjane pravṛttau rāgādidoṣaprasakterasāmañjasyāpātāt, preryapradhānādibhiḥ prerakeś‍varasya nira-
vayavatvena saṃbandhānupapatteḥ apratyakṣapradhānaviṣayakapreraṇāyā īś‍vare'nupapatteḥ jīvendriyayoriva pradhāneś‍varayoḥ preryaprerakatvābhyupagame
īś‍varasya bhogādiprasakteḥ pradhānajīveś‍varāṇāṃ vināśitvasyeśvarasyāsārvajñyasya ca prasakteśca īś‍varasya jagannimittatvamātravādī
māheś‍vararāddhānto bhrāntimūla iti ।। <pratika>sūtrārthastu, patyuḥ</pratika>= īś‍varasya jagannimittamātratvaṃ na saṃbhavati । kutaḥ । <pratika>asāma-
ñjasyāt</pratika>= jagatsarjane pravṛttau pravṛtte rāgādipūrvakatveneś‍varasya rāgādidoṣaprasaktyā āsāmañjasyasaṃbhavāt । iti ।।</p>
<p>apica <pratika>।। sū ।। saṃbandhānupapatteśca ।। 38 ।।</pratika> asaṃbaddhasya prerakatvāyogāt preryapradhānādibhiḥ prerakasyeś‍varasya saṃbandhā-
nupapatteśca māheś‍varasiddhānto bhrāntimūla iti ।।</p>
<p>kicaṃ <pratika> ।। sū ।। adhiṣṭhānānupapatteśca ।। 39 ।।</pratika> pradhānasya rūpādihīnatvena tadviṣayakādhiṣṭhānasyeś‍vare'nupapatte-
ścetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>prakārāntareṇākṣipya pariharati— <pratika>sū ।। karaṇavaccenna bhogādibhyaḥ ।। 40 ।। karaṇavaccet</pratika>= iṃdriyāṇyapratyakṣāṇyapi
yathā jīvena preryante evaṃ pradhānamapratyakṣamapi īś‍vareṇa preryata iti cet । <pratika>na</pratika> । kutaḥ । <pratika>bhogādibhyaḥ</pratika>= bhogādibhyo do-
ṣebhyaḥ ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>kiṃca । <pratika>sū ।। antavattvamasarvajñatā vā ।। 41 ।।</pratika> pradhānajīveś‍varāṇāṃ paricchinnasaṃkhyāparimāṇavattvāt trayāṇāṃ ghaṭa-
vadantavattvaṃ vināśitvaṃ syāt । aparicchinnatve īś‍varasyāsarvajñatvaṃ syāt ityarthaḥ ।। ato māheś‍varasiddhānto bhrānti-
mūla iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, śrutisiddhajagadubhayakāraṇatvasyāpi parameś‍varasya śaivāgamaniṣṭhaistadabhiprāyānabhijñaistāṃtrikairekadeśibhiru
cyamānaṃ kevalanimittatvaṃ yuktaṃ na veti saṃdehe kulālādidṛṣṭānteneś‍varasya kevalanimittamātratvaṃ yuktamiti pūrvapakṣaḥ । śruti-
nyāyavirodhenāsāmañjasyātparameś‍varasya kevalanimittamātratvamayuktamiti siddhāntaḥ । śivāgamaikadeśe parabrahmaṇaśśivasya ke-
valanimittatvamupapāditaṃ tatparihārārthamidamadhikaraṇamiti keṣāṃcitpūrvācāryāṇāmāśayaḥ । vedāgamayoḥ kartṛsāmānyādekārthapara-
tvena virodhābhāvādidamadhikaraṇaṃ kevaleś‍varanimittatvavādihiraṇyagarbhoktayogasmṛtiviṣayam । āgameṣu parameś‍varasya jagadubhaya-
kāraṇatvameva pratipāditam । kevalanimittamātratvamāgameṣūktamiti pratipādanamāgamārthānaṃbhijñatāṃtrikaikadeśivyākhyānamātramūla-
tayāna prāmāṇyamarhatīti ca śrīkaṇṭhācāryāṇāṃ svābhiprāyaḥ । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, patyurasāmañjasyāt ।। 35 ।। patyuḥ</pratika>=īś‍varasya
kevalanimittatvaṃ na yuktam । kutaḥ । <pratika>asāmañjasyāt</pratika>= śrutinyāyavirodhenāsāmañjasyāt । iti । <pratika>sū ।। adhiṣṭhānānu-
papatteśca ।। 36 ।।</pratika> aśarīrasya parameś‍varasya māyopādānādhiṣṭhānānupatteḥ śarīriṇa eva kulālādermṛtpiṇḍādyupādānādhi-
ṣṭhānasya loke darśanācca parameś‍varasya kevanimittatvaṃ na saṃbhavati iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। karaṇavaccenna bhogādibhyaḥ ।। 37 ।।</pratika> atra karaṇapadaṃ śarīropalakṣakam । yathā śarīramaśarīra ātmādhitiṣṭhati
tadvatpradhānamapīś‍varo'dhitiṣṭhatīti cenna । yathātmano'śarīrasya śarīrādhiṣṭhāne tadnatasukhaduḥkhādiḥ prāpnoti tathā parameś‍vara-
syāpi māyādhiṣṭhāne tadnatabhogādiḥ prasajyeta । ato na nimittamātratvamīś‍varasyeti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। antavattvamasarvajña-
tā vā ।। 38 ।।</pratika> vāśabdaścārthe । tathā sati patyurīś‍varasya saṃsāriṇa iva nāśavattvamasarvajñatvaṃ ca bhavati । ato na nimitta-
mātratvamīś‍varasyābhyupeyamiti siddham ।।</p>
<note>* idaṃ sūtraṃ śāṃkarānandatīrthībhāṣyapāṭhayoreva dṛśyate na śrīkaṇṭharāmānujabhāṣyapāṭhyorityavagantavyam ।।</note>
<pb n="115"/>
atha pāñcarātrādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। utpattyasaṃbhavāt ।। 39 ।।</sutra>
pañcarātramataṃ vāsudevoktam । tatra jīvotpattyādikamucyate । tat saṃbhavati na
veti saṃdehaḥ ।।
saṃbhavatīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । kutaḥ ? bhagavatā vāsudevena proktasya pramāṇatvāt ।
tathā hyatra prakriyā—bhagavāneko vāsudevaḥ paramātmā । tasmāt saṃkarṣaṇākhyo
jīvo jāyate । jīvācca pradyumnākhyaṃ manaḥ । manasaścāniruddhākhyo'haṃkāraḥ । ete
catvāro vyūhā sarvātmāna iti । ato vāsudevasya hiraṇyagarbhādibhyo'pi para-
tvena taduktasya prāmāṇyādidaṃ sarvamupapannam ।।
iti prāpte brūmaḥ । jīvotpattyabhidhāyakamidaṃ śāstramapramāṇam; kṛtanāśākṛtā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha pāñcarātrādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<p>hairaṇyagarbhamatanirākaraṇānaṃtaraṃ vaiṣṇavamatanirākaraṇārthamadhikaraṇam—<pratika>sū ।। utpattyasaṃbha-
vāt ।। 39 ।। jīvotpattyādikamiti ।</pratika> ādiśabdena jīvānmanautpattirvāsudevasya para-
makāraṇatvamityādi gṛhyate । yadyapi jīvaviśeṣe hiraṇyagarbhe bhrāṃtisaṃbhavāttaduktamīśvarasya ke-
valanimittatvaṃ na grāhyam । tathā'pi pārameśvaraparaśaktyaṃśatayā parameś‍varasyaivāvasthāviśeṣarūpe
bhagavati vāsudeve bhrāṃtileśasyāpyasaṃbhavāt taduktaṃ jīvotpattyādikaṃ tathaiva grāhyamiti pūrvapa-
kṣayati—<pratika>saṃbhavatīti</pratika> । nanu śarīrādyupādhikā jīvotpattiḥ siddhāṃte'pi saṃmatā kathaṃ
pūrvapakṣatayā niveśyate ityāśaṅkya pāñcarātre jīvasyocyamānotpattirna śarīrādyupādhikā ।
manohaṃkārayorapi sṛṣṭeḥ prāgucyamānatvāditi darśayituṃ tatprakriyāmupanyasyati—<pratika>tathā hīti ।
ete catvāra iti ।</pratika> bhagavavdyūhacatuṣṭayātmakaḥ sarvaḥ prapañca ityarthaḥ । jīvotpattivāde <quote>‘na jā-
yate mriyate vā vipaści’</quote> dityādiśrutivirodho <quote>‘nātmāśrute’</quote> ri<ref>(bra-2-3-14-sū)</ref> tyadhikaraṇe</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, paśupatimatamādaraṇīyaṃ na veti saṃdehe paramapuruṣārthasādhanāvavodhitvena nikhilavastusākṣātkārasamartha-
paśupatipraṇītatvādādaraṇīyamiti pūrvapakṣaḥ । vedaviruddhārthapratipādanāt nimittopādānabhedābhidhānāt surākuṃbhasthāpanatatstha-
devatārcanamudrikāṣaṭkavijñānataddhāraṇādivedaviruddhācārapratipādanaparatvāccāsāmaṃjasyātpatyuḥ paśupatermataṃ nādaraṇīyamiti ।
sūtrārthavarṇane <pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamatā</pratika>nnāsti vailakṣaṇyamiti bodhyam ।। anayormatayoḥ <pratika><quote>‘saṃbandhānupapatteśca’</quote></pratika> iti sūtrasya
pāṭha eva nāstīti <pratika>śāṃkaramatā</pratika>dviśeṣaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate, saurakaumāraśāktādi</pratika>matopalakṣaṇatvena <pratika>śaivapāśupatakālāmukhamahāvratānāṃ</pratika> mataṃ nira-
syate । śaivapāśupatādimatasiddhaṃ paśupaterjagatkartṛtvaṃ yuktaṃ na veti <pratika>saṃdehe</pratika> yuktamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘eko nārāyaṇa āsīnna
brahmā na ca śaṃkara’</quote> ityādiśrutibhiḥ paśupaterjananādidoṣavattvāt na yuktamiti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu, ।। sū ।। patyu-
rasāmañjasyāt ।। 37 ।। patyuḥ</pratika>=paśupateḥ jagatkāraṇatvaṃ na yuktam । kutaḥ । <pratika>asāmañjasyāt</pratika>= pārataṃtryotpattyādi-
doṣavattvādityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। saṃbaṃdhānupapatteśca ।। 38 ।।</pratika> śivasyāśarīrattvena jagatā saṃbandhānupapatteḥ na tasya kartṛtva-
mityarthaḥ <pratika> ।। sū ।। adhiṣṭhānānupapatteśca ।। 39 ।।</pratika> pralaye sarveṣāṃ naṣṭatvāt punassṛṣṭisamaye paśupateḥ pṛthivyādyāśrayānupa-
patteśca na tasya jagatkartṛtvamityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। karaṇavaccenna bhogādibhyaḥ ।। 40 ।। karaṇavaccet</pratika>= yataḥ sādhanajātaṃ
paśupateḥ karaṇavat śarīreṇa tulyam adhiṣṭhānatulyaṃ ca ato noktadoṣa iti cet <pratika>na</pratika> । kutaḥ । <pratika>bhogādibhyaḥ</pratika>=śarīrakṛtasu-
khaduḥkhabhogotpattimaraṇādidoṣebhya ityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। antavattvamasarvajñatā vā ।। 41 ।।</pratika> vāśabdo vikalpārthaḥ । yataḥ
śivasya dehitvatadabhāvapakṣayoḥ krameṇāntavattvaṃ nāśavattvamasarvajñatā vā syāt ato na yukta paśupaterjagatkāraṇatvamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ pāśupatādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>﻿
<pb n="116"/>
bhyāgamaprasaṅgeta jīvotpattyasaṃbhavāt । ekasmin kiṃcit puṇyāpuṇyātmakaṃ karma
kṛtvā pralaye naṣṭe tadanyaḥ kaścijjīvaḥ prāpnotītyakṛtābhyāgamaḥ । pūrvasya kṛtasya
nāśa ityādirdoṣaḥ । tato jīvotpattyabhidhāyakaṃ śāstramapramāṇam ।।
iyaṃ cānyānupapattirityāha—
<sutra>।। sū ।। na ca kartuḥ karaṇam ।। 40 ।।</sutra>
saṃkarṣaṇākhyājjīvāt pradyumnākhyaṃ mano jāyata ityucyate । karturjīvācca karaṇo-
tpattirna saṃbhavati, tasya prakṛtikāryatvena cetanakāryatvānupapatteḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। vijñānādibhāve vā tadapratiṣedhaḥ ।। 41 ।।</sutra>
vijñānaśabdo jīvavācakaḥ । atra jīvādīnāmutpattirnābhidhīyate । kiṃtu saṃka-
rṣaṇādīnāṃ jīvādibhāva ucyate । jīvādyadhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ jīvādibhāva iti tatasta-
cchāstraprāmāṇyapratiṣedho mā bhūditi śaṅkārthaḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। vipratiṣedhācca ।। 42 ।।</sutra>
evaṃ jīvotpattyabhidhāne parihṛte'pi pāñcarātramatasya nābhyupagamaḥ śrutiviru-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vyakto bhaviṣyatīti yuktivirodhamāha—<pratika>ekasminniti</pratika> । jīvotpattiriva jīvānmana utpatti-
rapi nopapadyata ityetadarthamuttarasūtrāmityāha—<pratika>iyañceti । sū ।। na ca kartuḥ karaṇam ।। 40 ।।
cetanakāryatvānupapatteriti ।</pratika> paṃcamyocyamānaṃ jīvopādānakatvaṃ naivopapadyata ityarthaḥ ।
<pratika>sū ।। vijñānādibhāve vā tadapratiṣedhaḥ ।। 41 ।।</pratika> vāśabdāt pakṣaviparivṛtteridaṃ pūrvapa-
kṣasūtram— <pratika>jīvavācaka iti</pratika> । <quote>‘vijñānaṃ yajñaṃ tanute’</quote> ityādiśrutiprayogādityarthaḥ । parama-
kāraṇāt parabrahmabhūtāt vāsudevātsaṃkarṣaṇo nāma jīvo jāyate । saṃkarṣaṇāt pradyumnasaṃjñaṃ
mano jāyate । tasmādaniruddhasaṃjño'haṃkāro jāyata iti pāñcarātragraṃthe jīvādyutpattyabhidhā-
namanabhyupagamya teṣu saṃkarṣaṇapradyumnāniruddhānāṃ bhāve adhiṣṭhātṛtvena sadbhāve'bhidheye'bhyu-
pagamyamāne tasya graṃthasyāpratiṣedhaḥ prāmāṇyaniṣedho na bhavati । paripūrṇaṣāṅguṇyaśālino
vāsudevasya ekaikaguṇayugalābhivyaktimajjīvādyadhiṣṭhātṛsaṃkarṣaṇādivyūharūpeṇa prādurbhāve
tātparyopapatteriti sūtrasyārthaṃ darśayati—<pratika>atra jīvādīnāmiti ।। sū ।। vipratiṣedhācca
।। 42 ।।</pratika> parihṛte'pītyapiśabdena parihārasyābhāsatāṃ sautracakārasamuccitayuktisiddhāṃ
dyotayati । tatrāyamabhiprāyaḥ । jīvādiśabdānāṃ prasiddhārthamapahāyāprasiddhajīvādyadhiṣṭhā-
tṛtvarūpārthāṃtarakalpanāyāṃ kiṃ pramāṇam । udāhṛtagraṃthe teṣāṃ saṃkarṣaṇādiviśeṣaṇatvamiti cet
bhrāṃto'si । saṃkarṣaṇādiśabdāḥ khalvatra saṃjñātvena jīvādiviśeṣaṇatayā nirdiṣṭāḥ । tena
prasiddhānāmeva jīvamano'haṃkārāṇāṃ pāñcarātraparibhāṣayā saṃkarṣaṇapradyumnāniruddhanāmāni
bhavanti । saṃkarṣaṇādināmabhiranūdya tasmin śāstre vigrahāyudhādividhānaṃ teṣāmeva dhyānārthaṃ
bhavati । kakārādyakṣarāṇāṃ varṇaviśeṣavidhānavat saṃkarṣaṇādyarcanavidhānañca jīvādiviṣayameva
bhavati । yatra śāstre yaśśabdo yatrārthe paribhāṣitaḥ, tatra tasya śabdasya sa eva khalvartho
grāhyaḥ । śabdaśāstragatanadīvṛddhyādisaṃjñārthavat । nanu, pāṃcarātra eva jīvaṃ prakṛtya <quote>‘sa hyanādi-
ranaṃtaśca paramārthena niścita’</quote> ityuktam । evaṃ tarhi vakṣyamāṇo vedavirodha iva parasparavirodho'pi
kaścana sūtrārthabhūto vipratiṣedho bhaviṣyati । nanu yatra bhrāṃtileśasyāpi śaṅkā na pravartate sa
<pb n="117"/>
kathaṃ bhagavān vāsudevaḥ śrutiyuktisvavacanaviruddhāṃ jīvotpattiṃ brūyāt ? satyam । bhrāṃtyā
na brūyāditi । vipralipsayā tu brūyādeva । dṛṣṭo hi tasyāvatāraviśeṣe vipralaṃbhaḥ । klṛptaśca pāṃca-
rātre'pi saḥ । mohaśāstratvaprasiddheḥ । nanu bhāratādiṣu pāñcarātrasya prāmaṇyamapi pratipāditaṃ
tarhi ayamapi kaścana vipratiṣedhaḥ sūtrokto bhaviṣyati । vastutastu nāyaṃ vipratiṣedho'sti ।
ananuṣṭheyāṃśeṣu kuṇḍagolakastrīśūdrādivedānadhikṛtaviṣayatayā prāmāṇyaṃ tatra vaidikādhikāra-
varṇanaviṣaye jīvotpattyādiśrutiyuktisvavacanaviruddhaviṣaye cāprāmāṇyamiti vyavasthopapatteḥ ।
iyaṃ vyavasthā kaurme darśitā । tatra hi <quote>‘sa teṣāṃ māyayā jātaṃ govadhaṃ gautamo muniḥ । kenāpi
hetunā jñātvā śaśāpātīva kopanaḥ । bhaviṣyatha trayībāhyā mahāpātakibhiḥ samāḥ’</quote> ।
ityādinā vedabāhyatvena gautamaśaptānprastutya <quote>‘sarve saṃprāpya deveśaṃ śaṃkaraṃ viṣṇumavyayam ।
astuvan laukikaiḥ stotrairucchiṣṭā iva sevakāḥ ।।’</quote> ityādinā śivakeśavasannidhau teṣāṃ
vaidikamantraiḥ stotre'nadhikārāt bhāṣāprabaṃdhaiḥ stutipūrvakaṃ gatiprārthanāmupanyasya <quote>‘tasmādvai veda-
bāhyānāṃ rakṣaṇārthaṃ tu pāpinām । saṃmohanāya śāstrāṇi kariṣyāvo vṛṣadhvaja । evaṃ saṃcodito
rudro mādhavena murāriṇā । cakāra mohaśāstrāṇi keśavo'pi śiveritaḥ ।’</quote> ityādinā vedabā-
hyatve'pyantaḥkaraṇaśuddhimatāṃ rakṣaṇārthaṃ vaidikatve'pi malinacittānāṃ vimohanārthaṃ ca śivake-
śavābhyāṃ pāśupatapāñcarātrādīni nirmitānīti śrutam । kuṇḍagolakādīnāṃ pāṃcarātre'dhikāro-
'pi kaurme darśitaḥ । athāṃśossātvato nāma viṣṇubhaktaḥ pratāpavān । mahātmā dānanirato dhanu-
rvedavidāṃ baraḥ । sa nāradasya vacanāt vāsudevārcane rataḥ । śāstraṃ pravartayāmāsa kuṇḍagolā-
dibhiḥ śritam । tasya nāmnā tu vikhyātaṃ sātvataṃ nāma śobhanam । pravartate mahāśāstraṃ kuṇḍā-
dīnāṃ hitāvaha’miti । pāṃcarātre strīśūdrādhikārastrivakrāputramupaślokaṃ prastutya bhāgavate
varṇitaḥ । <quote>‘tenāttaṃ sātvataṃ tantraṃ yajjñātvā muktibhāgbhavet । yatra strīśūdradāsānāmadhikāraḥ
paraḥ smṛtaḥ । saṃskāro vaiṣṇavaḥ’</quote> iti । pāñcarātrapraviṣṭasya ca krameṇa vaidikamārgāvāptidvārā śre-
yaḥprāptirityuktam । vāsiṣṭhalaiṃge tatra hi śāṃḍilyaṃ <pratika>prati bhagavadvacanam</pratika>—<quote>‘mattaṃtrāśrayaṇenaiva matpūjā
ca kṛtā tvayā । tayā na prītavānasmi tava śāṇḍilya durmate । kumārgeṇāpi śāṃḍilya kṛtā
pūjā mama tvayā । ataḥ kālena mahatā vedamārgaṃ gamiṣyasi’</quote> । iti । ye tu pāṃcarātramārgeṇa viṣṇuṃ
prapannā api prācīnadadhīcyādiśāpadoṣeṇa śivaniṃdādiṣu pravartaṃte teṣāmākalpaṃ niraya eva
na tu bhavāṃtare'pi vedamārgaprāptiḥ । taduktaṃ kaurme—<quote>‘evamuktvā tu viprarṣiśśaśāpeś‍varavidviṣaḥ ।
samāgatānbrāhmaṇāṃstān dakṣasāhāyyakāriṇaḥ । yasmādbahiṣkṛtā vedā bhavadbhiḥ parameśvaraḥ ।
viniṃdito mahādevaḥ śaṃkaro lokavaṃditaḥ । bhaviṣyatha trayībāhyāssarve'pīśvaravidviṣaḥ । ni-
ndanto hyaiśvaraṃ mārgaṃ kuśāstrāsaktamānasāḥ । mithyādhītasamācārā mithyājñānapralobhinaḥ ।
prāpya ghoraṃ kaliyugaṃ kalahaiḥ kalipīḍitāḥ । tyaktvā tapovanaṃ kṛtsnān gacchadhvaṃ narakānpunaḥ ।
bhaviṣyati hṛṣīkeśaḥ svāśrito'pi parāṅmukhaḥ ।’</quote> iti । tānadhikṛtya saurapurāṇe paṭhyate—<quote>‘puruṣo-
ttamamāśritya śivaniṃdāparā dvijāḥ । kalau yuge bhaviṣyaṃti trātā teṣāṃ na mādhavaḥ’</quote> । skānde
śaṃkarasaṃhitāyāṃ śivapūjāvidhau—<quote>‘nekṣeta pūjāvelāyāṃ naraṃ vatsa bahiṣkṛtam ।’</quote> ityuktvā
<quote>‘ko'sau bahiṣkṛta’</quote> iti jijñāsāyāmuktaṃ <quote>‘dadhīcinā gautamena ye śaptā brāhmaṇādhāmāḥ । kalā-
vavatariṣyanti nindakāste bahiṣkṛtāḥ ।।’</quote> iti । duṣkaraprāyaścittapāpāpāditavaidikamārgabahi-
<pb n="118"/>
rbhāvānāmapi taṃtreṣvadhikārassābapurāṇe darśitaḥ <quote>‘śrutibhraṣṭaḥ śrutiproktaprāyaścitte bhayaṃ gataḥ ।
krameṇa śrutisiddhyarthaṃ manuṣyastaṃtramāśrayet । dharmaśāstre purāṇe ca proktaṃ hi maraṇāṃtikam । prāya-
ścittaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ pāpiṣṭhānāṃ sudāruṇam । kalau durbalacittānāṃ maraṇe jāyate bhayam । teṣāmeva hi
rakṣārthaṃ tāntrikaṃ mārgamuktavā’</quote>niti । <quote>‘pāṃcarātraṃ bhāgavataṃ tantraṃ vaikhānasābhidham । vedabhraṣṭān samu-
ddiśya kamalāpatiruktavā’</quote>niti ca । tāneva kṛtamahāpātakān dharmaśāstroktaprāyaścittāśaktatayā
taṃtrāṇyāśritānadhikṛtyoktamāpastaṃbena—<quote>‘athābhiśastāḥ samavasāya careyurdhārmyamiti sāṃśi-
tyetaretarayājakā itaretarādhyāpakā mitho vivahamānāḥ’</quote> <ref>(pra. 1. pa॰ 1. kha॰ 28. sū. 9.)</ref>
iti । atrābhiśastaśabdoktānāṃ patitānāmitaretarayājanādhyāpanoktiḥ tāṃtrikaviṣayaiveti
labhyate । patitānāṃ vedamārge'nadhikārāt udāhṛtapurāṇavacanaisteṣāṃ taṃtramārge'dhikārasadbhā-
vāvagamācca । na cātrābhiśastaśabdaḥ patitaviṣayo na bhavatīti śaṃkanīyam । ‘putrānsanniṣpādya
brūyuḥ vipravrajatāsmadevaṃ hyasmatsvāryāssaṃpratyapatsyateti । <ref>(pra॰ 1. pa॰ 1. kha॰ 26. sū॰ 10)</ref>
athāpi na seṃdriyaḥ patati <ref>(sū 11.)</ref> tadetena veditavyamaṃgahīno hi sāṃgaṃ janayati ।
<ref>(sū॰ 12)</ref> mithyaitaditi hārītaḥ । <ref>(sū॰ 13.)</ref> dadhidhānīsadharmā strī bhavati ।
<ref>(sū॰ 14.)</ref> yo hi dadhidhānyāmaprayataṃ paya ātacya manthati na tena dharmakṛtyaṃ kriyata
evamaśuddhi śuklaṃ yannivartate na tena saha saṃprayogo vidyate <ref>(sū॰ 15)</ref> ityagrimasūtraiḥ abhi-
śastaśabdasaṃkīrtanapūrvakaṃ pūrvapakṣasiddhāṃtābhyāṃ tatputrāṇāmapi asaṃvyavahāryatvapratipādanāt ।
evaṃ codāhṛtanānāpurāṇavacanānusāreṇa bhāratādiṣu pāṃcarātraprāśastyavacanānyadhikārivi-
śeṣaviṣayatayā tatprāmāṇyavyavasthāpanaparāṇītyupapādanīyam । bhārate'pi hi—<quote>‘sāṃkhyaṃ yogaḥ
pāṃcarātraṃ vedāḥ pāśupataṃ tathā । kimetānyekaniṣṭhāni pṛthaṅ‌niṣṭhāni vā mune’</quote> । iti praśne
<quote>‘jñānānyetāni rājarṣe viddhi nānāmatāni vai ।’</quote> iti pāṃcarātrādīnāṃ vaidikamārgānmārgāṃtara-
tvoktyaivāvaidikatvamāviṣkṛtam । avaidikeṣu ca na vaidikānāmadhikāraḥ । <quote>‘yā vedabāhyāḥ
smṛtayo yāśca kāśca kudṛṣṭayaḥ । sarvāstā niṣphalāḥ proktā niṣṭhā teṣāṃ hi tāmasī’</quote> iti
manusmaraṇāt । varāhapurāṇe ca bahudhā pāṃcarātrapraśaṃsāṃ prastutyāpi avaidikādhikāritvamā-
viṣkṛtam । <quote>‘abhāve vedamantrāṇāṃ pāṃcarātroditena ca । mārgeṇa māṃ prapadyaṃte te māṃ prāpsyaṃti
mānavāḥ’</quote> iti । atra hi nityānāṃ vedamaṃtrāṇāṃ svarūpeṇābhāvo na vivakṣitaḥ । kiṃ tu teṣva-
dhikārābhāva eva । na ca pāśupata iva pāṃcarātre vaidikāvaidikavibhāgaḥ kṛto dṛśyate ।
yena <quote>‘jñānānyetāni rājarṣe’</quote> ityādiṣu pāśupatasyeva pāṃcarātrasyāpyavaidikasya grahaṇamiti
nīyetetyalaṃ prasaktānuprasaktyā । vistaro'nyatrānusandheyaḥ । tasmātsthitametatpāñcarātrasyā-
nuṣṭheyabhāgeṣvadhikāriviśeṣaviṣayatayā prāmāṇyamastīti tatprarocanārthaṃ bhāratādiṣu bahudhā
tatpraśaṃsanam । jīvotpattyādivacanaṃ tvapramāṇameva । mohaśāstratvena prasiddhe pratītāprāmāṇyani-
rāsahetvabhāvāt । tatprasiddhirahiteṣvapi hi sarvaveṣṭanādismaraṇeṣu śrutivirodhamātreṇāprāmā-
ṇyamabhyupagamyate । yatrāpi śrutivirodho nāsti tatrāpi hetudarśanamā treṇāprāmāṇyamabhyupaga-
myate । uktaṃ cāpastaṃbena—<quote>‘brāhmaṇoktā vidhayaḥ । teṣāmutsannāḥ pāṭhāḥ prayogādanumīyante ।
yatra tu prītyupalabdhitaḥ pravṛttiḥ na tatra śāstramasti । tadanuvartamāno narakāya rādhyatī’</quote>ti ।
kimu vaktavyaṃ mohaśāstre pratipādyamānaṃ śrutinyāyasvavacanaviruddhamapramāṇamiti । yattu bhārate
<pb n="119"/>
ddheśvarakāraṇavādamuktihetutvataptamudrādhāraṇādidharmaparatvādinā vipratiṣedhāt ।
ataḥ pāñcarātramatamasamañjasam ।।
<quote>‘pāñcarātre ca bauddhe ca tathā kālāmukhe'pi ca ।
śraddhayā dīkṣitā yūyaṃ bhavata brāhmaṇādhamāḥ ।।’</quote>
ityādiṣu ca viśeṣeṇāsya pratiṣedho dṛśyate । ato vipratiṣedhāt apramāṇaṃ
pāñcarātraṃ matam ।।
nanu <quote>‘puruṣo vai rudraḥ’</quote> ityādiśrutyā parameśvara eva puruṣo vāsudevaḥ, tajjñānārā-
dhanādikamapi krameṇa parameśvarapadaprāptisādhanamiti śrūyate । tadārādhanapratipāda-
kasya pāñcarātrasyāprāmāṇye tasyānārādhyatvaprasaṅga iti cet—na । śrutivirodhāt
pāñcarātrasyāprāmāṇye'pi tasya kā hāniḥ । śrutiprasiddhamārgeṇa tadārādhanasaṃbhavāt ।
ato na virodhaḥ ।। iti pāñcarātrādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<quote>‘bhaviṣyati pramāṇaṃ vai etadevānuśāsanam’</quote> । iti pāṃcarātraṃ prastutya vacanaṃ tattu kūrmapurāṇā-
digatakalidoṣakīrtanaprakaraṇeṣu <quote>‘kurvaṃti cāvatārāṇi brāhmaṇānāṃ kuleṣu vai । dadhīciśāpa-
nirdagdhā purā dakṣādhvare dvijāḥ । niṃdaṃti ca mahādevaṃ tamasāviṣṭacetasaḥ’</quote> । ityādivacanaiḥ
yeṣāṃ kalau prācuryamuktaṃ te sarve'pi vaidikānprati vastuto'pramāṇamapi pramāṇatvena grahī-
ṣyaṃti । tasminyuge vaidikamārgapracyutiprācuryāt te'pi tadgrahīṣyaṃtītyetatparaṃ na tu badaraphalara-
ktatvādivadbhāviprāmāṇyaparam । pūrvamapramāṇasya paścātpramāṇatvāyogāt iti na kaścidvirodhaḥ ।
<pratika>śrutiviruddheti</pratika> । śrutiviruddheśvarakāraṇavādaḥ śivādanyo vāsudevaḥ paramakāraṇamiti
vādaḥ । sa tāvatsamanvayādhyāyodāhṛtasakalaśrutivipratiṣiddhaḥ । tasya muktihetutvaṃ <quote>‘yadā carma-
vadākāśa’</quote> mityādiśrutivipratiṣiddham । taptamudrādhāraṇasya śrutismṛtipurāṇādipratiṣiddhatva-
manyatra praṃpacitamanusaṃdheyam । ādiśabdena sakalavaidikadevatāparityāgaḥ sakalatrayīdharmapari-
tyāgaḥ ityādi pāṃcarātroktaṃ śrutivipratiṣiddhaṃ gṛhyate । <quote>‘kiṃ bhostrayīdharmeṇāsaṃyukta imaṃ dharmaṃ
jijñāsīta oṃ bhoḥ jījñāsīte’</quote> tyādipraśnaprativacanarūpamekāyanaśākhāgataṃ śrutivacanaṃ
pāṃcarātroktasakalavaidikakarmaparityāge mūlamiti kalpanā tvekāyanaśākhāṃ kalpayatāmeva
śobhate । <quote>‘vipratiṣedhādi’</quote>ti sūtrasya niṣedhādityarthamabhipretya pāṃcarātradīkṣāniṣedhonnāyakaṃ
skāṃdavacanamudāharati—<pratika>pāṃcarātre ceti</pratika> । nanvityāśaṃkāparihārasyāyamabhiprāyaḥ । satyaṃ
nārāyaṇaḥ parameśvaraśaktyavasthāviśeṣatvāt tadananyaḥ tadārādhanādikañca krameṇa parameśvara-
prāptisādhanamiti । tathāpi vaidikānāṃ tadārādhanārthaṃ pāṃcarātraṃ nādaraṇīyam । vaidikeṣveva bo-
dhāyanavaikhānasādisūtreṣu tatpratiṣṭhotsavādiprapañcanāditi ।। <pratika>iti pāṃñcarātrādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</pratika>
iti śivātivādimūrdhanyaśivadarśanasthāpanadhurandharasakaladevabhūdevapratiṣṭhāpaka-
<pratika>śrīmaccinnabommabhūpālahṛdayakamalakuharaviharamāṇaśrīsāṃ</pratika>baśivapreritasya
śrīmadbharadvājakulajaladhikaustubhaśrīviśvavidyāji<pratika>śrīraṃgarājādhva-
rivarasūnorappayyadīkṣitasya kṛtau śrīkaṇṭhācāryaviracita-
brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāyāṃ śivārkamaṇidīpi-</pratika>

<head>iti śrīkaṇṭhaśivācāryaviracite brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye</head>
<head>dvitīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ. ।। 2 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>kākhyāyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya</head>
<head>dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 2 ।।</head>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha pāṃcarātrādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। utpattyasaṃbhavāt ।। 39 ।। na ca kartuḥ karaṇam ।। 40 ।। vijñānādibhāve vā tadapratiṣedhaḥ ।। 41 ।।
vipratiṣedhācca ।। 42 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>jīvasya vāsudevāccanirācārāśca taptamudrādyāḥ । tantre sātvatasaṃjñe kathitā nārāyaṇenaiva ।। 126 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>maivaṃ nyāyāmnāyasmaraṇaviruddhārthasaṃkalanāt । pratiṣedhācca viśiṣya tadanapekṣyaṃ vak‍tṛgauraṃve'pi sati ।। 127 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti pāñcarātrādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<p>iti śrīmadappayyadīkṣitakṛtau caturmatasārasaṃgrahe nayamaṇimālākhye tṛtīyapa-
ricchede dvitīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 2 ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha utpattyasaṃbhavādhikaraṇamathavā pāñcarātrādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। utpattyasaṃbhavāt ।। 41 ।। na ca kartuḥ karaṇam ।। 42 ।। vijñānādibhāve vā tadapratiṣedhaḥ ।। 43 ।।
vipratiṣedhācca ।। 44 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, evaṃ kevalanimittameveś‍vara iti vedāsaṃgate mate niraste nimittaṃ prakṛtiśceti bhāgavatamatasya vedasaṃga-
tatvāt tadukte jīvotpatyaṃśe'pi prāmāṇyaṃ syāditi pratyudāharaṇasaṃgatyedamārabhate—<pratika>sū ।। utpattyasaṃbhavāt ।। 42 ।।</pratika> atra
vāsudevaḥ khalu paramātmā jagata upādānaṃ nimittaṃ ca bhavati । tasmātsaṃkarṣaṇākhyo jīva udeti । tasmātpradyumnākhyaṃ mano
jāyate । tasmādaniruddhākhyo'haṃkāro jāyate । iti bhāgavatasiddhāntaḥ kiṃ pramāṇamūlaḥ uta bhrāntimūlaḥ iti saṃśaye pramāṇa-
mūla iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika> vedāviruddhāṃśe pramāṇamūlatve'pi vedaviruddhajīvotpattyaṃśe prāmāṇyaṃ na bhavati vāsude-
vājjīvotpattyaṃgīkāre tasya ghaṭavadanityatvāpattyā bhagavatprāptirūpamokṣaḥ kasya syāt । ata utpattyasaṃbhavāt bhrāntimūlo bhāga-
vatasiddhānta iti । itthaṃ jīvajanma nirasya tato manojanma nirācaṣṭe—<pratika>sū ।। na ca kartuḥ karaṇam ।। 43 ।।</pratika> karturdevadattāde-
ssakāśātkaraṇasya kuṭhārāderutpattyadarśanāt jīvātkartuḥ karaṇaṃ mano jāyate ityetadasaṃgatamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। vijñānādibhāve vā tadapratiṣedhaḥ ।। 44 ।। vijñānādibhāve vā</pratika>= saṃkarṣaṇādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ vijñānaiś‍varyā-
dirūpatve'pi । <pratika>tadapratiṣedhaḥ</pratika>=tasyotpattyasaṃbhavarūpadoṣasya prakārāntareṇa prāptirityarthaḥ। vāsudevādayaścatvāro'pīś‍varā iti pakṣe
bhagavāneko vāsudeva iti svasiddhāntahāniḥ।saṃkarṣaṇādayasrayo vāsudevatulyā ithi pakṣe uttpattyasaṃbhavadoṣastadavastha evetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>apica ।। <pratika>sū ।। vipratiṣedhācca ।। 45 ।।</pratika> kvacit jñānaiś‍varyādīni vāsudevasya guṇā iti kvaciccoktaguṇā eva vāsudeva
iti ca guṇaguṇinorbhedamabhedaṃ ca varṇayanti । tasmātparasparaṃ vipratiṣedhādaprāmāṇikamidaṃ bhāgavatamatamityarthaḥ ।। tasmādevaṃ
<pratika>sāṃkhyavaiśeṣikasaugatārhatamāheś‍varabhāgavatamatānāṃ</pratika> bhrāntimūlatvena tairmatairniravadyādadvaitābrahmaṇo jagatsargaṃ bruvansa-
manvayo na virudhyata iti siddham । atra pāde asminmate'<pratika>ṣṭādhikaraṇāni</pratika> । sūtrāṇi <pratika>paṃcacatvāriṃśat</pratika> ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, vāsudevaprokte pāñcarātre jīvotpattyādikamucyate tatsaṃbhavati na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । bhagavatā vāsudevena proktasya
pramāṇatvātsaṃbhavatīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । jīvotpattyabhidhāyakamidaṃ pāñcarātraṃ kṛtanāśākṛtābhyāgamaprasaṃgena jīvotpattyasaṃbhavāt śruti-
viruddheś‍varakāraṇavādamuktihetutvataptamudrādhāraṇādidharmaparatvādinā vipratiṣedhāccāpramāṇamiti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ</pratika> । ādyaṃ sūtraṃ vyākhyā-
tam । <pratika>sū ।। na ca kartuḥ karaṇam ।। 40 ।।</pratika> karturjīvācca karaṇotpattirna saṃbhavati । tasya prakṛtikāryatvena cetanakāryatvānu-
papatterityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। vijñānādibhāve vā tadapratiṣedhaḥ ।। 41 ।।</pratika> vāśabdasya pakṣaviparivṛttyarthatvādidaṃ pūrvapakṣasū-
tram । vijñānaśabdo jīvavācakaḥ । atra jīvādīnāmutpattirnābhidhīyate । kiṃ tu saṃkarṣaṇādīnāṃ jīvādibhāva ucyate । jīvā-
dyadhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ jīvādibhāva iti । tataḥ <pratika>tadapratiṣedhaḥ</pratika>=tasya pāccarātragraṃthasya prāmāṇyaniṣedho na bhavatītyarthaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। vipra
tiṣedhācca ।। 42 ।।</pratika> evaṃ jīvotpattyabhidhānadoṣaparihāre'pi pāñcarātramatasya nābhyupagamaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>vipratiṣedhācca</pratika>=
<pb n="121"/>
śrutiviruddheś‍varakāraṇavādamuktihetutvataptamudrādhāraṇādidharmaparatvādinā vipratiṣedhāt <quote>‘pāṃcarātre ca bauddhe ca’</quote> ityādināsya
matasya viśeṣeṇa niṣedhāccāsamañjasamidaṃ pāñcarātramatamityarthaḥ।। <pratika>asminmate asminpāde</pratika> sūtrāṇi <pratika>dvicatvāriṃśat</pratika> । a-
dhikaraṇāni <pratika>nava</pratika> ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, idamutpattyasaṃbhavādhikaraṇamiti vyapadiśyate । asminmate ādyaṃ sūtradvayaṃ pūrvapakṣapratipādakamita-
ratsūtradvayaṃ siddhāntapratipādakamityavadheyam । sāṃkhyāditantravatpāñcarātrataṃtramapramāṇaṃ vā uta pramāṇaṃ veti <pratika>saṃdehe</pratika> <quote>‘vāsude-
vātsaṃkarṣaṇo nāma jīvo jāyate’</quote> iti śrutiviruddhajīvotpattyādipratipādanāt <quote>‘caturṣu vedeṣu puruṣārthamalabhamāna’</quote> iti
vedagaṇānādaravacanāccāpramāṇamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, saṃkarṣaṇapradyumnāniruddhānāṃ, parabrahmabhāvena <quote>‘ajāyamāno
vahudhā vijāyata’</quote> iti śrutiprasiddhasvecchāvatārapratipādanāt, jīvāhaṃkāramanaśśabdānāṃ tattaccharīrakasaṃkarṣaṇādyabhidhāya-
katvāt <quote>‘caturṣu vedeṣu puruṣārthamalabhamāna’</quote> iti vedagaṇānādaravacanasyānuditahomanindāvadvakṣyamāṇapraśaṃsārthatvāt vedānto-
ditabrahmopāsanavidhānādvedāviruddhatadarcanādividhānāccedaṃ pāñcarātraṃ pramāṇameveti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, sū ।। utpattyasaṃbha-
vāt ।। 39 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘na jāyate mriyate ve’</quote> tyādiśruterjīvasyotpattyasaṃbhavāt jīvotpattivacanācca na pramāṇamityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।।
na ca kartuḥ karaṇam ।। 40 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘etasmājjāyate prāṇo manassarvendriyāṇice’</quote> ti brahmaṇa eva manautpattiśravaṇāt ‘saṃ-
karṣaṇātpradyumnasaṃjñakaṃ mana utpadyata iti manasaḥ karaṇasya karturjīvādutpattiśca śrutiviruddhatvānna saṃbhavati । ityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।।
vijñānādibhāve vā tadapratiṣedhaḥ ।। 41 ।।</pratika> vāśabdātpakṣo viparivartate । vijñānaṃ cādi ca vijñānādi brahma । saṃkarṣa-
ṇādīnāṃ brahmabhāve sati <quote>‘ajāyamāno bahudhā vijāyata’</quote> iti śrutisiddhasvecchāvatārasyaivātrābhidhānāt <pratika>tadapratiṣedhaḥ</pratika>=
tasya prāmāṇyasya niṣedho na bhavatīti । saṃkarṣaṇādīnāṃ jīvādisamānādhikaraṇatayā nirdeśasteṣāmadhiṣṭhātṛtayopapadyata ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। vipratiṣedhācca ।। 42 ।।</pratika> asminnapi taṃtre <quote>‘vyāptirupeṇa saṃbaṃdhaḥ tasyāśca puruṣasya hi । sa hyanādiranantaśca paramā-
rthena niścitaḥ ।।’</quote> iti puruṣasyotpattipratiṣedhāccāviruddhamidaṃ pāñcarātraṃ taṃtramiti ।। <pratika>asminmate'tra pāde dvicatvāriṃśatsū-
trāṇi adhikaraṇānyaṣṭau ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, śāktamate tu dūṣaṇāntaramapyastīti tannirākaraṇāya pṛthagadhikaraṇamārabhyate । asminnadhikaraṇe
śāktamataprabhedānāṃ trayamapi nirasyate । kevalā śaktirādyā jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ, śivānugṛhītā śaktirjagataḥ kāraṇaṃ,jñānadehakaraṇā-
disādhanavatā śivenānugṛhītā śaktirjagataḥ kāraṇamiti śāktamatasya trividhā prakriyā । tat‌trividhamapi śāktaṃ mataṃ yuktaṃ na veti
<pratika>saṃdehe</pratika> yuktamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu ‘na yuktamiti</pratika> । yathā—kevalā śaktirādyā jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ na saṃbhavati । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>utpattyasaṃbhavāt</pratika>= tato'patyotpattyasaṃbhavādityarthaḥ । puruṣānanugṛhītastrīmātrādapatyotpateradarśanāditi bhāvaḥ ।। śivānugṛ
hītā śaktirjagataḥ kāraṇamiti madhyamavāmaśāktaṃ nirācaṣṭe---<pratika>sū ।। na ca kartuḥ karaṇam ।। 43 ।। kartuśca</pratika>= anugrāha-
kasya śivasya । <pratika>karaṇam</pratika>= jñānādisādhanaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ। śivasya karaṇotpādane kevalaśakteraśakterna tasya śaktyanugrāhakatvaṃ yukta-
miti bhāvaḥ । ato na sāpi kāraṇaṃ bhavitumarhati ।। jñānadehādikaraṇavatā śivenānugṛhītā śaktirjagataḥ kāraṇamiti tṛtīyaṃ
vāmaśāktaṃ nirācaṣṭe--- <pratika>।। sū ।। vijñānādibhāve vā tadapratiṣedhaḥ ।। 44 ।।</pratika> karturityasti । tasya śivasya vijñānādi-
bhārve'gīkṛte sati । <pratika>tadapratiṣedhaḥ</pratika>=tasya prakṛtaśaivamatasyānumatiḥ syāt । tathā ca tādṛśaśivenaiva sarvakāryotpattau vyarthaṃ śa-
ktikartṛtvāṃgīkaraṇaṃ śivakartṛtvaṃ tu prāṅgirastamiti bhāvaḥ । evaṃ śāktamatatrayaṃ pṛthaṅgirasya sāmānyenāpi nirācaṣṭe---<pratika>sū ।। vipra-
tiṣedhācca ।। 45 ।।</pratika> sakalaśrutyādiviruddhatvāccāsamaṃjasaṃ śaktimatamityarthaḥ । tasmānnirīś‍varavaiśeṣikādisamayānāṃ duṣṭatvādyuktaṃ
janmādisūtroktaṃ viṣṇorjagatkartṛtvādirūpaṃ lakṣaṇamiti siddham ।। <pratika>asminmate</pratika> atra <pratika>pāde adhikaraṇāni dvādaśa ।
sūtrāṇi tu paṃcacatvāriṃśata ।। iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmutpattyasaṃbhavādhikaraṇam ।।</pratika></p>
<lg><l>yaṃ prāsūta viśuddhaśīlamanaghaṃ vṛddhāṃbikākhyā satī
yaṃ mṛtyuñjayaśarmaṇo budhamaṇerbhāgyaṃ vidussādhavaḥ ।</l>
<l>vādhūlānvayajanmano'sya sudhiyī hālāsyanāthāhvaya-
syeyaṃ satkṛtiredhatāmiha caturbhāṣyānugā candrikā ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>sūtrārthacandrikāyāmavirodhākhye dvitīyake'dhyāye । tarkāvirodhapādo dvaitīyīko'yamabhyagātpūrtim ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>śrīkaṇṭhalakṣmaṇānujamatayoḥ parapakṣadūṣakaḥ proktaḥ । samayāvirodhanām‍nā madhvamate tu prasiddhimupayātaḥ ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti hālāsyanāthakṛtau sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 2 ।। 2 ।।</head>
<pb n="122"/>
<head>।। śrīḥ ।।</head>
<head>śivābhyā namaḥ</head>
<head>śrīkaṇṭhācāryakṛtau</head>
<head>brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye</head>
<head>atha dvitīyasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha viyadadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<p>nirastassamasto viruddhetaradarśananyāyaḥ । adhyāyaśeṣeṇa punaravāṃtaravirodhapa-
rihāraḥ kriyate—
<sutra>sū॰ ।। na viyadaśruteḥ ।। 1 ।।</sutra></p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>śivārkamaṇidīpikāyām</head>
<head>atha dvitīyasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p>nanvavirodhādhyāye viyadādīnāmutpattyanutpatticintāprabhṛticiṃtā na saṃgatā । sāpi
viyadutpattyādiśrutīnāṃ tadanutpattyādiśrutivirodhasamādhānārtheti cenna । tāvatādhyāya-
saṅgatyasiddheḥ । na hi virodhasamādhānamātramadhyāyārthaḥ । kiṃ tu pūrvādhyāyanirūpite vedā-
ntānāṃ jagatkāraṇabrahmasamanvaye paripaṃthino virodhasya samādhānam । anyathādhyāyayorākṣe-
pyākṣepakabhāvasaṅgateralābhāt । yathākathañcidadhyāyasaṅgatisaṃbhave'pi na pādasaṃgatiḥ । pratha-
mapādavatsvamatadūṣaṇaparihārārthayostṛtīyacaturthapādayoḥ paramatadūṣaṇārthāt dvitīyapādāt
pūrvabhāvasyaivocitatvāt ityāśaṅkyādhyāyapādasaṅgatimāha—<pratika>nirasta iti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । a-
dhyāyasaṃgatiḥ prāsaṃgikī kāraṇaviṣayaśrutivirodhasamādhānaprasaṅgāt kāryaviṣayaśrutiviro-
dho'pi samādhīyata iti । yadvā । kāraṇaviṣayaśrutīnāṃ brahmaṇi samanvayo viyadādyutpa-
ttiśrutīnāṃ svārthasamanvayamapekṣate । anyathā viyannityatve pavanādīnāṃ viyadādijanyatve
ca brahma kasya jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavediti viyadādyutpattiśrutīnāṃ tadanutpattiśrutivirodhasa-
mādhānaciṃtā tāvat saṅgataiva । tadanubaṃdhena jīvanityatvajñātṛtvāṇutvādiśrutīnāṃ tajjana-
nādiśrutivirodhacintā । athavā <quote>‘vipratiṣedhāccāsamañcasa’</quote> mityādi <ref>(bra-2-2-9)</ref> sūtrai-
ssāṅkhyādidarśanānāṃ parasparavirodhādaprāmāṇyamuktam । evaṃ vedāṃteṣvapi kvacit viyato
nityatvaṃ pratipādyate kvacidanityatvam ityādirūpeṇa parasparavirodhena parāhatattvāt teṣāṃ
kāraṇaviṣaye'pi prāmāṇyaṃ na saṃbhavatīti prathamādhyāyanirūpitakāraṇaviṣayaśrutisamanvayākṣe-
pakatayaiva kṛtsnasyādhyāyaśeṣasyādhyāyasaṃgatiḥ । yadyapi parasparavirodhena vedāntānāmaprā-
māṇyaśaṅkā vakṣyamāṇādhikaraṇeṣu pūrvapakṣatvena nodbhāvyate tathāpi viyadanutpattyādipūrva-
pakṣodbhāvanapūrvakaṃ tadutpattyādiśrutīnāṃ svārthasamanvaye sthūṇānikhanananyāyena prasādhite
sati vipratiṣedhena nirastānāṃ sāṃkhyādīnāṃ hṛdi viparivartamānā, vedāṃtavipratiṣedhaprati-
baṃdyapi nirastā bhavatīti phalataḥ parasparavirodhasamādhānārthatvamastyeva । bāhyahetūtthasama-
nvayavirodhanirāsānaṃtaramāṃtarahetūtthatannirāsa iti tṛtīyacaturthapādayordvitīyapādānaṃtarya-
miti । anayoḥ paurvāparyahetuścaturthapādāraṃbhe darśayiṣyate । <pratika>sū ।। na viyadaśruteḥ ।। 1 ।।</pratika>
<pb n="123"/>
niravayavatvenākāryatvabhramādākāśasyotpattissaṃdihyate saṃbhavati na veti ।
viyannotpadyata iti prāptam । kutaḥ । aśruteḥ । tathā hi—chāṃdogye <quote>‘sadeva somye-
damagra āsī’</quote> dityārabhya <quote>‘tattejo'sṛjate’</quote> ti tejaḥprabhṛtibhūtasṛṣṭirabhidhīyate ।
tatra nākāśasyotpattiḥ śrūyate । yā tu <quote>‘tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśassaṃbhūta’</quote>
iti taittirīye sā gauṇī bhavitumarhati, ākāśotpādakasamavāyyādinirūpa-
ṇāsambhavāt ।
ato jīvavadākāśo'pi notpadyata iti prāpte brūmaḥ---
<sutra>sū ।। asti tu ।। 2 ।।</sutra>
viyata utpattirastyeva, <quote>‘tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśassaṃbhūtaḥ’</quote> ityādi-
śruteḥ । ātmanastu <quote>‘na jīyate mriyate vā vipaści’</quote>di ti pratiṣedhādanutpattiḥ ।
na viyadutpattipratiṣedhaśrutirasti । ato viyadutpadyata eva ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
viyadutpadyate na veti tadutpattipratipādanakṣamaśrutisaṃbhavāsaṃbhāvābhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvapakṣaḥ—vi-
yannotpadyate tadutpattipratipādanakṣamaśrutyabhāvāt । chāṃdogye tāvat tadviṣayā śrutireva
nāsti taittirīyātharvaṇādiṣu satyapi tadutpattipratipādanākṣamā । niravayavatvena sarvagatatvena
ca tasya nityatvāvagamāt । na ca dvitīyahetorasiddhiḥ । kvacidapi tadabhāvasya buddha‍yā-
rohāsambhavāt । atra viyannāstīti niṣedhasya vyāhatatvāt । yatra niṣidhyate tasyaiva deśa-
sya viyadrūpatvāt <quote>‘ākāśe cāviśeṣā’</quote> diti vaibhāṣikādhikaraṇa <ref>(bra-2-2-23.)</ref> sūtre
iha pratyayavedyo deśa ākāśa iti vyavasthāpitatvāt । na ca hetvoraprayojakatvam । nirava-
yavasya sarvagatasyopatpādakasāmagryanirūpaṇāt । tasmādanumānāt viyato nityatvāvadhāraṇena
tadutpattiṃ pratipādayitumakṣamā taittirīyādiśrutirgauṇatvamavalambate । na ca, taittirīyaśrutāve-
kasya saṃbhūtaśabdasya <quote>‘etasmājjāyate prāṇo manassarveṃdriyāṇi ca । khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ
pṛthvī viśvasya dhāriṇī’</quote> tyātharvaṇaśrutāvekasya jāyata iti śabdasya ca kvacidgauṇatvamanyatra
mukhyatvaṃ ca na yuktamiti vācyam । ātharvaṇaśrutāvevaikasya brahmaśabdasya tathātvadarśanāt ।
tatra śravaṇāvṛttirastīti cet tadanuṣaṃge'pyabhidhānāvṛttiraviśiṣṭā । sakṛcchrutasyaiva ca brahma-
śabdasya gauṇamukhyatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ <quote>‘dve brahmaṇī veditavye’</quote> ityatra । tasmādviyannotpadyata ityevaṃ
prāpte siddhāṃtamāha—<pratika>sū ।। asti tu ।। 2 ।।</pratika> viyadutpattipratipādanakṣamā śrutiriti śeṣaḥ ।
bhāṣye <quote>‘viyata utpattirastye’</quote> veti śrutisadbhāvasūtraṇasya phalitārtha uktaḥ । tuśabdaḥ
pūrvapakṣopāttajīvadṛṣṭāṃtavaiṣamyārtha iti vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>ātmanastviti</pratika> । tathā ca paramatānu-
sāreṇa prathamānumāne niravayavadravyatvarūpasādhanāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakaṃ svamatānusāreṇa
kevalasādhyavyāpakotpattipratiṣedhaśravaṇamupādhiriti bhāvaḥ । sarvagatatvahetustvasiddhaḥ ।
avyaktaprakṛtikasyākāśasya paricchinnatvāt । na coktavyāghātaḥ । tanniṣedhe cicchaktesta-
ddeśatvasaṃbhavāt । na ca patatripatanādāvapi saiva pratyakṣaviṣayo deśaḥ syāt । tasyā <quote>‘ssanghaṭa’</quote>
ityādipratyakṣaviṣayatvasaṃpratipatteḥ । tathā ca <quote>‘ākāśe cāviśeṣā’</quote> diti sūtravyākhyāna-
bhāṣyavirodha iti vācyam । cicchaktimanaṃgīkurvato bauddhasya tayānyathāsiddhiśaṃkānavakā-
śāt । svamate tuśabdāśruyatvayuktyanugṛhītaśrutibalādākāśasiddhiḥ । tasyāvakāśarūpa-
<pb n="124"/>
yaduktamutpattirgauṇīti tatrāha—
<sutra>sū॰ ।। gauṇyasaṃbhavācchabdācca ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘tattejo'sṛjate’</quote> ti tejasaḥ prathamasṛṣṭivacanāt <quote>‘ākāśassaṃbhūta’</quote> iti śru-
tirgauṇī, tasya niravayavasya utpattyasaṃbhavāt <quote>‘vāyuścāṃtarikṣaṃ caitadamṛta’</quote>miti
nityatvaśabdācca ।।
<sutra>sū॰ ।। syāccaikasya brahmaśabdavat ।। 4 ।।</sutra>
ekasya saṃbhūtaśabdasyākāśe gauṇatvamanyatra mukhyatvamanuṣaṅge'pi śravaṇādā-
vṛttāviva saṃbhavatyeva । yathaikasya brahmaśabdasya <quote>‘tasmādetadvrahma nāma rūpamannaṃ ca
jāyata’</quote> iti prakṛtau gauṇatvaṃ <quote>‘tapasā cīyate brahme’</quote> ti mukhyatvamāvṛttau tadvada-
trāpi । tasmādākāśotpattirayukteti ।।
atha parihāra ucyate—
<sutra>sū ।। pratijñāhāniravyatirekāt ।। 5 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatī’</quote> tyekavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñāyā ahānirviyadā-

vattvaśrutibalādeva patatryādipatanadeśatvasiddhiśceti draṣṭavyam । pūrvapakṣabījoddhāṭanārthamu-
ttarasūtradvayam—<pratika>sū ।। gauṇyasaṃbhavācchabdācca ।। 3 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘asaṃbhavā’</quote>dityanena śrutyarthā-
pattyanumānavirodhādutpattyasaṃbhava ukta iti vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>tatteja iti</pratika> । (te1jasaḥ prāksṛjya-
sadbhāve tasya prathamaṃ sṛṣṭiśravaṇaṃ nopapadyata iti arthāpattiḥ ।) <pratika>niravayavasyeti</pratika> । nirava-
yavasyotpādikā sāmagrī na saṃbhavatītyanukūlatarkasahakṛte niravayavatvahetau nopādhisaṃbhava
iti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। syāccaikasya brahmaśabdavat ।। 4 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘tasmādetadbrahme’</quote> tyatra brahmaśabdaḥ
kāryabrahmarūpahiraṇyagarbhādiparaḥ iti (ke2cit) । vaktavyaṃ ca viyadutpattivādināpi
<quote>‘ākāśavatsarvagataśca nitya’</quote> iti śrutau sakṛcchrutayornityasarvagataśabdayorekatra gauṇatvama-
nyatra mukhyatvaṃ ca । atastanna doṣa ityāpādayituṃ śakyata ityapi draṣṭavyam । <pratika>sū ।। prati-
jñāhāniravyatirekāt ।। 5 ।।</pratika> yatra tejasaḥ prathamaṃ sṛṣṭiḥ śrutā tatraiva chāṃdogye mṛtpiṇḍa-
ghaṭaśarāvādidṛṣṭāṃtodāharaṇapūrvakam ekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñātaṃ tata āpatadvi-
yadādeḥ brahmakāryatvaṃ tatra viyatsṛṣṭyaśravaṇamātreṇa pratyākhyātuṃ na śakyate । aśrutasyāpi
guṇopasaṃhāranyāyataḥ prāptisaṃbhavenāśravaṇasyānyathopapatteranumānamapyaprayojakam । nirava-
yavadravyasyāpi kāryatvasaṃbhavāt udāhṛtapratijñayā sarvasyāpi prapañcasya mṛtpiṇḍaghaṭaśarāvādi-
nyāyādekakāryatvāvadhāraṇena dravyāṇāmavayavasaṃyogārabhyātvāsiddheḥ । dṛṣṭāntarūpopapattyu-
panyāsapūrvikā pratijñā ca tātparyaliṅgavattvāttadrahitābhyo <quote>‘vāyuścāntarikṣaṃ ce’</quote> tyādiśrutito
balavatīti pratijñābalādeva pūrvapakṣāvalaṃbanahetutrayanirākaraṇasiddhimabhipretya sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe—
<pratika>yenāśrutamiti</pratika> । nanu, brahmajñānenājñātasyāpi jñānamātraṃ pratijñātaṃ na sarvasya jñānaṃ tattu
tejaḥprabhṛtiviṣayatvenāpyupapannamityāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>sarvavijñāneti</pratika> । <quote>‘yenāśruta’</quote> mityādau
aśrutādiśabdāssaṃkocakābhāvāt <quote>‘kasminnu, bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñāta’</quote> miti
<note>1 ( ) etadrekhāṃkitaṃ vākyaṃ kha pustake nāsti ।</note> <note>2 <quote>‘kecit’</quote> ityetata kha pustake nāsti ।</note>
<pb n="125"/>
derbrahmakāryatvena tadavyatirekādeva bhavati । ato na saṃbhūtaśabdasya gauṇatvaṃ,
pratijñāhānyādyāpatteḥ । yathā pratijñāhānirna bhavati tathā yojanīyam ।।
<sutra>sū ।। śabdebhyaḥ ।। 6 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘ātmana ākāśassaṃbhūta’</quote> ityādiśabdebhyo'vagatāṃ viyadutpattiṃ <quote>‘tattejo'sṛja-
te’</quote> tyatrākāśāvacanāvagataṃ tejaḥprāthamyaṃ na vicālayituṃ kṣamate ।।
<sutra>sū ।। yāvadvikāraṃ tu vibhāgo lokavat ।। 7 ।।</sutra>

śrutyaṃtaraikārthyācca sarvaviṣayā iti bhāvaḥ । nanu pratijñāyā ahāniravyatirekādananyatvā-
deva bhavatīti satyaṃ, tadananyatvamapṛthak‌siddhirūpaṃ śarīraśarīribhāvamātreṇopapadyamānaṃ viya-
dāderna kāryatvaparyaṃtamapekṣate ityāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>brahmakāryatveneti</pratika> । (1anyathā sarvavijñānapra-
tijñānānirvāhāt) mṛtpiṇḍaghaṭaśarāvādidṛṣṭāṃtānurodhā2cceti bhāvaḥ । pūrvapakṣyabhimatahetutraya-
nirāsārthaṃ pratijñāparyaṃtaṃ nānveṣaṇīyam । uktahetutrayānusāreṇa yasyāssaṃbhūtādiśrutergauṇatva-
māpādyate saiva tannirākaraṇasamartheti pratipādanārthaṃ <pratika>sūtram—sū ।। śabdebhyaḥ ।। 6 ।।</pratika> chāṃdo-
gye viyadutpattirna nivāritā tejassṛṣṭeḥ prāthamyaṃ ca na śrutaṃ kiṃ tu viyadutpatteravacanamātram ।
na ca kvacitkasyacidavacanamanyatra vacanatastatprāptiṃ nivārayitumīṣṭe । tejassṛṣṭiḥ prathama-
śruteti sthānapramāṇāt tatprāthamyamavagamyate iti cenna । sthānapramāṇakalpyaprāthamyānya-
thānupapattyā viyadanutpattikalpanatassaṃbhūtādiśruterbalavatvāt tejassṛṣṭiprāthamye viyatsṛ-
ṣṭistatprāthamyaṃ cobhayaṃ bādhyaṃ viyatsṛṣṭiprāthamye tu tejaḥsṛṣṭiprāthamyamātraṃ bādhyamiti
bādhakakalpanālāghavena tejassṛṣṭiprāthamyabādhasyocitatvācca । tasmādiha na śrutyarthāpattiḥ
pravartate । nāpyanumānam । pramāṇāṃtarāprāptāmekasmādātmano viyadutpattiṃ bruvāṇayā śrutyaiva
dravyasyāvayavasaṃyogārabhyatvaniyamarūpaśuṣkatarkabādhāt । udāhṛtaśabdo'pi na pravartate ।
<quote>‘satyaṃ jñānamanaṃtaṃ brahme’</quote> tyuktalakṣaṇāntargatānaṃtaśabdārthabhūtavastuparicchedarāhityopapādanārthaṃ
pravṛttasya <quote>‘ātmana ākāśa’</quote> ityādeḥ <quote>‘kasminnu bhagava’</quote> ityā3disarvavijñānapratijñopapādanārthaṃ
pravṛttasya <quote>‘etasmājjāyata’</quote> ityādeśca prabalatayā tenaiva tasya bādhyatvāditi pūrvapakṣyabhimata-
hetutrayanirākaraṇamabhipretya vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>ātmana ākāśa ityādinā</pratika> । chāṃdogye vi4yada-
nutpattivacanamaṃgīkṛtya taittirīyādigatavacanāṃtaratastatsiddhiḥ pūrvasūtrābhipretā bhāṣyakṛto-
panyastā । atha chāṃdogye'pi tadvacanamasti tejaḥ prabhṛtyutpattyukterevopalakṣaṇatayā viyadu-
tpattivacanarūpatvasyāpi sadbhāvādato na śrutyarthāpatteravakāśaḥ nāpyupanyastaśabdānumānayo-
riti pratipādanārthaṃ sūtrama—<pratika>sū ।। yāvadvikāraṃ tu vibhāgo lokavat ।। 7 ।।</pratika> tuśabda-
śchāṃdogye viyadutpattivacanaṃ nāstīti śaṃkāvyāvṛttyarthaḥ । vikriyata iti vikāraṃ kāryam ।
karmaṇi ghañ pratyayaḥ । ata eva napuṃsakaliṃgatopapattiḥ । sāmānyavacanasaṃkṣiptaṃ yāvatkārya-
jātamasti tatsarvaṃ karmaḥ vibhāgo vibhajyaikadeśasyodāharaṇatayā kathanaṃ vyāpnoti na tu
yāvadviśiṣyodāhṛtaṃ tāvanmātraniṣṭhaṃ bhavati । vibhāgavacanaṃ lokavat । yathā loke <quote>‘mahatā
tapasā mayeme putrā labdhāḥ’</quote> ityuktvā <quote>‘bahukālamayaṃ parameśvarārādhanena labdha’</quote> ityekasya
dvayostrayāṇāṃ vā vibhajya kathanaṃ sarveṣāmapi putrāṇāṃ tathā tapoviśeṣalabdhatvapradarśanārthaṃ
<note>1 ( ) etadrekhāṃkitaṃ vākyaṃ kha pustake nāsti ।</note> <note>(2) rodhāditi kha pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(3) <quote>‘ityādipratijñātasarva-
