bhavati । yathā vā <quote>‘agnaye juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmī’</quote> ti mantrasya <quote>‘vikṛtiṣu yathādevatamūhaḥ kartavya’</quote>
ityuktyā yathā sauryacarau <quote>‘sūryāya juṣṭhaṃ nirvapāmītyūha’</quote> iti viśiṣya kvacidvikṛtau tadde-
vatāvācipadohakathanaṃ sarvāsu vikṛtiṣu tathaiva tattaddevatāviśeṣavācipadohakartavyatā-
pradarśanārthaṃ bhavatīti sūtrārthaṃ darśayan kimatra sāmānyatassaṃkṣipya vacanaṃ kiṃ vā vibhāga-
vacanamityākāṃkṣāyāṃ tadubhayaṃ vivṛṇoti—<pratika>aitadātmyamiti</pratika> । idamupasaṃhāragatavākyo-
dāharaṇamupakramagatasya <quote>‘sadeva somyeda’</quote> mityādivākyasyāpyupalakṣaṇam । tathā ca sarva-
syāpi prapañcasya sṛṣṭeḥ prāksadrūpakāraṇātmatvāvadhāraṇāt upasaṃhāragatavākyaṃ sṛṣṭyanaṃtara-
mapi sadrūpakāraṇātmatvāvadhāraṇārthamavasīyate । tadetat sāmānyataḥ sarvasyāpi prapañcasya
brahmaṇaśca kāryakāraṇabhāvapratipādakaṃ saṃkṣipya vacanaṃ tatrodāharaṇaviśeṣapratipādanārthaṃ <quote>‘tatte-
jo'sṛjate’</quote>tyādi vibhāgavacanam । atastasya viyadādisarvakāryopalakṣaṇārthatvaṃ yuktamiti
bhāvaḥ । evaṃ cārthāpattiranavakāśeti spaṣṭam । śabdo'pi kāryakāraṇabhāvakṛtaprapañcabrahmā-
nanyatvapratipādakopakramopasaṃhāratadviśadīkaraṇārthamadhyaparāmarśayuktasandarbhāt durbala iti
spaṣṭameva । anumānamapi viyadādikaṃ kāryaṃ vastuparicchedarūpavibhāgavattvāt ghaṭavaditi
pratyanumānaparāhatam । sādhyamiha svarūpānyathābhāvajñānasaṃkocarūpadharmānyathābhāvānya-
tarakāryatvādhikaraṇatvamiti na cicchaktau jīvātmani ca vyabhicāraḥ । niravayave sāma-
gryanirūpaṇaṃ tu pratyuktam । idaṃ pratyanumānamarthāntarapareṇa sūtreṇa sūcitam । tatrāyaṃ sūtrārthaḥ ।
vibhāgo yāvadvikāraṃ vikārā yāvantaḥ tāvatsveva । ghaṭādivat । na kāryatvamatikramya
vibhaktatvamastīti । asminnarthe <quote>‘yāvadvikāra’</quote> mityavyayībhāvasamāsena ekaṃ padam । aya-
martho bhāṣyāṃtareṣūktaḥ tato'vagantuṃ śakyata ita bhāṣyakṛtā nopanyastaḥ । adhikaraṇārtha-
mupasaṃharati—<pratika>tasmāditi ।। iti viyadadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</pratika></p>

<sutra>sū ।। na viyadaśruteḥ ।। 1 ।। asti tu ।। 2 ।। gauṇyasaṃbhavācchabdācca ।। 3 ।। syāccaikasya brahmaśabda-

<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvasminpāde śrutiviruddhatvātparapakṣāṇāmupekṣyatvamabhāṇi । tarhi śrutīnāmapyanyonyaviruddhatvādbrahma-
kāraṇavādasyāpyupekṣyatvāpattirityāśaṃkānirākaraṇārthaṃ paraṃ pādadvayamārabhyate—<pratika>na viyadaśruterityādi</pratika> । atrādau sṛṣṭi-
vākyānāmavirodhaṃ pratipādayitumākāśamāśritya vicāryate । atra ākāśasyotpattirasti vā na veti saṃdehaḥ । yadyasti
tarhi chāndogye ākāśavāyū vinā <quote>‘tattejo'sṛjate’</quote> ti tejaādikā sṛṣṭiḥ śrūyate । taittirīyake tu <quote>‘ātmana ākā-
śassaṃbhūta’</quote> ityākāśādikā । tathā cānayorvākyayorvirodha iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, ekadeśimate chāndogye
ākāśasyotpattyabhāve'pi taittirīyake sā śrutirastyeva । tathāpi ākāśotpattau samavāyikāraṇādisāmagryabhāvāt vibhutvena
nityatvānumānāccākāśotpatterasaṃbhavātsā ākāśasyotpattirna mukhyā bhavitumarhati kiṃ tu gauṇī । kiṃ ca <quote>‘vāyuścāntarikṣaṃ
caitadamṛtam’</quote> ityākāśe'mṛtaśabdaprayogadarśanācca nākāśasyotpattiḥ । nanvekasminvākye ekasya saṃbhūtaśabdasya mukhyatvaṃ
gauṇatvaṃ ca kathamiti cet yathā ekasminneva prakaraṇe viṣayabhedāt <quote>‘annaṃ brahme’</quote>tyatra brahmaśabdo gauṇaḥ <quote>‘ānando brahme’</quote> tyatra brahmaśa-
bdo mukhyaḥ tathā prakṛte'pi viṣayabhedādekasya gauṇatvaṃ mukhyatvaṃ ca syāt । evamākāśasyānutpattau chāndogyaśrutestaitti-
rīyaśrutyā na virodha iti । ekadeśimataṃ dūṣayan sūtrakāraḥ paramasiddhāntamāha—yadyākāśasyotpattirna syāttarhi ekavijñānena
sarvavijñānapratijñāṃ hīyate । atastatsiddhaye ākāśasyotpattiraṅgīkartavyā । kiṃ ca । <quote>‘sadeva somyedamagra āsīt’</quote> <quote>‘aitadā-
tmyamidaṃ sarva’</quote> mityādiśabdebhyaḥ pratijñāsiddhiravagamyate । sarvasya vastujātasya brahmaṇo'vyatirekāddhi sarvavijñānapratijño-
papadyeta । chāndogyaśrutistaittirīyaśrutyanusāreṇa ākāśaṃ vāyuṃ ca sṛṣṭvā tattejo'sṛjateti vipariṇamyata iti nāna-
yorvirodhaḥ । yattu sāmagryabhāvādākāśasyānutpattiriti tanna । brahmaṇa eva viyatsāmagrītvāt । nityatvānumānamapi na
sidhdyati । ākāśādiḥ parādhīnasattākaḥ । svasamānasattākavibhāgavattvāt । ghaṭādivat । ityanumātuṃ śakyatvāt nityatvānumāne
hetorasiddheḥ । yataḥ yāvadvikārajātaṃ vibhāgo dṛśya te na tvavikāre brahmaṇi । loke ghaṭādervikārasyaiva vibhaktatvadarśanāt ।
ata ākāśasya brahmakāryatvaṃ siddhamiti । sūtrārtho'pi vyākhyātaprāyaḥ । asminmate <pratika><quote>‘śabdācca’</quote></pratika> iti pṛthaksūtraṃ
<pratika><quote>‘avyatirekācchabdebhyaḥ’</quote></pratika> ityekaṃ sūtramiti ca madhvamatasādhāraṇaḥ śrīkaṇṭharāmānujamatābhyāṃ viśeṣaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, sāṃkhyādidarśanavirodhaparihārānantaramadhyāyaśeṣeṇāvāntaravirodhaḥ parihriyate—<pratika>na viyadaśruterityādinā ।</pratika>
atrādhikaraṇe viyadutpadyate na vetyādisaṃdehapūrvapakṣādikaṃ prāyaḥ pūrvavat । siddhāntanirūpaṇe paraṃ sūtrārthavarṇanaṃ kiyadiva bhidyate
ityatastanmātramiha nirūpyate---<pratika>sū ।। na viyadaśruteḥ ।। 1 ।। viyanno</pratika>tpadyate । kutaḥ । <pratika>aśruteḥ</pratika>=tadutpattipratipādanaśrama-
śrutyabhāvādityarthaḥ । ato jīvavadākāśo'pi notpadyate iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣe</pratika> prāpte <pratika>siddhāntamāha—sū ।। asti tu ।। 2 ।।</pratika>
viyadutpattipratipādanaparā śrutiriti śeṣaḥ । chāndogye tadutpattipratipādanābhāve'pi taittirīye <quote>‘tasmādvā etasmādātmana
ākāśassaṃbhūta’</quote> iti tadutpattiparā śrutirastyeva । ātmanastu <quote>‘na jāyate mriyate ve’</quote> tyādipratiṣedhādanutpattiḥ na viyata
utpattipratiṣedhaśrutirasti । tasmādviyadvatpadyata eveti ।। uttarasūtradvayena pūrvapakṣabījamuddhāṭayati—<pratika>sū ।। gauṇyasaṃbhavāccha-
bdācca ।। 3 ।।</pratika> niravayavasyākāśasyotpattyasaṃbhavāt <quote>‘vāyuścāntarikṣaṃ caitadamṛta’</quote> miti nityatvaśabdācca <quote>‘tattejo'sṛjate’</quote>
ti tejasaḥ prathamasṛṣṭivacanāt <quote>‘ākāśassaṃbhūta’</quote> iti śrutirgauṇī <pratika>।। sū ।। syāccaikasya brahmaśabdavat ।। 4 ।।</pratika> yathā
ekasya brahmaśabdasya <quote>‘tasmādetadbrahma nāma rūpamannaṃ ca jāyata’</quote> iti prakṛtau gauṇatvaṃ <quote>‘tapasā jīyate brahma’</quote> iti mukhyatvaṃ
tadvadatrāpi ekasya saṃbhūtaśabdasyākāśe gauṇatvamanyatra mukhyatvamāvṛttāviva saṃbhavattyeva । tasmādākāśasyotpattirayukteti ।।
atha parihāramāha—<pratika>sū ।। pratijñāhāniravyatirekāt ।। 6 ।।</pratika> viyadāderbrahmakāryatvena tadavyatirekādeva <quote>‘yenāśrutaṃ
śrutaṃ bhavatī’</quote> tyekavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñāyā ahānirbhavati । ato na saṃbhūtaśabdasya gauṇatvam । ityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।।
śabdebhyaḥ ।। 6 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘ātmana ākāśassaṃbhūta’</quote> ityādiśabdebhyo'vagatāṃ viyadutpattiṃ <quote>‘tattejo'sṛjate’</quote> tyākāśāva-
canāvagataṃ tejaḥprāthamyaṃ na nivārayitumīṣṭe <pratika>।। sū ।। yāvadvikāraṃ tu vibhāgo lokavat ।। 7 ।।</pratika>
<quote>‘aitadātmyamidaṃ sarva’</quote> mityādinākāśādessarvasyāpi vikāratvavacanāt <quote>‘tattejo'sṛjate’</quote>tyādi vibhajya kathanaṃ yāvanto
vikārāstāvatsveva vyāpnoti । yāvadvikāramityavyayībhāvādekaṃ padam । yathā loke <quote>‘daśa me putrā’</quote> ityuktvā teṣu
keṣācidutpattikathanaṃ tadvadatrāpītyarthaḥ । tasmādviyadutpadyata eveti siddham । amṛtatvavacanamāpekṣikamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, saṃgatisaṃdehapūrvapakṣasiddhāntasūtrārthavarṇanādikaṃ prāyaḥ śrīkaṇṭhamatasādhāraṇameva । adhikaraṇaracanā paraṃ
bhidyate । śrīkaṇṭhamate pṛthagadhikaraṇadvayatayā vibhaktaṃ sūtradvayamanantarametadadhikaraṇe'ntarbhāvitamityasti viśeṣaḥ । tayorapi
sūtrayorarthavarṇanaprakārastvaviśiṣṭa eva śrīkaṇṭhamatāta । yathā—<pratika>sū ।। etena mātariśvā vyākhyātaḥ ।। 8 ।।</pratika> anena nyāyena
mātariśvano'pyutpattiruktā । adhikāśaṃkābhāvāt nyāyātideśo'yaṃ na bhavati । pṛthagyogakaraṇamuttarārtham । <pratika>sū ।। asaṃ-
bhavastu sato'nupapatteḥ ।। 9 ।।</pratika> tuśabdo'vadhārāṇārthaḥ । <pratika>sataḥ</pratika>= paramakāraṇasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ । <pratika>asaṃbhavaḥ</pratika>=utpasya-
saṃbhavaḥ । tadva‍yatiriktasya sarvasyaivaikavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñādyanupapattessaṃbhava ukta iti bhāvaḥ ।</p>
<pb n="128"/>
atha mātariśvādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। etena mātariśvā vyākhyātaḥ ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘tejo'ta’</quote> iti vakṣyati । tadarthaṃ pṛthagupādānam । ākāśādvāyorutpattirasti
naveti saṃśaye vāyurnotpadyata ityucyate । chāṃdogye tejaḥprāthamyāt vāyorutpattera-
śruteḥ bṛhadāraṇyake <quote>‘saiṣānastamitā devatā yadvāyuri’</quote> ti tajjanmaniṣedhācca sarvathā
vāyurnotpadyata iti prāpte siddhāṃta ucyate—chāṃdogye vāyorjanmāśravaṇe'pi guṇo-
pasaṃhāranyāyena <quote>‘ākāśādvāyuri’</quote> ti taittirīyavākyasyopasaṃhāre sati śrutameva
chāṃdogye'pi vāyorjanma । <quote>‘saiṣānastamite’</quote> ti śrutiḥ stutiparā । upāsanāprakara-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha mātariśvādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। etena mātariśvā vyākhyātaḥ ।। 9 ।।</pratika> nanu kimarthamidamatideśādhikaraṇaṃ
<quote>‘saiṣānastamite’</quote> ti vākyāvalaṃbanaśaṅkāvyāvartanārthamiti cenna । <quote>‘vāyuścāntarikṣaṃ ce’</quote> ti
pūrvādhikaraṇodāhṛtavākyāvalaṃbanaśaṅkāvyāvartanena tasyāpi siddhatvāt ityāśaṃkyāha-
<pratika>tejo'ta iti</pratika> । viyanmātariśvanorubhayorapyekasūtreṇotpattau samarthayituṃ śakyāyāmapyuttara-
sūtre sarvanāmnā mātariśvana eva parāmarśārthaṃ pṛthaksūtrakaraṇamityarthaḥ । ye tu manyaṃte <quote>‘vāyu-
ścāntarikṣaṃ caitadamṛta’</quote> mityubhayasādhāraṇyenāmṛtatvamuktvā punarvāyorviśiṣyocyate <quote>‘saiṣā
nastamitā devatā yadvāyu’</quote> riti tato'bhyāsādvāyoramṛtatvaṃ vivakṣitamiti jñāyata itya-
dhikāśaṃkāvyāvṛttyarthamātideśikamadhikaraṇāṃtaramevedamiti tanmatānusāreṇādhikaraṇamupa-
nyasyati—<pratika>ākāśādvāyorityādinā</pratika> । etadeva bhāṣyakārābhimataṃ matam । pṛthagyoga-
karaṇamuttarārthamiti tu matāntarapradarśanamātram । na hi <quote>‘tejo'tastathā hyāha’</quote> ityuttarasūtre
<quote>‘ata’</quote> ityanena vāyureva parāmarśanīyaḥ । kiṃ tvākāśo'pi। tatra sūtre vāyorevāgniriti-
vadākāśādeva vāyurityapi pūrvapakṣasya vivakṣitatvena tadarthaṃ vāyuriti pade'dhyāhṛte satyā-
vṛttyā tadanvayino'ta ityasyākāśaparatvasyāpyavaśyaṃbhāvāditi । <pratika>upāsanāprakaraṇāditi</pratika>।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, atra pāde vipratiṣedhadoṣaparihārāya śrutivirodho nirākriyate । atrādhikaraṇe saṃdehapūrvapakṣasiddhāntādhi-
karaṇaśarīrādikamaviśiṣṭameva śāṃkaramatāt । sūtrākṣarārthavarṇane paramasti vailakṣaṇyamiti tanmātramiha nirūpyate—<pratika>sū ।। na vi-
yadaśruteḥ ।। 1 ।। viyat</pratika>=ākāśamanutpattimanna । kiṃ tvīśādutpattimadeva । kutaḥ । <pratika>aśruteḥ</pratika>=viyadanutpattau śrutyabhāvādi-
tyarthaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। asti tu ।।2।।</pratika> ākāśotpattau <quote>‘ātmana ākāśassaṃbhūta’</quote> iti śrutirastyevetyarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। gauṇyasaṃbhavāt
।। 3 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘anādirvāyamākāśa’</quote> iti śruti<pratika>rgauṇī</pratika>=amukhyānāditvaparā । kutaḥ । <pratika>asaṃbhavāt</pratika>=tasyā mukhyārthatve bahu-
lotpattiśrutyayogādityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। śabdācca ।। 4 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘atha ha vāva nityānī’</quote> ti śrutibalāccānāditvaśrutirgauṇārthetyarthaḥ ।।
<pratika>sū ।। syāccaikasya brahmaśabdavat ।। 5 ।।</pratika> co'vadhāraṇe । <pratika>brahmaśabdavat</pratika>=yathā ekasyaiva brahmaśabdasya viṣṇau mukhyatvaṃ
jīve tvamukhyatvamasti tathā ekasyaiva nityatvabodhakaśabdasya brahmaṇi mukhyārthatā syāt ।। <pratika>sū ।। pratijñāhāniravyati-
rekācchabdebhyaḥ ।। 6 ।।</pratika> ākāśasya mukhyānutpattyuktau <pratika>pratijñāhāniḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘sa idaṃ sarvamasṛjate’</quote> ti viṣṇoḥ sraṣṭṭatvapra-
tijñāhāniḥ syāt । kutaḥ । <pratika>avyatirekāt</pratika>=ākāśasya sarvaśabdārthānatiriktatvāt । kiṃca ।। <pratika>śabdebhyaḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘ātmā
vā ida’</quote> mityādispaṣṭaśrutibhyaśca brahmaṇa eva mukhyānutpattiḥ na tvanyasyetyavasīyate ।। <pratika>sū ।। yāvadvikāraṃ tu vibhāgo
lokavat ।। 7 ।।</pratika> yāvacchabdo'vadhāraṇe । yāvadvikāramityavyayam । tu śabdaścārthe । tathā ca yataḥ <pratika>yāvadvikāraṃ</pratika>=vikri-
yamāṇameva vastu <pratika>vibhāgaḥ</pratika>=vibhāgaśabditālpaśaktimat na tvanyaditi niyamaḥ siddhaḥ । ato <pratika>lokavat</pratika>=loka iva ।
yathā loke ghaṭādau vibhaktatvādvikāritvamaṅgīkṛtaṃ tathā ākāśāderapi vibhaktatvahetunā vikāritvaṃ sidhdyati । tata eva
sāditvamapi siddha‍yatītyarthaḥ ।। atra mate viyatpadena bhūtāvakāśau tadabhimāninau ceti catuṣṭayamucyate ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ viyadadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<pb n="129"/>
<p>ṇāt । tasmāt vāyurapi jāyata eva ।। iti mātariśvādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
atha asaṃbhavādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। asaṃbhavastu sato'nupapatteḥ ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘sadeva somyedamagra āsī’</quote> diti sadrūpādbrahmaṇa ākāśādīnāmutpattiriti
nirūpitam । tadiha sarvakāraṇasya sato'pi brahmaṇaḥ kutaścitkāraṇādutpattirasti
na veti saṃdehe sati brahmaṇo'pyutpattirastītyucyate । yathā kāraṇatve'pyākā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
yadyapi sarvatrāpi brahmaprakaraṇe saṃbhṛtyadhikaraṇanyāyādupā1sanā vivikṣitāstyeva । tathāpyanya-
paratvamātramanayā bhaṃgyocyate । bṛhadāraṇyake hi <quote>‘anena hyetatsarvaṃ vede’</quote> tyātmavijñānena
sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñāya tadupapādanārthamātmakāryaṃ vāyvādikaṃ <quote>‘vāyuśce’</quote> tyādinā pradarśyate ।
atha svargakāmavākyānusāreṇa <quote>‘ko hi tadveda yadyamuṣmin loka’</quote> ityādivākyavadihāpi
pradhānavākyānusāreṇa guṇavākyasya yojanīyatvāt ātmakāryasyaiva vāyvāderamṛtatvakīrtanaṃ
stutiparamavasīyate iti bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। iti mātariśvādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>athāsaṃbhavādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p>tarhi tadvadeva <quote>‘sa bāhyābhyaṃtaro hyajaḥ’</quote> । <quote>‘nityaṃ vibhuṃ sarvagataṃ susūkṣmam’</quote> ityādau
brahmaṇo'pyajatvanityatvādikīrtanaṃ stutiparaṃ syāt ityāśaṃkānirākaraṇārthamadhikaraṇānta-
ram—<pratika>sū ।। asaṃbhavastu sato'nupapatteḥ ।। 9 ।।</pratika> kāraṇatvasāmānyādākāśādivat
brahmaṇo'pyutpattirastīti pūrvaḥ pakṣa । nanu <quote>‘agra āsīdi’</quote> ti sṛṣṭeḥ prāk brahmaṇo'vasthānaṃ</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyā/?/m atha mātariśvādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū ।। etena mātariśvā vyākhyātaḥ ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>saiṣānastamiteti śrutyaivāntasya vāraṇādvāyoḥ। vāyurnotpadyata iti śaṃkāyāmevamatideśaḥ ।। 130 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>tātparyavatpratijñānurodhataḥ syāttadutpattiḥ । saiṣānastamiteti stutiḥ paramupāsanāśeṣaḥ ।। 131 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti mātariśvādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām atha mātariśvādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। etena mātariśvā vyākhyātaḥ ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, atrāpi vāyorutpattirasti na veti <pratika>saṃdehe</pratika> chāndogye na śrūyate taittirīyake tu <quote>‘ākāśādvāyuḥ’</quote> iti
śrūyate । tathā ca pūrvavadanayorvirodhaprāptau tatparihārāya vāyorutpattirgauṇī vācyā । <quote>‘saiṣānastamitā devatā yadvāyu’</quote> riti
layapratiṣedhācca na vāyorutpattiriti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, etena</pratika>=ākāśasyotpattimattvavyākhyānena vāyurapyā-
kāśāvacchinnabrahmajanyatvena vyākhyātaḥ । anyathā pratijñāhānyādidoṣāpatteḥ । layapratiṣedhastvāpekṣikaḥ stutiparaḥ । pūrvaṃ
vāyvākāśayossāmānyenāmṛtatvamabhidhāya punaśca vāyoḥ <quote>‘saiṣānastamite’</quote> ti layapratiṣedhādvāyoramṛtatvaṃ vivakṣitamitya-
dhikāśaṃkānirākaraṇārthamidamātideśikamadhikaraṇāntaramiti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, nātrādhikaraṇe pūrvasmādvailakṣaṇyamiti vedyam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, asya sūtrasya pūrvādhikaraṇaśeṣatayā pūrvasminnadhikaraṇa eva vyākhyātatayā ca nātra punastatprapañcanāvakāśaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika> aviśiṣṭamidaṃ śāṃkaramatāt । <pratika>etena</pratika>=pūrvoktavibhaktatvādihetunā । <pratika>mātariśvā</pratika>=mukhyavāyuḥ ।
<pratika>vyākhyātaḥ</pratika>=utpattimattvenokta ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti mātariśvādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<note>(1) <quote>‘dupāsanāvivakṣāstyeva’</quote> iti kha pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="130"/>
śasya । kiṃ tu <quote>‘agra āsī’</quote>diti śravaṇāt sarvavikārebhyaḥ pūrvamasyotpattiḥ । ki-
masya kāraṇamiti cedasadeva । <quote>‘asadvā idamagra āsīttato vai sadajāyata’</quote> iti
śravaṇāt । tatassadrūpaṃ brahmāpi jāyata iti pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāṃtastu—na jāyate
brahmeti । kutaḥ । <quote>‘sadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyaṃ’</quote> <quote>‘yadā tamastanna divā
na rātrirna sanna cāsacchiva eva kevalaḥ’</quote> iti śivasya brahmaṇa evāvadhāraṇāt ।
tasyāsaṃbhava eva । niṣedhāta । tadanyasya tvanupapattessaṃbhava iti । yathā brahma
kāraṇatvena śrūyate sarveṣāṃ tathā tasyāpi kiṃcitkāraṇāṃtaraṃ śrūyate । <quote>‘asadvā
idamagra āsīttato vai sadajāyate’</quote> ti sataḥ kāraṇamasaditi cet । tadasat ।
<quote>‘kathamasatassajjāyete’</quote> ti niṣedhāt sata eva sadutpattāvātmāśrayāpatteḥ । tataḥ
sato brahmaṇa evāsaṃbhavo'nutpattiḥ । tadanyasya sarvasya sarvavijñānapratijñānupa-
patteḥ saṃbhava utpattiriti ।। iti asaṃbhavādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śrūyate tatkathamutpattimatsyāt ? neti brūmaḥ । <quote>‘agra āsī’</quote> diti viyadādibhyaḥ prāgutpatti-
rucyate । <quote>‘rohito lohitādāsīt dhundhustasya suto'bhava’</quote> dityādāvasteḥ 1utpattāvapi prayo-
gadarśanāt । kutastasyotpattiriti cedvākyāntaraprāptādasato bhaviṣyati । <quote>‘kathamasatassa-
jjāyete’</quote>ti vākyāmāścaryārthatvena kathañcidyojanīyam । tasyāpi kāraṇatvena kāryatayā
kāraṇākāṅkṣāyāmasadantaraṃ kāraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati । kāraṇānavasthā tu anāditvānna doṣa
iti । atra siddhāntaḥ—sato brahmaṇaḥ asaṃbhavastu anutpattireva । ekatvāvadhāraṇāt । na
ca sahotpannavastvaṃtaraniṣedhaparaṃ tat । <quote>‘ekamevādvitīya’</quote> miti padatrayeṇa sarvaniṣedhāt
<quote>‘yadā tama’</quote> iti mantreṇa prapañcasṛṣṭiprākkāle brahmavyatiriktasya sata ivāsato'pi sākṣā-
deva niṣedhācca । <quote>‘kathamasata’</quote> iti vākyaṃ cāsatassakāśāt sata utpattiṃ sākṣānniṣedhati ।
na ca tadāścaryaparaṃ yojanīyam । <quote>‘sa tveva somyedamagra āsī’</quote> dityagrimavākye tuśabdena
pūrvamasataḥ pratiṣedhaspaṣṭīkaraṇāt । sata eva sadutpattāvātmāśrayaḥ spaṣṭaḥ । satparaṃparābhyupa-
game tvaprāmāṇikyanavasthā । kāraṇatvasya kāryatvāprayojakatvādākāśādidṛṣṭāṃtopanyāsa-
mātreṇa kāryatvakalpanasyātiprasaṃgāvahatvāditi । yadyapi sautra <quote>‘manupapatte’</quote> riti padamasaṃ-
bhavahetuparatvena yojayituṃ śakyaṃ tathāpi tatra hetorekatvāvadhāraṇādeḥ spaṣṭatvāt brahmāti-
riktānāṃ parāparamāyāprakṛtīnāṃ brahmavajjagadupādānatvena prasaktāyā anutpattiśaṅkāyā
nirasanīyatvācca tannirāsārthatvena bhāṣyakṛtā tatpadaṃ yojitam । tadanyasya tvanupapatte-
ssaṃbhava iti । anupapattirapyagre spaṣṭīkṛtā । <pratika>‘sarvavijñānapratijñānupapatteriti</pratika> ।।
<head>ityasaṃbhavādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>athāsaṃbhavādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। asaṃbhavastu sato'nupapatteḥ ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>evaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ sadapi vyomādivajjananavatsyāt । bhavati tato vai sadajāyateti hi śravaṇamanyatra ।।132।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>utpattirekamevetyavadhāraṇabādhitā tasya । kathamasatassajjāyeteti viruddhaṃ tu tacchūvaṇam ।। 133 ।।</l></lg>
<head>ityasaṃbhavādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<note>(1) <quote>‘utpattyādāvapi’</quote> iti kha pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="131"/>
atha tejo'dhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। tejo'tastathā hyāha ।। 10 ।।</sutra>
atra vāyvādikāryaṃ sākṣādbrahmaṇa utpadyate svasvapūrvakāraṇādveti saṃdehe sati
svasvapūrvakāraṇāditi pūrvapakṣaḥ । tathā hi <quote>‘ākāśādvāyuriti’</quote> śrutervāyurākā-
śādevotpadyate na sākṣādbrahmaṇaḥ । tejo'pi tatā vāyoreva । tathā <quote>‘vāyoragni’</quote>-
rityāha śrutiḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha tejo'dhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p>evaṃ brahmavyatiriktasya kṛtsnasya prapañcasya brahmakāryatvamavirodhenopapāditam । atha ta-
tkāryatvaṃ sākṣādeva na tu paraṃparayetyetadavirodhenopapādayitumadhikaraṇam <pratika>।। sū ।। tejo'tastathā-
hyāha ।। 10 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘ātmana ākāśa’</quote> ityādisṛṣṭivākyāgatānāṃ paṃcamyaṃtānāmākāśādi-
śabdānāṃ mahābhūtatadantaryāmyanyataraparatvānavadhāraṇātsaṃśayaṃ darśayati —<pratika>atreti । ākā-
śādvāyuriti । śruteriti</pratika> । ākāśaśabdasya viyati tadaṃtaryāmiṇi brahmaṇi ca śakte-
raviśiṣṭatve'pi viyatparatvameva yuktam । laukikavaidikakāraṇaprasiddhyatiśayānugrahāt
<quote>‘ātmana ākāśa’</quote> iti tatraiva prathamāṃtasyākāśaśabdasya viyatparatāyāḥ klṛptatvāccāṃtaryāmiṇaḥ
kāryatvāsaṃbhavāditi bhāvaḥ । <pratika>tejo'pi tathā vāyoreveti</pratika> । uktanyāyādeva <quote>‘tattejo'-
sṛjate’</quote> ti chāṃdogyavākyaṃ paraṃparākāraṇatvaviṣayamiti na tadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ । nanu chāṃdo-
gyaśrutau <quote>‘tatteja aikṣate’</quote> tyatra tejaśśabdasyāṃtaryāmiparatvaṃ vācyam । īkṣaṇaliṃgāt । ata-
staittirīyakagatānāmapi kāraṇaparāṇāmākāśādiśabdānāmaṃtaryāmiparatvaṃ syāditi śaṅkā-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha asaṃbhavādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। asaṃbhavastu sato'nupapatteḥ ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvamasaṃbhāvitotpattikayorvāyvākāśayorutpattirastīti śrutibalāduktam । tadvadbrahmāntarāhbrahmotpattiḥ
śrutibalādastviti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyedamārabhyate—<pratika>asaṃbhavastviti</pratika> । atra <quote>‘na cāsya kaścijjanitā na cādhipaḥ’</quote> ityādīnāṃ
brahmaṇo nityatvapratipādakaśrutīnāṃ <quote>‘tvaṃ jāto bhavasi viśvatomukhaḥ’</quote> iti śrutyā virodho'sti na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । viro-
dho'stīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, satastu</pratika> sadātmakasya brahmaṇa eva । <pratika>asaṃbhavaḥ</pratika>=utpattyasaṃbhaḥ । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>anupapatteḥ</pratika>=satsāmānyātsatsāmānyasyotpattyanupapatteḥ । viśeṣasyaiva hi ghaṭādermṛtsāmānyajanyatvadarśanāt । janmaśruti-
ścaupādhikaviṣayā । ato nityaṃ brahmetyavirodhaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, yadyapi pūrvapakṣasiddhāntādikaṃ pūrvasmādaviśiṣṭam । tathāpi tadupapādanaprakāraḥ paraṃ bhidyate—yathā—<quote>‘sadeva
somyedamagra āsīt’</quote> iti sadrūpāhbrahmaṇa ākāśādīnāmutpattiriti nirūpitam । sarvakāraṇasya sato'pi brahmaṇaḥ kutaści-
dutpattirasti vā na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘asaṃdvā idamagra āsīt । tato vai sadajāyate’</quote> ti śravaṇātsarvavikārebhyaḥ
pūrvamasataḥ kāraṇātsadrūpaṃ brahmāpi jāyata iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, <quote>‘sadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyaṃ’</quote>
<quote>‘yadā tamastanna divā na rātrirna sanna cāsacchiva eva kevalaḥ’</quote> iti śivasya brahṇaṇa evāvadhāraṇāttadā sarvaniṣedhādasatassa-
jjanipratiṣedhācca tasyāsaṃbhava eva । tadanyasya tu anupapatteḥ saṃbhavaḥ iti । atra <quote>‘anupapatte’</quote> rityetattadanyasya
saṃbhavahetutayā vyākhyātamityapi pūrvasmādviśeṣaḥ । tato brahmaṇa evānutpattistadanyasya sarvavijñānapratijñānupapatterutpa-
ttiriti sūtrārthaḥ phalitaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, asyāpi sūtrasya pūrvasūtravatpūrvādhikaraṇaśeṣatayaiva niveśātatraiva vyākhyātatayā na punarvivaraṇā-
vakāśaḥ । sūtrārthaḥ paraṃ śrīkaṇṭhamatādaviśiṣṭa iti spaṣṭameva ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, idamapyaviśiṣṭārthameva śāṃkaramatāt । tuśabdo'vadhāraṇe । <pratika>sataḥ</pratika>viṣṇoḥ । <pratika>asaṃbhavastu</pratika>=
anutpattireva । na <quote>‘tvasataḥ sadajāyate’</quote> ti śrutyā asatassakāśādutpattirvācyā । kutaḥ । <pratika>anupapatte</pratika>=viṣṇorasadutpa-
ttarayogādityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>ityasaṃbhavādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="132"/>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। āpaḥ ।। 11 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘agnerāpa’</quote> iti śruterāpo'pyegnereveti ।।
<sutra>sū॰ ।। pṛthivī ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘adbhyaḥ pṛthivī’</quote> ti śruteradbhyaḥ eva pṛthivī । ato brahmaṇa eva sākṣānnotpa-
dyaṃte bhūtāni ।।
<sutra>sū॰ ।। adhikārarūpaśabdāntaremyaḥ ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
chāṃdogye'pi <quote>‘tā annamasṛjante’</quote> tyannaśabdena pṛthivyevocyate । sarvabhūtasṛṣṭya-
dhikārāt <quote>‘yatkṛṣṇaṃ tadannasye’</quote> ti rūpavidhānācca । <quote>‘adbhyaḥ pṛthivī’</quote> ti śabdācca ।
ataḥ pṛthivyevādbhya utpadyate । tadevaṃnyāyena brahma na sarveṣāṃ sākṣātkaraṇaṃ
kiṃtu paraṃparayeti ।।
siddhānta ucyate—
<sutra>sū॰ ।। tadabhidhyānādeva tu talliṃgātsaḥ ।। 14 ।।</sutra>
brahmaṇa eva tu sākṣātsarvabhūtotpattiḥ । tathā hi—
<quote>‘tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśassaṃbhūtaṃ’</quote> ityārabhya vāyvādīnāṃ pṛthivyaṃ-
tānāṃ na pūrvapūrvakāraṇādutpattirucyate । kiṃ tu pūrvapūrvakāraṇādākāśādiviśi-
ṣṭāt brahmaṇa evottarottaravāyvādikāryotpattirucyate iti paramātmā śiva eva
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>nirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram—sū ।। āpaḥ ।। 11 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘atastathā hyāhe’</quote> ti pūrvasūtrādanuṣaṅgaḥ ।
<pratika>āpo'pyagnereveti</pratika> । chāṃdogye'pi kāraṇaparatejaśśabdasya pūrvokta1yuktibhiḥ bhūtaviśeṣa-
paratvameva yuktamīkṣaṇaṃ tu prathamaśrutatejaśśabdānusāreṇa <quote>‘tasmādyatra kvaca śocati svedate
vā puruṣaḥ tejasa eva taddhyāpo jāyanta’</quote> iti vākyaśeṣadarśanācca gauṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti
bhāvaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। pṛthivī ।। 12 ।।</pratika> atrāpi pūrvavadanuṣaṃgaḥ । yadyapi pūrvasūtroktanyāyenaivādbhya
eva pṛthivītye2tatsiddhaṃ tathāpi chāṃdogye <quote>‘tā annamasṛjante’</quote> ti śravaṇāt <quote>‘tasmādyatra kva ca
varṣati tadeva bhūyiṣṭhamannaṃ bhavatī’</quote> ti tadvākyaśeṣācca tadvirodhaśaṃkāṃ prasajyaitadavirodho-
papādanasyāvasaradānāyedaṃ sūtram । tāmeva prasaktāṃ śaṅkāṃ nirākarttumuttarasūtram—<pratika>sū ।। adhi-
kārarūpaśabdāntarebhyaḥ ।। 13 ।। yatkṛṣṇaṃ tadannasyeti rūpavidhānācceti</pratika> । pṛthivyāmeva
hi prāyikatayā kṛṣṇaṃ rūpaṃ dṛśyate na vrīhiyavādiṣvadanīyeṣviti bhāvaḥ । ataḥ pṛthivyevādbhya
utpadyata iti mahābhūtādhikārarūpasya prakaraṇasya kṛṣṇarūpātmakasya liṃgasya śrutyaṃtaragatayathāsaṃ-
khyāmnānarūpasya sthānapramāṇasya ceti pramāṇatrayasyānnaśrutivarṣaṇaprayuktabhūyiṣṭhatvaliṃgarūpa-
pramāṇadvayāpekṣayā balavattvāditi bhāvaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। tadabhidhyānādeva tu talliṅgātsaḥ ।। 14 ।।
ākāśādiviśiṣṭāditi</pratika> । idamākāśādyabhimānisadāśivādiśarīrakatvasyāpi vakṣya-
māṇasyopalakṣaṇam । <pratika>śiva eveti</pratika> । anena sautra evakāro bhinnakrama iti darśitam ।
tena prathamāntākāśādipadokto'pi tattadviśiṣṭaśśiva eva । <quote>‘tadaikṣata bahu syā’</quote> miti
tadabhidhyānāt । tasya svarūpānyathābhāvarūpakāryatvāsaṃbhave'pi svaviśeṣaṇabhūtadharmānyathā-
bhāvarūpakāryatvasaṃbhavāditi sūcyate । <quote>‘tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeye’</quote> tivaditi dṛṣṭāṃto-
<note>(1) <quote>‘yuktibhyāṃ’</quote> iti kha pāṭhaḥ</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘tyetadapi siddhyati’</quote> iti kha pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="133"/>
sākṣātsarvabhūtotpādakaḥ <quote>‘tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeye’</quote> tivat, <quote>‘tatteja aikṣata
bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti’</quote> <quote>‘tā āpa aikṣanta bahvyaḥ syāma prajāyemahi’</quote> iti tadabhi-
dhyānāttalliṃgāt ।
<quote>‘sadāśivaśśabdamūrtiḥ sparśamūrtiratheś‍varaḥ । rudrastejomayassākṣāt rasamū-
rtirjanārdanaḥ । gaṃdhamūrtiścaturvaktraḥ ityetāḥ pañca mūrtayaḥ’</quote> । iti vacanāt sadā-
śivādirūpāt śabdādyātmano brahmaṇo vāyvādisaṃbhavaḥ । ete hi sadāśivā-
dayaḥ paṃcabrahmasaṃjñakāḥ paṃcabhūtātmānaḥ parabrahmaṇaśśarīram । pañcabrahmaśarīrādeva
parabrahmaṇaḥ prapaṃcasya sṛṣṭyādayaḥ pravartante । paṃcabhūtatāpannāścaite sadāśivādayaḥ
paramātmana utpadyaṃte ।
nanu bhūtānāmevātrotpattirucyate <quote>‘ākāśassaṃbhūta’</quote> ityādinā, sadāśivā-
dīnāṃ na sākṣātsṛṣṭirucyata iti cet । ucyata eva । śrutyaṃtarādhyāhārāt । tathā-
tharvaśikhāyāṃ <quote>‘dhyāyīteśānaṃ pradhyāyitavyaṃ sarvamidaṃ brahmaviṣṇurudrendrāste saṃpra-
sūyaṃte sarvāṇi ceṃdriyāṇi saha bhūtairna kāraṇaṃ kāraṇānāṃ dhyātā kāraṇaṃ tu dhyeyaḥ
sarvaiśvaryasaṃpannaḥ sarveś‍varaśca śaṃbhurākāśamadhyaga’</quote> iti brahmādīnāmindriyāṇāṃ ca
bhūtaissahotpattiḥ śrūyate। kāraṇānāmapi kāraṇatvena sa śaṃbhuḥ paramākāśamadhye dhyeyaḥ
śrūyate । tatassākṣādeva brahmaṇastattatkāraṇarūpāttattatkāryotpattiriti nirṇayaḥ ।।
iti tejo'dhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pādānasyāyamabhiprāyaḥ । idaṃ vākyaṃ brahmaṇo ya1thā bahubhavanasaṃkalpaṃ bravīti ta2thaiva <quote>‘tatteja-
ekṣate’</quote> tyādivākyadvayamapi bravīti tejassṛṣṭimātreṇa tadviṣayabahubhavanānivṛtteriti ।
anenaiṣāṃ śaṃkā vyāvartyate । jaḍānāmākāśādīnāmīkṣaṇāsaṃbhave'pi prāthamikatejaḥśrutya-
nusārāt gauṇamīkṣaṇamastu । tadabhimānināṃ sadāśivādīnāṃ tatsaṃbhavāt । ākāśādi-
padānāṃ tanmātraparyavasāyitvaṃ vāstu na3śivaparyaṃtatvam । na ca sadāśivādīnāmīkṣaṇamātrasaṃbhave-
'pi mahābhūtarūpeṇa bahubhavanasaṃkalpo na saṃbhavatīti vācyam । teṣāṃ yogasiddhānāmiva bhūtava-
śitvena sarvaśarīrakatvopapatteriti । evamabhidhyānasya prākpradarśitabahubhavanasaṃkalparūpatvata-
tsiddhabrahmasādhāraṇyasūcanārthaṃ <quote>‘tadabhidhyānā’</quote> diti <quote>‘talliṅgā’</quote> diti ca sautratatpadam । e4vaṃ
tatpadadvayaṃ prayuñcānasya sūtrakārasyāśayasthameva sadāśivādīnāmākāśādyabhimānitvaṃ <quote>‘sadā-
śivaśśabdamūrtti’</quote> rityādinā darśitam । evaṃ tejaḥprabhṛtisṛṣṭerbahubhavanasaṃkalparūpatvasiddhau
tulyanyāyatayā vāyvādisṛṣṭerapi tatpūrvakatvaṃ siddhyatīti brahmaliṃgasya vyāpakatvamanu-
saṃdheyam । <quote>‘nanu bhūtānā’</quote> mityādiśaṃkāparihārau spaṣṭau । śrutyaṃtarādhyāhārāditi ।
śrutyaṃtaraśrutaguṇopasaṃhārādityarthaḥ । atharvaśikhāvacanāni prathamādhyāye vyākhyātāni ।।

<sutra>sū ।। tejo'tastathā hyāha ।। 10 ।। āpaḥ ।। 11 ।। pṛthivī ।। 12 ।। adhikārarūpaśabdāntarebhyaḥ ।। 13 ।।
tadabhidhyānādeva tu talliṅgātsaḥ ।। 14 ।।</sutra>

<head>iti tejo'dhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām atha tejo'dhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। tejo'tastathā hyāha ।। 10 ।। āpaḥ ।। 11 ।। pṛthivī ।। 12 ।। adhikārarūpaśabdāntarebhyaḥ
।। 13 ।। tadabhidhyānādeva tu talliṅgātsaḥ ।। 14 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvatra sāmānyātsāmānyotpattirmābhūt । iha sāmānyādbrahmaṇo viśeṣasya tejasa utpattirastviti
pratyadāharaṇasaṃgatyedamāha—<pratika>tejo'ta ityādi</pratika> । <quote>‘vāyoragniḥ’</quote> iti tejaso vāyujanyatvapratipādakataittirīyaśruteḥ <quote>‘tattejo'-
sṛjate’</quote>ti tejaso brahmajanyatvapratipādakacchāndogyaśrutyā virodho'sti na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । virodho'stīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhā-
ntastu</pratika>, vāyorapi brahmakāryatvena tejaḥ pratyupādānatvāsaṃbhavādbrahmamātrajanyatvaṃ tejasa ityavirodha ityekadeśimatam । svamate tu,
<pratika>tejaḥ</pratika>=agniḥ । <pratika>ataḥ</pratika>=asmādvāyorjāyate । <pratika>hi</pratika>=yataḥ । <pratika>tathā</pratika>=vāyujanyatvam । <quote>‘vāyoragni’</quote> riti śruti<pratika>rāha</pratika> ।
vāyorbrahmajanyatvena vāyubhāvāpannabrahmajanyatvasya chāndogyaśrutyarthasyaiva <quote>‘vāyoragni’</quote> riti śrutyarthatvenaikārthatvādavirodha iti ।।</p>
<head>iti bhagavatpādamate tejo'dhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<head>atha abadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। āpaḥ ।। 11 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘atastathā hyāhe’</quote> tyanuvartate । <quote>‘agnerāpaḥ’</quote> iti śruteḥ <quote>‘tadapo'sṛjate’</quote> tyapāṃ brahmajanyatvaśrutyā
virodho'sti na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ ।</pratika> virodho'stīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।</pratika> apāmagnidāhyatvānna tajjanyatvamityavirodha ityekadeśimatam ।
<pratika>paramasiddhāntastu, āpaḥ</pratika> atastejaso jāyante । <pratika>hi</pratika>=yasmāt । <pratika>tathā</pratika>=tejojanyatvaṃ <quote>‘agnerāpa’</quote> iti śruti-
<pratika>rāha</pratika> । ataḥ pūrvavattejobhāvāpannabrahmajanyatvenānayoraikārthyānna virodha iti ।। <pratika>ityabadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha pṛthivyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। pṛthivyadhikārarūpaśabdāntarebhyaḥ ।। 12 ।।</pratika> atra <quote>‘adbha‍yaḥ pṛthivī’</quote> iti pṛthivyā abjanyatvaśruteḥ
<quote>‘tā annamasṛjanta’</quote> ityannasyābjanyatvaśrutyā virodho'sti na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । annaśabdasyodanādau prasiddhatvena pṛthivī-
vācakatvābhāvādvirodha iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, pṛthivye</pratika>vātrānnaśabdenocyate । na odanādi । kutaḥ । <pratika>adhikāra-
rūpaśabdāntarebhyaḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘tattejo'sṛjate’</quote> ti mahābhūtotpattyadhikārāt <quote>‘yatkṛṣṇaṃ tadannasya’</quote> iti pṛthivītvajñāpakakṛṣṇarūpasya
śravaṇāt <quote>‘adbhyaḥ pṛthivī’</quote>iti pṛthivyā eva tajjanyatvapratipādakaśabdāntaraṃsya sattvācca । ato'nayoraikārthyenaikavākyatvādavirodha
iti siddham । <pratika>iti pṛthivyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।। atha tadabhidhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</pratika></p>
<p>itthamutpattikrameṇa mahābhūtaśrutīnāmavirodhaḥ pratyapādi । adhunā tāni bhūtānyāśrityānyadvicāryate—<pratika>sū ।। tadabhi-
dhyānādeva tu talliṅgātsaḥ ।। 13 ।।</pratika> atra brahmaṇassarvasṛṣṭikartṛtvapratipādakaśruteḥ bhūtānāṃ bhautikasraṣṭṛtvapratipādaka-
śrutyā virodho'sti na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘ākāśādvāyu’</quote> rityādinā bhūtānāṃ svasvakāryotpattau svātantryaśravaṇāttatpratipāda-
kaśrutyā virodho'stīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, sa eva</pratika> parameśvaraḥ <pratika>tatta</pratika>tkāryagocarekṣaṇātmakā<pratika>bhidhyānā</pratika>devekṣitā
bhūtādhiṣṭhātā tattatkāryaṃ sṛjati । kasmāt । <pratika>talliṃgāt</pratika>=tasya paramātmanassarvaniyantṛttvarūpaliṅgasya ‘yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan,
ityādiṣu śrutatvāt । ato bhūtānāṃ parameśvarādhiṣṭhitānāmeva sraṣṭṛtvapratipādakatvenānayorekavākyatvādavirodha iti ।।</p>
<head>iti bhagavatpādamate tadabhidhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, <quote>‘pṛthivī’</quote> iti yogavibhāgo dṛśyate । <quote>‘tejo'ta’</quote> ityādisūtrapañcakātmakamidamekamadhikaraṇam । <pratika><quote>‘tejo'ta’</quote></pratika>
ityādikaṃ sūtracatuṣṭayaṃ pūrvapakṣatayā vyākhyāya <quote>‘tadabhidhyānā’</quote> diti sūtraṃ siddhāntatayā vyākhyātam । atrādhikaraṇe vāyvā-
dikāryaṃ sākṣādbrahmaṇa utpadyate vā uta svasvapūrvakāraṇādvā iti <pratika>saṃdehe</pratika> svasvapūrvakāraṇādeveti <pratika>pūrvapakṣa</pratika>pratipādakatayā sūtrāṇi
trīṇi vyākhyāya annaśabdasya pṛthivīparatvaṃ <quote>‘adhikārarūpe’</quote>ti sūtreṇa ca vyavasthāpya <quote>‘tadabhidhyānādeve’</quote>ti sūtreṇa tattaccharīraḥ
paramātmaiva teṣāṃ kāraṇamiti siddhāntitam । atra mate yadyapi saṃdehapūrvapakṣādikaṃ pūrvasmādaviśiṣṭam । tathāpi etāni sūtrāṇi
pṛthakpṛthagbhinnādhikaraṇatayā vyākhyātāni śāṃkaramate, atra tu ekīkṛtyaikādhikaraṇyamupapāditamiti viśeṣaḥ ।।</p>
<p>atra <quote>‘tadabhidhyanādeve’</quote>ti sūtrasya <quote>‘tatteja aikṣata’</quote>tā āpa aikṣante’ tyādibahubhavanasaṃkalparūpātparamātmaliṅgatparamātmana
eva tattaccharīrakātsarvotpattirityarthaḥ । sadāśivādipaṃcabhūtātmakapaṃcabrahmaśarīrakātparamaśivādeva tattatkāraṇarūpāttattatkāryotpatti-
rityarthādhikyamapi nirūpitamiti rāmānujabhāṣyādviśeṣaḥ ।।</p>
<pb n="135"/>
atha pāraṃparyādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
<sutra>sū॰ ।। pāraṃparyeṇa kramo'ta upapadyate ca ।। 15 ।।</sutra>
iha pūrvādhikaraṇe nirūpitaḥ sṛṣṭikrama upapadyate na veti saṃdehaḥ ।।
nopapadyata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । tathā hi—muṇḍakopaniṣadi <quote>‘etasmājjāyate prāṇo
manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca । khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ prathivī viśvasya dhāriṇī ।।’</quote>
iti prāṇādīnāṃ viyadādibhyaḥ pūrvamutpattiḥ śrūyate । atharvaśikhāyāṃ ca
<quote>‘brahmaviṣṇurudrendrāste saṃprasūyante sarvāṇi cendriyāṇi saha bhūtaiḥ’</quote> iti sahotpa-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha pāraṃparyādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>pāramparyeṇa kramo'ta upapadyate ca ।। 15 ।।</pratika> saṃgatipūrvakaṃ saṃśayaṃ darśayati—<pratika>iheti</pratika> ।
ākāśaśarīrakādbrahmaṇo vāyvādyutpattisamarthanādākāśādikrameṇa sṛṣṭirityāpi pūrvādhi-
karaṇena siddham । tadupapadyate na vetyuktakramakramāṃtarākramaśrutivirodhasamādhānasaṃbhavāsaṃ-
bhavābhyāṃ saṃśaye sati na saṃbhavati tatsamādhānamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । tathāhi—avicalastā-
vadākāśādikramaḥ pūrvādhikaraṇasiddhaḥ । muṇḍakopaniṣanmaṃtre prāṇāntaḥkaraṇeṃdriyabhūtānāṃ
kramo vivakṣita iti jñāyate । <quote>‘khaṃ vāyurjyoti’</quote> rityādyuttarārdhe tatkramapratyabhijñārūpālliṃgā-
diti । so'pyavicala eva । akramastu atharvaśikhāyāṃ tu sahaśrutyaiva spaṣṭīkṛtaḥ । ataḥ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>rāmānujamate tu</pratika> atrāsti kaścidviśeṣaśśrīkaṇṭhamatāt । yathā—śrīkaṇṭhamate adhikaraṇadvayatayā vibhaktamuparitanaṃ sūtratra-
yamapyatra<quote>‘tadabhidhyānādeve’</quote>ti siddhāntasūtropaṣṭaṃbhakatayā tejo'dhikaraṇaśeṣatvenāntarbhāvitamiti tāni trīṇi sūtrāṇyatraiva vyākhyā-
yante—yathā—<pratika>sū ।। viparyayeṇa tu kramo'ta upapadyate ca ।। 15 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘ākāśādvāyuḥ’</quote> vāyoragni’riti pāraṃparyakramā-
<pratika>dviparyayeṇa</pratika><quote>‘etasmājjāyate prāṇa’</quote> iti sarveṣāṃ brahmānantaryarūpo yaḥ <pratika>kramaḥ</pratika> sa ca <pratika>ataḥ</pratika>=tattaccharīrakādbrahmaṇassṛṣṭe<pratika>rupapadyate</pratika> ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। antarā vijñānamanasī krameṇa talliṃgāditi cennāviśeṣāt ।। 16 ।।</pratika> <pratika>antarā</pratika>=bhūtaprāṇayorantarāle
<pratika>indriyagrāmamanasī</pratika> krameṇotpadyete । kutaḥ । <pratika>talliṃgāt</pratika>=<quote>‘khaṃ vāyurjyoti’</quote>riti śrutikramapratyabhijñānarūpāttaṃlliṃgāt । <pratika>iti cet</pratika>=
ata idamapi pāraṃparyakramaparamiti cet । <pratika>na । aviśeṣāt</pratika>=<quote>‘etasmājjāyate’</quote> ityasya prāṇādipṛthivyanteṣu sarveṣu pratyekama-
nyayāviśeṣāt । atastejaḥprabhṛtīnāmapi sākṣātparamātmaiva kāraṇam ।।</p>
<p><quote>‘tatteja ekṣate’</quote>tyāditejaḥ prabhṛtiśabdāḥ loke tattadvastuvācinaḥ brahmaṇi bhāktā ityatrāha—<pratika>sū ।। carācaravyapāśrayastu
syāttadvyapadeśo'bhāktastadbhāvabhāvitvāt ।। 17 ।। carācaravastusaṃbandhī tattadvācī śabdo</pratika> brahmaṇi abhāktaḥ
mukhya eva । <quote>‘anena jīvene’</quote>ti sarvasya vastuno nāmarūpabhāktvasyātmatayā <pratika>brahmānupraveśabhāvabhāvitvāt । ityarthaḥ ।।</pratika></p>
<head>iti rāmānujamate tejo'dhikaraṇam ।।</head>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, atrāpi śāṃkaramatavadevādhikaraṇavibhāgaḥ । sūtrārthavarṇane paramasti kiṃcidiva vailakṣaṇyam । yathā-
<pratika>tejo'tastathā hyāha ।। 10 ।। tejaḥ</pratika>=tejobhūtam । <pratika>ataḥ</pratika>=brahmaṇa evotpadyate na vāyoḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>hi</pratika>=yasmāt । <quote>‘tatteja’</quote>
iti śrutiḥ । <pratika>tathā</pratika>=ukraprakāreṇa <pratika>āha</pratika>=vakti । tasmādityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti tejo'dhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। āpaḥ ।। 11 ।।</pratika> atrāpi <quote>‘atastathā hyāhe’</quote>tyanuvartate । sūtrārthaḥ pūrvasūtravat । atra <pratika>śrutiḥ</pratika>=brahmaivedamiti śrutirityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>ityabadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। pṛthivyadhikārarūpaśabdāntarādibhyaḥ ।। 12 ।।</pratika> atra mate <quote>‘śabdāntarādibhya’</quote> iti pāṭhaḥ । idamadhikara-
ṇamapyaviśiṣṭaṃ śāṃkaramatāt । <pratika>pṛthivī</pratika>=pṛthivyeva <quote>‘tā annamasṛjante’</quote>tiśrutisthānnaśabdenocyate na prasiddhānnam । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>adhikāraśabditabhūtaprakaraṇāt</pratika> <pratika>rūpa</pratika>śabdoktakṛṣṇarūpasya ca śravaṇāt <quote>‘pṛthivī vā anna’</quote> miti <pratika>śrutiviśeṣā</pratika>ccetyarthaḥ । apauruṣe-
yatvenādoṣasya vākyasya nāprāmāṇyamityādirādiśabdārthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti pṛthivyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। tadabhidhyānādeva tu talliṅgātsaḥ ।। 13 ।।</pratika> atra jagatsraṣṭurviṣṇossaṃhartṛtvamasti vā na veti <pratika>saṃdehe</pratika> <quote>‘prāṇānāṃ
granthirasi rudro māviśāntakaḥ ।’</quote> iti śrutyā rudrasyaivāntakatvaśravaṇātpiturloke saṃhārakatvāyogācca na viṣṇussaṃhartā kiṃ tu
rudra eveti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika> viṣṇureva saṃhartā na rudraḥ । iti । tuśabdo'vadhāraṇe । abhidhyānaśabdenecchocyate ।
tacchabdena viṣṇurguhyate । tathā ca <pratika>sa</pratika> viṣṇureva saṃhārakartā na rudraḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>tadabhidhyānāt</pratika>=<quote>‘tadabhidhyānā’</quote>diti śrutyaktā-
dabhidhyānarūpaśabdajñāpitasaṃjihīrṣāviśeṣitādanādibandhasaṃhārecchārūpā<pratika>ttarlliṃgādeva</pratika> । evakārastu bhāṣyarītyā kimu śrutibhya
iti kaimutyasūcakaḥ । nirdoṣe viṣṇau laukikapitṛnyāyo nāvataratīti bhāvaḥ ।। <pratika>iti tadabhidhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="136"/>
<p>ttirbrahmādīnāṃ bhūtendriyāṇāṃ cāmnāyate । ata ākāśādeḥ pūrvoktasṛṣṭikramo
nopapadyata ityucyate ।
siddhāntastu—upapannaḥ pūrvoktasṛṣṭikramaḥ । <quote>‘annamayaṃ hi somya mana āpomayaḥ
prāṇaḥ tejomayī vāk’</quote> iti prāṇādīnāṃ bhautikatvaśravaṇāt bhūteṣvantarbhāvānna
pṛthakkramāpekṣā । brahmādīnāṃ sahotpattistu bhūtaistadrūpatvāt teṣvantarbhāvāt ।
tataḥ pūrvoktakrame na virodhaḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। antarā vijñānamanasī krameṇa talliṅgāditi cennāviśeṣāt ।। 16 ।।</sutra>
prāṇabhūtānāmindriyagrāmamanasī krameṇāntarā utpadyete iti hīdaṃ vākyaṃ prati-
pādayati । <quote>‘khaṃ vāyurjyotiḥ’</quote> ityādau śrutyantarasiddhakramapratyabhijñānarūpālliṅgāt ।
tata idamapi pāraṃparyakramaparamiti cet—na, <quote>‘etasmājjāyate’</quote> ityasya prāṇādipṛ-
thivyanteṣu sarveṣu pratyekamanvayāviśeṣāt । ataḥ sarveṣāmīśvara eva kāraṇam ।
tathā । ca paurāṇikī phaṇitiḥ---
<quote>‘śaktyādi ca pṛthivyantaṃ śivatattvasamudbhavam ।
tenaikena tu tadvyāptaṃ mṛdā kumbhādikaṃ yathā ।।’</quote> iti ।
kramasadbhāvo'pi sarvasya śivatattvādutpattimabhidhatte । ataḥ sarvakāraṇaṃ brahmeti
samīcīnam ।। iti pāraṃparyādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kathaṃ virodhasamādhānamityevaṃ prāpte siddhāṃtaḥ—<quote>‘ātmana ākāśa’</quote> ityādisṛjyapāraṃparyeṇa
yaḥ kramassa upapadyate । ataḥ pūrvasūtroditāttadabhidhyānāt । pārameś‍varabahubhavanasaṃkalpa-
rūpābhidhyānānuvartanāvagamitaṃ hi pūrvapūrvabhūtaśarīrakasyaiva parameśvarasyottarottarabhūtasra-
ṣṭṛtvamityetanna vicālayituṃ śakyam । sati ca prabalena tena virodhe sahaśrutirbhūtādyutpatte-
stadabhimānibrahmādyutpattisāhityamātraparatayā yojanīyā । muṇḍakopaniṣanmaṃtrapāṭhakramaśco-
pekṣaṇīyaḥ । kiṃ ca । pāṭhakrameṇāpekṣitakramaḥ kalpanīyaḥ । na cātra kramāpekṣāsti । bhauti-
kānāṃ prāṇamanaiṃdriyāṇāṃ bhūtānantaryarūpasya kramāntarasyārthānirjñātatvādarthapāṭhayorarthasya
prabalatvāditi । anena sūtraṃ bhāṣyaṃ ca vyākhyātam । vivakṣitabhūtakramapratyabhijñānaliṃgāt
tatsahapaṭhitaprāṇādikramo vivakṣito'vasīyata iti śaṃkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>sū ।। anta-
rā vijñānamanasī krameṇa talliṃgāditi cennāviśeṣāt ।। 16 ।।</pratika> krameṇa manaiṃdri-
yakrameṇa । antarā prāṇabhūtamadhye । nanu chāṃdogyataittirīyayoḥ pūrvapūrvaviśiṣṭasya brahmaṇaḥ
uttarottarabhūtakāraṇatvaṃ pāṭhakramāvagatamākāśādyutpattikramamantareṇa nopapadyata iti cet sa tatra
vivakṣito'stu nām । iha tu nāsti tasya vivakṣāyāṃ pramāṇam । pāṭhakramātpratīyamānasyeva
pratyabhijñānaliṃgātpratīyamānasyāpi tasyāvivakṣaiva yuktā । arthataḥ kramāṃtarasya nirjñāta-
tvādityāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>idamapīti</pratika> । chaṃdogādivākyavadidamapi kramaparameva । manaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ
parigaṇanasya prayojanāṃtarābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ । <pratika>anvayāviśeṣāditi</pratika> । tathā ca prāṇa-
syeva manaḥprabhṛtīnāmapi kīrtanaṃ brahmakāryatvapratipādanārthamityasiddhaḥ prayojanāṃtarābhāva
iti bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘atassarveṣā’</quote> mityādiretatsūtrārthopasaṃhārārthaḥ । adhikaraṇārthopasaṃhārastvartha-
siddhaḥ । <pratika>iti pāramparyādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="137"/>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām atha pāramparyādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। pāraṃparyeṇa kramo'ta upapadyate ca ।। 15 ।। antarā vijñānamanasī krameṇa talliṃgāditi cennā-
viśeṣāt ।। 16 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>prāṇasyādāvathāntaḥkaraṇakhagaṇayorantato bhūtapaṃkteḥ saṃprajñātakramāyā yajuṣi samudayo muṇḍake pratyapādi ।</l>
<l>ātharvaṇyāṃ śikhāyāṃ yugapadabhidadhe janma bhūteṃdriyāṇāmitthaṃ vaimatyasatve kathamanumanuṣe sṛṣṭimākāśamukhyām ।। 136 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>prāṇādyāḥ prāgayante na kathamapi janiṃ bhautikā bhūtavargāt tasmādākāśamukhyaḥ krama iti ghaṭate na kramaḥ prāṇamukhyaḥ ।</l>
<l>sarveṣāṃ brahmajatvaṃ vidadhati ca manau na kramārthatvaśaṃkā brahmādīnāṃ śikhāyāṃ sahajaniruditā kṣmādibhirneṃdriyāṇām ।। 137 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti pāramparyādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacaṃdrikāyām atha pāraṃparyādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। pāraṃparyeṇa tu kramo'ta upapadyate ca ।। 15 ।। antarāvijñānamanasī krameṇa talliṃgāditi cennā-
viśeṣāt ।। 16 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvādhikaraṇairbhūtānāmutpattikrame cintite layakramasya buddhisthatvātso'tra prasaṃgādvicāryata ityāha—<pratika>vipa-
ryayeṇa kramo'ta upapadyate ca ।। 16 ।।</pratika> iha bhūtānāṃ śrutotpattikrameṇaiva layakramo vā, uta sopānaparaṃparārūḍhasya vyutkrameṇāva-
rohaṇavadva‍yutkrameṇaiva layakramo veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । kalpyāpekṣayā klṛptasya laghutvāt śrutotpattikrameṇaiveti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhā-
ntastu, ataḥ</pratika>=sṛṣṭikramāt । <pratika>viparyayeṇa tu</pratika>=viparītakrameṇaiva । <pratika>kramaḥ</pratika>=layakramaḥ । <pratika>upapadyate ca</pratika>=yujyate । svakāraṇe
kāryāṇāṃ layadarśanāditi bhāvaḥ । itarathā sati kārye kāraṇanāśaḥ syāt । taccāniṣṭamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti bhagavatpādamate viparyayādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<head>athāntarāvijñānādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। antarā vijñānamanasī krameṇa talliṃgāditi cennāviśeṣāt ।। 16 ।।</pratika> iha bhūtotpattilayakramavicārasa-
maprayojanatvātkaraṇotpattikramaṃ vicārayati—pūrvoktakramaḥ karaṇotpattikrameṇa virudhyate na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘etasmājjāyate prāṇo
manassarvendriyāṇi ca । khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivī’</quote> iti muṇḍakavākyoktena bhūtānāmātmanaścāntarāle indriyabuddhimanāṃsi
tebhyaśca bhūtāni jāyante ityanena krameṇa pūrvoktakramo virudhyate । kutaḥ । tatsṛṣṭigamakālliṃgāditi cet । iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।
siddhāntastu, nāviśeṣāt</pratika> । iṃdriyabuddhimanasāṃ bhautikatvena bhūtotpattikramādindriyādyutpattikramasyāviśeṣāt yena krameṇa
bhūtotpattistenaiva krameṇa bhautikotpattirityato na viruddhyata iti । <quote>‘etasmājjāyate’</quote> ityādiśrutiśca sarveṣāmātmanassakāśādutpa-
ttimātraṃ brūte na kramamiti bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘annamayaṃ hi somya mana āpomayaḥ prāṇastejomayī vāk’</quote> ityādikaṃ vākyaṃ karaṇānāṃ
bhautikatve liṃgamiti bodhyam ।।</p>
<head>।। iti bhagavatpādamate antarāvijñānādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, idaṃ sūtradvayamapi pāraṃparyādhikaraṇamiti vyapadiśyate । iha pūrvādhikaraṇe nirūpita ākāśādisṛṣṭikrama upa-
padyate na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । uktakramasya kramāntaraśrutyakramaśrutibhyāṃ virodhānnopapadyata iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika> <quote>‘annamayaṃ
hi somya mana āpomayaḥ prāṇastejomayī vāk’</quote> iti prāṇādīnāṃ bhautikatvaśravaṇena teṣvantarbhāvāt kramāntarapratipādinyā
muṇḍakopaniṣaduktāyā<quote>‘etasmājjāyate prāṇa’</quote>ityādiśruterupekṣaṇīyatvāt brahmādīnāṃ ca bhūtābhimānitvena teṣvantarbhāvātsahaśrute-
rbrahmādyutpattisāhityamātraparatayā yojanīyatvācca । <pratika>ataḥ</pratika>=pūrvasūtroditāttadabhidhyānācca tābhyāṃ virodhābhāvātpūrvapūrvabhūtaśarīra-
kasyaiva parameś‍varasyottarottarabhūtastraṣṭatvamityuktakrama upapadyata iti ।।</p>
<p>nanu, muṇḍakavākye vivakṣitabhūtakramapratyabhijñānāttatsahapaṭhitaprāṇādikramo vivakṣito'stvityāśaṃkya pariharati—<pratika>anta-
rā vijñānetyādinā । krameṇa</pratika>=manaiṃdriyakrameṇa । <pratika>antarā</pratika>=prāṇabhūtamadhye । <pratika>vijñānamanasī</pratika>=indriyamanasī utpadyete ।
kutaḥ । <pratika>talliṃgāt</pratika>=<quote>‘khaṃ vāyurjyoti’</quote>rityādau śrutyantarasiddhakramapratyabhijñānarūpālliṃgāt । <pratika>iti cet</pratika>=idaṃ muṇḍakavākya-
mapi kramaparamiti cet । <pratika>na । aviśeṣāt</pratika>=<quote>‘etasmājjāyate’</quote> ityasya prāṇādipṛthivyanteṣu sarveṣu pratyekamanvayāviśeṣāt ।
ataḥ sarvakāraṇaṃ brahmeti siddham । asminmate<quote>‘pāraṃparyeṇa tu krama’</quote>iti sūtrapāṭhe viśeṣaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, anayossūtrayoruparitanasūtrasya ca <quote>‘tadabhidhyānādeve’</quote>ti pūrvādhikaraṇasiddhāntasūtraśeṣatvena pūrvā-
dhikaraṇāntarbhāvitatayā pūrvatra tadvivaraṇaṃ kṛtamityato nātra punarvivaraṇāvakāśa iti vedyam । sūtrapāṭhastu śāṃkaramatavadevātra mate ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, adhikaraṇaracanāsaṃdehapūrvapakṣasiddhāntānāṃ śāṃkaramatasādhāraṇye'pi sūtrārthanirūpaṇe paramasti kiya-
diva vailakṣaṇyamiti tanmātraṃ nirūpyate—<pratika>sū ।। viparyayeṇa tu kramo'ta upapadyate ca ।। 15 ।।</pratika> tuśabdo'vadhāraṇe । ata
ityāvartate । <pratika>ataḥ</pratika>=utpattikramāt <pratika>viparyayeṇa</pratika>=vaiparītyena । <pratika>kramaḥ</pratika>=layakramaḥ na tūtpattikrameṇa । kutaḥ । <pratika>atastu</pratika>=vyu-
tkramādvilayaścaive’tibhāllaveyaśrutiviśeṣādeva । kiṃca । <pratika>upapadyate ca</pratika>=yujyate cāyaṃ vyutkramaḥ । kutaḥ । pūrvotpannānāmuttarotpannebhyo
bhagavatsannidhānakṛtādhikasāmarthyena teṣāmadhikakālāvasthānasya yuktatvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti viparyayādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<pb n="138"/>
atha carācaravyapāśrayādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। carācaravyapāśrayastu syāt tadvyapadeśo'bhāktastadbhāvabhāvitvāt ।। 17 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatrākāśādiśabdavācyatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ pratipāditam । tadiha vicāryate---
cetanācetanacarācaravastusaṃbandhī tadvāciśabdo brahmaṇi mukhyo na vā ?
iti saṃdehe na mukhya iti vadāmaḥ—anyavācakaśabdasya mukhyatayānyatra vṛttya-
bhāvāt । tathā hi—<quote>‘ādityo yūpaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ’</quote> ityādiṣu yūpāderādi-
tyādiśabdavācyatvaṃ sārūpyādiguṇasaṃbandhādeva dṛśyate, na mukhyatvena । atrāpi
<quote>‘tatteja aikṣata’</quote> ityādiṣu tejaḥprabhṛtīnāmacetanānāṃ cetanadharmekṣitṛtvāyogāt
tacchabdaistadāśritaṃ cetanaṃ brahma lakṣyate, <quote>‘mañcāḥ krośantī’</quote>tyādivat । tasmādā-
kāśādiśabdavācyatvaṃ brahmaṇi tadāśraye gauṇamiti ।।
evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ—carācaravastusaṃbandhī tadvyapadeśaśabdo brahmaṇi na bhāktaḥ, kiṃtu
mukhya eva । <quote>‘teṣāṃ khalveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ trīṇyeva bījāni bhavanti । aṇḍajaṃ jīva-
jamudbhijjamiti । seyaṃ devataikṣata hantāhamimāstisro devatā anena jīvenātma-
nānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi’</quote>iti sarvasya vastuno nāmarūpavibhāgāyatatta-
dātmatayā brahmaṇo'nupraveśabhāvabhāvitatvāt । yūpādīnāmādityādiśabdavācya-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha carācaravyapāśrayādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। carācaravyapāśrayastu syāttadvyapadeśo'bhāktastadbhāvabhāvitvāt ।। 17 ।।</pratika>
saṃgatipūrvakaṃ saṃśayaṃ darśayati—<pratika>pūrvatreti</pratika> । <quote>‘tejo'ta’</quote> ityadhikaraṇe sṛṣṭivākyagatākāśā-
diśabdapratipādyatvaṃ brahmaṇa uktam । tanmukhyamamukhyaṃ veti vyutpattisaṃbhavāsaṃbhavābhyāṃ
saṃśayaḥ । ākāśādiśabdānāṃ vyutpattigrahasya bhūtaviśeṣādiparyavasitatvāttato'nyasya
vrahmaṇastatpratipādyatvamamukhyamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāṃtastu carācarasaṃbandhī tadvācakatvena
lokāvadhṛto yastadvyapadeśaḥ brahmaṇi pravartamānaśśabdassa brahmaṇi abhāktaḥ amukhyo na
bhavati । kiṃ tu mukhya eva । kutaḥ । tadbhāvabhāvitvāt tasya brahmaṇo yo bhāvaḥ carācara-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
atrādhikaraṇe uttarasūtramapyantarbhāvyaikādhikaraṇyenādhikaraṇaracanāsminmate । atra vijñānatattvamanastattvayorapi pūrvoktaḥ
sṛṣṭikramādviparītakrameṇa layakramo vā sṛṣṭikramānusāreṇa layakramo veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ । vijñānamanasī</pratika>=vijñānatattvamanastattve ।
<pratika>antarā</pratika>=vinā । <pratika>krameṇa</pratika>=pūrvoktakrameṇānyeṣāṃ laya upapadyate । kutaḥ । <pratika>talliṃgāt</pratika>=<quote>‘manasaśca vijñānam’</quote><quote>‘yacchedvāṅganasī
prājñastadyacchedajñāna’</quote>iti śrutyuktātkramādutpannayoḥ kramāllayākhyaliṃgā<pratika>diti cet</pratika> iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, na</pratika> tathā ।
kutaḥ । <pratika>aviśeṣāt</pratika>=vijñānamanastattvayoryathotpatti laya ityatra viśeṣapramāṇābhāvāt । <quote>‘vijñānamanasoḥ krameṇe’</quote>ti vācye
<quote>‘antare’</quote>tyuktistaddvayādanyoṣāṃ vyutkrameṇa laya ityarthānumatiṃ sūcayitum । uktaṃ liṃgameva tatra mānamityāha—<pratika>sū ।। carācaravya-
pāśrayastu syāttadvayapadeśo bhāktastadbhāvabhāvitvāt ।। 16 ।। tadvyapadeśastu</pratika>=<quote>‘manasaśca vijñāna’</quote>miti manovi-
jñānaśabdarūpaḥ śrautavyavahārastu । <pratika>carācaravyapāśrayaḥ syāt</pratika>=indriyatadva‍ṛttitattvaviṣayassaṃbhāvitaḥ । tathāpi saḥ <pratika>bhāktaḥ</pratika>=
indriyamanastattvarūpamanaśśabdārthe tadva‍ṛttivijñānatattvarūpavijñānaviṣaya eva na tu tattvaviṣaya ityarthaḥ । bhāgavācino bhaktaśabdā-
ttasyedamityaṇi bhāktaśabdo niṣpanno bhāgaviṣaya ityarthaka iti yāvat । kutaḥ । <pratika>tadbhāvabhāvitvāt</pratika>=taditi padasyātra taṃtreṇa
nirdeśaḥ । tasmin carācaraśabditacetanācetanaviṣaye tadbhāvena manobhāvena ālocaneneti yāvat । <pratika>bhāvitvāt</pratika>=vṛttirūpajñāna-
syotpadyamānatvādityarthaḥ । tathā ca<quote>‘manaso vijñāna’</quote>mityuktirvastuni manobhāvena vṛtterjāyamānatvātmanorūpeṃdriyatajjanyavṛttivi-
vayā na tattvaviṣayeti na talliṃgamiti bhāvaḥ ।। <pratika>ityānandatīrthamate'ntarāvijñānādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="139"/>
tvamanupapat‍tyā na mukhyam । mañcādiṣu puruṣāṇāmavasthātṛmātratvāt teṣāmapi
tacchabdavācyatvaṃ na mukhyam । ihātmatayā prapañcānupraveśādbrahmaṇastacchabdavā-
cyatvaṃ mukhyameva, yathā''nmano brāhmaṇādiśarīrānupraviṣṭasya brāhmaṇādiśabda-
vācyatvaṃ mukhyam । anyathā <quote>‘aṣṭavarṣaṃ brāhmaṇamupanayīta’</quote> ityādiṣūpanayanasaṃskārādeḥ
śarīramātraparyavasānādātmanaḥ saṃskāryatvābhāvaprasaṅgāt । tato <quote>‘yasyaite catvā-
riṃśatsaṃskārā aṣṭau cātmaguṇāḥ sa brahmaṇaḥ sāyujyam’</quote> ityādirātmanaḥ saṃskā-
ravataḥ phalaśrutirapārthā bhavet । <quote>‘brāhmaṇo yajeta’</quote> ityādividhivaiyyarthyaṃ ca bhavet ।
tasmāt sakalacarācaravastuśarīrapraviṣṭasya brahmaṇastacchabdavācyatvaṃ mukhyameva ।।
<head>iti carācaravyapāśrayādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vastuṣvātmatayā sadbhāvastenaiva hi hetunā bhavati । na hyādityaśabdo yūpa iva tadātmatāmana-
pekṣya brahmaṇi carācaravastuvāciśabdaḥ pravartate । <quote>‘anena jīvene’</quote> tyādiśrutyā brahmaṇaśca-
rācaravastvātmatayā tadanupraveśahetukatayaiva carācaravastusaṃbadhināmarūpavyākaraṇasya brahma-
paryaṃtatāyāḥ pratipādanāt । tadvāciśabdasya tadātmatāmapekṣyānyatra pravṛttau tu mukhyatvameva
bhavati । śarīravāciśabdānāṃ śarīriparyaṃtatvasya vyutpattisiddhatvāt । ata eva <quote>‘brāhmaṇa-
mupanayīta’</quote> <quote>‘brāhmaṇo yajeta’</quote> ityādiśrutiṣu brāhmaṇādiśabdānāmātmaparyaṃtatvamiti । niga-
davyākhyānamasya bhāṣyam ।। iti carācaravyapāśrayādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha carācaravyapāśrayādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। carācaravyapāśrayastu syāttadvyapadeśo'bhāktastadbhāvabhāvitvāt ।। 17 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>tejaḥprabhṛtipadaistadvyapadeśo bhākta ityucitam । yajamānaḥ prastara ityādinayādvācyabhinnatvāt ।। 138 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>bhākto na nāmarūpavyākaraṇaṃ hi svaparyayanam । śrutyoditaṃ tatastadvācyaṃ tatsarvaśabdānām ।। 139 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti carācaravyapāśrayādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām ।</head>
<head>atha carācaravyapāśrayādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। carācaravyapāśrayastu syāttadvyapadeśo'bhāktastadbhāvabhāvitvāt ।। 17 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, atra <quote>‘na jīvo mriyate’</quote> iti jīvanityatvaśāstrasya jīvotpattināśanimittakajāteṣṭyādiśāstreṇa
virodho'sti na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । devadatto jāto mṛtaśceti laukikavyapadeśānugṛhītajātakarmādiśāstreṇa virodho'stīti
<pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, tadvyapadeśaḥ</pratika>=yo'yaṃ laukikastayorjanmamaraṇayorvyapadeśaḥ saḥ । <pratika>carācaravyapāśrayaḥ</pratika>=sthā-
varajaṅgamadehaviṣayo mukhyaḥ syāt jīve tu bhāktaḥ । kutaḥ । janmamaraṇavyapadeśasya <pratika>tadbhāvabhāvitvāt</pratika>=dehotpattivinā-
śānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvādityarthaḥ । dehaprādurbhāvādyapekṣayaiva jātakarmādividhānamiti na tena śāsreṇa jīvanityatva-
śāstrasya virodha iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, pūrvatrākāśādiśabdāvācyatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ pratipāditam । tadiha vicāryate---cetanācetanacarācaravastu-
saṃbandhī tadvāciśabdo brahmaṇi mukhyo na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । anyavācakaśbadasya mukhyatayānyatra vṛttyabhāvādgauṇa iiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।
siddhāntastu</pratika>, carācaravastusaṃbandhī tadvyapadeśaśabdo brahmaṇi na bhāktaḥ kiṃ tu mukhya eva । <quote>‘anena jīvene’</quote> tyādinā
sarvasya vastuno nāmarūpavibhāgāya tattadātmatayā brahmaṇo'nupraveśabhāvabhāvitatvāt । tasmātsakalacarācaravastuśarīrapravi-
ṣṭasya brahmaṇastacchabdavācyatvaṃ mukhyameva ।। iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, asyāpi sūtrasya pūrva tejo'dhikaraṇāntarbhūtatayā tatraiva vyākhyātatvena nātra tatprapaṃcitamite bodhyam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīryamate</pratika>, idaṃ sūtraṃ pūrvasminnantarāvijñānādhikaraṇe'ntarbhūtaṃ tatraiva vyākhyātaṃ cetyato nātra punaḥ prapaścita-
mityavadheyam ।।</p>
<head>iti carācaravyapāśrayādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<pb n="140"/>
<p>atha ātmādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। nātmā śruternityatvācca tābhyaḥ ।। 18 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatrākāśādīnāṃ brahmaṇaḥ sākṣādutpattirabhihitā । jīvo'pi tannyāyena
brahmaṇaḥ samutpadyate na veti saṃdehaḥ ।।
samutpadyata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । <quote>‘yadā tamastanna divā na rātrirna sanna cāsacchiva
eva kevalaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘ekamevādvitīyam’</quote> ityādiśruteḥ prāksṛṣṭerbrahmaikatvāvadhāraṇāt,
sadasatorniṣedhācca । ataḥ sṛṣṭikāle brahmaṇa utpadyata eva jīvaḥ । visphuliṅga-
dṛṣṭānto'pi jīvotpattyanuguṇaḥ śrūyate <quote>‘yathāgneḥ kṣudrā visphuliṅgā vyuccaranti
evamevaitasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ sarve lokāḥ sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni sarva
evātmāno vyuccaranti’</quote> iti । tasmādyathāgnervisphuliṅgā jāyante tathā brahmaṇa
ātmāno jāyante ।।
iti pāpte brūmaḥ---ātmā na jāyate । <quote>‘na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit’</quote> iti
śruteḥ, <quote>‘nityo nityānāṃ cetanaścetanānām’</quote> <quote>‘jñājñau dvāvajāvīśānīśau’</quote> ityādi-
śrutibhyaḥ nityatvāvagateśca । sṛṣṭeḥ prāgbrahmaṇo'vadhāraṇaṃ tadākṛtibhūtasya tasya
cācidvastunaśca nāmarūpavyavahārābhāvāt, na jīvādisvarūpāsattayā । visphuliṅga-
śrutiśca teṣāṃ nāmarūpasamunmeṣābhiprāyā, na janmaparā । anyathā kṛtanāśādido-
ṣaprasaṅgāt । tasmādbrahmaṇo na jāyata eva jīvaḥ ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha ātmādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। nātmā śruternityatvācca tābhyaḥ ।। 18 ।।</pratika> ākāśādīnāṃ svarūpānyathābhāvarūpotpattau
pratipāditāyāṃ tadvajjīvasyāpi tathābhūtotpattirasti na veti śrutivipratipattyā saṃśaye sati
<pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika>—sṛṣṭeḥ prāgekatvāvadhāraṇaṃ sadasadātmakasakalavastuniṣedhaśceti liṃgābhyāṃ <quote>‘sarva
eta ātmāno vyuccaraṃtī’</quote>ti śruteśca tasyāpi tathābhūtotpattirasti । tadanutpattyādiśrutistu
ākāśāmṛtatvādiśrutivadanyathā neyeti । atra siddhāntaḥ—jīvo notpadyate । <quote>‘na jāyate
sriyate ve’</quote> tyādiśruteḥ tābhyaḥ <quote>‘nityo nityānā’</quote> mityādiśrutibhyo'vagatānnityatva-
liṃgācca । utpattiśrutistu tattaccharīropādhikatattadavacchinnabhoktṛtvānuguṇajñānavikā-
sopādhikā । anekavyāpakatvāvadhāraṇādikaṃ ca nāmarūpasamunmeṣābhāvābhiprāyaṃ yojyam ।
svarūpānyathābhāvarūpotpattyaṃgīkāre tadanityatvāvaśyaṃbhāvena <quote>‘brahmavidāpnoti para’</quote> mityā-
dipradhānaphalavākyavirodhāpatteriti । bhāṣye <quote>‘acidvastuna’</quote> iti mā1yākāryatvāpannavastvabhi-
prāyaṃ māyādyacidākārapariṇāmicicchaktirūpavastvabhiprāyaṃ vā <pratika>।। ityātmādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</pratika></p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha ātmādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। nātmā śruternityatvācca tābhyaḥ ।। 18 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>prāgekatvaśravaṇādbrahmaṇa utyadyate jīvaḥ । śravaṇādapi ca yathāgneḥ kṣudrā iti janmanasteṣām ।। 140 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>naivaṃ tannityatvāmnānātkṛtako na doṣācca । śravaṇe tu nāmarūpavyākaraṇābhāvabhāvābhyām ।। 141 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti ātmādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<note>(1) <quote>‘māyākālādinityavastvabhiprāyam । <pratika>ityātmādhikaraṇam</pratika>’</quote> <pratika>iti—kha—pāṭhaḥ ।</pratika></note>﻿
<pb n="141"/>
<head>atha jñādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। jño'ta eva ।। 19 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatra nityatayā jīvaḥ siddhaḥ । punaratrāsya svābhāvikaṃ jñānamasti na veti
sandihyate ।।
evaṃ sati pūrvapakṣaḥ—jīvasya svābhāvikaṃ jñānadharmitvaṃ nāstīti । <quote>‘jñājñau dvau’</quote>
iti jīvasyājñatvameva hi śrūyate । tasmādajña evāsau caitanyamātrarūpaḥ kiṃtu
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha jñādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p>sū॰ ।। jño'ta eva ।। 19 ।। jīvasyānutpattiḥ sthā1pitā । tatprasaṃgādanyānapi jīva-
dharmānnirūpayitumāpādaparisamāpteradhikaraṇāni । iha tāvadāgaṃtukajñānadharmo jīvaḥ uta
svābhāvikajñānadharma iti vicāryate । tatra śrutivipratipattessaṃśaye sati pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ—pari-
ṇāminityadharmajñānānyathābhāvamāśritya hi pūrvādhikaraṇe jīvotpattiśrutivirodhasamādhānaṃ
vivikṣitama । tannopapadyate । dharmajñānasyāgantukatvāt <quote>‘jñājñau dvā’</quote>vityādiśrutyā jīvasyā-
jñatvamautsargikadharmaṃ vadaṃtyā suṣuptau jñānābhāvānubhavena <quote>‘na pretya saṃjñāstī’</quote> ti tadanusāri-
śrutyaṃtareṇa cānugṛhītayā tasyāgaṃtukatvāvadhāraṇāt tena <quote>‘yo vijñāne tiṣṭhanni’</quote> tyādi-
śruteḥ jīvasvarūpe saṃdehaviparyāsayoradarśanācca । jīvasya svaprakāśacaitanyasvarūpatve'pi
asau svamātraprakāśarūpa ityahamidaṃ jānāmīti jīvāśrayatvenānubhūyamānaṃ jñānamanityameva ।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām ।</head>
<head>atha ātmādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। nātmāśruternityatvācca tābhyaḥ ।। 18 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, dehotpattināśayossatorjīvasya janmanāśābhāve'pi kalpādyantayorjīvasya janmanāśau kiṃ na syātā-
mityāśaṃkyāha---<pratika>nātmāśruteriti ।।</pratika> atra avikṛtasyaiva brahmaṇo jīvabhāvena praveśavākyasya <quote>‘sarva eta ātmano
vyuccaranti’</quote> iti parasmādātmano jīvotpattivākyena virodho'sti na veti saṃdehaḥ । virodho'stīti <pratika>pūrvaḥpakṣaḥ । siddhā-
ntastu, ātmā</pratika>=jīvaḥ । <pratika>na</pratika>=notpadyate । kutaḥ । <pratika>aśruteḥ</pratika>=utpattiprakaraṇeṣu jīvotpatteraśruteḥ । <pratika>tāmyaḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘sa vā eṣa
mahānaja ātmā’</quote> <quote>‘ajo nityaḥ’</quote> ityādiśrutibhyaḥ । <pratika>nityatvācca</pratika>=jīvasya nityatvāvagamāccetyarthaḥ ।। aupādhikajanmālaṃbanaṃ
jīvajanivākyamiti na tena praveśavākyasya virodha iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, pūrvatra brahmaṇa ākāśādīnāmutpattirabhihitā । tannyāyenātra jīvo brahmaṇassamutpadyate na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ ।
pūrvapakṣasiddhāntau</pratika> yadyapi śāṃkaramatādaviśiṣṭau । tathāpi sūtrārthavarṇanaṃ bhidyate । tathā ca <quote>‘yadā tamaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘ekamevādvitīyam’</quote>
ityādiśrutessṛṣṭeḥ prāgbrahmaikatvāvadhāraṇātsadasatorniṣedhāt <quote>‘yathāg‍ne’</quote> rityādijīvotpattyanuguṇavisphuliṃgādidṛṣṭāntopapādanācca
brahmaṇa ātmāno jāyanta iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣe prāpte siddhāntaḥ---ātmā na</pratika> jāyate । kutaḥ । <pratika>śruteḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘na jāyate mriyate vā
vipaścit’</quote> iti śruteḥ, <pratika>tābhyaḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘nityo nityānāṃ’</quote> <quote>‘jñājñau dvau’</quote> ityādiśrutibhyaḥ । <pratika>nityatvācca</pratika>=nityatvāvagateśca । sṛṣṭeḥ
prāgekatvāvadhāraṇaṃ tadākṛtibhūtasya tasyācidvastunaśca nāmarūpavyavahārābhāvābhiprāyaṃ na svarūpāsattāparam । visphuliṃgaśrutiśca
nāmarūpasamunmeṣābhiprāyā na janmaparā । tasmādbrahmaṇo na jāyata eva jīva iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate, saṃdehapūrvapakṣādikaṃ</pratika> śrīkaṇṭhamatādaviśiṣṭameva । pūrvaṃpakṣe param ekavijñānapratijñādeḥ <quote>‘toyena jīvānvisasarja
bhūmyām’</quote> <quote>‘prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata’</quote> ityādisṛṣṭivacanācca’ iti tadupaṣṭaṃbhakayuktiradhikatayopanyasteti viśeṣaḥ ।anyadaviśiṣṭam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, atra bhūtadevatāvaccetanatvādisāmyātparamātmā dehanāśākhyalayavānvā na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘sa idaṃ
sarvaṃ vilāpyāntastamasi vilīna’</quote> iti śruterlayavāneveti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, paramātmā na vilīyata eva । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>aśruteḥ</pratika>=tallayasyāśravaṇāt । vilīnaśrutistvapihitapareti bhāvaḥ । kiṃca । <pratika>tābhyaḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘sa nityo nirguṇa’</quote> ityādiśrutibhyaḥ ।
<pratika>nityatvācca</pratika>=viṣṇornityatvāvagamācca na tasya nāśa iti ।। <pratika>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmātmādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</pratika></p>
<note>(1) <quote>‘nirūpitā’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="142"/>
<p>māyāśaktyavacchedādavāptaśarīrakaraṇādirayaṃ ghaṭo'yaṃ paṭo'yaṃ manuṣyo'haṃ devo'-
hamiti kalpitāhaṃkārabaddhaḥ saṃsaratīti saṃsāradaśāyāṃ jñānāt jīvasya svato
jñātṛtvaṃ nāstyeva, anyathāsya kuto muktiriti ।।
evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ—jñātaivāyamātmā । <quote>‘atha yo vededaṃ jighrāṇīti sa ātmā....ma-
nasaitān kāmān paśyana ramate ya ete brahmaloke’</quote> <quote>‘mano'sya daivaṃ cakṣuḥ’</quote> ityādi-
śruterdharmabhūtaṃ jñānamevāsya manaḥ । ataḥ svata evāyaṃ jñātā । yaduktaṃ māyāśakti-
saṃbandhāt saṃsāradaśāyāṃ jñātṛtvamasyeti, tatsatyam । māyāśaktikabalitasvā-
bhāvikajñānaśaktivilāso'yaṃ prākṛtamanaḥsaṃbandhāt bhoktā sukhaduḥkhayorjñātā
śarīrāhaṃkāramātraviśrāntaḥ saṃsarati hi jīvaḥ । yadā punarasya brahmajñānopāsa-
nābhyāsāt malatrayasaṃbandho'paiti, tadāsau brahmasadṛśo'bhivyaktanaijanirati-
śayajñānadharmo mukta ityucyate ।।
kiṃca—<quote>‘prāṇārāmaṃ manaānandam’</quote> iti brahmaṇo niratiśayātmānandaviṣayaṃ manaḥ
svābhāvikaṃ karaṇamavagamyate । tatsadṛśaguṇatvādapagatasaṃsārasya jīvasya svarūpā-
nandānubhavasādhanaṃ manorūpamantaḥkaraṇamanapekṣitabāhyakaraṇamastīti gamyate ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tena cānityajñānena jñānavattvamasya māyādisaṃbandhāt saṃsarataḥ kāryakaraṇavata eva । <quote>‘atha
yo vededaṃ jighrāṇī’</quote> tyādiśrutirāghrāṇādivedanāśrayatvasya na viśeṣaṇatayā jīvalakṣaṇatva-
parā kiṃ tu upalakṣaṇatayā । āghrāṇādyanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyinastasya vedanasya yāvadā-
tmabhāvitvābhāvāt । <quote>‘manasaitānkāmān’</quote> iti śrutistu muktau jñānakaraṇānuvṛttiparā
na jñānanityatve pramāṇamiti । siddhāṃtastu, ātmā jñaḥ jñātṛsvabhāvaḥ । ata eva śrutereva ।
tathāhi—<quote>‘atha yo vededaṃ jighrāṇīti sa ātmā’</quote> <quote>‘gandhāya ghrāṇa’</quote> mityādi śrūyate । prajā-
patividyāyāṃ <quote>‘maghavanmartyaṃ vā idaṃ śarīramāttaṃ mṛtyunā tadasyāmṛtasyāśarīrasyātmano'dhiṣṭhāna’</quote>
mityādinā śarīrātiriktatayā tadadhiṣṭhātṛtayā ca pratijñātasyātmanaḥ ghrā1ṇajanyagaṃdhādive-
danaṃ lakṣaṇatvena pratipādayadidaṃ vākyaṃ viśeṣaṇatayaiva tattathātvena pratipādayati nopala-
kṣaṇatayā । upalakṣyatāvacchedakasya rūpāntarasyānirjñātaṃtvāt vedane ghrāṇādijanyagandhā-
divṛttipariṇāmarūpatvasya paramātmātivyāptiparihārārthasyopalakṣaṇatve'pi tadupalakṣitasya
vedanasya nityatayā viśeṣaṇatvasaṃbhavācca । tasmādidaṃ vākyamātmano jñātṛsvabhāvatve pramā-
ṇam । tathā <quote>‘manasaitānkāmānpaśyanramata’</quote> ityādi śrūyate । idamapi tatra pramāṇam ।
brāhmalaukikabhogavastudarśanarūpajñānapariṇāmāpekṣitatayāva2śyāṃgīkarttavyasyāvikārātmavya-
tiriktasya tatpariṇāmidravyasyaiva karaṇatvavivakṣayā manaseti nirdeśopapattau muktāvanuvarta-
mānasyānyasya karaṇasya kalpanāyāṃ gauravāt <quote>‘jñājñā’</quote> vityādiśrutiḥ saṃsāradaśāyāṃ
jīvasya sārvajñyānabhivyaktiparatayopapadyate । suṣuptidaśāyāṃ <quote>‘na kiṃcidavediṣa’</quote> miti
jñānābhāvānubhavastu viṣayaviśeṣāvacchinnajñānapariṇāmābhāvaviṣayaḥ । <quote>‘na pretya saṃjñāstī’</quote>
ti vākyamapi tadviṣayam । yatastadanaṃtaramatraiva <quote>‘mā bhagavānamūmuhanna pretya saṃjñāstī’</quote>ti
maitreyīpraśne ‘na vā are mohaṃ bravīmi yadvaitanna paśyati paśyanvai tanna paśyati na hi draṣṭu-
<note>(1) <quote>‘‘jighrāṇītijanya’’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘vaśyāṃgīkartavyasya tatpariṇāmidravyasyaiva’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="143"/>
<quote>‘jñājñau’</quote> iti jīvasyājñatvaṃ kiṃcijjñatvameva । asaṃsāriṇaḥ parameśvarasya tu sarva-
jñatvamucyate । ataḥ saṃsāre kiṃcijjñatvaṃ muktau sarvajñatvamiti jñātaivātmā ।।
iti jñādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
rdṛṣṭerviparilopo vidyate avināśitvā’ dati yājñavalkyasyottareṇa tadvākyaṃ satye dharma-
jñāne kāraṇādhīnatatpariṇāmābhāvaviṣayatayā vyākhyātam । yattu māyādibaddhasya jñātṛ-
tvamiti satyaṃ māyādibaddhasya jñātṛtvaṃ tattu kiñcid‌jñatvarūpaṃ jñātṛtvaṃ, muktasya tu mala-
māyākarmabandhāpāyāt brahmasādṛśyaṃ prāptasyābhivyaktaniratiśayajñānasya sa1rvajñatvarūpaṃ jñā-
tṛtvamiti viśeṣaḥ । ihetaradbhāṣyamatirohitārtham ।। <pratika>iti jñādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha jñādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। jño'ta eva ।। 19 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>ajñaḥ svabhāvataḥ syāt jīvo jñājñāviti śravaṇāt । saṃsāradaśāyāṃ tu jñātṛtvasphūrtiraghyāsāt ।। 142 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>manasaitāniti muktāvapyasya jñātṛtāśravaṇāt । jñātṛtvaṃ svābhāvikamajñatvoktistvasārvajñyāt ।। 143 ।।</l></lg>

<head>atha jñādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। jño'ta eva ।। 19 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, atra <quote>‘ātmaivāsya jyotiḥ’</quote> ityādisvayaṃjyotiṣṭvaśruteḥ <quote>‘paśyaṃścakṣu’</quote> rityādyāgantukajñānavattvaśrutyā
virodho'sti na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । astīti <pratika>pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, jīvo <pratika>jñaḥ</pratika>=svayaṃjyotiḥsvarūpaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>ata-
eva</pratika>=anutpattimattvādevetyarthaḥ । <quote>‘paśyaṃścakṣu’</quote> rityādiśrutirāgantukavṛttyabhiprāyeti na tayā svayaṃjyotiṣṭvaśrutervirodha
iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ nityatayā sādhitasya jīvasyātrādhikaraṇe svābhāvikaṃ jñānadharmitvamasti na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । jñājñau
dvā’ vityādiṣu jīvasyājñatvamautsargikaṃ śrūyate । suṣuptidaśāyāṃ <quote>‘na kiṃcidavediṣa’</quote> miti jñānābhāvo'nubhūyate । jīvasya sva-
prakāśacaitanyasvarūpatve'pi asau svamātraprakāśarūpa ityahamidaṃ jānāmīti jīvāśrayatvenānubhūyamānaṃ jñānamanityamiti
gamyate । māyādisaṃbandhātsaṃsarato'sta tena cānityajñānena jñānavattvādasyāgantukajñānadharmitvameva na svābhāvikajñānadharmitva-
miti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, ātmā <pratika>jñaḥ</pratika>=svābhāvikajñānadharmī । kutaḥ । <pratika>ata eva</pratika>=śrutereva । tathāhi—<quote>‘ata yo vededaṃ
jighrāṇīti sa ātmā’ manasaitānkāmānpaśyanramate’</quote> <quote>‘mano'sya daivaṃ cakṣuḥ’</quote> ‘ityādi śrūyate । ataḥ dharmabhūtaṃ jñānamevāsya
manaḥ । ataḥ svata evāyaṃ jñātā । <quote>‘jñājñau dvā’</quote> viti śrutissaṃsāradaśāyāṃ sārvajñyānabhivyaktiparā । supuptidaśāyāṃ jñānā-
bhāvānubhavastu viṣayaviśeṣāvacchinnajñānapariṇāmābhāvaviṣayaḥ । māyādibaddhasya jñātṛtvaṃ kiṃcijjñatvarūpaṃ muktasya tu mala-
māyādyapagamādabhivyaktaniratiśayajñānasya sarvajñatvarūpamiti ca viśeṣaḥ । iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, asya sūtrasyottarādhikaraṇasūtraissahaikīkṛtyātmādhikaraṇatvena vyapadiṣṭatvāduttarādhikaraṇa eva vyākhyeyatā
samucitetyataḥ neha prapañcyate ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, evamadhibhūtādhidaivabrahmaviṣayaśrutyavirodhamabhidhāyādhunāpādaparisamāpti jīvaviṣayaśrutyavirodhamāha---
jño'ta eva ।। 18 ।। idamadhikaraṇamananyamatasādhāraṇena yukteścetyadhikasūtrapāṭhena yuktatayā sūtradvayātmakamiti
viśeṣaḥ । atra jīvaḥ parameś‍varādutpadyate na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ ।</pratika> <quote>‘nityo nityānā’</quote> miti śrutyā jīvasya nityatvāvagamānnotpadyata
iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, jānātīti jñaḥ jīvaḥ utpadyate । ata evetyāvartate । <pratika>ata eva</pratika>=prakṛtātmana eva ।
kutaḥ । <pratika>ata eva</pratika>=<quote>‘avinaṣṭā evotpadyanta’</quote> iti śruterevetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। yukteśca ।। 19 ।।</pratika> avinaśino'nāderapi jīvasya parādhīnaviśeṣalābharūpotpattiryujyate । <quote>‘vṛddho jāto yuvā jāta’</quote>
ityādyabādhitavyavahārāditi bhāvaḥ ।। <pratika>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ jñādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</pratika></p>
<note>(1) sarvajñatvameva na tvajñatvamiti iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>

<head>athotkrāntyadhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<sutra>।। sū ।। utkrāntigatyāgatīnām ।। 20 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatra jñātṛtvena siddhasyātmana utkrāntyādidarśanāt aṇutvamavagamyate । tadyu-
jyate na veti saṃdehaḥ ।।
nāsyāṇutvamupapadyate । <quote>‘sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmā’</quote> iti jīvasya vibhutvā-
vagamāt <quote>‘ahaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanamabhyabhavam’</quote> iti tasya vyāptyā sakalabhuvanābhibhā-
vitvāvagamācca sarvathāyamātmā vibhuḥ ।।
iti prāpte nirūpyate—aṇurevāyamātmā, utkrāntigatyāgatīnāṃ śruteḥ । <quote>‘tena
pradyotenaiṣa ātmā niṣkrāmati’</quote> iti hyutkrāntiḥ śrūyate । ‘ye vai ke cāsmāllo-

<head>atha utkrāntyadhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। utkrāntigatyāgatīnām ।। 20 ।।</pratika> aṇurayamātmā vibhurveti aṇuvibhuśrutyoḥ
kimanusāreṇa kā śrutirnetavyeti tayorbalābalānavadhāraṇātsaṃśayaḥ । tadartho'yaṃ sandehaḥ
pūrvādhikaraṇaprasādhito jīvasvarūpātiriktadharmajñānasadbhāva upapadyate na veti । upapadyate
cet tadvyāptyā sarvāṃgīṇasukhānubhavasya tadvyāptiviṣayatayā vibhutvaśruteścopapannatayotkrāṃ-
tigatyāgatiliṃgānugṛhītāṇutvaśrutibalādaṇurātmeti siddhāntakoṭissiddhyet । nopapadyate
cet sarvāṃgīṇasukhānubhavasyātmavyāptimantareṇānupapattestadanugṛhītayā vibhutvaśrutyā vibhu-
revāyamātmā । tadaṇutvaśruti <quote>‘stveṣa ma ātmāntarhṛdaye'ṇīyā’</quote>niti pārameśvarāṇutvaśru-
tivadaupādhikāṇutvaparā । utkrāṃtyādiśrutayo'pi aupādhikārthaviṣayā iti pūrvapakṣa-
koṭiḥ siddhyediti saṃśayayoḥ phalaphalibhāvaḥ । tatra pūrvapakṣaḥ <quote>‘sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātme’</quote>ti
śrutervibhurjīvaḥ । na ceyaṃ śrutiḥ parameśvaraviṣayā । <quote>‘yo'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇe’</quote>
ṣviti jīvaprastāvāt <quote>‘ahaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanamabhyabhavā’</quote>miti muktajīvasya vyāptyā sakalabhuva-
nābhibhāvitvaśravaṇācca । <quote>‘buddherātmā mahānpara’</quote> iti muktāmuktasādhāraṇyena jīvasya
mahattvaśruteśca । aṇutve ca tasya sarvāṃgīṇasukhānubhavo na syāt । ato dehaparimāṇatva-
syāpi jainādhikaraṇe dūṣitatvātpariśeṣādapi vibhutvasiddhiḥ । na ca jīvaprabhārūpadharmajñāna-
vyāptyā sarvāṃgīṇasukhānubhavopapattiḥ । jīvasvarūpātiriktasya dharmajñānasyāsiddheḥ <quote>‘yo vi-
jñāne tiṣṭhaṃ’</quote> nnityādiśruteḥ jīva1sya svaprakāśajñānarūpatvasyāvaśyābhyupagantavyatayā tasyaiva
tattadvastvavacchedena tattadviṣayajñānatvopapattāvatiriktadharmajñānakalpane pramā2ṇābhāvāt । <quote>‘na hi
draṣṭurdṛṣṭerviparilopo vidyata’</quote> ityādiśrutiṣu draṣṭṛdṛṣṭyādiśabdānāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyena
jīvasyaiva jñānarūpatvapratipādanaparatopapatterityevaṃ prāpte siddhāntamāha sūtrakāraḥ---<pratika>sū ।।
utkrāntigatyāgatīnām ।। 20 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘nātmā śrute’</quote>rityataḥ śruterityanuvartate । <quote>‘nāṇurata-

caśabdamavadhāraṇārthaṃ kṛtvā vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>uttarayoriti</pratika> । yadyapyutkramaṇaśabdārthasyāpi gati-

tatra parameśvarapratipādanamapyastīti tadviṣayatvaṃ mahattvaśruteryuktamiti bhāvaḥ । mahattvaśrutya-

yathā candanabindurekadeśastho'pi sakaladehavyāpi sukhaṃ janayati, tadvadavirodhaḥ ।।

<sutra>।। sū ।। avasthitivaiśeṣyāditi cennābhyupagamāddha‍ṛdi hi ।। 25 ।।</sutra>
deśaviśeṣasthitiścandanasyāstīti cet—na, ātmano'pi tadabhyupagamāt,
<quote>‘hṛdi hyeṣa ātmā’</quote> <quote>‘yo'pi vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdyantarjyotiḥ puruṣaḥ’</quote> iti śruteḥ ।
iti matāntaram ।।
svamatamāha—
<sutra>।। sū ।। guṇādvā''lokavat ।। 26 ।।</sutra>
ātmā svaguṇena jñānena sakaladehaṃ vyāpyānubhavati । yathā maṇiḥ svakīyena
tejasā sannihitaṃ vyāpya prakāśayati । tasmādavirodhaḥ ।।
jñānātmanorvyatireko nāstītyatrāi-
<sutra>।। sū ।। vyatireko gandhavattathā hi darśayati ।। 27 ।।</sutra>
gandhavatī pṛthivītivat jānāmīti guṇatvenopalabdherjñānātmanoḥ vyatire-
ko'sti । darśayati ca śrutirvyatirekaṃ <quote>‘jānātyevāyaṃ puruṣaḥ’</quote> iti ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। pṛthagupadeśāt ।। 28 ।।</sutra>
ātmanaḥ pṛthagupadiś‍yate jñānam । <quote>‘na vijñātuvijñāterviparilopo vidyate’</quote> iti ।।
evaṃ nityajñānaguṇaka ātmā siddhaḥ । evaṃ jñānaguṇakatve'pyātmanaḥ kathaṃ jñāna-

vat ।। 24 ।। tadvadavirodha iti । ekadeśasthasyāpi vyāpikāryajanakatvaṃ dṛṣṭam । na
ca dṛṣṭe kācidanupapattirastīti bhāvaḥ । nanu śarīraikadeśasthasyāpi haricandanabindossa-
rvāṃgīṇasukhānubhavahetutvaṃ dṛṣṭam । sarvaśarīravyāpinastvagindriyasyāpi tadda‍ṛṣṭam । ubhaya-
vidhadṛṣṭāntadarśane haricandanadṛṣṭāntasyaivānurodhe kiṃ niyāmakamityāśaṃkānirākaraṇārtha-
tvenottarasūtramavatārayati—punarāśaṃkyeti । sū ।। avasthitivaiśeṣyāditi cennā-
bhyupagamāddha‍ṛdi hi ।। 25 ।। ātmano'pīti । yathā haricandanabindorekadeśasthatvaṃ
pratyakṣasiddhamityabhyupagamyate evaṃ jīvasyāpi tacchrutisiddhamityabhyupagamyata iti bhāvaḥ ।
<quote>‘matāntara’</quote> mityanena etadasvārasyaṃ dyotyate yuktaṃ candanabindossāvayavasya sūkṣmāvayavapra-
saraṇena sakaladehavyāptyā sarvāṃgīṇasukhānubhavajanakatvaṃ na tvaṇorjīvasyāvayavāssanti
yairayaṃ sakalaṃ śarīraṃ kāyavyūhe bahūni śarīrāṇi ca vyāpnuyāditi । sū ।। guṇādvā''loka-
vat ।। 26 ।। bhavedevaṃ pradīpasya prabhayā prāsādodaravyāptivat jīvasya dharmajñānena śarī-
ravyāptiḥ, yadi jīvātiriktaṃ dharmajñānaṃ syāt, tadeva nāstīti śaṃkānirākaraṇārthatvena
uttarasūtramavatārayati—<pratika>jñānātmanoriti</pratika> । <pratika>sū ।। vyatireko gaṃdhavattathā hi darśayati
।। 27 ।। gaṃdhavattvena pṛthivyā iva jñānavattvena puruṣasya vyapadeśo naupacārikatvāya vyati-
rekamapekṣate iti bhāvaḥ । sū ।। pṛthagupadeśāt ।। 28 ।।</pratika> bhinnaśabdābhyāṃ kartṛkriyārūpa-
bhedasamarpakābhyāmupadeśaḥ pṛthagupadeśaḥ । tathā ca ṣaṣṭhyorvyadhikaraṇatayā mukhyākriyākartṛ-
bhāvabhede saṃbhavati sāmānādhikaraṇyamāśrityaupacārikatvakalpanaṃ na yuktamiti bhāvaḥ ।

mātratvavyapadeśa ityata āha—
<sutra>।। sū ।। tadga‍uṇasāratvāttu tadva‍yapadeśaḥ prājñavat ।। 29 ।।</sutra>
jñānaguṇasāratvādātmano jñānavyapadeśaḥ, na jñānamātratvāt । yathā prājñatya
vipaścito'pi <quote>‘satyaṃ jñāna’</quote>miti । tato jñānamātratvavyapadeśe doṣo na bhavatyā-
tmana iti ।।
punarupapattimāha—
<sutra>।। sū ।। yāvadātmabhāvitvācca na doṣastaddarśanāt ।। 30 ।।</sutra>
ātmasvarūpānubandhitvāt jñānasya, tena vyapadeśe na doṣaḥ । svarūpānubandhi-
dharmatvena gotvādinā khaṇḍādergaurityādivyapadeśo dṛśyate । ataḥ svarūpānubaṃ-
dhitvājjñānadharmasya tadva‍yapadeśaḥ ।।
suṣuptayādiṣvasato jñānasya yāvadātmabhāvitvaṃ kathamityata āha-
<sutra>।। sū ।। puṃstvādivat‍tvasya sato'bhivyaktiyogāt ।। 31 ।।</sutra>
suṣuptyādiṣu sato jñānasyānabhivyaktasyāpi jāgaritādāvabhivyaktisaṃbhavāt
svarūpānubandhyeva jñānam, yathā puṃstvāsādhāraṇasaptamadhātorbālye'pi sato yuva-
tve'bhivyaktiḥ । tato jñānasyātmasvarūpānubandhitve na doṣaḥ ।।
ātmano jñātṛtvāṇutvapratipādanaprayojanamāha—
<sutra>।। sū ।। nityopalabdhyanupalabdhiprasaḍgo'nyataraniyamo vānyathā ।। 32 ।।</sutra>
