yadyapi jīvasya jñānatvavyapadeśaḥ svaprakāśajñaptirūpatvādupapadyate tathāpi prakārāntareṇāpi
tadupapādanārthamuttarasūtradvayam—<pratika>sū ।। tadga‍uṇasāratvāttu tadvyapadeśaḥ prājñavat ।। 29 ।।</pratika>
yato jñānaguṇo'sya kartṛtvādisarvanirvāhakatayā sārabhūtaḥ atastena guṇena tasya vyapadeśaḥ ।
dṛṣṭo hi brahmaṇo'pi sārabhūtena guṇena vyapadeśa ityarthaḥ । yadyapi <quote>‘satyaṃ jñāna’</quote> mityatrā-
ntodāttena citsvareṇa matvarthīyācpratyayāntatayā jñānaśabdo jñānavatparaḥ ityupapādayituṃ
śakyate । tathāpi tasya jñānamātraparatve'pi na prakṛte kācidanupapattiḥ ityabhiprāyeṇa tadu-
dāhṛtam । sū ।। yāvadātmabhāvitvācca na doṣastaddarśanāt ।। 30 ।। lākṣaṇikatvena pūrvani-
rvāhaḥ ayaṃ tu mukhyatveneti viśeṣaḥ । pūrvasūtroktahetvākṣepakatvenottarasūtramavatārayati—<pratika>suṣu-
ptyādiṣviti । sū ।। puṃstvādivattvasya sato'bhivyaktiyogāt ।। 31 ।।</pratika> bālayu-
vādisādhāraṇo hi vīryarūpaḥ puṃstvadhātuḥ । śarīradhārakāndhātūnvinā śa1rīrasthityasaṃbha-
vāt । tathāpi yathā tasya bālye nābhivyaktiḥ <quote>‘na hi draṣṭurdṛṣṭe’</quote> riti jīvasvarūpānubaṃdhi-
tvena pratipannasya dharmajñānasya suṣuptau bāhyāṃtarasakaleṃdriyavyāpāroparameṇa viṣa2yāvabhā-
sābhāvāt tathābhivyaktirnāstīti bhāvaḥ । uttarasūtreṇa jīvasya jñānarūpatayāgantukajñāna-
tayā vā sarvagatatvābhyupagame dūṣaṇamucyate । taduktiḥ svamate tadda‍ūṣaṇāprasaṃgarūpaṃ prayojana-
mānayatīti paryavasyadarthamālocya svamataprayojanaparatayottarasūtramavatārayati—<pratika>ātmana
iti । sū ।। nityopalabdhyanupalabdhiprasaṅgo'nyataraniyamo vānyathā ।। 32 ।।</pratika> ātmā
<note>(1) <quote>‘śaktyasaṃbhavāt’</quote> iti kha pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘viṣayāvacchedābhāvāt’</quote> iti kha pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="148"/>
anyathā jñaptimātrasarvagatātmapakṣe tāvannityavat sarvadopalabdhiḥ syāt, saṃko-
cābhāvāt । vidyamānāyā anupalabdherapi sa eva heturiti sāpi sarvadā
syāt । āgantukajñānasarvagatātmapakṣe'pi sa eva doṣaḥ, sarvātmanāṃ sarvagatatvena
jñānahetūnāṃ manassaṃyogādīnāṃ sarvasādhāraṇatvāt । adṛṣṭahetūnāmapi tathātvāt
tenāpi na niyamaḥ । athopalabddha‍yanupalabdhyorvirodhādupalabdhereva hetavaḥ syuḥ,
anupalabdhereva vā । tathā sati anyataraniyamaḥ syāt । ataḥ pūrvoktameva
samīcīnam ।। ityutkrāntyadhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śarīrasyāntarupalabhyate tato bahirnopalabhyata iti tāvadahamihaivāsmi sadane jānāna iti
sārvalaukikānubhavasākṣikaṃ nānyathā kartuṃ śakyam । tadidaṃ pakṣadvaye'pi nopapadyate । tathā
hi jñānarūpaḥ sarvagata ātmeti pakṣe sa upalabhyānupalabhyasvabhāvaḥ upalabhyaikasvabhāvo'nu-
palabhyaikasvabhāvo vā । ādye sarvatra tasyopalabdhyanupalabdhī syātām । dvitīye sarvatro-
palabdhiḥ syāt । tṛtīye sarvatrānupalabdhirbhavet । dehasyāntarupalabhyasvabhāvastato bahira-
nupalabhyasvabhāva iti tu vyavasthā na saṃbhavati । na hyekasya kvacidaṃśe svaprakāśatvamanya-
trāsvaprakāśatvaṃ cetyupapadyate । āgantukajñānasarvagatātmapakṣe'pyevameva vikalpatraye'pi
doṣaḥ । na ca śarīrasyāntarjñānahetūnāṃ manassaṃyogādīnāṃ sattvāttatraivāhamityupalabdhirna
bahiriti vyavasthopapadyata iti vācyam । svaśarīrādbahirapi sarvagate svātmani mano'nta-
rasaṃyogasattvāt । na ca svādṛṣṭākṛṣṭamanassaṃyoga eva svajñānaheturiti vyavasthā kalpayituṃ
śakyā । sarvātmasaṃnidhāvutpadyamānānāmadṛṣṭānāṃ sarvasādhāraṇyānivāraṇāditi sūtrasyārthaṃ
darśayati—<pratika>anyatheti । pūrvoktimiti</pratika> । saṃkocavikāsannityajñānavānaṇurjīva iti
prāguktamityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti utkrāṃtyadhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha utkrāṃtyadhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū ।। utkrāṃtigatyāgatīnām ।। 20 ।। svātmanā cottarayoḥ ।। 21 ।। nāṇuratacchruteriti cennetarādhikā-
rāt ।। 22 ।। svaśabdonmānābhyāṃ ca ।। 23 ।। avirodhaścaṃdanavat ।। 24 ।। avasthitivaiśeṣyāditi
cennābhyupagamāddha‍ṛdi hi ।। 25 ।। guṇādvālokavat ।। 26 ।। vyatireko gandhavattathāca darśayati ।। 27 ।।
pṛthagupadeśāt ।। 28 ।। tadga‍uṇasāratvāttu tadvyapadeśaḥ prājñavat ।। 29 ।। yāvadātmabhāvitvācca na doṣasta-
ddarśanāt ।। 30 ।। puṃstvādivattvasya sato'bhivyaktiyogāt ।। 31 ।। nityopalabdhyanupalabdhiprasaṃ-
go'nyataraniyamo vānyathā ।। 32 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>sa vibhurmahānaja iti śravaṇātsarvāṅgavedanāvagateḥ । na ca sā jñānaguṇātsyāt jīvasya jñānamātratvāt ।। 144 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>gatyutkrāṃtiśravaṇādaṇurmahāniti tu paraviṣayam । vyāpyasya jñānaguṇaḥ tatsāratvāttathāsya nirdeśaḥ ।। 145 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti utkrāṃtyadhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrarthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>athotkrāntyadhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<p>sū ।। utkrāntigatyāgatīnām ।। 20 ।। svātmanā cottarayoḥ ।। 21 ।। nāṇuratacchruteriti cennetarā-
dhikārāt ।। 22 ।। svaśabdonmānābhyāṃ ca ।। 23 ।। avirodhaścandanavat ।। 24 ।। avasthitivaiśeṣyā-
diti cennābhyupagamāddha‍udi hi ।। 25 ।। guṇādvālokavat ।। 26 ।। vyatireko gandhavattathā gandhavattathā hi darśayati
।। 27 ।। pṛthagupadeśāt ।। 28 ।। tadga‍uṇasāratvāttu tadva‍yapadeśaḥ prājñavat ।। 29 ।। yāvadātmabhāvitvācca
<pb n="149"/>
na doṣastaddarśanāt ।। 30 ।। puṃstvādivattvasya sato'bhivyaktiyogāt ।। 31 ।। nityopalabdhyanupalabdhi-
prasaṃgo'nyataraniyamo vānyathā ।। 32 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ jīvasya nityatvaṃ svaprakāśatvaṃ cābhihitam । adhunā jīvasyāparicchinnatvamaṇutvanirāsena sādhayati—
<pratika>utkrāntigatītyādinā</pratika> । atra <quote>‘sarvavyāpi’</quote> iti sarvagatatvaśruteḥ <quote>‘eṣo'ṇurātmā’</quote> ityaṇutvaśrutyā virodho'sti na veti
<pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘asmāccharīrādutkrāmati’</quote> <quote>‘candramasameva sarve gacchanti’</quote> <quote>‘tasmāllokātpunareti’</quote> <pratika>ityutkrāntigatyāgatīnāṃ</pratika>
śravaṇādaṇurjīva iti prāpnoti । kiṃca । <pratika>sū ।। svātmanā cottarayoḥ ।। 21 ।।</pratika> yadyapyutkrāntirdehasvāmyanivṛttirūpā vibhutve
saṃbhavati । tathāpi <pratika>uttarayoḥ</pratika>=gatyāgatyoḥ । <pratika>svātmanā</pratika>=jīvātmanā saṃbaddhatvātte ātmano'ṇutva eva saṃbhavataḥ ।।</p>
<p>tarhi sarvagatatvaśrutirviruddhyetetyāśaṃkya samādhatte—<pratika>sū ।। nāṇuratacchruteriti</pratika> । nāyaṃ jīvo'ṇuḥ । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>atacchruteḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘sarvavyāpi’</quote> ityādinā sarvagatatvaśruteḥ । <pratika>iti cet । na । itarādhikārāt</pratika>=itarasya brahmaṇaḥ sarveṣu vedā-
nteṣu pradhānatayā jñeyatvena prakṛtvāt tasyaiva sarvagatatvaśrutirna jīvasyetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>jīvasyāpyaṇutvaśrutirastītyāha—<pratika>sū ।। svaśabdonmānābhyāṃ ca ।। 23 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘eṣo'ṇurātme’</quote>tyaṇutvavacanena <quote>‘vālāpraśata-
bhāgasye’</quote> tyunmānaśabditātyantālpaparimāṇaśravaṇena ca jīvo'ṇurityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanvātmano'ṇutve gaṃgājalanimagnasya dehavyāpiśaityopalabdhivirodha ityāha---<pratika>sū ।। avirodhaścandanavat ।। 24 ।।</pratika>
yathā candanabiṃduśśarīraikadeśasthaśśarīravyāpi sukhaṃ janayati tathā jīvo'pi dehavyāpinaṃ śaityādyupalaṃbhaṃ kariṣyatītyavirodha
ityarthaḥ । dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayorvaiṣamyamāśaṃkya pariharati---<pratika>avasthiti vaiśeṣyāditi ।। avasthitivaiśeṣyāditi cet</pratika>=
pratyakṣeṇa candanabindorekadeśe'vasthitirjñāyate jīvasya tu naivamityatulyatvādatra candanadṛṣṭānto nopapadyata <pratika>iti cet</pratika> । na ।
kutaḥ । <pratika>abhyupagamāt</pratika>=jīvāṇutvasyāṅgīkārāt । tatkasmāt । <pratika>hṛdi hi</pratika>=yasmāt <quote>‘hṛdyantarjyoti’</quote> rityādau alpaparimāṇe
hṛdi jīvaḥ paṭhyate, tasmājjīvasyāṇutvamabhyupagamyata iti na dṛṣṭāntavaiṣamyamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu sāvayavasya candanabindossarvaśarī ravyāpakatve'pi niravayavasyāṇorjīvasya tathā śarīravyāpakatvaṃ na syādityapari-
tuṣṭyā pakṣāntaramāha---<pratika>sū ।। guṇādvā lokavat ।। 25 ।।</pratika> ātmano'ṇutve'pi tanniṣṭhajñānaguṇasya vyāpakatvāṅgīkārāt
vyāpakaguṇāvdyāpi kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati । <pratika>lokavat</pratika>=yathā loke gṛhaniṣṭhapradīpasyālpatve'pi prabhātmakaguṇavaśādga‍ṛhavyāpi
prakāśādikāryaṃ saṃbhavati tadvadityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu guṇivyatirekeṇa guṇasya vṛtteranyatrādarśanāt tatkathamityāśaṃkyāha---<pratika>sū ।। vyatireko gandhavat ।। 26 ।।</pratika> yathā
guṇasyāpi sato gandhasya guṇivyatirekeṇa vṛttiḥ tadvat guṇivyatireko jñānasyetyarthaḥ ।।
jñānenaivātmano dehavyāptirityatra śrutimāha---<pratika>sū ।। tathā ca darśayati ।। 27 ।।</pratika> hṛdāyatanatvamaṇuparimāṇatvaṃ cātmano'bhi-
dhāya <quote>‘ā lomabhya ānakhāgrebhya’</quote> iti śrutiḥ jñānena samastaśarīravyāpitvaṃ darśayatītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>tatraiva hetvantaramāha---<pratika>sū ।। pṛthagupadeśāt ।। 28 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘prajñayā śarīraṃ samāruhya’</quote> ityātmajñānayoḥ kartṛkaraṇabhāvena
pṛthagupadeśāt guṇadvārāsya śarīravyāpitvaṃ gamyate । tathā ca vyāpakaṃ jñānaṃ jīvastvaṇuḥ ityaṇutvaśrutyā sarvagatatvaśrutervirodho-
'stīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>siddhāntastu---sū ।। tadga‍uṇasāratvāttu tadva‍yapadeśaḥ prājñavat ।। 29 ।।</pratika> tuśabdaḥ pūrvapakṣaṃ vyāvartayati ।
naivāṇurjīvaḥ । sarvagatasyaiva brahmaṇo jīvabhāvena praveśaśravaṇāttādātmyopadeśācca । <pratika>tadvyapadeśaḥ</pratika>=jīvasyāṇutvādivyapadeśaḥ ।
<pratika>tadga‍uṇasāratvāt</pratika>=tasyā buddherguṇā aṇutvotkrāntigatyāgatisukhaduḥkhādayaḥ । te guṇāḥ sāraṃ pradhānaṃ yasya jīvasya sa tathā ।
tasya bhāvastattvaṃ tasmāt bhavati । na svābhāvikaḥ । <pratika>prājñavat</pratika>=yathā prājñasya paramātmanassaguṇopāsaneṣu daharādyupādhivaśā-
daṇutvādikaṃ vyapadiś‍yate tadvadityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanvātmanyaṇutvādisaṃsārasya budhdyapādhikatve kadācidba‍udhdyā viyoge saṃsāro na syādityata āha---<pratika>sū ।। yāvadātma-
bhāvitvācca na doṣastaddarśanāt ।। 30 ।।</pratika> buddhisaṃyogasya <pratika>yāvadātmabhāvitvācca</pratika>=yāvadātmanassamyagdarśanena
saṃsāro na nivartate tāvatkālabhāvitvāt । <pratika>na doṣaḥ</pratika>=noktadoṣa ityarthaḥ । tatkasmāt । <pratika>taddarśanāt</pratika>=dehaviyoge'pi tasya
buddhisaṃyogasya <quote>‘sa samānassannubhau lokāvanusaṃcaratī’</quote> tyādi śrutau darśanādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu suṣuptau brahmasaṃpattikāryanāśayorabhyupagamānna buddhisaṃyogasya yāvadātmabhāvitvamityata āha---<pratika>sū ।। puṃstvādivattasya
sato'bhivyaktiyogāt ।। 31 ।। puṃstvādivat</pratika>=yathā bālye puṃstvādessata eva yauvane'bhivyaktistadvat । <pratika>tasya</pratika>=
buddhisaṃyogādeḥ । <pratika>sataḥ</pratika>=suṣuptau sūkṣmātmanā sata eva । <pratika>abhivyaktiyogat</pratika>=āvirbhāvasaṃbhavāt yāvadātmabhāvitvaṃ na
virudhyata ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu budhdyaparaparyāyāntaḥkaraṇe kiṃ pramāṇaṃ yatprayuktaḥ saṃsāraḥ syādityata āha---<pratika>sū ।। nityopalabdhyanupalabdhi-</pratika>
<pb n="150"/>
<pratika>prasaṃgo'nyataraniyamo vānyathā ।। 32 ।।</pratika> idamantaḥkaraṇavaśyamabhyupagantavyam । <pratika>anyathā</pratika>=anabhyupagame । sarve
ṣāmindriyāṇāṃ svasvaviṣayasaṃnnidhānadaśāyāṃ <pratika>nityopalabdhiprasaṃgaḥ</pratika>=yugapatsarvaviṣayopalabdhiprasaṃgaḥ । manovyatiriktajñāna-
sāmagryāssattvāt । yadi satyāmapi sāmagryāṃ jñānābhāvaḥ tadā <pratika>nityānupalabdhiprasaṃgaḥ</pratika>=kasyāpyupalabdhirna syāt ।
athavā ekasyopalabdhimitareṣāmanupalabdhimicchatā jñānasāmagrīmadhye <pratika>anyataraniyamaḥ=anyatarasya</pratika>—ātmanaḥ indriyasya vā
<pratika>niyamaḥ</pratika>=śaktipratibandho'ṅgīkartavyaḥ । nirdharmaka ātmani śakterabhāvāt śakterāntaratvenendriyadharmatvāyogācca sa na sabhavatī-
tyataḥ icchaiva niyāmikā । tasyāśca manodharmatvena tadanyathānupapasattyā <quote>‘kāmaḥ saṃkalpa’</quote> ityādiśrutyā ca siddhamantaḥkaraṇam ।
tatprayuktaścātmanyaṇutvādisaṃsāra iti । tasmādaupādhikāṇutvaśrutyā na vāstavasarvagatatvaśrutervirodha iti siddham ।।</p>
<head>itibhagavatpādamate utkrāntigatyadhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, pūrvatra jñātṛtvena siddhasyātmana utkrāntyādidarśanādavagamyamānamaṇutvaṃ yujyate na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘sa vā eṣa
mahānaja ātmā’</quote> <quote>‘ahaṃ viś‍vaṃ bhuvanamabhyabhavām’</quote> ityādiśrutibhistasya vibhutvasakalabhuvanābhibhāvitvayoravagamādvibhorjīvasya
nāṇutvamupapadyata iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।</pratika> utkrāntigatyāgatiśrutyādiprāmāṇyādātmano nityajñānaguṇakasyāṇutvamupapadyatai eveti <pratika>siddhā-
ntaḥ</pratika> । atra <quote>‘utkrantigatī’</quote> tyādīnyetadadhikaraṇasūtrāṇi sarvāṇyapi siddhāntopaṣṭaṃbhakatayaiva vyākhyātāni । ataḥ bhagavatpādamate
‘jīvāṇutvaparatayā pūrvapakṣapratipādakāni । <quote>‘unkrāntigatī’</quote> tyādīni nava sūtrāṇi prāyo'trāviśiṣṭārthāni । <quote>‘avasthitivai-
śeṣyā’</quote>diti sūtraṃ matāntaranirūpakaṃ <quote>‘guṇādvālokava’</quote> diti svamatapratipādakamiti viśeṣo'tra mate । asminmate pūrvapakṣasiddhā-
ntayorvinimayenāsti vailakṣaṇyaṃ pūrvasmāt । sūtrāṇi ca tadānuguṇyena vyākhyātāni । <pratika><quote>‘vyatireko gandhavattathāhi darśayati ।
pṛthagupadeśāt ।’</quote></pratika> itīdaṃ sūtradvayaṃ <pratika><quote>‘guṇādvālokavat ।’</quote></pratika> iti svamatārthopaṣṭaṃbhakatayā jñānātmanorvyatirekapratipādakamitya-
viśeṣaḥ । bhagavātpādamate siddhāntaparatvena vyākhyātāni <pratika><quote>‘tadga‍uṇasāratvā’</quote></pratika> dityādīni catvāri sūtrāṇyapi atra vilakṣaṇārtha-
paratayā bhinnārthānyeva । yathā---evaṃ nityajñānaguṇakasyātmanaḥ kathaṃ jñānamātratvavyapadeśa ityata āha---<pratika>tadga‍uṇasāratvādi-
tyādi । tadvyapadeśaḥ</pratika>=ātmano jñānavyapadeśaḥ । <pratika>tadga‍uṇasāratvāttu</pratika>=jñānaguṇasāratvādeva bhavati na jñānamātratvādityarthaḥ ।
<pratika>prājñavat</pratika>=yathā prājñasya vipaścito'pi <quote>‘satyaṃ jñāna’</quote> miti vyapadeśastadvaditi । punarupapattimāha---<pratika>sū ।। yāvadātmabhāvi-
tvācca na doṣastaddarśanāt ।। 30 ।। yāvadātmabhāvitvācca</pratika>=jñānasyātmasvarūpānubandhitvāt jñānamātratvavyapadeśe na
doṣaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>taddarśanāt</pratika>=svarūpānubandhidharmatvena gotvādinā khaṇḍādergaurityādivyapadeśasya loke darśanāt । ataḥ svarūpā-
nubandhitvājjñānadharmasya tadva‍yapadeśe na doṣa iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p>suṣuptyādiṣvasato jñānasya yāvadātmabhāvitvaṃ kathamityata āha---<pratika>sū ।। puṃstvādivattvasya sato'bhivyaktiyogāt
।। 31 ।।</pratika> suṣuptyādiṣvanabhivyaktatvena sato'pi jñānasya bālye'pi sataḥ puṃstvāsādhāraṇasaptamadhātoryauvane'bhivyaktivat
jāgarādavabhivyaktisaṃbhavāt jñānasya svarūpānubandhitvamakṣatamiti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p>ātmano jñātṛtvāṇutvapratipādanaprayojanamavagamayituṃ pakṣāntare doṣamāha---<pratika>sū ।। nityopalabdhyanupalabdhiprasaṃgo'
nyataraniyamo vānyathā ।। 32 ।। anyathā</pratika>=jñānātmavāde sarvagatātmavāde ca । <pratika>nityopalabdhyanupalabdhiprasaṃgaḥ</pratika>=
upalabdhyanupalabdhī nityavatprasajyeyātām । tayoranyataraniyamo vā bhavati । tasmādātmano jñātṛtvāṇutvavādaḥ pūrvokta eva
samīcīna iti siddham ।। atra <pratika>vyatireko gandhavattathāhi darśayati’</pratika> ityekasūtratayā pāṭhaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate, <quote>‘jño'ta eva’</quote></pratika> ityādīni caturdaśa sūtrāṇyapi jñādhikaraṇatvena vyapadiśyaṃte । atra kiṃ jīvaścaitanya-
mātravapuḥ uta pāṣāṇakalpa evāgantukacaitanyaguṇaḥ athavā jñātṛtvaikasvarūpa iti tredhā <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । caitanyamātravapurathavā
pāṣāṇakalpa āgantukacaitanyaguṇaḥ syāditi <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> ।। baddhamuktobhayāvastho jñātaivāyamātmā aṇureveti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ</pratika> ।।
sūtrārthavarṇanādikaṃ sarvamanyadaviśiṣṭameva śrīkaṇṭhamatāditi viramyate punastatprapañcanataḥ । iti ।।</p>
<head>iti rāmānujamate ātmādhikaraṇam ।।</head>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, <quote>‘utkrāntī’</quote> tyādisūtrasaptakamātramidamadhikaraṇaṃ <pratika><quote>‘vyatireko gandhava’</quote></pratika> dati sūtramadhi-
karaṇāntaraṃ <pratika><quote>‘pṛthagupadeśā’</quote></pratika> dityādisūtradvayamanyadadhikaraṇaṃ <pratika><quote>‘yāvadātmabhāvitvācce’</quote></pratika>ti sūtramanyat <pratika><quote>‘puṃstvādiva’</quote></pratika>
dityādisūtradvayamadhikaraṇāntaramiti cādhikaraṇapaṃcakātmatayā paṃcadhā vibhaktānīmāni trayodaśa sūtrāṇīti viśeṣaḥ । itaḥ
paramāpādaparisamāpteḥ pūrvādhikaraṇaprastutajīvaviṣaya evāṇutvamahattvādiśrutivirodhaḥ samādhāsyate । asminnadhikaraṇe <quote>‘vyāptā
hyātmānaḥ’</quote> aṇurhyeṣa ātmā’iti jīvaparimāṇaśrutyavirodha ucyate । atra jīvo'ṇurvā vibhurveti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘vyāptā hyātmāna’</quote>
iti yuktyanugṛhītatvena pravalayā śrutyā <quote>‘aṇurhyeṣa ātmā’</quote> iti jīvāṇutvaśrutervirodhavattvenāprāmāṇyādvibhurjīva iti
<pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> ।। <quote>‘so'smāccharīrādutkramyāmuṃ lokamabhigacchaṃtyamuṣmādimaṃ lokamāgacchantī’</quote>tyutkrāntigatyāgatiśravaṇāt <quote>‘vyāptā
hyātmāna’</quote>iti śruterīś‍varaviṣayatvācca aṇava eva te jīvā iti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ।।sūtrārthastu, sū ।। utkrāntigatyāgatīnām
।। 20 ।।</pratika> ‘so'smādityādivākyoktadehotkramaṇalokāntaragamanaitallokāgamanahetūnāṃ sakāśādaṇureva jīvo na vibhurityarthaḥ ।।
<pb n="151"/>
<pratika>sū ।। svātmanā cottarayoḥ ।। 21 ।।</pratika> caśabda evārthaḥ । jīvaḥ, <pratika>svātmanā</pratika>=svatantraparamātmanaiva tatpreraṇayaivotkrāntyā-
dimān । na svataḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>uttarayoḥ</pratika> sakāśāt <quote>‘sa etenaiva svātmanā’</quote> eṣa hyenaṃ jīvam’ ityuttaravākyadvayabalādi-
yarthaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। nāṇuratacchuteriti cennetarādhikārāt ।। 22 ।।</pratika> nanu na jīvo'ṇuḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>atacchruteḥ</pratika>—<quote>‘vyā-
ptā hyātmāna’</quote> ityaṇutvaviruddhavyāptatvaśruteḥ śravaṇāditi cenna । kutaḥ । <pratika>itarādhikārāt</pratika>=paramātmaprakaraṇāt । tathāca
vyāptatvaśruteḥ paramātmaviṣayatvānnāṇutvabādhakatvamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। svaśabdonmānābhyāṃ ca ।। 23 ।।</pratika> caḥ samuccaye । na kevalaṃ prakaraṇabalādva‍yāptatvaśrutirviṣṇuparā । kiṃ
tarhi <quote>‘eṣa hyātmādhyudgato mānaśakte’</quote> riti vākyasthasvaśabdagṛhītabrahmavācakātmaśabdādunmānaśabditāparimitatvaliṃgācca
vyāptatvaśrutirviṣṇuparaiva na jīvaparetyarthaḥ । anyāni <quote>‘avirodha’</quote> ityādīni trīṇi sūtrāṇi śāṃkaramatādaviśiṣṭārthānīti na
tāni vyākhyātāni ।। <pratika>avirodha</pratika>sūtroktāṃśatovyāptirdevānāṃ <pratika><quote>‘guṇādve’</quote></pratika> ti sūtroktā guṇato vyāptimenuṣyāṇāmiti vya-
vasyā draṣṭavyā ।। <pratika>ityutkrāntyadhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। vyatireko gandhavattathā ca darśayati ।। 26 ।।</pratika> atra jñāturjīvasyaikarūpatvānekarūpatvaśrutyavirodha ucyate ।
caśabdo <quote>‘'cintyaye’</quote> ti smṛtisamuccāyakaḥ। <quote>‘sa nityo niravayava’</quote> ityādigaupavanaśrutau jīvasyaikarūpatvamucyate <quote>‘sa pañcadhā sapta-
dhe’</quote>tyādipārāśaryāyaṇaśrutau bahurūpatvamabhidhīyate । evaṃ virodhe satyekarūpatvaśrutessayuktikatvena prabalatvātsayuktikaśrutiviro-
dhādanekarūpatvaśrutirapramāṇamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । jīvānāmaṇutve'pi aṃśavyatirekeṇa bahurūpatvamupapadyate । aṃśinaṃ vihāyāpyaṃ-
śasyānyatra gamanasya gandhādau dṛṣṭatvāt ekarūpatvaśruteḥ svarūpaikyaparatayopapatteśceti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ ।। sūtrārthastu, gandhavat</pratika>=
gandhasyeva । yathā puṣpagaṃdhasya svāṃśairvyatireko vibhāgastathāṇorapi jīvasya svāṃśairīśaśaktyā vyatireko yujyate । kutaḥ ।
<quote>‘athaika eva san’</quote> ityādiśrutiḥ <quote>‘acintyayeśaśaktyeha’</quote> ityādismṛtiśca yatastathā darśayati ata evetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti vyatirekādhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। pṛthagupadeśāt ।। 28 ।। tadga‍uṇasāratvāttu</pratika> tadva‍yapadeśaḥ prāśavat ।। 29 ।। atra jīveśabhedābhadeśrutya-
virodha ucyate । <quote>‘tatvamasyahaṃ brahmāsmī’</quote> ti ṣaḍvidhatātparyaliṃgopatejīvabrahmābhedaśrutivirodhāttadbhedaśrutirapramāṇamiti na tasyāḥ
paramārthato brahmaṇi samanvayo yukta iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘bhinno'cintyaḥ paramo jīvasaṅghāt’</quote> iti sayuktikakauśikaśrutyā tadbhe-
dopadeśāt jīvasya <quote>‘tattvamasī’</quote> tyādivyapadeśasya brahmasadṛśajñānānandādiguṇasāratvenopapadyamānatvācca bhinna eva brahmaṇo
jīva iti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu, pṛthak</pratika>=jīvaḥ paramātmano bhinnaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>upadeśāt</pratika>=<quote>‘bhinno'cintya’</quote> iti-
śruterityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>prājñavat</pratika>—brahmaṇīva । yathā prājñe brahmaṇi <quote>‘sarvaṃ svalvidaṃ brahme’</quote>ti jagadabhedoktiḥ, tathā jīve <pratika>tadva‍yapadeśaḥ</pratika>=
<quote>‘tatvamasī’</quote> ti brahmaikyauktiryujyate । kutaḥ । <pratika>tadga‍uṇasāratvāt</pratika>=jīvasya brahmaguṇasadṛśacidānandādiguṇasvarūpatvānnimittā-
dityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti pṛthagadhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। yāvadātmabhāvitvācca na doṣastaddarśanāt ।। 30 ।।</pratika> pūrvatra jīvasyāpyutpattiruktā । atastasyānāditvādi-
pratipādikā śrutirapramāṇam । utpattiśruterupādhiviṣayatve'pi upādherutpattimattve tatra brahmapratibiṃbarūpasya jīvasyāpyabhūtvā-
bhavanarūpotpatyavaśyaṃbhāvenānāditvādyayogāditi <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, yāvatparamātmā tiṣṭhatyanādyanantatvena tāvatkā-
labhāvitvena jīvo'pi nityaḥ । sarvagatasya paramātmano biṃbasya sadā sannidhānasattvāt । na copādhyutpattyā tadanāditvānu-
papattiḥ । bāhyopādherutpattimattve'pi svarūpopādhestadabhāvāt । iti । <pratika>sūtrārtha</pratika>stu, cassamuccaye darśanāccetyanveti ।
<pratika>yāvadātmabhāvitvāt</pratika>=jīvasya yāvatparamātmasattvarūpanityatvāditi yāvat । <pratika>na doṣaḥ</pratika>—<quote>‘so'nādine’</quote> ti puṇyapāpasaṃ-
bandhabodhakaśrutyaprāmāṇyadoṣo nāsti । kutaḥ । <pratika>taddarśanācca</pratika>—<quote>‘nityaḥ paro nityo jīva’</quote> iti śruteḥ <quote>‘ātmā nityaḥ sukhaduḥkhe
tvanitye’</quote> iti smṛteśceti ।। <pratika>iti yāvadadhikaraṇam ।। 15 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। puṃstvādivattvasya sato'bhivyaktiyogāt ।। 31 ।।</pratika> atra jīvasya sukhādirūpatvatadabhāvaśrutyoravirodha
ucyate । tuśabda evārthakaḥ । atra <quote>‘vijñānātmā saha devaiśca sarvai’</quote> riti jīvasya jñānānandādirūpatvaṃ vadantī śrutirapramāṇam ।
jīvasya sarvadā prakāśamānatvena tadabhinnānāṃ jñānānandādīnāṃ sadopalabdhiprasaṃgāt prakāśamānajīvasvarūpābhinneṣu teṣvāvaraṇa-
kalpanāyogāt <quote>‘duḥkhādvimukta ānandī bhavati so'jñānādvimukto jñānī bhavatī’</quote>ti muktisamayāgantukasukhādiśravaṇācca । tata-
ścaivaṃ <quote>‘samyagjñānānandādirūpatvaṃ devānāmeva । asurāstu viparītajñānaduḥkhātmakāḥ । manuṣyāḥpunarmiśrajñānasukhaduḥkhobhayātmakāḥ’</quote>
ityapi śrutirapramāṇam । asuramanuṣyāṇāmapi sukhaduḥkhakādācitkatvānubhavāt । anyathā asurāṇāṃ sarvadā duḥkhopalabdheḥ manu-
ṣyāṇāṃ sarvadā sukhaduḥkhopalabdhisāmyasya ca prasaṃgāditi <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । yathāśruti devāsuramanuṣyāṇāṃ sukhaduḥkhobhayātmakatve'pi
sata eva puṃstvādervālya ivedānīmāvṛtatvena muktyādisamaye yāvaina ivābhivyaktyā ca tathātathedānīmananubhavo muktyādisama-
yāgantukasukhādiśravaṇaṃ copapadyata iti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ। sūtrārthastu, puṃstvādivat</pratika>=puṃstvāderiva । puruṣayoṣidādīnāmapatyo-
<pb n="152"/>
atha kartradhikaraṇam. ।। 10 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।।kartā śāstrārthavattvāt ।। 33 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatra jñātṛtvamaṇutvaṃ ca nirūpitamātmanaḥ । kartṛtvamasti na veti saṃdehaḥ ।
kūṭasthasyātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ na saṃbhavati । buddhervā kartṛtvamucitaṃ, prakṛtervā । tadadhyā-
sāt svasminnāropya karteva pratibhāti । tasmādātmanaḥ kartṛtvamanupapannamiti
pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।।
siddhāntastu—ātmā kartaiva, śāstrārthavattvāt । anyathā kuryānna kuryāditi
śāstrasya vaiyyarthyaṃ syāt ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha kartradhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। kartā śāstrārthavatvāt ।। 33 ।।</pratika> āgaṃtukajñānasarvagatātmapakṣe sarvātmasanni-
dhāvutpadyamānānāmadṛṣṭādīnāṃ sarvasādhāraṇyādupalabdhyaniyama uktaḥ pūrvādhikaraṇe । tathaiva
prakṛteḥ kartṛtve tasyāssarvasādhāraṇatvāt kartṛtvasyāpyaniyamaḥ syādityucyata iti dṛṣṭāṃta-
saṃgatipradarśanāya vṛttamanukīrtayati—<pratika>pūrvamiti</pratika> । śrutivipratipattyā saṃśayaṃ darśayati—<pratika>kartṛ-
tvamiti । kūṭasthasyeti</pratika> । ātmanaḥ kauṭasthya <quote>‘masaṃgo hyayaṃ puruṣa’</quote> iti śrutyā sāmānyataḥ
pratipannam । viśiṣya ca<quote>‘hantā cenmanyate hantuṃ hataścenmanyane hatam । ubhau tau na vijā-
nīto nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate’</quote> । iti mantreṇa hananakriyāyāmakartṛtvaṃ pratipannam । tadapi
nyāyasāmyāt kriyāmātra evākartṛtvaparaṃ paryavasyati । tatra hantumityauṇādikastumunpra-
tyayaḥ । hantāramātmānaṃ manyata ityarthaḥ । <quote>‘ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ yaścainaṃ manyate hatam । ubhau
tau na vijānīto nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate’</quote> । iti gītāvacanāt । nanvātmana । kauṭasthye
kathamahaṃ karteti pratibhāsaḥ ityāśaṃkya sāṃkhyamaryādayā prakṛtikāryabuddhidharmasya prakṛti-
dharmasya vā kartṛtvasyādhyāsarūpatayā tadupapādayati—<pratika>buddherveti</pratika> । śāstramapi bhokturātmana-
stathābhūtameva kartṛtvamapekṣya pravartate । upādānavihāropadeśādikamapi tadavalaṃbanamiti
bhāvaḥ । <pratika>anyatheti</pratika> । buddheḥ prakṛtervā kartṛtve kuryānna kuryāditi niyuñjānayorvidhiniṣedha-
śāstrayorvaiyarthyaṃ syāt । kartā hi niyujyate bhoktaiva ca kartā bhavati । <quote>‘śāstraphalaṃ prayoktarī’</quote>ti
nyāyāt । na cācetanāyā buddheḥ prakṛtervā bhok‍tṛtvamasti । api ca । śāstreṇa kartā
bodhajananadvārā niyujyate । na cācetanayorbodhanīyatvamasti । ato bhok‍tṛtvāt bodhanī-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tpattiśaktisvarūpatve'pi yathā kālaviśeṣe tadabhivyaktistathā <pratika>sataḥ</pratika>=jīvasvarūpatvena mukteḥ pūrvamapi vidyamānasyaiva । <pratika>asya</pratika>=
jñānānandāde । <pratika>abhivyaktiyogāt</pratika>=muktāvabhivyaktyā nimittabhūtayā yogāt <quote>‘ānandī bhavatī’</quote>ti śrutyupapatterna jīva-
syānandādirūpatve tacchrutivirodha iti jīva ānandādirūpa evetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। nityopalabdhyanupalabdhiprasaṃgo'nyataraniyamo vānyathā ।। 32 ।।</pratika> vāśabdo vyavasthitavikalpārthaḥ ।
upalabdhiranubhavaḥ । <pratika>anyathā</pratika>=jīvasyānandādirūpatvamaṅgīkṛtyāvaraṇānaṅgīkāre । <pratika>nityopalabdhyanupalabdhiprasaṃgaḥ</pratika>—
gathāyogyamanvayaḥ । muktiyogyānāṃ nityamānandānubhavaḥ syāt । tamoyogyānāṃ na kadāpyānandānubhavaḥ syāt kiṃ tu svarūpa-
duḥkhānubhava eva syāt । evaṃ madhyamamanuṣyāṇā<pratika>manyataraniyamaḥ</pratika>— anyatarayossukhaduḥkhānubhavayo<pratika>rniyamaḥ</pratika> sāmyameva
syāt । pratibandhakībhūtāvaraṇānabhyupagamādityarthaḥ । tasmājjīvasyāvaraṇamavaśyamaṅgīkāryamiti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>ityānandatīrthamate puṃstvādhikaraṇam ।। 16 ।।</head>
<pb n="153"/>
<sutra>।। sū ।। upādānādvihāropadeśācca ।। 34 ।।</sutra>
<p><quote>‘evamevaiṣa etān prāṇān gṛhītvā sve śarīre yathākāmaṃ parivartate’</quote> ityupā-
dānavihāropadeśābhyāṃ cāyaṃ kartaiva ।।
yaduktaṃ buddhiprakṛtyoreva kartṛtvamiti tatra buddheḥ kartṛtvapakṣaṃ dūṣayati—
<sutra>।। sū ।। vyapadeśācca kriyāyāṃ na cennirdeśaviparyayaḥ ।। 35 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘vijñānaṃ yajñaṃ tanute’</quote> ityādinā yajñādau kartṛtvavyapadeśāccātmaiva kartā ।
vijñānaśabdena buddheḥ vyapadeśaḥ, nātmana iti cet na, tathā sati <quote>‘vijñānena’</quote> iti
nirdeśaviparyayaḥ syāt । anyatra hi buddhivivakṣāyāṃ vijñānaśabdasya karaṇavibha-
ktinirdeśo dṛśyate <quote>‘tadeṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ vijñānena vijñānamādāya’</quote> iti । ato buddheḥ
karaṇatvāt kartṛtvaṃ nāstīti ।।
prakṛteḥ kartṛtvapakṣaṃ dūṣayati—
<sutra>।। sū ।। upalabdhivadaniyamaḥ ।। 36 ।।</sutra>
prakṛteḥ kartṛtve tasyāḥ sarvasādhāraṇatvena pūrvoktopalabdhyaniyamavat phalā-
niyamaḥ syāt ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
yatvāccātmaiva śāstrairniyujyata iti sa eva karteti yuktam । nanu kauṭasthyaśrutyanurodhāda-
kartāsāvanyagataṃ kartṛtvamadhyasyatītyādhyāsikakartṛtvāpekṣā vidhiniṣedhaśāstrapravṛttirvarṇanī-
yeti cenna । kūṭasthe ahaṃ kartetyāroparūpasyādhyāsasyāpi niṣpattyasaṃbhavāt । tasmāda-
dhyāso'pyātmaprabhāsthānīyadharmajñānapariṇāmarūpatayā taddharmatāṃ netavya iti tathaiva kṛtirapi
taddharmatāṃ nīyatāṃ kimarthaṃ bādhānupalaṃbhe'pyahaṃ kartteti pratibhāsasya bhrāṃtirūpatvaṃ śāstrasya
bhrāṃtikṛtakartṛtvāvalambanatvaṃ ca kalpyate । asaṃgatvaśrutirātmanaḥ svayameva jñānakṛtyādi-
pariṇāmitvābhāvaviṣayā bhaviṣyati । <quote>‘hantā cenmanyate hantu’</quote> miti mantrastu <quote>‘na jāyate
mriyate vā vipaści’</quote> diti pūrvamantre <quote>‘na hanyate hanyamāne pi dehe’</quote> iti śarīrātiriktasyā-
tmano hananāyogyatvena prakṛtatvāt bhramarūpastaddhantṛtvābhimāna ityetadviṣayatayopapadyata
iti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। upādānādvihāropateśācca ।। 34 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘evamevaiṣa’</quote> ityasya dṛṣṭāntaḥ
<quote>‘sa yathā mahārājo jānapatān gṛhītvā sve janapade yathākāmaṃ parivartata’</quote> iti pūrvavākyani-
rdiṣṭaḥ । atra gṛhītvetyuktamindriyāṇāṃ grahaṇamupādānam । <quote>‘yathākāmaṃ parivartata’</quote> ityuktaḥ
svāpnasañcāro vihāraḥ । <pratika>dūṣayatīti</pratika> । ātmanaḥ kartṛtve kiñcitpramāṇamupanyasya tasya buddhi-
viṣayatvaśaṅkodbhāvanena tasyāḥ kartṛtvaṃ dūṣayatītyarthaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। vyapadeśācca kriyāyāṃ na
cennirdeśaviparyayaḥ ।। 35 ।। anyatra hīti</pratika> । yatra buddhikāryamucyate tatra buddheḥ karaṇa-
tayaiva nirdeśo dṛśyata ityarthaḥ । tatsvapnadaśāyāmeteṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ vijñānaṃ grahaṇa-
śaktiṃ vijñānena buddha‍yā gṛhītveti śrutyarthaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। upalabdhivadaniyamaḥ ।। 36 ।।</pratika>
adṛṣṭamanassaṃyogādīnāṃ sarvasādharaṇatvāt tatkṛtopalabdhyaniyamaprasaṅgaḥ pūrvādhikaraṇāpā-
ditaḥ iha sarvasādhāraṇāyāḥ prakṛteḥ kartṛtāyāmāpādyamāne phalāniyame dṛṣṭāntaḥ । <pratika>sū ।।</pratika>
<pb n="154"/>
<sutra>।। sū ।। śaktiviparyayāt ।। 37 ।।</sutra>
prakṛteḥ kartṛtve kartureva bhoktṛtvamiti saiva bhoktrī syāt । tataścātmano
bhoktṛtvaśakterviparyayo hāniḥ syāt ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। samādhyabhāvācca ।। 38 ।।</sutra>
kiṃca । prakṛtereva kartṛtve prakṛteranyo'smīti samādhyabhāvaprasaṅgācca kartā''tmā ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। yathā ca takṣobhayathā ।। 39 ।।</sutra>
ātmanaḥ kartṛtve icchāyāṃ karoti anyadā na karotyātmeti vyavasthā, yathā
takṣā svakārye tatheti । buddherevecchāsaṃbhavānnāvyavastheti cet—na । cetanadharmatvādi-
cchāyāḥ । tasmādātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ, na buddhernāpi prakṛteriti nirṇayaḥ ।।
iti kartradhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>śaktiviparyayāt ।। 37 ।। tataśceti</pratika> । buddhereva bhoktṛtve tadatiriktātmasiddhiśca na
syāditi bhāvaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। samādhyabhāvācca ।। 38 ।।</pratika> prakṛteḥ kartṛtve samādhāvapi saiva
kartrī vācyā । sā ca svātmānaṃ prakṛteranyatvena dhyātuṃ na śaknotīti samādhireva lupye-
tetyarthaḥ ।। ātmanaḥ kartṛtva iva buddheḥ prakṛtervā kartṛtve kartṛtvasya kālaniyamo na syādi-
tyāpādanārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>sū ।। yathā ca takṣobhayatā ।। 39 ।। svakārya iti</pratika> viṣayasaptamī ।
icchāyāṃ karoti anyadā na karotīti pūrvavākyādanuṣaṃgaḥ । tathā ca yathā vāsyādikaraṇa-
saṃpanno'pi takṣaṇecchāyāṃ tatkaroti anyadā na karotīti vyavasthā । evaṃ vāgādikaraṇasaṃpa-
nno'pyātmā bhogecchāyāṃ karoti anyadā na karotīti vyavasthā yujyate । buddhiprakṛtyo-
stadabhāvātsā na siddha‍yet । buddheḥ prakṛtervā bhogatadicchayoraṃgīkāre ca tadatiriktātmā-
na siddha‍yediti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>iti kartradhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</pratika></p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām atha kartradhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। kartā śāstrārthavattvāt ।। 33 ।। upādānādvihāropadeśācca ।। 34 ।। vyapadeśācca kriyāyāṃ na
cennirdeśaviparyayaḥ ।।35।। upalabdhivadaniyamaḥ ।।36।। śaktiviparyayāt ।।37।। samādhyabhāvācca ।।38।।
yathā ca takṣobhayathā ।। 39 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>nāyaṃ hantītyādeḥ śravaṇādetasya kartṛtā nāsti । buddhereva tu sā syāt vijñānaṃ yajñamityādeḥ ।। 146 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>śāstrārthavattvamukhyairhetubhiretasya kartṛtāstyeva । ayameva ca vijñānaṃ śravaṇaṃ tu tadasya hantyayogyatvāt ।। 147 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti kartradhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām atha kartradhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। kartā śāstrārthavattvāt ।। 33 ।। upādānādvihāropadeśācca ।। 34 ।। vyapadeśācca kriyāyāṃ na
cennirdeśaviparyayaḥ ।। 35 ।। upalabdhivadaniyamaḥ ।। 36 ।। śaktiviparyayāt ।। 37 ।। samādhyabhāvācca
।। 38 ।। yathā ca takṣobhayathā ।। 39 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ jīvasyāṇutvaṃ parāṇudya svayaṃjyotiṣṭvādivatsarvagatatvaṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam । adhunā buddheḥ kartṛtvaniṣedha-
pūrvakaṃ tasya kartṛtvaṃ sādhayati—<pratika>sū ।। kartā śāstrārthavattvāt ।। 33 ।।</pratika> atra kiṃ buddhiḥ kartrī uta jīva iti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> ।
pariṇāmitvādba‍uddhiriti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । <pratika>siddhāntastu</pratika>, ātmaiva kartā na buddhiḥ । karturapekṣitopāyabodhakavidhiśāstrasya
arthavattvāt । yadi buddhiḥ kartrī phalabhoktā cātmetyucyeta tarhi tādṛśavidhiśāstramanarthakaṃ syāt । ato na kevalabuddheḥ
kartṛtvamapi tvātmana iti ।।</p>
<p>kiṃca <pratika>।। sū ।। vihāropadeśāt ।। 34 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘sve śarīre yathākāmaṃ parivartate’</quote> iti jīvaprakaraṇe svapnāvasthāyāṃ <pratika>vihā-
rasya</pratika>=saṃcaraṇasyopadeśāt । akartussaṃcaraṇāyogādātmanaḥ <pratika>kartṛtvamityartha</pratika> ।।</p>
<pb n="155"/>
<p>kiṃca <pratika>।। sū ।। upādānāt ।। 35 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘prāṇānāṃ vijñānena vijñānamādāya’</quote> ityātmano grahaṇaśaktyupādānaśravaṇāt
akarturupādānāyogādātmanaḥ kartṛtvamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>apica <pratika>।। sū ।। vyapadeśācca kriyāyāṃ na cennirdeśaviparyayaḥ ।। 36 ।। kriyāyām</pratika>=<quote>‘vijñānaṃ yajñaṃ tanute’</quote>
ityādau laukikavaidikakriyāyām । <pratika>vyapadeśācca</pratika>=vijñānaśabdavācyasyātmanaḥ kartṛtvavyapadeśāt । <pratika>na cet</pratika>=yadi vijñāna-
śabdo buddhiparaḥ jīvaparo nacet tarhi <pratika>nirdeśaviparyayaḥ</pratika>=buddheḥ karaṇatvena vijñānamiti kartṛtvanirdeśasya vijñāneneti karaṇatva-
viparyayaḥ syādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu svataṃtrasyātmanaḥ kartṛtve aniṣṭaṃ na kuryādiṣṭameva kuryādityata āha—<pratika>sū ।। upalabdhivadaniyamaḥ ।। 37 ।।</pratika> yadva-
dupalabdhau svatantro'pyātmā iṣṭamaniṣṭaṃ copalabhate tadvadiṣṭamaniṣṭaṃ ca sādhayatītyaniyama ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>itaścātmana eva kartṛtvaṃ na buddherityāha—<pratika>sū ।। śaktiviparyayāt ।। 38 ।।</pratika> buddheḥ kartṛtve karaṇaśaktirhīyeteti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p>jñānasādhanavidhyanyathānupapattyāpi ātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ svīkāryamityāha—<pratika>sū ।। samādhyabhāvācca ।। 39 ।।</pratika> ātmano'ka-
rtṛtve <quote>‘ātmā vā are draṣṭavya’</quote> ityādau vihitasya brahmasākṣātkārasādhanasya samādherabhāvaprasaṃgādātmanaḥ kartṛtvasiddhiḥ ।।
asminmate ānandatīrthamate ca <quote>‘vihāropadeśāt’</quote> <quote>‘upādānāt’</quote> iti viparyayeṇa cakāramantarā pṛthagyogavibhāgaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti bhagavatpādamate kartradhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।</head>
<head>atha takṣādikaraṇam ।। 15 ।।</head>
<p>tacca kartṛtvamadhyastamātmanītyāhaḥ—<pratika>sū ।। yathā ca takṣobhayathā ।। 40 ।।</pratika> atra <quote>‘asaṃgo hyayaṃ purūṣaḥ’</quote> ityasaṃgatvaśruteḥ
karturiṣṭasādhanabodhakavidhivākyena virodho'sti naveti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । pūrvoktaśāstrārthavattvādihetubhiḥ kartṛtvasya svābhāvikatayā
tatpratipādakavidhiśāstreṇa virodho'stīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, na svābhāvikamātmanaḥ kartṛtvam api tvaupādhikam ।
yathāṃ loke ubhayathā takṣā vāsyādīni karaṇānyapekṣya kartā san duḥkhī bhavati anapekṣya tu svarūpeṇākartā sukhī bhavati
tathātmāpi buddha‍yādikaraṇānyapekṣya kartā saṃsarati anapekṣya tu svabhāvato'kartā paramānandaghana eva bhavati । vidhiśāstraṃ tu
kartṛtvaṃ vinānupapannaṃ tatsādhayati na tu tasya svābhāvikatvamapīti na tenāsaṃgatvaśrutervirodha iti siddham ।।</p>
<head>iti bhagavatpādamate takṣādhikaraṇam ।। 15 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate,</pratika> jñātṛtvavadātmanaḥ kartṛtvamasti na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । kūṭasthasyātmanaḥ kartṛtvāsaṃbhavāt buddhervā prakṛtervā samu-
citaṃ tatkartṛtvam । ātmā tadadhyāsātsvasminnāropya karteva pratibhātītyatastasya kartṛtvamanupapannamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhā-
ntastu</pratika>, vidhiniṣedhaśāstrayorvaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt, <quote>‘evamevaiṣa etānprāṇāngṛhītvā sve śarīre yathākāmaṃ parīvartate’</quote> ityupādāna-
vihāropadeśābhyāṃ, <quote>‘vijñānaṃ yajñaṃ tanute’</quote> ityādinā yajñādau kartṛtvavyapadeśāt, buddhivivakṣāyāṃ <quote>‘vijñānena’</quote> iti karaṇavi-
bhaktinirdeśasya viparyayaprasaṃgācca prakṛteḥ kartṛtve upalabdhyaniyamavatphalāniyamaprasaṃgāt, bhoktṛtvaśaktiviparyayaprasakteḥ prakṛte-
ranyo'smīti samādhyabhāvaprasaṅgācca, ātmā kartaiva । tasmādātmana eva kartṛtvaṃ na buddhernāpi prakṛteriti nirṇayaḥ ।। iti ।।
yadyapi saṃdehapūrvapakṣādikamaviśiṣṭameva śāṃkaramatāditi vaktumucitaṃ tathāpi keṣāṃcitsūtrāṇāmarthavarṇanaprakāraḥ paraṃ kiṃcidiva
bhidyate । tacca svayaṃ subodhamiti nātra prapañcyate ।। <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, atrāpi <quote>‘yathā ca takṣobhayathā’</quote> ityantaṃ śrīkaṇṭhamata-
vadekamadhikaraṇam । pradhānasyaiva kartṛtvādātmano na kartṛtvamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntasūtrārthavarṇanā</pratika>dikamanyatsarvamavi
śiṣṭameva śrīkaṇṭhamatāditi viramyate vivaraṇataḥ । antimasūtrasya yathā takṣā icchāyāṃ karoti anyadā na karotīti
vyavasthā evamātmanaḥ kartṛtva eva sā vyavasthā yujyeta । buddha‍yādīnāmacetanatvāccetanadharmatvāccecchāyā ityarthaḥ ।। iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate, <quote>‘parāttu tacchruteḥ’</quote></pratika> ityādyuttarādhikaraṇasūtrayorapyatraivādhikaraṇe'ntarbhāvaḥ । sūtrayogavibhāgādikaṃ
śāṃkaramatavadeva । saṃdehapūrvapakṣādikamapyaviśiṣṭaṃ pūrvasmātprāyaśaḥ । atrādhikaraṇe jīvakartṛtvākartṛtvaviṣayaśrutivirodhaḥ parihriyate ।
sūtrārthavarṇane paramasti kiṃcidiva vailakṣaṇyamiti tanmātraṃ nirūpyate—<pratika>sū ।। kartā śāstrārthavattvāt ।। 33 ।। jīvo'pi
kartā</pratika> । kutaḥ । tathāsatyeva <pratika>śāstrārthavattvāt</pratika>=vidhiniṣedharūpaśāstrasya prayojanavattvāt anyathā vaiyarthyaprasaṃgādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। vihāropadeśāt ।। 34 ।।</pratika> muktāva/?/pi <quote>‘jakṣankrīḍa’</quote> nniti vihārakartṛtvokteḥ jīvaḥ paramārthata eva kartā na
kālpanikakartetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। upādānāt ।। 35 ।।</pratika> jīvasya mokṣārthe sādhanādyanuṣṭhānadarśanāttataḥ phaladarśanācca na jīvaḥ saṃsāre'pi kālpa-
nikakartetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। vyapadeśācca kriyāyāṃ na cennirdeśaviparyayaḥ ।। 36 ।। kriyāyām</pratika>=<quote>‘ātmānameva lokamupāsīte’</quote> tyukto
pāsanakriyāyām । <pratika>vyapadeśācca</pratika>=jīvasya kartṛtvokteśca । <pratika>na cet</pratika>=jīvaḥ kartā na cet । <pratika>nirdeśaviparyayaḥ=nirde-
śasya=jīvasya</pratika> kartṛtveneś‍varasya karmatvena vacanasya । <pratika>viparyayaḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘ātmaivopāsīte’</quote>tyevaṃrūpavaiparītyaṃ syādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<pb n="156"/>
atha parāyattādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। parāttu tacchateḥ ।। 40 ।।</sutra>
jñātṛtvaṃ kartṛtvaṃ ca pratipāditamātmanaḥ । tat kartṛtvaṃ svāyattamīśvarāyattaṃ
veti saṃdehaḥ ।।
svāyattamiti prāptam । anyathā karmasviṣṭāniṣṭarūpeṣu vyāpārayan jīvamī-
śvaro vaiṣamyādidoṣabhājanaṃ syāt । kiṃca—jīvasya pravṛtterīśvarāyattatve tasya
kartṛtvābhāvādvidhipratiṣedhavaiyarthyaṃ ca syāt । tasmājjīvasya svāyattā pravṛttiḥ ।।
iti prāpte brūmaḥ— parameśvarāyattameva jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ, na svāyattam । <quote>‘ya ātmā-
namantaro yamayati’</quote> iti śruteḥ ।।
yaduktamīśvarasya jīvaṃ pravartayato vaiṣamyādikam, asya ca vidhipratiṣedhavaiyarthya-
miti, tatrāha—
<sutra>।। sū ।। kṛtaprayatnāpekṣastu vihitapratiṣiddhāvaiyarthyādibhyaḥ ।। 41 ।।</sutra>
jīvaḥ svecchayā pravṛttinivṛttihetuṃ karoti svakarmapākavaśena, jīvakṛtaprayatnaṃ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha parāyattādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। parāttu tacchruteḥ ।। 40 ।।</pratika> kartṛtve ciṃtite tadviśeṣaścintyata iti saṃgatimabhipretya
vṛttānukīrttanam । kartṛtvopapādakatayā tu jñātṛtvamanūditam । tatkartṛtvamiti । vidhi-
niṣedhaśāstrāṇāmantaryāmitvaśravaṇānāñca vipratipattiḥ sandehabījam । <pratika>vaiyarthyaṃ ca syāditi</pratika> ।
vidhiniṣedhaśāstrāvaiyarthyāya hi prāgātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ samarthitam । tasya kartṛtvasya parāyattatve
tadvaiyarthyaṃ tadavasthameva syāditi tatsamarthanamapi śithilībhavediti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। kṛtapraya-
t‍nāpekṣastu vihitapratiṣiddhāvaiyarthyādibhyaḥ ।। 41 ।।</pratika> nanu yadi jīvaḥ svecchayā kañcidyatnaṃ
karoti tarhi tatraiva tasya svātantryamabhyupagataṃ syādityāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>svakarmeti</pratika> । svakarmapāka-
vaśena yā svecchā tayeti yojanā । tathā ca parameśvarakāritapūrvakarmamūlasvecchādhīne yatne
parameśvarādhīnatvaṃ na hīyata iti bhāvaḥ । pūrvakarmāpi parameśvarakāritatatpūrvakarmamūlasve-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>sū ।। upalabdhivadaniyamaḥ ।। 37 ।। upalabdhivat</pratika>=upalabdhāviva । yathā jītasya jñāne svecchānusāreṇa jñānālābhaḥ
tathā kriyāyāmapi aniyamo yukta ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। śaktiviparyayāt ।। 38 ।।</pratika> īśajīvayoḥ । <pratika>śaktiviparyayāt</pratika> pūrṇāpūrṇarūpaśaktibhedamapekṣya kartṛtvamapi svata-
ntraparatantramedabhinnamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। samādhyabhāvācca ।। 39 ।।</pratika> <pratika>samādhi</pratika>ralaṃbuddhi<pratika>stadabhāvā</pratika>nna jīvasya svatantrakartṛtvaṃ kiṃ tu paratantrakartṛ-
tvamevetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। yathā ca takṣobhayathā ।। 40 ।।</pratika> dārṣṭāntikasamuccaye caśabdaḥ । <pratika>yathā takṣā</pratika>=vardhakiḥ । <pratika>ubhayathā</pratika>=prāsādā-
dikārayitṛpreritatvena tatkartṛtvena ca vyapadiśyate tathā īś‍varaniyato'pi jīvaḥ karteti vaktuṃ śakyata ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। parāttu tacchruteḥ ।। 41 ।।</pratika> jīvasya kartṛtvaśaktiḥ <pratika>parāttu</pratika> =paramātmānamanusṛtyaiva tadadhīnaivāsti । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>tacchruteḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘kartṛtvaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ ce’</quote>ti jīvakartṛtvasyeśādhīnatvaśravaṇādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। kṛtaprayat‍nāpekṣastu vihitapratiṣiddhāvaiyarthyādibhyaḥ ।। 42 ।।</pratika> turavadhāraṇe । yataḥ paramātmā <pratika>vihitapra-
tiṣiddhāvaiyarthyādibhyaḥ</pratika>=tādarthye caturthī । vidhiniṣedhaśāstrāvaiyarthyāya svasya vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyaparihārāya ca । <pratika>kṛtaprayatnā-
pekṣastu</pratika>=jīvakarmaprayatnayogyatāmapekṣamāṇa eva । jīvaṃ prerayati । ato jīvaśakterīśādhīnatve'pi tasyāpekṣitakṛti-
matvamastyevetyarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ kartradhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</pratika>
<pb n="157"/>
pravṛttinivṛttihetumavekṣya tadanumatidānena paraḥ pravartayatīti vidhiniṣedhāvaiyarthyaṃ
nigrahānugrahādibhyo'vagamyate । yathā gurūtaradārvādiharaṇaṃ bālaḥ prabalasahāyaḥ
kurvannapi svaprayatne vidhiniṣedhayogyo bhavati, evaṃ jīvaḥ parameśvarasahāyaḥ pravarta-
māno'pi svayaṃ vidhiniṣedhayogyo bhavati । ato jīvakṛtaprayatnāpekṣatvāt karmasu
jīvasya pravartaka īśvaro na vaiṣamyabhāk । tasyāpi svādhīnapravṛttisadbhāvāt vidhi-
niṣedhādivaiyarthyaṃ ca na saṃbhavatīti siddham ।। iti parā yattādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
cchādhīnam ityanādiḥ karmapravāha ityato nānavasthā doṣaḥ । tadanumatidāneneti । nanu,
prayat‍nakāraṇecchājanakakarmakārayitṛtvena prayat‍ne mūlakāraṇabhūta īśvaro nānumanteti vyapa-
deśārhaḥ । pravṛttapravarttako'numanteti prasiddheḥ । kintu prayojayiteti vyapadeśārha iti cedu-
cyate । yasyecchāṃ vijñāya yastadiṣṭaṃ nirvartayituṃ pravartate sa tasya prayojayiteti vyapadi-
ś‍yate । yathā rājā bhṛtyasya । na1 ceśvaraḥ puruṣecchāṃ vijñāya tadiṣṭo yāga iti taṃ nirvarta-
yituṃ pravartate kiṃ tu vidhitaḥ sveṣṭasādhanamiti vijñāya puruṣaḥ pravartate । ato'tra na prayo-
jayitṛvyapadeśaḥ kṛtaḥ । svarasoditayā svecchayā pravartamānaṃ prati pravartakatvāttvanumantṛ-
vyapadeśaḥ kṛtaḥ । <pratika>vidhiniṣedheti</pratika> । evaṃ svarasoditasvecchādhīnāmeva jīvapravṛttiṃ prati
parameśvarasyāpi kālādṛṣṭādivatkāraṇatvābhyupagame vidhiniṣedhayorna vaiyarthyam । svecchā-
dhīnapravṛttimato niyogārhatvāt । nāpi kopaprasādādikṛtalaukikapravṛttinivṛttyanubhava-
virodha iti bhāvaḥ । nanu, cetanapravṛttāvacetanasya kālādṛṣṭadeḥ kāraṇatvamastu nāma । tatra
cetanāṃtarāpekṣāyāṃ rājādhīnabhṛtyapravṛttinyāyena pāratantryaṃ syāditi vidhiniṣedhāyogyatvā-
diprasaṃgastadavastha ityāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>yatheti</pratika> । evaṃ ca vaiṣamyadoṣo'pi na prasajyata iti darśa-
yannadhikaraṇārthamupasaṃharatiḥ—<pratika>ata iti</pratika> । <pratika>iti parāyattādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</pratika></p>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha parāyattādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। parāttu tacchruteḥ ।। 40 ।। kṛtaprayat‍nāpekṣastu vihitapratiṣiddhāvaiyarthyādibhyaḥ ।। 41 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>sā tu svādhīnā syādasya na parameśvarādhīnā । asya hi paratantratve vidhivaiyarthyādidoṣaḥ syāt ।। 148 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>puruṣodyogamapekṣya kriyate'ntaryāmiṇānumatiḥ । tanna vidhervaiyarthyaṃ nāntaryāmitvabādho'pi ।। 149 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti parāyattādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha parāyattādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। parāttu tacchruteḥ ।। 40 ।। kṛtaprayatnāpekṣastu vihitapratiṣiddhāvaiyarthyādibhyaḥ ।। 41 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika> jīvasyaupādhikaṃ tatkartṛtvamapīś‍varāyattamityāha—<pratika>sū ।। parāttu tacchruteḥ ।। 41 ।।</pratika> atra <quote>‘eṣa hyeva
sādhukarma kārayatī’</quote> tyādiśrutervidhyādiśāstreṇa virodho'sti na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । rāgadveṣādivaśātsvata evātmanaḥ kartṛtvasaṃ-
bhavāt tatpratipādakavidhyādiśāstreṇa virodho'stīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, sautratuśabdaḥ purvapakṣavyāvartakaḥ । na svato
jīvasya kartṛtvādisiddhiḥ । kiṃ tu <pratika>tat</pratika>=aupādhikaṃ kartṛtvam । <pratika>parāt</pratika>=parasmādīś‍varātkarmādhyakṣāt । avidyātimirāndhasya
jīvasya kartṛtvādisaṃsārasiddhiḥ । īś‍varānugrahe tu vijñānena mokṣasidbhirbhaviṣyati । kṛtaḥ । <pratika>tacchruteḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘eṣa hyeva sādhukarma
kārayatī’</quote> tyādikāyāḥ śruteḥ tasyeśvarasya hetukartṛtvamavasīyata ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<note>1 <quote>‘na ceśvarecchāṃ vijñāya tadiṣṭo yāga iti taṃ nirvartayituṃ puruṣaḥ pravartate kiṃtu vidhitaḥ sveṣṭasādhanamiti vijñāya ।’</quote>
iti ka ga pāṭhaḥ । kha pāṭha eva samīcīna iti so'trādṛta iti vijñeyam ।</note>
<pb n="158"/>
athāṃśādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। aṃśo nānāvyapadeśādanyathā cāpi dāśaki-
tavāditvamadhīyata eke ।। 42 ।।</sutra>
nityo jñātāṇuḥ kartā parameśvarasāhāyyāpekṣapravṛttirjīva iti pūrvatra nirū-
pitam । sa iha parameśvara eva ? kiṃ vā tadaṃśabhūtaḥ ? ।।
iti saṃśaye parameśvara iti pūrvaḥpakṣaḥ । parameśvara eva bahuvidhopādhivaśā-
jjīvabhāvamupagato dṛśyate, yathaikamākāśaṃ ghaṭādyupādhivaśānnānākāraṃ dṛśyate
paricchinnaṃ ca । tathā hi śrutiḥ—<quote>‘ayamātmā brahma’</quote> iti vadati । tasmādīśvara
evājñānājjīvabhāvamupagata iti ।।
siddhāntastu—jīvātmā parameśvarasyāṃśo mūrtyekadeśa eva । <quote>‘anena jīvenātmanā-
nupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi’</quote> <quote>‘ya ātmani tiṣṭhan’</quote> pṛthagātmānaṃ preritāraṃ ca
matvā’ ।। <quote>‘māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram । tasyāvayavabhūtena vyāptaṃ sarva-
midaṃ jagat’</quote> ।। ityādiṣu nānāvyapadeśāt । yaduktaṃ <quote>‘ayamātmā brahma’</quote>ityādinā
brahmaṇa eva jīvatvamiti , tatrāha—anyathā <quote>‘tattvamasi’</quote> <quote>‘ayamātmā brahma’</quote>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>athāṃśādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। aṃśo nānāvyapadeśādanyathā cāpi dāśakitavāditvamadhīyata eke ।। 42 ।।</pratika>
pratipattisaukaryāya jīvapeṭikāyāṃ vṛttamarthamanuvadan saṅgatiṃ sūcayati—<pratika>nitya iti</pratika> । yatsā-
hāyyāpekṣayā jīvaḥ pravartata iti nirūpitaṃ sa eva parameśvaraḥ satyopādhyavacchedena mithyo-
pādhyavacchedena vā kalpitabhedassan jīva iti vyavahriyate utāntargaṇikabhede pāramārthike
satyeva viśeṣaṇatvena viśiṣṭaikadeśatayā parameśvarāṃśo jīva iti abhedaśruterbhedaśruteśca viprati-
pattitassaṃśaye sati pūrvapakṣaḥ । bhedābhedaśrutyoranyatarasyāvaśyamamukhyārthatve kalpanīye lāghavā-
dabhedaśrutirmukhyārtheti bhedaśruterghaṭākāśādibhedavyapadeśavadamukhyārthatvaṃ kalpyata ityevaṃ prāpte
siddhāntaḥ—jīvaḥ parameśvarasyāṃśaḥ śarīratvena viśiṣṭaikadeśa ityarthaḥ । nānāvyapadeśāt <quote>‘ya
ātmani tiṣṭhanni’</quote> tyādiśrutiṣu bhedavyapadeśāt । anyathā ca vyapadeśāt <quote>‘tattvama’</quote> syādi-
śrutiṣvabhedenāpi vyapadeśāt । api caike śākhinaḥ ātharvaṇikāḥ parameśvarasyaiva dāśa-
kitavādirūpatvamadhīyate <quote>‘brahma dāśā’</quote> ityādinā । evaṃ jīvaparayośśarīraśarīribhāvakṛtaviśi-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nanvīś‍varasya kārayitṛtve vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye syātāmityata āha—<pratika>kṛtaprayatnāpekṣa ityādi</pratika> । tuśabda uktaśaṃkānirāsakaḥ ।
jīvena kṛto yaḥ prayatno dharmādharmalakṣaṇastadapekṣa eveś‍varo'nyasminnapi janmani dharmādikaṃ kārayati tadapekṣaśca sukhādiphalaṃ
prayacchatīti na vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyaprasaktiḥ । anāditvātsaṃsārasya prāktanadharmādyapekṣā yuktaiva । nanu kasmāttadapekṣatvamata āha—
<pratika>vihitapratiṣiddhāvaiyarthyādibhyaḥ</pratika>=īś‍varasya karmāpekṣatve <quote>‘jyotiṣṭomena yajeta’</quote> <quote>‘brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ’</quote> iti vidhiniṣedha-
yoravaiyarthyaṃ bhavati । anyathā vidhiniṣedhaśāstramanarthakameva syāt । evaṃ ceś‍varakartṛtvapratipādakavidhyādiśāstreṇa <quote>‘eṣa hyeva
sādhukarma kārayatī’</quote> tyādiśāstrasya na virodha iti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika> tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> ca sūtrārthanirūpaṇaprakāravaiṣamye'pi saṃdehapūrvapakṣādiṣu nāsti vaiṣamyaṃ śāṃkaramatā-
diti viramyate pṛthaktatprapañcanataḥ ।। iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, anayoḥ sūtrayoḥ pūrvādhikaraṇaśeṣatayā tatraiva tadvivaraṇaṃ kṛtamiti vedyam ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ parāyattādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<pb n="159"/>
<p>ityādikādva‍yapadeśāt tayorjīvabrahmaṇorvyāpyavyāpakabhāvenānanyatvam । api ca
tathaivānanyatvamadhīyata eke—<quote>‘brahma dāśā brahma dāsā brahmeme kitavā uta’</quote> ityā-
dinā brahmaṇoṃ'śatve'pi jīvasya tadva‍yāptatayā tadva‍yapadeśo yuktaḥ, yathā vahninā
vyāptasya kāṣṭhādervahnivyapadeśaḥ । tathāpi hi tayorvahnikāṣṭhayornābhedaḥ । tasmā-
jjīvo brahmaṇoṃ'śabhūta eva tatsvarūpaṃ pratipadyate । brahmaṇa evājñānājjīvabhāva-
kalpane bahuśrutivirodhādidoṣaprasaktirdurvārā ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। mantravarṇāt ।। 43 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘pādosya viśvā bhūtāni’</quote> iti mantravarṇācca brahmaṇoṃ'śa eva jīvaḥ ।
<quote>‘māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram । tasyāvayavabhūtena vyāptaṃ sarvamidaṃ
jagat’</quote> ।। iti śrutiḥ prakṛtitvaṃ māyāyāstadviśiṣṭatvaṃ maheśvarasya tadavayavabhūtatvaṃ
sarvasya jagataḥ prakaṭayati । tato māyinaḥ parameśvarasyāvayavaleśaḥ purūṣaḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। api ca smaryate ।। 44 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘ātmā tasyāṣṭamī mūrtiḥ śivasya paramātmanaḥ । vyāpiketaramūrtīnāṃ viśvaṃ
tasmācchivātmakam ।।’</quote> iti smaraṇācca śivasya mūrtyekadeśa ātmā ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। prakāśādivattu naivaṃ paraḥ ।। 45 ।।</sutra>
brahmaṇoṃ'śatve'pi jīvasya jīvo yatsvarūpo yatsvabhāvaśca naivaṃ parameśvaraḥ,
kiṃtu sarvajñatvādiyukta eva । katham ? prakāśādivata । prakāśaviśiṣṭānāṃ maṇi-
prabhṛtīnāṃ prakāśo viśiṣṭaikadeśo yathāṃśaḥ, tadvajjīvaśarīratayā jīvaviśiṣṭasya
brahmaṇoṃ'śo jīvaḥ । ādiśabdādviśeṣaṇataikasvabhāvā jātiguṇādaye gṛhyante ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ṣṭarūpatvābhyupagamena bhedābhedaśrutyorubhayorapi mukhyatvasamarthanasaṃbhave kvacidapi nāmukhyatva-
māśrayaṇīyam । abhedaśrutimukhyatvāśrayaṇe ca na kevalaṃ bhedaśrutivirodhamātraṃ kiṃ tu nāhaṃ
sarvajña ityādipramāṇāntaravirodho'pi durvāra iti । bhāṣye <quote>‘vyāpyavyāpakabhāvene’</quote> tyasyā-
yamarthaḥ । kāyavyūhavataḥ kāyā iva parameśvarasya jīvāśśarīratvena vyāpyāḥ vyāpanīyāḥ,
parameśvarastānsarvānvyāpnuvanvyāpakaḥ ityevaṃ rūpeṇa vyāpyavyāpakabhāveneti । <pratika>yathā vahninā
vyāptasyeti</pratika> bhāṣyasyāyamarthaḥ । śarīraśarīribhāvābhāve'pi vahnivyāptaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ nirdiśyāyaṃ
vahniriti nirūḍhavyavahāro dṛśyate । iha śarīraśarīribhāvasyāpi sattvādayaṃ brāhmaṇa ityā-
divyapadeśava <quote>‘dayamātmā brahme’</quote> ti vyavahārassutarāmupapadyata iti । <pratika>sū ।। mantravarṇāt
।। 43 ।।</pratika> udāhṛtapuruṣasūktamantrasya mantrāṃtaraikārthyena parameśvaraparatvaṃ spaṣṭayituṃ mantrāṃtaramu-
dāharatiḥ—<pratika>māyāṃ tviti । sū ।। api ca smaryate ।। 44 ।।</pratika> itaramūrtayaḥ viyadādyacetana-
mūrtayaḥ tāsāmabhimānitvena jīvarūpā mūrtirvyāpiketyarthaḥ ।। <pratika>sū ।। prakāśādivattu naivaṃ
paraḥ ।। 45 ।।</pratika> yathā viśeṣaṇaṃ viśiṣṭaikadeśatayā tadaṃśastathā viśeṣyamapi । tathā cāṃśa-
tvāviśeṣājjīvabrahmaṇossāmyameva bhavet kiñcidjñatvasarvajñatvaniyamyaniyāmakatvādivai-
ṣamyaṃ na syāditi śaṅkāṃ dṛṣṭāntamukhena nirākartumidaṃ sūtramityabhipretya vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>brahmaṇa-
iti</pratika> । svarūpabhedo jīvabrahmaṇorvailakṣaṇyaṃ laukikānāmanyaviśeṣaṇataikasvabhāvānāṃ prakāśa-
<pb n="160"/>
viśeṣaṇānāṃ viśiṣṭaikadeśatayā tadaṃśatve'pi svarūpabhedo na virūddhaḥ, <quote>‘ya ātmani
tiṣṭhan’</quote> ityādiśruteḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। smaranti ca ।। 46 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘vigrahaṃ devadevasya jagadetaccarācaram । etamarthaṃ na jānanti paśavaḥ pāśagauravāt ।।’</quote>
ityādi । tato brahmaṇoṃ'śa eva jīvaḥ । tadviśiṣṭatayā svarūpabhedaśca siddhaḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। anujñāparihārau dehasaṃbandhājjyotirādivat ।। 47 ।।</sutra>
sarveṣāṃ jīvānāṃ brahmāṃśatve'pi kathaṃ kasyacidvedādiṣvanujñā, kasyacit pari-
hāra iti cet—brāhmaṇadehādisaṃbandhāt tadupapattiḥ, yathāgnyādeḥ śrotriyāgā-
raśmaśānādisaṃbandhāttadvat ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। asaṃtateścāvyatirekaḥ ।। 48 ।।</sutra>
asaṃtatiravyāptiḥ । pratiśarīraṃ bhinnatvāt tatratatrāṇutvenāvacchinnatvādasaṃ-
tateravyāptyā ca sthūlo'haṃ kṛśo'haṃ sukhyahaṃ duḥkhyahaṃ brāhmaṇo'haṃ kṣatriyo'ha-
miti dehābhimānināṃ jñānasukhādyavyatireko bhavati । kimuktaṃ bhavati ? dehābhi-
mānināṃ vyāptyabhāvasya samānatvāt paricchinnajñānasukhādikaṃ sāṃsārikameka-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
jātiguṇānāṃ viśeṣyamapi laukikamiti niyamadarśanādalaukikamīśvaraṃ prati laukikasya
viśeṣaṇatvaṃ na yuktamityāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthamuttarasūtram—<pratika>sū ।। smaranti ca ।। 46 ।।</pratika> yeṣāṃ
viśeṣaṇataikasvabhāvatvamapi lokasiddhaṃ teṣāmeva viśeṣyasya lokasiddhatvaniyama ityabhipretya
tathā niyamasaṃkocāpādinīṃ smṛtimudāharatiḥ—<pratika>vigrahamiti</pratika> । nanu, sarveṣāmātmanāmīśvara-
vigrahatvāviśeṣe kathaṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ vedādhyayanādiṣvanujñā śūdrādīnāṃ tatparihāra ityāśaṅkā-
nirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>sū ।।anujñāparihārau dehasaṃbaṃdhājjyotirādivat ।। 47 ।।
yathāgnyāderiti</pratika> । agnyudakādīnāṃ yeṣāṃ śrotriyāgārasthitidaśāyāṃ karmārhatvaṃ teṣāmeva
hi śmaśānādideśaṃ prāptānāṃ karmānarhatvaṃ dṛṣṭamevamātmanāṃ brāhmaṇādideheṣu sthitidaśāyā-
manujñā, śūdrādidehasthitidaśāyāṃ parihāraścetyupapadyata ityarthaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। asantateścāvya-
tirekaḥ ।। 48 ।।</pratika> nanvīśvaravigrahatvāviśeṣe'pi brāhmaṇādīnāṃ śūdrādyalabhyavedādhyayanādya-
nujñāvattadalabhyaniratiśayajñānasukhādiprāptirapi kiṃ na syātteṣāṃ tatprāptyabhāve muktānāṃ
vā tatprāptiḥ kathaṃ syādaviśiṣṭāḥ khalvīśvaravigrahatvena baddhā muktāśceti śaṃkadvayasya śrutya-
rthābhyāṃ nirākaraṇārthamidaṃ sūtram । tatra prathamaśaṅkānirākaraṇaprakāraṃ darśayan sūtraṃ vyā-
caṣṭe । <pratika>asantatiriti</pratika> । cakārasamucceyaṃ hetudvayaṃ darśayatiḥ—<pratika>pratiśarīramiti</pratika> । atrāya-
māśayaḥ । pratiprāṇivyavasthitānāṃ jñānādigu1ṇānāṃ sarveṣāmapyupalabdhyanupalabdhisūtrokta-
rītyā brāhmaṇādigatajñānasukhādijanakatvāpādanena teṣāṃ sarvavidhajñānasukhādiprāptirā-
śaṃkyate uta muktānāṃ yādṛśī niratiśayajñānasukhādiprāptiḥ tādṛśī teṣāmāśaṃkyate ।
ādye pratiprāṇivyavasthitajñānasukhādikāraṇasādhāraṇyāpādanaṃ sarvaśarīreṣvātmaikatve jī-
vānāṃ vibhutve tadīyacicchaktivyāptau vāṃgīkriyamāṇāyāṃ śakyaṃ kartum । na caitattatrayamaṃ-
gīkriyate । ataḥ pratiśarīraṃ bhinnānāṃ tatra tatraiva śarīre vyavasthitānāṃ tattaccharīrānati-
<note>1 <quote>‘kārakāṇāṃ’</quote> iti kha pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="161"/>
prakārakamevāsaṃkīrṇaṃ bhavatīti । anena parabrahmajñānaviśeṣeṇa vigalitadehābhi-
mānānāṃ mahāvyāptyā parāhaṃbhāvamupagatānāṃ muktātmanāṃ niratiśayatvena nitya-
tvena ca jñānādīnāṃ svābhāvikānāṃ sāṃsārikajñānādito vyatireka iti siddham ।।
ajñānopādhibhyāṃ brahmaiva saṃbadhyata iti yaduktaṃ, tatra na vyavasthetyāha—
<sutra>।। sū ।। ābhāsā eva ca ।। 49 ।।</sutra>
satyamithyopādhibhyāṃ baddhasya brahmaṇa eva jīvabhāva iti pakṣadvaye'pi yuktaya
ābhāsā eva ।।
tathā hi—
<sutra>।। sū ।। adṛṣṭāniyamāt ।। 50 ।।</sutra>
satyamithyopādhikṛtatve hyātmanāṃ brahmaṇa evājñānamupādhiśceti tatkṛtenā-
dṛṣṭenāpi na niyamaḥ ।।
kiṃ ca—
<sutra>।। sū ।। abhisaṃdhyādiṣvapi caivam ।। 51 ।।</sutra>
adṛṣṭahetubhūtābhisaṃdhyādiṣu caivameva niyamābhāvaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
laṃghicicchaktivyāptikānāṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ jñānasukhādeḥ śūdrādigatajñānasukhādyavyatirekasta-
davairūpyameva bhavati । yathā śūdrādīnāṃ jñānasukhādikaṃ yathākāraṇalābhaṃ parimitaṃ bhavati tathaiva
brāhmaṇādīnāmapi bhavatīti yāvat । ataḥ prathamakalpo na saṃbhavati । dvitīyakalpastu
baddhānāṃ malāvṛtacicchaktikatvānna saṃbhavati । ata eva baddhamuktasāmyāpādanarūpā dvitīya-
śaṃkāpi na pravartate । parameśvarasākṣātkārasaṃpannāṃ cicchaktivyāptimupagatānāṃ hi muktānāṃ
jñānasukhādikamabhivyaktaṃ parimitātsāṃsārikajñānasukhaiśvaryādito niratiśayatvena vilakṣa-
ṇameva bhavatīti । evaṃ baddhānāṃ jñānasukhādikaṃ yathākāraṇalābhaṃ vyavasthitamekaprakāraṃ
bhavati । muktānāṃ tu tatsvābhāvikamāvaraṇāpāyādabhivyaktaṃ niratiśayatvena tadvilakṣaṇaṃ
bhavatīti vyavasthopapāditā । evaṃ vyavasthā mithyopādhyavacchinnabrahmajīvavāde satyopādhya-
vacchinnabrahmajīvavāde ca pūrvapakṣite na saṃbhavatīti pratipādanārthatvena uttarasūtrāṇyavatāra-
yati—<pratika>ajñāneti । sū ।। ābhāsā eva ca ।। 49 ।।</pratika> asatyamajñānaṃ satyaṃ śarīrāntaḥkara-
ṇādikaṃ vopādhirbhavat svayaṃ bhinnabhinnamapyekasyaiva brahmaṇa upādhirbhavet । na tāvatā tadupa-
hitaṃ brahma bhidyate । na khalu dārukhaṇḍe nipatankuṭhāraḥ dārukhaṇḍamiva brahmaṇi samavayannu-
pādhirbrahma bhinatti । tathā ca bhogānāśrayāṇāmupādhīnāṃ bhede'pi vicitrabhogāśrayasyai-
katvena bhogasāṃkaryamaparihāryamiti । ityevaṃ tadasāṃkaryopapādakayuktaya ābhāsā iti bhāvaḥ ।
adṛṣṭāderbhogavyavasthā bhaviṣyatītyāśaṃkānirākaraṇārthānyuttarasūtrāṇīti darśayati—<pratika>tathā
hīti । sū ।। adṛṣṭāniyamāt ।। 50 ।।</pratika> adṛṣṭamapyajñānādyupādhibhirupahitasyaikasyaiva
brahmaṇo dharmo bhavanna vyavasthāpakamityarthaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। abhisandhyādiṣvapi caivam ।। 51 ।।</pratika>
adṛṣṭāhetusaṃkalpānuṣṭhānaśarīrādipratiniyamādvyavasthā bhaviṣyatīti śaṃkānirākaraṇāyādṛṣṭe
darśitasyāniyamāpādakanyāyasya saṃkalpādiṣvatideśārthamidaṃ sūtram । nanvātmapradeśavyavasthayā
<pb n="162"/>
<sutra>।। sū ।। pradeśāditi cennāntarbhāvāt ।। 52 ।।</sutra>
upādhisaṃvandhibrahmapradeśabhedāt vyavastheti cet—na, upādhiṣu gacchatsu sarva-
pradeśānāṃ tadantarbhāvāt । tasmāt satyamithyopādhiparicchinnabrahmajīvatvapakṣa-
dvaye'pi na vyavasthā saṃbhavati । tato brahmaṇoṃ'śabhūto jīvastadviśeṣaṇaikasvabhāva
iti yuktameva ।।</p>
<head>ityaṃśādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<p>iti śrīkaṇṭhaśivācāryaviracite brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye
dvitīyasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
bhogavyavasthā bhaviṣyatīti śaṅkānirākaraṇārthamuttarasūtram—<pratika>sū ।। pradeśāditi cennānta-
rbhāvāt ।। 52 ।।</pratika> brahmaṇaḥ pradeśāś‍śarīrāntarbhūtā eva bhogāśrayā vācyāḥ । tadantarbhū-
tapradeśāstu na vyavasthitāḥ । prāyaḥ sarveṣāmapi pradeśānāṃ saṃcaratsu teṣu teṣu śarīreṣvanta-
rbhāvāt । tathā ca brahmapradeśavyavasthayā bhogavyavasthopapādanamapi vivakṣitam । vivekena śarī-
ravyavasthayaiva tadupapādanaṃ paryavasyati । śarīravyavasthā ca pūrvasūtreṇa nirākṛtā । brahmopādhibhū-
tāni sarvāṇyapi śarīrāṇi brahmātmakasarvajīvasādhāraṇyāt na kasyacitkiṃciditi vyavasthi-
tāni bhaveyuriti । tasmātsarvagatātmapakṣa ivaikātmyapakṣe'pi bhogavyavasthā durupapādeti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p>iti śrīśivātivādimūrdhanyaśivadarśanasthāpanadhurandharasakaladevabhūdevapratiṣṭhāpaka-
śrīmaccinnabommabhūpālahṛdayakamalakuharaviharamāṇaśrīsāmbaśivapreritasya
śrīmadbharadvājakulajaladhikaustubhaśrīviśvajidyājiśrīraṃgarājādhva-
rivarasūnorappayadīkṣitasya kṛtau śrīkaṇṭhācāryavi-
racitabrahmamīmāṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāyāṃ śivā-
kamaṇidīpikākhyāyāṃ dvitīyasyā-
dhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 3 ।।</p>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām atha aṃśādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। aṃśo nānāvyapadeśādanyathā cāpi dāśakitavāditvamadhīyata eke ।। 42 ।। mantravarṇācca ।। 43 ।।
apica smaryate ।। 44 ।। prakāśādivattu naivaṃ paraḥ ।। 45 ।। smaranti ca ।। 46 ।। anujñāparihārau deha-
saṃbandhājjyotirādivat ।। 47 ।। asaṃtateścāvyatirekaḥ ।। 48 ।। ābhāsā eva ca ।। 49 ।। adṛṣṭāniya-
māt ।। 50 ।। abhisaṃdhyādiṣvapi caivam ।। 51 ।। pradeśāditi cennāntarbhāvāt ।। 52 ।।</sutra>

<p><pratika>iti śrīmadappaya dīkṣitakṛtau caturmatasārasaṃgrahe nayamaṇimālākhye tṛtīyaparicchede

<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha aṃśādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। aṃśo nānāvyapadeśādanyathā cāpi dāśakitavāditvamadhīyata eke ।। 42 ।। maṃnnavarṇācca ।। 43 ।।
apica smaryate ।। 44 ।। prakāśādivannaivaṃ paraḥ ।। 45 ।। smaraṃti ca ।। 46 ।। anujñāparihārau dehasaṃbandhā-
jjayotirādivat ।। 47 ।। asantateścāvyatirekaḥ ।। 48 ।। ābhāsa eva ca ।। 49 ।। adṛṣṭāniyamāt
।। 50 ।। abhisaṃdhyādiṣvapi caivam ।। 51 ।। pradeśāditi cennāntarbhāvāt ।। 52 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate,</pratika> itthaṃ nityatvaṃ svaprakāśatvaṃ vyāpitvamakartṛtvaṃ cātmano'bhidhāya atra tasya brahmaikyaṃ sādhayati—<pratika>aṃśo
nānetyādinā ।</pratika> atra <quote>‘tattvamasī’</quote> tyādyabhedaśrutijātasya <quote>‘ya ātmani tiṣṭha’</quote>nnityādibhedaśrutijātena virodho'sti na <pratika>veti
saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । jīveśvarayoḥ pūrvoktopakāryopakārakabhāvasya svāmibhṛtyavadbhedādhīnasaṃbandhasāpekṣatvāttadabhedaśrutijātena virodho'stīti
<pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, avidyānimittajīvabhāvavyudāsena brahmabhāvameva jīvasya pratipādayatastattvamasyādiśrutijātasya
āvidyakabhedānuvādiśrutijātena na virodha iti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu</pratika>, jīvaḥ īś‍varasyāṃśa ivāṃśaḥ na tu svābhāvikoṃ'śaḥ ।
tasya <quote>‘niṣkala’</quote> mityādinā niraṃśatvaśravaṇāt । ataḥ kalpitāṃśo jīvaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>nānāvyapadeśāt</pratika>=<quote>‘ya ātmani tiṣṭha’</quote>-
nnityādinā tayornānātvasya ca vyapadeśāt । <pratika>anyathā cāpi</pratika>=anānātvasyāpi vyapadeśāt । tathā <pratika>hi—eke</pratika>=śākhina ātharva-
ṇikāḥ <quote>‘brahma dāśā brahma dāsā brahma kitavā’</quote> iti <pratika>dāśakitavāditvamadhīyate</pratika>=āmanantītyato'nānātvasya ca vyapa-
deśaḥ । ataḥ bhedavādiśrutijātasya pratyakṣasiddhabhedānuvādenābhedaparatvātkalpitabhedavānaṃśo jīva ityarthaḥ ।। kiṃ ca ।
<pratika>sū ।। mantravarṇācca ।। 43 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘pādo'sya viś‍vā bhūtāni’</quote> iti maṃtravarṇātparameś‍varasyāvidyākalpitapārdo'śo bhūtaśabdavācyo
jīva iti gamyate ।। kiṃ ca <pratika>।। sū ।। api ca smaryate ।। 44 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘mamaivāṃśo jīvaloke jīvabhūtassanātanaḥ ।’</quote>iti bhagava-
dgītāsu ceś‍varasyāvidyākalpitoṃ'śo jīva iti smaryate ।।</p>
<p>nanu jīvasyeś‍varāṃśatve tadda‍uḥkheneś‍varasya duḥkhitvaṃ syādityata āha—<pratika>sū ।। prakāśādivannaivaṃ paraḥ ।। 45 ।।</pratika> yathā
jīvo'vidyāvaśāddehādyātmabhāvamiva gato'haṃ duḥkhītyabhimanyate <pratika>naivaṃ paraḥ</pratika>=īś‍varo naivaṃ bhavati । kiṃvat । <pratika>prakāśādi-
vat</pratika>=yathā sauraścāṃdro vā prakāśo nabho vyāpya vartamāno vakrakāṣṭhādyupādhikṛtavakrabhāvamivāpanno'pi na vastuto vakrabhāva-
māpadyate tadvat । jīvo'pi na paramārthato duḥkhitvamabhimanyata ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। smaranti ca ।। 47 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘tatra yaḥ paramātmā hi sa nityo nirguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ । na lipyate phalaiścāpi padmapatramivāṃ-
bhasā ।।’</quote> ityādibhirvyāsādaya īś‍varasya sāṃsārikaduḥkhāsaṃsparśitvaṃ smarantītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu, <quote>‘nānyo'to'sti draṣṭe’</quote> tyādinā ātmabhedamātraniṣedhāt <quote>‘mitraṃ sevyaṃ’</quote> <quote>‘śatravaḥ parihartavyāḥ’</quote> ityādyanujñāparihārau
kathaṃ syātāmityata āha—<pratika>sū ।। anujñāparihārau dehasaṃbandhājjyotirādivat ।। 48 ।।</pratika> sarvatrātmano'khaṇḍaikarasa-
tve'pi uktā<pratika>vanujñāparihārau । dehasaṃbandhāt</pratika>=dehatādātmyasaṃbandhātsaṃgacchete । katham । <pratika>jyotirādivat</pratika>=yathā
jyotiṣo'gnerekatve'pi śmaśānāgniḥ parihāryo netarastadvadātmāpītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanvevamapi svāmyekatvātkarmaphalasaṃkaraḥ syādityāha—<pratika>sū ।। asaṃtateścāvyatikaraḥ ।। 49 ।। avyatikaraḥ</pratika>=karmaphala-
saṃbandhasyāsaṃkaraḥ । kutaḥ ।<pratika>asaṃtateḥ</pratika>=upādhiparicchinnasyātmanaḥ sarvaiḥ śarīrairasaṃbandhādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>kiṃ ca <pratika>।। sū ।। ābhāsa eva ca ।। 50 ।।</pratika> ābhāsa evaiṣa jīvaḥ parasyātmanaḥ sūryapratibiṃbavat । tataśca yathaikasminpra-
tibiṃbe kampamāne pratibiṃbāṃtaraṃ na kampate tathā ekasmiñjīve karmaphalasaṃbandhini na jīvāntarasya tatsaṃbandha iti bhāvaḥ ।
svābhāvikātmanānātvavāde tu tatsaṃkaro durvāra iti dik ।।</p>
<p>nanu nānātvavāde adṛṣṭaniyamātkarmaphalaniyama iti cet tatrāha—<pratika>sū ।। adṛṣṭāniyamāt ।। 51 ।।</pratika> sāṃkhyamate pradhāna-
samavetasyādṛṣṭasya sarvātmasādhāraṇyāt nyāyamate'pyadṛṣṭahetumanassaṃyogasya sarvāviśeṣācca adṛṣṭaniyamābhāvātphalāniyama ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanvahamidaṃ phalaṃ prāpnavānītyabhisaṃdhyādayaḥ pratyātmaniyatāḥ adṛṣṭaniyamahetavo bhaviṣyaṃtītyata āha—<pratika>sū ।। abhisaṃdhyā-
diṣvapi caivam ।। 52 ।।</pratika> sādhāraṇamanassaṃyogasādhyeṣvabhisaṃdhyādiṣvapi ca । <pratika>evam</pratika>=adṛṣṭaniyamahetutvābhāvātsa
doṣastadavastha eva ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। pradeśāditi connāntarbhāvāt ।। 53 ।। pradeśāditi cet</pratika>=ātmanāṃ vibhutve'pi svasvaśarīrāvacchinna
evātmapradeśe manassaṃyoga iti bhavatyabhisaṃdhyādiniyama iti cet । <pratika>na । antarbhāvāt</pratika>=sarvātmanāṃ sarvaśarīreṣvantarbhāvāt ।
niyāmakābhāvena pradeśakalpanā na saṃbhavatītyuktasaṃkarastadavastha eva । asmatpakṣe jīvabhedasyāvidyakatve na saṃkaraḥ ।। tathā ca<quote>‘tattvama’</quote>-
syādyabhedaśrutijātasya āvidyakabhedānuvādiśrutijātena na virodha iti siddham । tadevaṃ bhūtabhoktṛviṣayaśrutīnāṃ mitho virodhābhā-
vena pramāṇyādbrahmaṇi samanvayassiddha ityanavadyam ।। asminmate atra <pratika>pāde tripaṃcāśatsūtrāṇi ।</pratika> adhikaraṇāni tu <pratika>saptadaśa ।
<pb n="164"/>
śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, pūrvatra nityo jñātāṇuḥ kartā parameś‍varāyattapravṛttirjīva iti nirūpitam । adhunā sa kiṃ parame-
ś‍vara eva । kiṃ vā tadaṃśabhūtaḥ iti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ ।</pratika> parameś‍vara eva bahuvidhopādhivaśājjīvabhāvamupagataḥ <quote>‘ayamātmā brahma’</quote> iti
śruteḥ iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika> <quote>‘anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi’</quote> ya ātmani tiṣṭhan’ <quote>‘pṛthagā-
tmānaṃ preritāraṃ ca matvā’</quote> ityādiṣu nānāvyapadeśāt jīvātmā parameś‍varasyāṃśo mūrtyekadeśa eveti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu</pratika> jīvaḥ
<pratika>aṃśaḥ</pratika>=parameś‍varasyāṃśaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>nānāvyapadeśāt । anyathā cāpi</pratika>=<quote>‘tattvamasi’</quote> <quote>‘ayamātmā brahma’</quote> ityādikādva‍ya-
padeśājjīvabrahmaṇorvyāpyavyāpakabhāvenānanyatvamapi yuktam । tathaivānanyatvaṃ <quote>‘brahma dāśā brahma dāsā’</quote> ityādinā eke
śākhino'dhīyate । iti ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। maṃtravarṇāt ।। 54 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘pādo'sya viś‍vā bhūtāni’</quote> iti maṃtravarṇācca brahmaṇoṃ'śa eva jīvaḥ । iti ।।</p>
<p>kiṃ ca <pratika>।। sū ।। api ca smaryate ।। 44 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘ātmā tasyāṣṭamī mūrtiśśivasya paramātmanaḥ । vyāpiketaramūrtīnāṃ viś‍vaṃ
tasmācchivātmakam ।।’</quote> iti smaraṇācca śivasya mūrtyekadeśa eva jīva iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। prakāśādivattu naivaṃ paraḥ ।। 45 ।।</pratika> jīvasya brahmaṇoṃ'śatve'pi jīvo yatsvarūpo yatsvabhāvaśca <pratika>naivaṃ paraḥ</pratika>=parame-
ś‍varo naivaṃrūpo bhavati kiṃ tu sarvajñatvādiyukta eva । katham । <pratika>prakāśādivat</pratika>=prakāśavatāṃ maṇiprabhṛtīnāṃ prakāśajāti-
guṇādayo yathāṃśāḥ tadvat jīvaśarīratayā jīvaviśiṣṭasya brahmaṇoṃ'śo jīva ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। smaranti ca ।। 46 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘vigrahaṃ devadevasya jagadetaccarācaram’</quote> ityādinā jīvasya brahmāṃśatvaṃ munayo'pi smaraṃtītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। anujñāparihārau dehasaṃbandhājjyotirādivat ।। 47 ।। anujñāparihārau</pratika>=vedādiṣvadhikāravidhi-
niṣedhau । <pratika>dehasaṃbandhāt</pratika>=brāhmaṇādidehasaṃbaṃdhādupapadyete । itaratsamānaṃ śāṃkaramatena ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। asaṃtateścāvyatirekaḥ ।। 48 ।।</pratika> jīvānāṃ pratiśarīraṃ bhinnatvādaṇutvena tatratatrāvacchinnatvāt avyāpteśca ।
<pratika>avyatirekaḥ</pratika>=jñānasukhādyavairūpyameva syādityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ābhāsā eva ca ।। 49 ।।</pratika>ajñabrahmavāde upahitabrahmavāde ca yuktaya ābhāsā evetyarthaḥ । <pratika>bahuvacanāntatayā</pratika>
pāṭho viśiṣṭo'tra śāṃkaramatāt ।।</p>
<p>tathā hiḥ—<pratika>sū ।। adṛṣṭāniyamāt ।। 50 ।।</pratika> ātmanāṃ satyamithyopādhikṛtatve adṛṣṭamapyajñānādyupādhibhirupahitasyaiva
brahmaṇo dharmo bhavanna vyavasthāpakaṃ syādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>kiṃca । <pratika>abhisaṃdhyādiṣvapi caivam ।। 51 ।।</pratika> adṛṣṭahetubhūtābhisaṃdhyādiṣu caivameva niyamābhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। pradeśāditi cennāntarbhāvāt ।। 52 ।। pradeśāditi cet</pratika>=upādhisaṃbandhibrahmapradeśānupahitabrahmapradeśasya bhinna
tayā sā vyavasthopapadyeteti cet । na । kutaḥ । <pratika>antarbhāvāt</pratika>=upādhiṣu yacchatsu sarvapradeśānāṃ tadantarbhāvāt । tasmātsatyami-
thyopādhiparicchinnabrahmajīvatvapakṣadvaye'pi vyavasthā na saṃbhavati । tato brahmaṇoṃ'śabhūto jīvastadviśeṣaṇaikasvabhāva iti yukta-
meva ।। asminmate <pratika>dvipañcāśa</pratika>tsūtrāṇi adhikaraṇāni <pratika>dvādaśa</pratika> ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamatte, saṃdehapūrvapakṣādikaṃ</pratika> sarvaṃ prāyo'viśiṣṭameva śrīkaṇṭhamatāt । <pratika><quote>‘smaranti ca’</quote> <quote>‘apica smaryate’</quote></pratika>
ityādisūtreṣu viṣṇuparāṇi vacanānyudāhṛtānīti pūrvasmādviśeṣaḥ । <pratika><quote>‘asaṃtateścāvyatikaraḥ’</quote></pratika> iti śāṃkaramatavadevātra sūtra-
pāṭhaḥ । <pratika>avyatikaraḥ</pratika>=asāṃkaryamiti ca tadarthaḥ ।। adhikaraṇāni <pratika>sapteti</pratika> ca viśeṣaḥ pūrvasmāt ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate, <quote>‘aṃśo nānāvyapadeśā’</quote></pratika> dityādika <quote>‘<pratika>mābhāsa eva ce’</pratika></quote> tyantaṃ sūtrāṣṭakamaṃśādhikaraṇa <pratika><quote>‘madṛṣṭā-
niyamā’</quote></pratika> dityādikamadhikaraṇāntaramiti ca viśeṣaḥ pūrvasmāt । atra jīvasya parameś‍varāṃśatvānaṃśatvavicāreṇa tadviṣaya
śrutivirodhaḥ parihriyate । <pratika>saṃdehapūrvapakṣā</pratika>dikasya jīvasyeś‍varāṃśatvānaṃśatvaviṣayatayā nāsti viśeṣa iti <pratika>sūtrārthaḥ</pratika> paramatra
nirūpyateḥ—<pratika>sū ।। aṃśo nānāvyapadeśāditi ।। 43 ।। aṃśaḥ</pratika>=jīvaḥ paramātmanoṃ'śa eva pitāputratvādisaṃbandhena kevalaṃ
tadupajīvakatvena taccheṣabhūta ityarthaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>nānāvyapadeśāt</pratika>=<quote>‘māṃ rakṣatvi’</quote> tyādau pitṛtvabhrātṛtvādinānāprakāreṇa
jīvasyeśasaṃbandhitvokteḥ । kiṃca । yataḥ <pratika>eke</pratika>=śākhinaḥ <quote>‘anyaḥ paro'nyo jīva’</quote> ityādinā enaṃ jīvaṃ parādanyathā
<pratika>cāpi</pratika>=bhinnatvenā<pratika>dhīyate</pratika>=paṭhanti । yataḥ anye ca śākhinaḥ । <pratika>dāśākitavāditvam</pratika>=<quote>‘brahma dāśā’</quote> ityādinā brahmaṇasta-
ttajjātiviśeṣarūpatvena tadabhedaṃ jādhīyate । ato jīvastadaṃśabhūta ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>kiṃca ।। maṃtravarṇāt ।। 44 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘pādo'sye’</quote> ti śruteśca jīvaḥ paramātmāṃśa ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। api ca smaryate ।। 45 ।।</pratika> jīvasyāṃśatvaṃ kṛṣṇādibhiḥ <quote>‘mamaivāṃśa’</quote> ityādinā kathyate cetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। prakāśādivannaivaṃ paraḥ ।। 46 ।।</pratika> jīvaḥ <pratika>prakāśādivat</pratika>=khadyotādyabhimānitejoṃ'śavat paramātmano
bhinnāṃśaḥ । <pratika>paraḥ</pratika>=matsyarūpī viṣṇustu । <pratika>naivam</pratika>=jīvavadbhinnāṃśo na । kiṃ tu <pratika>prakāśādivat</pratika>= kālāgnyādyabhimānitejoṃ'-
śavat īśābhinnāṃśa evetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। smaraṃti ca ।। 47 ।।</pratika> smartāro jīveśayorbhinnāṃśatvābhinnāṃśatve <quote>‘ete svāṃśakalā’</quote> ityādismṛtyā kathayanti cetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<pb n="165"/>
<p><pratika>sū ।। anujñāparihārau dehasaṃbandhājjayotirādivat ।। 48 ।।</pratika> yato <pratika>jyotirādivat</pratika>=cakṣurgolakādisthitāpabhra-
ṣṭadevatādestattaddehasaṃbandhātsūryavaruṇādyanujñayā tatpravṛttyāderiva jīvasyāpi <pratika>dehasaṃbandhāt</pratika>=tattaddehasaṃbandhāddhetoḥ paramātmana eva
<pratika>anujñāparihārau</pratika>=pravṛttirbandhanivṛttiśca pratīyate । na tathā matsyādeḥ । ato'pi jīvaḥ paramātmano bhinnāṃśaḥ matsyādi-
stvabhinnāṃśa iti vyavasthā siddhetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। asantateścāvyatikaraḥ ।। 49 ।। asaṃtateśca</pratika>=jīvasya samyakśaktyabhāvāt matsyādīnāṃ tu tadbhāvāt ।
<pratika>avyatikaraḥ</pratika>=jīveśayorbhinnābhinnāṃśatvamityuktārthasya vyatyāsābhāva ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ābhāsa eva ca ।। 50 ।।</pratika> cassamuccaye । yato jīvaḥ parasyābhāsa eva pratibiṃba eva matsyādistu na tathā ।
ato'pyuktasya na vyatyāsa ityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>ityaṃśādhikaraṇam ।। 18 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>athādṛṣṭādhikaraṇam ।। 19 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। adṛṣṭāniyamāt ।। 51 ।।</pratika> atrādhikaraṇe jīvānāmīś‍varapratibiṃbatvatadabhāvaśrutyorvirodhaḥ parihriyate । jīvā-
nāmīś‍varapratibiṃbatvaṃ vā tadabhāvo veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ ।</pratika> teṣāmīś‍varaikapratibiṃbatve parasparavaicitryānupapatterna pratibiṃbatvamiti
<pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, abhede'pi viśeṣabalādga‍uṇaguṇibhāvādivadupādhipratibiṃbabhāvo'pyupapadyate । pratibiṃbatvābhāvaśru-
testu svarūpātiri ktopādhimatpratiṣedhaparatvāt jīvānāṃ svarūpopādhikapratibiṃbatvena vicitrādṛṣṭaśālitattatsvarūpopādhi-
vaicitryātteṣāṃ vaicitryopapatteśceti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, adṛṣṭāniyamāt</pratika>= adṛṣṭapadopalakṣita vidyākarmasaṃskārāṇāmaniyamāt vaici-
tryāt pratibiṃbabhūtajīvānāmapi devadānavamānavādivaicitryaṃ yujyata ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। abhisaṃdhyādiṣvapi caivam ।। 52 ।।</pratika> yato'bhisaṃdhyādiṣu kāmakrodhādidoṣeṣvapi ca evamadṛṣṭādivaicitryādeva vaicitryaṃ
vācyam । ata āvaśyakatvādadṛṣṭādivaicitryameva jīvavaicitryakāraṇam । na doṣādivaicitryamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<pratika>sū ।। pradeśāditi cennāntarbhāvāt ।। 53 ।।</pratika> nanu <pratika>pradeśāt</pratika>=svargabhūmyādisthānavaicitryādeva suranarādijanavaici-
tryamastu nādṛṣṭavaicitryāt <pratika>iti cet na ।</pratika> kutaḥ । <pratika>antarbhāvāt</pratika>=sthānavaicitrye kiṃ kāraṇamiti kāraṇānveṣaṇe tatkāraṇa-
syādṛṣṭavaicitrya evāntarbhāvāt । tadrūpatvādata āvaśyakatvādadṛṣṭavaicitryameva suranarādivaicitryaniyāmakamityarthaḥ ।। atra <pratika>pāde</pratika>
āsminmate <pratika>tripaṃcāśa</pratika>tsūtrāṇi adhikaraṇā<pratika>nyekonaviṃśatiḥ ।। ityānandatīrthamate'dṛṣṭādhikaraṇam ।। 19 ।।</pratika>
<lg><l>yaṃ prāsūta viśuddhaśīlamanaghaṃ vṛddhāṃbikākhyā satī-
yaṃ mṛtyuñjayaśarmaṇo budhamaṇerbhāgyaṃ vidussādhavaḥ ।</l>
<l>vādhūlānvayajanmano'sya sudhiyo hālāsyanāthāhṛya-
syeyaṃ satkṛtiredhatāmiha caturbhāṣyānugā candrikā ।।</l></lg>
<p><pratika>sūtrārthacandrikāyāmavirodhākhye dvitīyake'</pratika>dhyāye । <pratika>sṛṣṭiśrutyavirodhāpādaka</pratika> ādye matatraye kathitaḥ ।।
viyadādibhūtabhoktṝnadhikurvanpūrtimabhyagātpādaḥ । <pratika>tārtīyīko mādhvaiḥ</pratika> proṃktaḥ <pratika>śrutyavirodhapāda</pratika>śabdena ।।</p>
<p><pratika>iti hālāsyanāthakṛtau sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 2 ।। 3 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="166"/>
<head>śrīḥ</head>
<head>śivābhyāṃ namaḥ</head>
<head>śrīkaṇṭhācāryakṛtau</head>
<head>brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye</head>
atha dvitīyasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ ।। 4 ।।
atha prāṇotpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। tathā prāṇāḥ ।। 1 ।।</sutra>
<p>pūrvatra bhūtāni brahmaṇa utpadyanta iti nirūpitam, jīvo nitya iti । iha
bhūtānāmivendriyāṇāṃ brahmaṇa utpattiḥ, uta jīvavannityatvamiti vicāryate ।
yathā nityatvānna jīvaḥ samutpadyate tarthandriyāṇyapi । jīvavadamīṣāmapi nityatve
śrutisaṃbhavāt । tathā hi, <quote>‘asadvā itamagra āsīt’</quote> <quote>‘ṛṣayo vāva te agre sadā-
san । tadāhuḥ । ke te ṛṣaya iti । prāṇā vā ṛṣayaḥ’</quote> iti pralayakāle prāṇānāṃ</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>śivārkamaṇidīpikāyām</head>
<head>atha dvitīyasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ ।। 4 ।।</head>
<head>atha prāṇotpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<p>kāraṇaviṣayaśrutivirodhasamādhānānantaraṃ kāryaviṣayaśrutivirodhasamādhitsayā tṛtīya-
caturthapādāvārabdhau । tatra pāraṃparyakramādhikaraṇoktarītyā bhūtasṛṣṭeḥ prāthamikatvādākā-
śādibhūtotpattyanutpattiviṣayaśrutivirodhasamādhānaṃ tṛtīyapādena kṛtam । tatra brahmavyatirikta
syākāśādeḥ kṛtsnasya kāryatve samarthite jīvasya kāryatve'pi svarūpānyathābhāvalakṣaṇaṃ kāryatvaṃ
nāstīti viśeṣo darśitaḥ । tatprasaṃgājjīvasya jñātṛtvādiviṣayaśrutīnāmapi virodhasamādhānaṃ
tṛtīyapāta eva kṛtam । idānīṃ jīvopakaraṇabhūtendriyamukhyaprāṇotpattyanutpattyādiviṣaya-
śrutivirodhasamādhānārthaṃ caturthaḥ pāda ārabhyate—<pratika>sū ।। tathā prāṇāḥ ।। 1 ।।</pratika> nanviṃ-
driyāṇāmutpattyanutpattivicāro nopapadyate । <quote>‘pratijñāhāniravyatirekā’</quote>diti viyadadhikaraṇasi-
ddhāṃtasūtroktarītyā brahmavyatiriktasya sarvasyāpyutpattiniyamādityāśaṃkyotpattisāmānye ni-
yame'pi svarūpānyathābhāvotpattiniyamo nāsti । tathābhūtotpattitadabhāvaviṣaya eva vicāraḥ
kariṣyata iti darśayanvṛttamanuvadati—<pratika>pūrvatreti ।</pratika> śrutivipratipattyā saṃśayaṃ <pratika>darśayati—
iheti ।</pratika> sautraṃ tathāśabdaṃ vivṛṇvan pūrvapakṣamāhaḥ<pratika>yatheti ।</pratika> nanu jīve'sti kṛtahānākṛtā-
bhyāgamaprasaṃgarūpatarkānugṛhītatvenānanyathāsiddhā nityatvaśrutirna tatheṃdriyeṣvasti । tannityatva-
śrutisadbhāve tasyā vāyvākāśāmṛtatvaśrutivaccirakālāvasthāyitvaparatayā yojayituṃ śakya-
tvādityāśaṅkyānanyathāsaddhāṃ śrutimudāharati—<pratika>tathā hīti ।</pratika> iyaṃ hi śrutirmahāpralaye
prāṇānāṃ sthitiṃ varṇayati । sā ca brahmaṇa iva prāṇānāṃ nityatvamantareṇa nopapadyate ।
prāṇāśceṃdriyāṇyeva । prāṇaśabdasya <quote>‘prāṇamevābhisaṃviśaṃtī’</quote>tyādiśrutyantare brahmaṇi dṛṣṭapra-
prayogatve'pi tasminbahuvacanasyānanvayāt ṛṣiśabdasya <quote>‘tasyāsate ṛṣayassapta tīre’</quote> itī-
<pb n="167"/>
sthitirāmnāyate । prāṇāstato brahmaṇo notpadyante ।।
iti prāpte brūmaḥ—
<sutra>।। sū ।। gauṇyasaṃbhavāttatprākcdhruteśca ।। 2 ।।</sutra>
na prāṇānāṃ sṛṣṭeḥ prāgavasthitiḥ, kiṃtu parameśvarasyaiva, <quote>‘sadeva saumyedamagra āsīt’</quote>
iti śruteḥ । ṛṣiśabdaḥ prāṇaśabdaśca parameśvara eva vartate । tasya bahutvāsaṃ-
bhavāt bahuvacanaśrutistatra gauṇī । tato brahmaṇa eva prāgavasthitirnendriyāṇām ।।
yuktyantaramāha—
<sutra>।। sū ।। tatpūrvakatvādvācaḥ ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
parameśvarasṛṣṭipūrvakatvāditareṣāṃ nāmarūpayogasya । tadānīṃ prāṇaśabdo nendri-
yaviṣayaḥ । tato brahmaiva pūrvabhāvi ।। iti prāṇotpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ndriyeṣvapi dṛṣṭaprayogatvena teṣu tadanvayasaṃbhavāt । <quote>‘etasmājjāyate prāṇo manassarveṃdriyāṇi
ca’</quote> iti indriyotpattiśrutistu jīvotpattiśrutivannetavyeti bhāvaḥ । pūrvapakṣamupasaṃharati—
<pratika>prāṇā iti । sū ।। gauṇyasaṃbhavāttatprāk‌śruteśca ।। 2 ।। sādhyanirdeśapūrvakaṃ dvitīyahe-
tuyojanakrameṇa sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe—na prāṇānāmiti</pratika> । bahvīṣu śrutiṣu brahmaṇa eva ekatvāva-
dhāraṇasahitasṛṣṭiprāgbhāvaśravaṇāt sṛṣṭiprāgbhāvarūpādanutpattiliṃgā <quote>‘detasmājjāyata’</quote> ityā-
dyutpattiśruteḥ prabalatvāt ihāpi sṛṣṭiprāgbhāvaśrutau prathamaśrutasya ṛṣiśabdasya draṣṭari brahma-
ṇyeva svārasyāt darśanakaraṇeṣu jñāneṃdriyeṣu svārasyābhāvāt karmeṃdriyeṣu kathamapyapravṛtteśca ।
bahuvacanasya brahmaṇyasaṃbhavataḥ <quote>‘pāśā’</quote>niti bahuvacanasya pāśāvayavabahutvaviṣayatayeva brahmaviśeṣa-
ṇabahutvaviṣayatayaupacārikatvopapatteśca <quote>‘prāṇā vā ṛṣaya’</quote> iti śrutirbrahmaviṣayeti bhāvaḥ ।
sū ।। tatpūrvakatvādvācaḥ ।। 3 ।। tacchabdārthamāha—<pratika>parameśvarasṛṣṭīti</pratika> । <quote>‘vāca’</quote> ityasyā-
rthamāha—<pratika>nāmarūpayogasyeti</pratika> । sautrahetuṃ sādhye saṃgamayati—<pratika>tadānīmiti</pratika> । jīvānāṃ
pralaye'pi sthitirabhyupagatā । anyathā kṛtahānādidoṣaprasaṃgāt । prāṇānāṃ sthityanabhyu-
pagame tu na kiṃcidbādhakamasti । atastadaṃśe vyākaraṇasya sṛṣṭipūrvakatvaniyamo na bādhanīya
iti bhāvaḥ । iti prāṇotpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha dvitīyasyādhyāyasya turīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha prāṇotpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। tathā prāṇāḥ ।। 1 ।। gauṇyasaṃbhavāttatprākcchruteśca ।। 2 ।। tatpūrvakatvādvācaḥ ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>prāṇā notpadyante nityāste jīvavadjñeyāḥ । prāṇā vā ṛṣaya iti pralaye teṣāmavasthitiśravaṇāt ।। 152 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>prāgekatvāvadhṛteḥ prāṇānāṃ sṛṣṭidārḍhyācca । brahmaparamuktavākyaṃ bahuvacanaṃ pāśanītyā syāt ।। 153 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti prāṇotpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha dvitīyasyādhyāyasya turīyaḥ pādaḥ।।</head>
<head>atha prāṇotpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। tathā prāṇāḥ ।। 1 ।। gauṇyasaṃbhavāttatprākcchuteśca ।। 2 ।। tatpūrvakatvādvācaḥ ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
<pb n="168"/>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate,</pratika> pūrvasminpāde bhūtabhoktṛśrutivirodhaḥ parihṛtaḥ । adhunā bhautikendriyādiśrutivirodhaṃ parihartuṃ pādāntara-
