mārabhyate । pūrvādhikaraṇe kartṛsvarūpāvadhāraṇena buddhisthānāṃ tadupakaraṇānāmindriyāṇāmutpattiṃ sādhayati—<pratika>sū ।। tathā prāṇāḥ
।। 1 ।।</pratika> atra <quote>‘etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca’</quote> ityādīndriyotpattiśruteḥ <quote>‘ṛṣayo vāva te'gre'sadāsīt’</quote>
ityādiprāgutpatterindriyasadbhāvaśrutyā virodho'sti na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ ।</pratika> virodho'stīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu,</pratika> sṛṣṭeḥ
prāgindriyasadbhāvaśruterhiraṇyagarbhātmakāvāntaraprakṛtiviṣayatayā ekavijñānapratijñānirvāhāyotpattiśrutermukhyatvābhyupagamāvaśyaṃ-
bhāvena <quote>‘etasmājjāyate’</quote> ityādivākye khavāyvādiṣu mukhyasya janmavācipadasyaiva tadapekṣayā prācīneṣu prāṇādiṣvapi śravaṇena
ca indriyotpattiśrutergauṇatvāsaṃbhavāt <quote>‘tattejo'sṛjate’</quote> ti śrutau bhūtamātrotpattiśravaṇe'pi <quote>‘annamayaṃ hi somye’</quote> tyādinā
manaḥprāṇasahitāyā vācaḥ brahmaprakṛtikatejo'bannapūrvakratvābhidhānācca prāksṛṣṭerindriyasadbhāvaśrutyotpattiśruternāsti virodha
iti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, tathā</pratika>=<quote>‘etasmājjāyate’</quote> ityudāhṛtavākyasthākāśādivat । <pratika>prāṇāḥ</pratika>=indriyāṇyapi jāyante । utpa-
ttiśruteraviśeṣādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>sṛṣṭeḥ prāgindriyasadbhāvaśravaṇādutpatiśrutirgauṇī iti cettatrāha—<pratika>sū ।। gauṇyasaṃbhavāt ।। 2 ।।</pratika> gauṇyā utpattiśruterasaṃ-
bhavādityarthaḥ । anyathā ekavijñānapratijñā hīyetetyarthaḥ । sadbhāvaśrutistu hiraṇyagarbhātmakāvāntaraprakṛtiviṣayeti na tayo-
tpattiśrutervirodha iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p>indriyotpattirmukhyetyatra hetvantaramāha—<pratika>sū ।। tatprākśruteśca ।। 3 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘etasmājjāyate’</quote> ityādivākye janmavācipadasya
khavāyvādiṣu mukhyasya tadapekṣayā prācīneṣu prāṇādiṣu śravaṇāccetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu <quote>‘tattejo'sṛjate’</quote> ti bhūtamātrotpattiśravaṇāttatkathamityāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>sū ।। tatpūrvakatvādvācaḥ ।। 4 ।।</pratika> yadyapi
bhūtamātrotpattiḥ paṭhyate । tathāpi <quote>‘annamayaṃ hi somya mana āpomayaḥ prāṇastejomayī vāk’</quote> iti manaḥprāṇasahitāyā
vāco brahmaprakṛtikatejo'bannapūrvakatvābhidhānādastyutpattiśrutirityato na virodha iti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate,</pratika> atrāpi indriyāṇāmutpattyanutpattivicāra eva viṣayaḥ । yadyapi saṃdehapūrvapakṣasiddhāntādikaṃ prāyassamāna-
meva । tathāpi tannirūpaṇaprakāravailakṣaṇyena sūtrārthavarṇanaṃ bhidyate । iha kiṃ bhūtānāmivendriyāṇāṃ brahmaṇa utpattiḥ uta jīvava-
nnityatvamiti <pratika>saṃdehe</pratika> yathā nityatvānna jīvassamutpadyate tathendriyāṇyapi, jīvavadamīṣāmapi nityatve śrutisaṃbhavāditi pūrvapakṣa-
nirūpakatayādyaṃ sūtraṃ vyākhyātamiti pūrvasmādviśeṣaḥ । <pratika>tathā</pratika>=yathā nityatvānna jīvassamutpadyate tathā । <pratika>prāṇāḥ</pratika>=indriyāṇyapi
notpadyanta iti sūtrārthaḥ । tathāhi—<quote>‘asadvā idamagra āsīt’</quote> ṛṣayo vāva te agre sadāsan । tadāhuḥ । ke te ṛṣaya iti ।
prāṇā vā ṛṣayaḥ’ iti pralayakāle prāṇānāṃ sthitirām‍nāyate । prāṇāstato brahmaṇo notpadyaṃta iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhā-
ntastu,</pratika> <quote>‘sadeva somyedamagra āsīt’</quote> iti śruteḥ prāṇānāṃ sṛṣṭeḥ prāgavasthitirnāsti । kiṃ tu parameś‍varasyaiva । ṛṣiśabdaḥ
prāṇaśabdaśca parameś‍vara eva vartate । tatra bahuvacanaśrutiḥ <pratika>gauṇī ।</pratika> kutaḥ । <pratika>asaṃbhavāt</pratika>=tasya bahutvāsaṃbhavāt । <pratika>tatprā-
kśruteśca</pratika>=tasya paramātmanaḥ prāgavasthānaśruteśca । tato brahmaṇa eva prāgavasthitirnendriyāṇāmiti ।। atra <pratika><quote>‘gauṇyasaṃbhavā-
ttatprākśruteśce’</quote></pratika> tyekaṃ sūtram । yuktyantaramāha—<pratika>sū ।। tatpūrvakatvādvācaḥ ।। 3 ।। bācaḥ</pratika>=parameś‍varavyatiriktanāmarūpa-
yogasya । <pratika>tatpūrvakatvāt</pratika>=parameś‍varakartṛkaviyadādisṛṣṭipūrvakatvādityarthaḥ । tadānīṃ prāṇaśabdo nendriyaviṣayaḥ । ataḥ
paramātmaiva prāṇaśabdanirdiṣṭaḥ ।। <pratika>iti prāṇotpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> saṃdehapūrvapakṣasiddhāntasūtrārthavarṇanādikaṃ sarvamaviśiṣṭameva śrīkaṇṭhamatāditi na pṛthakprapañcanamarhati ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, asminpāde sṛṣṭiśrutīnāṃ yuktisahitaśrutivirodhaḥ parihriyate । atrāpi indriyāṇyutpadyante vā na
veti saṃdehaḥ । <quote>‘etasmājjāyate prāṇo manassarvendriyāṇi ca’</quote> itīndriyāṇāmutpattiśruteḥ <quote>‘nopādānaṃ hīndriyāṇāmato'nutpatti-
riṣyate’</quote> iti smṛtyuktayuktisāhityena prabalayā <quote>‘prāṇā evānādayaḥ prāṇā nityā’</quote> iti kauṣāyaṇaśrutyā bādhānnotpadyanta
indriyāṇīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, sū ।। tathā prāṇāḥ ।। 1 ।।</pratika> yathā viyadādaya utpadyaṃte tathā tannyāyenaiva
indriyāṇyapyutpadyaṃta ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। gauṇyasaṃbhavāt ।। 2 ।।</pratika> anāditvaśrutirgauṇānāditvaparā । <pratika>indriyāṇāṃ mukhyā</pratika>nāditvāyogāt ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। pratijñānuparodhācca ।। 3 ।।</pratika> idaṃ sūtramasminmata eva paṭhyate nānyamateṣu ।। <quote>‘sa idaṃ sarvamasṛjate’</quote> ti pratijñānu-
sārāccotpattirindriyāṇāmaṅgīkartavyetyarthaḥ ।। <pratika>ityānandatīrthamate prāṇotpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha tatprāgadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। tatprākśruteśca ।। 4 ।।</pratika> atra manautpattimadvā na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘dvidhā haivendriyāṇi nityānyanityāni ca । tatra
nityaṃ mano'nāditvāt । na hyamanāḥ pumāṃstiṣṭhatyanityānyanyāni’</quote> iti gaupavanaśrutyā sayuktikayā manaso'nutpattiriti <pratika>pūrva-
pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu,</pratika> <quote>‘manassarvendriyāṇi ca’</quote> iti tasya manasastebhya indriyebhyaḥ pūrvamutpannatvena śravaṇāt ‘tadanutpatti-</p>
<pb n="169"/>
<head>atha saptagatyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>।। sū ।। saptagaterviśeṣitatvācca ।। 4 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatra brahmakāryatayā siddhānīndriyāṇi kiyatsaṃkhyānīti saṃdehe sapteti pūrvaḥ
pakṣaḥ । kutaḥ ? <quote>‘yadā pañcāvatiṣṭhante jñānāni manasā saha । buddhiśca na viceṣṭeta
tāmāhuḥ paramāṃ gatim ।।’</quote> iti saptānāmevāvagateḥ, <quote>‘sapta prāṇāḥprabhavanti’</quote> ityā-
diśrutau sapteti viśeṣitatvācca ।।
ityevaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
<sutra>।। sū ।। hastādayastu sthite'to naivam ।। 5 ।।</sutra>
na saptaivendriyāṇi । hastādayo'pīndriyāṇi, jīve dehāntaḥsthite upakaraṇa-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha saptagatyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। saptagaterviśeṣitatvācca ।। 4 ।।</pratika> prāsaṃgikasaṃgatiṃ sūcayati—<pratika>pūrvatreti । kiya-
tsaṃkhyānīti</pratika> । saptasaṃkhyāni vā ekādaśasaṃkhyāni vetyarthaḥ । śrutivipratipattessandehaḥ ।
sautraṃ gatiśabdamavagatiparamabhipretya saptasaṃkhyāvagamikāṃ smṛtimudāharati—<pratika>yadeti । jñānā-
nīti</pratika> । karaṇavyutpattyā jñānaśabda indriyaparaḥ । manobuddhisahapāṭhāt । <pratika>paramāṃ gati-
miti</pratika> । paramagatirūpamokṣasādhanaṃ yogamāhurityarthaḥ । <quote>‘viśeṣitatvā’</quote>diti sautrapadaṃ saptasaṃkhyāṃ
svaśabdenopādāya tayā viśeṣitatvādityarthaparatayā vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>sapteti</pratika> । nyūnādhikasaṃkhyāśra-
vaṇe nyūnasaṃkhyāgrahaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ lāghavāditi yuktyantarasamuccayārthaścakāraḥ । na ca vācya-
madhikasaṃkhyāgrahaṇe nyūnasaṃkhyāyāstatrāntarbhāvādubha1yānvayo bhavati atastadarthamadhikasaṃkhyā-
grahaṇameva nyāyyamiti । tathā sati kvacidjñānendriyāṇi pañca karmeṃndriyāṇi paṃca mano hṛdaya
miti dvādaśeṃdriyāṇi śrūyante । kvacittānyeva prāṇādhikāni trayodaśa śrūyante iti sarvādhi-
kasaṃkhyāgrahaṇe ekādaśasaṃkhyāvyavasthityasiddheriti । <pratika>sū ।। hastādayastu sthite'to naivam
।। 5 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘ato naiva’</quote> miti vyākhyāsyamānasūtrāṃśalabhyaṃ sādhyaṃ darśayati—<pratika>na saptaiveti</pratika> । tu
śabdamapyarthaṃ kṛtvā vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>hastādayo'pīti</pratika> । <quote>‘sthite'ta’</quote> iti sūtrāṃśena vivakṣitaṃ hetu-
mapekṣitādhyāhārapūrvakaṃ vivṛṇoti—<pratika>jīva iti</pratika> ।। hastādisatvopanyāsalabhyāyāmindriya-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vacanamalpopacayakāraṇāt’ iti vāyuproktavacanācca mana utpattimadeva na tvanutpattimadityarthaḥ ।। iti ।।</p>
<head>iti tatprāgadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<head>atha tatpūrvakatvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। tatpūrvakatvādvācaḥ ।।</pratika> atra vāgindriyamutpattimadvā anutpattimadveti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ ।</pratika> <quote>‘nityayānityayā staumi paramā-
tmānamacyutam । vāgvāva nityā na hyeṣotpadyate'syāṃ hi śrutiravatiṣṭhate’</quote> iti śravaṇādanutpattimaditi <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhā-
ntastu</pratika>, <quote>‘tasmānmana eva pūrvarūpaṃ vāguttararūpam’</quote> iti śravaṇāt <quote>‘vāgindriyasya nityatvaṃ śrutisannidhiyogyatā । utpattirmanaso
yasmānna nityatvaṃ kutaścane’</quote> ti vāyuproktavacanācca vāgindriyamutpattimadeveti ।।</p>
<head>iti tatpūrvakādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ prāṇotpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<note>(1) <quote>‘dubhayābādho’</quote> iti kha pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="170"/>
<p>tvāviśeṣāt । api tvekādaśa । <quote>‘daśeme puruṣe prāṇā ātmaikādaśaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘indri-
yāṇi daśaikaṃ ca’</quote> iti śrutismṛtibhyām । buddhyādīnāṃ na pṛthagindriyatvam, kiṃ tu
te manovṛttibhedā eva । saptānāṃ gatiśravaṇaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ ca teṣāṃ prādhānyāt ।
ato na saptendriyāṇi, kiṃ tvekādaśa ।। iti saptagatyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
saṃkhyāyāṃ śrutiṃ darśayati—<pratika><quote>‘daśema’</quote> iti ।</pratika> ātmā manaḥ । <pratika>śrutismṛtibhyāmiti</pratika> । ayamapi
heturataśśabdenāvṛttena vivakṣitaḥ । buddhyahaṃkāracittānāṃ manasyantarbhāvāt nādhikasaṃkhyā
prasajyata ityāha—<pratika>buddhyādīnāmiti</pratika> । nānāvidhasaṃkhyāśravaṇe kāryānusāreṇa saṃkhyāniya-
manaṃ yuktaṃ nānāvidhāvadānasādhanaśravaṇe sāmarthyānusāreṇāvadeyaniyamanavat । kāryaṃ ca
gandhādyupalabdhiñcakamādānādikriyāñcakamāntarajñānajātaṃ cetyekādaśavidhaṃ ghrāṇādisattve
cakṣurādiṣvasatsvajāyamānamekādaśavidhamiṃdriyagaṇaṃ vyavasthāpayati । yāni tu buddhyahaṃkāra-
cittavṛttitvena prasiddhāni adhyavasāyābhimānaciṃtārūpāṇi kāryāṇi tāni manovyatire-
ke jāyamānatvānavagamānna karaṇāṃtaravyavasthāpanaśaktānīti buddhyādayo mano'vasthābhedā
ityeva yuktamiti bhāvaḥ । pūrvapakṣayuktiṃ nirasyati—<pratika>saptānāmiti</pratika> । yogadaśāyāṃ karmeṃdriye-
bhyo jñāneṃdriyāṇi yatnena vaśīkaraṇīyānīti teṣāṃ vaśīkartavyatve'sti prādhānyam । tada-
bhiprāyeṇa <quote>‘yadā paṃcāvatiṣṭhante’</quote> ityādismṛtiḥ pravṛttā । <quote>‘sapta vai śīrṣaṇyāḥ prāṇā dvāvavāṃ-
cau’</quote> ityādiśrutiṣu saptānāṃ śīrṣaṇyatvarūpaṃ prādhānyaṃ prasiddham । tadabhiprāyeṇa <quote>‘sapta prāṇā’</quote>
iti śrutiḥ pravṛttā । na ca <quote>‘sapteme lokā yeṣu caranti prāṇā’</quote> iti taduttarārdhe saptānāmiha
paratra ca saṃcāraśravaṇāt sarvatra jīvānugantṛtvalakṣaṇaṃ pradhānyaṃ vivakṣitamastviti śaṃka-
nīyam । <quote>‘daśeme puruṣe prāṇā ātmaikādaśaste yadāsmānmartyāccharīrādutkrāmantī’</quote>ti śrutāve-
kādaśānāmapi jīvānugantṛtvaśravaṇāt । <quote>‘ato naiva’</quote> miti sūtrāṃśaṃ vyākurvannadhikaraṇārthamupasaṃ-
harati—<pratika>ato na sapteti</pratika> । punarāvṛttasyātaśśabdasya hastādīnāṃ sattvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti saptagatyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām atha saptagatyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। saptagaterviśeṣitatvācca ।। 4 ।। hastādayastu sthito'to naivam ।। 5 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>prāṇāssaptaiva yadā pañcetyādau tathāvagateḥ । sapta prāṇā ityapi viśeṣitatvācca mantreṇa ।। 154 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>vākpāṇyādīnāmapi sattāvagamāddaśema iti vākyāt । ekādaśasaptatvaśravaṇaṃ prādhānyato neyam ।। 155 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti saptagatyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha saptagatyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। sapta gaterviśeṣitatvācca ।। 4 ।। hastādayastu sthite'to naivam ।। 5 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate,</pratika> itthamindriyāṇāmutpattiṃ prasādhya tebhyo jīvasya vivekārthaṃ tadāśritasaṃkhyāṃ nirdhārayati---<pratika>saptagate-
riṃtyādi ।</pratika> atra <quote>‘sapta prāṇāḥ prabhavanti tasmāt’</quote> iti indriyāṇi sapra saṃkīrtyante । kvacidaṣṭau । kvacinnava । kvaciddaśa ।
kvacidekādaśa । ityevaṃ saptatvāṣṭatvādiśrutīnāṃ parasparavirodho'sti na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ ।</pratika> astīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣe</pratika> prāpte <pratika>ekadeśi
siddhāntaḥ । sapte</pratika>ndriyāṇi । kutaḥ । <pratika>gateḥ</pratika>=śrutyā saptatvāvagateḥ <quote>‘sapta vai śīrṣaṇyāḥ prāṇāḥ’</quote> iti śīrṣaṇyatvena viśeṣita-
tvācca । aṣṭatvādisaṃkhyāśravaṇaṃ tu ekasyaivāntaḥkaraṇasya vṛttibhedābhiprāyamiti na śrutīnāṃ virodha iti ।।</p>
<p>ekadeśimataṃ dūṣayati---<pratika>sū ।। hastādayastu sthite'to naivam ।। 5 ।।</pratika> turekadeśimatanirāsakaḥ । <quote>‘hastau vai grahaḥ’</quote>
ityādinā hastādayo vyatiriktāḥ prāṇāḥ śrūyante । saptatvātireke sthite saptatvasaṃkhyā ekādaśatvasaṃkhyāyāmantarbhāvayituṃ
śakyate । <pratika>ato naivam</pratika>=<quote>‘saptaiva prāṇā’</quote> iti na mantavyam । <quote>‘daśeme puruṣe prāṇā ātmaikādaśa’</quote> iti śravaṇādekādaśaiva । tasmānna
śrutīnāṃ virodha iti siddham ।।</p>
<pb n="171"/>
atha prāṇāṇutvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। aṇavaśca ।। 6 ।।</sutra>
tānīndriyāṇi vibhūni kimaṇūnīti saṃdehe cakṣurādīnāṃ dūragatavastugrahaṇa-
sāmarthyādvibhūnīti prāpte'ṇūnītyucyante—katham ? <quote>‘prāṇamanūtkrāmantaṃ sarve prāṇā
anūtkrāmanti’</quote> iti śravaṇāt । na vibhūni । vibhutve hi teṣāṃ na gatiḥ saṃbha-
vati । cakṣurāderdūragatavastugrahaṇasāmarthyaṃ na vibhutvena, kiṃtu tejorūpatvādaṇutvācca
śīghragatimatvāt । tasmādindriyāṇyaṇūnyeva ।। iti prāṇāṇutvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha prāṇāṇutvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<pratika>sū ।। aṇavaśca ।। 6 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘ata ete sarva eva samāḥ sarve'naṃtā’</quote> iti śruteḥ <quote>‘sarve prāṇā
anūtkrāmanti’</quote> iti śruteśca vipratipattyā saṃśayaṃ darśayati—<pratika>tānīṃdriyāṇīti</pratika> । aṇutvamiha
paricchinnatvam । <pratika>dūragateti</pratika> । tathā coktayuktisahakṛtatvādānantyaśrutiḥ prabalā yathā kārya-
darśanayuktisāhityādekādaśasaṃkhyāśrutireveti bhāvaḥ । ānantyaśrutiḥ <quote>‘sa yo hautānanantā-
nupāste anantaṃ vai sa lokaṃ jayatīti’</quote> vākyaśeṣadarśanādupāsanārthatvenānyathā siddheti ।
tataḥ prabalayā utkramaṇaśrutyā paricchinnatvamupapādayati—<pratika>prāṇamiti । śīghragatimattvā-
diti</pratika> । dūragatavastugrahaṇasāmarthyamindriyāṇāṃ viṣayaparyantaprasṛmarapravṛttyātmanā viṣayasaṃbaṃdhena
yujyata iti tadapyanyathāsiddhamityarthaḥ । <pratika>iti prāṇāṇutvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</pratika>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, atrāpi saṃdehapūrvapakṣādikaṃ prāyaḥ pūrvasmādaviśiṣṭam । indriyāṇi kiyatsaṃkhyāni saptasaṃkhyāni vā
adhikasaṃkhyāni veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘yadā pañcāvatiṣṭhaṃte jñānāni manasā saha । buddhiśca na viceṣṭeta tamāhuḥ paramāṃ gatim ।।’</quote>
iti saptānāmevāvagateḥ <quote>‘sapta prāṇāḥ prabhavanti tasmā’</quote> diti śrutau sapteti viśeṣitatvācca saptaivendriyāṇīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।
sūtrārtho</pratika>'pi vyākhyātaḥ । <pratika>siddhāntastu</pratika>, na saptaivendriyāṇi । kiṃ tu jīve dehāntaḥ sthite upakaraṇatvāviśeṣāddhastā-
dayo'pīndriyāṇi। ata indriyāṇyetādaśa। <pratika>ato naivam</pratika>=<quote>‘daśeme puruṣe prāṇā ātmaikādaśa’</quote> iti śravaṇāt <quote>‘indriyāṇi
daśaikaṃ ce’</quote> ti smṛteścaivamindriyāṇi saptaiveti na vaktavyam । kiṃ tu jñānendriyāṇi pañca, karmendriyāṇi pañca, mana ityekāda-
śendriyāṇīti । <pratika>sūtrārthaśca</pratika> vyākhyātaḥ ।। <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, sarvamaviśiṣṭaṃ śrīkaṇṭhamatādityavadheyam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, <quote>‘sapta prāṇāḥ prabhavanti tasmāt’</quote> tasmādvyādaśa vā ete prāṇāḥ’ iti śrutyoḥ parasparavirodhādanyatara-
balavattvakāraṇābhāvācca dvayoraprāmāṇye śrutivākyāntareṣvanāś‍vāsānna brahmaṇi śrutīnāṃ samanvayaḥ siddhyatīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> ।
jñānendriyāṇi cakṣurādīni manobuddhisahitāni sapta । tadabhiprāyeṇa <quote>‘sapta prāṇā’</quote>iti śrutiḥ karmendriyāṇi hastādayaḥ pañca
taissaha dvādaśasaṃkhyāśrutiriti na virodha iti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu, gateḥ</pratika>=jñānasya janakānīndriyāṇi <pratika>sapta</pratika>=saptasaṃ-
khyāni । iti nirṇaya eva । kutaḥ । <pratika>viśeṣitatvācca</pratika>=<quote>‘guhāśayāṃ nihitāssaptasapta’</quote> iti viśeṣaṇayuktatayā nirdiṣṭatvāt
cakārāt <quote>‘sapta prāṇāstvavagateḥ’</quote> iti bhaviṣyatparvavacanāccetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। hastādayastu sthite'to naivam ।। 7 ।।</pratika> tuśabdo vailakṣaṇyadyotakaḥ । yato <pratika>hastādayastu</pratika>=hastādīndriyāṇi
tu । <pratika>sthite</pratika>=sthitaṃ karma । tādarthye saptamī । karmārthānītyarthaḥ । <pratika>ataḥ</pratika>=asmādvailakṣaṇyāt । tāni <pratika>evam</pratika>=jñānendriyasaha-
bhāvena <pratika>na</pratika> paṭhitāni । atasteṣāṃ saptatā siddhaivetyarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti saptagatyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām atha prāṇāṇutvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। aṇavaśca ।। 6 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>prāṇānāmānantyaśravaṇādda‍ūrasthitagrahaṇāt । hastyāditanuvyāptervibhutā syādanyathāpyanāmnānāt ।। 156 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>gatyāgatyanurodhātsūkṣmāste'nantatoktirādhyānārthā । vṛttyā dūrasthagatirvikāsabhajanādgajāṃdidehāptiḥ ।। 157 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti prāṇāṇutvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<pb n="172"/>
<head>atha śraiṣṭhyādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<sutra>।। sū ।। śreṣṭhaśca ।। 7 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘prāṇamanūtkrāmantaṃ sarve prāṇā anūtkrāmanti’</quote> iti sarvaprāṇaśreṣṭhatayā śrūya-
māṇaḥ pañcavṛttyātmā prāṇavāyurbrahmaṇa utpadyate ? na vā ? ।।
iti saṃśaye na jāyate prāṇavāyuḥ nāsadāsīye sūkte <quote>‘ānīdavātam’</quote> iti
sṛṣṭeḥ prāgapi prāṇaceṣṭāśravaṇāt ।।
iti prāpte vadāmaḥ—prāṇavāyurapi jāyata eva । ānīcchabdo na prāṇavyāpāraṃ
vakti । avātamiti tanniṣedhāt । kiṃtu brahmasattvameva brūte । ato na prāṇānā-
ditvaṃ saṃbhavati ।।
bhavati tvayaṃ prāṇavāyurutpattimān । sa tu ‘sāmānyakaraṇavṛttiḥ prāṇādyā
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha śraiṣṭhyādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। śreṣṭhaśca ।। 7 ।।</pratika> prāṇasya bhūtavāyoriṃdriyavṛttibhyaścānyatvaṃ śrutivirodhasamādhāne-
nopapādanīyam । tadanyatvānanyatvavicārastadubhayasvarūpasya nirjñātatvātsukaro bhavatīti tadvi-
cāracikīrṣayā tasya kāryatvavicāramukhena prāsaṃgikatvasaṃpādanāyeṃdriyakāryatvopapādakanyāyaṃ
prāṇakāryatve'tideṣṭumidaṃ sūtram । asya pūrvādhikaraṇena saṃgatiṃ prāṇavāyau sautraśreṣṭhapadapravṛ-
ttinimittaṃ ca vivṛṇvanneva śrutivipratipattyā saṃśayaṃ darśayati—<pratika>prāṇamiti</pratika> । yadanūtkramaṇeneṃ-
driyāṇāṃ paricchinnatvaṃ samarthitaṃ tasya kāryatvaṃ samarthyata iti pūrvādhikaraṇasaṃgatiḥ । tatra
ca śreṣṭhapadamiṃdriyebhyaḥ śraiṣṭhyaparamiti dvayamapyanena vivṛtam । <pratika>kiṃtu brahmasatvameveti</pratika> । ana-
navyāpāro hi vātāśrayaḥ sa tu vātaniṣedhena pratipādyamānassattārūpa eva paryavasyati । sattā
ca vastuviśeṣānavacchinnā—nirupādhikabrahmasattaiva bhavediti bhāvaḥ । evaṃ prasaṅgaṃ saṃpādya prāsaṃ-
gikamarthaṃ pūrvapakṣamukhenāvatārayati—<pratika>bhavati tvayamiti</pratika> । sāmānyeti । yathā pañjarasthānāṃ</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha prāṇāṇutvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। aṇavaśca ।। 6 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, nanvindriyāṇāmaparicchinnāhaṃkārajanyatvena vibhutvādindriyāṇāmutpattirna saṃbhavatītyākṣepasaṃgatyeda-
māha—<pratika>sū ।। aṇavaśca ।। 7 ।।</pratika> atrotkrāntyādiśruteḥ <quote>‘prāṇāssarve'nantā’</quote> itīndriyavibhutvaśrutyā virodho'sti na veti
<pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । virodho'stīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, ime prāṇā <pratika>aṇavaḥ</pratika>=paricchitrāḥ । indriyāgrāhyātvena sūkṣmatvāt ।
vibhutvaśruterupāsanāparatvātra tayotkrāntyādiśrutervirodha iti siddham ।। iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate, tathā rāmānujamate ca</pratika> tānīndriyāṇi vibhūni kimaṇūnīti <pratika>saṃdahe</pratika> cakṣurādīnāṃ dūragatavastugrahaṇasāma-
rthyādvibhūnīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘prāṇamanūtkrāmantaṃ sarve prāṇā anutkrāmantī’</quote>ti śravaṇāt vibhutve gatyasaṃbhavācca na vibhūnīti
<pratika>siddhāntaḥ</pratika> । cakṣurāderdūragatavastugrahaṇasāmarthyaṃ ca tejorūpatvādaṇutvācca śīghragāmitvādupapadyate । tasmādindriyāṇyaṇūnye-
veti bhāvaḥ । vibhutvaśravaṇamupāsanārtham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, <quote>‘prāṇā vā aṇavaḥ’</quote> iti prāṇāṇutvaśruteḥ <quote>‘divīva cakṣurātata’</quote> miti dūraśravaṇadarśanādiyuktisahitayā
indriyavyāptiśrutyā virodhādaṇutvaśruteraprāmāṇyānna samanvayasiddhiriti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘tadyathā hyaṇunaścakṣasaḥ prakāśa’</quote> iti
viśeṣaśrutisadbhāvādvyāptaśruteścakṣuḥprakāśavyāptigocaratvāccāṇutvaśruterna bādha iti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu, prāṇāḥ</pratika>=indri-
yāṇi । <pratika>aṇavaḥ</pratika>=svato'ṇūnītyarthaḥ । na kevalamaṇūni kiṃ tu tejasā vyāptāni ceti caśabdārthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>itiprāṇāṇutvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<pb n="173"/>
<p>vāyavaḥ pañca’ iti tantrāntaroktarītyendriyavṛttibhyaḥ <quote>‘yo'yaṃ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ’</quote>
iti śrutyā bhūtavāyorvā na pṛthagbhūta ityata āha---
<sutra>sū ।। na vāyukriye pṛthagupadeśāt ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
pañcavṛttiḥ prāṇo'yaṃ na vāyuḥ । na cendriyavṛttiḥ,—
<quote>‘etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥsarvendriyāṇi ca । khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivī
viśvasya dhāriṇī ।।’</quote> iti śrutyā pṛthagupadeśāt । tato vāyorindriyavṛttibhyaścānya
eva prāṇaḥ ।।
vāyoranyatve'pi na tasya bhūtāntaratvamityāha—
<sutra>।। sū ।। cakṣurādivattu tatsahaśiṣṭyādibhyaḥ ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
vāyoḥ pṛthagbhūto'pyayaṃ nāgnyādivat bhūtāntaram, kiṃtu vāyureva dehadhāraṇayo-
gyatāmāpadyate svayaṃ parameśvarādhāraḥ । ‘bhartā san bhriyamāṇo bibharti । eko
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
sarvaṣāṃ śukānāṃ sādhāraṇo vyāpāraḥ pañjaracālanaṃ yathā vā sarvāsāṃ khalakapotikānāmupa-
ripatitavāgurotkṣepaṇaṃ sādhāraṇavyāpāraḥ tathā śarīrasthānāṃ sarveṣāmiṃdriyāṇāṃ sādhāraṇa-
vyāpāraḥ prāṇādivāyupañcakamiti sāṃkhyā vadaṃti । tathaivopapattau prāṇādipañcavṛttirmukhya-
prāṇo'nyo na svīkaraṇīyaḥ । yadīṃdriyakāryebhyo gandhopalabdhyādibhyo'nyasya ś‍vasanakāryasya
darśanānmukhyaprāṇa indriyavṛttibhyo'nyaḥ syāt tadā prāṇāpānādayo'pi kāryabhedād bhinnāḥ
syuriti pañcavṛttirmukhyaprāṇa iti na siddhyediti pūrvapakṣaḥ । evaṃ vādivipratipattinirāsaḥ
śrutivipratipattinirāsārthe'sminpāde saṃgatirahitatvādanvācayaśiṣṭaḥ । pūrvapakṣāṃtarārthā tva-
dhikaraṇapravṛttiḥ । tatpūrvapakṣāṃtaramittham—<quote>‘yaḥ prāṇassa vāyu’</quote> riti śruteḥ prāṇo bhūtavā-
yorna bhidyate । pṛthagupadeśādbha‍ūtavāyoravasthāntaraṃ prāṇaḥ na1 vāyureveti cet tarhi tadavasthā-
ntararūpasya tejasa iva prāṇasyāpi pūrvāvasthārūpavāyutvaparityāgaḥ syāditi । <pratika>sū ।। na
vāyukriye pṛthagupadeśāt ।। 8 ।। anya eveti</pratika> । <quote>‘yaḥ prāṇa ssa vāyuriti’</quote> śrutiḥ
prāṇasya vāyvavasthāṃtaratvena vāyuviśeṣatvādupapadyate iti bhāvaḥ । tadavasthāntaratve tejasa
iva vāyutvaparityāgena bhūtāntaratvaprasaṅga iti śaṃkottaratvenottarasūtramavatārayati—<pratika>vāyo-
ranyatva iti । sū ।। cakṣurādivattu tatsahaśiṣṭyādibhyaḥ ।। 9 ।।</pratika> nanvanena sūtreṇa prāṇasya
vāyutvaparityāgaprasaṃgasya tejodṛṣṭāṃtopapāditasya na kaścitparihāra ucyate । vāyutvaparityāge-
'pi cakṣurādivajjīvopakaraṇatvasaṃbhavādityāśaṃkya sūtreṇa vivakṣitaṃ parihāramāha—<pratika>vāyoriti</pratika> ।
satyeva taṃtūnāṃ tantutve parasparasaṃyogena śakaṭākarṣaṇayogyatāpattiriva satyeva prāṇasya vāyutve
dehadhāraṇayogyatāpattirasyāvasthāntarāpattiriti na bhūtāntaratvaprasaṃga iti bhāvaḥ । ekaikata-
ntuṣvadṛṣṭā śakaṭākarṣaṇayogyatā militeṣu tantuṣu saṃyogaviśeṣeṇeva vāyvantareṣvadṛṣṭā dehadhā-
raṇayogyatāsya kena viśeṣeṇetyāśaṃkāyāmāha—<pratika>svayamiti</pratika> । yathāyaṃ dehadhāraṇayogyo
bhavati tathainaṃ parameśvara uttabhnātītyarthaḥ । <pratika>bhartā sanniti</pratika> । parameśvareṇa svayaṃ bhriyamāṇa
eva bhartā bharaṇaśaktassanbibharti kāryakāraṇasaṃghātam । eko devo mukhyaprāṇaḥ bahudhā prāṇā-
<note>(1) <quote>‘na sa eva’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="174"/>
devo bahudhā niviṣṭaḥ’ <quote>‘tvameko'si bahūnanupraviṣṭāḥ’</quote> <quote>‘prāṇānāṃ granthirasi
rudro mā viśāntakaḥ’</quote> ityādiśruteḥ । kiṃca । ayaṃ cakṣurādivajjīvopakaraṇam ।
prāṇasaṃvādādiṣu cakṣurādibhiḥ sahopadeśāt tattulyopakāramukhyatvādibhyaśca ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। akaraṇatvācca na doṣastathā hi darśayati ।। 10 ।।</sutra>
akaraṇamakriyā । na jīvopakārakriyārahitatvāt doṣaḥ । yataḥ śrutireva dehe-
ndriyādyaśaithilyakāraṇaṃ vāyuriti darśayati । prāṇasaṃvāde <quote>‘yasmintutkrānte idaṃ
śarīraṃ pāpiṣṭhataramiva dṛśyate sa vaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ’</quote> iti prajāpativacanānantaraṃ, vāgā-
dyutkramaṇe'pi dehasyendriyāṇāṃ ca sthitiṃ darśayitvā prāṇotkramaṇe dehendriyaśai-
thilyābhidhānāt ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। pañcavṛttirmanovadvyapadiśyate ।। 11 ।।</sutra>
prāṇa eka eva svavṛttibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ prāṇāpānādisaṃjñābhedabhāgbhavati, yathā
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pānādibahuprakāreṇa niviṣṭa ityarthaḥ । prāṇānāṃ prāṇāpānādivṛttināṃ granthiḥ grathayitā
tatra tatra sthāpaka ityarthaḥ । ādiśabdo <quote>‘na prāṇena nāpānena martyo jīvati kaścana । ita-
reṇa tu jīvanti yasminnetāvupāśritau’</quote> । ityādiśrutyaṃtarasaṃgrāhakaḥ । prāṇasya dehadhārakatve
yuktyupanyāsaparatvena sūtraṃ yojayati—<pratika>kiṃ cāyamiti</pratika> । cakṣurādivadeva prāṇo'pi jīvasyo-
pakaraṇaviśeṣa iti mantavyam । prāṇasaṃvādādipradeśeṣu tasya cakṣurādibhissaha pāṭhāt ।
<quote>‘atha ha prāṇā ahaṃ śreyase hyūcire ahaṃ śreyānasmyahaṃ śreyānasmī’</quote>ti cakṣurādibhissaha kala-
hābhidhānena tattulyopakārakatvasandehasūcanāt tadanaṃtaraṃ tvaṃ naḥ śreṣṭho'sīti cakṣurādi-
vacanena prāṇasya mukhyatvanirdhāraṇācca । samānajātīyānāṃ hi sahapāṭhastulyopakāratva-
saṃśayena ca parasparotkarṣakalahaḥ । tannirdhāraṇārthaṃ <quote>‘te ha prāṇāḥ prajāpatiṃ pitarametyocuḥ bhagavan
ko naḥ śreṣṭha’</quote> iti praśnaḥ । kasyacidupakārātiśayadarśanena mukhyatvanirdhāraṇañca bhavati । jīvo-
pakaraṇatvena prasiddheḥ । samānajātīyatvaṃ ca jīvopakaraṇasya bhavati । prāṇasya tadupakaraṇatvaṃ-
ca dehadhāraṇādṛte nānyenopakāreṇopapadyata iti bhāvaḥ । nanvaprāṇasya pāṣāṇāderiva deha-
syāpi prāṇena dhāraṇaṃ nāpekṣitam । ato na dehadhāraṇaṃ jīvopakāraḥ ityāśaṃkya prā1ṇasya
dehaniyatadhārakatvamanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tatpradarśanaparāṃ śrutimudāhṛtya vyavasthāpayituṃ sūtram
<pratika>sū ।। akaraṇatvācca na doṣastathā hi darśayati ।। 10 ।।</pratika> karaṇamupakārakriyā tadrahi-
tatvādyo doṣaḥ jīvopakaraṇatvāsaṃbhavadoṣaḥ sa na pravartate । śrutireva hi tathā dehadhārakatayā
jīvopakaraṇatvena prāṇaṃ darśayatīti sūtrārthaṃ vivṛṇvannuktaśaṅkāṃ nirasyati---<pratika>akaraṇamiti ।</pratika>
iṃdriyavṛttitvapūrvapakṣabījaśaṃkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>sū ।। pañcavṛttirmanovadvyapadiśyate ।। 11 ।।</pratika>
mukhyaprāṇasya kāryabhedādiṃdriyavṛttibhyo bhedābhyupagame prāṇāpānādayo'pi mukhyaprāṇavṛ-
ttibhyo bhinnāḥ syuḥ kāryabhedādeva iti śaṃkā । neyamupapadyate । prāṇasya iṃdriyavṛttitvakalpane
hi na tāvanmilitānāmiṃdriyāṇāṃ sa vṛttiḥ । cakṣurādyekadvicaturabhāve prāṇanābhāvaprasa-
ṅgāt । nāpyekasyaiva tvagindriyasya vṛttiḥ । sāmānyakaraṇavṛttitvābhyupagamabhaṃgaprasaṃgāt
<note>(1) <quote>‘jīvasya dehe dhāryamāṇatvaṃ’</quote> iti. kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="175"/>
kāmādibhirmana ekameva । ataḥ prāṇa eka eva bhūtavāyvindriyavṛttivyatirikto
jīvopakāraka iti siddham ।। iti śraiṣṭhyādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śarīraikadeśe tvagindriyopahatau tatra prāṇanavyāpārābhāvaprasaṃgācca । tasmāt <quote>‘pṛthagupade-
śāt’</quote> sāmānyakaraṇavṛttitvānupapatteśca prāṇaḥ karaṇavṛttibhyo bhinna iti yuktam । na tathā
prāṇāpānādīnāṃ mukhyaprāṇataḥ pṛthagupadeśo'sti । nāpyananyathāsiddhaḥ kāryabhedo'sti ।
ekasyaiva vāyorhṛdayādisthānaviśeṣāvacchedena tattatkāryakaratvopapatteḥ tata eva prāṇāpānā-
dīnāṃ bhedopapatteśca । tasmāt <quote>‘pañcadhātmānaṃ pravibhajyaitadbāṇamavaṣṭabhya dhārayāmī’</quote> ti śrute-
rmukhyaprāṇa eka eva prāṇāpānādibhedena paṃcavṛttiriti yuktam । yathā <quote>‘kāmassaṅkalpo vici-
kitse’</quote>tyādiśruterekameva manaḥ kāmasaṃkalpādyanekavṛttīti । adhikaraṇārthamupasaṃharati—ata-
iti । <quote>‘śreṣṭhaśce’</quote>ti sūtraṃ pādādyādhikaraṇanyāyasiddhārthasmaraṇārthamiti tadartho nopasaṃhṛtaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti śraiṣṭhyādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām atha śraiṣṭhyādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। śreṣṭhaśca ।। 7 ।। na vāyukriye pṛthagupadeśāt ।। 8 ।। cakṣurādivattu tatsahaśiṣṭyādibhyaḥ ।। 9 ।।
akaraṇatvācca na doṣastathā hi darśayati ।। 10 ।। pañcavṛttirmanovadvyapadiśyate ।। 11 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>nityo mukhyaprāṇaḥ pralaye tadvyāpṛtessattvāt । ānīditi yatsūkte paripaṭhitaṃ nāsadāsīye ।। 158 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>ānīditi śivasattāviṣayaṃ prāṇo hyavātamityastaḥ । so'pi ca na vātamātraṃ na tatkriyā vā pṛthagjaniśravaṇāt ।। 159 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti śraiṣṭhyādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām atha prāṇaśraiṣṭhyādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। śreṣṭhaśca ।। 7 ।। na vāyukriye pṛthagupadeśāt ।। 8 ।। cakṣurādivattu tatsahaśiṣṭyādibhyaḥ ।। 9 ।।
akaraṇatvācca na doṣastathāhi darśayati ।। 10 ।। pañcavṛttirmanovadvyapadiśyate ।। 11 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, atra <quote>‘etasmājjāyate prāṇaḥ’</quote> iti mukhyaprāṇotpattiśruteḥ <quote>‘ānīdavāta’</quote> miti sṛṣṭeḥ prāṅmahāpralaye
prāṇasadbhāvaśrutyā virodho'sti na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । astīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika> indriyavat śreṣṭho'pi prāṇo brahmaṇo
jāyate । ataḥ <quote>‘ānīdavāta’</quote> miti śrutau ānīcchabdaḥ kāraṇasadbhāvaṃ darśayati । avātaṃ prāṇarahitamiti viśeṣaṇāt । na
tayā śrutyā prāṇotpattiśrutervirodha iti siddham ।। <pratika>iti prāṇaśraiṣṭhyādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha vāyukriyādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p>utpatticintānantaraṃ tasya svarūpaṃ vicāryate—<pratika>sū ।। na vāyukriye pṛthagupadeśāt ।। 9 ।।</pratika> atra mukhyaḥ prāṇaḥ kiṃ
vāyureva uta indriyavyāpāraḥ āhosvidvāyuviśeṣa iti tredhā <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘yaḥ prāṇassa vāyu’</quote> riti <quote>‘etasmājjāyate prāṇo
manaḥsarvendriyāṇi ca । khaṃ vāyu’</quote> riti bhedābhedaśrutyorubhayorvirodhe bhedaśrutergauṇatvāṅgīkāre vāyureva prāṇa iti bhedaśrutyava-
ṣṭaṃbhe sarvendriyavyāpāra eva prāṇa iti ca dvedhā <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> prāptaḥ । <pratika>siddhāntastu</pratika>, mukhyaprāṇo <pratika>na vāyukriye</pratika>=na vāyurnāpī-
ndriyavyāpāraḥ kiṃ <pratika>tu</pratika> vāyuviśeṣa eva । kutaḥ । <pratika>pṛthagupadeśāt</pratika>=<quote>‘sa vāyunā jyotiṣā’</quote> iti vāyoḥ tathā <quote>‘etasmājjāyate
prāṇaḥ’</quote> ityādinā karaṇebhyaśca pṛthagupadeśāt । tasmādvāyuviśeṣo'yamadhyātmabhāvāpannaḥ paṃcavṛttiḥ prāṇaḥ iti ।। tataśca na
śrutyorvirodha iti siddham ।।</p>
<p>indriyavyāpārasya prāṇatvābhāve prāṇasya jīvavatsvātantryaṃ syādityata āha---<pratika>sū ।। cakṣurādivattu tatsahaśiṣṭyā-
dibhyaḥ ।। 10 ।।</pratika> turuktaśaṃkāvyāvartakaḥ । prāṇo na jīvavatsvataṃtraḥ । kiṃ tu cakṣurādivat jīvaṃ prati karaṇabhūtaḥ । kutaḥ ।।
<pratika>tatsahaśiṣṭyādibhyaḥ</pratika>=taiścakṣurādibhissaha prāṇasaṃvādādiṣu prāṇasya <pratika>śiṣṭeḥ</pratika>=śāsanāt । acetanatvādirādiśabdārthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu prāṇasya jīvopakaraṇatve tasya viṣayāntaraṃ prasajyetetyata āha---<pratika>sū ।। akaraṇatvācca na doṣastathā hi darśa-
yati ।। 11 ।।</pratika> akaraṇatvānna prāṇasya viṣayāntarāpekṣā doṣaḥ । kasmāt । tathāhi śrutiḥ prāṇāntareṣvasaṃbhāvyamānaṃ mukhya-
prāṇasyāsādhāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ <quote>‘tānvariṣṭhaḥ prāṇa uvāce’</quote> tyādinā darśayatītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>kiṃca ।। <pratika>sū ।। pañcavṛttirmanovadvyapadiśyate ।। 12 ।। manovat</pratika>=yathā manaḥ vṛttyākhyānekavyāpārāpekṣayā anekadhā
vyapadiśyate tadvat । ucchvāsaniś‍vāsādivyāpārānapekṣya pañcavṛttiḥ prāṇaḥ prāṇāpānādisaṃjñayā vyapadiśyate ।।
<pb n="176"/>
<pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> ca <pratika><quote>‘śreṣṭhaśce’</quote></pratika> tyādikaṃ <pratika><quote>‘pañcavṛttirmanovadvayapadiśyate’</quote></pratika> ityantamekamevādhikaraṇam ।
adhikaraṇaikatvarūpavailakṣaṇye'pi saṃdehapūrvapakṣādikaṃ prāyo'viśiṣṭameva śāṃkaramatāt । anayormatayoḥ prathamasūtreṇa mukhyaprāṇasyāpi
brahmaṇa utpattiṃ prasādhya tasyaivendriyavṛttervā bhūtavāyorvā apṛthagbhāvamāśaṃkya <pratika><quote>‘na vāyukriye pṛthagupadeśā’</quote></pratika>diti sūtreṇa
tābhyāṃ pṛthagbhāvaḥ prasādhitaḥ । <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> paraṃ <pratika><quote>‘na vāyukriye pṛthagupadeśā’</quote></pratika> diti sūtre kriyāśabdaṃ vāyukriyā-
paratayā vyākhyāya tadānuguṇyena mukhyaprāṇasya vāyukriyāyāḥ pṛthagbhāvassādhita iti viśeṣaḥ । ādyaṃ sūtradvayamaviśiṣṭārtha-
meva śāṃkaramatāt ।।</p>
<p>mukhyaprāṇasya vāyoranyatve'pi nāgnyādivattasya bhūtāntaratvamityāha—<pratika>sū ।। cakṣurādivattu tatsahaśiṣṭyādibhyaḥ
।। 9 ।।</pratika> prāṇo nākāśādivadbha‍ūtāntaramapi tu vāyurevāvasthāntaramāpanna<pratika>ścakṣurādiva</pratika>jjīvopakaraṇam । kutaḥ । <pratika>tatsahaśi-
ṣṭyādibhyaḥ</pratika>=prāṇasaṃvādādiṣu cakṣurādibhissahopadeśāt tattulyopakāramukhyatvādibhiścetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। akaraṇatvācca na doṣastathā hi darśayati ।। 10 ।। akaraṇattvācca</pratika>=prāṇasya jīvaṃ pratyupakāraviśeṣarahitatvācca
<pratika>doṣo nāsti । tathāhi darśayati</pratika>=yataḥ śrutireva dehendriyādyaśaithilyakāraṇaṃ vāyuriti darśayati ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। paṃcavṛttirmanovadvyapadiśyate ।। 11 ।।</pratika> asyārthaśśāṃkaramatavadeva । ataḥ prāṇa eva bhūtavāyvindriyavyatirikto
jīvopakāraka iti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, idaṃ sūtrapañcakamapi śreṣṭhādhikaraṇaṃ cakṣurādyadhikaraṇaṃ pañcavṛttyadhikaraṇamiti cādhikaraṇatrayatayā vibha-
ktam । ādye <quote>‘naiṣa prāṇa udeti nāstametī’</quote>ti śrutyā <quote>‘yatprāptiryatparityāgaḥ utpattirmaraṇaṃ tathā । tasyotpattirmṛtiścaiva kathaṃ
prāṇasya yujyate ।।’</quote> iti smṛtyuktayuktisāhityena prabalayā virodhāt <quote>‘ātmana eṣa prāṇo jāyate’</quote> iti tadutpattiśrutirapramā-
ṇamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । śreṣṭhaśca</pratika>=yathetare prāṇā utpadyante evaṃ mukhyaprāṇo'pi viṣṇorutpadyata eva । na tvanutpattimān ।
<quote>‘saukṣmyeṇa ha vā eṣo'vatiṣṭhate sthūlatvaneti sūkṣmaścātho sthūlaśca prakṛtitassūkṣmo'nyatassthūlo'thainamāhussādiranādi’</quote>riti
śruteranutpattiśrutessvābhāvikasūkṣmarūpaviṣayatvāditi <pratika>siddhāntaḥ</pratika> । ādyaṃ sūtraṃ vyākhyātam ।।</p>
<p>yadyapi prāṇaśabdo bāhyavāyau ceṣṭārūpakriyāyāṃ mukhyaprāṇe ca vartate tathāpi prāṇotpattiśruterna vāyukriye viṣaya ityāha---
<pratika>sū ।। na vāyukriye pṛthagupadeśāt ।। 10 ।। vāyukriye</pratika>=bāhyavāyuceṣṭākhyakarmaṇī । <pratika>na</pratika>=<quote>‘etasmā’</quote> diti prāṇotpatti-
śrutipratipādye na bhavataḥ । kiṃ tu mukhyavāyureva tatpratipādyaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>pṛthagupadeśāt</pratika>=<quote>‘sa prāṇamasṛjate’</quote> tyādiśrutau
mukhyavāyūtpattiśruteḥ vāyukriyotpattibhyāṃ sakāśātpṛthakśravaṇāt ।। <pratika>ityarthaḥ ।। iti śreṣṭhādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha cakṣurādyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p>atra <quote>‘na prāṇaḥ kiṃ cidāśritaḥ’</quote> iti mukhyaprāṇasya svātantryaṃ pratipādayaṃtyāḥ āgneveśyaśruteḥ <quote>‘yadāśrayā asya ceṣṭā-
sso'nyaṃ kathamupāśrayet’</quote> iti smṛtyuktasakalajagacceṣṭakatvayuktisāhityena prabalatvāt tayā <quote>‘prāṇasyaitadvaśe sarvaṃ prāṇaḥ paravaśe
sthitaḥ’</quote> । iti tasyeś‍varapāratantryaṃ vadantyāḥ paiṅgaśruterbādhādaprāmaṇyamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika> mukhyaprāṇo'pi
cakṣurādivadīś‍varaparatantra eva । na tu svatantraḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>tatsahaśiṣṭyādibhyaḥ</pratika>=taiścakṣurādibhissaha mukhyavāyorapi
<quote>‘sarvaṃ hyevaita’</quote> diti śrutau parādhīnatvokteḥ । tasya kartṛtvādiyuktatvayuktibhyaśceti ādiśabdārthaḥ ।। īśvaradvayānupapattirūpayukti-
virodhāt sarveś‍varatvānanyeś‍varatvaśrutirbādhyata iti bhāvaḥ । mukhyasyānanyeś‍varatvavacanāni viśeṣaśrutyanusāreṇānekeś‍varatva-
prasaṃgayuktivirodhena ca bhagavadatiriktaniyantṛniṣedhaparāṇītyavirodha iti yāvat ।।</p>
<p>nanu cakṣurāditulyatayā tasya kathaṃ bhagavadatiriktaniyantṛrāhityamityāśaṃkyāha---<pratika>sū ।। akaraṇatvācca na doṣasta</pratika>thā
hi darśayati ।। itareṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ karaṇatvānmukhyaprāṇasyākaraṇatvācca tasyānyebhya uttamatvaṃ yujyate । ato <pratika>na doṣaḥ</pratika>=mukhya-
prāṇasvātantryavāciśruteravāntareś‍varaparatvābhāvadoṣo nāsti । kasmādevaṃ kalpyata iti cet hi=yasmāt <quote>‘tāni ha vā’</quote> iti
śrutiḥ । <pratika>tathā</pratika>=uktaprakāreṇa । <pratika>darśayati</pratika>=jñāpayati tasmādityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti cakṣurādyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha pañcavṛttyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। pañcavṛttirmanovadvyapadiśyate ।। 13 ।।</pratika> atra ye prāṇāpānādayaḥ pañca vāyavaste mukhyaprāṇasya dāsā vā uta
tasya svarūpāṇi veti <pratika>saṃdehe</pratika> <quote>‘sarve vā ete mukhyadāsāḥ prāṇo'pāno vyāna udānassamāna’</quote> iti <quote>‘mukhyasyaiva svarūpāṇi prāṇādyāḥ
pañca vāyavaḥ । sa eva prāṇināṃ dehe pañcadhā vartate'niśam ।।’</quote> iti ca yuktisāhityena samaprādhānye ubhe śrutī śrūyete ।
ubhayoḥ parasparavirodhādubhayoraprāmāṇyena samanvayāsiddhiriti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, manovat</pratika>=yathā mano dvividhai-
rmanaḥprabhṛtibhiḥ pañcavṛtti pañcadāsaṃ ca tathā mukhyaprāṇo'pi dvividhaiḥ prāṇādibhiḥ tathā vyapadiśyate । <quote>‘prāṇo vāva pañca-
vṛttiḥ prāṇo'pāno vyāna udānassamāna iti tebhyo vā etebhyaḥ paṃca dāsāḥ prajāyante prāṇādvāva prāṇo'pānādapāno
vyānādvyāna udānādudānassamānādeva samāno yathā havai manaḥ pañcadhā vyapadiśyate mano buddhirahaṅkāraścittaṃ cetaneti tebhyo
vā etebhyaḥ pañca dāsāḥ prajāyante manaso vāva mano buddheśca buddhirahaṅkārādahaṅkāraścittāccittaṃ cetanāyā eva cetanaiva’</quote> miti ।
ato viṣayabhedena śrutyoravirodha iti । svarūpabhūtāḥ prāṇādayo mukhyaguṇaparipūrṇāḥ dāsāstu kiṃcittadīyaguṇaśālinaḥ iti
bhedaḥ ।। <pratika>iti paṃcavṛttyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।। iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ prāṇaśraiṣṭhyādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="177"/>
atha mukhyaprāṇāṇutvādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। aṇuśca ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
pañcavṛttirayaṃ prāṇavāyurindriyavadaṇurvibhurveti saṃdehe sati, nāṇurayam,<quote>‘samaḥ
pluṣiṇā samo maśakena samo nāgena sama ebhistribhirlokaiḥ samo'nena sarveṇa’</quote>
<quote>‘prāṇe sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam’</quote> <quote>‘sarvaṃ hīdaṃ prāṇenāvṛttam’</quote> iti śruteḥ sarvāvārakatayā
vyāpī prāṇaḥ ।।
iti prāpte brūmaḥ—aṇureva prāṇavāyuḥ,<quote>‘prāṇamanūtkrāmantam’</quote> iti tasya gatiśrava-
ṇāt । ādhidaivikasya hiraṇyagarbhaprāṇasya vibhutvaṃ na vyaṣṭirūpasyeti na
virodhaḥ । tasmādaṇureva prāṇaḥ pañcavṛttiriti ।। iti mukhyaprāṇāṇutvādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha mukhyaprāṇāṇutvādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। aṇuśca ।। 12 ।। nanu</pratika> <quote>‘sarve'nantā’</quote> iti indriyāṇāmānantyaśrutau satyāmapyutkra-
maṇaliṃgena teṣāṃ paricchinnatvaṃ prasādhitam । evaṃ <quote>‘samo'nena sarveṇe’</quote>ti vyāpitvaśrutau satyā-
mapi tenaiva liṃgena prāṇasyāpi paricchinnatvaṃ siddhyet kimanenādhikaraṇena । na ca vācya-
mupāstividhānāntargatatvādda‍urbalamiti । sarvasāmyaśravaṇe'pi tulyatvāt । tatrāpi <quote>‘sāma
prāṇa’</quote>ityuktvā <quote>‘ya evametatsāma veda’</quote> ityupāstividhānāt ityāśaṃkyādhikaraṇāraṃbhahetubhū-
tāmadhikāśaṃkāṃ darśayati—<pratika>sarvāvārakatayeti</pratika> । udāhṛtaśrutau hi prāṇasya sarvasāmyamuktvā
tatropapattitayā <quote>‘sarvaṃ hīdaṃ prāṇenāvṛta’</quote>mityuktam । atassopapattikatayotkramaṇaliṃgataḥ
prabalena sarvasāmyaliṃgena prāṇasya vibhutvasiddhāvutkramaṇaliṃgamaupādhikotkramaṇatayā netavyam ।
<quote>‘sama ebhistribhirlokai’</quote>rityataḥ prāk<quote>‘samaḥ pluṣiṇā samo maśakena samo nāgene’</quote>ti vākyānyapi
ghaṭakārakādyākāśanyāyena aupādhikaparicchedaparatayā yojanīyānīti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>ādhidai-
vikasyeti</pratika> । sarvasāmyavacanaṃ samaṣṭiprāṇaviṣayamityavirodhe saṃbhavati na sarvaviṣayatvaṃ
kalpanīyamiti bhāvaḥ ।। <pratika>iti mukhyaprāṇāṇutvādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</pratika></p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām atha mukhyaprāṇāṇutvādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। aṇuśca ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>lokaistribhissamānassarveṇa yataśca sama uktaḥ । sarvasya ca pratiṣṭhā tasmādvibhureṣa ityuditam ।। 160 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>utkrāntyādyanurodhādayamapyaṇurakṣavadyuktaḥ । lokatrayasāmyāderāmnānaṃ syātsamaṣṭiparam ।। 161 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti mukhyaprāṇāṇutvādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha mukhyaprāṇāṇutvādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। aṇuśca ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, paṃcavṛtteḥ prāṇasyāntaraṃgasvarūpakathanānantaraṃ bahiraṃgaparimāṇamatidiśati---<pratika>sū ।। aṇuśca ।। 13 ।।</pratika>
atrotkrāntyādiśruteḥ <quote>‘sama ebhistribhirlokai’</quote> ityādiprāṇavibhutvaśruteśca mitho virodho'sti na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । astīti
<pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, cakṣurādivatprāṇo'pyaṇuḥ paricchinnaḥ sūkṣmaśca । <quote>‘sama ebhiḥ’</quote> iti śrutiḥ sakalavāyuparā,
nādhyātmikaprāṇamātraparetyanayorna virodha iti siddhamiti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate ca</pratika> atrādhikaraṇe saṃdehādiṣu nāsti vaiśiṣṭyaṃ pūrvasmāditi vedyam ।।
<pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, mukhyaprāṇo'ṇurvā vyāpto veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘prāṇa evādhastātprāṇa upariṣṭātprāṇo madhyataḥ prāṇassarvata’</quote>
<pb n="178"/>
atha jyotirādyadhiṣṭhānādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। jyotirādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ tu tadāmananāt prāṇavatā śabdāt ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
iha <quote>‘ādityaścakṣurbhutvākṣiṇī prāviśat’</quote> ityādiśrutyā cakṣurādīnāmādi-
tyādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ śrūyate । jīvasya ca rūpādigrahaṇāya tadadhiṣṭhānamupadiśyate <quote>‘evame-
vaiṣa etān prāṇān gṛhītvā sve śarīre yathākāmaṃ parivartate’</quote> iti । tadidaṃ jīvena
sahendriyādhiṣṭhānamādityādīnāṃ parameśvarāyattamuta svatantram ।।
iti saṃśaye <quote>‘ādityaścakṣurbhutvākṣiṇī prāviśat’</quote> ityādiṣu svātantryaśrava-
ṇādādityādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ na parameśvarāyattamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।।
siddhāntastu—parameśvarāyattamindriyādyadhiṣṭhānamādityādīnām । kutaḥ ? <quote>‘ya
ādityamantaro yamayati’</quote> <quote>‘ya ātmānamantaro yamayati’</quote> ityādiśravaṇāt’
parameśvarasaṃkalpapūrvakatvācca sarvapravṛttīnām । tasmādindriyādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ jīvasyā-
dityādīnāṃ ca parameśvarāyattameva ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। tasya ca nityatvāt ।। 14 ।।</sutra>
sarvasya ca parameśvaraniyamyatvaṃ nityameva । ato'pi parameśvarasaṃkalpāyattamevai-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha jyotirādyadhiṣṭhānādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। jyotirādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ tu tadāmananātprāṇavatā śabdāt ।। 13 ।।</pratika> ādityā-
dīnāmabhimānidevatānāṃ jīvasya ca śrutisiddhaṃ prāṇādhiṣṭhātṛtvam । tatrābhimānidevatānāṃ
tadadhiṣṭhātṛtvamīśvarāyattaṃ svatantraṃ veti saṃśaye yadya'pi <quote>‘parāttu tacchrute’</quote> ri <ref>(bra—2. 3—40)</ref>
tyadhikaraṇe jīvānāṃ kartṛtvamīśvarāyattamityaviśeṣeṇopapāditaṃ tathāpyādityādīnāmīś‍va-
radattaiśvaryāṇāmīśvaravadārādhyatvaphalapradatvādisattvena svātantryamapyastu kartṛtvasya parāyatta-
tāśruteḥ manuṣyādiviṣayatvena <quote>‘samo'nena sarveṇe’</quote>ti śrutessamaṣṭiprāṇaviṣayatveneva saṃkocasaṃ-
bhave tattadaiśvaryaśravaṇānugṛhītasya svātaṃtryaśravaṇasya bādhanāyogāditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । atra
sautraṃ siddhāṃtamāha—<pratika>siddhāṃntastviti</pratika> । jyotirādīnāmādityādīnāṃ yadadhiṣṭhānaṃ cakṣu-
rādyadhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ tat tadāmananāttasya parameśvarasya saṅkalpāt । kutaḥ । tasyāntaryāmitvaśrute-
riti sūtrārthaḥ । prāṇavatā jīvena saheti dṛṣṭāntārthamupādānam । yathā jīvasya svātantrya-
śravaṇe'pi tasyeṃdriyādhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ parāyattam evamiṃdriyābhimānidevatānāmapīti bhāvaḥ । nanu
parameśvaradattaiśvaryeṇa devatānāṃ manuṣyādijīvādviśeṣo'stiti śaṃkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram—
tasya ca nityatvāt ।। 14 ।। <quote>‘sa īśo'sya jagato nityameve’</quote>ti śruternityaṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ
parameśvaraniyamyatvam । ataḥ prāgadhikāraprāpteḥ parameśvaraniyamyānāṃ tadanantaramapi niyamya-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
iti prāṇavyāptiśrutyā <quote>‘etatsarvaṃ jagadvyāpya tiṣṭhati prāṇa eva tu । ato dhṛtaṃ jagatsarvamanyathā kena dhāryate’</quote> iti smṛtyukta-
yuktisahitayā bādhāt <quote>‘aṇunaitatsṛjyate aṇunaitaddhāryate aṇau layamabhyupaiti prāṇo'ṇu’</quote> riti śrutirapramāṇamiti <pratika>pūrva-
pakṣaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘aṇureva mukhyaprāṇo'yamutkrāmati nāḍībhi’</quote> riti sayuktikaśruteraṇurevāyam । vyāptiśrutistu saptaskaṃdhagataloka-
dhārakamukhyavāyurūpasya tasya vyāptimāha—<quote>‘sa vā eṣa prāṇo'ṇurmahā’</quote> nityādiśruteriti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ</pratika> । sūtrārthaḥ spaṣṭaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti mukhyaprāṇāṇutvādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<pb n="179"/>
<p>ṣāmadhiṣṭhātṛtvam ।। iti jyotirādyadhiṣṭhānādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
atha ta indriyādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। ta indriyāṇi tadvyapadeśādanyatra śreṣṭhāt ।। 15 ।।</sutra>
iha pūrvoktāni vāgādīnīndriyāṇi prāṇavṛttibhyo bhinnāni na vā ?.
iti saṃśaye tāni mukhyaprāṇavṛttaya eva, <quote>‘etasyaiva sarve rūpamabhavan’</quote> ityā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tvamavarjanīyamiti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>iti jyotirādyadhiṣṭhānādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha ta iṃdriyādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। iṃdriyāṇi tadvyapadeśādanyatra śreṣṭhāt ।। 15 ।।</pratika> iṃdriyavṛttiḥ prāṇa iti śaṅkā
<quote>‘na vāyukriye’</quote> ityadhikaraṇe nirastā । iha <quote>‘prāṇavṛttaya indriyāṇīti’</quote> śaṅkā nirasyate ।
nanvindriyāṇāmādityādīnadhiṣṭhātṝnsiddhavatkṛtya teṣāmadhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ parameśvarāyattamiti pūrvā-
dhikaraṇe prasādhitam । tanna siddhyet yadi prāṇavṛttaya iṃdriyāṇi syuḥ । na hi vṛttimadadhi-
ṣṭhātṛvyatirekeṇa vṛttīnāmadhiṣṭhātrapekṣāsti । vṛttiprasaraṇārthatvādva‍ṛttimadadhiṣṭhānasya । satyam ।
iha tadevākṣipyate । ata evākṣepikī saṅgatirasyādhikaraṇasya । na ca śrutisiddhamādityā-
dīnāṃ cakṣurādyadhiṣṭhātṛtvamākṣeptumaśakyamiti vācyam । cakṣurādīnāmādityādirūpatvenā-
dityādidaivatyatvena vopāsanārthāni <quote>‘ādityaścakṣurbhūtvetyādi’</quote> vākyānītyupapatteḥ । yathāśrutā-
rthasya bādhitatvāt । asmadādīndriyāṇāmādityādyadhiṣṭhānena jñānakarmārjakatve hi tatprayuktapu-
ṇyapāpaphalabhoktṛtvamapi teṣāṃ prasajyate । kartṛtvabhoktṛtvayoraikādhikaraṇyaniyamāt । jīvādhi-
ṣṭhitānāmindriyāṇāmādityādibhirapyadhiṣṭhitatve jīvasyādityādīnāñca kadācidvaimatyena kā-
ryāniṣpattiprasaṅgācca । na ca jīvo nendriyāṇāmadhiṣṭhātā tadro/?/carāparokṣajñānarahitatvāt kiṃ</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha jyotirādyadhiṣṭhānādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū ।। jyotirādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ tu tadāmananātprāṇavatāśabdāt ।। 13 ।। tasya ca nityatvāt ।। 14 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>akṣādhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ jīvasyāgnyādidevatānāṃ ca । na parasminnāyatate tadadhikṛteḥ pūrvameva dattatvāt ।। 162 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>jīvāgniprabhṛtīnāmantaryāmyādiśāstrato'vagatam । nityaṃ hi pāratantryaṃ tasmāttatsyātparāyattam ।। 163 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti jyotirādyadhiṣṭhānādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha jyotirādyadhiṣṭhānādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। jyotirādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ tu tadāmananātprāṇavatāśabdāt ।। 13 ।। tasya ca nityatvāt ।। 14 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika> atra ādhidaivikādyadhiṣṭhitānāmādhyātmikānāmindriyāṇāṃ ceṣṭāmācaṣṭe---<pratika>jyotirādītyādinā</pratika> ।
<quote>‘ādityaścakṣurbhūtve’</quote> tyādinendriyāṇāṃ devatādhīnaceṣṭāvattvaśruteḥ <quote>‘cakṣuṣā hi rūpāṇi paśyatī’</quote> ti śrutyā virodho'sti na
veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । astīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, jyotirādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ tu</pratika>=jyotirādibhirādityādibhiradhiṣṭhīyate preryate
ityadhiṣṭhānam adhiṣṭhitaṃ vāgādikaṃ ceṣṭate । kutaḥ । <pratika>tadāmananāt</pratika>=tasya devatādhiṣṭhitatvasya <quote>‘ādityaścakṣu’</quote> rityādiśrutyābhi-
dhānāt । <quote>‘cakṣuṣā hī’</quote>ti śrutau tu devatādhiṣṭhitatvāniṣedhāt na tayaitasyā virodha iti siddham ।।</p>
<p>devatānāmadhiṣṭhātṛtve tāsāṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ prasajyetetyata āha---<pratika>sū ।। prāṇavatā śabdāt ।। 15 ।। prāṇavatā</pratika>=jīve-
naivendriyāṇāṃ svasvāmibhāvaḥ saṃbandhaḥ । tataścendriyasādhyabhogabhāktvaṃ jīvasyaiva na devatānām । kutaḥ । <pratika>śabdāt</pratika>=<quote>‘sa
cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣo darśanāya cakṣu’</quote> rityādiśruterityarthaḥ ।।
<pb n="180"/>
dinā teṣāṃ prāṇarūpatvaśravaṇāt, vāgādīnāmuparamarūpe maraṇe prāṇo gata iti
vyavahārasāmānyācca । tasmāt prāṇādananyānīndriyāṇi ।।
iti prāpte brūmaḥ—mukhyaprāṇādanyānyevendriyāṇi, śreṣṭhādanye ye prāṇāsta indri-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tvādityādaya eva teṣāmatīndriyārthadarśitvāditi vācyam । jīvasyāpyabhimatārthagrāhake-
ndriyamanassaṃyojanādivyāpāreṇa jñānendriyakarmeṃdriyādhiṣṭhātṛtvasyānubhavasiddhatvāt । <quote>‘atha
yo vededaṃ jighrāṇīti sa ātma’</quote>tyādiśrutiṣu saṅkalpapūrvakaṃ jīve gandhāghrāṇādisaṃpādakatvasya
pratipādanācca । indriyāṇāmatīndriyatve'pi teṣāmabhimatārthagrahaṇāya nodanakāriṇīṣu
nāḍīṣu tvagindriyajanyāparokṣajñānasya tanmūlaprayatnasya ca saṃbhavācca । ata eva nāḍīgo-
caraprayatnenaiva tannodanīyānāṃ ś‍vāsamalamūtrādīnāmicchayā mocanaṃ dhāraṇaṃ ca dṛśyate ।
<quote>‘prāṇāngṛhītvā sve śarīre yathākāmaṃ parivartata’</quote>iti śrutirapi cakṣurādīnāṃ jīvādhiṣṭhānena
vṛttisaṃkocaṃ svāpe suṣupsādhīnatvadarśanena lokānubhavasiddhamanuvadati । taditthaṃ pūrvādhikaraṇa-
siddhārthākṣepeṇāsyādhikaraṇasya pravṛttiriti śliṣyate । atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—iṃdriyāṇi prāṇa-
vṛttayaḥ । tādadhīnyatādrūpyatatkṛtatannāmabhāk‍tvaśravaṇāt । prāṇādhīnasthitikatvaṃ hīndriyāṇāṃ
śrūyate । <quote>‘prāṇa uccikramiṣan sa yathā suhayaḥ ṣaḍviṃśaśaṃkūn saṅkhidedevamitarānprāṇānsamakkhida’</quote>
diti । tathā tādrūpyaṃ tatkṛtatannāmabhāktvaṃ ca śrūyate । <quote>‘na etasyaiva sarve rūpamabhavan tasmā-
deta etenākhyāyante’</quote> iti । ata iṃdriyāṇi prāṇavṛttaya iti sūtraṃ yojayan siddhāṃtamāha—
mukhyaprāṇāditi । <quote>‘iṃdriyāṇī’</quote>ti sūtre pakṣanirdeśaḥ । <quote>‘śreṣṭhādanyatre’</quote>ti sādhyanirdeśaḥ । śreṣṭhā-
danyānītyarthaḥ । etaiḥ padairāvṛttairanyaiśca sūtrapadairhetunirdeśaḥ । itiśabdaścādhyāhartavyaḥ ।
tathā ca śreṣṭhādanyatra te śreṣṭhādanye cakṣurādayaḥ prāṇā iṃdriyāṇīti teṣveva tadvyapadeśāt
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kiṃca ।। <pratika>tasya ca nityatvāt ।। 16 ।। tasya ca</pratika>=jīvasya । svakarmārjite kārye kartṛtvena bhoktṛtvena nityatvāt na
devatānāṃ bhoktṛtvamasminśarīre iti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate ca</pratika> atra saṃdehapūrvapakṣādīnāmaviśiṣṭatve'pi sūtrārthavarṇanamātre'pi kiṃcidiva vaila-
kṣaṇyam । jīvena sahendriyādhiṣṭhānamādityādīnāṃ kiṃ parameśvarāyattamuta svatantramiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣe</pratika> prāpte <pratika>prāṇavatā</pratika>=jīvena
saha । <pratika>jyotirādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ</pratika> tu=ādityādeścakṣurādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ tu । <pratika>tadāmananāt</pratika>=tasyeś‍varasyābhimukhyena mananāt tatsaṃka-
lpādityarthaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>śabdāt</pratika>=<quote>‘ya ādityamantaro yamayatī’</quote> tyādiśruterityarthaḥ । <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> jyotirādipadamagnyā-
dītyarthakatayā vyākhyāya tadānuguṇyena <quote>‘śabdā’</quote>diti padasya <quote>‘yo'gnau tiṣṭhan yo'gnimantaro yamayatī’</quote> tyādiśruterityarthakatayāṃ
ca vyākhyānādviśeṣaḥ śrīkaṇṭhamatāt ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। tasya ca nityatvāt ।। 14 ।। tasya ca</pratika>=sarveṣāmātmatayānupraviśya sarvaniyamanasya । <pratika>nityatvāt</pratika>=paramā-
tmano'varjanīyatvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, atra <quote>‘brahmaṇo vā etāni karaṇāni cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ mano vā’</quote> giti indriyāṇāṃ brahmakaraṇatvapratipādinī
kāṣāyaṇaśrutiḥ <quote>‘jīvasya karaṇānyāhuḥ prāṇānetāṃstu sarvaśaḥ । yasmāttu tadvaśā ete dṛśyante sarvadehiṣu ।।’</quote> iti sayuktika-
saukarāyaṇaśrutyā bādhyate iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ। siddhāntastu</pratika>, jyotirādīnāmadhiṣṭhānaṃ brahmaiva tadaṃśabhūtānāṃ cakṣurādīnāmapi prerakam ।
<quote>‘yaścakṣuṣi tiṣṭha’</quote> nnityādyāmnānāt brahmakaraṇatvaśrutirna bādhyate iti । sūtramapi vyākhyātam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। prāṇavatā śabdāt ।। 16 ।।</pratika> atra mate śāṃkaramatavadeva sarvatra sūtravibhāgaḥ । paramātmā svaprayojyaireva cakṣu
rādibhiḥ karaṇaiḥ <pratika>prāṇavatā</pratika>=jīvena kartrā darśanādi kārayati na jīvaprayojyaiḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>śabdāt</pratika>=<quote>‘eṣa hyanenātmanā
cakṣuṣā darśayati śrotreṇa śrāvayati manasā manayati’</quote> ityādiśravaṇādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। tasya ca nityatvāt ।। 17 ।।</pratika> cakṣurādīnāṃ brahmakaraṇatve'pi <pratika>tasya ca</pratika>=tasya jīvasya karaṇasya tayoḥ saṃbandhasya
ca । <pratika>nityatvāt</pratika>=nityatvaśravaṇāt । tadvivakṣayā jīvakaraṇaśrutirupapadyata iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ jyotirādyadhiṣṭhānādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<pb n="181"/>
<p>iṃdriyatvavyapadeśādityarthaḥ । nanu prāṇavyāvṛttavyānādināmabhājāṃ yathā na prāṇāda-
nyatvaṃ tathā iṃdriyāṇāmapyastu । maivam । na hi iṃdriyanāmātra hetūkriyate kiṃ tu
tacchabdokta indriyatvadharmaḥ । vyapadeśāditi hetvasiddhiparihārāya tatra śrutismṛtirūpaṃ
pramāṇamuktam । <quote>‘śreṣṭhādanye prāṇāsta iṃdriyāṇī’</quote>ti vyapadeśānukaraṇaṃ mukhyaprāṇe vyabhi-
cāraparihārārtham । ataścakṣurādīnāṃ prāṇānyatve sādhye iṃdriyatvamātraṃ hetutvena vivakṣita-
miti na kaściddoṣaḥ । kimidamindriyatvaṃ yada‍jñāneṃdriyakarmeṃndriyāntaḥkaraṇeṣvanugataṃ mukhya-
prāṇācca vyāvṛttam । pañcīkaraṇapakṣe tāvadekaikabhūtatanmātraprabhavatvaṃ tat । śrotratvakcakṣurjihvāghrā-
ṇāni krameṇa śabdatanmātrādiprabhavāṇi pādapāṇivāgupasthapāyavaśca । tathāntaḥkaraṇaṃ tu
pārthivam । eteṣāmuktarītyā śabdatanmātrādiprabhavatvamudāhṛtakrameṇa jñānendriyakarmendriyāṇā-
mīśānādidevatyatvamantaḥkaraṇasya sadyojātadevatyatvaṃ ca pra1darśayadbhiḥ purāṇavacanaiḥ prakaṭi-
tam । ato na lakṣaṇasyāsaṃbhavāvyāptī । nāpyativyāptiḥ । brahmāṇḍa2nabhogolakagirinadīsa-
mudracandrasūryabaḍabānalaprāṇapravahānilādīnāṃ deśarūpākāśasya ca pañcīkaraṇoktaprakriyā pañca-
bhūtaprabhavatvenaikaikabhūtatanmātraprabhavatvābhāvāt । trivṛtkaraṇapakṣe tvatīndriyatvaviśeṣitamukta-
lakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam । deśarūpasyākāśasya pratyakṣatvaṃ prāgupapāditam । vāyurapi pratyakṣaḥ । tvagiṃ-
driyavyāpārānaṃtaraṃ vāyurvātīti pratītestvakkaraṇakatvopapattau caladanokahaśākhāyāṃ cakṣurvyā-
pārānaṃtaramuktapratīterivāntarālikānumānakaraṇakatvakalpanāyā gauraveṇāyuktatvāt । bahi-
rdravyapratyakṣe dravyapratyakṣa iva guṇapratyakṣa iva ca nīlaghaṭavadārthasamājavaśādupapanne viṣayagatasyo-
dbha‍ūtasparśasyeva viśeṣaprayojakasyodbha‍ūtarūpasyāprayojakatvāt । anyathā vinigamanāviraheṇa
sparśastatra prayojaka ityapi kalpanāprasaṅgāt candraprabhādīnāṃ pratyakṣatve'pi candratārādi-
gatyanumānasya jainādhikaraṇe samarthitatvāt lāghavādudbha‍ūtarūpaṃ dravyapratyakṣamātre prayojakamiti
kalpanenātmano'pi pratyakṣatāpalāpāpatteśca । ātmano'pratyakṣatve yo'hamadrākṣaṃ so'haṃ spṛśāmītya-
bhedapratyabhijñā durupapādā cet vāyorapratyakṣatve'pi śīto vāyuriti pratyayo durupapāda iti
tulyam । śītadravyopanāyakatvenānumite vāyau tadabhedāropāsaṃbhavāt । vāyoḥ pratyakṣatve tadgatasaṃ-
khyāyāḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ syādāśrayapratyakṣasya tatprayojakatvāditi cet । iṣṭāpatteḥ । ahaṃ vakteti
pratītāvātmaikatvavadvāyurvātīti pratītau tadekatvasya viṣayatvāt । bahuṣu vāyuṣu saṃghībhūya
vījatsu satyapi praṇidhāne tadbahutvaṃ na pratīyata iti cenna । bahūnāṃ vāyūnāṃ melane teṣāṃ
saṃsargidravyatayā jalavadekadravyatāpattyā teṣu bahutvāsiddheḥ । ata eva paśāvaddhrigupraiṣagate
<quote>‘sūryaṃ cakṣurgamayatādvātaṃ prāṇamanvavasṛjatā’</quote> diti mantre bahupaśukeṣu vikṛtipaśuṣvatideśataḥ
prāpte cakṣurādipadānāṃ paśusaṃkhyānurodhena dvivacanabahuvacanābhyāmūhamāśaṃkya jalavattejo-
vāyvossaṃsargidravyatayā sarvapaśusaṃbadhināṃ cakṣuṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ ca bahirnirgatānāmekībhāvo
bhavatīti yathāprakṛtyeva mantra iti siddhāṃtitaṃ navame'dhyāye । evamapi vāyāvavayavabahu-
tvagrahaṇamāśaṃkyeta yadi viralataṃtvavayavasaṃyogārabdhe vastra ivāvayavabahutvānupamardanena vāyā-
vaikyamāvirbhavet । na tvevam । saṃsargidravyāṇāmaikyāpatteravayavabahutvopamardakatvaniyamāt ।
na hi jalabindūnāṃ melanenaikyāpattau satyāṃ teṣāṃ viralasaṃyogena bahutvamanuvartate । evaṃ pradī-
<note>(1) <quote>‘pratipādayadbhiḥ’</quote> iti kha—pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘bhūgolaka’</quote> iti kha—pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="182"/>
yāṇīti cakṣurādiṣveva <quote>‘indriyāṇi daśaikaṃ ca’</quote> ityādiṣvindriyavyapadeśāt ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। bhedaśrutervailakṣaṇyācca ।। 16 ।।</sutra>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pakiraṇānāṃ melane'pi na viralasaṃyogaḥ । madhye'ndhakārādarśanāt । tathā ca vāyorapi saṃsa-
rgidravyatvāviśeṣādbahūnāṃ vāyūnāṃ melanenaikyāpattau bahutvānanuvṛtterna tadgrahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ । yatra
tu bahutvamanuvartate tadgrahaṇe bahutvagrahaṇamapyastyeva । yathā kramikānekaphūtkāravāyugrahaṇe yathā
vā bhinnabhinnaśarīrāvayavasaṃsṛṣṭānekaphūtkāravāyugrahaṇe । tathā cākāśasya vāyośca pratyakṣa-
tvāta na tayorlakṣaṇasyātivyāptiḥ । na caivamapi vāyūpanītacampakādisaurabhāśrayadravya-
bhāgeṣvativyāptiḥ । teṣāmatīṃdriyatvāsiddheḥ । jālasūryamarīcyādyabhivyaṃjakābhāve teṣāmapra-
tītyupapatteḥ । ye tu manyaṃte vahnisahacaritānudbha‍ūtarūpodbha‍ūtasparśā ūṣmādirūpāstejobhāgā
iva campakādigandhadravyasahacaritāstattatsāmānyodbha‍ūtagandhā anudbha‍ūtarūpasparśāḥ pārthiva-
bhāgāssanti ta eva visṛmarāḥ paritastathātathā vāsayantīti tanmatānusaraṇe'pi na te-
ṣvativyāptiḥ । teṣāṃ pañcīkṛtapṛthivyavasthāviśeṣatvasaṃbhavena tadutpādanārthaṃ sargādyakāle prākpaṃ-
cīkaraṇādapañcīkṛtagandhatanmātrāvaśeṣaṇakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt । idamindriyāṇāṃ bhauti-
katvapakṣe pāraṃparyakramādhikaraṇabhāṣyasvārasyānurodhena lakṣaṇamuktam । śivāgamādiprasiddhe
teṣāmāhaṅkārikatvapakṣe tu rajastamo'nabhibhūtāhaṅkāraprabhavatvādikaṃ lakṣaṇamunneyam । uktalakṣa-
ṇasyeṃdriyatvasya hetūkaraṇe ca na hetoraprayojakatvam । apañcīkṛtapṛthivyādyavasthāviśeṣa-
rūpāṇāmindriyāṇāṃ pañcīkṛtavāyvavasthāviśeṣarūpaprāṇavṛttitvaṃ na saṃbhavatītyanukūlatarkasa-
dbhāvāt । ata eva prāṇādhīnaśarīrāvasthitikatvādikamindriyāṇāṃ lakṣaṇāṃtaraṃ saṃbhavadapi
na tadiha hetutvena vivakṣitam । tasya vyānādidṛṣṭāntena prāṇavṛttitvasādhyānukūlatayā prakṛ-
tasādhyaviruddhatvādityalaṃ prapañcena । yattu prāṇādhīnasthitikatvatadrūpatvatannāmatvaśravaṇādindri-
yāṇāṃ prāṇavṛttitvamavasīyata iti pūrvapakṣaśaṅkābījaṃ tannirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>sū ।। bhedaśrutervai-
lakṣaṇyācca ।। 16 ।।</pratika> prāṇasaṃvāde khalvindriyāṇāṃ prāṇādhīnasthitikatvādikaṃ trayamapi
śrūyate । tatra prāṇena saha teṣāṃ kalahopakrameṇaiva tato bhedaḥ spaṣṭīkṛtaḥ । cakṣurādīnāmekai-
kasya pravāse'pyanyeṣāṃ yathāpūrvamavasthānaṃ prāṇasya pravāsodyoga evānyeṣāṃ śaithilyāpatti-
riti prāṇasya cakṣurādibhyo vailakṣaṇyaṃ ca tatrānaṃtarameva pratipāditam । idamubhayamindriyāṇāṃ
prāṇasya ca vṛttivṛttimadbhāvema saṃghaṭate । na hi vṛttīnāṃ vṛttimatā saha samasvātantryābhimānena
kalahābhidhānaṃ yujyate । na vā vṛttayo vṛttimantamapahāya pravasanti । vṛttimatpravāse paraṃ nāvati-
ṣṭhaṃta ityupapadyate । tasmātprāṇasaṃvādopakramādiparyālocanayaiveṃdriyāṇāṃ prāṇavyatireke spaṣṭe
sati tadadhīnatvādikaṃ na prāṇābhedasādhanakṣamam । prāṇādhīnasthitikatvaṃ ca śarīre prāṇāda-
tyantabhinne vyabhicāri । prāṇanāmabhāktvaṃ ca tathābhūte nābhirandhre vyabhicāri । śrūyate
hi—<quote>‘nava vai puruṣe prāṇā nābhirdaśamī’</quote>ti । tasmādindriyāṇāṃ prāṇarūpatvaśravaṇaṃ prāṇaśraiṣṭhya-
pratipādanārthaṃ prāṇanāmabhāktvaśravaṇaṃ ca prāṇaprādhānyāt acchātrāṇāṃ chatripadeneva prāṇa-
nāmnā lakṣaṇīyatvapratipādanaparaṃ yojyamityevaṃ sūtratātparyaṃ <quote>‘cakṣurādivattuṃ tatsahaśiṣṭyā-
dibhya’</quote> iti <ref>(bra॰2-4-9)</ref> sūtragatahetvarthakathanenaiva spaṣṭamiti matvā sūtrasyārthāṃtaramāha—
<pb n="183"/>
<quote>‘etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥsarvendriyāṇi ca’</quote> iti prāṇendriyāṇāṃ bhedeno-
tpattiḥ śrūyate । indriyādyuparame'pi prāṇavṛt‍tyanuparamarūpaṃ vailakṣaṇyaṃ ca dṛśyate ।
ato'pi prāṇavṛttibhyo bhinnānīndriyāṇīti ।। iti ta indriyādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
atha saṃjñāmūrtiklṛptyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। saṃjñāmūrtiklṛptistu trivṛtkurvata upadeśāt ।। 17 ।।</sutra>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>etasmāditi । bhedenotpattiriti</pratika> । nanu manasa iṃdriyāṇāṃ ca bhedenotpattiḥ śrūyate, athāpi
neṃdriyebhyo manaso bhedaḥ । tathā prāṇādapīṃndriyāṇāṃ syāt । naiṣa doṣaḥ । mana iti na bhinnaṃ padaṃ kiṃ
tu manaḥpradhānānīṃdriyāṇīti śākapārthivādivat samāsenaikaṃ padam । <quote>‘tatsahaśiṣṭyādibhya’</quote>iti
sautrahetuparyālocanayaivāvagantuṃ śakyamapīndriyāṇāṃ prāṇavṛttivyatirekaṃ hetvaṃtarairapi spaṣṭīka-
rtumidamadhikaraṇāmārabdhamato'sya na vaiyarthyam ।। <pratika>iti ta iṃdriyādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha saṃjñāmūrtiklṛptyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। saṃjñāmūrtiklṛptistu trivṛtkurvata upadeśāt ।। 17 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘ākāśo ha vai nāma nāma-
rūpayornirvahite’</quote>ti vākye nāmarūpavyākartṛtvaṃ parameśvarasya pratīyate । ‘sarvāṇi rūpāṇi</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām atha ta iṃdriyādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū ।। ta iṃdriyāṇi tadvyapadeśādanyatra śreṣṭhāt ।। 15 ।। bhedaśrutervailakṣaṇyācca ।। 16 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>akṣāṇi vṛttayaḥ syuḥ mūkhyaprāṇasya yatteṣām । prāṇapadena vyavahṛtirāmnātaṃ caitadīyarūpatvam ।। 164 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>uparatimatsvakṣeṣvapyanuparamātprāṇavṛttīnām । prāṇādbhedena janiśruteśca bhinnāni tāni syuḥ ।। 165 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti ta indriyādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha ta indriyādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। ta indriyāṇi tadva‍yapadeśādanyatra śreṣṭhāt ।। 15 ।। bhedaśrutervailakṣaṇyācca ।। 16 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, satsvindriyeṣu tadadhiṣṭhātṛvicāraḥ । prāṇavyāpāravyatirekeṇa tānyeva na santītyāha---<pratika>ta indriyāṇītyā-
dinā</pratika> । atra <quote>‘etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥsarvendriyāṇi ca’</quote> iti mukhyaprāṇādindriyāṇāṃ tatvāntaratvaśruteḥ <quote>‘ta etasyaiva sarve
rūpamabhavan’</quote> iti prāṇātmakatvaśrutyā virodho'sti na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । astīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, śreṣṭhāt</pratika>=mu-
khyaprāṇāt । <pratika>anyatra</pratika>=anye te prakṛtā vāgādaya indriyāṇītyucyante na prāṇāḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>tadva‍yapadeśāt</pratika>=<quote>‘etasmājjāyate’</quote>
ityādau tasya bhedasya vyapadeśāt indriyāṇāṃ prāṇātmakatvaśrutergauṇatvena na tayā virodhaḥ ।।</p>
<p>kiṃca । <pratika>sū ।। bhedaśruteḥ ।। 18 ।।</pratika> vāgādīndriyaprakaraṇamupasaṃhṛtya <quote>‘atha hemamāsanyaṃ prāṇamūcu’</quote> riti bhinnaprakaraṇe prāṇasyai-
ndriyebhyo bhedena śravaṇāt na prāṇavyāpāratvamindriyāṇāṃ kiṃ tu tattvāntaratvamevetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>kiṃ ca ।। <pratika>sū ।। vailakṣaṇyācca ।। 19 ।।</pratika> suṣuptyavasthāyāṃ prāṇasya sthitirneṃndriyāṇāmityādivailakṣaṇyāttattvāntaratvam । tasmā
nnānayorvirodha iti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, ca sarvamaviśiṣṭaṃ pūvasmāt । <pratika>bhedaśrutervailakṣaṇyācce</pratika>tyekameva sūtramanayormatayo-
riti viśeṣaḥ । <quote>‘tadva‍ya<pratika>padeśā</pratika>’</quote> diti padaṃ teṣvevendriyaśabdanirdeśādityarthakatayā ca vyākhyātamanyadaviśiṣṭam ।।</p>
<p>ānandatīrthamate, <quote>‘athendriyāṇi prāṇā vā indriyāṇi hīdaṃ dravantī’</quote>ti sarveṣāṃ prāṇaśabdavācyanāmaviśeṣeṇendriyatvamidaṃ-
drāvakatvayuktipūrvakaṃ pratipādatayantyā pautrāyaṇaśrutyā virodhāt, <quote>‘dvādaśaivendriyāṇyāhu’</quote> riti kāṣāyaṇaśruteraprāmāṇyātkasyendri-
yatvaṃ nivāryamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, anyatra śreṣṭhāt</pratika>=mukhyaprāṇādanye ye prāṇāste dvādaśaive<pratika>ndriyāṇi</pratika> ।
na tu mukhyaprāṇo'pi । kutaḥ । <pratika>tadva‍yapadeśāt</pratika>=<quote>‘dvādaśaivendriyāṇi’</quote> iti śrutau tathoktatvāditi ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। bhedaśruteḥ ।। 19 ।।</pratika> śāṃkaramatavadidaṃ pṛthaksūtram । mukhyaprāṇasya sarvakartṛkārayitṛtvarūpabhedakadharmasyānyeṣāṃ tada-
bhāvasya ca <quote>‘sthita eva hī’</quote>ti śrutau śrutatvānna tasya cakṣurādyaviśeṣa ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। vailakṣaṇyācca ।। 20 ।।</pratika> mukhyaprāṇasya taṃditaraprāṇānāṃ ca kevaleśvarādhīnatveśvarajīvobhayādhīnatvarūpavailakṣaṇyasatvācca
na tasyendriyatvaṃ kiṃ tu cakṣurādīnāmevetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ ta indriyādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<pb n="184"/>
<p>pūrvamākāśādīnāṃ bhūtānāṃ saha sadāśivādibhiradhiṣṭhātṛbhiḥ parameśvarādutpa-
ttirabhihitā । tadevaṃ teṣu jāteṣu tato devānāṃ nāmarūpādiklṛptistasmādeva mūlakā-
raṇāt utānyasmāditi saṃdehaḥ ।।
evaṃ sati <quote>‘tat teja aikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti, tadapo'sṛjata’</quote> iti śrute-
stejo'bhimānī rudro'paḥ sṛjati, tāsu ca svavīryaṃ kṣipati, tāsu sattvasahito

ttvāyatanatvena viṣṇornārayaṇasaṃjñatā । <quote>‘tā āpa aikṣanta’</quote> <quote>‘tā annamasṛjanta’</quote>
iti śrutestadabhimānī nārāyaṇo'nnaśabdavācyāṃ pṛthivīmutpādayati । tatra pṛthi-

samudraṃ rudrasya vīryāt prathamaṃ saṃbabhūva । tasmin brahmā viṣṇurjāto jātavedāḥ’</quote> iti ।।

ca prapañcanam । vedaśabdebhya evādau devādīnāṃ cakāra sa’</quote> iti tadupabṛṃhaṇāccetyenaṃ jīvopa-

deva parameśvarādutpattimaṃgīkṛtya tadanantaramaṇḍāntarvartināmindrādidevānāṃ nāmarūpādiklṛpti-
metadadhikaraṇaviṣayatvena nirdiśya sā mūlakāraṇātparabrahmaṇa utānyasmāddhiraṇyagarbhāderiti

dhiṣṭhātṛdevatāviṣayāmāpādya pūrvapūrvabhūtādhiṣṭhāturuttarottarabhūtānāṃ sādhiṣṭhātṛkāṇāmutpatti-

āpa aikṣante’</quote>ti vākyamapi jalābhimāninārāyaṇaviṣayaṃ <quote>‘yato viṣṇustatprāviśa’</quote>dityādyu-

sraṣṭṭatvopapatteḥ <quote>‘vedena rūpe vyākaro’</quote>ditiśrutau tadupabṛṃhaṇeṣu ca tathaiva pratipādanācca । api

na yuktam । svatassiddhasārvajñyasya parameśvarasya pūrvakalpavṛttāṃtajñānāya vedānapekṣaṇāt tasya
prajāpatimātraparatvena prasiddhasya prajāpaternāmarūpavyākaraṇakartṛtvasiddhau vyarthamanyatra tadvā-
ciśabdasyāṃtaryāmiparyantatvakalpanam । evañca <quote>‘prajāpatirakāmayata prajāssṛjeyeti’</quote> <quote>‘prajā-
patiḥ prajā asṛjata’</quote> ityādiśrutīnāmapi hiraṇyagarbhasya devamanuṣyādināmarūpasraṣṭṛtve prāmā-
ṇyamavyāhatam । api ca । bṛhadāraṇyake'pi <quote>‘ātmaivedamagra āsītpuruṣavidha’</quote> iti hiraṇya-
garbhaṃ prastutya <quote>‘tato manuṣyā ajāyaṃte’</quote> tyādinā <quote>‘yadidaṃ kiṃ ca mithunamāpipīlikābhya-
statsarvamasṛjate’</quote> tyantena tasya manuṣyādisraṣṭṛtvamuk‍tvā tadanaṃtaramagnyādisraṣṭṛtvamapyuktam ।
na ca tatra parabrahmaṇaḥ prastāva iti śaṅkanīyam । <quote>‘sa yatpūrvo'smātsarvasmātsarvānpāpmana
auṣattasmātpuruṣa’</quote> ityataḥ pāpmasaṃsargapratītyā <quote>‘so'bibhennaiva rema’</quote> iti bhayāratiśravaṇena ca
tasya saṃsāritvāvagamāt । evaṃ kūrmapurāṇādiṣu parameśvaraniyogāddhiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ sraṣṭṛtvādi
pratipāditam । tadapyananyathāsiddhamatra pramāṇaṃ veditavyam । na hi tasyāṃtaryāmiparyavasā-
yitve tanniyogādhīnatvavacanamanvetīti । <quote>‘aṇḍaṃ hiraṇmaya’</quote>miti bhāṣyodāhṛtaśrutau viṣṇu-
rupendraḥ । toyābhimānino nā1rāyaṇasyotpatteraṇḍasṛṣṭitaḥ prācīnatvāt । <quote>‘apa eva sasarjādā’</quote>
vityādimānavavacanānāṃ <quote>‘tataḥ svayaṃbhūrbhagavānavyakto vyaṃjayannidam । mahābhūtādivṛttaujāḥ
prādurāsīttamonudaḥ । yo'sāvatīṃdriyagrāhyaḥ sūkṣmo'vyaktassanātanaḥ । sarvabhūtamayo'ciṃtya-
ssa eva svayamudbabhau । so'bhidhyāya śarīrātsvātsisṛkṣurvividhāḥ prajā’</quote> iti pūrvabhāgaḥ ।

<sutra>।। sū ।। māṃsādi bhaumaṃ yathāśabdamitarayośca ।। 18 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘annamaśitaṃ tredhā vidhīyate’</quote> ityādau prāṅnirūpitāt trivṛtkaraṇādarthāntarabhūta
evāṇḍāntarvartipuruṣopabhuktānnādīnāṃ pariṇāmaprakāra ucyate, na tu trivṛtkara-
ṇam । anyathā hi māṃsamanasoḥ purīṣādaṇīyastvenāpyataijasatvaprasaṅgaḥ । tathā
sati <quote>‘annamaśitaṃ tredhā’</quote> iti bhūmereva traividhyopakramaḥ <quote>‘annamayaṃ hi somya manaḥ’</quote>
iti manaso bhaumatvaṃ ca virudhyeta । tathetarayoraptajesostraividhyaṃ virudhyeta । tadidamāha—
<quote>‘māṃsādi bhaumaṃ yathāśabdamitarayośce’</quote>ti । purīṣavanmāṃsamanasī api bhaume iṣyete ।
tathā mūtravallohitaprāṇāvāpyau, tathāsthivat majjāvācau taijasye ।।
