trivṛtkaraṇasyā'ṇḍa1siddhipūrvabhāvāsiddheḥ । aṇḍasṛṣṭyuttarakālaṃ tadantarvarttidevamanuṣyādinā-
marūpavyākaraṇe ca nirvṛtte prāṇibhirbhujyamāneṣu tejo'banneṣu hi trivṛtkaraṇaprakāra upadi-
śyate । <quote>‘yathā khalu somyemā’</quote> ityādinā aṇḍāntarvartiṣu cāgnyādityādiṣu trivṛtkaraṇapra-
kāraḥ pradarśyate <quote>‘yadagne rohitaṃ rūpaṃ tejasastadrūpaṃ yacchuklaṃ tadapāṃ yatkṛṣṇaṃ tadannatye’</quote>tyādinā ।
nāmarūpavyākaraṇānaṃtaraṃ ca trivṛtkaraṇaṃ paṭhyate । <quote>‘seyaṃ devatemāstisro devatā anena jīve-
nātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākarot tāsāṃ trivṛtaṃ trivṛtamekaikāmakarot’</quote> iti । ata<quote>‘stri-
vṛtkurvata upadeśā’</quote>diti sautraheturayukta ityāśaṅkārthaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। māṃsādi bhaumaṃ yathāśabda-
mitarayośca ।। 18 ।।</pratika> upanyastaśaṃkānirākaraṇopayogi sādhyaṃ tadanaṃgīkāre'niṣṭaprasaṃgañca
manasi nidhāya prasaṃgasya viparyayaparyavasānamātraṃ sūtre nibaddhaṃ tadavatārayituṃ sādhyamaniṣṭaprasaṃgacca
darśayati—<pratika>annamiti । anyatheti</pratika> । atrivṛtkṛtāni pṛthivyaptejāṃsi kāryakāraṇabhāvāpa-
nnāni sthūlānyaṇūnyaṇīyāṃsi । atastrivṛtkṛteṣvapi tattadbha‍ūtāṃśānāṃ svakāraṇānuguṇyena
sthūlātvāṇutvāṇīyastvāni syuḥ । tasmā<quote>‘dannamaśita’</quote>mityādi vākyaṃ trivṛtkaraṇapradarśanaparaṃ
cet sthaviṣṭhaṃ purīṣaṃ pārthivamaṇu māṃsamāpyamaṇīyo manaśca taijasamityāpadyeta । tathā dvitī-
yaparyāye mūtraṃ pārthivaṃ lohitamāpyaṃ prāṇastaijasa iti bhavet । tṛtīyaparyāye asthi pārthiva-
māpyā majjā taijasī vāgiti syādityarthaḥ । astu ko doṣa ityāśaṃkya sūtralabdhamarthamāha—
<pratika>tathā satīti</pratika> । <quote>‘annamaśitaṃ tredhā vidhīyata’</quote> iti purīṣamāṃsamanasāṃ pārthivatvamuktam ।
<quote>‘āpaḥ pītāstredhā vidhīyanta’</quote> iti mūtralohitaprāṇānāmāpyatvamuktam । <quote>‘tejo'śitaṃ
tredhā vidhīyata’</quote> iti asthimajjāvācāṃ taijasatvamuktam । punaścā<quote>‘nnamayaṃ hi somya mana
āpomayaḥ prāṇa’</quote> iti manaḥ prāṇayoḥ pārthivāpyatvamuktam । tatsarvaṃ virudhdyetetyarthaḥ । upanya-
staviparyayaparyavasānaṃ sūtrārūḍhaṃ karoti—<pratika>tadidamāheti</pratika> । purīṣasya pārthivatvaṃ śaṅkāvādināpi
samarthayituṃ śakyamityāśaṃkya sūtre māṃsādītyuktam । ādiśabdena mano gṛhyate । yathāśabda-
mudāhṛtaśrutyanusāreṇetarayorapi paryāyayorvikārā boddhavyā iti sūtraśeṣārthaḥ । lohitavanmūtra-
prāṇāviti vāgvadasthimajjānāviti ca vaktavye bhāṣye mūtravadasthivadityuktirādyatrikasyā-
pyatvena dvitīyatrikasya taijasatvena ca sāmyamātre tātparyeṇa । yattvaṇḍāntarvartiṣvagnyādityā-
diṣu trivṛtkaraṇapradarśanaṃ tadboddha‍yasya śvetaketorbuddhisaṃvādārthaṃ na tu tatraiva trivṛtkaraṇamidaṃ-
<note>(1) sṛṣṭiprāgbhāvāsiddheḥ’ iti kha—pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="191"/>
nanu pūrvameva trivṛtkṛtaṃ cet tryātmakaṃ vastu kathamannamāpasteja ityucyata
ityata āha—
<sutra>।। sū ।। vaiśeṣyāttu tadvādastadvādaḥ ।। 19 ।।</sutra>
annādibhūyastvena vaiśeṣyādannavāda iti । tasmāttrivṛtkurvataḥ parameśvarasya catu-
rmukhādyātmanā sakalanāmarūpasṛṣṭiriti yuktameva ।। iti saṃjñāmūrtiklṛptyadhikaraṇam 8
iti śrīkaṇṭhaśivācāryaviracite brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye dvitīyasyādhyāyasya
caturthaḥ pādaḥ ।। ।। samāptaśca dvitīyo'dhyāyaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
prathamatayā pravṛttamiti bodhanārtham । nāmarūpavyākaraṇatrivṛtkaraṇayoḥ pāṭhakramaścārthakrameṇa
bādhyate । sarvo'pi saṃkalpakāle sādhyalābhasaṃkalpapūrvaṃkaṃ tatsādhanānuṣṭhānaṃ saṃkalpayatīti
loke dṛṣṭam । atrāpi prakaraṇe <quote>‘bahu syā’</quote>miti sādhyalābhasaṃkalpapūrvakaṃ <quote>‘prajāyeye’</quote> ti tatsā-
dhanapravṛttisaṃkalpavacanaṃ dṛṣṭam । atastadanusāreṇa <quote>‘hantāhamimā’</quote> iti saṃkalpavacane phalabhūtaṃ
nāmarūpavyākaraṇaṃ prathamaṃ paṭhitamiti tathaivottaravākye'pi nāmarūpavyākaraṇasya prathamaṃ pāṭha
āsīdityevamanyānurodhena pravṛttatvādapi pāṭhakramo'rthakrameṇa bādhyate । trivṛtkṛtaireva hi
tejo'bannairaṇḍamutpādanīyamatrivṛtkṛtānāṃ teṣāṃ kāryāraṃbhāsāmarthyāt । yathāhuḥ paurāṇikāḥ---
<quote>‘nānāvīryāḥ pṛthagbhūtāstataste saṃhatiṃ vinā । nāśaknuvanprajāḥ sraṣṭumasamāgamya kṛtsnaśaḥ ।
sametyānyonyasaṃyogaṃ parasparasamāśrayāḥ । mahadādyā viśeṣāntā hyaṇḍamutpādayanti te ।।’</quote> iti ।
evañca yadyapyaṇḍasṛṣṭyuttarabhāvino hiraṇyagarbhasya trivṛtkaraṇakartṛtvāyoge'pi tatpūrvabhāvino
nārāyaṇasya rudrasya vā tatkartṛtvamāśaṅkituṃ śakyam । tathāpi <quote>‘hantāhamimāstrisro devatā anena
jīvenātmanānupraviśye’</quote> tyatra jīvaśabdasya tojo'bannābhimānirudranārāyaṇahiraṇyagarbhaparatvāt
tanmadhye hiraṇyagarbhasya trivṛtkaraṇakartṛtvāsaṃbhavena nāmarūpavyākaraṇakartṛtvāsaṃbhave sthite traya-
sādhāraṇaṃ jīvaśabdamavalaṃbya rudrasya nārāyaṇasya vā trivṛtkaraṇakartṛtvāśaṅkāmūlaṃ nāmarūpa-
vyākaraṇakartṛtvacodyaṃ na pravartata iti vyarthā tayostrivṛtkaraṇakartṛkatvaśaṅkā nirālaṃbanā ceti
tātparyam । <quote>‘annamaśita’</quote> mityādinā prāgeva trivṛtkṛtānāṃ tejo'bannānāṃ prāṇibhirbhuktānāṃ
pariṇāmaprakāramātramucyate na tu trivṛtkaraṇamiti yaduktaṃ tanna yuktam । prāgeva trivṛtkṛtatve tryātma-
keṣu vastuṣvekaikavāciśabdaprayogāyogāt ityāśaṃkottaratvenottarasūtramavatārayati—<pratika>nanviti ।
sū ।। vaiśeṣyāttu tadvādastadvādaḥ ।। 19 ।। annāditi ।</pratika> ardhamannamardhamitaradbha‍ūtadvayami-
tyevamādirūpeṇa bhūyastvena prakāreṇa yadvaiśeṣyaṃ viśeṣastato hetorityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti saṃjñāmūrtiklṛptyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p>iti śrīśivātivādimūrdhanyaśivadarśanasthāpunadhuraṃdharasakaladevabhūdevapratiṣṭhāpaka-
śrīmaccinnabommabhūpālahṛdayakamalakuharaviharamāṇaśrīsāṃbaśivapreritasya
śrīmadbharadvājakulajaladhikaustubhaśrīviśvajidyājiśrīraṃgarājādhva-
<pratika>rivarasūnorapyayadīkṣitasya kṛtau śrīkaṇṭhācāryavi-
racitabrahmamīmāṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāyāṃ śavā-
rkamaṇidīpikākhyāyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyā-
yasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ ।। 4 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="192"/>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām atha saṃjñāmūrtiklṛptyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। saṃjñāmūrtiklṛptistu trivṛtkurvata upadeśāt ।। 17 ।। māṃsādi bhaumaṃ yathāśabdamitarayośca ।। 18 ।।
vaiśeṣyāttu tadvādastadvādaḥ ।। 19 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>druhiṇo devādīnāṃ vyākaraṇe nāmarūpayoḥ kartā । bhūmyabhimānayato'sya hi sṛṣṭestadanaṃtaraṃ bhavati ।। 166 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>vyākaraṇakartureva trivṛtkṛtāvapyabhāṇi kartṛtvam । tacca trivṛtkṛtambhādyaṇḍājjātasya no ghaṭate ।। 167 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti saṃjñāmūrtiklṛptyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
iti śrīmadappayadīkṣitakṛtau caturmatasārasaṃgrahe nayamaṇimālākhye tṛtīyapa-
ricchede dvitīyasyādhyāyasya turīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 2 ।। 4 ।। adhyāyaśca samāptaḥ ।। 2 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām atha saṃjñāmūrtiklṛptyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। saṃjñāmūrtiklṛptistu trivṛtkurvata upadeśāt ।। 17 ।। māṃsādi bhaumaṃ yathāśabdamitarayośca ।। 18 ।।
vaiśeṣyāttu tadvādastadvādaḥ ।। 19 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ nāmarūpabhedena prāṇendriyayorbheda ityuktam । tatprasaṅgena nāmarūpavyākaraṇaṃ kiṃkartṛkamiti vicā-
ryate—<pratika>saṃjñāmūrtītyādinā</pratika> । atra <quote>‘anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi’</quote>iti jīvakartṛkatvaśruteḥ <quote>‘ākāśo
ha vai nāmarūpayornirvahitā’</quote>iti parameśvarakartṛkatvaśruteśca mitho virodho'sti na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । astīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।
siddhāntastu</pratika>, tuśabdaḥ pūrvapakṣanirāsakaḥ । alpamedhaso jīvasya mahīmahīdharamahodadhivyākaraṇe sāmarthyābhāvāt <quote>‘tāsāṃ
trivṛtaṃ trivṛtamekaikāṃ karavāṇi’</quote> iti trivṛtkurvataḥ parameśvarasyaiva nāmarūpavyākriyā bhavitumarhati । <quote>‘seyaṃ devate’</quote>tyupakramya <quote>‘vyāka-
ravāṇi’</quote> iti vyākaraṇasya paradevatākartṛkatvopadeśāt <quote>‘anena jīvene’</quote> tyasya saṃnihitānupraviśyetyanena saṃbandhācca nānayorvi-
rodha iti ।। sūtrārtho'pi vyākhyātaḥ ।।</p>
<p>itthaṃ bāhyaṃ trivṛtkaraṇamabhidhāyādhyātmikamāha---<pratika>sū ।। māṃsādi bhaumaṃ yathāśabdamitarayośca ।। 21 ।।</pratika> bhūmerannā-
tmikāyāḥ kāryaṃ bhaumaṃ māṃsādi । ādiśabdena purīṣamanasī gṛhyete । <pratika>itarayoḥ</pratika>=aptejasoḥ । yathāśabdaṃ kāryamavagantavyam ।
mūtraṃ lohitaṃ prāṇaścāpāṃ kāryam, asthi majjā vāk tejasa iti । tadāha śrutiḥ---annamaśitaṃ tredhā vidhīyate tasya yaḥ
sthaviṣṭho dhātustatpurīṣaṃ bhavati yo madhyamastanmāsaṃ yo'ṇiṣṭhastanmanaḥ’ ityādinā ।।</p>
<p>nanu sarveṣāṃ trivṛtkaraṇāviśeṣāt kathaṃ pṛthivyādivyavahāraḥ saṃgacchate iti tatrāha---<pratika>sū ।। vaiśeṣyāttu tadvādastadvādaḥ
।। 22 ।।</pratika> tuśabdaśśaṃkānirāsārthaḥ । sarveṣāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ trivṛtkaraṇāviśeṣe'pi <pratika>vaiśeṣyāt</pratika>=svabhāgādhikyāt । <pratika>tadvādaḥ</pratika>=
pṛthivyādivyavahāraḥ saṃgacchate । tadvāda iti padābhyāso'dhyāyaparisamāptyarthaḥ । tadevaṃ sarvāsāṃ śrutīnāmavirodhe prāmāṇyā-
nniravadyādvitīye brahmaṇi samanvayassiddha iti ।। asmi<pratika>npāde dvāviṃśati</pratika>ssūtrāṇi adhikaraṇāni <pratika>nava ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, yathā <pratika>rāmānujamate ca</pratika> atrādhikaraṇe saṃdehapūrvapakṣādiṣu nāsti viśeṣaḥ pūrvasmāt । atrāpi nāmarū
pavyākaraṇaṃ kiṃ parameśvarakartṛkamuta caturmuṃkhādijīvakartṛkamiti saṃdihya trivṛtkurvataḥ parameśvarasyaiva caturmukhādyatmanā sakala-
nāmarūpasṛṣṭiriti tattanmataprakriyānuguṇyena siddhāntitamiti na pṛthakprapañcitam ।। atra <pratika>pāde</pratika> anayormatayo<pratika>rekonaviṃśati</pratika>-
ssūtrāṇi adhikaraṇāni <pratika>aṣṭau ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, atra ādyaṃ sūtraṃ saṃjñādhikaraṇamitaratsūtradvayaṃ māṃsādhikaraṇamiti ca vyapadiśyate । atra <quote>‘viriñco
vā idaṃ sarvaṃ virecayati brahmā vāva viriñca etasmāddhīme rūpanāmanī’</quote>iti gaupavanaśrutyā viriñcanāmanirvacanayuktyopaṣṭabhyayā druhi-
ṇasya nāmarūpakartṛtvaṃ pratipādayantyā virodhāt <quote>‘paramādhdyete nāmarūpe vyākriyete’</quote>iti viṣṇornāmarūpakartṛtvaṃ pratipādayantyā-
griveśyaśrutīrapramāṇamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīro nāmāni kṛtvābhivadanyadāste’</quote>iti śrutyā trivṛtkriyāka-
rtureva tatsāpekṣaśarīrakartṛtvaṃ tadanantaraṃ tattannāmakartṛtvaṃ ca viriñcādivākyānāṃ tadavāntarādhikāraviṣayatvāditi <pratika>siddhāntaḥ ।</pratika>
sūtramapi vyākhyātam ।। <pratika>iti saṃjñādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha māṃsādhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</head>
<p>atrādhikaraṇe śarīrakāraṇaśrutivirodhaḥ parihriyate । <quote>‘āpo vāva māṃsamasthi ca bhavantyāpaśśarīram’</quote>iti śrutyā <quote>‘ammayaṃ
ca yato māṃsaṃ manastṛptiśca māṃsata’</quote>iti smṛtyuktatṛptijanakatvayuktisahitayā śarīrasya kevalāpyatvasya <quote>‘pṛthivī śarīra’</quote>miti
pṛthivyāṃ layaśrutyā kāṭhinyādinā ca kevalapārthivatvasya <quote>‘so'gnerdevatāyā āhutībhyassaṃbhūya hiraṇyaśarīra ūrdhvaṃ svargalokametī’</quote>
ki śrutyauṣṇyadarśanena ca kevalataijasatvasya vāṅgīkartavyatyena tasya trivṛtkṛtabhūtatrayaprakṛtikatvaṃ vadantyā <quote>‘imāstisro devatāḥ
<pb n="193"/>
puruṣaṃ prāpye’</quote> tyādiśruterapramāṇatvādbha‍ūtatrayaprakṛtikatve viśeṣokterayogācca śarīrasya trivṛtkṛtabhūtatrayaprakṛtitvaṃ na saṃbhavatīti
<pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, māṃsādikaṃ pārthivamaptejasorapi kāryamaṅgīkartavyam । śrutyanusārāt । pāthivatvādiviśeṣavyava-
hārastu tattadbha‍ūtapracusaṃyogaviśeṣeṇa tattaccharīraviṣayaḥ ।। iti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu</pratika>, bhaumamityupalakṣaṇam । yaccharīre kaṭhinaṃ
māṃsādi tadeva bhaumaṃ pārthivam । na sarvaśarīram । kiṃ tarhi <pratika>yathāśabdam</pratika> =<quote>‘yatkaṭhinaṃ sā pṛthivī’</quote>ti śrutimanusṛtya
śarīre <pratika>itarayośca</pratika> aptejasośca kāryaṃ śoṇitamajjādirūpamaṅgīkāryam । yathā māṃsādika bhauma pṛthivīkāryam । na kevalaṃ
pṛthivīkāryaṃ kiṃ tarhi itarayoraptejasoś‍ca kāryaṃ yathāśrutyaṅgīkāryamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। vaiśeṣyāttu tadvādastadvādaḥ ।। 23 ।।</pratika> pārthivamāpyaṃ taijasamiti viśeṣoktistu <pratika>vaiśeṣyāt</pratika>=vṛthivyādibhūtānāṃ
tattaccharīraviśeṣasaṃyogamapekṣya yajyate । ato na tadvirodha ityarthaḥ ।। etadadhyāyoktāryasyāvadhāraṇārthādhyā/?/yānte dviruktiḥ ।।
asminpāde atra <pratika>mate trayoviṃśatissūtrāṇi</pratika> adhikaraṇāni <pratika>trayodaśa । ityānandatīrthamate māṃsādhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</pratika></p>
<lg><l>yaṃ prāsūta viśuddhaśīlamanaghaṃ vṛddhāṃbikākhyā satī
yaṃ mṛtyuñjayaśarmaṇo budhamaṇerbhāgyaṃ vidussādhavaḥ ।</l>
<l>vādhūlānvayajanmano'sya sudhiyo hālāsyanāthāhvaya
syeyaṃ satkṛtiredhatāmiṃha caturbhāṣyānugā candrikā ।।</l></lg>
<p><pratika>sūtrārthacandrikāyāmavirodhākhye dvitīyake'dhyāye । bhautikasṛṣṭiśrutigatamavirodhaṃ</pratika> sthāpayaṃstathā prathita ।।
ādye matatraye'pi prāpatsaṃpūrtimeṣaṃ khalu turyaḥ । <pratika>pādassayuktikaśrutyavirodhākhyaśca madhva</pratika>matarītyā ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ saṃjñāmūrtiklṛptyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>śrīmadvādhūlavaṃśa</pratika>muktāphalapāṃṇḍetaprakāṇḍa<pratika>gaṃgādharasudhrīmaṇeḥ</pratika> pautreṇa saṃtatasamācaritagāyatrīsamupāstisaṃdhukṣitabrahmava-
rcasasaṃsiddhanigrahānugrahaśaktikāntarmukha<pratika>mṛtyuñjayasaṃyamīndra</pratika>gārhasthyatapaḥstomaparipākāyitamūrtinā <pratika>vṛddhāṃbikāgarbha</pratika>śuktimu-
ktāphalena ag‍niṣṭomasamāgādhitāṣṭamūrtika<pratika>śrīmadgaṅgādharamakhivarya</pratika>caramasodareṇa <pratika>gargānvaya</pratika>mahābhodhikaustubhāyitabhaginīpati
<pratika>piccuśāstri</pratika>śabdite<pratika>śvaraśarma</pratika>tapodhanaśiṣṭāgragaṇyavrahyaniṣṭādhuraṃdharāntarmukhanirupadhikaruṇāśāli<pratika>deśikendra</pratika>paramānugrahasaṃpatsaṃ-
dhukṣitakāvyālaṃkārasāhitīparicayena tadasādhāraṇuparamānugrahaprātreṇa <pratika>pañcanadasthalā</pratika>bhijanasāg‍niciyasarvatomukhamahāvrataviśva-
jidyāji brahmībhūta <pratika>śrībālakṛṣṇamakhirāja</pratika>karuṇāpāṅgasamāsāditabrahmāvidyāparicayena <pratika>śrīhālāsyanāthasūriṇā</pratika> viraci-
tāyāṃ <pratika>brahmamīmāṃsāsūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ</pratika> caturmatabhāṣyārthabodhinyāṃ <pratika>dvitīyasyādhyāyasya turīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।</pratika></p>

<head>।। śrīḥ ।।</head>

<head>śrīkaṇṭhācāryakṛtau</head>
<head>brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye</head>
<head>atha tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha tadantarapratipattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<sutra>।। sū ।। tadantarapratipattau raṃhati saṃpariṣvaktaḥ praśnanirūpaṇābhyām ।। 1 ।।</sutra>
<p>atīte'dhyāye prathamādhyāyasiddhasya brahmakāraṇavādasamanvayasya virodhaḥ
parihṛtaḥ । tathā hi—prathame pāde sāṃkhyāditarkavirodhaḥ parihṛtaḥ । dvitīye pradhāna-
kāraṇavādādiṣu tarkavirodhaḥ pradarśitaḥ । tṛtīye bhūtasṛṣṭyāvāntaravirodhaparihā-
rapūrvakaṃ jīvaśca nityatvādidharmairnirūpitaḥ । caturthe prāṇendriyāṇāṃ svarūpaṃ brahmaṇaḥ
sakāśāt teṣāmutpattimapyabhidhāya sarveṣāṃ nāmarūpavyākaraṇaṃ ca nirūpitam ।
atra tṛtīye prathamapāde nityatvādiyuktasya jīvasya gatyāgatinirūpaṇaṃ kriyate ।
dvitīye tadavasthānirūpaṇapūrvakamīśvarasya svarūpalakṣaṇucyate ।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha śivārkamaṇidīpikāyāṃ</head>
<head>tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥpādaḥ</head>
<head>atha tadaṃtarapratipattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>।। sū ।। tadaṃtarapratipattau raṃhati saṃpariṣvaktaḥ praśnanirūpaṇābhyām ।। 1 ।।</pratika>
pratipattisaukaryāyaṃ vṛttavartiṣyamāṇādhyāyapādārthānanukīrtayan saṃ1gatiṃ darśayati—<pratika>atī-
te'dhyāya iti</pratika> । prathamenādhyāyadvayena vedāntavedyaṃ siddharūpaṃ paraṃ brahma saṃbhāvitasakalavi-
rodhaparihāreṇa nirūpitam । itaḥ paramadhyāyadvayena tatprāptisādhanatatprāptiprakārātmakaṃ
sādhyarūpaṃ vastu nirūpyate । brahmaprāptisādhananirūpaṇasya brahmaprāptinirūpaṇasya ca brahmasva-
rūpāvadhāraṇādhīnatvādasyādhyāyadvayasya pūrvādhyāyadvayānaṃtaryamiti pū2rvottarādhyāyadvikayo-
rhetuhetumadbhāvasaṃgatiḥ । tatra sādhanādhīnatvātsādhyalābhasya sādhananirūpaṇārthasya tṛtīyādhyā-
yasya phalādhyāyātpūrvabhāva ityanayoradhyāyayoravāntarasaṃgatiḥ । brahmaprāptisādhanaṃ saṃsārā-
dvairāgyaṃ brahmaprepsā tadupāsanāta3daṃgāśramādidharmakalāpaśceti caturvidham । tatrādhi-
kāriṇo vairāgyadṛḍhīkaraṇāya kṣayiṣṇutvasātiśayitvādinā saṃsārasya duḥkharūpatāṃ khyāpa-
yitumiha paratra tṛ4tīye sthāne ca paribhramaṇena tasya doṣavattvaṃ prathamapāde nirūpyate ।
tasya parabrahmaprepsādṛḍhīkaraṇāya parabrahmaṇaśśivasya mahimā dvitīyapāde nirūpyate । tatro-
bhayaliṃgādhikaraṇamārabhya nirdoṣakalyāṇaguṇākaratvasamābhyadhikarahitatvasakalakarmaphalaprada-
tvarūpastasya mahimā nirūpyate iti spaṣṭameva । svapnādhikaraṇe'pi tasyaiva mahimā nirūpyate ।
<note>(1) saṃgatimāviṣkaroti’ iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘pūrvottaradvikayossaṃgatiḥ’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(3) tadupāsanānuṣṭhāna-
mupāsanāṃgāśramādi’ iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(4) <quote>‘tṛtīyasthāne ca paribhramaṇarūpatvaṃ tasya’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="196"/>
tṛtīye tadupāsanāviśeṣāṇāṃ guṇopasaṃhāraḥ । caturthe tvāśramādidharma iti vivekaḥ ।।
atra prathamādhikaraṇe jīvaḥ paralokagatāgateṣu dehāntaraprāptaye bhūtasūkṣmairveṣṭito
yāti utāveṣṭita iti saṃśayaḥ ।।
jīvo dehānnirgacchan bhūtasūkṣmairbhāviśarīrabījairapariṣvakta eva yātītyucyate,
bhūtānāṃ sarvatra sulabhatvenāpārthakatvādāyāsasya ।।
iti prāpte bramūḥ—jīvo dehāntaraprāptaye bhūtasūkṣmaiḥ pariṣvakto yātīti pañcā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
na hi tatra jīvasya svapnāvasthā kīdṛśīti ciṃtyate kiṃ tu tasyāḥ parameśvarakartṛkatvaṃ vyava-
sthāpyate । tadvyavasthāpanaṃ cānaṃtaprāṇigataparasparaviruddhātyāścaryatattatpuruṣamātrānubhāvya-
tatkālamātrāvasāyisvāpnadārthajātasraṣṭṛtvādirūpatanmahimanirūpaṇaṃ paryavasyati । yadyapye-
tenādhikaraṇena svapnāvasthāyāḥ prajāpatividyoktarītyā bhayādidarśanakaluṣitatvena heya-
tvasaṃsūcanāt pūrvapādenaiva vairāgyadṛḍhīkaraṇamapi labhyate । tathāpi tadānuṣaṃgikaṃ prayo-
janaṃ na tvanugatapādārtharūpam । tathā suṣupticiṃtāpi parameśvarasya suṣuptisthānatvena pāpāsparśa-
prayojakatvarūpamahimanirūpaṇātmikaiva । tatratyātaḥprabodhasūtrākṣepasaṃgatyā pravṛttaṃ sa
eva tu karmānusmṛtyadhikaraṇaṃ taccheṣabhūtamānuṣaṃgikaprayojanārthasuṣuptyavasthāheyatvasaṃsūcanaparya-
vasāyi । mūrchādhikaraṇamekaṃ jīvāvasthānirūpaṇaprasaṃgāgatam । tadapyānuṣaṃgikuprayojanārthe
mūrchāvasthāyāḥ yadardhasampattirmūrchā tasyā maraṇāvasthāyāśca heyatvasaṃsūcane paryavasāyi । tṛtī-
yapāde saṃjātaśivaprāpti1kutūhalasyopāsakasya guṇopasaṃhārānupasaṃhārādirnirūpitaḥ ।
caturthapāde tadaṃgakarmakalāpo nirūpita iti vivekaḥ । <pratika>atra prathamādhikaraṇe iti ।। vettha
yathetyādi</pratika> । pañcāgnividyāgatapraśnaprativacanayorbhūtaveṣṭanagamakatvasaṃbhavāsaṃbhavābhyāmayaṃ saṃśa-
yaḥ । <quote>‘apariṣvakta eve’</quote> tyavadhāraṇena praśnaprativacanayorbhūtaveṣṭanagamakatvasaṃbhāvanā vyavacchi-
dyate । tathāhi—ś‍vetaketumāruṇeyaṃ pāñcālarājaḥ pravāhaṇo <quote>‘vetthayathe’</quote> tyādi papraccha । tasmi-
nnimaṃ praśnaṃ prativaktumajānati tasya pitari cājānati tatpitrā samāgatya pṛṣṭaḥ pravāhaṇaḥ
svayameva praśnaviṣayaṃ nirūpayan kāstāḥ pañcāhutayo yāsāmuttamāyāmāhutāvāpaḥ puruṣaśabdā-
bhilapanīyatāṃ bhajaṃta ityākāṃkṣāyām <quote>‘asau vāva loko gautamāgni’</quote> rityādinā dyuparja-
nyapṛthivīpuruṣayoṣitaḥ pañcāgnitvena rūpayitvā teṣu śraddhāsomavṛṣṭyannaretodravyakāḥ paṃcāhutī-
rupadiśya tadanaṃtara <quote>‘miti tu paṃcamyāmāhutā’</quote> vityādisvapṛṣṭārthanirūpaṇopasaṃhāraḥ kṛtaḥ ।
nātra praśne prativacane vā bhūtānāṃ śravaṇamasti । dūre tatsaṃpariṣvaktasya jīvasya । bhūteṣvapāṃ
śravaṇamātramasti । na tu tāsāṃ dyulokaparyaṃtaṃ gamanasya tato yoṣitparyantaṃ pratyāgamanasya vā
śravaṇamasti । yadi tvāpaḥ pañcasvapyagniṣu homadravyatayā śrūyeran tadā kevalānāmapāṃ vā
paratreha ca gatapratyāgate praśnaprativacanābhyāṃ vivakṣite iti kalpanīye । na tu tāstathā
śrūyaṃte । śraddhādīni bhinnabhinnānyeva hyāhutidravyāṇi śrūyante । ta2smānna bhūtasūkṣmave-
ṣṭitasya jīvasya gamanasiddhiḥ । nanu tathāpi dehāntarotpattyarthaṃ tadāraṃbhakabhūtasūkṣmayuktasya
jīvasya gatvāgatī vaktavye ityāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>bhūtānāmiti</pratika> । bhogyabhogopakaraṇabhogasthānavat
bhogāyatanānāmapi tatratyaireva bhūtairadṛṣṭākṛṣṭairāraṃbhassaṃbhavatīti tadarthamito bhūtasūkṣmanayanā-
pekṣā nāstītyarthaḥ।dehāntaraprāptaya iti।tacchabdassaṃjñāmūrtisūtragatamūrtiśabdoktadehaparāmarśī।
<note>(1) kutūhalosyopāsanānuṣṭhānāya tadbhedābhedaguṇopasaṃhārā’ iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) ‘tasmānna praśnaprativacanaparyālocanayā</note>
<pb n="197"/>
gnividyāyāṃ praśnaprativacanābhyāmavagamyate । katham ? ‘vettha yathā pañcamyāmāhutā-
vāpaḥ puruṣavacaso bhavanti’ iti praśnaḥ <quote>‘iti tu pañcamyāmāhutāvāpaḥ puruṣavacaso
bhavanti’</quote> iti prativacanam । tatra cāyamarthaḥ saṃpiṇḍitaḥ—brāhmaṇādidehastho jīvaḥ
svāhādānādi karma kṛtvā tatphalabhogāyāsmāddehādutthāya gacchannetaddehasthābhira-
dbhirbhūtāntarasaṃsṛṣṭābhiḥ sūkṣmābhiḥ pariṣvaktaḥ agnitvena nirūpitaṃ dyulokaṃ prāpya
tābhirevāmṛtamayadehākāreṇa pariṇatābhiradbhiḥ pariṣvakto devānāṃ śeṣabhāvamupa-
gamya taiḥ saha tatra bhogaviśeṣānanubhūya bhuktāvaśiṣṭena brāhmaṇādidehaprāpakena
karmaṇā saha punarimaṃ lokamāgatya karma kartuṃ tābhireva pariṣvakto'gnitvena nirūpitaṃ
parjanyaṃ prāpya varṣadhārābhiḥ saha agnitvena nirūpitāṃ pṛthivīmupagamya vrīhyādi-
sasyena annākārapariṇatena saha agnitvena nirūpitaṃ puruṣaṃ prāpya tatra śuklākā-
rapariṇatābhistābhiradbhiḥ pariṣvakto'gnitvena nirūpitāṃ yoṣitaṃ prāpya tatra
dehākārapariṇatābhiḥ puruṣaśabdābhilāpanīyābhiradbhiḥ pariṣvaktaḥ karmānurūpabrā-
hyaṇādidehena jāyata iti । tadetatsarvamuttaratrābhivyajyate । tasmāt puruṣo
bhūtasūkṣmairveṣṭita eva dehāntaraṃ prāpnotīti ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। tryātmakatvāttu bhūyastvāt ।। 2 ।।</sutra>
sarvasya trivṛtkaraṇena tryātmakatvādbha‍ūtāntarasaṃsṛṣṭā evāpo bhūyastvādapcha-
bdenocyante । ataḥ <quote>‘pañcamyāmāhutāvāpaḥ’</quote> iti kevalāpchabdagrahaṇe'pi na virodhaḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। prāṇagateśca ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘prāṇamanūtkrāmantaṃ sarve prāṇā anūtkrāmanti’</quote> iti jīvena sahendriyagatestadā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pratipattiśabdaḥ prāptivācī । saptabhyuddeśyarūpaviṣayārtheti bhāvaḥ । praśnaprativacanayoḥ bhūtave-
ṣṭito jīvo yātatyetadarthaparyavasāyitvaṃ sūtrākāra evottarasūtraiḥ prapaṃca3yiṣyati । atra
śrotṝṇāmākāṅkṣāśāntaye tamarthaṃ sarvaṃ niṣkṛṣya darśayati—<pratika>tatra cāyamartha</pratika> iti । praśnaprativaca-
nayorāpa eva kevalāḥ śrūyante na bhūtāntaraśravaṇamastīti śaṃkānirākaraṇārthaṃ tāvadidaṃ
sūtram—<pratika>sū ।। tryātmakatvāttu bhūyastvāt ।। 2 ।। sarvasyeti ।।</pratika> praśnaprativacanayorapāṃ
puruṣaśabdābhilapanīyatvaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ puruṣādhiṣṭhānadehāraṃbhakatvenaivopapādanīyam । ta2dāraṃbhaśca
na kevalābhiradbhirupapadyate । aśitapītādiparipākasnehagaṃdhādikāryadarśanena dehasya tryātma-
katvāt dehādyāraṃbhārthaṃ sarvasyāpi tejo'bannasya sargādyakāla eva trivṛtkṛtatvena tryātmaka-
tvācca । atastrayāṇāṃ dehāraṃbhakatve'pi dehasya rasalohitādibhūyastayā kāryānusāreṇa bhūte-
ṣvapāṃ bhūyastvāt apśabdenābhidhānaṃ na tu bhūtāntarābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ । na kevalaṃ praśnapra-
tivacanayoḥ śrūyamāṇānāmapāṃ dehāraṃbhakatvātkrayātmakatayā tayorapśabdasya tryātmakabhūtasū-
kṣmaparatā kiṃ tu tāsāṃ sūkṣmadeharūpatvādapīti pūrvasūtrasādhye hetvantarakathanārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>sū ।।
prāṇagateśca ।। 3 ।।</pratika> asti tāvadidamiha paratra ca jīvasya gatāgatayoriṃdriyāṇāmapi tena
saha gatāgate । na ceṃdriyāṇāṃ śarīrāśrayaṇaṃ vinā gatāgate saṃbhavataḥ । nāpi teṣāmavasthā-
<note>bhūtaveṣṭitasya’ iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(1) pratipādayiṣyati’ iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।।</note> <note>(2) dehāraṃbhaśca iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
