śrayatvena dehagamanamapi pratīyate । ato'pi bhūtasūkṣmadehaveṣṭita eva yātīti ।।
āśaṅkya pariharati---
<sutra>।। sū ।। agnyādigatiśruteriti cenna bhāktatvāt ।। 4 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘yatrāsya puruṣasya mṛtasyāgniṃ vāgapyeti vātaṃ prāṇaścakṣurādityam’</quote> ityādāvi-
ndriyāṇāmagnyādyabhigamaḥ śrūyate । tato jīvenendriyāṇāṃ na sahagamanamiti
cet—na, vāgādyabhimānidevatāsu vāgādiśabdānāṃ bhāktatvāt, oṣadhīrlo-
māni vanaspatīn keśāḥ’ ityanapiyadbhirlomādibhiḥ saha pāṭhāt ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। prathame'śravaṇāditi cenna tā eva hyupapatteḥ ।। 5 ।।</sutra>
prathame dyulokāgnāvapāmaśravaṇāt nāpo gacchanti <quote>‘etasminnagnau devāḥ śraddhāṃ
juhvati’</quote> iti śradvaiva śrūyate iti cet—na । āpa eva śraddhāśabdenocyante । katham ?
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
namātraṃ saṃbhavati । jīvaddaśāyāmeva darśanāt । na ca teṣāṃ svasvakāryeṣu pravṛttyarthameva dehā-
śrayaṇaṃ kevalamavasthānaṃ gatāgataṃ ca svasvopādānāśrayāṇāmeva teṣāṃ saṃbhavatīti vācyam ।
mārge caṃdrasaṃvādādiśravaṇena teṣāṃ gatāgatayoḥ svasvakāryeṣu pravṛtterapi sattvāt । ato mārge
sthūladehābhāvādiṃdriyāśrayatvopapattyarthametāsāmapāmeva tryātmakatayā sūkṣmadehatvamāśrayaṇīya-
miti bhāvaḥ ।। nanvevamiṃdriyāṇāṃ jīvānugatyabhyupagame teṣāmagnyādyapyayaśravaṇasya kathaṃ nirvāha
ityākāṃkṣāyāṃ tannirvāhapradarśanārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>sū ।। agnyādigatiśruteriti cenna bhāk‍ta-
tvāt ।। 4 ।। bhāktatvāditi</pratika> । nanu vāgiṃdriyādyabhimāniṣvagnyādiṣu tattaccharīrakeṣu
vāgādiśabdānāṃ mukhyatvaṃ saṃbhavati kathaṃ bhāktatvaṃ varṇyate ? vāgādiśabdānāmagnyādiparatve
ca kathaṃ vākyārthaniṣpattiḥ । na hyagnyādayo'gnyādīnapiyantītyupapadyate । utkrāntau
vāgādīnvihāya tadabhimānidevatānāmanyatra gamane ca devatānadhiṣṭhitānāṃ teṣāṃ kathaṃ mārge
candrasaṃvādādikāryaniṣpādakatvam ? । ucyate । vāgādiśabdā vāgādyabhimānidevatāsu
mukhyā eva । yattāsāmagnyādidevatāsvapyayavarṇanaṃ tadbhāktam । utkrāṃtisamaye nirvyāpāreṣu
vāgādiṣu tadabhimānidevatānāṃ tadvyāpā rayitṛtvaṃ vihāya kevalamagnyādirūpeṇāvasthānaṃ
tāsāmagnyādyapyayatvenopacaritamiti bhāṣyābhiprāyaḥ । syādetat । praśnaprativacanayoḥ yoṣi-
dagnyāhutāvapāṃ dehākārapariṇatimātraṃ śrūyate । tena tāsāṃ tryātmakatvaṃ sidhyatu nāma ।
tāvatā tāsāmiha paratra ca jīvapariṣvaṃjakatvena gatāgate na sidhyataḥ । na ca tāsāṃ homa-
pañcake'pyanuvṛttiśravaṇamasti । na cāhutidravyatvādanuvṛttikalpanam । tadaśravaṇāttattadāhutiṣu
dravyāntaraśravaṇācca । somādīnāmāhutidravyāṇāmabvikāratayā praśnaprativacanaśrutāvabrūpa-
tvakalpanā saṃbhavatīti cenna । prathamaparyāye manovṛttiviśeṣarūpaśraddhādravyake abvikāradravyā-
śrutyā praṇava eva vaisvaryeṇa tathākalpanasyāpravṛtteḥ । na ca tathāpi candrasaṃvādopapattaye
sūkṣmadeharūpatayaitāsāmapāṃ jīvānugatiḥ kalpanīyeti vācyam । pañcāmāhutau śrutānāmapāṃ
tāvanmātrasambandhe'pi candrasaṃvādopapattaye caṃdraloka eva dhūmādimārgagatānāmivārcirādi-
mārgagatānāmapyamṛtamayadehotpattikalpanopapatteḥ sthūladehakalpanayā caṃdrasaṃvādārthāpatterakli-
ṣṭopapādanasaṃbhave anyatrānyārthaśrutānāmapāṃ sūkṣmadehatvakalpanena kliṣṭopapādanāyogādityā-
śaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ <pratika>sūtram—sū ।। prathame'śravaṇāditi cenna tā eva hyupapatteḥ ।। 5 ।।</pratika>
<pb n="199"/>
apsu pṛṣṭāsu taduttaropapatteḥ। śraddhāśabdaścāpsu yujyate, <quote>‘śraddhā vā āpaḥ’</quote>
iti śruteḥ।।
punarāśaṅkaya pariharati—
<sutra>।। sū।। aśrutatvāditi cenneṣṭādikāriṇāṃ pratīteḥ।। 6।।</sutra>
atra praśnaprativacanayorāpa eva pratīyante, na tatpariṣvakto jīva iti cet—na,
uttaratra ‘atha ya ime grāme iṣṭāpūrte dattamityupāsate te dhūmamabhisaṃbhavanti dhūmā-
drātriṃ rātreraparapakṣamaparapakṣādyān ṣaḍdakṣiṇaiti māsāṃstān naite saṃvatsaramabhi-
prāpnuvanti māsebhyaḥ pitṛlokaṃ pitṛlokādādityamādityāccandramasameṣa some rājā
taddevānāmannaṃ taṃ devā bhakṣayanti tasmin yāvatsaṃpātamuṣitvāthaitamevādhvānaṃ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>apsu pṛṣṭāsviti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । praśnavākye pañcasvapyāhutiṣvapāṃ saṃbandhamabhyanujñāya
paṃcamāhutau dehākārapariṇatiprakāramātraṃ pṛṣṭam । na hi tatra paṃcamyāmāhutāvapāṃ sattvaṃ dehā-
kārapariṇatiprakāraścetyubhayaṃ pṛṣṭamiti vaktuṃ śakyam । vākyabhedāpatteḥ । evaṃ ca viśiṣya
paṃcamyāmāhutāvapāṃ dehākārapariṇatipraśnādāhutyantareṣvapi tāsāṃ saṃbaṃdhamātramabhyanujñātama-
vasīyate । yadyapyapāṃ puruṣavacastvaviśeṣitabhavanakriyāsaṃbaṃdhamātraṃ śābdaṃ tathāpyāhutīnāṃ
dravyākāṃkṣāyāṃ sannidhānāttaddravyatayāpi tāssambadhyante । tathā ca paṃcasvāhutiṣu hūyamā-
nānāmapāṃ pañcamyāmāhutau puruṣākāreṇa pariṇāmaṃ vettha kimiti praśnavākyārthaḥ paryavasyati ।
tataśca kāstā abdravyakāḥ paṃcāhutayaḥ ityākāṃkṣayāṃ tannirūpaṇārthaṃ pravṛtteṣu paṃcasu paryāyeṣu
ye homadravyaparāḥ śraddhādiśabdāste tāsāmapāmevāvasthāviśeṣavācakā iti vyākhyātuṃ
yuktam । evaṃ satyeva <quote>‘iti tu pañcamyāmāhutā’</quote> viti prativacanopasaṃhāravākyamapi saṃgacchate ।
yadi hyapāṃ paṃcamaparyāye hūyamānānāṃ <quote>‘tasminnetasminnagnau devā reto juhvati tasyā āhuterga-
rbhassaṃbhavatī’</quote>ti puruṣākārapariṇāmaṃ vaktuṃ <quote>‘tasminnetasminnagnau devāḥ śraddhāṃ juhvati tasyā
āhutessomo rājā saṃbhavatī’</quote> tyādiṣu prathamādiparyāyeṣvapi tāsāmeva hūyamānānāmapāṃ
somarājādipariṇāma uktaḥ syāt । tadānīmitiśabdena prakāravācinā ca pūrvoktasarva-
prakāraparāmarśassaṃgacchate । prathamādiparyāyeṣu evamevaṃ bhūtvā pañcamaparyāye puruṣākārā
bhavantyāpa ityanvayāt । yadi tu śraddhādiśabdoktānāmanyeṣāmeva homadravyāṇāṃ somarājā-
dipariṇāma ukto bhavet tadā pūrvoktaḥ sarvo'pi prakāro'pāṃ pariṇāmakramaviṣayo na bhava-
tīti sa na saṃgacchate । tasmādapsveva śraddhāśabdaḥ । vaidikaprayogāntaradarśanena tasya tāsu
vṛttyupapatteḥ pañcasvapyāhutiṣu apāmeva homadravyatvena saṃmbandhe siddhe paṃcamāhutau tāsāṃ puruṣa-
vacastvamātrasya vidheyatvenāvākyabhedopapatteśceti ।। nanvastvapāṃ tryātmakānāṃ pañcasvapyāhutiṣu
homadravyatvena somarājādyuttarottarāvasthāviśeṣapariṇāmitvena cānuvṛttyā gatāgatasiddhiḥ ।
tathāpi bhūtāntarasaṃsṛṣṭābhistābhiradbhissaṃpariṣvakto jīvo gacchatītyetanna sidhyati । jīva-
syāśrutatvādityetacchaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram— <pratika>aśrutatvāditi cenneṣṭādikāriṇāṃ
pratīteḥ ।। 6 ।।</pratika> pitṛyāṇavākye tāvatsomarājaśabdanirdiṣṭā iṣṭāpūrtādikarmaphalaṃ bhoktuṃ
dyuloke candramasaṃ prāptā iṣṭādikāriṇa eva । <quote>‘atha ya ime grāme iṣṭāpūrte’</quote> ityādinopanya-
stānāṃ teṣāmeva karmaphalabhogaparyantaṃ tatra sthitvā tadavasāne punarākāśādikrameṇa bhūmāva-
<pb n="200"/>
punarnivartante, yathetamākāśamākāśādvāyuṃ vāyurbhūtvā dhūmo bhavati dhūmo bhūtvābhraṃ
bhavati abhraṃ bhūtvā megho bhavati megho bhūtvā pravarṣati ta iha vrīhiyavā oṣa-
dhivanaspatayastilamāṣā iti jāyante ato vai khalu durniṣprapatataraṃ yo yo hyanna-
matti yo retaḥ siñcati tadbha‍ūya eva bhavati’ iti vākye dyuloke somarājaśabdo-
ktāmṛtamayadehavaiśiṣṭyena puṇyaphalamanubhūya puṇyakarmāvasāne punarihāgatya garbhaṃ
prāptavatāmiṣṭādikāriṇāṃ pratītesteṣāmeva <quote>‘tasminnetasminnagnau devāḥ śraddhāṃ juhvati
tasyā āhuteḥ somo rājā saṃbhavati’</quote> ityatra somarājaśabdena pratyabhijñānāt ।
tasmāt praśnaprativacanayorapyadbhiḥ pariṣvaktastaccharīrako jīva evāpa ityucyanta
iti gamyate । ato na virodhaḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। bhāktaṃ vānātmavittvāt tathā hi darśayati ।। 7 ।।</sutra>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vatīrya brāhmaṇādijanmane garbhaprāpteḥ pradipādanāt । na evātrāpi somarājaśabdanirdiṣṭā
bhavitumarhanti somarājaśrutisāmyāt dyulokasthitisāmyāccetyevamiṣṭādikāriṇāṃ pratīteḥ
tadaśravaṇamasiddhamiti bhāvaḥ । śrutā <quote>‘veṣa somo rāje’</quote> tyekavacanaśravaṇe'pi <quote>‘iṣṭādikā-
riṇā’</quote>miti sūtre bahuvacanaṃ śaṃkāntaravāraṇārtham । ebamiha śaṅkā syāt । <quote>‘ākāśāccaṃ-
dramasa’</quote> miti prakṛtaścandramāḥ <quote>‘eṣa’</quote> iti parāmṛśyate । ekavacanānuguṇyāt । somarāja-
śabdayostatra prasiddhatvāt tasya devabhakṣyatvaprasiddheśca । atastaṃ prakṛtā iṣṭādikāriṇo devā
bhūtvā bhakṣayantītyeva teṣāṃ dyuloke bhogaprakāra ucyate । tasmātsomarājaśabdeneṣṭādikā-
riṇāṃ pratītirasiddheti । tatrāyaṃ parihāro vivakṣitaḥ । candrasya <quote>‘eṣa somo rāje’</quote> ti soma-
rājatvaṃ na vidhātavyam । somarājaśabdayoścaṃdraparyāyatvasya prasiddhatvāt । ata <quote>‘eṣa’</quote> iti
prathamāṃtanirdiṣṭānāmiṣṭādikāriṇāmeva parāmārśaḥ । vibhaktyaikarūpyāt । ekavacanaṃ tu
vākyasya prātipadikasya ca guṇabhūtam । bahupatnīkaprayoge <quote>‘patnīṃ sannahye’</quote> tyekavacanavadatraiva
prakaraṇe <quote>‘vāyurbhūtvābhraṃ bhavatī’</quote> tyādīṣṭādikāriviṣayaikavacanavacca pratyekagataikatvābhiprāyaṃ
yojanīyam । tataśca <quote>‘somo rāje’</quote> tyanena gauṇena prasiddhacandrasādṛśyaṃ divyabhogayogyāmṛ-
tamayadehatvaṃ vidhīyate । athavā bhogyatvarūpamagrimasūtreṇa spaṣṭīkariṣyamāṇaṃ prasiddhacaṃdrasā-
dṛśyaṃ vidhīyate । tasyaiva vivaraṇaṃ <quote>‘taddevānāmannaṃ taddevā bhakṣayantī’</quote> ti । tasmātpitṛyāṇa-
vākyagataṃ <quote>‘eṣa somo rāje’</quote> tyetat bahūnāmiṣṭādikāriṇāmeva parāmarśakaṃ na tvekasya
candramasa iti । api ca । pitṛyāṇavākye parjanyāvarohaṇamiṣṭādikāriṇāmeva śrutaṃ na
tu candramasa iti nirvivādam । tacca pañcāgnividyāyāṃ somarājaśabdanirdiṣṭasya <quote>‘parjanyo
vāva gautamāgni’</quote> rityārabhya <quote>‘tasminnetasminnagnau devāḥ somaṃ rājānaṃ juhvatī’</quote> ti śrūyate ।
ato'pyastyatreṣṭādikāriṇāṃ somarājaśabdena pratītiriti । <quote>‘aparapakṣādyānī’</quote> tyādiśru-
tivākyasyāyamarthaḥ । aparapakṣāttānmāsānabhisaṃbhavaṃti prāpnuvaṃti yānṣaṇmāsān dakṣiṇāṃ
diśameti savitā dakṣiṇāyanamāsaṣaṭkābhimāninīrdevatāḥ prāpnuvantīti yāvat । ete iṣṭādi-
kāriṇo'rcirādimārgagāmino vidvāṃsa iva māsebhyaḥ saṃvatsaraṃ na prāpnuvantīti ।। nanu
pitṛyāṇavākye'pi somarājaśabdanirdiṣṭā iṣṭādikāriṇo na bhavaṃti devairbhakṣyamāṇatvaśrava-
ṇāditi śaṃkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>sū ।। bhāktaṃ vānātmavittvāttathāhi darśayati</pratika> ।
</p>
</section>
</report><pb n="201"/>
<quote>‘eṣa somo rājā taddevānāmannaṃ taṃ devā bhakṣayanti’</quote> iti somarājabhāvāpannasyaiva
devairbhakṣyamāṇatvaśravaṇānnāsau jīva iti cet—tat bhāktameva bhakṣyamāṇatvaṃ
anātmavittvena devopakaraṇabhāvābhiprāyam । tathā hi <quote>‘yathā paśurevaṃ sa devānām’</quote>
iti śrutiranātmavidāṃ paśuvaddevopakaraṇatvaṃ darśayati । tasmādātmavidāṃ parame-
śvaropakaraṇatvavat anātmavidāṃ devopakaraṇatvamiti mantavyam । ataḥ sarvathā
jīvo dehāntaraprāptau bhūtasūkṣmaveṣṭita eva yātīti siddham ।।
iti tadantarapratipattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
।। 7 ।। iṣṭādikāriṇaḥ prakṛtya śrutyantare <quote>‘te candraṃ prāpyānnaṃ bhavaṃti tāṃstatra devā yathā
somaṃ rājānamāpyāyasvāpakṣīyasvetyevamenāṃstatra bhakṣayantī’</quote>ti teṣāmeva devānnabhāvaśra-
vaṇāt । ihāpi pūrvāparaparyālocanālabdhānāmiṣṭādikāriṇāmeva devairbhakṣyamāṇatvaśravaṇāt
teṣāṃ vyāghrādibhiriva devairmukhyatayā bhakṣyamāṇatve svargakāmādi śrutivirodhaprasaṃgāt teṣā-
miha karmabhirdevārādhakatvena paratra tatparicārakatvena ca devopabhogyatvābhiprāyaṃ bhāktaṃ tadada-
danīyatvaśravaṇaṃ vyākhyeyamiti bhāvaḥ ।। <pratika>iti tadaṃtarapratipattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</pratika></p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha tadantarapratipattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<pratika>sū॰ ।। tadaṃtarapratipattau raṃhati saṃpariṣvaktaḥ praśnanirūpaṇābhyām ।। 1 ।। tryātmakatvāttu bhūyastvāt
।। 2 ।। prāṇagateśca ।। 3 ।। agnyādiśruteriti cenna bhāktatvāt ।। 4 ।। prathame'śravaṇāditi cenna tā eva
hyupapatteḥ ।। 5 ।। aśrutatvāditi cenneṣṭādikāriṇāṃ pratīteḥ ।। 6 ।। bhāktaṃ vānātmavittvāttathā hi
darśayati ।। 7 ।।</pratika>
<lg><l>jīvo yāti tridivaṃ na bhūtasūkṣmaiḥ pariṣvaktaḥ । dehāntarahetūnāṃ teṣāṃ sarvatra sulabhatvāt ।। 168 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>vettha yatheti śrutyā gamanaṃ tadveṣṭitasyaiva । prāṇānāṃ sahagatirapyanāśrayāṇāṃ na saṃbhavati ।। 169 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti tadantarapratipattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha tadantarapratipattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। tadantarapratipattau raṃhati saṃpariṣvaktaḥ praśnanirūpaṇābhyām ।। 1 ।। tryātmakāttu bhūyastvāt
।। 2 ।। prāṇagateśca ।। 3 ।। agnyādigatiśruteriti cenna bhāktatvāt ।। 4 ।। prathame'śravaṇāditi cenna
tā eva hyupapatteḥ ।। 5 ।। aśrutatvāditi cenneṣṭādikāriṇāṃ pratīteḥ ।। 6 ।। bhāktaṃ vānātmavittvā-
ttathā hi darśayati ।। 7 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ jīvopakaraṇabhūtabhautikajanma nirūpitam । tadupajīvya tadupahitasya jīvasya saṃsāraprakāraṃ vairā-
gyārthaṃ nirūpayituṃ dehāntarāraṃbhe bhūtasūkṣmasaṃpariṣvaktasyaiva paralokagamanamityāha—<pratika>sū ।। tadantarapratipattāvityādinā ।</pratika>
atra sa jīvaḥ kiṃ dehāntarāraṃbhakairapañcīkṛtabhūtabhāgairasaṃpariṣvakto gacchati uta saṃpariṣvakta iti <pratika>sandehaḥ</pratika> । mānābhāvāda-
saṃpariṣvakta eva gacchatīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । tadantarapratipattau</pratika>=dehāntarapratipattau tadāraṃbhakabhūtaiḥ <pratika>saṃpariṣvaktaḥ । raṃhati</pratika>=
gacchati । kutaḥ । <pratika>praśnanirūpaṇābhyām</pratika>=<quote>‘vettha yathā pañcamyāmāhutāvāpaḥ puruṣavacaso bhavanti’</quote> iti <pratika>praśnaḥ</pratika> । dyuparja-
nyapṛthivīpuruṣayoṣitsu pañcasvagniṣu śraddhāsomavṛṣṭyannaretorūpāḥ pañcāhutīrdarśayitvā <quote>‘iti tu paṃcamyāmāhutāvāpaḥ puruṣavacaso
bhavantī’</quote> ti <pratika>nirūpaṇaṃ</pratika>= prativacanaṃ <pratika>tābhyā</pratika>mityarthaḥ । atassaṃpariṣvakto gacchatīti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ ।।</pratika></p>
<p>nanvevamadbhissaṃpariṣvakto gacchatīti gamyate kathaṃ taditarabhūtapariṣvaṅgasiddhirityata āha---<pratika>sū ।। tryātmakatvāttu
bhūyasstvāt ।। 2 ।।</pratika> trivṛtkaraṇaśrutyā apāmitarabhūtadvayamelanena tryātmakatvāt । kathaṃ tarhi śrutāvapśabdaḥ । <pratika>bhūyastvāt</pratika>=
tejaādyapekṣayā apāṃ dehe bhūyastvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<pb n="202"/>
<p><pratika>sū ।। prāṇagateśca ।। 3 ।।</pratika> prāṇānāṃ bhūtāśritānāmeva <quote>‘tamutkrāmanta’</quote> mityādinā gateḥ śravaṇācca tatpariṣvaṅgasiddhiḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। agnyādigatiśruteriti cenna bhāktatvāt ।। 4 ।। agnyādigatiśruteriti cenna</pratika>=<quote>‘mṛtasyāgniṃ vā-
gapyeti vātaṃ prāṇaḥ’</quote>ityādinā agnyādiṣu <pratika>gatiśrute</pratika>rlayaśravaṇāt na jīvena vāgādayo gacchantīti cet na । vāgādilaya-
śruteḥ <quote>‘oṣadhīrlomāni’</quote> iti<pratika>vadbhākta</pratika>tvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। prathame'śravaṇāditi cenna tā eva hyupapatteḥ ।। 5 ।। prathame</pratika>=dyulokādiṣu pañcasvagniṣu prathame dyulokāgnau ।
<pratika>aśravaṇādita cet</pratika>=<quote>‘tasminnetasminnagrau devāḥ śraddhāṃ juhṇatī’</quote> ti śraddhāyā āhutitvaśravaṇādapāmaśravaṇātkathaṃ puruṣava-
capttvamiti cet । <pratika>na । hi</pratika>=yataḥ । <pratika>tā eva</pratika>=<quote>‘āpo hāsmai śraddhāṃ saṃnamante’</quote> iti śraddhāśabdena taddhetavastā evāpo lakṣya-
nte । <pratika>upapatteḥ</pratika>=praśnanirūpaṇayorupapatterityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। aśrutatvāditi cenneṣṭādikāriṇāṃ pratīteḥ ।। 6 ।। aśrutatvāditi cet</pratika>=apāṃ śravaṇe'pi abā-
divajjīvasyāśrutatvāditi cet । <pratika>na</pratika> । kutaḥ । <pratika>iṣṭādikāriṇāṃ pratīteḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘atha ya ime grāme iṣṭāpūrte dattamityupāsate te
dhūmamabhisaṃbhavantī’</quote> tyādivākyaśeṣeṇa iṣṭāpūrtakāriṇāṃ pratīterityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu teṣāṃ dhūmādimārgeṇa candralokaṃ gatānāṃ <quote>‘taddevānāmannaṃ taṃ devā bhakṣayantī’</quote> ti devairbhakṣyatvaśravaṇātkathaṃ teṣāṃ svaka-
rmaphalopabhogassidhdyedityata āha---<pratika>sū ।। bhāktaṃ vānātmavittvāttathāhi darśayati ।। 7 ।।</pratika> vāśabdaśśaṃkānirāsārthaḥ ।
teṣāmiṣṭādikāriṇāmannatvaṃ <pratika>bhāktameva</pratika> na mukhyam । kutaḥ <pratika>anātmavittvāt</pratika>=ātmajñānaśūnyatvātteṣāṃ devopabhogyatvame-
vānnatvam । <pratika>tathāhi darśayati</pratika>=<quote>‘atha yo'nyāṃ devatāmupāste’</quote> ityādiśrutirdevaparicārakatvameva tadannatvamiti darśayatī-
tyarthaḥ । tasmātparalokabhogārthaṃ bhūtasūkṣmasaṃpariṣvaktasyaiva jīvasya paralokagamanamiti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika> tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> ca asminpāde ṣaṭsvapyadhikaraṇeṣu prāyassa<pratika>ndehapūrvapakṣasiddhāntādiṣu</pratika> viśe-
ṣābhāvānna pṛthakprapañcanāvakāśa iti vedyam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika> idamadhikaraṇīyā saptasūtrī pratisūtraṃ bhinnādhikaraṇatayā saptadhā saṃvibhajya vyākhyātā । atra tṛtī-
yādhyāye sādhananirūpaṇaṃ prastūyate । tatrāsminprathame pāde sādhaneṣu prathamāpekṣitasya vairāgyasya siddhaye jīvasya gattyāga-
tinirūpaṃṇa kriyate---<pratika>sū । tadantarapratipattau raṃhati saṃpariṣvaktaḥ praśnanirūpaṇābhyām ।। 1 ।।</pratika> bandhanivṛttyarthaṃ
hi vairāgyādisādhanāpekṣā । bandhaśca bhūtabandha eva । tadvimokṣa eva ca mokṣaḥ । sa ca svamaraṇe bhavati । maraṇaṃ
ca svata e niyamena bhavati kiṃ vairāgyādisādhanāpekṣayeti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika> satyaṃ bhūtabandhanivṛttireva
mokṣaḥ । sā tu mṛtau na saṃbhavati । pūrvaśarīraṃ parityajya śarīrāntaraprāptau tadāraṃbhāya bhūtasaṃpariṣvaktasyaiva jīvasya gateḥ
<quote>‘vettha yathā pañcamyāmāhutāvāpaḥ puruṣavacaso bhavanti’</quote> <quote>‘iti tu pañcamyāmāhutāvāpaḥ puruṣavacaso bhavantī’</quote> ti praśnapra-
tivacābhyāmavagamāditi । sūtrārtho'pi vyākhyātaḥ ।। <pratika>iti tadantarādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha tryātmakādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। tryātmakatvāttu bhūyastvāt ।। 2 ।।</pratika> praśnaprativacanayorapāmeva gateḥ śrūyamāṇatvātkevalābhiradbhiśśarīrā-
ntarāraṃbhānmaraṇa eva bhūtabandhanivṛttirūpamokṣasaṃbhavānna vairāgyāpekṣeti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, prāgeva bhūtānāṃ trivṛ-
tkṛtatayāpāṃ grahaṇena bhūtejasorapi prāpteḥ sarvaśarīreṣu tricaturbhāginīnāmapāṃ bhūyastvena trivṛtkṛtatve'pyapśabdaprayogo-
papatteśca bhūtasaṃpariṣvaktasyaiva gatiḥ siddhā । tasmānna maraṇe mokṣasiddhiḥ । iti ।। <pratika>iti tryātmakādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha prāṇagatyadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। prāṇagateśca ।। 3 ।।</pratika> nanu praśnottarayoḥ śrutā <quote>‘vāpaḥ puruṣavacasa’</quote> iti śravaṇādbha‍ūtānāṃ sahagamanaṃ kaṇṭhato noktamato
na bhūtasaṃpariṣvaktasya gatissiddhayet । tasmānmaraṇa eva mokṣasiddhervairāgyādyanapekṣā yuktā iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>
<quote>‘prāṇairvāva na viyujyanta’</quote> iti śruteḥ <quote>‘yatra vāva bhūtāni tatra karaṇāni nityāni havā etāni bhūtāni karaṇāni na caitāni
kadācidviyujyante na ca vilīyanta’</quote> iti bhāllaveyaśruteśca prāṇānāṃ bhūtānāṃ cāvinābhāvāvagamādbha‍ūtānyapi jīvena saha ga-
cchantīti siddham । tasmānmaraṇe mokṣāsiddherasti vairāgyādisādhanāpekṣā jīvasyeti ।। <pratika>iti prāṇagatyadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। agnyādigatiśruteriti cenna bhāktatvāt ।। 4 ।।</pratika> nanu yatrāsya <quote>‘mṛtasyāgniṃ vāgapyetī’</quote> tyādiśravaṇā-
dindriyāṇāmeva jīvena sahagatirasiddheti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika> <quote>‘puruṣasya mṛtau brahmanprāṇā bhāgata eva tu । adhidaivaṃ
prāpnuvanti bhāgato'nubrajanti tam ।। punaśśarīrasaṃprāptau tamevānuviśanti ca ।।’</quote> <quote>‘mṛtikāle jahatyenaṃ prāṇā bhūtāni
pacaṃ ca । bhāgato bhāgatastvenamanugacchanti sarvaśaḥ ।।’</quote> iti brahmabrahmāṇḍavacanābhyāṃ prāṇānāṃ bhāṃgato'gnyādiprāpte-
rbhāgato jīvānuvrajanasya punaśśarīraprāptau bhūtāvinābhūtānāmagnyādigatabhāgānāmapi tadanupraveśasya ca pratipāditatvā-
tprāṇānāṃ jīvena sahagatissidhdyatyeveti ।। <pratika>bhāktatvāt</pratika>=bhāgaviṣayatvādityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti agnyādyadhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="203"/>
atha kṛtātyayādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। kṛtātyaye'nuśayavān dṛṣṭasmṛtibhyāṃ yathetamanevaṃ ca ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatra bhūtasūkṣmaśarīrayukta eva jīvaḥ svargādikamupetya devādiśarīre nijaka-
rmānuguṇaṃ bhogaṃ prāpnotīti siddham । tadiha bhogānantaraṃ sa jīvaḥ punarimaṃ lokaṃ
sakarmaśeṣo'vatarati, niḥśeṣabhuktakarmā veti saṃśayaḥ ।।
tathā sati puruṣo niranuśaya eva svargādimaṃ lokamavarohatīti yuktam । anu-
śayo nāma karmaśeṣo jīvamanuśeta iti । na svargādavarohato'nuśayaḥ saṃbhavati ।
anuśayaphalasya tatra bhuktatvāt । <quote>‘yāvatsaṃpātamuṣitvā athaitamevādhvānaṃ punarni-
vartante’</quote> iti śrutistadviṣayā । atra saṃpātaḥ karmasamūhaḥ । saṃpātamanatikramyeti
yāvatsaṃpātamityucyate । tato niḥśeṣaṃ karmaphalaṃ bhuktvā karmarahita eva svargā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha kṛtātyayādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p>evaṃ sakalasāṃsārikaduḥkhaheturdehāraṃbhakabhūtabandho maraṇe'pi na muñjatītyābrahmajñānaṃ teṣā-
manuvṛttiruktā । atha <quote>‘bhāktaṃ vānātmavittvā’</quote> dityavyavahitasūtre kṣayiṣṇusātiśayaphalakatayā
duḥkhaprāyaphalakatvena pradarśitasya karmabandhasyāpyevamābrahmajñānamanuvṛttipratipādanārthamadhika-
raṇam—<pratika>sū ।। kṛtātyaye'nuśayavāndṛṣṭasmṛtibhyāṃ yathetamanevaṃ ca ।। 8 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘yāvatsaṃpā-
tamuṣitve’</quote>ti śravaṇāt <quote>‘ramaṇīyacaraṇā’</quote> ityādiśravaṇācca saṃśayamāha—<pratika>sa jīva iti ।
saṃpātaḥ karmasamūha iti ।</pratika> saṃpatatyanena paralokamiti karaṇārthe ghañ‌pratyayaḥ । <pratika>ato
niśśeṣamiti</pratika> । upakramagatatvā <quote>‘dyāvatsaṃpāta’</quote> miti śravaṇaṃ pravalamiti tadanusāreṇa
caraṇaśabdaḥ svargārtheṣṭāpūrttadānādirūpakarmavyatiriktasandhyāvandanādyācāraparo netavya iti</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha prathamādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। prathame'śravaṇāditi cenna tā eva hyupapatteḥ ।। 5 ।।</pratika> ‘tasminnetasminnagnau devāśśraddhāṃ juhvatīti śarī-
rādutkrāntasya śraddhyeṣṭavataḥ puṃsaśśraddhāsahitasyaiva dyuśabdokte prathamāgnau homaśravaṇādbha‍ūtasahitasya tadaśravaṇācca nāsti
bhūtānāṃ sahagatistatsattve prathamaṃ taduktyavaśyaṃbhāvācceti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika> tadaśravaṇāsiddheḥ । tā eva hyāpa-
strivṛtkṛtāḥ śraddhāśabdenātrocyante । yataḥ śraddhāśabdo lakṣaṇayā adbhissahitaṃ puruṣamāha । tathā satyeva <quote>‘iti tu pañcamyā-
māhutāvāpaḥ puruṣavacaso bhavantī’</quote> tyupasaṃhāropapatterbhūtānāṃ jīvena sahagatirupapannaiveti ।। <pratika>iti prathamādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha aśrutatvādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। aśrutatvāditi cenneṣṭādikāriṇāṃ pratīteḥ ।। 6 ।।</pratika> agnyādigatiśrutivadbha‍ūtānāṃ jīvena sahagamanasya
pratyakṣaśrutāvaśravaṇādbha‍ūtānāṃ jīvena sahagamanaṃ na siddhyatīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, <quote>‘athainaṃ yajamānaṃ kiṃ na
jahāti bhūtānyeva bhūtaireva gacchati bhūtairbhukte bhūtairutpadyate bhūtaiścarati bhūtairvicarati’</quote> iti kauṃḍinyaśrutau pratyakṣata eva
yāgahomakṛtāṃ bhūtaviyogasahayogayoravagamādasti bhūtānāṃ jīvena sahagatiriti ।। ।। <pratika>ityaśrutatvādhikaraṇām ।। 6 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha bhāktādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। bhāktaṃ vānātmavittvāttathāhi darśayati ।। 7 ।।</pratika> evamadhikaraṇaṣaṭkoktārītyā maraṇamātreṇa mokṣābhāvā-
ttadarthaṃ mumukṣuṇā yadyavaśyamanuṣṭeyaṃ vairāgyādisādhanaṃ tarhi iṣṭaśeṣaśrutasomapānānmuktā abhūmeti vinā vairāgyādikaṃ karmādi-
naiva mokṣaṃ bruvāṇā śrutirviruddhyeteti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika> tadamṛtatvaṃ <pratika>bhākta</pratika>mamukhyam । kutaḥ । <pratika>anātmavi-
ttvāt ।</pratika> <quote>‘nānyaḥ panthā’</quote> ityādiśrutyā ātmavida eva mukhyamamṛtatvam । ñato na śrutivirodhaḥ । <pratika>tathāhi darśayati</pratika>=
<quote>‘amṛto vāve’</quote>ti <quote>‘sa ena’</quote>miti <quote>‘karmaṇe’</quote> ti <quote>‘ātmāna’</quote> miti ca śrutistathoktārthāndarśayati pratipādayatītyartha ।।</p>
<head>iti bhāktādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ tadantarapratipattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<pb n="204"/>
<p>davarohati jīva iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।।
siddhāntastu—svargāt sukṛtakṣaye punarimaṃ lokamavarohan sakarmaśeṣa evāga-
cchati । kathamavagamyate ? śrutismṛtibhyāmeva । yathā <quote>‘ramaṇīyacaraṇa abhyāśo
ha yatte ramaṇīyāṃ yonimāpadyeran brāhmaṇayoniṃ vā kṣatriyayoniṃ vā vaiśyayoniṃ
vā atha ya iha kapūyacaraṇāḥ abhyāśo ha yatte kapūyāṃ yonimāpadyeran śvayoniṃ
sūkarayoniṃ vā caṇḍālayoniṃ vā’</quote> iti śrutiḥ । <quote>‘jāyante puṇyakarmaṇā’</quote> ityādikā
smṛtiḥ । anyathā sadyaḥ samutpannasya bālasya dharmādharmādyabhāvāt sukhaduḥkhabhogo
na syāt । tasmādanuśayavāneva yathetamanevaṃ ca samāgacchati । ākāśāvarohaṇā-
dārohaprakāreṇa vāyvādiprāpteḥ pitṛlokādyaprāpteśca prakārāntareṇa ca punarniva-
rtanta ityarthaḥ ।।
punarāśaṅkaya matāntareṇa pariharati---
<sutra>।। sū ।। caraṇāditi cenna tadupalakṣaṇārtheti kārṣṇājiniḥ ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ, kapūyacaraṇāḥ iti caraṇaśabdānnānuśayasiddhiḥ । caraṇaśabdasya
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
bhāvaḥ । <pratika>śrutismṛtibhyāmiti</pratika> । yāvānasya karmasamūhassa sarvo'pi kadāciccaṃdramasamārū-
ḍhena bhoktuṃ na śakyate । anādijanmamaraṇapravāhe keṣāñcitkarmaṇāṃ tataḥ prāgeva bhuktatvānnā-
nāvidhadevamanuṣyapaśupakṣisarīsṛpādidehabhogyatvena śrutānāṃ karmaṇāmekena svargaśarīreṇa
bhoktumaśakyatvācca । tasmādupakramagatasyāpi yāvacchabdasya svata eva saṃkocākāṃkṣāyāṃ
smṛtyanugṛhītopasaṃhāragataramaṇīyacaraṇādiśravaṇānusāreṇa tadānīṃtanasvargaśarīrabhogyakarmasā-
kalyaviṣayatvena saṅkocaḥ kartuṃ yukta iti bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘tadya ihe’</quote> tyādiśruterayamarthaḥ । ye ramaṇīya-
caraṇāśśubhakarmāṇaste ramaṇīyāṃ yonimāpadyeranniti yattadabhyāśo ha savidha eva nātici-
reṇa bhavatīti । <quote>‘yathetamanevaṃ’</quote> ceti sūtraśeṣasyārohaṇaprakāreṇa prakārāṃtareṇa cāvarohantī-
tyarthaḥ । tadeva prakāradvayaṃ viśadayati—<pratika>ākāśāvarohaṇāditi</pratika> । candrārohaṇaṃ dhūmarātrya-
parapakṣadakṣiṇāyanapaṇmāsapitṛlokākāśakrameṇa tato'varohaṇaṃ tvākāśavāyudhūmābhrameghakra-
meṇetyevamārohaṇakrameṇa prakārāntareṇa cāvarohantītyarthaḥ । nanu yathetamanevaṃ cāvarohaṇamiti
śrutivākyataḥ spaṣṭaṃ pratīyate । na ca tatra nivartanīyā kācana śaṅkāsti । kimarthaṃ nyāya-
sūtre tannibaṃdhanam । dṛṣṭāntārtham । <quote>‘athaitamevādhvānaṃ punarnivartaṃte yathetamākāśa’</quote>mityupa-
kramaśrutādyathetamiti śabdādārohaparvaṇāmevāvarohe'pi vaiparītyena krama iti pratītāvapi
<quote>‘ākāśādvāyu’</quote> rityādyaupasaṃhārikabahuvākyānurodhādyathetamanevaṃ cāvarohaṇamityabhyupaga-
myate । tathaivopakramaśrutayā yāvaditi śrutyā niravaśeṣakarmabhogapratītāvapi <quote>‘ramaṇīyacaraṇā
ramaṇīyāṃ brāhmaṇādiyoniṃ kapūyacaraṇāḥ kapūyāṃ ś‍vādiyonimāpadyanta’</quote>ityaupasaṃhārikabahu-
vākyānurodhātsāvaśeṣa eva tatkarmabhogo'bhyupagantavya iti । nanūdāhṛtadṛṣṭāntāvaṣṭaṃbhenau-
pasaṃhārikabahuvākyānurodhādupakramagataikā yāvacchrutissaṅkocanīyetyetadayuktam । upasaṃhāre
caraṇaśabdayoḥ smārtācāraparatvenopakramāvagatasya karmaṇāṃ niravaśeṣabhogasyābhyupagame viro-
dhābhāvāditi śaṅkānirākaraṇārthatvenottarasūtramavatārayati—<pratika>punarāśaṃkyeti । sū ।।
caraṇāditi cenna tadupalakṣaṇārtheti kārṣṇājiniḥ ।। 9 ।। tasyaiva sukhādisādhana-</pratika>
<pb n="205"/>
smārtācaraṇaviṣayatvāditi cet—na, anuśayopalakṣaṇārthā hi caraṇaśrutiḥ । tasyaiva
sukhādisādhanatvāt ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। ānarthakyamiti cenna tadapekṣatvāt ।। 10 ।।</sutra>
evaṃ sati smārtācaraṇasyānupayogādānarthakyaṃ syāditi cet—na । tadapekṣatvā-
deva sarvasya puṇyakarmaṇaḥ, <quote>‘saṃdhyāhīno'śucirnityamanarhaḥ sarvakarmasu । yadanyatkurute
karma na tasya phalabhāgbhavet ।।’</quote> ityādivacanāt । iti kārṣṇājinimatam ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। sukṛtaduṣkṛte eveti tu bādariḥ ।। 11 ।।</sutra>
bādaristu <quote>‘ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ, kapūyacaraṇāḥ’</quote> iti caraṇaśabdena sukṛtaduṣkṛte
evocyete, puṇyaṃ karmācaratīti prasiddheḥ iti manyate । etadeva sūtrakārasya matam ।
yadā caraṇaśabdaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayorvācakaḥ, na tu lakṣakaḥ, iti bādarermatam,
smārtācārāpekṣaṃ karmeti tu svīkṛtameva । ataḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛtānuśayavāneva svargā-
davarohati jīva iti siddham ।। iti kṛtātyayādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>tvāditi</pratika> । iṣṭāpūrtādirūpasya karmaṇa eva svargādisādhanatvena vihitasya sukhādijanaka-
tvāt smārtācārasyātathātvādityarthaḥ । evaṃ tarhi saṃdhyāvandanādervaiyarthyaṃ prāptamiti śaṅkā-
nirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>sū ।। ānarthakyamiti cenna tadapekṣatvāt ।। 10 ।।</pratika> smārtācāra-
vataivānuṣṭhitāni yāgādikarmāṇi svargādiphalajanakāni yato divā rātrau ca karmādhikāra-
virodhyaśucitvāpādakāni yāni pāpānyavarjanīyāni tāni snānasaṃdhyāvandanādibhirnirasyaṃte ।
<quote>‘āpaḥ śuṃdhantu mainasaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘yaducchiṣṭamabhojyaṃ’</quote> <quote>‘yadahnā pāpamakārṣam’</quote> ityādimantraliṃgāt ।
ato na teṣāṃ vaiyarthyamityarthaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। sukṛtaduṣkṛte eveti tu bādariḥ ।। 11 ।। caraṇa-
śabdeneti ।</pratika> <quote>‘yānyanavadyāni karmāṇi । tāni sevitavyāni । yānyasmākaṃ sucaritāni । tāni
tvayopāsyāni ।’</quote> iti vede karmacaraṇayorbhedavyapadeśastu pratyakṣācārānumitaśrutisiddhaviṣaya-
tvenopapādanīya iti bhāvaḥ । kārṣṇājinimatādbādarimate sūtrakārābhimate caraṇaśabdasya
karmavācakatvameva viśeṣaḥ । ānarthakyasūtroktārthastu samāna evetyāha---<pratika>smāṃrteti । sukṛtadu-
ṣkṛtānuśayavāneveti</pratika>। eṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ svarganarakamātraphalakatvaṃ śrutaṃ tatphalānyanubhūyāva-
rohatāṃ karmāntarabṛndamevānuśayaḥ । yeṣāṃ tu karmaṇāṃ svarganarakabhogānaṃtaramiha yoniviśeṣa-
prāptyādikamapi phalāntaraṃ śrutaṃ tatphalānyanubhūyāvarohatāmaihikaphalapradāyī tatkarmaśaktaya-
vaśeṣo'pyanuśayaḥ । evañca svargādavarohatsu keṣāñcitkapūyacaraṇatvena ś‍vasūkarādiyoniprā-
ptimapi pratipādayantyāḥ śruteḥ <quote>‘varṇā āśramāśca svakarmaniṣṭhāḥ pretya karmaphalamanubhūya tata-
śśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭadeśajātikularūpāyuḥ śrutāvittavṛttasukhamedhaso janma pratipadyante viṣvañco
viparītā vinaśyaṃti tataḥ parivṛttau karmaphalaśeṣeṇa jātiṃ rūpaṃ varṇaṃ balaṃ medhāṃ prajñāṃ dravyāṇi
dharmānuṣṭhānamiti pratipadyante tacca kramādubhayorlokayoḥ sukha eva varttante’</quote> । <quote>‘śucīnāṃ śrīmatāṃ
gehe yogabhraṣṭo'bhijāyate’</quote> ityādismṛtivacanajātasya ca na virodhaḥ । viṣayabhedāt ।</p>
<head>iti kṛtātyayādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<pb n="206"/>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha kṛtātyayādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। kṛtātyaye'nuśayavāndṛṣṭasmṛtibhyāṃ yathetamanevaṃ ca ।। 8 ।। caraṇāditi cenna tadupalakṣaṇārtheti
kārṣṇājiniḥ ।। 9 ।। ānarthakyamiti cenna tadapekṣatvāt ।। 10 ।। sukṛtaduṣkṛte eveti tu bādariḥ ।। 11 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>punarāgacchati jīvaḥ smṛtimānniśśeṣabhuktakarmāsau । yatkiṃceti śrutyā samastakarmakṣayāmnānāt ।। 170 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>iha ramaṇīyacaraṇaśravaṇātkarmaśeṣayuta eva । caraṇaṃ caritramiti tu na tasya tadadhikāramātrahetutvāt ।। 171 ।।</l></lg>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha kṛtātyayādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। kṛtātyaye'nuśayavāndṛṣṭassṛtibhyāṃ yathetamanevaṃ ca ।। 8 ।। caraṇāditi cenna tadupalakṣaṇārtheṃti
kārṣṇājiniḥ ।। 9 ।। ānarthakyamiti cenna tadapekṣatvāt ।। 10 ।। sukṛtaduṣkṛte eveti tu bādariḥ ।। 11 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, svārgiṇāmavarohaṇamadhikṛtya śrūyate—<quote>‘tasminyāvatsaṃpātamuṣitvāthaitamevādhvānaṃ punarnivartante’</quote>ityādi ।
atra kiṃ svargādavarohantassānuśayāḥ uta niranuśayā iti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । niranuśayā iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu,
kṛtātyate</pratika>=svargaprāpakakarmajātasya bhogena nāśe । <pratika>anuśayavān</pratika>=āmuṣmikaphalaprāpakakarmātiriktakarmavānevāvarohati ।
kutaḥ । <pratika>dṛṣṭasmṛtibhyām</pratika>=<quote>‘tadya iha ramaṇīyacaraṇā abhyāśo ha yatte ramaṇīyāṃ yonimāpadyeran’</quote> ityādyā dṛṣṭā pratyakṣā
śrutiḥ, <quote>‘pretya karmaphalamanubhūya tataśśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭadeśakālakularūpāyuḥśrutavṛttavittasukhamedhaso janma pratipadyante’</quote> iti
smṛtiḥ tābhyāmanuśayavanta evāvarohantīti gamyate । iti ।। te ca yena mārgeṇa candralokamārūḍhāstenaiva mārgeṇāvarohanti
kimuta tadviparītenetyākāṃkṣāyāmāha—<pratika>yathetamanevaṃ ca</pratika>=yathetaṃ yathāgataṃ dhūmādimārgeṇa । <pratika>anevaṃ ca</pratika>=vakṣyamāṇābhrā-
dimārgeṇa cāvarohantītyarthaḥ ।। sūtramapi vyākhyātam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। caraṇāditi cennopalakṣaṇārtheti kārṣṇājiniḥ ।। 9 ।। caraṇāditi cet</pratika>=nanu ‘ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ
iti śrutiḥ caraṇādyonyāpattiṃ darśayati nānuśayāt । ato nānuśayavattvasiddhiriti cet । na । yataḥ kārṣṇājini-
rācāryaḥ iyaṃ caraṇaśrutiranuśayopalakṣaṇārthati manyate ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ānarthakyamiti cenna tadapekṣatvāt ।। 10 ।।</pratika> nanu caraṇaśrutermukhyācārārthaparityāyenānuśayārthakatye
ānarthakyamiti cet <pratika>na</pratika> । iṣṭādikarmaṇāmācāranirvartyatvena caraṇāpekṣatvāccaraṇaśruterarthavattvamityatheḥ ।।</p>
<p>vastutaḥ karmacaraṇayorna bheda ityāha---<pratika>sū ।। sukṛtaduṣkṛte eveti tu bādariḥ ।। 11 ।।</pratika> bādaristvācārya sukṛtaduṣkṛte
eva caraṇaśabdenocyete iti manyate । loke iṣṭādikāriṇi <quote>‘dharma caratī’</quote> ti karmacaraṇayora bhedena prayogadarśanāt । ata
iṣṭādikāriṇāṃ candralokaṃ gatānāṃ punaravarohārthamanuśayo'stīti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, tathā rāmānujamate ca pūrvādhikaraṇavatsaṃdehapūrvapakṣādiṣu nāsti vailakṣaṇyaṃ śāṃkaramatāditi
viramyate tadvivaraṇataḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, tu idamadhikaraṇaṃ tredhā vibhaktam । tatra <quote>‘yathetamanevaṃ ca’</quote> iti yogavibhāgaśca viśiṣṭaḥ । <pratika>kṛtā-
tyayādhikaraṇaṃ yathetādhikaraṇaṃ caraṇādhikaraṇamita</pratika> cādhikaraṇāni trīṇi vibhaktāni । <pratika>sū ।। kṛtātyaye'-
nuśayavāndṛṣṭhasmṛtibhyām ।। 8 ।।</pratika> kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ svargādiṣu bhogena niḥśeṣakṣayāttatra ca karmāntarānārjanāt śarī-
rāntarānāraṃbheṇa karmabandhamūlaḥ saṃsāraḥ svata evocchidyeta kiṃ vairāgyādimeti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, na tathā
<quote>‘taccheṣeṇemaṃ lokamāyāti punaḥ karma kurute punargacchati ।’</quote> <quote>‘bhuktaśeṣānuśayavānimāṃ prāpya bhuvaṃ punaḥ । karma kṛtvā punarga-
cchetpunarāyāti nityaśaḥ ।।’</quote> ityādiśrutismṛtibhyāṃ karmānuśayavānevāvaruhya śarīra labdhvā punarapi karma kurvanparivartata
ityavagamena karmabandhasya tanmūlasaṃsārasya ca svata evocchittyasaṃbhavādvairāgyādyapekṣāvaśyikī iti ।। ।। <pratika>iti kṛtātya-
yādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha yathatādhakaraṇama</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। yathaitamanevaṃ ca ।। 9 ।।</pratika> atra jāvasya svagādāgatiprakāro vicāyate । jīvasya gatiprakāraṇavāgātayuktāti
<quote>‘yathetameva gacchati yathetamāgacchatī’</quote>tyādiśrutyā pratīyata iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘dhūmādabhramabhrādākāśa’</quote> mityādikāṣāyaṇaśrutyā
gatiprakāreṇānyathā/?/ cāgatiḥsiddheti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ । yathetam</pratika>=jīvena yathā yena mārgeṇa svargādikamitaṃ prāptaṃ tathā tena ।
<pratika>anevaṃ ca</pratika>=anyena mārgeṇa ca jīva imaṃ lokamāgacchatītyarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti yathetādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="207"/>
atha aniṣṭādikāryadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। aniṣṭādikāriṇāmapi ca śrutam ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
iha yatheṣṭāpūrtādikāriṇāṃ candragamanam, tathānyeṣāmapyaṃsti na veti saṃśayaḥ ।
tathā satīṣṭāpūrtādyakurvatāmapi candragamanamastyeva, <quote>‘ya evaike cāsmāllokāt
prayanti candramasameva te sarve gacchanti’</quote> ityaviśeṣeṇa sarveṣāṃ candragamanaśrava-
ṇāt । yadyapi tatra pāpināṃ bhogo nāsti, tathāpi punarāgatya śarīragrahaṇārthaṃ
pañcamāhutilābhāya svargagatirapekṣyā । tasmādiṣṭāpūrtādyakurvatāmapi candraga-
manaṃ yuktam ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>athāniṣṭādikāryadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। aniṣṭādikāriṇāmapi ca śrutam ।। 12 ।।</pratika> saṃgatisūcanapūrvakaṃ saṃśayaṃ darśa-
yati—iheti । <quote>‘aśrutatvāditi cenneṣṭādikāriṇāṃ pratīte’</quote> <ref>(bra॰ 3-1-6)</ref> riti
sūtre <quote>‘iṣṭādikāriṇā’</quote> miti viśeṣagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tadva‍yartham । <quote>‘ye ke cāsmā’</quote> ditiśrutā-
viṣṭāniṣṭādikārisādhāraṇyena sarveṣāmapi candraprāptiśravaṇādityākṣepikī vyavahitā-
dhikaraṇasaṃgatiḥ । yāvacchruteriva <quote>‘ye kece’</quote> tyaviśeṣaśrute <quote>‘ścaṃdramasameva te sarve gacchaṃtī’</quote>
ti sarvaśruteśca na svayaṃ saṃkocāpekṣeti pratyudāharaṇarūpā samanaṃtarādhikaraṇasaṃgatiścātra
vivakṣitā । <quote>‘ye kece’</quote> tyādiśravaṇa <quote>‘mathaitayoḥ patho’</quote> rityādiśravaṇañca saṃśayabījam ।
nanu ye vihitamiṣṭādikaṃ na kurvati ye1 niṣiddhamapi kurvanti te khalvaniṣṭādikāriṇaḥ ।
teṣāmapi candraprāptau puṇyakarmaṇāṃ pāpināñca gatiraviśiṣṭā syādityāśaṃkyāha—yadya-
pīti । candraloke svargabhogābhāvaḥ puṇyakṛdidbhyaḥ pāpināṃ viśeṣaḥ । bhogābhāve'pi candra-
lokagamanaṃ na vyarthaṃ śarīrakāraṇapañcamāhutilābhārthatvāt । na ca <quote>‘athaitayoḥ pathorna
katareṇa ce’</quote> ti śrutivirodhaḥ । na hi sā pāpināṃ pathidvayamapi niṣedhati । svayaṃpathya-
ntarānupadeśāt । teṣāṃ saṃyamanaprāpterapyabhā2vaprasaṅgena pathiśabdayoḥ prakṛtavidyākarmapara-
tvasya vaktavyatvāt <quote>‘etattṛtīyaṃ sthāna’</quote> miti tṛtīyasthānāṃtaramātropadeśāt । na ca
pāpināmapi candralokaprāptau <quote>‘tenāsau loko na saṃpūryata’</quote> ityuktasyāsaṃpūraṇasyānupapattiḥ ।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha caraṇādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। caraṇāditi cennopalakṣaṇārtheti kārṣṇājiniḥ ।। 10 ।।</pratika> atra jīvasya gamanāgamanaṃ caraṇaphalaṃ vā
yajñādikarmaphalaṃ veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ ।</pratika> <quote>‘tadya iha ramaṇīyacaraṇā’</quote> ityādiśrutyā jīvasya gamanāgamanaṃ caraṇaphalameveti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।</pratika>
caraṇādiśruterajahallakṣaṇayā yajñādikarmapratipādakatayā karmaphalameva tadīyaṃ gamanāgamanamiti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ । caraṇāditi
cet</pratika>=gatāgataṃ na yajñāderbhavati kiṃ tu <pratika>caraṇāt</pratika>=yajñāṅgabhūtācārādeva । <pratika>iticenna</pratika> । kutaḥ । yataḥ śrutiḥ tadupalakṣa-
ṇārthā ajahatsvārthalakṣaṇayā yajñācārobhayapratipādiketi kārṣṇājinirācāryo manyate'ta ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ānarthakyamiticenna tadapekṣatvāt ।। 11 ।।</pratika> upalakṣaṇārthatve ramaṇīyakapūyapadābhyāmeva karmopalakṣaṇa-
saṃbhavāccaraṇaśabdasyā<pratika>narthakyamiti cenna ।</pratika> kutaḥ । <pratika>tadapekṣatvāt</pratika>=tasya sādhvasādhuyajñādimattvasya ācārādisāpe-
kṣatvāt । tathā ca tadbodhārthaṃ tatpadasārthakyaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। sukṛtaduṣkṛte eveti tu bādariḥ ।। 12 ।। sukṛtaduṣkṛte</pratika>=sādhvasādhukarmaṇī eva śrutisthacaraṇaśabdavācye
na tu tadaṃgācaraṇamiti bādarirācāryo manyata ityarthaḥ । tuśabdasyāpiśabdārthakatayā bādarirapītyanvayena sūtrakārasya
siddhānto'pi sa eveti sūcyate ।। ।। <pratika>iti caraṇādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ kṛtātyayādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<note>(1) <quote>‘niṣiddhaṃ vā kurvanti’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘saṃbhavaprasaṃgena’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="208"/>
<p>iti prāpte'bhidhīyate---
<sutra>।। sū ।। saṃyamane tvanubhūyetareṣāmārohāvarohau tadgatidarśanāt ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
iṣṭāpūrtādyakurvatāṃ candragamanaṃ nāsti, kiṃtu yamasadane karmaphalamanubhūya pratya-
varohaṇam । evaṃbhūtāveva teṣāmārohāvarohau, <quote>‘vaivasvataṃ saṃgamanaṃ janānām’</quote> iti
tadgatidarśanāt । bhogārthameva hi svargagamanam, na pañcamāhutilābhāya, droṇā-
dīnāṃ yoṣidāhuterabhāvena vyabhicārāt । ato yamalokaprāptireva pāpinā-
miti yuktam ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। smaranti ca ।। 14 ।।</sutra>
asminnarthe smaranti ca, <quote>‘sarve caite vaśaṃ yānti yamasya bhagavan kila’</quote> ityādi ।। 14 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। api ca sapta ।। 15 ।।</sutra>
sapta rauravādīnapi pāpino mahānarakān smaranti ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। tatrāpi ca tadva‍yāpārādavirodhaḥ ।। 16 ।।</sutra>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
teṣāṃ yamasadanaprāptau candulokasya mārgamātratvena tatra teṣāṃ saṃghībhūyāvasthānābhāvādasaṃ-
pūraṇopapatteḥ । atassā śrutirdevayānapitṛyāṇamārgaprāpyayorbrahmacandralokayorbhogābhāva-
mātraparā na pāpināṃ mārgadva‍yasyāpi niṣedhapareti bhāvaḥ ।। sū ।। <pratika>saṃyamane tvanubhūyetareṣā-
mārohāvarohau tadgatidarśanāt ।। 13 ।।</pratika> anubhūyetyasya śeṣamadhyāharati---<pratika>pratyavaro-
haṇamiti । evaṃbhūtāviti ।</pratika> saṃyamanārohastato'varohaścetyevaṃbhūtāvevetyarthaḥ । <pratika>vaivasvata-
miti ।</pratika> yadi <quote>‘ye kece’</quote> tyaviśeṣaṇaśravaṇātsarveṣāṃ candraprāptiḥ kalpyeta tadā <quote>‘vaivasvataṃ saṃga-
manaṃ janānā’</quote> mityaviśeṣaśravaṇātsarveṣāṃ yamaprāptirapi kalpyeta । ato yathā <quote>‘ayaṃ
loko nāsti para iti mānī punaḥ punarvaśamāpadyate me’</quote> ityādiviśeṣavacanādyathā yama-
prāptivacanamaniṣṭādikāriviṣayam evaṃ <quote>‘atha ya ime grāma iṣṭāpūrtte dattamityupāsate’</quote> i-
tyādiviśeṣavacanāt candraprāptivacanamapīṣṭādikāriviṣayamityāśayaḥ । pañcamāhutilābhārthaṃ
candraprāptigamanaṃ sarveṣāṃ vācyamityāśaṃkāparihāraṃ sūtrakāreṇa vakṣyamāṇamākāṃkṣāśāntaye
smārayati—<pratika>bhogārthamiti । sū॰ ।। smaranti ca ।। 14 ।। sa1rve ceti</pratika> । pāpina ityarthaḥ ।
ata upabṛṃhaṇasmṛtyanusāreṇāpi sāmānyavacanasya viśeṣaviṣayatetyarthaḥ <pratika>।।sū॰।। api ca sapta
।। 15 ।।</pratika> smarantītyanuvartate । pāpināmeva hi pāpaphalānubhavārthān sapta narakānapi smara-
nti । ato'pi hetoryamaprāptivacanānāṃ viśeṣaviṣayatvāttadvat candraprāptivacanamapi
viśeṣavacanānusāreṇa viśeṣaviṣayamiti bhāvaḥ । yamasadana eva keṣāṃcidyātanānubhavaḥ ।
tadabhiprāyaṃ <quote>‘saṃyamane tvanubhūye’</quote> ti sūtram । keṣāñcidyamasadanaprāptyanaṃtaraṃ yamājñayā pātā-
lānāmadhobhāgaṃ prāpya tatratyeṣu rauravādiṣu yātanānubhavaḥ । tadabhiprāya’ mapi ca sapte’
ti sūtram । saṃyamanasaptanarakarūpayātanānubhavasthānadvaividhyasūcanārthameva <quote>‘api ca sapte’</quote>
tyetasminsūtre samuccayārtho'piśabdaḥ । nanu rauravādayaścitraguptādyadhiṣṭhitāḥ śruyante ।
ato yamaprāptivacanasya pāpiviṣayatvakalpanāyāṃ rauravādismaraṇasya pramāṇatvenopanyāso
viruddha <pratika>ityāśaṃkānirākaraṇārthaṃ</pratika> sūtram—<pratika>tatrāpi ca tadvyāpārādavirodhaḥ ।। 16 ।।</pratika>
<note>(1) <quote>‘sarve caite pāpina ityarthaḥ’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="209"/>
tatrāpi citraguptādyadhiṣṭhiteṣu narakeṣvapi teṣāṃ prerakasya yamasya tadadhiṣṭhātṛ-
tvavyāpārasattvāt yamavaśyatāyā virodhābhāvaḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। vidyākarmaṇoriti tu prakṛtatvāt ।। 17 ।।</sutra>
vidyākarmaṇoḥ phalabhogādyarthaṃ brahmagamanaṃ candragamanaṃ ca katham ? <quote>‘tadya itthaṃ
vidurye ceme'raṇye śraddhā tapa ityupāsate te'rciṣamabhisaṃbhavanti atha ya ime
grāme iṣṭāpūrte dattamityupāsate te dhūmamabhisaṃbhavanti’</quote> iti brahmagamane candragamane
ca vidyākarmaṇoreva prakṛtatvāt । ato na pāpināṃ tadgatiprasaṅgaḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। na tṛtīye tathopalabdheḥ ।। 18 ।।</sutra>
na ca pāpināmapi pañcamāhutiprāptimūlatvāddehārambhasya tadartha dyulokāpekṣā,
teṣāṃ dyulokagamanābhāvopalabdheḥ ‘athaitayoḥ pathorna katareṇa ca tānīmāni kṣudrā-
ṇyasakṛdāvartīni bhūtāni bhavanti jāyasva mriyasvetyetat tṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ tenāsau
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
citraguptādīnāmapyadhiṣṭhāturyamasya samīpaṃ prāpya tadājñayā tadbha‍ṛtyādhiṣṭhitānnarakānpāpinaḥ
paścātprāpnuvantīti na virodha iti bhāvaḥ । pañcamāhutilābhārthaṃ pāpināmapi candraprāpti-
rvaktavyeti śaṅkāṃ nirākartuṃ candraprāptistadarthā na bhavati kiṃ tu karmaphalabhogārthā yathā
brahmaprāptirvidyāphalabhogārtheti pratipādanārthaṃ sūtram---<pratika>vidyākarmaṇoriti tu prakṛ-
tatvāt ।। 17 ।।</pratika> devayānapitṛyāṇe iti śeṣaḥ । <quote>‘vidyākarmaṇo’</quote> riti sabandha-
sāmānye ṣaṣṭhī tādarthyaparyavasāyinī । tādarthyaṃ ca tatphalaprāptyupāyatayā । itirhetau ।
tathā ca devayānapitṛyāṇevidyākarmaphalaprāptyarthe iti hetorityarthaḥ । tuśabdaḥ pañcamāhu-
tyarthatvavyavacchedārthaḥ । kathaṃ tayostādarthyaṃmityākāṃkṣāyāṃ tatsādhako heturuktaḥ prakṛtatvā-
diti । candraprāpteḥ phalabhogārthatvavaddehāraṃbhārthapaṃcamāhutilābhārthatvamapi syāditi
śaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram---<pratika>na tṛtīye tathopalabdheḥ ।। 18 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘athaitayo’</quote> riti
<quote>‘vettha yathāsau loko na saṃpūryate’</quote> ityapi śvetaketuṃ prati pravāhaṇasya praśnaḥ । ayaṃ loka iva
svargaloko'pi bahuṣu prayatsu yena kāraṇena sampūrṇo na bhavati tatkāraṇaṃ vettha kimiti praśnaḥ ।
śvetaketau prativacanāśakte pravāhaṇasyaivedaṃ prativacana <quote>‘mathaitayo’</quote> rityādi । etayordeva-
yānapitṛyāṇayormadhye yeṣāmanyatareṇa mārgeṇa gamanaṃ nāsti tānīmāni kṣudrāṇi yūkāli-
kṣamaśakādīni bhūtānyasakṛdāvṛttīni bhavaṃti । asakṛdāvṛttirjananamaraṇapaunaḥpunyarūpeti
<quote>‘jāyasva mriyasve’</quote> tyanenocyate । <quote>‘kriyāsamabhihāre loḍloṭo hi svau vā ca tadhvamo’</quote>
riti pāṇini <ref>(3-4-2)</ref> sūtre kriyāpaunaḥpunyavivakṣāyāṃ sarvalakārāpavādo loṇma-
dhyamapuruṣo vihitaḥ । tatra dvirbhāvastasyaiva dhātoranuprayogaśca niyataḥ । yathā lunīhi lunī-
hīti lunāti punaḥ punarlunātītyarthaḥ । tadanaṃtaraṃ <quote>‘samuccaye'nyatarasyā’</quote> miti <ref>(pā॰3-4-3)</ref>
sūtreṇa anekakriyāsamabhihāre vikalpena loṇmadhyamapuruṣo vihitaḥ । tatra na dvirbhāvaḥ ।
tāvatkriyāsāmānyavacanasya tu dhātoranuprayogo niyataḥ । yathā <quote>‘odanaṃ bhuṅkṣva saktūnpiva
dhānāḥ khāde tyayamabhyavaharatī’</quote> ti । atra jananamaraṇakriyayoḥ pratyekaṃ paunaḥpunyaṃ tayo-
ssamuccayaścetyubhayaṃ vivakṣitam । ubhayavivakṣāyāṃ <quote>‘vipratiṣedhe paraṃ kārya’</quote> miti samuccaya-
vivakṣāprayukto vaikalpiko loṇmadhyamapuruṣaḥ । asakṛdāvartīni bhavaṃtīti jananamaraṇakri-
<pb n="210"/>
loko na saṃpūryata’ iti । tṛtīyaṃ sthānamiti pāpakarmāṇa ucyante । ataḥ
pāpināṃ na svargagamanam ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। smaryate'pi ca loke ।। 19 ।।</sutra>
loke draupadyādīnāṃ puṇyakarmaṇāmapi pañcamāhutyanapekṣā dehārambhāya smaryate ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। darśanācca ।। 20 ।।</sutra>
kiṃca śrutidarśanaṃ ca bhavati <quote>‘teṣāṃ khalveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ trīṇyeva bījāni bhava-
nti aṇḍajaṃ jīvajamudbhijjamiti’</quote> । tatra svedajodbhijjayostadanapekṣatvaṃ dṛśyate ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
yāsāmānyavācino bhavateranuprayogaśca । etadasakṛdāvṛttirūpaṃ tṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ prakṛtadeva-
yānapitṛyāṇamārgadvayāpekṣayā । kṣudrajaṃtūnāmayaṃ tṛtīyo mārgaḥ । tena kṣudrajaṃtūnāmanaṃtānāṃ
mārgāṃtarasattvāt devayānapitṛyāṇaprāpyacandraprāptyabhāvena hetunā kṣudrajaṃtubhirapyākrānto'yaṃ
loka ivāsau loko na sampūryate iti prativacanārthaḥ । evañca <quote>‘tṛtīyaṃ sthānamiti pāpa-
karmāṇa ucyanta’</quote> iti bhāṣye pāpakarmaśabdastanmārgopalakṣakatvena yojanīyaḥ । na caitatprakṛtaṃ
kṣudraprāṇijātaṃ vidvadiṣṭādikāryapekṣayā tṛtīyaṃ karmaphalānubhavasthānamiti śrutyarthapradarśa-
katayā yathāśrutārthameva bhāṣyamastviti śaṅkanīyam । <quote>‘athaitayoḥ pathoriti’</quote> prakṛtamārga-
dvayāpekṣayā tṛtīyasya mārgāntara evānvayāt <quote>‘asya gordvitīyo'nveṣṭavya’</quote> ityādāviva
saṃkhyāyāḥ sajātīyaniveśitvāt sthānaśabdasya karmaphalānubhavāśrayaparatve vidyeṣṭādi-
phalānubhavāśrayabrahmacandraprāptāpekṣayā brāhmaṇādiyoniprāptānāmapi tṛtīyarā1śitvena bheda-
nirdeśāpatteśca । ata eva <quote>‘athaitayoḥ pathori’</quote> tyasya vidyākarmaparatvamapi pratyuktam ।
vidyākarmāpekṣayāpi sthānasya tṛtīyatvāsaṃbhavena pathoriti mukhyārthamārgadvayaparaṃ tṛtīyaṃ
sthānamiti mārgātaraparamityeva vyākhyātumucitatvāt । aniṣṭādikāriṇāṃ mārgāntara-
vivakṣāyāṃ ca mārgadvayaniṣedhe'nupapattyabhāvāt । <quote>‘paṃcamyāmāhutā’</quote> viti vacanaṃ tu pañcamāhutau
satyāṃ śarīrasaṃbhavamātraṃ pratipādayati na tu paṃcamāhutyabhāve tadasaṃbhavamapi pratipādayati ।
vākyabhedāpatteḥ । na cārthāttatkalpanam । <quote>‘etattṛtīyaṃ sthāna’</quote> miti viśeṣavacanaviro-
dhāditi bhāvaḥ । tarhi paṃcamāhutimantareṇā'pi śarīrotpattyaṃgīkāre tasyāstatkāraṇatvaṃ
na syāt vyatirekavyabhicārāditi śaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram---<pratika>smaryate'pi ca loke ।। 19 ।।
paṃcamāhutyanapekṣeti ।</pratika> tathā ca śarīraviśeṣa eva paṃcamāhuteḥ kāraṇatvamiti kalpana-
māvaśyakamiti bhāvaḥ ।। nanu tapoviśeṣaprabhaveṣu śarīreṣu kāyavyūharītyā paṃcamāhutyana-
pekṣāyāmapyanyatra sarvatrāpi tadapekṣā syāt । na ca pañcamāhutivākye <quote>‘puruṣavacasa’</quote> iti
śravaṇātpuruṣaśabdasya <quote>‘puruṣāvātmamānavā’</quote> viti nānārthakośānusāreṇa manuṣyamātra-
viṣayatvopapatteḥ kṣudrajantuṣu paṃcamāhutyapekṣā na prāpnotīti śaṃkanīyam । kapūyacaraṇānāṃ
śvasūkarayoniprāptāvapi tadapekṣāpratipādanāditi śaṃkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>darśanācca
।। 20 ।। svedajodbhijjayoriti</pratika> । svedajasya paṃcamāhutyanapekṣāyāḥ laukikapramāṇena
darśanāt udbhijjānāṃ tadapekṣāyāḥ śrutyāpi darśanādityubhayasaṃgrāhakaṃ <quote>‘darśanācce’</quote> ti sūtra-
miti bhāvaḥ ।। nanu svedajasyāpi kasyacitprāṇijātasya sattve kathaṃ <quote>‘vīṇyeva bījānī’</quote>ti
<note>(1) <quote>‘rāśitvena teṣāmapi tṛtīyasthānatayā nirdeśāpatteśca’</quote> iti kha. pāṭha ।</note>
<pb n="211"/>
nanu <quote>‘jīvajamudbhijjamiti’</quote> śrutau svedajagrahaṇaṃ nāstītyata āha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। tṛtīyaśabdāvarodhaḥ saṃśokajasya ।। 21 ।।</sutra>
saṃśokajasya svedajasyāpi tṛtīyenodbhijjaśabdena saṃgraho'stītyarthaḥ । tataḥ
pāpināṃ na svargagamanamiti nirṇayaḥ ।।
ityaniṣṭādikāryadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śrutāvavadhāraṇamiti śaṃkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>sū॰ ।। tṛtīyaśab‍dāvarodhassaṃśokaja-
sya ।। 21 ।। udbhijjaśabdeneti</pratika> । svedajamapi prāṇijātaṃ laukikapramāṇasiddhamavaśyaṃ kvaci-
dihāntarbhāvanīyam । anyathāvadhāraṇaśrutyaprāmāṇyāpatteḥ । ataḥ pārthivatvoṣmaprabhavatvā-
yonijatvāviśeṣādudbhijjamadhye tadantarbhāvo'pi vivakṣitaḥ kalpyata iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>ityaniṣṭādikāryadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha aniṣṭādikāryadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। aniṣṭādikāriṇāmapi ca śutam ।। 12 ।। saṃyamane tvanubhūyetareṣāmārohāvarohau
tadgatidarśanāt ।। 13 ।। smaranti ca ।। 14 ।। api ca sapta ।। 15 ।। tatrāpi ca tadva‍yāpārādavirodhaḥ
।। 16 ।। vidyākarmaṇoriti tu prakṛtatvāt ।। 17 ।। na tṛtīye tathopalabdheḥ ।। 18 ।। smaryate'pi ca
loke ।। 19 ।। darśanācca ।। 20 ।। tṛtīyaśabdāvarodhassaṃśokajasya ।। 21 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>ye vai ke cetyaviśeṣaśravaṇātpañcamāhuterlabdhyai । pāpācāravatāmapi vaktavyā candramaḥprāptiḥ ।। 172 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>gantavyāntaramuktaṃ teṣāṃ dhūmādimārgastu । puṇyaphalatvenokto nāhutisaṃkhyāpyapekṣyate loko ।। 173 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti aniṣṭādikāryadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha aniṣṭādikāryadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। aniṣṭādikāriṇāmapi ca śrutam ।। 12 ।। saṃyamane tvanubhūyetareṣāmārohāvarohau tadgati-
darśanāt ।। 13 ।। smaranti ca ।। 14 ।। api ca sapta ।। 15 ।। tatrāpi ca tadva‍yāpārādavirodhaḥ ।। 16 ।।
vidyākarmaṇoriti tu prakṛtatvāt ।। 17 ।। na tṛtīye tathopalabdheḥ ।। 18 ।। smaryate'pi ca loke ।। 19 ।।
darśanācca ।। 20 ।। tṛtīyaśabdāvarodhassaṃśokajasya ।। 21 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, atra pāpināṃ candralokagatirasti vā na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ । aniṣṭādikāriṇāmapi</pratika>=pāpināmapi ।
<pratika>śrutam</pratika>=<quote>‘ye vai kecāsmāllokātprayanti candramasameva te sarve gacchanti’</quote> iti śrutam । ataḥ dharmiṇa eva candralokaṃ gacchantī-
tyetadasaṃgatam । pāpināmapyasti candralokagatiriti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, sū ।। saṃyamane tvanubhūyetareṣā-
mārohāvarohau tadgatidarśanāt ।। 13 ।।</pratika> tuśabdaḥ pūrvapakṣanirāsārthaḥ । <pratika>saṃyamane</pratika>=yamālaye । <pratika>anubhūya</pratika>=svapā-
pānurūpā yāmīryātanā anubhūya pratyavarohanti pāpinaḥ । ataḥ <pratika>itareṣāṃ</pratika>=pāpinām । evaṃbhūtāveva ārohāvarohau bhavataḥ ।
kutaḥ । <pratika>tadgatidarśanāt</pratika>=<quote>‘ayaṃ loko nāsti para iti mānī punaḥ punarvaśamāpadyate me’</quote> iti śrutau yamavaśatvalakṣaṇāyā-
steṣāṃ pāpināṃ gaterdarśanāt ।। iti ।। dve sūtre api vyākhyāte ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। smaranti ca ।। 14 ।।</pratika> manvādayaḥ śiṣṭāḥ pāpināṃ narakabhogaṃ smaranti । ataśca dharmiṇāmeva candraloka-
gamanaṃ nānyeṣāmityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। api ca sapta ।। 15 ।।</pratika> api ca sapta rauravādayo narakāḥ pāpināṃ pāpaphalabhūmitvena smaryante paurāṇikauḥ ।
pāpinastānprāp‍nuvanti na candralokamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu pāpino yamayātanā anubhavantītyetanna yuktaṃ rauravādau citraguptādīnāmadhiṣṭhātṛtvasmaraṇādityata āha—<pratika>sū ।। tatrāpi
ca tadva‍yāpārādavirodhaḥ ।। 16 ।। tatrāpi ca</pratika>=rauravādinarakeṣu ca । <pratika>tadva‍yāpārāt</pratika>=tasyaiva yamasyādhiṣṭhātṛtva-
vyāpārāt । <pratika>avirodhaḥ</pratika>=virodho nāsti । citraguptādīnāṃ yamaprayuktatvāditi bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p>upāsakānāmarcirādimārgaḥ kevalakarmiṇāṃ dhṛmādimārga iti śrutismṛtyādiṣu vyavasthāpitatvādetanmārgadvayabhraṣṭānāṃ pāpināṃ
<pb n="212"/>
tṛtīyamārgokteśca na teṣāṃ candralokaprāptirityāha—<pratika>sū ।। vidyākarmaṇoriti tu prakṛtatvāt ।। 17 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘athaitayoḥ
prathorna katareṇa ca na tānīmāni kṣudāṇyasakṛdāvartīni bhūtāni bhavantī’</quote> tyādau <quote>‘etayo’</quote> riti padasya vidyākarmaṇori-
tyartho'bhyupeyaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>prakṛtatvāt</pratika>=vidyākarmaṇoreva devayānapitṛyānātmakamārgadvayasādhanatvena prakṛtatvātprakṛtavāca-
katvametacchabdasya yuktamisyarthaḥ । sutre tuśabdena <quote>‘candramasameva te sarve gacchantī’</quote> ti śrutiprayuk‍taśaṃkā vyāvartyate । kutaḥ ।
sarvaśabdasya puṇyapuruṣamātraparatvāt iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu <quote>‘pañcamyāmāhutau’</quote> ityādinā saṃkhyāniyamena dehaprāptyabhidhānāttadarthaṃ pāpināmapi candralokaprāptiraṅgīkāryetyata
āha---<pratika>sū ।। na tṛtīye tathopalabdheḥ ।। 18 ।।</pratika> tṛtīye mārge praviṣṭānāṃ pāpinām । <pratika>na</pratika>=dehaprāptyarthamāhutisaṃkhyāni-
yamo nādartavyaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>tathopalabdheḥ</pratika>=saṃkhyāniyamaṃ vinaiva <quote>‘jāyasva mriyasvetyetattṛtīyaṃ sthāna’</quote> miti śrutau tṛtīye
mārge dehaprāpterupalabdherityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। smaryate'pi ca loke ।। 19 ।।</pratika> api ca loke bhāratādau droṇadhṛṣṭadyumnādīnāmayonijatvaṃ smaryate । āhu-
tisaṃkhyāyāṃ niyamābhāvaḥ siddhaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। darśanācca ।। 20 ।।</pratika> kiṃ ca । loke jarāyujā/?/ṇḍajasvedajodbhijjādiṣu caturvidhadeheṣu svedajodbhijjayoḥ strīpuṃvya-
ktisaṃyogaṃ vinevotpattidarśanānnāhutisaṃkhyāniyama ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu <quote>‘trīṇyeva bījāni bhavanti aṇḍajaṃ jīvajamudbhijja’</quote> miti śarīratraividhyaśravaṇātkathaṃ cāturvidhyamityata āha—<pratika>sū ।।
tṛtīyaśabdāvarodhassaṃśokajasya ।। 21 ।।</pratika> śrutau <pratika>saṃśokajasya</pratika>=svedajasya । <pratika>tṛtīyaśabdāvarodhaḥ</pratika>=tṛtīye-
nodbhijjaśabdena saṃgraho'bhipretaḥ । ato'niṣṭādikāriṇāṃ na candralokaprāptirapi tu iṣṭādikāriṇāmeveti siddham ।।
<pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate, rāmānujamate</pratika> ca saṃdehapūrvapakṣādiṣu yadyapi nāsti vaiśiṣṭyaṃ pūrvamatāt । <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> para, mādyasya
sūtrapañcakasya pūrvapakṣopapādakatārūpaviśeṣasattve'pi aniṣṭādikāriṇāmapi yamaloke yātanādyanubhavānantaraṃ candralokaprā-
ptirastīti pūrvapakṣaśarīrapratipādanānuguṇyena pūrvapakṣasūtrāṇāṃ vyākhyānānnāstyativailakṣaṇyaṃ teṣāmarthavarṇana itīyāneva viśeṣo'
tra śrīkaṇṭhamatādityavadheyam । anyadaviśiṣṭaṃ pūrvasmācchrīkaṇṭhamatavat ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, idamadhikaraṇam <quote>‘aniṣṭādhikaraṇam’</quote> <quote>‘apisaptādhikaraṇam’</quote> ‘tatrāpyadhikaraṇam <quote>‘vidyādhi-
karaṇaṃ’</quote> <quote>‘na tṛtīyādhikaraṇa’</quote> miti pañcadhā vibhaktam । tatrādye aniṣṭādhikaraṇe pūrvokto gamanāgamanakleśaḥ
iṣṭādipuṇyakṛtāmeva vā uta pāpakarmakāriṇāmapīti <pratika>saṃdehe</pratika> iṣṭādikāriṇāṃ puṇyakṛtā meva gamanāgamanakleśo nānyeṣāṃ
teṣāṃ pratyavāyabhayarahitatvātphalakāmanārāhityācceti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, yāgādikarma akurvatāṃ tadviruddhapāpakarma-
kāriṇāṃ cāstyevāyaṃ gatāgatakleśa iti । kutaḥ । <quote>‘tadya ihe’</quote> tyādibhāllaveyaśrutau tathāśrutatvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>saṃyamane tvanubhūyetareṣāmityādi</pratika> । tuśabdo'vadhāraṇe । saptamī dvitīyārthe । <pratika>saṃyamane</pratika> narake samyagyamaśāsana-
<pratika>manubhūyaiva</pratika> sthitānā<pratika>mitareṣā</pratika>miṣṭādikāribhyo'nyeṣāṃ madhye । <pratika>ārohāvarohau</pratika>=keṣāṃ cidāroho narakādutthānaṃ keṣāṃ-
cidavarohaḥ tato'pi nīcasthāne nityanarake pāto bhavati । kutaḥ । <pratika>tadgatidarśanāt</pratika>=teṣāmaniṣṭādikāriṇāmevaṃvidhagate
rdarśanāt । <quote>‘sarve vā ete’</quote> ityādiśrutau darśanādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। smaranti ca ।। 16 ।।</pratika> smṛtikartāra uktamarthaṃ <quote>‘gacchanti pāpinassarve’</quote> ityādinā pratipādayantītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>ityaniṣṭādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<head>atha api saptādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। apisapta ।। 16 ।।</pratika> atra <quote>‘cakāra narakaṃ śūnya’</quote> mityādismṛtivacanānnityanarako nopapadyata iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।
siddhāntastu</pratika>, ‘rauravo'tha mahāścaiva vahnirvaitaraṇī tathā । kuṃbhīpāka iti proktānyanityanarakāṇi ca । tāmisraścā-
ndhatāmisrau dvau nityau saṃprakīrtitau ।।” ityādinā saptānāṃ narakāṇāṃ smaraṇāt <quote>‘cakāra narakaṃ śūnya’</quote> miti vacanasya
rauravādipañcanarakīviṣayatvācca nityanarako'bhyupagantavya eveti ।। <pratika>ityapisaptādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha tatrāpyadhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। tatrāpi ca tadvyāpārādavirodhaḥ ।। 17 ।।</pratika> atra īśvarasya nārakijanaprerakatvāṅgīkāre tasyāpi duḥkhabhāvatvaṃ
syāditi <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, tatrāpi ca</pratika>=narake'pi ca । <pratika>tadva‍yāpārāt</pratika>=duḥkhānubhavaṃ vinaiva tasyeśvarasya
preraṇākhyavyāpārasatvāt । <pratika>avirodhaḥ</pratika>=īśvarasya narake sthitvā tanniyantṛtve duḥkhābhoktṛtvapratipādanācca na śrutivirodhaḥ
ityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>।। iti tatrāpyadhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha vidyādhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। vidyākarmaṇoriti tu prakṛtatvāt ।। 18 ।।</pratika> atra <quote>‘athaitayoḥ patho’</quote> rityādinā devayānapitṛyāṇamārga-
yorbhūtaiḥ svātantryeṇa gantuṃ śakyatvāvagamātkiṃ vairāgyādisādhanakalāpānuṣṭhānakleśeneti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, ‘etayoḥ
<pb n="213"/>
atha tatsvābhāvyāpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। tatsvābhāvyāpattirupapatteḥ ।। 22 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatra phalabhogānantaraṃ svargāt sānuśaya eva jīvo'vataratīti nirūpi-
tam । tasyāvarohata ākāśādibhāvaḥ śrūyate <quote>‘athaitamevādhvānaṃ punarnivartante
yathetamākāśamākāśādvāyuṃ vāyurbhūtvā dhūmo bhavati dhūmo bhūtvābhraṃ bhavati abhraṃ
bhūtvā megho bhavati megho bhūtvā pravarṣati’</quote> iti । tatra jīvasyākāśādirūpatā-
''pattiḥ tatsādṛśyāpattirveti saṃśayaḥ ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha tatsvābhāvyāpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ tatsvābhāvyāpattirūpapatteḥ ।। 22 ।।</pratika> āpādaparisamāpteravarohaprakāraviṣayāṃ
ciṃtāṃ pravartayituṃ prāksiddhamarthamanuvadati—<pratika>pūrvatreti</pratika> । <quote>‘vāyurbhūtvā dhūmo bhavatī’</quote> tyādi-
sāmānādhikaraṇyasya mukhyatvāpavādakābhāvasadbhāvābhyāṃ saṃśayamāha—<pratika>tatra jīvasyeti ।
bhūtveti śabdāditi</pratika> । vāyoḥ karmatvanirdeśe'pi tadbhāvāpattiparāmarśāttathaiva karmatve
nirdiṣṭe'pi ākāśe'varohatāṃ tadbhāvāpattiravasīyate । ākāśavāyvoḥ karmatvanirdeśaśśa-
rīrabhūtayostayoranupraveśārthatvena mukhyatayopapadyate । <quote>‘vāyurbhūtvā dhūmo bhavatī’</quote> tyādi-
sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tu śarīraśarīribhāvābhāve mukhyatayā nopapadyate । na cāsya mukhyatve
sthānaśabdasya mukhyatve tṛtīyaśabdasamabhivyāhāravat kiñcidbādhakamasti । ataḥ prathama-
caramāhutyordevamanuṣyādibhāvavadadhvanyākāśādibhāvasyāpi śarīraśarīribhāvatvaṃ yuktam ।
bhūsvargayorivādhvani bhogābhāvāt śarīragrahaṇasya niṣprayojanatvaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyasya
mukhyatve bādhakamiti cet । na । prayojanābhāvena śrutaparityāgāyogāt । na hi bhūtānāṃ
sarvatra sulabhatayā śarīrāraṃbhakabhūtasūkṣmasahitasya gamanaṃ niṣprayojanamiti śrutaṃ tatpari-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
patho’ rityanena mārgadvayaprāptisādhanabhūtayorvidyākarmaṇoḥ parāmarśāt tayorapi <quote>‘tadya itthaṃ viduḥ’</quote> <quote>‘atha ya ime grāme’</quote>
iti prakṛtatvāt । ato nāsti svātantryeṇa gatirbhūtānāmiti yujyata eva tatsādhanakalāpānuṣṭhānapravṛttiriti ।।</p>
<head>iti vidyādhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। na tṛtīye tathopalabdheḥ ।। 19 ।।</pratika> atra tiryagyātanātamobhedena trividhāyāmadhogatau tṛtīye'pi tamaḥsthāne
pūrvayoriva kadācitsukhaṃ syāditi <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘nāndhe tamasi magnānāṃ sukhaleśo'pi kaścane’</quote> tyādismṛtyā svatantraḥ
parameśvaraḥ svadveṣiṇāṃ sukhaṃ necchettadicchāṃ vinā ca kimapi na bhavediti yuktyā ca tatretarasthānadṛṣṭāntena sukhonnayanasya
bādhitatvāttṛtīye tamaḥsthāne sukhaleśo'pi nāstītyarthaḥ ।। iti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ ।। sūtrārthastu tṛtīye</pratika>=tamaḥsthāne । <pratika>na</pratika>=
na sukhamasti । kutaḥ । <pratika>tathopalabdheḥ</pratika>=tathāpratīterityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>sū ।। smaryate'pi ca loke ।। 20 ।।</pratika> aṃdhe tamasi
sukharāhityaṃ <quote>‘nāndhe tamasī’</quote> tismṛtikartrā <pratika>smaryate ca</pratika>=smṛtyā ca pratiyādyate । kiṃcaitat loke'pi lokadṛṣṭavyā-
ptikānumānenāpi siddhamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। darśanācca ।। 21 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘apaśyatrividhānbrahmā sākṣādeva caturmukhaḥ’</quote> iti pādme trividhaprāṇivargasya hiraṇyagarbha-
kartṛkadarśanaviṣayatvapratipādanāccetyarthaḥ । idaṃ sūtraṃ na bhāṣyāntareṣu dṛśyate ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। tṛtīye śabdāvarodhassaṃśokajasya ।। 22 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘tṛtīye’</quote> ityāvartate । tṛtīye tamasi sthāne tatrāpi
tṛtīye'ndhe tamasi tadviṣaye yaḥ śabdaḥ tṛtīyatamaḥsvarūpapratipādakaśabdaḥ tena avarodhaḥ prāptiḥ । kasya । <pratika>saṃśokajasya</pratika>=
samyakśokajasya mohasyeti yāvat ।। ataśca tṛtīye na sukhamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। smaraṇācca ।। 23 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘mahātamastridhā praukta’</quote> mityādinā kaurme śravaṇādeva mūrcchādipradatvasmaraṇāccetyarthaḥ ।
ato na tṛtīye tamasi sthāne sukhaleśaprasaktiriti siddham ।। <pratika>।। iti na tṛtīyādhikaraṇam ।। 15 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmaniṣṭādikāryadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<pb n="214"/>
tatra bhūtveti śabdādākāśādirūpatvaṃ jīvasya ।।
iti prāpte brūmaḥ—nāvarohato jīvasyākāśādirūpatā''pattiḥ, kiṃtu tatsā-
dṛśyāpattiḥ, tatra sukhaduḥkhānubhavābhāvāt । tadanubhavārthaṃ hi tattaccharīrasaṃ-
bandhaḥ । anyasyānyatvānupapatteśca । tasmāt tatsādṛśyāpattiravarohata itye-
vopapadyata iti nirṇayaḥ ।।
<head>iti tatsvābhāvyāpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tyajyate । bhogābhāvo'pyasiddhaḥ । bhūsvargayorivā'dhvanya'pi bhogopapatteḥ । na ca vṛkṣāgrā-
diva svargātpatatāṃ saṃmūrchitakaraṇānāṃ bhogo na saṃbhavatīti vācyam । na hīṣṭāpūrtādi-
kāriṇaḥ svarge karmaphalaṃ bhuktvā punarbhūloke brāhmaṇādiyoniṃ prāpya karmārjanāya prācīnakarma-
śeṣeṇāvarohanto vṛkṣāgrādiva svargānmūrchitāḥ patantīti kalpayituṃ yuktam । tathā sati
yāgādīnāmanarthaphalatvāpatteḥ । <quote>‘savijñāno bhavati sa vijñānamevānvavakrāmatī’</quote> ti
śrutyantare gatāgatayorjñānavattvapratipādanena mūrchitatvakalpanānupapatteśca । na ca tattada-
bhimāniśarīratvena sthitānāmākāśādīnāmavarohataḥ pratyapi śarīratvamanupapannamiti vā-
cyam । parameśvaraṃ prati śarīrabhūtānāmeva teṣāmabhimānidevatāḥ pratīva etānpratyapi śarī-
ratvopapatteriti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>tatra sukhaduḥkheti</pratika> । abhimānidevatāḥ prati bhogāśrayāṇāmanu-
śayinaḥ pratyapi bhogāśrayatvamanupapannam । yugapadbhoktṛdvayasamāveśe tayoḥ parasparaviruddha-
bhogārthitāyāṃ śarīronmathanaprasaṃgāditi bhāvaḥ । nanu bhogābhāve'pi parameśvaraṃ pratīva
śarīratvaṃ syādityāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>tadanubhavārthaṃ hīti</pratika> । na tāvadanyabhogāśrayaniyamanārthaṃ
tānprati śarīratvam । parameśvarasyeva teṣāmantaryāmitvābhāvāt । tadbhogārthamapi na bhavati
cet svārthatayā parārthatayā vā tanniyamyatvarahitānāṃ taccharīratvaṃ na saṃbhavati । śarī-
ralakṣaṇābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ । nanvavarohatāmākāśādiśarīratvaṃ tattadabhimānidevatābhāve-
naivāstvityāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>anyasyeti</pratika> । sargādyakālamārabhya āpralayamākāśābhimānidevatāḥ
tattatkālaviśeṣeṣu avarohadbha‍yo'nyā eva klṛptāssanti । tato'nyeṣāmavarohatāṃ tattā-
dātmyaṃ nopapadyata iti bhāvaḥ । cakāreṇa bahūnāmavarohatāmākāśādyabhimānidevatābhā-
vānupapattissamuccīyate । <pratika>tatsādṛśyāpattiriti</pratika> । svargārthakarmakṣayānaṃtaramamṛtamayadehe
vilīne sūkṣmadehamātradehaveṣṭitatvenāvarohatāmākāśādibhyaḥ pṛthagabhidhānānarhatvaṃ tatsā-
dṛśyamiti bhāvaḥ । tasmātpitṛmātṛpraveśe pitṛmātṛbhyāmivākāśādibhirapyavarohatāṃ dehā-
ntaraprāptinimittakarmodbodhitavāsanāmūlasvāpnajñānasadṛśānabhivyaktajñānamātravatāṃ svayaṃ
bhogarahitānāṃ saṃśleṣamātramiti sthitam ।। <pratika>iti tatsvābhāvyāpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</pratika>

<head>iti tatsvābhāvyāpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<pb n="215"/>
atha nāticirādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। nāticireṇa viśeṣāt ।। 23 ।।</sutra>
atrāvarohan jīvo vilambate na vetyaniyamaḥ, uta na vilambata eva
iti saṃśayaḥ ।।
tatra pravarṣaṇānantaraṃ vrīhyādi bhāvaḥ śrūyate <quote>‘ta iha vrīhiyavā oṣadhivana-
spatayastilamāṣā jāyante’</quote> iti । prāgetasmāt vrīhiyavādibhāvādākāśādau
vilambatvarayorna niyamaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha nāticirādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। nāticireṇa viśeṣāt ।। 23 ।।</pratika> anaticirāvasthānaniyāmakasattvāsattvābhyāṃ
saṃśayamāha—<pratika>atreti । prāgetasmāditi</pratika> । yathā vrīhiyavādiṣvavasthānamaticiramitya <quote>‘to
vai khalu durniṣprapatara’</quote> miti vākyādavagamyate evamākāśādiṣu meghānteṣu nātici-
ramavasthānamiti kutaścinnāvagamyate । atasteṣu ciramaciraṃ vetyaniyamaḥ । na ca vrīhyādiṣu
cirāvasthānapratipādanādevākāśādiṣvacirāvasthānamavagamyata iti vācyam । vrīhyādiṣu
hi cirāvasthānaniyamo vidhitsitaḥ । na tatsattāmātram । ciramaciraṃ vetyaniyatasyāva-
sthānasya vrīhyādi1bhāvoktyaiva labdhasyāvidheyatvāt । tathā ca viśiṣya vrīhyādiṣu cirāva-
sthānaniyamapratipādanasāmārthyādākāśādibhyaścirāvasthānaniyama eva vyāvartate । na
tvaniyataṃ cirāvasthānamapi । yathā <quote>‘vaikhānasaṃ pūrve'hansāma bhavati ṣoḍaśyuttara’</quote> iti
viśiṣyāṃgirasāṃ dvirātrasyottare'hani ṣoḍaśigrahaniyamavidhānasāmarthyā <quote>‘duttare'handvirā-
trasya gṛhyata’</quote> iti sāmānyavacanaprāptaḥ ṣoḍaśigrahaniyama eva dvirātrāntarebhyo vyāvatate ।
na tu prakṛteratirātrādaniyataprāptaḥ ṣoḍaśigraho'pi । ata eva <quote>‘ardhamantarvedyardhaṃ bahirvedī’</quote> ti</p>

<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha tatsābhāvyāpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। tatsābhāvyāpattirupapatteḥ ।। 22 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvamiṣṭādikāriṇo'varohantītyuktam । atra teṣāmavarohaprakāraścintyate । śrūyate hyavarohaśrutiḥ---<quote>‘athai-
tamevādhvānaṃ punarnivartante yathetamākāśamākāśādvāyuṃ vāyurbhūtvā dhūmo bhavati dhūmo bhūtvābhraṃ bhavati abhraṃ bhūtvā medho bhavati
medho bhūtvā pravarṣati’</quote> iti । tatra kiṃ svargādavarohanto jīvā ākāśādisvarūpaṃ pratipapadyante uta tatsāmyamiti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> ।
ākāśādisvarūpamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu tatsābhāvyāpattiḥ</pratika>=jīvānāṃ tairākāśādibhissāmyaprāpteḥ ।
samāno bhāvo rūpaṃ yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ bhāvassābhāvyaṃ sādṛśyamiti vigrahaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>upapatteḥ</pratika>=candralokaṃ gatānāmanuśayināṃ
pravṛtaphalakarmakṣayadarśanajanitaśokāgninā dahyamānamidaṃ śarīraṃ karakādivadvilīyamānamākāśasamaṃ bhavatītyaṃtadupapadyate ।
na hyanyasyānyabhāvo mukhya upapadyate । tasmātsādṛśyameva pratipadyanta iti siddham ।। iti ।। sūtramapi vyākhyātam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika> tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> ca nāsti viśeṣaḥ pūrvasmāt ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, atra dhūmādibhāvaḥ karmiṇo dhūmādidevataikyaṃ vā tatpadaprāptirveti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘dhūmo bhūtvābhraṃ bhavatī’</quote>
tyādiśrutyā dhūmādidevataikyaṃ dhūmādibhāva iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । dhūmādiṣu praviśya tadgatau gatistatsthitau sthitirityādireva
tadbhāvāpattiḥ । anyasyānyabhāvāyogāditi <pratika>siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu</pratika>, । karmiṇaḥ <pratika>tatsvābhāvyāpattiḥ</pratika>=tasya dhūmā-
didevasya svābhāvyasya svabhāvasadṛśasvabhāvasya prāptireva । na tadaikyaṃ tatpadaprāptirvā । kutaḥ । <pratika>upapatteḥ</pratika> anyasyānyai-
kyādṛṣṭyāsyaivārthasya yuktatvādityarthaḥ ।। 16 ।। <pratika>।। iti tatsvābhāvyāpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</pratika></p>
<note>(1) <quote>‘diṣvavasthānoktyaiva labdhatvena tasyāvidheyatatvāt’</quote> iti kha. pāṭha. ।</note>
<pb n="216"/>
<p>iti prāpte brūmaḥ—vrīhyādiprāpteḥ prāgākāśādiṣu nāticiraṃ tiṣṭhati jīvaḥ ।
katham ? vrīhyādibhāvānantaraṃ <quote>‘ato vai khalu durniṣprapataram’</quote> iti vrīhyādibhāvā-
nnirgamanaṃ duśśakamiti hi śrūyate । ato vrīhyādau vilambāt anyatra tvaretya-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
yūpāvaṭamānadeśavidhāne antarāḻalakṣaṇāṃ parityajyā <quote>‘rdhamantarvedī’</quote> tyetāvanmātramantarvedye-
kadeśaṃ yūpārdhāṃgatvena vidhatte । ardhe tatra mīyamāne ardhāṃtaraṃ bahiriti labhyate । ato<quote>‘'rdhaṃ-
bahirvedī’</quote> tyanuvāda iti na vākyabheda iti pūrvapakṣe <quote>‘ardhamantarvedī’</quote> ti niyamavidhānā-
dardhāntarādantarvediniyama eva vyāvartate na tvaniyato'pyantarvedideśaḥ । ato'rdhāntara-
syāntarbahirvā mānaṃ syāditi tatparihārāya <quote>‘ardhaṃ bahirvedī’</quote> tyasyāpi vidhāyakatvaṃ syā-
diti vākyabhedaḥ <quote>‘tathā yūpasya vedi’</quote> rityadhikaraṇe prasaṃjitaḥ । na ca <quote>‘ato durniṣprapatara-
meve’</quote> ti mābhūnniyamaḥ, ata eva <quote>‘durniṣprapatara’</quote> miti parisaṃkhyāstu, tathā cākāśādi-
bhyaścirāvasthānaṃ vyāvartata iti vācyam । ākāśādiṣu vrīhyādiṣu cirāvasthānasya
niyataprāptau hi parisaṃkhyā yujyate । na tasya kutaścitprasaktirasti । ciramaciraṃ veti ni-
yamābhāvasyāvasthānoktyā prasaktirastītyaniyamaprāptau niyama evāyam । na ca tathāpi
<quote>‘durniṣprapatara’</quote> miti tarappratyayārthasyātiśayasya pratiyogyākāṃkṣāyāṃ prāganukrāṃtānāmā-
kāśādīnāṃ buddhisannidhānāttatpratiyogitvenānvayaḥ syāt । tathā ca vrīhyādiṣvākāśāpe-
kṣayā ciramavasthānoktāvākāśādiṣvavasthānasya tadapekṣayālpakālatvaṃ paryavasyatīti vācyam ।
yato durniṣprapataśabdāttarappratyayo na dṛśyate । chāṃdasenaikasya takārasya lopena tatra tarappratya-
yasamarthane chāṃdasena rephopajananena tadabhāvo'pi samarthayituṃ śakyate । <quote>‘chaṃdasi gatyarthebhya’</quote>
iti <ref>(pā॰ 3-3-129)</ref> sūtreṇa khalarthe chāṃdase yuci pratyaye sati durniṣprapatanamiti
rūpasiddhau nakārasya chāṃdasena varṇavyatyayenāpi tadabhāvaḥ samarthayituṃ śakyate । tasmādyathā
yoṣāyāmanuśayināṃ garbharūpeṇāvasthānamaniyatakālaṃ ciramaciraṃ veti viśeṣa mnānābhāvā-
tsrāvapātāvaprasavakālaprasavabhedadarśanācca evamākāśādiṣvapyavasthānamaniyatakālam ।
niyamakāriṇaśśāstrasyābhāvādityabhiprāyaḥ । <pratika>anyatra tvaretyavagamāditi</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ ।
durupapadādupasṛṣṭātpatlṛdhātoḥ khalarthe ḍapratyaye sati durniṣprapamiti rūpasiddhau ta1smāttarappratyaye
durniṣprapataramiti rūpasiddhiḥ । <quote>‘anyeṣvapi dṛśyata’</quote> iti janerupapadāntareṣu ḍapratyayavi-
dhāyakasūtre <quote>‘anyebhyo'pi dṛśyata iti vaktavya’</quote> miti vārtikakṛtā dhātvantarebhyo'pi
ḍapratyayasyānuśiṣṭatvāt । tatra dṛśigrahaṇaṃ sarvopādhivyabhicārārthamiti vṛttikāreṇoktatayā
<quote>‘kṛtyalyuṭo bahula’</quote> miti <ref>(pā॰ 3-3-113.)</ref> sūtre bahulagrahaṇādanye'pi kṛtaḥ prāptama-
bhidheyaṃ vyabhicarantīti tenaivoktatayā ca tasya ḍapratyayasya khalarthavṛttitvopapatteśca । evaṃ
varṇa2vyatyayavarṇalopavarṇopajanavarṇavikārānantareṇa śabdasvarūpaniṣpattisaṃbhave teṣāmanyatamo
na kalpanīyaḥ । tathā cātiśāyanikapratyayasāmarthyādākāśādiṣvavasthānamaticiramityava-
gamyata iti । etena <quote>‘ato vai khalu durniṣprapatara’</quote> mityatrātaśśabdena sarvanāmnā saṃko-
cābhāvādākāśādisarvaparāmarśādākāśādiṣvapyaticiramavasthānamityapi śaṃkā nirastā ।
ātiśayinikapratyayārthapratiyogitayākāśādīnāmanvayitayātaśśabdasyāvyavahitaikavā-
kyopāttavrīhyādimātraparāmarśitvasya vaktavyatvāt vrīhyādibhyo durniṣprapataratvoktisāma-
<note>(1) <quote>‘tata upari tarappratyayena durniṣprapataramiti śabdaniṣpattiḥ’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘varṇavyatyaye’</quote> ti padaṃ
kha. pustake na dṛśyate ।</note>
<pb n="217"/>
vagamādākāśādau na vilambate jīva iti ।।
iti nāticirādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
atha anyādhiṣṭhitādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। anyādhiṣṭhite pūrvavadabhilāpāt ।। 24 ।।</sutra>
iha vrīhyādāvapi jīvasya saṃśleṣamātram, uta janma !
iti saṃśaye vrīhyādirūpeṇa <quote>‘jāyante’</quote> iti śravaṇāt tasya vīhyādijanma ।।

rthyādākāśādibhyo'pi durniṣprapataratvamastīti teṣvapi cirāvasthānāvagamāt sūtre <quote>‘nāti-
cireṇe’</quote> tyuktam । vrīhyādiṣu yāvānvilaṃbastāvānākāśādiṣu nāstītyetāvanmātramiha
sūtrakṛtoktam । ubhayatrā'pi kāleyattāyāṃ vyavasthāpakāni śrutismṛtyādivacanāni santi
cettebhya eva sāvagantavyā ।। <pratika>iti nāticirādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha anyādhiṣṭhitādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū । anyādhiṣṭhite pūrvavadabhilāpāt ।। 24 ।।</pratika> avarohatāmākāśādibhāvastatsaṃ-
śleṣamātraṃ na tu tādrūpyaṃ tacca nāticiramityākāśādimeghāṃteṣūbhayaṃ siddham । tadanantarapa-
ṭhitavrīhyādibhāvastvaticiramityapi viśeṣassiddhaḥ । tarhi tathaiva vrīhyādibhāvastādrūpyami-
tyapi viśeṣo'stviti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyā pratyavasthānamabhipretya jāyaṃta iti janmasaṃkīrtanāt
janmanimittakarmāsaṃkīrtanācca saṃśayamāha—<pratika>iheti । jāyanta iti śravaṇāditi</pratika> ।
nanu <quote>‘megho bhūtvā pravarṣatī’</quote>ti pravarṣaṇakartṛtvaśravaṇe'pi yathā na meghatādrūpyaṃ tadvadihāpi
vrīhyādayo jāyaṃta iti śravaṇe'pi vrīhyāditādrūpyabhiti kiṃ na syāt । maivam । pravarṣa-
tītyetadācārārthakvibantatayā yojayituṃ śakyam । asti ca vṛṣṭitaḥ pṛthagabhidhānāna-</p>
