<head>nayamaṇimālāyām atha nāticirādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। nāticireṇa viśeṣāt ।। 23 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>ākāśādāvasya sthitiraniyatakālabhāktu syāt । āmrāyate hi kaścicciramaciraṃ veti na viśeṣaḥ ।। 176 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>vrīhyādibhyo durniṣprapatataratvoktisāmarthyāt । avasīyate tataḥ prāgaciraṃ vyomādyavasthānam ।। 177 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti nāticirādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha nāticirādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। nāticireṇa viśeṣāt ।। 23 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvamākāśādiṣuvarṣānteṣu pūrvapūrvasādṛśyānantaramuttarottarasādṛśyamityuktam । tatra kiṃ jīvaḥ cirakālameva
sādṛśyenāvasthāya aparasādṛśyaṃ gacchati utālpamalpamiti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । niyāmakābhāvādaniyama iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।
siddhāntastu</pratika>, jīvo <pratika>nāticireṇa</pratika>=alpamalpaṃ kālamevākāśādivarṣāntaiḥ sādṛśyenāvasthāya varṣadhārādvārā pṛthivīṃ
praviśati । kutaḥ । vrīhyādibhāvāpattyanantaraṃ <quote>‘ato vai khalu durniṣprapataram’</quote> iti viśeṣāt tataḥ pūrvaṃ suniṣprataratvaṃ pratīyate ।
jīvasya vrīhyākāśabhāve vinā sthūlaśarīraṃ liṃgaśarīramātreṇa sukhaduḥkhopabhogāsaṃbhavāttadānīṃ pratīyamāne sukhe cirakālā-
vasthānarūpe eva bhavataḥ । na mukhye । ato vrīhya।dipraveśātpūrvamalpamalpameva kālaṃ tatsādṛśyenāvasthānamiti siddhamiti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> ca atrāpi nāsti vailakṣaṇyaṃ śāṃkaramatāditi vedyam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, atra svargānnirgatasya karmiṇaḥ cireṇa dehaprāptirvā utācireṇeti <pratika>saṃdehe</pratika> cireṇaiva dehaṃ prāpno-
tīti<pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> ।। <quote>‘tadya iha ramaṇīyacaraṇā’</quote> iti viśeṣavacanādacireṇaiva kamī svargādavarūḍho dehaṃ prāpnotīti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ</pratika> ।।
sūtrārtho'pi vyākhyātaḥ ।। 17 ।। <pratika>।। iti nāticirādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</pratika>
<pb n="218"/>
iti prāpte brūmaḥ—anyajīvādhiṣṭhite vrīhyādau jīvasya saṃśleṣamātram । ākā-
śādāvivāvarohatastatra jananahetusaṃkīrtanavirahitābhilāpāt <quote>‘jāyante’</quote> iti
śrutirgauṇī । yatra brāhmaṇādijanmāsti tatra <quote>‘ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇāḥ’</quote>
iti heturabhilapyate । ato brāhmaṇādāvevāsya janmābhilāpādanyatrāsya saṃba-
ndhamātramiti nirṇayaḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। aśuddhamiti cenna śabdāt ।। 25 ।।</sutra>
avarohataḥ puruṣasya pūrvānuṣṭhitayāgādiṣvagnīṣomīyādihiṃsāmiśratvādaśuddhaṃ
karmeti tatphalabhogāya vrīhyādiṣvapyutpattirastviti cet—na,
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
rhe vṛṣṭisaṃśliṣṭe bhūtasūkṣmaveṣṭite'nuśayini vṛṣṭiśabdaprayogaḥ । <quote>‘tasyā āhutervarṣa saṃbhavati’</quote>
iti । jāyanta iti śabdastu vrīhyādyātmanā jananamevābhidhatte iti vaiṣamyāt । na ca
svargādavarohatāṃ pāpaphalasthāvarajanmānupapattiḥ । śvasūkarādijanmavat sthāvarajanmano-
'pyupapatteḥ । na ca sthāvarajanmanimittakarmaśravaṇāttajjanmaśravaṇamanyathā neyamiti vācyam ।
śrutopapattyarthamaśrutakarmakalpanaucityena tadaśravaṇamātreṇa śrutaparityāgāyogāt । etena
vrīhyādibhāvo na tādrūpyeṇa janma janmanimittakarmasaṃkīrtanarahitatvānmeghādibhāvavaditi
sāmānyato dṛṣṭānumānamapi nirastam । <pratika>jananahetusaṃkīrtaneti</pratika> । kapūyacaraṇābhivyakteragre
saṃkīrtanāt śvādiyoniprāptivat vrīhyādijanmaprāptestannimittatvaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyate । na ca
prāksaṃkīrtitasyeṣṭādikarmaṇo'bhivyaktasya svarge dattaphalasya śeṣānuvṛttisadbhāve'pi tasyo-
ttamajanmaprāptihetoḥ pāpaphalasthāvarajanmanimittatvamasti । na cātra sthāvarajanmanimittasya
kasyacitkarmaṇassaṃkīrtanamasti । tasmātsthāvarajanmanimittakarmābhivyaktivyatirekāvagamā-
dākāśādiṣviva vrīhyādiṣvapi saṃśleṣamātramiti bhāvaḥ । nanu yāgādikarmaśeṣaphalamevāstu
sthāvarajanma yāgādikarmaṇo hiṃsādiyuktatvena pāpamiśritatvāditi <pratika>śaṃkānirākaraṇārthaṃ
sūtram---aśuddhamiti cenna śabdāt ।। 25 ।। hiṃsāmiśratvāditi</pratika> । nātra padāha-
vanīyādivadutsargāpavādanyāyaḥ pravartate । avirodhāt । paśuhiṃsāvidhirhi tasyāḥ kratū-
pakārakatvaṃ bodhayati । <quote>‘na hiṃsyā’</quote>diti niṣedhastu pratyavāyaphalakatvam । na caikasyeṣṭāni-
ṣṭaphalakatvaṃ nopapadyate । yena yāgīyahiṃsāśāstrasya hiṃsāniṣedhaśāstrasya cāvirodhāya viṣa-
yavyavasthā kalpyeta । dṛśyate hi ghṛtapānādeḥ puṣṭyādirūpeṣṭahetutvaṃ mehādirūpāniṣṭahetutvaṃ
ca । kimanyatrodāharaṇagaveṣaṇayā । yāgādāveva śrutiprāptasvargādīṣṭahetutvaṃ pratyakṣādiprāpta-
tātkālikakleśarūpāniṣṭahetutvaṃ ca sarvasampratipannam । tadvadyāgīyahiṃsādiṣu śrutidvayaprāpte-
ṣṭāniṣṭahetutvasamāveśaḥ syāt । ko virodhaḥ । athocyeta yāgīyahiṃsāyāṃ vidhitaḥ pravṛrtterna
sā niṣedhaśāstrasya viṣayaḥ । tasya rāgaprāptaviṣayatvāditi । naitadyuktam । yāgīyahiṃsāyā-
mapi rāgata eva pravṛtteḥ । na hi vidhisahasramapīṣṭasādhanatābodhajananadvārā rāgamanutpādya
puruṣaṃ pravartayitumīṣṭe । jaimininā ca tṛtīyādhyāye <quote>‘ṣaṭ‍‌triṃśatprakramā prāci caturviṃśatiragreṇa
triṃśajjaghanene’</quote> ti vihitā saumikī mahovediḥ kevalapradhānārthā । <quote>‘iyati śakṣyāmaha’</quote>
iti tadvākyaśeṣe iyati etāvati bhāge kartuṃ śakṣyāma ityarthake tumunpratyayārthacikīrṣāsaṃ-
yogāt na1 cikīrṣāṃgapradhānārthā aṃgānāmīpsitaphalasādhanatvābhāvenācikīrṣitatvāditi
<note>(1) <quote>‘na tvaṅgapradhānārthā’</quote> iti, kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="219"/>
śrūyate hi<quote>‘hiraṇyaśarīra ūrdhvaṃ svargaṃ lokameti’</quote> <quote>‘na vā u vetanmriyase na riṣyasi’</quote>
iti paśuhiṃsāyā ahiṃsātvam । tato na tatprāptirasti ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pūrvapakṣaṃ kṛtvā <quote>‘tadyukte tu phalaśrutistasmātsarvacikīrṣā syā’</quote> diti sūtreṇa sakalāṃgayukte
phalaśruteḥ sarvatra pradhāneṃ'gakalāpe ca cikīrṣāstītyaṃgānāmapi cikīrṣitatvāviśeṣādaṃgapra-
dhānārthā mahāvediriti siddhāṃtayatā aṅgeṣvapi rāgata eva pravṛttiriti sthāpitā ।
tasmāddhiṃsādipāpamiśrayāgādikarmaśeṣataḥ sthāvarajanma saṃbhavatītyāśāyaḥ । <quote>‘hiraṇyaśarīra’</quote>
ityādiḥ kratau saṃjñaptasya paśoḥ svargaprāptipratipādako'rthavādaḥ । <quote>‘na vā u veta’</quote> dityādiḥ
tasya mṛtihiṃsābhā1vabodhako maṃtraḥ । tatra vai iti prasiddhau । u ityavadhāraṇe । etadidā-
nīmityarthaḥ । he paśo tvaṃ khalu idānīṃ naiva mriyase nāpi hiṃsyase ityarthaḥ । <pratika>ahiṃsātva-
miti</pratika> । kratau paśusaṃjñapanasya pāpayonivimocanapūrvakaṃ svargaprāpakatvena tadrakṣaṇarūpatvā-
ccikitsakakṛtavraṇadāhacchedādivanna hiṃsātvamiti na tatra <quote>‘na hiṃsyā’</quote> diti niṣedhasparśaḥ ।
ato na yāgasya pāpamiśratvamiti bhāvaḥ । idamatra ciṃtyate । <quote>‘hiraṇyaśarīra’</quote> ityādyartha-
vādārthe bādhakābhāvāt kratau saṃjñaptasya paśoḥ svargaprāptirastu nāma । saṃjñapanasya svargaprā-
ptisādhanatvāttadahiṃsātvena maṃtro'pi stautu nāma । tāvatā kathaṃ paśuprāṇaviyojanarūpaṃ
tanmaraṇoddeśyakamaraṇānukūlavyāpāratve hiṃsālakṣaṇe satyapi ahiṃsā syāt । na ca tadrakṣa-
ṇarūpatvādahiṃsā । vraṇadāhacchedayordāhacchedarūpatve'pi vraṇirakṣaṇatvavatpaśuprāṇavimocana-
rūpasya saṃjñapanasya hiṃsātve'pi tadrakṣaṇatvopapatteḥ <quote>‘ahiṃsansarvabhūtānyanyatra tīrthebhya’</quote>
itiśrutau tīrthaśabdoktayajñādyarthasaṃjñapane'pi hiṃsātvamabhyupagamyaiva tatparyudāsācca । asārva-
trikaścāyaṃ parihāraḥ । na khalu sautrāmaṇyāṃ varṇatraye'pi niṣiddhasparśāghrāṇādikāyāḥ
paiṣṭyāssurāyāḥ grahaṇaṃ na grahaṇamiti vā pānaṃ na pānamiti vā vaktuṃ śakyam । nāpyaśvamedhe
rājānujñayāśvasaṃrakṣakaiḥ kriyamāṇamaśvamedhaviṣayamantrabrāhmaṇakalpādivedināṃ brāhmaṇānāma-
brāhmaṇānāñcābhyavahāryasyācchidyaharaṇaṃ parasvaharaṇaṃ na bhavatīti vaktuṃ śakyam । nāpi
vāmadevyopāsakasya prārthayamānasarvayoṣidapariharaṇaṃ tatsaṃgatirna bhavatīti vaktuṃ śakyam ।
nāpi saṃsthite ṣaḍahe <quote>‘madhvāśayedghṛtaṃ ve’</quote> ti dvādaśāhāṃgatvena vihitaṃ <quote>‘madhu na dīkṣito
brahmacāritvāt ।’</quote> <ref>(jai॰ 10-6-32)</ref> <quote>‘prāśyeta vā yajñārthatvāt’</quote> <ref>(jai॰ 10-6-33)</ref>
iti dāśamikādhikaraṇe yajamānatayā brahmacarye satyapi satrātmakadvādaśāhe ṛtvikkarta-
vyatvena sthāpitaṃ madhvaśanaṃ brahmacāriṇāṃ niṣiddhaṃ madhvaśanaṃ na bhavatīti vaktuṃ śakyam ।
ato <quote>‘na śabdā’</quote> diti sūtrāṃśenānya eva śaṃkāyāḥ parihāro vivakṣitaḥ । sa ittham ।
<quote>‘na hiṃsyā’</quote> diti niṣedhavākye puruṣārthaiva hiṃsā dhātunānūdyate na kratvarthāpi । kartu-
rākhyātavācyatvapakṣe samānapadaśrutyā (samāna2padopātta) hiṃsāyāstaccheṣatvapratīteḥ tasyā-
khyātārthabhāvanākṣepyatvapakṣe'pi tadākṣiptakartṛśeṣatvapratīteḥ । nātra kratorvācakaṃ kiñcidasti ।
yena <quote>‘athāto'gnimagniṣṭomenānuyajantī’</quote>tyanārabhyādhīte vākye cityāgneryajiśabdoktayāgaśe-
ṣatvadasyāḥ kratuśeṣatvamavagamyeta । nāpi kratorākṣepakaṃ kiṃcidasti । yena parṇatāyā
juhvākṣiptakratuśeṣatvavadasyāḥ kratuśeṣatvamavagamyeta । na ca prakaraṇe pā3ṭho'sti । yena <quote>‘nānṛtaṃ-
<note>(1) <quote>‘bhāktvapratiṣedhako’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) ‘etadrekhākitaṃ vākyaṃ kha. pustake nāsti ।</note> <note>(3) prakaraṇena
kratorviparivṛttirasti । yena iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="220"/>
vade’</quote> diti darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇāmnātavākye'nūdyamānasyānṛtavadanasyeva kratvarthapratītirbha-
vet । tasmādiha hisidhātunānuvādaḥ puruṣārthahiṃsāyā iti tasyā eva niṣedho na
kratvarthāyāḥ । nanu tathāpi hisidhātoḥ kratvarthapuruṣārthahiṃsādvayasādhāraṇyena śabdaśa-
ktibalādupasthitaṃ hiṃsādvayamapyanūdya niṣiddha‍yatāmiti cennaitannyāyyam । ākhyātavācyatvena
vā tadvācyabhāvanākṣepyatvena vopasthitasya puruṣasya śeṣabhūtāyā hiṃsāyāśśīghropasthiti-
katayā tanniṣedhena caritārthasyāhiṃsāvākyasya kalpanīyavilaṃbopasthitikakratuśeṣahiṃsāni-
ṣedhakatvasyāpi kalpanāyogāt । nanu śabdaśaktisāmye'pi śīghropasthitikasyaiva śakyasya
vākyārthānvayo na vilaṃbitopasthitikasyeti vaiṣamyābhyupagame <quote>‘darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo
yajete’</quote> tyatra pūrṇamāsapadenotpattivākyaśrutapaurṇamāsīkālikatvayorāgneyāgnīṣomīyayāga-
yoreva jhaṭiti pravṛttinimittāvagatyā śīghropasthitikayoḥ phala1sambandhaḥ syāt । upāṃśu-
yājasya tu paurṇamāsīkartavyāgneyāgnīṣomīyayāgadvayāntarāle vidhānādarthasiddhapaurṇamāsī
kālasya jhaṭiti pravṛttinimittānavagatyā vilaṃbitopasthitikasya phalānvayo na syādi-
ti cetsatyam । āgneyāgnīṣomīyavadupāṃśuyājasyāpi śrutapaurṇamāsīkālatveṃna jhaṭiti
pravṛttinimittāvagatyā śīghropasthitikatvāviśeṣeṇa phalānvayasiddha‍yarthameva <quote>‘tāvabrūtāmagnī-
ṣomāvājyasyaiva nāvupāṃśu paurṇamāsyāṃ yaja’</quote> nnityāhatya paurṇamāsīkālavidhānamanyadā-
driyate । etadevāsya vidhānasya prayojanamupāṃśuyājādhikaraṇe <quote>‘prāyevacanācce’</quote> ti sūtreṇa
vārtikena ca spaṣṭīkṛtam । tatra hyadhikaraṇe viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyo'jāmitvāya prajāpatiru-
pāṃśu yaṣṭavyo'jāmitvāyāgnīṣomāvupāṃśu yaṣṭavyāvajāmitvāye’ ti trayāṇāṃ yāgānāṃ vi-
dhayaḥ । antarāḻavākyaṃ tu tatsamudāyānuvādaḥ vidvadvākyavaditi pūrvapakṣanirākaraṇārthaṃ guṇa-
sūtraṃ <quote>‘prāyevacanādi’</quote> ti । <quote>‘śiro vā etadyajñasya yadāgneyo hṛdayamupāṃśuyājaḥ pādāva-
gnīṣomīyā’</quote> vityupāṃśuyājasya pradhānaprāyapāṭhātprādhānyāvagateḥ viṣṇvādivākyaistrayāṇāṃ
yāgānāmupāṃśuyājaśabdaparāmṛṣṭānāṃ vidhāvupāṃśuyājamātraprādhānyāvagatibādhaprasaṃgāt
antarāvākyavidheya eka evopāṃśuyājaḥ tattadarthavādā viṣṇvādivākyānīti sūtrasyāsya
bhāṣye tātparyamuktam । kathaṃ yāgatrayavidhipakṣe tatprādhānyabādhaḥ syādityāśaṃkyopapāditaṃ
vārtike—‘viṣṇuprajāpatyagnīṣomadevatyayāgatrayavidhipakṣe <quote>‘tāvabrūtāmagnīṣomā’</quote> vityādi-
nāgnīṣomadaivatyasyaiva yāgasya paurṇamāsīvidhiriti syāt । tathā ca tasyaiva vidvadvākya-
phalavākyasthapaurṇamāsīpadagṛhītasya phalasaṃbaṃdhena prādhānyaṃ siddha‍yet । na tu tadagṛhītayoḥ
viṣṇuprajāpatidevatyayāgayorantarāvākyenaikasyaiva yāgasya vidhiḥ tatraiva śākhābhedenām‍nātairyā-
jyānuvākyāyugalaiḥ prāpitā viṣṇvādidevatā vikalpyanta’ iti । siddhāntapakṣe tu <quote>‘vi-
ṣṇuprajāpatidevatyasyāpyekatvenāgnīṣomopalakṣitatvānapāyāt upāṃśuyājasāmānyasya paurṇa-
māsīkālasambandhalābhena siddha‍yati prādhānya’</quote> miti । anena paurṇamāsīvidhinaiva labhyaḥ phalasaṃ-
baṃdho nāntarālavidhilabhya ityāśayaḥ spaṣṭa eva । anyathā viṣṇuprajāpatidevatyayo-
rāhatya paurṇamāsīvidhyabhāve'pi antarālakālatayārthaprāptapaurṇamāsīsaṃbaṃdhenaiva phalavi-
dhigṛhītayoḥ prādhānyaṃ siddha‍yediti tatprādhānyāvagatibādhaprasaṃgadūṣaṇamasamañjasaṃ syāt । na tva-
ntarāvākyaṃ yatrayāgasamudāyānuvādakamiti pūrvapakṣe antarāle yāgavidhāyakaṃ kiñci-
<note>(1) <quote>‘phalānvayāt’</quote> iti. kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="221"/>
dvākyaṃ nāstīti viṣṇuprajāpatidevatyayāgayoḥ phalasaṃbandhārthaṃ paurṇamāsīvidhireva śaraṇī-
karaṇīyaḥ । ato yāgabhede tasyāgnīṣomīyamātraviṣayatvena tayoḥ phalasaṃbandho na sidhyediti
tadda‍ūṣaṇasāmañjasyamiti cenna । antarāvākyamanuvāda iti pakṣe'pi jāmitādoṣanirākara-
ṇārthamantarāśruteranālaṃbanatvaparihārārthaṃ ca triṣva'pi yāgeṣvantarālaprāpteravaśyavaktavya-
tvāt । ata eva bhavadevena upāṃśuyājādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣe <quote>‘kathamantarālavākyasya sarvātmanā-
nuvādakatvamantarālasyaivāprāptasya vidheyatvā’</quote>dityāśaṃkya jāmitādoṣopakrameṇa viṣṇavādivā-
kyeṣu pratyekamajāmitvānuvādena ca teṣvantarālaprāptimuktvaiva bhavati cānuvādato'pi
sthānaniyamaḥ yathā <quote>‘na girā gireti brūyā’</quote> diti girāpadaniṣedhānuvādabalādirāpadasya
girāpadasthānaniveśitva’ miti sadṛṣṭāntamupapāditam । kecitu <quote>‘viṣṇavādivākyāni yāga-
vidhaya’</quote> iti pakṣe prādhānyabādhamanyathā samarthayante । viṣṇavādivākyeṣu tavyapratyayātprathamaṃ
guṇakarmatvadhīrbhavati karmāntarānupayogānusaṃdhānena tvarthakarmatāvagantavyā । ataśśīghrāva-
gatārthakarmaṇāmevādhikārānupraveśādupāṃśuyājasya tadanupraveśena prādhānyāvagatirvihanyeta ।
antarāvākyaṃ yāgavidhāyakamiti pakṣe tu tatra tavyapratyayābhāvena guṇakarmatvadhīkṛtavilaṃ-
bāprasakterāgneyādivadevādhikārānupraveśātprādhānyāvagatirna vihanyata iti teṣāmapi padārtha-
pratītiśaighryamāndyakṛtavākyārthānupraveśatadananupraveśanyāya evopajīvyaḥ iti prakṛtopayukte
tasminnyāye na vivādaḥ । api ca । yadarthatayā yatprasaktaṃ tasya niṣedho'pi tadarthaḥ iti
nyāyamaryādā । anyathāprasaktapratiṣedhatvānāṃjasyāt । ata eva darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇām‍nāto
<quote>‘nānṛtaṃ vade’</quote> diti niṣedhaḥ prakaraṇātkratvartho bhavan kratvarthasyaivānṛtavadanasya niṣedhaḥ ।
tena kratūpayogidravyādisaṃpādanārthānṛtavadane kratvarthaniṣedhātikramaṇāt kratorvaiguṇyaṃ kratu-
madhye'pi puruṣārthānṛtavadane na kratorvaiguṇyam । <quote>‘yo nāma kratumadhyasthaḥ kalaṃjādīni bhakṣa-
yet । na kratostasya vaiguṇyaṃ yathā coditasiddhita’</quote> iti nyāyāt । kiṃ tu puruṣasya pratya-
vāyamātram । kratuprakaraṇāmnāto'pi yo niṣedhaḥ kratvarthasya niṣedho bhavituṃ nārhati nāsau
kratvarthaḥ । yathā darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇāmnāto <quote>‘malavadvāsasā na saṃvadeta na sahāsīta nāsyā
annamadyā’</quote> diti niṣedhaḥ । yadyapi pat‍nyā saha saṃvādassahāsanañcetyubhayaṃ kratvarthatayā arthataḥ
prāpnoti tathā'pi malavadvāsasā tayā na prāpnoti । <quote>‘yasya vratyehanpat‍nyanālaṃbhukā syāttā-
mavarudhya yajete’</quote> ti malavadvāsasaḥ kratau sarvātmanā dāsīkaraṇarūpasyāvarodhasya vihita-
tvāt । tadannādanaṃ tu <quote>‘atho khalvāhurabhyaṃjanaṃ vāva striyā annamabhyaṃjanameva na pratigṛhya’</quote>
mityabhyaṃjanaśabdoktatatsaṃgatirūpatayā vyākhyātaṃ kratvarthatvena kathamapi na prāpnoti । evaṃ
sati <quote>‘na hiṃsyā’</quote> diti niṣedhaḥ kratvarthapuruṣārthobhayavidhahiṃsāniṣedharūpatve svayamapi kratvartha-
puruṣārthobhayarūpo bhavan svasya kratupuruṣasaṃbandhabodhanārthaṃ vākyaṃ bhindyāt । evaṃ <quote>‘laukike
puruṣārthatvaṃ vaidike kratuśeṣate’</quote> ti kratupuruṣobhayasambandhabodhane vākyabhedaḥ syāditi tatpa-
rihārārthamevāśvapratigraheṣṭisomavamaneṣṭyādivākyeṣu <quote>‘yo'śvaṃ pratigṛhṇāti’</quote> <quote>‘yassomaṃ vamatī’</quote>
ti nimittasamarpakaśabdānāṃ laukikavaidikasādhāraṇyenāśvapratigrahasomavamanādisāmānyaparatvaṃ
tyaktam । evaṃ hiṃsāniṣedharītyaiva surādiniṣedhānāmapi puruṣārthaniṣedharūpatvena kratvartha-
surāgrahaṇādyasparśitvaṃ vyākhyātam । itthamahiṃsādivākyānāṃ vaidhahiṃsādyasparśitvaṃ mīmāṃ-
sānyāyapariśīlanaśālināmatispaṣṭamiti tadapradarśya vaidhahiṃsāmātre neyaṃ hiṃseti bhāṣya-
<pb n="222"/>
upapattyantaramāha—
<sutra>।। sū ।। retassigyogo'tha ।। 26 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘yo yo hyannamatti yo retaḥ siñcati tadbha‍ūya eva bhavati’</quote> ityanena retassicā
yogamātramasyānantaramucyate । ataḥ pūrvamapi vrīhyādiṣu yogamātrameva ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। yoneḥ śarīram ।। 27 ।।</sutra>
yadā yoniprāptistasya tadaiva śarīramutpadyate । ataḥ pūrvaṃ tu saṃśleṣamātra-
miti bhāvaḥ ।।
ityanyādhiṣṭhitādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
iti śrīkaṇṭhaśivācāryaviracite brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya
prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kṛtā kācidabhyuccayayuktiḥ pradarśitā—śrūyate hītyādinā । abhyuccayayuktitvaṃ ca <quote>‘paśu-
hiṃsāyā ahiṃsātva’</quote>mityanena sūcitam । tatra hi hiṃsāyā iti hiṃsātvamabhyupagamyaivā-
hiṃsātvamaupacārikamupanyastam । tasmādyāgādikarmaṇāṃ pāpamiśritatvābhāvena tatphalaṃ vrīhyā-
dijanmeti sthitam । kathaṃ tarhi jāyanta ityuktirityākāṃkṣāyāṃ tadupapattipradarśanaparaṃ sūtramava-
tārayati—<pratika>upapattyantaramiti । sū ।। retassigyogo'tha ।। 26 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘tadbha‍ūya eva bhavatī’</quote> ti
retassigbhāva āmnāyate । na ca pūrvasiddhapitṛbhāvaḥ putrasya saṃbhavati । atastatrāvaśyaṃ
tadyoga eva tadbhāva upacarita ityupapādanīyam । evamatrāpi jāyamānavrīhyādisaṃśleṣa-
evānuśayināṃ jananamityupacarita iti bhāvaḥ <pratika>। sū॰ ।। yoneśśarīram ।। 27 ।।</pratika> yoneḥ
prāptyanantarameva śarīramutpadyate । tadanaṃtarameva sukhaduḥkhādibhogasatvāt śrutau brāhmaṇā-
diśarīrapratipādanācca । ato yoniprāpteḥ prāgākāśādipitṛvīryānteṣu saṃśleṣamātramiti bhāvaḥ ।</p>
<p>iti śrīśivātivādimūrdhanyaśivadarśanasthāpanadhuraṃdharasakaladevabhūdevapratiṣṭhāpaka-
<pratika>śrīmaccinnabommabhūpālahṛdayakamalaku</pratika>haraviharamāṇa<pratika>śrīsāṃbaśivapre-
ritasya śrīmadbharadvājakulajaladhikau</pratika>stubhaviśvajidyājiśrīraṃ-
<pratika>garājādhvarivarasūnorappayyadīkṣitasya</pratika> kṛtau <pratika>śrīka-
ṇṭhācāryaviracitabrahmamīmāṃsābhāṣya-</pratika>
vyākhyāyāṃ śivārkamaṇidīpikākhyāyāṃ
tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।। 3 ।।</p>

<head>atha anyādhiṣṭhitādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। anyādhiṣṭhite pūrvavadabhilāpāt ।। 24 ।। aśuddhamiti cenna śabdāt ।। 25 ।। retassigyo-
go'tha ।। 26 ।। yoneśśarīram ।। 27 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>jāyata iti śruteḥ syādvīhiyavādyātmanāsya janmaiva । karma hi hiṃsāyuktaṃ sthāvaratāpyasya phalamucitam ।। 178 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>vyomādāviva retassici va ca saṃśleṣamātramatrāpi । paśuhitatayā śrutasya hi tatsaṃjñapanasya nāsti hiṃsātvam ।। 179 ।।</l></lg>
<head>ityanyādhiṣṭhitādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>iti śrīmadappayyadīkṣitakṛtau caturmatasārasaṃgrahe nayamaṇimālikākhye
tṛtīyaparicchede tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।। 1 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="223"/>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyāmatha anyādhiṣṭhitādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। anyādhiṣṭhite pūrvavadabhilāpāt ।। 24 ।। aśuddhamiti cenna śabdāt ।। 25 ।। retassigyogo'tha
।। 26 ।। yoneśśarīram ।। 27 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, tasminnevāvarohe <quote>‘ta iha vrīhiyavā oṣadhivanaspatayastilamāṣā iti jāyante’</quote> iti śrūyate । tatra
kiṃ vrīhyādibhāvena jīvānāṃ janiśrutirmukhyā uta jīvāntareṇādhiṣṭhite vrīhyādau saṃsargamātramiti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ ।</pratika> mukhyeti <pratika>pūrva-
pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, anyādhiṣṭhite</pratika> anyairjīvairadhiṣṭhite vrīhyādau saṃsargamātramanuśayināṃ bhavati । kutaḥ । <pratika>pūrva-
vadabhilāpāt</pratika>= yathākāśādivarṣānteṣu karmaparāmarśamantareṇaiva praveśa uktaḥ evaṃ vrīhyādiṣvapi karmaparāmarśaṃ vinaiva
praveśābhilāpāt । tasmājjaniśrutissaṃsargamātrābhiprāyā na mukhyeti siddham ।। iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। aśuddhamiti cenna śabdāt ।। 25 ।। aśuddhamiti cet</pratika>= nanu jyotiṣṭhomādikaṃ karma paśuhiṃsādiyogādaśuddham ।
tatkāriṇāmanuśayināṃ vrīhyādisthāvareṣu duḥkhānubhavārthaṃ mukhyameva janmāstviti cet na । <pratika>śabdāt</pratika>=vidhiśāstrādagniṣṭo-
māderdharmatvenāvagatatvānna duḥkhahetutvamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। retassigyogo'tha ।। 26 ।। atha</pratika>=vrīhyādibhāvānantaram । anuśayināṃ <pratika>retassigyogaḥ</pratika>=retassiñcatī-
ti retaṃssik tadyogaḥ tadbhāvaḥ । <quote>‘yo retassiñcati tadbha‍ūya eva bhavati’</quote> iti śrutāvāmnāyate । retassigbhāvo mukhyo na
saṃbhavati । atastadbhāvaḥ tatsaṃsargo vācyaḥ । tathā vrīhyādāvapi saṃsarga eva ।।</p>
<p>nanu anuśayināṃ sarvatra saṃsargasyaivāṅgīkāre mukhyaṃ janma kvāpi na syādityāha---<pratika>sū ।। yoneśśarīram ।। 27 ।।</pratika> yonau
retasi niṣikte tatastukhaduḥkhopabhogayogyaṃ śarīraṃ karmopārjitamanuśayināṃ jāyata iti <quote>‘ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ’</quote> ityādi śāstramāha ।
tasmādbrāhmaṇādiyonāvevānuśayināṃ mukhyaṃ janma na vrīhyādāviti gatyāgativivekakṛtaṃ vairāgyaṃ jñānasādhanamiti siddham ।।
atra <pratika>pāde</pratika> asminmate <pratika>ṣaḍa</pratika>dhikaraṇāni । sūtrāṇi <pratika>saptaviṃśatiḥ ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, ca atrāpyadhikaraṇe nāsti vailakṣaṇyaṃ pūrvasmāt । atra pāde anayormatayo-
ssūtrasaṃkhyādhikaraṇasaṃkhyādiṣvapi nāsti vailakṣaṇyaṃ pūrvasmādityavadheyam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, atrādhikaraṇe karmiṇāṃ vrīhyādibhāvanimittakaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavati vā na veti <pratika>saṃdehe</pratika> duḥkhaṃ bhavatyeveti
<pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, anyādhiṣṭhite vrīhyādiśarīre praveśamātramabhipretam । na tu bhogaḥ । ato na tatkṛtaṃ
duḥkhamiti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu</pratika>, karmiṇaḥ <pratika>anyādhiṣṭhite</pratika>=anyajīvābhimanyamānavrīhyādiśarīre praveśa eva । na tu tadabhi-
mānitvam । yena duḥkhaṃ syāt । tarhi vrīhiyavā ityabhedoktiḥ kathamityata uktam— । yathā <pratika>pūrvavaditi</pratika> <quote>‘dhūmo bhūtve’</quote> tyādau
dhūmādibhāvoktistathā । kuta etata । <pratika>abhilāpāt</pratika>=<quote>‘so'vāggata’</quote> iti śrutau tathābhidhānādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। aśuddhamiti cenna śabdāt ।। 27 ।।</pratika> hiṃsārūpatvādyajñasya karmāśuddhaṃ duḥkhasādhanamiti <pratika>cenna ।</pratika> kutaḥ । <pratika>śabdāt</pratika>=
śrutivākyavihitatvādityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>।। ityanyādhikaraṇam ।। 18 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha reto'dhikaraṇam ।। 19 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। retassigyogo'tha ।।28 ।।</pratika> atra <quote>‘svargādavāggataścāpi māturevodaraṃ vraje’</quote> diti śravaṇāt svargādavatīrṇasya jīvasya
sākṣānmātṛpraveśa eva yuktaḥ । <quote>‘ya eva gṛhī bhavatī’</quote> tyādinā śrutaḥ pitṛpraveśaḥ prayojanābhāvānnādartavya iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।</pratika>
<quote>‘retassicabhevānupraviśatyatha mātara’</quote> miti kauṇḍaravyaśruteḥ astyeva pitṛpraveśaḥ । pitṛvīryasyāpyapekṣitatvena māturevo-
daramityevakārasyāyogavyavacchedakatvāt pitaraṃ praviśya śarīrotpādakavīryeṇa saha mātṛpraveśasyeś‍varakalpitatvācca । iti
<pratika>siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu</pratika>, karmiṇaḥ prathamaṃ retassicā pitrā yogaḥ saṃbandhaḥ । tatpraveśa iti yāvat । <pratika>atha</pratika>=anantaraṃ
mātṛpraveśaḥ na tu prathamamevetyarthaḥ ।। <pratika>।। iti reto'dhikaraṇam ।। 19 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha yonyadhikaraṇam ।। 20 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। yoneśśarīram ।। 29 ।।</pratika> atrādhikaraṇe karmī retoraktasaṃyogātpaścāddehākāreṇa pariṇāmānantarameva mātṛgarbhasthaṃ
dehamannādidvāreṇa praviśatīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, pitṛśarīrānmātṛśarīramanupraviśya tata eva śarīramāpnotīti ।।
<pratika>sūtrārthastu, yoneḥ</pratika> lyablope pañcamī । karmī pitṛdvārā mātṛyoniṃ praviśya । atha tatra <pratika>śarīraṃ</pratika> labhate na tu tadvine-
tyarthaḥ ।। <pratika>।। iti yonyadhikaraṇam ।। 20 ।।</pratika></p>
<p>atra mate <quote>‘kṛtātyaya’</quote> iti sūtre <quote>‘yathetamanevaṃ ce’</quote> ti yogavibhāgataḥ <quote>‘tatsvābhāvyāpattirupapatte’</quote> riti sūtrataḥ pūrvaṃ
<quote>‘smaraṇācce’</quote> tyadhikasūtrapāṭhāccātra pāde <pratika>ekonatriṃśa</pratika>tsūtrāṇyadhikaraṇāni tu <pratika>viṃśati</pratika>riti vidyam ।।</p>
<lg><l>yaṃ prāsūta viśuddhaśīlamanaghaṃ vṛddhāṃbikākhyā satī
yaṃ mṛtyuñjayaśarmaṇo budhamaṇerbhāgyaṃ vidussādhavaḥ ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>vādhūlānvayajanmano'sya sudhiyo hālāsyanāthāhvaya-
syeyaṃ satkṛtiredhatāmiha caturbhāṣyānugā candrikā ।।</l></lg>
<p><pratika>sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ tārtīyīke'</pratika>tra sādhanādhyāye । <pratika>vairāgyapāda</pratika>nāmnā prathitassaṃpūrṇa <pratika>ādimaḥ</pratika> pādaḥ ।।</p>
<p>iti <pratika>hālāsyanāthakṛtau sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="224"/>
<head>।। śrīḥ ।।</head>
<head>śivābhyāṃ namaḥ ।</head>
<head>śrīkaṇṭhācāryakṛtau</head>
<head>brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye</head>
<head>atha tṛtīyasyādhyayasya</head>
<head>dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha sandhyādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<sutra>।। sū ।। saṃdhye sṛṣṭirāha hi ।। 1 ।।</sutra>
<p>pūrvatra jīvasya gatyāgatinirūpaṇaṃ kṛtam । iha tadavasthā vicāryate । sandhye</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>śivārkamaṇidīpikāyām</head>
<head>atha tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha saṃdhyādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū—saṃdhye sṛṣṭirāha hi ।। 1 ।।</pratika> pādayossaṃgatimāha—<pratika>pūrvatreti</pratika> । pūrvasminpāde'dhikā-
riṇāṃ vairāgyadṛḍhīkaraṇāya jīvasya gatyāgatinirūpaṇaṃ kṛtam । tathā hi—prathame tāvadadhi-
karaṇe saṃsāraduḥkhāyatanasya bhūtendriyasaṃghātarūpasya sūkṣmadehasya viraktādhikārikaśravaṇama-
nanopāsanāsādhyabrahmasākṣātkārarūpatannivṛttisādhanalābhaparyantamiha paratra ca gatāgatayo-
rapyanuvṛttirastīti nirūpitam । tatraiva <quote>‘bhāktaṃ vānātmavitvā’</quote> diti <ref>(bra॰ 3—1—7.)</ref>
sūtreṇa devabhṛtyabhāvamavalaṃbya tatprayuktakleśakaraṃbitasya svargabhogānubhavasya prahīṇatvaṃ sāti-
śayatvaṃ cāviṣkṛtam । dvitīye sūkṣmadehasyāpi kāraṇatayā sakalasaṃsārakleśanidānasya
karmabandhasya tāvatparyaṃtamanuvṛttirnirūpitā । tatraiva svargabhogasya kṣayiṣṇutvadoṣo'pi <quote>‘kṛtā-
tyaya’</quote> iti sūtrabhāgena darśitaḥ । evamanekadoṣaduṣṭasyāpi svargabhogasya janakaṃ yāgādika-
mapi pratijanma yāvajjīvakartavyasnānasaṃdhyāvaṃdanādivihitānuṣṭhānaniṣiddhaparihārarūpabahuvi-
dhakleśasādhyasmārtācārasāpekṣatvādatiduṣkaramiti <quote>‘caraṇāditi ce’</quote>dityādisūtraiḥ prakaṭitam ।
aniṣṭādikāriṇāṃ tu <quote>‘grāmaṃ gacchanvṛkṣamūlamupasarpatī’</quote> tinyāyenāpi svargaprāptirnāsti ।
yamasadane rauravādiṣu ca bhūyānyātanānubhavaḥ kīṭādijanmaprāptiśceti tṛtīye varṇitam ।
caturthe tu svargādavarohatāmākāśādibhāvaśravaṇāttadabhimānidevatānāmivākāśādiśarīraka
tvaprayuktaḥ kiyāndivya bhogānubhavo'stīti śaṅkāvāraṇāyākāśādiṣu saṃśleṣamātramiti varṇi-
tam । pañcame teṣu ciramaciraṃ vāvasthānamityaniyamanirāsavyājena vrīhyādiṣu sukhabhogarahi-
tamacirāvasthānaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtam । ṣaṣṭhe teṣvavasthānaṃ sukhaleśarahitaṃ tadabhimānijīvātmanā cetta-
llavanaparyantameva bhavedityanatiheyatvaśaṅkānirāsāya teṣu saṃśleṣamātramiti pradarśya sa saṃśleṣa-
steṣāṃ śoṣaṇakusūlāvasthāpanāvahananaphalīkaraṇapākabhakṣaṇādidaśāsvanuvartamānaḥ pitṛvīryā-
tmanā pariṇāmaparyantaḥ । puruṣabhakṣaṇaviṣayatvamanāpanneṣu vrīhyādiṣu saṃśliṣṭānāmanuśayināṃ-
teṣu saṃśleṣaḥ tattadvrīhyādipariṇāmāntaraparaṃparākrameṇa yathākathañcitpuruṣabhakṣaṇaviṣayatvaprāptyanaṃ-
taraṃ teṣāṃ tadvīryātmanā pariṇāmaparyanta iti retassik‌sūtreṇa saṃsūcya puruṣavīryānupraveśe'pi
yoṣitamaprāpya teṣāṃ na śarīralābhaḥ। tadyadi vīryamaparigrahāṇāṃ vandhyādiṣu pravṛttānāṃ vā
syāt tadā tadvīryapariṇāmāntarakrameṇa punarapi puruṣabhakṣaṇaviṣayatvaṃ prāpya tadvīryasaṃsakta-
<pb n="225"/>
svapne <quote>‘na tatra rathā na rathayogā na panthāno bhavanti atha rathānrathayogānpathaḥ
sṛjate’</quote> ityādinā sṛṣṭirabhidhīyate । saiṣā jīvakṛtā parameśvarakṛtā veti saṃśayaḥ ।।
evaṃ sati jīvakṛtetyavagamyate । <quote>‘atha veśāntāḥ puṣkariṇyaḥ sravantyaḥ sṛjate
sa hi kartā’</quote> iti svapnadṛśaṃ jīvameva kartāramāha hi śrutiḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tayā ṛtumatīnāṃ yoṣitāṃ garbhagolakapraveśānaṃtarameva kvacijjanmani bhogāśrayasya bhogamo-
kṣasādhanopayoginaśca śarīrasya lābha iti <quote>‘yoneśśarīra’</quote> miti <ref>(bra॰ 3—1—27)</ref>
sūtreṇa saṃsūcitam । evaṃ vairāgyadṛḍhīkaraṇāya gatāgatanirūpaṇena jīvasya jāgarāvasthāvicāro
niṣpannaḥ । iha pāde tadavasthāntaravicāraḥ kriyata ityarthaḥ । yadyapi sāṃsārikaviṣayavairā-
gyadṛḍhīkaraṇānaṃtaraṃ tadvilakṣaṇabrahmaprepsādṛḍhīkaraṇāya brahmaṇo mahimātra pāde varṇyate । tathāpi
jīvāvasthāviśeṣāśrayaṇopakramamiha tanmahimanirūpaṇaṃ svapnādyavasthāsvapi prajāpatividyoktado-
ṣāviṣkaraṇena tato'pi vairāgyasyātidṛḍhīkaraṇamānuṣaṃgikaṃ prayojanāntaraṃ laṃbhayitumiti pūrva-
pādasaṃgatipradarśanārthamevamuktiḥ । sūtragataṃ saṃdhyaśabdaṃ viṣayavākyagatatatraśabdaṃ ca vivṛṇvanneva
viṣayavākyamudāhṛtya saṃśayaṃ darśayati—<pratika>saṃdhye svapna iti ।।</pratika> jāgarasuṣuptyoḥ sandhau bhavanaṃ
sandhyaśabdapravṛttinimittam । tena jāgarāvasthāvicārānaṃtaraṃ prathamaṃ svapnāvasthāvicāre'pi
saṃgatirlabdhā <quote>‘sa hi kartte’</quote>tyasya prakṛtajīvaparāmarśakatvasaṃbhavāsaṃbhavābhyāṃ saṃśayaḥ । puṣka-
riṇyaḥ sravantya iti dvitīyārthe prathamā । <pratika>svapnadṛśaṃ jīvameveti</pratika> । atrāyamāśayaḥ । sandhyaṃ
tṛtīyaṃ svapnasthānaṃ tasminsaṃdhye sthāne tiṣṭhanniti jīvaṃ prakṛtya <quote>‘ubhayānpāpmana ānaṃdāṃśca
paśyatī’</quote>ti sa svapnadraṣṭṛtvena nirūpitaḥ । sa eva <quote>‘sa hi karttetya’</quote>tra tacchabdena parāmṛśyate ।
sa prakṛto jīvo yasmātkartā bhavitumarhati prajāpativākyoditasatyasaṃkalpādimattvāt
atassa sṛjatīti yuktamiti vākyārthaḥ । anyathā <quote>‘sṛjata’</quote> ityasya <quote>‘karte’</quote> tyasya caikārththe
hetuhetumadbhāvānupapatteḥ । na ca satyasaṃkalpatvādisadbhāve jāgare'pi tasya rathādisraṣṭṛtvaṃ
syāditi vācyam । jāgaradaśāyāṃ tirobhūtasya tasya muktāviva svapne'pyāvirbhāvasaṃbhavāt ।
na caitadayuktam । pūrvaṃ paścāccāsatāṃ rathānāṃ rathānyuṃjānānāmaśvānāṃ rathagamanocitānāṃ rāja-
pathānāṃ ca svapnakālamātre bhavanavatsatyasaṃkalpatvasyāpi tatkā1lavṛttitvopapatteḥ । evaṃ jīvasya
svapnasraṣṭṛtvopapādanāya svapnakālamātre satyasaṃkalpatvādyāvirbhāvaṃ <quote>‘sa hi kartte’</quote> tyanena viva-
kṣitaṃ dṛṣṭāntamukhena yuktatāṃ netumeva <quote>‘na tatra rathā’</quote>ityādikamuktam । tena hi rathādyabhāvo
na svapne pratipādyate । <quote>‘sṛjata’</quote> iti svoktivirodhāt । na hi yasminkāle yasya sṛṣṭiḥ
prati pāda yiṣitā tasminneva kāle tadabhāvo'pi pratipādayituṃ śakyate । ataḥ pūrvaṃ paścācca
tadabhāvasyāyamupanyāsa iti vaktavyam । svapnarathādidarśanadeśe pūrvāparakālayostadabhāvaśra
lokānubhavasiddhatvānna śāstreṇa pratipādanīyaḥ । atastadvaiyarthyaparihārāya pūrvāparakālayora-
satāṃ rathādīnāṃ svapnakālamātre bhavanavatsvapnadṛśastatsṛṣṭāvupayuktasya satyasaṃkalpatvasya tatkā-
lamātra evāvirbhavanamapi yuktamiti dṛṣṭāntapradarśanārthatvameva tasya vaktavyam । api ca । prākṛ-
tadehayogādirjīvasya satyasaṃkalpatvādestirodhāyakaḥ na tu parameśvaraḥ । muktāvapi tattiro-
dhānaprasaṃgāt । na ca svapnadaśāyāṃ tadyogo'sti । tasminmṛtakalpe śayāne svapnavyavahārāttasya
<note>(1) <quote>‘tatkālamātra evāvirbhavanopapateḥ’</quote> iti kha pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="226"/>
<sutra>।। sū ।। nirmātāraṃ caike putrādayaśca ।। 2 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘ya eṣa supteṣu jāgarti kāmaṃkāmaṃ puruṣo nirmimāṇaḥ’</quote> iti jīvameva svapne
kāmānāṃ nirmātārameke śākhino'dhīyate । tatra kāmaśabdanirdiṣṭāḥ kāmyamānāḥ
putrādayaḥ, pūrvatra <quote>‘sarvān kāmān chandanaḥ prārthayasva’</quote> ityuktvā <quote>‘śatāyuṣaḥ putra-
pautrān vṛṇīṣva’</quote> iti vivṛtatvāt । tataśca jīvakṛtaiva svapnasṛṣṭiḥ ।।
iti prāpte'bhidhīyate—
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vyavahārānupayogitvamabhāvaścetyubhayaṃ samānam । ata eva sūtrakāro vakṣyati <quote>‘tanvabhāve
saṃdhyavadupapatte’</quote> riti <ref>(bra॰ 4—4—13)</ref> na caivaṃ sati prabuddhasya rathādīnadrākṣamiti parāma-
rśavadrathādīnasrākṣamityapi parāmarśaḥ syāditi vācyam । svapne'pi cirātītapitṛpitāma-
hādīnpaśyatāṃ prāk‌tadatītatvaniścayavatāmapi tadānīṃ tadatītatvānanusaṃdhānavat spapne sva-
gatasvāpnarathādisraṣṭṛtvaniścayavatāmapi pravodhānaṃtaraṃ tadananusaṃdhānopapatteḥ । iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ ।
pitrādyatītatvānubhavaja1nmadṛḍhasaṃskārānuvṛttau prabodhānaṃtarānusaṃdhānopayoginyāṃ satyāmeva
svapnakāle tadanudbodhenāvasthāviśeṣamahimaprayuktena tadananusaṃdhānamupapādanīyam । svapnadaśāyāṃ
jātasya svakīyasvapnārthasraṣṭṛtvānubhavasya śaiśavāvasthotpannānubhavabṛṃdasyeva saṃskārānādhāyaka-
tayaitadanusaṃdhānamupapādayituṃ śakyam । na ca tathā sati śaiśavakṛtasyeva svāpnasyāpi vyava-
hārasya kārts‍nyenānanusaṃdhānaṃ syāditi vācyam । pūrvajanmavyavahārāntarānanusandhāne'pi
gomarkaṭamārjārādijanmasu tattajjātyucitaprācīnatattajjanmābhyastavyavahārānusaṃdhāna-
vadvyavasthopapatteḥ । na ca jīvasya svāpnārthasraṣṭṛtve śubhasūcakāneva sṛṣṭvā sa paśyet na
tvaśubhasūcakāniti vācyam । tadānīṃ svapnatvasyāśubhasūcakatvasya cānanusaṃdhānena tatsṛṣṭyu-
papatteḥ । svapne svayaṃ kriyamāṇatailapānatailakaṭāhāvagāhanabisavakṣaṇamadhvaśanaikapuṇḍarīkadhāra-
ṇakṛṣṇadhenukālanādiṣvevameva siddhānte'pyupapādanīyatvāt । tasmādyathāśruti jīva eva
svāpnapadārthānāṃ sraṣṭā । śrutanirvāhārthamaśrutasatyasaṃkalpāvirbhāvakalpanopapatteḥ ।। nanu <quote>‘ya eṣa
supteṣvi’</quote>ti kaṭhavallīmantre parameśvarasteṣāṃ sraṣṭā pratipādyate । tasyaiva hi tatra prakaraṇa<quote>‘manyatra
dharmā’</quote>diti । atastadaikārthyāt <quote>‘sa hi kartte’</quote>tyetadapi tadviṣayaṃ syāt । tasya prakṛtatvābhā-
ve'pi <quote>‘tadete ślokā bhavantī’</quote>ti prakrānte tadanantaraśloke svapnena śārīramabhiprahatyāsupta-
ssuptānabhicākaśītī’ti varṇayiṣyamāṇatvāt । tatra hi śārīrasya jīvasya svapnāvasthāpra-
dānenābhiprahantā parameśvara eveti śaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>sū ।। nirmātāraṃ caike putrā-
dayaśca ।। 2 ।।</pratika> cakāro'vadhāraṇārtha ityabhipretya vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>jīvameveti</pratika> । nanu kāmaśabda i-
cchārthaḥ parameśvare'pi saṅgacchate ityāśaṅkānirākaraṇāya <quote>‘putrādayaśce’</quote>ti sūtraśepaṃ vyācaṣṭe-
<pratika>tatreti ।</pratika> dvitīyacakāro'pyavadhāraṇārthaḥ icchārthatvavyavacchedārthaḥ । atra prakaraṇe kāmaśa-
bdasya putrādiṣu prayuktatvādihāpi mantre tasya tādarthyamavasīyate । ataḥ putrādisaṃbaṃdhaliṅgaṃ
parameśvaraprakaraṇādbalavat । nacātyaṃtaṃ jīvasyāprastutatvam । <quote>‘hanta tadidaṃ pravakṣyāmi guhyaṃ
brahma sanātanam । yathā ca maraṇaṃ prāpya ātmā bhavati gautama । yonimanye prapadyante śarī-
ratvāya dehinaḥ । sthāṇumanye'nusaṃyaṃti yathākarma yathāśruta’</quote> mityavyavahitamantraprastutatvā-
<note>(1) <quote>‘janyasaṃskārānuṣṭattau’</quote> iti kha---pāṭhaḥ ।</note>

<sutra>।। sū ।। māyāmātraṃ tu kārtsnyenānabhivyaktasvarūpatvāt ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
svapne yadrathādi sṛṣṭamarthajātaṃ tadidaṃ māyāmātramīśvarakṛtaṃ, na jīvakṛtam । svapna-
dṛśaikenānubhāvyaṃ tatkālamātrāvasāyīti āścaryarūpatayā māyāmātramityuktam ।
jīvasya satyasaṃkalpatvādikaṃ tirohitamiti tasya rathādisṛṣṭisāmarthyaṃ na saṃbha-
vati । ataḥ <quote>‘puruṣo nirmimāṇaḥ’</quote> iti na jīvaviṣayam । kiṃ tu,
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
diti bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। māyāmātraṃ tu kārtsnyenānabhivyaktasvarūpatvāt ।। 3 ।।</pratika> māyā-
mātramityanena vivakṣitaṃ sādhyaṃ darśayati—<pratika>īśvarakṛtamiti</pratika> । tuśabdārthamāha—<pratika>na jīvakṛta-
miti ।</pratika> īśvarakṛtatve sādhye paryavasānamupapādayituṃ māyāmātramityasya sākṣādarthamāha-
<pratika>āścaryarūpeti ।</pratika> māyā indrajālādikaṃ tatsādṛśyādiha māyāśabdaḥ । āścaryarūpatvaṃ tatsā-
dṛśyam । mātraśabdo'vadhāraṇārthaḥ । tathā ca svāpnamarthajātaṃ sarvamāścaryarūpameva । na tatrānā-
ścaryarūpaṃ kimapyastīti bhāvaḥ । āścaryarūpatvamupapādayati—<pratika>svapnadṛśeti ।</pratika> svapnadṛk yasmi-
ndeśe rathaṃ yadā paśyati tadānīṃ tatra sthito'nyastanna paśyatīti svapnadṛgapi prabodhānantaraṃ
tatra gatastanna paśyati na vā tasyānyatra nayanacihnāni nemipadāni tatraiva nāśacihnāni
tadavayavaviśaraṇādīni vā paśyati । kevalamaiṃdrajālikena yo mohitassa eva yathā samudrā-
dikaṃ paśyati so'pi mohāpāye tanna paśyati na vānyatra jalanissaraṇacihnaṃ tatraiva śoṣa-
cihnaṃ vārdratādikaṃ paśyati । tataśca yathaivamāścaryabhūtasamudrādidraṣṭuranyastathābhūtasamudrādisaṃ-
pādayitaiṃdrajālikastathaivāścaryasvāpnapadārthadraṣṭustathābhūtasya tasya sraṣṭānyaḥ svīkaraṇīyaḥ । sa
ca parameśvarādanyo na saṃbhavatītyevaṃ māyāmātraśabdasya parameśvarakartṛkatve sādhye paryavasāna-
mityarthaḥ । nanu yathaiṃdrajāliko mantrauṣadhādibalāttathābhūtamarthajātaṃ sṛjati darśayati vā evaṃ
svapnadṛgeva prajāpativākyapratipannasatyasaṅkalpatvabalātsvāpnapadārthajātaṃ sṛjatvityāśaṅkāni-
rākaraṇāya pravṛtta <quote>‘manabhivyaktasvarūpatvā’</quote>diti sautraṃ hetuṃ vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>jīvasyeti</pratika> । <quote>‘uttarā-
ccedāvirbhūtasvarūpastvi’</quote>tyatra tattirodhānaṃ samarthitamiti bhāvaḥ । nanu svapnadaśāmātre satyasa-
ṅkalpatvābhivyaktirbhavatviti śaṅkānirākaraṇāya <quote>‘kārts‍nyene’</quote>ti viśeṣaṇam । saṃsārakālatvā-
vacchedenaiva tattirohitam । tirodhāyakasattvāviśeṣāditi bhāvaḥ । nanu <quote>‘sa hi karte’</quote>ti
śravaṇāttannirvāhāya svapnāvasthāmātre satyasaṅkalpatvābhivyaktiḥ kalpyetyāśaṃkya tasyāḥ parame-
śvaraviṣayatvamupapādayitumāha—<pratika>ata iti ।</pratika> <quote>‘ya eṣa supteṣu jāgarti kāmaṃ kāmaṃ puruṣo nirmimāṇa’</quote>-
ityetadanaṃtaraṃ <quote>‘tadeva śukraṃ tadbrahma tadevāmṛtamucyate । tasmim̐llokāḥ śritāssarve tadu nātyeti
kaścane’</quote>ti śrūyate । atra yacchabdapratinirdeśakasya tacchabdasya brahmaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇya-
rūpādvākyapramāṇāt yacchabdapratinirdiṣṭe sarvalokāśrayatvasarvottaratvarūpaliṅgadarśanācca kaṭha-
vallyuktasvapnasraṣṭā parameśvara ityavasīyate । udāhṛtaliṃgavākyāpekṣayā kāmaśabdasya putrādi-
paratvaṃ kalpayitvā kliṣṭagatyā samarthanīyasya putrādisaṃbaṃdhaliṃgasya durbalatvāt । ataḥ <quote>‘kāmaṃ-
kāmami’</quote>ti śabdo ṇamulantatayā saṃkalpyasaṃkalpyetyevamarthatayā yojanīyaḥ । tataśca <quote>‘sa hi karte’</quote>
tyetadapi parameśvaraviṣayam । tadaikārthyāt <quote>‘svapne na śārīra’</quote>mityanaṃtaramantre tatsaṅkīrtanācca ।
tasyāpi mantrasya<quote>‘asuptassuptānabhicākaśītī’</quote>tyudāhṛtakaṭhavallīmantraikārthyāditi bhāvaḥ । evañca
yadyapi parameśvarasya svāpnarathādisraṣṭṛtvapratipādane tadupapādakahetvapekṣā nāsti, tasya sarva-
<pb n="228"/>
<quote>‘tadeva śukraṃ tadbrahma tadevāmṛtamucyate ।
tasmim̐llokāḥ śritāḥ sarve tadu nātyeti kaścana ।।’</quote>
iti vākyaśeṣādīśvaraviṣayam । tadaikārthyāt <quote>‘sa hi kartā’</quote> ityapi tadviṣa-
yameva । ataḥ parameśvarakṛtā svapnasṛṣṭiriti ।।
jīvasvarūpānabhivyaktihetumāha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। parābhidhyānāttu tirohitaṃ tato hyasya bandhaviparyayau ।। 4 ।।</sutra>
jīvasyānādyapacārapravāheṇa parābhidhyānāt parameśvarasaṃkalpāt tasya satyasaṃ-
kalpatvādikaṃ tirohitam । tadapacāratadanuvṛttikṛtāt tasmādeva parameśvarasaṃka-
lpādasya bandhamokṣau bhavataḥ । tathāhi śrutiḥ---<quote>‘yadā hyevaiṣa etasminnudaramantaraṃ
kurute । atha tasya bhayaṃ bhavati । yadā hyevaiṣa etasminnadṛśye'nātmye'nirūkte'ni-
layane'bhayaṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ vindate । atha so'bhayaṃ gato bhavati’</quote> iti ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śaktimatvena sarvasraṣṭṛtvena ca prasiddhatvāt । tathāpi tasyaiva prasiddhasya hetorayamanuvādarūpo
hetuvannigadārthavādaḥ । yataḥ svapnakālamātre bhavantaḥ svāpnarathādayo'tyāścaryabhūtāḥ । āścaryā-
ṇāñca kartā parameśvaraḥ prasiddhaḥ । ataḥ sa tānmṛjatītyetaducitamiti । syādetat । <quote>‘sa
hi karte’</quote>tyetadanaṃtaraśloko na parameśvaraviṣayaḥ । <quote>‘prāṇena rakṣannavaraṃ kulāyaṃ bahiṣkulāyāda-
varaścaritvā । sa īyate amṛto yatra kāmaṃ hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣa ekahaṃsaḥ’</quote> iti tadanantaraślo-
kasya <quote>‘sa’</quote> iti tena ślokenāktaṃ parāmṛśato jīvaviṣayatvāt । tasyāpi ślokasya <quote>‘śukra-
mādāya punareti sthānaṃ hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣa ekahaṃsaḥ’</quote> ityuttarārdhe śukraṃ prakāśakaṃ cakṣurādīndri-
yajātaṃ gṛhītvā punarjāgarasthānaprāptirūpasya jīvaliṃgasya darśanāt jīvaparatadanaṃtaraśloka-
caturthapādapratyabhijñānācca । tatra hyekahaṃsaśabdaḥ eka eva haṃti gacchati iha paratra ca saṃca-
ratīti vyutpattyā jīvaparaḥ । evaṃ ca <quote>‘sa hi karte’</quote> tyasya kathañcidapi prastāvarahite parame-
śvare yojayitumaśakyatvātpūrvāparamantrasandarbhagocarajīvaviṣayatvameva vaktavyam । śratani-
rvāhārthaṃ jīvasya svapnāvasthāyāṃ satyasaṅkalpatvābhivyaktirapi kalpanīyā । na ca tirodhā-
yakānuvṛttāvabhivyaktikalpanā bādhiteti vācyam । prākṛtasthūladeha eva tirodhāyaka iti
kalpanopapatteḥ । tasya ca svapnadaśāyāṃ vyavahārānupayogino'satkalpatvāditi śaṅkānirā-
karaṇārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>parābhidhyānāttu tirohitaṃ tato hyasya bandhaviparyayau ।। 4 ।।</pratika> <pratika>yadeti ।</pratika>
yadā khalveṣa jīva etasminprakṛte ānandamayarūpe brahmaṇi araṃ chidramapacāraṃ tadājñārūpa-
vidhiniṣedhātikramam । antaraṃ satyasaṅkalpatvādisvarūpatirodhānakaram । antaraśabdādantardhā-
navācinastatkarotiṇyantātpacādyacyantaramiti rūpam । evaṃbhūtamapacāraṃ utkurute atha
tasya saṃsārabhayaṃ bhavati । yadā tveṣa etasminnadṛśye pratyakṣāgamye anātmye ātmasaṃbaṃdhi-
liṃgarahite anumānāgamye anirukte śabdenāpi īdṛktayā paricchettumaśakye anilayane
svayamāśrayarahite abhayaṃ sakalalaukikabhayaparityāgapūrvakaṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ śaraṇāgatiṃ viṃdate atha
so'bhayaṃ saṃsārabhayanivṛttiṃ prāpnotītyarthaḥ । evaṃ cānādyapacārapravāhe svarūpatirodhāyake-
'nuvartamāne svapnadaśāyāṃ tadabhivyaktikalpanamayuktamiti <quote>‘sa hi karte’</quote>tyetadapi yathākatha-
ñcitparameśvaraviṣayacayā yojanīyam । atha tathā yojayituṃ na śakyate । pūrvāparasaṃdarbhayoḥ

<sutra>।। sū ।। dehayogādvā so'pi ।। 5 ।।</sutra>
jīvasya svarūpatirodhānabhāvo'pi devamanuṣyādidehākārācidyogādbhavati
sṛṣṭisamaye, pralaye punarnāmarūpavibhāgānarhasūkṣmākārācidyogādityevaṃ tasya
tirohitasatyasaṃkalpatvādikasya tātkālikavicitrasṛṣṭisāmarthyaṃsvapne na saṃbhavati ।।
upapattyantaramāha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। sūcakaśca hi śruterācakṣate ca tadvidaḥ ।। 6 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu striyaṃ svapneṣu paśyati ।
samṛddhiṃ tatra jānīyāt tasmin svapnanidarśane ।।’</quote>
<quote>‘atha svapnāḥ puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇadantaṃ paśyati sa enaṃ hanti’</quote> ityādiśruteḥ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
parameśvaraprastāvābhāvāt <quote>‘svayaṃ vihatya svayaṃ nirmāya svena bhāsā svena jyotiṣā prasva-
pitī’</quote>ti pūrvasaṃdarbhe <quote>‘svapnāṃta uccāvacamīyamāno rūpāṇi devaḥ kurute bahūni । uteva strībhi-
ssaha modamāno jakṣadutevāpi bhayāni paśya’</quote>nnityuttarasandarbhe ca jīvasya svāpnapadārthajāta-
sraṣṭṛtvapratipādanāccetyucyeta tadā <quote>‘sṛjata’</quote> ityetadapi tasyaiva svāpnarathādisraṣṭṛtvapratipāda-
naparam । tasya tirohitasatyasaṅkalpatvādikasya tatsraṣṭṛtvaṃ kathamityākāṃkṣāyāmadṛṣṭadvāreti
tadupapādayituṃ sa hyadṛṣṭajanakakarmaṇāṃ kartetyevamarthaparaṃ <quote>‘sa hi karte’</quote>ti vākyamiti yoja-
nīyam । sarvathā tadvākyaṃ tirohitaśaktikasya jīvasya saṅkalpapūrvakaṃ svāpnarathādisraṣṭṛtva-
pratipādakaṃ na bhavatīti bhāvaḥ । nanu muktau prākṛtadehaviyoge sati svarūpābhivyaktiri-
ṣyate, atastadyogastasya tirodhāyaka eṣṭavya iti tadabhāvātsvapne svarūpābhivyaktiḥ syādi-
tyāśaṃkya sa parameśvarasaṅkalpadvāratayā tirodhāyako na sākṣāditi pratipādanārthaṃ <pratika>sūtram-
dehayogādvā so'pi ।। 5 ।।</pratika> so'pi parameśvarasaṅkalpakṛtastirobhāvo dehayogāt dehayogaṃ
dvāramapekṣyeti sūtrārthaḥ । tarhi dvārābhāvātparameśvarasaṅkalpo na svarūpatirodhāyaka ityā-
śaṅkānirākaraṇāya vāśabdaścārthaḥ acitprakṛterapi tirodhāyakatvasaṃgrāhakaḥ । sā pralaya iva
svapne'pi tirodhāyikā bhaviṣyatīti darśayituṃ pralaye tasyāḥ sthūladehanirapekṣāyāstirodhāya-
katvaṃ sampratipannamityudāharati—<pratika>pralaye punariti ।</pratika> āṇavamalaśaktessāṃsārikatvarūpapuruṣa-
tvāpādakatayā <quote>‘kālaḥ svabhāvo niyateryadṛcchā bhūtāni yoniḥ puruṣa iti cintya’</quote>miti
śrutau puruṣaśabdena prasiddhāyāstirodhāyakatvaṃ bhāṣye tatra tatra prāgāviṣkṛtam । tasyā api
saṃgrāhako'yaṃ vāśabdo draṣṭavyaḥ । nanu <quote>‘sṛjata’</quote>iti svātantryapratipādakākhyātasvārasyāt
jīvasya saṃkalpapūrvakameva svāpnarathādisraṣṭṛtvamastu tadarthaṃ dvārabhūteṣu tirodhāyakeṣu satsvapi
parameśvarasyaiva saṃkalpaviśeṣavaśāt svapnadaśāmātre satyasaṃkalpatvābhivyaktiḥ kalpyatāṃ yathā
nidhitirodhāyakeṣu bhūtalādiṣu satsvapi <quote>‘diśāṃ vrataṃ daśānugānām etena kalpena catvāri
varṣāṇi prayuñjīta nidhayo'sya prakāśante’</quote>ityādiśrutivihitamantrādyanuṣṭhānaprasāditapa-
rameśvarasaṃkalpaviśeṣabalānnidhyabhivyaktiriti śaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>sūcakaśca hi
śruterācakṣate ca tadvidaḥ ।। 6 ।।</pratika> cakāreṇa svapnasya tātkālikaśubhāśubhakārakatvaṃ samuccī-
yate । tadapi bhāṣyodāhṛtaśrutāvevāmnātam <pratika>। sa enaṃ hantīti ।</pratika> ādiśabdena ‘varāha
enaṃ haṃti, <quote>‘markaṭa enamāskaṃdayati’</quote> ityādivākyāntarāṇi gṛhyante । svapne varāhavānara-
<pb n="230"/>
corāgnisarpapiśācarākṣasādaraḥ svātmānamabhibhavanto mahadbhayaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca janayanto dṛśyante ।
teṣāmaśubhasūcakatvasyānanusaṃdhāne'pi tatkārakatvasyānusaṃdhānasattvāt jīvakartṛtve teṣāṃ
sṛṣṭirna syāditi bhāvaḥ । atredaṃ vicāraṇīyam । yatra deśe svapnadraṣṭā rathādīnpaśyati tatra
svayaṃ gatvā paśyati utāpavarake śayāna eveti । yāṃśca paśyati te satyā mitthyābhūtā veti
ca । kecidāhuḥ—tattaddeśaṃ gatvā satyāneva rathādīnpaśyatīti । atreyaṃ śaṅkāvatarati । kāśyāṃ
rātrāvargalite'pavarake śayitaḥ svapne svaśarīreṇaivottarāṃ diśaṃ prasthitaṃ muhūrtamātreṇa kāṃcīṃ
prāpya tatra vastuto rathādimatsu pradeśeṣu rathādīnpaśyaṃtamanyatra gajādimatsu pradeśeṣu tānpa-
śyaṃtaṃ tasyāmeva bahutithaṃ kālamativāhayantamātmānamanubhavanneva yathāpūrvamargalitāpavarakaśa-
yitena svaśarīreṇa śayanānaṃtaraṃ muhūrtamātreṇa pratibudhyata iti tāvatsarvalokasiddham । katha-
masya deśāṃtaragamanopapattiḥ kathañca deśakālavastuviparyāse satyapi svāpnarathādīnāṃ satyatvo-
papattiriti । atretthaṃ parihāramāhuḥ—śayitena śarīreṇa na svapnānubhavaḥ kiṃ tu yathānubhavaṃ
tatsadṛśena visadṛśena vā śarīrāntareṇa kāśyādito nirgatya kāṃcyādikaṃ gatvā tadanubhavaḥ ।
<quote>‘prāṇena rakṣannavaraṃ kulāyaṃ bahiṣkulāyādavaraścaritve’</quote>tiśruteḥ । tathā ca tapobalasṛṣṭaiśśa-
rīrāṃtaraissaubhareriva parameśvarasṛṣṭena śarīrāntareṇa svapnadṛśo bahirvyāpāra upapadyate । na ca
tasya nirgamane kavāṭoddhāṭanāpekṣā । nāpi tasya yojanaśataprāpyadeśaprāptau bahukālāpekṣā ।
tasyāścaryarūpasya prasiddhaśarīravilakṣaṇatvāt deśakālaviparyāsaśca ghaṭate । svapna īśvarasṛṣṭai-
stadekānubhāvyairādityagatyādyupādhiviśeṣairavacchinnānāṃ dikkālānāṃ tattatsvapnadraṣṭṛpuruṣāpekṣayā
vyavasthopapatteḥ । mārgagatānāṃ prāpyadeśagatānāṃ ca jāgarāvasthānubhāvyānāṃ vastuviśeṣāṇā-
mupalaṃbhābhāvaśca yujyate । svapnasṛṣṭaśarīragatānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ svapnārthamātragrahaṇayo-
gyatvāt । gajādimatsu deśeṣu rathādyupalaṃbhaścopapadyate । svapnārthānāṃ jāgaritārthānāṃ ca
jalālokapavananyāyena mūrtatve'pi mithaḥ pratighātakatvābhāvakalpanopapatteḥ । āloko
hyagādhasvacchajalaparipūrṇe sarasi jalenāpratihanyamāna evāntaḥ praviśya talasthitānupalādī-
nprakāśayati । ālokapūrṇe ca nabhasi pavano vāti । muhūrtābhyantareṇa bahurātrātivāhanaṃ
ca saṃgacchate । devādikālopādhibhyo manuṣyādikālopādhīnāmiva jāgratkālopādhibhyaḥ
svāpnakālopādhīnāṃ sūkṣmatvatāratamyakalpanopapatteriti । anye tvāhuḥ—svapnadṛṣṭā ghaṭādayaḥ
parameśvarasṛṣṭāḥ padārthāssatyā eva na tu bāhyā mṛdādyupādānā vā । bahirdeśe prāgūrdhvaṃca mṛtpi-
ṇḍakapālādipūrvottarāvasthayoranupalaṃbhāt । kiṃtvāntarā vāsanāmayāśca । vāsanānāmatīṃ-
driyatvādantarapi prāgūrdhvāvasthayoranupalambhaḥ । te ca manasaiva grāhyāḥ । cakṣurādīnāmupa-
ratatvāt । teṣu bāhyatvamṛṇmayatvacākṣuṣatvādyabhimānastu bhramarūpa iti । apare tvāhuḥ-
pratibhāsamātraśarīrāste na tu pāramārthikāḥ । prabodhānaṃtaraṃ bādhyamānatvāt । <quote>‘ārukṣamiva
śailāgramāvikṣamiva kānana’</quote>mityādirūpeṇa tanmithyātvavyavahārācca, <quote>‘uteva strībhissaha
modamāno jakṣadutevāpi bhayāni paśyan’</quote> iti śrutāvapi lokānubhavasiddhatanmithyātvānu-
vādācca । <quote>‘atha rathā’</quote>nityādau tatsṛṣṭyuktistu bhāktatayā vyākhyeyā । anyathā pradhānapra-
karaṇārthavirodhāpatteḥ । ātmanaḥ svayaṃ jyotiṣṭvaṃ pratipādayituṃ pravṛtte hi prakaraṇe jāgrada-
vasthāyāmādityādijyotirvyatikarāttadda‍urvivecamiti tadvivecanārthaṃ svapnāvasthāvatāritā ।
<pb n="231"/>
tatra yadi sṛṣṭiḥ pratipādyeta tadā tatrāpi tadda‍urvivecaṃ syāt । ādityacaṃdrāgnivākprati-
bhāsasya tadānīmapi sattvāt । ataḥ pradhānapratipādyavirodhāt svargārthaṃ jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇa
tadaṃgavidhyarthavādasya <quote>‘ko hi tadveda yadyamuṣmim̐lloke'sti vā na vetī’</quote>ti vākyasyeva svāpna-
sṛṣṭivacanasya na svārthe tātparyam । kiṃtvarthapratibhāsasattvamātreṇa tadaupacārikaṃ yathā
<quote>‘candramā ivādityo dṛśyate na raśmayaḥ prādurbhavanti lohinī dyaurbhavati yathā maṃjiṣṭhe’</quote>ti
dyulauhityabhavanavacanam । na hi divo lauhityaṃ satvenāsannāriṣṭena dṛśyamānaṃ tātvikaṃ kiṃ
tu bhrāṃtikalpitameva । ata eva tatra prakaraṇe <quote>‘yatra chidra ivādityo dṛśyate yatra nīla ivā-
gnirdṛśyate yathā mayūragrīvāṃ mahāmeghaṃ vā maricimiva paśyet yatra bhūmiṃ jvalaṃtīmiva paśye’</quote>-
diti tatratatrāpāramārthikatvadyotakā ivaśabdāḥ । ihāpi <quote>‘na tatra rathā na rathayogā na paṃthāno
bhavaṃtī’</quote>tyupakrameṇaiva sṛṣṭivacanasyāpāramārthikaviṣayatvaṃ dyotitam । <quote>‘na tatra rathā’</quote> ityādeḥ
svāpnarathādyapāramārthikatve na tātparyaṃ tasya lokasiddhatvāditi cenna । lokasiddhasyaiva
svāpnarathādimithyātvasya svayaṃ jyotiṣṭvavivecanopayogitvenānuvādopapatteḥ । tasmānmanorā-
jyaviṣayārthajātavat paittyaprakopāsannāriṣṭādidaśodbha‍ūtacittavibhramaviṣayavacca svapnārthajāta-
mapi prātibhāsikamabāhyamacakṣurādivedyañca । na hi manorājyādidaśāyāmapi jīvasya śarīraṃ
hitvā bahirnirgamanaṃ tadviṣayārthajātasṛṣṭiścāṃgīkriyate । na vā tatra vastutaścakṣurādipravṛtti-
rasti । ādyantayorvyabhicāradarśanañca manorājyādyapekṣayā viśeṣaḥ । svapne hi ratho'yami-
tyanubhūyamāna eva manuṣyaḥ sampadyate । manuṣyo'yamityanubhūyamāna eva vṛkṣassaṃpadyate । evaṃ ca
bahiṣkulāyaśrutirapi bahiriva kulāyādityevaṃ bhāktatayā vyākhyeyā । ata eva <quote>‘sa yatrai-
tatsvapnayācarati’</quote> ityupakramya sve śarīre yathākāmaṃ parivartata iti śrutyaṃtaraṃ <quote>‘netrasthaṃ
jāgrataṃ vidyāt kaṇṭhe svapnaṃ samādiśet । suṣuptaṃ hṛdayasthaṃ tu turīyaṃ mūrdhani sthita’</quote> mityā-
dīni śrutyaṃtarāṇi ca ekasminneva śarīre'vasthābhedena jīvasya sthānabhedaṃ darśayanti । tasmādyathā-
pūrvaṃ svaśarīre sthitasyaiva manorājyādivibhramavat svapnavibhrama iti । ācāryāṇāṃ tu naiteṣu pakṣeṣu
kvacitpakṣaviśeṣe'bhiniveśaḥ । kiṃ tu manorājyādivyavahāra iva svapnavyavahāro na jīvasaṅkalpakṛ-
taḥ, kiṃ tu parameśvarasaṅkalpamātrādhīnaḥ ityetāvanmātre'bhiniveśaḥ ।tasyaiva sūtrārthatvāt । ato'tra
pakṣaviśeṣo na cintitaḥ । nanu<quote>‘svapnadṛśaikenānubhāvyaṃ tatkālamātrāvasāyītyāścaryatayā māyā-
mātra’</quote>mityuktaṃ bhāṣye । tena prathamapakṣo'bhimata ityunnīyate । svapnarathādīnāṃ bāhyatve khalvanyeṣāma-
pi darśanaprasaktau svapnadṛśaikenānubhāvyatvamāścaryaṃ bhavediti ceducyate । svāpnarathādīnāṃ satyatve
teṣāṃ svapnadṛgekānubhāvyatvameva tāvadasiddham । svapnadṛśeva svapnadṛṣṭamanuṣyādibhirapi teṣāṃ
nirīkṣyamāṇatvāt । na ca svapnadṛṣṭāścetanā asatyā rathādaya eva tu satyā ityardhajaratīye-
'sti pramāṇam । teṣāmāścaryarūpatvamapyasiddham । jāgratpadārthānāmapi svapnadṛgananubhāvyatvenā-
viśeṣāt । na hi yatra deśe svapnadṛgrathādīnpaśyati tatra tadā jāgradbhiste nānubhūyante । na ca
svapnārthānāṃ jāgratsvasvakāryājanakatvamāścaryarūpatvam । jāgradarthānāmapi svapnadṛkṣu tajjanakatvā-
bhāvasyāviśeṣāt । yathā hi kvaciddeśe svapnadṛśā dṛśyamānāḥ dāvadahanacaṇḍavāyunadīpra-
vāhādayaḥ tatra teṣu jāgratsu dāhādikāryaṃ na janayanti tathā tato'nyasmindeśe vastuto
dāvadahanādimatyeva saudhavanitādibhirmodamāneṣu svapnadṛkṣu tanna janayantyeva । na ca yathā-
<pb n="232"/>
śubhāśubhasūcakaśca hi svapnaḥ । svapnādhyāyavidaśca śubhāśubhasūcakān svapnaviśe-
ṣānācakṣate । ato na jīvasṛṣṭāḥ svapnārthāḥ, jīvasṛṣṭatve tadaśubhasūcakānāṃ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nyajāgraddarśanayogyā jāgradarthā na tathānyasvapnadṛgdarśanayogyāḥ svapnārthā itīdaṃ tadvailakṣaṇyamā-
ścaryarūpatvaṃ syāditi śaṃkyam । bahūnāṃ svapnasaṃvāde tathābhāvasyāpi saṃbhavāt । na caikasmi-
ndeśe kaścidrathaṃ paśyatyanyo gajamaparo'śvamityevaṃ puruṣabhedena vyavasthitatayā dṛśyamāna-
tvamāścaryarūpatvam । jāgraddaśāyāmapyekatra caitre sati saṃtatānāṃ taddeśakālāvacchedānubhavi-
tṛbhireva puruṣairvyavasthayā dṛśyamānatvāt । na ca vastuto rathādimati pradeśe tadapratighātena
svāpnagajādīnāmavasthānamāścaryarūpatvam । teṣāmapi rathādīnāṃ svāpnagajādyavirodhenāvasthā-
nasyāviśiṣṭatvāt । na ca manuṣyatvenānubhūyamānasya tadānīmeva markaṭamārjārādirūpeṇa dṛśya-
mānatvamāścaryarūpatvam ।ekasminneva vastuni krameṇa satyasya manuṣyatvamarkaṭatvāderanyonyabādhya-
bādhakabhāvaṃ vinā samāveśāṃgīkāre jāgraddaśāyāmapi nandikeśvare krameṇa manuṣyatvadevatvayorna-
huṣe devatvasarpatvayośca samāveśasya sampratipannatvena tadaviśeṣāt ।ekasya vastutaḥ parasparavisadṛ-
śānekabhramaviṣayatvasamāveśāspadatvamāścaryarūpatvamityaṅgīkāre svapnārthānāmasatyatvenaivāścarya-
rūpatvopapādanāpatteḥ । nāpi svapnānubhavakālāvasāyitvamāścaryarūpatvam । ekatra svapne
dṛṣṭasya gajāderdināṃtare'pi sva1pne darśanasya lokasiddhatvena tatra tadasiddheḥ । tatra svāpnārthabhede
pramāṇābhāvāddināṃtare'pi taṃ didarśayiṣoḥ parameśvarasyecchayā punardarśanaparyantamavasthānaka-
lpanasyaiva laghutvāt sthāyina eva svapnaprapañcasya svapnadaśāmātre'nubhavaḥ jāgratprapañcasyeva jāgra-
dvaśāmātra ityapi kalpanasambhavena kvacidapi tadasiddheśca । na ca <quote>‘pathassṛjata’</quote>ityādi śruti-
balāt pratisvapnaṃ svapnaprapañcabhedakalpanam । tathā sati <quote>‘yatraitatpuruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana
paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati tadenaṃ vāksarvairnāmabhissahāpyeti cakṣuḥ sarvairūpaissahā-
pyeti śrotraṃ sarvaiśśabdaissahāpyeti manassarvairbhūtaissahāpyeti sa yadā prabudhyate yathāgnerviṣphu-
liṃgā vipratiṣṭherannevamevaitasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇā yathāyatanaṃ vipratiṣṭhante prāṇebhyo devā
devebhyo lokā’</quote> ityādiśrutibalena jāgratprapañcasyāpi pratiprabodhaṃ bhedakalpanāpattyā svapna-
jāgaraprapañcayorubhayorapi tattadavasthāmātrāvasāyitvasyāviśeṣāpatteḥ । tasmādudāhṛtabhāṣyaṃ
śāṃbarikadarśitaprapañcasya śāmbarikamohitaikānubhāvyatvena śāmbarīprasaraṇamātrakālāvasā-
yitvena ca yathāścaryarūpatvaṃ tathā svapnaprapañcasya parameśvaramohitasvapnadṛgekānubhāvyatvena tatpra-
sāritasvapnāvasthāmātrānubhāvyatvena cāścaryarūpatvamiti prātibhāsikatvāśraye'pyarthe yoja-
yituṃ śakyamiti na tadanusāreṇa bhāṣyasya prathamapakṣe tātparyasiddhiḥ । na ca svapnaprapañcasya
pāramārthikatva eva parameśvarasya tatsraṣṭṛtvena mahāmahimasiddhiriti pādasaṅgatyarthaṃ bhāṣyasya
prathamapakṣe tātparyaṃ kalpanīyamiti vācyam । anaṃtaprāṇidṛśyamānaparasparaviruddhānaṃtasvapnapra-
pañcapradarśakatvenāpi tasya mahāmahimasiddheḥ । māyikapaṃcaṣavastupradarśakatvenāpi hi śāṃba-
rikasya loke mahāmahimā gaṇyate । avaśyaṃ caivamevābhyupeyam । anyathā svapnasatyatvapakṣe
svasaṃkalpātkṣaṇenaivātivipulaprākāragopurādikaṃ girinadīsamudrādikaṃ vā nirmimāṇamākāśa-
gamanamerumaṃdarādideśasañcāraṃ kṛtsnabhūgolabhramaṇādikaṃ kurvantaṃ vā yatra svapnadṛgātmānamīkṣate
<note>(1) ‘dināntarasvapne'pi iti kha॰ pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="233"/>
sṛṣṭyabhāvaprasaṅgāt । tasmāt parameśvarakṛtā svapnasṛṣṭiriti yuktameva ।।
iti sandhyādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tatra svapnasatyatvavāde yathānubhavaṃ tathaivābhyupagantavyamiti jīvasyāpyatyāścaryasvapnaprapañcasra-
ṣṭṭatve samāne parameśvarasya tataḥ ko'tiśayassiddha‍yet । tasmāttatra tathā tathātmanaḥ sraṣṭṭatvādi-
bhramamāpādayataḥ svapnāvasthāṃ prāpayya mohayataḥ parameśvarasyaiva tena mahāmahimā sidhyatītyeva
tatropapādanīyamiti tasmādācāryāṇāmiha yathopapattyaṃgīkaraṇīyamityabhiprāyaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti saṃdhyādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 2 ।।</head>
<head>atha saṃdhyādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। saṃdhye sṛṣṭirāha hi ।। 1 ।। nirmātāraṃ caikai putrādayaśca ।। 2 ।। māyāmātraṃ tu kārtsnyenānabhi-
vyaktasvarūpatvāt ।। 3 ।। parābhidhyānāttu tirohitaṃ tato hyasya bandhaviparyayau ।। 4 ।। dehayogādvā
so'pi ।। 5 ।। sūcakaśca hi śruterācakṣate ca tadvidaḥ ।। 6 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>svapnasraṣṭā jīvo'tha rathāniti taṃ prakṛtya sṛṣṭyabhidhānāt । tasyāpi hi prajāpativākyoditamasti satyasaṃkalpatvam ।। 180 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>muktau tasya tadukteḥ svapnārtheṣvahitasṛṣṭidṛṣṭeśca । sraṣṭā tatra na jīvaḥ kiṃ tvīśaḥ śrutivaco'pi tadviṣayam ।। 181 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti saṃdhyādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥpādaḥ ।</head>
<head>atha sandhyādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। saṃdhye sṛṣṭirāha hi ।। 1 ।। nirmātāraṃ taike putrādayaśca ।। 2 ।। māyāmātraṃ tu kārts‍nyenānabhivyakta-
svarūpatvāt ।। 3 ।। parābhidhyānāttu tirohitaṃ tato hyasya bandhaviparyayau ।। 4 ।। dehayogādvā so'pi
।। 5 ।। sūcakaśca hi śruterācakṣate ca tadvidaḥ ।। 6 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ jīvasya gatyāgaticintayā jāgradavasthā nirūpitā । atha tvaṃpadārthasya svayaṃjyotiṣṭvasiddhaye svapnā-
vasthāṃ nirūpayati—<pratika>sū ।। sandhye sṛṣṭirāha hi ।। 1 ।।</pratika> svapnamadhikṛtya śrūyate—<quote>‘atha rathānra/?/thayogānpathaḥsṛjate’</quote> iti ।
tatra kiṃ svapnasṛṣṭirvyāvahārikī, uta māyāmātramiti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ । sandhye</pratika>=jāgratsuṣuptyossandhau bhave svapne <pratika>sṛṣṭiḥ</pratika> vyāvahā-
rikyeva । <pratika>hi</pratika>=yasmāt <quote>‘atha rathā’</quote> nityādikā śrutireva<pratika>māha</pratika> ।</p>
<p>kiṃca । <pratika>sū । nirmātāraṃ caike putrādayaśca ।। 2 ।।</pratika> eke śākhinaḥ jīvavattathā asminneva svapne kāmānāṃ nirmātāra-
mīśvaramāmananti <quote>‘ya eṣa supteṣu jāgarti kāmaṃkāmaṃ puruṣo nirmimāṇaḥ’</quote> iti । putrādayaśca tatra kāmā abhidhīyante kāmyanta
iti । evaṃ ca <quote>‘svapnasṛṣṭiḥ vyāvahārikī, īśvarakartṛkatvāt kṣityādivat’</quote> ityanumānamanena sūtreṇa sūcitam । tasmātpūrvodāhṛta-
śrutyā etadanumānena ca svapnasṛṣṭirvyāvahārikīti siddhamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, sū ।। māyāmātraṃ tu kārts‍nye-
nānabhivyaktasvarūpatvāt ।। 3 ।।</pratika> tuśabdaḥ pūrvapakṣanirāsārthaḥ । svapnasṛṣṭiḥ śuktirūpyava<pratika>nmāyāmātram</pratika> । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>kārts‍nyenānabhivyaktasvarūpatvāt</pratika> । na hi kārts‍nyena deśakālādisaṃpattyabādharūpaparamārthavastudharmeṇa abhivyaktasvarūpaḥ
spapnaḥ । yaduktam <quote>‘atha rathānra/?/thayogānpathaḥsṛjate’</quote> iti tacca <quote>‘na tatra rathā rathayogā na panthāno bhavanti’</quote> ityevamādikayā
śrutyaiva parihṛtam । yaccānumānamuktaṃ tatrocitadeśakālādijanyatvamupādhiḥ । hetvasiddhiśca <quote>‘svayaṃ vihatya svayaṃ nirmāye’</quote>tyādinā
śrutyantareṇa spapnasṛṣṭerjīvakartṛkatvaśravaṇāt । ataḥ svapnasṛṣṭirmithyeti yuktam । nanu svapnasya mithyātve tatsūcito'pyarthaḥ satyo
na syādityāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>sū ।। sūcakaśca hi śruterācakṣate ca tadvidaḥ ।। 4 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu striyaṃ svapneṣu
paśyati । samṛddhiṃ tatra jānīyāt’</quote> ityādiśruteḥ svapne jāyamānaḥ strīdarśanādiḥ satya eva । sa ca satyasya sādhvasādhuvastunaḥ
<pratika>sūcako</pratika> hetuḥ । ityavagamyate । <pratika>ācakṣate ca svapnādhyāyavidaḥ</pratika> śubhāśubhasūcakatvaṃ svapnadarśanasya । vastutastu darśanasya
stryādyartharūṣitatvena satyatve'pi śuktirūpyajñānasya satyaharṣādijanakatvavatsatyaśubhādisūcakatvamaviruddhamiti bhāvaḥ । asyasūtra-
syādhikaraṇāntimasūtratayā pāṭhaḥ śrīkaṇṭharāmānujamatayoriti pāṭhakrame'sti viśeṣaḥ। ānandatīrthamate śāṃkaramatānusāryeva
sūtrapāṭhakramaḥ ।।</p>
<pb n="234"/>
<p>nanu pūrvamucitadeśādinimittābhāvātsvapno māyetyuktamayuktam । aiśvaryayogātsaṃkalpamātreṇāpi satyasṛṣṭeḥ saṃbhavādityāśaṃ-
kyāha—<pratika>sū ।। parābhidhyānāttu tirohitaṃ tato hyasya bandhaviparyayau ।। 5 ।।</pratika></p>
<p>asya jīvasya <pratika>tirohita</pratika>maiśvaryaṃ <pratika>parasya</pratika>=parameśvarasya <pratika>abhidhyānāt</pratika>=ābhimukhyena dhyānādabhivyaktaṃ bhavati । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>tataḥ</pratika>=tasmādajñātādīśvarā<pratika>dba/?/ndhaḥ</pratika> jñātā<pratika>dviparyayaḥ</pratika>=mokṣaḥ iti <quote>‘jñātvā devaṃ sarvapāśāpahāniḥ kṣīṇaiḥ kleśairjanmamṛtyuprahāṇiḥ,
tasyābhidhyānāttṛtīyaṃ dehabhede viśvaiśvaryaṃ kevala āptakāmaḥ’</quote> iti śrutirdarśayati । evaṃ ca jīveśvarayorabhede'pyaiśvaryasya tiro-
hitatvānna jīvasya saṃkalpamātreṇa sraṣṭṭatvamiti bhāvaḥ ।</p>
<p>nanu jīvasyaiśvaryatirobhāve ko heturityāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>sū ।। deha yogādvā so'pi ।। 6 ।।</pratika> so'pi jīvasyaiśvaryatirobhāvaḥ ।
<pratika>dehayogāt</pratika>=dehādāvātmatvābhimānalakṣaṇāvidyāvaśāt । yathā bhasmayogādvahneḥ prakāśanaśaktitirobhāvastadvadityarthaḥ ।
vāśabdaḥ īśvaratvāsaṃbhavaśaṃkānirāsārthaḥ । abhedasyāmnāyasahasraprasiddhatvāt । ataḥ svapnaprapañcasya māyāmātratvena tato vini-
rmuktasya jīvasya svayaṃ jyotiṣṭvasiddhiriti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> ca svapnamadhikṛtya śrūyate <quote>‘na tatra rathā rathayogā na panthāno bhavantyatha rathānrathayo-
gānpathassṛjate’</quote> ityārabhya <quote>‘atha veśāntāḥ puṣkariṇyassravantyassa hi karte’</quote> ti । atra kiṃ svāpnapadārthasraṣṭā jīva eva uta
paramātmeti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । svapnadṛśo jīvasya sannidhānāt <quote>‘sa hi karte’</quote>ti jīva eva parāmṛśyate । jīvasyāpi satyasaṃkalpatvaṃ
prajāpativākyoditamasti । atassa eva sraṣṭreti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika> jīvasya satyasaṃkalpatvaṃ svābhāvikamapi saṃsā-
radaśāyāṃ paramapuruṣasaṃkalpāttirohitamiti na jīvasya saṃkalpamātreṇa sraṣṭṭatvamupapadyate । ataḥ paramātmaiva sakaletarapuruṣānu-
bhavāviṣayāṃstakttpuruṣamātrānubhāvyāṃstattatkālāvasānānsvāpnānpadārthānsṛjatīti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu sandhye</pratika>=svapne śrūyamāṇā ।
<pratika>sṛṣṭiḥ</pratika>=rathādisṛṣṭiḥ spapnadṛśā jīvena kṛtā । kutaḥ । <pratika>āha hi</pratika>=<quote>‘sa hi karte’</quote> ti prakṛtasya tasyaiva parāmarśādityarthaḥ ।
<pratika>sū ।। nirmātāraṃ caike putrādayaśca ।। 2 ।।</pratika> enameva jīvaṃ nirmātāraṃ svāpnārthānāmeke śākhino'dhīyate <quote>‘ya eṣa suptepu
jāgarti kāmaṃ kāmaṃ puruṣo nirmimāṇa’</quote> iti । atra kāmaśabdanirdiṣṭāḥ kāmyamānatayā putrādaya eva । caśabdo'vadhāraṇe ।
pūrvatra <quote>‘sarvānkāmānchandataḥ prārthayasva’</quote> ityuktvā <quote>‘śatāyuṣaḥ putrapautrānvṛṇīṣve’</quote> ti vivṛtatvāt ।</p>
<p>atha siddhāntasūtrāṇi vyākhyāyante—<pratika>sū ।। māyāmātraṃ tu kārts‍nyenānabhivyaktasvarūpatvāt ।। 3 ।।</pratika> tuśabdātpakṣo
vyāvartate । na jīvena sṛṣṭaṃ svāpnamarthajātam । api tvīśvara<pratika>māyāmātram</pratika> । sakaletarapuruṣānubhavāviṣayaṃ svapnadṛgekānubhāvyaṃ
tatkālāvasānamāścaryarūpamarthajātagīścarassṛjatītyarthaḥ । jīvasya satyasaṃkalpatvādeḥ <pratika>kṛtsnasya</pratika> saṃsāradaśāyā<pratika>manabhivyaktasva-
rūpatvā</pratika>ttasya saṃkalpamātreṇa sraṣṭṭatvaṃ nopapadyate । ataḥ <quote>‘puruṣo nirmimāṇaḥ’</quote> iti na jīvaviṣayam । kiṃ tu <quote>‘tadeva śukra’</quote>
mityādivākyaśeṣādīśvaraviṣayam । tadaikārthyā <quote>‘tsa hi karte’</quote> tyapi tadviṣayameva । ataḥ paramātmakṛtā svapnasṛṣṭiriti ।।</p>
<p>jīvasvarūpānabhivyaktihetumāha—<pratika>sū ।। parābhidhyānāttu tirohitaṃ tato hyasya bandhaviparyayau ।। 4 ।।</pratika> tuśabdaśśaṃ-
kānivṛttyarthaḥ । <pratika>parābhidhyānāt</pratika>=parameśvarasaṃkalpāt asya svābhāvikaṃ rūpamanādikarmapravāheṇa kṛtāparādhatayā <pratika>tiro-
hitam । tataḥ</pratika>= paramātmanassaṃkalpādeva <pratika>hyasya</pratika>=jīvasya । <pratika>bandhaviparyayau</pratika>=saṃsāramokṣau śrūyete । <pratika>śrīkaṇṭhabhāṣye</pratika> <quote>‘yadā-
hyevaiṣa etasmin’</quote> ityupakrāntaṃ jīvasya bhayābhayaprāptibodhakaṃ śrutidvayamupanyastam । <pratika>rāmānujabhāṣye</pratika> tu <quote>‘ko hyevānyātkaḥ
prāṇyāt’</quote> paraṃjyotirupasaṃpadya’ ityupakrāntaṃ śrutidvayaṃ tatpramāṇatayopanyastamityanayormatayorviśeṣaḥ ।</p>
<p>tirodhānaprakāramāha—<pratika>sū ।। dehayogādvā so'pi ।। 5 ।। so'pi</pratika>=tirobhāvaḥ । <pratika>dehayogādvā</pratika> bhavati । vāśabdo
vikalpārthaḥ । vyavasthitaśca vikalpaḥ । devamanuṣyādidehākārapariṇatācidyogātsṛṣṭivelāyāṃ nāmarūpavibhāgānarhasūkṣmadaśāpa-
nnācidyogena pralayakāle ।।</p>
<p>upapattyantaramāha—<pratika>sūcakaśca hi śruterācakṣate ca tadvidaḥ ।। 6 ।।</pratika> itaśca svāpnā rathādayo na jīvasaṃkalpakṛtāḥ ।
yataḥ svapnaśśubhāśubhayo<pratika>ssūcaka</pratika> iti <pratika>śrute</pratika>ravagamyate । <pratika>tadvidaḥ</pratika>=svapnādhyāyavidaḥ <quote>‘yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu’</quote> <quote>‘atha svapne puruṣaṃ
kṛṣṇa’</quote> mityādiṣu svapnaviśeṣānśubhāśubhasūcakānā<pratika>cakṣate</pratika> । svapnānāṃ jīvasṛṣṭatve tadaśubhasūcakānāṃ sṛṣṭyabhāvaprasaṃgāt । ataḥ
svāpnānāmarthānāṃ paramātmaiva sraṣṭeti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, yaddārḍhyāya pūrvasminpāde vairāgyaṃ nirūpitaṃ yā copāsanāṃgaṃ tāṃ māhātmyajñānapūrvakasneharūpāṃ bhakti
nirūpayatyasminpāde—<pratika>sū ।। saṃdhye sṛṣṭirāha hi ।। 1 ।।</pratika> atrādhikaraṇe svāpnaprapañcasya bhagavadadhīnatvamahimā varṇyate । atra
svāpnaprapañcasya bhagavadadhīnatvena pāramārthikatvaṃ vā marumarīcikājalādivatprātītikatvenāsatyatvaṃ veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । svāpnapratyayānāṃ
vibhramatvāttadviṣayāśśuktiḥ/?/jatādivadasatyā iti na teṣāṃ sṛṣṭivādo yukta iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika> <quote>‘atha rathā’</quote>
nityādyanekaśrutisiddhā svāpnapadārthasṛṣṭirnāpahnavārhā । tattatkarmānusāriparameśvarecchāmātraprabhavāḥ svāpnārthāssatyā eveti teṣāṃ
sṛṣṭirbhagavadadhīnetyatastatsṛṣṭivādo yukta eveti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, hi</pratika> yasmāt=<quote>‘atha rathā’</quote> niti <pratika>śrutiḥ sandhye</pratika>=jāgratsuṣu-
ptisaṃdhau bhave bhagavatassṛṣṭi<pratika>māha</pratika> । ataḥ <pratika>sṛṣṭiḥ</pratika> svāpnapadārthasṛṣṭirbhagavataiva jāyata ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<pb n="235"/>
atha tadabhāvādhikaraṇam. ।। 2 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। tadabhāvo nāḍīṣu tacchruterātmani ca ।। 7 ।।</sutra>
svapnābhāvaḥ suṣuptiḥ । <quote>‘tadyatraitatsuptaḥ samastaḥ saṃprasannaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānāti,
āsu tadā nāḍīṣu sṛpto bhavati’</quote> iti <quote>‘atha yadā suṣupto bhavati yadā na kasya
cana veda hitā nāma nāḍyo dvāsaptatisahasrāṇi hṛdayātpurītatamabhipratiṣṭhante
tābhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītati śete’</quote> iti <quote>‘yatraitat purūṣaḥ svapiti nāma satā
somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati’</quote> iti ca śrutibhirjīvasya suṣuptau nāḍīṣu purītati
brahmaṇi ca śayanamavagamyate । teṣvasya vikalpaḥ samuccayo veti saṃśayaḥ ।।
nāḍyādīni sthānāni vikalpitāni bhavitumarhanti, ekaprayojanatvāt ।
yathā <quote>‘vrīhibhiryajeta, yavairyajeta’</quote> ityatra/?/ puroḍāśaniṣpādanaprayojanasyaikatvena
vikalpaḥ svīkriyate, tathā suṣuptiprayojanasyaikatvāt kadācit purītati śete kadā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha tadabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। tadabhāvo nāḍīṣu tacchruterātmani ca ।। 7 ।।</pratika> sautratadabhāvapadavyākhyānena
svapnāvasthāśrayavicārānaṃtaraṃ svapnānaṃtarabhāvisuṣuptyāśrayavicāraḥ kriyata iti saṃgatiṃ darśa-
yati—<pratika>svapnābhāva iti । teṣvasyeti</pratika> । kāryaikyatadbhedābhyāṃ saṃśayaḥ । <pratika>ekaprayojanatvā-
diti</pratika> । nāḍīpurītadbrahmaṇāṃ hi suṣuptau jīvaṃ pratyadhikaraṇabhāvenopayogaḥ । adhikaraṇa-
bhāvaśca pratyekaṃ saptamībhirnirapekṣāṇāmavagamyate । tataśca yathā vrīhīṇāṃ yavānāñca puroḍā-
śasādhanatvena kratāvupayuktānāṃ pratyekaṃ tṛtīyābhyāṃ nirapekṣasādhanatvāvagatervikalpaḥ tathā-
trāpi vikalpa eva nyāyya ityarthaḥ । nanu <quote>‘satā somye’</quote> tyatra saptamī na śrūyata iti
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>sū ।। nirmātāraṃ caike putrādayaśca ।। 2 ।। ca</pratika>=yataḥ । <pratika>eke</pratika>=śākhinaḥ enaṃ bhagavantaṃ <quote>‘ya eṣa supte’</quote> ṣviti svāpna-
padārtha<pratika>nirmātāra</pratika>māmananti । apare ca putrādayastasmādviṣṇoreva jāyanta iti vadanti । tasmādviṣṇoreva svāpnasṛṣṭirityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। māyāmātraṃ tu kārtsyenānabhivyaktasvarūpatvāt ।। 3 ।।</pratika> turevārthe । saṃdhyaṃ māyāmātraṃ nimittopādānabhū-
tābhyāṃ māyāśabditecchāvāsanābhyāmeva nirmitam । na bāhyakāraṇakam । kutaḥ । <pratika>kārts‍nyenānabhivyaktasvarūpatvāt</pratika>=
bāhyavatsamyaganabhivyaktasvarūpatvādityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। sūcakaśca hi śruterācakṣate ca tadvidaḥ ।। 4 ।। ca</pratika>=yataḥ svāpnapadārthaḥ । <pratika>sūcakaḥ</pratika>=śubhāśubhajñāpakaḥ ।
ato'pi nāsatyaḥ । tatkutaḥ । <quote>‘yade’</quote> ti <pratika>śruteḥ</pratika> pratyakṣataḥ phaladarśanācceti <pratika>hi</pratika>śabdārthaḥ । kiṃca । <pratika>tadvidaḥ</pratika>=svapnavidaḥ
vyāsādayaḥ । <pratika>ācakṣate ca</pratika>=<quote>‘yade’</quote> ti śrutau svāpnānāmarthakriyākāritva vadantyato'pītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>ityānandatīrthamate sandhyādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<head>atha parābhidhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। parābhidhyānāttu tirohitaṃ tato hyasya bandhaviparyayau ।। 5 ।।</pratika> atra svapnatirodhānaṃ bhagavadadhīnaṃ vā na
veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । bāhyājñānakṛtasya svapnasya bāhyajñānenaiva vilayopapatterna tattirodhānaṃ bhagavadadhīnamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । ajñānamū-
lasya bandhasya jñānamūlasya mokṣasya ca tādadhīnyadarśanāt na hyajñānamūlasya jñānena laye na bhagavadapekṣetyasti niyamaḥ । ataḥ
svapnatirodhānamapi bhagavadadhīnameveti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ ।। iti parābhidhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha dehayogādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। dehayogādvāso'pi ।। 6 ।।</pratika> atra jāgradavasthā bhagavadhīnā na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । tasyāḥ kālādhīnatvadarśanānna sā
bhagavadadhīnete <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, kālasyācetanasyāsvātaṃtryeṇa kālādhīnatvapratyakṣasya nimittatāmātraviṣayatvāt
<quote>‘sa eva jāgarite sthāpayatī’</quote> tyādiśruteśca jāgarāvasthāpi bhagavadadhīnaivete । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, dehayogādvāsaḥ</pratika>=dehābhimāne-
nāvasthitirūpā jāgradavasthāpi parābhidhyānādeva bhavati nānyata ityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti dehayogādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="236"/>
cinnāḍīṣu kadācit brahmaṇīti vikalpa evātra samucita iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।।
