cetsatyam । tadvākyaśeṣe śrūyate <quote>‘sati sampadya na vidussati sampatsyāmaha itī’</quote>ti ।
<quote>‘nanu sanmūlāssomyemāḥ sarvāḥ prajāssadāyatanāssatpratiṣṭhā’</quote> iti śravaṇānniyamena brahmā-
śritasya jīvasya kathaṃ tadanapekṣya kadācinnāḍyāṃ purītati vā suṣuptirāśaṃkyate ? ucyate ।
na kevalasya brahmaṇo'tra vikalpakoṭitvaṃ kiṃ tu daharākāśarūpasya । chāṃdogya eva hi dahara-
vidyāyāṃ daharākāśarūpaṃ brahma prakṛtya tasya suṣuptisthānatvaṃ śrūyate । <quote>‘evamevemāssarvāḥ prajā
aharaharbrahma gacchaṃtyaḥ etaṃ vrahmalokaṃ na viṃdatī’</quote>ti । tadetaddaharādhikaraṇa eva <quote>‘gatiśabdābhyā’</quote>
miti <ref>(bra॰ 1-3-14)</ref> sūtre nirūpitamiti nātrāviṣkṛtaṃ bhāṣye । api ca sadvidyāvā-
kyaśeṣe'pi <quote>‘sata āgatya na vidussata āgacchāmaha’</quote> iti śrūyate । tena kiñcitpradeśāva-
cchinnameva sacchabdoktaṃ brahma suṣuptisthānamiti gamyate । na hi grāmādivāparicchinnādbrahmaṇa
āgamanaṃ saṃbhavati । tatraiva jīvabrahmaṇossūtraprabaddhaśakunitadādhārayaṣṭidṛṣṭāntaśravaṇena
caitatsidhyati । nahi kiñcitpradeśāvacchinnabrahmāvivakṣāyāṃ śakunerādhārayaṣṭita iva jīvasya
brahmaṇo niṣkramya pratidiśaṃ patanaṃ vaktuṃ śakyam । sa cāvacchedako hṛdayapuṇḍarīkarūpa iti
1śrutibhya eva pradeśāntaraparyālocanayā niścīyate । spaṣṭaṃ caivameva śrutyaṃtare samāmnāyate-
<quote>‘yatraiṣa etatsupto'bhūdya eṣa vijñānamayaḥ puruṣastadaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ vijñānena vijñānamādāya ya eṣo-
ntarhṛdaya ākāśastasmincheta’</quote> iti । tasmādupapannātra brahmaṇo'pi vaikalpikādhikaraṇatvaśaṅkā ।
nanu <quote>‘tāsu tadā bhavati yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathā'sminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavatī’</quote>ti
nāḍīnāṃ prāṇaśabdoktasya brahmaṇaśca samuccayaḥ śrūyate । tathā <quote>‘tābhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītati
śeta’</quote> iti nāḍīnāṃ purītataśca samuccayaḥ śrūyate । ekakāryāṇāmapi samuccayaśravaṇe sati na
vikalpaḥ pravartate । ata evānuṣṭheyārthaprakāśanaikakāryāṇāmapyabhyādānamaṃtrāṇāṃ <quote>‘caturbhira-
bhrimādatta’</quote> iti samuccayaśrutisattvāt vrīhiyavavadaindrābārhaspatyayājyānuvākyāyugalatraya-
vacca na vikalpa iṣyate । na cāṇorjīvasyānekādhikaraṇasamuccayānupapattiḥ । nāḍīnāṃ purī-
tatprāptau brahmaprāptau ca mārgatvena samuccayopapatteḥ । purītadbrahmaṇorapi prākāraparyaṃkanyāyena
samuccayopapatteḥ । purītaditi hi hṛdayapuṇḍarīkapariveṣṭanamucyate । tathā ca yathā prākāra-
pariveṣṭitaprāsādamadhyagate paryaṃke śayānaḥ prākāre śeta ityapi vyapadiśyate, tathā ca
purītadveṣṭitahṛdayapuṇḍarīkamadhyagate brahmaṇi śayānaḥ purītati śeta ityapi vyapadeṣṭuṃ śakyate
nātra kaścidvirodha iti ceducyate । <quote>‘yadā suṣupto bhavatī’</quote> tyādiśrutau hṛdayākāśaṃ prāptasya
jīvasya punarhṛdayānnāḍībhirniṣkramya purītati śayanaṃ śrūyate <quote>‘tābhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītati
śete’</quote> iti । etadvākyaṃ hṛdayākāśaṃ vihāya kevale purītati śayanenopapādanīyam । <quote>‘na hi
prāsādānnirgatya prākāre śete nṛpati’</quote> riti vākyaṃ prākāraveṣṭitaprāsādamadhyagataparyaṃkaśayane-
nopapādayituṃ śakyam । ato hṛdayākāśe purītati ca śayanasya vaikalpikatvaṃ tāvadavaśya-
meṣṭavyam । evameva nāḍīnāmapi vaikalpikatvaṃ bhaviṣyati । <quote>‘āsu tadā nāḍīṣvi’</quote>ti nira-
pekṣasaptamīśrutibādhanāyogāt prākāraveṣṭitaprāsādamārgabhūtamadhyagatakakṣyāviśeṣe kadā-
cidrājña iva jīvasya nāḍyāmapi kadācicchayanopapatteśca । tasmādeṣāṃ vikalpa eva । evaṃ
<note>(1) <quote>‘chāṃdogya eva’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="237"/>
samuccaya iti siddhāntaḥ । kutaḥ ? naikaprayojanatvāt । tathā hi—jīvasya hṛdaya-
niṣṭhabrahmagamanamārgatayā nāḍīnāṃ sādhanatvaṃ purītati brahmaṇi ca prāsādaparyaṅka-
vadavirodhaḥ । ato nāḍībhirupasṛpya purītati brahmaṇi jīvaḥ śeta ityupakāra-
bhedāt samuccaya eva ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
prāpte siddhāntamāha—<pratika>samuccaya iti ।</pratika> sūtre cakārātpurītadgrahaṇamiti trayāṇāṃ samuccaya
ityarthaḥ । <quote>‘tacchrute’</quote> rityasya samuccayaśruteriti nārthaḥ । trayāṇāṃ samuccayaśruterabhāvāt ।
kiṃ tu trayāṇāṃ sthānatvaśravaṇādityarthaḥ । tacca vrīhiyavavannāḍīnāṃ nāḍīmārgagamyasya purī-
tatastathābhūtasya daharākāśarūpabrahmaṇaśca nirapekṣakārakatvaśravaṇarūpaṃ vikalpasyaiva sādhakaṃ na
samuccayasyetyāśaṃkya hetorāśayamāviṣkaroti—<pratika>naikaprayojanatvāditi ।</pratika> naiketi nasamāsaḥ ।
bhinnaprayojanatvādityarthaḥ । nanu phalabhūmālpatvarūpaprayojanabhede'pi ṣoḍaśigrahāgrahayorvi-
kalpa iṣyate । viruddhayostayorekatra samuccayāyogāt । tathehāpi vikalpo yuktaḥ । aṇuṃ jīvaṃ
prati parasparaviprakṛṣṭānāṃ bahūnāmadhikaraṇatvasamuccayāyogādityāśaṃkya dvāradvāribhāvena
bhinnaprayojanatayā samuccayamupapādayati—<pratika>tathāhīti</pratika> । prākārasthānīyasyāpi purītataḥ
prāsādasthānīyatvoktiḥ prākārasya prāsādaparivṛttirūpatayā tadekadeśatvābhiprāyeṇa । atrā-
yamāśayaḥ । <quote>‘tābhiḥ pratyavasṛpyeti’</quote> hṛdayātpratyāgamanaṃ nocyate kiṃ tu svapnavahanāḍībhyaḥ ।
pūrvaṃ hi <quote>‘sa yatraitatsvapnayācarati te hāsya lokā taduteva mahārājo bhavati uteva mahābrā-
hmaṇaḥ utevoccāvacaṃ nirgacchatī’</quote> tyādinā svapnāvasthāṃ nirūpya <quote>‘atha yadā suṣupto bhavatī’</quote>
tyādinā suṣuptyavasthā nirūpayitumupakrāntā । svapnāvasthāyāñca svapnavahanāḍīṣvavasthānama-
nyatra prasiddham । tathā hi—hṛdayasya suṣumnāṃ parito daśa nāḍyo daśendriyavyāpārahetavo
daśaprāṇādhiṣṭhitāḥ । tāsaṃ ca vṛkṣāṇāmiva prattyekaṃ daśa daśa śākhārūpā nāḍyaḥ । tāsāṃ
śatasya śākhānāḍīnāmekaikasyā dvāsaptatirdvāsaptatirityevaṃ dviśatottarāṇi saptasahasrāṇyupaśā-
khānāḍyaḥ । tāsāmavāntaraśākhānāḍyo dvāsaptatisahasrasaṃkhyāḥ sahasradhā bhinnakeśāṃśavada-
tisūkṣmāḥ yāsāmudāhṛtabṛhadāraṇyavākye hitā iti nāmopanyastam । tatra pradhānabhūtāsu daśasu
nāḍīṣu yadā prāṇena saṃyujyate jīvaḥ tadā svapne nadīnagaraharmyaprākārādīnāṃ darśanaṃ bhavati ।
yadā vyānena tadā devarṣīṇāṃ yadāpānena tadā yakṣarākṣasagandharvāṇāṃ yadodānena devalokānāṃ
devānāṃ skandajayantayośca yadā samānena tadā devānāṃ lokānāṃ dhanānāṃ ca yadā vairambheṇa
tadā jāgaradṛṣṭādṛṣṭaśrutāśrutabhuktābhuktādīnāṃ yadā sthūlanāḍībhyaḥ pratyavasṛpyopaśākhānāḍīṣu
pratyavasarpati tadaihalaukikapāralaukikavyāpārāṇāṃ darśanaṃ bhavati । etatsubālopaniṣadyapi
<quote>‘hṛdayasya daśa chidrāṇi bhavanti । teṣu prāṇāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ । sa yadā prāṇena saha saṃyujyate tadā
paśyati nadyo nagarāṇi bahūni vividhāni ce’</quote> tyādinā <quote>‘prāṇaśśarīraṃ parirakṣatī’</quote> tyaṃtena
pratipāditam । evañcātra <quote>‘tābhiḥ pratyavasṛpye’</quote> tyasya svapnavahanāḍībhyaḥ atisūkṣmahitanāḍī-
mārgeṇa pratinivṛttyetyevārtho grāhyaḥ । na tu hṛdayāditi । hṛdayasya svapnasthānatvābhāvāt ।
<quote>‘ato hṛdayātpurītatamabhipratiṣṭhanta’</quote> iti vacanaṃ dvāsaptatisahasrasaṃkhyāvacanavatsvarūpaka-
thanārthaṃ na tu hṛdayātpurītatamabhipraviśato mārgakhyāpanārtham । <quote>‘pratyavasṛpye’</quote> tyatra pratyu1pa-
<note>(1) <quote>‘pratyavasargaśca’</quote> iti. kha. pāṭhaḥ.</note>
<pb n="238"/>
<sutra>।। sū ।। ataḥ prabodho'smāt ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘sata āgamya na viduḥ sata āgacchāmahe’</quote> iti brahmaṇaḥ sakāśādasya prabodhaṃ
śrutirāha । ataḥ samuccayaḥ । vikalpe'ṅgīkṛte hyaṣṭadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ । yadā jīvo
nāḍīṣu śete tadā purītadbrahmavākyayoḥ prāmāṇyaṃ prāptaṃ parityajyeta । aprāptaṃ
cāprāmāṇyaṃ svīkriyeta । yadā purītadbrahmaṇoḥ śete tadā purītadbrahmavākyayoḥ
pūrvaṃ tyaktaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ svīkriyeta । pūrvaṃ svīkṛtaṃ cāprāmāṇyaṃ parityajyeta । iti
prāptaparityāgo'prāptasvīkāraḥ parityaktasvīkāraḥ svīkṛtaparityāgaśceti deṣacatu-
ṣṭayaṃ purītadbrahmavākyakoṭau । tathā nāḍīvākyakoṭau ca doṣacatuṣṭaye yojite
satyaṣṭau doṣā bhavanti । tato na vikalpaḥ samuccayopapattāviti samādhiḥ ।।
iti tadabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
sargaśca pratisuṣupti hitanāḍīmārgeṇa nivṛttirastītyabhiprāyakaḥ । na tu purītato nāḍīmārgeṇa
hṛdayaṃ praviṣṭasya punarhṛdayātpurītatpraveśārthaṃ pratinivṛttyabhiprāyakaḥ । ataḥ <quote>‘prāsāde śeta’</quote>
iti vacanasya prāsādāntarvarttiparyaṅke śayāna iva hṛdayāntarvarttini brahmaṇi śayāne purītati
śeta iti vacanasya na kācidanupapattiḥ । nāḍīṣu supto bhavatītyasyāpi nānupapattiḥ ।
hṛdayākāśarūpe brahmaṇi svaptuṃ yo nāḍīḥ praviśati sa tu nāḍīṣu supta eva bhavati । śrāva-
yati ca tatra vākyaśeṣa eva brahmasampattiṃ <quote>‘tanna kañcana pāpmā spṛśati tejasā hi tadā
sampanno bhavatī’</quote>ti । evaṃ tārpyadarbhamayāhatavāsonyāyātprayojanabhedena nāḍīpurītadbrahmaṇāṃ
samuccaye samarthayituṃ śakye vakṣyamāṇāṣṭadoṣaduṣṭo vikalpo nāḍgīkartavyaḥ । vrīhiyavayostu
prayojanabhedādyupāyāntarādarśanāt <quote>‘evameṣo'ṣṭadoṣo'pi yadvrīhiyavavākyayoḥ । vikalpa
āśritastatra gatiranyā na vidyata’</quote> ityuktarītyā gatyantarābhāvena vikalpāṅgīkāra iti ।
evamupapāditāyāṃ suṣupterbrahmādhikaraṇatvasya niyatatāyāmupapattyantarapradarśanārthaṃ sūtram-<pratika>sū ।।
ataḥ prabodho'smāt ।। 8 ।।</pratika> <pratika>atassamuccaya iti</pratika> । anyathā <quote>‘sata āgatyeti’</quote> nityava-
cchravaṇavirodha iti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>ityaṣṭau doṣā iti</pratika> । idaṃ purītadbrahmavākyayorekīkṛtya
pradarśanāduktam । vastutastu nāḍīvākya iva tayorapi pratyekaṃ catvāraścatvāro doṣā iti
dvādaśa doṣā draṣṭavyāḥ । aṣṭadoṣaduṣṭo vikalpa iti prasiddhistu prasiddhodāhāraṇayoḥ vrīhi-
yavaśāstrayordvitvāt । ihaikasyāṃ sūptau nāḍyāṃ śayane purītadvākye brahmavākye ca pratyekaṃ
prāthamikau dvau dvau doṣau suṣuptyantare purītati śayane nāḍībrahmavākyayoḥ pratyekaṃ prāthamikau
dvau doṣau purītadvākye tūparitanamapi doṣadvayamiti punassuptyantare brahmaṇi śayane brahmavā-
kye'pyuparitanaṃ doṣadvayaṃ tatassuptyaṃtare nāḍyāṃ śayane nāḍīvākye'pyuparitanaṃ doṣadvayamiti
svāpacatuṣṭayena dvādaśa doṣāḥ prāduḥṣyuḥ । vrīhiyavaśāstrayostu prayogatrayeṇāṣṭau doṣā iti
viśeṣaḥ । nanvanenādhikaraṇena kaḥ parabrahmaṇo mahimaviśeṣaḥ sidhyati । suptajīvaviśrāṃti-
sthānatvaguṇaniyama iti cenna । tasya pūrvapakṣe'pyanapāyāt । muktisaṃsārayoraviśeṣeṇa brahmāśri-
tasya jīvasya nāḍyāṃ purītati vā kadācitsuptiriti pūrvapakṣe'pyastyeva hi tattadavacchinna-
brahmāśritatvaṃ daharākāśarūpeṇa brahmaṇassuṣuptisthānatvaguṇaniyama iti cenna । tatastasya mahimni
kasyacidviśeṣasyālābhāditi ceducyate । suptau tāvajjīvasya sakalapāpāsparśaḥ śrutiṣu ca
<pb n="239"/>
prasiddhaḥ । nāḍīvākye'pi śrūyate sa tu nityavadāmnātaḥ । pūrvapakṣe suṣuptyavasthāviśeṣaprayukto
bhavati sa tu pākṣikabrahmasampattiprayuktaḥ <quote>‘tejasā hi tadā sampanno bhavatī’</quote>ti nāḍīvākya-
śeṣo'pi pūrvapakṣe nāḍīnāmeva tejastvena kathañcitstutiparatayā yojanīyo bhavati । siddhānte
tu daharākāśarūpabrahmasampattiprayukta eva sa sidhyati । prasiddho hi daharavidyāyāṃ tatsampa-
nnasya sarvapāmpāsparśaḥ <quote>‘sarve pāpmāno'to nivartaṃte apahatapāpmā hyeṣa brahmaloka’</quote> iti ।
evaṃ suṣuptau yasya daharākāśarūpasya sampattyā jīvasya sakalapāpmāsparśaḥ tadbrahma mahāmahime-
tyanenādhikaraṇena khyāpyata ityuktarūpamahimasiddhirasyādhikaraṇasya phalam । etatphakāvala-
mbanenottarādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣapravṛttiriti ।। iti tadabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।

<head>atha tadabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। tadabhāvo nāḍīṣu tacchruterātmani ca ।। 7 ।। ataḥ prabodho'smāt ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>nāḍyādīnāṃ suptau nirapekṣatvādvikalpaḥ syāt । maivaṃ samuccayo'rhati mārgaprāsādamañcanayāt ।। 182 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti tadabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha tadabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। tadabhāvonāḍīṣu tacchruterātmani ca ।। 7 ।। ataḥ prabodho'smāt ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, atra parasparaṃ vipratipannāni suṣuptivākyāni vicāryante । kvacit <quote>‘āsu tadā nāḍīṣu sṛpto bhavati’</quote> iti
suṣuptikāle nāḍīpraveśaḥ śrūyate, kvaci <quote>‘ttābhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītati śete’</quote> iti kvacit <quote>‘ya eṣo'ntarhṛdaya ākāśastasmiñcheta’</quote>
iti । tatra kiṃ jīvasya nāḍīpurītatparamātmanāṃ madhye yatra kvacitsuṣuptiriti vikalpaḥ । uta nāḍīpurītatpraveśānantaraṃ para-
mātmanyeveti samuccayaḥ । iti <pratika>saṃdehe</pratika> ekaphalatvādvrīhyādivadvikalpa iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, nāḍīpurītatpraveśā-
nantaraṃ paramātmanyeveti samuccaya eva nyāyya iti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, tadabhāvaḥ</pratika>=svapnābhāvaḥ suṣuptiḥ । nāḍīṣu ātmani ca iti
nāḍyādīnāṃ samuccaya eva na vikalpaḥ । sa ca samuccayaḥ nāḍīpurītatpraveśaṃ vinā satsaṃpatterabhāvānnāḍīpurītatorguṇabhūtatayā
paramātmanaḥ prādhānyenāvagantavyaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>tacchruteḥ</pratika>=tasya nāḍyādīnāṃ suṣuptisthānatvasya śrutatvāt । uktasamuccayāna-
ṅgīkāre śrutīnāṃ saṃgraho na syāditi bhāvaḥ ।</p>
<p>kiṃ ca । <pratika>sū ।। ataḥ prabodho'smāt ।। 8 ।।</pratika> yataḥ paramātmaiva suṣuptisthānam ata eva hetoḥ asmātparamātmano
jīvasya prabodha upadiśya te । <quote>‘sata āgamya na vidussata āgacchāmaha’</quote> iti sadrūpātparamātmanassakāśājjīvā āgacchanti’
iti śravaṇādanyasya suṣuptisthānatve idaṃ śravaṇaṃ bādhyeta । anyatra suptasyānyasmātsamutthānāyogāditi bhāvaḥ । tasmātsuṣuptau
mithyājñānābhāvamātreṇa brahmasaṃpatteḥ satvānmūlājñānanivṛttau sākalyena brahmasaṃpattiraviruddheti । ato jīvasya brahmaikyamiti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate, tathā rāmānujamate</pratika>, ca <pratika>saṃdehapūrvapakṣādiṣu</pratika> nāsti vailakṣaṇyaṃ pūrvasmāt । <pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika> tu vikalpa-
pakṣāṅgīkāre prāptaparityāgo'prāptasvīkāraḥ parityaktasvīkāraḥ svīkṛtaparityāgaśceti pratipakṣaṃ doṣacatuṣṭyāpādanenāṣṭadoṣopapā-
danamadhikamupanyastamiti viśeṣaḥ । <pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, adhikaraṇadvitayātmatayā vibhakte ime sūtre । svapnajāgaranyāyena
suṣupterapi bhagavadadhīnatve siddhe tasyāḥ sthānavicāraḥ prastūyate—<quote>‘satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavatī’</quote> ti śrutyā bhagavatyeva suṣu-
ptirvācyā । <quote>‘āsu tadā nāḍīṣu supto bhavatī’</quote> ti śrutirapramāṇamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । suṣuptau nāḍīṣvavasthāne duḥkhitvaprasaṃgādu-
bhayavidhaśrutidarśanācca nāḍīsthe bhagavati suṣuptyupapatterubhayavidhaśrutiprāmāṇyasaṃbhave kasyāścidaprāmāṇyakalpanāyogāt ।। iti
<pratika>siddhāntaḥ</pratika> । asminmate <quote>‘tacchruterātmani ha’</quote> iti pāṭhaḥ । hetyayaṃ śabdaḥ śrutiprasiddhivācakaḥ । sūtrārthaḥ spaṣṭaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti tadabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<head>atha prabodhādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p>sū ।। ataḥ prabodho'smāt ।। 8 ।। atra suptasya prabodho bhagavadadhīno vā uta bherītāḍanādyadhīno veti <pratika>saṃdehe</pratika>
bherītāḍanādyadhīnatvaṃ lokadṛṣṭameva yuktamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘eṣa eva suptaṃ prabodhayatyetasmājjīva uttiṣṭhatī’</quote> ti sāvadhāraṇa-
kauṇḍinyaśrutyanurodhena bherītāḍanādyadhīnatvadarśanasya nimittamātratvaviṣayatvāditi <pratika>siddhāntaḥ ।।</pratika> <pratika>iti prabodhā-
dhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</pratika> <pratika>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ tadabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="240"/>
atha karmānusmṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। sa eva tu karmānusmṛtiśabdavidhibhyaḥ ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
atra <quote>‘satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati’</quote> iti viṣayaḥ ।।
pūrvatra jīvasya suṣuptyavasthā nirūpitā । tatra brahmaṇi supta eva pratibudhyate,
utānya iti saṃśayaḥ ।।
ihānya iti prāptam, brahmaprāptasyāvṛtteranucitatvāt । niratiśayānande brahmaṇi
sāmyaṃ prāptasya jīvasya punarna duḥkhamayasaṃsārāvṛttirupapadyate । satā saṃpannaḥ katha-
muttiṣṭhet, ko vātra vibhāgaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha karmānusmṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। sa eva tu karmānusmṛtiśabdavidhibhyaḥ ।। 9 ।। iti saṃśaya iti</pratika> । pūrvā-
dhikaraṇaphalatvena vivakṣitasya suṣuptau sarvapāpmāsparśasya muktāviva sarvopādhivinirmokṣā-
diprayojakatvāprayojakatvābhyāmayaṃ saṃśayaḥ <pratika>। brahma prāptasyeti ।</pratika> muktasyeva suṣuptasyāpi
brahmaprāptyā sakalapāpmottīrṇatvaṃ tena sarvaduḥkhottaraṇaṃ ca bṛhadāraṇyake śrūyate <quote>‘ananvāgataṃ
puṇyena ananvāgataṃ pāpena tīrṇo hi tadā sarvānpāpmanaḥ śokānhṛdayasya bhavatī’</quote>ti ।
sarvapāpmottaraṇapūrvakaṃ niratiśayānaṃdarūpabrahmasampattyā svarūpānaṃdābhivyaktirapi jīvasya
tatraiva śrūyate । <quote>‘sa yathā kumāro vā mahārājo vā mahābrāhmaṇo vātighnīmānandasya gatvā
śayīta evamevaiṣa etaccheta iti tadvā asyaitadaticchandāḥ apahatapāpmābhayaṃ rūpaṃ tadyathā
priyayā striyā sampariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiñcana veda nāṃtaramevamevāyaṃ puruṣaḥ prājñenātmanā
sampariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiñcana veda nāntaraṃ tadvā asyaitadāptakāmamātmakāmamakāmaṃ rūpaṃ
śokāntara’</quote> miti । atidhnīmatiśayena duḥkhahantrīṃ daśām । atichandā atichandamicchāva-
rjitamakāmaṃ kāmyaviṣayarahitaṃ śokāntaraṃ śokatirodhāyakamityarthaḥ । evañca suṣuptimuktā-
dvibhāgasya punarāvṛttihetorvailakṣaṇyasyābhāvādanya evottiṣṭhatīti’ vaktavyam । upāyasahasre-
ṇāpi muktavadbrahmaprāptasya punarāvṛtterupapādayitumaśakyatvāt । ataḥ karmānusmṛtiśabda-
vidhayo yathākathañcidupapādanīyāḥ । kathaṃ karmaphalabhoganiyamaḥ । ataḥ puṇyaṃ phalabhogārthinā
saṃkīrttanādibhya iva suṣuptito'pi rakṣaṇīyam । pāpabṛndasya suṣuptyā śuddhiḥ strīṇāṃ māna-
savyabhicārā2deḥ rajaseva । svaviṣayā paraviṣayā vā pratyabhijñā svapna iva bhrāntirūpā ।
svapne hi svātmānaṃ rājacoravyāghrādirūpamanubhavanprāgapyahamevaṃrūpa iti manyate prāgadṛṣṭameva
kaṃcitpuruṣaṃ paśyan prāgapyayaṃ dṛṣṭo mayeti manyate । ata iha <quote>‘vyāghro ve’</quote> tyādiśabdo yaccha-
rīrakaḥ prācīnastaccharīraka evānya uttiṣṭhatītyevaṃparaḥ । mokṣārthavidhayaśra brahmānandānubha-
vārthiviṣayatayā caritārthāḥ । suṣuptasya hi svarūpānandānubhava eva kevalaṃ na tu brahmānandā-
nubhavo'pi । brahmasākṣātkārābhāvāt । evañca yasya kevalasvarūpānandānubhūtau na paryāptā buddhiḥ
tena prayatnataḥ suṣuptiṃ varjayitvā bhogamokṣārthaṃ vihitānuṣṭhānaniṣiddhaparihāraśravaṇamananā-
diṣu yatitavyamiti ataḥ suṣuptaviṣaya śrutyanurodhādanya evottiṣṭhatītyabhyupagantavyamiti
pūrvapakṣābhiprāyaḥ । evañca <quote>‘ataḥ prabodho'smāditi’</quote> pūrvādhikaraṇasūtre suṣuptasya brahmaṇassakā-
<note>(1) <quote>‘tītyaṅgīkartavyam’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘vyabhicāradoṣasya’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="241"/>
iti prāpte brūmaḥ—satā saṃpanno'pi supta eva pratibuddha uttiṣṭhati, jñānavaidhuryeṇa
kṛtasya karmaṇastenānubhāvyatvāt, pūrvānubhūtapratyabhijñānācca, <quote>‘ta iha vyāghro vā
siṃho vā vṛko vā varāho vā kīṭo vā pataṅgo vā daṃśo vā maśako vā yadya-
dbhavanti tadābhavanti’</quote> iti tadbhāvaśruteśca, mokṣopāyavidhivākyānarthakyaprasa-
ṅgācca । <quote>‘sata āgamya na viduḥ’</quote> iti saṃpannasya brahmānandajñānābhāvoktermuktāviva
na tallayaḥ । ataḥ supta eva punaḥ samuttiṣṭhatīti yuktam ।।</p>
<head>iti karmānusmṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p>śātprabodha iti yaduktaṃ tannopapadyata iti tadākṣepeṇāsyādhikaraṇasya pravṛttiḥ । <pratika>supta eveti</pratika> ।
ayamāśayaḥ । suptaviṣayapāpmāsparśādyarthavādamanurudhya na karmānusmṛtyādīnāmetāvadva‍yākulī-
karaṇaṃ nyāyyam । <quote>‘no ha khalvayamevaṃ sampratyātmānaṃ jānātyayamahamasmīti no evemāni
bhūtāni nāhamatra bhogyaṃ paśyāmī’</quote>ti suṣuptau nindārthavādo'pi śrūyate । ato yadyapi jīvasya
daharākāśarūpabrahmasampattyarthe hṛdayānupraveśe manuṣyasya divyakṣetrānupraveśe taṃ gṛhītavataḥ piśā-
casyeva puṇyapāpādhikaraṇasyāntaḥkaraṇasya bahirevāvasthānamiti tadānīṃ na jīvasya puṇya-
pāpasyarśaḥ brahmasampannasyopasaṃhṛtasakalabāhyeṃdriyakaraṇatvānna śokodayaḥ, jāgarasvapnadaśāpanna-
syeva tasya vyākṣepābhāvādīṣatsvarūpānandābhivyaktiśca । tathāpyagrimasaṃsāranimittayoḥ
puṇyapāpayoḥ svarūpato nāśābhāvāttasyaivotthāni na kācidanupapattiḥ । ataḥ karmānusmṛtyā-
dyanusāreṇa sa evottiṣṭhatītyaṅgīkaraṇīyam । evaṃ sati <quote>‘aharahargacchantya etaṃ brahmalokaṃ
na vindantyanṛtena hi pratyūḍhāḥ’</quote> ityādiśrutayo'pyāñjasyaṃ labheranniti ।।</p>
<head>iti karmānusmṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha karmānusmṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। sa eva tu karmānusmṛtiśabdavidhibhyaḥ ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>muktāvivāsya suptāvāmnānādbrahmasampatteḥ । supto nottiṣṭhati punaruttiṣṭhannanya evātmā ।। 183 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>bhoktavyakarmasatvātsmaraṇāta iheti ca śravaṇāt । mokṣopāyavidhānāduttiṣṭhati supta evātmā ।। 184 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti karmānussṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha karmānusmṛtiśabdavidhyadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। sa eva tu karmānusmṛtiśabdavidhibhyaḥ ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, atra yassupto jīvassa eva pratibudhyate vā uta sa eva anyo vetyaniyamo veti <pratika>saṃśaye</pratika> aniyama
iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika> yassupto jīvassa eva pratibudhyate nānyaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>karmānusmṛtiśa</pratika>bdavidhibhyaḥ
pañcabhyo hetubhyaḥ=dinadvayasādhyasya karmaṇo'rdhaṃ kṛtvā suptaḥ punarutthāyāvaśiṣṭamardhaṃ karoti । anuśabdena pratyabhijñā sūcyate ।
yo'hamatīte'pyahani ghaṭamadrākṣaṃ sa evaitaṃ ghaṭaṃ spṛśāmītyādyākārā । paścātsa ghaṭa ityādismaraṇaṃ smṛtiśabdenocyate । punaḥ
<quote>‘pratinyāyaṃ pratiyonyādravati buddhāntāyaiva’</quote> ityādiśrutisamūhaḥ śabdenocyate । karmavidyāvidhayo vidhaśabdenocyante । yadi
suptasya punarnotthānaṃ tarhi uktahetavo bādhyeran । ataḥ supta evottiṣṭhatīti siddham । <pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika> tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>
ca yadyapi sandehapūrvapakṣādikamaviśiṣṭam । tathāpi <quote>‘karmānusmṛtiśabdavidhibhya’</quote> ityasyārthavarṇanamātre'sti kiyatī bhidā
pūrvasmāt । jñānavaidhuryeṇa kṛtasya karmaṇastenānubhāvyatvāt pūrvānubhūtapratyabhijñānāt <quote>‘ta iha vyāghro ve’</quote> tyāditadbhāvaśruteḥ mokṣo-
pāyavidhivākyānarthakyaprasaṅgācceti tadarthaḥ । iti ।।</p>
<pb n="242"/>
atha mugdhādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। mugdhe'rdhasaṃpattiḥ pariśeṣāt ।। 10 ।।</sutra>
mūrchitaḥ puruṣa iti vyavahārānmūrcheti kācidavasthānubhūyate । saiṣā suṣuptyā-
dibhyo bhinnā na veti saṃdehaḥ ।।
jāgarasvapnasuṣuptibhyo bhinnāyā avasthāyā aprasiddhatvānmūrchā jāgarādi-
ṣvantarbhūtā ।।
iti pūrvapakṣe prāpta ucyate—mūrchite puruṣe yāvasthā sā maraṇārdhasaṃpattiḥ iti
pariśeṣāt bhinnā suṣuptyādeḥ । prapañcapratīterabhāvānna jāgarasvapnayorantarbhāvaḥ ।
suṣupteḥ prasannavadanādilakṣaṇāyā vikṛtamukhādilakṣaṇāyā asyāśca viśeṣāt
tato'pyanyāvasthā mūrcheti siddham ।। iti mugdhādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha mugdhādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। mugdhe'rdhasampattiḥ pariśeṣāt ।। 10 ।।</pratika> jīvāvasthāvicāraprasaṃgādidamadhi-
karaṇam । mū1rchāvasthā uktāvasthābhyo bhinnā na veti tadbhedakasadbhāvāsadbhāvābhyāṃ saṃśaye
viśeṣavijñānābhāvasāmyāt sā suṣuptiḥ karālavadanatvādisāmyātkrodhadaśeva jāgarāvasthā
bhīṣaṇasvapnadarśanadaśeva vā svapnāvasthā vṛkṣāgrapatanādikāraṇakatvādvā maraṇavasthā na tu
suṣuptyādibhyo bhinnā avasthāntaraśrutyabhāvāditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । viśeṣavijñānābhāvānna
jāgaraḥ svapno veyaṃ prasannavadanatvaśvāsapūrṇatvādyabhāvānna suṣuptiḥ sūkṣmaśvāsavatvānna maraṇaṃ
kiṃ tu vṛkṣāgrapatanādyabhighātanimittasaukṣmyāpannaprāṇayuktā taccikitsādyabhāve maraṇaparya-
vasāyinī maraṇāvasthārdhasampattirūpā suṣuptyādibhyo vilakṣaṇeti siddhāntaḥ ।</p>
<head>iti mugdhādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām atha mugdhādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<lg><l>jāgratsvapnasuṣuptiṣvantarbhūtaiva mūrchā syāt । tadavasthātrayabhinnāvasthā na kutracidviditā ।। 185 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>jñānoparamādviṣamaś‍vāsatvādeśca tatrayādanyā । martyaṃ prakṛtya tato...............ṣe vayam ।। 186 ।।</l></lg>
<p>* (pariśeṣānmūrchākhyā jñeyā maraṇārdhasampattiḥ ।)</p>
<head>iti mugdhādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p>* nayamaṇimālāyāmaṃtimamardhaṃ truṭitatvānna labhyate । atastadanyathā viracya ( ) etadrekhāmadhyapātitayā
saṃyojitamiti vedyam ।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika> atrādhikaraṇe sarvapuruṣīyasārvakālikasarvāvasthānāṃ bhagavadadhīnatvamahimā varṇyate । atra na sarveṣāṃ
sārvakālikasarvāvasthā bhagavadadhīnāḥ । kiṃ tu keṣāṃcitkiṃcitkālikāvasthā eveti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, sa eve</pratika>-
ś‍vara eva sarveṣāṃ sarvāvasthāprerakaḥ । na deśakālāntare'nyaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>karmānusmṛtiśabdavidhibhyaḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘eṣa hyeva sādhukarma-
kārayatī’</quote> tyādinā karmaṇāmīśādhīnatvaśruteḥ, <quote>‘pradarśakastu sarveṣāṃ svapnādereka eva tu । paramaḥ puruṣo viṣṇustato'nyo nāsti
kaścana ।।’</quote> ityāditadanusārismṛteśca <quote>‘eṣa svapnānpradarśayatyeṣa prabodhayatyeṣa eva parama ānandaḥ’</quote> ityādiśruteḥ <quote>‘ātmānameva
lokamupāsīta’</quote> iti vidhivākyācca । iti । sūtrārtho'pi vyākhyātaḥ । paramātmano'nyasya prerakatve tasyāpyupāsyatvaprāptyā
śrutau paramātmana evopāsyatvāvadhāraṇānupapattiriti bhāvaḥ ।। <pratika>iti karmānusmṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</pratika></p>
<note>(1) <quote>‘mūrchā suṣuptyādibhyo’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="243"/>
athobhayaliṅgādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। na sthānato'pi parasyobhayaliṅgaṃ sarvatra hi ।। 11 ।।</sutra>
pūrveṣvadhikaraṇeṣu tvaṃpadārthasya jīvasya svarūpadharmagatyāgatyavasthāviśeṣanirūpaṇaṃ
kṛtam । ataḥ paraṃ tatpadārthasya parameśvarasya svarūpadharmādikaṃ nirūpyate । <quote>‘so'nta-
rādantaraṃ prāviśat diśaścāntaraṃ sa prāviśat’</quote> <quote>‘yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan’</quote> ityādiṣu
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha ubhayaliṃgādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। na sthānato'pi parasyobhayaliṅgaṃ sarvatra hi ।। 11 ।।</pratika> peṭikāsaṃgatiṃ darśayituṃ
vṛttānukīrtanapūrvakamāpādasamāpteruttarādhikaraṇānāmarthamāha—<pratika>pūrveṣviti</pratika> । prathamādhikaraṇe
svapnāvasthāviṣayaśrutivākyārthavicāreṇa jīvasya svaprakāśajñānātmakaṃ svarūpaṃ nirūpitam ।
tatraiva saṃsāradaśāyāṃ guṇāṣṭakatirodhānarūpo dharmo nirūpitaḥ । tadanaṃtarādhikaraṇe suṣuptau
brahmagatiḥ prabodhe tata āgamaścetyubhayaṃ nirūpitam । tṛtīyādhikaraṇe tata āgatirākṣepa-
samādhānābhyāṃ vyavasthāpitā । caturthādhikaraṇe mūrchāyā maraṇārdhasampattirūpo viśeṣo nirū-
pita ityarthaḥ । <pratika>svarūpadharmādikamiti</pratika> । <quote>‘prakāśavacce’</quote>ti sūtre parameśvarasya jñānātmakaṃ
svarūpamubhayaliṃgādisūtrairdoṣābhāvakalyāṇaguṇātmakā dharmāḥ tata upari samābhyadhikaprati-
ṣedhaḥ phaladātṛtvaṃ cetyetatsarvaṃ nirūpyata ityarthaḥ । tathā ca jīvasvarūpādinirūpaṇaparyavasā-
yibhirvicāraiḥ pūrvapādasaṃgatyā prathamapravṛttaiḥ parameśvaramahimāviṣkaraṇānantaraṃ sākṣāttatsva-
rūpadharmādivicāraistanmahimāviṣkaraṇaṃ kriyata iti peṭikāsaṃgatiriti bhāvaḥ । yadyapi
pūrveṣvadhikaraṇeṣvitivṛttasaṃkīrtanasya <quote>‘nātmāśrute’</quote> rityādiṣu viyatpādādhikaraṇeṣu yajjī-
vasya svarūpadharmanirūpaṇaṃ pūrvapādādhikaraṇeṣu yadgatyāgatinirūpaṇam etatpādādhikaraṇeṣu yatsva-
pnādyavasthānirūpaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya sarvasyāpi pratipattisaukaryārtho'nuvāda iti tātparyaṃ vaktuṃ</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām atha mugdhādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। mugdhe'rdhasaṃpattiḥ pariśeṣāta ।। 10 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ so'hamiti pratyabhijñānātsuṣuptapratibuddhaikyamuktam । tadvadviśeṣābhāvapratyabhijñānātsuṣuptireva mūccheti
dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyedamāha—<pratika>mugdhe'rdhasaṃpattirityādi</pratika> । atra kiṃ mūrchāvasthā suṣuptyantargatā utātiriktā iti <pratika>saṃdehe</pratika> suṣuptya-
ntargateti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, na tāvatsvapnajāgarite mūrchāvasthā । atra jñānābhāvāt । nāpi maraṇāvasthā । prāṇo-
ṣmaṇossattvāt । nāpi suṣuptiḥ । bhayānakavadanatvādilakṣaṇabhedāt । kiṃ tu <pratika>pariśeṣāt</pratika>=prasaktasya pratiṣedhe'nyatrāprasaṅgā-
cchiṣyamāṇe vastuni yaḥ saṃpratyayaḥ sa pariśeṣaḥ । tasmāt । <pratika>mugdhe</pratika>=mugdhirmūrchāvasthā tadavasthāpanne viśeṣajñānarāhityādinā
ardhena dharmajātena mūrchāvasthāyāssaṃpannatvāt ardhena kampanādinā maraṇāvasthādharmajātena ca yuktatvādardhasaṃpattirmūrchāvasthā
suṣuptivyatiriktaiveti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, mūrchāvasthā suṣuptyādyantargatā vā bhinnā veti <pratika>saṃdehe</pratika> suṣuptyādiṣvantarbhūteti <pratika>pūrvapakṣe</pratika> prāpte pariśeṣāt
maraṇārdhasaṃpattirūpā mūrchāvasthā suṣuptyāderbhinnaiveti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ</pratika> । sūtrārthaḥ pūrvavat ।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, kiṃ mūrchāvasthā maraṇādarthāntaramuta maraṇameveti <pratika>saṃdehe</pratika> sarvendriyaprāṇavyāpāroparatermaraṇameveti <pratika>pūrvapakṣe</pratika>
prāpte ākārāvairūpyeṇa sūkṣmaprāṇāstitvāvagamānmaraṇārdhasaṃpattirmūrchāvastheti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ</pratika> । sūtrārthaḥ pūrvavat ।।</p>
<p>ānandatīrthamate, mūrchāvasthāpi svapnajāgarādinyāyena bhagavadadhīneti siddhameva । tasyāḥ sthānamiha vicāryate । jāgara-
svapnayoriva sthūlasūkṣmaprapañcadarśanābhāvena suṣuptisāmyāttasyāmapyasti brahmasaṃpattiriti <pratika>pūrvapakṣe</pratika> prāpte tasyāṃ brahmaṇyardhasaṃpatti-
reva । kutaḥ । duḥkhamātrānusaṃdhānasattvāditi <pratika>siddhāntaḥ</pratika> । sūtrārthastu, <pratika>mugdhe</pratika>=mūrchāvasthāyāṃ । jīvasyārdha<pratika>saṃpattiḥ</pratika>=paramātma-
nyardhapraveśaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>pariśeṣāt</pratika>=prasaktapratiṣedhapūrvakānumānādityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>itisaṃpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ mugdhādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<pb n="244"/>
parameśvarasya sarvātmakatayānupraveśaḥ śrūyate । tasya sarvāvasthāsu sarvāntaryāmi-
tayāvasthitau tattaddoṣakalaṅkaḥ prasajyate na vā ।।
iti saṃśaye prasajyata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । tathā hi—<quote>‘asthūlamanaṇvahrasvam’</quote>
<quote>‘niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntaṃ niravadyaṃ nirañjanam’</quote> ityādinā ca parameśvarasya rūpā-
dikaṃ niṣidhyate । taddoṣasparśabhayādeva <quote>‘satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma’</quote> iti ca tasyāpa-
ricchinnasatyajñānamātrarūpatvamucyate । yadi prakṛtivikārasaṃbandho'pyasyābhyupa-
gamyeta, jīvavadasāvapi sakalavikāradoṣāspadaṃ bhavediti ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śakyate tathāpi tenātra vaktavyatvenāpekṣitā peṭikāsaṃgatirna labhyate । na cātrārthauci-
tyamasti । pūrvādhyāyayorbrahmasvarūpataddharmāṇāmapi kiyatāṃśena nirūpitatayā teṣāṃ nirūpayi-
ṣyamāṇatayā pariśeṣāyogāt parabrahmajñānamātrasvarūpaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ tasya <quote>‘so'ntarā’</quote>dityādi-
śrutibhiḥ pratīyamānaṃ sarvānupraveśasarvaniyantṛtvasarvaśarīratvādikamatātvikam uta yathā paraṃ
brahma jñānasvarūpam evaṃ sarvānupraveśādidharmavadapīti saṃśaye tadarthasaṃśayaṃ darśayati—<pratika>tasya
sarvāvasthāsviti</pratika> । <quote>‘sarvāvasthā’</quote> svityanena yathā lokadvayagatāgatavrīhiyavādipitṛvī-
ryāntasaṃśleṣamātragarbhasthitijananajātavyāpārarūpāyāṃ jāgarāvasthāyāṃ svapnasuṣuptimūrchāmara-
ṇāvasthāsu ca sūkṣmasthūlaśarīrāvasthitinibandhanā jīvasya doṣāstathā brahmaṇo'pi syuḥ ।
śarīrāvasthiteraviśeṣāt । <quote>‘dehayogādvā so'pī’</quote>ti sūtre saṃsāradoṣāṇāṃ śarīrasaṃbaṃdhani-
baṃdhanatvasyoktatvāt malamūtrapūyamāṃsaśoṇitādikardamiteṣu śarīreṣu rauravādiṣvivāvasthāna-
syātiheyatāyāssarvasampratipattyarhatvācceti pūrvapakṣabījamadhikaraṇasaṃgatiścetyubhayaṃ sūcitam ।
<quote>‘antaryāmitaye’</quote> tyanena saiddhāntikaṃ tatpratyākhyānabījaṃ sūcitam । nanu, yathaivāsthū/?/lādi-
vākyajātaṃ śrutistathā sarvaśarīratvapratipādakavacanajātamapi śrutireva । tathā ca tadavi-
rodhāya karmādhīnaśarīraniṣedhaparamasthūlādivacanamityupapādanīyam । na tu śarīritve tatprayu-
ktadoṣabhāktvaṃ syāditi bhiyā śarīramātraniṣedhaparamityupapādanīyam । tathātve śrutyantarasya
nirviṣayatvāpātāt karmādhīnaśarīrayogasyaiva doṣāvahatvena svecchādhīnayā niyantṛtayā
tatrāvasthānasya doṣāvahatvābhāvācca । na hi rājño viṣaye vasatāṃ rājājñayā sukhaduḥkhabhā-
ktvamastīti tatra vāsāviśeṣāt rājño'pi tadbhavati । śrutirapi śarīrasthityaviśeṣe'pi
pāratantryameva śarīraprayuktasukhaduḥkhabhāktve nimittaṃ darśayati <quote>‘samāne vṛkṣe puruṣo nimagna’</quote>
ityādiketyāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>yadi prakṛtivikārasaṃbaṃdha iti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । rājaviṣayavāsa-
mātraṃ na rājājñānanuvṛttiprayuktasukhaduḥkhabhāktve nimittaṃ kiṃ tu rājājñāviṣayatvaviśe-
ṣitam । rājā na hi rājājñā viṣayaḥ । ato yuktaṃ rājñaḥ svaviṣayavāsitve'ṣi svājñā-
nanuvṛttiprayuktaduḥkhāspṛṣṭatvam । śarīraprayuktaduḥkhabhāktve tu śarīritvamātraṃ nimittam ।
ato yathā pūtigandhādiyuktakārāgṛhaprayuktaduḥkhabhāktve kārāgṛhāvasthitimātraṃ nimitta-
miti tatkārāgṛhanikṣiptasyeva svecchayā tanniyaṃtṛtvena tatrāvasthitasyāpi bhavati । evaṃ
dehaprayuktaṃ duḥkhaṃ dehabaddhasyeva tatra tanniyantṛtayā sthitasyāpi bhavedeva । tasmādbhoktāpattya-
dhikaraṇagataṃ lokavadityudāharaṇamayuktam । guhādhikaraṇagataṃ <quote>‘samāne vṛkṣa’</quote> iti śrutyudāha-
raṇamapyayuktam । śrutirapi hi na dṛṣṭaviruddhamarthaṃ bodhayitumīṣṭe । īśvaro jīvavaddehakārā-
gṛhe'tijugupsite'vatiṣṭhate jīvavattatprayuktaduḥkhena na spṛśyate iti । tasmādasthūlatvādi-
<pb n="245"/>
neti siddhāntaḥ । sarvāvasthāsu sarvāntaryāmitayā sthitimatopi parameśvarasya
na kaściddoṣakalaṅkaprasaṅgaḥ । kutaḥ ? sarvatra śrutiṣu cāsya nirastadoṣakalaṅkatvaṃ
niratiśayamaṅgalākaratvaṃ cetyubhayaṃ liṅgaṃ hi prasiddham <quote>‘eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā
vijaro vimṛtyurviśoko vijighatso'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ’</quote>
<quote>‘asti kaścidaparyantaramaṇīyaguṇāśrayaḥ ।
sarvalokavinirmātā paśupāśavilakṣaṇāḥ ।।’</quote>
ityādiṣu । ataḥ pṛthivyādiṣvantaryāmitayāvasthānato'pi na doṣaḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। bhedāditi cenna pratyekamatadvacanāt ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
yathā jīvasya svato'pahatapāpmatvādiguṇasyāpi devādiśarīrasaṃbandhitvāva-
sthābhedāduktadoṣavatvaṃ tathā parameśvarasyāpi <quote>‘yasya pṛthivī śarīram’</quote> iti śarī-
rasaṃbandhitvāvasthābhedāttaddoṣāḥ syuḥ iti cet—na, pratyekaṃ pratiparyāyamatadvacanāt
doṣāsaṃbaṃdhitvavacanāt । <quote>‘yasya pṛthivī śarīram’</quote> ityādiṣu <quote>‘eṣa ta ātmānta-
ryāmyamṛtaḥ’</quote> ityantaryāmiṇo hi nirdoṣatvamucyate । jīvasya tu parābhidhyānāt
tatsvarūpaṃ tirohitamityuktam ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। api caivameke ।। 13 ।।</sutra>

vacanāni jugupsitaśarīraprayuktadoṣabhiyaiva parameśvarasya tathābhūtaṃ śarīraṃ pratiṣedhanti । tasya
pṛthivyādiśarīrakatvatanniyantṛtvādivacanāni tvatātvikaṃ tattaccharīrakatvādikamarthavāda-
vidhayā kalpayantītyeva vyavasthopapādanīyeti <quote>‘na sthānato'pī’</quote>ti sūtrabhāgaṃ pratiṣedhyādhyā-
hāreṇa yojayati—<pratika>na kaściddoṣakalaṃkaprasaṃga iti । ubhayaliṅgaṃ hi prasiddhamiti</pratika> ।
doṣābhāvaśravaṇamiva doṣavirodhiguṇaśravaṇamapi doṣapratikṣepakamityubhayaliṃgopanyāsaḥ ।
nanu daharavidyādiṣvīś‍varasyeva jīvasyāpi prajāpatividyāyāmupanyastamastyubhayaliṅgatvaṃ
ko'tra viśeṣaḥ yena dehāvasthitatve'pi jīvo duḥkhamanubhavenneśvaraḥ । tasmādīśvaro'pi
śarīrasaṃbaṃdhāvasthāviśeṣaprayuktaṃ duḥkhamanubhavedeva yadi sarvaśarīrakaḥ syādityāśaṅkāmudbhāvya
tannirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>bhedāditi cenna pratyekamatadvacanāt ।। 12 ।।</pratika> atadvacanādi-
tyasya doṣābhāvavacanādityarthamabhipretya vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>nirdoṣatvamucyata iti</pratika> । nanu pratiparyāya-
mucyatāṃ śarīraprayuktadoṣāsparśitvaṃ prayatnena kathaṃ taccharīritvasya pāramārthikatāyāmupapā-
danīyam । doṣāsparśavacanādeva tasyāpāramārthikatā vivikṣitetyunnīyata ityāśaṃkyāha—
<pratika>jīvasya tviti</pratika> । jīvasyāpahatapāpmatvādikaṃ tirohitamiti parābhidhyāna <ref>(bra॰ 3-2-4)</ref>
sūtre darśitamīśvarasya tannityāvirbhūta <quote>‘mityuttarāccedāvirbhūtasvarūpastviti’</quote> <ref>(bra॰ 1-3-19)</ref>
sūtre darśitam । asmādevobhayaliṃgatvānāvirbhāvāvirbhāvaviśeṣāt jīveś‍varayośśarīraprayu-
ktaduḥkhasparśāsparśaviśeṣopapattau śrutipratipannamīśvarasya sarvaśarīratvādikamavivakṣitamiti
kalpayituṃ na yuktamiti bhāvaḥ । amumeva viśeṣamabhipretya jīveśvarayorekaśarīrasthitāvapi
bhok‍tṛtvābhok‍tṛtvaviśeṣaṃ pratipādayanmaṃtro dṛśyata iti pratipādanārthaṃ sūtram <pratika>api</pratika>
caivameke ।। 13 ।। nanu, jīveśvarayorūbhayaliṃgatirodhānātirodhānāviśeṣa ukta iti

api ca—ekasmin śarīre śarīritvenāvasthitayorapi jīveśvarayordoṣasaṃbandhi-

ato na jīvavadīśvare doṣaprasaṅga ।।
jīveśvarayoḥ śarīrasthitisāmye'pi sthitivaiṣamyamāha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। arūpavadeva hi tatpradhānatvāt ।। 14 ।।</sutra>
<p>tadbrahma parameśvaro devādiśarīreṣu śarīritayā sthitāvapi rūparahitavastuvadeva
vartate । kutaḥ ? nāmarūpanirvoḍhṛtvapradhānatvāt । tathā hi śrutiḥ <quote>‘ākāśo vai
nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā te yadantarā tadbrahma’</quote> iti । nāmarūpayorantarāle tatkā-
ryasparśarahita eva vartate । madhya iti svātantryamuktam । karmaphalabhogārthaṃ hi jīvasya

ti sūtreṇa darśita ityetatsarvamastīti satyam । idamapyastyeva yaccharīrābhighātādiprayuktai-
śśarīragatadhātuvaiṣamyādikṛtarogaprayuktaistadgatamalamūtrādyanubhavaprayuktaiśca duḥkhairyajjīvo'bhibhū-
yate tatra śarīritvameva prayojakamiti । na ca satyapi śarīritve nityāvirbhūtāpahatapāpma-
tvādiśālitayā karmarahitasya parameśvarasya śarīritvaprayuktaduḥkhaṃ na bhavediti vācyam ।
karmāṇyapi hi duḥkhaviśeṣānuguṇadevamanuṣyapaśupakṣisarīsṛpādiśarīrasaṃbaṃdhamāpādya tadanu-
praviṣṭaṃ jīvaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhojayanti । īśvarasya vināpi cetkarmabhistena tena śarīreṇa śarīritvaṃ
syāt tadā karmābhāvopanyāsena kiṃ samāhitaṃ bhavet । na khalu rājāparādhena kārāgṛhe
nibaddhasya tadgatadurgaṃdhādiprayuktaṃ duḥkhaṃ tanniyantṛtayā kārāgṛhamanupraviṣṭasyādhikāripuru-
ṣasya rājāparādhābhāvamātreṇa na bhavatītyāśaṃkya jīveśvarayorekaśarīrasthitāvapi tatprayu-
ktaduḥkhabhogābhogavaiṣamyopapādanārthatvenottarasūtramavatārayati—<pratika>jīveśvarayoriti । sū ।।
arūpavadeva hi tatpradhānatvāt ।। 14 ।।</pratika> arūpavaditi vatipratyayāntam । idaṃ śarīra-
rahitaṃ vastu yathā śarīritvaprayuktaduḥkhabhājanaṃ na bhavatyevaṃ brahmāpītyarthaḥ । nanu, nāmarūpa-
nirvoḍhṛtvena tatra svātantryalakṣaṇaṃ nāmarūpakāryāpekṣayā prādhānyaṃ brahmaṇo bhavatu nāma ।
tathāpi tadanupraveśe pūtigandhakārāgṛhanirvoḍhustatpraveśa iva tadavasthitiprayuktaṃ kāryaṃ kena
vāryate ityāśaṅkaya nāmarūpanirvoḍhṛtvalakṣaṇapradhānahetūktisūcitāṃ śrutimudāharati—<pratika>tathā-
hīti</pratika> । udāhṛtaśrutau nāmanirvoḍhustatsaṃbaṃdhābhāva uktaḥ । sa ca bādhitaḥ । nirvāhyanirvā-
hakabhāvarūpasyaiva saṃbaṃdhasya sattvāt । atastatkāryaduḥkherṣyādisaṃbaṃdhābhāvaparā taduktiriti
bhāvaḥ । nanu <quote>‘te yadantarā tadbrahme’</quote>ti śruyata iti satyaṃ, tattu nāmarūpanirvoḍhṛtvasyātātvika-
tvenaivopapādanīyaṃ gatyaṃtarābhāvādityāśaṅkaya nāmarūpanirvoḍhṛtvādiśrutyabādhenaiva tadupapāda-
yati—<pratika>karmaphalabhogārthamiti</pratika> । karmādhīnamevārthānāṃ duḥkhakaratvaṃ na vastusvabhāvaprayuktam ।
putradārādīnāṃ śītoṣṇādiviṣayāṇāñca samayabhedena duḥkhakaratvatadabhāvadarśanāt । smaranti
ca—<quote>‘tadeva prītaye bhūtvā punarduḥkhāya jāyate । tadeva kopāya yataḥ prasādāya ca jāyate ।
tasmādda‍uḥkhātmakaṃ nāsti na ca kiñcitsukhātmaka’</quote> miti । tasmānnityavirbhūtāpahatapāpmā-
diguṇakatvena śrutasya parameśvarasya karmaleśo'pi nāstīti tasyāsmadādiśarīreṣu sthitasyāpi

śarīre sthitiḥ । ata ubhayorvaiṣamyam ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। prakāśavaccāvaiyarthyāt ।। 15 ।।</sutra>
yathā <quote>‘satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma’</quote> iti vākyāvaiyarthyāt svaprakāśarūpatayā jñāna-
rūpaṃ brahma tathā <quote>‘niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntam’</quote> <quote>‘apahatapāpmā’</quote> <quote>‘satyātma prāṇārāmaṃ
manaānandam’</quote> <quote>‘yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit’</quote> <quote>‘pradhānakṣetrajñapatirguṇeśaḥ ‘parāsya śakti-
rvividhaiva śrūyate’</quote> <quote>‘atha kasmāducyate mahādevo yaḥ sarvān bhāvān parityajyā-
tmajñānayogaiśvarye mahati mahīyate tasmāducyate mahādevaḥ’</quote> ityādīnāṃ paraśśatānāṃ
vākyānāmavaiyarthyāt niravadyaṃ kalyāṇaguṇāspadaṃ ca brahma ityubhayaliṅgameva ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। āha ca tanmātram ।। 16 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘satyaṃ jñānamantaṃ brahma’</quote> iti śrutiranavacchinnajñānarūpatāmātraṃ brahmaṇa āha ।
nānyaṃ nivārayati, viśeṣābhāvādavirodhācca । yathā svarṇarūpaṃ kirīṭamityetat
svarṇarūpatāmātrakathanaparaṃ, na tatkhacitaratnādiniṣedhaparaṃ, tadvaditi । atra hi

na kārāgṛgapraviṣṭādhikāripuruṣanyāyena duḥkhādikaṃ prasajyata iti bhāvaḥ । yattu parameśvarasya
sarvaśarīrakatve vidhiniṣedhavākyagatabrāhmaṇādiśabdānāṃ tatparyaṃtatvena tasyāpi vidhiniṣe-
dhaullaṃghanaprayuktapāpāvaśyaṃbhāvena tatprayuktaduḥkhādibhāktvaṃ syāditi tattuccham । teṣu brāhma-
ṇādiśabdānāṃ <quote>‘triḥ prathamāmanvāha triruttamā’</quote> mityatra prathamottamaśabdayoḥ prathamopasthitasthā-
nātikrameṇa pravovājīyādiṛk‌paryantatvavatprathamopasthitajīvaparityāgena parameśvaraparyaṃta-
tvasya kalpanāyogāt tathā kalpane jīvānāṃ vidhiniṣedhaviṣayatvaṃ kuto'pi pramāṇānna
sidhyediti teṣāṃ karmādhīnaihikāmuṣmikadehaviśeṣasambandhabandhamokṣādipratipādakasakalaśā-
strārthaviplavaprasaṃgācca । tasmādasthūlādivākyānāṃ sarvaśarīratvavākyānāṃ ca śrutitvāviśe-
ṣeṇa prāmāṇyasyā2bhyupagantavyatvāt padāhavanīyaśāstranyāyena vyavasthā kalpayitumuciteti
asthūlādivākyāni karmādhīnaśarīraniṣedhaparāṇi <quote>‘yasya pṛthivī śarīra’</quote> mityādīni niyantṛ-
tvena sarvaśarīrakatvapratipādakānīti vyavasthāpanānna parasparavirodha iti bhāvaḥ । satyajñānā-
divākyairapi brahmaṇo na jñānamātratvasiddhiriti pratipādanārthaṃ sūtram---<pratika>prakāśavaccāvai-
yarthyāt ।। 15 ।।</pratika> prakāśaḥ svaprakāśaṃ jñānam । satyajñānādiśrutiprāptaṃ jñānarūpatvamiva
<quote>‘yassarvajñaḥ sarvavitsarveśvara’</quote> ityādiśrutiprāptaṃ sārvajñyaiśvaryādikamapyaṃgīkaraṇīyam । ubhayoḥ
prāmāṇyāviśeṣāt । <quote>‘tulyaṃ ca sāmpradāyika’</quote>miti nyāyāt virodhābhāvenātra vyavasthāpa-
kanyāyasyāpyanapekṣitatvāditi bhāvaḥ । yadi brūyātsatyajñānādi śruterjñānamātre tātparyami-
tyasti virodha iti tatparihārārthaṃ sūtram---<pratika>āha ca tanmātram ।। 16 ।।</pratika> na hīyaṃ śruti-
rjñānamātraṃ brahmetyāha kiṃ tu jñānaṃ brahmetyetāvanmātramāha । tattu guṇavattve'pi na virudhyata
iti bhāvaḥ । nanu jñānasya sato jñātṛtvādikaṃ viruddhamasmadādīnāṃ ghaṭādijñāneṣvadarśanādi
tyarthāt jñānasvarūpatvoktyā jñātṛtvādidharmavyatireko'vasīyata ityāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>atra hīti</pratika> ।
parameśvarasya prakāśatayā jñānarūpatvaṃ na tu ghaṭādijñānavadda‍ṛśyaviṣayatayā । na ca tadūjñātṛtvā-
<note>(1) <quote>‘sthānātikrame kāraṇābhāvena pravovājīyādi’</quote> iti kha. ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘syāvaśyasamarthanīyatvāt’</quote>
iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="248"/>
<quote>‘satyaṃ jñānamanantam’</quote> iti svata eva mahāprakāśarūpatayā parabrahmaṇaḥ paramajñānā-
kāramātramabhidadhatī śrutiranantaramucyamānaṃ brahmaṇo vipaścittvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ nivā-
rayituṃ kathaṃ kṣamate । vividhaṃ vastujātaṃ paśyantī vimṛśantī cidyasya sa vipaścit ।
ato na virodhaḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। darśayati cātho api smaryate ।। 17 ।।</sutra>
heyaguṇarāhityena kalyāṇaguṇasāhityena cobhayaliṅgaṃ brahma darśayati sarvatra
śrutireva bhagavatī । <quote>‘ākāśaśarīraṃ brahma । satyātma prāṇārāmaṃ manaānandam ।
śāntisamṛddhamamṛtam । iti prācīnayogyopāssva’</quote> iti । ā kāśata ityākāśaḥ
prakāśastadrūpaṃ cidambararūpam । satyātma sattārūpam । prāṇārāmaṃ prāṇe ātmanye-
vārāmo na bahirasyeti । manasyevānando'sya na bāhyakaraṇeṣviti manaānandam ।
mana iti jñānamantaḥkaraṇamucyate, yenānapekṣitabāhyakaraṇenāparokṣitasakalabā-
hyavastuvilāsena nityaniṣkalaṅkena pramāviśeṣeṇa sarvajñaṃ brahmocyate । tenāpari-
mitasvarūpānandamanubhavatīti manaānandam । śāntisamṛddhaṃ rāgadveṣādīnāṃ heyagu-
ṇānāmatyantarāhityaṃ śāntiḥ tatsamṛddhaṃ niravaśeṣanirdhūtanikhiladoṣakalaṅkam ।
amṛtamanādimuktamiti satyajñānarūpaṃ sarvajñaṃ niratiśayātmānandaśaktivilāsaṃ
nirastasamastadoṣaṃ paraṃ brahmetyubhayaliṅgamiti darśayati । tathā <quote>‘niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ
śāntam’</quote> <quote>‘dharmāvahaṃ pāpanudaṃ bhageśam’</quote> <quote>‘tamīśvarāṇāṃ paramaṃ maheśvaram’</quote> ityādiśru-
tiścaubhayaliṅgaṃ brahmāha---
‘anādimalasaṃś‍leṣaprāgabhāvādviśeṣataḥ ।
atyantapariśuddhātmā śiva ityucyate vibhuḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
diviruddham । tathābhūtasyaiva jīvasya jñātṛtvādidarśanāt । kiṃ ca jñānatvoktisāmarthyātpu-
ruṣabuddha‍yā hi jñātṛtvādyabhāvaḥ kalpanīyaḥ । tatkalpanāṃ śīghrapravṛttikaṃ śrutyaṃtaraṃ vārayatī-
tyetadāstām । <quote>‘vipaścite’</quote>ti tadanantaraśravaṇamapi vāsya/?/ti । śarkarāñjanavidhisāmarthyāt
puruṣabuddha‍yā tatsādhanatvena dravyasāmānyakalpanāmiva vākyaśeṣe ghṛtaśravaṇamiti bhāvaḥ ।
vipaścitpadaṃ bhāṣyadarśite'rthe pṛṣodarāditvātsādhuḥ । evaṃ satyajñānādi śrutyavalambanena nirviśe-
ṣajñānarūpaṃ brahmetyabhyupagamya parameśvarasya sarvaśarīratvaśravaṇasya tadupapādakatvenopanyastasya
sarveṣu vedānteṣūbhayaliṃgatvaśravaṇasya cānyathāsiddhiḥ kartuṃ na śakyata ityupapāditam । atha
sarvo'pi vedāntagaṇaḥ tadīyobhayaliṃgatvaparyavasāyītyato'pi hetostadanyathāsiddhiḥ kartuṃ na
śakyata iti pratipādanārthaṃ sūtram---<pratika>darśayati cātho api smaryate ।। 17 ।।</pratika> atho iti
nipāto vedāntavākyakārts‍nyaparaḥ । <quote>‘maṃgalānaṃtarāraṃbhapraśnakārts‍nyeṣvatho atha’</quote> iti tasya
kārts‍nyārthānuśāsanāt । <quote>‘o’</quote>diti sūtreṇa pragṛhyasaṃjñayā prakṛtibhāvaḥ । na tādṛśaḥ kaści-
dvedānteṣu brahmaṇi pravṛttaḥ śabdo'sti yaḥ pravṛttinimittatayā kasyaciddoṣasyābhāvaṃ kaṃcana
kalyāṇamuṇaṃ vā nāpekṣeta । atassarvo'pi vedāntatadupabṛṃhaṇagaṇagatabrahmaparaśabdarāśistasyobhaya-
liṃgatvaṃ samarpayatītyarthaḥ । atrodāhṛtāni śrutitadupabṛṃhaṇānyadhastāttatratatra vyākhyātāni ।
<pb n="249"/>
anantānandakalyāṇaguṇaikaghana īśvaraḥ ।
śiva ityucyate sadbhiḥ śivatattvārthavedibhiḥ ।।’
iti smaryate ca śivaśabdavācyaṃ brahmobhayaliṅgamiti । paramaviśuddhimaṅgalagu-
ṇavācakena śivaśabdena nirastanikhiladoṣakalaṅkaṃ niratiśayapuruṣārthaṃ guṇaparipūrṇaṃ
brahmābhidhīyata iti brahmaṇaḥ śivaśabdavācyatayā cobhayaliṅgasiddhiḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। ata eva copamā sūryakādivat ।। 18 ।।</sutra>
yataḥ pṛthivyādiṣu sarvatra sthitasyāpi parameśvarasya nirdoṣatvaṃ kalyāṇaguṇā-
karatvaṃ ca ata eva śāstreṣu jalasūryādivadityasyopamā kriyate ।
<quote>‘ākāśamekaṃ hi yathā ghaṭādiṣu pṛthagbhaveta ।
tathātmaiko hyanekastho jalādhāreṣvivāṃśumān ।।’</quote>
iti । atra vastutaḥ sthitamākāśaṃ vastuto'navasthitaṃ ca sūryamupamānamupādatte
anenābhiprāyeṇa—yathaikamevākāśaṃ ghaṭādiṣu pṛthak‌pṛthageva vastutaḥ sthitaṃ, tathaika
eva parameśvaraḥ pṛthivyādiṣu pṛthak‌pṛthagātmatayā vastuta eva tiṣṭhatīti parameśvara-
syaikasyāpi bahuṣu vastutaḥ sthitirupapadyate ityākāśopamānam । jalādhāreṣu
vastuto'navasthitasya sūryasya yathā na tadvikārādidoṣasparśaḥ tathā pṛthivyādiṣu
vastutaḥ sthitasyāpi parameśvarasya na tadvikārādidoṣasparśa iti sarvāntaryāmiṇaḥ
parameśvarasya nirdoṣatvaṃ svarūpaguṇāhāniśceti sūryopamānam । ata ākāśādyu-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
evamubhayaliṃgatvasamarthanapūrvakaṃ pṛthivyādisthitāvapi tatprayuktadoṣāprasaṃgassamarthitaḥ । atha
śrutyudāhṛtadṛṣṭāntasāmarthyena taṃ samarthayituṃ sūtram---<pratika>ata eva copamā sūryakādivat
।। 18 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘ākāśamekaṃ hi yathe’</quote> tyādiśrutau prathamadṛṣṭāntena <quote>‘yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭha’</quote>nnityādi-
śrutisiddhā <quote>‘na sthānato'pī’</quote>ti <ref>(bra॰ 3-2-11)</ref> sūtre'nūditā sarvatra sthitirūpapāditā ।
tena kathamekasyāmūrtasya bahuṣu sthitiḥ kṛtsnaikadeśavikalpaparāhatatvāditi śaṃkā niravakā-
śīkṛtā । dvitīyadṛṣṭāntena teṣu sthitasyāpi teṣu vastuto sthitasyeva tatprayuktadoṣāsparśaḥ
<quote>‘te yadantare’</quote> tyādiśrutisiddhaḥ sūtre'<quote>‘pyarūpavadeva hī’</quote> tyanūdita upapāditaḥ । tena taccha-
rīrakaḥ kathaṃ tatprayuktadoṣabhāk na bhavediti śaṃkā niravakāśīkṛtā । karmavaśyatvatadabhā-
vābhyāṃ jīveśvarayorviśeṣa iti śruterabhiprāyaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। aṃbuvadagrahaṇāttu na tathātvam
।। 19 ।।</pratika> atreyamāśaṃkā—aṃbuvat aṃbunīvāgrahaṇādyathāmbuni sūryaḥ tatrānavasthita eva
bhrāntyā tatra sthita iva gṛhyate tathā paramātmā pṛthivyādāvasthita eva tatra sthita iva
gṛhyata ityanabhyupagamāt tatra vastutaḥ sthita eva gṛhyata ityupagamānna tathātvaṃ na sūryasyevo-
pādhiprayuktadoṣāprasaṃgaḥ । ataḥ śrutiritthaṃ vyākhyeyā । pṛthivyādiṣu sthitau kathaṃ tatprayu-
ktadoṣāprasaṅga ityāśaṃkāyāmākāśadṛṣṭāntaḥ । prasiddho hyākāśasya tatra tatra sthitasyāpi
doṣāprasaṃgaḥ । <quote>‘jīvitātyayamāpanno yo'nnamatti yatastataḥ । ākāśa iva paṃkena na sa pāpena
lipyate’</quote> ।। ityādau nirviśeṣajñānamātrarūpasya brahmaṇaḥ pṛthivyādiniyantṛtayā tatra tatrāva-
sthitirayuktetyāśaṃkāyāṃ dvitīyadṛṣṭāntaḥ । tena vastuto na tiṣṭhatyeva pṛthivyādiṣu brahma
jala iva sūryaḥ । <quote>‘sanghaṭa’</quote> ityādipratibhāsamātrāvalambanena tatra tatra sthitirupanyastā ।
<pb n="250"/>
pamayāpi sarvātmanaḥ parameśvarasya siddhamubhayaliṅgatvam ।।
atrāśaṅkate---
<sutra>।। sū ।। ambuvadagrahaṇāttu na tathātvam ।। 19 ।।</sutra>
ambuni yathā sūryo'paramartho gṛhyate, na tathā parameśvaraḥ pṛthivyādau । kiṃtu
paramārthatastatra sthita eva gṛhyate । ataḥ kathamasya nirdoṣatvam ? ।।
iti śaṅkāyāḥ parihāra ucyate—
<sutra>।। sū ।। vṛddhihrāsabhāktvamanta rbhāvādubhayasāmañjasyādevaṃ darśanācca ।। 20 ।।</sutra>
netyanuvartate । vastutaḥ pṛthivyādiṣvantarbhāvādapi parameśvarasya tadgatavṛddhihrāsa-
bhāktvaṃ na saṃbhavati । pūrvoktobhayadṛṣṭāntagrahaṇasāmañjasyādevamavagamyate । uktaṃ
hi vastuto'navasthitasya sūryasya sthitasya cākāśasyopamānatvena grahaṇaṃ <pratika>sarvatrā</pratika>-
vasthitasyāpi parameśvarasyānavasthitasyeva na taddoṣasparśa iti jñāpayitumiti । tathā
hi dṛśyate vivakṣitadharmasāmyajñāpanamātreṇa candravanmukhamiti dṛṣṭāntaḥ । tasmā-
dubhayaliṅgasiddhirīśvarasya pāramārthyāt pṛthivyādiṣu sthitasyāpi । athavā—śrutā-
vapi dṛśyate vivakṣitadharmasāmyena dṛṣṭāntaḥ <quote>‘aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya pāpam’</quote>
ityādau । ato vivakṣitadharmasāmyenobhayadṛṣṭāntasāmañjasyādubhayaliṅgameva brahmeti
siddham ।। ityubhayaliṅgādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ataḥ pratisūryasya calanādikamiva tatsthityavabhāsaprayuktaṃ doṣavattvaṃ guṇavattvaṃ vā bhāsatāṃ
nāma na tatpāramārthikamiti । tasmādasyāḥ śrutervivakṣitārthaviruddhāyā udāharaṇamayukta-
miti । <pratika>sū ।। vṛddhihrāsabhāktvamantarbhāvādubhayasāmañjasyādevaṃ darśanācca ।। 20 ।।</pratika>
ayaṃ hi parihārābhiprāyaḥ । yathā jalasūryasya jalopādhiprayuktavṛddhihrāsādibhāktvaṃ vastuto
na bhavati evaṃ brahmaṇaḥ pṛthivyādyantaravasthitiprayuktaṃ guṇadoṣabhāktvaṃ na bhavatīti tatprayukta-
guṇadoṣabhāktvābhāvamātre dvitīyadṛṣṭāntaḥ । tathā satyeva dṛṣṭāntadvayīsāmañjasyāt । prati-
sūryavadupādhyanavasthitiparyantavivakṣāyāṃ prathamaśrutadṛṣṭāntopamardāpatteḥ । tathā satyeva satya-
jñānādiśrutyubhayaliṅgatvaśrutirūpobhayasāmañjasyācca । anyathā sarvaśarīratvasarvaniyaṃtṛtvādipra-
tipādakānekaśrutivirodhāpatteḥ । na hi sarvātmanā dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayossāmyena bhāvya-
mityasti niyamaḥ । lokavedayorvivakṣitāṃśasāmyamātreṇa dṛṣṭāntopādānarśanāditi ।</p>
<head>ityubhayaliṅgādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
