<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>athobhayaliṃgādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। na sthānato'pi parasyobhayaliṃgaṃ sarvatra hi ।। 11 ।। bhedāditi cenna pratyekamatadvacanāt ।। 12 ।।
api caivameke ।। 13 ।। arupavadeva tatpradhānatvāt ।। 14 ।। prakāśavaccāvaiyarthyāt ।। 15 ।।
āha ca tanmātram ।। 16 ।। darśayati cātho api smaryate ।। 17 ।। ata eva copamā sūryakādivat ।। 18 ।।
aṃbuvadagrahaṇāttu na tathātvam ।। 19 ।। vṛddhihrāsabhāktvamantarbhāvādubhayasāmaṃjasyādevaṃ darśanācca ।। 20 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>yadyapi nirdoṣatvaṃ svatassamāmnātamaṃbikāramaṇe । doṣavati vastuni sthitirathāpi doṣaṃ samāvahedeva ।। 187 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>maivamatirohitobhayaliṃgasya vibhormṛgāṃkacūḍasya । duṣṭe sthityā na bhavetparataṃtrasyeva tadaniṣṭam ।। 188 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti ubhayaliṃgādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<pb n="251"/>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>athobhayaliṃgādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। na sthānato'pi parasyobhayaliṃgaṃ sarvatra hi ।। 11 ।। na bhedāditicenna pratyekamatadvacanāt ।।12।।
api caivameke ।। 13 ।। arūpavadeva hi tatpradhānatvāt ।। 14 ।। prakāśavaccāvaiyarthyam ।। 15 ।। āha ca-
tanmātram ।। 16 ।। darśayati cātho api smaryate ।। 17 ।। ata eva copamā sūryakādivat ।। 18 ।। ambu-
vadagrahaṇāttu na tathātvat ।। 19 ।। vṛddhihrāsabhāktvamantarbhāvādubhayasāmañcasyādevam ।। 20 ।। darśa
nācca ।। 21 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, atra <quote>‘sarvakāmaḥ sarvagandhaḥ sarvarasaḥ’</quote> ityādinā, brahmaṇaḥ saviśeṣatvaṃ śrūyate <quote>‘asthūlamanaṇu’</quote> ityā-
dinā nirviśeṣatvam । tatra kimubhayaśrutyanurodhādubhayarūpaṃ brahma, utaikarūpam । ekarūpamityatrāpi, saviśeṣaṃ, nirviśeṣaṃ veti
<pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । dvirūpamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, na tāvatparasya brahmaṇa ubhayaliṃgamubhayarūpatvaṃ saṃbhavati । satyasya vastu-
no dvairūpyāyogāt । na hyekameva vastu ekadā tadvattadabhāvavacca dṛṣṭam । nāpi sthānata upādhita ubhayarūpatvaṃ tātvikaṃ yu-
ktam । agnisaṃyogamātreṇa jalasthoṣṇasya tatsvabhāvatvādarśanāt । ata ekarūpatvameva brahmaṇaḥ । <pratika>hi</pratika>=yasmāt । <pratika>sarvatra</pratika>=sarveṣu
vedānteṣu <quote>‘aśabdamasparśamarūpa’</quote> mityādibrahmapareṣu saviśeṣatvanirāsena nirviśeṣamevaikarūpaṃ brahmopadiśyata ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। na bhedāditi cenna pratyekamatadvacanāt ।। 12 ।।</pratika> nanu <pratika>na</pratika> nirviśeṣameva brahma । kutaḥ । <pratika>bhedāt</pratika>=pratividyaṃ
brahmaṇa ākārabhedena bhedāt । kasyāṃ cidvidyāyāṃ catuṣpādbrahmopadiśyate । kasyāṃcit ṣoḍaśakalam । kasyāṃcittrailokyaśa-
rīraṃ vaiśvānarākhyam । tasmātsaviśeṣamapi śrutisāmarthyādaṅgīkartavyamiti cet । <pratika>na । pratyekaṃ</pratika>=pratyupādhi । <pratika>atadvacanāt</pratika>
abhedavacanāt । <quote>‘yaścāyamasyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ tejomayo'mṛtamayaḥ puruṣa’</quote> ityādiśrutau brahmaṇaḥ sarvopādhiṣu pṛthivyabādipu abheda-
śravaṇādityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। api caivameke ।। 13 ।।</pratika> apicaike śākhinaḥ <quote>‘mṛtyossa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati’</quote> <quote>‘neha
nānāsti kiṃcana’</quote> ityevaṃ bhedanindāpūrvakamabhedameva brahmaṇaḥ samāmananti ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu saguṇanirguṇapare śrutidvaye sati kathaṃ nirguṇe brahmaṇi pakṣapātaḥ tatrāha---<pratika>sū ।। arūpavadeva hi tatpradhānatvāt
।। 14 ।। arūpavadeva</pratika>=rūpādihīnaṃ nirviśeṣameva brahmāvadhārayitavyam । na saviśeṣam । kutaḥ । <pratika>tatpradhānatvāt</pratika>=<quote>‘a-
sthūla’</quote> mityādiniṣedhaśāstrasya nirguṇabrahmapradhānatvādityarthaḥ । upāsanāvākyānāṃ saviśeṣatve tātparyābhāvāttattātparyāṅgīkāre
vākyabhedāpatteḥ itareṣāṃ saviśeṣavākyānāṃ pratyakṣādisiddhaprapañcānuvādakatvena nirviśeṣaparatvāt <quote>‘tadananyatvam’</quote> ityādinā
prapañcamithyātvasādhanācca na saviśeṣatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prāmāṇikamiti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu tarhi saviśeṣaśrutīnāṃ kā gatirityata āha---<pratika>sū ।। prakāśavaccāvaiyarthyam ।। 16 ।।</pratika> yathā sūryādiprakāśo vakra-
vaṃśādyupādhinā vakra iva ṛjuriva bhavati tadvat brahmāpi pṛthivyādyupādhivaśāttattadākāramiva bhavati । tādṛśaupādhikākāraḥ
saviśeṣaśrutīnāṃ gatiriti tāsā<pratika>mavaiyarthyam</pratika>=nirarthakatvābhāva ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu kīdṛśaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ brahmetyata āha---<pratika>sū ।। āha ca tanmātram ।। 16 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘sa yathā saindhavaghano'nantaro'bāhyaḥ
kṛtsnaḥ prajñānaghana evaivaṃ vā are'yamātmānantaro'bāhyaḥ kṛtsnaḥ prajñānaghana eva’</quote> iti śrutiḥ <pratika>tanmātram</pratika>=caitanyamātraṃ
svaprakāśaṃ cidekarasaṃ nirviśeṣamāhetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>kiṃca । prapañcapratyākhyānamukhena brahmaṇa upadeśādapi brahma nirviśeṣameva । saviśeṣatve tadvākyaireva tatsiddheḥ pratyākhyā-
nopadeśānarthakyaṃ syādityāha---<pratika>sū ।। darśayati cātho api smaryate ।। 17 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘athāta ādeśo neti neti’</quote> ityādi-
śrutiḥ prapañcaniṣedhamukhenaiva brahma <pratika>darśayati</pratika> । sautrāthośabdastathārthaḥ । tathā <pratika>smaryate ca</pratika> bhagavadgītāsu niṣedhamukhenaiva brahma
<quote>‘anādimatparaṃ brahma na sattannāsaducyate’</quote> iti ।</p>
<p>kiṃca । viśiṣṭadṛṣṭāntoktirapi nirviśeṣatvamasya gamayatītyāha---<pratika>sū ।। ata eva copamā sūryakādivat ।। 18 ।।</pratika>
yata evāyamātmā caitanyaikarasaḥ parapratiṣedhopadeśyo nirviśeṣaḥ ata evaupādhikatvaṃ saviśeṣamādāya sūryakādivat jalagata-
sūryapratibiṃbādivat ityupamopādīyate mokṣaśāstreṣu <quote>‘yathā hyayaṃ jyotirātmā vivasvānapo bhinnā bahudhaiko'nugacchan । upā-
dhinā kriyate bhedarūpo devaḥ kṣetreṣvevamajo'yamātmā’</quote> ityādiṣu । evaṃ caitadda‍ṛṣṭāntabalādapi brahmaṇo nirviśeṣatvamiti sū-
trābhiprāyaḥ ।</p>
<p>dṛṣṭāntavaiṣamyaṃ śaṃkate---<pratika>sū ।। ambuvadagrahaṇāttu na tathātvat ।। 19 ।।</pratika> yathā aṃbu sūryānmūrtādbhinnaṃ dūrasthaṃ mūrtaṃ
gṛhyate tadvadamūrtātsarvātmakādātmano bhinnadūrasthopādhera<pratika>grahaṇānna tathātvaṃ</pratika> na sūryatulyatvamiti śaṃkārthaḥ ।</p>
<p>atrottaramāha---<pratika>sū ।। vṛddhihrāsabhāktvamantarbhāvādubhayasāmañjasyādevam ।। 20 ।।</pratika> yathā sūryapratibiṃbasya
jalāntarbhūtasya jalagatavṛddhihrāsabhāktvaṃ na vāstavam evaṃ nirviśeṣasya paramātmano dehādyupādhyantarbhāvāddehādigatavṛddhihrāsa-
bhāktvaṃ na svābhāvikam ityetāvatāṃśenobhayordṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayossāmajasyādbhavati sūryādidṛṣṭāntaḥ । na hi dṛṣṭāṃtadārṣṭānti-
<pb n="252"/>
kayossarvāṃśena samatvaṃ śakyate śakreṇāpi vaktum । tatve taducchedāditi bhāvaḥ ।</p>
<p>kiṃcca । āgamaikasamadhigamye'rthe na paryanuyoga ityāha---<pratika>sū ।। darśanācca ।। 21 ।।</pratika> parasya brahmaṇo dehāntarānupraveśasya
pratibiṃbabhāvarūpasya <quote>‘puraścakre dviṣadaḥ puraścakre catuṣpadaḥ । puraḥ sa pakṣī bhūtvā puraḥ puruṣa āviśat’</quote> ityādiśrutau darśanāt ।
ato nirviśeṣameva caitanyaikarasaṃ brahmeti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika> tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> ca pūrveṣvadhikaraṇeṣu tvaṃpadārthasya jīvasya svarūpadharmagatyāgatyavasthāviśeṣanirūpaṇaṃ
kṛtam । ataḥ paraṃ tatpadārthasya parameśvarasya svarūpadharmādikaṃ nirūpyate—<pratika>sū ।। na sthānato'pi parasyobhayaliṃgaṃ sarvatra hi
।। 11 ।।</pratika> atra kiṃ jīvasyeva tadantaryāmiṇaḥ parasya brahmaṇo'pi jāgarādiprayuktadoṣāssaṃbhavanti uta neti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘yaḥ
pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan’</quote> ityādinā sarvāsvavasthāsvavasthitivacanāttattaddoṣakalaṅkāḥ prasajyanta eveti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu,
na sthānato'pi parasya</pratika>=pṛthivyādiṣvantaryāmitayāvasthitasyāpi parasya brahmaṇastatratatrāvasthānena jīvasyeva ye doṣā
uktāste na saṃbhavantītyarthaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>ubhayaliṃgaṃ sarvatra hi</pratika>=hirhetau । yatassarvatra śrutismṛtiṣu nirastanikhiladoṣatva-
samastakalyāṇaguṇātmakatvarūpobhayaliṃgamubhayalakṣaṇaṃ paraṃ brahmāvagatam <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। bhedāditi cenna pratyekamatadvacanāt
।। 12 ।।</pratika> yathā jīvasya svato'pahatapāpmatvādiguṇakasyāpi devādiśarīrasaṃbandhitayāvasthānabhedāduktadoṣasaṃbandhitvamevaṃ para-
syāpi <quote>‘yasya pṛthivī śarīra’</quote> miti śarīrasaṃbandhitvāvasthābhedātte doṣāḥ syuriti cenna । <pratika>pratyekaṃ</pratika>=pratiparyāyam । <pratika>atadva-
canāt</pratika>=doṣāsaṃbandhitvavacanāt । <quote>‘yasya pṛthivī śarīra’</quote> mityādiṣu <quote>‘sa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛta’</quote> ityantaryāmiṇo nirdoṣa-
tvamucyate । jīvasya tu parābhidhyānātsvarūpaṃ tirohitamityuktam । ataśśarīrasaṃbandhitve'pi parasyaite na doṣāḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। api caivameke ।। 13 ।।</pratika> apica yadidaṃ jīvaparayorekasminśarīre śarīritvenāvasthitayordoṣasaṃbandhitvaṃ tadviparī-
tatvaṃ coktamevameke śākhinaḥ <quote>‘dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā’</quote> vityādinā svaśabdenādhīyate । ato na jīvavadīś‍vare doṣaprasaṃgaḥ ।।</p>
<p>jīveś‍varayośśarīrasthitisāmye'pi sthitivaiṣamyamāha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। arūpavadeva hi tatpradhānatvāt ।। 14 ।।</pratika> manu-
ṣyādiśarīreṣu śarīritve'pyarūpavadeva hi tatparaṃ brahma vartate । kutaḥ । <pratika>pradhānatvāt</pratika>=nāmarūpanirvāhakatvāt । jīvasya
nāmarūpabhāktvena karmaphalāśanaṃ nirvoḍhuṃ parasya tattaccharīre śarīritvenāvasthānam । jīvasya tu karmaphalabhogārthaṃ hi śarīre
sthitiḥ । ata ubhayorvaiṣamyaṃ siddham ।।</p>
<p>nanu <quote>‘satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahme’</quote> ti prakāśaikasvarūpatā brahmaṇa ucyate kathamubhayaliṃgamityata āha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। prakāśava-
ccāvaiyarthyāt ।। 15 ।।</pratika> yathā <quote>‘satyaṃ jñāna’</quote>miti vākyāvaiyarthyātprakāśo brahmaṇaḥ svarūpamityavagamyate tathā <quote>‘yassarvajñassarva-
vit’</quote> <quote>‘parāsya śaktirvividhaiva śrūyate’</quote> ityādivākyāvaiyarthyātkalyāṇaguṇākaratvaṃ ca brahmaṇaḥ svarūpamityavagamyate । ata
ubhayaliṃgameva ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। āha ca tanmātram ।। 16 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘satyaṃ jñāna’</quote> miti vākyaṃ brahmajñānasvarūpamityetāvanmātramāha na punaḥ kalpā-
ṇaguṇākaratvaṃ niṣedhati ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। daśaryati cātho api smaryate ।। 17 ।। darśayati ca</pratika> śrutirbhagavatī heyaguṇarāhityena kalyāṇaguṇasāhi-
tyena cobhayaliṃgaṃ brahmeti ityevaṃ rītyā brahmaṇa ubhayaliṃgatve śrutismṛtipramāṇopanyāsakatvena sūtrārthavarṇanamaviśiṣṭamevānayo-
rmayatoḥ । śrutismṛtyudāharaṇaprakriyā paraṃ bhidyate । <pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika> <quote>‘ākāśaśarīraṃ brahma satyātma prāṇārāmaṃ manaānandam’</quote>
ityādikaṃ śrutivākyaṃ <quote>‘anādimalasaṃś‍leṣaprāgabhāvādviśeṣataḥ’</quote> ityādismṛtivākyaṃ codāhṛtya śivaśabdavācyaṃ brahmobhayaliṃga-
miti nirūpitam । <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> tu <quote>‘niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śānta’</quote> mityādiśrutivākyaṃ <quote>‘yo māmajamanādiṃ ca vetti loka-
maheśvara’</quote> mitismṛtivacanaṃ codāhṛtamiti ca parasparaṃ viśeṣaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। ata eva copamā sūryakādivat ।। 18 ।।
ata eva ca</pratika>=yato brahmaṇo nirastanikhiladoṣatvena kalyāṇaguṇākaratvena cobhayaliṃgatvātpṛthivyādisthānato'pi nāsti
tatprayuktadoṣagandhaḥ । ata eva śāstreṣu jalasūryakādyupamā svīkriyate <quote>‘ākāśamekaṃ hi yadā ghaṭādiṣu pṛthagbhavet । tathātmai-
ko'pyanekastho jalādhāreṣvivāṃśumā’</quote> nityādiṣu ।।</p>
<p>atrāśaṃkate---<pratika>sū॰ ।। aṃbuvadagrahaṇāttu na tathātvam ।। 19 ।।</pratika> tuśabdaścodyaṃ dyotayati । <pratika>aṃbuvadagrahaṇāt</pratika>=aṃbunīvā-
grahaṇādityarthaḥ । yathā aṃbuni sūryastatrānavasthita eva bhrāntyā tatra sthita iva gṛhyate na tathā paramātmā pṛthivyādau
gṛhyate । <quote>‘yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhanpṛthivyā antara’</quote> iti paramārthataḥ sthito gṛhyate । ato <pratika>na tathātvam</pratika>=na sūryasyeva tatprayukta-
doṣagandhābhāvaḥ paramātmanaḥ paramārthataḥ sthitatvāditi ।।</p>
<p>pariharati—<pratika>sū॰ ।। vṛddhihrāsabhāktvamantarbhāvādubhayasāmañjasyādevaṃ darśanācca ।। 20 ।।</pratika> pṛthivyādiṣu
viṣameṣu sthāneṣu sthitasyāpi paramātmanasta<pratika>dantarbhāvāt</pratika>=tatrāvasthānataḥ tatprayuktavṛddhihrāsabhāktvaṃ <quote>‘jalādhāreṣvivāṃśumā’</quote>
niti dṛṣṭāntena nivartyate । kuto'vagatamiti cet <pratika>ubhayasāmañjasyādevam</pratika>=ubhayadṛṣṭāntopādānasāmarthyādevamavagamyata
ityarthaḥ । <quote>‘ākāśamekaṃ hi yathā ghaṭādiṣu pṛthagbhave’</quote> diti ghaṭādiṣu viṣameṣvavasthitamākāśaṃ <quote>‘jalādhāreṣvivāṃśumā’</quote> niti
<pb n="253"/>
cāṃśumaṃtaṃ paramārthato'navasthitaṃ cobhayaṃ dṛṣṭāntatayopādāya <quote>‘tathātmaiko'pyanekastha’</quote> iti nigamanāttattatsthānaprayuktavṛddhihrāsa-
bhāktvanivartanamātraṃ vivakṣitamityavagamyate । anyatrāpi dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayossarvasāmyābhāve'pi <quote>‘siṃha iva māṇavaka’</quote>
ityādiṣu dṛṣṭāntopādānadarśanāccaivamavagamyate ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika> netyanuvartya vṛddhihrāsabhāktvaṃ na bhavatīti vyākhyātam । athavetyupakramya darśanāccetyasya <quote>‘aśva iva romāṇi
vidhūya pāpa’</quote> miti śrutau vivakṣitadharmasāmyena dṛṣṭāntadarśanāccetyarthaparatvamapyupanyastamiti ca viśeṣaḥ । ato vivakṣitadha-
rmasāmyenobhayadṛṣṭāntasāmañjasyādubhayaliṃgaṃ brahmeti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, iyamekādaśasūtrī adhikaraṇapañja<pratika>kātmatayā vibhaktā । tatrādye na sthānato'pyadhikaraṇe</pratika> sarvaśarīreṣu
pratiśarīraṃ dakṣiṇākṣyādisthāneṣu ca jāgradādyavasthāprerakatayā <pratika>sthitasya</pratika> viś‍vataijasaprājñādirūpasya parameśvarasya bhinnasthānatve
bahukuṃbhasaṃbhṛtāṃbhovadbhedāvaśyaṃbhāvāt sarvāvasthāprerakaḥ parameśvara <pratika>eka eveti</pratika> yaduktaṃ tadayuktam । evaṃ ca bhinnānāṃ guṇā-
ditāratamyānugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvadarśanāttasyāpi tatprasaktau na parameśvarasya nirdoṣāśeṣaguṇatvasiddhiriti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhā-
ntastu</pratika>, sthānabhede'pi <pratika>na parasya</pratika> bhinnaṃ rūpam । <quote>‘sarveṣu bhūteṣvekameva brahmatyācakṣate’</quote> iti sarvabhūteṣvekasyaiva nirdoṣaparipūrṇaguṇa-
tvaśravaṇāt <quote>‘ayaṃ <pratika>vai haraya</pratika>’</quote> ityādinā bhagavadrūpāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ mūlarūpeṇa cābhedavacanāt brahmatarkoktarītyā baddhādyukternetavyatvācca ।
tasmātsthānabhede'pyabhedātrānānnāsti brahmaṇo rūpabheda iti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu sū॰ ।। na sthānato'pi parasyobhayaliṃgaṃ sarva-
tra hi ।। 11 ।। parasya</pratika>=paramātmanaḥ । <pratika>sthānato'pi</pratika>=akṣyādisthānabhedādapi । <pratika>ubhayaliṃgaṃ</pratika>=bhinnarūpaṃ nāsti । kiṃ tu
<pratika>sarvatra</pratika>=sarvasthāneṣu sthitaṃ rūpamekameva । <pratika>hi</pratika>=yasmāt । <quote>‘sarveṣvi’</quote> ti śrutiratrāsti ata ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। na bhedāditi cenna pratyekamatadvacanāt ।। 12 ।। bhedāt</pratika>=<quote>‘kāryakāraṇabaddhā’</quote> viti svapnajāgradanubhava-
janakatvarūpabhedakatvaśravaṇāt । viś‍vādirūpāṇāṃ nābheda iti cenna । kutaḥ । <pratika>pratyekaṃ</pratika>=parasparaṃ teṣāṃ rūpāṇām । <pratika>atadvaca-
nāt</pratika>=<quote>‘eṣa ta ātme’</quote> tyabhedaśruterityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। apicaivameke ।। 13 ।।</pratika> yataḥ evamabhedaṃ caśabdārthānantarūpatvaṃ caike śākhinaḥ <quote>‘amātra’</quote> iti śrutau paṭhanti ।
<pratika>api</pratika>—abhede'pi bhedavyapadeśaḥ sthānabhedādyujyata ityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti nasthānato'pyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>athārūpādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। arūpavadeva hi tatpradhānatvāt ।। 14 ।।</pratika> atra pūrvādhikaraṇoktarītyā varṇitamahimnaḥ parameś‍varasya rūpavattva-
masti vā na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । rūpavattvābhyupagame śarīrasyānityatvaniyamānnīrūpatvaśrutivirodhācca arūpitve rukmavarṇavattvādi-
śrutivirodhātsaundaryādiśūnyatve bhakternirālaṃbanatāpātācca tadevamubhayathāpi tatra bhakterayogādva‍yarthaṃ tasya svapnapravartakatvādima-
himavarṇanamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, tasya prakṛtyādipravartakatvena tatpradhānatvāt jñānānandasvabhāvavilakṣaṇanityarūpa-
sattve'pi prasiddhaprākṛtarūpābhāvābhiprāyeṇa nīrūpatvaśrutyupapatteḥ prasiddhaprākṛtarūparahita eva parameśvara iti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu</pratika>,
brahma <pratika>arūpavadeva</pratika>=prākṛtarūparahitameva । kutaḥ । <pratika>tatpradhānatvāt</pratika>=prakṛtyādyuttamatvāt hiśabdasūcitāsthūlamitiśruteścetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। prakāśavaccāvaiyarthyam ।। 16 ।।</pratika> co hetusūcakaḥ । <pratika>prakāśavat</pratika>=lokavilakṣaṇacakṣurādiprakāśe nāsti prakāśa
iti vyavahārasyeva । <pratika>avaiyarthyam</pratika>=na brahmaṇo rūpitvaśrutīnāmaprāmāṇyam । kutaḥ । tasyārūpitve'pi vilakṣaṇarūpitvā-
bhyupagamādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। āha ca tanmātram ।। 16 ।।</pratika> yataḥ <quote>‘aikātmya’</quote> miti śrutiḥ brahmaṇa<pratika>stanmātram</pratika>=vijñānānandaikasvarūpaṃ rūpa-
<pratika>māha</pratika>=vaktītyarthaḥ । ato na vailakṣaṇyāniruktiriti caśabdārthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। darśayati cātho api smaryate ।। 17 ।।</pratika> co yataḥ । apissamuccaye । na kevalaṃ brahmaṇaḥ ānandātmakatvaṃ
darśayati kiṃ tu <quote>‘tadvijñānene’</quote> tiśrutirjñānasya brahmātmakatvamapi <pratika>darśayati</pratika>=pratipādayati । <quote>‘atho’</quote> iti padaṃ jñānarūpārthā-
ntaravāci । <pratika>atho</pratika>=vijñānasyāpi brahmarūpatvam । <pratika>smaryate</pratika>=vyāsādibhiḥ <quote>‘śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśa’</quote> mityādinā । ato na
jñānānandayorbrahmasvarūpatvamaprāmāṇikamityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>ityarūpādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>athopamādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ata eva copamā sūryakādivat ।। 18 ।।</pratika> atra jīvaḥ paramātmābhinnaścetanatvādviśvādivadityanumānena
jīvasya brahmābhedasiddherna tāvadātyantikī bhaktiḥ paramātmani yukteti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, jīvaḥ paramātmābhinno
na bhavati tatpratibiṃbatvāt yathā sūryapratibiṃbo na sūryābhinna ityatyantabhedapratipādakaprabalānekaśrutisahakṛtānumānavirodhāt ।
ato jīvasya paramātmapratibiṃbatvena tadabhedāyogādbhaktirupapannaiveti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, ata evaca</pratika>=bhinnatvatadadhīnatvatatsā-
dṛśyaireva <pratika>sūryakādyupamā</pratika>nopādhyadhīnatvādineti bhāvaḥ ।। <pratika>ityupamādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>athāṃbuvadadhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। aṃbuvadagrahaṇāttu na tathātvam ।। 19 ।।</pratika> nityānandajñānādessādṛśyasya nityasiddhatvānna bhaktijñānādinā
prayojanamityato bhaktiḥ kartavyeti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, aṃbuvat srehena grahaṇaṃ jñānaṃ hi bhaktiḥ । tāṃ vinā
bhagavatsādṛśyarūpaṃ svarūpajñānādikaṃ na samyagabhivyajyate । atastatsamyagabhivyaktaye bhaktyādyapekṣāvaśyikīti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu</pratika>,
<pb n="254"/>
atha prakṛtaitāvattvādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
ubhayaliṅgāsaṃbhavamāśaṃkyāha---
<sutra>sū ।। prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato bravīti ca bhūyaḥ ।। 21 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatra brahmaṇa ubhayaliṅgatvaṃ sādhitam । tadbādho'sti na veti saṃdihyate ।।
<quote>‘dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe mūrtaṃ cāmūrtaṃ ca’</quote> iti pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśātmaka-
mūrtāmūrtaprapañcarūpatvaṃ brahmaṇa uktvā, <quote>‘athāta ādeśo netineti’</quote> iti śrūyate ।
atretiśabdasya pūrvaprakṛtaparāmarśitvāt brahmaṇaḥ pūrvapratipāditaṃ mūrtāmūrtaprapañca-
rūpatvaṃ niṣidhyate ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha prakṛtaitāvattvādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p>etadadhikaraṇasiddhārthaviṣayākṣepasamādhānatvenottarādhikaraṇamavatārayati—<pratika>ubhayaliṃgeti ।
sū ।। prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato bravīti ca bhūyaḥ ।। 21 ।। pūrvatreti</pratika> ।
<quote>‘athāta ādeśo neti netī’</quote> ti niṣedhasya pūrvaprakṛtamūrtāmūrtaprapañcātmakabrahmarūpaviṣayatā-
yāmubhayaliṃgatvabādhaḥ prakṛteyattāviṣayatāyāṃ na tadbādha iti tadviṣayānavadhāraṇātsaṃśayaḥ ।
<pratika>atreti</pratika> । <quote>‘neti netī’</quote> tyatretiśabdaparāmṛṣṭasya nañā niṣedha iti tāvannirvivādam ।
itiśabdaḥ prakāravācī pūrvaprakṛtaṃ prakāraṃ parāmṛśet । pūrvañca <quote>‘dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe’</quote> i-
tyādau mūrtāmūrtaprapaṃcātmakaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakāradvayaṃ prakṛtam । atastanniṣidhyata iti yuktam ।
<quote>‘neti netī’</quote> ti vīpsāyāṃ dviruktiḥ pūrvaprakṛtasya rūpadvayasya sākalyena niṣedhapratyāya-
nārthā । athavaikena mūrtaprapañcasya niṣedho'pareṇāmūrtaprapaṃcasyeti dvirvacanasāphalyam । prakṛte-
yattā niṣidhyata iti tu na yuktam । rūpadvayavattasyāḥ prakṛtatvābhāvādrūpadvayaniṣedha iva
tanniṣedhe dvirvacanasya sāphalyābhāvācca । na ca vākyaśeṣe adhikaguṇajātavidhānaṃ prakṛte-
yattāniṣedhānuguṇaṃ dṛśyata iti vācyam । tadasiddheḥ । <quote>‘na hyetasmā’</quote> diti vākye prakṛtabrahmā-
pekṣayotkṛṣṭaṃ niṣidhyata iti brahmaṇassarvottaratvaguṇapratipādakavākyaśeṣa iti cenna । tasya
pūrvavākyārthānuguṇyena brahmānyasarvaniṣedhakatvopapatteḥ । tathā sa <quote>‘tyanyatpara’</quote> miti ca pada-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
sādṛśyārtho vatiḥ । sādṛśyaṃ snehākhyaviśeṣaṇena vivakṣitam । tathā ca yataḥ <pratika>aṃbuvadagrahaṇāt</pratika>=snehasahitamāhātmya-
jñānābhāvāt । bhaktiṃ vineti yāvat । <pratika>tathātvam</pratika>=sukhādyātmakatvarūpeś‍varasādṛśyaṃ <pratika>na tu</pratika> samyagvyajyate । ato bhaktireva
samyaksvarūpābhivyaktijaniketi tadarthaṃ sā kartavyetyarthaḥ ।। <pratika>ityaṃbuvadadhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha vṛddhihrāsādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। vṛddhihrāsabhāktvamantarbhāvādubhayasāmañjasyādevam ।। 20 ।।</pratika> atra sā bhaktiḥ puruṣeṣu kiṃ tāratamyena
vartate utaikaprakāreti <pratika>saṃśaye</pratika> ekaprakāreti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika> asyāśca bhakteradhikāriṣu tāratamyamasti । brahmādī-
nāmuttamaphalānāmasmadādīnāmalpaphalānāṃ cādhikārāntarbhāvāt । evaṃ satyevobhayānprati viṣamaphaladāturīś‍varasya sāmañjasyaṃ
syāditi । <pratika>sūtrārthastu</pratika>, vṛddhihrāsabhāktvam=bhaktyādessādhakeṣvādhikyanyūnatā । netyanuvartate । na tāvadatrāṅgīkartavyam ।
kutaḥ । antarbhāvāt=mahadalpaphalavatāṃ brahmādīnāmanyeṣāṃ ca bhaktatve'ntarbhāvāt । tathā pi kuto vṛddhihrāsabhāktvam । <pratika>evaṃ</pratika>
bhaktitāratamye satyevo<pratika>bhayasāmañjasyāt</pratika>=ubhayānmahadalpaphalānbrahmādijīvānpratiphaladāturīś‍varasya sāmañjasyādvaṣaimyeṇa phala-
dānasya bhaktitāratamyena yuktatvāt anyathā ayuktatvāt । atastadaṅgīkāryamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। darśanācca ।। 21 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘athāta’</quote> iti śrutau <quote>‘yathe’</quote> ti smṛtau ca phalatāratamyadarśanāduktatvāccoktaṃ yuktamityarthaḥ ।।
<pratika>iti vṛddhihrāsādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmubhayaliṃgādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<pb n="255"/>
<p>iti prāpte brūmaḥ—<quote>‘neti neti’</quote> iti pūrvasiddhaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prapañcarūpatvaṃ na niṣidhyate,
aprajñātatvena vihitasyāsya pratiṣedhāyogāt । kiṃtu, prakṛtaitāvanmātraṃ brahma na
bhavatīti prakṛteyattāmeva <quote>‘neti neti’</quote> iti pratiṣedhatīti yuktam । yataśca paścāt
pūrvamanuktaṃ bhūyo guṇajātaṃ bravīti । <quote>‘na hyetasmāditi netyanyat paramasti atha
nāmadheyaṃ satyasya satyamiti prāṇā vai satyaṃ teṣāmeṣa satyam’</quote> ityādinā । atra
<quote>‘na hyetasmāt’</quote> iti vākyena <quote>‘neti neti’</quote> iti nirdiṣṭāt brahmaṇo'nyannāstyu-
tkṛṣṭamityucyate । atha nāmadheyamucyate—satyasya satyamiti । tadarthanirvacanaṃ tu-
<quote>“prāṇā vai satyaṃ teṣāmeṣa satyam”</quote> iti । prāṇā jīvātmānaḥ satyaṃ viyadādivadu-
tpattyabhāvāt । tebhyaḥ satyebhyo hyeṣa satyam; tadvat jñānasaṃkocādyabhāvāt ।
ataḥ prakṛtadharmeyattāpratiṣedhaparatvāt <quote>‘neti neti’</quote> iti vākyasya brahmaṇaḥ pūrvasi-
ddhamubhayaliṅgatvaṃ na hīyata eva ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dvayaṃ vyarthaṃ syāditi cenna । tavāpi tulyatvāt । brahmāpekṣayotkṛṣṭaṃ nāstītyutkṛṣṭaniṣedha-
vivikṣāyāmapi hyanyaditi vyarthameva । tato'nyasyaiva tadapekṣayotkṛṣṭatvaprasaktyā tanniṣe-
dhasyārthavattvāt । ataḥ paraśabdasyāpi vyatiriktārthatvamaṃgīkṛtya pratibhāsataḥ kevalaṃ brahmaṇaḥ
paramasti vastutastu tato'nyattu paraṃ nāstītyevamarthatayā tatpadadvayaṃ saṃgamayitavyam । ata eva
<quote>‘prāṇā vai satyaṃ teṣāmeṣa satya’</quote> miti tadanantaraṃ śrūyate । tatra prāṇaśabdenendriyavācinā
tadviṣayā lakṣyaṃte । te tāvat <quote>‘sanghaṭa’</quote> ityādyanubhavadarśanātkevalaṃ pratibhāsataḥ satyabhūtāḥ ।
brahma tu vastuto'pi satyam । tadapekṣayotkṛṣṭaṃ satyamiti । athavā । sanmṛtpiṇḍaḥ sanghaṭaḥ
satkapālaṃ saccūrṇamityādipratyayaviṣayā mṛtpiṇḍaghaṭakapālādayo vyāvartamānasatyāḥ । brahma
tu sarveṣvapyeteṣu pratyayeṣu satsaditi pratyayavedyamanugataṃ satyam । vyāvartamānāścānuvartamāne
kalpitā dṛṣṭāḥ yathā rajjvidamaṃśe sraksarpabhūdalanādayaḥ । ato vyāvartamānā ghaṭādayaḥ
kevalaṃ pratibhāsatassatyā iti teṣāmutkṛṣṭaṃ satyaṃ pāramārthikaṃ brahmeti । ataḥ prapañcani-
ṣedhānnirviśeṣaṃ brahma nobhayaliṃgamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu pramāṇāntarāpratipannatayā
pūrvavākye śrutyaiva vihitaṃ brahmaṇo mūrtāmūrtapañcavaiśiṣṭyaṃ tadanantaravākyena niṣeddha‍uṃ na śa-
kyate । pūrvāparagranthavyāhatiprasaṃgāt । ṣoḍaśigrahāgrahavadvastuni vikalpāsambhavāt ।
ataḥ pūrvaṃ mūrtāmūrtaprapañjavaiśiṣṭyoktyā buddhisthaḥ prakṛteyattārūpaḥ prakāro niṣidhyata iti
yuktam । mūrtāmūrtaprapañcaviśiṣṭaṃ brahmetyatāvanmātraṃ na bhavati । kintu adhikamapi guṇā-
ntaravattvamastīti । vīpsā tvādarārthatvena yojanīyā । tadeva guṇāntaraṃ <quote>‘na hyetasmā’</quote> diti
vākyaśeṣeṇa pratipādyate । rūpatayā viśeṣaṇabhūtānmūrtāmūrtādacetanaprapaṃcātparamutkṛṣṭaṃ brahmeva
tato'nyadasmātprapaṃcādutkṛṣṭaṃ nāstīti tasyārthaḥ । tena samaniṣedhaḥ phalitaḥ । ato nānya-
padavaiyarthyam । nanu kathamayaṃ samaniṣedhaḥ astyeva hi bhūtavaśināṃ yogasiddhānāṃ muktā-
nāñca brahmavadeva mūrtāmūrtaprapañcarūpatvena prapañcādutkṛṣṭatvamityāśaṃkānirākaraṇārthaṃ nāmadhe-
yoktipurassaraṃ tannirvacanam । tatra prāṇaśabdena prāṇādhiṣṭhātāro jīvā lakṣyante । te tāva-
tsatyabhūtā avikārāḥ । viyadādivatsvarūpānyathābhāvarūpotpattyabhāvāt । teṣāmapyutkṛṣṭaṃ
satyamavikārātmakaṃ brahma । jīvavajjñānasaṃkocavikāsātmikāyā dharmānyathābhāvarūpāyā
<pb n="256"/>
nanu san ghaṭaḥ san paṭa ityādiṣvanuvṛttaṃ sadrūpaṃ brahma satyam । anyat vyāva-
rtamānaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ <quote>‘neti neti’</quote> iti pratiṣedhati śrutirityata āha---
<sutra>sū ।। tadavyaktamāha hi ।। 22 ।।</sutra>
brahmasvarūpaṃ pratyakṣādinā pramāṇāntareṇa nābhivyajyate । <quote>‘na saṃdṛśe tiṣṭhati
rūpamasya । na cakṣuṣā paśyati kaścanainam । hṛdā’</quote> ityādinā yataḥ śrutirāha ataḥ
pratyakṣādinā siddhā sattā na brahmeti ।।
brahmasvarūpagrahaṇe hetumāha—
<sutra>sū ।। api saṃrādhane pratyakṣānumānābhyām ।। 23 ।।</sutra>
api tu dhyānarūpajñānena samyagārādhane brahmasvarūpaṃ gṛhyate । ye brahmabhāvitā
brahmopāsate, teṣāṃ brahmasvarūpaṃ grahaṇayogyaṃ bhavatīti śrutismṛtibhyāmavagamyate—
<quote>‘nāyamātmā pravacanena labhyo na medhayā na bahunā śrutena ।
yamevaiṣa vṛṇute tena labhyaḥ tasyaiṣa ātmā vivṛṇute tanūṃ svām ।।’</quote> iti ।
<quote>‘tatastu taṃ paśyate niṣkalaṃ dhyāyamānaḥ’</quote> ityādikā śrutiḥ ।
smṛtirapi—<quote>‘nāsau pratyakṣaviṣayaḥ’</quote> ityādikā ।।
<sutra>sū ।। prakāśādivaccāvaiśeṣyaṃ prakāśaśca karmaṇyabhyāsāt ।। 24 ।।</sutra>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
apyutpatterabhāvāt । tato yogināṃ muktānāṃ ca jñānavikāsānantaraṃ bhūrtāmūrtaprapañcarūpa-
tvasadbhāve'pi prāk jñānasaṃkocakāle tannāstīti sārvadikamū1rtāmūrtarūpatvaśāli brahma yathā
prapañcādutkṛṣṭaṃ na tathā jīvā ityabhiprāyaḥ । evamarthavarṇana eva <quote>‘dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe’</quote> ityā-
dyupakramānuguṇyaṃ <quote>‘nityo nityānāṃ cetanaścetanānā’</quote> mityādiśrutyantarānuguṇyaṃ ca labhyate
iti । <quote>‘atha prāṇā vai satya’</quote> mityādivākyaśeṣasya pūrvapakṣyabhimatārthanirākaraṇārthatveno-
ttarasūtramavatārayati—<pratika>nanviti । tadavyaktamāha hi ।।22।। na brahmeti</pratika> । kiṃtu brahmaśaktirūpā
prapañcopādānatvena tattādātmyāpannā sattetyarthaḥ । <pratika>sū॰ ।। api saṃrādhane pratyakṣānumā-
nābhyām ।। 23 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘apitvi’</quote>ti śabdo na cakṣuṣā paśyatīti vyāvartitātsādhanāntarā-
tsaṃrādhanasya viśeṣapradarśanārthaḥ । dhyānayajñenārādhanasya samyaktvaṃ parameśvaraprasādalabhyata-
dviṣayadṛḍhabhaktipūrvakatvam । brahmabhāvitāḥ brahmaṇaiva bhāvavantaḥ svaviṣayadṛḍhabhaktimantaḥ
kṛtāḥ । brahmabhāvavacchabdā<quote>‘ttatkarotī’</quote>ti ṇici ṇāviṣṭhavadbhāvāt <quote>‘vinmatorlugi’</quote>ti matu-
blope ṇyaṃtātkarmaṇi ktapratyaye <quote>‘niṣṭhāyāṃ seṭī’</quote> ti ṇilope ca sati brahmabhāvitā iti
rūpam । <pratika>nāyamātmeti</pratika> । pravacanaṃ bahuvedapariśramaḥ । medhā bahuvidyādhāraṇasamarthā dhīḥ ।
bahuśrutaṃ tarkamīmāṃsādipariśramaḥ । eṣaḥ paramātmā yaṃ nityanaimittikādyanuṣṭhānena malapāka-
vaśena ca śuddhāntaḥkaraṇaṃ vṛṇute svakīyatvena parigṛhṇāti madbhaktyā kṛtārtho'yaṃ bhavatviti
kaṭākṣayati । tenaiva labhyaḥ dṛḍhabhaktiviṣayatvena prāpyaḥ tasyaiva puruṣadhaureyasya svāṃ tanuṃ sa-
ccidānaṃdalakṣaṇāṃ vivṛṇute prakāśayatītyarthaḥ । dhyāyamāna iti hetau śānacpratyayaḥ । dhyānena
paśyatītyarthaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। prakāśādivaccāvaiśeṣyaṃ prakāśaśca karmaṇyabhyāsāt ।। 24 ।।</pratika>
<note>(1) <quote>‘sarvaprapañcarūpatva’</quote> iti kha॰ pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="257"/>
avicchinnānudhyānasaṃrādhanena yeṣāṃ brahma prakāśate teṣāṃ tena brahmadarśanena
viṣayīkaraṇe tajjñānānandāderjagadaiśvaryasya ca vaiśeṣyaṃ nāsti । tathā hi dṛśyate ।
<quote>‘ahaṃ manurabhavaṃ sūryaśca’</quote> <quote>‘taṃ māmāyuramṛtamityupāssva’</quote> ityādiṣu brahmopāsa-
kānāṃ tena bhāvanaikyena tadasādhāraṇaguṇaprāptiḥ । <quote>‘divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣuḥ paśya
me yogamaiśvaram’</quote> ityādiṣu hi kṛṣṇādīnāṃ tadaikyabhāvanayā tadaiśvaryaprakāśanaṃ
dṛśyate, brahmabhāvanābhyāsena ca viśvāmitrāgastyādīnāṃ svargāntarakaraṇajaladhi-
kabalanādisāmarthyam । loke ca mantriṇāṃ garuḍabhāvanayā garuḍāsādhāraṇadharma-
prāptiḥ । tasmāt brahmāhantāyāḥ prauḍhabhāve sati brahmāsādhāraṇadharmāṃśavaiśiṣṭya-
mupāsakānāmasādhāraṇamityanavadyam । ato ghāṭadiṣvanuvṛttaṃ sanmātraṃ pratyakṣaṃ
brahmeti viruddhameva । tasmāt sākṣātkārahetūnāṃ nididhyāsanādīnāṃ vaiyarthyaprasa-
ṅgāt apratyakṣe'pi tādṛśi talliṅgādarśanācca, ataḥ sanmātraṃ pratyakṣaṃ brahma tada-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
prakāśādivat brahmopāsanayā sākṣātkṛtabrahmaṇāṃ jñānānandāderiva jagadaiścaryasyāpyavaiśeṣyaṃ
bhavati । yathā teṣāṃ jñānānandāderbrahmajñānānandādadito viśeṣābhāvaḥ tathā teṣāṃ jagadaiśva-
ryasyāpi brahmaṇo jagadaiśvaryāt viśeṣābhāvo bhavati । ata eva bhagavataḥ kṛṣṇasyopāsanāka-
rmaṇyabhyāsāt ciranirantaraikāgryāt brahmasākṣātkāreṇa tadvajjagadaiśvaryaprāptyārjunāya tatpra-
kāśanaṃ gītāsu dṛśyate । agastyaviśvāmitrādīnāṃ ca jaladhipānasvargāntarakaraṇādisāma-
rthyaprakāśanaṃ purāṇeṣu dṛśyate । na caitadasaṃbhāvitam । loke'pi gāruḍamantropāsakānāṃ
garuḍabhāvanayā tadasādhāraṇadharmasya darśanamātreṇa viṣasaṃharaṇasāmarthyasya prāptidarśanāt ।
tasmādgaruḍāhaṃbhāvanayā garuḍāsādhāraṇakiyadarthaprāptivadbrahmāhaṃbhāvena brahmāsādhāraṇakiyaddha-
rmaprāptiryuktaiveti sūtrābhiprāyamāha—<pratika>avicchinnetyādinā</pratika> । nanu pūrvasūtre brahmasākṣātkārasya
kāraṇamuktamasminsūtre kāryamuktaṃ nānayorupayogaḥ prakṛte dṛśyata ityāśaṃkyāvyaktatvahetunā
brahmaṇaḥ <quote>‘sanghaṭa’</quote> ityādipratyakṣaviṣayatve nirākṛte tatra hetvaṃtarapradarśanaparatvenopayogaṃ darśa-
yansūtradvayārthamupasaṃharati—<pratika>ata iti</pratika> । yataḥ pāmarāṇāmapi bhavataḥ । <quote>‘sanghaṭa’</quote> ityādipra-
tyakṣasya brahmasākṣātkāre klṛptamupāsanārūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ nāsti । yataśca sarvajñānānandaiśvaryaviśe-
ṣāvirbhāvarūpaṃ tatkāryaṃ nāsti । ato'pi hetorna brahmaṇastadviṣayatvamityarthaḥ । nanvasya sūtra-
sya brahmasākṣātkārakāryopanyāsamukhenoktasādhye hetvantarapradarśanaparatve jñānānaṃdaiśvaryaviśe-
ṣāvirbhāvasya tatkāryatvamātramupanyasanīyam । kimarthamāvirbhavatāṃ teṣāṃ jñānādīnāṃ brahma-
jñānādyavaiśeṣyamapyupanyastam ? ucyate । <quote>‘netinetī’</quote> tyatra prakṛtaitāvattvasya niṣedho na rūpava-
ttvasyeti pradhānasādhye'pyānuṣaṃgikahetvantaralābhārthaṃ brahmasākṣātkāravatāṃ yadaiśvaryamāvirbha-
vati tadbrahmasāmyarūpamiti vaktavyam । <quote>‘nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaitī’</quote> ti śruteḥ । ato
yathā teṣāmāvirbhavajjñānānandarūpatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ svīkriyate evaṃ jagadaiśvaryamapi tasya svīkā-
ryamiti hetvantaraṃ tena pradarśyate । tadarthameva jñānānandayorapyaiśvaryavat brahmasākṣātkārakā-
ryatve tulyavadupanyasanīye'pi prakāśādivaditi tayordṛṣṭāntatayopādānaṃ sāmyamityetāvati
vaktavye avaiśeṣyamityanṛjuvacanamapi tadarthameva । anyathā jñānānaṃdābhyāmeva sāmyamastu
mābhūdaiśvaryato'pi sāmyamiti śaṃkā syāt । anṛjūktau tu paramaṃ sāmyamiti śrutyarthasūca-
<pb n="258"/>
nyat sarvaṃ niṣedhati neti netīti na yuktameva ।।
<sutra>sū ।। ato'nantena tathā hi liṅgam ।। 25 ।।</sutra>
yato brahmopāsīnānāmapi tadasādhāraṇajñānānandaparamaiś‍varyādikaṃ prakāśate,
ato <quote>‘dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe’</quote> ityādinābhihitenānantena kalyāṇaguṇena yogo
brahmaṇaḥ siddha eva । tasmādubhayaliṅgaṃ brahmeti ।।
nanu <quote>‘dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe’</quote> ityādinoktaṃ prapañcasya brahmarūpatvaṃ brahmaprapañcayo-
rādhyāsikasaṃbandhenaiva nirvāhyam, vidhāntareṇa tannirvāhāsaṃbhavāt । tataśca <quote>‘a-
thāta ādeśo neti neti’</quote> ityasya adhyastaprapañcaniṣedhaparatvameva yuktamityāśaṅkya
vināpyadhyāsasaṃbandhaṃ svābhimatena prakāreṇa tannirvāhaṃ vakṣyan prathamaṃ pakṣāntaramāha
<sutra>sū ।। ubhayavyapadeśāt tvahikuṇḍalavat ।। 26 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘sarvo vai rudraḥ’</quote> <quote>‘dyāvāpṛthivī janayan deva ekaḥ’</quote> ityekatvabahutvavyapadeśādaheḥ
kuṇḍalabhāvarjubhāvavat parameśvarasyaiva <quote>‘dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe’</quote> ityādinoktaḥ pṛthi-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nātsā śaṅkā nivartate । sarvairapi guṇaiḥ kiṃcitkiñcitsāmyaṃ hi paramaṃ sāmyaṃ na tu yena
kenacidga‍uṇena kiñcitsāmyam । prakāśādivacceti cakāro'pi tadarthaḥ । na kevalaṃ jñānā-
nandasāmyamātreṇa paramasāmyanirvāhaḥ । api tvaiśvaryasāmyenāpīti samuccayastadarthaḥ । dvitī-
yaścakārastvarthaḥ tadupāsanayā taddharmaprāptāvasaṃbhavaśaṃkānirākaraṇārthaḥ । amumevānuṣaṃgikaṃ
hetuṃ parāmṛśan anena prakṛtasādhyasiddhiṃ darśayati sūtrakāraḥ—<pratika>sū॰ ।। ato'nantena tathā
hi liṃgam ।। 25 ।।</pratika> upāsīnānāmapītyapiśabdena upāsyasyāpi paramasāmyaṃ śrutiprāptaṃ

tyādiśabdena brahmaṇaḥ kalyāṇaguṇajātapratipādakaṃ sarvaṃ vacanajātaṃ gṛhyate । <quote>‘anantene’</quote>tyasya
kalyāṇaguṇeneti viśeṣyopādānena <quote>‘athavānantakalyāṇaguṇaikaghana īśvaraḥ । śiva ityu-

prayukta iti dyotitam । <quote>‘tathā hi liṃga’</quote> miti sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>tasmāditi</pratika> । anena
<quote>‘tathā hī’</quote> tyasya tathāsati hītyartho liṃgamityasya <quote>‘pītā gāvo bhuktā brāhmaṇā’</quote> itivadarśa-
ādyacpratyayāntatvenobhayaliṃgamityarthaśca darśito bhavati । nirviśeṣabrahmavāde'pi nirdoṣa-
tvāṃśassampratipanna iti guṇavattvaprasādhanamukhenobhayaliṃgatvopasaṃhāraḥ kṛtaḥ । uttarasūtra-
mavatārayitumāśaṅkate—<pratika>nanviti</pratika> । yadyapi <quote>‘aṃśo nānāvyapadeśā’</quote> dityadhikaraṇe citprapa-
ñcasya brahmāpṛthaksiddhaviśeṣaṇatārūpāṃśatvasamarthanādacitprapañcasyāpi tathātvaṃ tulyanyāyatayā

viśeṣaṇatvenopādānāt । viśiṣyaivācitprapañcasya brahmaśaktipariṇāmitvena tadapṛthaksiddha-
viśeṣaṇatālakṣaṇatāsaṃbaṃdhaḥ prakṛtyadhikaraṇādiṣu siddhaḥ, tathāpi matāntaropanyāsapūrvakaṃ
svamate viśeṣapradarśanena svamatapariśuddhisiddha‍yartho'yamāraṃbha ityāśayaḥ । <pratika>sū॰ ।। ubhaya-
vyapadeśāttvahikuṇḍalavat ।। 26 ।। aheriti</pratika> । yathā hyaherahitvenābhede'pi kuṇḍa-

rūpāpattyā bheda ityarthaḥ । na cāherviśrāntisaṃcārādiprayuktabhogaviśeṣārthaṃ kuṇḍalabhāvaṛ-

vyādibhāvasaṃsthānaviśeṣaḥ ।।

kajātiyogeneti vā tasya pṛthivyādibhāvaḥ ।।
<sutra>sū ।। pūrvavadvā ।। 28 ।।</sutra>
vāśabdaḥ pakṣadvayavyāvṛttyarthaḥ । yathā pūrvatra prakāśajātiguṇaśarīravadviśeṣaṇa-

vidyāvidyātmakaṃ sarvaṃ viśvaṃ viśvagurorvibhoḥ ।
rūpameva na saṃdeho viśvaṃ tasya vaśe yataḥ ।।’</quote>
ityādipurāṇavacanaprāmāṇyācca cidacidvastunoraṣṭamūrterbrahmaṇaḥ śarīratā ca siddhā ।

ca । etaduktaṃ bhavati—cidacitoḥ kāraṇatve'pi tadviśiṣṭatve'pi brahmaṇaḥ śivasya

<head>atha prakṛtaitāvattvādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato bravīti ca bhūyaḥ ।। 21 ।। tadavyaktamāha hi ।। 22 ।। api
saṃrādhane pratyakṣānumānābhyām ।। 23 ।। prakāśādivaccāvaiśeṣyaṃ prakāśaśca karmaṇyabhyāsāt ।। 24 ।।
ato'nantena tathāhi liṃgam ।। 25 ।। ubhayavyapadeśāttvahikuṇḍalavat ।। 26 ।। prakāśāśrayavadvā teja-
stvāt ।। 27 ।। pūrvavadvā ।। 28 ।। pratiṣedhācca ।। 29 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>na brahmobhayaliṃgaṃ taddhi mitaṃ nirviśeṣasanmātram । tadrūpasya niṣedhātsarvasya ca neti netīti ।। 189 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>na ca tacchrutyā brahmaṇi vihitaṃ yenāniṣedhyaṃ syāt । sanghaṭa ityādidhiyā sati tasya brahmaṇi prasaktatvāt ।। 190 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>evamanuvartamāne sadrūpe brahmaṇi pratītamidam । vyāvartamānamakhilaṃ kalpitamiti tasya sadrūpam ।। 191 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>ādhyāsikasaṃbandhaṃ vinā ca tadrūpatāstu kiṃ tasya । ahikuṇḍalatādinaye pariṇāmitvādayo hi doṣāḥ syuḥ ।। 193 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>maivaṃ prakṛteyattāpratiṣedho netipadabodhyaḥ । prāyo guṇopadeśāt vihitapratiṣedhanasya cāyogāt ।। 193 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>avyaktaṃ brahma tannaḥ sphurati viṣayadhīṣvasya saṃrādhane syāt pratyakṣaṃ gāhate tattvakhilamapi guṇaṃ saccidānandatulyam ।</l></lg>
<lg><l>kiṃcaiśvaryāṃśamasya svayamapi dadhate yogitaḥ kauśikādyāḥ prauḍhyā tadbhāvanāyāstadapi yutatayaivāsya rūpaṃ prapañcaḥ ।। 194 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti prakṛtaitāvattvādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha prakṛtaitāvattvādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato bravīti ca bhūyaḥ ।। 21 ।। tadavyaktamāha hi ।। 22 ।। api
saṃrādhane pratyakṣānumānābhyām ।। 23 ।। prakāśādivaccāvaiśeṣyaṃ prakāśaśca karmaṇyabhyāsāt ।। 24 ।।
ato'nantena tathāhi liṃgam ।। 25 ।। ubhayavyapadeśāttvahikuṇḍalavat ।। 26 ।। prakāśāśrayavadvā
tejastvāt ।। 27 ।। pūrvavadvā ।। 28 ।। pratiṣedhācca ।। 29 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ niṣedhaśrutibhirbrahma nirviśeṣaṃ sidhyatītyuktamayuktaṃ tābhirbrahmaṇo'pi niṣiddhatvādityākṣepasaṃgatye-
damāha—<pratika>sū ।। prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato bravīti ca bhūyaḥ ।। 21 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe mūrtaṃ caivā-
mūrtaṃ ca’</quote> ityupakramya <quote>‘athāta ādeśo neti neti’</quote> iti śrūyate । tatra kiṃ prapañco brahma cetyubhayamapi niṣidhyate uta ekam ।
ekamityatrāpi prapañca brahma veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । niyāmakābhāvādubhayamapīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । athavā prapañcasya pratyakṣatvena
niṣedhāsaṃbhavānniravadhikaniṣedhāyogādekaṃ brahmaiva niṣidhyata iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, prakṛtaṃ pradhānam etāvattvaṃ-
miyattāparicchinnaṃ yadbrahmaṇo rūpadvayaṃ tatprakṛtaitābattvam । tadeva pratiṣedhati <quote>‘neti neti’</quote> ityādiśrutiḥ । itiśabdasya pradhā-
matvena prakṛtarūpadvayaparāmarśitvāt । brahma tu na pradhānatvena prakṛtam । <quote>‘dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe’</quote> iti rūpadvayātmakajagadupasarja-
natvenaivābhihitatvāt । itaśca brahmaṇo na niṣedhaḥ । <pratika>hi</pratika>=yasmāt । <pratika>tataḥ</pratika>=prapañcaniṣedhānantaraṃ <pratika>bhūyaḥ</pratika> <quote>‘na hyetasmāditi
netyanyatparamasti’</quote> iti etasmāt=netinetītyādiṣṭādbrahmaṇaḥ anyat vyatiriktaṃ nāsti brahmaiva tu paramastītyetannirvacanavākyaṃ
bravīti । yadvā । tataḥ prapañcaniṣedhasya parastāt <quote>‘atha nāmadheyam’</quote> ityādivākyaṃ brahma bravītītyarthaḥ । na ca prapañcaniṣedhe
pratyakṣavirodhaḥ । tasya vyāvahārikaprāmāṇyādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu yadi brahmāsti tarhyupalabhyeta tatrāha---<pratika>sū ।। tadavyaktamāha hi ।। 22 ।। tat</pratika>=brahma । avyaktaṃ na vyajyate ityavyaktaṃ
pratyakṣādyagocaram । <pratika>hi</pratika>=yataḥ <quote>‘na cakṣuṣā gṛhyate nāpi vācā’</quote> ityādiśrutirāhetyarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>tarhi sarvadā brahmagrahaṇābhāve mokṣo na syādityāha---<pratika>sū ।। api saṃrādhane pratyakṣānumānābhyām ।। 23 ।।
apicainaṃ</pratika> paramātmānam । <pratika>saṃrādhane</pratika>=samādhyavasthāyām । kṛtārthāḥ paśyanti iti <pratika>pratyakṣānumānābhyām</pratika>=śrutismṛti-
bhyām । <quote>‘kaściddhīraḥ pratyagātmānamaikṣadāvṛttacakṣuramṛtatvamicchan’</quote> ityādikā śrutiḥ <quote>‘yaṃ vinidrā jitaśvāsāḥ saṃtuṣṭāssaṃya-
tendriyāḥ । jyotiḥ paśyanti yuñjānāstasmai yogātmane namaḥ ।।’</quote> iti smṛttiḥ tābhyāmavagamyata ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>nanu jīvabrahmaṇordhyātṛdhyeyabhāvāṅgīkāre bhedaḥ syādityāśaṃkyāha---<pratika>sū ।। prakāśādivaccāvaiśeṣyaṃ prakāśaśca
karmaṇyabhyāsāt ।। 24 ।।</pratika> yathā sauraḥ prakāśo'ṅgulyādyupādhau karmaṇi bhinna iva pratibhāti vastutastvekarūpaḥ tadvatpra-
<pb n="261"/>
kāśaḥ paramātmāpi dhyānādyupādhau karmaṇi bhinna iva bhāti । vastutastu <pratika>avaiśeṣyam</pratika>=ekarūpatvamātmanaḥ । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>abhyāsāt</pratika>=<quote>‘tattvamasi’</quote> ityādyabhedaśrutyabhyāsādityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>kiṃca । <pratika>sū ।। ato'nantena tathā hi liṃgam ।। 25 ।।</pratika> ataśca bhedasyaupādhikatvādvidyayā bhedaṃ vidhūya jīvo'-
nantena paramātmanā ekatāṃ gacchati । <pratika>tathā hi liṃgam</pratika>=<quote>‘sa yo havaitatparamaṃ brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati’</quote>ityādyapūrvārtha-
jñāpakamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>itthaṃ jīvabrahmaṇoḥ pāramārthikābhedamabhidhāya svamatapariśuddhaye bhedābhedavādamupamyasyati—<pratika>sū ।। ubhayavyapadeśāttva-
hikuṇḍalavat ।। 23 ।।</pratika> dhyātṛdhyeyabhāvādinā bhedasyābhedasya ca śrutau vyapadeśājjīveśvarayorbhedābhedau bhavataḥ । tuśabda-
ssiddhāntavaiṣamyadyotanārthaḥ । <pratika>ahikuṇḍalavat</pratika>=aheḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣo'hikuṇḍalam । tayorahitvenābhedaḥ kuṇḍalatvena
bhedo yathā tadvadityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>dharmabhedena bhedābhedāviti pakṣamabhidhāya ekadharmāvacchedenaiva bhedābhedāviti pakṣāntaramāha—<pratika>sū ।। prakāśāśrayavadvā
tejastvāt ।। 27 ।।</pratika> yathā sāvitraḥ prakāśaḥ tadāśrayaśca savitā tayornātyantabhedaḥ, tejastvāviśeṣāt, tathāpi bhedaśca
pratīyate । evaṃ ca ekatejastvāvacchedenaiva pramāṇabalādbhedābhedau । tadvajjīveśvarayorbhedābhedāvityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>nanu bhedasya pāramārthikatve jñānanivartyatvāsaṃbhavānmokṣo na syāt । ekadharmāvacchedena bhedābhedayorekatrāṅgīkāre loke
virodhakathaiva na syādityādidoṣajātaṃ paramate matvā niravadyaṃ svasiddhāntamāha—<pratika>sū ।। pūrvavadvā ।। 28 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘prakāśādiva-
ccāvaiśeṣyam’</quote> ityatra pūrvaṃ bhedaḥ kālpanikaḥ abhedaḥ pāramārthika iti yaduktaṃ sa eva siddhānto'bhyupeyaḥ ।</p>
<p>kiṃca <pratika>sū ।। pratiṣedhācca ।। 29 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘nānyo'to'sti draṣṭā’</quote> ityādinā śāstreṇa paramātmavyatiriktasya cetanasya <quote>‘neti
netī’</quote> tyādinā śāstreṇa prapañcasya ca pratiṣedhāt brahmādvitīyamityayameva <pratika>siddhāntaḥ</pratika> । tasmācchrutibalānnirviśeṣamekameva
brahmetī siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate ca</pratika> <quote>‘athāta ādeśo neti neti’</quote> ityādinā pūrvaprakṛtasya mūrtāmūrtaprapañcasya brahmaṇo
rūpatvapratiṣedhānniṣprapañcaṃ sanmātrameva brahma na punaruktasvarūpamubhayaliṃgamityāśaṃkyāha---<pratika>sū ।। prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi prati-
ṣedhati tato bravīti ca bhūyaḥ ।। 21 ।।</pratika> atra <quote>‘dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe mūrtaṃ cāmūrtaṃ ca’</quote> iti pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśātmaka-
mūrtāmūrtaprapañcarūpatvaṃ brahmaṇa uktvā <quote>‘athāta ādeśo neti neti’</quote> iti śrūyate । anena brahmaṇa ubhayaliṃgatvaṃ niṣidhyate na
veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । atretiśabdasya pūrvaprakṛtaparāmarśitvādbrahmaṇaḥ pūrvapratipāditaṃ mūrtāmūrtaprapaṃcarūpatvaṃ niṣidhyata iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।
siddhāntastu</pratika>, mūrtāmūrtaprapaṃcasya brahmaṇo rūpatayā pramāṇāntarāprajñātasyātraiva rūpatayopadiṣṭasya niṣedhāsaṃbhavātprakṛtaitāvattvaṃ
hi brahmaṇaḥ pratiṣedhati <quote>‘athāta ādeśo netinetī’</quote> ti śrutiḥ । pūrvaprakṛtaitāvanmātraṃ brahma na bhavati iti tadarthaḥ । <pratika>tato
bravīti ca bhūyaḥ</pratika>’=tataḥ pūrvāktādbha‍ūyastvaṃ bravīti ca vākyaśeṣaḥ <quote>‘na hyetasmāditi netyanyatparamasti atha nāmadheyaṃ satyasya
satyamiti prāṇā vai satyaṃ teṣāmeṣa satya’</quote> miti । ataḥ prakṛtadharmeyattāpratiṣedhaparatvā <quote>‘nniti netī’</quote> ti vākyasya brahmaṇaḥ pūrva-
siddhamubhayaliṃgatvaṃ na hīyata eva ।।</p>
<p>nanu <quote>‘sanghaṭassanpaṭa’</quote> ityādiṣvanuvṛttaṃ brahma satyaṃ tadatiriktaṃ vyāvartamānaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ <quote>‘netinetī’</quote> ti śrutiḥ pratiṣedhatī-
tyata āha—<pratika>sū ।। tadavyaktamāha hi ।। 22 ।।</pratika> tadbrahma na kenāpi pramāṇena vyaktam । <quote>‘na saṃdṛśe tiṣṭhati rūpamasye’</quote>
tyādikā śrutistathā pratipādayati hi । ataḥ pratyakṣādinā siddhā sattā na brahmeti ।</p>
<p>brahmasvarūpagrahaṇe hetumāha---<pratika>sū ।। api saṃrādhane pratyakṣānumānābhyām ।। 23 ।।</pratika> api tu dhyānarūpajñānena samyagārādhane
brahmasvarūpaṃ gṛhyate । iti <quote>‘nāyamātmā pravacananena labhyaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘nāhaṃ vedairna tapasā’</quote> <quote>‘nāsau pratyakṣaviṣayaḥ’</quote> ityādiśrutismṛti-
vākyābhyāmavagamyate ।।</p>
<p>jñānānandavajjagadaiśvaryamapi brahmaṇo rūpamityāha---<pratika>sū ।। prakāśādivaccāvaiśeṣyaṃ prakāśaśca karmaṇyabhyāsāt
।। 24 ।।</pratika> avicchinnānudhyānasaṃrādhanena yeṣāṃ brahma prakāśate teṣāṃ tena brahmadarśanena viṣayīkaraṇe tajjñānānandāderjagadaiśvaryasya
ca vaiśeṣyaṃ nāsti । tathā hi śrūyate <quote>‘ahaṃ manurabhavaṃ sūryaśce’</quote> tyādiḥ । tasmādbrahmāhantāyāḥ prauḍhabhāve sati brahmāsādhāraṇadharmāṃ-
śavaiśiṣṭyamupāsakānāmasādhāraṇamityanavadyam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ato'nantena tathāhi liṃgam ।। 25 ।।</pratika> ato dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe’ ityādinopadiṣṭenānantena kalyāṇa-
guṇagaṇena yogo brahmaṇassiddhaḥ । tathā satyubhayaliṃgameva brahma ।। <pratika>iti rāmānujamate prakṛtaitāvattvādhikaraṇam ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, tvidamadhikaraṇamanuvartate । atastatsamāpyānantaraṃ rāmānujamatakriyāmanusṛtya ahikuṇḍalādhi-
karaṇaṃ nirūpayiṣyate ।</p>
<p>nanu dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe’ ityādinoktaṃ prapañcasya brahmarūpatvaṃ brahmaprapañcayorādhyāsikasaṃbandhenaiva nirvāhyam । vidhāntareṇa
tannirvāhāsaṃbhavāt । tataśca <quote>‘athāta ādeśo neti netī’</quote> tyasya adhyastaprapañcaniṣedhaparatvameva yuktamityāśaṃkya vināpyadhyāsa-
<pb n="262"/>
saṃbandhaṃ svābhimatena prakāreṇa tannirvāhaṃ vakṣyanpakṣāntaraṃ prathamamāha---<pratika>sū ।। ubhayavyapadeśāttvahikuṇḍalavat ।। 26 ।।</pratika>
<quote>‘sarvo vai rudraḥ’</quote> <quote>‘dyāvāpṛthivī janayandeva ekaḥ’</quote> ityekatvabahutvavyapadeśādaheḥ kuṇḍalabhāvarjubhāvavat parameśvarasyaiva <quote>‘dve vāva
brahmaṇo rūpe’</quote> ityādinoktaḥ pṛthivyādibhāvasaṃsthānaviśeṣaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। prakāśāśrayavadvā tejastvāt ।। 27 ।।</pratika> prakāśatadāśrayayoryathā svarūpabhede'pi tejastvayogenaikyam evamaciddra-
hmaṇorekajātiyogeneti vā tasya pṛthivyādibhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। pūrvavadvā ।। 28 ।।</pratika> vāśabdaḥ pakṣadvayavyāvṛttyarthaḥ । yathā pūrvatra prakāśajātiguṇaśarīravadviśeṣaṇataikasvabhāvatayā
viśiṣṭaikadeśatvenāṃśatvamuktaṃ cidvastunaḥ evamacidvastuno'pi । <quote>‘sarvo vai rudraḥ’</quote> iti cidacidvastunorekena śabdenābhidhānaṃ
hi śakyamekarūpabhūtayoḥ pūrvoktasaṃbandhe satyeva । itarapakṣadvaye brahmaṇassadoṣatvaṃ durnivāram । <quote>‘yasya pṛthivī śarīram’</quote> <quote>‘yasyātmā
śarīram’</quote> ityādiśruteḥ । <quote>‘vidyeti cetanāṃ prāhustathāvidyāmacetanām’</quote> ityādipuṃrāṇavacanaprāmāṇyācca cidacidvastunoraṣṭamūrte-
rbrahmaṇaśśarīratā ca siddhā ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। pratiṣedhācca ।। 29 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘nāsya jarayaitajjīryati’</quote> <quote>‘asthūlamanaṇvahrasvam’</quote> ityādiṣu cidacidātmatve'pi brahmaṇasta-
ddharmapratiṣedhācca cidaciddviśiṣṭamapi brahma nirdoṣanikhilamaṃgalaguṇāspadaṃ ca । evaṃ cidacidviśiṣṭasyāpi brahmaṇo vikārājñatvā-
dyapuruṣārthadharmarahitatvaṃ sarvajñatvādiparamapuruṣārthadharmavattvaṃ ca nityasiddhameveti ।। <pratika>iti śrīkaṇṭhamate prakṛtaitāvattvā-
dhikaraṇam ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate, <quote>‘ubhayavyapadeśāttvahikuṇḍalavat’</quote></pratika> ityādikamahikuṇḍalādhikaraṇamiti vyapadiśyate । atrādhikaraṇe
nnedhā saṃśayamāpādya śrīkaṇṭhamatavadeva pakṣadvaye brahmaṇassadopatvāpattyā jīvasyaiva brahmaśarīratayā brahmaviśeṣaṇatvenācidvastuno
brahmāṃśatvamiti <pratika>siddhāntaśca</pratika> nirūpitaḥ । sūtrārthavarṇanādikamaviśiṣṭameva prāyaḥ śrīkaṇṭhamatāditi na tatpratanyate ।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, idamadhikaraṇatritayātmatayā vibhaktam । tatrādyaṃ sūtraṃ <pratika>prakṛtādhikaraṇamiti</pratika> vyapadiśyate ।
<pratika>sū ।। prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato bravīti ca bhūyaḥ ।। 22 ।।</pratika> parameśvarabhaktisiddhaye tasya pālakatvama-
himātra varṇyate । sṛṣṭisaṃhārakartuḥ parameśvarasya pālakatvaṃ nāma vyāpārāntaramasti vā na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । prayojanābhāvā-
tpālanaṃ nāma vyāpārāntaraṃ nāṅgīkaraṇīyamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, <quote>‘naitāvadenā paro anyadastyukṣā sa dyāvā-
pṛthivī bibharti’</quote> iti śrutisiddhaṃ pālanaṃ nāma vyāpārāntaramaṅgīkaraṇīyamiti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, hi</pratika>=yataḥ । <quote>‘naitāva’</quote>diti
śrutiḥ <pratika>prakṛtaitāvattvam</pratika>=prakṛtasya sṛṣṭyādikartṛtvasyaitāvattvaṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārakartṛtvamātraparyavasitatvam । <pratika>pratiṣedhati</pratika>=nirā-
<pratika>caṣṭe । tataḥ</pratika>=sṛṣṭyādikartṛtvāt । <pratika>bhūyaḥ</pratika>=adhikaṃ pālakatvaṃ ca । <pratika>bravīti</pratika>=ataḥ <quote>‘sṛṣṭi ce’</quote> ti śabdasūcitaṃ pālakatvaṃ ca
mahimāntaramastīti jñāpayatītyarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti prakṛtādhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>athāvyaktādhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। tadavyaktamāha hi ।। 23 ।।</pratika> atra parameśvarasyopalabdhiyogyatvaṃ vā tadayogyatvaṃ veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । īśvarasyo-
palabdhiyogyatve staṃbhāderiva tadāparokṣyaṃ puruṣaprayatnasādhyaṃ bhavet । avyaktatve sādhanasahasrairapi na tatsaṃbhavedadṛṣṭāderiva ।
ataḥ ubhayathāpi īśvarāparokṣyāya bhaktyādyanapekṣaiveti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika> avyaktasyaiva parameśvarasya bhaktiśraddhāśravaṇa-
mananādyabhyāsātprakāśo bhavatīti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, tat</pratika>=brahma । <pratika>avyaktam</pratika>=puruṣaprayatnena draṣṭumaśakyasvabhāvam । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>hi</pratika>=yasmāt । <quote>‘avyaktaṃ ca niṣkala’</quote> miti śrutista<pratika>thāha</pratika> tasmādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। api saṃrādhane pratyakṣānumānābhyām ।। 24 ।। api</pratika>=bhaktirahitārādhanenāpi na brahma vyaktīkartuṃ śakyam ।
kutaḥ <pratika>saṃrādhane'pi</pratika>=saṃpūjane'pi । avyaktatvasya <pratika>pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ</pratika>=jñānipratyakṣatvasūkṣmatvahetukānumānābhyāṃ
siddhatvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। prakāśavaccāvaiśeṣyam ।। 25 ।।</pratika> co nañarthaḥ । <pratika>prakāśavat</pratika>=yathāgneḥ sthūlasūkṣmābhyāṃ vyaktāvyaktatve tathā
brahma na । kiṃ tu svato vyaktameva । kutaḥ । yato'vaiśeṣyam=brahmaṇi sthūlasūkṣmatvaviśeṣo nāsti ata ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। prakāśaśca karmaṇyabhyāsāt ।। 26 ।।</pratika> prakāśaścāparokṣajñānaṃ ca karmaṇi viṣayabhūte brahmaṇi । <pratika>abhyāsāt</pratika>=
śravaṇāderāvartanādbhavatītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ato'nantena tathā hi liṃgam ।। 27 ।। ataḥ</pratika>=avyaktatve pratyakṣatve ca pramāṇasadbhāvāttadanyathānupapattyā ।
<pratika>anantena</pratika>=aparicchinnena brahmaṇā tatprasādenāvyaktasyāparokṣyaṃ bhavatīti jñāyate । na kevalamanupapattimātrāt । kiṃ tarhi ।
<pratika>hi</pratika>=yasmāt <pratika>tathā liṃgaṃ</pratika>=<quote>‘tasyābhidhyānā’</quote> dityuktamīśaprasādasya bandhanivṛttihetutvarūpaṃ prasādasya darśanahetutvajñāpakamasti
tasmādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>।। ityavyaktādhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।</head>
<head>athāhikuṇḍalādhikaraṇam ।। 15 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ubhayavyapadeśāttvahikuṇḍalavat ।। 28 ।।</pratika> atra parameśvarasya guṇakriyādayo yadi bhinnāstadā samavāyasya
<pb n="263"/>
atha parādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
tadiha sakalacidacidākāraparamaśaktivilāsasamarasātmanaḥ sarvadoṣavāsanā-
kalaṃkarahitāt sarvajñatādisakalamaṅgalaguṇaratnākarāt parabrahmaṇo virūpākṣācchi-
vādetasmāt paraṃ kiṃcidapi vastvantaraṃ nāstīti vaktuṃ prathamamāśaṅkate—
<sutra>sū ।। paramataḥ setūnmānasaṃbandhabhedavyapadeśebhyaḥ ।। 30 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘janmādyasya yataḥ’</quote> ityādinā <quote>‘pratiṣedhācca’</quote> ityantena yaḥ paramakāraṇatayā
pratipāditaḥ parameśvaraḥ itaḥ paramapi vastvasti na vā</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha parādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p>uttarādhikaraṇaṃ tatpratipādyapradarśanapūrvakamavatārayati—<pratika>tadiheti ।</pratika> <quote>‘na sthānato'pi’</quote> ti
sūtre paraśabdena brahma sarvoṃtkṛṣṭatvenānūditaṃ tadadhikaraṇapratipādyobhayaliṃgatvabādhābādhavi-
cārārthatvenāntaraṃgatvāttadanantaraṃ prakṛtaitāvattvādhikaraṇaṃ pravṛttam । tatsūtre'pi parasye-
tyanuvṛttestasya sarvotkṛṣṭatvaprasaṃgo'nuvṛttaḥ । tena samarāhityamapyarthasiddham । anyathā tasya
svavyatiriktasarvotkṛṣṭatvāsiddheḥ । tadviṣayavākye <quote>‘na hyetasmā’</quote> diti <quote>‘netyanyatparamastī’</quote>
ti tasya samarāhityaṃ pratipāditam । tataḥ kaimutikanyāyādadhikarāhityamarthasiddham ।
evaṃ prasaktamubhayamapi saṃbhāvitasakalaśaṃkāparihāreṇa nyāyataḥ sthirīkartumuttarādhikaraṇadvayaṃ
tatrāpyadhikarāhitye nirṇīte mābhūdadhikaḥ samaḥ kaścidastviti śaṃkā pravartitumuciteti
prathamamadhikarāhityaṃ nirṇāyata iti saṃgatiriha vivakṣitā <pratika>। sū॰ ।। paramatassetūnmānasaṃ-
baṃdhabhedavyapadeśebhyaḥ ।। 30 ।।</pratika> nanvetāvatparyaṃtena sūtrasaṃdarbheṇa sakalajagatkāraṇatayā
tadupapādakasakalakalyāṇaguṇavattayā muktopāsyatayā muktopa1sṛpyatayā ca pratipāditātpara-
meśvarātparo'stīti śaṃkā nāvakāśaṃ labhata ityāśaṃkya samyagālocayatāṃ tathaiva tathāpi
setvādivyapadeśānnirīkṣamāṇānāṃ mandadhiyāṃ tathā śaṃkā bhavediti tadapākaraṇāya teṣāṃ
gatipradarśanārtho'yamāraṃbhaḥ ityabhipretyāha—<pratika>janmādyasyeti</pratika> । setvādivyapadeśānāṃ gatyanta-
rāsaṃbhavasaṃbhavābhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvapakṣaḥ । bhavatu jagatkāraṇatvādiyuktaṃ paraṃ brahma muktaprāpyaṃ tu
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nirākṛtatvāttadvattvamanupapannam । yadyabhinnāstadā jñānādimattvaṃ sraṣṭṛtvasaṃhartṛtvādikaṃ cānupapannamityubhayathāpi mahimarahite
tasminnanupapannā bhaktiḥ iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । pārameśvarā guṇakriyādayassarve'pi tenābhinnā eva tasya dharmāśca bhavanti । abhe-
de'pi bhedapratinidherviśeṣasya balāddharmadharmitvagocarā vyavahārāḥ pravartante । ataḥ śrutiṣu dharmadharmibhāvarūpobhayavyapadeśasattvā-
dupapannamahimaśālini tasminnupapannā bhaktiriti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu</pratika>, brahma ānandaguṇaṃ tadrūpaṃ ca bhavati । kutaḥ <pratika>ubhayavyapa-
deśāt</pratika>=<quote>‘ānando brahma’</quote> <quote>‘ānandaṃ brahmaṇa’</quote> ityādiśrutiṣu guṇātmakatvena guṇitvena ca brahmaṇa uktatvāt । tadapi katham ।
<pratika>ahikuṇḍalavat</pratika>=yathā ahessarpasya kuṇḍalatvaṃ kuṇḍalitvaṃ ca viśeṣāttathetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। prakāśāśrayavadvā tejastvāt ।। 29 ।।</pratika> yathā prakāśāśrayasyādityasya prakāśarūpatvaṃ tadāśrayatvaṃ ca tadvadbrahma-
ṇo'pi । anyaparityāgena ādityadṛṣṭānte ko heturityata uktaṃ <pratika>tejastvāditi</pratika> । brahmādityayorubhayorapi tejorūpatvāttada-
bhiprāyeṇa tadda‍ṛṣṭāntīkaraṇāmatyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। pūrvavadvā ।। 30 ।।</pratika> yathā kālaḥ pūrveṇābhinno'pi pūrvakāla iti pūrvapadena viśeṣyate tathā brahma ānandena viśe-
ṣyata ityarthaḥ । ādarārthaṃ sthūlasūkṣmavuddhivivakṣayā vā dṛṣṭāntatrayoktiḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। pratiṣedhācca ।। 31 ।।</pratika> brahma guṇānāṃ brahmaṇaśca <quote>‘neha nāne’</quote> ti bhedasya pratiṣedhācca brahma guṇātmakamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>ityahikuṇḍalādhikaraṇam ।। 15 ।।</head>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ prakṛtaitāvattvādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<note>(1) <quote>‘muktaprāpyatayā’</quote> iti. kha॰ pāṭhaḥ ।</note>

<p>iti saṃśaye'stīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । tathā hi—<quote>‘atha ya ātmā sa seturvidhṛtiḥ’</quote> <quote>‘etaṃ
setuṃ tīrtvā andhaḥ sannanandho bhavati’</quote> iti <quote>‘catuṣpādbrahma’</quote> <quote>‘amṛtasyaiṣa setuḥ’</quote>
ityādibhirasya parabrahmaṇaḥ setutvataritavyatvaparimitatvaprāpakatvādīni vyapa-

siddhānta ucyate—
sū ।। sāmānyāttu ।। 31 ।।

vastu tato'nyadeva tasmādapi paramiti setvādivyapadeśato'vagabhyate । tathā hi—setuvyapa-

kalā candraḥ kalā vidyutkalaiṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇo jyotiṣmānnāma prāṇaḥ kalā
cakṣuḥ kalā śrotraṃ kalā manaḥ kalaiṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇa āyatanavānnāme’ ti
gavāṃ pādeṣu purato dvau khurau paścāt dvau pārṣṇī ityekaikasminpāde catvāraścatvāraḥ śaphā-
ssanti । te kalāśabdenocyante । evaṃ parimitaṃ brahmetyaparimitaṃ yatprāpyaṃ mokṣaśāstreṣu
prasiddhaṃ tadbrahmaṇo'nyattatprāpyamityavasīyate । sākṣādeva muktaprāpyasya brahmaṇaśca prāpyaprāpaka-
bhāvasaṃbaṃdhasyāpi vyapadeśo dṛśyate । <quote>‘tasyaiṣa somaḥ amṛtasya paraṃ setu’</quote> miti । tathāca
<quote>‘amṛtasyaiṣa setu’</quote> rityasyāpi tadaikārthyaṃ yuktam । sākṣācca vedānteṣu paraśabdena prasiddhā-
dbrahmaṇaḥ paraṃ prāptavyamiti bhedasyāpi vyapadeśo dṛśyate <quote>‘parātparaṃ puruṣamupaiti divya’</quote> miti ।
na ca brahmasākṣātkārarūpasādhanādbrahmaṇa eva prāptavyatvaṃ yuktamiti śaṃkanīyam । mokṣahetu-

<head>atha anyapratiṣedhādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। tathānyapratiṣedhāt ।। 35 ।।</pratika> nanu, puruṣasūktanārāyaṇānuvākādīnāmavirodhena
gati <quote>‘retena sarve vyākhyātāḥ’</quote> ‘anupapattestu na śārīra ityādyadhikaraṇeṣu prapañcitā kathaṃ
tadavalaṃbano'tra pūrvapakṣaḥ, ucyate । puruṣasūkte nārāyaṇasya sarvakāraṇatvapratipādanaṃ pārame-
śvaracicchaktyaṃśatvena jagadupādānatvābhiprāyamityupapāditam । tannopapadyate । tasya tadaṃ-
śatve pramāṇābhāvāt । nārāyaṇānuvāke tasya sarvaiśvaryaparabrahmabhāvādipratipādanaṃ daharo-
pāsakasya parameśvaraikyabhāvanādārḍhyābhiprāyamityupapāditam । tadapi nopapadyate । dahara-
vidyāyāṃ svayamupāsyasya tasyānyopāsaka1tvāsaṃbhavāt । śrūyate hi ātmaprabodhopaniṣadi
<quote>‘yadidaṃ brahma puramidaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ tasya ya ātmā hṛtpuṇḍarīkamadhye’</quote> ityupakramya <quote>‘brahmaṇyo
devakīputro brahmaṇyo madhusūdana’</quote> iti tataḥ <quote>‘prāk oṃ namo nārāyaṇāye’</quote> ti mantropāsanaṃ
<quote>‘vaikuṇṭhaṃ bhagavallokaṃ gamiṣyatī’</quote> ti tadīyadaharavidyāṃgamaṃtrastatphalaṃ cetyubhayaṃ darśitam । nārā-
yaṇopāsanayā talloke tatsāyujyaprāptiśca śivasāyujyaprāptivadevānāvṛttiphalā । ata eva
mahābhārate śivavacanam—<quote>‘sāyujyānāṃ viśiṣṭe dve māmakaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tathā । māṃ prāpya na
nivartaṃte viṣṇuṃ vā śubhalocane’</quote> ।। iti । etadabhiprāyeṇaiva bodhāyanādibhiḥ <quote>‘mahādevaṃ
mahāpuruṣaṃ vārcayeddevayoryathākāmī syāt’</quote> ityādivacanaiḥ śivaviṣṇubhajanayorvikalpa uktaḥ ।</p>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha parādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū ।। paramatassetūnmānasaṃbaṃdhabhedavyapadeśebhyaḥ ।। 30 ।। sāmānyāttu ।। 31 ।। buddhyarthaḥ pādavat ।। 32 ।।
sthānaviśeṣātprakāśādivat ।। 33 ।। upapatteśca ।। 34 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>setuṃ tīrtvetyādau taritavyatvādikaśravaṇāt । brahmādilaṃdhyamuktau tataḥparaṃ prāpyamiti bhāti ।। 195 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>brahmaiva paramamuktau prāpyamiti śrutiśatāvagatam । tatsetutvamasaṃkarakāritvaṃ taratirāptyarthaḥ ।। 196 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti parādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<note>(1) <quote>‘pāsakatvakalpanāyogāt’</quote> iti kha॰ pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="267"/>
<p>paratvaṃ <quote>‘tamevaṃ vidvānamṛta iha bhavati’</quote> iti mokṣahetutvaṃ cāvagamyate । tasya punaḥ
<quote>‘sahasraśīrṣaṃ devam’</quote> ityārabhya <quote>‘patiṃ viś‍vasya’</quote> iti viś‍vapatitvaṃ <quote>‘nārāyaṇa-
paraṃ brahma’</quote> iti nārāyaṇaśabdavācyatvaṃ parabrahmatvaṃ <quote>‘paramātmā vyavasthitaḥ’</quote> iti
daharākāśopāsyatvaṃ cāvagamyate । ato nārāyaṇo'sau parameśvarasamānadharmā ।
eta eva hi parameśvarasya dharmāḥ—
<quote>‘sarvānanaśirogrīvaḥ sarvabhūtaguhāśayaḥ ।
sarvavyāpī ca bhagavāṃstasmātsarvagataḥ śivaḥ ।।’</quote>
iti mantropaniṣadi । <quote>‘viśvataścakṣuruta viśvatomukhaḥ’</quote> iti mahopaniṣadi ।
śivasaṃkalpe ca <quote>‘sarvatomukhaḥ’</quote> iti । atharvaśirasi bahumukhapādādimattvaṃ para-
meśvarasya śrūyate ।
<quote>‘māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram ।
tasyāvayavabhūtena vyāptaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagat ।।’</quote>
iti jagadaṃśaviśiṣṭatvaṃ, <quote>‘hiraṇyagarbhaṃ paśyata’</quote> ityādiṣu hiraṇyagarbhakāraṇatvaṃ
<quote>‘samastasākṣiṃ tamasaḥ parastāt’</quote> ityādiṣu tamaḥparatvaṃ <quote>‘daharaṃ vipāpmam’</quote> ityādiṣu
daharopāsyatvaṃ <quote>‘jñātvā śivaṃ śāntimatyantameti’</quote> ityādiṣu mokṣahetutvaṃ <quote>‘sarvai-
śvaryasaṃpannaḥ’</quote> ityādiṣu jagadīśvaratvaṃ cāvagamyate । evaṃ viśvarūpatvādidharmasā-
myamanayornārāyaṇaparameśvarayoḥ । smṛtyādiṣu pūjāvidhāne <quote>‘śivaṃ vā viṣṇumeva
vā’</quote> iti samānatayā vikalpaḥ śrūyate । samānameva ca tayorloke pūjāsthānā-
dikaṃ tatpratipādakapurāṇāgamādikaṃ ca । tasmāt parameś‍varasadṛśaḥ puruṣo nārāyaṇaḥ ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
na caiteṣāṃ vacanānāṃ viṣṇuprajāpatyagnīṣomānāṃ tāratamye satyapyupāṃśuyājadevatātve vikalpa-
vannityārcane śivanārāyaṇayossatyapi tāratamye devatātve vikalpa ityetāvanmātre tātparya-
miti vācyam । udāhṛtabhāratavacanānusāreṇa mokṣārthabhajana eva vikalpaparatvāt । <ref>1(ata
eva kūrmapurāṇe <quote>‘na viṣṇavārādhanātpuṇyaṃ vidyate karma vaidikam । tasmādanādimadhyāntaṃ
nityamārādhayeddhari’</quote> mityādinā viṣṇupūjāṃ vidhāya tadavasāne)</ref> <quote>‘nivedayīta svātmānaṃ
viṣṇāvamitatejasi । tadātmā tanmanāḥ śāntaḥ tadviṣṇoriti maṃtrataḥ ।।’</quote> iti tadīya-
prapadanaprakāśakena mantreṇa mokṣārthamevātmasamarpaṇamuktam । tadanantaram <quote>‘athavā devamī-
śānaṃ bhagavantamanāmayam । ārādhayenmahāpūto bhāvayanvai maheśvara’</quote>mityādinā śivapūjāṃ
vidhāya tadavasāne'pi <quote>‘namaskuryānmahādevamṛtaṃ satyamitīśvaram । nivedayīta cātmānaṃ yo
brahmāṇamitīśvare ।।’</quote> iti mokṣaphalakaprapadanārthatayā prasiddhenaiva mantreṇātmasamarpaṇaṃ vihi-
tam । evamubhayorbhajanasya muktiphalakatvāviśeṣādeva śaivāni vaiṣṇavāni ca muktikṣetrāṇi
purāṇeṣu prasiddhāni । teṣu tayoradyāpyaviśeṣeṇa pūjāviśeṣāḥ pravartante । tayorjagatkāraṇa-
tvajagadīśvaratvamuktopāsyatvamuktaprāpyatvādipratipādakāśca śrutismṛtipurāṇāgamāssamame-
vopalabhyante । evañca yadyapi tattatpurāṇāgameṣvitarāpakarṣavacanaṃ gārhasthyasaṃnyāsādyanyo-
nyanindāvacanavannahinindānyāyenopapadyate iti śivādādhikyaṃ kasyacidapi na saṃbhavati,
<note>(1) etadrekhāṃkito bhāgaḥ kha pustake na dṛśyate ।</note>
<pb n="268"/>
iti prāpte brūmaḥ—parameś‍varādutkṛṣṭaṃ nāsti yathā, tathā sadṛgapi nāstyeva, jaga-
tkāraṇatveś‍varatvādau tadanyapratiṣedhāt । tathā hi—
<quote>‘eka eva rudro na dvitīyāya tasthuḥ ya imāl‍m̐lokānīśata īśanīyuḥ jananīyuḥ’</quote>
<quote>‘dyāvāpṛthivī janayan deva ekaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘ya eko rudra ucyate’</quote> <quote>‘haraḥ kṣarātmānāvīśate
deva ekaḥ’</quote>
<quote>‘yadā carmavadākāśaṃ veṣṭayiṣyanti mānavāḥ ।
tadā śivamavijñāya duḥkhasyānto bhavaṣyati ।।’</quote>
<quote>‘śiva eko dhyeyaḥ śivaṃkaraḥ sarvamanyatparityajya’</quote>
<quote>‘yadā tamastanna divā na rātriḥ na sanna cāsacchiva eva kevalaḥ ।।’</quote>
ityādibhiḥ parameś‍varādanyasya jagatkāraṇatvādau niṣedhaḥ kriyate । ataḥ para-
meś‍vareṇa sadṛśaḥ kaścinnāsti । paramaśaktimattvānnimittabhūtaḥ parameśvara eva ।
puruṣa upādānamiti puruṣasya hiraṇyagarbhakāraṇatvam । tasya upādānatvāt ।
īśvarasya nimittatvāducyate ubhayorapi jagatkāraṇatvam । ata eva pratīyate
<quote>‘tasmādvirāṭ’</quote> iti hi puruṣasyopādānatvaṃ <quote>‘hiraṇyagarbhaṃ paśyata jāyamānam’</quote>
<quote>‘dyāvābhūmī janayan deva ekaḥ’</quote> iti parameś‍varasya nimittatvaṃ ca pratipādyate ।
sarvajñāt sarvaśaktimataḥ parabrahmaṇaḥ śivādviś‍vādhikāt prathamaṃ paraprakṛtibhūtā
parā śaktiḥ prādurbhavati । sā prathamabhoktṛtvadaśāyāṃ puruṣaḥ ucyate, yaḥ <quote>‘sahasra-
śīrṣā puruṣaḥ’</quote> iti śrūyate । tadātmana eva śivāt sakalacetanaprapañcapariṇāmaḥ ।
ata eva <quote>‘sarvo vai rudraḥ’</quote> iti parameśvarasya sarvātmatābhidhānamupakramya <quote>‘puruṣasya
nārāyaṇasya sarvātmatvamupādānatvāt।’</quote> kathamasya sarvātmatvamityāśaṅkāyāṃ <quote>‘puruṣo
vai rudraḥ’</quote> iti <quote>‘puruṣasya vidma sahasrākṣasya mahādevasya dhīmahi’</quote> iti ca puruṣo'pi
parameśvarasya mahāvibhūtyātmā jagadākāra iti nirūpitam । sarvajñaṃ sarvaśaktikaṃ
nityatṛptaṃ svatantraṃ viśvādhikaṃ nimittabhūtameva paraṃ brahmā sargasamaye bahu syāmiti
saṃkalpya svātmano'muṃ puruṣaṃ vibhajati । svavibhaktasvāṃśabhūtena sakalaṃ jagadbhavatīti
<quote>‘tatsṛṣṭvā । tadevānuprāviśat । tadanu praviśya । sacca tyaccābhavat ।’</quote> ityādinā,
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tathāpyapakṣapātena śrutismṛtipurāṇāgamānvimṛśatāṃ śivena nārāyaṇasya sāmyaṃ na pratyā-
khyātuṃ śakyam । jagatsraṣṭṛtvādikaṃ cobhayorapi kalpabhedenopapādanīyamityevamadhikāśaṃkāva-
lambano'tra pūrvapakṣaḥ । tannirākaraṇāya pravartate sūtrakāraḥ—<pratika>tathānyapratiṣedhāditi । tatra</pratika>
tathāśabdasūcitasya pratijñāṃśasyānuvṛttyadhyāhārābhyāmapekṣitaṃ pūrayansūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>yatheti</pratika> ।
nanvaiśvaryakāraṇatvādiviṣaye anyapratiṣedho dṛśyatāṃ nāma, kimataḥ, nārāyaṇasyāpi tatpra-
tipādanamapi dṛśyata evetyāśaṃkya tasya gatiṃ vaktumupakramate—<pratika>paramaśaktimatvādityā-
dinā</pratika> । nanvidaṃ sarvaṃ svakalpitaprakriyāmātraṃ <quote>‘tatsṛṣṭvā tadevānuprāviśa’</quote> dityādiśrutivākyādapi
sadvārakādvārakasādhāraṇapraveśamātrapratipādakātspaṣṭamidaṃ na pratīyata ityāśaṃkya nārāya-
ṇasya cicchaktyaṃśatve jagadupādānabhūtataddvārā parameśvarasya jagadātmatve ca śvetāśvatara-
<pb n="269"/>
<quote>‘māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram ।
tasyāvayavabhūtena vyāptaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagat ।।’</quote>
ityādinā ca śrutivākyenāvagamyate । nimittasaṃkalpamūlatvādupādānabhāvasya
nimittasyopādānādhikyam, upādānasya nimittasaṃkramāvibhāgānnimittadharmāṇā-
mupādāne śravaṇam । ataḥ parameśvareṇa sadṛśamutkṛṣṭaṃ vā vastu nāstyeva ।।
ato'pi parameśvareṇa sadṛśaṃ tadutkṛṣṭaṃ ca kiṃcidapi vastu nāstītyāha---
<sutra>sū ।। anena sarvagatatvamāyāmaśabdādibhyaḥ ।। 36 ।।</sutra>
āyāmo mahāvyāptiḥ । <quote>‘sarvānanaśirogrīvaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘viśvataścakṣuruta viś‍vatomukhaḥ’</quote>
ityādibhiḥ, <quote>‘aṇoraṇīyān’</quote> ityārabhya <quote>‘sarvo hyeṣa rudraḥ’</quote> ityetatparyantairmaho-
paniṣadvākyaiḥ <quote>‘yo vai rudraḥ sa bhagavān’</quote> ityārabhya <quote>‘yacca satyam’</quote> ityantairātharva-
vākyaiśca sakalajagadvyāptipratipādanaparaiḥ । anena svadharmāṃśabhūtenopādānapuruṣeṇa
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
mantramudāharati—<pratika>māyāṃ tviti</pratika> । asya mantrasyoktārthaparatvaṃ prakṛtyadhikaraṇabhāṣyavyākhyā-
nasamaye'smābhiḥ prapañcena pratipāditam । yadyapi prakṛtyadhikaraṇe śivasyopādānatve ni-
rvikāraśrutivirodhaparihārāya pariṇāmiprakṛtidvārakaṃ tasyopādānatvamityetāvatpradarśayituṃ
<quote>‘pariṇāmā’</quote>diti sūtraṃ pravṛttam । tathāpi prakṛterupādānatve kathaṃ nārāyaṇasyopādānatva-
śravaṇamiti buddhisthaśaṃkānirākaraṇāya tatra bhāṣyakṛtā <quote>‘māyāṃ tvi’</quote> ti mantramudāhṛtya tatra
tātparyamuktamityasmābhirapi tadviṣaye'tra vaktavyaṃ sarvaṃ tatra prapañcitam । <ref>1(nārāyaṇasya
māyāśabdoktacicchaktirūpatvamāśvalāyanasmṛtāvapi yajñopavītapraśaṃsāprakaraṇe varṇitam ।
<quote>‘sisṛkṣureka evāgre samāsīnaśśivaḥ svayam । sṛṣṭvā guṇamayīṃ māyāṃ sūtrarūpāmupākarot ।।
tayā tadātmakaṃ viṣṇuṃ sṛṣṭvā pālaṃ divaukasām । svayaṃ brahmābhavadrudro rudraścāsya kṣayāya
saḥ ।।’</quote> iti । )</ref> nanu nimittasya svātantryāttasya tatparatantrādupādānādādhikyena bhāvyaṃ
cet kā tarhyupādānasya nārāyaṇasya paramaiśvaryaparabrahmabhāvādiśravaṇasya gatirityāśaṃkya
tasyaupacārikatvamāha—<pratika>upādānasyeti</pratika> । parameśvaraikyabhāvanānimittatvamapi tatra tatrokta-
manusandheyam । yattu daharavidyopāsyatvaṃ nārāyaṇasyāpi śrutamiti bhavatu tadasmadādyupāsya-
syāpi tasya parameśvaramahimaprakhyāpanārthaṃ tadupāsakatvamaviruddham । nārāyaṇopāsanā
tu sākṣānnānāvṛttiphalā kintu tatpadaprāptidvārā śivapadaprāpakatvena । yataśśivasāyujya-
meva mokṣaḥ । ata eva mahābhārate'pi <quote>‘dharmānveṣī tapaḥ kartuṃ yateta satataṃ priye । amaratvaṃ
śivatvaṃ ca tapasā prāpayetsade’</quote> ti tapasaḥ svargamokṣahetutvakathane mokṣaśśivatvamityanena
vyapadiṣṭaḥ । śivanārāyaṇayorjagatkāraṇatvādipratipādakavacanabalābalavibhāge tadārādhanayoḥ
phalaviśeṣavibhāge ca yadatra vaktavyamapekṣitaṃ tatsarvamasmābhiśśivatatvaviveke prapañcitamanusa-
ndheyam । uttarasūtramavatārayati---<pratika>ato'pīti । sū ।। anena sarvagatatvamāyāmaśabdā-
dibhyaḥ ।। 36 ।।</pratika> āyāmastrividhavyāptirūpā mahāvyāptiḥ । tatpratipādakaśśabdaḥ <quote>‘sarvā-
nanaśirogrīva’</quote> ityādimantraḥ । tatra hi <quote>‘sarvavyāpī’</quote> tyanenākāśavatkevalaṃ vibhutvarūpā vyā-
ptirgṛhyate । <quote>‘sarvabhūtaguhāśaya’</quote> ityanena niyamanārthasarvaprāṇihṛdayaguhāsannidhānarūpā । tataḥ
<note>(1) etadrekhāṃkito bhāgaḥ kha. pustake nāsti ।</note>
<pb n="270"/>
sarvagatatvamavagamyate nimittasya parabrahmaṇaḥ । tasmāt parameś‍varasya vibhūtimayaṃ
viś‍vamiti tatsadṛśastadutkṛṣṭaśca nāstyeva ।। ityanyapratiṣedhādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<quote>‘sarvānanaśirogrīva’</quote> ityanena upādānabhāvaprayuktasarvakāryānusyūtirūpā vyāptirucyate । pā-
riśeṣyāt <quote>‘sahasraśīrṣaṃ deva’</quote> mityādernārāyaṇaviṣayasyaitadaikārthyasya tatparatvadarśanācca ।
na nirvikārasya parabrahmaṇaśśivasya sākṣādupādānatvaṃ saṃbhavatītyadvārakaṃ tadāśrayaṇīyam ।
tatra dvārāpekṣāyāṃ yatra <quote>‘sarvānanaśirogrīva’</quote> ityādiśrutitaulyaṃ tasya nārāyaṇasya <quote>‘māyāṃ
tu prakṛtiṃ vidyā’</quote> diti śrutāyāśśivaśakteśca dvāratvaṃ prāptam । na ca tayoranyataraparityāge
kāraṇamastīti yatorapi dvāradvāribhāvāśrayaṇe māyāśaktessākṣācchivadharmatvasya pratipanna-
tvātpariśeṣeṇa nārāyaṇasya tadaṃśatvaṃ siddhyatīti yacchivasyopādānabhāvaprayuktaṃ sarvānusyū-
tatvaṃ śrutaṃ tadanena tacchaktyaṃśabhūtena nārāyaṇena dvāreṇeti siddhyatītyevamāyāmaśabdā-
<quote>‘ttadanena sarvagatatva’</quote> miti nirdiṣṭasya sādhyasya siddhiḥ । tathā <quote>‘sarvo vai rudra’</quote> ityatropādāna-
bhāvena sārvātmyaṃ vivakṣitam । <quote>‘viśvaṃ bhūtaṃ bhuvanaṃ citraṃ bahudhā jātaṃ jāyamāna’</quote> mi-
tyagre sarvasya kāryarūpatokteḥ tatkathaṃ rudrasyopapadyate । puruṣasya hi tathā sārvātmyaṃ <quote>‘puruṣa
evedaṃ sarva’</quote> mityādiśrutyantare prasiddhamiti śaṃkāvāraṇāya <quote>‘puruṣo vai rudra’</quote> iti tadanaṃtara-
vākyaṃ pravṛttam । tenā <quote>‘pyanena sarvagatatva’</quote> miti nirdiṣṭasya sādhyasya siddhiḥ । <quote>‘tasyāvayavabhū-
tene’</quote> tyanena ca sakalavaiparītyaśaṃkānivartanakṣameṇa tasya siddhiḥ । evamāyāmaśabdādibhyo
hetubhyaḥ prāptaṃ yatparameśvarasya svadharmāṃśabhūtanārāyaṇadvāreṇopādānatayā sarvagatatvamasmādapi
hetoḥ parameśvareṇa samaḥ ko'pi nāsti । saṃbhāvitasāmyasya nārāyaṇasya taddharmāṃśabhāvena
tadupādānatvaghaṭakatayā tadupasarjanatvāt anyasya ca tatsāmyasaṃbhāvanāspadasyābhāvā-
diti pūrvasūtroktenā <quote>‘nyapratiṣedhā’</quote> diti samaniṣedhahetunāsya hetossamuccayaḥ prāk <quote>‘ato'pī’</quote>
ti sūtrāvatārikābhāṣyeṇa darśitaḥ । etatsūtravivaraṇabhāṣye <quote>‘sarvānanaśirogrīva’</quote> iti mantraḥ
prādhānyenāyāmaśabdarūpahetutayopāttaḥ । tadupodbalakatayā <quote>‘viśvataścakṣu’</quote> rityādaya upā-
ttāḥ । <quote>‘aṇoraṇīyā’</quote> nityāderaṇuto'pyaṇīyānpadārthaḥ parameśvaraḥ evaṃ mahato mahīyānpa-
dārtho'pi sa eveti sārvātmyamarthamabhipretya tadudāharaṇam <quote>‘sarvo vai rudra’</quote> ityādyaṃśasya tvādi-
śabdopāttadvitīyahetusamarpakatayā । tṛtīyahetusamarpaka <quote>‘stasyāvayavabhūtene’</quote>tyādiḥ pūrvasūtra-
evodāhṛta iti punariha nodāhṛtaḥ । evañcānyapratiṣedhamātraṃ pūrvasūtre vivakṣito hetuḥ tarhi
śrutyantaradarśanataḥ samāpatantyāḥ nārāyaṇasya tatsāmyapratīteḥ kaḥ pratīkāra iti śaṃkāyā
nirākaraṇametatsūtroktahetuprasādalabhyamapyākāṃkṣāśāṃtaye bhāṣyakṛtā pūrvasūtre kṛtamiti sarva-
manavadyam ।। <pratika>।। iti anyapratiṣedhādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</pratika></p>
