<lg><l>mābhūtparo maheśāt samastu nārāyaṇo'styeva । śrūyante paradharmāstasyāpi hi kāraṇatvādyāḥ ।। 197 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>nāsti samastasyānyapratiṣedhātkāraṇatvamukhyeṣu । nārāyaṇe śrutā api tadavasthaṃ prāpnuyuśśivaṃ dharmāḥ ।। 198 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>māyātvityādimaṃtraprathitajagadupādānabhāvasya puṃso naiva svaprerakatvaṃ samupagatavatā viśvakartrāsti sāmyam ।</l>
<l>tasmādyaddharmajātaṃ piśunayati parabrahmabhāvaṃ mukunde tatsarvaṃ paryavasyedviṣamaśarahare tādavasthyaṃ dadhāne ।। 199 ।।</l></lg>
<head>ityanyapratiṣedhādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<pb n="271"/>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha parādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। paramatassetūnmānasaṃbandhabhedavyapadeśebhyaḥ ।। 30 ।। sāmānyāttu ।। 31 ।। buddha‍yarthaḥ pādavat
।। 32 ।। sthānaviśeṣātprakāśādivat ।।33।। upapatteśca ।।34।। tathānyapratiṣedhāt ।।35।। anena sarvagata-
tvamāyāmaśabdādibhyaḥ ।। 36 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ <quote>‘netinetī’</quote>ti brahmātiriktaṃ vastu niṣedhyamityuktamayuktam । brahmaṇassetutvonmānādivyapadeśena
vastvantarasattvāvagamādda‍yubhvādyadhikaraṇe setutvasya gauṇatvena nītatve'pi unmānādīnāṃ gatedarśanādityākṣepasaṃgatyedamāha—<pratika>sū ।।
paramatassetūnmānasaṃbandhabhedavyapadeśebhyaḥ ।। 30 ।।</pratika> atra brahmātiriktaṃ vastvasti vā na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ । ataḥ</pratika>=
asmādbrahmaṇassakāśāt । paraṃ vastvasti । <quote>‘atha ya ātmā sa setuḥ’</quote> iti brahmaṇassetutvavyapadeśāt, tathā <quote>‘brahma catuṣpāt’</quote> iti
śrutau unmānavyapadeśāt, etāvadidamiti paricchinnatvavyapadeśāt, suṣuptau <quote>‘prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvaktaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘śārīra ātmā’</quote>
ityādinā brahmaṇassaṃbandhavyapadeśāt, āditye hiraṇmayaṃ puruṣamīśvaraṃ vyapadiśya tato bhedena akṣisthapuruṣasya vyapadeśāt ।
tasmātsadvitīyaṃ brahmeti siddham ।। iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।। siddhāntastu</pratika>,</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। sāmānyāttu ।। 31 ।।</pratika> tuśabdaḥ pūrvapakṣanirāsārthaḥ । mṛddārvādimaye hi setuśabdo rūḍho loke । na hi brahmaṇastā-
dṛśaṃ setutvamasti kiṃ tu yathā setorjalavyavasthāpakatvam evaṃ brahmaṇo'pi jaganmaryādāvyavasthāpakatvena prasiddhasetusāmānyātsā-
myātsetutvavyapadeśa ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>unmānavyapadeśo'pi na mukhya ityāha—<pratika>sū ।। buddha‍yarthaḥ pādavat ।। 32 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘brahma catuṣpāt’</quote> iti śrutau unmānavya-
padeśo <pratika>buddha‍yarthaḥ</pratika>=upāsanārthaḥ । nirviśeṣasya buddhisthatvāyogāt । upāsanādvārā buddhisthasyonmānavyapadeśo na mukhyaḥ । <pratika>pāda-
vat</pratika>=yathā brahmapratīkasya manaso vāgghrāṇacakṣuḥśrotrāṇāmupāsanārthaṃ pādatvena vyapadeśastadvadityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>saṃbandhabhedavyapadeśāvapi na mukhyāvityāha—<pratika>sū ।। sthānaviśeṣātprakāśādivat ।। 33 ।। sthānaviśeṣāt</pratika>=
sthānamupādhirbudhdyādistadviśeṣātprāptasya bhedasyopādhyupaśamādya upaśamassa eva prājñenātmanā jīvasya suṣuptau saṃbandha ityupādhya-
pekṣayopacaryate । akṣyādityapuruṣayorbhedavyapadeśo'pyakṣyādityarūpasthānaviśeṣāpekṣayopacaryate । <pratika>prakāśādivat</pratika>=yathā saurā-
lokāderaṃgulyādyupādhiyogādupajātabhedasyopādhyupaśamātsaṃbandhavyapadeśaḥ, upādhibhedācca bhedavyapadeśastadvadityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu mukhyāveva saṃbandhabhedau kiṃ na syātāmityata āha—<pratika>sū ।। upapatteśca ।। 34 ।।</pratika> na mukhyasaṃbandho jīvaparayoḥ suṣuptau
bhavati । <quote>‘svamapīto bhavati’</quote> iti śrutau svarūpasyaiva saṃbandhatvavyapadeśopapatteḥ । tathā bhedo'pi mukhyaḥ । śrutisahasravirodhāt ।
ityupapatteścetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>itthaṃ setutvādīnbhedahetūnnirākṛtya brahmaṇo'dvitīyatvaṃ hetvantareṇāha—<pratika>sū ।। tathānyapratiṣedhāt ।। 35 ।।</pratika> yathā setutvā-
dihetubhyo na vastvantarapratipattiḥ tathā <quote>‘ātmaivādhastāt’</quote> ityādivākyairanyasya vastunaḥ pratiṣedhādadvitīyameva brahmetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu brahmaṇo'dvitīyatve kathaṃ sarvagatatvamata āha---<pratika>sū ।। anena sarvagatatvamāyāmaśabdādibhyaḥ ।। 36 ।। anena</pratika>=
setutvādivyapadeśamukhyatvasya vastvantarasya ca pratiṣedhena brahmaṇassarvagatatvaṃ siddham । apratiṣedhe prasiddhasetuvadbrahmaṇassarvagatatvaṃ
prasajyeta । kasmātpunassarvagatatvam ? । <pratika>āyāmaśabdādibhyaḥ</pratika>=āyāmaśabdo vyāpakatvavācakaḥ । <quote>‘ākāśavatsarvagataśca
nityaḥ’</quote> ityādiśabdāt ādiśabdena <quote>‘nityassarvagataḥ sthāṇuḥ’</quote> ityādiruktaḥ । tasmādadvitīyasya brahmaṇa āvidyakaṃ sarvamādāya
śrutismṛtibhyāṃ sarvagatatvaṃ siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, idamadhikaraṇadvitayātmakatayā vibhajya <pratika>parādhikaraṇamanyapratiṣedhādhikaraṇamiti</pratika> vyapadiśyate ।
tatrādye parādhikaraṇe sarvajñatādinikhilamaṃgalaguṇaratnākarātparabrahmaṇaḥ paramaśivātparaṃ kiṃcidapi vastvantaraṃ nāstīti vaktumā-
śaṃkate—<pratika>sū ।। paramatassetūnmānasaṃbandhabhedavyapadeśebhyaḥ ।। 30 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘janmādyasya yataḥ’</quote> ityādinā paramakāraṇatayā
pratipāditātparameśvarātparamapi vastvasti vā na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘atha ya ātmā sa seturvidhṛtiḥ’</quote> <quote>‘etaṃ setuṃ tīrtvā andha-
ssannanandho bhavati’</quote> <quote>‘catuṣpādbrahma’</quote> <quote>‘amṛtasyaiṣa setuḥ ityā’</quote>dibhirasya parabrahmaṇaḥ setutvataritavyatvaparimitatvaprāpakatvādīnāṃ vyapa-
deśādasmādapi paraṃ kiñcidvastvastīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।। siddhāntastu, sū ।। sāmānyāttu ।। 31 ।।</pratika> tuśabdaḥ pūrvapakṣaṃ
vyāvartayati । <quote>‘viśvādhiko rudro maharṣiḥ’</quote> ityādiśrutibhiḥ parabrahmaṇaśśivasya viśvādhikatvasiddheḥ, <quote>‘atha ya ātmā sa setu-
rvidhṛtireṣāṃ lokānāmasaṃbhedāye’</quote> ti sarvalokāsaṃkarakaratvena sāmyādeva setuvyapadeśopapatteḥ, ‘sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahme9ti pratipādita-
jagadubhayakāraṇabhāvasya parameśvarasyaiva <quote>‘etamitaḥ pretyābhisaṃbhavitāsmi’</quote> <quote>‘trilocanaṃ nīlakaṇṭhaṃ praśānta’</quote> mityādikayā ca śrutyā
sarvottarataḥ prāpyatvāvagamācca taritavyatvasya prāpyatvaparatvāt, anyathānavasthāprasaṃgācca parimitatvavyapadeśasya <quote>‘vākyādaścakṣuḥ
pādaḥ’</quote> itivadupāsanārthatvāt aparimitasyāpi parameśvarasya sthānaviśeṣādvātāyanādisthānasaṃbandhātprakāśāderivāvacchidyā-
<pb n="272"/>
nusaṃdhānopapatteḥ, <quote>‘yamevaiṣa vṛṇute tena labhyaḥ’</quote> ityādiśrutyā prāpyasyaiva parameśvarasya prāpakatvopapatteśca sarvottarātparamaśivātparaṃ
vastu kiñcidastīti vādo na yuktaḥ । ataḥ parameśvarānnāsti paramiti siddham iti । anena <quote>‘budhdyarthaḥ pādavat’</quote> ityādīni
trīṇi sūtrāṇyapi vyākhyātāni ।। <pratika>iti śrīkaṇṭhamate parādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha anyapratiṣedhādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। tathānyapratiṣedhāt ।। 35 ।।</pratika> atrādhikaraṇe pūrvādhikaraṇoktarītyā parameśvarādutkṛṣṭavastvabhāve'pi jagatkāraṇa-
tveneśvaratvādinā tatsadṛśo'sti vā na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘sahasraśīrṣā puruṣaḥ’</quote> ityādiśrutibhiḥ bahumukhapādādimān jagadviśiṣṭaḥ
paramākāśavartī avyaktahiraṇyagarbhopādānaḥ tamaḥparaḥ puruṣanārāyaṇaśabdavācyo mokṣahetuḥ kaścittatsadṛśo'stīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।
siddhāntastu</pratika>, yathā parameśvarādutkṛṣṭaṃ vastu nāsti <pratika>tathā</pratika> tatsadṛśo'pi nāstyeva । jagatkāraṇatveśvaratvādau <quote>‘eka eva rudro
na dvitīyāya tasthuḥ’</quote> <quote>‘śiva eva kevalaḥ’</quote> ityādibhiḥ parameśvarādanyasya pratiṣedhāt । sarvasyāsya prapañcasya paremeśvaravibhūti-
mayatvātparameśvareṇa sadṛśamutkṛṣṭaṃ vā vastu nāstyeveti । āyāmo mahāvyāptiḥ । jagadva‍yāptipratipādanaparairupaniṣadvacanajātaiḥ
svadharmāṃśabhūtenopādānapuruṣeṇa nimittasya parabrahmaṇaḥ sarvagatatvapratipādanāt sarvasyāsya parameśvaravibhūtimayatvācca na kāpya-
nupapattiḥ ।। iti ca ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> tu śāṃkaramatavadidamekamevādhikaraṇam । sūtrārthavarṇanādikaṃ prāyaḥ śrīkaṇṭhamatavadeva । śrīkaṇṭhamate bhinnāṃ-
dhikaraṇatayā vyākhyātasya <quote>‘tathānyapratiṣedhāt’</quote> iti sūtrasya tu <quote>‘na tasyeśe kaścane’</quote> tyādiśrutiṣu puruṣādanyasya paratvaprati-
ṣedhādityarthaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। anena sarvagatatvamāyāmaśabdādibhyaḥ ।।</pratika> <quote>‘nityaṃ vibhuṃ sarvagataṃ susūkṣma’</quote>mityādisarvavyāptivāciśa-
bdebhyo'vagamyamānam anena brahmaṇā sarvasya vyāptatvametasmātparaṃ vārayatītyarthaḥ । anyatsarvaṃ śrīkaṇṭhabhāṣyapratipāditaparādhi-
karaṇavat । parabrahmaṇo'nyattadutkṛṣṭaṃ vastu nāstyeveti siddhāntitam । sarvatra śrīkaṇṭharāmānujamatayoḥ prāyassamānaprakriyatve'pi parabra-
hmaśabdavācyaṃ jagatkāraṇaṃ vastu paraṃ nāmato rūpataśca bhinnamiti vedyam । <pratika>iti rāmānujamate parādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthaṃmate</pratika>, idamadhikaraṇacatuṣṭayātmakatayā vyākhyātam । tatrādye parādhikaraṇe paramātmani atiniratiśayabha-
ktisiddhaye tadīyaguṇānāṃ laukikaguṇavailakṣaṇyaṃ samarthyate—<pratika>sū ।। paramatassetūnmānasaṃbandhabhedavyapadeśebhyaḥ ।। 32 ।।</pratika>
atra brahmaguṇajātaṃ lokavilakṣaṇaṃ na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । lokavilakṣaṇaṃ na bhavatīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika>। lokavilakṣaṇamiveti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ।
sūtrārthastu</pratika>, brahmaguṇajātaṃ <pratika>paramataḥ</pratika>=lokavilakṣaṇam । kutaḥ/?/ । <pratika>setūnmānasaṃbandhabhedavyapadeśebhyaḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘eṣa setu’</quote>riti setu-
tvokteḥ <quote>‘yato vāca’</quote> ityunmānaśabditapūrṇatvokteḥ <quote>‘etasyaivānandasye’</quote>ti biṃbapratibiṃbabhāvasaṃbandhokteḥ <quote>‘anyajjñānaṃ tvi’</quote>ti
laukikānandādbhedokteścetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। darśanāt ।। 33 ।।</pratika> anyamateṣu <pratika><quote>‘sāmānyāttu’</quote></pratika> iti anyathā sūtrapāṭho dṛśyate । atra mata eva <pratika><quote>‘darśanā’</quote>
diti</pratika> pāṭhabhedaḥ । anyānandādīnāṃ pratyakṣasiddhatvānmanovāgviṣayatvācca brahmānandasyātathātvādeva lokavilakṣaṇatvamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। buddha‍yarthaḥ pādavat ।। 34 ।।</pratika> yathā lokapādavilakṣaṇeṣu jīvākhyabhūteṣu <quote>‘pādo'sya viśvā bhūtānī’</quote>ti pādapadaprayogaḥ
<pratika>buddha‍yarthaḥ</pratika>=bhūtānāmīśāṃśatvajñāpanārthaḥ । tathā laukike'pi brahmānandādāvānandapadaprayogaḥ budhdyarthaḥ anukūlatayā vedanīya-
tvādidharmajñāpanārtha ityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti parādhikaraṇam ।। 16 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha sthānaviśeṣādhikaraṇam ।। 17 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। sthānaviśeṣātprakāśādivat ।। 35 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘etasyaivānandasye’</quote>ti śrutyā hiraṇyagarbhādijīvagatalaukikānandānāṃ
brahmānandapratibiṃbatvamuktam । tathā sati biṃbāvaicitryeṇa laukikānandānāṃ vaicitryābhāvasaṃgāt biṃbapratibiṃbabhāvoktiranupapanneti
<pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, prakāśādivat</pratika>=yathā sūryakāntādigatasūryādipratibiṃbe'gnijanakatvādivaicitryaṃ <pratika>sthāna-
viśeṣā</pratika>tsūryakāntādisthānaguṇavaicitryādupapadyate tathā brahmādisthānagatabhaktyādiguṇavaicitryādbhagavadānandapratibiṃbeṣu brahmā-
dyānandeṣvapi vaicitryamupapadyata ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। upapatteśca ।। 36 ।।</pratika> biṃbabhūtabhagavadaiśvaryavaśādeva pratibiṃbabhūtabrahmādyānandavaicitryopapatteśca tatpratibiṃbatvami-
tareṣāṃ yuktamevetyarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti sthānaviśeṣādhikaraṇam ।। 17 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha tathānyapratiṣedhādhikaraṇam ।। 18 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। tathānyapratiṣedhāt ।। 37 ।।</pratika> atra brahmaṇaḥ prāṅ‌nirūpitamavyaktatvaṃ punarākṣipya samarthyate । dhyātṝṇāṃ hṛdi
dhyānakāle sphuraṇāt brahmāvyaktaṃ na bhavatīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, yathā jīvānandādi brahmānandādervilakṣaṇaṃ tathā
dhyānakāle pratītaṃ vāsanāmayaṃ vastu brahmaṇo'nyattatpratibiṃbabhūtameva । kutaḥ । <quote>‘yanmanase’</quote>ti tadanyasya brahmatvapratiṣedhādityarthaḥ ।
tasmāddha‍yānanimittaṃ rūpaṃ brahmaṇaḥ pratibiṃbaviśeṣa iti tadupāsanayaiva pratimopāsanayeva tadgataṃ brahma prasannaṃ sadavyaktamapi
svasāmarthyādaparokṣībhavatīti yuktam ।। iti ।। <pratika>iti tathānyapratiṣedhādhikaraṇam ।। 18 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="273"/>
atha phalādhikaraṇam. ।। 9 ।।
evaṃ sarveśvaratayā sarvātmakatayā sa eva parameśvaraḥ sarvakarmaṇāṃ tattaddevatārū-
peṇa svarūpeṇa ca phaladātā bhavatīti nirūpayitumāha---
<sutra>sū ।। phalamata upapatteḥ ।। 37 ।।</sutra>
iha pūrvatra sarveśvaratayā pratipāditasya parabrahmaṇa eva sarvānuṣṭhātṝṇāmanuṣṭhāna-
phaladātṛtvamutānyasyeti saṃśayaḥ ।।
anukṣaṇavināśino'pi karmaṇo'pūrvavyavadhānena kālāntarabhāviphaladāne sāma-
rthyamastyeva । tataḥ karmaṇaḥ phaladātṛtve siddhe tadatiriktāprasiddhaparameśvarakalpane
gauravaprasaṅgāt tasya na phaladātṛtvamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha phalādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<p>saṃgatiṃ sūcayannuttarādhikaraṇamavatārayati—<pratika>evamiti</pratika> । yathā nirastasamastadoṣassakalamaṃ-
galaguṇaratnākarassarvakāraṇatvasarveśvaratvādiviṣaye samābhyadhikarahitaśca parameśvaraḥ evaṃ sa1ka-
lakarmajātānāṃ svargāpavargādiphalaprado'pi sa eveti tasya mahimāntaraṃ nirūpayitumadhikara-
ṇamārabhyata ityarthaḥ । anena mahāprabhurmahāvadānyaśca phalepsubhissarvaissevyo nānyaḥ । <quote>‘ekāhā-
dvā teṣāṃ samatvātsyā’</quote> diti nyāyāt । tatrottarapādapratipādanīyābhirupāsanābhirārādhanīyatva-
siddha‍yarthaṃ parameśvarasyānanyasāmānyaṃ mahāprabhutvaṃ nirūpitam । idānīṃ karmabhirupāsanaiśca prīto
mahāphalaṃ prayacchatīti tasya mahāvadānyatvaṃ pratipādyata iti saṃgatiḥ sūcitā । <pratika>sū ।। phalamata u-
papatteḥ ।। 37 ।।</pratika> vidhiśrute <quote>‘ryamebhyo lokebhya unninīṣata’</quote> ityādiśruteśca saṃśayamāha—<pratika>pūrva-
treti । anyasyeti</pratika> । karmaṇa ityarthaḥ । nanu tatkālavināśinaḥ karmaṇaḥ kathaṃ phalajanaka-
tvam । apūrvavyāpārakalpane tu <quote>‘dharmikalpanāto varaṃ dharmakalpane’</quote>ti nyāyādīśvarasyaiva phala-
dātṛtvakalpanā yukteti pūrvapakṣasya nāvakāśa ityāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>anukṣaṇeti</pratika> । kevalaḥ parame-
śvaraḥ karmaphaladāteti vaktuṃ na śakyate । adṛṣṭavattasya vipākāpekṣatvābhāvena svargādeḥ
kālāntarabhāvitvabhaṅgaprasaṃgāt । karmopāsanābhirārādhitasya prasannasya parameśvarasya phaladā-
tṛtvapakṣe'pi karmānuṣṭhānānaṃtarameva prasādo vaktuṃ śakyate । paramasvatantrasya prasāde sati phale
vilaṃbāyogāt prayājādibhiraṃgaistadanuṣṭhānānaṃtarameva prasāde sati pradhānānuṣṭhāne'pi aṃgā-
ntarakaivalye'pi phalaniṣpattiprasaṃgācca । tasmātkarmabhirapūrve niṣpādite tasya paripakvatayā
phalajananaunmukhyadaśāyāṃ parameśvarasya prasādo vaktavyaḥ । tathā cāvaśyābhyupagantavyāpūrva-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha sarvagatatvādhikaraṇam ।। 19 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। anena sarvagatatvamāyāmayaśabdādibhyaḥ ।। 38 ।।</pratika> atra deśakālāntareṣu sṛṣṭyādikamanyenāpi parameśvaradatta-
svātantryeṇa kriyata iti vaktuṃ yujyate vā na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । yathā loke svatantro'pi rājā svayameka eva rājyadhurāṃ nirva-
hatīti niyamo nāsti kiṃ tu taddattasvātantryastatratatrānyo'pi nirvahati tathā sṛṣṭyādikamanyenāpi parameśvaradattasvātantryeṇa
deśakālāntareṣu kriyata eveti yuktameveti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, anena</pratika> bhagavataiva sarvadeśakālayoḥ sṛṣṭyādirbhavati ।
na tu deśakālāntarayoranyena । kutaḥ । <pratika>sarvagatatvamāyāmayaśabdādibhyaḥ</pratika> <quote>‘eṣa sarvagata’</quote> iti sarvagatatvaśruteḥ tasya ca
sṛṣṭyādyarthatvāt viṣṇau prayuktamāyāmayaśabdavyākhyānarūpasarvatretyādiśruteścetyarthaḥ । anyatra pramāṇābhāvāccetyādiśabdārthaḥ ।।
atramate <pratika><quote>‘māyāmayaśabdādibhyaḥ’</quote></pratika> iti pāṭho viśiṣṭaḥ । <pratika>ityānandatīrthamate sarvagatatvādhikaraṇam ।। 19 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ parādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<note>(1) <quote>‘sarveṣāṃ karmopāsanānām’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="274"/>
<p>siddhāntastu—parameśvarādevārādhitāt sarveṣāṃ karmaphalasiddhiḥ । upapatteḥ, sevi-
tarājādivadupāsitāt parameśvarādupāsakānāṃ phalasiddha‍yupapatteḥ । na hi acetanasya
karmaṇo'pūrvasya vā tāratamyena pratiniyataṃ phalaṃ jñātuṃ dātuṃ sāmarthyamasti, sevākriyā-
yāmacetanāyāṃ tathā darśanāt । iha śāstrasiddhasya parameśvarasyākalpyatvānna kalpa-
nāgauravam । tathā hi---<quote>‘eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokebhya unni-
nnīṣati eṣa evāsādhu karma kārayati yamadho ninīṣati’</quote> iti śrutirīśvarasyaiva
dharmādharmaphaladātṛtvaṃ tatkārayitṛtvaṃ ca vadati । pratyuta apūrvasyaivāśrutasya kalpane
gauravam । tasmāt karmabhirārādhitaḥ parameśvaraḥ phaladātā na karmeti nirṇayaḥ ।।
<sutra>sū ।। śrutatvācca ।। 38 ।।</sutra>
śrūyate hi sarvakarmaṇāmadhipatiḥ parameśvaraḥ, tadārādhyatvāt tatphaladātṛtvācca-
<quote>‘gāthapatiṃ medhapatiṃ rudraṃ jalāṣabheṣajam’</quote>।<quote>‘ā vo rājānamadhvarasya rūdram ।’</quote> ityādiṣu ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vyāpāreṇa karmaṇa eva phalajanakatvopapattau kimīśvarasyāpi tatphaladātṛtvakalpanayā tatpra-
sādakalpanayā vā । na ca puruṣasya yāgadānahomādikarmabhiḥ parameśvarasya prasādotpattau
kiñcitkāraṇamasti । na ca teṣāṃ tatprasādajanakatvopapattaye tadārādhanarūpatvaṃ kalpanīyam ।
kalpakābhāvāt । tatprasāde hetutvena tadārādhanatvakalpane'nyonyāśrayāditi bhāvaḥ । <pratika>upapa-
tteriti</pratika> । rājasevānyāyapradarśanena kevalasya karmaṇaḥ phaladātṛtvaṃ nopapadyata ityapi sūci-
tam । tadupapādayati—<pratika>na hīti</pratika> । nanu, tattatkarmaṇaḥ svābhāvyātpratiniyatavicitraphalavi-
śeṣajanakatvaṃ bhavet । kimatra jñānāpekṣayā । ataḥ klṛptasya karmaṇa eva phalajanakatvopapattau
parameśvarasyāpi phaladātṛtvamaklṛptaṃ kalpanīyamityāśaṃkya na kalpyate tat, kiṃ tu śrūyata
iti gauravamakiñcitkaramityāha—<pratika>iheti</pratika> । evaṃ ca śrutena phaladātṛtvenaiva karmaṇāṃ parameśvara-
prasādahetutvaṃ tadupapādakaṃ tadārādhanarūpatvaṃ ca kalpyata iti nānyonyāśraya iti bhāvaḥ । vipa-
rītaṃ gauravamityāha—<pratika>pratyuteti</pratika> । nanu, śrutaṃ karma parityajyāśrutamapūrvaṃ phalajanakamiti na
kalpyate kiṃ tu śrutameva karmaṇāṃ phalajanakatvamupapādayituṃ tatkalpyate । śrutābhyupagama iva
śrutanirvāhārthakalpane'pi gauravaṃ na doṣa iti cedevaṃ tarhi karmaṇa īśvarasya ca śrutaṃ phalakā-
raṇatvamupapādayituṃ karmaṇāmīśvaraprasādasya ca madhyavarttitvenaiva tatkalpanamucitaṃ na tu sākṣā-
tphalajanakatvena । karmaṇa iva īśvarasyāpi phalakāraṇatāyāḥ śrutatvāviśeṣeṇa tadanapekṣānau-
cityāditi bhāvaḥ । evaṃ karmaṇāmīśvarārādhanatvakalpanāmāśritya tasya karmaphaladātṛtvamupa-
pāditam । atha karmaṇāmīśvarārādhanatvamapi śrutameveti pratipādanārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>śrutatvācca
।। 38 ।।</pratika> gāthāḥ stotrāṇi । medhā yajñāḥ । jalāṣaśabdassukhavācī vaidikanighaṇṭuṣu prasiddhaḥ ।
jāyanta iti jāḥ prāṇinaḥ tairlaṣyate'bhilaṣyata iti vyutpatteḥ । tadarthaṃ bheṣajaṃ tadrūpaṃ vā
bheṣajam । nanu medhapatimityetadyadyapi parameśvare yajamānatvena nopapadyate tathāpi parameśvara-
viṣayasetuśabdoktena karmaṇāmasaṃkarakāritvenopapadyate । atastadārādhanarūpatāyāṃ nedaṃ pramā-
ṇamityāśaṃkya tatra prāmāṇyamupapādayitumupabṛṃhaṇānyudāharati—<pratika>smṛtirapīti</pratika> । tathā copa-
bṛṃhaṇānurodhena <quote>‘medhapati’</quote> mityādeḥ <quote>‘āśāsānā medhapatibhyāṃ medha’</quote> mityādivattattatkarmārādhya-
paratayaivopapādanaṃ kāryāmiti bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘āvo rājāna’</quote> miti maṃtrasyāpyevamevopabṛṃhaṇaṃ śiva-
<pb n="275"/>
etanmūlā smṛtirapi parameśvarasya sarvayajñādhipatyaṃ vadati---
<quote>‘somenārādhayeddevaṃ somaṃ somaviśrūṣaṇam ।’</quote> iti ।। <quote>‘nāśvamedhātparo yajño rudra-
syārādhanaṃ prati ।।’</quote> iti ca rāmāyaṇam ।
camakeṣu <quote>‘vājaśca me prasavaśca me dhātā ca me viṣṇuśca me’</quote> ityādiṣu ca vājā-
dīnāṃ vastūnāṃ viṣṇvādīnāṃ devatānāṃ deyatvapratīteḥ pariśeṣādīśvarasya sarvakarma-
phaladātṛtvasiddhiḥ । ataḥ parameśvara eva sarvayajñārādhyaḥ sarvaphaladātā ।।’
pakṣāntaramāha---
<sutra>sū ।। dharma jaiminirata eva ।। 39 ।।</sutra>
dharmamevopapatteḥ śrutatvācca phaladāyinaṃ jaiminirmene । upapattiḥ kṛṣyādermardanā-
deśca karmaṇaḥ sākṣāt paraṃparayā vā phalasiddhinidarśanam । śrutaṃ ca kāminaḥ karta-
vyatayā karmavidhānānyathānupapattyā karmaivāpūrvarūpeṇa tattatphalasādhamiti ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
purāṇe dṛśyate <quote>‘kimebhiramarairanyairadhvare pūjitaiḥ phalam । rājā cedadhvarasyāsya na rudraḥ pūjyate
tvaye’</quote>ti । evaṃ sarvakarmaṇāmārādhyaṃ tatphalapradānadhurandharaṃ ca paraṃ brahmeti vyavasthāpitam ।
tatra <quote>‘medhapatiṃ rudra’</quote>mityādiśrutyudāharaṇena brahmā nārāyaṇo vā karmaṇāmārādhyaḥ phalapradātā
ceti kalpayatāṃ niravakāśatvamapi prasaṃgātsiddham । tasminprasaṃgasiddhe'rthe hetvantaramāha---
<pratika>camakeṣviti</pratika> । vājādīnāmiti dṛṣṭāntārtham । vājamannam । viṣṇvādīnāṃ deyatvaṃ <quote>‘sarve'smai
devā balimāvahantīti’</quote> śrutyuktarītyā tadvaśyatāpādanam । nirūpito'yamarthaḥ sudarśanācāryaiḥ
<quote>‘viṣṇuprajāpatipurandarapūrvakeṣu vājāditulyamakhileṣvapi daivateṣu । āśaṃsiteṣu camakāḥ pari-
śiṣyamāṇaṃ dātāramīśvara bhavantamaśābdamāhu’</quote> riti prapañcena ca taiśśivasya sarvakarmārādhyatvaṃ
śrutisūktimuktāvalyāṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ tatraivānusaṃdheyam । evaṃ dṛḍhīkṛte'pi siddhānte siddhā-
ntasiddhamarthaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇaṃ tadrītyaivāṃgīkārayituṃ pūrvapakṣamudbhāvayati । <pratika>sū ।। dharmaṃ jaiminirata
eva ।। 39 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘ata’</quote> eve tyetadupapapattiśrutatvarūpobhayahetuparāmarśi । tatra mardanādīnāṃ yathā
sāndṛṣṭikaphalasādhanatvaṃ dṛṣṭam evaṃ kṛṣyādīnāmudarkaphalasādhanatvamapi dṛṣṭameva । na ca
kṛṣyādibhirārādhitaḥ kaściccetanastatphalaṃ prayachati । tathaiva yāgādikarmaṇāmapi svayameva phala-
sādhanatvamupapadyate ityupapattiḥ । <quote>‘yajeta svargakāma’</quote> ityādiśravaṇam । tatra hi yāgādikaṃ
kāminaḥ karttavyatayā bodhyate na tu yāgādibhiḥ kasyacitprasādanīyatvam । nanu, <quote>‘vāyumeva
svena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayati’</quote> <quote>‘tṛpta evainamindraḥ prajayā paśubhissamarddha-
yatī’</quote> tyādivākyaśeṣeṇa bodhyata iti cet । na । tasya bādhitārthatvāt । etatkalpavarttinā-
mindrādīnāṃ kalpāntarabhogyaphaladātṛtvāsaṃbhavāt acetanadevatānāṃ kadāpi phaladātṛtvāsaṃ-
bhavācca । tasmāttattaddevatyakarmaphalameva tattaddevatādeyatvenāropya devatāstutiparo vākyaśeṣaḥ ।
yathā kārīrīṣṭyanantaraṃ vṛṣṭyā śuṣyatsasyaphalaniṣpattau jātāyāmetairidaṃ phalaṃ dattamiti ṛtvijaḥ
prati praśaṃsāvākyam । <quote>‘yamebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate’</quote> <quote>‘annādo vasudāna’</quote> ityādivedāntagatārtha-
vādajātamupapādanīyañcettadapyasaṃkareṇa sakalalokapālakasya parameśvarasya praśaṃsāparam ।
dṛśyate hyasaṃkareṇa rājyaṃ paripālayato rājñaḥ praśaṃsāvacana ‘mayamatra rājye kṛṣyādikarmaṇāṃ
<pb n="276"/>
<sutra>sū ।। pūrvaṃ tu bādarāyaṇo hetuvyapadeśāt ।। 40 ।।</sutra>
pūrvoktaṃ parameśvarasyaiva karmaphaladātṛtvaṃ bhagavān bādarāyaṇo manyate, <quote>‘vāyavyaṃ
śvetamālabheta bhūtikāmaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayati’</quote> ityādiṣu parameśvarātmakatayā
vāyvādīnāṃ karmavidhiṣveva phalahetutvavyapadeśāt । tadabhāve hi kṣaṇikasya
karmaṇaḥ phalasādhanatvanirvāhārthamapūrvatvaṃ kalpyeta । vākyaśeṣopapāditavidhyape-
kṣitaphalasādhanatvaprakārasadbhāve tu sa eva svīkartavyaḥ । yathā vākyaśeṣasthaṃ
vidhyapekṣitaṃ <quote>‘pratitiṣṭhanti ha vā etā rātrīrupayanti’</quote> ityādiṣu phalaṃ svīkri-
yate । <quote>‘yo vai rudraḥ sa bhagavān’</quote> ityādinā vāyvādisarvadevatārūpatvamīśvarasyā-
vagamyate atharvaśirasi । tatraiva parameśvareṇa <quote>‘yo māṃ veda sa sarvān devān veda’</quote> iti
svajñānāt svātmakasakaladevatājñānamupapāditam । ataḥ sakaladevatārūpaḥ sarva-
karmārādhyaḥ sarvaphaladātā parameśvaraḥ paraṃ brahma śivaḥ sākṣādumāpatiriti siddham ।
iti phalādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।
iti śrīkaṇṭhaśivācāryaviracite brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye
tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 3 ।। 2 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
phaladātā svāmī ce’ti । tasmātkarmaiva svargādisādhanamiti jaiminermatam । <pratika>sū ।। pūrvaṃ tu
bādarāyaṇo hetuvyapadeśāt ।। 40 ।।</pratika> rātri/?/trādervidhyavagateṣṭasādhanatvanirvāhāyeṣṭavi-
śeṣākāṃkṣāyāṃ yadvākyaśeṣapratīta iṣṭaviśeṣo gṛhyate na tadvākyaśeṣasvārasyena । <quote>‘pratitiṣṭhanti
havā ete ya etā rātrīrupayantī’</quote>ti vartamānopadeśenaṃ bhayoryaugapadyapratīteḥ kāryakāraṇabhāva-
virodhitvāt । kiṃ tu yadetadorvyatyastayojanayā <quote>‘pratitiṣṭhantī’</quote>tyatra sannarthāntarbhāvena <quote>‘upa-
yantī’</quote> tyatra vidhivibhaktitvāśrayaṇena ca <quote>‘ye pratiti/?/ṣṭhāsanti ta etā rātrīrupeyu’</quote> riti
vyavadhāraṇakalpanayā । na tāvānvāyukṣepiṣṭhādivākyeṣu kleśo'sti antaryāmiparatvakalpane ।
ato rātrisatranyāyataḥ śrutaparameśvaraprasādadvārakatva/?/siddhau paścāttannirvāhārthamapūrvakalpanā
na gauravadoṣamāvahati । na hi darśapūrṇamāsayorantaḥprayo/?/gaṃ śrapaṇīyasya puroḍāśasya prakṛti-
dravyopādānākāṃkṣāyāṃ paścādāvaśyakatayā prāpsyantama/?/piṣṭamatilaṃghya śrutavrīhidravyapari-
graheṇa samāpatato/?/ḍulapiṣṭāvasthayorapekṣaṇaṃ gau/?/ṣeṇa parityajyate । tasmājjaiminyabhima-
tanyāyenaivātra siddhāntaḥ sidhyatīti sūtrabhā/?/ṣyayorāśayaḥ । <pratika>apūrvaṃ kalpyeteti</pratika> । parameśvara-
prasādānapekṣamiti śeṣaḥ । tasmādavikalaṃ karmānuṣṭhāya tatsūkṣmāvasthārūpamapūrvaṃ sampādya tasya
yāvadvipākaṃ saṃkīrtanādibhyo nāśakebhyassaṃrakṣaṇe sati prasannaḥ parameśvarastatphalaṃ prayaccha-
tīti niravadyam ।। <pratika>iti phalādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</pratika></p>
<p>iti śrīśivātivādimūrdhanyaśivadarśanasthāpanadhuraṃdharasakaladevabhūdevapratiṣṭhāpakaśrīma-
ccinnabommabhūpālahṛdayakamalakuharaviharamāṇa<pratika>śrīsāṃbaśivapreritasya</pratika> śrīmadbhara-
dvājakulajaladhikaustubhaśrīviśvajīdyājiśrīraṅgarājādhvarivarasūnorappaya-
<pratika>dīkṣitasya kṛtau śrīkaṇṭhācāryaviracitabrahmamīmāṃsābhāṣyavyā</pratika>-
khyāyāṃ <pratika>śivārkamaṇidīpikākhyāyāṃ</pratika> tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ
pādaḥ ।। 3 ।। 2 ।।</p>
<pb n="277"/>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyam</head>
<head>atha phalādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। phalamata upapatteḥ ।। 37 ।। śrutatvācca ।। 38 ।। dharmaṃ jaiminirata eva ।। 39 ।। pūrvaṃ tu bādarā-
yaṇo hetuvyapadeśāt ।। 40 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>karmaṇa evāstu phalaṃ kiṃcidvārā kṛṣinyāyāt । maivaṃ karmārādhyaḥ śrutaḥ śivastatphalapradātānaḥ ।। 200 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti phalādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<p>iti śrīmadappayyadīkṣitakṛtau caturmatasārasaṃgrahe nayamaṇimālākhye
tṛtīyaparicchede tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 3 ।। 2 ।।</p>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha phalādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। phalamata upapatteḥ ।। 38 ।। śrutatvācca ।। 39 ।। dharmaṃ jaiminirata eva ।। 40 ।। pūrvaṃ tu bādarāyaṇo
hetuvyapadeśāt ।। 41 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, nanu brahmātiriktasya vastuno niṣedhe brahmaṇo nirviśeṣatvena phaladātṛtvaṃ na syādityākṣepasaṃgatyedamāha---
<pratika>sū ।। phalamata upapatteḥ ।। 38 ।।</pratika> atra kiṃ sarvasya jantoḥ karmaṇa eva phalaṃ bhavati uteśvarāditi <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । karmaṇa
iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, ataḥ</pratika>=asmātparameśvarāt phalaṃ sarvasya jantorbhavitumarhati । kutaḥ । <pratika>upapatteḥ</pratika>=kṣaṇi-
kātkarmaṇaḥ phalāsaṃbhaveneśvarasyaiva phaladātṛtvopapatterityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। śrutatvācca ।। 39 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmānnādo vasudāna’</quote> iti īśvare phalahetutvasya śrutatvācceśvaraḥ
phaladātetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>śaṅkate—<pratika>sū ।। dharmaṃ jaiminirata eva ।। 40 ।।</pratika> yataḥ śrutyupapattibhyāmīśvaraṃ phaladātāraṃ manyate siddhāntī, <pratika>ata eva</pratika>=
śrutyupapattibhyām । dharmaṃ phaladātāraṃ jaiminirācāryo manyate । tathā hi—<quote>‘svargakāmo yajeta’</quote> iti vidhiviṣayasya yāgasya
svargasādhanatvaṃ śrutam । tannirvāhāya śrutiprāmāṇyādapūrvākhyo vyāpāro yāgasyottarāvasthārūpaḥ kalpanīya iti yāgādidharma
eva phaladātā, īśvarasya sarvasādhāraṇasya vicitraphaladātṛtvānupapatteriti ।।</p>
<p>samādhatte <pratika>sūpūrvaṃ tu bādarāyaṇo hetuvyapadeśāt ।। 41 ।।</pratika> turuktaśaṃkānirāsārthaḥ । <pratika>pūrvaṃ</pratika>=pūrvoktamīśvaraṃ phaladātāraṃ
bādarāyaṇastvācāryo manyate । karma apūrvaṃ vā svasvarūpasvaviniyogasākṣātkāravadadhiṣṭhitaṃ bhavitumarhati acetanatvānmṛdādiva-
dityanumānena saṃbhāvite'rthe śrutismṛtī pramāṇayati <pratika>hetuvyapadeśāt</pratika>---<quote>‘eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati’</quote> annādo vasudāna’
iti śrutyāṃ <quote>‘labhate ca tataḥ kāmānmayaiva vihitānhitān’</quote> ityādismṛtyā ca īśvarasya dharmādharmayostatphale ca hetutvena vyapade-
śādityatastattatkarmasāpekṣādīśvarādeva sarveṣāṃ phalasiddhiḥ । tadevamadhikaraṇacatuṣṭayena nirviśeṣaḥ svaprakāśo niṣedhāviṣayo'dvi-
tīyaḥ śākhācandranyāyena karmaphaladātṛtvenopalakṣitastatpadārthaḥ paramātmā śodhita iti tattvaṃpadārthau śodhitāviti sthitam ।।
asmi<pratika>nmate</pratika> atra <pratika>pāde adhikaraṇānyaṣṭau</pratika> । sūtrāṇi tu <pratika>ekacatvāriṃśat</pratika> ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> ca <pratika>pūrvapakṣasiddhāntādikaṃ</pratika> prameyajātamaviśiṣṭam । upapādanaprakāravailakṣaṇyātsūtrā-
rthavarṇane paramasti vailakṣaṇyamiti tadevātra nirūpyate । <pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate—sū ।। phalamata upapatteḥ ।। 37 ।। ataḥ</pratika>=parameśvarā-
devārādhitāt । <pratika>phalam</pratika>=sarveṣāṃ karmaphalasiddhiḥ । <pratika>upapatteḥ</pratika>=sevitarājādivadupāsitātparameśvarādupāsakānāṃ phalasiddhayu-
papatteḥ ।। <pratika>rāmānujamate ca</pratika> kṣaṇavidhvaṃsinaḥ karmaṇaḥkālāntarabhāviphalapradānāśaktatvātsarvajñasya sarvaśakteśca parameśvarasya
tadupapatteścetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। śrutatvācca ।। 38 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘gādhapatiṃ medhapati’</quote> mityādiśrutiṣu parameśvarasya sarvakarmādhipatyasya tatphaladātṛtvasya ca-
śrutatvāccetyarthaḥ । <pratika>rāmānujamate tu</pratika>, <quote>‘sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmānnādo vasudānaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘eṣa hyevānandayāti’</quote> iti bhogāpavarga-
rūpaṃ phalamayameva dadātīti śrutatvāccetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। dharmaṃ jaiminirata eva ।। 39 ।।</pratika> ubhayatrāpyaviśiṣṭam ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। pūrvaṃ tu bādarāyaṇo hetuvyapadeśāt ।। 40 ।।</pratika> pūrvoktaṃ parameśvarasyaiva phaladātṛtvaṃ bhagavānvādarāyaṇo
manyate । <quote>‘sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayatī’</quote> tyādiśrutiṣu vā/?/yvādyātmanāvasthitasyaiva parameśvarasya karmavidhiṣveva phalahetutvavyapadeśāt ।
<pratika>rāmānujamate'</pratika>pyaviśiṣṭam ।। anayormatayo<pratika>rnavādhikaraṇāni</pratika> sūtrāṇi <pratika>catvāriṃśat</pratika> ।।</p>
<head>iti śrīkaṇṭharāmānujamatayoḥ phalādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<pb n="278"/>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, atreśvarasya svarganarakādiphalapradatvamahimā samarthyate—<pratika>sū ।। phalamata upapatteḥ ।। 39 ।।</pratika> īśvarasya
phalapradatvamabhyupagacchatāpi karmaṇaḥ phalakāraṇatvamavaśyamabhyupagantavyam । anyathā vaiṣamyanaiṃrghṛṇyakarmavaiyarthyatadbodhakavedāprāmā-
ṇyadoṣāpatteḥ । tataśca karmaṇa eva phalopapatteḥ kimīśvareṇa । tasya phalapradatvaśrutīnāṃ sādhvasādhukarmaṇostatkāritatvenaupacārikatvo-
papatteriti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, satyaṃ karma phalakāraṇaṃ tattu na cetanāpreritaṃ phalopayogīti yathāśruti parameśvara eva
karmāpekṣaphaladātā । ataḥ pratipāditaniratiśayamahimaśālini parameśvare bhaktiḥ kāryeti siddhamiti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, phalaṃ</pratika>=
svargādi । <pratika>ataḥ</pratika>=īśvarādeva bhavati । na karmataḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>upapatteḥ</pratika>=īśvarasya cetanatvena phaladātṛtvasya yuktatvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। śrutatvācca ।। 40 ।।</pratika> śrutatvāt=śrutyuktatvācceśvarasyaiva phaladātṛmityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। dharmaṃ jaiminirata eva ।। 41 ।।</pratika> jaiminirācāryaḥ dharmaṃ phalapradamāha । taṃ ca dharmaṃ ata eva īśvarādeva janyaṃ
manyate । kutaḥ । <pratika>ata eva</pratika>=<quote>‘eṣa hyeve’</quote>ti śruterevetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। pūrvaṃ tu bādarāyaṇo hetuvyapadeśāt ।। 42 ।।</pratika> vādarāyaṇācāryastu <pratika>pūrvaṃ</pratika>=pūrvoktaṃ brahma dharmaṃ cobhayaṃ phalahetuṃ
manyate । atra brahma kartṛtvena karma karaṇatvena heturiti viśeṣastuśabdārthaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>hetuvyapadeśāt</pratika>=<quote>‘puṇyene’</quote> ti śrutau
brahmakarmaṇoḥ kartṛtvakaraṇatvarūpahetutvasyoktatvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>atra <pratika>pāde</pratika> asmi<pratika>nmate viṃśatiradhikaraṇāni sūtrāṇi tu dvicatvāriṃśat ।।</pratika></p>
<head>ityānandatīrthameta phalādhikaraṇam ।। 20 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ phalādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<lg><l>yaṃ prāsūta viśuddhaśīlamanaghaṃ vṛddhāṃbikākhyā satī
yaṃ mṛtyuñjayaśarmaṇo budhamaṇerbhāgyaṃ vidussādhavaḥ ।</l>
<l>vādhūlānvayajanmano'sya sudhiyo hālāsyanāthāhvaya-
syeyaṃ satkṛtiredhatāmiha caturbhāṣyānugā candrikā ।।</l></lg>

<l>dvaitīyīkaḥ pādaḥ prathitaḥ pūrṇaśca bhaktipāda iti ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti hālāsyanāthakṛtau sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 3 ।। 2 ।।</head>

<head>।। śrīḥ ।।</head>
<head>śivābhyāṃ namaḥ ।</head>
<head>śrīkaṇṭhācāryakṛtau</head>
<head>brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye</head>
<head>atha tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
atha sarvavedāntapratyayādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।
<p>pūrvatra nirūpito nityatvādiguṇakastvaṃpadārthaḥ paśurupāsakaḥ, sarvajñatvādiguṇa-
kastatpadārthaḥ patirupāsyaḥ śivaśca । tadiha kathamupāsanamityākāṅkṣāyāṃ tannirūpa-
ṇamuttaratrābhivartate—
<sutra>sū ।। sarvavedāntapratyayaṃ codanādyaviśeṣāt ।। 1 ।।</sutra>
sarveṣu vedānteṣu daharādyupāsanaṃ śrūyate । tadekam uta śākhābhedādinā bhinnameva
iti saṃdehaḥ ।।
śākhābhedena prakaraṇabhedāt pratiśākhamupāsanaṃ bhidyate ।</p>

<head>śivārkamaṇidīpikāyāṃ</head>
<head>tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya</head>
<head>tṛtīyapādaprāraṃbhaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha sarvavedāntapratyayādhikaraṇam ।।</head>
<p>saṅgatisūcanārthaṃ pūrvadaśapādīsiddhārtheṣvapekṣitārthānuvādapūrvakamuttarapādapratipādyārthaṃ darśa-
yati—<pratika>pūrvatreti</pratika> । jīvasya nityatve hyupāsanāsādhyaśāśvataphalaprāptau vāṃchā bhavet । svayamani-
tyasya kiṃ tena । ato <quote>‘nātmāśrute’</quote>rityadhikaraṇasiddhaṃ nityatvaṃ smāritam । ādiśabdena
saṃsāre jihāsotpattyarthamavasthātraye'pi heyāspadatvaṃ pūrvapādadvayoktaṃ saṃgṛhītam । ciramupā-
sitasyāpi śivasya kadācidupāsakaprayāsānanusaṃdhānena tadanuguṇaphalādātṛtve kimatiduṣka-
rānekaniyamaghaṭitenopāsanāprayatnena । ataśśāstrayonitvādhikaraṇasiddhaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ smāri-
tam । ādiśabdena sarvaśaktimattvaniratiśayadayāśālitvamahāvadānyatvādikaṃ pūrvādhikaraṇa-
paryantatattadadhikaraṇodāhṛtaviṣayavākyaiḥ śabdato'rthataśca siddhamupāsyatvopayuktakalyāṇaguṇa-
jātaṃ gṛhyate । <pratika>kathamupāsanamiti</pratika> । kimekasyopāsanasya kasyāṃcicchākhāyāṃ yāvanto guṇā
āmnātāstāvadupasaṃhāreṇaiva tadupāsanaṃ kāryamuta śākhāṃtaragatatadupāsanāprakaraṇāmnātaguṇāṃ-
taropasaṃhāreṇetyākāṃkṣāyāṃ tannirūpaṇaṃ, pravartate । tadarthaṃ śākhābhede'pi codanādyaviśeṣe sati
nopāsanaṃ bhidyata iti tadabhedanirūpaṇaṃ tadbhedanirūpaṇaṃ tu tadapavādatveneti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>sū॰ ।।
sarvavedāntapratyayaṃ codanādyaviśeṣāt ।। 1 ।।</pratika> codanādyaviśeṣeṇābhedapratyabhijñānāt
nāmarūpādibhedena bhedapratīteśca saṃśayaṃ darśayati—<pratika>prakaraṇabhedāditi</pratika> । prakaraṇāṃtaroktira-
bhyāsasyāpyupalakṣaṇam । asti hi māsāgnihotranityāgnihotranyāyena daharavidyādīnāṃ chāṃdo-
gyataittirīyādiṣu prakaraṇabhedava <quote>‘dvidyādupāsīte’</quote> tyādiraviśeṣitatattadvidhiśravaṇarūpo'bhyā-
so'pi । nanu nātrābhyāsanyāyaḥ pravartate । vidhiśrutyā viśeṣaṇasaṃkrāṃtirahitayā karmavi-
dhisiddhau vihitasya vidhānamanarthakamityānathakyanyāyamūlako hyabhyāsena karmabhedaḥ । na
<pb n="280"/>
tathā chāndogye taittirīyake ca daharopāsanamāmnāyate । ekatra <quote>‘ya ātmā'pahata-
pāpmā vijaro vimṛtyuḥ’</quote>ityārabhya apahatapāpmatvādayo guṇā āmnātāḥ । anyatra
<quote>‘ṛtaṃ satyam’</quote> ityārabhya kṛṣṇapiṅgalatvādayo guṇāḥ । tatra guṇabhedenopāsanaṃ
bhidyate । chāndogye pañcāgnividyāyāṃ kauthumamiti nāma, bṛhadāraṇyake vājasane-
yamiti nāma । tatra nāmabhedādupāsanaṃ bhidyate । muṇḍakaśākhāyāṃ śirovratākhyo
dharmaḥ śrūyate <quote>‘teṣāmevaitāṃ brahmavidyāṃ vadeta śirovrataṃ vidhivadyaistu cīrṇam’</quote> iti ।
śirovrataṃ nāma vedavrataviśeṣaḥ ātharvaṇikānprati vihito netarānprati ।

cehānarthakyamasti । yo yacchākhādhyāyī taṃ prati tadvākyaṃ tatkarmapramityarthamiti sārthakatva-
saṃbhavāt <quote>‘svādhyāyo'dhyetavya’</quote> iti pitṛpitāmahādiparaṃparāprāptasvaśākhādhyayanasyaiva vihi-
tatvenānadhītācchākhāntaratastatpramityasaṃbhavāt । evamiha prakaraṇāntaranyāyo'pi na prava-
rtate । asannihitasya karmaṇo buddhiviparivṛttyabhāvenānuvādāyogāt । karmavidhisiddhau
vihitasya vidhānamanarthakamiti prakaraṇāṃtarataḥ karmabhedasiddherapyānarthakyamūlakatvāditi
cenmaivam । kṛtasvaśākhādhyayanasya matipāṭavakautukādinā śākhāntarādhyayanasya tattacchākhā-
dhyāyibhyastattadvākyagrahaṇasya ca sambhavena taṃ prati tasya tasya vākyasyānuvādakatvaṃ svaśā-
khādhyāyinaṃ prati jñāpa1katvamiti vairūpyaṃ syāditi sarvaśākhāvākyānāmevaṃvidhānarthakyapari-
hārāya sarveṣāmapi vākyānāṃ bhinnabhinnakarmavidhāyakatvasyāvaśyavaktavyatvenātrāpyānarthakya-
nyāyapravṛtteḥ । <pratika>tathā chāṃdogya iti</pratika> । yathā <quote>‘tapte payasi dadhyānayati sā vaiśvadaivyāmikṣā
vājibhyo vājina’</quote> mityatrotpattiviśiṣṭāmikṣādravyāvaruddhe vaiśvadevayāge dravyatayā niveśi-
tatvenāmikṣāvirodhāttatra niveśamalabhamānena vājinaguṇena vājinayāgasya tato bhedaḥ ।
utpattivākyasaṃsiddhaṃ karma sarvamanūdyate । <quote>‘na cāśritaguṇe śakyaṃ tadvirodhi guṇāntara’</quote>miti
nyāyāt । evamapahatapāpmatvādiguṇanirūpaṇānaṃtara <quote>‘matha ya ihātmāna’</quote> mityādinā prakṛtā-
pahatapāpmatvādiguṇakā2tmaviṣayatayā vidhīyamānāyāṃ chāṃdogyāmnātadaharavidyāyāṃ dehasadbhāve
pāpmādisparśāvaśyaṃbhāvenāpahatapāpmatvādivirodhāttasyāṃ niveśamalabhamānena kṛṣṇapiṃgalatvā-
diguṇena taittirīyāmnātāyā daharavidyāyāstato bheda ityarthaḥ । <pratika>chāṃdogya iti</pratika> । yathā <quote>‘athai-
ṣa jyotiretena sahasradakṣiṇena yajete’</quote> tyatra jyotirnāmakasya yāgasya jyotiriti nāmabhedena
prakṛtājjyotiṣṭomanāmno yāgādbhedaḥ । evaṃ chāṃdogyabṛhadāraṇyakāmnātapaṃcāgnividyayoḥ kauthu-
mavājasaneyakanāmabhedādbhedaḥ। śākhāsviva tattadāmnātavidyāsvapi kauthumādināmnāṃ kauthumī
paṃcāgnividyetyādirūpeṇa vyavahriyamāṇatayā tāni śākhānāmeva nāmāni na vidyānāmiti
niyaṃtumaśakyatvāditi bhāvaḥ । pañcāgnividyodāharaṇena saṃkhyālakṣaṇaguṇabhedādapi bhedassū-
citaḥ । chāṃdogye hi pañcaivāgnayaḥ samāmnātā <quote>‘atha ha ya etānevaṃ paṃcāgnīnvede’</quote>ti । bṛha-
dāraṇyake tu ṣaṣṭho'pyagnirāmnātaḥ <quote>‘tasyāgnirevāgnirbhavati samitsami’</quote>dityādinā । <pratika>muṇḍaka
iti</pratika> । ātharvaṇikānpratyeva vihitasya śirovratasya muṇḍakāmnātaprakṛtākṣarabrahmavidyāṃgatvena
tadga‍uṇarahitaśākhāntarāmnātākṣarabrahmavidyā tato bhinnaiva vācyā । ekasyāṃ vidyāyāṃ tadga‍uṇatvātadga‍u
ṇatvasamāveśāsaṃbhavāt । na ca <quote>‘naitadacīrṇavrato'dhīta’</quote> ityagre śirovratasya prakṛtamuṇḍako-
paniṣadadhyayanāṃgatvaśravaṇāt gurumukhoccāraṇānūccāraṇarūpādhyayanaśarīrānupakārakaṃ tacchirovra-
<note>(1) <quote>‘pramāpakatvamiti’</quote> iti. kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(1) <quote>‘guṇaviśiṣṭātma’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>

ato dharmabhedādupāsanābhedaḥ । tataḥ śākhādibhedādupāsanābheda iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।।

tamadhyayanasaṃskāryāyāstasyā upaniṣada evāṃgaṃ bhavet । tathā ca saivopaniṣadetatpratipādyākṣarabrahma-
vidyāpratipādakopaniṣadantarādbhidyeta nākṣarabrahmavidyeti vācyam । adhyayanajanyasaṃskārasyā-
kṣarāvāptirūpatvena śirovratamaṃtareṇādhyayanenaivāvāptuṃ śakyāyāmupaniṣadi tajjanye vidyānuṣṭhāno-
payoginyarthajñāne cānupakārakasya śirovratasya vidyāyāmeva phalopakāryaṃgatvasya vaktavya-
tvāt । na ca tasyāṃ śirovratasya viniyojakaṃ pramāṇaṃ nāsti kiṃtvadhyayana eva acīrṇavrata-
syādhyayananiṣedhasāmarthyāt śirovratācaraṇamadhyayanāṃgamiti siddheriti vācyam । uktasāma-
rthyādadhyayanāṃgatvakalpanāyāṃ prasaktāyāmadhyayane tadavāpyāyāmupaniṣadi cānupakāriṇaśśiro-
vratasyopaniṣatpratipādyatvena tadupasthāpyāyāṃ vidyāyāṃ juhvākṛtyanupakārakasya parṇatvasya juhū-
pasthāpyāyāmiṣṭāviva viniyojakasya vākyapramāṇasya vopaniṣadupasthāpyāyā vidyāyā buddhi-
sannidhānasattvātsannidhilakṣaṇasthānapramāṇasya vā sattvāt śirovratasyādhyayanāṃgatvavidhivya-
tirekeṇa <quote>‘teṣāmevetāṃ brahmavidyā’</quote> miti prakṛtabrahmavidyāṃgatvavidherapi sattvācca । na ca <quote>‘naita-
dacīrṇavrata’</quote> ityagrimavākyānusāreṇa brahmavidyāśabdastatpratipādakaprakṛtopaniṣadgraṃthaparo vyā-
khyeya iti vācyam । upasaṃhārānurodhenopakramasyānyathākaraṇāyogādvirodhābhāvācca ।
adhyayanāṃgasya satassaṃyogapṛthaktvena vidyāṃgatvasyāpi saṃbhavāt । <quote>‘teṣāmevaitā’</quote>mityanenā-
pyadhyayanāṃgatvasyaiva bodhane'grimavākyena paunaruktyāpatteśca । na <quote>‘cetāmi’</quote>ti prakṛtaparāmarśinā
sarvanāmnā muṇḍakopaniṣadadhyayanāvāpyatvena rūpeṇa vidyāparāmarśādupaniṣadaṃtareṇa yaireṣā
vidyāvāpyate teṣāṃ tadanuṣṭhāne śirovratamaṃgaṃ na sidhyatīti nāsti vidyaikye kaścidvirodhaḥ
iti vācyam । muṇḍakopaniṣadadhyayanāvāpyatvena rūpeṇa vidyāyāḥ śabdataḥ prakṛtatvābhāvena
tādrūpyeṇa parāmarśe hetvabhāvāt । anyathā <quote>‘ya etenāniṣṭvāthānyena yajata’</quote> ityatrāpyetaccha-
bdasya tacchākhādhyayanāvāptatrivṛdādistomayuktajyotiṣṭomaparatvāpattyā kratvaṃtarāṇāṃ tathābhū-
tajyotiṣṭomapūrvakatvaniyamaprasaṃgādevamapi paunaruktyāparihārācca । agrimavākyena muṇḍa-
kopani1ṣadupasthitau tasyāmanupakārakasya śirovratasya tadavāpyavidyāṃgatva eva paryavasā-
nāt । na ca, tarhi śākhāntareṣvapyāmnātākṣarabrahmavidyātharvaṇikamātrādhikārikaśiro-
vratāṃgakatvānurodhena tanmātrādhikāriketyadhikārasaṃkoco'stu । <quote>‘ṛddhikāmāssatramāsīra’</quote>
nnityaviśeṣaśravaṇe'pi satre ye yajamānāsta ṛtvija iti brāhmaṇakartṛkeṣu ṛtvikkarmasu yaja-
mānānāṃ kartṛtvavidhyanurodhena brāhmaṇānāmevādhikāraḥ । tatrāpi rājanyavasiṣṭhānāṃ nārā-
śaṃso dvitīyaḥ prayājastanūnapādanyeṣāmiti prayojakeṣu kalpabhedaśravaṇātsarveṣāṃ yajamānānāṃ
tada2vaiguṇyāya tulyakalpānāmevādhikāraḥ । tatrāpi vaiśvāmitro hoteti । niyamāt vaiśvāmi-
tratattulyakalpānāmevādhikāra ityaṃgānurodhenādhikārasaṃkocadarśanāt । tathā ca muṇḍake
śākhāntareṣu cākṣarabrahmavidyaikye'pi na kaścidvirodhaḥ । ātharvaṇikavyatiriktānāṃ tu dahara-
vaiśvānarādividyāntaropāsanena muktirbhaviṣyatīti vācyam । śākhāntaroktākṣaravidyā3yāṃ
muṇḍakoktāṃgānurodhena saṃkocānupapattau tatsaṃkocanāyogāt । na ca codanādyaviśeṣādabhe-
dasiddhestatsaṅkocanaṃ, tadbhedasyābhyāsādibhissādhitatvāditi bhāvaḥ । ato dharmabhedāditi ।

siddhāntastu—sarvavedāntapratyayaṃ daharādyupāsanamekameva, karmavidhiṣviva coda-

yadyapi śirovratarūpadharmaviśeṣādbhedo'pi guṇaviśeṣādeva bhedaḥ tathāpyayamutpannaśiṣṭaguṇādbheda
ityetāvatā pṛthaguktiḥ । <pratika>sū॰ ।। sarvavedāntapratyayaṃ codanādyaviśeṣāt ।। 1 ।।</pratika> pratīyata
iti pratyayam । sarvavedāntapratipādyamekameveti sādhyaṃ hetusāmarthyādadhyāhṛtam । <quote>‘karmavidhi-
ṣviveti’</quote> śākhāntarādhikaraṇanyāyassūcitaḥ । śākhāṃtarādhikaraṇe hi <quote>‘nāmarūpadharmaviśeṣapu-
naruktinindāśaktisamāptivacanaprāyaścittānyārthadarśanācchākhāntare karmabhedaḥ syā’</quote>diti sūtre
pūrvapakṣamupanyasya <quote>‘ekaṃ vā saṃyogarūpacodanākhyāviśeṣāt’</quote> iti sūtreṇa siddhāntaḥ kṛtaḥ । tatra
pūrvapakṣasūtrasyāyamarthaḥ---kāṭhakamāśakakālāpakādīni tattacchākhāgatāgnihotrādīnāṃ nāmā-
nīti nāmabhedaḥ । kvacicchākhāyā <quote>‘magnīṣomīyamekādaśakapāla’</quote>miti śrūyate । anyatra dvāda-
śakapālamiti rūpabhedaḥ । <quote>‘mārutamasi marutāmoja’</quote> ityādīni kārīrīvākyānyadhīyānā-
staittirīyā bhūmibhojanamācaranti nānye । agnivākyānyadhīyānāḥ kecidupādhyāyasyodakuṃbha-
māharanti nāpare । aśvamedhavākyānyadhīyānāḥ ke'pyaśvasya ghāsamānayanti netara ityeva-
mādirdharmabhedaḥ । punaruktirabhyāsaḥ । <quote>‘prātaḥ prātaranṛtaṃ te vadaṃtī’</quote>ti । <quote>‘purodayājjuhvati
ye'gnihotraṃ divākīrtyamadivā kīrtayantaḥ sūryo jyotirna tadā jyotireṣā’</quote>miti <quote>‘yathātithaye
pradrutāyānnaṃ hareyustādṛgeva tadyadudite juhvatī’</quote>ti ca śākhābhedenoditānuditahomayoḥ para-
sparaniṃdā । aśaktiḥ sarvaśākhoditāṃgānāmekatropasaṃhāraḥ । maitrāyaṇīyānāmanvārohasaṃjña-
keṣu sthalārohaṇamantreṣvagnissamāpyate'nyatrānyeṣāmiti samāptibhedaḥ । keṣāṃcicchākhāyā-
muditahomavyatikrame prāyaścittaṃ keṣāṃcidanuditahomavyatikrame iti prāyaścittabhedaḥ । udi-
tānuditahomavidhānaṃ vaikalpikatvenopapannamityubhayathāpyavaiguṇyaṃ bhavati । prāyaścittavidhāna-
mubhayathāpi karmaikye vaiguṇyaliṅgam । evaṃ nāmabhedādibhiśśākhābhede karmabhedaḥ । anyārtha-
darśanācca । tathā hi dvādaśāhe śrūyate—<quote>‘yadi purā didīkṣāṇāḥ syurbṛhatsāmānamatirātramupe-
yurupetaṃ hyeṣāṃ rathantaramatha yadyadidīkṣāṇāḥ rathaṃtarasāmānamatirātramupeyu’</quote> riti । purā didī-
kṣāṇā pūrvameva dīkṣāvantaḥ । liṭaḥ kānaci dvirvacanam । atrāniṣṭaprathamayajñānāṃ dvādaśāha-
darśanaṃ śākhābhedena dvādaśāhabhede liṃgam । katham । tāṇḍiśākhāyāṃ <quote>‘ya etenāniṣṭve’</quote>tvā-
dinā sarvakratūnāṃ jyotiṣṭomapāścātyatvamaṃgaṃ vihitam । yadi pratiśākhaṃ dvādaśāhādayaḥ
kratavo bhinnā na syuḥ tadaika eva dvādaśāho nānāśākhāsu vihita iti tasya jyotiṣṭoma-
pūrvakatvaniyamādaniṣṭaprathamayajñasya dvādaśāhadarśanaṃ nopapadyate । yadi pratiśākhaṃ te bhinnāḥ
syustadā tāṇḍiśākhāyā <quote>‘mathānyena yajate’</quote> ityanyaśabdasya tāṇḍiśākhāgatadvādaśāhādi-
kratvaṃtaraviṣayatvopapatteḥ । śākhāntaragatadvādaśāhādīnāṃ jyotiṣṭomapāścātyatvasyāvidhā-
nāt yasyāṃ śākhāyāmaniṣṭaprathamayajñasya dvādaśāhṛdarśanaṃ tacchākhāgatadvādaśāhaviṣaya-
tvena tadupapadyata iti । evaṃ nāmabhedādihetubhiḥ pratiśākhamagnihotrādikaṃ bhidyata iti
pūrvapakṣo sati tadaikyasādhakasya siddhāntasūtrasyāyamarthaḥ—sarvāsu śākhāsvekamagnihotrādikarma
svargādiphalasaṃyogasya rūpākhyasya dravyadevatasya juhotyādicodanāyā agnihotrādyākhyā-
yāścetyeteṣāmabhedapratyabhijñāpakānāmaviśeṣāditi । eta eva śākhāntarādhikaraṇasiddhānta-
<pb n="283"/>
nāphalasaṃyogarūpākhyānāmaviśeṣāt । <quote>‘vidyāt’</quote> <quote>‘upāsīta’</quote> iti codanā tāvat
śākhābhede'pyaviśiṣṭā । phalasaṃyogo brahmaprāptirūpo'viśiṣṭaḥ । vedyamapi vaiśvā-
narādirūpaṃ brahmāviśiṣṭam । ākhyāpi vaiśvānaravidyetyevamādiraviśiṣṭaivetyeka-
mevopāsanam । vidyādibhede'pyupāsanaṃ na bhidyate । <quote>‘tasminyadantastadanveṣṭavyam’</quote>
iti chāndogye daharavidyāvidhiḥ । <quote>‘tasminyadantastadupāsitavyam’</quote> iti taitti-
rīyake ca । tatra sthānādyabhedādupāsyasya brahmaṇo'pyabhedāt ubhayatroktānāṃ dharmā-
ṇāmavirodhādvidyaikyameva । chāndogyabṛhadāraṇyakaśākhayordyuparjanyapṛthivīpuruṣa-
yoṣidākhyasyāgnipañcakasya vedyatayā yatsvarūpamāmnātaṃ tadubhayatrāpi samānam ।
ato na vidyābhedaḥ ।

hetavo'trāpi codanādyaviśeṣādityanenopanyastā iti vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>codanāphalasaṃyogetyā-

namanuvidya vrajantī’</quote>ti vākye daharavidyāvidhiḥ tathāpi notpattiśiṣṭaguṇāvarodho doṣaḥ,
virodhābhāvādityabhipretyāha—<pratika>ubhayatroktānāmiti</pratika> । virodhābhāvo <quote>‘darśayati ce’</quote>ti sūtre
pradarśayiṣyate । virodhā1bhāve ca notpattiśiṣṭaguṇāvarodho doṣaḥ । anyathā puroḍāśādyavaru-
ddheṣu yāgeṣu vrīhyādīnāmananvayāpatteḥ । kauthumādīni śākhānāṃ nāmāni na tu vidyānām ।
ato nāmabhedācchā2khābhede'pi na vidyābhedaḥ । kauthumādiśabdānāmekaikaśākhānāmatvena
tadāmnātāsu sarvāsvapi vidyāsu lākṣaṇikatvopapattau tāvatīṣu vidyāsu pratyekaṃ śaktiṃ kalpa-
yitvā ta3tra tatra lakṣaṇākalpanasya gauravaparāhatatvāt । yathāhuḥ---śākhayā hyekayā yogādba-
hukarmāvabodhanam । yujyate karmanānātvānnaikaśākhopalakṣaṇa’ miti । kiñca । kauthumaśabdaḥ
kuthuminā proktamityasminnarthe proktapratyayāntaḥ pravacananimittaḥ । na ca pravacanaṃ vidyāyā-
ssaṃbhavati । tasya śabdaviṣayatvāt । vājasaneyakaśabdo'pyāmnāyaviśeṣaparaḥ <quote>‘śaunakādibhya-
śchandasī’</quote>ti sūtreṇa śaunakādigaṇapaṭhitādvājasaneyaśabdādvājasaneyena prāktaṃ chanda ityarthe
ṇinipratyeya tadantasya <quote>‘chaṃdobrāhmaṇāni ca tadviṣayāṇī’</quote>ti sūtreṇa <quote>‘tadadhīte tadvede’</quote> tyeta-
darthavihitapratyayaviṣayatve tadarthavihitasya ca prāgdīvyatīyapratyayasya <quote>‘proktāllumiti’</quote> sūtreṇa
luki vājasaneyena proktaṃ chaṃdo'dhīyata iti vājasaneyina iti rūpe sthite teṣāmāmnāya i-
tyarthe <quote>‘caraṇāddharmāmnāyayoriti vaktavya’</quote>miti vārttikena vājasaneyināmāmnāya ityarthe vihite
vājasaneyiśabdāduñpratyaye <quote>‘nastaddhita’</quote> iti ṭilope ca sati vājasaneyakaśabdasya nippatteḥ ।
evaṃ kauthumādiśabdānāṃ śākhānāmatvavyutpādanaṃ <quote>‘na nāmnā syāccodanābhidhānatvā’</quote>diti
śākhāntarādhikaraṇaguṇasūtrasiddhaṃ prasiddhameveti tadvihāya śākhādvayāmnātāyāṃ pañcāgnivi-
dyāyāmagnisaṃkhyārūpaguṇabhedādbhedaśaṃkāṃ nirācaṣṭe—<pratika>chāṃdogyeti । vedyatayeti ।</pratika> upāsanīyata-
yetyarthaḥ । tathā ca bṛhadāraṇyake'pi sāṃpādikāḥ pañcaivāgnaya upāsyāḥ । ata eva ṣaṣṭhasyā-
pyagnessamiddha‍ūmādikalpanayopāsanāprasaktau tannivṛttaye <quote>‘tasyāgnisvāgnirbhavati’</quote> <quote>‘samitsamit’</quote>
ityādi samāmnāyate । ṣaṣṭhasyāpyagnerupāsyatve tu sāṃpādikāgnyabhiprāyā pañcasaṃkhyeti na virodhaḥ ।

<sutra>sū ।। bhedānneti cennaikasyāmapi ।। 2 ।।</sutra>
aviśeṣapunaḥśrutiḥ prakaraṇāntarasahitā bhedāpādikā । ato na vidyaikyamiti
cet—vidyaikye'pi śākhāntare'pi pratipattṛbhedādupapannā sā na bhedāvahā ।।
<sutra>sū ।। svādhyāyasya tathātvena hi samācāre'dhikārācca savavacca tanniyamaḥ ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
atharvavede <quote>‘teṣāmevaitāṃ brahmavidyāṃ vadeta’</quote> iti śirovrataniyamaḥsvādhyāyāṅgatvena
na tu vidyāṅgatvena । <quote>‘naitadacīrṇavrato'dhīte’</quote> iti tasyādhyayanasaṃbandhāvagamāt, samā-
cāragranthe <quote>‘idamapi vedavratena vyākhyātam’</quote> iti tasya vedavratatvapratipādanācca ।
<quote>‘brahmavidyām’</quote> ityatra brahmaśabdo vedaviṣayaḥ ।

abhyāsaprakaraṇāntarābhyāṃ vidyābhedaśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>bhedāditi cennaikasyāmapi
।। 2 ।।</pratika> sarvavedāntapratyayaṃ daharādyupāsanaṃ naikaṃ vidhiśruteḥ prakaraṇasya ca bhedāditi śaṃkā-
bhāgaṃ tātparyato vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>aviśeṣeti । pratipattṛbhedāditi</pratika> । sarvasyāpi svaśākhādhya-
yanaṃ pra1thamamāvaśyakamiti taṃ prati tāvatpramitijanakatvenārthavattvamasti । ato nānarthakyamū-
lo'bhyāsanyāyaḥ prakaraṇāntaranyāyo vātra pravartate । na ca paraśākhādhyāyinaṃ pratyanuvāda-
katvādvairūpyamiti vācyam । vākyāntareṇa prāptimapekṣyārthajñānajanakatvaṃ hyanuvādakatvaṃ na
jñātajñāpakatvamātram । svaśākhāgatavākyasyāpi punaḥśravaṇe'nuvādakatvena vairūpyāpatteḥ ।
na ca nānāśākhāgateṣvagnihotrādivākyeṣu kiñcidapi vākyaṃ śākhāntaravākyataḥ prāptima-
pekṣya svārthaṃ bodhayati । ato nānuvādakatvakṛtaṃ vairūpyamapīti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>sū॰ ।। svādhyā-
yasya tathātvena samācāre'dhikārācca savavacca tanniyamaḥ ।। 3 ।।</pratika> svādhyāyasya tathā-
tvena svādhyāyaṃ pratyaṅgatvena śirovratavidhiḥ na tu vidyāṃ pratyaṅgatvena । kutaḥ । samācāre'dhi-
kārāt ātharvaṇikānā vedavratopadeśārthe samācārākhye granthe tathā pratipādanāt । cakā-
reṇa <quote>‘naitadacīrṇavrato'dhīta’</quote> ityagrimavākye tathaiva spaṣṭatvācceti sūtrārthaṃ darśayandharmaviśe-
ṣādvidyābheda iti śaṅkāṃ nirācaṣṭe—<pratika>atharveti</pratika> । evañca dharmaviśeṣānmuṇḍakopaniṣadrūpasvā-
dhyāyasyaiva śākhāntararūpātsvādhyāyādbhedo bhavati । tasyaiva cātharvaṇikamātrādhikārikaśi-
rovratāṅgatvānurodhena tanmātrādhyeyatvaṃ sidhyati । na tu śākhāntaragatākṣaravidyāyā muṇḍaka-
pratipādyākṣaravidyāto bhedo bhavati । nāpyakṣaravidyāmātrasyātharvaṇikaikādhikārikatvaṃ sidhyati ।
tasmādātharvaṇikairetadgranthopāyākṣaravidyā veditavyeti teṣāmeva śirovratapūrvakādhyayanaprā-
ptaitadgranthavodhinaiṣā vidyā phalaṃ prayacchati । śākhāntarādhyāyināṃ tvepaiva vidyā śākhāntarā-
dhyayanaprāptaitadgranthādhyāyibhyo labdhā vā phalaṃ prayacchatīti na kaściddoṣaḥ । nanu svādhyā-
yāṅgasya śirovratasya saṃyogapṛthaktvanyāyena vidyāṅgatvamapyastu ko virodha ityāśaṅkānirā-
karaṇārthamāha—<pratika>brahmavidyāmityatreti</pratika> । muṇḍakopaniṣadupakrame <quote>‘dve vidye veditavye iti ha
sma yadbrahmavido vadanti parā caivāparā ca tatrāparā yadṛgvedo yajurvedasmāmavedo'tharvavedaśśi-
kṣā kalpo vyākaraṇaṃ niruktaṃ chaṃdo jyotiṣamitihāsaḥ purāṇaṃ nyāyo mīmāṃsā dharmaśā-
strāṇītyatha parā yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyate’</quote> ityatra prakaraṇe vidyāśabdo vidyāsthānaparo-
'vagataḥ । tadanusāreṇopasaṃhāre'pi tasya tādarthye sthite niṣādasthapatinyāyena samānādhikaraṇa-

tasmādyathā savahomasteṣāmeva, tathā śirovratamapi । atastanna vidyābhede liṅgam ।।

samāsasyābhyarhitatvādbrahmaśabdaḥ prakṛtamuṇḍakopaniṣadrūpavedaparo vyākhyeyaḥ । ṣaṣṭhīsamāsena
mukhyārtho vāstu । na cāgrimavākyena paunaruktyam । agrimavākyamacīrṇavratasyādhyayanani-

vākyayoriva viṣayabhedasattvāditi bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘savavacca tanniyama’</quote> iti dṛṣṭāntabhāgaṃ vyācaṣṭe—
<pratika>tasmādyatheti ।</pratika> yathā saptasūryākhyahomaprabhṛtiśatodanākhyahomaparyantassavahomagaṇasteṣāmevā-
tharvaṇikānām । tadīyaikāgnisambaṃdhāt । evaṃ śirovratamapi svādhyāyasyaiva । tadīyādhyayana-
sambandhādityarthaḥ । evamiha śirovrataṃ nāmātharvaṇikānāṃ vedavratatvena prasiddhaṃ śirasyaṃgāra-
pātradhāraṇarūpaṃ vratam । tasya ca svādhyāyāṃgatvameva pratipādyate na tu vidyāṃgatvamityupapā-
ditam । purāṇeṣu tu saurasaṃhitādiṣviha śirovratamatharvaśirasi prasiddhaṃ pāśupatavrataṃ, tasya ca
vidyāpekṣitatvameva pratipādyate । tadapi na prakṛtākṣarabrahmavidyāmātrāpekṣitatvaṃ kiṃ tu vaiśvā-
naravidyāsādhāraṇyena sakalabrahmavidyāpekṣitatvamityaṃgīkṛtya tathaivopabṛṃhitam । saurasaṃhi-
tāyām—<quote>‘brahmavidyopadeśasya yogyaṃ vakṣyāmi suvrate’</quote> ityupakramya <quote>‘vidhivacchraddhayā sārddhaṃ na
cīrṇaṃ yaiśśirovratam । brahmavidyāmimāṃ teṣāṃ na vadeta kadācana ।। idaṃ śirovrataṃ cīrṇaṃ
vidhi1vacchraddhayā yadi । teṣāmeva parāṃ vidyāṃ vadedajñānabādhikām ।। śirovratamidaṃ nāma
śirasyātharvaṇaśruteḥ । yaduktaṃ taddhi naivānyattatpāśupatasaṃjñitam ।। śākhābhedeṣu nāmāni vrata-
syāsya vibhedataḥ । paṭhyante muniśārdūla śākhāsvekaṃ vrataṃ hi tat ।। agnirityādibhirmantraiḥ
ṣaṅbhiḥ śuddhena bhasmanā । sarvāṅgoddhūlanaṃ kuryācchirovratasamāhvayam ।।’</quote> iti । brahmottarasva-
ṇḍe'pi <quote>‘ayamatyāśramo dharmo yaissamācarito mudā । prā2ptaṃ taiḥ paramaṃ jñānaṃ saṃsāracchedakāra-
ṇam ।। uddha‍ūlanaṃ tripuṇḍrañca māyāpāśanivṛttaye । āmanaṃti muniśreṣṭhāḥ atharvaśirasi sthi-
tam ।। ato'pi pāpavicchedalābhāya jñānasiddhaye । uddha‍ūlanaṃ tripuṇḍraṃ ca mumukṣussamyagācare’</quote>
dityādi । nyāyyaṃ caitat । muṇḍake hi <quote>“brahmā devānāṃ prathamassaṃbabhūva viśvasya karttā bhuva-
nasya goptā । sa brahmavidyāṃ sarvavidyāpratiṣṭhāmatharvāya jyeṣṭhaputrāya prāhe’</quote>ti paramopakramopa-
kṣiptā brahmavidyā brahmopāsanārūpaiva na tu tatpratipādakopaniṣadrūpā । tadanaṃtaramatharvaprabhṛtyaṃ-
giraḥparyantāṃ guruparaṃparāmuktvā <quote>‘śaunako ha vai mahāśāloṃ'girasaṃ vidhivadupasannaḥ prapraccha,
kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte, sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavatī’</quote>ti śaunakasya brahmopāsanāviṣayaṃ praśnamupa-
nyasya <quote>‘tasmai sa hovāce’</quote> tyādinā taduttaratvenaiva muṇḍakopaniṣatparisamāpteḥ । tatparisamāptau
ca ‘śirovrataṃ vidhivadyaistu cīrṇa ‘mityetadanaṃtaraṃ <quote>‘tadetatsatyamṛṣiraṃgirāḥ purovāce’</quote>ti brahmo-
pāsanāviṣayaśaunakāṃgirassaṃvādarūpākhyāyikātmatvenaiva samāpanāt । tadanantaraṃ <quote>‘naitadacīrṇa-
vrato'dhīte namaḥ paramaṛṣibhyo namaḥ paramaṛṣibhya’</quote> iti śrutivākyamadhya evācīrṇavratasyai-
tadupaniṣadadhyayananiṣedhaśravaṇāt । yadyapi <quote>‘kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte’</quote> ityatra brahmaviṣayajñā-
namātrasādhāraṇo vijñānaśabdaḥ, tathāpi <quote>‘yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatyamataṃ matamavijñātaṃ vijñātami-
tyātmani khvalvare dṛṣṭe śrute mate vijñāte vā idaṃ sarvaṃ viditamātmano vā are darśanena
śravaṇena matyā vijñānenedaṃ sarvaṃ vidita’</quote>miti śrutyantaragatasarvavijñānapratijñāvākyeṣu vijñā-
<note>(1) <quote>‘vidhivadyairdvijātibhiḥ’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘teṣāmeva paraṃ jñānaṃ’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="286"/>
naśabdasya sthānapramāṇenopāsanāparatvanirṇayādatrāpi tasya tathātvamavasīyate । evaṃ copa-
krame brahmavidyāśabdasyopāsanāparatvātsamāptāvapi <quote>‘sa yo ha vaitatparaṃ brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati
nāsyābrahmavitkule bhavati tarati śokaṃ tarati pāpmānaṃ guhāgranthibhyo vibhukto bhavatī’</quote>ti
muktiphalāmupāsa1nārūpāmeva brahmavidyāṃ prastutya <quote>‘tadetadṛcābhyuktaṃ, kriyāvantaḥ śrotriyā brahma-
niṣṭhā svayaṃ juhvata ekaṛṣiṃ śraddhayantaḥ । teṣāmevaitāṃ brahmavidyāṃ vadeta śirovrataṃ vidhivadyai-
stu cīrṇa’</quote> miti prakṛtopā2sanārūpabrahmavidyāviṣayatvenaivāsya ślokasyāvataraṇācca । na cātra
brahmavidyāśabdasyākasmādupāsanārūpārthaparityāgo yuktaḥ । ekarṣirmukhyarṣiśśivaḥ । <quote>‘viśvā-
dhiko rudro maharṣi’</quote>riti kṣavaṇāt । īśāvāsyabṛhadāraṇyakayoḥ <quote>‘pūṣannekarṣe yamasūryaprājāpatya-
vyūha parasminsamūhate hi । yatte rūpaṃ kalyāṇatamaṃ tatte paśyāmi yo'sāvasau puruṣasso'ha-
masmī’</quote>ti sūryāntarvarttini śive sākṣādekarṣiśabdasyaiva śravaṇācca । taṃ śraddhayantaḥ śraddadhānāḥ
sa evāsmānrakṣipyatīti dṛḍhaniścayavanta ityarthaḥ । <quote>‘dve vidye veditavye’</quote> ityādau vidyāśabdo
vedasāmānādhikaraṇyādvedaparo'stu । vedādiśabdā vā vidyāsāmānādhikaraṇyāttattajjanyavi-
dyāviṣayāssantu । iha tu brahmavidyāśabdasyopāsanāparatvamuktanyāyaissudṛḍham । evaṃ ca śiro-
vrataśabdasyāpi nātharvaṇikamātrādhikārikavrataviśeṣaparatvaṃ yuktam । kathaṃ hi bahvṛcatvena
prasiddhāya śaunakāyāṃgirāḥ svayamimāṃ vidyāmupadiśyānātharvaṇikāyaitadupadeśaṃ niṣedhet ।
<quote>‘naitadacīrṇavrato'dhīta’</quote> ityatra svādhyāyāṃgatvena varṇyamānaṃ vratamidaṃ vā vrataṃ bhavatvātharvaṇi-
kaprasiddhaṃ vratāntaraṃ vā bhavatvityanyadetat । samācāra3graṃthasyāpyātharvaṇikaprasiddhaṃ vratāntaraṃ
vedavratatvena kīrtayato nātra kaścidvirodho'nurodho vā । tasmātsarvasādhāraṇaṃ pāśupatavrata-
meveha śirovratam । tasya <quote>‘caitā’</quote>miti prakṛtākṣaravidyāparāmarśe'pi hetusādhāraṇyātsakala-
brahmavidyāsādhāraṇyaṃ siddhyati । <quote>‘etā’</quote>miti prakṛtaparāmarśenaiva brahmaviṣayatve vidyāyāssi-
ddhe'pi brahmaviśeṣaṇaṃ hi hetusūcanārthaṃ hetugarbhaviśeṣaṇam । yasmādeṣā brahmaviṣayā vidyā
tasmādacīrṇaśirovratāya na pradeyeti hetusādhāraṇye ca hetumati sarvatra vidheyaṃ siddhyati ।
yathā <quote>‘na hyatrānūyājā ijyanta’</quote> iti hetusādhāraṇyādātithyāvyatiriktāsvapyanūyājarahitā-
sviṣṭiṣvaupabhṛtāṣṭagṛhītābhāvaḥ, evaṃ brahmavidyāpradānasya śirovratāpekṣatvādeva śvetāśvataro-
paniṣadi <quote>‘tapaḥprabhāvāddevaprasādācca brahmavicchvetāśvataro'tha vidvān । atyāśramibhyaḥ
paramaṃ pavitraṃ provāca samyagṛṣisaṃghajuṣṭa’</quote> miti pāśupatavratavadbhyo'tyāśribhya eva brahmavi-
dyāpradānamuktam । tebhyo brahmavidyāmupadiṣṭavataḥ śvetāśvatarasyāpi maharṣeḥ pāśupatavratānu-
ṣṭhātṛtvamuktaṃ kūrmapurāṇe—<quote>‘athāsminnaṃtare'paśyatsamāyāntaṃ mahāmunim । śvetāśvataranāmānaṃ
mahāpāśupatottama’</quote>miti । evaṃ daharavidyānuṣṭhāne'pi pāśupatavratasyādhikāriviśeṣaṇatvamuktaṃ
kaivalyopaniṣadi <quote>‘atyāśramasthassakalendriyāṇi nirudhya bhaktyā svaguruṃ praṇamye’</quote>ti । kaivalyopa-
niṣadi brahmavidyādhigamārthaṃ parameṣṭhinamupasannasyāśvalāyanasya pāśupatavratavattvaṃ tu tadīyadharmaśā-
straparyālocanayaiva spaṣṭam । evaṃ nyāyopabṛṃhaṇābhyāṃ supratiṣṭhitaṃ <quote>‘śirovrataṃ vidhivadyaistu cīrṇa’</quote>
mityasyārthamapahāya sūtrakārabhāṣyakārābhyāmarthāṃtaraṃ parigṛhya kimarthaṃ parihṛtamiti cet
<note>(1) <quote>‘mupāsanāṃ prakṛtāṃ prastutya’</quote> iti ka. ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note><note>(2) <quote>‘prastutopāsanāviṣayatvenaiva’</quote> iti ka. ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<note>(3) <quote>‘prasiddhasyāpyā’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="287"/>
<sutra>sū ।। darśayati ca ।। 4 ।।</sutra>
śrutireva vidyaikyaṃ darśayati mahopaniṣatkaivalyopaniṣadordaharavidyāyām---
<quote>‘ṛtaṃ satyaṃ paraṃ brahma puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇapiṅgalam । ūrdhvaretaṃ virūpākṣam’</quote> <quote>‘umāsahāyaṃ para-
meśvaraṃ prabhuṃ trilocanaṃ nīlakaṇṭhaṃ praśāntam ।’</quote>
ityādinā nirdiṣṭamīśvarasya rūpamapekṣya rūpavattvāt pāpmajarāmaraṇādiprasaktau
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kṛtvāciṃtayeti brūmaḥ । yadi śirovratamityasyātharvaṇikavedaprasiddhavedavratātirekeṇārthāṃtaraṃ
na syāttadā yathākathaṃcicchirovratasya svādhyāyadharmatvapratipādana eva <quote>‘śirovrataṃ vidhiva-
dyaistu cīrṇa’</quote>mityasya tātparyaṃ vaktavyam । anyathā codanādyaviśeṣaprāptābhedapratyabhijñānaviro-
dhāttadbhedakalpane gauravācceti । evamarthāṃtaraparasyāpi vākyasya nyāyavyutpādanārthaṃ kṛtvā-
cintayārthāntarāśrayaṇena siddhāṃtavarṇanamanyatrāpi dṛśyate । tadatra śāstre yathā <quote>‘prāṇā-
dayo vākyaśeṣā’</quote>diti । na hi <quote>‘yasminpañca paṃcajanā’</quote> iti mantre pañcajanaśabdaḥ kliṣṭa-
gatyā vākyaśeṣagataprāṇādiparaḥ । tasya maṃtrāntarānusāreṇa cetanaviśeṣaṇaparatvāt । atha-
rvavede hi tṛtīyakāṇḍe pañcamānuvāke samāmnāyate mantraḥ---yaṃ tvā hotāraṃ manasābhisaṃvidustra-
yodaśa bhauvanāḥ pañca mānavāḥ । varcodhase yaśase sūnṛtāvate tebhyo agnibhyo hutamastveta’
diti । asyārtho vedabhāṣye darśitaḥ---he agne tvā tvāṃ hotāraṃ devānāmāhṇātāraṃ manasā-
bhisaṃvidussamyagjānanti । ye jānaṃti te pradarśyaṃte । trayodaśa bhauvanāḥ <quote>‘viśvakarmā bhauvanaḥ
svātmani sarvāṇi bhūtāni juhavāṃcakāre’</quote>tyādiśrutyantaraprasiddhāḥ viśvakarmaprabhṛtayo bhuva-
nasya maharṣeḥ putrāḥ trayodaśasaṃkhyākāḥ । pañca mānavāḥ niṣādapañcamāścatvāro varṇāḥ । gandharvāḥ
pitaro devā asurā rakṣāṃsītyeke । tasmai varcodhase tejo dhārayate yaśase yaśasvine sūnṛtā-
vate priyahitavacanayuktāya tubhyaṃ tebhyaḥ prāguktebhyaḥ tvadvibhūtirūpebhyaḥ agnibhyaśca hutame-
taddhavirastviti । yathā <quote>‘yamāya harmyamavapan pañca mānavā vaivasvato na tṛpyati pañcabhirmāna-
vairyama’</quote>ityādiriha vedāntarāvagatamantrabhāgo'pyudāharaṇam । tatrāpi <quote>‘niṣādapañcamāścatvāro
varṇāḥ pañca mānavā’</quote> iti bhaṭṭabhāskarādibhirvyākhyātam । varṇānāṃ pañcamatvena niṣādasya
grahaṇamagnisambaṃdhasāmyāt । ata eva mantravarṇaḥ <quote>‘janā yadagnimayajanta pañce’</quote> ti । evaṃ
mantrāntarānurodhena pañcajanaśabdasyārthāntaraparatvādeva śārīrakabhāṣye tasya yathāsūtraṃ prāṇā-
diparatvaṃ varṇitavadbhirapi śaṅkarācāryairbṛhadāraṇyakabhāṣye <quote>‘pañca pañcajanāḥ gaṃdharvāḥ pitaro devā
asurā rakṣāṃsi, niṣādapaṃcamā vā varṇā’</quote> iti vyākhyātam । evamevārthāṃtaraparasyāpi vākyasya
nyāyavyutpādanārthamarthāntarāśrayaṇena siddhāntavarṇanaṃ pūrvataṃtre'pi dṛśyate । hānopāyanādhika-
raṇe tadudāhariṣyate । tasmānnyāyopabṛṃhaṇānugṛhītavākyārthanirṇayānurodhātsūtrakārabhāṣya-
kārābhiprāyāvirodhāccātharvaśiraḥ prasiddhātyāśramasaṃjñakapāśupatavratānuṣṭhānavadbhireva brahmavidyā-
nuṣṭheyā grāhyā ca tebhya eva ca pradeyeti nirṇayaḥ । aṃgāvabaddhādhikaraṇe cādhikamatra vyutpā-
dayiṣyate । śarīritvāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇabhedo vidyābhedakatvena yaḥ pūrvapakṣiṇaśśaṃkāviṣayaḥ sa na
tadbhedakaḥ pratyuta tadabhedasyaivopapādaka iti pratipādanārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>darśayati ca ।। 4 ।।</pratika> śarī-
ritvena pāpmādiprasaktau hi tanniṣedho'rthavān । ataḥ kaivalyopaniṣadādipratipāditaśarīri-
tvaprāptimapekṣamāṇaśchāṃdogye pāpmādiniṣedho vidyaikyasyaiva gamakaḥ iti bhāvaḥ । daharavidyā-
<pb n="288"/>
chāndogye <quote>‘atha yadidamasmin’</quote> ityārabhya tasya guṇāṣṭakaviśiṣṭatvaṃ kevalamucyate ।
tatra tatra dharmaviśeṣāpādikā punaḥśrutiḥ vidyābhediketi śaṅkāyā api nāva-
kāśaḥ । tataścodanādyaviśeṣāt sakalavedāntapratyayamekamevopāsanam, tadbhedaka-
śabdāntarādyadarśanāt iti siddham ।।
iti sarvavedāntapratyayādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
yāśśākhābhedena punaḥśrutirviruddhadharmāṇāmapi prāpayitrīti tato vidyābhedo na śaṅkanīyaḥ ।
śaktimatsu tadvirodhāsiddherityāśayenāha—<pratika>tatra dharmaviśeṣeti । śabdāntarādyadarśanā-
diti ।</pratika> śabdāṃtarābhyāsasaṃkhyāguṇaprakriyānāmadheyāni karmabhedapramāṇāni pūrvataṃtre prasi-
ddhāni । ihāpi <quote>‘nānāśabdādibhedā’</quote>dityādiṣu vibhāvayiṣyante । teṣāmi1hādarśanamabhedasādha-
kamityarthaḥ । iti sarvavedāntapratyayādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</p>
