<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha sarvavedāntapratyayādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। sarvavedāntapratyayaṃ codanādyaviśeṣāt ।। 1 ।। bhedānneti cennaikasyāmapi ।। 2 ।। khyādhyāyasya tathā-
tvena hi samācāre'dhikārācca savavacca tānnayamaḥ ।। 3 ।। darśayati ca ।। 4 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>aviśeṣapunaḥśravaṇātprakaraṇaguṇānāmabhedācca ।dharmāṇāmapi bhedātpratiśākhaṃ bhidyate vidyā ।। 201 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>vidhiphalarūpākhyaikyātkaivalyaguṇaupajīvanācchāṃdogye । nāsti bhidā supariharā bodhyavibhedādibhiḥ punaḥśravaṇādyāḥ ।। 202 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti sarvavedāntapratyayādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha sarvavedāntapratyayādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। sarvavedāntapratyayaṃ codanādyaviśeṣāt ।। 1 ।। bhedānneti cennaikasyāmapi ।। 2 ।। svādhyāyasya tathā-
tvena hi samācāro'dhikārācca savavacca tanniyamaḥ ।। 3 ।। darśayati ca ।। 4 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvapāde vākyārthajñānakaraṇabhūtatattvaṃpadārthanirūpaṇamakāri । saguṇavidyāyāścittaikāgryadvārā nirguṇavākyā-
rthajñānopayogitvāttadvākyārthavicāraḥ prastūyate'sminpāde---tatra tāvatpaṃcāgniprāṇadaharaśāṇḍilyavaiśvānaropāsanasvarūpamāha—<pratika>sū ।
sarvavedāntapratyayaṃ codanādyaviśeṣāt ।। 1 ।।</pratika> atra uktopāsanāni kiṃ pratiśākhaṃ bhidyante uta neti <pratika>saṃdaheḥ</pratika> ।
nāmarūpādibhedādbhidyanta iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, sarvairvedāntaiḥ pratyayaṃ pratīyamānānyupāsanāni na bhidyante । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>codanādyaviśeṣāt</pratika>=codanāsaṃyogarūpasamākhyānāmaviśeṣāt । yathā—sarvaśākhāsu <quote>‘agnihotraṃ juhuyā’</quote>diti codanāyā
aviśeṣāt nityāgnihotramekameva,yaḥ prāṇopāsakaḥ saḥ <quote>‘jyeṣṭhaśca śreṣṭhaśca svānāṃ bhavati’</quote>iti phalasaṃyogasya sarvatrāviśiṣṭatvācca
jyeṣṭhatvādiguṇakaprāṇasyopāsyasya sarvatrāviśiṣṭatvācca na vidyābhedaḥ, tathā prāṇavidyeti samākhyāyāssarvatrāviśiṣṭatvācca na
vidyābheda iti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। bhedānneti cennaikasyāmapi ।। 2 ।।</pratika> nanu vājasaneyinaḥ pañcāgnividyāyāṃ <quote>‘tasyāgnirevāgnirbhavati’</quote> iti ṣaṣṭhaṃ
prasiddhāgnimupāsyatvenāmananti, chandogāstu <quote>‘pañcāgnīnvede’</quote>ti । tathā ca rūpabhedādāmikṣāvājinayāgayoriva śākhādvaye pañcāgni-
vidyāyā bhedo naikyamiti cet <pratika>na</pratika> । yataḥ । ekasyāmapi vidyāyāmayaṃ rūpabheda upapadyate । yathā---vājasaneyibhirdyulokādayo
ye pañcāgnaya uktāsta eva pratyabhijñāyante chāndogye । tathā ca na vidyābhedo yuktaḥ । agniṣu pañcatvasaṃkhyāśravaṇasya sāṃpādi-
kāgniparatvena ekasminnevātirātre ṣoḍaśigrahaṇatadabhāvayoriva ṣaṣṭhāgnitadabhāvayorupapannatvena ca virodhābhāvānna tato'pi
vidyābhedo yukta iti siddham ।।</p>
<p>nanu brahmavidyāpratipādakamuṇḍakādhyayane śirovratākhyadharmo vihito nānyatra । ato dharmabhedādvidyābheda ityāśaṃkāyāmāha---
<pratika>sū ।। svādhyāyasya tathātvena hi samācāre'dhikārācca savavacca tanniyamaḥ ।। 3 ।।</pratika> svādhyāyasyaiva śirovratā-
khyadharmo'ṅgaṃ na vidyāyāḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>tathātvena hi</pratika>=yataḥ svādhyāyāṃgatvena samācārākhyavedavratopadeśaparagranthe śirovratamapi
vedavratatvenātharvaṇikāssamāmananti । <pratika>adhikārācca</pratika>=naitadacīrṇavrato'dhīta’ ityatratyādadhikṛtaviṣayādetacchabdāt cakārā-
<note>(1) <quote>‘teṣāmihādarśanādityarthaḥ’</quote> ।। iti ka. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="289"/>
<quote>‘dadhīte’</quote> ityadhyayanaśabdācca śirovratamadhyayanasyaivāṅgam । tatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ---<pratika>savavacca</pratika>=yathā savāḥ sapta homāsyauryādayaśśatauda-
nāntāḥ śākhāntaroktatretāgnyanabhisaṃbandhādātharvaṇikoktaikāgnisaṃbandhāccaikāgnīnāmātharvaṇikānāmeva niyamyante tadvat ।
<pratika>tanniyamaḥ</pratika>=muṇḍakādhyayana eva tasya śirovratasya niyamaḥ । tasmātsarvatra vidyaikyamanavadyam ।।</p>
<p>kiṃ ca ।। <pratika>sū ।। darśayati ca ।। 4 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘sarve vedā yatpadamāmananti’</quote> iti vākyaṃ vedyasyaikatvena sarvatra tadvidyāyā ekatvaṃ
darśayati <quote>‘yastvetamevaṃ prādeśamātra’</quote> mityādi vākyaṃ ca vaiśvānaravidyāyā ekatvaṃ darśayati । tathā ca tadupāsanānāmapyaikyamavaga-
myate । tatsamabhivyāhārāditareṣāmapyupāsanānāmabheda iti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate, rāmānujamate ca saṃdehapūrvapakṣādikaṃ</pratika> śāṃkaramatādaviśiṣṭam । sūtrārthavarṇanaprakāraḥ paraṃ śāṃkaramatā-
tkiṃcidiva bhidyate । upapādanaprakāre'pyanayormatayoḥ parasparamavaiśiṣṭyamevetyanusaṃdheyam । sarveṣu vedānteṣu śrūyamāṇaṃ daharādyu-
pāsanaṃ kimekameva uta bhinnamiti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । aviśeṣapunaḥśravaṇasya prakaraṇāntarasya ca bhedahetutvāt upāsanāntaramiti
<pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । pratipattṛbhedena punaḥśravaṇopapatteḥ tata eva prakaraṇāntaratvābhāvācca codanāphalasaṃyogarūpākhyānāmaviśeṣādu-
pāsanaikyameveti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ</pratika> । sūtrārtho'pyaviśiṣṭaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। bhedānneti cennaikasyāmapi ।। 2 ।।</pratika> aviśeṣapunaḥśrutyā vidyābhedāvagamānna vidyaikyamiti cet ekasyāmapi
vidyāyāṃ śākhāntare pratipattṛbhedātpunaḥśravaṇamarthavaditi na vidyābhedaḥ ।।</p>
<p><quote>‘<pratika>svādhyāyasye</pratika>’</quote>tyādisūtrasyārthaḥ pūrvasmādaviśiṣṭaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। darśayati ca ।। 4 ।। śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, śrutireva vidyaikyaṃ darśaṃyati । mahopaniṣatkaivalyopaniṣadordaharavidyāyāṃ
<quote>‘ṛtaṃ satyam’</quote> <quote>‘umāsahāyam’</quote> ityādinā nirdiṣṭamīśvarasya rūpamapekṣya rūpavattvātpāpmajarāmaraṇādiprasaktau chāndogye <quote>‘atha yadi-
damasmin’</quote> ityārabhya tasya guṇāṣṭakaviśiṣṭatvaṃ kevalamucyate । tataścodanādyaviśeṣādekamevopāsanamiti siddham ।। ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate tu darśayati ca</pratika> śrutirupāsanasya sarvavedāntapratyayatvam । chāndogye daharavidyāyāṃ <quote>‘tasminyadanta’</quote>riti
vihitamapahatapāpmatvādiguṇāṣṭakaṃ taittiriyake kevalaṃ <quote>‘tasminyadantastadupāsitavya’</quote>mityevoktam । tadubhayatra vidyaikatva eva
saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ ।। ।। <pratika>iti śrīkaṇṭharāmānujamatayossarvavedāntapratyayādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, bhaktinirūpaṇānantaraṃ tatsādhanopāsanā nirūpyate । sā copāsanā samastaśāstrābhyāsarūpā śravaṇa-
mananātmikaikā, śravaṇamananotsāritājñānasaṃśayaviparyayasya puruṣasya dhyānātmikānyā ceti dvividhā । tatra śravaṇamananātmi-
kopāsanā prathamādhikaraṇe nirūpyate---<pratika>sū ।। sarvavedāntapratyayaṃ codanādyaviśeṣāt ।। 1 ।।</pratika> sarvavedoditaṃ brahma kima-
dhikāriṇā svaśākhoktarūpeṇaiva śravaṇamananābhyāṃ jñātavyam uta samastaśākhoktarūpeṇa veti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । kvacicchākhāyāṃ satya-
jñānādirūpaṃ vedyamanyatrāpahatapāpmatvādirūpamityevaṃ vedyabhedātsarvaśākhādhyayanaśravaṇamananeṣu mandānāṃ śaktyabhāvātsvaśākhokta-
rūpeṇaiva jñātavyam । ata eva śākhābhedavyavasthāpi yujyata iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, yassarveṣāṃ vedānāmanto
nirṇayaḥ śravaṇamananasādhyaḥ tena jñātavyaṃ brahma na tu svaśākhānirṇayamātreṇa jñātavyam । kutaḥ । <pratika>codanādyaviśeṣāt</pratika>=
<quote>‘ātme’</quote>tyādividhīnāmādipadoditānā <quote>‘matra hyeta’</quote> ityādivākyoktayuktīnāṃ <pratika>cāviśeṣā</pratika>tsarvādhikārisādhāraṇatvāditi ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। bhedānneti cennaikasyāmapi ।। 2 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘ce’</quote>ti <quote>‘ne’</quote>ti <quote>‘bhedā’</quote>diti <quote>‘apī’</quote>ti cāvartate । tarhīti śākhāyāmiti
ca labhyate । tathā ca vedyādisarvaśākhoktārthānāṃ <pratika>bhedāt</pratika>=pṛthaktvāt । atha ekaikena sarvaśākhoktaṃ jñeyaṃ na bhavati kiṃ tu
khaśākhoktamevetyucyate tarhyapi svasvaśākhoktamapi na jñeyaṃ syāt । kutaḥ । <pratika>ekasyāṃ śākhāyāmapi bhedāt</pratika>=arthabhedada-
rśanāt । atha yadi tatra dharmabhedādekasmindharmiṇi bhinnadharmavidhānātprasaṃgabhedācceti parihāra ucyate tasya sarvaśākhoktajñā-
ne'pi sama ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। svādhyāyasya tathātvena hi samācāre'dhikārācca ।। 3 ।।</pratika> pṛthaksūtramidam । <pratika>svādhyāyasya</pratika>=<quote>‘svādhyāyo-
'dhyetavya’</quote> iti vidheḥ । <pratika>tathātvena</pratika>=sarvasādhāraṇyenādhyayanavidhāyakatvena । <pratika>samācāre</pratika>=sarvavaidikakarmakaraṇe । <pratika>adhikā-
rācca</pratika>=sarveṣāmadhikārasadbhāvācca <quote>‘hi’</quote> itisūcitāyāḥ <quote>‘vedaḥ kṛtsno'dhigantavya’</quote>iti smṛteśca ekaikenāpi sarvaśākhādhyayanena
brahma jñātavyamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। salilavacca tanniyamaḥ ।। 4 ।।</pratika> sūtrapāṭhabhedaḥ spaṣṭaḥ । co'vadhāraṇe । <quote>‘tanniyama’</quote> ityatra pañcamītatpuruṣakarmadhā-
rayau । <pratika>salilavat</pratika>=salilamiva । <pratika>tanniyamaḥ</pratika>=yathā sarveṣāṃ salilānāṃ pratibandhakābhāvamapekṣyaiva samudraikāśnayatvaniyamaḥ
tathātrāpi <pratika>tasyāḥ</pratika>=puruṣaśaktimapekṣyaiva <pratika>niyamaḥ</pratika>=sarvavedoktaprakāreṇa dhyānena brahma jñātavyamiti niyama ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। darśayati ca ।। 5 ।।</pratika> śrutiḥ smṛtiśca sarvaśākhoktamārgeṇa brahma jñātavyamityarthaṃ jñāpayatītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ sarvavedāntapratyayādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<pb n="290"/>
athopasaṃhārādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
sarvavedāntacoditānāṃ vidyānāmaikyapratipādanaphalamāha---
<sutra>sū ।। upasaṃhāro'rthābhedādvidhiśeṣavatsamāne ca ।। 5 ।।</sutra>
iha vidyaikye satyapi śākhāntarasiddhānāṃ guṇānāṃ śākhāntara upasaṃhāro na
kartavyaḥ kartavyo vā ।
iti saṃśaye na kartavya iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । tathā hi---chāndogye daharavidyāyā-
mapahatapāpmatvādayo guṇā āmnātāḥ । na taittirīye । na tatra teṣāmupasaṃhāraḥ
kartavyaḥ tatrānuktatvāt । vidyopakārastatroktaireva kṛṣṇapiṅgalatvādiguṇairbhavi-
ṣyati, kimupasaṃhāreṇācoditena ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>athopasaṃhārādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। upasaṃhāro'rthābhedādviśeṣavatsamāne ca ।। 5 ।।</pratika> pūrvādhikaraṇaprayojanasama-
rthanārthatvena saṃgatiṃ sūcayannekaikasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ sarvaguṇānāmanāmnānādvidyaikyācca saṃśayaṃ
darśayati---<pratika>iheti</pratika> । nanu vidyaikye tadga‍uṇatvāviśeṣāttattacchākhāgataguṇānāmivānyaśākhā-
gataguṇānāmapi grahaṇaṃ sidhyedeva । ataḥ kathaṃ pūrvapakṣa ityāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>tathā hīti</pratika> । yadya-
nyaśākhāgataguṇā api grāhyā vivakṣitāḥ tadā teṣāmapyāmnānaṃ syādityanāmnānādeva teṣā-
mavivakṣāvagamādagrahaṇamityarthaḥ । na ca śākhāntaraguṇā1 abhedātsvata eva prāpnuvantītya-
nyathāsiddhyā tadanāmnānaṃ na tvavivakṣayeti vācyam । śākhāntaragatānāmapi keṣāñcidā-
mnānena tadatiriktānāmanabhimatatvonnayanāditi bhāvaḥ । nanu tadga‍uṇānāmeva satāmagrahaṇe
kathamakhaṇḍopakārasiddhiḥ । tasya tatpradhānānvayasakalāṃgakalāpasādhyatvādityāśaṃkyāha—
<pratika>vidyopakāra iti</pratika> । anekaśākhāviprakīrṇasakalaguṇopasaṃhārasya kartumaśakyatvātsarvaśaktya-
dhikaraṇanyāyena śakyaguṇamātropasaṃhāraḥkāryaḥ । tathā ca keṣāṃcidga‍uṇānāmaśaktyā hānā-
vaśyaṃbhāve yo yacchākhāgatavidhinopāsanāmavagatya tāmanutiṣṭhāsati tasya tacchākhāgataguṇā-
nāmavagatānāṃ hāne hetvabhāvāttadanāmnātaguṇāstena hātavyā iti vyavasthābhyupagantavyā ।
nanu sarvaśaktyadhikaraṇe nityānāmeva śakyāṃgopasaṃhāreṇānuṣṭhānamuktam । jīvanādinimitta-
kapradhānāvaśyakartavyatānurodhātkāmyeṣu tu sakalāṃgopasaṃhāraniyamaḥ <quote>‘kāmyeṣu caivamarthatvā’</quote>
diti tadanaṃtarādhikaraṇe sthāpitaḥ । kāmyāni copāsanāni, atasteṣvaśakyāṃgahānaṃ na
yuktamiti cenmaivam । jīvanādirūpānupādeyanimittarahitatayā kadāpyavaśyakartavyatvenā-
prāpnuvaṃti kāmyakarmāṇi yadākadācidupādeyasakalāṃgasaṃpādanena kartuṃ śaknoti puruṣa iti
tatra yuktassakalāṃgopasaṃhāraniyamaḥ । anavagatanānāśākhāviprakīrṇasakalaguṇopasaṃhāraṃ tu
kaścidapi kadācidapi kartuṃ na śaknotīti upāsanānāṃ kāmyatve'pi sarvaśaktyadhikaraṇa-
nyāyaviṣayatvāt karmasvapi nānāśākhāgatasakalaṃgopasaṃhārāśaktitaulye tatrāpi samā-
no'yamākṣepaḥ । devarṣayassarvaśākhābhijñāssakalaguṇāṃgopasaṃhārāśaktāssantīti cet । na ।
teṣāmapi prācīneṣu janmasu devarṣipadaprāpakakarmānuṣṭhānasyāpekṣitatvāditi bhāvaḥ । anenā-
bhiprāyeṇa tatrokterityuktam । apaṭhitaguṇopasaṃhāre paṭhitaguṇānāṃ pāṭhakramaprāptasyānusaṃdhāna-
<note>(1) <quote>‘śākhāntarāmnātā vastuto vidyaikyātsvata eva’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="291"/>
iti prāpte'bhidhīyate---sarvatra vidyaikye chāndogyādiṣūktānāṃ daharādyupāsana-
dharmāṇāmapahatapāpmatvādīnāmanyatra taittirīyakadaharādiṣūpasaṃhāraḥ kāryaḥ, vidyo-
pakārarūpasyārthasyaikatvāt । yathaikavidhiśeṣatayā vihitānāmaṅgānāmagnihotrā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kramasya bādhaḥ syāt so'pi na yukta ityukterityanena sūcitam । <quote>‘uktereve’</quote> tyevakāreṇa
gṛhamedhīyanyāyassūcitaḥ । nanu gṛhamedhīyeṣṭau prakṛtitassaṃbhavatprāptikayorājyabhāgayoḥ
punaḥśravaṇamapūrvatāparamityarthādaprāptaprākṛtāṃganivṛttiḥ phalati । na ceha tathā kiṃcitprā-
kṛtamaṃgaṃ, tasya punaḥśravaṇaṃ vāsti, ato nātra gṛhamedhīyanyāyaḥ pravartata iti cenmaivam ।
ihāpi śākhāṃtaratassaṃbhavatprāptikānāṃ keṣāṃcidga‍uṇānāṃ punaḥśravaṇasya sattvena prakṛtivikṛ-
tibhāvābhāve'pyanyatassaṃbhavatprāptikaguṇaśravaṇaṃ tatratyaguṇāṃtaranivṛttiphalakamiti nyāyā-
vatārasaṃbhavādityāśayaḥ । <pratika>vidyopakārarūpasyeti</pratika> । ekavidyākarmānvayiguṇāṃgānāmakha-
ṇḍopakārarūpaprayojanaikyātsarveṣāmapi teṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ tāvatsvarasataḥ prāpnoti । tasya na tāva-
daśaktyāpavādaḥ । aśaktirhi tāvacchākhādhyayanāśaktiḥ । uta anaṃtaśākhāvihitānanta-
guṇānusaṃdhānāṃgānuṣṭhānāśaktiḥ athavā anadhītaśākhāmnātāṅgāvagatyaśaktiḥ । nādyaḥ ।
<quote>‘adhyayanenaiva svādhyāyārthajñānaṃ bhāvaye’</quote>diti niyamasya svasvaśākhāmātraviṣayatvenānadhīsa-
paraśākhāmnātaguṇa1saṃgrahaṇasaṃbhavāt । na dvitīyaḥ । sarvajñairmaharṣibhiḥ praṇīteṣu kalpasūtreṣu
karmaṇāmaṃgeyattāyāḥ brāhmavāsiṣṭhādividyākalpeṣūpāsanānāṃ guṇeyattāyāśca parichinnatve-
nānantaśākhāvihitānāmapi teṣāmānantyāsiddheḥ । na tṛtīyaḥ । kalpasūtrairvidyākalpaistatta-
tkālābhiyuktaśākhāntarādhyayanavadupadraṣṭṛvacanaiścaitadavagatisaṃbhavāt । nāpi gṛhamedhīyanyā-
yena śākhāntarāmnātakatipayāṃgapunaḥśravaṇādapavādaḥ । gṛhamedhīyaprayogavidhiraṃgajanyopakā-
ramapekṣamāṇaḥ prakṛtau klṛptopakārayorājyabhāgayoḥ sannidhānāmnātayorgrahaṇenopakārākāṃkṣā-
śāṃtyā prakṛtitoṃ'gāṃtarāṇāṃ prāptiṃ nāpekṣata iti tatprāpakacodakalopāt na darśapūrṇamāsa-
prakṛtiko gṛhamedhīyaḥ kintvapūrva iti siddha‍yati । evamaṃgāntaranirapekṣo'pi sannidhyāmnā-
tānyaprākṛtāni vaiśeśiṣikāṃgāni tadvaiyarthyaparihārārthaṃ gṛhṇātīti gṛhamedhīyanyāyaḥ । na
cātra śākhāntarāmnātapunaḥśrūyamāṇaguṇāṃgānāṃ kvacitprāk‌klṛptopakāratvamasti । yena tadgra-
haṇanirākāṃkṣā vidyākarmaprayogavidhayo guṇāṃgāntarāṇi nāpekṣeran । tathāpi yadi teṣāṃ punaḥ
śravaṇasya vaiyarthyaṃ prasajyate tadā tatparihārāya śākhāntarāmnātaguṇāṃgāntaraparisaṃkhyārthatvaṃ
kalpyetāpi । na tu vaiyarthyaprasaktirasti । tasya śākhāntarāmnātavidyākarmaikyapratyabhijñānārtha-
tvāt । siddhe hi tedaikye tatassaṃbhavatprāptikānāṃ punaḥśravaṇaṃ vyarthamiti śaṃkanīyam । tadai-
kya2siddhāvevopayuktasya na vaiyarthyaśaṃkāvakāśaḥ । nāpi tattacchākhāpaṭhitaguṇāṃgakramabalāda-
pavādaḥ । ekasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ vihitāni vidyākarmaguṇāṃgāni guṇidvārā vākyapramāṇena hi
śākhāntare gacchaṃti । yathā juhvādidvārā vākyapramāṇena kratau parṇatādayaḥ । na ca vākyasya
sthānarūpapāṭhakrama īṣṭe । tatprameyaśca padārthadharmarūpaḥ kramaśśiṣṭākopādhikaraṇanyāyādvākya-
prameyebhyaḥ padārtharūpebhyo guṇāṃgāṃtarebhyo durbalaḥ । tasmādakhaṇḍopakārarūpaprayojanaikyādvi-
dyaikye guṇopasaṃhāraḥ karmaikyeṃ'gopasaṃhāraśca yukta eva । sūtre <quote>‘vidhiśeṣava’</quote>diti samuccayo-
<note>(1) <quote>‘guṇāṃgagrahaṇa’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘siddhāveva punaḥśravaṇasyāvaiyarthyaśaṃkā’</quote> iti ka. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="292"/>
diṣu, tathaiva codanādibhiḥ samāne daharādyupāsane guṇānāṃ prāptiriti guṇopasaṃ-
hāro yukta eva ।। ityupasaṃhārādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</p>
<head>athānyathātvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<head>anyathātvaṃ śabdāditi cennāviśeṣāt ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p>vājināṃ chandogānāṃ codgīthe prāṇadṛṣṭyopāsanaṃ śatruparibhavaphalaṃ vidhīyate ।
tatra vidyaikyamasti na vā ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pamā । tena ka1rmaṇāmaṃgopasaṃhāro'pyatra prasaṃgātprasādhanīyaḥ । cakāro'vadhāraṇārthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>ityupasaṃhārādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<head>atha anyathātvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। anyathātvaṃ śabdāditi cennāviśeṣāt ।। 6 ।।</pratika> codanādyaviśeṣādvidyaikyaṃ vidyaikye
guṇopasaṃhāraścetyubhayaṃ nirūpitam । tada2pavādaḥ kriyate iti saṃgatiḥ । devāsurasaṃgrāmo-
pakramādyaikarūpyāt kvacidudgātari prāṇadṛṣṭiranyatrodgātrā gātavyasya stotrasāmadvitīyabha-
ktirūpasyodgīthasyāvayave praṇave prāṇadṛṣṭiriti rūpaviśeṣabhedācca vidyaikyabhedasaṃśaye pūrvapakṣaḥ ।
ekaiva vidyā codanādyaviśeṣāt । ubhayatrāpi hyupāsanāviṣayā codanā । <quote>‘bhavatyātmanā parāsya
dviṣanbhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ vede’</quote> tyekatra <quote>‘yathāśmānamākhaṇamṛtvā vidhvaṃsate evaṃ haiva sa
vidhvaṃsate ya evaṃvidi pāpaṃ kāmayata’</quote> ityanyatra cocyamānaṃ śatruparābhavarūpaṃ phalam । upāsyaṃ
rūpaṃ prāṇaḥ । udgīthavidyetyākhyā । ākhanyate'nenetyākhaṇaḥ । <quote>‘khanī gha ce’</quote>ti karaṇādhikaraṇa-
yorvihito ghapratyayaḥ । tamākhaṇamityaśmaviśeṣaṇam । ṇatvaṃ chāṃdasam । kālāyasavatkhananasādha-
natvena dṛḍhamityarthaḥ । arthālloṣṭādikamiti kartṛlābhaḥ । <quote>‘yathāśmānamṛtvā loṣṭo vidhvaṃsete’</quote>ti</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>athopasaṃhārādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। upasaṃhāro'rthābhedādvidhiśeṣavatsamāne ca ।। 5 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>tattacchākhoktaguṇairvidyānāmupakṛterlābhāt । vidyaikye'pi na kāryaśśākhāntaragataguṇopasaṃhāraḥ ।। 203 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>teṣāmapi tadvidyātsaṃbaṃdhasyāviśeṣeṇa । ... ... ... ... ... pasaṃhāraḥ ।। 204 ।।</l></lg>
<head>ityupasaṃhārādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>athopasaṃhārādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। upasaṃhāro'rthābhedādvidhiśeṣavatsamāne ca ।। 5 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, sarvatropāsanānāmekatve'pi ekaśākhāsthavidyānāṃ śākhāntarasthādhikaguṇānāmupasaṃhāro'sti na <pratika>veti
saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । yatra yāvanto guṇāḥ śrutāstaivākāṃkṣāśānternopasaṃhāra iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, samāne upāsane guṇo-
pasaṃhāro yuktaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>arthābhedāt</pratika>=upāsyaguṇairnirvartyasya upāsanārūpārthasya sarvaśākhāsvabhinnatvāt । tatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ---
<pratika>vidhiśeṣavat</pratika>=yathāgnihotrasya sarvatraikyāt taccheṣāṇāmupasaṃhārastadvadityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika> tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate ca saṃdehapūrvapakṣādika</pratika>maviśiṣṭam । <pratika>arthābhedāt</pratika>=vidyopakārarūpasyārthasyaika-
tvādityarthaḥ । <pratika><quote>‘vidhriśeṣavat’</quote></pratika> ityatra <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> paraṃ vaiśvānaravidyādividhiśeṣayatā vihitasya guṇasya yathā tadupakārāyo-
pasaṃhārastathā vedantāntareṣvapi tadvidyāṅgatvāviśeṣādupasaṃhāro nyāyya iti dṛṣṭāntasvarūpamanyathā vivṛtamiti viśeṣaḥ । anyada-
viśiṣṭam ।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, asyādhikaraṇasya uttarādhikaraṇasūtraissahaikādhikaraṇyasadbhāvāduttarasminnadhikaraṇa eva tasya nirūpaṇī-
yatvānnātra tannirūpaṇāvakāśa iti vedyam ।। <pratika>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmupasaṃhārādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</pratika></p>
<note>(1) <quote>‘karmāṅgānāmupasaṃhāro'pyatra’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘tasya kvacidapavādaḥ’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="293"/>
<p>iti saṃdehe codanādyaviśeṣādvidyaikyamastīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।।
nanu vājināṃ prāṇadṛṣṭayopāsanamudgānakartṛviṣayamiti <quote>‘atha hemamāsanyaṃ prāṇa-
mūcustvaṃ na udgāyeti tatheti tebhya eṣa prāṇa udagāyat’</quote> । iti śabdāt pratīyate ।
chandogānāṃ tu tadudgānakarmaviṣayamiti<quote>‘ya evāyaṃ mukhyaprāṇastamudgīthamupāsāṃcakrire’</quote>
iti śabdāt pratīyate । tasmādanyathātvaṃ vidyayornaikyamiti cet—na, upakramā-
viśeṣāt । <quote>‘dvayā ha prājāpatyā devāścāsurāśca । tataḥ kānīyasā eva devā
jyāyasā asurāsta eṣu lokeṣvaspardhanta te ha devā ūcuḥ hantāsurān yajña
udgīthenātyayāma’</quote> ityekatra <quote>‘devāsurā ha vai yatra saṃyetire ubhaye prājāpatyāstaddha
devā udgīthamājahruranenainānabhibhaviṣyāmaḥ’</quote> ityādyanyatra । tasmādupakramāviśeṣā-
dubhayatra vidyaikyamiti ।।
siddhāntamāha---
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
samānaprakaraṇa śravaṇāt । yadyapyākhanyate bhidyata iti karmaṇi ghañpratyayena bhiduraṃ loṣṭame-
vākhaṇaśabdena vaktuṃ śakyate, tathāpi <quote>‘sa eṣo 'śmākhaṇa’</quote> ityagrimavākyadarśanādihāpya-
śmaviśeṣaṇamevedam । <quote>‘nanu atha hemamāsanyaṃ prāṇamūcu’</quote>rityādinā ekatrodgānakartari prāṇadṛ-
ṣṭirvidhīyate । anyatra <quote>‘tamudgītha’</quote> mityādinodgīthāvayave । āsanyamāsye bhavam । <quote>‘ya evāyaṃ
mukhyaḥ prāṇa’</quote> iti samānaprakaraṇe śravaṇāt । <quote>‘paddannomā’</quote> sityādisūtreṇāsyaśabdasyāsannā-
deśaḥ । yadyapi bṛhadāraṇyake'pyudgīthenātyayāme’ tyudgīthopakramāviśeṣāttadanurodhena prāṇa-
udagāyatte viduranena vaina udgātrātyepyaṃtī’ti prāṇasamānādhikaraṇodgānakartṛvāciśabdaprayoga
udgānakarmaṇyudgītha eva saukaryātiśayavivakṣayā lākṣaṇika ityupapādyeta । tathāpyuttarādhikara-
ṇanyāyena chāṃdogyagata udgīthaśabdaḥ udgīthāvayavaparaḥ । bṛhadāraṇyakagatastu nyāyāviṣaya-
tvātkṛtsnodgīthabhaktipara ityasti viśeṣaḥ । tasmādvidyābhedo yukta iti cenmaivam । upakra-
mādisārūpyabāhulyenālpavailakṣaṇyasya bhedakatvābhāvāt devāsurasaṃgrāmapravṛttirdevānāmudgī-
thenāsuraparābhavābhiprāyā । asuraparābhavārthaṃ devānāṃ vāgghrāṇacakṣuḥśrotramanasāmāśrayaṇaṃ
vāgādīnāmasurairabhibhavaḥ tato mukhyaprāṇasamāśrayaṇaṃ tadvīryādaśmaloṣṭanidarśanenāsuravidhvaṃ-
sanamityetsarvamubhayatrāpi samānam । ato'lpavailakṣaṇyamuditānuditahomavadvikalpena samā-
dheyam । na codgātrudgīthayorutpattiśiṣṭatayā kaścidviśeṣaḥ । agnīṣomīyayāgāṃgakapālaikāda-
śadvādaśasaṃkhyayorutpattiśiṣṭatve'pi tulyabalatayā vikalpasya śākhāntarādhikaraṇavārtike
varṇitatvāt । nanviha prāṇavidyāyāṃ prāṇaḥ prādhānyena nopāsyaḥ kiṃtvekatrādhyastaprāṇabhāva-
udgātodgītho vā upāsyaḥ । anyatra tathābhūta udgīthāvayavaḥ praṇavaḥ । tataśca pradhā1nopāsyā-
tmakarūpabhede bhāvyamupāsanabhedeneti cenmaivam । yathā yāge devatā evamupāsanāyāmupāsyaḥ ।
upāṃśuyāje satya2pyagniprajāpatyagnīṣomalakṣaṇadevatābhede bhedo nāśritaḥ । kiṃtvekasminnevo-
pāṃśuyāje devatānāṃ vikalpa āśritaḥ । tatheṃdravāyvādidevatābhede'pi somayāge bhedo
nāśritaḥ । kiṃtvekasyaiva somayāgasya devatābhedenābhyāsassamāśritaḥ । evamihāpyupāsya-
vikalpastadbhedenopāsanābhyāso vā bhaviṣyati । tasmādvidyaikyameva nyāyyamiti । atra siddhā-
<note>(1) <quote>‘pradhānopasarjanabhāvādeva bhāvya’</quote> miti ka. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘satyapi viṣṇuprajāpati’</quote> iti ka. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="294"/>
<sutra>sū ।। na vā prakaraṇabhedātparovarīyastvādivat ।। 7 ।।</sutra>
nobhayatra vidyaikyam, prakaraṇabhedāt । tathā hi---<quote>‘omityetadakṣaramudgīthamupā-
sīta’</quote> ityudgīthāvayavabhūtapraṇavaviṣayaṃ prakaraṇaṃ chandogānām । vājināṃ tu kṛtsno-
dgīthaviṣayamiti prakramabhedena rūpabhedādvidyābhedaḥ । yathaikasyāmapi śākhāyāmudgī-
thopāsaneṣu hiraṇmayadṛṣṭeḥ parovarīyastvādidṛṣṭirbhidyate, tathātrāpīti ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nta ucyate । <pratika>sū॰ ।। na vā prakaraṇabhedātparovarīyastvādivat ।। 7 ।।</pratika> na veti nipāta-
samudāyaḥ pūrvapakṣavyāvṛttyarthaḥ । prakaraṇabhedāt prakaraṇavailakṣaṇyādityarthaḥ । ayamāśayaḥ ।
yuktaṃ śākhādvaye'pi agnīṣomīyayāgaikyaṃ dravyadevatākālarūpapradhānabahuguṇasārūpye sati
dravyopasarjanakapālaviśeṣaṇasaṃkhyāvaiṣamyamātrasya pratyabhijñāvicchedakatvābhāvāt । pratyabhijña-
yaikyasiddhau saṃkhyādvayasyāpyutpattiśiṣṭatvena tulyabalatvādvikalpo'pi nyāyyaḥ । iha tūpa-
sarjanaprāṇaguṇamātrasārūpye'pi pradhānopāsyavairūpyaṃ pratyabhijñāvicchedakamiti pratyabhijñā-
nudayānna vidyaikyasiddhiḥ । evaṃ vidhivākyayoraikyapratyabhijñāvicchedake jāgrati bahiraṃgārtha-
vādamātrasārūpyamaprayojakam । itthameva nyāyamaryādāsārūpyeṇa sādhanīye'rthe pradhānaguṇa-
sārūpye satyapradhānaguṇavairūpyaṃ nārthasiddhivighātakaṃ pradhānaguṇavairūpye satyapradhānaguṇasārūpyaṃ
nārthasidhdyupayogīti । atredamudāharaṇam---karmaṇāṃ prakṛtivikṛtibhāvassārūpyeṇa kalpanīyaḥ
janakasaptarātre śrūyate—<quote>‘catvāri trivṛntyahānī’</quote>ti । teṣāṃ sārūpyeṇa prakṛtau kalpanīyāyāṃ yadi
trivṛttvasārūpyaṃ prayojakamādriyeta tadādvādaśāhe pārṣṭhikeṣvahaḥsu prathamamevāhaścaturṇāmapi prakṛtiḥ
syāt । tadeva hi trivṛtstomakaṃ sarūpam । dvitīyatṛtīyacaturthāni tvahāni pañcadaśasapta-
daśaikaviṃśastomakāni virūpāṇi । yadi saṃghātasāmānyaṃ prayojakamādriyeta tadā prathamasya
prathamamahaḥ dvitīyasya dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyasya tṛtīyaṃ caturthasya caturthaṃ prakṛtissiddha‍yet । tatrāhardha-
rmasya saṃghātasya pradhānaguṇasārūpyarūpatvādaharaṃgabhūtastotropasarjanaṛk‌saṃkhyārūpatrivṛttvādi-
vaiṣamye satyapi saṃghātasārūpyeṇa caturṇāmahnāṃ krameṇa catvāryahāni prakṛtaya iti guṇacoda-
nāyāṃ yasya liṃgaṃ tadāvṛttiḥ pratīyetāgneyavadityāṣṭamikādhikaraṇe nirṇītam । tatra prakṛti-
vikṛtibhāvakalpanāyāṃ pradhānāpradhānaguṇasamavāye pradhānaguṇasārūpyeṇaiva sārūpyanibaṃdhanārtha-
siddhiḥ na tu pradhānaguṇānanuguṇāṅgaguṇasārūpyeṇārthasiddhirastītyubhayamāviṣkṛtam । tathā
ekānekaguṇasamavāye'nekaguṇasārūpyeṇa sārūpyanibaṃdhanārthasiddhiḥ na tvekaguṇavairūpyeṇa
tadvighāta ityapi nyāyamaryādā । atra tvidamudāharaṇam—citreṣṭau madhūdake dravye śrūyete ।
tayordravava1tvavarṇarūpābhyāmājyena sārūpyaṃ dravatvagatasāṃsiddhikatvaviśeṣeṇa tu payasā । tatra
satyapi dravatvaguṇabhūtasāṃsiddhikatvanaimittikatvavairūpye dravatvavarṇarūpānekarūpaguṇasārūpyeṇa
madhūdakayorājyaṃ prakṛtiriti madhūdake dravatvasāmānyātpayovikāraḥ syādityāṣṭamikādhikaraṇe
nirṇītam । tasmānnātrāgnīṣomīyanyāyaḥ pravartate । nāpyupāṃśuyājanyāyaḥ pravartate । <quote>‘upāṃ-
śuyājamaṃtarā yajatī’</quote> tyekena vākyenotpanne tasminbhedasyāsaṃbhavitvenaikye siddhe paścādyā-
jyānuvākyāmukhenāpataṃtīnāṃ devatānāṃ vikalpaṃ vinā gatyantarābhāvāt । ata eva somayā-
ganyāyo'pi na pravartate । <quote>‘somena yajete’</quote> tyekena vākyenotpannasya somayāgasyaikye siddhe
taddravyasaṃskārarūpagrahaṇamukhenāpataṃtīnāṃ devatānāṃ grahaṇasamuccayena samuccaye satyapi tataḥ
<note>(1) <quote>‘rdravatvarūpābhyā’</quote> miti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="295"/>
āśaṅkya pariharati---
<sutra>sū ।। saṃjñātaścet taduktamasti tu tadapi ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
udgīthavidyeti saṃjñaikyādubhayatrābheda iti na vācyam । asti hi vidheya-
bhede'pi saṃjñaikyam । yathā naiyamikāgnihotre kuṇḍapāyināmayanāgnihotre ca nāmai-
kye'pi karmabhedaḥ । tadvadatrāpi na virodhaḥ ।। ityanyathātvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
prāksiddhasomayāgaikyavighātāyogāt । iha tūpāsanotpattidaśāyāmevānusaṃdhīyamānaṃ pradhāno-
pāsyavairūpyaṃ bhinnayorevopāsanayorutpattiṃ gamayet । tasmācchāṃdogyabṛhadāraṇyakayorbhinnaivaiṣā
prāṇavidyeti । <pratika>sū॰ ।। saṃjñātaścettaduktamasti tu tadapi ।। 9 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘tadukta’</quote> mityasya paro-
varīyastvādiguṇakavidyābhede'pi chāṃdogyaprathamaprapāṭhakāmnātānāṃ sarvāsāṃ vidyānāmudgīthavi-
dyeti saṃjñaikyasattvānna tadvidyaikyaprayojakamityetatpūrvasūtra eva parovarīyastvādivaditi dṛṣṭā-
ntopanyāsenoktaprāyamityarthaḥ ।। iti anyathātvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha anyathātvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। anyathātvaṃ śabdāditi cennāviśeṣāt ।। 6 ।। na vā prakaraṇabhedātparovarīyastvādivat ।।7।।
saṃjñātaścettaduktamasti tu tadapi ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>chāṃdogyakāṇvapaṭhitā vidyaikodgītharūparūpaikyāt । udgītha eva rūpaṃ kāṇvānāmapyupakramātkartā ।। 205 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>udgīthasyāvayavaśchāṃdogye rūpamadhikārāt । kāṇve sakalo'sāviti rūpavibhedena bhinnā sā ।। 206 ।।</l></lg>
<head>ityanyathātvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>athānyathātvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। anyathātvaṃ śabdāditi cennāviśeṣāt ।। 6 ।। na vā prakaraṇabhedātparovarīyastvādivat ।। 7 ।।
saṃjñātaścettaduktamasti tu tadapi ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, atra <quote>‘atha hemamāsanyaṃ prāṇamūcustvaṃ na udgāyeti tatheti tebhya eṣa prāṇa udagāyat’</quote> । iti vāja-
saneyavākyaṃ tathā <quote>‘atha ha ya evāyaṃ mukhyaḥ prāṇastamudgīthamupāsāṃcakrire’</quote> iti chāndogyavākyaṃ ca viṣayaḥ । atrobhayatrāpi
prāṇavidyāvidhiravasīyate । pūrvatra samākhyāyā aviśeṣādvidyaikyamuktam । tarhi atrāpyudgīthavidyeti samākhyāyā aviśeṣā-
dvidyaikyameveti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyedamārabdham । kimatra vidyaikyam uta vidyābheda iti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । vidyaikyameveti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> ।
<pratika>anyathātvaṃ</pratika>=na vidyaikyaṃ bhavitumarhati । kutaḥ । <pratika>śabdāt</pratika>=<quote>‘tvaṃ na udgāye’</quote> tyudgīthakartṛtvenaikatra anyatra <quote>‘tamudgīthamupāsāṃ cakrire’</quote>
iti udgīthatvena ca prāṇasyopāsyatvapratipādakāt śabdāt iti cet । naitāvatā vidyābhedaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>aviśeṣāt</pratika>=devā-
surasaṃgrāmopakamāsurātyayābhiprāyaprabhṛtīnāmubhayatrāviśeṣāt । ato vidyaikyamiti siddham ।। evaṃ pūrvapakṣe prāpte <pratika>siddhānta-
māha=sū ।। na vā prakaraṇabhedātparovarīyastvādivat ।। 7 ।।</pratika> naiva vidyaikyaṃ yuktam । kutaḥ । <pratika>prakaraṇabhe-
dāt</pratika>=ekatra <quote>‘omityetadakṣaramudgīthasupāsīta’</quote> ityudgīthāvayava oṃkāre prāṇadṛṣṭirupadiśyate, anyatra tu <quote>‘tvaṃ na udgāye’</quote> ti yā
sakalaiva sāmabhaktiḥ tasyāḥ kartodgātā prāṇatvenāvedyata ityupakramabhedāt । tatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ=<pratika>parovarīyastvādivat</pratika>=yathā
paramātmadṛṣṭyadhyāsasāmye'pi <quote>‘sa eṣa parovarīyānudgītha’</quote> iti parovarīyastvādiviśiṣṭamudgīthopāsanamakṣyādityagatahi-
raṇyaśmaśrutvādiviśiṣṭodgīthopāsanādbhinnaṃ tadvat ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। saṃjñātaścettaduktamasti tu tadapi ।। 8 ।।</pratika> nanu udgīthavidyetyubhayatra <pratika>saṃjñātaḥ</pratika>=saṃjñāyā ekatvādvidyaikyamiti
<pratika>cet taduktam</pratika>=<quote>‘na vā prakaraṇabhedāt’</quote> iti sūtre । <pratika>asti tu</pratika> tatsaṃjñaikatvaṃ prasiddha bhedānāmapyagnihotraprabhṛtīnāṃ kāṭhakaikagra-
nthapaṭhitānāṃ kāṭhakatvasaṃjñaikatvam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika> tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate ca saṃdehapūrvapakṣādiṣu</pratika> nāsti vailakṣaṇyamato nāsti tadvivaraṇāvakāśaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, atra <quote>‘upasaṃhāro'rthābhedā’</quote> dityādikamekamadhikaraṇam । atra upasaṃhārapakṣānupasaṃhārapakṣāvubhāvapi
sopapattikamupapāditau । pakṣadvayamapi vaikalpikatvena siddhāntitam । tacca sūtrārthavarṇanataḥ viśadībhavet । <pratika>sū ।। upasaṃ</pratika>-
<pb n="296"/>
atha vyāptyadhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। vyāpteśca samañjasam ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
chāndogye <quote>‘omityetadakṣaramudgīthamupāsīta’</quote> iti śrūyate । iha praṇavodgīthayo-
stantramupāsanamutaikaviṣayam ।
iti saṃśaye pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ---yadyapi praṇavodgīthayoriha sāmānādhikaraṇyamavaga-
myate । tacca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatayā saṃbhavati । tathāpyudgīthena praṇavo viśeṣyate
praṇavena codgītha ityatra niyāmakābhāvāt tantramupāsanamiti ।।
evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ---na tantramudgīthapraṇavayorupāsanam । chāndogye prathamaprapāṭhake</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha vyāptyadhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। vyāpteśca samañjasam ।। 9 ।।</pratika> chāṃdogyagata udgīthaśabdaḥ udgīthāvayavapraṇavapara
iti siddhavatkṛtya tannibaṃdhano vidyābhedaḥ pūrvādhikaraṇe nirūpitaḥ । tadidānīṃ sādhyata iti
saṃgatiḥ । praṇavodgīthobhayaviṣayamupāsanamutodgīthaviśiṣṭapraṇavaviṣayami <quote>‘tyomityetadakṣaramu-
dgītha’</quote> miti śrutayorakṣarodgīthaśabdayossāmānādhikaraṇyasaṃbhavāsaṃbhavābhyā saṃśaye pūrvapakṣaḥ ।
bhinnārthavācinoranayoḥ svasvārthaparatayā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na saṃbhavati । anyataralakṣaṇayā
viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvakalpanāyāṃ ca kimudgīthaśabdenodgīthāvayava oṃkāro lakṣaṇīyaḥ <quote>‘omi-
tyetadakṣara’</quote> mityanena vā tadvānudgītho lakṣaṇīya ityatra vinigamakaṃ nāsti । anyataralakṣa-
ṇayā viśiṣṭoddeśe caikatvaviśiṣṭagrahoddeśa iva vākyabhedaḥ prasajyate । tasmādyathā <quote>‘tvāṣṭraṃ
pātnīvatamālabhete’</quote> tyatra pratyekaṃ taddhitaśravaṇāt tvaṣṭā patnīvāṃśca pṛthakpṛthagdevateti tadubha-
yoddeśyako yāgaḥ, tathātrāpi pratyekaṃ dvitīyāvibhaktiśravaṇādoṃkāra udgīthaśca pṛthakpṛthagu-
pāsya iti tadubhayoddeśyakamupāsanamiti yuktam । evañcānyataratra dvitīyāvibhakterviśeṣaṇa-
vibhaktitayā vyarthaprāyatā ca na bhaviṣyatīti । atra siddhāntaḥ—viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāve vi-
nigamakābhāvastāvadasiddhaḥ<quote>‘oṃmiti hyudgāyatī’</quote>tyanaṃtaravākya e<quote>‘vo’</quote>mityakṣare udgīthaśabdasya
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>hāra ityādi ।। 6 ।। vidhiśeṣavat</pratika>=vidhavihitasyeva । yathā vidhivihitatvātsandhyāvandanādikamavaśyaṃ kartavyaṃ
<pratika>tathārthābhedāt</pratika>=sarvavedārthabhūtānāmānandādiguṇānāmapahatapāpmatvādidoṣābhāvānāṃ cāvibhāgāt । tānavibhajyeti yāvat ।
<pratika>upasaṃhāraḥ</pratika>=sarvaguṇānāmapyekabuddha‍yārohaṇarūpopasaṃhāraḥ <quote>‘upāsya eka’</quote> iti śrutau vihitatvātkartavyaḥ । so'pi <pratika>samāne
ca</pratika>=samānaviṣaya eva । ye brahmaṇi yogyāḥ pūrṇatvāvirodhino guṇāḥ tadviṣaya eva । na tvayogyarodanādau । tathā
satyanarthaprāpterityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। anyathātvaṃ ca śabdāditi cennāviśeṣāt ।। 7 ।। anyathātvaṃ</pratika>=sarvaguṇopasaṃhāraḥ kārya ityuktasyānyathā-
bhāvaḥ tasyākartavyatvamevāvaśyamaṃgīkāryam । kutaḥ । <pratika>śabdāt</pratika>=<quote>‘ātmetyevopāsīte’</quote>ti anupasaṃhāraśruteriti <pratika>cenna । aviśe-
ṣāt</pratika>=<quote>‘ete guṇā nopasaṃhāryā’</quote> iti viśeṣapramāṇābhāvāt <quote>‘sarvairguṇai’</quote> rityaviśeṣeṇopasaṃhāre tu viśeṣapramāṇasadbhāvāccetyarthaḥ ।
<quote>‘ātmetyeve’</quote> tyevakārastvayogavyavacchedaka iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। na vā prakaraṇabhedātparovarīyastvādivat ।। 8 ।। parovarīyastvādivat</pratika>=yathā sa eṣa ityuktānāṃ
niravadhikasarvottamatvarūpaparovarīyastvādiguṇānāmevopāsanārthamupasaṃhāro na sarvaguṇānām । tadvatsarvaguṇopasaṃhāro na kartavyo
vā । kutaḥ । <pratika>prakaraṇabhedāt</pratika>=parovarīyovaiś‍vānarādiprakaraṇabhedāt । anyathā tanna syādityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। saṃjñātaścetta-
duktamasti tu tadapi ।। 9 ।। saṃjñātaḥ</pratika>=sarvavidyānāṃ bhagavannāmatvena tadga‍uṇoktirūpatvāt sarvavidyoktaguṇopasaṃhāraḥ kārya
iti <pratika>cet । taduktam</pratika>=tatra codye tadiṣṭameveti samādhānaṃ tenopasaṃhārasūtreṇoktamityarthaḥ । na kevalaṃ yuktisiddhametat ।
kiṃtu <pratika>tadapi</pratika>=tasminnarthe <quote>‘nāma vā etā’</quote> iti pramāṇamapi <pratika>asti tu</pratika>=astyevetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>ityānandatīrthamate upasaṃhārādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<pb n="297"/>
<p><quote>‘omityetadakṣaramudgīthamupāsīta omityudgāyati’</quote> iti tasyopakramavaduttaratrāpi
<quote>‘khalvetasyaivākṣarasyopavyākhyānaṃ bhavati’</quote> iti praṇavasyopāsyatvavyāpterudgīthena
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
lakṣaṇayā pravṛttau nimittasya sambaṃdhasyocyamānatvāttasyopavyākhyānamiti prakṛtasyoṃkārasyaiva
guṇopāsanaphalaprapañcanārtha uttaraḥ prapañca ityuktatvāt prathama <quote>‘meṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ pṛthivī rasa’</quote> iti
guṇaprapañcanamupakramya pṛthivyoṣadhipuruṣavāgṛk‌sāmodgīthā uttarottaraṃ rasā ityudgīthasya rasa-
tamatvaguṇapratipādanānaṃtaraṃ katama udgītha iti vimṛṣṭaṃ bhavatītyudgīthavimarśaṃ kṛtvā <quote>‘omi-
tyetadakṣaramudgītha’</quote> iti vyākhyātatvācca । rasatamatvādiviśiṣṭaguṇopāsanātphalaprapañcanānaṃtaraṃ
dvitīyakhaṇḍamārabhya prapañcayiṣyamāṇānāmudgīthavidyānāmapyoṃkāraviṣayatāyāḥ <quote>‘khalvetasyai-
vākṣarasye’</quote> tyādiprathamakhaṇḍāntavākyena darśitatvācca । etena vibhaktidvayasāphalyāyopāsya-
dvayakalpanamapi nirastam । agrimavyākhyānaprapañcena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvāvadhāraṇāt । na ca
viśiṣṭoddeśena vākyabhedaḥ । viśiṣṭasyoddeśyatvānaṃgīkārāt udgīthā1vayavatvaviśiṣṭapraṇavo-
pāsanāvidheraṃgīkārāt tasya cā<quote>‘gnaye pāvakāya puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ nirvape’</quote> dityatra pāvaka-
tvaviśeṣitāgnidevatāviśiṣṭayāgavidhivadupapatteḥ । vastutastu <quote>‘omityetadakṣaramudgīthamupā-
sīte’</quote> tyatra nopāsanāvidhiḥ । <quote>‘āpayitā ha vai kāmānāṃ bhavati ya etadevaṃ vidvānakṣaramudgī-
thamupāste’</quote> ityatra rasatamatvādiguṇakopāsanāvidhiḥ, agrimakhaṇḍe prāṇadṛṣṭiviśeṣopāsanā-
vidhirityevamādikrameṇa pratyekamupāsanāvidhīnāṃ sadbhāvāt । na ca te sarve'pyadhikāravidhayaḥ
sarvasādhāraṇo'yamutpattividhiḥ syāditi bācyam । tathā satyutpattividhyaikyena ekasyā
evodgīthavidyāyāḥ phalabhedena guṇabhedena ca jyotiṣṭomarītyā prayogāvṛttimātramityāpatteḥ ।
na ceṣṭāpattiḥ । <quote>‘parovarīyastvādiva’</quote> diti pūrvādhikaraṇasūtrāṃśena parovarīyastvahiraṇmaya-
tvādidṛṣṭiviśiṣṭodgīthavidyānāṃ parasparabhedasya darśitatvāt । kiṃ tu tatra vakṣyamāṇopāsa-
nānikuruṃbaviṣayamoṃkāramanūdya tasyodgīthāvayavatvavidhānaparam । oṃkāro hi sarvavedavyāpī
kratuṣu cādhvaryavahautrādimantravyāpī । udgīthāvayavasyaivoṃkārasyopāsyatvaṃ yathā syādityeva-
marthaṃ tatpratipādanam । etatsiddhasyaivodgīthāvayavatvasyāgrimasamānādhikaraṇanirdeśairanuvādaḥ ।
na ca vakṣyamāṇopāsanāviṣayatvenākṣarānuvāde viśiṣṭoddeśaprayuktavākyabhedāpattiḥ । akṣara-
mātrānuvāde'pi tasya prakaraṇaprāptopāsanāsaṃbaṃdhānuvādārtha <quote>‘upāsīte’</quote>ti nirdeśaḥ <quote>‘imāmagṛ-
bhṇanraśanāmṛtasyetyaśvābhidhānīmādatta’</quote> ityatra yathāś‍varaśanāgrahaṇoddeśena maṃtravidhau viśi-
ṣṭoddeśadoṣāpatteḥ kevalamaś‍voddeśena mantravidhau sati raśanāgrahaṇaprakāśakasya mantrasya sākṣā-
daś‍vārthatvāsaṃbhavāttadīyaraśanāgrahaṇadvārakatvaṃ paryavasyatīti <quote>‘abhidhānīmādatta’</quote> ityaṃśassā-
marthyasiddhānuvādārtha ityupapatteḥ । etenaiva <quote>‘ya evāyaṃ mukhyaprāṇastamudgīthamupāsāṃcakrira’</quote>
ityagrimakhaṇḍe yathodgīthe prāṇadṛṣṭividhiḥ evamihāpyudgīthe praṇavadṛṣṭividhirastu । na ca
phalanirdeśābhāvādupāsanāvidhyaṃtaraṃ na saṃbhavatīti śaṃkanīyam । viśiṣya phalanirdeśarahitānā-
maṃgāvabaddhopāsanānāṃ kratuvīryavattaratvarūpasādhāraṇaphalenaiva phalākāṃkṣāśānteriti nirastam ।
dṛṣṭividhau sārūpyasyaivāpekṣitatvena <quote>‘omiti hyudgāyatīti’</quote> saṃbaṃdhapratipādakavākyaśeṣānu-
papatteḥ <quote>‘khalvetasyaivākṣarasyopavyākhyāna’</quote> mityasyāsāmañjasyaprasaṃgācca । tasmā ‘domitye-
<note>(1) <quote>‘udgīthāvayavatvaviśeṣitapraṇavaviśiṣṭopāsanāvidhe’</quote>riti. ka. ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="298"/>
praṇavo viśeṣyata iti prāṇaviṣayatvameva samañjasam । ataḥ praṇava evopāsyaḥ ।।
iti vyāptyadhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
atha sarvābhedādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
sū ।। sarvābhedādanyatreme ।। 10 ।।
<quote>‘yo ha vai jyeṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca veda jyeṣṭhaśca ha vai śreṣṭhaśca bhavati prāṇo vāva
jyeṣṭhaśca śreṣṭhaśca’</quote> iti chandogā vājinaśca prāṇavidyāyāṃ jyeṣṭhatvādikamadhīyate
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tadakṣaramudgītha’ miti vākyamagrimavidyāsūpāsyasya praṇavasyodgīthāvayavatvaviśeṣaṇasamarpaṇā-
rthamiti nyāyyaḥ panthāḥ । sūtre <quote>‘vyāpte’</quote> rityanena praṇavasyottaragranthe viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvani-
yāmikā vyāptiryathocyate tathā praṇavasya viśeṣanirdhāraṇāya viśeṣaṇāpekṣāpādinyādhvaryavādi-
mantravyāptirapi hetvaṃtaratvenocyata iti tatsamuccayārthaścakāraḥ । <pratika>iti vyāptyadhikaraṇam ।।4।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha sarvābhedādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। sarvābhedādanyatreme ।। 10 ।।</pratika> prāṇavidyāyāṃ vicāraṃ pravarttayiṣyan viṣayaśuddha‍yartha
viṣayavākyamupanyasya tatpratipādyaṃ darśayati—<pratika>yo havā iti</pratika> ।। jyaiṣṭhya vayaḥkṛtam । mukhya-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha vyāptyadhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<head>sū॰ ।। vyāpteśca samañjasam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<lg><l>omityatropāsanamudgīthapraṇavayorbhavettantram । na tayoḥ kimapi niyāmakamasti viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatve ।। 207 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>praṇavasyopāsyatayā yaduttaratrāpi lakṣyate vyāptiḥ । tasmādudgīthaṃ prati viṣayatā samucitā tasya ।। 208 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti vyāp‍tyadhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha vyāptyadhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। vyāpteśca samañjasam ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamatate</pratika>, pūrvam <quote>‘omityetadakṣaramudgītham’</quote> ityatroṃkārodgīthayorviśeṣyabhāvaṃ siddhavatkṛtya prakramabhedādvidyābheda-
ssiddhāntitaḥ । sa na yukta ityākṣepasaṃgatyedamāha—<pratika>vyāpteśceti</pratika> । atra <quote>‘omityetadakṣaramudgītham’</quote> ityoṃkārodgīthayossāmānā-
dhikaraṇyaṃ śrūyate । tatkiṃ nāmabrahmetivadadhyāsārtham , uta yadrajataṃ sā śuktiritivadapavādārtham āhosvitsindhuraḥ karītiva-
daikyapramityartham, utāho nīlotpalamitivadviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvanibandhanam । iti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । nirdhāraṇe kāraṇābhāvādani-
rdhāritārthakamidamiti <pratika>pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, oṃkārasya ṛgyajuḥsāmasu triṣu <pratika>vyāpteḥ</pratika> vyāptatvāt ka oṃkāra
upāsya ityapekṣāyāmudgīthāvayavatvena oṃkāro viśeṣyate <quote>‘omityetadakṣaramudgīthamupāsīte’</quote>ti । evaṃ ca udgīthamityoṃkārasya viśeṣa-
ṇamityeva <pratika>samañjasaṃ</pratika>=niravadyam । tuśabdārthakena sautracaśabdenādhyāsāpavādādipakṣāṇāṃ nirāsaḥ । ataḥ viśeṣaṇapakṣa
eva śreyān iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate, rāmānujamate ca</pratika> <quote>‘omityetadakṣaramudgīthamupāsīte’</quote> tyatra praṇavodgīthayostantramupāsanamuttaikaviṣayamiti
<pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । atra praṇavodgīthayossāmānādhikaraṇye satyapi udgīthena praṇavo viśeṣyate vā praṇavena codgītho vetyatra niyāmakā-
bhāvāttantramupāsanamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, na tantramudgīthapraṇavayorupāsanam । chāndogye <quote>‘omityakṣara’</quote> mityupakramava-
duttaratrāpi <quote>‘etasyaivākṣarasyopavyākhyānaṃ bhavati’</quote> iti praṇavasyopāsyatvavyāpterudgīthena praṇavo viśeṣyata iti praṇavaviṣayatvameva
samañjasam । ataḥ praṇava evopāsyaḥ । iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, pūrvoktamupasaṃhārānupasaṃhārayorubhayorapi kartavyatvaṃ samañjasaṃ na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । parasparavirodhādadhi-
kāribhedābhāvācca na samañjasamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । <quote>‘prāpteśca’</quote></pratika> sūtrapāṭhe viśeṣaḥ । <pratika>siddhāntastu</pratika>, sarvaguṇopasaṃhāre viriñcasya
śaktatvenādhikāribhedasadbhāvāt pakṣadvayasya kartavyatve virodhābhāvācca samañjasamiti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, sū ।। prāpteśca samañjasam
।। 10 ।।</pratika> upasaṃhārānupasaṃhārayoḥ kartavyatvaṃ samañjasaṃ yuktam । kutaḥ । <pratika>prāpteśca</pratika>=tattadyogyapuruṣabhedena tayorvyavasthitatvāda-
virodhaprāpteścetyarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ vyāp‍tyadhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="299"/>
kauṣītakinaśca । tribhirapi vāgādikaraṇagrāmasthitestatkāryasya ca prāṇahetutvenaika-
rūpeṇa prāṇasya jyaiṣṭhyamupapāditam । vāgādigatavasiṣṭhatvādisaṃbandhitvaṃ prāṇa-
syobhayeṣāmuktam <quote>‘atha hainaṃ vāguvāca yadahaṃ vasiṣṭhāsmi tvaṃ tat vasiṣṭho'sīti
atha hainaṃ cakṣuruvāca yadahaṃ pratiṣṭhāsmi tvaṃ tat pratiṣṭhāsīti atha hainaṃ śrotra-
muvāca yadahaṃ sampadasmi tvaṃ tat sampadasīti atha hainaṃ mana uvāca yadahamāyata-
namasmi tvaṃ tadāyatanamasīti’</quote> । kauṣītakināṃ tu anuktamapi vasiṣṭhatvādika-
mupasaṃhāryaṃ na vā ।

prāṇo hi sarveṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ madhye vayasādhikaḥ । garbhasthe puruṣe prāṇasya vṛttiścakṣurādibhyaḥ

darśayati---<pratika>atha hainamityādinā । kauṣītakināṃ tviti</pratika> । kauṣītakināṃ śākhāyāṃ
vāgādīnāṃ vasiṣṭhatvādikaṃ tasya prāṇe samarpaṇañcetyubhayamapi noktamityarthaḥ । <pratika>anuktama-
pīti</pratika> । kauṣītakiśākhāgataivaṃśabdādvidyaikyācca saṃśayaḥ । syādetat । codanādyaviśeṣeṇa
śākhātraye'pi vidyaikyādupasaṃhārādhikaraṇanyāyena vasiṣṭhatvādyupasaṃhāryaṃ prāpnoti । ko'trānu-
pasaṃhāryatvaśaṃkāvakāśaḥ । na ca kvacidvasiṣṭhatvādyanāmnānādvidyābhedaśśaṃkanīyaḥ । vidyaikye
satyanāmnātaguṇānāmupasaṃhāranyāyataḥ prāpteḥ । anāmnātaguṇopasaṃhārārthameva hi sarvatra
vidyaikyasādhanam । nanu phalabhedādvidyābhedaḥ syāt । chaṃdogavājasaneyiśākhayorjyaiṣṭyādikaṃ
phalamuktam । kauṣītikiśākhāyāṃ tu <quote>‘atho evaivaṃ vidvānsarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ prāṇameva prajñātmāna-
mabhisaṃbhūya sahaitaissarvairasmāccharīrādutkrāmati sa vāyupratiṣṭha ākāśa ātmā svareti yatraite
devāstatprāpya tadamṛto bhavati yadamṛtā devā’</quote> iti prāṇadevatāsāyujyaṃ phalamuktam । na cā-
mṛtatvaṃ cirākālāvasthāyitvarūpaṃ jyaiṣṭhyāntargataṃ prāṇadevatāsamānaiśvaryaṃ śraiṣṭhyāntargatamiti
nāsti phalabheda iti vācyam । vājasaneyiśākhāyāṃ svānāmiti viśeṣaṇena jyaiṣṭhyaśraiṣṭhyayo-
raihikaphalatvāvasāyāt । chāṃdogye tadviśeṣaṇabhāve'pi samānaprakaraṇagatavākyānusāreṇa

<quote>‘ya eṣāṃ bubhūṣati ya evaṃ vedeti’</quote> vākyenānyeṣāmapi yeṣāṃ jyeṣṭhaśca bhavitumicchati teṣāmapi
jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaśca bhavatī’ tyuktatvena phalataḥ phalaikyaparyavasānāt । tadanaṃtaraṃ yo ha vai pratiṣṭhāṃ
