vasiṣṭhatvādiguṇaṃkatvaṃ mukhyaprāṇasya vāgādīnāṃ ca śraiṣṭhyaviṣayaparasparavivādena brahmasabhopasa-
rpaṇaṃ <quote>‘yasminnutkrānte śarīreṃdriyānavasthitiḥ sa śreṣṭha’</quote> iti brahmavacanaṃ tatparicikṣiṣayā
vāgādīnāmekaikasya śarīrādutkramya paryaṭanaṃ tasminsamaye śarīrasyeṃdriyāntarāṇāñca yathāpū-
pūrvamavasthānaṃ prāṇasyotkramaṇapravṛttau teṣāṃ viśaraṇaṃ tato bhītānāṃ vāgādīnāṃ <quote>‘motkramīstvaṃ
naḥ śreṣṭha’</quote> iti mukhya3prāṇaṃ prati prārthanamityetatsarvaṃ krameṇa varṇitam । prāṇe vāgādigatava-
<note>(1) <quote>‘cirakālavyavahitasya’</quote> iti. kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘sarvaṃ samañjasam’</quote> iti. kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(3) <quote>‘prāṇasya
śraiṣṭhyāvadhāraṇamityetatsarvaṃ’</quote> iti. ka. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="303"/>
parāmarśādvasiṣṭhatvādikamupasaṃhāryamiti ।। iti sarvābhedādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
siṣṭhatvādiguṇasamarpaṇamātraṃ noktaṃ tadviṣayatva eva bhāṣyavākyānāmāñjasyamucyate । tatraivaṃ-
vedanaśabdayuktaphalavacanāśravaṇādbhāṣye pūrvapakṣabījatvenoktā yuktirna pravartate । na ca vācya-
mekaśākhāntargatapradeśadvayāmnātaśāṇḍilyavidyānyāyenātra pradeśadvayāmnātaprāṇavidyaikyasiddhau
<quote>‘yo ha vai jyeṣṭhaṃ ce’</quote> tyāderviṣayavākyatve'pi <quote>‘athāto niḥśreyasādāna’</quote> mityādipradeśagataivaṃ-
śabdānvayastatra vaktuṃ śakyata iti । tathā satyupasaṃhārādhikaraṇanyāyena chāṃdogyabṛhadāraṇya-
kāmnātatayāpi prāṇavidyaikyasiddhau tadubhayāmnātavāsiṣṭhyādiguṇānāmapyevaṃśabdānvayastathai-
vopapadyata iti pūrvapakṣayukteranavatāraprasaṃgāt । na hyekaśākhāntargatapradeśāntarāmnātaguṇānāṃ
śākhāntarāmnātaguṇānāṃ cāsannidhānāviśeṣe vidyaikyena nimittena evaṃśabdaḥ pūrvānparā-
mṛśati nottarāniti niyantuṃ śakyate । tasmā <quote>‘dathāto niḥśreyasādāna’</quote> miti sandarbhā-
mnātaivaṃśabdādanyatra prāṇavidyāmnātāñjaiṣṭhyavāsiṣṭhyādiguṇānna parāmṛśatītyeva pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ
kartuṃ yuktaḥ । evameva śāṅkarabhāṣye pūrvapakṣo dṛśyata iti tathaivātrāpi bhāṣyavākyāni neta-
vyāni । sūtre <quote>‘samāna evañcābhedā’</quote> diti vaktavye <quote>‘sarvābhedā’</quote> diti vacanaṃ yadekaśākhāyāṃ
pradeśāntare śākhāntare vā samāmnātaṃ śreṣṭhatvādiguṇake prāṇopāsanaṃ tena sarveṇā <quote>‘pyathāto niḥ-
śreyasādāna’</quote> mityādisandarbhāmnātaprāṇopāsanasyābhedādityarthaparyavasitaṃ na tu śākhāntarā-
mnānataḥ pradeśāntarāmnāne viśeṣābhāvaṃ sūcayati । teneyaṃ śaṅkā vyāvartate । <quote>‘yo ha vai jyeṣṭhaṃ ca
śreṣṭhaṃ ce’</quote> tyārabhya śākhābhedānāmnātaṃ sarvamapi prāṇopāsanamekameva vairūpyābhāvāditi yuktastatra
parasparāmnātaguṇopasaṃhāraḥ । <quote>‘athāto niḥśreyasādāna’</quote>mityādisaṃdarbhāmnātaṃ tu tato bhinna-
meva । tatra sarvatrāpi vāgādīnāmekaikasyotkramaṇe satyapi śarīrasyeṃdriyāṇāṃ ca yathāpūrva-
mavasthānena prāṇasyotkramaṇaprasaktau teṣāṃ śaithilyāpattyā ca prāṇasya śraiṣṭhyanirddhāraṇam । iha
prāṇasahiteṣu vāgādiṣu sahotkrāṃteṣu mṛtakalpatayā śayitasya śarīrasya vāgādipraveśe tasyā-
pyanutthānataḥ prāṇapraveśamātreṇotthānataśca śraiṣṭhyanirdhāraṇamityupākhyānabhedāditi । śaṅkā-
vyāvartanaprakārastu śraiṣṭhyaṃ ś‍vaśakuniparyantasarvaprāṇyannatvamācamanīyasalilavāsastvamityupā-
syaguṇasārūpye satyanupāsyaguṇavairūpyaṃ na bhedāvaham । sādṛśyanirṇayārtheṣu mukhyasādṛśyameva
svakāryakaraṃ na tvamukhyavaisādṛśyamiti । ayaṃ nyāyo'dhikaraṇāntare vivakṣitatvādiha bhāṣya-
kṛtā noddhāṭita ityalamativistareṇa ।। <pratika>iti sarvābhedādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</pratika>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha sarvābhedādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। sarvābhedādanyatreme ।। 10 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>vāsiṣṭhyādi na kauṣītakināṃ prāṇasya vedane'pekṣyam । tatparipaṭhitaguṇānāmevaivaṃśabdaviṣayatvāt ।। 209 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>śākhāntaragatamapi tadruṇinā prāṇena buddhimānītam । evaṃśabdārthatvaṃ yātīsyupahāryamevamatrāpi ।। 210 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti sarvābhedādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha sarvābhedādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। sarvābhedādanyatreme ।। 10 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvamoṃkārasya udgīthatvaviśeṣaṇātsarvavedavyāptivyāvṛttivat <quote>‘evaṃ vidvā’</quote> niti prakṛtaguṇamātragrāhakaivaṃ-
śabdācchākhāntaraguṇavyāvṛttiriti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyedamāha—<pratika>sarvābhedāditi</pratika> । atra vājasaneyake chāndogye ca prāṇavidyāyāṃ
<pb n="304"/>
athānandādyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
ānandādayaḥ pradhānasya ।। 11 ।।
abhedāditi śeṣaḥ । <quote>‘satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma’</quote> ānando brahma’ <quote>‘ṛtaṃ satyaṃ paraṃ
brahma puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇapiṅgalam’</quote> <quote>‘ākāśaśarīraṃ brahma, satyātma prāṇārāmaṃ manaānandam,
śāntisamṛddham’</quote> ityādiṣvānandādayo guṇāḥ paravidyāsu pradhānasya brahmaṇaḥ
śrūyante । te sarvāsu paravidyāsūpasaṃhāryā na vā ।।
iti saṃśaye nopasaṃhāryāḥ, brahmaṇa ekasyānandādyanekaguṇaviśiṣṭatve'nekatvapra-
saṅgāt, viśeṣyabhedakatvāt, athavā—tatratatroktaguṇamātreṇāpi tadupāsanasaṃbhavāt
ityevaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate । guṇino brahmaṇa ekatvāt sarvāsu paravidyāsūpasaṃ-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha ānandādyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ānandādayaḥ pradhānasya ।। 11 ।।</pratika> pūrvasūtrādapekṣitāṃśānuvṛttiṃ darśayati—<pratika>abhedā-
diti</pratika> । siddhāntasūtre'sminnapekṣitāṃśapūraṇasya siddhāntopakramasya vyākhyānasamaye kartavya-
tve'pyatra tatkāraṇaṃ kāryākhyānādhikaraṇe kariṣyamāṇasya prāṇavidyāviṣayavicārāntarasya
pūrvādhikaraṇasaṃgatatvāttataḥ prāṅmadhye vicārāntarakaraṇamayuktamityāśaṅkānirākaraṇāya sautra-
padānuvṛttilipsayā madhye kṛtamiti saṃgatisūcanārtham । evameva hi jaimininā <quote>‘cikīrṣayā
ca saṃyogā’</quote>dityupakrāntamahāvedyadhikaraṇapūrvapakṣasiddhāntamadhye saṃyogādityasyānuvṛttili-
psayā <quote>‘tathā pradhānene’</quote>tyeṣṭikivedyadhikaraṇapūrvapakṣasūtraṃ kṛtam । ānaṃdādīnāṃ brahmaguṇānāṃ
sakaletaravilakṣaṇatvena pratītāvupayogānupayogābhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । ānandādayaḥ sarvāsu
vidyāsu kimarthamupasaṃhāryāḥ kimete sakaletaravilakṣaṇabrahmasvarūpapratītyanubaṃdhina iti tatpratī-
tyarthamupasaṃhāryāḥ uta vidyopakārārtham । nādyaḥ । ghaṭatvādivadekasyaiva svarūpanirūpakadharmasya
sakaletaravilakṣaṇadharmisvarūpapratītisādhanatvena tāvadga‍uṇopasaṃhāravaiyarthyāt । na ca brahmaṇa-
stāvanto'pi guṇāḥ svarūpanirūpakāḥ । svarūpanirūpakadharmānekatve ghaṭapaṭādirītyā brahmaṇo-
'pyanekatvaprasaṃgāt । lokavedayorekasmindharmiṇyanekadharmasamāveśasya bahulamupalaṃbhe'pi svarū-
panirūpakāsādhāraṇadharmabhede dharmibhedasya niyatatvāt । na dvitīyaḥ । tattadvidyāprakaraṇāmnā-
taguṇaireva vidyopakārasiddheḥ । anyathā vidyābhede'pi keṣāñcidga‍uṇānāmupasaṃhāre vinigamanā-
virahātsarvaguṇānāmapi pāriplavatvaprasaṃgāt । iti । siddhāntastu—nityānapāyijñānānandādi-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vāgādayo vasiṣṭhatvādiguṇāḥ śrūyante na kauṣītakyādiśākhāsu । tatra kiṃ vasiṣṭhatvādiguṇāḥ anyatroktā anyatra nopasaṃhartavyā
utopasaṃhartavyā iti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । nopasaṃhartavyā iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, anyatra</pratika>=vasiṣṭhatvādiguṇānāmaśravaṇasthale ।
<pratika>ime</pratika>=vasiṣṭhatvādayo guṇā upasaṃhartavyāḥ । kasmāt । <pratika>sarvābhedāt</pratika>=sarvāsu śākhāsu prāṇasaṃvādasthāyāḥ prāṇavidyāyāḥ
abhinnatvāt । ata eva prakṛtaguṇānāmivāprakṛtaguṇānāmapi buddhisthatayaivaṃśabdagrāhyatvātsarve sarvatropasaṃhartavyā iti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> ca sarvaṃ saṃdehapūrvapakṣādikamaviśiṣṭaṃ pūrvasmāditi na tatpratanyate ।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, ubhayoḥ kartavyatvasyādhikāribhedena vyavasthitau alpaguṇopāsakānāmapi muktisattve sarvaguṇopāsanaṃ
keṣāṃcidvyarthaṃ na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । vyarthamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, sarvaguṇopasaṃhāreṇopāsakānāṃ brahmādīnāmuttamaphala-
bhāktvena phalatāratamyasaṃbhavānna vyarthamiti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, sū ।। sarvābhedādanyatreme ।। 11 ।। ime</pratika>=sarvaguṇopasaṃhartṛ-
brahmādayaḥ <pratika>anyatra</pratika>=tadanupasaṃhartṛbhyo'nyatra tatphalavilakṣaṇamahāphale bhavanti । tadbhājo bhavanti । kutaḥ । <pratika>sarvābhedāt</pratika>=
sarvavedoktaguṇānāmavibhāgenopasaṃhartṛtvenopāsanādityarthaḥ । <pratika>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ sarvābhedādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</pratika>
<pb n="305"/>
hāryā ānandādayaḥ । nīlo dhavaḻo raktaḥ khaṇḍaḥ pūrṇaśṛṅga ityādināṃ viruddhadharmā-
ṇāmeva dharmibhedāvahatvam, na tu nīlaṃ sugandhi mahadutpalamityatra nīlimādī-
nām । ato brahmaṇo guṇānāmavirodhānna bhedāvahatvam । tasmādga‍uṇino brahmaṇaḥ
sarvatrābhedādupasaṃhāryā ānandādaya iti ।। ityānandādyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
atha priyaśirastvādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। priyaśirastvādyaprāptirupacayāpacayau hi bhede ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘tasya priyameva śiraḥ’</quote> ityādau priyaśirastvādayo brahmadharmatvena śrūyante ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
guṇavigrahaviśeṣavattvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ svarūpalakṣaṇamityuktaṃ janmādisūtre । na hi brahmaviṣṇavādisaka-
letaravilakṣaṇaṃ brahma śṛṃgagrāhikayānubhavārūḍhaṃ bhavati । yathā prakṛṣṭaprakāśena sakalagrahanakṣatra-
tārakādivilakṣaṇaścaṃdraḥ tathābhūtasvarūpalakṣaṇaśāli brahmaikameva sarvāsu vidyāsūpāsyamiti ।
candradarśane sarvatra prakṛṣṭaprakāśānuvṛttivat jñānānaṃdādiguṇavigrahaviśeṣānuvṛttissarvāsvapi
brahmavidyāsu bhavedeva । na ca svarūpanirūpakataddharmabhedāddharmibhedaśśaṅkanīyaḥ । na hi svarūpani-
rūpakatvaṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhedakatve prayojakaṃ kiṃ tu viruddhadharmatvaṃ nīlatvadhavalatvādiṣu tathā klṛpteḥ ।
ata eva <quote>‘yadi rathantarasāmā somaḥ syādaindravāyavāgrāngrahāngṛhṇīyāt’</quote> iti vākye rathantara-
sāmatvarūpasya somaviśeṣaṇasya tadviruddhabṛhatsāmatvarūpajyotiṣṭomaprayogāntarādeva bhedakatvaṃ
na tu tadaviruddhagāyatramahāyavādisāmayuktajyotiṣṭomakratusāmānyādbhedakatvamiti vyavasthā-
pitaṃ rathantarādhikaraṇe । iha śrutipratipannasamāveśānāmudāhṛtaguṇaviśeṣavigrahaviśeṣāṇāṃ
nāsti virodhaśaṅkā । atassarvāsvapi vidyāsveteṣāmupasaṃhāraḥ kārya iti ।।</p>
<head>।। iti ānandādyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<head>atha priyaśirastvādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। priyaśirastvādyaprāptirupacayāpacayau hi bhede ।। 12 ।।</pratika> priyādīnāmānaṃdavi-
śeṣatvātteṣāṃ śiraḥprabhṛtirūpatvasyopacāpacayādyāpādakatvācca saṃśayapūrvapakṣajñānāvāntaraviśe-
ṣasatyasaṃkalpatvādivadānaṃdāvāṃtaraviśeṣāḥ priyaśirastvādayo'pyupasaṃhartavyāḥ । na ca priyā-
dīnāmānaṃdabhedatve'pi teṣāṃ śirastvātmatvādikaṃ vidyāviśeṣe brahmaṇo niratiśayānaṃdarūpatva-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha ānandādyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। ānandādayaḥ pradhānasya ।। 11 ।।</sutra>
<p><lg><l>ānandādyā na guṇā ssamastavidyopasaṃhāryāḥ । itaraguṇebhyasteṣāṃ vyavasthitebhyo viśeṣaḥ kaḥ ।। 211 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>dharmisvarūpa ete nirūpakāḥ khaṇḍamuṇḍatādivat । iti cettarhi brahmānekaṃ prasajyate khaṇḍamuṇḍavadeva ।। 212 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>dharminirūpakabhede nirūpyabhedasya niyatatvāt । dharmiṇi dhiyamārūḍhe caikenānyaguṇavaiphalyam ।। 213 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>maivaṃ brahmālaukikamekena guṇena na dhiyamārohet । na ca khaṇḍatādivadime virodhino yena dharmibhedaḥ syāt ।। 214 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>tatsaccidādidharmāssamastavidyopasaṃhāryāḥ । evaṃ nikhilanarāmaravilakṣaṇaṃ brahma dhīpadaṃ bhavati ।। 215 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>saditi sakalaprapañcākārajuṣā saṃgataṃ śaktyā । ciditi sakalāvabhāsakamanassamākhyātabodhadhanam ।। 216 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>nityavibhusarvabhāvāttrividhaparicchedalaṃdhyanaṃtamiti । ānanda iti tathāyutamanatiśayānandarūpayā śaktyā ।। 217 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>divyādbha‍utataravigrahaśobhi virūpākṣamityuditam । tatkṛṣṇapiṃgalamiti proktaṃ śaktyā tayā śabaladeham ।। 218 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>ākāśaśarīramiti prathitaṃ tacchaktyabhinnamityetat । tasyāmeva tu raktimatprāṇārāmamiti saṃkathitam ।। 219 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>tāmapi na brāhyakaraṇairupabhuṃkte kiṃ tu manasaiva । līlaiva tanuparigraha iti mana ānandamityuditam ।। 220 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti ānandādyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<pb n="306"/>
<p>te'pyānandādaya iva paravidyāsūpasaṃhāryā na vā ।।
iti saṃśaye teṣāmapi satyasaṃkalpatvādivadupapasaṃhāre ko virodhaḥ ।।
iti prāpte brūmaḥ---nāsti priyaśirastvādīnāmupasaṃhāraḥ paravidyāsu, satyasaṃ-
kalpatvādivat teṣāṃ brahmaguṇatvābhāvāt । upasaṃhāre teṣāṃ brahmaṇaḥ sāvayavatve-
nopacayāpacayaprasaktiḥ । bhedo hi priyaśirastvādīnāṃ svābhāvikatve brahmaṇo
bhavati । atasteṣāṃ nopasaṃhāraḥ ।।
ānandādīnāmiva sarvajñatvādīnāṃ brahmasvarūpāntarbhūtaguṇatvādavirodha ityāha-
<sutra>sū ।। itare tvarthasāmānyāt ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
itare sarvajñatvanityatṛptatvādayo brahmasvarūpāntargatatayā arthasāmānyāt sarva-
tropasaṃhāryāḥ । priyaśirastvādīnāmanantarbhāvānnopasaṃhāra iti ।।
iti priyaśirastvādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pratipattisaukaryārthaṃ kalpitaṃ na tu tātvikaṃ brahmānaṃdasya tatvataḥ śiraḥprabhṛtirūpatve
kvacitsthaulyaṃ kvacitkārśyamiti tasyopacayāpacayaprasaṃgāditi vācyam । brahmānandarūpāyāḥ
pariṇāminyāścicchakterupacayāpacayayoḥ pariṇāmaviśeṣavṛttyoradoṣāvahatvāditi । siddhāṃ-
tastu, upacayāpacayau śiraḥpakṣapucchādirūpatayā sthūlatvakṛśatvarūpau prasajyeyātām । tau hi
jaḍapariṇāmeṣveva saṃbhavato nānaṃdabhedeṣu priyādiṣu । ānaṃdamayasya pucchatvena nirūpitādbra-
hmaṇo bhedaśca prasajyate । ato'nnamayādīnāmivānandasyāpi śiraḥprabhṛtikalpanāmātramiti
na teṣāmupasaṃhāra iti । sūtre hetuvācī hiśabdaḥ kākākṣinyāyenobhayatra saṃbadhyate । tathā
copacayāpacayaprasaṃgāt bhedaprasaṃgāccetyarthaḥ । sarvajñatvanityatṛptatvādikaṃ jñānānandaviśeṣatve'pi
yadupasaṃhāryamabhimataṃ tatra hetuṃ priyaśirastvādivaiṣamyaṃ darśayitumuttarasūtramavatārayati—<pratika>ānaṃ-
dādīnāmiveti । sū ।। itare tvarthasāmānyāt ।। 13 ।।</pratika> svarūpāntargatatayā yathā
brahmasvarūpalakṣaṇatayā tathā arthasāmānyāt anapāyitvena brahmarūpadharmisādṛśyāt । nanu
kiṃ yāvadanapāyi brahmaṇi dharmajātaṃ tatsarvaṃ sarvavidyāsūpasaṃhāryam ? neti brūmaḥ । yadbrahmasva-
rūpapratītyanubaṃdhi jñānānaṃdādikaṃ yacca muktāvupāsakena prāpyaṃ sarvajñatvasatyakāmatvasatyasaṃka-
lpatvāptakāmatvādikaṃ tatsarvamupasaṃhāryam । tatra pratītyanubandhiguṇajātasyopasaṃhāryatvaṃ pūrvā-
dhikaraṇe varṇitamiha muktaprāpyaguṇajātasyopasaṃhāryatvaṃ varṇitaṃ tadetadarthasāmānyādityasya
muktānāṃ brahmaṇā saha guṇāṣṭakāvirbhāvādiphalasāmyādityarthāntaragarbhākāreṇa vivakṣitam ।
idañcāgrimādhikaraṇe <quote>‘tadanusaṃdhānanairaṃtaryāddhi tatsārūpyāpattirmuktiḥ ato yathopāsanaṃ
phala’</quote>miti bhāṣyakṛdeva spaṣṭayiṣyati ।। <pratika>iti priyaśirastvādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha priyaśirastvādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। priyaśirastvādyaprāptirupacayāpacayau hi bhede ।। 12 ।। itare tvarthasāmānyāt ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>jīvasyānaṃdabhidāḥ kiṃ na syuḥ priyaśirastvādyāḥ । naiva brahmaguṇāste sāvayavaṃ brahma hi tathā syāt ।। 221 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>jñānānandaviśeṣā ye tvitare syuḥ śivāgame'pi mitaḥ । sārvajñyatṛptimukhyāssaṃgrāhyāstāsu te'rthaikyāt ।। 222 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti priyaśirastvādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<pb n="307"/>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha ānandādyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।। 7 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। ānandādayaḥ pradhānasya ।। 11 ।। priyaśirastvādyaprāptirupacayāpacayau hi bhede ।। 12 ।। itaretva-
rthasāmānyāt ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, atra nirguṇaśrutiṣu ānandasvarūpatvādayo dharmāḥ kvacitkvacicchrūyante, te kiṃ sarvatropasaṃhāryā uta
neti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । nopasaṃhartavyā iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, sarvaśākhāsu vedyasya brahmaṇa ekatvena vidyāyā ekatvāt
ānandasvarūpatvādayo dharmāḥ sarvatropasaṃhartavyā iti ।</p>
<p>nanu yadi brahmaṇa ekatvādānandādyupasaṃhārastarhi priyaśirastvādyupasaṃhāro'pi syādityāśaṃkyāha---<pratika>sū ।। priyaśirastvādya-
prāptirupacayāpacayau hi bhede ।। 12 ।। priyaśirastvādidharmāṇāṃ na sarvatra prāptiḥ</pratika> । hi=yasmāt priyamodapramo-
dānandānāṃ parasparāpekṣayā <pratika>upacayāpacayau</pratika>=vṛddhihrāsāvanubhūyete । tau ca dharmibhede satyeva svābhāvikau bhavataḥ । brahma-
ṇastu, nirbhedatvāt ।</p>
<p>jñānopayogitvādānandādīnāṃ saṃyadvāmatvādidharmebhyo vaiṣamyamāha---<pratika>sū ।। itare tvarthasāmānyāt ।। 13 ।। itare tu</pratika>=
upāsyadharmāpekṣayā itare tvānandādayo dharmāḥ jñānaikaphalāssarvatropasaṃhriyante । kutaḥ । <pratika>arthasāmānyāt</pratika>=pratipādyanya
brahmaṇa ekatvādityarthaḥ । antareṇa guṇopasaṃhāraṃ yāvadbrahmasvarūpaviṣayakamahāvākyārthajñānasādhyāyā avidyānivṛtterasaṃbhavātsarva-
trānandādaya upasaṃhartavyā iti siddham ।। <pratika>ityānandādyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, <quote>“ānandādayaḥ pradhānasya”</quote> itīdamekaṃ sūtramānandādyadhikaraṇamitaratsūtradvayamadhikaraṇāntaramiti bhedaḥ ।
ānandādyadhikaraṇe paravidyāsu, pradhānasya brahmaṇaḥ śrūyamāṇā, ānandādayo guṇāḥ sarvāsu paravidyāsūpasaṃhāryā na veti
<pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । ekasya brahmaṇa ānandādyanekaguṇaviśiṣṭatve viśeṣaṇānāṃ viśeṣyabhedakatvenānekatvaprasaṃgāt, tatratatroktaguṇamātre-
ṇāpi tadupāsanasaṃbhavācca nopasaṃhāryā iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । guṇino brahmaṇa ekatvāt <quote>‘nīlo dhavala’</quote> ityādiviruddhadharmāṇāmeva
dharmibhedāvahatvāt ānandādīnāṃ brahmaguṇānāmavirodhena <quote>‘nīlaṃ sugandhi mahadutpala’</quote> mityādau nīlimādīnāmiva bhedānāvahatvācca
sarvāsu paravidyāsūpasaṃhāryā ānandādaya iti ।। <pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate ānandādyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha priyaśirastvādyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। priyaśirastvādyaprāptirupacayāpacayau hi bhede ।। 12 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘tasya priyameva śiraḥ’</quote> ityādayo brahmadharmatvena
śrūyante te'pyānandādaya iva paravidyāsūpasaṃhāryā na veti <pratika>saṃdehe</pratika> satyasaṃkalpatvādivadupasaṃhāryā eveti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhānta-
stu</pratika>, priyaśirastvādīnāmupasaṃhāro nāstyeva paravidyāsu । satyasaṃkalpatvādivatteṣāṃ brahmaguṇatvābhāvāt । teṣāmupasaṃhāre brahmaṇa-
ssāvayavatvenopacayāpacayaprasaktiḥ । priyaśirastvādīnāṃ svābhāvikatve bhede hi brahmaṇo bhavet । atasteṣāṃ nopasaṃhāraḥ ।
ānandādīnāmiva sarvajñatvādīnāṃ brahmasvarūpāntarbhūtaguṇatvātteṣāmupasaṃhāre na virodha ityāha---<pratika>sū ।। itare tvarthasāmānyā-
t ।। 13 ।। itare</pratika>=sarvajñatvanityatṛptatvādayo guṇāstu arthasāmānyātsarvatropasaṃhāryāḥ । priyaśirastvādīnāṃ tadanantarbhāvā-
nnopasaṃhāraḥ iti ।। <pratika>iti priyaśirastvādyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate tu</pratika>, <quote>‘ānandādaya’</quote> ityādīni sapta sūtrāṇyapyekamadhikaraṇam । tatra jñānānandāmalatvādayo brahmasvarūpa-
nirūpakadharmāḥ sarvāsu paravidyāsūpasaṃhartavyā na veti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । aprakaraṇādhītānāmupasaṃhāre pramāṇābhāvādbrahmaguṇānāmasaṃkhyeya
tvenopasaṃhārāśakteśca nopasaṃhartavyā iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, ānandādayassarvāsu paravidyāsūpasaṃhartavyāḥ । pradhānasya
guṇino brahmaṇassarvāsu vidyāsvabhedāt । <quote>‘sarvābhedā’</quote> diti pūrvasūtrā <quote>‘dabhedā’</quote>dityekadeśānuvṛttyā labhyate ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। priyaśirastvādītyādi ।। 12 ।।</pratika> ānandādīnāṃ prāptāvapi priyaśirastvādīnāṃ brahmasvarūpaguṇatvābhāvādaprāptireva ।
brahmaṇaḥ śiraḥpakṣādibhede svarūpe sati brahmaṇa upacayāpacayau prasajyeyātām ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। itare tvarthasāmānyāt ।। 13 ।। itare tu</pratika>=ānandādayaḥ । <pratika>arthasāmānyāt</pratika>=brahmasvarūpasāmānyātsarvāsva
nuvartante ।।</p>
<p>nanu priyaśirastvādīnāṃ brahmasvarūpadharmatvābhāve kimarthaṃ tadabhidhānamityata āha---<pratika>sū ।। ādhyānāya prayojanābhāvāt
।। 14 ।।</pratika> prayojanāntarābhāvādanucintanārthaṃ tadabhidhānam । veditavyatayopadiṣṭamānandamayaṃ brahma dhyānārthaṃ tathā buddhāvāropyata
ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ātmaśabdācca ।। 15 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘anyo'ntara ātmānandamaya’</quote> ityātmaśabdācca priyaśirastvādayo na brahmasvarūpadharmāḥ ।
śiraḥ pakṣādīnāmātmadharmatvābhāvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ātmagṛhītiritaravaduttarāt ।। 16 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘anyo'ntara ātme’</quote> tyātmaśabdena paramātmana eva grahaṇam
<pb n="308"/>
athādhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। ādhyānāya prayojanābhāvāt ।। 14 ।।</sutra>
iha pūrvoktānandamayātmānusandhānavadannamayādīnāmapyanusandhānaṃ niyatamasti
na veti saṃśayaḥ ।।
annamayādisarvāntarasyānandamayasyānnamayādyanusaṃdhānakramamantareṇa tadantaratve-
nānusaṃdhānāyogāt teṣāmanusaṃdhānaṃ niyatam ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha ādhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>ādhyānāya prayojanābhāvāt ।। 14 ।।</pratika> saṃgatisūcanapūrvakaṃ saṃśayaṃ darśayati—<pratika>iheti ।
<quote>‘sa eko brahmaṇa ānanda’</quote></pratika> ityānaṃdavallyāṃ śrutasya niratiśayānandasya sarvavidyāsvanusandheya-
tvavyavasthāpanādānaṃdamaya ātmā sarvavidyāsvanusaṃdheya iti phalitam । tadanusaṃdhāne tadīyaṃ
priyaśirastvādikamapi sarvatrānusaṃdhātavyamiti śaṅkā pūrvādhikaraṇe nirākṛtā । mābhūdānaṃ-
damayasambandhi śiraḥpakṣādikamanusaṃdheyam । ānandamayasya yasminnannamayādikośacatuṣṭaye
nigūḍhatvamuktaṃ tadanusaṃdheyameva tasyākalpitatvāditi śaṅkānirākaraṇārthametadadhikaraṇamiti
saṃgatiḥ । annamayādikīrtanasyānaṃdamayagatānnamayādisarvāṃtaratvarūpaguṇānusaṃdhānārthatvānaṃdama-
yapratipattisaukaryāṃrthatvānyatarānavadhāraṇātsaṃśaya iti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>annamayādīti</pratika> । ayamā-
śayaḥ । annamayādiṣūttarottarasya pūrvapūrvāṃtaratvapratipādanamānaṃdamayasya sarvāṃtaratvarūpānusaṃ-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kutaḥ । <quote>‘ātmāvā idameka eve’</quote> tyatra yathā paramātmano grahaṇaṃ tadvat । kathamidamavagamyate iti cet <pratika>uttarāt</pratika>=<quote>‘so'kāmayata
bahu syā’</quote> miti tadekārthāduttaravākyādityarthaḥ ।।
<pratika>sū ।। anvayāditi cetsyādavadhāraṇāt ।। 17 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘anyo'ntara ātmā prāṇamaya’</quote> ityādipūrvavākyeṣu anātmasvā-
tmaśabdānvayātkathamuttaravākyānnirṇaya iti cet <quote>‘tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśa’</quote> iti prakṛtasyātmana eva ānandamayapa-
ryanteṣvavadhāraṇāt syādeva nirṇayaḥ । ataḥ priyaśirastvādīnāmanātmadharmatvāt jñānānandādīnāmātmasvarūpanirūpakadharmatvācca
teṣāmeva sarvatropasaṃhāra iti ।। <pratika>iti rāmānujamate ānandādyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, imāni trīṇi sūtrāṇi trīṇyadhikaraṇānīti vedyam । <pratika>sū ।। ānandādayaḥpradhānasya ।। 12 ।।</pratika> atra
sarvaṃmumukṣūṇāṃ kiyanto guṇāḥ niyamenopāsyā iti yaḥ ko'pi guṇo niyantuṃ śakyate vā na veti <pratika>saṃdehe</pratika> pramāṇābhāvānna
śakyate iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, ānandādayaḥ</pratika>=ānando jñānaṃ sacchabdoditaṃ nirdoṣatvaṃ ātmaśabdoditaṃ svā-
mitvaṃ ceti catvāro guṇāḥ । <pratika>pradhānasya</pratika>=pradhānaphalasya mokṣasyārthe sarvamumukṣūpāsyāḥ । mokṣasya nirdoṣajñānānandarūpatvāt । <quote>‘taṃ
yathā yathopāste’</quote> iti śruterityarthaḥ । ātmatvamapi turīye vakṣyamāṇaṃ saṃgṛhyate iti yāvat ।। <pratika>ityānandādyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। priyaśirastvādītyādi ।। 13 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘tasya priyameva śiraḥ’</quote>ityādinā śrutāḥ priyaśirastvādayo'pi guṇāḥ kiṃ sarvamumu-
kṣūpāsyā vācyāḥ uta neti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । teṣāmānandabhedatvātsarvamumukṣūpāsyā vācyā eveti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>,
sarveṣāṃ priyaśirastvādiguṇopāsanayogyatā nāsti kiṃ tu keṣāṃcideva । kutaḥ । <pratika>hi</pratika>=yasmāt । <pratika>bhede</pratika>=nimittasaptamī । phalabhe-
dasidhdyartham । <pratika>upacayāpacayau</pratika>=upāsane vṛddhihrāsau । tāratamyamiti yāvat । apekṣitau । tasmādityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti priyaśi-
rastbādyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। itare tvarthasāmānyāt ।। 14 ।।</pratika> iha uktebhyaścaturbhya itare madhyamaguṇāḥ devādibhirupāsakairupasaṃhāryā vā na
veti <pratika>saṃdehe</pratika> anarhaguṇopāsanasyānarthaphalatvānnopasaṃhāryā iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, itare</pratika>=uktebhya ānandādibhya-
ścaturbhyaḥ anye madhyamaguṇāḥ । <pratika>arthasāmānyāt</pratika>=svasvaprāpyamokṣarūpaphalasāmyāt । tuśabda evārthe । lyablope pañcamī ।
svaguroranyasmādvā kutaścitsarvajñāt bhāvisvasvamuktiphalasvarūpajñānasaṃbhavena phalatāratamyamapekṣya itare'pi madhyamaguṇā apyupasaṃ-
hāryā eveti ।। <pratika>iti itaraguṇādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।। sūtrārthacandrikāyāmānandādyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</pratika>
<pb n="309"/>
iti prāpte'bhidhīyate---annamayādīnāmanusaṃdhānaṃ na niyatam, prayojanābhā-
vāt । tasyānandamayabrahmasiddhirhi prayojanam । atastatsiddhiparyantamevānnamayā-
dīnāmanusaṃdhānamiti teṣāmaniyatamanusaṃdhānam ।।
<sutra>sū ।। ātmaśabdācca ।। 15 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘etamannamayamātmānamupasaṃkramya’</quote> ityādiṣu pratyekamātmaśabdādannamayādīnāmannā-
dyadhiṣṭhātṛcetanatvamavagamyate । brahmavyatiriktānāṃ cetanānāṃ mumukṣudhyeyatvaniṣe-
dhāt dhyānakāle teṣāṃ nānusaṃdhānam । tathā'tharvaśikhāyām <quote>‘śiva eko dhyeyaḥ
śivaṃkaraḥ sarvamanyat parityajya’</quote> iti śivavyatiriktānāṃ mumukṣudhyeyatvaṃ niṣi-
dhyate । tato'nnamayādīnāmanusaṃdhānāniyamaḥ ।।
<sutra>sū ।। ātmagṛhītiritaravaduttarāt ।। 16 ।।</sutra>
iha <quote>‘anyo'ntara ātmā''nandamayaḥ’</quote> ityātmagṛhītiḥ paramātmaviṣayā, na
pratyagātmaviṣayā, <quote>‘ātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ’</quote> ityatrātmaśabdavat । tadidamutta-
rāt <quote>‘ānandamayamātmānamupasaṃkramya’</quote> ityetasmādavagamyate । tasmādānandamayā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dheyaguṇapratipādanārtham । tathā satyevaikavākyatālābhāt । ānvaparyeṇa pravṛtte'pi vākye
annamayādivedanaphalavarṇanaṃ bhūmavidyāyāṃ nāmādivedanaphalavarṇanamiva yuktam । annamayādyā-
ntaratvavedanaṃ ca nānnamayādyanusaṃdhānaṃ vinā śakyate kartum । ato yathā daharavidyāyāṃ brahma-
puramadhyavarttidaharapuṇḍarīkābhyantaratvena brahmānusaṃdhānārthaṃ brahmapuradaharapuṇḍarīkānusaṃdhānaṃ
niyataṃ tathānnamayādyanusaṃdhānamapi niyatameva । na cānnamayādayo devatāviśeṣā yena devatā-
ntarāṇāṃ mumukṣudhyeyatvaniṣedhācchivasya sarvottaratvapratipattisaukaryārthamevānnamayādyanukīrtanaṃ
na tuṃ tadāṃtaratvānusaṃdhānārthamiti kalpyeta । śarīraprāṇamanovijñānātmāno hi te tattadvā-
kyataḥ pratīyaṃte । evañcānaṃdamayasya sarvavidyāsvanusaṃdheyatve annamayādyāṃtaratvamapi sarvatrā-
nusaṃdheyam । pradhānānusāritvādga‍uṇānām । yadyapi vidyāntareṣu brahmapratipattyanubaṃdhitvenā-
naṃdamayatvamātramanusaṃdhātavyaṃ syāttathāpyānaṃdamayavidyāyāṃ prakaraṇapaṭhitaguṇatyāgāyotyādanna-
mayādyāntaratvānusaṃdhānārthamannamayādyanusaṃdhānaṃ niyatamiti । <pratika>ānaṃdamayabrahmasiddhiriti</pratika> ।
annamayādibhya utkṛṣṭatvenānaṃdamayabrahmasiddhirityarthaḥ । tadeta <quote>‘dādhyānāye’</quote>ti sautrapadasā-
marthyāllabhyate । ābhimukhyena dhyānaṃ hyādhyānam । sarvotkṛṣṭatvasiddhāvevātyaṃtādarakṛtenābhi-
mukhyena dhyānaṃ bhavati । nanu kimiti pratipattisaukaryamātrārthatvamucyate, guṇānusaṃdhānārtha-
tvamapi kimiti na syāditi śaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>ātmaśabdācca ।। 15 ।।</pratika> asmi-
nsūtre vaktavyaṃ sarvamānandamayādhikaraṇatṛtīyapakṣe bhāṣye vyaktaṃ pratipāditam ।। <pratika>dhyānakāla
iti</pratika> । dhyānātpūrvaṃ śivasya brahmādiparatvadṛḍhīkaraṇārthamannamayādyanusaṃdhānamastu nāma । niraṃ-
taraśivaikaviṣayacintāsantatirūpadhyānakāle tu tanna yuktamityarthaḥ । nanvātmaśabdayoge'pi
<quote>‘ye'nnaṃ brahmopāsata’</quote> ityādiṣu brahmaśabdaśravaṇe'pi upāsanāprāpyadevatāviśeṣatve'pi yathānna-
mayādīnāmabrahmatvaṃ tathānaṃdamayasyāpi syāditi mandaśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>ātmagṛ-
hītiritaravaduttarāt ।। 16 ।।</pratika> <pratika>ānandamayamātmānamiti ।</pratika> tadanaṃtaramupasaṃkramaṇīyā-
ntarānirdeśānmuktiphalasya tatprāptāveva paryavasānāttasya parabrahmatāvasīyata iti bhāvaḥ ।
<pb n="310"/>
tmānusandhānaṃ mukhyaṃ brahmānusaṃdhānamiti ।।
<sutra>sū ।। anvayāditi cet syādavadhāraṇāt ।। 17 ।।</sutra>
annamayādīnāmupyātmaśabdānvayātparamātmatvena teṣāmapyanusaṃdhānamaviruddha-
miti cet---na, <quote>‘anyo'ntara ātmā''nandamayaḥ’</quote> ityānandamayasya paramātmanaḥ
śivasyānnamayādibhyo bhinnatvāvagamāt <quote>‘śiva eko dhyeyaḥ śivaṃkaraḥ sarvamanyat
parityajya’</quote> iti sakaletaraparityāgapūrvakaṃ śivasyaikasyaiva dhyeyatvāvadhāraṇāt ।
atra hi nirastasamastakalaṅkatayā nikhilamaṅgalabhājanatayā ca śivaśabdena paraṃ
brahmocyate । yadvirūpākṣaṃ kṛṣṇapiṅgalaṃ tadanusaṃdhānanairantaryāddhi tatsārūpyāpatti-
rmuktiḥ । ato yathopāsanaṃ phalamiti tadvyatiriktānāṃ śivatāśūnyānāmanu-
saṃdhānaṃ na śivatvāpādakam । ata ānandamayaḥ śiva eka evānusaṃdheya iti ।।
ityādhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
abhyāsādikaṃ tvānaṃdamayādhikaraṇe prapañcitatvānnopāttam । tarhyātmabrahmaśabdādiśravaṇādannama-
yādīnāmapi brahmatāstu । <quote>‘anyo'ntara’</quote> iti bhedanirdeśasya <quote>‘brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhe’</quote>ti pucchapu-
cchavadbhāvanirdeśavadaupādhikabhedaviṣayatvopapatteḥ । annamayādyupāsanābhiḥ kramaprāpyasthānabhe-
daśravaṇasya ca paramaśivalokāntargatasthānabhedaviṣayatvopapatteḥ ityāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ
sūtram—<pratika>anvayāditi cetsyādavadhāraṇāt ।। 17 ।।</pratika> ātmaśabdānvayādityetat brahmaśa-
bdānvayasyāpyupalakṣaṇam । <quote>‘avadhāraṇā’</quote>dityetadbhinnatvaniścayaparamiti vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>bhinnatvā-
vagamāditi</pratika> । ānandamayasya brahmaṇaśca parabrahmatvamānandamayādhikaraṇoktanyāyairavicala-
miti pucchapucchavadbhāvanirdeśaḥ kathaṃcidaupādhikavipayatvena yojyate । nātra tathā <quote>‘anyoṃ'tara-
ātme’</quote>tyasya mukhyārthāparigrahe pramāṇamasti । ātmaśabdasya devatāviśeṣatvādupapatteḥ ।
brahmaśabdasya pañcabrahmamantraprasiddheṣu brahmaviṣṇurudrendramaheśvarepūpapatteriti bhāvaḥ।<quote>‘prayojanābhāvā’</quote>
diti prathamasūtroktamarthaṃ prapañcayati—<pratika><quote>‘śiva eko dhyeya’</quote> ityādinā <quote>‘na śivatvāpādaka’</quote>mi-
tyantena । iti ādhyānāpikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</pratika></p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām atha ādhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। ādhyānāya prayojanābhāvāt ।। 14 ।। ātmaśabdācca ।। 15 ।। ātmagṛhītiritaravaduttarāt
।। 16 ।। anvayāditi cetsyādavadhāraṇāt ।। 17 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>ānandamayopāstāvannamayādyā api dhyeyāḥ । svātantryeṇa kramaśaḥ svasvaguṇairyojitāssamāmnātaiḥ ।। 223 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>evaṃ hi tattadāntaravijñānamayāntakośānām । āntaratayā prasidhdyedānandamayasya nidhyānam ।। 224 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>maivaṃ tasyopāstau na dhyeyāste <ref>(prayoja1nābhāvāt ।)</ref> tasya dhyānāya hi te buddhyavatārārthamevoktāḥ ।। 225 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>/?/ mātmaśabdataste śikhayoktā brahmaviṣṇurudreṃdrāḥ । ānandamayastvātmā sākṣācchiva eva sṛṣṭivākyoktāḥ ।। 226 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>evaṃ pa/?/ teṣvihātmaśabde samāne'pi । śiva eko dhyeyaḥ syādanyānbrahmādikānparityajya ।। 227 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>evamathavaiśikhāyāmanyatsarva parityajya । śiva eko dhyeya iti sphuṭamevānyavyavacchedāt ।। 228 ।।</l></lg>
<head>ityādhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<note>(1) etadekhākiṃtaṃ pade mātṛkāpustake vṛ/?/ṭitatayā arthānusāreṇa mayā saṃpūrya saṃyojitamiti vedyam । anantarādhi-
/?/ /?/ mayaiva /?/ /?/ /?/ । madāyaparaṇasāmañjaṣṇāsāmañjasyāṃnardhāraṇa paṇḍitā, pramāṇam ।।</note>
<pb n="311"/>
sūtrārthacandrikāyām
atha ādhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।। 8 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। ādhyānāya prayojanābhāvāt ।। 14 ।। ātmaśabdācca ।। 15 ।। ātmagṛhītiritaravaduttarāt
।। 16 ।। anvayāditi cetsyādavadhāraṇāt ।। 17 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, atra ādyaṃ sūtradvayamādhyānādhikaraṇamitaratsūtradvayamātmagṛhītyadhikaraṇamiti vijñeyam । asya <quote>‘indri-
yebhyaḥ parā hyarthā’</quote> ityārabhya <quote>‘puruṣānnāparaṃ kiṃcitsā kāṣṭā sā parā gatiḥ’</quote> ityantaṃ kaṭhavallīvākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । tatra kimimāni
vākyāni bhinnāni, uta ātmaparamekameva vākyamiti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । pratipādyabhedādbhinnānīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ। siddhāntastu,
ādhyānāya</pratika>=dhyānasādhyasākṣātkārāya puruṣa evārthādibhyaḥ paratvena pratipādya ityekameva vākyam । na tvindriyaparatvenārthā-
dayaḥ pratipādyāḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>prayojanābhāvāt</pratika> । na hīndriyaparatvenārthajñānaṃ kiṃcitprayojanaṃ janayati । ataḥ pratipādyabhedā-
bhāvānna vākyabhedaḥ ।।</p>
<p>apūrvatvamapi liṅgāntaramastītyāha---<pratika>sū ।। ātmaśabdācca ।। 15 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘eṣa sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhotmā na prakāśate । dṛśyate
tvamyayā budhdyā sūkṣmayā sūkṣmadarśibhiḥ ।।’</quote> iti prakṛtapuruṣe ātmaśabdaśravaṇāccātmaparamevedaṃ vākyam । tasyātmanaḥ śrutyā
mānāntarāvedyatvarūpāpūrvatvapratipādanāditi bhāvaḥ ।। <pratika>iti bhagavatpādamate ādhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha ātmagṛhītyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p>atrādhikaraṇe varṇakadvayaṃ varṇitam । tayorādyaṃ varṇakamidam—yathā pūrvaṃ vākyabhedabhiyā arthādīnāṃ pṛthakpratipādyatvaṃ nāstī-
tyabhihitam । tadvadaitareyavākye <quote>‘prajāpate reto devāḥ’</quote> iti pūrvavākye hiraṇyagarbhasya prakṛtatvādvākyabhedabhiyā sa evātmaśa-
bdenābhidhīyatāmiti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyedamārabhyate---<pratika>ātmagṛhītirityādi</pratika> । asya varṇakasya <quote>‘ātmā vā idameka evāgra
āsīnnānyatkiṃcana miṣat’</quote> ityādyaireyakavākyaṃ vipayaḥ । tatra kimātmaśabdena hiraṇyagarbha ucyate uta paramātmeti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> ।
hiraṇyagarbha iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, asminsṛṣṭivākye <pratika>ātmagṛhītiḥ</pratika>=ātmaśabdena paramātmana eva grahaṇaṃ
nānyasya । kiṃvat । <pratika>itaravat</pratika>=yathā itareṣu sṛṣṭivākyeṣu <quote>‘ātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ’</quote> ityādiṣu ātmaśabdena paramātmana
evaṃ grahaṇaṃ tadvadatrāpi । kutaḥ । <pratika>uttarāt</pratika>=<quote>‘sa īkṣata lokānnu sṛjā iti’</quote> <quote>‘sa imām̐llokānasṛjate’</quote> ti īkṣaṇapūrvakasraṣṭṭatvarūpo-
ttaraviśeṣaṇadityarthaḥ । tacca viśeṣaṇaṃ paramātmanyeva mukhyatvenāvagatamiti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p>pūrvapakṣabījamanūdya dūpayati---<pratika>anvayāditi cedityādi । anvayāditi cet</pratika>=lokasṛṣṭivākyaparyālocanayā hira-
ṇyagarbha eva vākyānvayānna paramātmagrahaṇaṃ yūktamiti cet । <pratika>syāt</pratika>=paramātmana eva grahaṇaṃ yuktaṃ syāt । kutaḥ । <pratika>ava-
dhāraṇāt</pratika>=<quote>‘ātmā vā idameka evāgra āsīt’</quote> iti sṛṣṭeḥ prāgekatvāvadhāraṇasya paramātmanyeva sāmañjasyāt । tataścātra
śākhāntaroktabhūtasṛṣṭirupasaṃhartavyetyadoṣaḥ ।। <pratika>ityātmagṛhītyadhikaraṇe prathamaṃ varṇakam ।।</pratika></p>
<p>atha dvitīyaṃ prastūyate—pūrvatra vākyaikyabalādarthādiparatvaṃ parityajya vidyaikyamuktam iha tūpakramabhedena vākyabhedādvidyaikyaṃ na
myāditi pratyudāharaṇarasaṃgatyedamārabhyate---<pratika>ātmagṛhītiritaravadityādi</pratika> । bṛhadāraṇyake <quote>‘katama ātmā’</quote> ityātmaśabde
nopakramya <quote>‘sa vā/?/ eṣa mahānaja ātmā’</quote> ityātmaśabdenopasaṃhṛtam । chāndogye tu <quote>‘sadeva somyedamagra āsī’</quote> diti vinaivātma-
śabdaṃ sanmātratvenopakramya <quote>‘sa ātmā tattvamasi’</quote> ityupasaṃhṛtam । tatra kimanayorvākyayostutyārthatvamuta bhinnārthatvamiti
<pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । bhinnārthatvamiti <pratika>pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, ātmagṛhītiḥ</pratika>=chāndogye satpadenātmana eva grahaṇam । <pratika>itaravat</pratika>=
bṛhadāraṇyake ātmapadenātmagrahaṇavat । kutaḥ । <pratika>uttarāt</pratika>=<quote>‘sa ātmā’</quote> ityupasaṃhārabalāt । ata ubhayatra tulyārthatvamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। anvayāditi cetsyādavadhāraṇāt ।। 17 ।। anvayāditicet</pratika>=upasaṃhārasyopakramānvayenopakramaparatantra-
tvāt upasaṃhāravalātsatpadenātmagṛhītirityasaṃgatamiti cet tatrāha---<pratika>syāt</pratika>=satpadenātmagṛhītiryuktā syāt । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>avadhāraṇāt</pratika>=<quote>‘sadeve’</quote> tyadvitīyatvāvadhāraṇādityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti dvitīyaṃ varṇakam ।</pratika></p>
<head>iti bhagavatpādamate ātmagṛhītyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, <quote>‘ādhyānāye’</quote> tyādīni catvāryapi sūtrāṇyādhyānādhikaraṇamiti viśeṣaḥ ।। atra pūrvoktānandamayātmānusaṃdhā-
navadannamayādīnāmapyanusaṃdhānaṃ niyatamasti vā na veti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । annamayādisarvāṃtarasyānandamayasyānnamayādyanusaṃdhānakrama-
mantareṇa tadāntaratvenānusaṃdhānāyogātteṣāmanusandhānaṃ niyatamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, annamayādīnāmanusaṃdhānaṃ na
niyatam । <pratika>prayojanābhāvāt</pratika> । ābhimukhyena dhyānaṃ hyādhyānam । ānandamayasya sarvotkṛṣṭatvasiddhāvevātyantādarakṛtenā-
bhimukhyena dhyānaṃ bhavati । annamayādyanusaṃdhānasya ānandamayabrahmasiddhaparyantatvātteṣāmaniyatamanusaṃdhānamiti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ātmaśabdācca ।। 15 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘etamannamaya’</quote> mityādiṣu pratyekamātmaśabdaśravaṇena cetanatvānavagamāt brahmavyatiriktānāṃ
mumukṣudhyeyatvaniṣedhāta tathātharvaśikhāyāṃ <quote>‘śiva eko dhyeyaḥ śivaṃkarassarvamanyatpa/?/rityajye’</quote>ti śivavyatiriktānāṃ mumukṣudhyeya-
<pb n="312"/>
atha kāryākhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। kāryākhyānādapūrvam ।। 18 ।।</sutra></p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha kāryākhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। kāryākhyānādapūrvam ।। 18 ।। chāṃdogye vājasaneyakaśākhayośca kāṇvamādhyaṃ-</sutra>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p>tvaniṣedhācca annamayādīnāmanusaṃdhānamaniyatamiti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ātmagṛhītiritaravaduttarāt ।। 16 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘anyo'ntara ātmānandamayaḥ’</quote> ityātmagṛhītiḥ paramātmaviṣayā na
pratyagātmavipayā । kiṃvat । <quote>‘ātmana ākāśassaṃbhūta’</quote> ityatrātmaśabdavat । kathamidamavagamyate iti cet <pratika>uttarāt</pratika>=<quote>‘ānanda-
mayamātmānamupasaṃkramye’</quote> tyuttaravākyādavagamyate । tasmādānandamayātmānusaṃdhānaṃ mukhyaṃ brahmānusaṃdhānamiti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। anvayāditi cetsyādavadhāraṇāt ।। 17 ।। anvayāditicet</pratika>=annamayādīnāmapyātmaśabdānvayātpara-
mātmatvena teṣāmapyanusaṃdhānamaviruddhamiti cenna । <pratika>syāt</pratika>=viruddhameva syāt । kutaḥ । <pratika>avadhāraṇāt</pratika>=<quote>‘anyo'ntaraātmā-
nandamaya’</quote> ityānandamayasya paramātmanaḥ śivasyānnamayādibhyo bhinnatvāvagamāt <quote>‘śiva eko dhyeyaśśivaṃkarassarvamanyatparityajya’</quote>
iti sakaletaraparityāgapūrvakaṃ śivasyaikasyaiva dhyeyatvāvadhāraṇācca । ata ānandamayaḥ śiva eka eva dhyeya iti ।।</p>
<head>ityādhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, <quote>‘ādhyānāye’</quote>tyādinī catvāryapi sūtrāṇi pūrvādhikaraṇaśeṣatvena ānandādyadhikaraṇa eva vyākhyātānītyato
nātra punaḥ prapañcanīyatāmarhanti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, atrādhikaraṇe upasaṃhārādhikaraṇoktamupasaṃhārānupasaṃhārapramāṇadvayamākṣipya samarthyete---<pratika>ādhyānā-
yetyādinā</pratika> । pūrvamupasaṃhārādhikaraṇe sarvavidyānāṃ bhagavannāmatvena tadga‍uṇābhidhāyakatvamupasaṃhāre pramāṇaṃ prakaraṇabhedo'nupasaṃhāre
pramāṇamityubhayaṃ vaikalpikatvena siddhāntitam । guṇābhidhānasya tattadga‍uṇaśravaṇadvārā janalokādiphalatvasaṃbhavenopāsanārthatvābhā-
vān tadarthatve sarvaguṇānāmekatraivoktiprasaṃgācca prakaraṇeṣvetāvanta evopāsyā ityuktyabhāvācca tadubhayamayuktamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।
siddhāntastu</pratika>, guṇābhidhānasyādhyānārthatvānniḥśreyasopayogitayā mahāphalatvenābhihitasya tasya janalokādikṣudraphalārthatvāyo-
gāt <quote>‘ātmetyevopāsīte’</quote> ti guṇāntaravyavacchedapūrvakamātmatvasyopāsanāvidhānāccobhayamapi adhikārivyavasthayā yuktameveti ।
<pratika>sūtrārthastu</pratika>, vedeṣu sarvaguṇoktirupasaṃhāraśca <pratika>ādhyānāya</pratika>=samyagjñānārthaṃ klṛpto bhavet । kutaḥ । <pratika>prayojanābhāvāt</pratika>=guṇo-
ktestadupasaṃhārasya na samyagjñānaṃ vinā prayojanābhāvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ātmaśabdācca ।। 15 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘ātmetyevopāsīte’</quote> tyātmaśabdaghaṭitaśrutisadbhāvādadhikāribhedena sarvaguṇopasaṃhāraścā-
kartavya ityarthaḥ ।। atastadubhayaṃ yuktamiti । <pratika>ityānandatīrthamate ādhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>athātmagṛhītyadhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ātmagṛhītiritaravaduttarāt ।। 17 ।।</pratika> atra yadyeva <quote>‘mātmetyeve’</quote>tyavadhāraṇenānandādīnāmapi vyavacchedā-
<quote>‘dānandādayaḥ pradhānasye’</quote> tyuktamayuktaṃ syāditi <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, ānandādīnāṃ caturṇāmapi svāmitvavācinā-
tmaśabdenaiva <quote>‘vijñānamānandaṃ brahme’</quote> tyādivākyeneva parigṛhītatvāt uttaravākyācca yuktameveti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, itaravat</pratika>=satya-
jñānādivākye satyādipadairanyepāṃ guṇānāmiva । <pratika>ātmagṛhītiḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘ātmaive’</quote> ti vākye'pi ātmaśabdena caturṇāṃ guṇānāṃ
grahaṇaṃ saṃbhavati । kutaḥ । <pratika>uttarāt</pratika>=<quote>‘atra hyete’</quote> ityuttaravākyācca । ataścaturguṇopāstyukternāsti virodha iti ।।</p>
<head>ityātmagṛhītyadhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<head>athānvayādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। anvayāditi cetsyādavadhāraṇāt ।। 18 ।।</pratika> atra <quote>‘āplṛvyāpterātmaśabdaḥ paramasya prayujyate’</quote> ityātmaśabdasya
sarvaguṇābhidhāyakatvaśravaṇā <quote>‘dātmetyeve’</quote> ti vākyasyānupasaṃhārapramāṇatvaṃ yuktaṃ na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । na yuktamiti <pratika>pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।
siddhāntastu</pratika>, tasyānupasaṃhārapramāṇatvaṃ yuktameveti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, anvayāditi cet</pratika>=ātmaśabde sarvaguṇānāmanvayā-
diti cet । <pratika>syāt</pratika>=yatparoktaṃ tattathā syādeva । tathāpi nānupapattiḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>avadhāraṇāt</pratika>=<quote>‘ātmetyeve’</quote> tyavadhāraṇāt ।
ātmaśabdo hi brahmādīnpratyeva sarvaguṇānvadati nānyānpratīti nirṇayopapatterityarthaḥ । tatassarveṣāmupāsanasiddhiḥ । ata-
stasyānupasaṃhārapramāṇatopapanneti siddham ।। <pratika>iti ānandatīrthamate anvayādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmādhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।। 8 ।।</head>
<pb n="313"/>
<p><quote>‘yo ha vai jyeṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca veda’</quote> ityārabhya <quote>‘kiṃ me vāsaḥ’</quote> iti vāgādīn
prati prāṇapraśnasyottaramapāṃ prāṇavāsastvamuktvā <quote>‘tasmādevaṃvidaśiṣyannācāme-
daśitvā cācāmedetameva tadanamanagnaṃ kurute’</quote> iti śrūyate । atrācamanaṃ prāṇa-
vāsastvaṃ cetyubhayaṃ vidhīyate uta prāṇavāsastvameva ।।
iti saṃśaye viśeṣābhāvādubhayamapīti prāpte—ācamanasya smṛtyācāreṇa prāpta-
tvādaprāptaṃ prāṇavāsastvamevāpūrvaṃ vidhīyate । aprāptasyaiva vidheyatvākhyānādanu-
vādasarūpe vidhikalpanā । tasmādapūrvaṃ prāṇavāsastvānusaṃdhānameva vidheyamiti
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dinasaṃjñayoḥ prāṇavidyāyāmannaṃ vāsaśca pṛṣṭavate prāṇāya vāgādīnāmuttare śvapakṣyādiparyantaṃ
prāṇijātamannamuktam । tatra tāvadda‍ṛṣṭividhirasaṃdigdhaḥ । sarvaprāṇyodanatvasyāśābdatvādaśa-
kyatvācca । <quote>‘na havā evaṃvidi kiṃcanānannaṃ bhavati na havā asyānannaṃ jagdhaṃ bhavati nānannaṃ
pratigṛhītaṃ ya evametadannasyānnaṃ vede’</quote>ti tadvedanaphalārthavādaśravaṇācca । tadanantaramācamanī-
yānāmapāṃ prāṇavāsastvamuktam । tatrāpi dṛṣṭividhireva । dṛṣṭividhisāhacaryāt । chāṃdogye
<quote>‘laṃbhuko havā bhavatyanagno bhavatī’</quote>ti tadvedanaphalārthavādaśravaṇācca । tadanantaraṃ <quote>‘yadyapyetacchu-
ṣkāya sthāṇave brūyājjāyerannevāsminśākhāḥ praroheyuḥ palāśānī’</quote>ti phalārthavādāntaraśrava-
ṇācca । evaṃ kāṇvaśākhāyāmapyācamanīyānāmapāṃ prāṇavāsastvamātramuktam । mādhyaṃdinaśā-
khāyāṃ tu <quote>‘tasmādevaṃvidaśiṣyannācāme’</quote>dityādyadhikaṃ śrūyate । tatkācamanamapi vidhīyate na
veti tatra śrutasyācamanasyāprāptiprāptibhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvapakṣaḥ---<quote>‘ācāme’</quote> ditvasaṃdigdhavi-
dhivibhaktiśravaṇādācamane'pi vidhiḥ । na ca sarvakarmāṃgatvenācamanasya smṛtyācāraprāptatvā-
devaṃviditi viśeṣaṇe vidhisaṃkramo vācyaḥ । smārtācāravyatirekeṇācamanāntarasyāprāptasya
vidhisaṃbhavāt । cāturmāsye <quote>‘dvayoḥ praṇayatī’</quote> tyatra prakṛtiprāptapraṇayanavyatirekeṇa praṇayanā-
ntaravidhiriti vidhisārthakatvāyābhyupagatatvācca । aprāptavidhau ca labdhe dṛṣṭividhirācamana-
vidhiśceti vākyabhedo na doṣaḥ । <quote>‘adhastātsamidhaṃ dhārayannanudravedupari hi devebhyo dhāra-
yatī’</quote>tyatreva spaṣṭe vidhidvaye vākyabhedasya nyāyyatvāt । na ca tarhyācamana eva vidhirastu
apāṃ vāsastvaśravaṇamarthavādo'stviti śaṅkanīyam । annadṛṣṭividhisāhacaryeṇa phalārtha-
vādaśravaṇena chāṃdogye kāṇvaśākhāyāñcācamanadṛṣṭiśravaṇena dṛṣṭividherapyāvaśyakatvāditi ।
siddhāṃtastu prasiddhānuvādenāprasiddhavidhinaikavākyatve saṃbhavati na vākyabhedo nyāyyaḥ ।
<quote>‘dvayoḥ praṇayati tasmāddvābhyāmetī’</quote>ti sārthavādo vidhiḥ । na ca tasyānyatra saṃkramaṇaṃ saṃbha-
vatīti praṇayanāntare vidhirāśritaḥ । upari dhāraṇe'pyaprāptatvādanuvādānarho vidhirāśritaḥ ।
iha tu sarvakarmāṃgatvena smṛtitaḥ prāptamācamanamanuvādārhamastīti tadanuvādena dṛṣṭimātravidhyu-
papatteḥ na tatrāpi vākyabhedāvaho vidhirāśrayaṇīyaḥ । na cācamanavidhiprāpako dṛṣṭi-
vidhyananuguṇaḥ kaścidarthavādaḥ śrūyate pratyuta vāsastvadṛṣṭhyarthavāda eva tatrāpi śrūyate <quote>‘eta-
meva tadanamanagnaṃ kuruta’</quote> iti । tasmādapāṃ vāsastvānuciṃtanamātre vidhiriti । sūtre kārya-
śabdaḥ kāryatvaparaḥ । apūrvaṃ vāsastvaciṃtanaṃ vidheyamapūrvasyaiva kāryatvākhyānāt vidheyatvapra-
tipādanā<quote>‘daprāpte śāstramarthava’</quote>dityādiṣu । ato yadyapi <quote>‘ya evaṃ vidvānsāmnā stuvīte’</quote>tyā-
<pb n="314"/>
yuktam ।। iti kāryākhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।
atha samānādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। samāna evaṃ cābhedāt ।। 19 ।।</sutra>
agrirahasye bṛhadāraṇyake ca śāṇḍilyavidyā''mnāyate । ekatra <quote>‘ātmānamu-
pāsīta manomayaṃ prāṇaśarīraṃ bhārūpaṃ satyasaṃkalpamākāśānmānam’</quote> iti । itaratra
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
diṣviva vidyāṃśe'nuvādarūpatvaṃ pratīyate tathāpi prāptāprāptavivekena tatraiva vidhisaṃkramo
vācya iti bhāvaḥ ।। <pratika>iti kāryākhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha samānādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>samāna evañcābhedāt ।। 19 ।।</pratika> vājasaneyināṃ śatapathabrāhmaṇo prathamamagnirahasye <quote>‘sa-
ātmānamupāsīta manomayaṃ prāṇaśarīraṃ bhārūpamākāśatmānaṃ kāmarūpiṇaṃ manojavasaṃ satya-
saṅkalpaṃ satyadhṛtiṃ sarvagandhaṃ sarvarasaṃ sarvā anudiśaḥ prabhūtaṃ sarvamidamabhyāttamavākyamanādara’</quote>
miti śāṇḍilyavidyā śrūyate । tadanantaraṃ bṛhadāraṇyake'pi śrūyate ‘manomano'yaṃ puruṣo</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyam</head>
<head>atha kāryākhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 9।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū ।। kāryākhyānādapūrvam ।। 18 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>ācamane vidhidṛṣṭe smārtādanyadvidheyaṃ tat । vāsastvamapūrvaṃ ce (ttadda‍ṛ) ṣṭā vapi vidhirbhavatu ।। 229 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>prāptamanudyācamanaṃ tasyāpsu/?/ prāṇavāsastvam । ekaṃ vidheyamucitaṃ tadevaṃ copakrame'vagatam ।। 230 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti kāryākhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha kāryākhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। kāryākhyānādapūrvam ।। 18 ।। bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, atra vṛhadāraṇyakacchāndogyayorubhayatra <quote>‘evaṃvidaśiṣyannā-
cābhedaśitvācācābhedetameva tadanamanagnaṃ kurute’</quote> iti vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । tatrācamanamanagnatācintanaṃ ca pratīyate । ubhayavidhāne
vākyabhedabhayādekameva vidheyam । tadeka kimācamanam । utānagnatāciṃtanamiti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । prāṇavidyāṅgatvenāpūrvamācamaname-
vātra vidheyamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, apūrvamanagnatācintanamevātra vidheyaṃ nācamanam । kutaḥ । <pratika>kāryākhyānāt</pratika>=
smārtavidhinā sakalakarmānuṣṭhānāṃgatvena śudhdyarthaṃ <pratika>kāryasyā</pratika>camanasya prāṇavidyāyāmapi vidhiprāptasyā<pratika>khyānā</pratika>danagratācinta-
nārthānuvādādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika> tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate ca</pratika> viṣayavākyādikaṃ prāyassamānameva । tatra ācamanaṃ prāṇavāsastvamityubhayaṃ vidheyaṃ
vā uta prāṇavāsastvamiti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । viśeṣābhāvādubhayamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । rāmānujamate</pratika> tu bhagavatpādamatavadācamanaṃ vidheyaṃ
vā uta prāṇavāsastvānusaṃdhānamiti saṃśayasvarūpanirūpaṇe viśeṣaḥ । <pratika>siddhāntastu</pratika>, ācamanasya smṛtyācāraprāptatvādaprāptaṃ
prāṇavāsastvānucintanameva vidheyam । kutaḥ । <pratika>kāryākhyānāt</pratika>=aprāptasyaiva vidheyatvākhyānādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, <quote>‘paramatassetūnmāne’</quote> tyadhikaraṇe bhagavadga‍uṇānāmalaukikatvamabhihitam । tadyuktaṃ na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> ।
alaukikasyānanubhūtatvena dhyānakāle budhdyanārohāt teṣāṃ laukikatvameva dhyānānyathānupapattyā kalpanīyam । ato bhagavadga‍uṇā-
nāmalaukikatvanirṇayo na yukta iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, apūrvam</pratika>=alaukikameva bhagavadga‍uṇajātaṃ dhyātavyam । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>kāryākhyānāt</pratika>=kāryasya dhyānakāryasya mokṣasyālaukikatvāt phalānusāridhyānakartavyatāniyamāt indradiriva gurūpadeśādi-
bhiralaukikānāmapi teṣāṃ budhdyārohopapatteśca । atastepāmalaukikatvanirṇayo yukta eveti ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ kāryākhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<pb n="315"/>
<p><quote>‘manomayo'yaṃ puruṣo bhāssatyastasminnantarhṛdaye yathā vrīhirvā yavo vā sa eṣa sarvasya
vaśī sarvasyeśānaḥ sarvasyādhipatiḥ sarvamidaṃ praśāsti’</quote> iti । ubhayatra vidyā
bhinnā na veti saṃśayaḥ ।।
ekatrākāśātmakatvena mahattvam, itaratra yavasādṛśyenālpatvam, ekatra satya-
saṃkalpatvam, itaratra vaśitvādikam, iti dharmabhedādbhinnā ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
bhāssatyastasminnaṃtarhṛdaye yathā vrīhirvā yavo vā sa eṣa sarvasyeśānaḥ sarvasyādhipatissarva-
midaṃ praśāsti yadidaṃ kiñce’ti । tatra kimubhayatra vidyā bhidyate na veti mahattvāṇīyastvā-
dirūpabhedābhedātsaṃśaye pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ---ekatrākāśasāmyarūpaṃ mahattvamīśānatvādikaṃ
ca śrūyate । anyatrāṇīyastvaṃ satyasaṃkalpatvādikaṃ ca śrūyate । ato rūpabhedādvi-
dyābhedaḥ । nanu manomayatvabhārūpatvaguṇapratyabhijñānādvidyaikye sthite satyubhayatrāpi
parasparānāmnātasatyasaṅkalpatveśānatvādiguṇānāmupasaṃhāro bhaviṣyati । tatra paraspara-
virodhaśaṃkānavakāśāt । mahattvāṇīyastvayostūditānuditahomavadekādaśakapāladvādaśa-
kapālavacca vikalpo bhaviṣyati । na ca mahattvamihāhatyāmnātam । <quote>‘ākāśātmāna’</quote>mitye-
tadākāśatsvacchatāparatvenāpyupapannaṃ dhyeyaguṇatvābhiprāyaṃ vinā svābhāvikamahattvavarṇanena
stutyarthatayā vopapannam । yathā chāṃdogye śāṇḍilyavidyāyāmevāṇīyastvavarṇanānantaraṃ jyāya-
stvakīrtanam । tasmādiha na vidyābhedaśaṃkāvakāśaḥ iti ceducyate । ubhayatrā <quote>‘pyupāsī-
teti’</quote> vidhiḥ śrūyate । na caikasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ pratipattṛbhedena vidhidvayaṃ sārthakyamaśnute । na
cā <quote>‘gnihotraṃ juhoti’</quote> <quote>‘dadhnā juhotī’</quote>ti vākyayorivaikatra dhātvarthavidhiranyatra tadanuvādena
guṇamātravidhirityatra vinigamakamasti । ekatra satyasaṃkalpatvakāmarūpatvamanojavasatvādi-
kamanyatreśānatvādikamityubhayatrāpyapunaruktaguṇaśravaṇāt । na ceśānatvādikaṃ satyasaṃkalpa-
tvāṃtargatameva । atassatyasaṃkalpatvasyāgnirahasye saṃkṣepeṇoktasya samāsoktasya vigrahavākye-
neva pratipattisaukaryāya <quote>‘sarvasyeśāna’</quote>ityādinā vivaraṇārthaṃ bṛhadāraṇyake'nuvādaḥ syāditi
vācyam । vikalpāsahatvāt । kimīśānatvādikaṃ satyasaṃkalpaviśeṣa ityucyate uta tadvyā-
pyamiti । nādyaḥ । īśānatvaṃ hi īśānaśaktimattvamīśanaśīlatvaṃ vā । tācchīlyavayovaca-
naśaktiṣu cānaśo vidhānāt । praśāsitṛtvamadhipatitvaṃ rakṣitṛtvam । pāterḍatipratyayavidhā-
nāt । rūḍhyā svāmitvarūpaṃ śeṣitvaṃ vā । na caite satyasaṃkalpatvāvāntaraviśeṣāḥ । na ca
sāmānyākārasya dhyeyatvavidhānena viśeṣākārāṇāmapi dhyeyatvamuktaṃ bhavati । yenātra tadvi-
varaṇamātraṃ syāt । etena dvitīyapakṣo'pi nirastaḥ । tadvyāpyatvamātreṇa tasya dhyeyatvā-
vidhānāt । dhyeyatvasiddhau kāmarūpatvādīnāmata eva tatsiddha‍yā punargrahaṇavaiyarthyāpatteśca ।
na ceśānatvādīnāṃ satyasaṃkalpatvaśabdārthatvābhāve'pi <quote>‘sarvasyeśāna’</quote> ityādestadvivaraṇarūpa-
tvātsatyasaṃkalpatvaśabdasya tadanusārādīśānatvādiṣu paryavasānaṃ syāt <quote>‘abhyaṃjanaṃ vāva
striyā anna’</quote>miti vivaraṇānusārādivānnaśabdasyābhyaṃjana iti vācyam । anyonyāśrayā-
patteḥ । na hyabhyañjanavākyasyānnaśabdavivaraṇarūpatvamiva īśānādivākyasya saṃkalpavivara-
ṇarūpatvaṃ sampratipannaṃ kiṃ tu samāsavyāsavākyavadarthaikyātkalpanīyaṃ, tattvasiddhameva । tasmā-
ddhinigamanāviraheṇobhayatra vidhānādabhyāsanyāyato vidyābhedo yuktaḥ । aviśeṣapunaḥśrava-
<pb n="316"/>
iti prāpte brūmaḥ---sarvatra manomayatvādike samāne ākāśātmetyasyākāśavat
svacchatāparatvena māhātmyaparatayā stāvakatvena vopapatteḥ vaśitvādeḥ satyasaṃka-
lpatvaviśeṣarūpatvena tadabhedācca vidyaikyam ।। iti samānādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ṇābhāve'pyabhyāsanyāyamūlasyānarthakyasya tulyatvāt । evaṃ cāvarjanīye sati vidyābhede
nā <quote>‘kāśātmāna’</quote> mityasyā <quote>‘kāśavatsarvagataśca nitya’</quote> iti śrutyaṃtaraprasiddha‍yanusārimahattvaparatvaṃ
tyaktavyamiti । tato'pi vidyābheda īśānatvāditaścetyabhyuccaya iti । siddhāntastu nobhayatra
vidyāvidhiḥ । vinigamanāvirahāsiddheḥ । yatra bhūyāṃso guṇāstatrāgnirahasye vidyāvidhiḥ
anyatra guṇavidhiriti vyavasthāyāṃ guṇabhūtastvasya vinigamakasya sattvāt । loke'pi hi
yatra chatracāmaradhvajagaturagādibāhulyaṃ tatra rājā anyatrāmātyādistadga‍uṇa ityavadhāryate ।
pūrvatantre'pi <quote>‘bhūyastvenobhayaśruti’</quote> rityadhikaraṇe darśito'yaṃ nyāyaḥ । evañcāgnirahasyavihita-
vidyānuvādenānekaguṇavidhāne vākyabhedaḥ syādatastatrāpi vidhirāśrayaṇīya iti śaṅkā tu
<quote>‘sarvatra prasiddhopadeśā’</quote>di<ref>(bra॰ 1-2-1)</ref>tyadhikaraṇe prapañcitenāvākyabhedopapādanaprakāreṇa samā-
dheyā । <quote>‘evamapi vidyābhedaḥ syāt yadi viruddhaguṇaśravaṇaṃ kiṃcitsyāt na caitadastī’</quote>ti
sūtrabhāṣyayordarśitam । abhedādityatra hetoraikyāditi nārthaḥ । <quote>‘ākāśātmāna’</quote>mityasya
kenacidaikyaṃ vaktuṃ pratiyogyabhāvāt tatraiva ca virodhaśaṃkonmeṣeṇa samādhānāpekṣaṇāt ।
kiṃtvavirodhādityarthaḥ । <quote>‘rājñāmaṃtarbhedo vartata’</quote>ityādivyavahāre bhedaśabdasya virodhārthaprasiddheḥ ।
bhāṣye <quote>‘satyasaṃkalpatvaviśeṣarūpatvene’</quote>tyatra viśeṣaśabdo na tadavāntarabhedatvaparaḥ । īśānatvā-
dīnāṃ satyasaṃkalpaviśeṣatvābhāvāt । tadviśeṣatve'pi tasya dhyeyatvoktyā teṣāṃ dhyeyatvasi-
ddha‍yabhāvācca । kiṃ tu viśeṣakatvaparaḥ । tataśca satyasaṃkalpopapādakatvaparatayā tadanuguṇatvā-
dityarthaḥ । bhāṣye bṛhadāraṇyakavākyodāharaṇe <quote>‘sarvasya vaśī’</quote>ti pāṭho'stīti cet na
śākhāntarapāṭhaḥ । kāṇvaśākhāyāṃ tu ṣaṣṭhādhyāyagatavidyāntara eva <quote>‘sarvasya vaśī sarvasyeśāna’</quote>
iti pāṭhaḥ । saptamādhyāye śāṇḍilyavidyāyāṃ nāsti <quote>‘sarvasya vaśī’</quote>ti viśeṣaṇam । yadyapi
chāṃndogye'pi śāṇḍilyavidyā śrūyate । tathāpyekaśākhāgatayoreva vākyayorudāharaṇamabhyāsa-
nyāyamūlo'tra pūrvapakṣa iti vibhāvayitumiti sarvamanavadyam । sūtrakṛtā caivaṃ śābdenābhyā-
sanyāyaparihāro darśitaḥ । yathā śākhābhede vidyaikyaṃ guṇopasaṃhāraśca । evaṃ śākhaikye'pi-
bhūyastvasya vinigamakasya sattvenābhyāsanyāyāpravṛtteriti tasya tātparyam । cakārastvabhe-
dāccetyevaṃsaṃbaṃdhenākāśātmatvādivirodhaparihārasamuccayārtha iti sarvamanavadyam ।</p>
<head>iti samānādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām atha samānādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। samāna evañcābhedāt ।। 19 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>sāmye'pi bahuguṇānāṃ vaśitāderbhedakatvavirahe'pi । mahadaṇutayorvirodhādbhinnā śāṇḍilyavidyā syāt ।। 231 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>svagatopādhigatābhyāmaviruddha te tato na vidyābhedaḥ । śākhaikye'pi vidhidvayabhedavidhau niyāmakasyābhāvāt ।। 232 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti samānādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<pb n="317"/>
atha saṃbaṃdhādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। saṃbandhādevamanyatrāpi ।। 20 ।।</sutra>
bṛhadāraṇyake <quote>‘ya eṣa etasmin maṇḍale puruṣo yaścāyaṃ dakṣiṇe'kṣan’</quote> ityupa-
kramya satyasya brahmaṇo vyāhṛtiśarīratvenādityamaṇḍale'kṣaṇi copāsyatvamuktvā
<quote>‘tasyopaniṣadahaḥ ityadhidaivataṃ’</quote> <quote>‘tasyopaniṣadaham ityadhyātmam’</quote> iti dve rahasya-
nāmanī āmnāyete । te ubhayatropasaṃhārye na vā ।।
iti saṃśaye satyupāsyaikyādvidyaikyam । ata ubhayatrāpi dve nāmanī iti
pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha saṃbaṃdhādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। saṃbandhādevamanyatrāpi ।। 20 ।।</pratika> aharahamityupaniṣadau rahasyanāmanī ubha-
yatrāpyaniyatavikalpena samuccayena vopasaṃhārye uta yathānirdeśaṃ vyavasthite iti nāmavidhā-
navākyaśrutayostasyetiśabdayoḥ kevalapuruṣaparāmārśitvasthānaviśeṣaviśiṣṭapuruṣaparāmarśi-
tvānyatarānavadhāraṇātsaṃśaye vyāhṛtiśarīratvaviśiṣṭabrahmarūpopāsyaikyādvidyaikye sati vidyai-
kyādubhayatropasaṃhārye iti pūrvapakṣaḥ । nanu <quote>‘tasyopaniṣadaha’</quote>riti <quote>‘tasyopaniṣadaha’</quote>miti ca</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha samānādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। samāna evaṃ cobhedāt ।। 19 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, vājasaneyakāśākhāyāmagnirahasye śāṇḍilyavidyāyāṃ <quote>‘sa ātmānamupāsīta manomayaṃ prāṇaśarīraṃ bhārūpa’</quote>
mityādi śrūyate । tatraiva bṛhadāraṇyake punaḥ saiva śrūyate---manomayo'yaṃ puruṣo bhāssatya’ miti । tatra kimanayorvidyayorbhedaḥ
utaikyamiti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । bheda iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, evaṃ ca</pratika>=yathā bhinnāsu vidyaikyaṃ guṇopasaṃhāraśca bhavati evaṃ
<pratika>samāne</pratika>=samānāyāmapi śākhāyāṃ bhavituṃ yuktam । kutaḥ । <pratika>abhedāt</pratika>=upāsyasya manomayodiguṇakasyobhayatrāpyabhedena pratya-
bhijñānāt । evaṃ ca ubhayatra śāṇḍilyavidyaikyamiti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate, tathā rāmānujamate</pratika> ca, viṣayavākyapūrvapakṣādikaṃ sarvaṃ prāyassamānameva । sūtrārthavarṇane paramasti ki-
yānbhedaḥ pūrvasmāt । itaradaviśiṣṭam । sūtrārtha evam---<pratika>samāne</pratika>=manomayatvādike samāne sati vidyaikyaṃ siddham । <pratika>evaṃ
cābhedāt</pratika>=vaśitvādiguṇenāpyabhedāt । vaśitvādessatyasaṃkalpatvaviśeṣarūpatvenābhedādvidyaikyaṃ siddhamiti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, uttarasūtreṇa saha sūtradvayātmakamidamadhikaraṇam । phalānusāri dhyānamityetadyuktaṃ na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> ।
vāṇībrahmaṇorhi muktau sthānaikyasya phalatāratamyasya ca sattvena phalaṃ samaviṣamam । viruddhatvāttayorupāsanaṃ tu samaviṣamaṃ na
saṃbhavati । tasmā <quote>‘ditare tvarthasāmarthyādi’</quote>tyatra kṛtaḥ phalānusāriguṇopāsananirṇayo'pyayukta iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>,
vāṇībrahmaṇoḥ phalaṃ samaviṣamamupāsanamapi samaviṣamameva । tathā hi---sarasijāsanastāvadasaṃkocena vedoktasamastaguṇakriyopetata-
yānantarūpaṃ harimupāste । sarasvatyapi sakalaguṇopetatayānantarūpaṃ harimupāsta eva । kriyāstu saṃkocayati yatassāmānyakri-
yopasaṃhārameva karoti na tu sarasijāsanavantrivikramatvādikadācidabhivyaktimatkriyopasaṃhāramapi karoti । kiṃ tu tāsāṃ-
nityavikrāntyādisāmānyakriyāsvantarbhāvameva । sarasvatyā nityaṃ pṛthakrivikramatvādyupāsanayogyatvābhāvāt । nanu brahmaṇo vā
kathaṃ nityaṃ tadupāsanayogyatā । upāsanakāle tadabhāvāt । avidyamānopāsanasyāyogāditi cet na, trivikramatvādīnāmapi
tādātmyena paramātmasaṃbandhitayā nityatvāt nityaṃ tasya tadupāsanopapatteriti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu</pratika>, evaṃ ca evamapi brahmaguṇānā-
malaukikatve'pi vāṇyāḥ samāne yogyaguṇaviṣaya evopasaṃhāraḥ na tvayogyakriyāsu । tatra tu <pratika>abhedāt</pratika>=abhedamapekṣya trivi-
kramatvādikādācitkakriyāstatsajātīyanityavikrāntyādiṣvantarbhāvyopasaṃhāro bhavedityarthaḥ । ato vāṇībrahmaṇoḥ phalatulyamu-
pāsanamityataḥ phalānusāriguṇopāsananirṇayo yukta iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। saṃbandhādevamanyatrāpi ।। 21 ।। hiraṇyagarbhasya tu anyatrāpi</pratika>=trivikramatvādikriyāviśeṣe'pi evaṃ sarvado-
pasaṃhāro yujyate । kutaḥ । <pratika>saṃbandhāt</pratika>=kriyāṇāṃ brahmaṇā tādātmyarūpasaṃbandhena nityatvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ samānādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<pb n="318"/>
<p>siddhānta ucyate—
<sutra>sū ।। na vā viśeṣāt ।। 21 ।।</sutra>
nātra vidyaikyam, ādityākṣisthānaviśeṣasaṃbandhitvenopasyabhedāt । ata-
statra niyate nāmanī ।। iti saṃbandhādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nirdeśabhedānnāmavyavasthā syāt । yathā <quote>‘rathantare prastūyamāne saṃmīlayet’</quote> <quote>‘bṛhati prastūyamāne
samudraṃ manasā dhyāye’</quote>diti nirdeśabhedāddharmavyavasthā । na hi tatrāpūrvīyatvalakṣaṇayā vrīhi-
dharmāṇāṃ yava iva bṛhadrathaṃtaradharmayoḥ parasparasāṃkaryamasti । viṣamo dṛṣṭāntaḥ । tatra rathanta-
rabṛhacchabdopātte sāmanī bhinne iti yuktā tatra nirdeśabhedāddharmavyavasthā । iha tu tasyeti
padadvayenāpyeka eva puruṣa upātta iti kathaṃ tasyaiva nāmadvayaṃ tatra saṃkīrṇaṃ na bhavet । nanu
<quote>‘agnarjyotirjyotissūryaḥ svāhe’</quote>ti sāyaṃ juhoti <quote>‘sūryo jyotirjyotiragniḥ svāheti prāta-
rjuhotī’</quote>ti nirdeśabhedānmaṃtravyavasthā dṛṣṭā । tathehāpi nāmavyavasthā syāti । ayamapi viṣamo
dṛṣṭāntaḥ । tatraikasyāpi homasya kālabhedenobhyasyamānasya tattatkālaviśeṣe maṃtravidhiriti
vyavasthā yujyate । nātra kiñcidviśeṣaṇamasti । nanvatrāpi sthānabhedo viśeṣaṇaṃ, naitadyujyate,
vastutaḥ sthānabhedasattve'pi nāmanirdeśakayostasyetipadayoḥ pradhānasatyabrahmarūpapuruṣamātra-
paratvena tanmātranāmatvāvagamāt । tamimaṃ pūrvapakṣamāha sūtrakāraḥ—<pratika><quote>‘saṃbaṃdhādevamanyatrāpī’</quote>ti</pratika> ।
yathā śāṃḍilyavidyāyāṃ śākhaikye'pyekavidyāsaṃbaṃdhātparasparaguṇopasaṃhāraḥ evaṃ satyavidyāyāma-
pītyarthaḥ । anenāsyādhikaraṇasya pūrvādhikaraṇena pratyudāharaṇasaṃgatirapi darśitā । <pratika>sū ।। na va
viśeṣāt ।। 21 ।।</pratika> yadyapi <quote>‘satyaṃ brahme’</quote>tyupakrāṃtamekameva satyaṃ brahma ādityamaṇḍale akṣaṇi
copāsyaṃ <quote>‘tadyatsatyamasau sa ādityo ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣo yaścāyaṃ dakṣiṇe'kṣa’</quote>nnityupa-
kramāttasyaivādityamaṇḍalasthasya <quote>‘ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣastasya bhūriti śira’</quote>ityādinā
<quote>‘bhūriti śiro'kṣaraṃ bhuva ityakṣare bāhū suvarityakṣare pādā’</quote>viti vyāhṛtiśarīratvamupadiśyā<quote>‘ha’</quote>
riti nāmopadiṣṭam । tasyaivākṣisthasya <quote>‘yo'yaṃ dakṣiṇe'kṣanpuruṣastasya bhūriti śira’</quote> ityādinā
tathaiva vyāhṛtiśarīratvamupadiśyāhamiti nāmopadiṣṭaṃ, tathāpi sthānātmakarūpabhedādāditye'kṣa-
ṇi ca naikā satyavidyā yathodgīthavidyā adhyasanīyahiraṇmayapuruṣaprāṇākāśādyātmakarūpabhe-
dāt । ato vidyābhedānnopasaṃhāraḥ । athāpyupasaṃhāraḥ śaṃkyeta yadi tasyetiśabdaḥ keva-
lasya brahmaṇaḥ parāmarśakaḥ syāt । sa tu sthānaviśeṣaviśiṣṭasya parāmarśakaḥ । tasmādeka-
syoktaṃ nāmānyasya na bhavati । evamatra tasyetiśabdasya sthānaviśeṣaviśiṣṭaparāmarśakatvā-
deva hi maṇḍalasthasyopadiṣṭaṃ vyāhṛtiśarīratvamakṣisthasya na bhavediti tasyāpi tatpṛthagupa-
diṣṭam । loke cā<quote>‘sīna ācārye tamitthamupāsīna’</quote> <quote>‘mārgaṃ gacchatyācārye tamitthamupāsīte’</quote>ti
vākyagatatatpadayoḥ prakṛtāsanagamanaviśiṣṭācāryaparāmarśakatvādevopāsanaviśeṣavyavasthā dṛśya-
te । tasmādiha nāstyupasaṃhāra iti ।। <pratika>iti saṃbaṃdhādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</pratika></p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha saṃbaṃdhādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। saṃbaṃdhādevamanyatrāpi ।। 20 ।। na vā viśeṣāt ।। 21 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>satyaṃ vyāhṛtirūpaṃ brahmopāsyaṃ vikartane'kṣaṇi ca । tadabhedāttannāmnoraharahamorna vyavasthā syāt ।। 233 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>brahmaṇa ekatve'pi sthānakṛto rūpabhedo'sti । tasmādvidyābhedādvyavasthite nābhanī bhavataḥ ।। 234 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti saṃbaṃdhādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<pb n="319"/>
atha maṇḍalavidyādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। darśayati ca ।। 22 ।।</sutra>
chāndogye taittirīye ca maṇḍalavidyā'mnātā । saikā bhinnā vā ।।
iti saṃśaye pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । ekatra <quote>‘ya eṣo'ntarāditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣo dṛśyate
hiraṇyaśmaśrurhiraṇyakeśa āpraṇasvāt sarva eva suvarṇaḥ’</quote> ityādi śrūyate । anyatra
<quote>‘ya eṣo'ntarāditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣaḥ’</quote> iti trayīmayamaṇḍalāntarvartipuruṣāntarvarti-
tayā hiraṇmayaṃ puruṣaṃ prastutya tasyopasaṃhāre <quote>‘sarvo vai rudra’</quote> ityārabhya <quote>‘namo hira-
ṇyavāhave hiraṇyapataye'mbikāpataya umāpataye namo namaḥ’</quote> ityantena sarvātmatvaṃ
hiraṇyabāhutvamumāpatitvaṃ cāmnāyate । tatraikatra sarvaṅgasuvarṇatvamanyatra bāhumātra-
suvarmatvamiti rūpabhedaḥ । ekatra <quote>‘sarvo vai rudraḥ’</quote> iti sarvātmatvaṃ anyatra <quote>‘sarveṣāṃ
lokānāmīṣṭe’</quote> iti sarvādhipatyamiti dharmabhedaḥ, tasmānna vidyaikyam ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha maṇḍalavidyādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<p>ekasyāpi vedyasya sthānabhedādvidyābheda uktaḥ sthānaikye tu na vidyābhedaḥ iti pratyudā-
haraṇasaṃgatyādhikaraṇāntaram---<pratika>sū॰ ।। darśayati ca ।। 22 ।।</pratika> rūpabhedābhedābhyāṃ vidyābhedā-
bhedasaṃśaye pūrvapakṣaḥ---ekatra sarvāvayavasuvarṇatvaṃ sarveśvaratvañcānyatra bāhumātrasuvarṇatvaṃ sarvā-
tmatvaṃ ceti rūpabhedādvidyābhedo yuktaḥ । rūpabhede sati sthānaikyamātrasya daharaśāṇḍilya-
vidyayorivaikyāprayojakatvāditi । siddhāntastu iha sthānaikyaṃ vidyaikye gamakameva । tadapavā-
dakasya rūpabhedasyābhāvāt । taittirīyake'pi <quote>‘hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣa’</quote> ityupakramānusāreṇopasaṃhāre
bāhugrahaṇasyopalakṣaṇatvātsarvātmatvasya sarvaśarīrakatvātmakatve tadeva sarveśvaratvamityabhedātsa-
rvopādānatvātmakatve tasya sarveśvaratvaniyatatvena tadanuguṇatayā virodhaśaṃkābhāvenopasaṃhārya-
tvāditi । nanu chāṃdogye maṇḍalavidyā udgīthe hiraṇmayadṛṣṭirūpā kratvaṃtargatā taittirīye sā
svātaṃtryeṇa hiraṇmayapuruṣānusaṃdhānarūpā tadanantargatā kathamanayoraikyaṃ pratipādyate । yadi
chāṃdogye'pyeṣā svatantrā syāttadā vidyaikyaṃ bhavedeva rūpaikyāditi kṛtvācintayā prati-
pādyate । kratupāratantryasvātantryābhyāṃ vidyābhede'pi maṇḍalāntarvarttiparameśvare tadga‍uṇavi-
grahāṇāmabhedapratyabhijñānādvidyādvaye'pi parasparānāmnātaguṇaviśeṣopasaṃhāraṃ vibhāvayitum ।
kathaṃ vidyābhede guṇopasaṃhāraḥ । vidyābhede'pyupāsanāsthānasya sthāninastadga‍uṇavigrahāṇāñcai-
kyapratyabhijñānāt । na hi daharaśāṃḍilyavidyayoriva guṇabhedena pratyabhijñāvicchedo'sti ।
sūtrakāro'pi svātantryapāratantryakṛtavidyābhedo na guṇānupasaṃhāraprayojaka iti vibhāyi-
tumeva chāṃdogyataittirīyāmnātapuruṣavidyayoḥ svātantryapāratantryakṛtabhede spaṣṭe satyapi guṇā-
bhedādaikyamāśaṃkya guṇabhedādbhedaṃ sādhayiṣyati । sūtasaṃhitāyāṃ cādityamaṇḍalāntavartinaḥ
parameśvarasya dhyānavidhānaṃ chāṃdogyāmnātaguṇopasaṃhāro'pi darśitaḥ---‘athavākāśamadhyasthe
<pb n="320"/>
iti prāpte brūmaḥ—na bhinnā vidyā । <quote>‘antarāditye’</quote> iti sthānaikyameva vidyaikyaṃ
darśayati । taittirīye <quote>‘hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣa’</quote> ityupakrameṇa bāhugrahaṇasyopalakṣaṇatvā-
dupasaṃhāre'pi sarvāṅgasuvarṇatvameva vivakṣitam । jagadīśvarasyāpi tanupraveśāt
tadātmatvaṃ yuktamiti nirūpitam । tasmādubhayatraikasya pratipādyatvādubhayatrāpyu-
māpatitvādikamupasaṃhāryam ।। iti maṇḍalavidyādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
bhrājamāne suśobhane । ādityamaṇḍale pūrṇe lakṣayojanavistṛte । sarvalokavidhātāramīśvaraṃ
himarūpiṇam । hiraṇyaśmaśrukeśaṃ ca hiraṇmayanakhaṃ tathā। kapyāsāṃbujavannetraṃ nīlagrīvaṃ
vilohitam । āgopālaprasiddha‍yarthamaṃbikārdhaśarīriṇam । so'hamityaniśaṃ dhyāyetsaṃdhyākā-
leṣu vā naraḥ ।’ iti । atra <quote>‘netra’</quote> mityantena chāṃdogyagataguṇopasaṃhārassūcitaḥ । tadupari-
pādadvayena <quote>‘asau yo'vasarpatī’</quote>ti mantrārthopasaṃhāraḥ । antimapādena taittirīyopaniṣadartho-
pasaṃhāraḥ । vāyusaṃhitāyāmapi—<quote>‘sarvo rudro namastasmai puruṣassatparo mahān । hiraṇyabāhurbhagavān
hiraṇyapatirīśvaraḥ । aṃbikāpatirīśānaḥ pinākī vṛṣavāhanaḥ ।’</quote> ityārabhya <quote>‘hiraṇyakeśaḥ
padmākṣo hyaruṇastāmra eva ca । yo'yaṃ sarpatyasau devo nīlagrīvo vilohita’</quote> ityaṃtenādi-
tyamaṇḍalāntarvartini parameśvare prāgudāhṛtaśrutitrayārthopasaṃhāro darśitaḥ । tasmādyuktameta-
dga‍uṇopasaṃhārasiddha‍yarthaṃ kṛtvācintayā vidyaikyaprasādhanamiti sūtre cakāraḥ sthānaikyaṃ vidyā-
bhinnāṃ darśayati parasparānāmnātaguṇajātaṃ copasaṃhāryaṃ darśayatīti samuccayārthaḥ । vidyaikye
sati tatphalasyopasaṃhārasya tatassiddhisaṃbhave'pi vidyaikyasādhakātsthānādyaikyādeva tatsi-
ddhipradarśanaṃ kṛtvācintayāpi sisādhayiṣitasya vidyaikyasya vastutassiddha‍yabhāve'pi guṇo-
pasaṃhārasiddhirapratyūheti sūcanārthamiti sarvaṃ samañjasam । <pratika>iti maṇḍalavidyādhikaraṇam।।12।।</pratika></p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām atha maṇḍalavidyādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। daśaryati ca ।। 22 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>sarvāṃgabāhumātragasuvarṇatā rūpabhedena । chāṃdogyataittarīyagamaṇḍalavidyāvibhedaḥ syāt ।। 235 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>darśayati sthānaikyaṃ sarvātmakatvaṃ ca vidyaikyam । bāhugrahaṇaṃ tvekaṃ sarvāvayavopalakṣaṇaṃ yuktam ।। 236 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>aikyamiha vidyayoḥ kathamekā hyaṃgāśritā svataṃtrānyā । satyaṃ tanna vivakṣitamubhayo rūpaikyamātramiha sādhyam ।। 237 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>yaḥ khalu savitari śaṃbhośchaṃdogairdivyavigraho'dhītaḥ । yājuṣikairapi saiva sthānaikyāderna tatra bheda iti ।। 238 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti maṇḍalavidyādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<sutra>sū ।। saṃbandhādevamanyatrāpi ।। 20 ।। na vā viśeṣāt ।। 21 ।। darśayati ca ।। 22 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, bṛhadāraṇyake satyavidyāyāmādhidaivikapuruṣasyādityasya <quote>‘aha’</quote> rityetannāma dhyānāyopadiṣṭam ādhyātmi-
kasya tvakṣipuruṣasya <quote>‘aha’</quote> mityetannāmeti । tatra kimasyāṃ satyavidyāyāṃ nāmnorvyavasthayā dhyānaṃ kartavyamuta nāmadvayasya pratisthānaṃ
dhyānamiti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । yathā śāṇḍilyavidyāyāmekaśākhāyāṃ vibhāgenādhītāyāmekavidyātvasaṃbandhādanyonyaṃ guṇopasaṃhāraḥ pūrva-
muktaḥ evamanyatrāpi satyavidyāyāṃ bhavituṃ yuktam ekavidyātvasaṃbandhāditi <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, sū ।। na vā viśe-
ṣāt ।। 21 ।। na vā</pratika>=naivobhayorubhayatropasaṃhāraḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>viśeṣāt</pratika>=tasyāhariti tasyāhamiti cāyatanavyapāśrayeṇaivo-
paniṣadorviśeṣopadeśāt ।।</p>
<p>kiṃ ca <pratika>sū ।। darśayati ca ।। 22।।</pratika> vidyāntare <quote>‘hiraṇyaśmaśru’</quote> rityādinā ādityapuruṣasya rūpamuktvā tadrūpamakṣipuruṣe-
'tidiśati---<quote>‘tasyaitasya tadeva rūpaṃ yadamuṣya rūpamiti’</quote> । so'yamatideśo vidyāsthale sthānabhedānnopasaṃhāra iti darśayati ।
itarathāyamatideśo nirarthaka eva syāt ato nāmnorvyavastheti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, idamadhikaraṇaṃ sūtradvayātmakaṃ <quote>‘darśayatice’</quote>ti sūtraṃ tvadhikaraṇāntaramiti bhedaḥ । atra saṃbandhādhikaraṇe viṣa-
yavākyapūrvapakṣādikamaviśiṣṭaṃ pūrvasmāt । ubhayatrobhe nāmanī vidyaikyādaniyate iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । sthānabhedāśrayeṇopāsyabhe-
dādvidyaikyābhāvānniyate nāmanī iti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ</pratika> । ato'viśiṣṭameva pūrvasmāt ।।</p>
<head>iti śrīkaṇṭhamate saṃbandhādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<pb n="321"/>
atha saṃbhṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।
saṃbhṛtidyuvyāptyapi cātaḥ।। 23 ।।
rāṇāyaṇīyānāṃ khileṣu śrūyate । <quote>‘brahma jyeṣṭhā vīryā saṃbhṛtāni । brahmāgre jyeṣṭhaṃ
divamātatān । ṛtasya brahma prathamota jajñe । tenārhati brahmaṇā sphardhituṃkaḥ’</quote> iti ।
yāni loke tripuradahanakālakūṭakabalanādīni, tāni niratiśayāni jyeṣṭhānyana-
nyasukarāṇi śrīkaṇṭhamūrtyādibhiḥ saṃbhṛtāni paraṃ brahma ātatāna saṃpāditavat,
jyeṣṭhaṃ hariharahiraṇyagarbhādibhyo'pyutkṛṣṭaṃ brahmeti । agre teṣāmapi sṛṣṭeḥ prāgdivaṃ
paramākāśapadamātatāna vyāpyādhyāsteti । teṣāṃ mahatāṃ vīryāṇāṃ saṃbhṛtirdyuvyāptiśca
sarvāsu paravidyāsūpasaṃhāryā na vā ।।
iti saṃśaye brahmaguṇatvāviśeṣādanārabhyādhītatvācca sarvāsu paravidyāsūpasaṃhāryā ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha saṃbhṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</head>
<p>vidyaikyabhedau cānapekṣya svataṃtropasaṃhārānupasaṃhāranirūpaṇaprasaṃgādidamadhikaraṇāntaram---
<pratika>sū॰ ।। saṃbhṛtidyuvyāptyapi cātaḥ ।। 23 ।।</pratika> vedānteṣvakriyāśeṣasya brahmaguṇavibhūtivarṇa-
nasya tadupāsanaikaphalatvādanārabhya tadāmnānasyāpi tattatprakaraṇaśrutopāsanārthatve saṃbhavati
tatra tatropāsanāntaravidhikalpanāgauravāyogācca tattatprakaraṇaśrutopāsanāsu saṃbhṛtyāderupasaṃ-
hāre kartavye kiṃ sarvāsupāsanāsūpasaṃhāraḥ uta kāsucideveti saṃśaye viśeṣābhāvātsarvāsūpasaṃ-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha maṇḍalavidyādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। darśayati ca ।। 22 ।।</pratika> chāndogye taittirīyake ca maṇḍalavidyāmnātā । saikā bhinnā veti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । ekatra <quote>‘ya eṣo-
'ntarāditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣo dṛśyate hiraṇyaśmaśrurhiraṇyakeśa āpraṇakhātsarva eva suvarṇaḥ’</quote> ityādi śrūyate । anyatra <quote>‘ya eṣo'-
ntarāditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣaḥ’</quote> iti trayīmayamaṇḍalāntarvartitayā hiraṇmayaṃ puruṣaṃ prastutya tasyopasaṃhāre <quote>‘sarvo vai rudra’</quote> ityārabhya-
<quote>‘namo hiraṇyabāhave hiraṇyapataye'mbikāpataya umāpataye namo namaḥ’</quote> iti sarvātmatvaṃ hiraṇyabāhutvamumāpatitvaṃ cāmnāyate । tatra
sarvāṃgasuvarṇatvabāhumātrasuvarṇatvādirūpabhedāt sarvātmatvasarvādhipatitvādidharmabhedācca na vidyaikyamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhā-
ntastu</pratika>, na bhinnā vidyā । <quote>‘antarāditye’</quote> iti sthānaikyameva vidyaikyaṃ darśayati । <quote>‘hiraṇyabāhave’</quote>ityatra bāhugrahaṇasyopalakṣaṇatvena
tatrāpi sarvāṅgasuvarṇatvasyaiva vivakṣitatvāt jagadīśvarasyāpi tadanupraveśena sarvātmatvasya yuktatvācca ubhayatraikasyaiva pratipādyatveno-
bhayatrāpyumāpatitvādikamupasaṃhāryamiti ।। <pratika>iti śrīkaṇṭhamate maṇḍalavidyādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> tu idamadhikaraṇaṃ sūtratrayātmakameva । viṣayavākyapūrvapakṣādikaṃ sarvamaviśiṣṭameva śāṃkaramatāt । asminmate
prāyaḥ śrīkaṇṭhamatānuyāyitve'pi asminnadhikaraṇe paramadhikaraṇaracanādikaṃ sarvamanukaroti śāṃkaramatameveti viśeṣo'vadheyaḥ ।
śrīkaṇṭhamate <quote>‘darśayatice’</quote> tyadhikaraṇāntararacanāyāḥ śivaparatvenāsya matasyātidavīyastvāt śāṃkaramataprakriyaivātrānusṛteti vedyam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, ādyasūtrasya pūrvādhikaraṇe'ntarbhāvāttatraiva tadvyākhyātam । <pratika>sū ।। na vāviśeṣāt ।।</pratika> pūrva <quote>‘mātmetye-
vopāsī te’</quote> tyatrātmaśabdasya brahmāṇaṃ prati sakalaguṇābhidhāyakatvamanyātprati katipayaguṇābhidhāyakatvaṃ coktam । tanna yujyate ।
pramāṇābhāvāt । kiṃ tu brahmāṇaṃ prati sakalaguṇābhidhāyakatvameva yujyate anyatra yujyate iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>
nāstyaviśeṣeṇa sarvānprati sarvaguṇābhidhāyakatvam । nāpyaniyataguṇābhidhāyakatvam । kiṃtvadhikāriviśeṣeṇa tattadyogyaguṇābhi-
dhāyakatvameva । ato yasya yāvanto guṇā ātmaśabdena yugapatpratīyante tasya tāvanta upāsyā iti nirṇayopapattiḥ । <pratika>sūtrā-
rthastu, navā</pratika>=<quote>‘ātme’</quote>ti vākyasyātmaśabdena sarvaguṇānāṃ grahaṇaṃ na vābhyupagamyate । kutaḥ । <pratika>viśeṣāt</pratika>=adhikāriyo-
gyatāviśeṣamapekṣya tasya tadyogyaguṇābhidhāyakatvāt ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। darśayati ca ।। 23 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘sarvānguṇānātmaśabda’</quote> iti bhāllaveyaśrutiḥ svoktārthaṃ pratipādayatītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ saṃbandhādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<pb n="322"/>
<p>iti prāpte'bhidhīyate—na sarvāsūpasaṃhāryā vyāptiḥ । sāmarthyādalpasthānavyati-
rikteṣūpasaṃhāryā । <quote>‘devā ha vai svargaṃ lokamagamaṃste devā rudramapṛcchan ko bhavāniti’</quote>
iti niratiśayasukhāspadatayā svargaśabdavācyaṃ brahmādipadebhyo'pi mahattaraṃ mahā-
sthānaṃ hi śrūyate । tataḥ svalpasthānavyatirikteṣu vaiśvānarādyupāsaneṣu dyuvyāpti-
rupasaṃhāryeti । tatsahacārānmahāvīryasaṃbhṛtirapi tatraivopasaṃhāryā ।।</p>
<head>iti saṃbhṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p>hāraḥ । na cālpasthānāsu daharaśāṇḍilyādividyāsu dyuvyāptirupasaṃhartumaśakyeti tatsāhaca-
ryātsaṃbhṛtyādikamapi tāsu vopasaṃhāryamiti vācyam । daharādividyāsvapi <quote>‘yāvānvā ayamā-
kāśo jyāyāndiva’</quote> ityādiśravaṇena tadvaddayuvyāpterapyupasaṃhārasaṃbhavāditi pūrvapakṣaḥ । vastu-
sāmarthyarūpādviśeṣādalpasthānavyatiriktāsviva vaiśvānaropāsanādiṣūpasaṃhāryā । <quote>‘yāvānvā’</quote>
ityādikamupāsyamahimakhyāpanārthaṃ nopāsyaguṇasamarpaṇārthamiti na virodhaḥ । <quote>‘satyaṃ jñāna-
mananta’</quote> mityatra sattājñānayoreva brahmasvarūpapratītyanusaṃbaṃdhitvena sarvavidyāsūpasaṃhāraḥ na tu-
trividhaparicchedarāhityarūpasyānantatvasyāpīti na virodha iti siddhāntaḥ । bhāṣyakṛtavyā-
khyānānusāreṇa viṣayavākye <quote>‘saṃbhṛtānī’</quote>tyasya śrīkaṇṭhādibhiriti kartradhyāhāro ‘brahmo
tyasyā <quote>‘tatāne’</quote> tyagrimakriyāpekṣaṇaṃ ca draṣṭavyam । sūtre <quote>‘saṃbhṛtidyuvyāpti’</quote>iti samāhāradvaṃdvaḥ ।
alpasthānavyatiriktopāsaneṣvityadhyāhāraḥ । upasaṃhāryamiti pūrvādhikaraṇasūtre caśabda
sāmarthyalabdhasyānuṣaṃgaḥ । ata ityanena vyavahitasūtropāttasya <quote>‘viśeṣā’</quote>dityasya parāmarśaḥ ।
vastusāmarthyarūpādviśeṣādityarthaḥ । <pratika>iti saṃbhṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</pratika></p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām atha saṃbhṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। saṃbhṛtidyuvyāptyapi cātaḥ ।। 23 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>saṃbhṛtyādiguṇaughaḥ prakaraṇapāṭhasya vaidhuryāt । aviśeṣātsarvāsvapi paravidyāsūpasaṃhāryaḥ ।। 239 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>dyuvyāpteraghaṭanamastyalpasthānāsu vidyāsu । tatsahapaṭhanātsaṃbhṛtyādyā api tāsu nopasaṃhāryāḥ ।। 240 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti saṃbhṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha saṃbhṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। saṃbhṛtidyuvyāptyapi cātaḥ ।। 23 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, rāṇāyaṇīyānāṃ khileṣu paṭhyate---<quote>‘brahma jyeṣṭhā vīryā saṃbhṛtāni । brahmāgre jyeṣṭhaṃ divamātatāna’</quote> iti ।
tatra śrūyamāṇaṃ saṃbhṛtidyuvyāptyādikaṃ tadīyopaniṣadvihitaśāṇḍilyādibrahmavidyāsūpasaṃhartavyaṃ na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । upasaṃhartavya-
miti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, vīryasamṛddhidyulokavyāptyādikaṃ nopasaṃhṛrtavyam । kutaḥ । <pratika>ataśca</pratika>=nāmnoriva vyavasthāpa-
kasthānaviśeṣādeva । atassaṃbhṛtyādiguṇaviśiṣṭamupāsanāntaraṃ tatra vidheyamiti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika> tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> ca prāyo nāsti viśeṣaḥ pūrvasmādviṣayavākyādiṣu । tatrāpi saṃbhṛtidyuvyāptyādīnāṃ
kiṃ sarvāsu vidyāsūpasaṃhāraḥ uta sthānaviśeṣopāsaneṣu niyama iti <pratika>saṃśaye</pratika> anārabhyādhītatvātteṣāṃ sarvāsūpasaṃhāra iti pūrva-
pakṣamudbhāvya dyuvyāptisāmarthyāttasya hṛdayādyalpasthāneṣūpasaṃhārāyogāttatsāhacaryāccetareṣāmalpasthānavihitāsu vidyāsu nopasaṃ-
hāra iti siddhāntitatvādasti kiṃcidiva vailakṣaṇyaṃ siddhāntasvarūpe । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, saṃbhṛtidyuvyāptyapi</pratika>=samāhāradvandvaikava-
dbhāvaḥ । saṃbhṛtiprabhṛti guṇajātamapi <pratika>ata eva</pratika>=sthānaviśeṣasaṃbandhaniyamānniyataṃ na sarvatropasaṃhartavyamiti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika> pūrvamānandādiguṇacatuṣṭayameva sarvamumukṣūpāsyamityuktaṃ na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । saṃbhṛtidyuvyāptyoḥ <quote>‘ukṣā sa
dyāvapṛthivī’</quote>ti śrutayossakalamumukṣūpāsyatvātsarvāpekṣitatvena phalanusāryupāsanasya kartavyatvānmokṣe tayossattvācca na yuktaṃ
guṇacatuṣṭayopāsanaṃ mumukṣūṇāmiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, na saṃbhṛtidyuvyāptī sarvopāsye kiṃ tu devādyupāsye eva ।
yogyatāyāṃ viśeṣasadbhāvāt । yogyatvābhāve ca phalāpekṣā nopāsanaprayojikā, anarthaprāptiprasaṃgāt । iti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu</pratika>,
apipadena nañaḥ samākarṣaḥ । caśabda evārthe । <pratika>saṃbhṛtidyuvyāpti</pratika>=samyagbharaṇaprakāśavyāptī na sarvopāsye । kiṃ tu devādyu-
pāsye eva । kutaḥ । <pratika>ata eva</pratika>=adhikāriyogyatāyāṃ viśeṣasadbhāvata eva । iti ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyā saṃbhṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<pb n="323"/>
atha puruṣavidyādhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। puruṣavidyāyāmapi cetareṣāmanāmnānāt ।। 24 ।।</sutra>
chāndogyataittirīyakayoḥ puruṣavidyā'mnātā । <quote>‘puruṣo vāva yajñastasya yāni
caturviṃśativarṣāṇi tat prātaḥsavanam’</quote> ityādirekatra । <quote>‘tasyaivaṃ viduṣo yajñasyātmā
yajamānaḥ śraddhā patnī śarīramidhmamuro vediḥ’</quote> ityādiranyatra । sobhayatrābhinnā
bhinnā veti saṃśayaḥ ।।
ubhayatra puruṣavidyeti nāmābhedādyajñāvayavakalpanāsāmyācca abhinnā ।।
iti prāpte'bhidhīyate---taittirīye samāmnātānāṃ yajamānapatnyādīnāṃ yajñāvaya-
vānāṃ savanatrayādīnāṃ ca chāndogye'nāmnānāt, tatrānyathaiva savanatrayādikalpa-
nācca bhinnaivobhayatra puruṣavidyā । taittirīyake hi <quote>‘yat sāyaṃ prātarmadhyandinaṃ ca
tāni savanāni’</quote> iti savanatrayakalpanam । chāndogye puruṣāyuṣaṃ tredhā vibhajya
