<head>atha puruṣavidyādhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।</head>
<p>deśabhedasaṃbandhividyāsu guṇānupasaṃhāranirūpaṇaprasaṅgena caturviṃśativarṣādikālabhedasaṃba-
ndhividyāyāṃ guṇānupasaṃhāraṃ darśayatimadhikaraṇāntaram---<pratika>sū ।। puruṣavidyāyāmapi cetare-
ṣāmanāmnānāt ।। 24 ।।</pratika> chāndogye puruṣasya yajñatvakalpanāmupakramya yajñāvayavāssampāditāḥ
ṣoḍaśottaravarṣaśatamite puruṣāyuṣe caturviṃśatirvarṣāṇi prātassavanaṃ catuścatvāriṃśadbarṣāṇi mā-
dhyandinaṃ savanamaṣṭācatvāriṃśadvarṣāṇi tṛtīyasavanaṃ yadaśiśiṣati pipāsati na ramate tā
dīkṣāḥ yadaśrāti pibati ramate tā upasadaḥ yadvasati bhakṣayati mithunībhavati tāni
stutaśastrāṇi yattapo dānamārjavamahiṃsā satyavacanaṃ tā dakṣiṇāḥ yanmaraṇaṃ tadavabhṛtha iti
tattatsavanatayā vibhakte vayasi rogādiprādurbhāve sati sa brūyāt <quote>‘prāṇā vasava idaṃ me prāta-
ssavanaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanamanusaṃtanute’</quote>tyādavastannivṛttaye japtavyā mantrā vihitāḥ । <quote>‘praha
ṣoḍaśaṃ varṣaśataṃ jīvati’</quote>tyāyuḥprāptirasyāḥ puruṣavidyāyāḥ phalamuktam । imāṃ vidyāmāṅgi-
raso'ghoranāmā ṛṣiḥ kṛṣṇāya devakīputrāyopadideśa sa imāṃ vidyāṃ labdhvā vidyāntaravi-
tṛṣṇa evaitadvidyāniṣṭho babhūveti vidyāpraśaṃsā ca kṛtā । taittirīyake tu vidvatsaṃbandhiyajñā-
nuvādena yajñāvayavāssampāditāḥ na tu viduṣo yajñatvakalpanamupakrāntam । vidvānyajña
ātmā yajamāna iti tādarthyena pṛthagvāvākyāntarābhāvāt । vidvatsambandhinaḥ kasyacidyajñasya
prāganuktatve'pi vakṣyamāṇāmātmādiṣu yajamānādikalpanāmālocya tadarthasamūhasya yajñatvena
prakaraṇalabdhena vidvatsaṃbandhitvena cānuvādataḥ pratītaikavākyatānirvāhopapatteśca । yajñāva-
yavāḥ---svātmā yajamānaḥ śraddhā patnī śarīramidhmamuro vedirlomāni barhirvedaśśikhā hṛdayaṃ
yūpaḥ kāma ājyaṃ manyuḥ paśustapo'gnirdamaśśamayitā dakṣiṇā vāgghotā prāṇa udgātā cakṣu-
radhvaryurmano brahmā śrotramagnīdyāvādhdriyate sā dīkṣā yadaśnāti taddhaviryatpibati tadasya so-
mapānaṃ yadramate tadupasado yatsañcaratyupaviśatyuttiṣṭhate ca sa pravargyo yanmukhaṃ tadāhavanīyo yā
vyāhṛtirāhutiryadasya vijñānaṃ tajjuhoti yatsāyaṃ prātaratti tatsamidho yatprātarmadhyandinam̐
sāyaṃ ca tāni savanāni ye ahorātre te darśapūrṇamāsau ye 'rdhamāsāśca māsāśca te cāturmā-
<pb n="324"/>
savanatrayakalpanam । taittirīye phalāśravaṇāt <quote>‘brahmaṇe tvā mahasa omityātmānaṃ
yuñjīta’</quote> iti brahmavidyāmabhidhāya <quote>‘brahmaṇo mahimānamāpnoti’</quote> iti tatphalaṃ cā-
bhidhāya <quote>‘tasyaivaṃ viduṣaḥ’</quote> ityādinā''mnātā puruṣavidyā prastutabrahmavidyāṅgamiti

tataḥ phalabhedādavayavabhedācca na vidyaikyamiti ।।
iti puruṣavidyādhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।

syāni ya ṛtavaste paśubandhā ye saṃvatsarāśca parivatsarāśca te'hargaṇāssarvavedasaṃ vā eta-
tsatraṃ yanmaraṇaṃ tadavabhṛtha’ iti । idaṃ tu <quote>‘brahmaṇo mahimānamāpnotī’</quote>ti pūrvaprastutabrahmavi-
dyāsaṃbandhyevānūdītam । śamayitā bhojyānāṃ saṃskartā । sarvavedasaṃ dakṣiṇeti bhaṭṭabhāskareṇa
vyākhyātam । itthaṃ puruṣavidyādvaye savanatrayādikalpanaṃ phalaṃ cetyetatsarvamapi paraspara-
vilakṣaṇamiti spaṣṭameva । evamāmnāyapāṭhādeva spaṣṭabhede yathaikasyāṃ puruṣavidyāyāṃ savanatra-
yādikalpanaṃ phalaṃ cāmnāyate na tathānyatrāmnāyata ityevaṃ sūtrakṛtā vyutpādanīyam । nātra
kiṃcidasti । yathākathaṃcitsavanatrayādikalpanaṃ yatkiṃcitphalaśravaṇaṃ cāstītyetāvatā vidyai-
kyaśaṅkā tu sarvatrātiprasaktā । sarvāsvapi hi vidyāsu yatkiṃcidrūpaviśiṣṭaṃ yatkiṃcidupāsyaṃ
yatkiṃcitphalaṃ cāstyeva । nirākṛtā ca yathākathaṃcitsāmyāvalambanānāmaikyāvalambanā ca
vidyaikyaśaṅkā <quote>‘anyathātvaṃ ca śabdāditi ce’</quote>dityadhikaraṇe । tatra bahusāmye satyapyekatro-
dgīthāvayavatve prāṇadṛṣṭiranyatra kṛtsnodgīthe tadudgānakartari vetyetāvanmātravaiṣamyeṇa vidyābheda
uktaḥ । iha savanatrayakalpanādessarvasyāpi vaiṣamye kathaṃ tata eva vidyābhedo na siddhyet ।
na ca sarvasyāpi vailakṣaṇye maraṇāvabhṛthatvamātramabhedasādhakaṃ tasmānniṣprayojanamidamadhika-
raṇamiti cet uktamasya prayojanaṃ maṇḍalavidyādhikaraṇe <quote>‘puruṣavidyayoḥ phalavailakṣaṇyaṃ rūpa-
vailakṣaṇyaṃ ca parasparaguṇānupasaṃhāraprayojakaṃ na svātantryapāratantryavailakṣaṇyamiti vibhājana-
masya prayojana’</quote>miti tadevānusaṃdheyam । <quote>‘taittirīyake phalāśravaṇā’</quote>diti bhāṣyasyāgrimasādhye
hetunirdeśakasya pradhānabhūtabrahmavidyāphalavyatirekeṇa phalāntarāśravaṇādityarthaḥ । anyathā pū-
rvānuvākānte brahmavidyāphalatvena śrutāyā brahmamahimāvāpte <quote>‘stasyaivaṃ viduṣa’</quote> ityādyanuvākā-
nte'pi śrutatvena phalāśravaṇahetorasiddhiprasaṅgāt । na cobhayatrāpi <quote>‘brahmaṇo mahimānamāpno-
tī’</quote>ti phalaśravaṇena pūrvottarānuvākavihitayorbrahmavidyāpuruṣavidyayossamaprādhānyaṃ śaṅkanī-
yam । <quote>‘tasyaivaṃ viduṣa’</quote> ityādinā prāguktabrahmavidyāvataḥ puruṣavidyāvidhānenopakrama eva ta-
syāstadaṅgatvāvagamāt । <quote>‘somāpauṣṇaṃ traitamālabheta paśukāma’</quote> iti śrutasya pradhānaphalasya
tadaṅge yūpodumbaratvaivātrāpi pradhānaphalasyāṅge'nuvādopapatteśca । suryācandramaḥprāptipūrvaka-
tvaviśeṣapratipādanārthatvenānuvādasāphalyopapatteśca ।। <pratika>iti puruṣavidyādhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।</pratika></p>

atha vedhādyadhikaraṇam ।। 15 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। vedhādyarthabhedāt ।। 25 ।।</sutra>
taittirīyāṇāmupaniṣadupakrame śrutau <quote>‘śaṃ no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘saha nāvavatu’</quote>
iti mantrau vidyāṅgabhūtau na vā ।।
iti saṃśaye vidyāsannidhivaśādvidyāṅgabhūtāviti prāpte ucyate---yathā ātha-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha vedhādyadhikaraṇam ।। 15 ।।</head>
<p>atha taittirīyake brahmavidyāprakaraṇapāṭhāt <quote>‘tasyaivaṃ tiduṣo yajamānasye’</quote>ti vidyāsamabhi-
vyāhārarūpādvākyācca puruṣavidyāyā iva <quote>‘śaṃ no mitra’</quote> ityādimantrayorbrahmavidyāsannidhi-
pāṭhādvidyāviṣayabrahmaprakāśanasāmarthyarūpaliṅgācca brahmavidyāṅgatvaṃ syāditi śaṅkānirākara-
ṇārthamadhikaraṇāntaram---<pratika>sū॰ ।। vedhādyarthabhedāt ।। 25 ।।</pratika> ayamatra pūrvapakṣābhiprāyaḥ ।
<quote>‘vadiṣyāmi adhitamastvi’</quote>tyadhyayanaprakāśanasāmarthyarūpālliṅgādadhyayana iva vidyāsannidhi-
pāṭharūpātsthānapramāṇādagre vidhāsyamānāsu vidyāsvapi viniyogaḥ syāt । kvacidviniyu-
ktānāṃ mantrāṇāmanyatrāpi viniyogasya bahulamupalambhena virodhābhāvāt । virodhābhāve ca
prabalaviniyuktasya durbalenāpi viniyogasaṃbhavāt । vidyāsu viniyogābhāve tatsannidhyā-
mnānasyānarthakyaprasaṅgenātra sthānasya liṅgena samānabalātvācca । ataeva <quote>‘athāto'gnimagni-
ṣṭomenānuyajantī’</quote>ti vākyaviniyuktāgnyavaruddhe'pi kratāvuttaravedyāḥ kratuprakaraṇāmnānavaiyarthya-
parihārāya tasyā api kratvaṅgatvamāśritam । asti ca sannidhyanuguṇaṃ liṅgamapi vidyāsaṃba-
ndhibrahmaprakāśanasāmarthyarūpam । tasmādudāhṛtamantrayorvidyāsvapi viniyoga iti । siddhāntā-
bhiprāyastvayam---sākṣādadhyayanaprakāśanasāmarthyarūpāliṅgādviniyojakaśrutimātrakalpanayā
śīghramadhyayanaviniyoge sati tata eva mantrayornerākāṅkṣyātsannidhānena svasvaprakaraṇāmnātā-
ṅgairnirākāṅakṣāṇāmapi vidyānāmākāṅkṣāmutthāpya tayā mantryorvidyābhirekavākyatāṃ parika-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha puruṣavidyādhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। puruṣavidyāyāmiva cetareṣāmanāmnānāt ।। 24 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, atra paiṅgirahasye <quote>‘puruṣo vāva yajña’</quote> iti puruṣavidyā śrūyate । tatrāśīrmantraprayogādayo dharmāśca śrū-
yante । taittirīye'pi <quote>‘tasyaivaṃ viduṣo yajñasyātmā’</quote> ityādi । tatra paiṅgirahasyoktāḥ puruṣayajñadharmāstaittirīyake'pyupasaṃhāryā vā
na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । upasaṃhāryā iti <pratika>pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, puruṣavidyāyāmiva</pratika>=yathā paiṅgināṃ puruṣavidyāyāṃ
puruṣo yajñatvena kalpitaḥ tadīyamāyustredhā vibhajya savanatvena kalpitam, aśiśiṣādīni ca dīkṣādibhāvena kalpitāni,
tathā <pratika>itareṣāṃ</pratika>=taittirīyakāṇāṃ puruṣavidyāyāṃ savanatvādīnāmanāmnānāt । teṣāṃ hi puruṣavidyāyāṃ puruṣasaṃbandhiyajño'nu-
krāntaḥ । ato vidyaikyābhāvānnopasaṃhartavyā iti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> ca pūrvavadeva saṃdehapūrvapakṣādikaṃ prāyassarvamaviśiṣṭameveti nātra pṛthagvistaraḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, pūrvokto guṇopasaṃhāraḥ kartavyo vā uta na kartavyaḥ । iti <pratika>saṃśaye</pratika> bahvalpaguṇopāsanayogyādhikā-
riṇāṃ bahvalpaguṇavidhāyakavidyāviśeṣaparigraheṇābhimatārthasiddhernirarthako guṇopasaṃhāra iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, kvaci-
dapi vidyāyāṃ sarvaguṇānāmanuktatvātsarvavidyottamāyāṃ puruṣasūktavidyāyāmapi keṣāṃcidevoktatvādanyeṣāṃ ca guṇānāmanāmnā-
nācca sarvaguṇopāsakairbrahmādibhiravaśyaṃ kartavya eva sarvavidyāguṇopasaṃhāraḥ । anyairapi svasvāpekṣitaphalalābhāya ekasyāmeva
vidyāyāṃ svāpekṣitasarvaguṇoktiniyamābhāvādga‍uṇopasaṃhāraḥ kartavya eveti ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ puruṣavidyādhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।</head>
<pb n="326"/>
rvaṇikānāmupaniṣadārambhe paṭhitaḥ <quote>‘śukraṃ pravidhya hṛdayaṃ pravidhya’</quote> ityādimantro hṛ-
dayavedhādiprakāśanasāmarthyarūpālliṅgādabhicāraśeṣaḥ । yathā vā aitareyiṇāṃ vā-
jasaneyināṃ copaniṣadārambhe paṭhitaṃ mahāvrataṃ pravargyarūpaṃ ca karma śrutyādiviniyo-
gāt kratuśeṣaḥ । tathemāvapi mantrau <quote>‘ṛtaṃ vadiṣyāmi . . . tejasvināvadhītamastu’</quote>
ityādiliṅgādadhyayanaśeṣabhūtāveva na vidyāṅgabhūtau, prayojanabhedāt, śrutiliṅgavā-
kyebhyaḥ sannidherdurbalatvāt ।।
iti vedhādyadhikaraṇam ।। 15 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
lpyaikavākyatānirvāhāya mantrayorbrahmaprakāśanadvārā tadvidyāprakāśanasāmarthyamapi kalpayitvā
tadviniyojakaśrutikalpanāpūrvakaṃ vidyāsu viniyogaḥ kārya ityevaṃ vilambitapratītikena vi-
niyogāntaraṃ na kartavyam । ākāṅkṣāmūlatvādevaṃvidhakalpanāyāḥ । mantrayorvidyāsannidhyā-
mnānaṃ tu vidyābhāgavadaraṇye'nuvākyatvalābhārthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti । sūtre vedhādyupādānaṃ dṛṣṭā-
ntārthamiti bhāṣya eva vyākhyātam । yadyapi vedhamantrādīnāmapyaviśiṣṭastattadupaniṣadārambhe
samāmnāyaḥ । tathāpi <quote>‘hṛdayaṃ pravidhya dhamanīḥ pravidhye’</quote>tyādyarthaparyālocanāyāmātharvaṇikama-
ntrasamāmnāyasyābhicārikakarmasveva liṅgādviniyoga iti spaṣṭam । tathā pravargyasya jyoti-
ṣṭomādiṣu mahāvratākhyasya karmaṇo gavāmayanādiṣu ca yathāyathaṃ śrutyādibhirviniyoga iti
spaṣṭamiti tadaṃśo dṛṣṭāntatayā yojitaḥ । <pratika>prayojanabhedāditi</pratika> ।। adhyayanaprakāśanarūpa-
prayojanabhedādityarthaḥ । śrutiliṅgādītyatra vākyebhya iti pravargyamahāvratādisarvābhiprāyam ।।
<head>iti vedhādyadhikaraṇam ।। 15 ।।</head>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām atha vedhādyadhikaraṇam ।। 15 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। vedhādyarthabhedāt ।। 25 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>śaṃ no mitrassahanāviti mantrau taittirīyakāmnātau । vidyāsaṃnidhipaṭhanādvidyāṅgatvena gamyete ।। 243 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>adhyayanaliṅgavattvāttadaṅgabhūtāvimau mantrau । vedhādivattu vidyāsaṃnidhirāraṇyakatvakṛtaḥ ।। 244 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti vedhādyadhikaraṇam ।। 15 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha vedhādyadhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। vedhādyarthabhedāt ।। 25 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, atra ātharvaṇikānāmupaniṣadārambhe <quote>‘sarvaṃ pravidhya hṛdayaṃ pravidhye’</quote>tyādayo mantrāḥ paṭhitāḥ । kāṇvā-
nāmupaniṣadādau <quote>‘devā ha vai satraṃ niṣedu’</quote>rityādi pravargyabrāhmaṇaṃ paṭhitam । tatra kimete <quote>‘sarvaṃ pravidhye’</quote>tyādayo mantrāḥ pravargyā-
dīni karmāṇi ca vidyāsūpasaṃhriyeranna veti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । upasaṃhriyeranniti <pratika>pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, vedhādyarthabhe-
dāt</pratika>=<quote>‘sarvaṃ pravidhye’</quote> tyādimantraprakāśitānāṃ vedhādīnāmarthānāmābhicārikakarmādisamavetānāṃ bhedāt vidyāsvasamavetatvā-
dityarthaḥ । evaṃ mantrāṇāṃ vidyāṅgatvābhāvātpravargyādikarmaṇāṃ vidyāśeṣatvābhāvācca nopasaṃhriyeranniti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> ca prāyo'viśiṣṭameva pūrvasmātsaṃdehapūrvapakṣādikam । viṣayavākyanirūpaṇe paraṃ <quote>‘śaṃ
no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ’</quote> ityādayo mantrā apyudāhṛtā ityato nāsti viśeṣaḥ pṛthakprapañcanārha iti vedyam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, atra <quote>‘agne tvacaṃ yātudhānasya bhindhi, taṃ pratyañcamarciṣā vidhya marmana’</quote> ityādi vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ ।
atroktā duṣṭanigrahaphalā vedhādayo guṇāssarvamumukṣūpāsyā na veti <pratika>saṃśaye</pratika> duṣṭanigrahasya sarvāpekṣitatvātsarvamumukṣūpāsyā eva ।
ata ānandādiguṇacatuṣṭayameva sarvamumukṣūpāsyamityuktamayuktamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, vedhādi</pratika>=bhindhividhyatṛṇī-
hītyādikaṃ na sarvopāsyam । kutaḥ । <pratika>arthabhedāt</pratika>=vedhādīnāṃ yatyādyupāsyatvābhāvāt vedhādyupāsanaphalasya hiṃsāderyatyādi-
yogyaphalādvilakṣaṇatvāt । ato vidhādikaṃ na sarvopāsyamānandādi catuṣṭayameva sarvamumukṣūpāsyamiti susthamiti siddhamiti ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ vedhādyadhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।</head>
<pb n="327"/>
atha hānopāyanādhikaraṇam ।। 16 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। hānau tūpāyanaśabdaśeṣatvātkuśāchandastutyupagānavattaduktam ।। 26 ।।</sutra>
viduṣo brahma prāpna‍uvataḥ puṇyapāpayorvimocanamekasyāṃ śākhāyāmāmnātam । vimu-
ktayoḥ puṇyasya praveśasthānaṃ suhṛdaḥ, pāpasya praveśasthānaṃ śatrava iti ekasyāṃ śā-
khāyāmāmnātam । anyasyāṃ vimocanaṃ praveśasthānaṃ cetyubhayamāmnātam । sarvaṃ ci-
ntanārthameva । iha vimocanaṃ praveśasthānaṃ cetyanayoḥ samuccayena sarvatra cintanam ?
uta vikalpeneti saṃśayaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha hānopāyanādhikaraṇam ।। 16 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। hānau tūpāyanaśabdaśeṣatvātkuśācchandastutyupagānavattaduktam ।। 26 ।।</pratika>
tāṇḍiśākhāyāmatharvaṇikaśākhāyāṃ ca puṇyapāpayoḥ kevalaṃ hānaṃ śrutam । śāṭhyāyaniśā-
khāyāṃ kevalamupāyanaṃ śrutam । kauṣītikaśākhāyāmubhayamapi śrutam । sarvamidamanucintanārthaṃ
na kevalaṃ vidyāmahimaprakhyāpanārtham । vidyāprakaraṇapāṭhasya sthānaguṇādipāṭhavadanucintanārtha-
tvasyaivocitatvāt <quote>‘jyāyāndiva’</quote> ityādāviva virodhābhāvācca । na ca sthānaguṇādipāṭha
evānucintanārthaḥ phalapāṭhastu tadvattābodhanaikaprayojana iti vācyam । śāṇḍilyavidyāyāṃ
<quote>‘etamitaḥ pretyābhisaṃbhavitāsmī’</quote>ti phalabhūtāyā eva brahmaprāpteranucintanīyatvoktidarśanāt ।
kiṃcā<quote>‘śvaiva romāṇī’</quote>ti tāṇḍiśākhāyāmante brahmaprāptyā saha hānasyānucintanīyatvamu-
cyate । tatsamānārthatayā kauṣītakiśākhāyāmapi hānasyānucintanīyatvasiddhau tatsāhacaryā-
dupāyanasyā'pi tatsidhyati । tadevopāsanāsu śāṭhyāyanaśākhāyāṃ śrūyata iti tatrā'pi
tatsidhyati । evaṃ hānopāyanayoranucintanīyatvasiddhau kiṃ tayorekaikabhubhayaṃ ca vikalpenā-
nucintanīyamutobhayamapi sarvatropasaṃharaṇīyamityupāyanasya hānaṃ pratyaśeṣatvaśeṣatvābhyāṃ saṃ-
śaye pūrvapakṣaḥ । yathā vidyāsannidhau śrutaṃ vedhamantrādikaṃ vidyāsu nopasaṃhāryaṃ tathā kvaci-
cchākhāyāṃ hānasannidhau śrutamupāyanamanyatra kevalahānaśrutau nopasaṃhāryam । evaṃ kevalopā-
yanaśrutau hānamapi nopasaṃhāryam । upasaṃhāraprayojakasya vidyaikyasyābhāvāt । nanu hāno-
pāyanayoḥ parasparāpekṣatayopasaṃhāraḥ syāt । upāyanaṃ hi hānamantareṇānupapannaṃ hānamape-
kṣate । hānamapyupāyanamapekṣata eva । avaśyaṃ hi kutaścitprahīṇaṃ kiṃcidupauti yathāśvātprahīṇaṃ
romabṛndaṃ bhūbhāgamiti cet । satyam । arthasvabhāvaparyālocanayā tathaivānucintanaṃ tvekaika-
syobhayasya ca vikalpenaiva kartavyam । na samuccayena । samuccayasya sarvatra kauṣītakivākye-
naiva prāptisaṃbhave śākhāntareṣvekaikāmnānasya vikalpārthatvābhāvavaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt । na ca
śākāntarādhikaraṇoktarītyādhyetṛbhedena sārthakatvamupapādayituṃ śakyam । aviśeṣapunaḥśra-
vaṇe hi tathā vaktuṃ yuktamiha tu śākhābhedenaikaikasyobhayasya ca śravaṇamuditānuditahomaśrava-
ṇavadvikalpārthamityeva nyāyyamiti bhāṣye hānaśrutāvupāyanasyānupasaṃhāryatvoktirupāyana-
śrutau hānānupasaṃhāryatvasyāpyupalakṣaṇam । siddhāntastu ekaikaśrutāvapyanyadapyupasaṃhāryam ।
śāṭhyāyaniśākhāyāṃ dāyasaṃkramaṇadṛṣṭāntena hyevamavagamyate । yathā mucyamānasya dhane taṃ
prati yatheṣṭaviniyogārhatā hīyate putrānprati ca sā sampadyate । evaṃ tasya puṇyapāpayostaṃ
<pb n="328"/>
kiṃ tāvat prāptam ? <quote>‘tasya putrā dāyamupayanti suhṛdaḥ sādhukṛtyāṃ dviṣantaḥ pā-
pakṛtyām’</quote> iti śāṭhyāyanake śrūyate । tāṇḍiśākhāyām <quote>‘aśva iva romāṇi vi-
dhūya pāpaṃ candra iva rohormukhāt pramucya’</quote> iti śrūyate <quote>‘tadā vidvān puṇyapāpe
vidhūya nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaiti’</quote> iti cātharvaṇe । atra viduṣaḥ pāpaparityāgapra-
tipādakaśrutau parityaktayoḥ puṇyapāpayoḥ praveśasthānaṃ nopasaṃhāryam, parityāgaśru-
tāvaśrutatvāt ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
prati phalajananārhatā hīyate, priyāpriyānprati ca sampadyata iti śrutiṣu hānopāyanaśa-
bdābhyāṃ vivakṣitamiti tatra hānaṃ brahmaprepsormucyamānasya phalarūpatvādyathopāsanaṃ phalamiti
tatkratunyāyatassarvāsu vidyāsvanucintanīyatayopasaṃhartavyam । evacca tasya phalasyopapādaka-
tayā taccheṣatvena phalabhūtamupāyanamapi sarvatropasaṃhāryam । puṇyapāpayoḥ phalajananārhatvasyā-
nyaviṣayasaṃkrāntau hi hānamupapannaṃ bhavati । saṃkīrtanaprāyaścittādibhiranaṣṭatayā vidyamānayo-
stayoḥ phalajanakatvāvaśyaṃbhāvāditi sūtre hānāvupāyanamupasaṃhartavyam । tasya hānopapāda-
katayā phalarūpaṃ hānaṃ prati śeṣatvena phalakoṭiṣṭatvādityukterupāyane'pi hānamupasaṃharta-
vyam । hānasya tadupapādanīyaphalarūpatvāditi sahetukasādhyantarasyāpyupalakṣaṇam ।। śā-
khāntaroktārthāpekṣitasya śākhāntarādgrahaṇe dṛṣṭāntāḥ kuśācchanda ityādisautrapadenoktāḥ
kuśāḥ । udgātṝṇāṃ prastāvakarmaṇi viniyuktā udumbaradāruśalākāḥ । chandāṃsi devaprakāśakā
asuraprakāśakāśca karmaviśeṣe krameṇa prayoktavyā mantrāḥ । stutirukthyastotrānantaraṃ sūryā-
stamayasannihite kāle samārambhaṇīyaṃ stotram । upāgānamudgātṛṣu stuvatsu adhvaryuvyatiri-
ktairyaiḥ kaiścana ṛtvigbhiḥ kartavyaṃ ho iti śabdoccāraṇam । eteṣāmukto viśeṣaḥ śākhānta-
ravākyaikavākyatayā labdha iti dṛṣṭāntīkaraṇam । nanu hānopāyanayoḥ kvacidekaṃ kvacida-
nyatkvacidubhayamityāmnānabhedavaiyarthyaparihārāya vikalpassamāśrayaṇīyo na samuccaya iti
śaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ taduktamiti sūtraśeṣaḥ । śākhāntarāmnātopasaṃhāre sarvāsvapi śākhāsu
hānopādānaśabdavattvāviśeṣo labhyata ityaviśeṣapunaḥśravaṇamadhyetṛbhedena parihartuṃ śakyam ।
ato'ṣṭadoṣaduṣṭo vikalpo na samāśrayaṇīyaḥ । evaṃ śākhāntaragataśabdopasaṃhāreṇā'pi
parihartuṃ śakye vikalpena vikalpassamāśrayaṇīya ityetajjaiminināpi <quote>‘api tu vākyaśeṣaḥ
syā’</quote>dityādi sūtreṇoktamiti sūtraśeṣasyābhiprāyaḥ । <quote>‘yajñeṣu yeyajāmahaṃ karoti nānūyāje’</quote>-
ṣvityanārabhya śrūyate । tatra sāmānyatassarvayajñeṣu yeyajāmahasya vidhiśrutau viśiṣyānū-
yājeṣu tanniṣedha iti paryudāsādhikaraṇe pūrvapakṣaḥ kṛtaḥ । tathā satyanūyājeṣu yeyajāmahata-
nniṣedhayorubhayorapi śrutitaḥ prāptatvenātirātre ṣoḍaśigrahaṇāgrahaṇayoriva vikalpo bhavet ।
na cātra padāhavanīyaśāstranyāyaḥ pravartate । padaśāstraṃ hyāhatya homaviśeṣaviṣayatvāddhoma-
sāmānyadvārā tadviṣaye'pi home prāptavyaparyavasānādāhavanīyaśāstrātprāgeva pravartata iti
śīghrapravṛttikena padaśāstreṇāpahṛtaviṣayaviśeṣamāhavanīyaśāstraṃ taditaraviśeṣaviṣayatayā vya-
vatiṣṭhata iti yuktam । yuktaśca viśeṣaśāstratayā śīghrapravṛttena <quote>‘śaramayaṃ barhiri’</quote>ti śāstreṇā-
pahṛtabarhiraṅgaṃ kalpanīyacodakaśāstraṃ taditarāṅgaviṣayatayā vyavatiṣṭhata iti । iha tū sāmā-
nyaviṣayamapi vidhiśāstramevānūyājānapi kroḍīkṛtya prathamaṃ pravartata iti vaktavyam । a-
<pb n="329"/>
iti prāpte brūmaḥ---hānirvimocanaṃ, upāyanaṃ praveśaḥ । kevalahānāvāmnātāyāṃ ke-
valopāyane cāmnāte itaretarasamuccaya eva nyāyyo na vikalpaḥ । upāyanaśabdasya
hānivākyaśeṣatvāt taccheṣatvam, tyaktayoḥ praveśasthānavācitvena tadapekṣatvāt ।
pradeśāntarāmnātavākyasya pradeśāntaravākyaṃ kathaṃ śeṣabhūtamiti cet---yathā <quote>‘vāna-
spatyāḥ kuśāḥ’</quote> ityetadvākyaśeṣabhūtaṃ <quote>‘audumbaryā kuśāḥ’</quote> ityetat tadviśeṣakaṃ prade-
śāntarastham । yathā <quote>‘devāsurāṇāṃ chondobhiḥ’</quote> ityetaccheṣabhūtaṃ <quote>‘devacchandāṃsi pūrvam’</quote>
iti pradeśāntarastham । yathā <quote>‘ṣoḍaśinaḥ stotramupākaroti’</quote> ityetaccheṣabhūtaṃ <quote>‘sama-
yāviṣite sūrye ṣoḍaśinaḥ stotram’</quote> iti । yathā <quote>‘ṛtvija upagāyanti’</quote> ityetacche-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nyathā prasaktyabhāvena niṣedhāyogāt । ataḥ padaśāstrasyāhavanīyaśāstrādiva na niṣedhaśāstrasya
vidhiśāstrādbalavattā śakyā vaktum । nāpi liṅgācchruteriva niṣedhaśāstrādvidhiśāstrasya bala-
vattā vaktuṃ śakyā । niṣedhaśāstrasyātyantabādhaprasaṅgāt । tasmādubhayorapi viruddhayostulyabala-
tvādvikalpaḥ prasajyetaiva । evaṃ vikalpaḥ prasajyamāno'ṣṭadoṣaduṣṭatvādanyāyya iti tatparihārāya
nañaḥ paryudāsavṛttimāśrityānūyājavyatirikteṣu yajñeṣu yeyajāmahaṃ karotītyevamarthasamarpakatayā
<quote>‘nānūyāje’</quote>ṣvityasya pūrvavākyaśeṣataivāṅgīkaraṇīyeti siddhāntavyavasthāpanārthamidaṃ sūtra<quote>‘mapi
tu vākyaśeṣaḥ syā’</quote>dityādi pradeśāntarasthavākyaśeṣatāpratipādanaparam । apitviti pūrvapakṣa-
vyāvṛttyartham । nanu nedaṃ sūtraṃ pradeśāntarasthaśabdasya pradeśāntarasthavākyaśeṣatāpratipādakatāyā-
mudāharaṇaṃ kiṃtu <quote>‘dīkṣito na juhoti’</quote>ti jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇāmnātaṃ vākyaṃ kratvarthapuruṣārthasādhā-
raṇyena sarveṣāmapi homānāṃ pratiṣedhakamathavā kratvartheṣu pratyakṣaśiṣṭānvihāyātideśaprāptānāṃ
bahūnāṃ puruṣārthānāṃ ca homānāṃ pratiṣedhakamiti pūrvapakṣanirākaraṇārthaṃ pravṛtta<quote>‘mapi tu vākyaśe-
ṣatvāditaraparyudāsaḥ syātpratiṣedhe vikalpaḥ syā’</quote>diti sūtramihodāharaṇam । tena hi sūtreṇāgni
hotrādihomānāṃ svasvavidhitaḥ kratumadhye kartavyatvena nadīkṣitavacanena akartavyatvena paryudā-
sādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣanyāyādvikalpaprāptau tatparihārāya nadīkṣitavākyasyāgnihotrādivākyaśe-
ṣatvamabhyupagamya nañaḥ paryudāsavṛttirāśrayaṇīyā । tenādīkṣito yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juho-
tītyagnihotrādivākyānāmarthassampadyata iti pratipāditamatastadevehodāhartavyamiti cetsa-
tyametat । tathā hi---tatra pratiṣedhāśrayaṇe vastuto vikalpo na prasajyate । homaniṣedhaḥ
kratvarthaḥ homaḥ puruṣārtha iti vidhiniṣedhayorviṣayabhedādubhayorapi kratvarthatvena viṣayaikye hi
ṣoḍaśigrahaṇāgrahaṇarītyā tayoranyatarasya yasya kasyacitparigrahe'pi kratossāguṇyādvikalpo
bhavet । iha tu homaniṣedhaeva kratvartha iti homapakṣe kratorvaiguṇyādvastuto vikalpasya na
prasaktiḥ । kṛtvācintayā tu tatsūtraṃ pravṛttam । yadi pratiṣedhāśrayaṇe paryudāsādhikaraṇapūrva-
pakṣarītyā vikalpaḥ prasajyate tadā tatparihārāya na dīkṣita ityasyāgnihotrādivākyaśeṣa-
tvamaṅgīkṛtyāpi vikalpaḥ pariharaṇīyaḥ kiṃcitprakaraṇāmnātasyaikasya śabdasya pradeśāntarāmnā-
tānekavākyaśeṣabhāvādapi pāpīyānvikasya iti nyāyaṃ vyutpādayitum । ataḥ pradeśānta-
rāmnātaśabdasya pradeśāntarāmnātavākyaśeṣatatvaṃ kuśādiṣūdāhṛtameva । <quote>‘tadukta’</quote>miti sūtrāṃśastu
vastutaḥ prāpnuvanvikalpassati saṃbhave sarvathā pariharaṇīya ityetāvanmātre pūrvamīmāṃsakasaṃma-
tipradarśanārtha ityabhipretya <quote>‘nānūyāje’</quote>ṣvityatra vidhipratiṣedhayorubhayorapi kratvarthatvena va-
<pb n="330"/>
ṣabhūtaṃ <quote>‘nādhvaryurupagāyet’</quote> iti paryudāsavākyam । evamupāyanavākyasya hānivā-
kyaśeṣatayā saṃbhavantyāṃ gatau na vikalpo nyāyyaḥ । taduktaṃ prathamatantre <quote>‘api tu
vākyaśeṣaḥ syādanyāyyatvādvikalpasya’</quote> iti stutyarthaṃ prakarṣārthaṃ veti । nanvarthavādaḥ
kathaṃ deśāntarasthārthavādasāpekṣa iti cet---‘na, sāmopāstistāvakatvena śrutasya
<quote>‘ekaviṃśo vā ito'sāvādityaḥ’</quote> ityarthavādasyaikaviṃśatvanirṇayāya taittirīyakaga-
tasatraprakaraṇasthārthavādāpekṣatvadarśanāt । <quote>‘dvādaśamāsāḥ pañcartavastraya ime lokā
asāvāditya ekaviṃśaḥ’</quote> iti hi tatra saṃkhyānirvāha uktaḥ । tato'rthavādatve'pyu-
pāyanamupasaṃhāryam । hānopāyanayorekatrāpyavagatirasti kaiṣītakiśrutau <quote>‘tat sukṛ-
taduṣkṛte vidhūnute tasya priyā jñātayaḥ sukutamupayanti apriyā duṣkṛtam’</quote> iti ।
atastayoḥ samuccayaḥ ।।
iti hānopāyanādhikaraṇam ।। 16 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
stuto vikalpaprāptirastīti tatpradarśanāya paryudāsādhikaraṇasiddhāntasūtramudāhṛtam । sūtre
hānaṃ pratyupāyanasya śeṣatvoktyaiva kevalopāyanaśrutau hānopasaṃhārasiddhyarthaṃ hānasyopāyanaṃ
prati śeṣitvaheturapi siddha eveti na pṛthaguktiḥ । upāyanasyṛ śeṣatvādityetāvati vaktavye
śabdagrahaṇamaviśeṣapunaḥśravaṇābhāvādvikalpa eva nyāyya iti pūrvapakṣaśaṅkānirākaraṇāya sa-
rvatra hānopāyanaśabdavattvāviśeṣaṃ darśayitum । evamanucintanārthaṃ hānopāyanayoḥ parasparo-
pasaṃhāra iti pratipādanārthatvena sūtraṃ yojitam । atha stutyarthatvenopasaṃhāra iti pratipā-
danārthamidaṃ sūtramiti matāntaramupanyasyati---<pratika>stutiprakarṣeti</pratika> । nanu tatrādityasyaikaviṃśa-
tvanirdhāraṇārthamarthavādāntarāpekṣā nātropāyanāpekṣayā nirṇayaṃ kiṃcidastītyāśaṅkyārthanirṇa-
yārthamapekṣābhāve'pi stutiprakarṣārthaṃ tadapekṣetyetāvatā sāmyamastītyabhipretyopasaṃharati---
<pratika>tato'rthavādatve'pīti</pratika> । stutyarthatvapakṣe'pi hānopādāne pāramārthike eva । vaiśvānareṣṭi-
phalanyāyena vacanabalāt । <quote>‘yadenaścakṛmā vayaṃ, yadvānyakṛta mārima, tā māmuñcatāṃhasaḥ,
yadanyakṛta mārime’</quote>tyādiṣvanyakarmaphalasyānyatra saṃbhavāt <quote>‘kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇī’</quote>tyādikaṃ
paramātmadṛṣṭhyanantaraṃ taddraṣṭāraṃ prati karmaṇāṃ phalajananaśaktikṣayaparaṃ priyāpriyagataphalārpaṇāna-
ntaraṃ tatkṣayaparaṃ veti na kaścidvirodhaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti hānopāyanādhikaraṇam ।। 16 ।।</head>

<head>atha hānopāyanādhikaraṇam ।। 16 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। hānau tūpāyanaśabdaśeṣatvātkuśācchandastutyupagānavattaduktam ।। 26 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>hānopāyanataddvayamanusaṃdheyaṃ vikalpena । paravidyāsu yathāruci pṛthagāmnānārthavattvāya ।। 245 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>hānopāyanavākye hyapekṣayā śeṣaśeṣitāpanne । tasmātsamuccayaḥ syāt pṛthagāmnānasya vaidhuryāt ।। 246 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti hānopāyanādhikaraṇam ।। 16 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha hanyadhikaraṇam ।। 15 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। hānī tūpāyanaśabdaśeṣattvātkuśācchandastutyupagānavattaduktam ।। 26 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhāgavatpādamate</pratika>, asyādhikaraṇasya <quote>‘tasya putrā dāyamupayanti suhṛdaḥ sādhukṛtyāṃ dviṣantaḥ pāpakṛtyām’</quote> <quote>‘aśva iva
<pb n="331"/>
romāṇi vidhūya pāpam’</quote> <quote>‘tathā vidvānpuṇyapāpe vidhūya’</quote> ityādīni krameṇa śāṭhyāyanitāṇḍyātharvaṇavākyāni <pratika>viṣayaḥ</pratika> ।
atra varṇakadvayamupanyastam । ādye varṇake śāṭhyāyaniśrutau puṇyapāpayorupādānamātraśravaṇe'pi tyāgaṃ vinopādānasyāsaṃbha-
vātpuṇyapāpatyāga ākṣipyate । tāṇḍyātharvaṇavākyayoḥ puṇyapāpatyāgamātramucyate, tyaktayorupādānamanyatra śrutamatropasaṃ-
hāryaṃ na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । nopasaṃhartavyamiti <pratika>pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, sūtre tuśabdaḥ kaivalyavācī । <pratika>hānau tu</pratika>=kevala-
hānau śrutāyāmupādānamupasaṃhartavyam । kutaḥ । <pratika>upāyanaśabdaśeṣatvāt</pratika>=<quote>‘tatsukṛtaduṣkṛte vidhūnute tasya priyā jñātayaḥ
sukṛtamupayanti apriyā duṣkṛtam ।’</quote> ityagnirahasye hānasannidhau śrūyamāṇasya hānaśabdenāpekṣitasya upādānātmakopāyanaśa-
bdasya hānaṃ prati śeṣatvāvagamādityarthaḥ । tatra dṛṣṭāntamāha---<pratika>kuśācchandastutyupagānavat</pratika>=kuśāvat chandovat stu-
tivat upagānavadityarthaḥ । yathā kuśādiṣu śrutyantaragataviśeṣānvayaḥ tathā hānāvupāyanānvaya iti siddham । śrutyantaragato
viśeṣaḥ śrutyantare'bhyupeya eva । anyathā aṣṭadoṣaduṣṭo vikalpaḥ syāt । <pratika>taduktam</pratika>=dvādaśalakṣaṇyāṃ jaimininā <quote>‘vipratiṣedhe
vikalpaḥ syā’</quote>dityuktamiti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>varṇakāntaraṃ</pratika> nirūpyate---udāhṛtaśrutiṣveva kiṃ puṇyapāpayorvidhūnanaṃ=hānamabhipretamuta tayoścālanamiti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । cāla-
nameveti <pratika>pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, hānāvevāyaṃ vidhūnanaśabdo bhavitumarhati । kutaḥ । upāyanaśabdasannidhau śrūyamāṇasya
vidhūnanaśabdasyopāyanaṃ prati śeṣatvādityarthaḥ । hānaṃ vinopādānātmakopāyanasyāsaṃbhavāccālanavācakenāpi vidhūnanaśabdena
hānameva lakṣyamiti bhāvaḥ । yathā kuśādisthale śākhāntarīyaviśeṣaśravaṇaṃ nirṇāyakaṃ tathehāpi kvacidvidhūnanasaṃnidhau śrūya-
māṇamupāyanaṃ sarvatra hānalakṣakatve niścāyakamiti yāvat । <quote>‘tadukta’</quote>miti pūrvavadvyākhyeyam ।। <pratika>iti hānyadhikaraṇam ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> ca viṣayavākyamaviśiṣṭameva pūrvasmāt । pūrvapakṣasiddhāntanirūpaṇetu kiyānasti
viśeṣaḥ pūrvasmāt । nānayoḥ parasparaṃ vairūpyam । anayormatayoḥ <pratika>saṃśaya</pratika> evam---kiṃ puṇyapāpayoḥ kevalahānicintanaṃ keva-
lopāyanacintanamubhayacintanaṃ ca, sarvāsu vidyāsu vikalpenānuṣṭheyamuta samuccayeneti । tathātathāmnātasyārthavattvāya vikalpa
eva nyāyya iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, kevalahāne kevalopāyane āmnāte itaretarasamuccayo nyāyyo na vikalpaḥ ।
ekasyāṃ śākhāyāmubhayavidhānaṃ pratipattṛbhedena parihāryam । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, hānautviti</pratika> । tuśabdaḥ pakṣavyāvartakaḥ । hā-
nāviti pradarśanārtham । kevalavimocane kevale copāyane śrūyamāṇe tayoritaretarasamuccayo'vaśyambhāvī । kutaḥ । <pratika>upāyana-
śabdaśeṣatvāt</pratika>=upāyanaśabdasya hānivākyaśeṣatvādityarthaḥ । pradeśāntarāmnātavākyasya pradeśāntarāmnātavākyaśeṣatve
dṛṣṭāntamāha---<pratika>kuśācchandastutyupagānavaditi</pratika> । spaṣṭam । evamupāyanavākyasya hānivākyaśeṣatayā saṃbhavantyāṃ gatau
na vikalpo yuktaḥ । taduktaṃ pūrvakāṇḍe---<quote>‘api tu vākyaśeṣaḥ syādanyādyatvādvikalpasye’</quote> tyādinā । iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, sūtradvayātmakamidamadhikaraṇam । muktāvapyupāsanamasti vā na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । muktasya vidhivaśyatve
muktessaṃsārāviśeṣaprasaṅgānmuktānāmupāsanaṃ nāstīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, yadyapi muktānāṃ vidhinibandhanamupāsanaṃ
nāsti tathāpi niyatabrahmayajñānāmapi kuśaiḥ svecchayā mantravatsāmādhyayanādidarśanāt aicchikamupāsanaṃ muktānāmapyastye-
veti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu</pratika>, turavadhāraṇe । yataḥ <pratika>hānau</pratika>=bandhahānirūpamuktau । taduktam <quote>‘muktānāmetatsame’</quote>tiśrutāvupāsanamuktam ।
ato mokṣe'pi teṣāmupāsanamastyeva । tadapi <pratika>kuśācchandastutyupagānavadeva</pratika>=yathā niyatabrahmayajñānāṃ dvijānāṃ niya-
tasaṃdhyopāsanānantaramapi kuśagrahaṇapūrvakamācchandena svecchayā stutyupagānaṃ tadvat svecchayā muktānāmupāsanamasti । tadapi
na vidhitaḥ । tadapyupāsana<quote>‘metatsāma gāyannāste’</quote>ityādāvuktamityarthaḥ । vidhinibandhanatvamupāsanasya kathaṃ na syāditi cet
upāsanavidhīnāmupāyanaśabdaśeṣatvāt=mokṣavākyaśeṣatvāt । tathā ca mokṣārthā upāsanāvidhayaḥ kathaṃ muktiviṣayāḥ syu-
riti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। sāṃparāye tartavyābhāvāttathā hyanye ।। 28 ।। sāṃparāye</pratika>=mokṣe upāsanaṃ svecchayaivetyaṅgīkāryam । natvani-
ṣṭanivṛttyaryam । kutaḥ । <pratika>tartavyābhāvāt</pratika>=muktaiḥ parihartavyāniṣṭasyaivābhāvāt । tadapi kutaḥ । hi=yasmādanye śākhinaḥ
tathā <quote>‘tīrṇo hi tadā sarvānśokānhṛdayasya bhavatī’</quote>ti parihartavyāniṣṭābhāvaṃ paṭhanti tasmādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ hānyadhikaraṇam ।। 15 ।।</head>
<pb n="332"/>
atha sāparāyādhikaraṇam ।। 17 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। sāṃparāye tartavyābhāvāt tathā hyanye ।। 27 ।।</sutra>
pūrvoktaṃ puṇyapāpavimocanaṃ dehaviyogakāla eva cintanīyaṃ uta mārge vā ।।
iti saṃdihya pūrvapakṣaṃ pravartayati । tathā hi---<quote>‘aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya pā-
pam ... dhūtvā śarīram’</quote> iti kutracidṛhaviyogakāla eva śrutā sukṛtaduṣkṛtahāniḥ ।
kutracit <quote>‘sa āgacchati virajāṃ nadīṃ tāṃ manasā'tyeti tat sukṛtaduṣkṛte vi-
dhūnute’</quote> ityadhvani śrutā । evamubhayaśrutisadbhāve'pi sāṃparāye dehaviyogakāla eva
cintanīyā, tadūrdhvaṃ brahmaprāptivyatirekeṇa prāptavyasya karmasādhyasya sukhaduḥkhabho-
gasyābhāvāt । tathā hyadhīyate'nye <quote>‘tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye atha saṃ-
patsye’</quote> iti dehaviyogādūrdhvaṃ brahma prāptameva ।।
<sutra>sū ।। chandata ubhayāvirodhāt ।। 28 ।।</sutra>
dehaviyogakāle puṇyapāpavimocanaśrutessadūrdhvaṃ brahmaprāptiśruteḥ ubhayatra śrutyavi-
rodhāddhetoḥ <quote>‘tat sukṛtaduṣkṛte vidhūnute’</quote> iti śrutikhaṇḍaśchandato netavyaḥ, <quote>‘etaṃ
devayānaṃ panthānamāpadya’</quote> iti vākyakhaṇḍāt prāgupanetavyaḥ ।।
<sutra>sū ।। upapannastallakṣaṇārthopalabdherlokavat ।। 29 ।।</sutra>
dehaviyogakāle sarvakarmakṣaye'pi gatividhirupapanna eva brahmopāsakānām, tatra
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha sāṃparāyādhikaraṇam ।। 17 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। sāṃparāye tartavyābhāvāttathā hyanye ।। 27 ।।</pratika> prāsaṅgikīṃ saṃgatiṃ sūcayituṃ
viśeṣayati---<pratika>pūrvoktamiti</pratika> । dehaviyogānantaraṃ karmasādhyaphalābhāvādvividhaśrutidarśanācca
saṃśayaḥ । prāptavyasyetyanena sautraṃ tartavyapadaṃ vyākhyātam । taratiriha prāptyarthaḥ । āgama-
śāsanasyānityatvādiḍāgamābhāvaḥ । nanvevaṃ sati <quote>‘tatsukṛte’</quote>tyādiśruteḥ kā gatiḥ । na ca
pāṭhakramādarthakramasya balavattvāttadvākyaṃ prāgeva netavyamiti vācyam । <quote>‘tatsukṛte’</quote>tyatra taccha-
bdena tasmādarthena saṃnihitasya virajānadyatikramaṇasya sukṛtaduṣkṛtavidhūnane hetutvasya prati-
pādyamānatayārthataḥ prāṅyanāsaṃbhavādityāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram---<pratika>sū॰ ।। chandata ubha-
yāvirodhāt ।। 28 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘pāpaṃ vidhūya dhūtvā śarīra’</quote>miti <quote>‘yāvanna vimokṣye atha saṃpatsye’</quote> iti
ca śrutidvayasyāvirodhamapekṣya <quote>‘tatsukṛte’</quote>tyatra tatpadaṃ sannihitasya virajānadyatikramaṇasya
hetutvaṃ na bravīti kiṃtu paryaṅkavidyāprakaraṇādvidyāsāmarthyādeva puṇyapāpavidhūnanasya śrutya-
ntareṣu prasiddhatvācca prakṛtāyā vidyāyāḥ kāraṇatvaṃ bravītītyaṅgīkartavyam । evañca sarvanāma-
śrutiprāptahetuhetumadbhāvavirodhābhāvā<quote>‘ttatsukṛte’</quote>tyādivākyaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ yojayituṃ śakyamiti
devayānapathaprāptivacanātprāgevocitasthale tadvacanaṃ yojanīyamiti bhāvaḥ । nanu dehaviyo-
gakāla eva sarvakarmakṣaye karmamūlasūkṣmaśarīrānuvṛttyasaṃbhavādarcirādigatividhiranupapannaḥ ।
jīvasyāṇutvena svato gatimātrasaṃbhave'pi śarīrendriyarāhitye candrasaṃvādādyasaṃbhavādityāśa-
ṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram---<pratika>sū॰ ।। upapannastallakṣaṇārthopalabdherlokavat ।। 29 ।।</pratika> mārge
yathā candrasaṃvādaśśarīrendriyasādhyaḥ tathā brahmaprāptyanantaramapi śarīrendriyasādhyā eva vihā-
<pb n="333"/>
tatra vihārarūpārthopalabdheḥ । <quote>‘sa svarāṅgavati tasya sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati’</quote>
iti dṛśyate । lokavat, yathā loke rājāśritānāṃ puruṣāṇāmanitarapuruṣasādhāra-
ṇasarvārthasiddhiḥ । ato mārgaśrutirapi na bādhyate, dehaviyogakāle sakalakarmakṣa-
ye'pi vidyāmāhātmyālliṅgaśarīrāvasthānena mārgagatiḥ, tattaddeśavihāracandrasaṃvā-
dādisarvārthasiddhisaṃbhavāditi ।।
evaṃ prāpte siddhānta ucyate---
<sutra>sū ।। gaterarthavattvamubhayathā'nyathā hi virodhaḥ ।। 30 ।।</sutra>
dehaviyogakāle virajānadyatikramaṇakāle ca ityubhayathā karmakṣaye satyeva deva-
yānagateḥ prayojanavattvam । anyathā dehaviyogakāla eva sarvakarmakṣaye tadanantara-
mevāsau mukta iti devayānagaterniṣprayojanatvāt devayānagatiśravaṇasya <quote>‘paraṃ jyo-
tirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate’</quote> iti devayānena brahmaprāptyanantarameva dhīvi-
kāsādirūpasvarūpāvirbhāvaśravaṇasya ca virodhaḥ syāt । evaṃ ca yadyapi vidyāsā-
marthyāddevayānena gatistattaddeśavihāracandrasaṃvādādikamagrimavihārādivadupapadyate ।
tathā'pi yāvadbrahmaprāpti dhīsaṃkocarūpasaṃsārānuvṛttiḥ vidyāsāmarthyānnopapadyata iti
tanmūlabhūtakarmaleśānuvṛttiravaśyameṣṭavyā । na ca parameśvarasaṃkalpaviśeṣādeva tada-
nuvṛttiḥ syāditi vācyam, tasyauvāsmābhiḥ karma<ref>(mūla)</ref>tayocyamānatvāt, na hya-
smanmate vihitaniṣiddhācaraṇaprayuktaparameśvarasaṃkalpavyatirekeṇa puṇyapāpe staḥ ।।
nanu brahmaprāptyanantaradhīvikāsādisvarūpāvirbhāvaścet tāvatparyantaṃ dhīsaṃkoca-
hetukarmānuvṛttyā bhāvyam । kathaṃ virajānadyatikramaṇānantarameva karmakṣayaḥ ।।
ucyate---prākṛtaprapañcasīmāvadhyatikramaṇameva paramākāśarūpaparamaśivapadaprāpti-
riti saiva <quote>‘paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya’</quote> ityanena brahmaprāptirvivakṣitā । viṣṇupadasaṃba-
ndhinī virajānadī prākṛtaprapañcasīmāvadhiḥ । tadanupraveśataḥ prakṣīṇasarvakarmalepā
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
rādaya āmnāyante । te brahmavidyāsāmarthyalabdhairaprākṛtaiśśarīrendriyairupapādanīyāḥ । evaṃ sarva-
karmakṣaye'pi brahmavidyāsāmarthyādeva mārgagatiparyantaṃ sūkṣmaśarīrasyānuvṛttyā candrasaṃvādādi-
rupapannaḥ । loke rājāśritapuruṣāṇāmapi hyabhimatārthasiddhisaṃpādakasakalasādhanasaṃpattirdṛ-
śyate । kimuta paraṃbrahmaiva śaraṇaṃ prāptānāmiti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>sū॰ ।। gaterarthavattvamubhayathā'nyathā
hi virodhaḥ ।। 30 ।।</pratika> dhīsaṃkocānupravṛttyarthaṃ tanmūlakarmaleśānuvṛttiravaśyamabhyupagantavyeti
vidyāsāmarthyādbhavadapi karmaṇo hānaṃ kasyaciddehaviyogakāle kasyacidvirajānadyatikramaṇā-
nantaramiti vyavasthāpanīyam । ata<quote>‘statsukṛte’</quote>tyādi śrutirapi na pāṭhakramātpracyāvanīyā ।
na hi dehaviyogakāla eva sarvakarmahānamiti pūrvapakṣiṇāpi vaktuṃ śakyam । keṣāṃcitkarmaṇāṃ
vidyodaye satyeva hānasya <quote>‘tadadhigama uttarapūrvādhayo’</quote>rityadhikaraṇe vakṣyamāṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ ।
<pratika>prākṛtaprapañcasīmāvadhiriti</pratika> । prākṛtagrahaṇamupalakṣaṇam । prakṛtimāyābindūpādānakasya
malinamiśraśuddhātmakasya sāṃsārikabhogasthānaviśeṣabhūtalokasaṃghātātmakasya prapañcasya sī-
māyā avadhiḥ samāptibhūmiḥ । tataḥ paraṃ paramānandamayo muktaprāpyaḥ paramaśivalokaḥ । <pratika>nanu</pratika>
<pb n="334"/>
yogino viṣṇupadādūrdhvamaprākṛtaśivapadaṃ paramānandamayamanuviśanti । tathā hi
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
paramaśivaloke'pi kiṃcidda‍ūraṃ gatvā <quote>‘virajāṃ prāpye’</quote>ti śrutiparyālocanayā pratīyate । kau-
ṣītakināmupaniṣadi hi paryaṅkavidyāmnātā । tatraivaṃ śrūyate---<quote>‘tasya ha vā etasya brahmaloka-
syārohado muhūrtānyeṣṭihā virajānadīkalpo vṛkṣa’</quote> ityādikaṃ <quote>‘taṃ pañcaśatānyapsarasaḥ prati-
yanti śataṃ pha1lahastāśśatamāñjanahastāśśataṃ vāsohastāśśataṃ cūrṇahastāstaṃ brahmālaṃkāreṇālaṃku-
rvanti sa brahmālaṃkāreṇālaṃkṛto brahmavidvānbrahmābhiprayāti sa āgacchatyāraṃ hṛdantarmanasātyeti
sa āgacchati muhūrtān nyeṣṭihāstasmādapadravanti sa āgacchati virajānadīṃ tāṃ manasaivā-
tyetī’</quote>ti parabrahmaṇā preṣitābhirapsarobhirbrahmālaṃkārairalaṃkṛtasyaiva brahmavido hradaviśeṣasya ya-
ṣṭibhirhantṝṇāṃ ca prāptipūrvakameva virajānadīprāptirvaṇyate । kathaṃ prākṛtaprapañcasīmāvadhirityu-
ktam ? । ucyate । hradayaṣṭihāssīmāsaṃdhisthitāḥ na tu paramānandamayaśivalokāntargatāḥ ।
virajānadyatikramaṇānantarabhāvikarmaleśanivṛtteḥ prāka‍tatpradeśāsaṃbhavāt apsarasāṃ niyogārthe
parabrahmavacane'bhidhāvatamamayaśasā virajāṃ vā ayaṃ nadīṃ prāpannavā ayaṃ jariṣyatī’ti
virajāprāptikīrtatena tasyāssīmāsaṃdhitvāvagamācceti bhāṣyābhiprāyaḥ । atra <quote>‘na vā ayaṃ
jariṣyatī’</quote>ti vacanānusāreṇa <quote>‘vijare’</quote>tyeva nāmeti pratīyate । upaniṣadgrantheṣu sāmpradāyika-
tadadhyetṛṣu ca virajāmityeva pāṭho dṛśyate । virajeti lokairvyahriyamāṇaṃ nāma prasiddham ।
viṣṇupadādūrdhvamiti । viṣṇulokaḥ paramaśivalokādavyavahitādharaloka iti bhāvaḥ ।
nanu karmayogena śivamupāsīnānāṃ prāpyādaparaśivalokādavyavahitādharaloko viṣṇulokaḥ ।
na tu muktaprāpyātparamaśivalokāt । śivadharmottare---<quote>‘jñeyaṃ viṣṇupadādūrdhvaṃ divyaṃ śivapadaṃ
mahat । bhogasaṃsthānamatulaṃ karmayogaratātmanām ।। aprameyaguṇairdivyairvimānaissārvakā-
mikaiḥ । asaṃkhyaistatpuraṃ vyāptaṃ sarvaprāṇyupakārakaiḥ । sahasrabhūmivistīrṇaissūryakoṭisamaprabhaiḥ ।।
rudraloka iti proktamaśeṣaguṇasaṃyutam । sarveṣāṃ śivabhaktānāṃ tatpuraṃ parikīrtitam ।। rudrakṣe-
tramṛtānāṃ ca jaṃgamasthāvarātmanā’</quote>mityādivacanairaparaśivalokaṃ varṇayitvā <quote>‘ityeta2daparaṃ proktaṃ
śrīmacchivapuraṃ mahat । dehināṃ karmaniṣṭhānāṃ punarāvartanaṃ smṛta’</quote>miti tadvarṇanaṃ samāpya----<quote>‘ūrdhvaṃ
śivapurājjñeyaṃ sthānatrayamanuttamam । nityaṃ paramaśuddhaṃ ca skandomāśaṅkarātmakami’</quote>ti tadana-
ntaraṃ skandalokādumālokācca parasya paramaśivalokasya varṇanamupakramasya <quote>‘ye saṃprāptāḥ paraṃ
sthānaṃ dhyānayogaratā narāḥ । na teṣāṃ punarāvṛttirghore saṃsāramaṇḍale’</quote> ityādinā taṃ prā-
ptānāmevānāvṛttipratipādanāt । tatrokta umāloka eva vāyusaṃhitāyāmunmanāloka i-
tyuktaḥ । <quote>‘tadūrdhvamunmānālokātsomalokamalaukikam । somassahomayā yatra nityaṃ nivasa-
tīśvaraḥ’</quote> iti । ucyate । umālokasannidhau śivadharmottarādipratipādito'sti gomātṛ-
lokaḥ sa tāvadu3mālokāntargata eva । tatraivomāyā aṃśabhūtasya paranārāyaṇasya sthānam ।
tadetanma /?/varṇenāvagamyate । <quote>‘tā vāṃ vāstūnyuśmasi gamadhyai gāvo yatra bhūriśṛṅgā ayāsaḥ ।
atrāha tadurugāyasya vṛṣṇaḥ paramaṃ padamavabhāti bhūrī’</quote>ti । asyārthaḥ---he viṣṇo te tāni
sthānāni tacchabdādbahuvacanasya <quote>‘supāṃ sullugi’</quote>tyādinā śe ādeśaḥ । te tava dhāmāni sthā-
<note>(1) <quote>‘mālāhastāḥ’</quote> iti pāṭhāntaram ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘ityetaduttaraṃ proktaṃ’</quote> iti pāṭhāntaram ।</note> <note>(3) <quote>‘dumālokaikadeśa eva’</quote>
iti kha pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="335"/>
śrūyate <quote>‘so'dhvanaḥ pāramāpnoti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam’</quote> iti । ato na virodhaḥ ।।
iti sāṃparāyādhikaraṇam ।। 17 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tāni gamadhyai gantumuśmasi icchāmaḥ । gamerdhāto<quote>‘stumarthe sese’</quote>tyādisūtreṇa tumunpratyayārthe
adhyai iti pratyayaḥ । <quote>‘uśmasī’</quote>ti <quote>‘vaśa kāntau’</quote> iti dhātoruttamapuruṣabahuvacane <quote>‘idaṃto-
masī’</quote>riti sūtreṇāntima ikārādeśaḥ । sāṃhito dīrghaḥ । tānyeva dhāmāni viśeṣyante ।
yatra yeṣu sthāneṣu ayāsaḥ anapāyinyaḥ yāterasunpratyaye naña‍samāsaḥ । bhūriśṛṅgā gāvaḥ
nandyādayo gomātaraḥ santi atrāha a1sminneva sthāne । <quote>‘ahe’</quote>ti nipāta evakārārthaḥ ।
tatprasiddham । urugāyasya urubhirmahadbhirgīyamānasya bhūreḥ mahato vṛṣṇaḥ viṣṇostava paramama-
dhastanaviṣṇulokāpekṣayotkṛṣṭamavabhāti avame bhāti paramaśivalokasyādhastādbhātīti ।
tasmādumālokāntargatavaiṣṇavaparamapadābhiprāyaṃ <quote>‘viṣṇupadasaṃbandhinī’</quote>ti <quote>‘viṣṇupadādūrdhvamiti
ce’</quote>ti yujyata eva ।।</p>
<head>iti sāmparāyādhikaraṇam ।। 17 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha sāmparāyādhikaraṇam ।। 17 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। sāmparāye tarttavyābhāvāttathā hyanye ।। 27 ।। chandata ubhayāvirodhāt ।। 28 ।। upapannastalla-
kṣaṇārthopalabdherlokavat ।। 29 ।। gaterarthavattvamubhayathānyathā hi virodhaḥ ।। 30 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>dehaviyoge viduṣāṃ karmalayastadanu na khalu tatkṛtyam । gataye sūkṣmatanusthitirastu krīḍāgrimepi vidyātaḥ ।। 247 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>dehaviyoge'dhvani ca dvidhāghavilayaśrutidvayāñjasyāt । na hi vidyayā tanusthitimupapādya śrutamupekṣituṃ yuktam ।। 248 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>yāvatsūkṣmaśarīrasthāyī bandhaśca buddhisaṃkocādiḥ । sa ca na parābhidhyānaṃ vināvatiṣṭheta karma kimatonyanna ।। 249 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti sāmparāyādhikaraṇam ।। 17 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha sāmparāyādhikaraṇam ।। 16 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। sāmparāye tartavyābhāvāttathā hyanye ।। 27 ।। chandata ubhayāvirodhāt ।। 28 ।। upapannastallakṣa-
ṇārthopapatterlokavat ।। 29 ।। gaterarthavattvamubhayathānyathā hi virodhaḥ ।। 30 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ vidyāyāḥ karmahānihetutvaṃ siddhavatkṛtya kevalahānaśravaṇe upāyanopasaṃhāro'bhihitaḥ । saṃprati
vidyāyāḥ karmahānihetutvaṃ nāstītyākṣepasaṃgatyāha---<pratika>sāṃparāye ityādi</pratika> । atra <quote>‘virajāṃ nadīṃ tāṃ manasaivātyeti tatsukṛ-
taduṣkṛte vidhūnute’</quote> iti paryaṅkasthabrahmopāsakasya karmahānipratipādakaṃ kauṣītakivākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । tatra kiṃ virajānadītaraṇā-
nantaraṃ karmahāniḥ uta dehatyāgātprākkāle iti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । śrutibalānnadītaraṇānantarameveti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu,
sāṃparāye</pratika>=dehatyāgātprākparalokasādhanībhūtavidyākala eva karmahāniryuktā । kutaḥ । <pratika>tartavyābhāvāt</pratika>=nadītaraṇānantaraṃ
tartavyasya prāptavyasya puṇyapāpakarmaṇaḥ phalāntarasyābhāvāt । karmahānihetorvidyāyāḥ prāksatvātkarmahāniṃ vinā nadītaraṇā-
nupapatteśca । ato jīvata eva vidyāsāmarthyātkarmahāniḥ । <pratika>tathā hyanye</pratika>=tathā tāṇḍyādayo'nye śākhinaśca <quote>‘aśva iva ro-
māṇī’</quote>tyādau jīvaddaśāyāmeva karmahānimadhīyate ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>nanu karmahānervidyāphalatve brahmaprāpteriva dehatyāgottarakālikatvameva syādityāśaṃkyāha---<pratika>sū ।। chandata ubhayāviro-
dhāt ।। 28 ।। chandataḥ</pratika>=svecchāto vidyānuṣṭhānaṃ jīvata eveti taddhetukakarmakṣayo jīvata eva yuktaḥ sati hetau kāryavi-
laṃbāyogāt । <pratika>ubhayāvirodhāt</pratika>=evaṃ sati tāṇḍyādiśrutyorubhayoravirodho'pi bhavatītyarthaḥ । brahmaprāpterdehatyāgaṃ vinā-
nupapatteḥ prakṛte cānupapattyabhāvācca jīvata eva karmakṣaya iti bhāvaḥ ।। idamadhikaraṇaṃ sūtradvayātmakameva । anyatsūtradvayama-
dhikaraṇāntaram । tatrāpi tayoḥ pāṭha paurvāparyaviparyayaścātra mate viśiṣṭaḥ śrīkaṇṭharāmānujamatābhyāmiti vivekaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti bhagavatpādamate sāmparāyādhikaraṇam ।। 16 ।।</head>
<note>(1) <quote>‘eteṣveva sthāneṣu’</quote>---iti kha pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="336"/>
<head>atha gaterarthavattvādhikaraṇam ।। 17 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। gatararthavattvamubhayathā'nyathāhi virodhaḥ ।। 29 ।।</pratika> kvacicchrūyamāṇasyānyatropasaṃhārābhyupagame hānasannidhau
kvacicchrūyamāṇasya devayānasya patho'nyatra sarvatropasaṃhāro'stviti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyedamārabdham । karmahānasaṃnidhau kvaciddevayānaḥ
panthāḥ śrutaḥ nirguṇavidyāsthale kvacinna śrutaḥ । tatra kiṃ devayānopasaṃhāro'sti na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । astīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।
siddhāntastu</pratika>, nāstīti । sa ca sūtrārthavarṇanataḥ spaṣṭībhaviṣyati । yathā---<pratika>gateḥ</pratika>=devayānasya pathaḥ arthavattvamubhayathā-
vibhāgena bhavitumarhati kvacitsaguṇavidyāyāṃ devayānamārgo'sti kvacinnirguṇavidyāyāṃ nāstīti । <pratika>anyathā</pratika>=sarvatra devayāna-
mārgopasaṃhārābhyupagame <quote>‘vidvānpuṇyapāpe vidhūya nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaiti’</quote> iti śrutivirodhaḥ syāt । ato nirguṇavi-
dyāyāṃ mārgopasaṃhāro vyartha ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>nanu tarhi saguṇavidyāyāmapi mārgo vyarthaḥ syādityata āha---<pratika>upapanna</pratika> ityādi ।। gaterubhayathābhāva upapannaḥ । <pratika>talla-
kṣaṇārthopalabdheḥ</pratika>=sā gatirlakṣaṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasya saguṇavidyāphalasya sa tallakṣaṇārthaḥ । tasya śrutiṣūpalabdheḥ । ataḥ saguṇa-
vidyāyāṃ mārgo'rthavān na nirguṇavidyāyām । <pratika>lokavat</pratika>=yathā loke setuvāsināṃ gaṅgāprāptyarthaṃ mārgopekṣito na gaṅgāvā-
sināṃ tadvadityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti gaterarthavattvādhikaraṇam ।। 17 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, idaṃ sūtracatuṣṭyaṃ sāṃparāyādhikaraṇam । <pratika>rāmānujamatetu</pratika> pañcasūtrātmakamidamadhikaraṇamiti viśeṣaḥ ।
bhagavatpādamate adhikaraṇadvayātkamayoḥ aniyamaḥ sarveṣām---yāvadadhikāram---iti sūtrayoruttarayoḥ śrīkaṇṭharāmānujamatānu-
sāreṇa pāṭhakrame paurvāparyaviparyayavatossūtrayoruttarayorādyasya <quote>‘yāvadadhikāra’</quote>miti sūtrasya rāmānujamate sāṃparāyādhikaraṇe'-
ntarbhāvādasya pañcasūtrātmakateti vedyam । yadyapi viṣayavākyapūrvapakṣādikaṃ prāyo'viśiṣṭameva । tathāpi saṃśayādisvarūpe para-
manayormatayoḥ parasparaṃ vailakṣaṇyābhāve'pi kiyadasti vailakṣaṇyaṃ śāṅkaramatāditi viśeṣaḥ । ataḥ prathamaṃ śrīkaṇṭhamatānusāre-
ṇedaṃ nirūpyate---viṣayavākyaṃ pūrvavat । pūrvoktaṃ puṇyupāpavimocanaṃ kiṃ dehaviyogakāla ekadeśaḥ kṣīyate adhvani śiṣṭami-
tyūbhayatra cintanīyaṃ vā uta dehaviyogakāla eva sarvaṃ kṣīyata iti cintanīyaṃ veti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । dehaviyogakāla eva sarvaṃ
kṣīyate iti cintanīyamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । tadupapādakāni trīṇi sūtrāṇi । <pratika>siddhāntastu</pratika>, dehaviyogakāle virajānadya-
tikramaṇe cetyubhayatraivetyeva cintanīyamiti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu</pratika>, ubhayaśrutisadbhāve'pi sukṛtaduṣkṛtahāniḥ sāṃparāye dehaviyoga-
kāla eveti cintanīyā । kutaḥ । <pratika>tartavyābhāvāt</pratika>=tadanantaraṃ brahmaprāptivyatirekeṇa prāptavyasya karmasādhyasya sukhaduḥkha-
bhogyasyābhāvāt । <pratika>tathā hyanye</pratika>=<quote>‘tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye atha saṃpatsye’</quote> iti dehaviyogādūrdhvaṃ brahma prāptameva
anye śākhino'dhīyate hi ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। chandata ubhayāvirodhāt ।। 28 ।।</pratika> evaṃ dehaviyogakāla eva sarvakarmakṣaye'vadhṛte <pratika>ubhayāvirodhāt</pratika>=<quote>‘aśva
iva romāṇi vidhūya pāpam’</quote> <quote>‘tasya tāvadeva cira’</quote> mityubhayaśrutyavirodhāt caramaśruto'pi <quote>‘tatsukṛtaduṣkṛte vidhūnute’</quote> iti
vākyakhaṇḍaḥ <quote>‘etaṃ devayānaṃ panthānamāpadye’</quote>ti vākyakhaṇḍātprāk <pratika>chandataḥ</pratika>=icchānusāreṇa netavya ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। upapannastallakṣaṇārthopalabdherlokavat ।। 29 ।।</pratika> dehaviyogakāle sarvakarmakṣaye'pi gatividhiḥ upapanna eva
brahmopāsakānām । kutaḥ । <pratika>tallakṣaṇārthopalabdheḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘sa svarāṭbhavati tasya sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati’</quote> ityādinā ta-
ttaddeśavihāracandrasaṃvādādisarvārthasiddhisaṃbhavāt । yathā---<pratika>lokavat</pratika>=yathā loke rājāśritānāṃ puruṣāṇāmanitarapuruṣasā-
dhāraṇasarvārthasiddhiḥ tadvat devayānādimārgaśrutirapi na bādhyate vidyāmāhātmyālliṅgaśarīrāvasthānena mārgagatyādikamupapanname-
veti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p>evaṃ prāpte <pratika>siddhāntamāha---sū ।। gaterarthavattvamubhayathā'nyathāhi virodhaḥ ।। 30 ।।</pratika> dehaviyogakāle virajā-
nadyatikramaṇakāle cetyubhayathā karmakṣaye satyeva <pratika>gateḥ</pratika>=devayānagateḥ <pratika>arthavattvaṃ</pratika>=prayojanavattvaṃ sidhdyati । <pratika>anyathā</pratika>=dehavi-
yogakāla eva sarvakarmakṣaye tadanantaramevāsau mukta iti devayānagaterniṣprayojanatvāt devayānagatiśravaṇasya <quote>‘paraṃ jyotirupa-
saṃpadye’</quote>ti devayānena pathā brahmaprāptyanantarameva dhīvikāsādirūpasvarūpāvirbhāvaśravaṇasya ca virodhaḥ syāt । ataḥ dehaviyo-
gakāle virajānadyatikrame cetyubhayatra sukṛṃtaduṣkṛtahāniścintanīyeti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, tu pañcasūtrātmake'trādhikaraṇe viṣayavākyasaṃśayapūrvapakṣādīnāṃ prāyaḥ śrīkaṇṭhamatasāmye'pi sūtrārthani-
rūpeṇa siddhāntopanyāse ca kiyānasti bhedaḥ । <pratika><quote>‘gaterarthavattvam’</quote> <quote>‘upapannastallakṣaṇārthaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘yāvadadhikāramavasthitiḥ’</quote></pratika>
ityādhikrameṇa sūtrapāṭhe matadvayamapyanusṛtamubhayamatavilakṣaṇatayā ‘yāvadadhikārasūtraṃ sāṃparāyādhikaraṇe'ntarbhāvya taccheṣatayā
vyākhyātam । atrādhikaraṇe ādyayossūtrayorarthavarṇanamapi śrīkaṇṭhīyāmeva prakriyāmanukarotītyato'vaśiṣṭasūtratrayārtha eva
nirūpyate---yathā । <pratika>sū ।। gaterarthavatvamubhayathā'nyathāhi virodhaḥ ।। 30 ।। gateḥ</pratika>=devayānena gatiśrute<pratika>rarthavattvaṃ</pratika>
<pb n="337"/>
atha ādhikārikādhikaraṇam ।। 18 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। yāvadadhikāramavasthikirādhikārikāṇām ।। 31 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatrābhihitamupāsakānāṃ puṇyapāpavimocanaṃ, brahmaprāptiśca । tadihādhikāri-
kāṇāmadhikārabhogamantareṇa muktirasti na veti saṃśayaḥ ।।
kiṃ tāvat prāptam ? vasiṣṭhādīnāmadhikāriṇāṃ tatra tatra purāṇādiṣu janmā-
ntaraśravaṇāt teṣāṃ muktirnāstyeva। atastatvavidāṃ pākṣikī mokṣaprāptiriti ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha ādhikārikādhikaraṇam ।। 18 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। yāvadadhikāramavasthitirādhikārikāṇām ।। 31 ।।</pratika> saṃgatisūcanārthaṃ vṛttama-
nuvadati---<pratika>pūrvatreti ।</pratika> viduṣo dehaviyogakāle vidyayā sarvakarmakṣayaḥ yāvadvirajānadītaraṇaṃ
dhīsaṃkocādivyavasthāpakakarmaleśamātrasyānuvṛttirityuktam । tadidamanupannam । viduṣā-
mapi punarjanmāntaraśravaṇena vidyayā mukteḥ sarvakarmakṣayasya cāniyatatvādityākṣepikī saṃga-
tiriti bhāvaḥ । vidyayā muktirniyatā na veti saṃśaye tadarthasaṃśayo bhāṣye darśitaḥ । <pratika>pākṣi-
kīti</pratika> । yadyapi śukādīnāṃ dehāvasāne muktiḥ smaryate tathāpi vasiṣṭhādīnāṃ dehāntaraśrava-
ṇādvidyayā muktiḥ karmakṣayaścetyubhayaṃ na niyatam । na ca vasiṣṭhādīnāṃ prārabdhānuvṛttirasti ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dehaviyogakāle'dhvani cetyubhayathā karmakṣaye satyeva । <pratika>anyathā</pratika>=dehaviyogakāla eva sarvakarmakṣaye sati sūkṣmaśarīrasyāpyā-
rambhakanāśena sthityanupapatterdevayānagatiśrutirhi virudhyate ।।</p>
<p>pariharati---<pratika>sū ।। upapannastallakṣaṇārthopalabdherlokavat ।। 31 ।।</pratika> bhagavantamupāsīnānāṃ dehaviyogakāle sarva-
karmakṣaye'pyupapanno devayānaḥ panthāḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>tallakṣaṇārthopalabdheḥ</pratika>=akarmalabhyārthopalabdherityarthaḥ । <quote>‘sa kharāṭbhavati
tasya sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavatī’</quote>tyādiṣu upalabhyate hyakarmalabhyārtho brahmopāsīnānām । <pratika>lokavat</pratika>=yathā loke rā-
jānamupāsīnānāṃ prākṛtapuruṣāsādhāraṇātiramaṇīyanekārthasiddhiḥ tadvatsarvajñaṃ satyasaṃkalpaṃ mahodāraṃ paraṃ brahmopāsīnānāṃ sarva-
mupapannamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>dehapātasamaya eva sarvakarmakṣaye tadūrdhvaṃ karmaphalabhogābhāvātkathaṃ visiṣṭhādīnāṃ jñānināmapi dehāntarasaṃyogaḥ putravipattyā-
diṣu duḥkhādyanubhavaścopapadyetetyāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>yāvadadhikāramityādi</pratika> । yeṣāṃ jñānināṃ dehapātādanantaramarcirādikā gatiḥ
prāptā teṣāṃ tadūrdhvaṃ taritavyakarmaphalabhogābhāvāddehapātasamaya eva sarvakarmakṣaya uktaḥ । vasiṣṭhādīnāmādhikārikāṇāṃ tu yā-
vadadhikārasamāpti nārcirādikā gatirasti । api tvadhikāre'vasthitireva । adhikārahetubhūtakarmaṇaḥ phaladānāyārabdhatvāt ।
jñānino'pyārabdhaṃ hi karma phalānubhavenaiva kṣīyate ।। iti ।।</p>
<head>iti rāmānujamate sāṃparāyādhikaraṇam ।। 17 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, ādyasūtrasya pūrvādhikaraṇe'ntarbhāvāt <quote>‘chandata’</quote> ityādyevedamadhikaraṇam । evaṃ tarhi muktasyopāsanava-
tkarmāpi niyatamasti vā na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । vidhyabhāvasya bhagavatpūjātmakatvena tadicchāviṣayatvasaṃbhavasya cāviśeṣāt <quote>‘kṛ-
ṣṇo muktairijyate vītamohai’</quote>riti bhāratavacanācca karmāpyupāsanavanniyatamastviti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu sū ।। chandata
ubhayāvirodhāt ।। 29 ।।</pratika> muktāḥ chandataḥ svecchāmanusṛtyaiva karma kurvanti na vidhitaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>ubhayāvirodhāt</pratika>=
karmakaraṇākaraṇayorvidhibandhapratyavāyayorabhāvādityarthaḥ ।। tasmānmuktānāṃ karmāniyatameveti ।। <pratika>sū ।। gaterarthavattvamubhaya-
thānyathāhi virodhaḥ ।। 30 ।।</pratika> hirhetau ।। <pratika>ubhayathāhi</pratika>=bandhapratyavāyayorabhāvādeva । <pratika>gateḥ</pratika>=mukteḥ । <pratika>arthavattvam</pratika>=
puruṣārthatvam । anyathā mūktau bandhapratyavāyayorbhāve । <pratika>virodhaḥ</pratika>=muktessaṃsārasamatvena puruṣārthatvarūpavirodhaḥ syādityarthaḥ ।।
<pratika>sū ।। upapannastallakṣaṇārthopalabdherlokavat ।। 31 ।।</pratika> yathā loke yāgāṅgaviṣṇukramaṇasya kriyānuṣṭhānaniyamaḥ na yā-
gāṅgasaṃpūrtyanantaramapyasti kiṃtu kadācideva tathā muktānāṃ kadācitkarma kurvanti na vetyevaṃ tāva<pratika>dupapannaḥ</pratika>=yuktaḥ । kuta
etat । <pratika>tallakṣaṇārthopalabdheḥ</pratika>=tallakṣaṇasya paraṃparayā karmasādhyasyārthasya mokṣasya upalabdheḥ prāptatvādityarthaḥ ।। iti ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ sāṃparāyādhikaraṇam ।। 17 ।।</head>
<pb n="338"/>
<p>atrocyate---adhikāripuruṣāṇāṃ dehapātādūrdhvamapi phalāntarānubhava eva ā
prārabdhādhikārahetukarmavināśāt । evaṃ ca yāvadadhikārasamāptistāvat taddhetuka-
rmānubhavāya tatraiva teṣāmavasthitirnārcirādiprāptiḥ । jñānināmapi prārabdhaṃ karmā-
nubhavādeva naśyati । ato'dhikāriṇāmadhikāranivṛtteranantaraṃ muktiriti tattva-
vidāṃ na pākṣikī mokṣaprāptiriti ।।
ityādhikārikādhikaraṇam ।। 18 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
aprārabdhasyaiva vidyānāśyatvaniyama iti na niyamabhaṅga iti vācyam । pratiśarīramārambha-
kakarmaṇāṃ bhinnatvena yasmindehe vidyotpannavā tadāraṃbhakātiriktānāṃ sarveṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ vidyānā-
śyatvaniyamasya vaktavyatvena niyamabhaṅgasyāparihāryatvāditi bhāvaḥ । <pratika>ā prārabdheti</pratika> । a-
nekadehāraṃbhakamapyekaṃ karmāsti । śvasūkarakharoṣṭrāṇāṃ gojāvimṛgapakṣiṇām । caṇḍālapu-
lkasānāñca brahmahā yonimṛcchati’ ।। ityādismaraṇāt । ato vasiṣṭhādīnāmādhikārikapada-
prāpakaṃ karmānekadehānubhāvyamiti teṣāṃ caramadehe vidyayā sarvakarmakṣayapūrvikā muktiḥ । ato
nāsti niyamabhaṅga iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>ityādhikārikādhikaraṇam ।। 18 ।।</head>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha ādhikārikādhikaraṇam ।। 18 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। yāvadadhikāramavasthitirādhikārikāṇām ।। 31 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>janma vasiṣṭhādīnāṃ viduṣāmavagamyate purāṇeṣu । tasmānmokṣaprāptisteṣāmapi pākṣikī bhāti ।। 250 ।।</l></lg>

<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>ityādhikārikādhikaraṇam ।। 18 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha ādhikārikādhikaraṇam ।। 18 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। yāvadadhikāramavasthitirādhikārikāṇām ।। 31 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ muktiphalatvānnirguṇavidyāyāṃ mārgo nirarthakaḥ । brahmalokaprāptiphalatvātsaguṇavidyāyāṃ mārgassarva-
trārthavāniti vyavasthā kṛtā । sā na yuktā । nirguṇopāsakānāmapītihāsādau punarjanmadarśanena nirguṇavidyāyā muktisādha-
natvāsaṃbhavādityākṣepasaṅgatyedamārabhyate---<pratika>yāvadadhikāramiti</pratika> । apāntaratamā nāma kalidvāparayossandhau viṣṇuniyo-
gātkṛṣṇadvaipāyanassaṃbabhūve’tyādinā apāntaratamovasiṣṭhādīnāṃ nirguṇabrahmavidāṃ punarjanma smaryate । tatra kiṃ viduṣo vartamānade-
hapātānantaraṃ dehāntaraprāptirasti uta nāsti iti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । astīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, apāntaratamaḥprabhṛtī-
nāmādhikārikāṇāṃ lokavyavasthāhetuṣvadhikāreṣu parameśvareṇa niyuktānāṃ samyagdarśanataḥ prakṣīṇakarmaṇāṃ <pratika>yāvadadhikāramava-
sthitiḥ</pratika>=yāvatprārabdhakarmāvasthitiḥ, tasya prārabdhakarmaṇo bhogena kṣaye pratibandhakāntarābhāvādapratibandhasākṣātkāro varta-
mānadehapātānantaraṃ kaivalyaṃ saṃpādayatīti na dehāntaraprāptiriti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, viṣayavākyapūrvapakṣādikaṃ sarvamaviśiṣṭam । vasiṣṭhādīnāmādhikārikāṇāṃ muktirasti na veti saṃdihya
teṣāṃ pākṣikī mokṣaprāptiriti <pratika>pūrvapakṣe</pratika> prāpte teṣāmadhikāranivṛtteranantaraṃ muktirasti na pākṣikī mokṣaprāptirjñānināmādhi-
kārikāṇāmiti <pratika>siddhāntitam</pratika> । sūtrārtho rāmānujamatevadeva ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, asya sūtrasya pūrvādhikaraṇaśeṣatayā tatraiva vyākhyātatayā nātra punaḥ prapañcanamiti vedyam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, asya sūtrasya <quote>‘akṣaradhiyā’</quote>mityuttarasūtreṇaikādhikaraṇyāduttarādhikaraṇe tadvyākhyāsyate iti nātra
tatprasaktiriti bodhyam ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmādhikārikādhikaraṇam ।। 18 ।।</head>
<pb n="339"/>
atha aniyamādhikaraṇam ।। 19 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। aniyamassarveṣāmavirodhaśśabdānumānābhyām ।। 32 ।।</sutra>
upakosalādyupāsaneṣvarcirādigatirāmnāyate । sā kiṃ tanniṣṭhānāmeva, uta
sarvopāsakānāmiti saṃśayaḥ ।।
chāndogye pañcāgnividyāyāmupakosalavidyāyāṃ cārcirādigatiḥ paṭhitā, pāśu-
patavidyāyāmatharvaśirasi sūcitā, śāṇḍilyavidyādiṣu na paṭhitā । prakaraṇava-
śāt yāsu śrutā tāsveva niyatā nāparāsu ।।
iti pūrvapakṣe prāpte brūmaḥ---yāsu śrutā tāsveveti na niyamaḥ, api tu sarvā-
sūpāsanāsu bhavati । tathā satyeva śrutismṛtibhyāmavirodhaḥ । pañcāgnividyāyāṃ
<quote>‘ye ceme'raṇye śraddhā tapa ityupāsate te'rciṣamabhisaṃbhavanti’</quote> ityaviśeṣaṇa śrutiḥ ।
smṛtirapi <quote>‘agnirjyotirahaḥ śuklaḥ’</quote> ityaviśeṣakā । tataḥ sarveṣāmupāsakānāma-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha aniyamādhikaraṇam ।। 19 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। aniyamassarveṣāmavirodhaśśabdānumānābhyām ।। 32 ।।</pratika> viduṣo muktiri-
vārcirādigatirapi niyateti samarthyata iti saṃgatiḥ । upakosalavidyāpañcāgnividyāparyaṃka-
vidyādiṣu sā samāmnātā kāsucitsūcitā । yathā pāśupatavidyāyāmatharvaśirasi <quote>‘ayaṃ
paṃthā vitata uttareṇa yena devā yena ṛṣayo yena pitaraḥ prāpnuvaṃti paramaparaṃ parāyaṇaṃ ce’</quote>ti
śāṇḍilyavidyādiṣu na spṛṣṭā sā sarvāsu vidyāsu bhavati na veti sarvavidyā saṃbaṃdhapratipā-
dakavākyābhāvābhāvābhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvapakṣaḥ---yathāprakaraṇaṃ vyavatiṣṭhate । anyathā karmakā-
ṇḍe'pi dharmāṇāṃ pāriplavatā syāt । na ca <quote>‘yecāmī araṇya’</quote>ityādibṛhadāraṇyakavākyāt
<quote>‘ye ce me'raṇye śraddhāṃ tapa ityupāsate te'rciṣa’</quote>mityādi chāṃdogyavākyācca tasyāssarvavi-
dyāsvanvayaśśaṅkanīyaḥ tayorhi satyatapaśśabdau satyavacananiyamalakṣaṇatapoviśeṣavācinau na
tu brahmavācinau । tapaśśabdasya brahmaṇyaprasiddhatvena tayossatyavacana eva paryavasānaucityā-
ttayorbrahmaviṣayatāyāmekasminneva chāṃdogye pañcāgnividyāyāmupakosalavidyāyāñca dviḥpāṭhasya
vaiyarthyaprasaṃgācca । śākhaikye pratipattṛbhedena sāphalyāsaṃbhavāt । na ca vājisaneyaśākhāgataśā-
ṇḍilyavidyānyāyena ekatra vidhiranyatrānuvāda iti niyantuṃ śakyate । vinigamakābhāvāt ।
<quote>‘ācāryastu te gatiṃ vakte’</quote>ti gatyuktipariśeṣeṇa <quote>‘vettha yadito'dhi prajāḥ prajāyaṃte’</quote> ityā-
dipraśnaprativacanābhyāñcobhayatrāpi tasyāḥ pratipipādayiṣitatvāvagamācceti । siddhāntastu
<quote>‘vidyayā tadārohanti yatra kāmāḥ pratiṣṭhitā na tatra dakṣiṇā yānti nāvidvāṃsastapasvina’</quote>
iti śrutervidyāṃ vinā satyavacanarūpeṇa tapasārcirādiprāptyasaṃbhavādbha‍ūmavidyāyāmiva satya-
śabdasya rūḍhyā brahmaviṣayatvāt । tatsamānārthasya tapaśśabdasyā'pi <quote>‘tapasā brahma vijijñā-
sasva tapo brahmetī’</quote>ti śrutau tapaḥprāpyatvena śrute brahmaṇi lakṣaṇopapatteḥ । <quote>‘agnirjyotirahaḥ
śuklaḥ ṣaṇmāsā uttarāyaṇam । tatra prayātā <pratika>gacchanti brahma brahmavido janā</pratika>’</quote> iti brahmavi-
nmātrasyārcirādigatipratipādakatadupabṛṃhaṇasmṛtisadbhāvācca । smṛtyanugṛhītavākyapramāṇa-
balātprakaraṇamullaṃdhya sarvāsu vidyāsu bhavatyarcirādigatiḥ । chāṃdogye prathamapaṭhitāyāmupako-
<pb n="340"/>
rcirādigatirniyataiva । kecidāhuḥ---aniyamaḥ, sarveṣāmupāsakānāmarcirādigatau
niyamābhāvaḥ; tathā sati śrutismṛtibhyāmavirodha iti । tatrāpi na doṣaḥ । ni-
ranvayopāsakānāṃ tadapekṣā'bhāvāditi ।।
ityaniyamādhikaraṇam ।। 19 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
salavidyāyāṃ tasyā vidhiḥ pañcāgnividyāyāṃ <quote>‘ye ceme'raṇya’</quote>ityādinā sarvavidyāsaṃbandhapra-
tipādanārthaṃ <quote>‘vettha patordevayānasya pitṛyāṇasya vyāvartanā’</quote> iti pṛṣṭe devayānapitṛyāṇa-
vyāvartakapratipādanārthaṃ ca tadanuvādaḥ । ataeva devayānapitṛyāṇobhayaviṣayayoḥ praśnapra-
tivacanayorapyupapattiḥ । devayānasya svarūpeṇānuvādyatve'pi pitṛyāṇavyāvartakadharmavattvena
pratipipādayiṣitatvātpitṛyāṇasya svarūpeṇā'pi pratipipādayiṣitatvācceti । na <quote>‘nvarcirā-
dinā tatprathite’</quote>rityadhikaraṇe vidūṣāmarcirādimārgavyatirekeṇa mārgāṃtaraṃ nāstiti sthāpa-
yiṣyante । bhāvyaṃ cāvaśyaṃ deśāntarasthitabrahmaprāptyarthāsu sarvāsvapi vidyāsu mārgeṇa ।
ato vākyāsamarthane'pyaśakyavyavasthānālliṅgāderarcirādigaterdeśāntarasthitabrahmaprāptyarthasa-
rvavidyānvayassidhyati kimanenādhikaraṇena । na ca liṅgādbrahmaprāptyarthamarcirādigateranvaya-
siddhāvapi sarvāsu vidyāsvanuciṃtanīyatvaṃ na sidhyati । yāsu paṭhyate tāsvevānuciṃtanīyeti
śaṅkā syāttannivṛttyarthamidamadhikaraṇamiti vācyam । brahmaprāptyupāyatayā sarvavidyānvaya-
siddhau hānopāyananyāyena phalakoṭiniviṣṭatayaiva sarvatrānuciṃtanīyatvasyāpi siddhisaṃbha-
vāt । na ca chāṃdogye dviḥpāṭho liṅgātsarvatrānvaye vyarthaḥ syādityadhikaśaṅkānirākaraṇārtha-
midamadhikaraṇamiti vācyam । pañcāgnividyāyāṃ sarvavidyānvayavākyasya vyāvartakadharmavacanasya
prāgapratipannasya sattvena tadarthaṃ prākpratipannagatyanuvāda iti śāṇḍilyavidyāvyutpāditanyā-
yasaṃcāreṇāvagaṃtuṃ śakyatvāditi manyamānānāṃ keṣāṃcidabhimatāṃ prakārāntareṇa sūtrayojanāṃ
darśayati---<pratika>kecidāhuriti</pratika> । nanu yadi sarveṣāmupāsakānāṃ nārcirādigatiḥ, tarhi eṣāṃ na
sā te kathaṃ brahma prāpnuyurityāśaṃkya tanmatamupapādayati---<pratika>tatrāpi na doṣa iti</pratika> । nira-
nvayopāsakāḥ guṇānvayarahitanirviśeṣabrahmopāsakāḥ teṣāṃ na deśāṃtarasthaṃ saguṇaṃ brahma prā-
ptavyaṃ yānadhikṛtya <quote>‘na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanti atraiva samavalīyante’</quote> ityādiśrutayastada-
nusāriṇyaḥ smṛtayaśceti teṣāmāśayaḥ ।।</p>
