<head>atha aniyamādhikaraṇam ।। 19 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। aniyamassarveṣāmavirodhaḥ śabdānumānābhyām ।। 32 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>upakosalavidyādiḥ śruto na sarvāsu vidyāsu । prakaraṇaniyaṃtritatvātprasārayatyarcirādiko mārgaḥ ।। 252 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>ye ceme'raṇya iti śrutivākyātsarvavidyāsu । labdhānvayasya tasya prakriyayā nāstyavacchedaḥ ।। 253 ।।</l></lg>
<head>ityaniyamādhikaraṇam ।। 19 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha aniyamādhikaraṇam ।। 19 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। aniyamassarveṣāmavirodhaḥ śabdānumānābhyām ।। 32 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ saguṇanirguṇavidyāsu mārgasya bhāvābhāvavyavasthā yathoktā tathā saguṇavidyāsvapi vyavasthāsviti
<pb n="341"/>
atha akṣaradhyadhikaraṇam ।। 20 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। akṣaradhiyāṃ tvavarodhaḥ sāmānyatadbhāvābhyāmaupasadavattaduktam ।। 33 ।।</sutra>
gārgibrāhmaṇe---<quote>‘asthūlamanaṇvahrasvam’</quote> ityādau brahmabodhāya kecana niṣedhāḥ
śrutāḥ । ātharvaṇe ca <quote>‘yattadadreśyamagrāhyamagotramavarṇam’</quote> ityādau śrutāḥ । teṣā-
mānandādivadupasaṃhāro'sti na veti saṃśayaḥ ।
kiṃ prāpnoti ? teṣāṃ niṣedhānāmānandādivat guṇatvābhāvānna sarvāsu paravi-
dyāsūpasaṃhāraḥ ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha akṣaradhyadhikaraṇam ।। 20 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। akṣaradhiyāṃ tvavarodhassāmānyatadbhāvābhyāmaupasadavattaduktam ।। 33 ।।</pratika>
arcirādigativadasthūlatvādīnāmapi sarvavidyāsādhāraṇyaṃ pratipādyata iti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatiḥ ।
dvitīyayojanāyāṃ pratyudāharaṇasaṃgatiḥ । asthūlatvādīnāṃ sarvāsu vidyāsūpasaṃhāro'sti na
veti tadapekṣānapekṣābhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvapakṣaḥ । prakaraṇaviśeṣāmnātānāmeṣāṃ nopasaṃhāraḥ । āna-
ndādivatsvarūpapratipattyarthatvābhāvāt <quote>‘labdharūpe kvacitkiṃci’</quote>diti nyāyenāvagatasvarūpa
eva dharmiṇi niṣedharūpāṇāṃ teṣāṃ bodhyatvātsarvajñatvasatyasaṃkalpatvāditprāptavyaphalatvā<quote>‘ditare
tvarthasāmānyā’</quote>diti nyāyena teṣāmupasaṃhāreṇa bhāvyamiti cenna । <quote>‘niravadyaṃ nirañjana’</quote>mi-
tyādau sāmānyataḥ śrutasya nirdoṣatvamātrasyopasaṃhāreṇāpi cāritārthyāddoṣaviśeṣaṇāṃ prāti-
svikābhāvopasaṃhārāpekṣāyāñca nānāśākhāmnātānāṃ teṣāmānantyopasaṃhārasyāśakyatvāt ।
gārgibrāhmaṇamuṇḍakāmnātānāmasthūlatvādīnāmeva sakaladoṣābhāvopalakṣaṇatvāṅgīkāre tatta-
dvidyāmnātānāṃ yatkiṃciddoṣābhāvānāmeva tathātvasaṃbhavenāsthūlatvādyapekṣaṇasya vaiyarthyāditi ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyedamārabhyate saguṇopāsane kvacitpāñcāgnyupāsanādiṣu mārgaḥ śrūyate kvacittu vaiśvānarādiṣu na śrūyate । tatra
kiṃ yeṣu mārgaḥ śrutaḥ teṣāmeva tasya niyamaḥ kiṃ vā sarveṣāmaniyama iti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । vidyāviśeṣaprakaraṇā<pratika>nniyama</pratika> iti <pratika>pū-
rvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika> sarveṣāṃ saguṇopāsanānāṃ mārgasyāniyamaḥ । aniyamābhyupagame prakaraṇavirodhaḥ syāditi cenna ।
<pratika>avirodhaḥ</pratika>=naiṣo'sti virodhaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>śabdānumānābhyām</pratika>=<quote>‘tadya itthaṃ viduḥ ye ceme'raṇye śraddhā tapa ityupāsate
te'rciṣamabhisaṃbhavanti’</quote>ityādyāḥ śrutayaḥ, <quote>‘śuklakṛṣṇe gatī hyete jagataḥ śāśvate mate । ekayā yātyanāvṛttimanyayā''vartate
punaḥ ।।’</quote> ityādyāḥ smṛtayaḥ tābhyāmityarthaḥ । evaṃ ca pañcāgnividāmiva vidyāntaraśīlināmapyaviśeṣeṇa arcirādimārgaprati-
pādakavākyena prakaraṇaṃ bādhyamiti bodhyam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> ca viṣayavākyasaṃdehādikaṃ pūrvavadeva । <pratika>śrīkaṇṭhabhāṣye</pratika> paraṃ <quote>‘kecidāhuḥ’</quote> ityā-
rabhya <pratika>aniyamaḥ</pratika>=sarveṣāmupāsakānāmarcirādigatau niyamābhāvaḥ । tathā sati śrutismṛtibhyāmavirodha iti । tatrāpi na
doṣaḥ । niranvayopāsakānāṃ tadapekṣābhāvāditi sūtrārtho'nyathāpi varṇitaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti śrīkaṇṭharāmānujamatayoraniyamādhikaraṇam ।। 19 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, <quote>‘yāvadadhikāra’</quote>miti sūtrasya bhagavatpādamatavad <pratika><quote>‘aniyama’</quote></pratika> iti sūtrānantarameva pāṭhaḥ । upasaṃhṛti-
vadyogyāyogyavibhāgena jñāniṣu mokṣaḥ keṣāṃcidasti keṣāṃcinnāstīti niyamo'sti vā na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । jñānināṃ madhye
keṣāṃcinmokṣo'sti keṣāṃcinneti niyamo'stīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣe</pratika> prāpte nāstīti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu, aniyamaḥ</pratika>=apa-
rokṣajñānināṃ madhye keṣāṃcinmokṣaḥ keṣāṃcinnetyevaṃrūpavyavasthābhāvo jñāyate । kutaḥ । sarveṣāmapi mokṣe'virodhāt niṣedhakā-
bhāvāt । kiṃca । <pratika>śabdānumānābhyām</pratika>=<quote>‘nakaści’</quote>diti śruteḥ tanmūlakānumānāccetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmaniyamādhikaraṇam ।। 19 ।।</head>
<pb n="342"/>
<p>iti prāpte brūmaḥ---akṣarasambandhinīnāṃ niṣedhadhiyāṃ sarvāsu paravidyāsūpasaṃ-
hāro yuktaḥ, guṇino brahmaṇaḥ sarvatraikatvāt । etairhi guṇaiḥ sakaletaravyāvṛttabra-
hyānusandhānopapattirnānyathā, heyaguṇasaṃbandhānarhā ānandādayo hi pratyagātmanaḥ
sakāśāt brahmaṇo vyāvartakāḥ, pradhānānuvṛttitvaṃ guṇasya svabhāvaḥ । yathā jāma-
dagnya—catūrā—trapuroḍāśādyupasadga‍uṇabhūtasya <quote>‘agnirhotraṃ vetvadhvaram’</quote> ityādimantrasya
sāmavedapaṭhitatvena sāmavedasvarasyoccaistvasya prāptāvapi yājurvedikapradhānopasada-
nuvṛttitvādupāṃśuguṇatvam । taduktaṃ prathame kāṇḍe <quote>‘guṇamukhyavyatikrame tadarthatvā-
nmukhyena vedasaṃyogaḥ’</quote> iti ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
siddhāntastu jñānānandādīnāṃ jī1veṣvapi sattvena tadvailakṣaṇyadṛḍhīkaraṇārthaṃ doṣābhāvarū-
pāṇāṃ teṣāmapyupasaṃhāraḥ kāryaḥ । sāmānyato doṣābhāvānusaṃdhānādapi jīveṣu saṃbhāvitānāṃ
doṣaviśeṣāṇāṃ viśiṣyābāvānusaṃdhāne tadvailakṣaṇyadārḍhyalābhāt । na ca nirdoṣatvamātraṃ vi-
dyānuṣṭhānakā2le'nusandheyaṃ taddārḍhyārthamasthūlatvādayo'nnamayādyuktarītyā vidyānuṣṭhānātprā-
geva śravaṇamanananakālayoranusaṃdhātavyā ityastviti vācyam । <quote>‘sarvamanyatparityajye’</quote>ti vaca-
nabalāddevatāviśeṣarūpāṇāmannamayādīnāṃ vidyānuṣṭhānakāle'nusaṃdhānāyogāttyāge'pi ci-
ranirantarābhyāsena dārḍhyātiśayahetūnāmasthūlatvādīnāṃ tyāge hetvabhāvāt । na cānantyā-
dupasaṃhārasaṃbhavaḥ । <quote>‘asthūla’</quote>mityā<quote>‘dyadīrgha’</quote>mityante<quote>‘nāsnāyvanākāśa’</quote>mityantena ca do-
ṣāvahaśarīraniṣedhaḥ, <quote>‘atama’</quote> ityavidyā niṣedhaḥ, <quote>‘acakṣuri’</quote>tyādinā indriyaniṣedhaḥ, ityā-
dirūpeṇa doṣābhāvānāmavacchidya grahaṇasaṃbhavāditi । yadyapi <quote>‘niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śānta’</quote>
mityādiśākhāntaraśrutā api doṣābhāvā upasaṃhāryāḥ । tathāpyasthūlādivākye muṇḍaka-
vākye ca paripūrṇaḥ śarīrendriyādidoṣaniṣedhaḥ śrūyata iti, tadupasaṃhāre sati nānyāpekṣāstī-
tyānantyadoṣaparijihīrṣayā sūtre'kṣaragrahaṇaṃ kṛtam । annamayādivaddoṣaviśeṣābhāvāḥ prāge-
vānusandheyāḥ । vidyākāle mābhūttadanusaṃdhānopasaṃhṛtiriti śaṅkāvāraṇārthaṃ dhiyāmityuktam ।
tuśabdassāmānyataḥ pūrvapakṣanirākaraṇārthaḥ । <pratika>avarodhaḥ</pratika> saṃgrahaḥ । sāmānyatadbhāvābhyāṃ sa-
rvāsu vidyāsūpāsyasya brahmaṇassamānatvātteṣāmasthūlatvādīnāmitaravailakṣaṇyārthaṃ brahmasvarūpa-
pratītidārḍhyasampādanopayogasadbhāvāccetyarthaḥ । aupasadaḥ upasatsaṃbaddhassāmavedotpannastadga‍u-
ṇabhūto mantraḥ । taduktaṃ sāmavedotpannasya mantrasyo<quote>‘ccaissāmne’</quote>ti vihitasvavedasvaramapahāya
<quote>‘upāṃśu yajuṣe’</quote>ti yājurvaidikasvaraparigraheṇa yadyājurvaidikapradhānopasadanuvarttitvaṃ tadga‍uṇamu-
khyādisūtreṇoktamityarthaḥ । <pratika>guṇamukhyayoḥ</pratika> mantropasadoḥ <pratika>vyatikrame</pratika> svasvavedavihitasvaraprāptyā
virodhe sati <pratika>mukhyena</pratika> pradhānānusāreṇa <pratika>vedasaṃyogaḥ</pratika> svaravidhāyakavedasaṃbandhaḥ pradhānavidhi-
vidheyatvādaṅgānāmityarthaḥ । sāmagānāṃ pañcaviṃśatibrāhmaṇe jāmadagnyacatūrātrasyopasatsu e-
kakapālādidvādaśakapālāntapuroḍāśadravyakā dvādaśayāgā vihitāḥ । teṣāṃ ca <quote>‘agnaye verho-
tramaveradhvaramāvitkaraṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vaisvānaramavase karīndrāya devebhyo juhutā haviḥ svāhe’</quote>
tyādyā dvādaśahomamantrāḥ samāmnātāḥ । ta ihodāharaṇam । śabarasvāminā tu nyāyasā-
myādasminnadhikaraṇe'nyadudāhṛtamiti na virodhaḥ । evaṃ yathākathaṃcidupayogavarṇanenāsthūla-
<note>(1) <quote>‘jīve'pi sadbhāvena’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘kāle'nucintanīyaṃ’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="343"/>
naitāvatā sarveṣāmupasaṃhāryatvaprasaktirityāha---
<sutra>sū ।। iyadāmananāt ।। 34 ।।</sutra>
āmananamābhimukhyena mananam, iyadeva guṇajātaṃ sarvatropasaṃhāryam, yena
guṇajātena sakaletaravyāvṛttabrahmamananaṃ bhavati । ato'kṣarabrahmasaṃbandhinīnāmasthū-
latvādiniṣedhadhiyāmeva sakaletaravyāvartakadharmarūpatvādupasaṃhāraḥ parividyāsu, na
tu <quote>‘sarvakarmā sarvakāmaḥ sarvagandhaḥ sarvarasaḥ’</quote> ityādīnāmapīti ।।</p>
iti akṣaradhyadhikaraṇam ।। 20 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p>tvādyupasaṃhārasamarthane sarvavidyāmnātānāṃ sarveṣāmapi brahmaguṇānāṃ sarvatropasaṃhārakalpanā pra-
sajyetetyatiprasaktiśaṅkāparihārārthatvenottarasūtramavatārayati---<pratika>naitāvateti । sū॰ ।। iya-
dāmananāt ।। 34 ।। ābhimukhyena mananamiti</pratika> । ādareṇa ciṃtanamityarthaḥ । ādaro
nirdoṣatve svaprāpyaphalarūpatvaprayuktaḥ । evaṃ ca phalarūpatayāvaśyānusandheyasya doṣābhāvasyaiva
prapañcainānusandhānataḥ parabrahmaṇassarvetaravailakṣaṇyenārthasiddhādānantyādavaśyopasaṃhārāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ
guṇānāṃ sarvatropasaṃhāro na prasajyata iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti akṣaradhyakṣikaraṇam ।। 20 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha akṣaradhyadhikaraṇam ।। 20 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। akṣaradhiyāṃ tvavarodhaḥ sāmānyatadbhāvābhyāmaupasadavattaduktam ।। iyadāmananāt ।। 34 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>ānandādyairguṇoghairitaravisadṛśe labdhabuddhipratiṣṭhe brahmaṇyasthūlavādīnkimiti kalayase sarvavidyānurodhyān ।</l>
<l>viśvopādānatāntaḥsthiti...mathanākṛṣṭadoṣāpanutyā tādrūpthasyopalabdhyai taditarasadṛśaṃ doṣavaśyaṃ hyavaśyam ।। 254 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti akṣaradhyadhikaraṇam ।। 20 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha akṣaradhyadhikaraṇama ।। 20 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। akṣaradhiyāṃ tvavarodhaḥ sāmānyavadbhāvābhyāmaupasadavattaduktam ।। 33 ।। iyadāmananāt ।। 34 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, idaṃ sūtradvayamadhikaraṇadvayātmatayā vibhaktam । asya <quote>‘etadvai tadakṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadantya-
sthūlamanaṇu’</quote>ityādikaṃ bṛhadāraṇyavākyaṃ akṣaramupakramya śrūyamāṇaṃ <quote>‘yattadadreśyamagrāhya’</quote>mityādikamātharvaṇavākyaṃ na viṣayaḥ ।
tatra kiṃ kvacinniṣedhaśrutau aśrutaniṣedhānāṃ śrutyantarādupasaṃhāro'sti na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । nāstīti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । astīti
<pratika>siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu, akṣaradhiyāṃ</pratika>=akṣare brahmaṇi dvaitaniṣedhadhiyaḥ tāsāṃ sarvatra niṣedhaśrutiṣvavarodhaḥ upasaṃhāro
nyāyyaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>sāmānyatadbhāvābhyām</pratika>=dvaitanirāsena brahmapratipādanasya sāmānyaṃ samānatvaṃ, tasya brahmaṇaḥ pratipādyasya
sarvatrabhāvaḥ ekatvena pratyabhijñāyamānatvaṃ tābhyāṃ hetubhyāmityarthaḥ । tatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ---<pratika>aupasadavat</pratika>=yathā jāmadagnye'hīne
puroḍāśinīṣūpasatsu coditānāmaupasadānāmadhvaryukartṛkapuroḍāśeṣāṇāṃ mantrāṇāṃ yatra kvacicchrutānāmapi adhvaryuṇā saṃbandhaḥ
tathā akṣarapramitiśeṣāṇāṃ niṣedhānāṃ yatra kvacicchrutānāmapi akṣareṇa sarvatra saṃbandha ityarthaḥ । <pratika>taduktaṃ</pratika>=<quote>‘‘guṇamukhyavyati
krame tadarthatvānmukhyena vedasaṃyogaḥ’</quote> iti jaimininā prathame kāṇḍe uktamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti bhagavatpādamate akṣaradhyadhikaraṇam ।। 20 ।।</head>
<head>atha iyadadhikaraṇam ।। 21 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। iyadāmananāt ।। 34 ।।</pratika> asya <quote>‘dvā suparṇā sayujā’</quote>ityādyātharvaṇamantraḥ <quote>‘ṛtaṃ pibantā’</quote>viti kāṭhakavākyaṃ ca
viṣayaḥ । tatra kimanayorvidyābhedaḥ utābheda iti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । vidyābheda iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, mantradvaye
vidyāyā abheda eva । kutaḥ । <pratika>iyadāmananāt</pratika>=iyataḥ iyattāvacchinnasya dvitvādacchinnabhayatrāpyabhinnatvena āmananāt
abhidhānādityarthaḥ । atra hi mantradvaye bhoktṛtvānuvādena paramātmā rudraḥ pratipādyaḥ । pibantāviti prayogastu <quote>‘chatriṇo ga-
chantī’</quote>tivadupapadyata ityavirodhaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti bhagavatpādamate iyadadhikaraṇam ।। 21 ।।</head>
<pb n="344"/>
atha antarābhūtagrāmādhikaraṇam ।। 21 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। antarā bhūtagrāmavat svātmano'nyathā bhedānupapattiriti cenno-
padeśa1vat ।। 35 ।।</sutra>
bṛhadāraṇyake <quote>‘yat sākṣādaparokṣāt brahma ya ātmā sarvāntaraḥ taṃ me vyācakṣva’</quote>
ityuṣastipraśne prativacanamevamāmnāyate <quote>‘yaḥ prāṇena prāṇiti sa ta ātmā sarvā-
ntaro yo'pānenāpāniti sa ta ātmā sarvāntaraḥ’</quote> ityādi <quote>‘ato'nyadārtam’</quote>
ityantam । tadanantaraṃ <quote>‘yadeva sākṣādaparokṣāt brahma ya ātmā sarvāntarastaṃ me
vyācakṣva’</quote> iti kaholapraśne tu prativacanamevamāmnāyate <quote>‘yo'śanāyāpipāse śokaṃ
mohaṃ jarāṃ mṛtyumatyetyetaṃ vai tamātmānaṃ viditvā’</quote> ityādi <quote>‘ato'nyadārtam’</quote> itya-
ntam । ihobhayatra vidyaikyaṃ na veti saṃśayaḥ ।।
tathā sati <quote>‘ya ātmā’</quote> ityuṣastipraśnaḥ bhūtagrāmavatpratyagātmaviṣayaḥ । anyathā
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha sarvāntarādhikaraṇam ।। 21 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। antarābhūtavatsvātmano'nyathā bhedānupapattiriti cennopadeśavat ।। 35 ।।</pratika>
doṣābhāvarūpamasthūlatvādikaṃ jīvavyāvartakamityuktaṃ pūrvādhikaraṇe । tarhyaśanāyādyatītameva
jīvavyāvartakānnirdoṣatvādbrahma syāt । prāṇitṛtvādiviśiṣṭastu jīva evetyutthānātsaṃgatiḥ ।
uṣastikahoḻayoryājñavalkyasya ca praśnaprativacanasandarbhayorvidyā bhidyate na vetyuṣasti-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika> tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika> ca idamekamevādhikaraṇam । tayorapi matayoḥ pūrvavadeva viṣayavākyapūrvapakṣādi-
kam । ānandādivatsarvāsu paravidyāsu asthūlatvādayo'pyusaṃhāryā na veti <pratika>saṃdehe</pratika> nopasaṃhāryā iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣe</pratika> prāpte upasaṃ-
hāryāṃ eveti siddhāntaḥ । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, akṣaradhiyām</pratika>=akṣarasaṃbandhinīnāmasthūlatvādidhiyāṃ sarvavidyā<pratika>svavarodhaḥ</pratika> saṃ-
grahaṇam । kutaḥ । <pratika>sāmānyatadbhāvābhyām</pratika>=brahmaṇassarvatrasamānatvāt brahmānusaṃdhānāntarbhāvācca tāsām । śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ।।</p>
<p>naitāvatā sarvaṣāmupasaṃhāryatvaprasaktirityāha---<pratika>sū ।। iyadāmananāt ।। 34 ।। āmanana</pratika>mābhimukhyena mananam । <pratika>i-
yat</pratika>=asthūlatvādiviśeṣitamānandādyeva guṇajātaṃ sarvatropasaṃhāryam । yena guṇajātena saṃkaletaravyāvṛttabrahmamananaṃ bhavati tadeva
sarvatrānusaṃdheyaṃ bhavati । anyat <quote>‘sarvakarmā sarvakāma’</quote>ityādikaṃ tu tatra tatra vyavasthitamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti śrīkaṇṭharāmānujamatayorakṣaradhyadhikaraṇam ।। 20 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, <quote>‘yāvadadhikāra’</quote>miti sūtra<quote>‘makṣaradhiyā’</quote>miti sūtraṃceti sūtradvayaṃ <pratika>yāvadadhikārādhikaraṇamiti</pratika>
vyapadiśyate’ <quote>‘iyadāmananāt’</quote>ityādikaṃ sūtratrayamadhikaraṇāntaramiti bodhyam । atrādhikārikādhikaraṇe <quote>‘prāpteśca samañjasa’</quote> mi-
tyādyadhikaraṇeṣūktaḥ upāsakānāmadhikāraniyamo yukto vā na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । pramāṇābhāvānmuktānāmadhikāraniyamo na yukta
iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, ānandavallayādisiddhasya muktāvānandatāratamyasyāpahnotumaśakyatayā tasyaivādhikārani-
yame pramāṇatvāt yasya yāvadga‍uṇopāsane yogyatārūpo'dhikārastasya tadadhikaprayatnakṛterdoṣāvahatvāt muktānāmānandatārata-
myenāsamatve'pi guruṣu śiṣyāṇāmiva parasparaṃ virodhādarśanātparamupakāryopakārakabhāvasaṃbhavācca muktānāmupāsanāyāmadhi-
kāraniyamo yukta eveti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, ādhikārikāṇām</pratika>=yogyatānusāryuṃpāsanaśīlānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ svasvādhikārā-
nusāreṇaiva muktāvavasthitiravasthitānāmupāyanāvattāratamyenaiva muktau teṣāṃ phalamityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>sū ।। akṣaradhiyāmiti</pratika> ।।
tuśabdo'pyarthaḥ । <pratika>akṣaradhiyāṃ</pratika>=brahmajñāninām asamatve'pi <pratika>avirodhaḥ</pratika>=virodho nāsti । kutaḥ । <pratika>sāmānyatadbhāvā-
bhyām</pratika>=brahmavittvāt yanmatsarādidoṣābhāvasāmyaṃ mātsaryādidoṣābhāvaprasañjita uktamebhyo yo'dhamānāmupakārastābhyāṃ ce-
tyarthaḥ । katham । <pratika>aupasadavat</pratika>=yathā guruṣvaupasadānāṃ sacchiṣyāṇāṃ virodhābhāvo dṛśyate tadvat । <pratika>taduktam</pratika>---catuśrutau
<quote>‘nānāvidhā devasaṃghā’</quote>ityādinā asamatve'pi virodho nāstītyuktamato'pyavirodha ityarthaḥ ।। <quote>‘iyadāmananāt’</quote> iti sūtramu-
ttarādhikaraṇe'ntarbhāvitam ।।</p>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyāmakṣaravadhyadhikaraṇam ।। 20 ।।</head>
<note>1 deśāntaravaditi. śāṃ. bhā. pāṭhaḥ.</note>
<pb n="345"/>
<p><quote>‘yaḥ prāṇena prāṇiti sa ta ātmā’</quote> iti tatprativacanaviṣayasya kaholapraśnaprati-
vacanaviṣayasyāśanāyādyatītatvādeśca bhedānupapattiriticet ।।
siddhāntayati---nopadeśavaditi । <quote>‘ya ātmā sarvāntaraḥ’</quote> ityubhayatra praśnaika-
rūpyāt parameśvara evobhayatra praśnaviṣayaḥ । prativacanagataṃ nirupādhikaṃ prāṇānādihe-
tutvamaśanāyādyatītatvaṃ ca tatraiva samupapadyate । sadvidyopadeśavat praśnaprativacanāvṛ-
ttirekaviṣayā । praṣṭṭabhedo rūpabhedaśca na vidyābhedāvahaḥ ।।
tatā hyāha---
<sutra>sū ।। vyatihāro viśiṃṣanti hītaravat ।। 36 ।।</sutra>
arthaikye niścite sati praṣṭrorbuddhivyatihāraḥ kartavyaḥ । uṣastinā'pyaśanāyā-
dyatītatvadhīḥ, kaholenāpi prāṇanādihetutvadhīḥ kāryā । ubhayaprakaraṇagatāni hi
vākyāni parameśvaraṃ viśiṃṣanti, yathetaratra sadvidyāyām । tasmādekasyaiva praśnaprati-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
praśnatatprativacanayorjīvaviṣayatvabrahmaviṣayatvānyatarānavadhāraṇātsaṃśaye pūrvapakṣaḥ । praśnapra-
tivacanāvṛtteruṣastipraśnaprativacanaṃ prāṇitṛtvādiliṃgājjīvaviṣayaṃ । kahoḻapraśnaprativacanamaśa-
nāyādyatītatvaliṃgādbrahmaviṣayamityupāsyabhedācca vidyā bhidyate । yadyapyuṣastipraśno'pi
parabrahmaviṣayaḥ <quote>‘yatsākṣādaparokṣādbrahme’</quote>ti sākṣāttvaviśeṣaṇāt । uṣastipraśnaprativacanānantaraṃ
pravṛttasya kaholapraśnasya parabrahmaviṣayatvena saṃpratipannasya yadeva sākṣādbrahmetyavadhāraṇena uṣa-
stipraśnasamānaviṣayatvāvagamācca । na ca tasyopakramagatasya prativacanānusāreṇa jīvaviṣa-
yatvaṃ kalpayituṃ yuktam । tadanusāreṇa prativacanasyaiva brahmaviṣayatvavarṇanaucityāt । suṣupti-
samayādisādhāraṇanirupādhikaprāṇanavyāpārādikartṛtvasya brahmaṇyeva svārasyādityucyate,
tathāpi praṣṭṭabhedātprāṇitṛtvādyaśanāyātītatvādirūpabhedāccānivāryo vidyābheda iti tatra
prathamapūrvapakṣa udbhāvya prathamasūtreṇa nirākṛtaḥ । tatra bhūtagrāmavattvaṃ svātmamanaśśarīreṃdriya-
prāṇādimattvaṃ tadviśeṣaṇaṃ prāṇitṛtvāderjīvaliṃgatvopapādanārthaṃ śarīrādyaṃtaratvaviṣayatayā
sarvāṃtaratvopapādanārthaṃ ca antarā aṃtare prāthamike sarvāṃtaravākye । aṃtaraśabdātsaptamyā-
<quote>‘ssupāṃsulu’</quote>gityādinā pūrbasavarṇādeśaḥ । tasminbhūtagrāmavataḥ svātmano nirdeśa iti śeṣaḥ ।
dvitīyapūrvapakṣottaratvena dvitīyasūtramavatārayati---<pratika>praṣṭṭabhedo rūpabhedaśceti । tathāhyā-
heti</pratika> । yathā na vidyābhedāvahastathaivopapādayatītyarthaḥ । <pratika>sū॰ ।। vyatihāro viśiṃṣanti
hītaravat ।। 36 ।।</pratika> nanu prakaraṇadvayagatānyapi vākyānyekameva brahma viśiṃṣantu na tāvatā
rūpabhedaprayuktavidyābhedaśaṅkā nivāritā bhavati । na hi khalvetasyaivākṣarasyopavyākhyānaṃ
bhavatītyekamevodgīthāvayavaṃ prastutya taṃ viśiṃṣatsu prāṇākāśahiraṇmayapuruṣādivākyeṣvadhyasa-
nīyātmakarūpabhedaprayukto vidyābhedo nāstītyāśaṅkyetaravaditi sūtrāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>yatheta-
ratreti</pratika> । udgīthaprakaraṇe <quote>‘devāsurā havai yatra saṃ1yetire’</quote>ityārabhya mukhyaprāṇādayaḥ paraspara-
bhinnāḥ parasparavilakṣaṇaguṇayuktāścādhyasanīyatvena vaktuṃ prakrāṃtā iti yuktastatra rūpabhedā-
dvidyābhedaḥ । iha tu sarvāṃtaratvaṃ prakaraṇadvaye'pi samam । <quote>‘atonyadārtta’</quote>mityupasaṃhāro'pi
<note>1 saṃyattā iti—m—pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="346"/>
vacanagatatvānna vidyābhedaḥ punaruktistu śaṅkānirāsāya <quote>‘tattvamasi’</quote> itivat ।।
ityantarābhūtagrāmādhikaraṇam ।। 21 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
samānaḥ । aśanāyādyatītatvamapi nirdoṣatvarūpatvena sakalavidyopasaṃharaṇīyaṃ na guṇānta-
ravadbhedakam । vidyāvidhiścaikatraiva kahoḻapraśnaprativacane śrūyate । <quote>‘tasmadbrahmaṇaḥ pāṇḍityaṃ
nirvidya bālyena tiṣṭhāse’</quote>diti । ato yathā sadupadeśe <quote>‘bhagavāṃstvevametadbravītu bhūya eva mā-
bhagavānvijñāpayatvi’</quote>ti praśnabhede'pi <quote>‘tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo’</quote> iti prati-
praśnottaramupasaṃhāraikyātpratipraśnaṃ bhūyaśśabdaśravaṇānmadhye virodhiguṇāśravaṇācca । ekaivopa-
krāntasadviṣayā vidyā । evamihāpi sarvāṃtarātmabrahmaviṣayaikaiva vidyeti yuktam । na caivaṃ
vidyaikyapramāṇeṣu satsu praṣṭṭabhedamātraṃ vidyābhedāvaham । <quote>‘śi1lakaśśalākāvatyaḥ prācīnaśāla
aupamanyavaḥ’</quote> ityādiṣu vidyaikye'pi bahulaṃ praṣṭṭabhedopalaṃbhāditi bhāvaḥ । nanūdgīthavidyā vai-
śvānaravidyādiṣu praṣṭṭabhedamātraṃ na tu praśnasyaikarūpyamasti । iha tūṣastipraśne yājñavalkyasyo-
ttaraṃ śrutavato'pi kahoḻasya tathaiva sarvāṃtare brahmaṇi praśnaḥ śrūyate । ato vidyāṃtaraparici-
kṣiṣayaivāyaṃ praśna iti vaktavyamityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>punaruktiriti</pratika> । yathā śaṅkāviśeṣanirāka-
raṇāya sadvidyāyāṃ punaḥ punaḥ praśnaḥ yathā vātraivoṣastibrāhmaṇe prāṇitṛtvādinā sarvāṃtaratve
pratipādite'pi jīvavyāvṛttatayā sphuṭaṃ sarvāntaratvopapādakaṃ noktamityuṣastasyaiva <quote>‘yadeva sā-
kṣā’</quote>dityādiḥ kahoḻapraśnaḥ । evaṃ dvitīyoṣastipraśnottareṇāpi <quote>‘na dṛṣṭerdraṣṭāraṃ paśye’</quote>dityādinā
jīvavyāvṛttatayā sphuṭataraṃ sarvāntaratvopapādakaṃ noktamityaparituṣyataḥ kahoḻasya praśnaḥ ।
aśanāyādyatītatvopanyāsena ca tasya paritoṣa ityevaṃ vidyaikye'pi punaruktirupapadyate ।
ataḥ sarvāṃtaratvadārḍhyārthamubhayamubhayatropasaṃhartavyamiti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sarvāntarādhikaraṇam ।। 21 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha sarvāntarādhikaraṇam ।। 21 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। antarābhūtagrāmavatsvātmano'nyathā bhedānupapattiriti cennopadeśavat ।। 35 ।। vyatihāro vi-
śiṃṣanti hītaravat ।। 36 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>yatsākṣādasi jīvo yadeva sākṣāditi tu paraḥ । pratipādyaḥ prāṇibhṛtādyaśanāyārahitatādiliṅgagaṇāt ।। 255 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>sarvāntarādisāmyātsākṣādbrahmaiva rūpyamubhayatra । .........pyekaiva tato vyatihara...tadga‍uṇānāṃ syāt ।। 256 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti sarvāntarādhikaraṇam ।। 21 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha sarvāntarādhikaraṇam ।। 21 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। antarābhūtagrāmavatsvātmano'nyathā bhedānupapattiriti cennopadeśavat ।। 35 ।। vyatihāro
viśiṃṣati hītaravat ।। 36 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, ādyasya sūtrasya <quote>‘antarābhūtagrāmavatsvātmanaḥ’</quote> ityantaṃ yogavibhāgātsūtradvayātmakamidamadhikaraṇam ।
<quote>‘vyatihāra’</quote>ityādikaṃ sūtramadhikaraṇāntaram । ādyasyādhikaraṇasya <quote>‘yatsākṣādaparokṣādbrahma ya ātmā sarvāntaraḥ’</quote> iti dvirā-
mnāyamānaṃ bṛhadāraṇyakavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । tatra kimanayorbrāhmaṇayorvidyābhedaḥ । ata vidyaikyamiti viśayaḥ । vidyābheda iti
<pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu---sū ।। antarā bhūtagrāmavatsvātmanaḥ ।। 35 ।। āmananā</pratika>diti padasyānuṣaṃgaḥ । brāhma-
ṇadvaye'pi svātmanaḥ sarvāntaratvāmananādvidyaikyaṃ vijñeyam । ekasmindehe dvayormukhyataḥ sarvāntaratvāyogāt । kiṃvat । <pratika>bhū</pratika>-
<note>(1) <quote>‘uddālakaśśālāvatyaḥ’</quote> khapāṭhaḥ ।।</note>
<pb n="347"/>
<pratika>tagrāmavat</pratika>=yathā bhūtasamūhātmakasthūladehe pṛthivyapekṣayā jalamāntaraṃ jalāpekṣayā teja ityādikrameṇāpekṣikaṃ bhūtānāmānta-
ratvaṃ na mukhyaṃ tadvat । athavā, <quote>‘eko devassarvabhūteṣu gūḍha’</quote>ityādiśrutyantare sarveṣu bhūtagrāmeṣu sarvāntara eka evātmā''mnāyate
tadvadanayorbrāhmaṇayorityarthaḥ । evaṃca vedyaikyādvidyaikyamiti siddham । iti ।</p>
<p>pūrvapakṣamanūdya dūṣayati---<pratika>sū ।। anyathā bhedānupapattiriticennopadeśāntaravat ।। 36 ।। anyathā</pratika>=vidyābhe-
dānaṅgīkāre । <pratika>bhedānupapattiḥ</pratika>=āmnānabhedasyābhyāsasyānupapattiḥ prayojanābhāvāditi cet । <pratika>na</pratika> । upadeśāntaravadabhyāsa-
syopapattiḥ । tathā hi---yathā chāndogye <quote>‘tattvamasī’</quote>tyupadeśe navakṛto'bhyasyamāne'pi, na vidyā bhidyate upakramopasaṃhāra-
yoraviśeṣāttadvat brāhmaṇadvaye'pi praśnarūpopakramasya <quote>‘ato'nyadārta’</quote>mityupasaṃhārasya cāviśeṣānna vidyābheda iti siddham ।।</p>
<head>iti bhagavatpādamate sarvāntarādhikaraṇam ।। 22 ।।</head>
<head>atha vyatihārādhikaraṇam ।। 23 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। vyatihāro viśiṃṣanti hītaravat ।। 37 ।।</pratika> asya <quote>‘tadyo'haṃ so'sau yo'sau so'ha’</quote>mityaitareyakavākyaṃ <pratika>vi-
ṣayaḥ</pratika> । tatra kiṃ vyatihāreṇa matirekarūpā vidhīyate uta dvirūpeti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । ekarūpeti <pratika>pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>,
vyatihāro'tropāsanārthamupadiśyate । <pratika>itaravat</pratika>=yathā itare sarvātmatvādayo guṇā upāsanārthamupadiśyante tadvat । tathāhi
viśiṃṣanti samāmnātāraḥ <quote>‘tvamahamasmyahaṃ ca tvamasi’</quote>ityubhayoccāraṇena । tacca viśeṣaṇaṃ dvirūpāyāṃ matau kartavyāyāmarthavadbha-
vati । anyathā hīdaṃ viśeṣaṇobhayāmnānamanarthakaṃ syāt । ato matirdvirūpaiveti siddham ।।</p>
<head>iti bhagavatpādamate vyatihārādhikaraṇam ।। 23 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, asya viṣayavākyapūrvapakṣādikaṃ pūrvasmādaviśiṣṭam । <quote>‘antarā bhūtaprāmava’</quote>diti sūtre yogavibhāgābhāvāt
vyatihārasūtreṇa sahāsya sarvāntarādhikaraṇasya sūtradvayātmatā । vidyābhedo'sti vā nāsti veti <pratika>saṃdehe</pratika>, vidyābheda iti <pratika>pūrva-
pakṣe</pratika> prāpte, <quote>‘ya ātmā sarvāntara’</quote>ityubhayatra praśnaikarūpyāt parameśvara evobhayatra praśnaviṣayaḥ । yataḥ prativacanagataṃ nirupādhikaṃ
guṇajātaṃ tatraiva samupapadyate । sadvidyopadeśavatpraśnaprativacanāvṛttirekaviṣayā । praṣṭṭabhedo rūpabhedaśca na vidyābhedāvahaḥ । a-
rthaikye niścite sati praṣṭrorbuddhivyatihāraḥ kartavyaḥ । itaratra sadvidyāyāmiva ubhayaprakaraṇagatāni vākyāni parameśvaraṃ vi-
śiṃṣanti hi । tasmādekasyaiva praśnaprativacanagatatvānna vidyābheda iti <pratika>siddhāntitaḥ</pratika> । punaruktistu śaṅkānirāsāya <quote>‘tattva-
masī’</quote>tivat ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, sarvaṃ śrīkaṇṭhamatavadeva prāyaśaḥ । kiṃ tu <quote>‘saiva hi satyādaya’</quote> ityuttarādhikaraṇasūtramapīdamadhikaraṇaśeṣatayā
vyākhyātamiti viśeṣaḥ । sadvidyāyāmapi <quote>‘seyaṃ devataikṣate’</quote>tyādiṣu saiva parā devataikānuvartate । <quote>‘aitadātmyamidaṃ sarva’</quote>mityā-
diṣu ta eva satyādayaḥ sarveṣu prativacaneṣūpasaṃhriyanta ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, <quote>‘antarā bhūtagrāmavaditicettaduktam’</quote> iti bhagavatpādānusāreṇa yogavibhāgataḥ pṛthakpāṭhaḥ । <quote>‘iyadā-
mananāt’</quote>ityādikaṃ sūtratrayātmakamidamadhikaraṇaṃ । vyatihārasūtramadhikaraṇāntaramiti vivekaḥ । tatrādye iyadadhikaraṇe pūrvokta-
madhikāritāratamyaṃ prāṇāvadhikaṃ vā, tato'pyadhikaṃ veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । prāṇādīnāṃ sottamatvadarśanena prāṇādadhikasya śrutāvanu-
ktatve'pi anumānatastatsādhanasya śakyatvasaṃbhavena ca prāṇādapyadhikaḥ kaścidadhikārī bhavitumarhati । ato'dhikāriṇāṃ
prāṇavasānatvābhāvātprāṇātmakasya hiraṇyagarbhasyaiva sarvaguṇopāsanayogyatvamityuktamayuktamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>,
<quote>‘prāṇo vāva sarvebhyo bhūyānnahi prāṇādbha‍ūyān’</quote> iti kauṣītakiśrutāvāmnānāt । <pratika>iyat</pratika> prāṇāvasānamevādhikāriṇāṃ tāratamyam ।
iti । idaṃ sūtraṃ spaṣṭārtham । <pratika>sū ।। antarābhūtagrāmavaditi cettaduktam ।। 36 ।। bhūtagrāmavat</pratika>=yathā nāmādi-
prāṇasamūhe ekasmādeka uttamo dṛṣṭaḥ tathā । <pratika>antarā</pratika>=paramātmānaṃ śriyaṃ ca vinā prāṇadapyuttamostviti cet । <pratika>neti</pratika>
śeṣaḥ । yataḥ <pratika>taduktam</pratika>=tatra prāṇāduttamābhāve <quote>‘na hi prāṇādbha‍ūyān’</quote> iti pramāṇamuktam ata ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। anyathābhedānupapattiriti cennopadeśavat ।। 37 ।। anyathā</pratika>=prāṇādapyuttamābhāve । <pratika>bhedānupapatti-
riti cenna</pratika>=prāṇaparamātmanorbhedānupapattiriti cenna । katham । <pratika>upadeśavat</pratika>=yathāśrutāvuktaṃ tathāṅgīkartavyam । anuktā-
rthasyānumānaṃ tu pratyakṣaśrutyā bādhitamiti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti iyadadhikaraṇam ।। 21 ।।</head>
<head>atha vyatihārādhikaraṇam ।। 22 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। vyatihāro viśiṃṣanti hītaravat ।। 38 ।।</pratika> prāṇādīśvarasyottamatvopadeśo'sti vā na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । chando-
gaśrutau prāṇasyaiva sarvottamatvopadeśāt <quote>‘eṣa tu vā ativadatī’</quote>tyādi satyātivādasya vāgādiṣu satyānteṣviva satye utta-
matvaviṣayapraśnaprativacanayorabhāvena viṣṇuparatvābhāvāt । pratyuta prāṇātmakahiraṇyagarbhaviṣayatāyā eva pratīteśca । prāṇātmaka-
hiraṇyagarbhasyaiva sarvottamatvenopāsanaṃ kāryamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ</pratika> । satyādivāde tathā praśnaprativacanayoradhyāhāreṇa yataḥ chandogāḥ
<quote>‘sa vā eṣa evaṃ paśyannevaṃ manvāna evaṃ vijānanni’</quote>tyādinā prakṛtātprāṇāvādinassatyātivādino vyāvartayanti । tataḥ prāṇāda-
<pb n="348"/>
atha satyādhikaraṇam ।। 22 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। saiva hi satyādayaḥ ।। 37 ।।</sutra>
yadda‍ṛṣṭāntena pūrvādhikaraṇanirṇayaḥ tatrāpi sadvidyāyāṃ saṃśayaḥ bhinneyama-
bhinnā veti ।।
praśnāvṛttidarśanāt prativacanabhedadarśanācca pratyāvṛttibhinnā ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha satyādhikaraṇam ।। 22 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। saiva hi satyādayaḥ ।। 37 ।।</pratika> pūrvādhikaraṇasūtrodāhṛtadṛṣṭāṃtākṣepeṇa saṃgatisū-
canapūrvakamekarūpapraśnasyābhyāsanyāyena vidyābhedakatvā'bhedakatvābhyāṃ saṃśayaṃ darśayati---
<pratika>yadda‍ṛṣṭānteneti</pratika> pṛṣṭārthasyottare nivṛtte tathaiva punaḥ praśno na yuktaḥ । śaṅkāntaranirākaraṇārtha-
ñcet, praśna eva śaṅkāntarotkīrtanena bhāvyam । ataevoṣastibrāhmaṇe <quote>‘yatsākṣādaparokṣā’</quote>dityā-
dinā sarvāntarapraśnānantaram, <quote>‘eṣa ta ātmā sarvāntara’</quote> iti yājñavalkyasyottare sati nānena
spaṣṭaṃ sarvāṃtaro darśito bhavatīti nirdhārya śṛṅgagrāhikayā darśanīya ityabhiprāyeṇa <quote>‘katamo
yājñavalkya sarvāntaraḥ’</quote> iti punaḥ pṛṣṭe <quote>‘yaḥ prāṇena prāṇiti sa ta ātmā sarvāṃtaraḥ’</quote> ityādau
ca yājñavalkyenopanyastena sahovācoṣastiścākrāyaṇo yathā vibrūyādasau gaurasāvaśva ityevame-
vaitadvyapadiṣṭaṃ bhavatīti śaṅkodbhāvanapūrvakameva <quote>‘yadeva sākṣādaparokṣādbrahma tanme brūhī’</quote>tyādinā
praśnāvṛttiḥ kṛtā । atra hi viśiṣya sarvāṃtaro vaktavya iti dvitīyapraśnānaṃtaraṃ tadvacanārthaṃ
pravṛttena tvayā prāṇitṛtvaliṅgena sarvāṃtaratvapradarśanaṃ gāmaśvaṃ vā śṛṅgagrāhikayā pradarśayiṣyā-
mīti pratijñāya sāsnādimāngauḥ kesarādimānaśva iti vacanena tulyaṃ jñātamiti śaṅko-
dbhāvanaṃ kṛtam । na tayā'traśaṅkodbhāvanaṃ dṛśyate । tasmādekarūpapraśnabhedādaviśeṣapunaḥśrava-
ṇarūpābhyāsanyāyena praṣṭavyabhedovasīyate । ato'tra <quote>‘bhūya eva mā bhagavānvijñāpayatvi’</quote>tyasya
sadviṣaya eva punarvidyāntaramapadiśetyarthaḥ । na coktārthagrahaṇāśaktyāpi loke punaḥ praśno
dṛśyate tadvadiha kiṃ na syāditi vācyam । tathā satyuktārthasyaiva punaḥ kathanāpatteḥ । ihatu
pratipraśnaṃ guṇāntarapratipādanaṃ dṛśyate । tasmādiha vidyābhedo yukta iti pūrvapakṣamāha---
<pratika>praśnāvṛttīti</pratika> । nātra vidyābhedaḥ । sarveṣvapi prativacaneṣu satyatvātmatvādiguṇāvṛttyā vidyai-
kyapratyabhijñānāt । praśnāvṛttistu tatra tatra prasaktānāṃ śaṅkāviśeṣāṇāmupākaraṇārtheti pra-
śneṣu śaṅkodbhāvanābhāve'pi tattacchaṃkāviśeṣopākaraṇārthaṃ dṛṣṭāṃtaviśeṣāpanyāsapūrvakaprati-
vacanaparyālocanayaivāvagamyate । tathāhi---suṣuptau jīvā yatrāpi yanti tatsaditi navakha-
ṇḍamadhye prathamakhaṇḍena bodhite sati <quote>‘suṣuptau satsampannā jīvāḥ kimiti satsampattiṃ na
vidu’</quote>riti śaṅkābhiprāyeṇa praśna ityetat <quote>‘yathā somya madhu madhukṛto nistiṣṭhantī’</quote>tyādi dvi-
tīyakhaṇḍe nānāvṛkṣāṇāṃ rasānmadhumakṣikābhirmadhutvena samāhṛtātprastutya ‘yathā tatra na vi-
pyadhikatvena viṣṇorupadeśassiddha eveti sarvottamatvena viṣṇorevopāsanaṃ kāryamiti <pratika>siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu, vyatihāraḥ</pratika>=
prāṇaprakaraṇādanantaraṃ viṣṇoḥ prakaraṇātprākpraśnaprativacanayoradhyāhāraḥ kāryaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>hi</pratika>=yasmāt । <pratika>itaravat</pratika>=nāmā-
dito vāgādikamiva prāṇavādinassakāśātsatyākhyaviṣṇuvādinaḥ chandogāḥ <quote>‘eṣa tu ve’</quote>ti tuśabdena viśiṃṣanti vyāvarta-
yanti tasmādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ sarvāntarādhikaraṇam ।। 21 ।।</head>
<pb n="349"/>
<p>iti prāpte brūmaḥ । na bhinneyaṃ sadvidyā । <quote>‘seyaṃ devatā’</quote> iti prastutāyā eva mahāde-
vatāyāḥ praśnaprativacaneṣvanuvṛtteḥ । yataḥ <quote>‘tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi’</quote> iti
punaḥpunaḥ satyādīnāmāvṛttirgamyate, ato vastvaikyādabhinneyaṃ vidyeti ।।
iti satyādhikaraṇam ।। 22 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vekaṃ labhante'muṣyāhaṃ vṛkṣasya raso'smyamuṣyāhaṃ vṛkṣasya raso'smītyevameva khalu somyemā-
ssarvāḥ prajāssati saṃpadya na vidussati saṃpatsyāmaha’ iti prativacanabhaṃgyāvasīyate । nanu
yuktaṃ suṣuptau sarveṃdriyoparamātmatsaṃpatterāvedanam utthitāssato'hamāgata iti kimiti na
viduḥ । svagṛhe suptotthitā hi svagṛhādvayamāgatā iti jānantītyabhiprāyeṇa dvitīyaḥ praśna
ityetat <quote>‘imāssomya nadyaḥ purastātprācyaḥ syandante’</quote> ityādi tadanaṃtarakhaṇḍe samudrādākṛṣya
jaladharamuktairjalaiḥ saṃbhūtāḥ pravahantīrnadīḥ prastutya <quote>‘tā yathā tatra na viduriyamahamasmīya-
mahamasmītyevameve khalu somyemāssarvāḥ prajāssata āgatya na vidussata āgacchāmaha i-
tīti’</quote> prativacanabhaṃgyā'vasīyate । evaṃ tṛtīyādipraśnānāmapi śaṅkābhiprāyaḥ । tadanantarakha-
ṇḍagatadṛṣṭāntaviśeṣopayuktaprativacanabhaṃgyaivonneyaḥ । evaṃ prativacanabhaṃgyonnetuṃ śakyaśśa-
ṅkābhiprāya iti na praśnavākyeṣu śrutyā nirdiṣṭaḥ । tasmādyuktaṃ sadupadeśe vidyaikyamiti si-
ddhāntayati---<pratika>na bhinneyamiti</pratika> । sūtre saiva seyaṃ devateti pratyutāsacchabdoktā paradevataiva sa-
rveṣu praśnaprativacaneṣvanuvartate iti sādhyādhyāhāraḥ । <pratika>satyādayo hīti</pratika> । hi śabdo bhinna-
kramaḥ । satyatvātmatvādyanuvṛtterityartaḥ । tataśca rūpaikyānna vidyābhedaśaṃkāvakāśa iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti satyādyadhikaraṇam ।। 22 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha satyādyadhikaraṇam ।। 22 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। saiva hi satyādayaḥ ।। 37 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>sadvidyā bhinnaiva praśnaprativacanabhedena । ekasyāmāvṛttirvyarthā tatsatyamityādeḥ ।। 257 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>ekatvameva tasyāssatyādipratyabhijñayā yuktam । upapādakabhedātsyādāvṛttirbodhadārḍhyahetośca ।। 258 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti satyādhikaraṇam ।। 22 ।।</head>
<sutra>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</sutra>
<head>atha satyādyadhikaraṇam ।। 22 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। saiva hi satyādayaḥ ।। 37 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, asya <quote>‘mahadyakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ veda satyaṃ brahma’</quote> iti satyavidyāṃ vidhāya tadanantaraṃ <quote>‘tadyatsatyamasau sa ā-
dityaḥ’</quote>ityādi śrūyamāṇaṃ bṛhadāraṇyakavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । tatra satyavidyātastadanantaravidyā bhidyate na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । bhidyata
iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, iyamanantaravidyā <pratika>saiva</pratika>=satyavidyaiva na tato bhidyate । kutaḥ । hi śabdo hetau । <quote>‘tadya-
tsatya’</quote>miti prakṛtasyaivopāsyasya hiraṇyagarbhasyākarṣaṇāddhetoḥ । nahyupāsyābhede vidyābhedo yuktaḥ । ato vidyaikyātpūrvāparavā-
kyasthāssarve satyādayo guṇā upasaṃhartavyā iti siddham । iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, satyavidyāyāṃ praśnāvṛttidarśanātpratyāvṛtti vidyā bhinnā vā abhinnā veti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ</pratika> । bhinneti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ ।
siddhāntastu</pratika>, na bhinneyaṃ sadvidyā । seyaṃ devateti prastutāyā eva mahādevatāyāḥ praśnaprativacaneṣvanuvṛtteḥ । <quote>‘tatsatyaṃ sa
ātmā’</quote> iti punaḥ punaḥ satyādīnāmāvṛttirgamyate । ato vastvaikyādabhinneyaṃ vidyeti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, asya sūtrasya pūrvādhikaraṇe'ntarbhāvāttatraiva tadva‍yākhyātam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, pūrvatra prāṇādviṣṇurevādhika iti yaduktaṃ tadyuktaṃ na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । prāṇādhikatvenopadiṣṭātsatyapa-
<pb n="350"/>
atha kāmādhikaraṇam ।। 23 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। kāmādayastatra tatra cāyatanādibhyaḥ ।। 38 ।।</sutra>
chāndogye taittirīyake vājiśākhāyāṃ kaivalyopaniṣadi ca daharavidyā śrutā ।
seyamabhinnā bhinnā vā । iti saṃśaye pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ---<quote>‘yadidamasmin pure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ
veśma daharo'sminnantara ākāśaḥ’</quote> ityārabhya daharākāśaśabdoktasya daharapuṇḍarī-
kavartino'pahatapāpmatvādiguṇāṣṭakaṃ mukhyamāmnātam । taittirīyake <quote>‘daharaṃ vipāpmam’</quote>
ityārabhya daharapuṇḍarīkavartinaḥ praṇavaprakṛtyātmanādavācyatva-maheśvaraśabdavācyatva,
kṛṣṇapiṅgalatva-virūpākṣatvādayo dharmāḥ pradarśitāḥ । vājiśākhāyāṃ <quote>‘ya eṣo'
ntarhṛdaya ākāśastasmin śete sarvasya vaśī sarvasyeśānaḥ sarvasyādhipatiḥ’</quote> iti
vaśitvādayaḥ । kaivalyopaniṣadi---<quote>‘hṛtpuṇḍarīkaṃ virajam’</quote> ityārabhya <quote>‘vibhuṃ ci-
dānandamarūpamadbha‍utam । umāsahāyaṃ parameśvaraṃ prabhuṃ trilocanaṃ nīlakaṇṭhaṃ praśāntam’</quote>
ityantena hṛdayapuṇḍarīkavartinaḥ parasya trilocanatva-nīlakaṇṭhatva-cidānandarū-
patvo-māsahāyatvādayo dharmāḥ । tatra nīlakaṇṭhatvādīnāṃ śarīradharmatvena satyatvā-
dīnāmātmadharmatvena virodhādupasaṃhāro na nyāyyaḥ । tasmādvidyā bhinneti ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha kāmādyadhikaraṇam ।। 23 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। kāmādayastatra tatra cāyatanādibhyaḥ ।। 38 ।।</pratika> prāṇitṛtvāśanāyātītatvādī-
nāmavirodhena dharmibhedāvahatvābhāvādvidyaikyaṃ samarthitam । iha vigrahadharmāṇāmatathātvādvi-
dyābheda ityutthānātsaṃgatiḥ । nanu vigrahadharmāṇāmātmadharmāṇāṃ ca nāsti parasparaṃ virodhaḥ ।
ubhayeṣāmapyātmani vyavahitāvyavahitasaṃbaṃdhasattvāt । anyathaikasyāmeva kaivalyaśākhāyāṃ
vigrahadharmāṇāmātmadharmāṇāñca samuccitya śravaṇasya kā gatiḥ । viśiṣya ca virūpākṣatvanīla-
kaṇṭhatvādīnāmapahatapāpmatvādīnāñca vidyābhedakatvābhāva<quote>‘ssarvavedāntapratyayādhikaraṇe’</quote> sama-
rthitaḥ । ato'tra pūrvapakṣo na saṃbhavatītyāśaṅkya tamupapādayati---<pratika>tatra nīlakaṇṭhatvādīnā-
miti</pratika> । <quote>‘nīlakaṇṭha’</quote>mityanena kaṇṭhamātranailyaṃ pratīyate <quote>‘kṛṣṇapiṃgala’</quote>mityanenārdhanailyaṃ
pratīyate । <quote>‘samaṃ syādaśrutatvādi’</quote>tinyāyāt । tathā <quote>‘trilocana’</quote>mityanena locanānāṃ tritva-
saṃkhyaivocyate, na tu vairūpyam । kaivalyaśākhāyāṃ <quote>‘śivaṃ praśāntamamṛtaṃ brahmayoni’</quote>miti
śivaśabdena nirastanikhiladoṣasamastamaṃgalaguṇākaratvavācinā vairūpyasyāpi pratikṣepāt ।
<quote>‘virūpākṣa’</quote>mityanena tu tadvairūpyamucyate । evaṃ vigrahadharmāṇāṃ tāvatparasparaṃ virodhaḥ । tathā ā-
tmadharmāṇāmapi kvacitsatyakāmatvamucyate । <quote>‘kvacitpraśānta’</quote>miti niṣkāmatvamucyate ityādi ।
evaṃ dharmavailakṣaṇyātpratiśākhaṃ bhinnā daharavidyetyupasaṃharati---<pratika>tasmāditi</pratika> । <quote>‘tatra tatre’</quote>ti
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dohitādviṣṇorapi vijñāna-mati-śraddhā-niṣṭhā-kṛti-sukha-bhūmā-haṃkārā-tmanāmupadiṣṭatvānna yuktamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu,
saivahi</pratika>=paradevatā viṣṇvākhyā satyavijñānamatyātmikā । <quote>‘satyaṃ bhagavo jijñāse’</quote> iti satyākhyasya viṣṇorguṇajijñāsāyāṃ
tadga‍uṇatvena vijñānādīnāmuktatvāt anyathā satyajijñāsāyāṃ vijñānādikathanasyāsāṃgatyācca । ataḥ prāṇādadhikā bahavo na
bhavanti । kiṃtu śrītadīśāvevetyarthaḥ । ataḥ prāṇādviṣṇorādhikyavarṇanaṃ yuktaṃmeveti ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ satyādyadhikaraṇam ।। 22 ।।</head>
<pb n="351"/>
<p>evaṃ prāpta ucyate---tatra tatra hṛdayapuṇḍarīkāyatanādibhyo vidyaikyameva । ataḥ
satyakāmādayaḥ sarvatropasaṃhāryāḥ । chāndogyagatā apahatapāpmatvādayo vājiśā-
svāgatāḥ vaśitvādayaḥ taittirīyagatāḥ praṇavavācyatvādayaḥ kaivalyagatāścidāna-
ndarūpatvādayaśca sarva ete guṇā dahara-vidyāyāṃ brahmaṇo'nusandheyāḥ । kaivalyopani-
ṣadgatamumāsahāyatvaṃ trilocanatvaṃ anyatra kṛṣṇapiṅgalatvaṃ virūpākṣatvaṃ caikārtham ।
āvṛttirādarārthā । sarvatra guṇānāmāvṛttau tathā draṣṭavyam । atra guṇitvena
brahmaṇa ekasyaivopāsyatvādapahatapāpmatvādiyogi sarveśvaramoṅkāravācyamumāsa-
hāyaṃ trilocanaṃ nīlakaṇṭhaṃ cidānandarūpamanantamamṛtamadbha‍utaṃ paraṃ brahma daharapuṇḍa-
rīkamadhye'nusandheyamiti paravidyāsviyameva pradhānabhūtā । chāndogye kaivalyo-
paniṣadi caitadvidyāniṣṭhasya । <quote>‘‘paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate’’</quote>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vīpsāyāṃ dvirbhāvaḥ । castvarthaḥ pūrvapakṣanirākaraṇārthaḥ । <pratika>hṛdayeti</pratika> । hṛdayapuṇḍarīkāya-
tanatvaṃ tāvatsarvāsvapi śākhāsu tulyam । viśokatvaṃ chāṃdogyakaivalyataittarīyakeṣu tulyaṃ ।
muktiphalaśruvaṇamapi teṣu tulyaṃ । setutvaṃ chāṃdogyavājasaneyakayostulyaṃ । idaṃ sarvamādiśa-
bdena gṛhyate । śarīradharmāṇāṃ parasparavirodhaṃ pariharati । <pratika>kaivalyeti</pratika> । umāsahāyatvaṃ kṛṣṇa-
piṃgalaśabdenocyate । trilocanatvaṃ virūpākṣaśabdenocyate । saṃkhyāvaiṣamyameva tatra vairūpyaṃ
vivakṣitam । kaṇṭhamātre nailyaṃ vāmetarabhāge vivakṣitam । <quote>‘praśānta’</quote> miti nityatṛptatvena
svayaṃ bhogatṛṣṇārāhityamucyate । <quote>‘satyakāma’</quote> miti tatsṛṣṭānāmasmadādibhogyapadārthānāma-
vitathatvamucyate । bahuguṇapratyabhijñānurodhena vidyaikyasiddhāvevamavirodhena vyākhyānamucita-
miti bhāvaḥ । nanvevaṃ śākhābhedena guṇāvṛttiḥ kimarthaṃ vidyaikyasiddhaye guṇapratyabhijñānārtha-
miti cenna । guṇāntarapratyabhijñayā vidyaikye siddhe hi trilocanavirūpākṣādiśabdānāma-
virodhena vyākhyānaṃ kriyate । na tu tadabhedapratyabhijñānādvidyaikyasiddhirastītyatrāha---<pratika>āvṛ-
ttiriti । sarvatra guṇānāmāvṛttāviti</pratika> । yathaikasyāṃ śākhāyāmaṃbikāpataya umāpataya
ityādyāvṛttirādarārthā tathehāpītyarthaḥ । evaṃ vidyaikye siddhe tatphalaṃ nānāśākhāmnātaguṇo-
pasaṃhāraṃ darśayati । <pratika>atra guṇitveneti ।</pratika> <quote>‘apahatapāpmatvādiyogīti’</quote> viśeṣaṇaṃ chāṃdogyā-
mnātānāṃ sarvoṣāṃ guṇānāmupalakṣaṇam । <quote>‘sarveśvara’</quote>miti bṛhadāraṇyakāmnātānām । <quote>‘oṃkā-
ravācyamiti’</quote> taittarīyakāmnātānā <quote>‘mumāsahāya’</quote>miti kaivalyaśākhāmnātānāmiti vivekaḥ ।
tatrānaṃtarūpamityasya vyākhyānamanaṃtamiti । anaṃtaṃ avināśi nityaṃ svarūpamasyeti
śrutyarthaḥ । evaṃ vyākhyāna eva daharapuṇḍarīkasyāṃtarupāsanaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>paravidyā-
sviti</pratika> । yadyapi sarvāsāmapi parabrahmaviṣayāṇāmahaṃgrahopāsanānāṃ cāviśiṣṭaṃ muktiphalatvaṃ
vakṣyati ca sūtrakāraḥ <quote>‘vikalpo viśiṣṭaphalatvā’</quote> diti । tathāpyācāryasya daharavidyāpri-
yatvādevamuktiḥ । athavā daharavidyāsu umāsahāyatvādiviśiṣṭaparabrahmaparamaśivaviṣayaiva
daharavidyāpradhānabhūtetyarthaḥ । teneyaṃ śaṃkā vyāvartyate । ātmabodhopaniṣadi nārāyaṇopā-
syā daharavidyā śrūyate sā parameśvaropāsyāyāḥ kaivalyataittarīyakopaniṣadāmnātāyā daharavi-
dyāyā bhinnaiva । upāsyabhedāt । evaṃ dvividhadaharavidyāsattve sati yadyapi bṛhadāraṇyakā-
mnātā guṇāśśaivīṃ daharavidyāṃ pratipadyante । tatra <quote>‘sarvasyeśāna’</quote> iti ‘eṣa bhūtādhipatiri-
<pb n="352"/>
<quote>‘dhyātvā munirgacchati bhūtayoniṃ samastasākṣiṃ tamasaḥ parastāt’</quote> iti sākṣāt
tasyaivopāsyasya parabrahmaṇaḥ prakṛtimaṇḍalātītasya prāptirhi phalamavagamyate । ata
eva nīlakaṇṭhatvādidharmasyāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇānāṃ ca brahmaṇi nityatvādanyo-
nyasāpekṣatvāccopasaṃhāre na virodhaḥ, aprasaktasya pratiṣedhāyogāt । trilocanatvā-
dilakṣaṇaśarīraviśiṣṭe parabrahmaṇi prasaktānāṃ śarīradharmāṇāṃ pāpajarāmaraṇakṣuttṛ-
ḍasatyakāmāsatyasaṃkalpānāṃ niṣedhāya hi apahatapāpmatvādayaḥ pratipāditāḥ ।
trilocanatvādilakṣaṇaśarīrakamapi paraṃ brahmāpahatapāpmakaṃ jarārahitamaśokamavi-
jighatsamapipāsaṃ satyakāmaṃ satyasaṃkalpaṃ cidānandarūpaṃ bhavatīti na virodhaḥ ।।
iti kāmādyadhikaraṇam ।। 23 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tyeṣa sarveśvara’ iti ca lokavedaprasiddhaśivarūḍhibhāvānāmīśānabhūtādhipatisarveśvaranāmnāṃ
śravaṇāt । tathāpi chāṃdogyāmnātānāmapahatapāpmatvādīnāṃ kasyāṃ daharavidyāyāmanvaya ityatra
nāsti vinigamakamiti śaṃkā bhavati । tatsa1mādhānaprakārastvayam । śaivī daharavidyā tāva-
tpradhānabhūtā kaivalyaśākhāyāṃ muktiphalaśravaṇāt । tatra hi <quote>‘tamasaḥ parastā’</quote>diti viśeṣi-
tam । ataḥ chāṃdogye'pi muktiphalaśravaṇāttadāmnātā guṇāśśaivīṃ daharavidyāṃ prāpnuvaṃtīti
yuktam । vaiṣṇavī tadupasarjanabhūtā । <quote>‘vaikuṇṭhaṃ bhagavallokaṃ gamiṣyatī’</quote>ti śravaṇena tasyā
vaikuṇṭhaprāptidvārā muktihetutvāt । muktisthānasya vaikuṇṭhasya cordhvādharabhāvaḥ parāparabhāvaśca
prāgvyavasthāpitaḥ । vaikuṇṭhaprāptānāṃ kramamuktiṃ ca bhāṣyakāro vakṣyati । evañca yadyapi
trilocanatvavirūpākṣatvādīnāmavirodhaḥ spaṣṭa iti virodhanirāsena naitadadhikaraṇaṃ sapra-
yojanaṃ bhavet । tathāpyuktaśaṃkānirāsena prayojanamiti bhāṣyakārasyāśayaḥ । vigrahadharmā-
ṇāmātmadharmāṇāñca parasparavirodhenā'pi vidyābhedaprasaktirnāstīti sarvavedāntapratyayādhi-
karaṇāsiddhamarthaṃ smārayati---<pratika>nīlakaṇṭhatvetyādinā</pratika>। cidānandarūpe śivasya divyavigrahe
vastusvābhāvyātpāpmajarādiprasaktirnāstītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti kāmādyadhikaraṇam ।। 23 ।।</head>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām ।</head>
<head>atha kāmādyadhikaraṇam ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰।। kāmādayastatra tatra cāyatanādibhyaḥ ।। 38 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>bhinnaiva daharavidyā yuktā kaivalyatāṇḍiśākhādigatā । ekagatatvāyogānnīlagrīvatvasatyakāmādīnām ।। 259 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>hṛtkamalasthityāderguṇasya sāmyānna bhinnaiṣā । nīlagrīvatvādivapurviśiṣṭātmaparyantā ।। 260 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>evaṃ satyapyavāryassati vapuṣi vibhossatyakāmādyayoga statsaṃbandhasya sarveṣvapi duritajarāmṛtyukośātigatvāt ।</l>
<l>maivaṃ teṣu prasakteṣvapahataduritatvādayassāmnyadhītā ityanyonyavyapekṣā niyamitamupasaṃhāramaṃgī kuruṣva ।। 261 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti kāmādyadhikaraṇam ।। 23 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha kāmādyadhikaraṇam ।। 23 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। kāmādītaratra tatra cāyatanādibhyaḥ ।। 38 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, chāndogye <quote>‘daharo'sminnantara ākāśa’</quote> iti śrutasya daharākāśasya satyakāmatvādayo guṇā āmnātāḥ ।
<note>(1) <quote>‘tadvyavacchedaprakārastvayam’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="353"/>
atha alopādhikaraṇam ।। 24 ।।
nanu priyaśirastvādīnāmiva nīlakaṇṭhatvādīnāmavayavānāṃ brahmasvarūpāntarbhāve
tasyopacayāpacayaprasaktirityato nīlakaṇṭhatvādikaṃ lupyata ityata āha---
<sutra>sū ।। ādarādalopaḥ ।। 39 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatra nīlakaṇṭhatvādiviśiṣṭaṃ rūpamumābhidhānaparamaśaktisāhityaṃ satyasaṃkalpa-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha alopādhikaraṇam ।। 24 ।।</head>
<p>pūrvādhikaraṇena prasaṃgasaṃgatyottarādhikaraṇamavatārayati---<pratika>nanviti । sū॰ ।।
ādarādalopaḥ ।। 39 ।।</pratika> nīlakaṇṭhatvādiviśiṣṭo viśiṣṭavigrahassatyasaṃkalpatvādiguṇagaṇaśca
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
bṛhadāraṇyake tu <quote>‘ya eṣo'ntarhṛdaya ākāśa’</quote>ityabhihitasyākāśāśrayasya sarvavaśitvādayo guṇāḥ । te parasparamupasaṃhartavyā na
veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । nopasaṃhartavyā iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, kāmādi</pratika>=satyakāmatvādiguṇajātam । <pratika>itaratra</pratika>=bṛhadā-
raṇyake upasaṃhartavyam । yacca sarvavaśitvādikaṃ tadapi <pratika>tatra</pratika> ca=chāndogye upasaṃhartavyam । kutaḥ । <pratika>āyatanādibhyaḥ</pratika>=
ubhayatrāviśiṣṭebhyo hṛdayāyatanasetutvavyapadeśādibhyo hetubhyaḥ । evaṃ vedyābhede'pi saguṇanirguṇatvena vidyayorbhedātkathamupa-
saṃhāra upapadyeteti cet na upasaṃhārasya vidyāstutyarthatvenopāsanārthatvābhāvānna kācidanupapattiriti ।। atra mate <pratika>rāmānu-
jamate ca</pratika> <quote>‘kāmādītaratre’</quote>ti pāṭhaḥ । <pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika> <quote>‘kāmādayastatra tatre’</quote>ti sūtrapāṭhe viśeṣaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, tathā <pratika>rāmānujamate, ca</pratika> yadyapi <pratika>viṣayavākyapūrvapakṣasaṃdehasiddhāntādika</pratika>maviśiṣṭameva pūrva-
smāditi vaktavyam । tathāpyanayormatayoḥ pūrvapakṣasiddhāntopapādanaṃ tu svasvasiddhāntaprakriyānusāreṇa daharapratipādakabahuśru-
tivacanopanyāsapūrvakaṃ vivṛtamiti viśeṣaḥ । <pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika> idamadhikaraṇaṃ śāṃkaramatavadekasūtrātmakameva । <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>
tūttarasūtradvayasyāpyatrāntarbhāvena sūtratrayātmakamidamadhikaraṇamityasti viśeṣaḥ pūrvamatābhyām । atastatprakriyānusāreṇa u-
ttarasūtrayorartho'tra varṇyate---<quote>‘manasaivānudraṣṭavyaṃ neha nānāsti kiṃcane’</quote>tyādeḥ pūrvaprakṛtatvāt <quote>‘sa eva neti netyātme’</quote>ti ca
vakṣyamāṇatvātsarvavaśitvādiviśeṣāṇāṃ brahmasvarūpatvāsaṃbhavāt kathaṃ satyakāmatvādermokṣasādhanopāsanarūpatvamityata āha---
<pratika>sū ।। ādarādalopaḥ ।। 39 ।। ādarāt</pratika>=vaśitvādeḥ pramāṇāntarāviditarūpasya śrutyekasamadhigamyasyādareṇa pratipāda-
nāt । <pratika>alopaḥ</pratika>=apratiṣedhastasyāpi brahmaguṇatvamavaśyāśrayaṇīyam । aviśeṣaniṣedhāstu sakaletaraprākṛtaviśeṣaviṣayāḥ ।
sarvasya brahmakāryatayā nānātvaniṣedho brahmātmakatvābhiprāyaḥ ।।</p>
<p>saguṇopāsanasya pitṛlokādisāṃsārikaphalatveṃna muktiphalatvābhāvamāśaṃkya pariharati---<pratika>sū ।। upasthite'tastadva-
canāt ।। 40 ।। upasthite</pratika>=brahmopasaṃpanne । ataḥ=brahmopasaṃpattereva hetoḥ । <pratika>tadvacanāt</pratika>=pitṛlokādiprāptivacanāt
na tatsāṃsārikaṃ phalam । api tu sākṣānmuktasyaiva । <quote>‘asmāccharīrātsamutthāya’</quote>---<quote>‘sasvarāṭbhavati’</quote>—iti ca nivṛttāvidyasya
hi svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpannasyaivocyate । ato brahmasaṃpattihetukatvaṃ krīḍāderavagamyate ।।</p>
<head>iti śrīkaṇṭharāmānujamatayoḥ kāmādyadhikaraṇam ।।</head>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika> ‘kāmāditaratra iti <quote>‘upasthitestadvacanāt’</quote> iti ca sūtrayorasti pāṭhabhedaḥ । atra upāsanādhikā-
riṇāṃ prāṇāvasānatvamuktaṃ yuktaṃ vā na veti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । tata uttamāyāḥ śriyo'pi sādhutve sati baddhatvena tadadhikāritvānna
yuktamiti <pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, nityamuktaiva śrīssadā bhagavatsamīpe mūlarūpeṇa sthitevānyatra bhagavadicchānusāriṇyā
svecchayaiva rukmiṇyādyavatārānkaroti । <quote>‘sarvakāmāyatanā sarvakālā sarvecchānubaddhā bandhikā saiṣā prakṛtiravikṛtiḥ’</quote> ityādi-
śruteḥ । sā hi nāmādivanna baddhā nāpi parameśvaravattanmokī । kiṃ tu sarveṣāṃ bandhikā । ataḥ nāmādi baddhamoktṛprastāve na
paṭhitā । ataḥ yuktameva prāṇāvasānatvamupāsanādhikāriṇāmiti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu</pratika>, lakṣmī<pratika>statra</pratika> bhagavatsamīpe sthitā satī
<pratika>itaratra ca</pratika>=bhūmyādāvapi kāmādīśecchayaivāvatārānkaroti । kutaḥ । <pratika>āyatanādibhyaḥ</pratika>= sarvagatatvapratipādaka <quote>‘sarvāyata-
ne’</quote>tyādiśrutyādibhya ityarthaḥ । uttarādhikaraṇasūtradvayena sahedamadhikaraṇaṃ sūtratrayātmakaṃ veditavyam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ādarādalopaḥ ।। 41 ।। ādarāt</pratika>=bhagavati nirupādhikabhaktyatiśayāt <pratika>alopaḥ</pratika>=śriyo bhagavadupāsanā-
bhāvo netyarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। upasthitestadvacanāt ।। 42 ।।</pratika> śriyo nityamuktatvaṃ yujyate । kutaḥ । <pratika>upasthiteḥ</pratika>=harisamīpe
sadāsthiteḥ । śriyo nityasamīpasthatvaṃ ca <pratika>tadvacanāt</pratika>=<quote>‘dvāvetā’</quote>viti nityasaṃbandhitvavacanād jñāyata ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ kāmādyadhikaraṇam ।। 23 ।।</head>
<pb n="354"/>
<p>tvādiguṇajātaṃ ca nirūpitam । iha teṣāṃ parabrahmaṇi lopo'sti kadācit, atha
vā kadācidapi ma lopa iti saṃśayaḥ । kiṃ tāvat prāptam ? upāsanārthaṃ parabrahmaṇi
kalpitatvāt teṣāṃ kadācillopa iti prāpte brūmaḥ---parabrahmaṇa umāsahitatvādīnāṃ
sarvatra śrutiṣvabhyāsādādarādalopa eva । ata evāluptaśaktikamucyate paraṃ brahma ।
kutrādarādabhyāsa iti cet---sarvatraiva । kṛṣṇapiṅgalaṃ virūpākṣaṃ iti śaktisāhitye
trilocanatve ca siddhe'pi punarādarārthaṃ hi <quote>‘umāsahāyaṃ parameśvaraṃ prabhuṃ trilocanam’</quote>
ityabhyastam । savitṛmaṇḍalavidyāyāṃ ca <quote>‘namo hiraṇyabāhave hiraṇyapataye'mbikā-
pataya umāpataye’</quote> iti hyādarārthamumāpatitvamabhyastam । anyatra <quote>‘nīlagrīvo vilo-
hitaḥ.... nīlagrīvāya ca śitikaṇṭhāya ca’</quote> ityādiṣu nīlagrīvatvamīśvarasyādarāda-
bhyastam । satyasaṃkalpatvādīnāmekatra siddhānāmanyatra punarvacanamādarārthameva । ta-
smādumāpatitvādīnāmabhyāsādādarādalopa eva parabrahmaṇa iti । dharmabrahmaṇoḥ pra-
māṇāntarāgamyayoryādṛśaṃ svarūpamabhidhatte bhagavatī śrutistādṛśamevābhyupeyaṃ śruti-
prāmāṇyāvalambinām । anyathā tadviruddhatarkāvalambane jagadupādānatvādikaṃ na
siddhyet । ataḥ śrutireva ca <quote>‘satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma’</quote> iti satyajñānākāramapari-
cchinnaṃ brahme tyuktvā,
ṛtaṃ satyaṃ paraṃ brahma puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇapiṅgalam ।
ūrdhvaretaṃ virūpākṣam .................... ।।
ityādinā tasyaiva trilocanatvaparamaśaktyumāśabalitatvarūpaṃ viśiṣṭamabhi-
dhatte । punaśca tasya <quote>‘sa eko brahmaṇa ānandaḥ’</quote> iti niratiśayānandavattvamāha । ta-
syaiva ca <quote>‘ākāśaśarīraṃ brahma । satyātma prāṇārāmaṃ manaānandam । śāntisamṛddhama-
mṛtam’</quote> ityādinā citprakāśarūpatvamātmārāmatvaṃ, bāhyakaraṇanirapekṣāntaḥkaraṇaikānu-
bhūyamānaparamānandavilāsatvaṃ, upaśāntasakalopadraṃvakalaṅkatva, manādimuktatvaṃ, ca pra-
kāśayati । asya hi virūpākṣatvādilakṣaṇaśarīrasaṃbandhena jīvavat prasaktān do-
ṣāṃśca <quote>‘apahatapāpmā’</quote> ityādinā nirākaroti । <quote>‘yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit’</quote> <quote>‘parā'sya śa-
ktiḥ’</quote> <quote>‘paśūnāṃ pataye’</quote> ityādibhirasya sarvajñatvasarvaśaktitvasvatantratvādikaṃ ca nirūpa-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
lupyate na veti <pratika>kalpitatvākalpitatvābhyāṃ</pratika> viśaye pūrvapakṣaḥ । ānandarūpaśśivasya vigraha
iti <quote>‘ākāśaśarīraṃ brahma’</quote> <quote>‘ānandarūpamamṛtaṃ yadvibhātī’</quote>tyādi śrutyanusārādiṣyate । na cāna-
ndasya vakṣaḥkaṃṭhahastāṃgulyādirūpeṇa sthaulyakārśye saṃbhavataḥ । tataśca tatsaṃbhave priyaśirastvādi-
kamapi tātvikaṃ syāt । ato vigrahastāvatkalpitaḥ tatsahapāṭhādga‍uṇagaṇaśca kalpita iti ।
siddhāntastu, abhyastatvenādarātiśayaviṣayatayā tayostātvikatvamavasīyate । śrutiśaraṇaiḥ
khalu yathā śrutyevābhyupagantavyam । śrutiprāmāṇyādānandātmanaiva paramākāśasyopacayā-
pacayavānpariṇāmo yujyate । priyaśirastvādikaṃ tu tathā <ref>(pa?)</ref> tātparyagrāhakapramāṇābhāvā-
dannamayādiṣu kalpitaiḥ pakṣapucchādibhissahapāṭhācca kalpitamityabhyupagamyata iti । <quote>‘satya-
saṃkalpatvādīnāmekatra siddhānāmanyatra punarvacanamādarārthameve’</quote>ti bhāṣyasyāyamarthaḥ । ekasyā-
<pb n="355"/>
yati । evaṃ śrutireva sakalapramāṇaśekharasthānīyā, satyajñānānandamaparicchinnasvarūpaṃ
sarvajñaṃ nityatṛptaṃ svatantraṃ anādiprakāśaṃ anantāluptaśaktikaṃ ātmārāmaṃ antara-
nubhavaikaviṣayaparamānandaṃ upaśāntaṃ amṛtaṃ nīlakaṇṭhaṃ virūpākṣaṃ umāsahitaṃ paraṃ
brahma sarvātmakaṃ muktisādhakamiti sarvatra ghoṣayantī kena nivāryate । tataḥ para-
brahmaṇa uktasvarūpadharmāṇāmalopa eva ।।
iti alopādhikaraṇam ।। 24 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
mevaśākhāyāṃ daharaśāṇḍilyādividyābhedena satyasaṃkalpatvādayo'bhyasyante । na cāyamabhyā-
sastattadvidyāsu satyasaṃkalpatvādiprāptyarthaḥ । kvacidāmnātānāmapyupāsyaprāpyaphalarūpatvena
<quote>‘itare tvarthasāmānyā’</quote>diti nyāyata eva sarvāsu vidyāsu prāpteḥ । kiṃtvādarārtha eveti ।
ataśśākhābhede punarvacanaṃ vidyaikyasiddhihetuguṇapratyabhijñānārthaṃ syāt, vidyābhede'pi prati-
pattṛbhedena sārthakaṃ syāditi, nādarārthaṃ bhavediti, śaṃkā nāvakāśaṃ labhate ।।</p>
<head>ityalopādhikaraṇam ।। 24 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām ।।</head>
<head>athā'lopādhikaraṇam ।। 24 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। ādarādalopaḥ ।। 39 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>kalpitamupāsanārthaṃ nīlagrīvatvasāṃbatāpramukham । lupyata eva brahmaṇi yathaiva tat .................।। 262 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>ānandaviśeṣāścetpriyamodādyāḥ śiraḥprabhṛtayaḥ syuḥ । brahmānandaḥ kvacidapi pīnaḥ kvacidapi kṛśaḥ prasajyeta ।। 263 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>ityāpadyeta doṣaprasara iti śiraḥpakṣapucchādiklṛptiḥ brahmānandetvayoktāstu sahajavapuḥsvīkṛtāvapyavāryaḥ ।</l>
<l>yāte rudreti maṃtre khalu niratiśayānandarūpatvamasyāpyāmnātaṃ tatpurāṇāgamavacanaśataissādaraṃ cānvamodi ।। 264 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>maivaṃ tātparyaliṅge muhurabhilapane yāmike jāgarūke nīlagrīvaṃ na śakyaṃ vapurapalapituṃ brahmaṇordhāṃbikeśam ।</l>
<l>brahmānando vibhussannapi niravayavopyaṃdhrijaṃghādibhedairaṃgapratyaṃgabhāvaṃ dadhadaniśamapi brahma saṃkalpataḥ syāt ।। 265 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>naivaṃ tātparyaliṅgaṃ khagavapuṣi tato laukikānandajātādbrahmānandasya kṛtsnādadhikatamatayā khyātaye rūpakaṃ tat ।</l>
<l>kīrtyoghābodhisatvapramukhabhi.....jāṃ vīciphenaprapañcāḥ kīrtyaṃbodheḥ stave tu stutitatiṣu yathā veṃkaṭakṣoṇibhartuḥ ।। 266 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>iṃdromāyābhiruktyā paraśivavapuṣāṃ śuddhamāyāmayatvaṃ tasyoktaṃ śaṃtamatvaṃ niratiśayadaśābandhugandhādimattvam ।</l>
<l>manyante kecideṣāṃ mata iha na śiraḥpakṣatulyatvaśaṅkā kiṃtūktissā sadeśaprabhṛtitanuparetyeva satsaṃpradāyaḥ ।। 267 ।।</l></lg>
<head>ityalopādhikaraṇam ।। 24 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha alopādhikaraṇam ।। 24 ।। 25 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। ādarādalopaḥ ।। 39 ।। upasthite'tastadvacanāt ।। 40 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, asya chāndogye vaiśvānaravidyāyāṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ <quote>‘sa yāṃ prathamāmāhutiṃ juhuyāttāṃ juhuyātprāṇāya svāhe’</quote>ti
prāṇāgnihotrapratipādakaṃ vākyaṃ <pratika>viṣayaḥ ।</pratika> tatra kiṃ bhojanalope prāṇāgnihotrasya lopaḥ utālopa iti <pratika>saṃdehaḥ</pratika> । bhojana-
lope'gnihotrasyālopaḥ । kutaḥ । <quote>‘‘pūrvo'tithibhyo'śnīyā’</quote>diti jābālaśrutyā pūrvabhojanasya prāthamyarūpadharmalopamasaha-
mānayā prāṇāgnihotre ādarakaraṇāt । na hi dharmalopamasahamānā śrutiḥ dharmiṇaḥ prāṇāgnihotrasya lopaṃ sahate ato'lopa iti
<pratika>pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu । sū ।। upasthite'tastadvacanāt ।। 40 ।।</pratika> bhojane copasthite ataḥ asmādeva bhojana-
dravyātprāṇāgnihotraṃ kartavyam । anupasthite tvagnihotrasya lopa eva । kutaḥ । tadvacanāt=<quote>‘‘tadyadbhaktaṃ prathamamāgacchettaddhomī-
ya’</quote>miti vacanāt । ādaravacanaṃ tu bhojanaprasaktidaśāyāṃ draṣṭavyam ।।</p>
<pb n="356"/>
atha tadvacanādhikaraṇam ।। 25 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। upasthite'tastadvacanāt ।। 40 ।।</sutra>
iha pūrvādhikaraṇoktaṃ brahmasvarūpameva muktaprāpyamutānyaditi saṃśayaḥ ।। kiṃ tā-
vat‌prāptaṃ ? <quote>‘niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntaṃ niravadyaṃ nirañjanam’</quote> ityādiṣu brahma nirviśe-
ṣameva śrūyate । <quote>‘brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati’</quote> iti muktasya tatsvarūpāpattireva muktiḥ ।
ato nirviśeṣameva brahma muktaprāpyaṃ nānyaditi prāpte, brūmaḥ---pūrvoktaṃ saviśe-
ṣameva brahmasvarūpaṃ muktaprāpyaṃ, daharakamalāntarbhāvanīyatayā pratipādite virūpākṣe
parabrahmaṇi <quote>‘paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya’</quote> iti muktena prāpte <quote>‘svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate’</quote> iti
svarūpābhiniṣpattereva hetoḥ, <quote>‘jakṣan krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ strībhirvā jñātibhirvā’</quote> i-
tyādinā svacchandato jñātyādiprāp‍tyabhidhānāt, <quote>‘paramaṃ sāmyamupaiti’</quote> iti śrutyā,
<quote>‘muktaḥ śivasamo bharvat’</quote> iti smṛtyā ca, muktasya parabrahmasādṛśyaprāptyabhidhā-
nācca । ataḥ sākṣānmuktaprāpyameva pūrvoktaṃ nīlakaṇṭhatvādilakṣaṇaṃ parabrahmasvarūpaṃ,
na sāṃsārikam । tasya <quote>‘apahatapāpmā’</quote> ityādinā sāṃsārikadharmaniṣedhāt । sa-
guṇaivātaḥ paravidyā । <quote>‘niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyam’</quote> ityādiṣu heyaguṇaniṣedhaḥ kriyate na
kalyāṇaguṇaniṣedhaḥ । tathā hi---
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha tadvacanādhikaraṇam ।। 25 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। upasthite'tastadvacanāt ।। 40 ।।</pratika> yadi śivasya rūpaṃ guṇajātaṃ ca tātvikaṃ
tadā muktaprāpyaṃ brahma tato'nyatsyādityutthānātsaṃgatiḥ । muktaprāpyaṃ brahma śivādanyaduta
śiva eveti muktinirviśeṣabrahmabhāvāpattissaviśeṣabrahmasādṛśyāpattirvetyanavadhāraṇātsaśaye
tatra pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । nīrūpaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ ca paraṃ brahmeti paraśśatāḥ śrutayaḥ pratipādayanti । tadbhā-
vāpattirmuktiriti ca <quote>‘brahma veda brahmaiva bhavatī’</quote>ti sāvadhāraṇaśrutiḥ pratipādayati । ato
rūpavānsaguṇaśśivo na paraṃ brahma nāpi tatsādṛśyāpattiḥ paramamuktiriti । siddhāṃtastu,
uktarūpaśśiva eva paraṃ brahma tatsādṛśyāpattireva ca paramamuktiḥ । daharapuṇḍarīkādiṣu tadu-
pāsanena labdhayā tatprāptyaiva svarūpābhiniṣpattyādipratipādanāt । <quote>‘nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmya-
mupaitī’</quote>ti śrutyā <quote>‘muktaśśivasamo bhavedi’</quote>ti smṛtyanugṛhītayā nirañjana iti śabdoditasya
saṃsārānmuktasyaiva tatsāmyāpattipratipādanācca । parabrahmaṇaḥ rūpaguṇaniṣedhaśrutayaḥ prākṛta-
rūpaheyaguṇaniṣedhaparāḥ । muktaprāpye <quote>‘saha brahmaṇā vipaścite’</quote>ti sārvajñyaguṇaśravaṇena mukta-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, idaṃ sūtradvayaṃ pratyekamekaikamadhikaraṇamiti vedyam । tatrādye'lopādhikaraṇe pūrvatra nīlakaṇṭhatvādiviśiṣṭaṃ
rūpamumābhidhānaparaśaktisāhityaṃ satyasaṃkalpatvādiguṇajātaṃ ca nirūpitam । iha teṣāṃ parabrahmaṇi kiṃ lopo'sti kadāci-
dathavā kadācidapi na lopa iti <pratika>saṃśayaḥ ।</pratika> upāsanārthaṃ teṣāṃ parabrahmaṇi kalpitatvātkadācillopa iti <pratika>pūrvapakṣa । si-
ddhāntastu</pratika>, parabrahmaṇa umāsahitatvādīnāṃ sarvatra śrutiṣvabhyāsādādarādalopa eva । ataevāluptaśaktikamucyate paraṃbrahmeti ।
ataḥ parabrahmaṇaḥ bahuṣu śrutiṣūktasvarūpadharmāṇāmalopa eveti ।।</p>
<head>iti śrīkaṇṭhamate alopādhikaraṇam ।। 24 ।।</head>
<pb n="357"/>
<p><quote>‘niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyam’</quote> ityādinā <quote>‘pradhānakṣetrajñapatirguṇeśaḥ’</quote> ityādinā ca nirgu-
ṇatve saguṇatve ca sāmānyena prāpte <quote>‘apahatapāpmā’</quote> <quote>‘yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit’</quote> ityādi-
bhirviśeṣaśrutibhirnirguṇaśruterheyaguṇarāhityamarthaḥ, saguṇaśruteḥ kalyāṇaguṇasāhityaṃ
iti vijñāyate । kiṃca vacanameva saguṇaṃ mokṣaphalaṃ prakāśayati, <quote>‘so'śnute sarvān
kāmān saha brahmaṇā vipaścitā’</quote> iti । vipaścitā sarvajñena brahmaṇā sarvānapi
kāmān muktaḥ saha prāpnotīti । sahaśabdo brahmaṇā''nandabhogasya ca yaugapadyā-
bhiprāyaḥ । ataḥ saguṇameva brahmasvarūpaṃ muktaprāpyaṃ phalamiti ।।</p>
<head>iti tadvacanādhikaraṇam ।। 25 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p>prāpyaṃ paraṃ brahma nirguṇamiti kalpanāyogāt । <quote>‘brahma veda brahmaiva bhavatī’</quote>tyevakāraśca sāmya-
śrutyanusārādivārthaḥ । <quote>‘vaiṣṇavaṃ vāmanamālabheta spardhamāno viṣṇureva bhūtvemām̐llokānabhi-
jayati’</quote> <quote>‘vināśamevāpīto bhavati’</quote> <quote>‘nāhamatra bhogyaṃ paśyāmī’</quote> tyādiśrutiṣvevakārasya ivā-
rthatvadarśanāditi । sūtrasyāyamarthaḥ । upasthite upāsakena brahmaṇi śive prāpte sati ataḥ
brahmaprāptyadhīnajñānavikāsādisvarūpāvirbhāvāddhetoḥ jakṣaṇakrīḍanaramaṇādisvācchandyatatsā-
myāpattivacanātsa eva paraṃ brahma tatsāmyāpattireva muktiriti ।।</p>
<head>iti tadvacanādhikaraṇam ।। 25 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha tadvacanādhikaraṇam ।। 25 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। upasthite'tadvacanāt ।। 40 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>aktasvarūpametanmuktaprāpyaṃ na guṇayutaṃ brahma । kiṃ tu paraṃ nirguṇamāmnātaṃ yatsarvavedeṣu ।। 268 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>muktānāmetadeva śrutiśikharaśatāṃ śīrṣitaṃ brahmagamyaṃ prāpte hyetadvihāraṃ kathayati nijarūpābhiniṣpattilābhāt ।</l>
<l>nairguṇyoktistu heyānapanayati guṇānvigrahādiprasaktānasminneveṃdumaulāvapavadananayachāganītyādinītyā ।। 269 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti tadvacanādhikaraṇam ।। 25 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha tadvacanādhikaraṇam ।। 25 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। upasthite'tastadvacanāt ।। 40 ।।</pratika> iha pūrvādhikaraṇoktaṃ brahmasvarūpameva muktaprāpyamutānyaditi <pratika>saṃśayaḥ ।</pratika>
<quote>‘niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntaṃ niravadyaṃ nirañjana’</quote>mityādiṣu brahma nirviśeṣameva śrūyate । <quote>‘brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati’</quote> iti muktasya
tatsvarūpāpattireva muktiḥ । ato nirviśeṣameva brahma muktaprāpyaṃ nānyaditi <pratika>pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu</pratika>, pūrvoktaṃ saviśeṣa-
meva brahmasvarūpaṃ muktaprāpyam । <pratika>upasthite</pratika>=daharakamalāntarbhāvanīyatayā pratipādite virūpākṣe parabrahmaṇi <quote>‘paraṃjyotirupasaṃ-
padye’</quote>ti muktena prāpte । <pratika>ataḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate’</quote> iti svarūpābhiniṣpattereva hetoḥ <quote>‘jakṣankrīḍanramamāṇa’</quote>ityādinā
svacchandato jñātyādiprāptyabhidhānāt <quote>‘muktaśśivasamo bhavet’</quote> iti smṛtyanugṛhītayā <quote>‘paramaṃ sāmyamupaitī’</quote>ti śrutyā muktasya
parabrahmasādṛśyaprāptyabhidhānācca । saguṇaśrutīnāṃ kalyāṇaguṇasāhityaparatayā nirguṇaśrutīnāṃ heyaguṇarāhityaparatayā ca mukta-
prāpyaṃ brahmasvarūpaṃ saviśeṣamiti siddham ।। iti ।।</p>
<head>iti śrīkaṇṭhamate tadvacanādhikaraṇam ।। 25 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, anayossūtrayoḥ kāmādyadhikaraṇaśeṣatayā tatraiva vyākhyātatayā nātra punarvivaraṇāvakāśa iti bodhyam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, anayossūtrayoḥ pūrvādhikaraṇaśeṣatayā tatraiva tayorvyākhyānānnātra punastadvivaraṇāvakāśa iti
bodhyam ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmalopādhikaraṇam ।। 25 ।।</head>
<head>itaḥparaṃ nopalabhyate । ataḥ atraiva samāpitā । anyatspaṣṭamupoddhāte---</head>
<pb n="358"/>
<p>atha tannirdhāraṇāniyamādhikaraṇam ।। 26 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। tannirdhāraṇāniyamastadda‍ṛṣṭeḥ pṛthagdhyapratibandhaḥ phalam ।। 41 ।।</sutra>
udgīthādikarmāṅgāvabaddhā upāstayaḥ karmasu niyatā utāniyatā iti saṃśayaḥ ।
kiṃ tāvat prāpnoti? karmānuṣṭhāne karmāṅgatvāt niyamenānuṣṭheyāḥ । karmaprakaraṇa-
manārabhyādhītatve'pi vākyādeva kratusaṃbandhopapattiḥ । yathā <quote>‘yasya parṇamayī juhū-
rbhavati’</quote> ityanārabhyādhītasya parṇamayatvasyāvyabhicaritakratusaṃbandhijuhūdvārā vā-
kyataḥ kratusaṃbandhaḥ, tathā <quote>‘ya evaṃ vidvānudgāyati’</quote> <quote>‘ya evaṃ vidvān sāma gāyati’</quote></p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha tannirdhāraṇādhikaraṇam ।। 26 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। tannirddhāraṇāniyamastadda‍ṛṣṭeḥ pṛthagdhyapratibandhaḥ phalam ।। 41 ।।</pratika> yathā śivo-
pāsanāphalameva muktiphalamevaṃ kratuphalamevodgīthavidyādiphalaṃ nānyadastīti śaṃkayā saṃgatiḥ ।
niyatā utāniyatā vā iti aṃgatvānaṃgatvābhyāṃ saṃśayaḥ । nanu karmāṃgatvāditi heturasiddhaḥ,
karmaprakaraṇānāmnātānāmupāsanānāṃ tadaṃgatve pramāṇābhāvādityāśaṃkya prakaraṇābhāvepyabhi-
caritakratusaṃbaṃdhisadbhāvātparṇatādīnāmiva vākyapramāṇaṃ viniyojakamastītyāha---<pratika>karmapraka-
raṇamiti</pratika> । evaṃ kratusaṃbaṃdhena nairākāṃkṣye sati rātrisatranyāyāpravṛtteḥ kāmāvāptyādiśrava-
ṇamapāpaślokādiśravaṇavadarthavādamātramiti bhāvaḥ । nanu <quote>‘tenobhau kuruta’</quote> iti vākyena kratvaṃ-
gāśritopāsanānāmaniyama ucyate tenānaṃgatvasiddhau phalāpekṣāyāṃ rātrisatranyāyena
<quote>‘āpayitā havai kāmānāṃ bhavati tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavatī’</quote>tyādyarthavāda śrutakāmāvāptikratuvīrya-
vattaratvādikaṃ phalatvena pariṇamanīyamiti cet naitadvacanaṃ nyāyavido'numanyaṃte । nahyaniya-
mamātreṇāṃgatvamapaiti । aniyamokte grahaṇāgrahaṇarītyā vikalpārthatvopapatteḥ । <quote>‘nānā tu vidyā
cāvidyā ca yadeva tu vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavatī’</quote>ti samanaṃ-
taravākyena tathaiva spaṣṭīkaraṇācca । atra hi <quote>‘vidyaye’</quote>ti tṛtīyāśrutyā vidyāyāḥ karoti-
śabdoktakarmāṃgatvamucyate । <quote>‘tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavatī’</quote> tyanena vidyānuṣṭhānapekṣe kratuphalasya
bhūyastvamucyate । na tu kratuphalāpṛthakphalamucyate । tarappratyayasya prakṛtyupāttaguṇāṃśa evā-
tiśayapratipādakatvasya <quote>‘jñānavattaraśśaratara’</quote> ityādivyavahāreṣu prasiddhatvāt । vidhiniṣedha-
yorekāṃgatvena vidhipakṣe phalabhūyastvaṃ <quote>‘karmabhūyastvātphalabhūyastva’</quote>miti nyāyata eva prāptam ।
jaiminināpi <quote>‘phalasya karmaniṣpattesteṣāṃ lokavatparimāṇataḥ phalaviśeṣaḥ syā’</quote>diti sūtreṇa
pradarśitam । tadovātra vīryavattaraśabdenānūdyata iti yuktam । api ca । <quote>‘tenobhau kuruta’</quote>
iti vākyenāniyatāṃgatvamapi pūrvaprastutāptyādiguṇakodgīthavidyāmātrasyocyate na tu tada-
nantaraṃ vakṣyamāṇānāṃ mukhyaprāṇadṛṣṭyādiviśiṣṭodgīthopāsanānām । <quote>‘etaṃ hyeva bahvṛcā mahatyu-
kthe mīmāṃsante etamagnāvadhvaryavaḥ etaṃ mahāvrate chaṃdogā’</quote> ityādi śrutyaṃtarapratipannabrahmadṛṣṭyā-
diviśiṣṭakratvaṃgāṃtaropāsanānāṃ ca । <quote>‘yaścaivaṃ veda yaśca na vede’</quote>tyatraivaṃśabdasya prakṛtāptyā-
diguṇakavaiśiṣṭyaparatvāt । ata eva puruṣārthādhikaraṇe <quote>‘yadeva vidyayā karotī’</quote>ti śrute-
raupaniṣadī sarvāpyātmavidyā karmāṅgaṃ na tu svātaṃtryeṇa muktisādhanamiti <quote>‘tacchrute’</quote>riti
sūtreṇa pūrvapakṣamudbhāvya <quote>‘sārvatrikī’</quote>ti sūtreṇa vidyayeti tṛtīyāśrutissarvavidyāviṣayā na
bhavati, kiṃtvevaṃśabdayogā <quote>‘dyadeva vidyayeti’</quote> prasiddhavannirdeśācca prakṛtodgīthavidyāmātravi-
<pb n="359"/>
ityavyabhicaritakratusaṃbandhisāmodgīthādidvārā tadupāsanānāṃ kratusaṃbandhaḥ । ataḥ
karmasu niyatā udgīthādyupāstaya iti ।।
evaṃ prāpte būmaḥ---godohanādivadaniyatā upāstayaḥ । yathā---‘camasenāpaḥ praṇa-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ṣayeti siddhāṃtayiṣyate । yadi tatra vidyayeti śrutiḥ prakaraṇamullaṃghya kra1tvaṃgabhūtamupāsanā-
ntaramapi viṣayīkuryāt, tadā sarvāmapyaupaniṣadamātmavidyāmākrāmantī kena nivārayituṃ
śakyā । atastatra yadeva vidyayeti vākyasya prakṛtodgīthavidyāmātraviṣayatvasyaiva sūtrārtha-
tvāttata eva kaimutikanyāyāt <quote>‘yaścaivaṃ vede’</quote>ti pūrvavākyasyāpi tanmātraviṣayatvaṃ siddhyatī-
tyāptyādiguṇakāmaviśiṣṭaviṣayakaivodgīthavidyā kratuṣvaniyatā । aniyatatve'pi sāpyaṃgame-
vānyāstvaṃgābaddhopāsanāḥ kratuṣu niyatāṃgānītyetatsarvamabhipretyopasaṃharati---<pratika>ataḥ karma-
sviti ।</pratika> evaṃ prāpte siddhāntaḥ । aṃgāvabaddhopāsanānāṃ kratuṣu na niyamaḥ । teṣāṃ tadaṃgatvā-
bhāvāt । tadabhāvaśca viniyojakapramāṇābhāvāt । na ca vākyaṃ viniyojakam । <quote>‘udgī-
thamupāsīte’</quote>tyādiṣu kratūpāsanāsamabhivyāhārāśravaṇāt । na cāvyabhicaritakratusaṃbaṃdhenopa-
sthite kratau parṇatānyāyena tadanvayapratipādakaśabdaḥ kalpanīyaḥ । uktaṃ yatparṇatāyā ju-
hūsaṃbandhe'pyavyāpārarūpatayā phalaniṣpādakatvaṃ na syāditi । tatsiddhaye kratūparāgeṇa vyāpā-
rarūpatāṃ sampādayituṃ juhūliṅgena kratumupasthāpya tatsaṃbaṃdhabodhakaśśabdaḥ kalpyate juhūśabda-
syaiva vā juhūsambaṃdhini kratau lakṣaṇā kalpyata iti । ihopāsanāyāḥ svayaṃ vyāpārarūpāyāḥ
svataeva phalaparyavasāne saṃbhavati kimudgīthādyupasthāpitakratusaṃbaṃdhabodhakaśabdakalpanādi-
vyasanena । yadicāpyabhicaritakratusaṃbandhasadbhāvamātreṇa tadupasthāpitakratusaṃbandhabodhaka-
śśabdakalpanādiniyamaḥ । tadānīmādhānasyāpi āhavanīyādyupasthāpitakratusaṃnbadhabodhakaśa-
bdakalpanādinā tasyāpi kratvaṃgatvamaṃgīkriyeta । na cādhānasyāgnibhiḥ phalattvamasti na tū-
pāsanānāṃ kenacitphalavattvam । atasteṣāṃ kratuphalena phalavattvasiddhyarthaṃ kratusaṃbaṃdhabodhaka-
vākyakalpanāpekṣāstīti vācyam । upāsanāvākyaśeṣasyaiva phalasamarpakatayā vipariṇāma-
saṃbhave phalavatkarmāṃtarānvayabodhakavākyakalpanādyanapekṣaṇāt । tasmādvākyaśeṣaśrutāya tasmai
phalāyodgīthādyāśrayatvaviśiṣṭopāsanāvidhirityeva yuktam । evamudgīthādiśravaṇamasyopāsa-
nārthatāyāmeva dṛṣṭārthatā labhyate । nirālaṃbanadhyānāsaṃbhavenodgīthāderālaṃbanasyopāsanenā-
pekṣitatvāt । upāsanāśravaṇasyodgīthādyarthatve tvadṛṣṭārthatā syāt । upāsanenodgīthādiṣū-
tpattiprāptavikṛtināmasaṃbhavenādṛṣṭasaṃskārasyaiva vaktavyatvāt । dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaprayojanaparyavasāyyanva-
yadvayasaṃbhave ca dṛṣṭaprayojanaparyavasāyyevānvayo grāhyaḥ । ata eva khalevālī yūpo bhavatī-
tyasya yaḥ khādirādiḥ pukṛtiprāpto yūpastasya khalevālyākṛtividhānaparatāyāmadṛṣṭārthatā
syāditi vidherdṛṣṭārthatvalipsayā khalevālyā yūpakārye vidhirāśritaḥ । tasmādgodohanavidhi-
vadāśrityavidhānarūpā aṅgāvabaddhopāsanāvidhayaḥ । na tu parṇatādividhivatkratvaṃgatvavi-
dhirūpāḥ । tamimaṃ nyāyaṃ <quote>‘tannirdhāraṇāniyama’</quote> iti sūtrāṃśena vivakṣitaṃ hṛdi nidhāyāha---
<pratika>godohanādivadaniyatā iti</pratika> । evaṃ ca <quote>‘tenobhau kuruta’</quote> iti vākyaṃ godohananyāyaprā-
ptāniyamānuvādakaṃ na tu <quote>‘ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇātī’</quote>ti vidhitaṣoḍaśigrahaṇe niyamataḥ prāpte tada-
<note>1 <quote>‘kratvaṃgāśritaṃ’</quote> iti, kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="360"/>
yet godohanena paśukāmasya’ ityapāṃ praṇayanamāśritya vidhīyamānaṃ godohanamakra-
tvarthatvādaicchikameva, na tvappraṇayanādivanniyatam । tathā karmāṇyāśritya vidhī-
yamānā upāstayaḥ kratvarthā na bhavanti, <quote>‘tenobhau kuruto yaścaitadevaṃ veda yaśca na veda’</quote>
ityudgīthādyupāsanarahitasyāpi kratvanuṣṭhānadarśanāt । <quote>‘yadeva vidyayā karoti śraddhayo-
paniṣadā tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati’</quote> iti vartamānanirdeśe'pi kratuvīryavattaratvasādha-
natayopāsanāvidhiḥ kalpyate । vīryavattaratvaṃ nāma prabalakarmāntarāpratibandhenāvila-
mbitaphalatvameva । tathā kāmavṛṣṭyādipṛthakphalaśravaṇācca na niyatā upāstayaḥ ।।
iti tannirdhāraṇāniyamādhikaraṇam ।। 26 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
grahaṇavākyamiva <quote>‘adgīthamupāsīte’</quote>tyādividhinopāsane niyamataḥ prāpte satyaniyamavidhāya-
kamiti nyāyasāmyātsarveṣāmapyaṅgāvabaddhopāsanānāmaniyamasyopalakṣaṇaṃ tat na tu prakṛto-
dgīthavidyāmātrasyāniyamaviṣayamityevaṃ sarveṣāmapyaṅgāvabaddhopāsanānāmaniyamānuvādaliṅgā-
dapyevamavasīyate iti <quote>‘tadda‍ṛṣṭe’</quote>riti sūtrāṃśena vivakṣitamarthamāha---<pratika>tenobhāviti</pratika> । evaṃ
sati <quote>‘yadeva vidyaye’</quote>tyādikaṃ vidyānuṣṭhānapakṣe nyāyaprāptasya phalabhūyastvasyānuvādakaṃ na bha-
vati । kiṃtu <quote>‘tenobhau kuruta’</quote> ityatrāniyatānuṣṭhānatvenānūditānāmaṃgāvabaddhopāsanānāṃ
kratuvīryātiśayādhānarūpaphalavidhiparamityamumarthaṃ phalamiti sūtrāṃśena vivakṣitamāha---<pratika>yade-
veti ।</pratika> pṛthakphalatvopapādanārthama<quote>‘pratibaṃdhohī’</quote>ti sūtrāṃśena vivakṣitaṃ vīryavattaraśabdārthaṃ
darśayati । <pratika>vīryavattareti</pratika> । vīryaṃ hi loke kāryānukūlaṃ balamiti prasiddhaṃ । na tu kāryame-
veti । balavattaratvañca karmaṇaḥ svaphalajananapratibandhakāpekṣayā vaktavyam । anyasya prakṛtā-
nupayogāt । ataḥ svaphaladānonmukhena virodhikarmāṃtareṇāpratibandha eva vīryavattaratvami-
tyaucityādavasīyata iti bhāvaḥ । evaṃ ca <quote>‘yadeva vidyaye’</quote>ti tṛtīyāśrutiraṃgāvabaddhopāsa-
nānāṃ na mukhyakarmaśeṣatvapratipādanaparā kiṃtu karmabhirvilaṃbena phale jananīye teṣāmupakā-
rakatvamastītyupacaritaśeṣatvaparā । <quote>‘asārvatrikī’</quote>ti puruṣārthādhikaraṇasūtre tu pūrvapakṣyuktaṃ
<quote>‘vidyaye’</quote>ti tṛtīyāśrutermukhyaśeṣaparatvamabhyupetya । tathāpi prakṛtodgīthavidyāyā eva karmaśe-
ṣatvamāyāti nātmavidyāyā ityuktam । ihāpi yadi tathābhyupetya siddhāntayitavyaṃ tadā <quote>‘te-
nobhau kuruta’</quote> ityādeḥ pūrvapakṣoktarītyā'rthogrāhyaḥ ityāptyādiguṇakaprakṛtodgīthavidyāyā e-
vāniyatamaṅgatvamāyāti । na sarveṣāmaṅgāvabaddhopāsanānāmiti tannirddhāraṇāniyama iti
siddhāntasya na ko'pi virodhaḥ । <pratika>kāmavṛṣṭyādīti ।</pratika> <quote>‘āpayitā havai kāmānāṃ bhavati va-
rṣati hāsmai varṣayati ha kalpante hāsmai lokā ūrdhdvāścāvṛttāśce’</quote> tyādiphalāṃtaraśravaṇāccetyarthaḥ
ātharvādikatvāviśeṣādvīryavattaratvavadasādhāraṇaphalānyapi grāhyāṇīti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>

<lg><l>udgīthādyavabāddhā upāsanā parṇatādivanniyatāḥ । tāsu phalaśravaṇasyāpyaṃgatvādarthavādatāprāpteḥ ।। 270 ।।</l></lg>

<pb n="361"/>
atha pradānādhikaraṇam ।। 27 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। pradānavadeva taduktam ।। 42 ।।</sutra>
ekasyaiva śivasya parabrahmaṇaḥ paravidyāsu sarvāsu tattadga‍uṇaviśiṣṭatayā pṛtha-
kcintanīyatvamuktam । tadiha saṃbhavati na veti saṃśayaḥ । kiṃ tāvat prāptam ? guṇa-
bhede'pi guṇino brahmaṇa ekatvādupāsanaṃ na bhidyate । yathaikasya rājñastattadbha‍ūṣaṇādi-
viśeṣaṇabhedena yuktasyāpi kāryadarśanavyāyāmabhojanāsanamṛgayāsamarādivyāpā-
reṣu siṃhāsanādisthānabhede'pi bhedo na dṛśyate । tathā daharādisthānabhede'pi tatta-
dga‍uṇabhedaviśiṣṭasyāpi brahmaṇa ekatvāt tadanusandhānamekamevetyevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ---e-
kasyaiva parabrahmaṇaḥ śivasya svarūpābhede'pi tattadga‍uṇaviśiṣṭasvarūpatayā guṇaviśe-
ṣaṇabhedena bhedādviśiṣṭaguṇyāvṛttyā pṛthakṛtadupāsanaprayogaḥ, indrapradānavat । yathā
<quote>‘indrāya rājñe puroḍāśamekādaśakapālamindrāyādhirājāyendrāya svarājñe’</quote> iti
guṇabhedāt pṛthakpuroḍāśapradānaṃ <quote>‘nānā devatāpṛthaktvāt’</quote> iti saṃkarṣe tathokta-
tvāt, tathaikasyāpi parabrahmaṇo guṇabhedādupāsanapṛthaktvamiti । yaduktamekasya rājña
iti, tatrāpi rājasvarūpābhede'pi sthānaguṇādibhedādupāsanaprakāro bhinna eva
sevākānāmiti ।।
iti pradānādhikaraṇam ।। 27 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha pradānādhikaraṇam ।। 27 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। pradānavadeva taduktam ।। 42 ।।</pratika> karmaṇāṃ tadaṅgāśritopāsanānāṃ ca phalabhedani-
rūpaṇaprasaṃgādvidyābhedanirūpaṇamiti saṃgatiḥ। dharmaikyātsthānaguṇabhedācca saṃśayaḥ । nanu
sthānaguṇabhedāddharmiṇo'pi bhedaḥ syādityāśaṃkya tadbhede'pi dharmyabhedaṃ dṛṣṭāntenopapādayati-
yathaikasyeti । satyaṃ sthānaguṇabhedena vastuto dharmī na bhidyata iti । tathāpi tadbhede satyau-
pādhiko bhedo'sti । tāvanmātramapi vidyābhede prayojakaṃ । yatheṃdrasya rājādiguṇabhedopādhiko
bhedo haviḥpradānākhyayāgabheda iti । siddhāṃtayati---<pratika>ekasyaiveti । upāsanāprakāro
bhinna iti</pratika> । rājño yānāsanavyāyāmādiṣu chatracāmaravyajanādipradhānassevakānāṃ sevāpra-
kāro bhinna evetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti pradānādhikaraṇam ।। 27 ।।</head>

<head>atha pradānādhikaraṇam ।। 27 ।।</head>
