<lg><l>vidyā bhidyeta nānāśrutivihitaguṇasthānabhedairna śaṃbhoḥ patyussevaiva tattatsamayasamucitā naiva pīṭhādiṃbhedaiḥ ।</l></lg>
<lg><l>dṛṣṭaṃ rājādhirājādimaguṇabhidathaṃdrasya bhinnaṃ pradānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vaitānavahnerapi havanamukhaṃ sthānabhedena bhinnam ।। 272 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti pradānādhikaraṇam ।। 27 ।।</head>
<pb n="362"/>
atha liṃgabhūyastvādhikaraṇam ।। 28 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। liṅgabhūyastvāttaddhi balīyastadapi ।। 43 ।।</sutra>
pūrvaṃ sarvāsūpavidyāsu brahmopāsyamiti sthitam । tasyopāsyasya brahmaṇo
viśiṣya nirdhāraṇārthamidamadhikaraṇam । taittirīye---
<quote>‘sarvo vai rudrastasmai rudrāya namo astu namo astu ।
puruṣo vai rudraḥ sanmaho vai rudraḥ sanmaho namo namaḥ ।।
viśvaṃ bhūtaṃ bhuvanaṃ citraṃ bahudhā jātaṃ jāyamānaṃ ca yat ।
sarvo hyeṣa rudrastasmai rudrāya namo astu ।।
kadrudrāya pracetase mīḍhuṣṭamāya tavyase । vocema śantamaṃ hṛde ।
sarvo hyeṣa rudrastasmai rudrāya namo astu ।।
namo hiraṇyabāhave hiraṇyapataye'mbikāpataya umāpataye namo namaḥ’</quote> ।।
iti । atra sarvātmatvādibhirumāpatitvena ca śrūyamāṇaṃ paraṃ brahma prakṛte savitṛ-
maṇḍalavidyāmātra upāsyamuta sarvāsu paravidyāsviti saṃśayaḥ । kiṃ tāvat prāptam ?
prakaraṇabādhāyogāt prakṛtasavitṛmaṇḍalavidyāyāmevopāsyam ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<sutra>sū ।। atha liṃgabhūyastvādhikaraṇam ।। 28 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। liṃgabhūyastvāttaddhi balīyastadapi ।। 43 ।।</pratika> saṃgatimāha---<pratika>pūrvamiti</pratika> । pūrvādhi-
karaṇe sarvāsu sākṣānmuktiphalāsu vidyāsu śivarūpaṃ paraṃ brahma ekamevopāsyamiti siddhaṃ
kṛtvopāsyaikye'pi na vidyaikyamiti samarthitaṃ । idānīṃ tadevopāsyaikyaṃ samarthyata iti
saṃgatiḥ । <pratika>prakṛte savitṛmaṇḍale vidyāmātre iti</pratika> । <quote>‘sarvo vai rudra’</quote> ityanuvāke rudrasya
sarvāsu paravidyāsūpāsyatve viniyojakasya vākyasya sadbhāve vākyena prakaraṇasya bādhā-
tsarvāsu paravidyāsu rudrākhyaṃ paraṃ brahmopāsyaṃ bhavet । tadasadbhāve prakaraṇena savitṛmaṇḍala-
vidyāyāmevaitadupāsyaṃ bhavet । vidyāntareṣu tūpāsyaṃ tattatprakaraṇālocanayā nirdhāraṇīyaṃ
syāditi tathā bhūtavākyasadasadbhāvābhyāmayaṃ saṃśayaḥ । <pratika>prakaraṇabādhāyogāditi</pratika> । ayamā-
śayaḥ । rudranamaskārārthā ime mantrāḥ । na tu tattadvidyopāsyaliṃgavadbhiśśabdaistattadvidyopāsyaṃ
pratyabhijñāpya tasya rudratvapratipādanārthāḥ । tathā sati namaskārānanvayaprasaṃgāt । yadyapi
<quote>‘sarvo vairudrastasmairudrāyanamo astvi’</quote> tyatra vākyabhedapratīterekaṃ vākyaṃ śāṇḍilyavidyopāsyasya
rudratvanirddhāraṇārthamanyadvākyaṃ namaskārārthamiti yojayituṃ śakyaṃ । tathā'pi <quote>‘puruṣo vai rudra’</quote>
ityādau vākyabhedāpratītestathā yojanā na saṃbhavati । atastasya puruṣasūktasadvidyāvyāhṛ-
tividyopāsyatvanirdhāraṇārthatvāsaṃbhavātsakalaparavidyopāsyanirddhāraṇārthatvamasyānuvākasya na
labhyata iti <quote>‘sarvo vai rudra’</quote> ityasyāpi vidyāṃtaropāsyanirddhāraṇārthatvaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyate ।
kṛtsnasyānuvākasya sakalaparavidyopāsyanirddhāraṇārthatvopapādanasaṃbhave hyasya vākyasyā'pi
yatkiñcidvidyopāsyaniddhāraṇārthatvaṃ bhavet । tadasaṃbhave tu ‘sarvo vai rudra”iti namaskāryasya
<pb n="363"/>
iti prāpte brūmaḥ । idamumāsahitaṃ paraṃ brahma sarvāsvapi paravidyāsūpāsyam । tatta-
lliṅgasaṃbandhivākyabhūyastvāt । tathā hi <quote>‘sarvo vai rudra’</quote> ityādivākye <quote>‘sarvaṃ kha-
lvidaṃ brahma tajjalāniti śānta upāsīte’</quote>ti śāṇḍilyavidyopāsyaliṅgam ।
<quote>‘puruṣo vai rudra’</quote> iti vākye puruṣasūktopakosalavidyādyupāsyaliṅgam । <quote>‘sat’</quote>
ityatra <quote>‘sadeva somyedamagra āsīt’</quote> iti sadvidyopāsyaliṅgama । <quote>‘mahaḥ’</quote> ityatra <quote>‘maha
iti tadbrahma sa ātmā aṅgānyanyā devatā’</quote> iti vyāhṛtividyopāsyaliṅgam ।
<quote>‘śantamaṃ hṛde’</quote> iti hṛdayadyotanāt daharavidyopāsyaliṅgam । <quote>‘hiraṇyabāhave’</quote> iti
hiraṇyarūpatvaṃ savitṛmaṇḍalopāsyaliṅgam । <quote>‘umāpataye’</quote> iti sarvaparavidyopāsya-
liṅgam । saṃsārarugdrāvakatvāt rudra ityucyate paramātmā śivaḥ । evamumāpateḥ para-
brahmaṇaḥ śivasya sarvaparavidyopāsyatvaṃ vākyairavasīyate । vākyaṃ hi prakaraṇādba-

sarvātmakatvena stutimātraṃ kṛtaṃ syāt । yadi ca <quote>‘puruṣo vai rudra’</quote> ityāderanyārthatvepi
vidyāntaropāsyasamarpakapadasāmānādhikaraṇyamātreṇa tattadvidyopāsyaviśeṣanirddhāraṇārthatvaṃ ka-
lpyeta । yadivā tatrānyārthatvapratītirahitasya kasyacidvākyasya kiṃcidvidyopāsyanirddhāra-
ṇārthatvaṃ kalpyeta । tadā nārāyaṇānuvākasyāpi sahasraśīrṣākṣaraśivaśaṃbhvādiśabdapratyabhi-
jñāpitasakalaparavidyopāsyanirddhāraṇārthatvaṃ bhavet । <quote>‘tadviśvamupajīvatī’</quote>tyākhyātasatvena
dvitīyāntānāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyasyānyārthatve'pi <quote>‘nārāyaṇaparaṃ brahme’</quote>tyādiprathamānta-
nirdeśeṣvākhyātābhāvena tadvailakṣaṇyāt । tanmātrasya katipayaparavidyopāsyanirddhāraṇārthatvaṃ
bhavet । tathā ca sarvaparavidyopāsyaśśiva ityabhimataṃ tanna sidhdyediti । <pratika>tattalliṅgasaṃba-
ndhīti</pratika> sūtre <quote>‘liṅgabhūyastvādi’</quote>ti padaṃ tattalliṅgopāsyaliṅgasamarpakapadaghaṭitavākyabhūyastva-
paramiti bhāvaḥ । tena kvacideva vākye kiṃcidvidyopāsyaliṅgasamarpakapadasāmānādhi-
karaṇyamātraṃ tadvidyopāsyanirdhāraṇārthatvakalpanāyāṃ prayojakaṃ na bhavati । bahvatiprasaṅgāpatte-
riti śaṅkā nirākṛtā veditavyā । śāṇḍilyavidyāgrahaṇamanyatrā'pi yatra yatra <quote>‘idaṃ sarvaṃ
yadayamātmā’</quote> ityādau brahmaṇassarvātmatvamuktaṃ tasyāsya sarvasyāpi vidyāyā upalakṣaṇam ।
evamuttaratrāpi draṣṭavyam । <pratika>sarvaparavidyeti</pratika> । <quote>‘tasmātsaha tayā śaktyeti’</quote> śruteḥ paraśakti-
vaiśiṣṭyasya sarvavidyāsādhāraṇyeti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>vākyairavasīyata iti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ ।
<quote>‘sarvo vai rudra’</quote> ityatra vākyabhedenopāsyaviśeṣanirddhāraṇārthatvaṃ suvacam । <quote>‘puruṣo vai rudra’</quote>
ityādikamapi vaiśabdayogānnamaśśabdānvayāpādakacaturthyabhāvācca puruṣasūktādyupāsyānu-
vādena tasya rudratvanirddhāraṇārthameva । namaśśabdayogastu, <quote>‘sarvaṃ rudreti vai prāhurmunaya-
statvadarśinaḥ । namaskāreṇa sahitaṃ gauravātparameśituḥ’</quote> ।। 1 ।। iti liṅgapurāṇo-
ktarītyā namaśśeṣitvarūpagauravaprakhyāpanārthaḥ । yathā <quote>‘śrīrudrāḥ pāvanāḥ śrīśailo mu-
ktida’</quote> ityādiprayogeṣu śrīśabdaḥ pūjyatvaprakhyāpanārthaḥ । <quote>‘kadrudrāye’</quote>ti maṃtrasyāya-
marthaḥ । mīḍhuṣṭamāya sektṛtamāya sarvoṣāmapi pitre । tavyase tavo vṛddhiḥ tadasyāstīti viniḥ ।
tavasvi tadatiśāyane īyasunpratye sati <quote>‘vinmatorlugi’</quote>ti vino luki <quote>‘ṭe’</quote>riti ṭilope ca
sati chāndase ikāralope ca sati tavyasaitirūpasiddhiḥ vṛddhimattamāyetyarthaḥ । hṛde
hṛdayasthāya । evaṃbhūtāya rudrāya । śaṃtamaṃ sukhāvahatamaṃ । sarvaduḥkhānāṃ śamayitṛtamaṃ । kat vāk-

līyaḥ । tadapyuktam---<quote>‘śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyānāṃ samavāye pāradau-
rbalyamarthaviprakarṣāt’</quote> iti । tasmādumāsahitaṃ saṃsārarugdrāvakaṃ paraṃ vastu sakalapara-

<sutra>sū ।। pūrvavikalpaḥ prakaraṇāt syāt kriyāmānasavat ।। 44 ।।</sutra>
agnirahasyabrāhmaṇe śrūyate <quote>‘ṣaṭ‌triṃśataṃ sahasrāṇyapaśyadātmano'gnīnarkānmayoma-
yān manaścitaḥ’</quote> iti । tathā ‘vākcitaḥ prāṇacitaścakṣuścitaḥ śrotracitaḥ karma-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ślāghanaṃ stotraṃ <quote>‘kattha ślāghāyā’</quote>miti dhātorbhāveṣviti saṃyogāntalopaḥ । evaṃbhūtaṃ stotraṃ
vocema <quote>‘liṅyā''śirṣyāṅ’</quote>ityaṅi <quote>‘vacau’</quote>mityumāgame ca satyāśiṣi liṅi bahuvacanam ।
atra yadyapi hṛdayasthatvamanyārthatvenopāttaṃ । tathāpi daharavidyopāsyasūcanārthaṃ bhavatyeva । kaiva-
lyopaniṣadi viśiṣya śivasya daharavidyopāsyatvena prasiddhatvāt । evamanyārthatvenāpi
<quote>‘namo hiraṇyabāhava’</quote> ityādinā savitṛmaṇḍalopāsyaviśeṣanirdhāraṇaṃ labhyate prakaraṇāviro-
dhāditi । taddhi balīya iti sūtrāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>vākyaṃ hīti</pratika> । <quote>‘tadapīti’</quote> sūtrāṃśaṃ pūrva-
sūtrāduktamityasyānuṣaṅgeṇa vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>tadapyuktamiti</pratika> । <quote>‘sarvo vai rudra’</quote> ityādivākyeṣu nārā-
yaṇānuvākavaiṣamyoddhāṭanena nyāyavyutpādanārthamidamadhikaraṇam । sarvāsu paravidyāsu śi-
vasya dhyeyatvamatharvaśikhāyāmāhatyaiva nirdhāritaṃ na nyāyavyutpādanāpekṣam । tatra hi
vidyāviśeṣamanupakramya sarvaparavidyāsādhāraṇye dhyānasādhanadhyānadhyātṛdhyeyaviṣayapraśnānu-
panyasya, tatprativacanasandarbhe praśnatrayaprativacanānantaraṃ sarvāsu paravidyāsu brahmaviṣṇvādisa-
kalaprapañcakāraṇabhūtaḥ paramākāśavarttī niratiśayaiśvaryaśālī niratiśayānandaghanaḥ śiva eva
dhyātavya iti dhyeyanirdhāraṇaṃ kṛtvopaniṣatsamāpitā ।।</p>
<head>iti liṅgabhūyastvādhikaraṇam ।। 28 ।।</head>
<head>atha pūrvavikalpādhikaraṇam ।। 29 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। pūrvavikalpaḥ prakaraṇātsyātkriyāmānasavat ।। 44 ।।</pratika> yathā savitṛmaṇḍa-
lavidyāprakaraṇasya balīyasā pramāṇena bādhaḥ evaṃ kriyāmayakratuprakaraṇasyāpīti dṛṣṭāntasaṃ-
gatiḥ । śatapathabrāhmaṇe agnirahasye kriyāmayakratvaṅgabhūta iṣṭakacitogniḥ prakṛtaḥ <quote>‘taddha ta-
nmana evāsī’</quote>diti prathamotpannaṃ manaḥ prastutya <quote>‘tatṣaṭ‌triṃśatsahasrāṇyapaśya’</quote>dityādinā mana-</p>

<sutra>sū ।। vidyaiva tu nirdhāraṇāddarśanācca ।। 46 ।।</sutra>
vidyaiva vidyāmayakratvaṅgabhūtā ityarthaḥ । sāṃpādikāgnitvena vidyāmayatve siddhe'pi
<quote>‘te haite vidyācita eva’</quote> iti nirdhāraṇaṃ hi vidyāmayakratvaṅgatvakhyāpanāya । dṛśyate ca
vidyāmayakratuḥ atraiva <quote>‘manasā'cīyanta manasaiṣu grahā agṛhyanta manasā'stuvan
manasā'śaṃsan yat kiṃca yajñe karma kriyate yat kiṃca yajñīyaṃ karma manasaiva teṣu
manomayeṣu manaścitsu manomayamakriyata’</quote> iti । atasteṣāṃ vidyāmayakratvaṅgatvameva ।।
<sutra>sū ।। śrutyādibalīyastvācca na bādhaḥ ।। 47 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘te haite vidyācita eva tān haitānevaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni cinvantyapi
svapate vidyayā haivaita evaṃvidaścitā bhavanti’</quote> iti śrutyā vākyena liṅgena cāvagatasya
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kṣābhiprāyaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। vidyaiva tu nirddhāraṇāddarśanācca ।। 46 ।।</pratika> pūrvapakṣasūtre kriyāśabda i-
vātra vidyāśabdo'pi lākṣaṇika iti vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>vidyaiveti । te haita iti</pratika> । sarvanāmabhyāṃ
saptavidhānāmagnīnāṃ parāmarśaḥ । teṣāṃ vidyācitatve siddhe'pi ya<quote>‘dvidyācitaeve’</quote>ti nirdhāraṇaṃ
yacca tadanaṃtaraṃ <quote>‘vidyayā haivata evaṃvidaścitā bhavantī’</quote>ti tadvivaraṇavākye nirdhāraṇaṃ tadvi-
dyāmayakratvanupraveśinaḥ evaite na tu kriyāmayakratvanupraveśina iti jñāpanāyetyarthaḥ । nanu
vidyāmayaḥ kratureva na dṛśyate yadanupraveśo nirdhāraṇena jñāpyeteti śaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ <quote>‘darśa-
nācceti’</quote> sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>dṛśyate ceti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । agnīnāmiva grahagrahaṇādīnā-
mapi śravaṇamaviśiṣṭam । na ca sarvāsāṃ manovāgādivṛttīnāmagnidṛṣṭikroḍīkṛtatvādgrahagraha-
ṇādidṛṣṭiviṣayatvābhāvātte na santīti vācyam । na hi pratidinaṃ yāvatyo manovāgādivṛ-
ttayastāsāṃ sarvāsāṃ saṃyāteṣvagnidṛṣṭiḥ kartavyeti vidhānamasti । ṣaṭ‌triṃśatsahasrasaṃkhyā tu
pratidinaprabhavāsu katipayamanovāgādivṛttiṣvagnidṛṣṭyāpi caritārthā । kāsucidgrahagrahaṇā-
didṛṣṭirna virudhyate । na ca vidyāmayaṃ grahagrahaṇādikaṃ manovṛttyadhiṣṭhānakamiti niyamo-
'sti । tadadhiṣṭhānatve'pi mānasagrahāṇāṃ grahaṇāsādanādīnāmidamidamiti manomātranirvartya-
tvarūpaṃ tadupapadyate । tathāpi vidyāmayasya kratorvidhirnopalabhyata iti cedanupalabhyamāno'pi
grahaṇādisaṃskāravidhibhirunnīyate । yatkiṃcana yajñe karma kriyate yatkiṃcana yajñiyaṃ karmeti
dvivāraṃ vīpsayā yajñānubandhi yatphalārthaṃ guṇajātamaṅgajātaṃ ca tatsarvaṃ gṛhyate । tenābhiṣavā-
dīnāmapi grahaṇamasaṃdigdham । evaṃ ca <quote>‘somābhāve pūtikānabhiṣuṇuyā’</quote>diti pūtikānāma-
bhiṣavamātraśravaṇena taddravyakayāgānvayaḥ kalpyate । yadi rājanyaṃ vaiśyaṃ vā yājayetsayadi somaṃ
vibhakṣayiṣannyagrodhastibhinīrāhṛtya tāssaṃpiṣya dadhnyunmṛjya tasmai bhakṣaṃ prayacchenna somamiti
phalacamasasya bhakṣaṇamātraśravaṇena taddravyakayāgābhyāsaḥ kalpyapte । iha grahaṇābhiṣavahomabha-
kṣaṇādisakalasaṃskāraśravaṇe kathaṃ yāgakalpanaṃ na syāt । tasmādastyatra vidyāmayaḥ kraturiti ।
nanvaindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇātītyādivākyeṣu śrutānāmiṃdravāyvādyuddeśena somarasagrahaṇānāṃ yāgānva-
yāpekṣāṇāṃ śrutasomayāgānvayena cāritārthye saṃbhavati na yāgāntarakalpaneti paśusomādhi-
karaṇe vyavasthāpitam । evamihāpi grahaṇādisaṃskārāṇāmiṣṭakacitāgnyupasthāpitakriyāma-
yakratvanvaye saṃbhavati na vidyāmayaḥ kratuḥ kalpanīya iti śaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram । <pratika>sū ।।
śrutyādibalīyastvācca na bādhaḥ ।। 47 ।।</pratika> nanu śrutiliṅgavākyebhyaḥ manaścidādīnāṃ vi-
<pb n="368"/>
vidyāmayakratvanvayasya durbalena prakaraṇena na bādhaḥ।। nanu <quote>‘manasaiṣu grahā agṛhyanta’</quote> ityā-
diṣu vidhipratyayāśravaṇāt kriyāmayāt kratoranyo vidyāmayaḥ kraturnāstītyata āha—
<sutra>sū ।। anubandhādibhyaḥ prajñāntarapṛthaktvavadda‍ṛṣṭaśca taduktam ।। 48 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘grahā agṛhyanta’</quote> ityādikratvanubandhaiḥ <quote>‘te haite vidyācita eva’</quote> iti śrutyādi-
bhiśca vidyāmayakratuvidhiḥ kalpanīyaḥ । daharavidyādīnāṃ kriyāmayāt pṛthaktva-
vadasyāpi vidyāmayakratoḥ sānubandhaiḥ śrutyādibhiḥ pṛthaktvamavagamyate । dṛṣṭaścānu-
vādasarūpe vidhiḥ <quote>‘yadeva vidyayā karoti’</quote> ityādau । taduktam <quote>‘vacanāni tvapūrva-
tvāt’</quote> iti । ato vidyāmayakratvaṅgatvameva yuktam ।। āśaṅkya pariharati---
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dyāmayakratvanvayo nāvagamyate । tathāhi natāvadiha teṣāṃ tatra viniyojikā vibhaktyādiśru-
tirasti । tatsatve'pi <quote>‘ṣaḍviṃśatirityeva brūyāt’</quote> ityādivadevakāropahatavidhiśaktikatayā na
viniyojakatvaṃ saṃbhavati । evakāraśrutistu kriyārūpakratvaṃgatvameva vyāvarttayenna tu vidyārū-
pakratvaṃgatvaṃ bodhayet । tathā sārvadikasarvabhūtakartṛkatvaṃ cayanasya vyavasthitakālakartṛkakri-
yārūpakratvaṅgatva eva liṃgaṃ na tu vidyārūpakratvaṃgatve । evaṃvide cinvaṃti evaṃvidaścitā bhavaṃti
iti vākyaṃ tu agnīnāṃ puruṣasaṃbandhamātraṃ bodhayet na tu vidyārūpe kriyārūpe vā kratāvaṅga-
tvam । ataḥ śrutyādibhirvidyāmayakratvanvayoktirna yukteti ceducyate । udāhṛtaśrutili-
ṅgābhyāṃ kriyārūpakratvanvaye nirākṛte grahaṇādisaṃskāravidhibhistadanvayayogyo vidyāmayaḥ
kratuḥ kalpanīyo bhavati । kratvaṅgasyāgnicayanasya puruṣasaṃbandhaṃ bodhayadvākyaṃ kratusaṃbandhadvārā
nirvāhyamiti kriyārūpakratusaṃbandhasya śrutiliṅgābhyāṃ bodhe sati vidyāvatvarūpapuruṣaviśeṣaṇa-
sāmarthyādvidyārūpakratusaṃbandhadvārakasyaiva tasya bodhakaṃ paryavasyatītyevaṃ śrutiliṅgavākyānā
vidyāmayakratvanvaye paryavasānamastīti bhāṣyābhiprāyaḥ । tadvirodhinaḥ prakaraṇasyāpi hi
kriyāmayakratvaṅgatvabodhakatvaṃ paryavasānavṛttyaiva । nahyagnirahasyabrāhmaṇe kriyāmayasya kratoḥ
prakaraṇamasti kiṃ tu tadaṅgasya kriyānirvartyasyāgnereva । atastadīyasyaiva prakaraṇasya tadupasthā-
pyakratvanvaye paryavasānaṃ vaktavyamiti sūtre cakāraṇe vidyāmayāgnīnāmiva vidyāmayagrahagraha-
ṇādīnāṃ kriyāmayakratau vaikalpitāṅgatvāsaṃbhavaḥ pūrvapakṣipradarśitaḥ <pratika>samuccīyate । nanviti ।</pratika>
grahagrahaṇādiṣu vidhisadbhāve hi vihitairvidyāmayaissaṃskārairucito vidyāmayaḥ kratuḥ kalpyeta
natu tacchravaṇamastīti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। anubaṃdhādibhyaḥ prajñāṃtarapṛthaktvavadṝṣṭaśca taduktam
।। 48 ।।</pratika> grahā agṛhyantetyādīnāmanuvādasvarūpatve'pi vacanāni tvapūrvāditinyāyena
manaścidādīnāmiva grahagrahaṇādīnāmapi vidhikalpanaṃ bhavanna nivārayituṃ śakyam । <quote>‘some
vacanādbhakṣo na vidyata’</quote> iti adhikaraṇe hi some śeṣabhakṣo nāsti vacanābhāvāt । <quote>‘sarvataḥ
parihāramāśinaṃ bhakṣayatī’</quote>tyādivacanānāṃ guṇavidhānārthatvāt । na ca guṇavidhānasya vihi-
tabhakṣaṇavidhimantareṇānupapattiḥ । tasyaicchikapakṣaprāptabhakṣaṇaviṣayatvopapatteriti pūrvapakṣaṃ
kṛtvā viśiṣṭavidhirūpāṇyeva tāni vākyāni bhakṣaṇasyāpūrvatvena vidhyarhatvāditi siddhāṃ-
titam । tathā ca grahagrahaṇādibhiḥ kratvanubandhaiḥ pūrvasūtrodāhṛtaśrutyādibhissahitaiḥ kratu-
vidhiḥ kalpanīya iti na vidyāmayakratuvidhyabhāvaḥ śaṅkanīya iti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>āśaṅkyeti</pratika> ।
manaścidādīnāmatideśeneṣṭakacitāgnibhistulyakāryatvāvagamātteṣāṃ kriyāmayakratvanupraveśo-
<pb n="369"/>
<sutra>sū ।। na sāmānyādapyupalabdhermṛtyuvanna hi lokāpattiḥ ।। 49 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘teṣāmekaika eva tāvān yāvānasau pūrvaḥ’</quote> itīṣṭakacitāgnicitaphalasāmānyenā-
tideśaḥ, iṣṭakacitāgneḥ svakratudvāreṇa yat phalaṃ tadeṣāṃ vidyāmayakratupraveśena pha-
lamiti । na punariṣṭakacitāgnitulyadeśatvameṣāmiti । kenāpi sāmānyenātide-
śopalabdheḥ <quote>‘sa vā eṣa eva mṛtyurya eṣa etasmin maṇḍale puruṣa’</quote> iti saṃhartṛtva-
mātreṇa । na hi tatra maṇḍalapuruṣasya mṛtyutulyadeśatvam । ataḥ kenacit sāmānye-
nātideśe na virodhaḥ ।। hetvantaramāha
<sutra>sū ।। pareṇa ca śabdasya tādvidhyaṃ bhūyastvāttvanubandhaḥ ।। 50 ।।</sutra>
pareṇa ca brāhmaṇenāsya manaścidādivācinaḥ śabdasya vidyamayatvapratipādakatva-
mavagamyate । tathā hi <quote>‘ayaṃ vāva loka eṣo'gniścitastasyāpa’</quote> ityādinā pṛtha-
kphalā vidyā vidhīyate । kriyāprakaraṇe manaścidādīnāmanubandhastu saṃpādanīyā-
nāmagnyaṅgānāṃ bhūyastvāt । tata eteṣāṃ vidyāmayakratvaṅgatvam ।।
iti pūrvavikalpādhikaraṇam ।। 29 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
'vagamyata iti pūrvapakṣoktamāśaṅkyetyarthaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। na sāmānyādapyupapattermṛtyuvannahi lo-
kāpattiḥ ।। 49 ।।</pratika> iṣṭakacitāgneriva svapradhānadvārā phalavatvamastītyetāvatā sādṛśyenāti-
deśaḥ na tulyadeśatvaparyantena । yathā manaścidādibrāhmaṇātpūrvabrāhmaṇāvasānaśruteḥ<quote>‘sa eṣa mṛtyu’</quote>-
rityādau maṇḍalapuruṣe saṃhartṛtvamastītyetāvatā sādṛśyena mṛtyuriti vyapadeśaḥ na tu mṛtyulo-
kāvasthitilakṣaṇatulyadeśatvaparyantenetyarthaḥ। <pratika>hetvaṃtaramiti</pratika> । manaścidādibrāhmaṇasya vidyāprādhā-
nyaiti śeṣaḥ ।। <pratika>sū ।। pareṇa ca śabdasya tādvidhyaṃ bhūyastvāttvanubandhaḥ ।। 50 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘ayaṃ vāvalo-
ka’</quote>iti citegnau pṛthivīdṛṣṭirvidhīyate । <quote>‘tasyāpa eva pariśrutā’</quote> iti <quote>‘aśmarnnūjamiti pariṣiñca-
tī’</quote>ti vihitāgnipariṣecanajale samudrajaladṛṣṭirvidhīyate । evaṃ <quote>‘manuṣyāya juṣmatya iṣṭakā’</quote>ityā-
dināpyagnyanubandhiṣu bhūlokāditattadvastuviśeṣadṛṣṭayo vidhīyante । avasāne ca tadvidaḥ phalamu-
cyate <quote>‘etatsarvamabhisampadyata’</quote> iti । cakārātpūrveṇā'pi brāhmaṇena manaścidādibrāhmaṇasya vi-
dyāprādhānyamavagamyate iti samuccīyate । pūrvatra hi sa eṣa mṛtyurya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣo
yaścāyaṃ dakṣiṇekṣanpuruṣaḥ sa eṣa evaṃvida ātmā bhavati sa yadaivaṃvidasmāllokātpraityathaitamevātmā-
namabhisaṃbhavati somṛto bhavatī’ti vidyāviśeṣamupadiśya tadvidaḥ phalamucyate । na tu svatantravi-
dyānāṃ kriyāmayaprakaraṇasamāmnānaṃ kimarthamityākāṅkṣāyāṃ <quote>‘bhūyastvānubandha’</quote>iti sūtraśeṣaṃ vyā-
caṣṭe---kriyāmayaprakaraṇa iti । anubandhaḥ kriyānirvartyogniḥ prakaraṇamanusamāmnānamityarthaḥ ।।</p>

<sutra>sū ।। pūrvavikalpaḥ prakaraṇātsyātkriyāmānasavat ।। 44 ।। atideśācca ।। 45 ।। vidyaiva tu nirdhā-
raṇāddarśanācca ।। 46 ।। śrutyādibalīyastvācca na bādhaḥ ।। 47 ।। anubandhādibhyaḥ prajñāntarapṛthaktvava-
dda‍ṛṣṭaśca taduktam ।। 48 ।। na sāmānyādapyupalabdhermṛtyuvanna hi lokāpattiḥ ।। 49 ।। pareṇa ca śabdasya

<pb n="370"/>
atha śarīre bhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 30 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। eka ātmanaḥ śarīre bhāvāt ।। 51 ।।</sutra>
iha pūrvoktabrahmasvarūpānusandhānaṃ sarvāsu paravidyāsu yujyate na veti saṃśayaḥ ।
tatraike manyante । śarīre vartamānatvādupāsituḥ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvarūpāpannatvāt tathā'-
vasthitasyātmatayā paravidyāsu parameśvarasya trilocanatvādilakṣaṇasvarūpānusandhānaṃ
na yujyata iti ।। siddhānta ucyate ।
<sutra>sū ।। vyatirekastadbhāvabhāvitvānna tūpalabdhivat ।। 52 ।।</sutra>
naivaṃ yatkartṛtvabhoktṛtvādirūpāpannasyopāsiturātmatayā paramātmā'nusandheya
iti । apitu sāṃsārikasvabhāvānmukte yo vyatireka apahatapāpmatvādiguṇarūpaḥ
so'nusandheyaḥ । tathā'nusandhānasadbhāvabhāvitvāt svarūpopalabdheḥ । yathā yathā'va-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha śarīre bhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 30 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। eka ātmanaśśarīre bhāvāt ।। 51 ।।</pratika> pūrvādhikaraṇaviṣayavākye manaścidādayaḥ
pratyagātmatvena dhyātavyā ityuktam । evaṃ śivo'pi pratyagātmatayā dhyātavyaḥ । <quote>‘tvaṃ vā
ahamasmi bhagavo devate ahaṃ vai tvamasī’</quote>ti śivajīvayoḥ parasparaikyabhāvanayāvihitatvāt
<quote>‘ātmeti tūpagacchaṃti’</quote>ityadhikaraṇe tathā vakṣyamāṇatvāccetyetadanusmṛtya liṅgabhūyastvādhika-
raṇoktamākṣipyata iti saṃgatiṃ sūcayati---<pratika>pūrvoktamiti । yujyate na veti saṃśaya iti</pratika> ।
kiṃ pratyagātmā tadā1nīṃtanaiḥ karmādhīnaśarīrabandhakakartṛtvabhoktṛtvadharmairviśiṣṭaḥ paravidyāsu
śivadharmikaikyapratiyogitvenānusaṃdheyaḥ । kiṃ vā muktidaśāyāmāvirbhaviṣyadbhirapahatapāpma-
tvādibhirviśiṣṭa ityanavadhāraṇātsaṃśaya iti bhāvaḥ । yathā śuktirajataikyānubhavastadānīṃ
dṛśyamānaiścākacakyādibhirdharmairviśiṣṭatayā śuktyaikyaviṣayaḥ । na tu tadānīmadṛśyamānairnīla-
bhāgādibhirviśiṣṭatayā । evaṃ śivajīvaikyabhāvanamapi tadānīmanubhūyamānairddharmairviśiṣṭena
jīvenaikyaviṣayaṃ । na tu tadānīṃ tirohitairiti yuktam । na ca tatkratunyāyānusārādanevaṃbhā-
vaśśaṅkanīyaḥ । <quote>‘taṃ yathopāsata’</quote> iti śrutyantarānusāreṇa tasya prāpyaparabrahmaviṣayatvāt ।
evañca yaduktaṃ liṅgabhūyastvādhikaraṇe nirastasamastadoṣasya nikhilamaṅgalaguṇākarasya cidā-
nandarūpakarmādhīnadivyavigrahaviśiṣṭasya śivasya sarvāsu paravidyāsu dhyeyatvaṃ tannopapadyate ।
karmādhīnaśarīrabandhatadadhīnavihitaniṣiddhakartṛtvatatphalasukhaduḥkhabhoktṛtvaviśiṣṭapratyagātma-
rūpatayānusaṃdhīyamāne tasmin tadvirodhiguṇānusaṃdhānāyogāt । ahamanubhavarūpapratyagātmagu-
ṇebhyaḥ śrutyupasthāpitaguṇānāṃ durbalatvāditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।। <pratika>sū ।। vyatirekastadbhāvabhāvi-
tvānnatūpalabdhivat ।। 52 ।।</pratika> natviti sūtrāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>naivamiti</pratika> । apahatapāpmatvā-
diguṇarūpahativyatirekapadavyākhyānena prajāpatividyāvākyaṃ vyatirekasyānusandheyatve pramāṇaṃ
sūcitam । tatra hyapahatapāpmatvādirūpaviśiṣṭaṃ pratyagātmānaṃ prastutya <quote>‘sonveṣṭavya’</quote> iti pra-
kṛtarūpaviśiṣṭameva tacchabdena parāmṛśya tasyānusandheyatvamuktam । evaṃ ca yathāvidhivihita-
vidyānuṣṭhānaṃ । na tu laukikapramāṇopasthityanuguṇamiti । tadānīṃ pratyakṣopasthitairapi sāṃsāri-
<note>(1) <quote>‘adhunātanaiḥ’</quote> iti. kha॰ pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="371"/>
sthitasvarūpabrahmānusandhānabhāvinī brahmopalabdhiḥ tadvat, <quote>‘yathākraturasmiṃlloke pu-
ruṣaḥ’</quote> ityādiśruteḥ । ataḥ sāṃsārikasvabhāvanirmuktāpahatapāpmatvādisvarūpatayopā-
situranusandheyatvāt tadātmatayā'nusandheyasya parameśvarasya trilocanatvādilakṣa-
ṇasvarūpānusandhāne nāsti virodhaḥ ।।
iti śarīre bhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 30 ।।
atha aṅgāvabaddhādhikaraṇam ।। 31 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। aṅgāvabaddhāstu na śākhāsu hi prativedam ।। 53 ।।</sutra>
kāsu cicchākhāsu śruyamāṇā upāsanāṅgāvabaddhāḥ sarvāsūpāsanāsvaṅgatvenopasaṃ-
hāryā na veti saṃśayaḥ ।। tathā hi---<quote>‘‘ātmānamaraṇiṃ kṛtvā praṇavaṃ cottarāraṇim ।
dhyānarnirmathanādeva pāśaṃ dahati paṇḍitaḥ ।।”</quote> iti kaivalyopaniṣadi daharopāsa-
nāyāṃ praṇavābhyāsaḥ śrūyate । <quote>‘agni’</quote>rityādinā bhasma gṛhītvā vimṛjyāṅgāni
saṃspṛśet । tasmādvratametat pāśupataṃ paśupāśavimokṣāya’ iti atharvaśirasi pā-
śupatavidyāyāṃ bhasmoddha‍ūlanaṃ śrūyate । anyatra <quote>‘tisro rekhāḥ prakurvīta’</quote> iti
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kairdharmaiḥ pratyagātmano'nusaṃdhānaṃ na kāryaṃ kiṃtu tadānīṃ tirohitairapyapahatapāpmatvādibhire-
veti bhāvaḥ । nanu brahmopalabdhiryathāvasthitabrahmaviṣayā kāryeti niyamo <quote>‘yathākratu’</quote>riti śru-
terityāśaṅkya sā śrutirjīvayāthātmyasādhāraṇī tasyāpi prāpyakoṭiniviṣṭatvāt <quote>‘taṃ yathā
yathopāsata’</quote> iti śruterapi jīvātmabhūtaparamātmatvādityabhipretyāha---<pratika>yathākraturiti ।।</pratika></p>
<head>iti śarīre bhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 30 ।।</head>
<head>athāṅgāvabaddhādhikaraṇam ।। 31 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। aṅgāvabaddhāstu na śākhāsu hi prativedam ।। 53 ।।</pratika> evaṃ parabrahmaṇaḥ śiva-
syopāsyasya sakalaparavidyāsu sādhāraṇyaṃ liṅgabhūyastvādhikaraṇoktamākṣipya samāhitaṃ । tatpra-
saṅgāttadasādhāraṇamantrabhūtapraṇavābhyāsasya tadbhaktāsādhāraṇacihnabhasmoddha‍ūlanatripuṇḍradhāraṇa-
yoścāsādhāraṇyamucyata iti saṃgatiḥ । <pratika>upāsanāṃgāvabaddhā iti</pratika> । upāsanāṅgatvena
nibaddhā ityarthaḥ । nanu praṇavābhyāsabhasmoddha‍lanayorūpāsanāṅgatvena nibaṃdhanaṃ daharapāśupata-
vidyāprakaraṇāmnānādavagamyate । kālāgnirudropaniṣadi vidyāviśeṣamanārabhyāmnātasya tripu-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha śarīre bhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 30 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū ।। eka ātmanaḥ śarīre bhāvāt ।। 51 ।। vyatirekastadbhāvabhāvitvānnatūpalabdhivat ।। 52 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>vapuṣi sthiteranākāśātkartṛtvasyātivelamalinesmin । śivasāmarasyaviṣayā śivohamiti bhāvanā kathaṃ jīve ।। 278 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>nāyaṃ vidyāsu ciṃtyastanubhṛdaśivatāpādakaiḥ kartṛtādyaiḥ kiṃ tu brahmopadiṣṭairapahataduritatvādibhistadvirūddhaiḥ ।</l>
<l>evaṃ dhyāte hi jīvaḥ pralayavati yathāvasthite svasya rūpe muktau cicchaktitaḥ syātparaśivasamatā tatkratunyāyagatyā ।। 279 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti śarīre bhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 30 ।।</head>
<pb n="372"/>
<p>tripuṇḍradhāraṇavidhiḥ śrūyate । tasya <quote>‘śivasāyujyam’</quote> iti phalaśravaṇāt para-
vidyāṅgatvam । tadevaṃ vidyāṅgāvabaddhāḥ yāsu śākhāsu śrutāstāsu vihiteṣūpāsane-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ṇḍradhāraṇasya tatkuto'vagamyate ityākāṅkṣāyāmāha---<pratika>tasyeti</pratika> । <quote>‘tiryak tisro rekhāḥ praku-
rvīta vratametacchāṃbhavaṃ sarvavedeṣu devādibhiruktaṃ tatsamācarenmumukṣurapunarbhavāye’</quote>ti tripuṇḍradhā-
raṇasya muktiphalakatvamuktam । upaniṣadante ca <quote>‘etatripuṇḍraṃ bhasmanā karoti yo vidvānbrahma-
cārī gṛhī vānaprastho yatirvā samastamahāpātakopapātakebhyaḥ pūto bhavatī’</quote>tyupakramya dehaṃ
tyaktvā śivasāyujyamāpnoti na sa punarāvartata ityupasaṃhṛtam । na ca vidyāṅgabhāvaṃ vinā
tasya sākṣānmuktiphalakatvaṃ sambhavatīti tasya muktiphalakavidyāṅgatvamavasīyata iti bhāvaḥ ।
itthaṃ viṣayaṃ saṃśodhya pūrvapakṣamāha---<pratika>evamiti</pratika> । vidyāviśeṣaprakaraṇāmnātayoḥ praṇavābhyāsa-
bhasmoddha‍ūlanayoḥ prakaraṇānniyamaḥ spaṣṭaḥ । tripuṇḍradhāraṇasya tu vidyāviśeṣamatra śākhyāyāṃ
vidhānaṃ tacchākhāmnātavidyāsu sannidhānānniyamaḥ । yathā vedādyadhikaraṇapūrvapakṣe <quote>‘śanno mi-
trā’</quote>di mantrasyeti bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘śrutyā sannidherbādha’</quote> iti sannidhigrahaṇaṃ prakaraṇasyāpyupalakṣaṇam ।
śrutigrahaṇamapekṣārūpavastusāmarthyātmakaliṅgasyāpyupalakṣaṇam । tathācā<quote>‘tmānamaraṇiṃ kṛtve’</quote>ti
mantre <quote>‘ktvā’</quote>śrutyā praṇavasya dhyānamātrāṅgatvena vidhānāttayā daharavidyāprakaraṇasya bādhaḥ ।
na hi dhyānasāmānyavācinyā prakaraṇānusāreṇa daharavidyāyāḥ saṅkoco yujyate ।
bhasmoddha‍ūlanatripuṇḍradhāraṇayostu jābālaśrutau <quote>‘nīlakaṇṭhāya śirasi nikṣipetsarvātmane nama’</quote>
ityantena tadubhayavidhānānantaraṃ <quote>‘pāpaṃ nāśayate kṛtsnamapi janmaśatārjita’</quote>mityādinā
pāpakṣayahetutvāvagamāt । kālāgnirudropaniṣadi tripuṇḍradhāraṇasya pāpakṣayadvārā muktihetu-
tvaśravaṇāt । <quote>‘madyaṃ pītvā gurudārāṃśca gatvā steyaṃ kṛtvā brahmahatyāṃ ca kṛtvā । bhasmacchanno
bhasmaśayyāśayāno rudrādhyāyī mucyate sarvapāpaiḥ’</quote> iti śātātapasmṛtau bhasmoddha‍ūlanasya
sarvapāpakṣayahetutvaśravaṇācca । tayormuktihetutvaśravaṇasya śravaṇamanananididhyāsanādiprati-
bandhakaduritanivṛttidvārakatvāvagamāt । tasmādapekṣālakṣaṇavastusāmarthyarūpeṇa liṅgena pāśu-
patavidyāprakaraṇasya tattacchākhāmnātavidyāsannidheśca bādhaḥ । vidyāviśeṣāmnātānāmapi
hi viśeṣāṇāmapekṣābalātprakaraṇamanādṛtya sarvavidyasādhāraṇyāpādana <quote>‘mānaṃdādayaḥ pradhā-
nasya’</quote> <quote>‘akṣadhiyāṃ tvavirodhaḥ’</quote> ityadhikaraṇeṣu siddham । agre ca <quote>‘tametaṃ vedānuvacane-
na’</quote>ityādi prakṛtadaharākāśaviṣayakavidyāviśeṣagrahaṇe satyapi <quote>‘dharmeṇa pāpamapanudatī’</quote>ti
śrutipratipannasya karmajanyasya pāpakṣayarūpadvārasya sarvavidyāpekṣitatvātkarmaṇāṃ sarvavidyā-
sādhāraṇyaṃ vakṣyate । tathā <quote>‘tasmādevaṃvicchānto dānta’</quote> ityādi śrutau prakṛtavidyā-
parāmarśakaivaṃvicchabde satyapi śamo damo vakṣyate । tasmādiha vaktavyamadhikaṃ nāstīti saṃ-
kṣipyoktaṃ bhāṣye <quote>‘śrutyā sannidherbādha’</quote> iti । yadyapi śrutyādibhiḥ prakaraṇābādhasya pūrva-
vikalpādhikaraṇe nirūpitatvādapekṣāvaśātsarvavidyāsādhāraṇyasya bahuṣvadhikaraṇeṣu pratipanna-
tvācca nātra vyutpādanīyamasti । tathāpi bhasmoddha‍ūlanādikaṃ yathāprakaraṇaṃ vyavatiṣṭhata iti
keṣāñcidbhrāntānāṃ vacanairmandānāṃ mābhūdbhrama ityetadadhikaraṇāraṃbhaḥ । śākhaikyakṛtasya vedaikya-
kṛtasya ca dvividhasyāpi sannidherbādhapratipādanārthaṃ sūtre <quote>‘śākhāsu prativeda’</quote>miti viśeṣaṇa-
dvayam । hiśabdo'syārthasya nyāyasāmyādadhikaraṇāṃtarebhyaḥ prasiddhidyotanārthaḥ । evaṃ brahma-
mīmāṃsakamaryādayā praṇavānusandhānādīnāṃ sarvavidyāsādhāraṇyamupapāditam । karmamīmāṃsa-
<pb n="373"/>
ṣūpāsakaiḥ kāryāḥ sannidhānāt na sarvatra ।। iti prāpte brūmaḥ । bhasmoddha‍ūlanādaya
upāsanāṅgāvabaddhā yāsu śākhāsu śrutāstāsveveti na niyamaḥ । kiṃtu prativedaṃ
sarvāsu śākhāsu sarvairapi brahmopāsakaiḥ kāryā eveti śrutyā sannidherbādhaḥ ।।
<sutra>sū ।। mantrādivadvā'virodhaḥ ।। 54 ।।</sutra>
yathā kratvaṅgabhūtānāṃ mantrāṇāmekaikaśākhāgatānāmapi sarvaśākhāgatakratvanvaye na
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kāstvanuvādassatisaṃbhave prakṛtagāmī prakṛtasatve tadanvayāsaṃbhave'pyānarthakyatadaṅganyāyena
tadaṅgagāmī । śrutisaṅkocastu prakaraṇānugrahalābhārthatvānna doṣaḥ । yadā prakaraṇānugrahāya
śruterapi saṅkocaḥ, tadā kimu vaktavyamapekṣālakṣaṇaliṅgamakiñcitkaramityanuvādasya । prakṛta-
gāmitvamautsargikamādriyante । ata eva vāraṇādipātrāṇāmādhānaprakaraṇe <quote>‘vāraṇo yajñāva-
caro vaikaṃkato yajñāvacara’</quote> ityādivākyeṣu yajñasāmānyasādhanatvena śrutānāmapi sarvāsāmi-
ṣṭīnāṃ pātrāpekṣāyāṃ satyāmapi teṣāmayajñarūpādhānasaṃbandhāsaṃbhave'pi pāvamāneṣṭīnāmādhānā-
ṅgatāyāmaṅgāvatāranyāyena pāvamāneṣṭimātrāṅgatā syāditi । tasya nyāyasyānavakāśīkaraṇena
pātrāṇāṃ sarveṣṭisādhāraṇyārthaṃ pāvamāneṣṭīnāmādhānāṅgatvaṃ tairyatnena nirākṛtam । ataḥ ka-
rmamīmāṃsakamaryādayā 1praṇavānusandhānatripuṇḍradhāraṇādīnāṃ sarvavidyāsādhāraṇyaṃ na sidhdyediti
śaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ kvacicchākhāyāṃ kiñcitkarmaprakaraṇāmnātānāṃ śākhāntarāmnātakarmāntarā-
ṅgatvamapi viniyojakapramāṇabalādbhavatītyatra karmamīmāṃsakamatadṛṣṭāntapradarśanārthaṃ ca sūtram ।।
<pratika>sū ।। mantrādivadvā'virodhaḥ ।। 54 ।। yathā kratvaṃgabhūtānāmiti</pratika> । atrāyamāśayaḥ । karma-
mīmāṃsakairguṇamukhyavyatikramādhikaraṇe sāmavedotpannāni sāmavede kratuṣu viniyuktāni <quote>‘ya
evaṃvidvānvāravantīyaṃ sāma gāyati yajñāyajñiyaṃ sāma gāyati vāmadevyaṃ sāma gāyatī’</quote>tyādi-
bhiryājurvodikairādhāne viniyuktāni vāravantīyādīni sāmānyudāhṛtya teṣā<quote>‘muccaissāmne’</quote>-
tyutpattivedavihitasvaraprāptau pradhānabhūtaviniyogavidhyanusāreṇa <quote>‘upāṃśuyajuṣe’</quote>ti vihitaḥ
yājurvaidika eva svara iti siddhāntitam । atra śākhāntare kiñcitkarmaprakaraṇāmnātānāṃ
viniyojakapramāṇabalāt śākhāntarāmnātakarmāntarāṅgatvamapyastītyatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ spaṣṭaḥ । ata-
evopanyastaśaṅkānirākaraṇamapi labhyate । tathāhi <quote>‘upāṃśuyajuṣā kriyata’</quote> iti jyotiṣṭo-
maprakaraṇāmnātaṃ yajurvedavihitakarmoddeśenopāṃśusvaravidhāyakaṃ vidhimavalambya guṇamukhyavya-
tikramādhikaraṇe siddhāntaḥ kṛtaḥ । yadyanuvādaḥ prakṛtagāmīti prakaraṇānusāreṇa yajurvedavi-
hitakarmānuvādasya yajurvedavihitajyotiṣṭomaikaviṣayatā syāttadānīmādhānatadaṅgānāṃ yāju-
rvaidikatve'pyupāṃśusvaro na prāpnuyāditi siddhānto bhajyeta । atastatra prakaraṇena śrutisaṃcārā-
yogādyajurveda vihitakarmasāmānyoddeśenopāṃśusvaravidhirītyabhyupagamyaiva tasya siddhāntasya pra-
vṛttirvakravyā । na ca sannidhyāmnātayo<quote>‘ruccai ṛcā kriyate uccaissāmne’</quote>ti vidhyostattadveda-
vihitakarmamātroddeśadarśanādihāpi tathātvena bhāvyamiti prakaraṇānādaraḥ । śrutimapi saṅko-
cayataḥ prakaraṇasya sannidhyanuvartanāyogāt । tasmātkevalaṃ prakaraṇānugrahāya nāsti śruti-
<note>(1) <quote>‘praṇavānusaṃdhānādīnāṃ’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="374"/>
saṅkoca ityeva tasminnadhikaraṇe teṣāmapi maryādā vyavasthāpanīyā । ata eva vārtikakṛtā
<quote>‘guṇānāṃ ca parārthatvādasaṃbaddhassamatvātsyā’</quote>diti sūtraṃ pātrāṇāmaṅgāvatāranyāyena pāvamā-
neṣṭimātrāṅgatvanivāraṇāya pāvamāneṣṭīnāmādhānāṅgatvanirākaraṇārthaṃ na bhavati । tā-
sāmādhānāṅgatve'pi pātrāṇāṃ vākyabalena sarvayajñārthatāsiddheḥ । yajñaśabdasya prakaraṇānusā-
reṇa saṃkocakalpanāyogāditi bhāṣyabhaṅgaṃ kṛtvā tatsūtraṃ nividadhikaraṇaguṇasūtratvena yo-
jitam । ato mīmāṃsakamaryādayāpi <quote>‘ātmānamaraṇiṃ kṛtve’</quote>ti mantre dhyānaśabdasya prakara-
ṇānusāreṇa saṅkocaḥ prasajyata iti bhāṣye <quote>‘sarvaśākhāgatakratvanvaya’</quote> ityasya śākhāntaraga-
takarmānvaya ityarthaḥ । ādhānasya kratutvābhāvāt । athavā prāksūtrakṛtā guṇamukhyavyati-
kramādhikaraṇanyāya<quote>‘syaupasadava’</quote>dityudāharaṇāntaramupanyastamiti tadabhiprāyaṃ kratugrahaṇam ।
apicā''tharvaśākhāraṃbhe vidyāviśeṣamanupakramya <quote>‘bhagavankimādau prayuktadhyānaṃ dhyāyitavyaṃ kiṃ
taddha‍yānaṃ ko vā dhyātā kaśca dhyeya’</quote> ityaṅgirasasanatkumārayoḥ praśne <quote>‘sa ebhyo'tharvā pratyuvā-
ce’</quote>ti tatprativacanamupakramya praśnacatuṣṭayaprativacanatvenaivāgrimassaṃdarbhassarvo'pi pravartitaḥ ।
tatra brahmadhyānasyādau kimakṣaraṃ prayuktaṃ sadbrahmasvarūpatadga‍uṇavācakatayā taddha‍yānasādhanamiti
kṛtvā dhyātavyamityādi । atra spaṣṭaṃ praṇavasya sarvavidyāsādhāraṇyamāhavanīyasyeva sarvaho-
masādhāraṇyam । ataḥ kaivalyopaniṣadādiṣvapi <quote>‘ātmānamaraṇiṃ kṛtve’</quote>ti mantraḥ sarvavidyā-
sādhāraṇaḥ । tasyāyamarthaḥ । yathā hyaraṇau prāgapi sthitasya vahnerabhivyaktyarthamadharottarāraṇī
saṃyojya mathanena vahnirabhivyakto bhavati । sa cābhivyaktena vāhninā mathitā svābhimataṃ
dāhyadāhaṃ labhate । evaṃ paṇḍitaḥ kṛtaśravaṇamananādikaṃ, svātmani prāgapi sthitasya śivasyā-
bhivyaktyarthaṃ svātmānaṃ praṇaṃva ca dhyānakriyāyāṃ kartṛkaraṇabhūtau saṃyojya dhyānābhyāsaṃ ka-
roti cettena svātmani śivo 'bhivyakto bhavati । tadanugraheṇa sa pāśadāhaṃ labhate । iti <quote>‘dhyāna-
nirmathanābhyāsāddevaṃ paśyennigūḍhava’</quote>diti śvetāśvataropaniṣadi pāṭhāttadarthopasaṃhāreṇāraṇima-
thanapāśadahanoktisāmarthyena cāyamarthaḥ spaṣṭaḥ । evaṃ tāvatpraṇavābhyāsasya sarvavidyāsādhā-
raṇyaṃ yaduktaṃ tattatkarmamīmāṃsakamaryādāmapyanuvartata ityupapāditam । yathaiva bhasmoddha‍ūlanatripu-
ṇḍrayorapekṣāvaśātsarvaviddhāsādhāraṇyaṃ yaduktaṃ tadapi tanmaryādānuvartyaiva । tairapi vrīhyādyuddeśena
vihitasyāvahananāderyavādisādhāraṇyamapekṣāvaśādeva samarthanīyam । tadeta<quote>‘dāvṛttirasakṛdupade-
śā’</quote>dityadhikaraṇe saprapañcamupapādayiṣyate । tatraivātratyānāṃ śaṅkāśūkānāmapi saviśeṣaṃ ni-
rākaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati । sūtre vākāro bodhanīyabhedena vyavasthitavikalpārthaḥ । praṇavādicintanā-
dīnāṃ vidyāviśeṣasannidhyāmnātānāmapi sakalavidyāsādhāraṇye yo vaktavyo nyāyassa brahmamī-
māṃsakānāṃ vidyāviśeṣasannidhyāmnātasya ānandādiguṇajātasya asthūlatvādiniṣedhavṛndasya
arcirādimārgasya sannyāsasya yajñādikarmanikarasya śamadamādiparikarasya ca sarvavidyāsā-
dhāraṇyamabhyupagacchatāṃ prasiddha eveti varṇitam pūrvasūtre karmamīmāṃsakānprati tvidamucyate ।
teṣāmapi nāsti virodhaḥ mantrādiṣu darśanāt । kvacicchākhāyāṃ vidyāviśeṣasannidhyāmnātānā-
mapi praṇavacintanādīnāṃ śākhāntarapaṭhitavidyāṃtarāṅgatvaṃ sāmaśākhāyāṃ kratuprakaraṇāmnātānāṃ
tadaṅgānāṃ stotrīyasādhāraṇamantrāṇāṃ yājurvedikādhānāṅgatvamiva viniyojakapramāṇabalānna
virudhyate । dhyānānuvādasya prakaraṇānurodhena saṅkocābhāvaḥ svaravidhau yajurvedavihitakarmā-
<pb n="375"/>
virodhaḥ tathā'trāpīti ।।
ityaṅgāvabaddhādhikaraṇam ।। 31 ।।
atha kratujyāyastvādhikaraṇam ।। 32 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। bhūmnaḥ kratuvajjyāyastvaṃ tathā hi darśayati ।। 55 ।।</sutra>
iha vaiśvānaravidyāyāmupāsanamaṃśena samastena veti saṃdihyate । tathā hi---tatra
dyulokasūryavāyvākāśodakapṛthivyo vaiśvānarasya mūrdhacakṣuḥprāṇamadhyaśarīramūtrasthā-
napādarūpā dhyātavyā iti nirūpitam । teṣāmaṅgānāmapi pratyekamupāsanamabhihi-
tam <quote>‘attyannaṃ paśyati priyaṃ bhavatyasya brahmavarcasaṃ kule ya etamevamātmānaṃ vaiśvānara-
mupāste’</quote> iti pṛthak‌pṛthagdivādiparyāyagatairvākyaiḥ । evaṃ satyupāstiśabdasya phalava-
canasya ca pratyekamupalabhyamānatvādaṃśopāsanamucitamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nuvādasyeva śrutiprābalyānna virudhyate । vidyāviśeṣānubandhinorapyuddha‍ūlanatripuṇḍrayossarvavidyā-
sādhāraṇyaṃ, vrīhyanubandhino'vahananasya yavasādhāraṇyamivāpekṣābalānna virudhyata iti ।।</p>
<head>ityaṅgāvabaddhādhikaraṇam ।। 31 ।।</head>
<head>atha kratujyāyastvādhikaraṇam ।। 32 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। bhūmnaḥ kratuvajjyāyastvaṃ tathā hi darśayati ।। 55 ।।</pratika> kiṃcidvidyānvitānā-
meva praṇavacintanādīnāṃ vidyāṃtareṣvapyanvayavatsamastopāsanānvitānāmeva dyusūryādīnāṃ vya-
stopāsanāsvapyanvaya iti śaṅkayā pūrvapakṣotthānātsaṅgatiḥ । vyastopāsaneṣu pratyekamā-
khyātaṃ phalaṃ ca dyusūryādiṣu pratyekaṃ vaiśvānaratvaṃ ca śrūyate । vyastopāsananindāpūrvakaṃ sama-
stopāsanaṃ ca śrūyate । tayoḥ samabalatve vyastopāsanaṃ ca kāryam । nyūnādhikabalatve sama-
stopāsanameva kāryamiti tadanavadhāraṇātsaṃśayaḥ । samastopāsanaṃ siddhāntino'pyabhimataṃ
nopapādanīyamiti, pratyekamākhyātaśravaṇādibhirvyastopāsanamupapādayanpūrvapakṣayati---<pratika>ta-
thāhīti । attyannamiti</pratika> । annamattītyanvayaḥ । evamuttaratrāpi । phalavacanasya ceti cakā-
reṇa pratyekaṃ vaiśvānaratvaśravaṇaṃ samuccīyate । <pratika>aṃśopāsanamiti</pratika> । yathā samastasya vaiśvānara-
tvaśravaṇāttadupāsanatatphalaśravaṇācca samastopāsanamucitam । evama1vayavopāsanamapi । ubha-
yatrāpi vartamānāpadeśe vidhikalpanasyārthavādikaphalakalpanasya cāviśiṣṭatvena yatra vidhibha-
ktirevaṃ kāmaśabdo vā tatra vidhiranyatrāvayutyānuvādaḥ samudāyānuvādo veti kalpanāyāṃ
niyāmakābhāvāt । na ca vaiśvānarātmabubhutsvaupamanyavādipraśnabhūte svarlokādipṛthivyanta-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha aṅgāvabaddhādhikaraṇam ।। 31 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। aṅgāvabaddhastu na śākhāsu prativedam ।। 53 ।। mantrādivadvāvirodhaḥ ।। 54 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>bhasmoddha‍ūlatripuṇḍrapraṇavajapaśikhārudrapāṭhādimuktervyāvartyāgāvatāraprakaraṇapaṭhitā eva vidyāḥ śrayeta ।</l></lg>
<lg><l>maivaṃ muktyānvayitvaṃ stutibhiradhigataṃ kvāpi sāmāyitasyetyaṃgīkāryopa...yaprakṛtaniyamanaṃ sarvavidyāṅgabhāvaḥ ।। 280 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>ityaṅgāvabaddhādhikaraṇam ।। 31 ।।</head>
<note>(1) <quote>‘evaṃ vyastopāsanamapi’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="376"/>
<p>siddhānte tu---samastopāsanameva mukhyamityucyate । tathā hi---tatra trailokya-
śarīratayopāsyasya vaiśvānarātmanaḥ svarlokādipṛthivyantānāṃ mūrdhādipādāntāva-
yavatvamabhidhāya <quote>‘yastvetamevaṃ prādeśamātramabhivimānamātmānaṃ vaiśvānaramupāste sa
sarveṣu lokeṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu sarveṣvātmasvannamatti’</quote> iti brahmānubhavaḥ phalaṃ cābhihi-
tam । tatra mūrdhādyavayavopāsanāt bhūmnaḥ samastopāsanasya jyāyastvaṃ prāmāṇika-
tvam, tatraiva brahmānubhavaphalābhidhānāt । tatrāvayavopāsanaṃ phalakīrtanaṃ ca kratu-
vadavivakṣitam । <quote>‘vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet putre jāte’</quote> ityuktvā <quote>‘yadaṣṭā-
kapālo bhavati gāyatryaivainaṃ brahmavarcasena punāti’</quote> ityādinocyamānamaṣṭākapā-
lādikaṃ tatphalaṃ ca yathā na vivakṣitaṃ tadvat । tathā hi samastopāsanasyaiva jyaiṣṭhyaṃ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śśarīrakavaiśvānarātmanirūpaṇapūrvakasarvalokasarvabhūtasarvātmabhogyabrahmānandānubhavarūpatadupā-
sanāphalapratipādanaparyantasya kṛtsnasya sandarbhasyaikavākyatvāvagamāttatsaṃrakṣaṇīyavyastopāsa-
natatphalavacanānāṃ putreṣṭiviṣayamahāvākyāntargatāṣṭākapālatatphalādivacanavadarthavādarūpatvaṃ
kalpanīyamiti vācyam । bhūmavidyāyāṃ satyaśabdoktasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvatobhūmatvapratipādanārthaṃ
tadavadhitvenopanyasyamāneṣu nāmādiprāṇānteṣviva sarvaśarīrakasya vaiśvānarasya pratipādanārthaṃ
tadavayavatvenopanyasyamāneṣu svarlokādiṣu prātisvikopāsanātatphalavidhānasya mahāvākyai-
kyāvirodhitvāt । na ca bhūmavidyāyāṃ nāmādyupāsanānāmaśrutā nindātra vyastopāsanānāṃ
śrūyate । sācoditānuditahomanindānyāyena prakrāntaparityāgaviṣayatayā yojayituṃ na śa-
kyate । samastopāsanāmavijñāya vyastopāsanāmeva kṛtavataḥ prācīnaśālāditi tannindā-
śravaṇāditi vācyam । tathāpi na hi nindānyāyena yojayituṃ śakyatvāt । na hyatrodi-
tānuditahomayoriva vyastopāsaneṣu prāyaścittaśravaṇamasti yena prakrāntaparityāgaviṣayatayā
yojanaparyaṃtamapaśyeta । nindayā vyastopāsanāṃ niṣedhonnayanabalena <quote>‘nacatustriṃśa’</quote>diti brūyāditi
niṣedheneva vidhyunnayanamavarjanīyam । niṣedhasya rāgaprāptaviṣayatvābhavāt । tasmātsamastopāsa-
navadvyastopāsanānyapi nāmādyupāsanavadvidheyānyeveti bhāvaḥ । nanu jyāyastvaṃ praśasyataratvaṃ
na tadvyastopāsanavidhipratikṣepakaṃ kiṃtu tatsādhakameva । tatsadbhāve hi brahmadṛṣṭiviśiṣṭaikaikāva-
yavopāsanārūpādabhyudayaphalāttasmātsarvāvayavaviśiṣṭabrahmopāsanasya mokṣaphalasya viṣayaviśe-
ṣeṇa phalaviśeṣeṇa ca prāśastyamupapadyata ityāśaṅkya vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>prāmāṇikatvamiti । jyā-
yastvaṃ</pratika> prācīnatvaṃ । <quote>‘vṛddhasya ce’</quote>ti sūtreṇa vṛddhaśabdasyāpi jyādeśavidhānāt । tatprāmāṇika-
tvaparyavasāyī । prāmāṇikaṃ hi svābhāvikatvena prāyo'nādisiddhaṃ bhavati । bhrāntikalpitaṃ
tu pūrvapakṣiṇotprekṣitamadyatanaṃ bhavet । <pratika>kratuvadavivakṣitamiti</pratika> । atra brahmānubhavaphalābhi-
dhānāditi hetoranvayaḥ । tathā ca yasmiñjāta etāmiṣṭiṃ nirvapatīti vākyena varṇyamāne
dvādaśakapāladravyakeṣṭiphale pūtatvādisamudāye pūtatvādirekaika iva sakalaviṣayabhogakaṇi-
kāmahāsudhāsamudāyamāṇabrahmānandānubhave ‘attyannamityādinokto'bhyudayaphalaviśeṣontarbhava-
tītyavayutyānuvādasaṃbhavānna vākyabhedāvahaṃ vyastopāsanānāmapi vidhānamāśrayaṇīyamiti
bhāvaḥ । nanu mahāvākyaikatve'pi nāmādyupāsanādivadvyastopāsanānāṃ vidhānamupapadyate ityā-
śaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ <quote>‘tathāhi darśayati’</quote> iti sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>tathā hīti</pratika> । jyaiṣṭhya-
<pratika>miti</pratika> । vyastopāsanābhiranarthasyoddhāṭanena tāsāṃ bhrāntimūlatvaṃ darśayantī śrutiḥ samasto-
<pb n="377"/>
darśayati śrutiḥ---tatra hi <quote>‘aupamanyava kaṃ tvamātmānamupāsse’</quote> .... <quote>‘prācīnayogya-
kaṃ tvamātmānamupāsse’</quote> ityādipraśnānantaraṃ <quote>‘divameva bhagavo rājan’</quote> .... <quote>‘ādi-
tyameva bhagavo rājan’</quote> ityādiprativacanairavayavopāsane'bhihite <quote>‘attyannaṃ paśyati
priyam’</quote> ityādinā tatratatra phalanirdeśaṃ kṛtvā'pi <quote>‘mūrdhā tveṣa ātmana iti ho-
vāca mūrdhā te vyapatiṣyadyanmāṃ nāgamiṣyaḥ’</quote> ityādirājavacanairanarthaṃ bravīti । ataḥ
samastopāsanameva mukhyam ।।</p>
<head>iti kratujyāyastvādhikaraṇam ।। 32 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p>pāsanasyaiva prāmāṇikatvaṃ darśayatītyarthaḥ । nanvanarthavacanaṃ na hi niṃdānyāyena samastopā-
sanāstutyarthatayopapannaṃ na niṣedhānumāpakam । tathātve'pi lokataḥ prāptānāṃ vyastopāsa-
nānāṃ niṣedhaḥ teṣu vidhessādhaka eva na bādhaka ityāśaṅkānirākaraṇamabhipretyopasaṃharati---
<pratika>ata iti । mukhyamiti</pratika> । mukhe agre bhavaṃ prācīnaṃ prāmāṇikamiti yāvat । ayamāśayaḥ ।
agnihotraṃ prakṛtya śrutena <quote>‘jartilayavāgvā juhuyādgavīdhukayavāgvā vā na grāmyānpaśūnhinasti
nāraṇyān’</quote> iti vākyena jarttilagavīdhukaśabdavācyāraṇyatilāraṇyagodhūmakṛtayavāgvorvi-
kalpenāgnihotrāhutau dravyatvavidhāne liṅ‌vibhaktibalena grāmyāraṇyapaśuhiṃsārahitatayā tayoḥ
stavanena ca pratīyamāne'pi <quote>‘atho khalvāhuranāhutirvai jarttilāśca gavīdhukāśca payasāgnihotraṃ
juhuyā’</quote>diti tadanaṃtaraṃ jarttilādipratikṣepeṇa payovidhidarśanāt tadekavākyatayā <quote>‘jarttilaya-
vāgvā vā juhuyā’</quote>dityādeḥ grāmyāraṇyapaśuhiṃsārāhityena praśastatayā homārhā api jartti-
lā gavīdhukāśca yadapekṣayā duṣṭāḥ tatpayo'tyantaṃ praśastamiti payaḥstutyarthatvamekavākyānu-
rodhāditi । na cedanyaṃ prakalpayetprākklṛptāvarthavādaḥ syādānarthakyātparasāmarthyācceti, pūrvata-
ntrādhikaraṇe kiñcidvidhipūrvakaṃ nindāyāssaha vidhinā vidhyaṃtaraśravaṇe sati tadarthavādatvaṃ
tadekavākyatvānurodhātsamarthitam । evamihāpyaṅgīkarttuṃ yuktam । nanu jarttilagavīdhukayoḥ
payasā saha saṃbandhābhāvājjartilagavīdhukayavāgūvidhānayoḥ payovidhyekavākyatārthavādatayaiva
samarthanīyeti । tatra tathāstunāma iha tu bhūmavidyāyāṃ nāmādināṃ satvena brahmaṇā saha bhū-
yastvāvadhita eva divādīnāṃ samastopāsanāviṣayeṇa vaiśvānarātmanā sahāvayavatvena saṃbaṃ-
dho'stīti prāsaṃgikatadupāsanāvidhānaikavākyatvabhaṃgo nāsti । ato bhūmavidyānyāya e-
vātra pravartate na tu jarttilayavāgūnyāya iti cet maivam । vyastopāsanānāṃ nindanena <quote>‘mū-
rddhātveṣa ātmana iti hovāce’</quote>tyādi vākyeṣu tu śabdakṛtena divādīnāṃ svatantropāsya-
tvavyavachedanena <quote>‘tānhovācaite vai khalu yūyaṃ pṛthagivemamātmānaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vidvāṃso'nnama-
tye’</quote>ti vyastopāsanānāṃ bhramamūlatvoddhāṭanena bhūmavidyāvaiṣamyasya bahuvidhasya satvena ja-
rttilayavāgūnyāyasyaivātra pravṛttyaucityāditi ।। <pratika>iti kratujyāyastvādhikaraṇam ।। 32 ।।</pratika></p>
