<lg><l>vaiśvānaraliṅgānāmapyupāsānā bhinnā । pratyekamupāstipadānprati niyatatvātphalānāṃ ca ।। 281 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>tatra samastopāstervākyaikatvādvidhitsitaikaiva । aṅgeṣu doṣakathanādupāsanānāṃ vidhirnāsti ।। 282 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti kratujyāyastvādhikaraṇam ।। 32 ।।</head>
<pb n="378"/>
atha nānāśabdādyadhikaraṇam ।। 33 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। nānā śabdādibhedāt ।। 56 ।।</sutra>
iha paravidyāyāmekīkaraṇenopāsanamuta bhedeneti saṃśaye nānāśākhāśrutā-
nāmapi vidyānāṃ vedyasya brahmaṇa ekatvādekīkaraṇenopāsanam । iti prāpte
ucyate---anantaśrutibodhyānāmanantānāṃ vidyānāmekīkṛtyānuṣṭhānāyogāt svarū-
paikye'pi brahmaṇo guṇabhedāt vidyābhedaḥ । yatra guṇabhedo nāsti tatra sthānā-
dibhedādvidyābhedaḥ । rājādiguṇabhedādindrasya puroḍāśadānabhedavat gārhapatya-
sthānādibhedādagrerūpacārabhedavacca vidyābheda upapanna iti nirūpitam । ato
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha nānāśabdādyadhikaraṇam ।। 33 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। nānāśabdādibhedāt ।। 56 ।। yatra guṇabheda iti</pratika> । satyavidyāyāṃ hi <quote>‘sayo
havaitanmahadyakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ vede’</quote>tyatra vedyasya satyasya brahmaṇo guṇabhedo nāmnātaḥ । tatrākṣādi-
tyasthānabhedāt vidyābheda ityarthaḥ । nanu daharavaiśvānarādividyāsu pratyayāvṛttirūpopāsana-
syaikarūpatvādvedyasya brahmaṇassarvatraikarūpatvācca vidyaikyamāśaṅkya <quote>‘yatheṃ drāya rājña’</quote>ityatra haviḥ-
pradānarūpasya yāgasya sarvatraikarūpatve'pi yaṣṭavyasyeṃdrasyekatve'pi rājādiguṇabhedādyāgabhedaḥ
tathā vedyaguṇabhedādvidyābhedaḥ iti <quote>‘pradānavadeva tadukta’</quote>mityadhikaraṇe nirūpitam । sthāna-
bhedādvidyābheda ityapi āyatanabhedādagnīnāmupacārabhedavaditi tatraiva nirūpitaprāyaṃ । kima-
rthamidamadhikaraṇamityāśaṅkya tatrādhikaraṇe nirūpitatvaṃ tāvadaṃgīkaroti । <pratika>rājādivaditi</pratika> ।
tenaiva nyāyenātrāpi nirṇaya ityata āha---<pratika>ata iti</pratika> । na ca śabdādyanubandhabhedastatra nokta
iti tadarthamidamadhikaraṇaṃ syāditi śaṅkanīyam । <quote>‘yajati juhoti dadātī’</quote>tyādipadaparyā-
yadhātubhede hi śabdāntaranyāyaḥ pravarttate । vidyāprakaraṇeṣu <quote>‘dhyāyedupāsīta kratuṃ kurvīte’</quote>ti
dhātubhede'pi nāparyāyatāsti । na copakosalavidyādiṣu kevalaṃ vididhātuprayogo'pi dṛ-
śyate । tasya jñānasāmānyavācitvaṃ nopāstiparyāyatāstīti vācyam । dhyānasyaiva sākṣātkā-
rajanakatāyā lokadṛṣṭatvena <quote>‘tatastu taṃ paśyate niṣkalaṃ dhyāyamāna’</quote> iti śrutipratipannatvena
ca mokṣāpekṣitasākṣātkārasiddhaye teṣu vidhiśravaṇasya vidyāntaraśrutopāsanārthatvasyāvaśyāṅgī-
kartavyatayā phalataḥ paryāyatvaprāpteḥ । na cāvṛttyanapekṣā sakṛdevānuṣṭheyā sākṣātkāradvārikā,
kācana muktiheturvidyāsti । yenāvṛttyanāvṛttiguṇavidhāvācakadhātvoraparyāyatvena tatra śabdā-
ntaranyāyassamartheti tathābhūtavidyāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt । tatsatve ca kimupakosalavidyāda-
yo'pi tathaivāvṛttinirapekṣāḥ mokṣahetava iti śaṅkāyā aśakyanirasanatvena teṣāmupāsanā-
viśeṣatvābhyupagamasya nirmūlatvāpatteḥ । na ca kvacidvidyāyāṃ vidyopāstau vyatikaritaprayoga-
satvāt tatra vide chāgavidenyāyenopāsanāparyavasānamastītyetāvatānyatrāpi tathā kalpanaṃ
yuktam । karmakāṇḍe'pi <quote>‘yo'śvamedhena yajate ya u cainamevaṃ vede’</quote>tyāderupāsanārthatvakalpa-
nāprasaṅgā<quote>‘ccitrayā yajeta paśukāma’</quote> ityādāvapi paśuśabdasya chāgārthatvakalpanāprasaṃgācca ।
tasmādvidyāvidhiṣu mukhyasya śabdāṃtarasyāsaṃbhavāt tattadvidyāprakaraṇāmnātā sādhāraṇaguṇa-
kalāpaviśeṣitavidyāvidhaya eva śabdāṃtarāṇīva bhavaṃti । <quote>‘arthenaiva viśeṣo hi nirākāra-
<pb n="379"/>
nānāprakārā vidyā śabdādyanubandhabhedāt iti nirṇayaḥ । punaradhikaraṇārambho'yaṃ
jñānasyāvidheyatānirāsārthaḥ ।।
iti nānāśabdādyadhikaraṇam ।। 33 ।।
atha vikalpādhikaraṇam ।। 34 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। vikalpo'viśiṣṭaphalatvāt ।। 57 ।।</sutra>
evaṃ nānāprakārāḥ paravidyā nirūpitāḥ । tāsūpāsakasya vikalpaḥ samuccayo
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tayā dhiyā’</quote> miti nyāyena <quote>‘vidyādupāsīta dhyāyedi’</quote>tyādyākhyātairvidheyatvena samarpyamā-
ṇānāṃ vidyānāṃ prāyastattadga‍uṇarūpaviṣayaviśeṣaviśiṣṭatayā parasparavilakṣaṇatvenaiva samarpyamā-
ṇatvādityevamaupacārikīhaśabdāntaroktirityeva samarthanīyam । evaṃ guṇabhedopādhikaśabdā-
ntaroktirvivakṣitavivekena guṇabhedoktirityeva paryavasyati । guṇabhedādbhedastu prāgeva sama-
rthitaḥ । prakaraṇabhedādikaṃ ca vidyābhede saṃbhavatpramāṇaṃ <quote>‘na vā prakaraṇabhedātparovarīyastvā-
diva’</quote>dityādisūtraistatra tatrāviṣkṛtam । brahmaguṇādibhede'pi vedyabrahmaikyādvidyaikyaśaṅkāmātra-
mavaśiṣṭaṃ tadapi <quote>‘pradānavadeva tadukta’</quote>mityadhikaraṇe nirākṛtam । nātra nirākaraṇīyaṃ kiñci-
dasti । kimarthaṃ tarhyetadadhikaraṇamityākāṅkṣāyāmāha---<pratika>punariti</pratika> । avidheyajñānavādāsaṃma-
tisūcanārthaṃ jñāne śabdāntararūpacodanābhedasadbhāvapradarśanaṃ dyusūryādisamastāvayavaviśeṣatayā
vaiśvānaravidyaikyavannānāśākhāmnātanānāprakaraṇapaṭhitasakalaguṇaviśeṣatayā brahmavidyāmātra-
syaikyamastviti pūrvādhikaraṇasaṅgataśaṅkānirākaraṇavyājena jñānasyāvidhe/?/yatāṃ nirākartumida-
madhikaraṇamārabdhamityarthaḥ । yadyapi <quote>‘sarvavedāntapratyayacodanādyaviśeṣā’</quote>diti sūtreṇa coda-
nāgrahaṇenāvidheyajñānāsaṅgatisūcanaṃ labdhaṃ tathāpi tadda‍ṛḍhīkaraṇamasya phalamiti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti nānāśabdādyadhikaraṇam ।। 33 ।।</head>
<head>atha vikalpādhikaraṇam ।। 34 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। vikalpo'viśiṣṭatvāt ।। 57 ।।</pratika> vidyānāṃ vikalpasamuccayacintāvidyābheda-
siddha‍yapekṣatvāttadanantaraṃ pravartata iti saṅgatiṃ darśayan kimāsāṃ vikalpa eva uta samuccayo'pi
saṃbhavatīti samuccaye phalabhūyastvasaṃbhavā'saṃbhavābhyāṃ saṃśayaṃ darśayati । <pratika>evamiti । phala</pratika>-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha nānāśabdādyadhikaraṇam ।। 33 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। nānā śabdādibhedāt ।। 56 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>sarvāsvapi vidyāsu brahmaikaṃ vedyamekameva phalam । tasmādvidyaikyaṃ syānnānāśākhāguṇaughasaṃkalanāt ।। 283 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>tāvadga‍uṇasaṃkalanaṃ kartuṃ śakyaṃ na kenāpi । sacchandāntaramukhyairupāsanāstatra tatra bhinnāḥ syuḥ ।। 284 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>nanu śabdāntarakathanaṃ guṇabhedopādhikaṃ hi vidyāsu । guṇabhedāttadbhedaḥ pradānavaditi prasādhitaḥ pūrvam ।। 285 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>satyaṃ punarityuktirasāvavidheyajñānamapanetum । api ca prakaṭīkartuṃ phalasaṃjñābhedato'pi tadbhedam ।। 286 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti nānāśabdādyadhikaraṇam ।। 33 ।।</head>
<pb n="380"/>
<p>veti saṃśayaḥ ।। kiṃ prāpnoti ? daharavidyāsadvidyādīnāṃ samuccayenānuṣṭhānamucitam,
karmabhūyastvena phalabhūyastvasaṃbhavāt । vikalpe tu kiñcinniyāmakaṃ nāsti ।। iti
prāpte brūmaḥ---ekasminnupāsake sarvāsāṃ paravidyānāṃ vikalpa eva । kutaḥ ? nira-
tiśayabrahmānandānubhavasya brahmasākṣātkāraphalasyāviśiṣṭatvāt । prayojanameke-
nopāsanena yadi siddha‍yati kimanyairaprayojanaiḥ । kiṃca, ekenopāsanena brahmasva-
rūpāparokṣaṃ niratiśayabhāvanayā sidhyati । dhyeyatādātmyābhimānāt । tadekaṃ pari-
tyajyānyatra gamane cittavikṣepaḥ syāt । ato vikalpa eva ।।
iti vikalpādhikaraṇam ।। 34 ।।
atha yathākāmādhikaraṇam ।। 35 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। kāmyāstu yathākāmaṃ samuccīyeranna vā pūrvahetvabhāvāt ।। 58 ।।</sutra>
iha brahmasākṣātkāravyatiriktaphalānāmapi vidyānāṃ pūrvādhikaraṇanyāya iti
sandehe prāpte'bhidhīyate---na pūrvādhikaraṇanyāya iha saṃbhavati, vaiṣamyāt । ‘devo
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>bhūyastvasaṃbhavāditi</pratika> । yadyapi niratiśayabrahmānandānubhavarūpe mokṣe bhūyastvālpatvaviśeṣo
na saṃbhavati । tathāpi kāsucidvidyāsu lokaśeṣaprāptipūrvikā brahmaprāptiḥ । yathā madhuvidyāyāṃ
vasvādilokaprāptipūrvikā upakosalavidyāyāgnilokaprāptipūrvikā ityevamantarālaprāpyapha-
laviśeṣasatvāttallipsāyāḥ samuccayopyupapadyate । na ca brahmaprāptiphalānāṃ vidyānāmāprāyaṇama-
haraharanuṣṭheyatvādanekavidyāsamuccayānavakāśaḥ āprāyaṇamaharahassandhyopāsanāgnihotrāvasathya-
homādīnāmiva samayabhedena samuccayasaṃbhavāditi bhāvaḥ । <pratika>aviśiṣṭatvāditi</pratika> । sakalavi-
ṣayabhogaviraktānāṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ brahmānubhava eva evoddeśyaṃ phalaṃ । na tvantarāle bhavadapi vasubhā-
vādikam । ata uddeśyaphalasyaikatvādvidyānāṃ vikalpa evetyarthaḥ।yadi kaścinnānālokāvāptidvā-
rikāṃ kramamuktimapekṣeta tasya tallokāvāptidvārā muktiphalānāṃ vidyānāṃ samuccayassyādityā-
śaṅkyāha---kiṃceti । <pratika>cittavikṣepaḥ syāditi</pratika> । ekasyāṃ vidyāyāmabhiratasya tatraikāgryasi-
ddhaye cittavikṣepasamādhānārthamupāsanānuṣṭhānakālavyatiriktakāleṣvanuṣṭheyaṃ maunaṃ <quote>‘sahakārya-
ntaravidhi’</quote>rityadhikaraṇe pradarśayiṣyate । ato nāsti vidyāntarāvakāśa iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti vikalpādhikaraṇam ।। 34 ।।</head>
<head>atha yathākāmādhikaraṇam ।। 35 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। kāmyāstu yathākāmaṃ samuccīyeranna vā pūrvahetvabhāvāta ।। 58 ।।</pratika> pratyudāharaṇa-
saṅgatyedamadhikaraṇam । <pratika>pūrvādhikaraṇanyāya iti</pratika> । abhyudayaphalānāmapyupāsanānāṃ mokṣapha-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha vikalpādhikaraṇam ।। 34 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। vikalpo'viśiṣṭaphalatvāt ।। 57 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>tāsāṃ samuccayopi syādyāva(tsandhyādivadya)nuṣṭātuḥ । phalabhūyastvamapekṣya jyotiṣṭomāgnihotrayordṛṣṭeḥ ।। 287 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>tāsāṃ vikalpa eva brahmānande phale viśeṣābhāvāt । sākṣātkārāyogātsamuccaye cittavṛttivikṣepe ।। 288 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti vikalpādhikaraṇam ।। 34 ।।</head>
<pb n="381"/>
<p>bhūtvā devānapyeti’ iti jīvata eva bhāvanāprakarṣavaśāddevabhāvasākṣātkāraprāptira-
vagamyate paravidyāsvahaṃgrahavatīṣu । na tathā nāmabrahmādyupāsanāsu kāmyāsu sākṣā-
tkāraphalatve kiṃcinmānamasti । tatphalatvābhāve ca tatra tatra bhogabhūyastvāpekṣayā
samuccaya eva yuktaḥ, brahmaphalavadekatvābhāvāt । tata ekaṃ vā bahu vā samāśrityā-
nuṣṭheyamiti nirṇayaḥ ।।
iti yathākāmādhikaraṇam ।। 35 ।।
atha yathāśrayādhikaraṇam ।। 36 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। aṅgeṣu yathāśrayabhāvaḥ ।। 59 ।।</sutra>
iha punarudgīthādyaṅgāvabaddhānāṃ kratvaṅgabhāvaḥ svātantryaṃ vā ।। iti saṃśaye pūrva-
pakṣanyāyaḥ pravartate । udgīthādiṣvaṅgeṣu śrutānāmupāsanānāmudgīthādivat kratvaṅga-
bhāva eva । godohanādivat svavākye phalāśravaṇāt ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
lakopāsanānāṃ mokṣaphalakopāsanāvadupāsanātvādupāsyasākṣātkārāpekṣatvamaviśiṣṭamiti
bhavāḥ । <pratika>na tathā nāmabrahmādyupāsanāsviti</pratika> । <quote>‘devo bhūtvā devānapyetī’</quote>ti jīvata evopāsya-
tādātmyabhāvanāprakarṣavaśāttathābhūtasākṣātkārakṛtopāsyadevabhāvāpattirbrahmaviṣayāsvahaṃgraho-
pāsanāsūcyate na kāmyāsu । ataḥ kāmyavidyānāṃ yathākālamanuṣṭhitānāṃ kālāntare citta-
vikṣepe'pyapūrvadvārā phalajanakatvāvirodhātsamuccayopapattiriti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti yathākāmādhikaraṇam ।। 35 ।।</head>
<head>atha yathāśrayādhikaraṇam ।। 36 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। aṅgeṣu yathāśrayabhāvaḥ ।। 59 ।।</pratika> abhyudayārthopāsanavattvaṅgāśritopāsanānā-
mapi yathākāmyaṃ pratipādyata iti saṅgatimabhipretya saṃśayaṃ darśayati---<pratika>iha punariti</pratika> । puna-
śśabdastannirdhāraṇāniyama ityadhikaraṇe nirṇīta evārthe kaiścana hetubhiḥ punaśśaṅkotthānami-
tyagatārthatāṃ sūcayati । yathāśrayabhāva ityetadvyācaṣṭe---<pratika>udgīthavaditi</pratika> । yathodgīthādīnāmu-
pāsanāśrayāṇāṃ kratvaṅgastotrasaṃbandhena kratvaṅgabhāvastathopāsanānāmapi kratvaṅgodgīthādisaṃba-
ndhenetyarthaḥ । nanu godohanādīnāṃ praṇayanādyāśritānāmapi praṇayanādivatkratvaṅgabhāvo nāsti
tathā kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkya yathāśrayabhāvaityanena vivakṣitaṃ tadvaiṣamyamāha---<pratika>svavākya iti</pratika> ।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha yathākāmādhikaraṇam ।। 35 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। kāmyāstu yathā kāmaṃ samuccīyeranna vā pūrvahetvabhāvāt ।। 58 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>evaṃ sati kāmyānāmapi vidyānāṃ vikalpanaṃ nyāyyam । cittāvikṣepeṇa dhyeyāvirbhāvalābhāya ।। 289 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>tāsāṃ bhavati vikalpaḥ samuccayo vā phale'bhedāt । dhyānāspadādasākṣātkṛtirahagrahopāsanāsveva ।। 290 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti yathākāmādhikaraṇam ।। 35 ।।</head>
<pb n="382"/>
<p><sutra>sū ।। śiṣṭeśca ।। 60 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘udgīthamupāsīta’</quote> iti vidheḥ <quote>‘yadeva vidyayā karoti’</quote> ityatra vidhyabhāvāccā-
ṅgabhāva eva ।।
<sutra>sū ।। samāhārāt ।। 61 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘hotṛṣadanāddhaivāpi durudgīthamanusamāharanti’</quote> ityupāsanasya samāhāre niyamo
dṛśyate । ato'pi kratvaṅgabhāvaḥ । durudgītho vedanahīna udgīthaḥ । vedanahānau anyena
samādhānaṃ bruvadvākyaṃ hi tasya niyamenopādānaṃ darśayati । niyamāccāṅgabhāvaḥ ।।
<sutra>sū ।। guṇasādhāraṇyaśruteśca ।। 62 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘teneyaṃ trayīvidyā vartate omityāśrāvayati omiti śaṃsati omityudgā-
yati’</quote> iti sarvataḥ sañcarataḥ praṇavasya guṇatvenopāsanasya sañcārādapyupāsanopādā-
naniyamo'vagamyate । teneti hi prakṛtaparāmarśaśabdaḥ, prakṛtaṃ sopāsanameva praṇavaṃ
parāmṛśati । ataḥ pūrvokta udgīthādyupāsanānāmaniyamo na saṃbhavati ।। iti
prāpte siddhānta ucyate---
<sutra>sū ।। na vā tatsahabhāvāśruteḥ ।। 63 ।।</sutra>
aṅgabhāvo hi sahabhāvaḥ । tadaśravaṇādeṣāṃ na tadbhāvaḥ । <quote>‘yadeva vidyayā karoti
tadeva vīryavattaram’</quote> iti phalāntarasādhanatayā'vagatānāmupāsanānāmaṅgabhāvābhā-
vāt । <quote>‘udgīthamupāsīta’</quote> ityudgīthāśrayatāmātrapratipādanānna teṣāmaṅgāvabaddhānāṃ
kratvaṅgabhāvaḥ ।।
<sutra>sū ।। darśanācca ।। 64 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘evaṃviddha vai brahmā yajñaṃ yajamānaṃ sarvāṃścartvijo'bhirakṣati’</quote> iti brahmaṇo veda-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
godohanavākye paśukāmapadasamabhivyāhārāttṛtīyayā phale godohanaṃ viniyuṅkta iti yuktaṃ । tasya
phalārthatvāt । iha tu svavākye phalaśravaṇena tādarthyāpratīteḥ । pratyuta dvitīyayā kratvaṅgasaṃ-
skārasyaiva ca pratīterutpattivākyena kratvaṅgatvāvadhāraṇe sati vidyayeti vākyāntare phalaśra-
vaṇamakiñcitkaramiti bhāvaḥ ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।। śiṣṭeśca ।। 60 ।।</pratika> udgīthāṅgatve vidhiśravaṇamasti na
phalārthatva iti vaiṣamyāntaram । yadi tu vidhiśravaṇābhāve'pi <quote>‘yadeva vidyaye’</quote>ti tṛtīyāśra-
vaṇamastīti tatphalārthatve vidhiḥ kalpyeta, tathāpi na tatprathamapratītakratvaṅgatvabādhakam ।
yathā prastarapraharaṇasya sūktavākyena <quote>‘prastaraṃ praharatī’</quote>ti vihitasya darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇāvagate
<pb n="383"/>
nena sarvarakṣaṇaṃ vadantī śrutirudgātṛprabhṛtīnāṃ vedanasyāniyamenānaṅgatāṃ darśayati ।
ataḥ pūrvokta upāsanānāmaniyamo yukta eva ।।
iti yathāśrayādhikaraṇam ।। 36 ।।
iti śrīkaṇṭhaśivācāryaviracite brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye tṛtīyādhyāyasya
tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 3 ।। 3 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tadaṅgatve satyeva māntravarṇikena phalenāpyanvayaḥ tathātrāpyupapattiriti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p>iti śivātivādimūrddhanyaśivadarśanasthāpanadhuraṃdharasakaladevabhūdevapratiṣṭhāpaka<pratika>śrīmacci-
nnabommabhūpāla</pratika>hṛdayakamalakuharaviharamāṇa<pratika>śrīsāmbaśivapreritasya śrībharadvā</pratika>-
jakulajaladhikaustubhaviśvajidyājiśrīraṅgarājādhva<pratika>rivarasūnorappayyadī-
kṣitasya</pratika> kṛtau <pratika>śrīkaṇṭhaśivācāryaviracitabrahmamīmāṃsābhāṣya</pratika>-
vyākhyāyāṃ śivārkamaṇidīpikākhyāyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya
<pratika>tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ</pratika> ।। 3 ।। 3 ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha yathāśrayabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 36 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। aṅgeṣu yathāśrayabhāvaḥ ।। 59 ।। śiṣṭeśca ।। 60 ।। samāhārāt ।। 61 ।। guṇasādhāraṇyaśruteśca
।। 62 ।। na vā tatsahabhāvāśruteḥ ।। 63 ।। darśanācca ।। 64 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>aṅgāśritavidyānāmaṅgatvaṃ parṇatādivadyuktam । tenobhāviti vacaso hetorudgīthavacanena ।। 291 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>na nayo'tra parṇatāyāstṛtīyayā phalakāraṇatāvagatā । syāttu durudgīthavacaḥ phalārthinaḥ pratividhānaparam ।। 292 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti yathāśrayabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 36 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>iti śrīmadappayyadīkṣitakṛtau adhikaraṇasārasaṅgrahe nayamaṇimālāye/?/
tṛtīyaparicchede tṛtīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 3 ।। 3 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="384"/>
<head>।। śrīḥ ।।</head>
<head>śivābhyāṃ namaḥ ।</head>
<head>śrīkaṇṭhācāryakṛtau</head>
<head>brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye</head>
atha tṛtīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ
atha puruṣārthādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।
<p>pūrvatropapāditaḥ paravidyāprakāraḥ । iha tu vidyāsahakāriṇa āśramadharmādīn
nirūpayituṃ vidyāta eva puruṣārtha iti darśayati---
<sutra>sū ।। puruṣārtho'taḥ śabdāditi bādarāyaṇaḥ ।। 1 ।।</sutra>
ato vidyāta eva puruṣārthaḥ <quote>‘brahmavidāpnoti param’</quote> <quote>‘jñātvā śivaṃ śāntima-
tyantameti’</quote> ityādiśabdāditi bhagavān bādarāyaṇo manyate ।। tat saṃbhavati na
vetyubhayaśrutidarśanāt saṃśaye sati pūrvapakṣaḥ pravartate---
<sutra>sū ।। śeṣatvāt puruṣārthavādo yathā'nyeṣviti jaiminiḥ ।। 2 ।।</sutra>
na vidyātaḥ puruṣārthaḥ kutaḥ? <quote>‘tattvamasi’</quote> ityādisāmānādhikaraṇyena karmasu</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>śivārkamaṇidīpikāyām</head>
<head>tṛtīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha puruṣārthādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। puruṣārtho'taśśabdāditi bādarāyaṇaḥ ।। 1 ।।</pratika> pradhānabhūtavidyāprakāranirūpa-
ṇānantaraṃ tadaṅgabhūtāśramadharmādinirūpaṇamiti pūrvapādasaṅgatapādārthapradarśa1napūrvakaṃ vidyāyāḥ
svātantryeṇa phalasādhanatve siddha eva tadaṅgakarmaviśeṣacintanaṃ yuktamiti, vidyāyāḥ karmāṅga-
tvaśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ prathamādhikaraṇaṃ tadupoddhātatvenāvatārayati---<pratika>pūrvatreti</pratika> । siddhānto-
pakramamidamadhikaraṇamiti siddhāntapratijñāparatayā sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>ata iti</pratika> । <quote>‘nānā
śabdādibhedādityādya’</quote><ref>(bra॰ a॰ 3 pā॰ 3 sū॰ 56)</ref>dhikaraṇeṣu prastutā vidyā sarvanāmnā
parāmṛśyata iti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>taditi</pratika> । vidyātaḥ puruṣārtha ityetatsaṃbhavati na veti vidyāsvā-
tantryatatkarmāṅgabhāvaparyavasāyyubhayavidhaśrutidarśanātsaṃśaya ityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। śeṣatvātpu-
ruṣārthavādo yathānyeṣviti jaiminiḥ ।। 2 ।। śeṣatvāditi</pratika> hetumupapādayanvyā2caṣṭe---
<pratika>tattvamasīti</pratika> । <quote>‘dravyasaṃskārakarmasu parārthatvātphalaśrutirarthavādaḥ syā’</quote>diti jaiminisūtre
<note>(1) <quote>‘pūrvakamuddeśyaphalasādhanatve siddha eva’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘vyācaṣṭe---na vidyātaeveti । dravyasaṃskāra’</quote>
iti. kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="385"/>
kartureva brahmatvāvagamāt । tadvedanasya tatsaṃskāratayā karmaśeṣatvāt । phalaśrutistu
<quote>‘dravyasaṃskārakarmasu’</quote> iti nyāyenārthavāda eva । ato na vidyātaḥ puruṣārtha iti
jaiminirācāryo manyate ।।
<sutra>sū ।। ācāradarśanāt ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
ācāro'pi dṛśyate । aśvapatiḥ kekayo brahmavit <quote>‘yakṣyamāṇo ha vai bhagava-
nto'hamasmi’</quote> ityāha । evaṃ kekayaprabhṛtīnāṃ brahmavidāmapi karma prādhānyenāvaga-
myate । ato'pi vidyā karmāṅgameva ।।
<sutra>sū ।। tacchruteḥ ।। 4 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘yadeva vidyayā karoti’</quote> iti śrutyaiva vidyāyāḥ karmasu viniyogādapi karmā-
ṅgatvam । yat karoti tadvidyayā iti hi śruterarthaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<quote>‘yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavati na sa pāpm̐/?/ślokaṃ śṛṇoti yadāṅkte cakṣureva bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte
yatprayājānūyājā ijyante varma vā etadyajñasya kriyate varma yajamānasya bhrātṛvyābhibhūtyā’</quote>
ityādividhividheyeṣu vākyaprakaraṇāvagatakratvaṅgabhāveṣu parṇādidravyeṣvañjanādisaṃskāreṣu pra-
yājādikarmasu ca phalaśravaṇamarthavāda iti nirṇītam । tannyāyenetyarthaḥ । tatra hyavyabhica-
ritakratusambandhijuhūdvārā vākyena parṇatāyāḥ kratuśeṣatvamuktam । sa nyāya ihāpi sa-
mānaḥ । jīva eva hi brahma । <quote>‘tattvamasī’</quote>tyādisāmānādhikaraṇyāt । sa yadyapi laukike-
ṣvapi karmasu kartā bhavati । tathāpi tatkartṛtvasya dehādivyatireke'pyupapatteḥ dehātirikta
ātmā pāralaukikaphalaiḥ kratubhirevāpekṣyata iti sa tāvatkratvavyabhicārī । ata<quote>‘ātmāna-
mupāsīte’</quote>tyādiṣu dvitīyāśrutyā tatsaṃskāratayāvagatā vidyā taddvārā kratuśeṣabhūtaivetyarthaḥ ।।
nanu <quote>‘tattvamasī’</quote>tyādisāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ śarīraśarīribhāvanibandhanamityasakṛdupapāditaṃ ka-
thamiha tadapahnavena pūrvapakṣa ityāśaṅkya vidyāyāḥ kratuśeṣatvapratyāyakaṃ śrutiliṅgādikaṃ tadu-
podbalakamastīti darśayitumuttarasūtrāṇi <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। ācāradarśanāt ।। 3 ।।</pratika> yadyapi vi-
dyāniṣṭhānāṃ kekayaprabhṛtīnāṃ karmānuṣṭhānaṃ karmaṇo vidyāṅgatve'pi saṃbhavati । tathāpyubhayatho-
papannaṃ <quote>‘tadātmānamupāsīta’</quote> <quote>‘ātmā draṣṭavya’</quote> iti dvitīyāśrutipratyayāvagatavidyāsaṃskārya-
bhāvapāralaukikātmarūpakartrupasthāpitakratuśeṣatvāvagatisvārasyānurodhātkarmaprādhānye talliṅgaṃ
bhavatīti bhāvaḥ ।। vidyayeti tṛtīyāśruteścaivamityāha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। tacchruteḥ ।। 4 ।।</pratika> nanu <quote>‘ya-
deva vidyayā karotī’</quote>ti vidyayā kriyamāṇamanūdyate । tacca prāgudgīthavidyayā kriyamāṇatvena
prastutaṃ karmaiva paryavasyati । ato nātra vidyāmātrasya karmasu viniyogāvagatirityāśaṅkyāha
---<pratika>yatkarotīti</pratika> । sarvanāmāvadhāraṇābhyāṃ vyāptiradhigamyate । <quote>‘ya eva dhūmavāndeśassa
eva vahnimāni’</quote>tivat । tataśca karmamātramanūdya vidyāsādhanatvena vidhīyate । na ca somā-
ṅgodgīthasaṃskārarūpā vidyā sarvakarmānvayinī bhavitumarhatītyataḥ kartṛbhūtātmasaṃskāra1dvāri-
<note>(1) <quote>‘rūpāyā’</quote> iti ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="386"/>
<sutra>sū ।। samanvārambhaṇāt ।। 5 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘taṃ vidyākarmaṇī samanvārabhete’</quote> iti vidyākarmaṇorekasmin puruṣe sāhityaṃ
dṛśyate । ataśca tadaṅgatvameva vidyāyāḥ ।।
<sutra>sū ।। tadvato vidhānāt ।। 6 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘ācāryakulādvedamadhītya yathāvidhānaṃ guroḥ karmātiśeṣeṇābhisamāvṛttya kuṭumbe
śucau deśe svādhyāyamadhīyāno dhārmikān vidadhat’</quote> ityādāvarthajñānaparyantādhyaya-
navataḥ karma vidhīyate । ataśca jñānasya karmāṅgatvam ।।
<sutra>sū ।। niyamāt ।। 7 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘kurvanneveha kurmāṇi jijīviṣecchatm̐/?/samāḥ’</quote> ityātmavido jīvanasya karmasu vi-
niyogo niyamyate । ataśca vidyā karmāṅgamiti । nātaḥ puruṣārtha iti ।। atha si-
ddhānta ucyate---
<sutra>sū ।। adhikopadeśāttu bādarāyaṇasyaivaṃ taddarśanāt ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
na vidyāyāḥ karmaśeṣatvam । apitu vidyayaiva puruṣārtha iti bādarāyaṇasya mata-
meva yuktam । kartuḥ pratyagātmano'rthāntarabhūtasyaiva vidyatayopadeśāt । tathā hi
<quote>‘bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti’</quote> <quote>‘sa kāraṇaṃ karaṇādhipādhipaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘viśvādhiko rudro maharṣiḥ’</quote>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kāyā ātmavidyāyā api karmāṅgatvamavasīyata iti bhāvaḥ ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।। samanvārambhaṇāt
।। 5 ।।</pratika> taṃ paralokaṃ prayāntaṃ puruṣaṃ vidyākarmaṇī anuvartete iti dvandvāvagatasāhityayorvi-
dyākarmaṇoḥ phaladānāyānuvṛttivacanamapi prāguktanyāyāduktarūpāṅgapradhānabhāvābhiprāyameveti
bhāvaḥ ।।<pratika>---sū॰ ।। tadvato vidhānāt ।। 6 ।। ācāryakulāditi</pratika> । ācāryakulavāsī
sanvedamadhītya yathāvidhānaṃ śrutyuktaniyamairyuktassannityarthaḥ । smṛtyuktaniyameṣvapi guruśuśrū-
ṣāyāḥ prādhānyamucyate।guroḥ karmātiśeṣeṇa guruśuśrūṣāvaśiṣṭakālenādhītyetyanvayaḥ । <pratika>abhi-
samāvṛttya</pratika> gurukulānnivṛttya dāraparigrahapūrvakaṃ <pratika>kuṭumbe</pratika> gārhasthyāśrame sthitvā gārhasthyepyavi-
smaraṇārthaṃ vedābhyāsaṃ kurvāṇa eva <pratika>dhārmikānvidadhat</pratika> putraśiṣyādīn dharmaniratān <pratika>kurvan</pratika>
dharmopayuktārthān sampādayanniti vā । evamarthajñānaparyantādhyayanavataḥ karmasu niratervidhānaṃ
karmaṇāṃ ta1dapekṣatva evopapadyata iti tasya karmāṅgatvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। niyamāt
।। 7 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘īśāvāsyamidm̐/?/sarva’</quote>mityātmopadeśapūrvakaṃ kurvanneveti śravaṇamātmavido jīvanasya
karmasu viniyogaparamiti vidyā2yāḥ karmāṃgatvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ । evamaupaniṣadasyātmajñā-
nasya karmasu viniyogasiddhau tadupodbalitaṃ tattvamasyādivākyaṃ jīvasvarūpameva brahma nānya-
diti pratipādanaparam । tatra ca jagatkāraṇatvāpahatapāpmatvādivarṇanaṃ stutyarthamiti pūrvapa-
kṣābhiprāyaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। adhikopadeśāttu bādarāyaṇasyaivaṃ taddarśanāt ।। 8 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘adhikantu
bhedanirdeśā’</quote>dityādi <ref>(bra॰ a॰ 2 pā॰ 9 sū॰ 22)</ref> sūtraiḥ prāgvyavasthāpita eva jīvā-
dhikabrahmopadeśo'nena sūtreṇa smāryate । <quote>‘tattvama’</quote>syādisāmānādhikaraṇyasya śarīrātmabhāva-
<note>(1) <quote>‘tadapekṣatvādaṅgabhāva iti’</quote> ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘vidyāyāṃ viniyojakamiti’</quote> iti. ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="387"/>
ityādivākyeṣu vedyasya brahmaṇa ādhikyaṃ dṛśyate । ato na vidyāyāḥ karmaśeṣa-
tvam ।। yaduktamācāradarśanaṃ tatrāha---
<sutra>sū ।। tulyaṃ tu darśanam ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
vidyāyāḥ prādhānye'pi tulyamācāradarśanam, na kevalaṃ karmaṇa eva । <quote>‘etaddha sma
vai tadvidvāṃsa āhu ṛṣayaḥ kāvaṣeyāḥ kimarthā vayamadhyeṣyāmahe kimarthā vayaṃ yakṣyā-
mahe kiṃ prajayā kariṣyāma’</quote> ityādau brahmavidāṃ karmatyāgo hi dṛśyate । anuṣṭhānaṃ
tu phalābhisandhānarahitasya karmaṇo vidyāṅgatvena । tyāgastu phalābhisandhānayu-
ktasyeti virodhābhāvāt karmaṇa eva vidyāṅgatvamiti vidyāyāḥ prādhānyameva ।।
<quote>‘yadeva vidyayā’</quote> iti yaduktaṃ tatrāha---
<sutra>sū ।। asārvatrikī ।। 10 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘yadeva vidyayā karoti’</quote> iti na sārvatrikī vidyocyate, yadeva vidyayeti prasi-
ddhavannirdeśāt । prasiddhirapyudgīthavidyāyā eva । <quote>‘yadeva vidyayā karoti tadeva
vīryavattaram’</quote> iti prakṛtodgīthavidyāyāstadyuktasya karmaṇo vīryavattaratvasādhanabhāvo
vidhīyata iti na vidyā karmāṅgam ।। yaduktaṃ <quote>‘taṃ vidyākarmaṇī’</quote> iti tatrāha---
<sutra>sū ।। vibhāgaḥ śatavat ।। 11 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘taṃ vidyākarmaṇī samanvārabhete’</quote> ityatra vidyākarmaṇorbhinnaphalatvena vidyā ca
svasmai phalāyānveti, karma ca svasmai phalāyānveti iti vibhāgaḥ, yathā kṣetraratna
vikrayaṇena śatadvayamityatra kṣetrārthaṃ śataṃ ratnārthaṃ śatamiti vibhāgaḥ ।।
<sutra>sū ।। adhyayanamātravataḥ ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘vedamadhītya’</quote> ityadhyayanamātravata eva karmāvidhānānna vidyā karmāṅgam । adhyaya-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nivandhanatvaṃ prāksiddhamācāradarśanādibhirvidyāyāḥ karmāṅgatvahetubhiścālanīyaṃ । na tu tadyu-
jyate teṣāmanantarasūtrairnirākariṣyamāṇatvāditi tatsmaraṇasyābhiprāyaḥ ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।। tulyaṃ tu
darśanam ।। 9 ।।</pratika> brahmavidāṃ karmānuṣṭhānatattyāgadarśanayoḥ kathaṃ virodhasamādhānamityākāṅkṣā-
yāmāha---<pratika>anuṣṭhānamiti ।। sū॰ ।। asārvatrikī ।। 10 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘prasiddhavannirdeśā’</quote>dityu-
palakṣaṇaṃ <quote>‘yaścaitadevaṃ vede’</quote>tyevaṃśabdena prakṛtodgīthavidyāyā eva parāmarśādityapi draṣṭavyam ।
tataśca vidyayetyasya prakṛtodgīthavidyāmātraparatvāvaśyaṃbhāvāt <quote>‘yadeveti’</quote> kratuprayogaparamaṅgī-
kṛtya yaṃ yaṃ somayāgaprayogaṃ prakṛtodgīthavidyayā karoti sa sarvo'pi vīryavattaro bhavatī-
tyartho varṇanīya iti bhāvaḥ । ato naupanipa/?/dātmajñānasya karmāṅgatvaśaṅkānavakāśaḥ । <quote>‘yo vā
etadakṣaraṃ gārgyaviditvāsmin loke juhoti yajate tapastapyate antavadevāsya tadbhavatī’</quote>ti
karmanindāpradeśepyaupaniṣadātmajñānarahitena kṛtānāmapi karmaṇāmantavatsvaphalajanakatva-
syoktatvāditi bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। vibhāgaḥ śatavat ।। 11 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘vidyākarmaṇī’</quote> ityuddeśyagataṃ
sāhityamavivakṣitaṃ tadvivakṣāyāmapi karmaṇāṃ vidyāṅgatve'pi tadupapadyata iti bhāvaḥ ।। <pratika>sū॰
।। adhyayanamātravataḥ ।। 12 ।।</pratika> adhyayanasyākṣarāvāptiphalakatvamarthajñānaparyantatvaṃ ceti
pakṣadvayaṃ prāgupapāditam । pakṣadvaye'pi mīmāṃsāpāṭhādhīnādvedārthanirṇayādanyasyāḥ karmavatta-
<pb n="388"/>
navidhirhyakṣaragrahaṇamātre paryavasyati । arthāvabodhaparyantatve'pyarthajñānādarthāntara-
bhūtā vidyā । upāsīteti vihitā vidyā pratyayāvṛttirūpā । ato'syāḥ kvāpi na
viśeṣaṇabhāvaḥ ।।
<sutra>sū ।। nāviśeṣāt ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘kurvanneveha karmāṇi’</quote> ityatra svatantre karmaṇi vidvadāyuṣo viniyoga iti viśe-
ṣaheturna dṛśyate । <quote>‘īśāvāsyamidm̐/?/sarvam’</quote> iti vidyāprakaraṇācca vidyāṅgabhūtametat
karmeti vijñāyate । ato na vidyāyāḥ karmāṅgatvam ।।
<sutra>sū ।। stutaye'numatirvā ।। 14 ।।</sutra>
vidyāmāhātmyāt sarvadā karmāṇi kurvannapi tairna lipyate iti hi vākya-
śeṣaḥ । ataśca vidyāyā eva prādhānyam ।।
<sutra>sū ।। kāmakāreṇa caike ।। 15 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘kiṃ prajayā kariṣyāma’</quote> ityādinā kāmakāreṇa viduṣo gārhasthyasya tyāgamadhī-
yata eke । ato'pi vidyā pradhānabhūtā lakṣyate ।।
<sutra>sū ।। upamardaṃ ca ।। 16 ।।</sutra>
vidyayā sarvakarmopamardaṃ cādhīyata eke---<quote>‘kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe
parāvare’</quote> iti । ato na karmaprādhānyam ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
danantaramanuṣṭheyāyāḥ pratyayāvṛttirūpāyā vidyāyāḥ karmāṅgatvaṃ na prasajyata ityarthaḥ । na ca
kṛtsnavedārthanirṇayavataḥ karmavidhāne kṛtsnasyāpi vedārthanirṇayasya sarvāpekṣitatvaparyavasānāt ।
karmārtha eva kṛtsno veda iti svatantrā vidyā pratikṣiptā bhavediti vācyam । tadvato vidhā-
nena hi vedārthanirṇayaḥ karmāpekṣita ityetāvanmātraṃ sidhyati । natvekasya karmānuṣṭhāne kṛtsna-
vedārthanirṇayo'pyapekṣita iti rājasūyādivākyārthanirṇayasya brāhmaṇādikarmānuṣṭhānānupayo-
gitvena tathā tātparyakalpanāyogāditi bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। nāviśeṣāt ।। 13 ।।</pratika> vidyā
karmāṅgaṃ na bhavatīti siddhānte viduṣāṃ sarvathā karma nāpekṣitamiti nābhyupagamaḥ । kintu
vidyāṅgaṃ karmeti viduṣo'pi karmāpekṣābhyupagamyata eva । ata eva <quote>‘yo vā etadakṣaraṃ gārgya-
viditve’</quote>tyādivākyenāvidvatkarmaṇāmantavatphaloktyā vidyāsādhyama1nantavatphalameva vidvatka-
rmaṇāṃ phalamiti teṣāṃ vidyāṅgatvaṃ sūcyate । ataḥ <quote>‘kurvanneve’</quote>tyādikaṃ vidyāṅgakarmaviṣayatayo-
papannamiti bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। stutaye'numatirvā ।। 14 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘vidyāmāhātmyā’</quote>dityādinā vā-
kyaśeṣo'rthataḥ paṭhitaḥ । evaṃ tvayi nānyatheto'sti । na karma lipyate nara iti mantraśeṣaḥ ।
viduṣā yāvajjīvaṃ yatkiñcitkarma kriyatāṃ nāma । evaṃ karma kurvatyapi tvayi nare karmaśleṣa-
yogye manuṣye'pi tatkarma na śliṣyate ito'nyathā nāsti idaṃ tattvamiti vidyāmāhātmya-
stutiḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। kāmakāreṇa caike ।। 15 ।। ato'pi vidyeti</pratika> । na hi karmaprādhānye
buddhipūrvaṃ pradhānaṃ tyaktvāṅgānuṣṭhānamupapadyata iti bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। upamardaṃ ca ।। 16 ।।
sarvakarmeti</pratika> । vidyodayā2tprācīnaṃ vidyāphalavirodhiphalaṃ yatkarma tasya sarvasyāpyupamardami-
<note>(1) <quote>‘manantaphalameva’</quote> iti ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘prāgvirodhiphalaṃ’</quote> iti ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="389"/>
<sutra>sū ।। ūrdhvaretassu ca śabde hi ।। 17 ।।</sutra>
ūrdhvaretassu cāśrameṣu vidyādarśanāt teṣvagnihotrādyasaṃbhavācca na vidyā karmā-
ṅgam । tathāhi---<quote>‘trayo dharmaskandhāḥ’</quote> iti vaidike dṛśyante traya āśramadharmāśrayāḥ।
ato vidyaiva pradhānabhūtā puruṣārthahetuḥ । tasyāstvaṅgatayā pradhānaphalābhisandhira-
hitasya vihitakarmaṇo'nuvṛttiriti siddham ।।
iti puruṣārthādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।
atha parāmarśādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। parāmarśaṃ jaiminiracodanāccāpavadati hi ।। 18 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatra <quote>‘trayo dharmaskandhāḥ’</quote> iti trayāṇāmevāśramāṇāṃ dharmādhāratvamuktam । ata
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tyarthaḥ । evameva hi caturthādhyāye bhāṣyakāro vakṣyati---<quote>‘etena śaṅkāpyeṣā nirastā । sa-
tyapi nivartyanivartakabhāvavirodhe yathā karmaṇāṃ vidyāṅgatvamabhyupagamyate tathā vidyāyāḥ ka-
rmāṅgatvamabhyupagamyatā’</quote>miti । siddhānte he yeṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ vidyānivartyatvaṃ na teṣāṃ vidyā-
ṅgatvamiṣyate । upaniṣadāṃ jīvātiriktabrahmaparatvamapahnutya dehātiriktātmamātraparatvamupagamya
tadvedanaṃ pāralaukikasarvakarmāṅgamiti samarthayamānasya jaiminermate vidyānirvartyakarmaṇāmapi
pāralaukikātmavedanasādhyatvāviśeṣeṇa vidyāṃ prati prādhānyameṣṭavyamiti vaiṣamyāt <pratika>।। sū॰ ।।
ūrddhvaretassu ca śabde hi ।। 17 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘stutayenumatirve’</quote>tyetadantaissūtrairvidyāyāḥ karmāṅgatve
parābhimatāni sādhakāni dūṣitāni ।।</p>
<head>iti puruṣārthādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<head>atha parāmarśādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p>upamardaṃ ceti sūtreṇānena sūtreṇa ca tatra bādhakamuktam । tatraitatsūtroktaṃ bādhakamākṣipya
samarthayitumadhikaraṇāntaramārabhyate---<pratika>sū॰ ।। parāmarśaṃ jaiminiracodanāccāpavadati hi
।। 18 ।।</pratika> atrāyamākṣepaprakāraḥ । ūrddhvaretassu vidyāsadbhāvo na vidyāyāḥ karmāṅgatvabādhakaḥ ।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya turīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 3 ।। 4 ।।</head>
<head>atha puruṣārthādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। puruṣārtho'taśśabdāditi bādarāyaṇaḥ ।। 1 ।। śeṣatvātpuruṣārthavādo yathānyeṣviti jaiminiḥ
।। 2 ।। ācāradarśanāt ।। 3 ।। tacchruteḥ ।। 4 samanvārambhaṇāt ।। 5 ।। tadvato vidhānāt ।। 6 ।। niya-
māt ।। 7 ।। adhikopadeśāttu bādarāyaṇasyaivaṃ taddarśanāt ।। 8 ।। tulyaṃ tu darśanam ।। 9 ।। asārvatrikī
।। 10 ।। vibhāgaḥ śatavat ।। 11 ।। adhyayanamātravataḥ ।। 12 ।। nāviśeṣāt ।। 13 ।। stutaye'numa-
tirvā ।। 14 ।। kāmakāreṇa caike ।। 15 ।। upamardaṃ ca ।। 16 ।। ūrdhvaretassu ca śabde hi ।। 17।।</sutra>
<lg><l>jñānaṃ na mokṣahetuḥ karmasu tatkartṛsaṃsmṛtitvena । śeṣatvātkartaiva hi tattvamasītyucyate brahma ।। 293 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>adhikopadeśatastu jñānaṃ tadviṣayamatra vidhiviṣayaḥ । tasya phalākāṅkṣāyāṃ mokṣaḥ syādrātrisatranayāt ।। 294 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti nayamaṇimālāyāṃ puruṣārthādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<pb n="390"/>
<p>evātra caturthāśramadharmasadbhāve sandehe sati pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ---<quote>‘trayo dharmaskandhāḥ’</quote> ityādau
caturthāśramācodanāt <quote>‘etameva pravrājino lokamicchantaḥ pravrajanti’</quote> ityādi catu-
rthāśramavacanamupāsanastutyarthavādameva jaiminirmanyate । apavadati hi <quote>‘vīrahā vā
eṣa devānāṃ yo'gnimudvāsayate’</quote> iti śrutiḥ caturyāśramam । ato'gnihotraparityāge
mahān doṣa iti nāsti tatparityāgenāśramāntaramiti ।। atha siddhāntaḥ---
<sutra>sū ।। anuṣṭheyaṃ vādarāyaṇaḥ sāmyaśruteḥ ।। 19 ।।</sutra>
gṛhasthāśramādivadāśramāntaramapyanuṣṭheyamiti bhagavato bādarāyaṇasya matam ।
tatra <quote>‘trayo dharmaskandhāḥ’</quote> <quote>‘etameva pravrājino lokamicchantaḥ pravrajanti’</quote> iti sarvā-
śramasāmyaśruteḥ । agnyudvāsanadoṣo gṛhasthaviṣaya eva । ataścaturthāśramadharmasadbhāvaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pa1tnīsannihite vānaprasthe agnihotrādīnāṃ sattvānnaiṣṭhike patnīsāpekṣakarmaṇāmabhāve'pi japa-
tapodānaprabhṛtīnāṃ svātantryeṇa puṇyalokasādhanānāṃ sattvāt । ata itthaṃ pūrvoktaṃ bādhaka-
mupapādanīyam । sannyāsini na vidyāyāḥ karmāṅgatvaṃ saṃbhavati । mumukṣvekādhikāre sannyāse
abhyudayaphalānāṃ karmaṇāmaprasakteḥ । nityānāmapi patnīsādhyānāmagnihotrādīnāmabhāvāt ।
snānaśaucādyācārāṇā<quote>‘mānarthakyamiti cenna tadapekṣatvā’</quote>diti <ref>(bra॰ 3—1—10)</ref> sūtro-
ktanyāyena vaidikakarmādhikāramātrāpādakānāṃ svatantraphalarahitānāṃ karmavatsvāśramāntareṣu
karmādhikārārthatvasyeva mokṣārthavidyāvati sannyāsini vidyādhikārārthatvasyaiva prāpteriti ।
naitadupapadyate । sannyāsasyaiva śaśaśṛṅgāyamāṇatvāt । <quote>‘trayo dharmaskandhā yajño'dhyayanaṃ
dānamiti । prathamastapa eva, dvitīyo brahmacāryācāryakulavāsī, tṛtīyo'tyantamātmānamā-
cāryakule'vasādayan sarva ete puṇyalokā bhavanti brahmasaṃstho'mṛtatvametī’</quote>ti śrutau gṛ-
hasthavānaprasthanaiṣṭhikānāṃ trayāṇāmevāśramāṇāṃ vidhānena sannyāsasyācoditatvāt । na ca
<quote>‘brahmasaṃstho'mṛtatvametī’</quote>tyeṣā sannyāsacodaneti śaṅkanīyam । <quote>‘trayo dharmaskandhā’</quote>ityupakrā-
ntasaṃkhyāvirodhāpatteḥ । <quote>‘brahmasaṃstho'mṛtatvametī’</quote>tyasya triṣvevāśrameṣu karmāṅgabhūtavidyā-
praśaṃsārthatvopapatteḥ । na <quote>‘caitameva pravrājino lokamicchantaḥ pravrajantī’</quote>ti śrutyantaraṃ sannyā-
savidhāyakaṃ syāditi vācyam । agnyudvāsananindāvirodhena tasyāpi vidyāpraśaṃsāmātrapa-
ratvāditi <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। anuṣṭheyaṃ bādarāyaṇaḥ sāmyaśruteḥ ।। 19 ।।</pratika> āśramāntaraṃ gārha-
sthyātiriktamāśramatrayam । yadyapi pūrvapakṣiṇassannyāsamātre vipratipattiḥ । tathāpi yathā
<quote>‘trayo dharmaskandhā’</quote> ityatra vidhivibhaktirāhitye'pi brahmacaryavānaprasthāśramayorgṛhasthāśrama-
vadavigītamanuṣṭheyatvaṃ evaṃ sannyāsasyāpi yuktam । <quote>‘etameva pravrājino lokamicchantaḥ pravra-
jantī’</quote>tyatrāpi vidhivibhaktirāhityasyānuṣṭheyatvāvighātakatvāditi dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikatātpa-
ryeṇa trayamapyupāttam ।। nanvagnyudvāsane doṣaśravaṇaṃ sannyāsasyānuṣṭheyatvakalpanāvirodhītyā-
śaṅkyāha---<pratika>agnyudvāsanadoṣa iti</pratika> । gṛhasthasyāpi hi nimi2tte sati vidhita utsargeṣṭipū-
rvake tyāge na doṣaḥ । tasmādavaidhatyāgaviṣayā doṣaśrutiriti pravivrajiṣoḥ/?/ tyāgavidhisadbhā-
vāt । tasyāpi vidhitastyāgo na doṣāvaha iti bhāvaḥ । na cāśramatritvasaṅkhyāvirodhaḥ mo-
<note>(1) <quote>‘patnīsāhityavānaprasthe’</quote> iti ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘vairāgye sati’</quote> iti ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="391"/>
<sutra>sū ।। vidhirvā dhāraṇavat ।। 20 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘upari hi devebhyo dhārayati’</quote> ityatrāprāptatvena yathā vidhiḥ । tadvadatrāpi vidhireva ।
athavā । jābālaśrutau pratyakṣavidhirapyasti ‘brahmacaryaṃ samāpya gṛhī bhavet gṛhī vā
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kṣāśramasya caturthasya sadbhāve'pyabhyudayasādhanadharmapradhānānāmāśramāṇāṃ tritvopapatteḥ । ata
eva <quote>‘sarva ete puṇyalokā bhavantī’</quote>ti teṣāṃ dharmaphalabhūtā puṇyalokāvāptirucyate । na hi
sannyāsasya puṇyalokāvāptiḥ phalam । <quote>‘etameva pravrājino lokamicchantaḥ pravrajantī’</quote>tyava-
dhāraṇena parabrahmātiriktalokeṣaṇāvyavacchedāt । tadanantaraṃ <quote>‘te ha sma putreṣaṇāyāśca vitteṣa-
ṇāyāśca lokeṣaṇāyāśca vyutthāya atha bhikṣācaryaṃ carantī’</quote>ti sphuṭameva lokeṣaṇāvyāvarta-
nāt । <quote>‘sannyāsādbrahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ brāhmaṃ sannyāsināṃ smṛta’</quote>mityādivacanāni tvihāparipūrṇa-
vidyānāṃ sannyāsināṃ <quote>‘prāpya puṇyakṛtāṃ lokā’</quote>niti smṛtivadāntarālikaphalābhiprāyāṇi ।
anyathā śrutivirodhāpatteḥ । <quote>‘brahmasaṃsthomṛtattvametī’</quote>tyetattu brahmasaṃsthaśabdasya āgneyīnyā-
yena yaugikatayā prakṛtaparatvena trayāṇāmeteṣāmāśramiṇāṃ madhye bhāgyavaśādyasya brahmasaṃsthā
jātā tasya muktirityetatparam । yathā <quote>‘rājagṛhe brāhmaṇā daśadaśa svarṇān labhanta’</quote> iti
vacanānantaraṃ <quote>‘brahmaniṣṭhaḥ śataṃ suvarṇā’</quote>niti vacanaṃ teṣāṃ vrāhmaṇānāṃ madhya eva yo brahmani-
ṣṭhastasyādhikaphalaprāptipratipādanaparam । parivrājakasya tu mukti<quote>‘retameva pravrājina’</quote> iti ।
vacanāntareṇaiva pratipādyata iti ।। nanu trayo dharmaskandhā itya<quote>‘traitameva pravrājina’</quote> ityatra
ca vidhivibhaktyabhāve kathamāśramāṇāmanuṣṭheyatvasiddhirityāśaṅkya sārvatrikīṃ gatimāha---
<pratika>sū॰ ।। vidhirvā dhāraṇavat ।। 20 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘adhastātsamidhaṃ dhārayannanudravedupari hi devebhyo
dhārayatī’</quote>ti mṛtāgnihotraprakaraṇagataśrutau liṅ‌vibhaktiyogādadhodhāraṇa ivāprāptatvādupari-
dhāraṇe'pi vidhirāśrīyate । <quote>‘vidhistu dhāraṇe'pūrvatvā’</quote>diti pūrvatantrādhikaraṇe । sa iha dṛṣṭā-
ntīkṛtaḥ । avadhāraṇārtho vākāraḥ । evaṃ jābālopaniṣadi śrutānāśramavidhīnkareṇa vidhāya
pratyakṣavidhyabhāve'pi gārhasthyādivatsannyāsasyāpi vidhikalpanenānuṣṭheyatvasiddhirapratyūheti
samarthitam । idānīṃ vidhiṃ siddhaṃ kṛtvā cintāmuddhāṭayati---<pratika>athaveti</pratika> । asminpakṣe <quote>‘trayo
dharmaskandhā’</quote> ityādau gārhasthyādiṣu vidhirna kalpanīyaḥ । anyataḥ prāptisaṃbhavāt । atrāpi
teṣu vidhikalpane vidhyanekatvena vākyabhedāpatteścetyanuvādatvasūcanārthassautro hi vākāraḥ ।
yadvā---gārhasthyādīnāṃ kṣudraṃ phalamiti tata utkṛṣṭaphalatvena stutyā sannyāsamātre vidhiḥ
kalpanīyaḥ । brahmasaṃsthaśabdasya yaugikatve'pi saṃpūrvasya tiṣṭhateḥ samāptivācakatayā karma-
vyavacchedena brahmaikaniṣṭhatvārthakasya sannyāsinyeva vyavasthitatvāt । tathā satyeva gārhasthyā-
dyasādhāraṇadharmopanyāsapūrvakatattadāśramasaṃkīrtanaprāyapāṭhānugrahalābhācca । na caivaṃ sati
sannyāsināmeva muktiḥ syānna gṛhasthādīnāmiti vācyam । itaranindāyāḥ stotavyastutyartha-
tayā svārthe tātparyābhāvena <quote>‘sa khalvevaṃ vartayanyāvadāyuṣaṃ brahmalokamabhisampadyate ye ceme'-
raṇye śraddhā tapa ityupāsate te'rciṣamabhisaṃbhavanti’</quote> ityādiśrutiprāptasyārthasya tadapratikṣe-
<pb n="392"/>
vanī bhūtvā pravrajet’ iti । nātra krame niyamaḥ । <quote>‘utsannāgniranagniko vā yadahareva
virajet tadahareva pravrajet’</quote> iti śruteḥ । janmāntarasukṛtaparipākena viśuddhāntaḥkara-
ṇasya brahmacaryādeva pārivrājyaṃ bhavati ।। <quote>‘‘ṛṇāni trīṇyapākṛtya mano mokṣe nive-
śayet । anapākṛtya mokṣaṃ tu bhajamāno vrajatyadhaḥ ।।’’</quote> ityādiniṣedhastvavirakta-
viṣayaḥ । <quote>‘vīrahā vā eṣa devānāṃ yo'gnimudvāsayate’</quote> ityagnyudvāsananiṣedhāt brahma-
caryādeva pārivrājyaṃ na gārhasthyātparamiti kecit । tathā sati <quote>‘vanī bhūtvā
pravrajet...utsannāgniranagniko vā yadahareva virajet tadahareva pravrajet’</quote> ityādi-
vidhivaiyarthyaṃ syāt । ato brahmacaryādeva pravrajediti vā, vanī bhūtvā pravrajediti
vā na nirbandhaḥ kāryaḥ । brahmacaryādeva pravrajediti vadatāmayamabhiprāyaḥ---sāgnirana-
gnikaśceti dvāvevāśramau । tatra brahmacārī parivrāṭ ca anagniḥ, gṛhastho vānaprasthaśca
sāgniḥ । agnimādhāyodvāsya pārivrājyāt brahmacaryāt pārivrājyamevātīva mukhya-
miti । anyathā śrutivirodhāpatteḥ । ataḥ sarvāśramadharmasiddhiḥ ।।
iti parāmarśādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pyatvāt । <pratika>nātreti</pratika> । atra sannyāse uktakramo niyato na bhavatītyarthaḥ । itareṣu triṣvapyu-
ktakramo niyata eva । <pratika>aviraktaviṣaya iti</pratika> । anatyantavirakto yaḥ kramasaṃpādanīyavairā-
gyastadviṣaya ityarthaḥ । <pratika>tathā satīti</pratika> । tathā codāhṛtavākyajāte dṛḍhavairāgyasyaivādhikā-
riviśeṣaṇatvaśravaṇāt । sati tasmin yadākadācit sannyastavyamityarthaḥ । <quote>‘atha yadi
vratī vāvratī vā snātako vāsnātako vā utsannāgniranagniko ve’</quote>ti viśiṣya keṣāñcitkī-
rtanasyāyamabhiprāyaḥ । upakrāntamāsopavāsādivratenāntarā vairāgye sati vratasamāptiparyantaṃ
na vilambanīyam । anupakrāntavrateneva tadānīmeva sannyastavyam । tathādhyayanārthamupakrānta-
gurukulavāsena samāvartanaparyantaṃ na vilambanīyam । samāvṛtteneva tadānīmeva sannyastavyam ।
vicchinnāgninā <quote>‘tathaike prājāpatyāmeveṣṭiṃ kurvanti tadu tathā na kuryāt । āgneyīmeva ku-
ryā’</quote>dityādinā vakṣyamāṇeṣṭipūrvakāgnisamāropaṇāya agnyādhānaparyantaṃ na vilambanīyam ।
anagnikeneva akṛtāgnisamāropaṇenaiva sannyastavyamiti ।। nanu kathaṃ pratyakṣaśrutau vidyamā-
nāyāmeva tāmavigaṇayya kecidbrahmacaryādeva pārivrājyaṃ vadantītyāśaṅkya mukhyatvābhiprāyeṇe-
tyāha---<pratika>brahmacaryādeveti</pratika> । mukhyatvamapi sarvatra samānam । adhikāriviśeṣaṇasya vairāgya-
syaikarūpatvāditi kecidityanenaiva dhvanitam ।।</p>
<head>iti parāmarśādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha parāmarśādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। parāmarśaṃ jaiminiracodanāccāpavadati hi ।। 18 ।। anuṣṭheyaṃ bādarāyaṇaḥ sāmyaśruteḥ ।। 19 ।।
vidhirvā dhāraṇavat ।। 20 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>saṃnyāse nāsti vidhirna kalpanaṃ vīraheti doṣagateḥ । tasmādvidyāstutaye śrutiṣu parāmarśamevāsya ।। 295 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>dhāraṇa iva vidhikalpanasucitaṃ tasminnapūrvatvāt । doṣasya śravaṇaṃ tu tadutsannāgnikagṛhasthaparam ।। 296 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti parāmarśādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<pb n="393"/>
atha stutimātrādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। stutimātramupādānāditi cennāpūrvatvāt ।। 21 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘omityetadakṣaramudgīthamupāsīta’</quote> ityupakramya <quote>‘sa eṣa rasānāṃ rasatamaḥ paramaḥ
parārdhyo'ṣṭamo ya udgīthaḥ’</quote> ityevaṃjātīyakodāharaṇe udgīthādiṣu rasatamatvādidṛṣṭi-
rvidhīyate na veti saṃśayaḥ ।। kiṃ tāvat prāptam ? nodgīthādiṣu rasatamatvādidṛṣṭi-
rvidhīyate, kiṃtu, <quote>‘iyameva juhūḥ svargo loka āhavanīyaḥ’</quote> itivat karmāṅgabhūto-
dgīthādyupādāya tasya rasatamatvādivacanaṃ stutimātramiti cediti pūrvapakṣasamāptiḥ ।।
siddhānta ucyate---nāpūrvatvāditi । na stutimātraṃ kiṃtūdgīthādiṣu rasatamatvādi-
dṛṣṭirvidhīyata eva, apūrvatvāt । na caivaṃ juhūrityādinyāyāvatāraḥ, juhvādivi-
dhivadudgīthādividheratrāsannidhānāt । ato rasatamatvādidṛṣṭividhireva ।।
<sutra>sū ।। bhāvaśabdācca ।। 22 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘udgīthamupāsīta’</quote> iti vidhipratyayaścātra śrūyate । ato'pi rasatamatvādidṛṣṭi-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha stutimātrādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। stutimātramupādānāditi cennāpūrvatvāt ।। 21 ।।</pratika> stutividhiprasaṅgādidama-
dhikaraṇam । <pratika>ityupakramyeti</pratika> । śrūyata iti śeṣaḥ । <pratika>sa eṣa iti</pratika> । <quote>‘eṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ pṛthivī
rasaḥ pṛthivyā āpo raso apāmoṣadhayo rasaḥ oṣadhīnāṃ puruṣo rasaḥ puruṣasya vāgrasaḥ
vāca ṛgrasaḥ ṛcassāma rasaḥ sāmna udgītho rasa’</quote> ityanukrāntānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ rasānāṃ
rasatamaḥ atiśayito rasaḥ paramaḥ utkṛṣṭaḥ । utkṛṣṭatve hetuḥ parārdhyaḥ parasya brahmaṇo'rdhaṃ
sthānamarhati paramātmopāsanāsthānabhūta ityarthaḥ । aṣṭamaḥ pṛthivyādirasāpekṣayā । ko'sā-
vevaṃbhūtaḥ yadudgīthaḥ udgīthāvayavapraṇava evaṃbhūta ityarthaḥ । <quote>‘evaṃjātīyaka’</quote>mityanena <quote>‘iyameva-
rgagnissāme’</quote>tyādikaṃ gṛhyate <quote>‘iyameva juhū’</quote>rityādinirdeśasāmyādudgīthādividhisamabhivyāhā-
rābhāvācca saṃśayaṃ darśayati---<pratika>kimiti</pratika> । yadyapi karmāṅgaviṣayaguṇapratipādanamātre stutyartha-
tvaniyamo nāsti । varṇamayyādivākyeṣu vyabhicārāt । utkṛṣṭatvena guṇaviśeṣaṇe'pi guṇa-
niyamaḥ । <quote>‘hiraṇmayyaḥ sruco bhavantī’</quote>tyādiṣu vyabhicārāt । tathāpyananuṣṭheyatvenāpi guṇa-
viśeṣaṇe'sti niyamaḥ । rasatamādivākyānāmudgīthādisamabhivyāhārābhāve'pyavyabhicarita-
vidhisambandhinodgīthādinopasthāpiteṣu tattadvidhiṣu stāvakatvenānvayassaṃbhavati । na ca
stāvakavākyānāṃ stutyavidhisamabhivyāhāraniyamo'sti । <quote>‘etadbrāhmaṇānyeva pañca havīṃṣi
yadbrāhmaṇānītarāṇī’</quote>tyatidiṣṭeṣu pañcasañcarārthavādeṣu vyabhicārāt tasmādudgīthādiṣu na rasa-
tamatvādidṛṣṭividhiriti pūrvapakṣamāha---nodgīthādiṣviti । <pratika>asannidhānāditi</pratika> । prakaraṇe
saṃbhavadanvayasyotkarṣo na yuktaḥ । pañcasañcarārthavādānāṃ tu vacanabalādanyatrāpyanvaya iti
bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। bhāvaśabdācca ।। 22 ।।</pratika> na kevalaṃ stutyarthatvapratikṣepakamudgīthādividhya-
saṃnidhānamātraṃ । kintu dṛ1ṣṭyarthatvopapādakamupāsanāvidhisannidhānaṃ cāstītyanena sūtreṇocyate ।
<note>1 <quote>‘dṛṣṭividhitvopapādaka’</quote>mati ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="394"/>
vidhiriti ।।
iti stutimātrādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
atha pāriplavādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। pāriplavārthā iti cenna viśeṣitatvāt ।। 23 ।।</sutra>
vedānteṣu vidyārambhe---<quote>‘pratardano ha vai daivodāsiḥ’</quote> ityādyākhyāyikā ā-
mnātāḥ । tāḥ pāriplavārthā uta vidyāstutyarthā iti saṃśayaḥ ।। kiṃ tāvatprāptam ?
pāriplavārthā iti । aśvamedhayāge rājānaṃ sakuṭumbamupaveśya tatpurato vaidikānyā-
khyānānyadhvaryuṇā vaktavyāni । tadidaṃ pāriplavākhyaṃ karma <quote>‘pāriplavamācakṣīta’</quote> iti
vākyena vihitam । tatra <quote>‘sarvāṇyākhyānāni pāriplave śaṃsanti’</quote> iti viniyo-
gādupaniṣadārambhagatā apyākhyāyikāstadarthā iti cediti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।। tatro-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
na copāsanavidhinānvaye'pi stutyarthatā kiṃ na syāditi śaṅkanīyam । vidhiviṣayasamarpa-
katayā pravṛttiviśeṣakaratve saṃbhavati vyarthaprāyastutyarthatvakalpanāyogāditi bhāvaḥ । vidhi-
pratyayayuktakriyāśabdo'tra bhāvaśabdo vivakṣitaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti stutimātrādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<head>atha pāriplavādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। pāriplavārthā iti cenna viśeṣitatvāt ।। 23 ।।</pratika> rasatamatvādīnāmupāsyaviṣa-
yasamarpakatvavadākhyānānāṃ pāriplavaprayogavidhiśeṣatvaṃ stutyarthatvāpekṣayā jyāyaḥ । pravṛttiviśe-
ṣakaratvāditi pūrvapakṣotthānātsaṅgatiḥ । <quote>‘sarvāṇyākhyānānī’</quote>tyaviśeṣaśravaṇādvākyaśeṣe vi-
śeṣasaṃkīrtanācca saṃśayaḥ । upakramaśrutasya <quote>‘sarvāṇyākhyānānī’</quote>tyasya vākyaśeṣagatenākhyā-
naviśeṣasaṃkīrtanena saṅkoco na yuktaḥ । upakramasyopasaṃhārataḥ sarvākhyānaśruterākhyānaviśe-
ṣasannidhānataśca prabalatvāt । anyathā <quote>‘eṣa vāva prathamo yajño yajñānāṃ yajjyotiṣṭomo
ya etenemāniṣṭvāthānyena yajate’</quote> ityatrānyaśabdasya jyotiṣṭometarasarvakratuparāmarśino
<quote>‘yo hi trivṛdanyaṃ yajñakratumāpadyate sa taṃ dīpayati yaḥ pañcadaśassa taṃ yassaptadaśassa
taṃ ya ekaviṃśassa ta’</quote>miti vākyaśeṣagatatṛvṛdādistomakakratusaṃkīrtanānusāreṇa tāvanmātre
saṅkucitavṛttitvāpatteriti pūrvapakṣayati---<pratika>tatreti । tadarthā iti</pratika> । nyāyataulyāt karma-
kāṇḍagatākhyāneṣvapi samāno'yamākṣepaḥ । na ca yathā japapārāyaṇādiviniyuktānāṃ
vidhivākyānāṃ vidhāyakatvamapi । evaṃ pāriplave viniyuktānāmākhyānānāṃ stutyartha-
tvamapyastviti vācyam । vyarthaprāyaṃ hi stutyarthatvaṃ sarvathā prayojanāntarābhāve kalpanī-
yam । pāriplavārthatvena sārthakatvasaṃbhave na ca vyarthaṃ tallakṣaṇākleśāśrayaṇena kalpanī-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha stutimātrādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। stutimātramupādānāditi cennāpūrvatvāt ।। 21 ।। bhāvaśabdācca ।। 22 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>dṛṣṭirnodgīthādiṣu rasatamatādervidhīyate śrutyā । karmāṅgagocaratayā yūpādityādivatstutiparatvāt ।। 297 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>karmāṅgaprakaraṇavaidhuryānnātra tatstavanam । syādvidhirupāsanāvidhisannihitatvādapūrvatvāt ।। 298 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti stutimātrādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<pb n="395"/>
<p>ttaram---na viśeṣitatvāditi । na pāriplavārthāstāḥ । <quote>‘prathame'hani manurvaivasvato
rājā...dvitīye'hani yamo vaivasvato rājā’</quote> ityādinā pāriplavārthānāmākhyāyi-
kānāṃ viśeṣitatvāt ।। aupaniṣadākhyāyikāḥ saṃnihitavidyāvidhibhirekavā-
kyatvāt vidyārthā ityāha---
<sutra>sū ।। tathācaikavākyatopabandhāt ।। 24 ।।</sutra>
yathā <quote>‘so'rodīt’</quote> ityādyākhyānānāṃ karmavidhibhirekavākyatā, tathā vidyā-
vidhibhirekavākyatopasaṃbandhācca vidyāstutyarthā eveti ।।
iti pāriplavādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
yamiti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>viśeṣitatvāditi</pratika> । yukta <quote>‘meṣa vāva prathama’</quote> ityādivākyagatānyaśa-
bdasya jyotiṣṭometarasarvakratuparatvaṃ । tasya svatassaṃkocākāṅkṣāvirahāt । tadabhiprāyeṇaiva pū-
rvatantre <quote>‘ekastome vā kratusaṃyogāt’</quote> <quote>‘sarveṣāṃ vā codanāviśeṣātpraśaṃsāstomānā’</quote>miti pūrvo-
ttarapakṣasūtrābhyāṃ vākyaśeṣānusāreṇa saṅkoco nirastaḥ । iha tvasti <quote>‘sarvāṇyākhyānānī’</quote>-
tyasya <quote>‘athaitasyaiva hī’</quote>ti yojanasya <quote>‘sarva eva lipsanta’</quote> ityatra sarvaśabdasyeva saṅkocākāṅkṣā ।
anantaśākhāgatasarvākhyānaśaṃsanasyāśakyatvāt । satyāṃ ca tadākāṅkṣāyāṃ vākyaśeṣaśrute-
ṣvevākhyānaviśeṣeṣu saṅkoco yukta iti bhāvaḥ ।। evaṃ <quote>‘sarvāṇyākhyānānī’</quote>tyasya saṅkoce
satyaupaniṣadānāmākhyānānāṃ vidyāvidhisamabhivyāhārāt stutyarthatayā tadanvaya eva syā-
dityuttarasūtrābhiprāyaṃ darśayannavatārayati---<pratika>aupaniṣadeti ।। sū॰ ।। tathā caikavākyato-
pabandhāt ।। 24 ।।</pratika> ekavākyatayānvayaḥ ekavākyatopabandhaḥ । <pratika>yathā so'rodīditi</pratika> ।
tatrāpi samāno'yaṃ siddhāntanyāya iti bhāvaḥ । na cākhyāyikānāṃ stutimātraprayojana-
tvena vyarthaprāyatā । vidyāpratipattisaukaryasyāpi tatprayojanatvāt । ākhyāyikāśravaṇe hya-
vahitā avyavadhānaṃ labhante । yathā---upāyena tu yacchakyaṃ na tacchakyaṃ parākramai’riti
nītiśāstrārthopadeśe <quote>‘kākaḥ kanakasūtreṇa kṛṣṇasarpamamāraya’</quote>dityākhyāyikayā ārthavādi-
kaliṅgadarśanaiśca bahavo vidhyarthāḥ pūrvatantre nirṇīyante । ihāpi <quote>‘sarvānnānumatiśca prāṇātyaye
taddarśanā’</quote> <ref>(bra॰ 3—4—28)</ref> dityādau ārthavādikāni ca phalādīni vidhyapekṣitāni
śāstradvaye'pi gṛhyante । tatsarvamarthavādānāṃ prayojanamiti sākṣātpravṛttiviśeṣakaratvābhāve-
'pi nātyantavaiyarthyamiti samabhivyāhṛtavidhyekavākyatvamākhyānānāṃ yuktamiti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti pāriplavādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha pāriplavādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। pāriplavārthā iti cenna viśeṣitatvāt ।। 23 ।। tathā caikavākyatopabandhāt ।। 24 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>upaniṣadāmnātānyapi sarvopākhyānaśaṃsanasvānāt । ākhyānāni bhajeyuḥ pāriplavakarmaśeṣatvam ।। 299 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>vidyāvidhyupayuktānyetāni tadekavākyatādṛṣṭeḥ । sarvākhyānavidhissa tu manvādyākhyānamātraparaḥ ।। 300 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti pāriplavādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<pb n="396"/>
atha agnīndhanādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। ata eva cāgnīndhanādyanapekṣā ।। 25 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatropapādito'ntyāśramasadbhāvaḥ । tasya vidyārthamādhānādyapekṣā'sti na veti
saṃśayaḥ ।। kiṃ tāvat prāptam ? vidyāṅgatvena karmaṇo vidhānāt vidyāvatāmūrdhvaretasāṃ
vidyāṅgatvenādhānādyanuṣṭheyam । iti prāpte būmaḥ । na teṣāmādhānādyapekṣā vidyā ।
<quote>‘etameva pravrājino lokamicchantaḥ pravrajanti’</quote> ityādiśrutesteṣāṃ karmatyāgenaiva
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha agnīndhanādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। ata eva cāgnīndhanādyanapekṣā ।। 25 ।।</pratika> stutividhiprasaṅgāgatamadhikaraṇadva-
yamapahāya <quote>‘parāmarśaṃ jaimini’</quote>rityadhikaraṇena <ref>(bra॰ 3—4—18 sū॰)</ref> saṅgatiṃ darśayati---
<pratika>pūrvatreti</pratika> । yajñādiśruteḥ karmatyāgaśruteśca saṃśayaḥ । ādhānādyapekṣāyā<quote>‘mūrdhvaretassu ce’</quote>ti
puruṣārthādhikaraṇaguṇa <ref>(bra॰ 3—4—17)</ref> sūtroktārthākṣepāttenāpi mūlabhūtādhikaraṇenāsya
saṅgatiranusandheyā । <pratika>ūrdhvaretasāmapīti</pratika> । yadyapi sannyāsino vidhibalāt tyaktapūrvadā-
rāgnihotrādayaḥ । tathāpi niraṅgena vidyāmātreṇa phalāniṣpatteraṅgabhūtayajñādyanuṣṭhānasyāvaśya-
katvāt । tadarthaṃ dārāntaraṃ parigṛhyāgnyādhānaṃ kāryam । na ca dāraparigrahe satyūrdhvaretastvavi-
rodhāpattiḥ । vidyāṅgakarmārthaṃ dāraparigrahe'pi bhīṣmavadūrdhvaretastvopapatteriti caśabdena
dyotyate । so'ya<quote>‘mupāyanādadhīta homasaṃyogā’</quote>diti pūrvatantrādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣarītyā pūrvapakṣaḥ ।
tatra hyupanayanāṅgahomaḥ āhavanīye kartavyaḥ । <quote>‘yadāhavaniye juhvatī’</quote>tyaviśeṣaśravaṇāt ।
āhavanīyasiddha‍yarthaṃ cāgnaya ādhātavyāḥ । agnyādhānasiddha‍yarthaṃ dārasaṅgrahaśca kāryaḥ । a-
smin dārasaṅgrahe karmārthe satyapyupanayanapūrvakavidyāgrahaṇottarakālavihito dārasaṅgrahaḥ prajārtho
bhaviṣyatīti pūrvapakṣaḥ kṛtaḥ । nacāśramadharmaireva vidyāyāssāṅgatvasiddheryajñādyanuṣṭhānārthamā-
dhānadārasaṅgrahayorākṣepo na prāpnotīti vācyam । <quote>‘yajñene’</quote>tyāditṛtīyāśrutyā viśiṣya ya-
jñādīnāmapi vidyaṅgatvavidhānāt । karmatyāgaśrutistu vidyānaṅgakarmaviṣayā syāditi
bhāvaḥ । <pratika>karmatyāgenaiveti</pratika> । tathā ca viśeṣavidhyanusāreṇa yajñādiśrutirgṛhasthaviṣayā bhavi-
ṣyati । na ca yajñādiśrutyanusāreṇa karmatyāgaśrutireva yajñāṅgakarmātiriktakarmaviṣayāstviti
vācyam । gṛhasthairapi saṃsārādvirajya muktyarthāṃ vidyāmanutiṣṭhadbhiraihikāmuṣmikaphalasādha-
nānāṃ kāmyakarmaṇāṃ tyaktatvena viśiṣya sannyāsināṃ karmatyāgavidhervidyāṅgayajñādiparyanta-
tvasyāvaśyavaktavyatvāt । <quote>‘sarvārthatvācca putrārthe na prayojaye’</quote>diti pūrvodāhṛtapūrvatantrādhi-
karaṇasiddhāntasūtroktanyāyena <quote>‘dharme cārthe ca kāme ca nāticaritavye’</quote>ti smṛteḥ kevalaṃ pu-
trārthamiva kevalaṃ dharmārthamapi dārasaṅgrahāyogācca । bhīṣmasya tu dharmaprajobhayārthe dārasaṅgrahe
nirvṛtta eva pitṛprītyarthamūrdhvaretasvapratijñayā putrotpādanānnivṛttau satyāṃ dārāṇāṃ dharmārtha-
<pb n="397"/>
vidyāvattvāvagamāt । kiṃtu svāśramadharmāpekṣā sā । teṣāmādhānādyanupapatteriti ।।
iti agnīndhanādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
atha sarvāpekṣādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। sarvāpekṣā ca yajñādiśruteraśvavat ।। 26 ।।</sutra>
pūrvādhikaraṇe nirūpitamantyāśramiṇāmanupapatterādhānādyanapekṣā vidyeti । tadiha
gṛhiṇāṃ vidyā tadapekṣā na veti saṃśayaḥ ।। evaṃ sati gṛhasthānāmapi vidyā'gnī-
ndhanādikarmānapekṣiṇīti brūmaḥ । tasya vyabhicāreṇa vidyāṅgatvānupapatteḥ । yattu
vimatā vidyā svāṅgabhūtakarmāpekṣā aṅgitvāt prayājādyapekṣadarśapūrṇamāsavat, itya-
numānam । tatrādhānādeḥ kīdṛśamaṅgatvaṃ sādhyam ? prayājādivat phalopakāritvaṃ vā,
avaghātādivat svarūpopakāritvaṃ vā । nādyaḥ । tajjanyatve mukteranityatvaṃ syāt ।
dvitīye sādhyavikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ । ato na vidyāṅgatvaṃ karmaṇaḥ । tasmāt gṛhiṇā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tvamātramavaśiṣṭamiti, tena yajñādyanuṣṭhānaṃ । na tūrdhvaretastvapratijñānantaraṃ kevalaṃ dharmārthadārasa-
ṅgraheṇa śrutismṛtisiddhāniketatvādisannyāsidharmaparyālocanayāpi na sannyāsino dārasaṅgra-
hādikamupapadyata iti bhāvaḥ । sannyāsinaḥ svāśramadharmāstriṣavaṇasnānasamadhikaśaucāṣṭagrā-
sādayaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti agnīndhanādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<head>atha sarvāpekṣādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। sarvāpekṣā ca yajñādiśrutiraśvavat ।। 26 ।।</pratika> sannyāsināmiva gṛhasthānāmaṣi
vidyā karmānapekṣeti pūrvapakṣotthānātsaṅgatiḥ । yajñādyabhāve'pi vidyādarśanāt yajñādiśruteśca
saṃśayaḥ । <pratika>vyabhicāreṇeti</pratika> । na ca ṣoḍaśigraharahitakratvapūrvāttatsahitakratvapūrvasyaiva karmara-
hitavidyātaḥ karmavadvidyāyā utkarṣaḥ kalpanīyaḥ mukterekarūpatvena । tatheha phalotkarṣaprayo-
jakasya sādhanotkarṣasya samarthayitumaśakyatvāt tadaprayojakasya vidyotkarṣasya saṃbhavato'-
pyanuddeśyatvāt muktiphalajananakṣamasya vidyāmātrasya sannyāsināmiva karmabhirvināpi saṃ-
bhave karmānuṣṭhānakleśāyogāditi bhāvaḥ । uktabhaṅgyā dūṣitamapyanumānaṃ prātisvikadoṣeṇa
dūṣayitumudbhāvayati---<pratika>yattviti । sādhyavikala iti</pratika> । <quote>‘nanvavaghātādyapekṣadarśapūrṇamāsa-
va’</quote>diti dṛṣṭāntopādāne sādhyavaikalyaṃ na bhaviṣyati । satyam । tathāpyāsanabandhaprāṇāyā-
mādibhiścittaikāgryasaṃpādanadvārā vidyāsvarūpanirvartakairarthāntaraṃ syāt । tasmādyajñādīnāṃ</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha agnīndhanādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ataevacāgnīndhanādyanapekṣa ।। 25 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>atyāśramiṇāpi satā vidyārthatvena kāryamādhānam । yajñādikarmaṇāṃ yadvidyāṅgatvaṃ samāmnātam ।। 301 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>nokāryametameva pravrājina iti vidhānabalāt । vidyārthameva karma tyaktavatassā hi na tadapekṣeta ।। 302 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti agnīndhanādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<pb n="398"/>
<p>mapi vidyā karmānapekṣeti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।। siddhāntastu---karmavatsu gṛhastheṣu vidyā'-
gnihotrādisarvakarmāpekṣā । <quote>‘yajñena dānena’</quote> iti śruteḥ, yajñādīnāṃ pārameśvaraniyo-
gasiddhatvācca । yathā'śvo gamanasādhanabhūto'pi svaparikarabandhāpekṣo gamane, tathā
vidyā'pīti । karmaṇaḥ phalābhisandhirahitatvena vidyāsvarūpopakāryaṅgatvānna tajjanyatvaṃ
mokṣaphalasya । kiṃtu sākṣāt jñānaphalameva mokṣaḥ । ato gṛhasthānāṃ yajñādisāpekṣā
vidyā । sarveṣāmāśramiṇāṃ svāśramavihitakarmāpekṣeti yuktaṃ vidyāyāḥ karmāpekṣatvam ।।
iti sarvāpekṣādhikaraṇam ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vidyāṅgatvāyogā<quote>‘dyajñene’</quote>tyādiśrutirvidyāstutyarthā । vartamānāpadeśatvāt । dṛśyate hyatadartha-
syāpi tādarthyavarṇanaṃ stutyarthaṃ । <quote>‘yajñārthaṃ paśavassṛṣṭā’</quote>ityādau । atassannyāsibhiriva gṛhasthai-
rapi vidyārthaṃ karma nānuṣṭheyamiti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>pārameśvaraniyogasiddhatvācceti ।</pratika> tathā ca para-
meśvaraḥ svaniyogānuvartanena prasannassannāprāyaṇamaharaharavicchedenānuṣṭheyāṃ vidyāṃ cittaikāgryā-
dipradānadvārā nirvartayediti vidyāsvarūpopakārakāṇi yajñādīnītyevaṃ yajñādiśruterarthavattva-
saṃbhave nānarthakamarthavādatvamāśrayaṇīyamiti bhāvaḥ । yajñādīnāṃ vidyāvyabhicāraṃ pariharati
---<pratika>sarvoṣāmāśramiṇāmiti ।</pratika> yasminnāśrame sthitvā yo vidyāmanutiṣṭhati tasya tadāśramadha-
rmairvidyāsvarūpopakāra iti niyame nāsti vyabhicāraḥ । <quote>‘tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vi-
vidiṣanti yajñena dānena’</quote>tyādiśruterapyatraiva tātparyam । tatra <quote>‘vedānuvacanene’</quote>ti brahmacāri-
dharmajātaṃ lakṣyate । adhyayanārthamupakrāntameva hi gurukulavāsamāprāyaṇamanuvartayennaiṣṭhikabra-
hmacārī । <quote>‘yajñena dānene’</quote>tyanena yajñadānapradhānaṃ gṛhasthadharmajātaṃ lakṣyate । <quote>‘tapase’</quote>tyanena
kṛcchracāndrāyaṇapañcāgnimadhyatapaścaryādipradhānaṃ vaikhānasadharmajātam । <quote>‘anāśakene’</quote>tyanena
anaśanaprāyāṣṭagrāsaniyamapradhānaṃ yatidharmajātaṃ lakṣyate । evamāśramadharmabhede'pi tadupakā-
ryavidyābhedo na prasajyate । <quote>‘yasya yāvatsvagṛhyoktaṃ bahu vā svalpameva vā । tasya tāvati
śāstrārthe kṛte sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhave’</quote>diti smṛtyuktarītyā varṇāśramakulaviśeṣādiprayuktapārameśvara-
niyogānuvartanasyaikarūpaphalatvopapatteriti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sarvāpekṣādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha sarvāpekṣādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। sarvāpekṣā ca yajñādiśruteraśvavat ।। 26 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>tarhyeva seti vidyā gṛhiṇāmapi na tadapekṣeta । ekasyāstadapekṣānapekṣatāyā viruddhatvāt ।। 303 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>yajñeneti śravaṇāttasyāḥ karma hyapekṣāsti । āśramabhidayā sā syādgamanasyāś‍va iva puṃbhidayā ।। 304 ।।</l></lg>

<pb n="399"/>
atha śamadamādyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
sū ।। śamadamādyupetaḥ syāttathā'pi tu tadvidhestadaṅgatayā teṣāmapyavaśyā-
nuṣṭheyatvāt ।। 27 ।।
<quote>‘śānto dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ samāhito bhūtvā''tmanyevātmānaṃ paśyet’</quote> <quote>‘śra-
ddhābhaktidhyānayogādavehi’</quote> ityādinā vidyāyāḥ śamādisaṃpattyapekṣā śrūyate ।
sā śamādisaṃpattirgṛhiṇāṃ saṃbhavati na veti saṃśayaḥ ।। yajñādimattayā bahuvyā-
pāravyākulānāṃ teṣāṃ taduparatirūpā śamadamādisaṃpattirna saṃbhavati iti prāpte
ucyate---gṛhastho vihitakarmavyāpṛto'pi niṣiddhakāmyādikarmasu vyāpārarahitaḥ
śamādyupetaḥ syāt <quote>‘śānto dāntaḥ’</quote> ityādinā <quote>‘śraddhābhaktidhyānayogādavehi’</quote>-
ityādinā ca śamādervihitatvāt, vidyāniṣpattaye tadaṅgatvena teṣāmavaśyā-
nuṣṭheyatvāt । āntarāṇāṃ rāgadveṣādīnāmanāvirbhūtiḥ śamaḥ । sarveṣāmindriyāṇā-
mavihitavyāpārebhyo nivartanaṃ damaḥ । niṣiddhakāmyakarmavyāpāroparama uparatiḥ ।
dvandvasahiṣṇutvaṃ titikṣā । visṛṣṭatandrādivyākṣepasya cittasya paratattvābhimukhyaṃ
samādhānam । apuruṣārthasakaletaraśāstraparāṅmukhī paravidyāmayaparamātmatantropani-
ṣadgoṣṭhīsamutkaṇṭhārūpā sattvakalā śraddhā । vinirmuktasakaletaradevatārādhanā tri-
vidhakaraṇasaṃpādyā viśiṣṭāṣṭāṅgayoginī paramaśivaparicaryāmayī vaidikī kriyā
bhaktiḥ । paramānandāveśamayamahāmokṣalakṣmīdarśanatvarā mumukṣā । aihikāmuṣmika-
sakalabhogaparāṅmusvatvarūpeṇa vairāgyeṇa nityānityavastunirdhāraṇākāreṇa vivekena
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha śamadamādyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। śamadamādyupetaḥ syāttathā'pi tu tadvidhestadaṅgatayā teṣāmapyavaśyānu-
ṣṭheyatvāt ।। 27 ।।</pratika> pūrvādhikaraṇe vidyāṅgatvena gṛhasthānuṣṭheyatayā vyavasthāpitairyajñādibhiḥ
śamādīnāṃ virodhāvirodhābhyāṃ saṃśayaḥ । śamādīnāṃ sarvavyāpāroparatirūpatayā yajñādibhi-
rvirodho'stīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । teṣāṃ tattadāśramavihitadehayātropayuktetaroparatirūpatayā nāsti
virodha iti siddhāntaḥ । vidyāvirodhināmantarindriyavyāpārāṇāmuparamaḥ śamaḥ । jñānendriya-
vyāpārāṇāmuparamo damaḥ । karmendriyavyāpārāṇāmuparama uparatiḥ । paramātmatantraṃ paramāptena
śivena praṇītaṃ sarvajñānottarādiśivaśāstram । tatra viśiṣṭāni bhakteraṣṭāṅgāni---<quote>‘madbhaktaja-
navātsalyaṃ pūjāyāñcānumodanam । svayamabhyarcanaṃ caiva madarthe cāṅgaceṣṭanam ।। matkathāśra-
vaṇe prītiḥ svaranetrāṅgavikriyā । mannāmakīrtanaṃ nityaṃ mayi kaitavavarjana’</quote>miti śivenaiva
nirūpitāni । <pratika>vaidikī kriyeti</pratika> । na tu tantroktaprakāreti bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘mumukṣurvai śaraṇamahaṃ
prapadye’</quote> ityādi śrutyuktādhikāriviśeṣaṇarūpāṃ mumukṣāmupāyamukhena saṃbhāvayati---<pratika>aihi-
keti ।</pratika> nityānityavastunirdhāraṇādanityeṣu viṣayeṣu vairāgyaṃ tataḥ śamādisampattyā mumu-
kṣeti kramaḥ ।। nanu <quote>‘yajñene’</quote>tyādiśrutivihitavidyāsādhanakarmānuṣṭhānaṃ vidyānuṣṭhānāraṃbhā-
tprāgiti <quote>‘vihitatvāccāśramakarmāpī’</quote> tyadhikaraṇe bhāṣyakāro vakṣyati । śamādikaṃtu
cittaikāgryadvārā vidyāsvarūpopakārakaṃ vidyānuṣṭhānāraṃbhaprabhṛtyanuṣṭheyam । ato yajñādeḥ
<pb n="400"/>
ca viśiṣṭasya śamādisaṃpattikrameṇa saṃbhavati mumukṣā । ete vivekādayo mumukṣā-
paryantāḥ paramadharmāḥ sarveṣāmāśramiṇāṃ vidyārthamaviśeṣeṇānuṣṭheyā iti ।।
iti śamadamādyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
atha sarvānnānumatyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। sarvānnānumatiśca prāṇātyaye taddarśanāt ।। 28 ।।</sutra>
prāṇavidyāyāṃ paṭhyate <quote>‘na ha vā evaṃvidi kiṃcanānannaṃ bhavati’</quote> iti । iha
prāṇavidyāniṣṭhasya sarvānnānumatiḥ pratīyate । tadeṣā yuktā na veti saṃśayaḥ ।। kiṃ
tāvat prāptam ? mānāntaraprāptasya bhojanasyāvidheyatvādiha sarvānnānumatiraprāptā
vidhīyate । iti prāpte samādhīyate । prāṇavidyāniṣṭhasyāpi sarvānnānumatirna sa-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śamādeśca virodhaśaṅkaiva nāstīti nedamadhikaraṇamāraṃbhaṇīyamiti cenmaivam । vidyāsādhanaṃ
karmasañjātamumukṣeṇā hi vidyopāyasampattidvārā vidyālābhārthamanuṣṭheyaṃ । tadānīmapi niṣi-
ddhakāmyarucivāsanānāṃ samūlonmūlanārtha śamādikamanuṣṭheyamiti virodhaśaṅkāvataraṇāt
vidyāraṃbhaprabhṛtyapi <quote>‘vidyāñcāvidyāñce’</quote>ti śrutivihitavidyāsahakārikarmānuṣṭhānasya vakṣyamā-
ṇatayā tena saha śamādervirodhaśaṅkāvataraṇācca ।।</p>
<head>iti śamadamādyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<head>atha sarvānnānumatyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। sarvānnānumatiśca prāṇātyaye taddarśanāt ।। 28 ।।</pratika> yajñādīnāṃ śamādīnāñca
brahmavidyāśeṣatvamuktam । tatprasaṅgātsarvānnānumateḥ prāṇavidyāśeṣatvamasti na veti vicā-
ryate । <quote>‘na havā’</quote> ityādividhistutyarthatvānavadhāraṇātsaṃśayaḥ । tatra pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । adanasya
rāgaprāptatve'pi tadāśritā sarvānnānumatiraprāptāprāṇavidyāṅgatvena vidhīyate । abhakṣyabhakṣaṇa-
niṣedhastu puruṣārthatvānna tāṃ kratvarthāmāskandati । uṣasticaritadarśanamapi na tasyā bādha-
kam । uṣasterbrahmavidaḥ prāṇavidyāniṣṭhatvābhāvāt । brahmavidaśca <quote>‘nāvirato duścaritā’</quote>diti
śrutyā sakalaniṣiddhavyāvṛtteruktatvāditi । siddhāntastu, prāṇavidyāniṣṭhasyāpi sarvānnānuma-
tiritarasādhāraṇyena prāṇātyaya eva । <quote>‘na havā evaṃvi’</quote>dityādikaṃ, tu <quote>‘yatkiñcididamā
śvabhya āśakunibhya’</quote> iti vihitasyāśvādikaṃ sarvamidaṃ prāṇasyānnamityanucintanasya
phalārthavādamātram ।। na cāpūrvatvātpravṛttiviśeṣakaratvācca tatra vidhiriti yuktam । vidhi-
vibhakteraśravaṇāt tatkalpane ca pratyakṣasya sāmānyaniṣedhaśāstrasyaparipanthitvāditi ava-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha śamadamādyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। śamadamādyupetaḥ syāttathāpi tu tadvidhestadaṅgatayā teṣāmapyavaśyānuṣṭheyatvāt ।। 27 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>evaṃ tarhi śamādervidhānamatyāśramiṣveva । syādvidyārthaṃ gṛhiṇāṃ yajñādivyāpṛtesyattvāt ।। 305 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>teṣāmapi sa vidhāturniṣiddhakāryādiviṣayeṣu । śakyastataścasakalo vidyārthīśamadamādyupetaḥ syāt ।। 306 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti śamadamādyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head><pb n="401"/>
rvadā, kiṃtu prāṇātyaya eva । adhikaśakteruṣasterbrahmavido'pi hi prāṇātyaya evo-
cchiṣṭabhakṣaṇādau śrutirdṛśyate---<quote>“maṭacīhateṣu kuruṣvāṭakyā saha jāyayā uṣastirha
cākrāyaṇa ibhyagrāme pradrāṇaka uvāsa । sa hebhyaṃ kulmāṣān svādantaṃ bibhikṣe ।
sa hovāca, neto'nye vidyante yacca ye ma imā upanihitā iti । eteṣāṃ me de-
hīti hovāca । tānasmai pradadau । hantānupānamiti । ucchiṣṭaṃ me pītaṃ syāditi
hovāca । na svidete'pyucchiṣṭā iti ? na vā ajīviṣyamimānakhādanniti ho-
vāca kāmo ma udapānam ।।”</quote> ‘ityādirūpā । ataḥ prāṇātyaya eva sarvānnānumatiḥ
paravidyāvato'pīti ।।
<sutra>sū ।। abādhācca ।। 29 ।।</sutra>
<quote>“āhāraśuddhau sattvaśuddhiḥ sattvaśuddhau dhruvā smṛtiḥ । smṛtilambhe sarvagranthīnāṃ
vipramokṣaḥ।।”</quote> ityāhāraśuddherabādhācca prāṇasaṃśaya eva sarvānnānumatiḥ ।।
<sutra>sū ।। api ca smaryate ।। 30 ।।</sutra>
prāṇasaṃśaya eva sarvānnānumatiḥ smaryate'pi---<quote>“prāṇasaṃśayamāpanno yo'nnamatti
yatastataḥ । lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatramivāmbhasā ।।”</quote>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dhāraṇārthena sautracakāreṇa sūcito'yaṃ vidhikalpanābādhako hetuḥ । <quote>‘prāṇavido'pi sarvā-
nnānumatiritaravatprāṇātyaya’</quote> eveti pratijñāyāṃ brahmavido'pyevaṃ kimuta prāṇavida iti kaimu-
tikanyāyahetvantarapradarśanārthaṃ <quote>‘taddarśanā’</quote>diti sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>adhikaśakterityā-
dinā ।</pratika> maṭacyaḥ śakuniviśeṣāḥ । tābhirhateṣu kuruṣu kurudeśasasyeṣu āṭakyā anupajāta-
stanādivyañjanayā jāyayā saha uṣastirha uṣastiriti nāmnā prasiddhaḥ ca cākrāyaṇaḥ cakra-
syāpatyam । ibhyagrāme ibhamarhataḥ hastyārohasya grāme pradrāṇakaḥ annālābhātkutsitāṃ gatiṃ
gataḥ atyantakaṣṭāvasthāṃ prāptassannuvāsa mārgavaśātkasmiṃściddivase uṣitavān । sa ha sa
kila kulmāṣān kutsitān māṣān jalapakvakullutthādikān vā khādantaṃ ibhyaṃ bibhikṣe ।
sa ha ibhyaḥ kila uvāca । ito'smānmayā bhakṣyamāṇāducchiṣṭakulmāṣarāśeranye kulmāṣā
na vidyante yacca ye yasmin rāśau me madarthamupanihitāḥ bhakṣaṇārthaṃ prakṣiptā ime kulmāṣā
ito'nye na vidyanta iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ । ityukta uṣastiruvāca । eteṣāṃ me dehi etā-
nmahyaṃ dehīti । tānasmā ṛṣaye pradadau । pānāya samīpasthamudakaṃ gṛhītvovāca । hanteti
harṣe । anupānaṃ idamanupānamapi gṛhāṇa ityukta ṛṣiḥ pratyuvāca ucchiṣṭaṃ vai me mayā pītaṃ
syāt yadīdamudakaṃ pibeyamityukta ibhyaḥ pratyuvāca na svidete'pyucchiṣṭāḥ kimete kulmāṣā
api nocchiṣṭā iti । evamukta uṣastiruvāca । navā ajīviṣyaṃ naiva jīviṣyāmīmāna-
svādan kāmo ma udapānam icchāto mamodakapānaṃ labhyata iti । evaṃ brahmavidye'pyatyanta-
kaṣṭāvasthāyāmupyananyalabhyasya kulmāṣamātrasyocchiṣṭasya grahaṇam anyalabhyasyodakasya
pariharaṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭamityanyeṣāṃ ca sarvānnānumatiratyantakaṣṭāvasthāyāmeveti kaimutikanyāyasi-
ddhamityupasaṃharati---<pratika>ata iti</pratika> ।। brahmavidanuṣṭhānenaiva brahmavidviṣayavacanenāpi kaimutika-
nyāyaḥ siddhyatītyāha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। abādhācca ।। 29 ।।</pratika> sattvaśuddhirantaḥkaraṇaśuddhiḥ । dhruvāsmṛtiḥ
nirantarasmṛtisantānarūpadhyānalābhaḥ ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।। api ca smaryate ।। 30 ।।</pratika> sarvasādhāraṇa-
<pb n="402"/>
<sutra>sū ।। śabdaścāto'kāmakāre ।। 31 ।।</sutra>
tasmāt <quote>‘brāhmaṇaḥ surāṃ na pibet’</quote> iti kāmakāranivṛttau śabdaśca bhavati । a-
taśca prāṇasaṃśaya eva viduṣo'pi sarvānnānumatiḥ । anyathā niṣiddhācaraṇena para-
meśvarasyādrohī syāditi bhāvaḥ ।।
iti sarvānnānumatyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।
atha āśramakarmādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। vihitatvāccāśramakarmāpi ।। 32 ।।</sutra>
vidyāhīnasya gṛhasthasyāśramakarma yajñādikaṃ <quote>‘yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhoti’</quote> iti
vihitatayā ca <quote>‘yajñena dānena’</quote> iti śrutervidyāsādhanatayā cānuṣṭheyamavagamyate ।।
<sutra>sū ।। sahakāritvena ca ।। 32 ।।</sutra>
vidyāvato'pi <quote>‘vidyāṃ cāvidyāṃ ca’</quote> iti śrutervidyāṅgatayā vihitatayā cānuṣṭhe-
yamavagamyate । tadiha vidyāhīnena vidyāvatā ca yajñādikaṃ vidyāyāssādhanatvena
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
smṛtibalādapyevamiti bhāvaḥ ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।। śabdaścāto'kāmakāre ।। 31 ।।</pratika> sarvānnānumati-
bādhanakṣamapratyakṣaśrutipradarśanārthamidaṃ sūtram । tasmā <quote>‘dbrāhmaṇaḥ surāṃ na pibe’</quote>diti śabdaḥ
kaṭhaśākhāyāṃ śrūyate । kāmakāranivṛttāviti prayojanasya nimittatvavivakṣayā saptamī ।
<pratika>ataśceti ।</pratika> sautraścakāro bhinnakramatayā yojitaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sarvānnānumatyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<head>atha āśramakarmādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। vihitatvāccāśramakarmāpi ।। 32 ।।</pratika> vidyānuṣṭhānāraṃbhātprāktadāraṃbhaprabhṛti ca
yajñādīnāṃ dviranuṣṭhānaṃ sakṛdveti vicāraṃ pravartayiṣyan vicāraprasañjakaṃ <quote>‘vihitatvā’</quote>dityādi-
sūtradvayena darśayati । yajñādikarmāśramakarmāpi bhavati । apiśabdādvidyāsādhanaṃ ca । <quote>‘yāva-
jjīvamagnihotraṃ juhotī’</quote>tyādi śrutyāśramadharmatvena vihitatvāt cakārā <quote>‘dyajñena dānene’</quote>-
tyādiśrutyā vidyāsādhanatvena bodhitatvāccetyasya sūtrasyārthaḥ ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।। sahakāritvena
ca ।। 33 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘vihitatvācce’</quote>tyanuvartate । vidyāraṃbhaprabhṛti yajñādikaṃ vidyāsahakāritvenānu-
ṣṭheyam cakārādāśramadharmatvenāpyanuṣṭheyam । <quote>‘vidyāñcāvidyāñce’</quote>ti śrutyā vidyāsahakāritvena
bodhitatvāt yāvajjīvādiśrutyāśramadharmatvena vihitatvāccetyarthaḥ । evaṃ mumukṣorvidyāraṃbhā-
tprāk vidyāraṃbhaprabhṛti ca yajñādiṣvadhikāradvitve siddhe saṃśayaṃ pravartayati---<pratika>tadiheti</pratika> ।</p>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha sarvānnānumatyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। sarvānnānumatiśca prāṇātyaye taddarśanāt ।। 28 ।। abādhācca ।। 29 ।। api ca smaryate ।। 30 ।।
śabdaścāto'kāmakāre ।। 31 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>prāṇavidassarvānnānumatau vidhirastyapūrvatvāt । sāmānyaniṣedhaḥ khalu saṃkucitaḥ syādviśeṣavidheḥ ।। 307 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>klṛptassāmānyavidhirviruddhavidhikalpanāṃ viśeṣe'pi । bādheta tatassā syāt prāṇātyayagocarā yathoṣasteḥ ।। 308 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti sarvānnānumatyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<pb n="403"/>
<p>aṅgatvena vihitatvena ca dviranuṣṭheyaṃ sakṛdanuṣṭheyaṃ veti saṃśaye satyubhayavidhibalāt
dviranuṣṭheyamiti prāpte siddhānta ucyate---
<sutra>sū ।। sarvathāpi ta evobhayaliṅgāt ।। 34 ।।</sutra>
ubhayatra viniyogenobhayākāratve'pi ta eva yajñādayaḥ, sarvatra pratyabhijñānāt ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kiṃ vidyāhīnena vidyāyāssādhanatvena vihitatvena ca dviranuṣṭheyam । vidyāvatā ca vidyāṅga-
tvena vihitatvena ca dviranuṣṭheyam uta vidyāhīnena vidyāvatā ca sakṛtsakṛdanuṣṭheyamiti
saṃśayaprakāraḥ । yadyāśramadharmarūpādyajñādervidyāsādhanaṃ yajñādikaṃ nityāgnihotrātkauṇḍapāyi-
nāmayanāgnihotramiva bhidyeta tadānīmāśramadharmarūpānmukhyādyajñādervidyāsādhanaṃ gauṇaṃ yajñā-
dikaṃ pṛthaganuṣṭheyamiti mukhyagauṇātmakasya yajñāderdviranuṣṭheyatvaṃ siddhyati । yadi <quote>‘yāvajjīva-
magnihotraṃ juhotī’</quote>ti śrutānnityāgnihotrāt <quote>‘agnihotraṃ juhuyātsvargakāma’</quote> iti śrutaṃ kā-
myāgnihotramiva na bhidyeta tadā kāmyaprayogānnityānuṣṭhānasiddhiriti prasaṅganyāyena yajñā-
dikaṃ sakṛdevānuṣṭheyaṃ siddhyati । ato'tra kiṃ nityāgnihotramāsāgnihotranyāyena bhedaḥ uta
nityāgnihotrakāmyāgnihotranyāyenābhedaḥ iti karmabhedābhyāmayaṃ saṃśayaḥ । tatra pūrvapakṣamāha
---<pratika>ubhayavidhibalāditi</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ---yuktamekasyaivāgnihotrasya nityatvena kāmyatvena
ca prayogabhedamātramiti yāvajjīvasvargakāmavākyayorekatraiva prakaraṇe śravaṇāt । <quote>‘yajñene’</quote>tyādi-
vākyasya <quote>‘vidyāñcāvidyāñce’</quote>ti vākyasya ca prakaraṇāntare śravaṇāt māsāgnihotranyāya eva
pravartate । na ca tatra <quote>‘juhotī’</quote>ti home vidhiḥ śrūyate । ato vihitasya vidhānāyogena vi-
hitātprasiddhāgnihotrahomādasya homasyānyatvasiddhau tatra vartamānaṃ nāma tatparatantraṃ satprasi-
ddhāgnihotrapratyabhijñāpakaṃ na bhavatīti tatra prakaraṇabhedātkarmāntaratvamastu । iha tathā yajñā-
diṣu vidhirna śrūyate । kintu vividiṣāyāmiti vācyam । atrāpīṣyamāṇavidyoddeśena ya-
jñādikaṃ vidheyamiti yajñādināmno vidheyaparatvenāgnihotranāmatulyatvāt । etena <quote>‘māsama-
gnihotraṃ juhotī’</quote>tyanupādeye kāle vidhisaṃkramāyogena homasyaiva vidheyatvaṃ vācyamiti vi-
hitasya vidhānāyogāttatra karmabheda iti nirastam । kālavatphalasyāpyanupādeyatvenātrāpi
yajñādereva vidheyatvasya vācyatvātprasiddhasya yajñādeḥ prāptatvena tasyāprāpto vidyāphalasaṃ-
bandho bodhayituṃ śakya ityetattu tatrāpi tulyam, prasiddhasyaivāgnihotrasya māsaguṇasambandho
bodhayituṃ śakyata iti । tasmādanupādeyasambandhe karmaṇa eva vidhyeyatvamiti māsāgnihotra-
nyāyasyehāpi tulyatvātprakaraṇāntarātkarmabhedaḥ syādeveti <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। sarvathāpi ta evobha-
yaliṅgāt ।। 34 ।।</pratika> ubhayaliṅgādityasyobhayatra karmaikye pratyabhijñānarūpālliṅgādityarthamāha
---<pratika>sarvatra pratyabhijñānāditi</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ---<quote>‘māsamagnihotraṃ juhotī’</quote>tyatra vidheyaṃ ka-
rmāgnihotrādanyadapi homarūpatayāvagamyata iti yuktam । tatrāgnihotraśabdasya sādhyasādṛ-
śyāvalambanayā gauṇyā vṛttyā vartanam । iha tu yajñādiśabdopāttaṃ karma yajñāderanyaccettatkiṃrū-
pamityavagantuṃ na śakyate । iṣṭipaśusomādirūpāṇāṃ yajñādīnāṃ madhye kena yajñādinā sādṛ-
śyamavalambya pravṛttayā gauṇyā vṛttyā yajñādiśabdavṛttirityapyavagantuṃ na śakyate । yajñā-
dināmnā dravyadevatādyatideśe sati devatoddeśyakadravyatyāgatvādirūpayajñādiśabdapravṛttini-
mittaprāpteranivāryatvena yajñādibhinnatvamapi vidheyasya karmaṇassamarthayituṃ na śakyate । ta-
smādiha yajñādiśabdānāṃ <quote>‘yajño'dhyayanaṃ dānamiti prathamaḥ, tapa eva dvitīyaḥ ।’</quote><quote>‘bhoktāraṃ
yajñatapasāṃ sarvalokamaheśvara’</quote>mityādiśrutismṛtiṣviva prasiddhayajñādiparatvameva yuktamiti ।।
<pb n="404"/>
evaṃ ca karmasvarūpaikye sati saṃyogapṛthaktvanyāyena na virodhaḥ । sakṛtprayoge'pi
vacanadvayabalena karmaṇa ekasyāpyākāradvayopapatteḥ । yathā <quote>‘svādiro yūpo bhavati---
khādiraṃ vīryakāmasya yūpaṃ kurvanti’</quote> ityatra vacanadvayabalena nityatvaṃ kāmyatvaṃ cai-
kasya khādiratvasya, tadvat । tato viduṣo'pyaviduṣo'pi vidyāṅgatayā vidyāhetu-
tayā vihitatayā ca sakṛdevānuṣṭheyaṃ yajñādikamiti ।।
<sutra>sū ।। anabhibhavaṃ ca darśayati ।। 35 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘dharmeṇa pāpamapanudati’</quote> iti śrutirvidyotpattipratibandhakaduritanivartanena vi-
dyāyā anabhibhavaṃ karmānuṣṭhānakāryaṃ ca darśayati । ato na pūrvoktavirodhaḥ ।।
ityāśramakarmādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nanvevamaikyapratyabhijñayā nityasyaiva yajñādeḥ kāmyatvenānityatvāṅgīkāre virodhaḥ syādityā-
śaṅkyāha---<pratika>saṃyogeti</pratika> । <quote>‘ekasya tūbhayatve saṃyogapṛthaktvaṃ’</quote>miti jaiminisūtroktanyāyassaṃ-
yogapṛthaktvanyāyaḥ । ekasyānuṣṭheyasya nityānityobhayarūpatve saṃyogapṛthaktvaṃ kāraṇamiti
tasya sūtrasyārthaḥ । siddharūpa ivānuṣṭheye vastuni nityatvānityatvayorna vastukṛto virodho-
'sti ṣoḍaśigrahakartavyatvākartavyatvayoriva । viniyojakapramāṇaikye śabdakṛto virodhaḥ
syāt । ekasya vākyasyobhayasambandhabodhakatvāsaṃbhavāt । so'pi nāsti । <quote>‘svādiro yūpaḥ’</quote>
<quote>‘svādiraṃ vīryakāmasye’</quote>tyādiviniyojakapramāṇabhedasadbhāvāditi tasya sūtrasyābhiprāyaḥ ।।
nanu karmaikye nityatvānityatvavirodhābhāve'pi nityārthaṃ phalārthaṃ ca dviḥprayogaḥ syādityā-
śaṅkyāha---<pratika>sakṛtprayoge'pīti</pratika> । karmaikyavatprayogaikye'pi sati na virodhaḥ kāmyānuṣṭhā-
nataḥ prasaṅgānnityārthasiddheriti bhāvaḥ । karmaikye pramāṇāntarasamuccayārthaṃ sūtram---<pratika>sū॰ ।।
anabhibhavaṃ ca darśayati ।। 35 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘kaṣāye karmabhiḥ pakve tato jñānaṃ pravartate’</quote>ityādibhiḥ
karmaṇāṃ vidyāsādhanatve vidyotpattipratibandhakaduritanivṛttirdvāramitītyavagatam । tadeva
cāśramadharmāṇāṃ kāryamiti <quote>‘dharmeṇa pāpamapanudatī’</quote>ti śrutirdarśayati---ato vidyāpekṣita-
dvārajanakatvena klṛptasyaiva karmaṇo vidyāsādhanatvaṃ yuktamityapīto'pi karmaikyamavasīyata
iti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>ato na pūrvokteti ।</pratika> evaṃ dṛḍhe karmaikye nityatvānityatvavirodhaḥ saṃyogapṛtha-
ktvanyāyenaiva pariharaṇīya iti bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘vidyāñcāvidyāñca yastadvedobhaym̐/?/saha । avi-
dyayā mṛtyuṃ tīrvā vidyayā'mṛtamaśnuta’</quote> iti mantrasyāyamarthaḥ---vidyāṃ brahmopāsanāṃ avidyāṃ
tatsahakārikarmavṛndaṃ ceti tadubhayaṃ yaḥ saha veda sahakārisahakāryabhāvena yugapadanuṣṭheyaṃ veda
sa vidvānaharaharanuṣṭhīyamānena tena karmaṇā mṛtyuṃ tīrvā vidyānuvṛttitadvaiśadyādipratibandha-
kaduritajātamabhibhūya vidyayā sākṣātkāraparyantayā muktiṃ prāpnotīti ।।</p>

<head>atha āśramakarmādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। vihitatvāccāśramakarmāpi ।। 32 ।। sahakāritvena ca ।। 33 ।। sarvathāpi ta evobhayaliṅgāt
