<lg><l>prāṅjñānānuṣṭhānāttadicchatā tadanutiṣṭhatā vāpi। karma dviranuṣṭheyaṃ sādhanasahakārinityabhāvena ।। 309 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>karmaikameva tāvadyajñādipratyabhijñānāt । karmaikye sati kāmyānuṣṭhānānnityasiddhiḥ syāt ।। 310 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti āśramakarmādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<pb n="405"/>
atha antarādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। antarā cāpi tu tadda‍ṛṣṭeḥ ।। 36 ।।</sutra>
uktamāśramiṇāṃ vidyā saṃpadyata iti । ihānāśramiṇāṃ vidyā saṃpadyate na veti
saṃdehaḥ ।। anāśramiṇaḥ snātakā vidhurāśca, teṣāṃ brahmavidyā na saṃbhavati, vidyāsā-
dhanabhūtānāmāśramadharmāṇāmabhāvāt ।। iti prāpte vadāmaḥ---raikvādiṣu vidyādarśa-
nādanāśramiṇāmapi vidyā saṃbhavatyeva ।। yaduktaṃ vidyāsādhanāśramadharmābhāvāditi,
tatrāha---
<sutra>sū ।। api ca smaryate ।। 37 ।।</sutra>
anāśramiṇāmapi japādinā vidyānugrahaḥ smaryate <quote>‘japyenaiva tu saṃsidhyedbrā-
hmaṇo nātra saṃśayaḥ । kuryādanyanna vā kuryānmaitro brāhmaṇa ucyate ।।’</quote> iti ।।
<sutra>sū ।। viśeṣānugrahaśca ।। 38 ।।</sutra>
āśramaniyatadharmaviśeṣeṇāpi vidyā'nugrahaḥ śrūyate । <quote>‘tapasā brahmacaryeṇa śra-
ddhayā vidyayā cātmānamanviṣya’</quote> iti ।।
<sutra>sū ।। atastvitarajjyāyo liṅgācca ।। 39 ।।</sutra>
anāśramitvāditaradāśramitvaṃ jyāyaḥ, dharmabhūyastvāt, ‘anāśramī na tiṣṭhettu
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>antarādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। antarā cāpi tu tadda‍ṛṣṭeḥ ।। 36 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘vihitatvāccāśramakarmāpī’</quote>tyāśramakarmaṇāṃ
vidyāsādhanatvaṃ vidyāsahakāritvaṃ coktam । tarhyanāśramiṇāmāśramakarmābhāvādvidyā na sampa-
dyata iti pūrvapakṣotthānātsaṅgatiḥ । anāśramiṇāṃ vidyāsādhanasahakārikarmāsaṃbhavasaṃbhavābhyāṃ
saṃśayaḥ । ye gurukulātsamāvṛttau satyāmakṛtadārasaṅgrahāḥ snātakāḥ ye ca mṛtapatnīkā
vidhurāḥ teṣāṃ vidyā na sampadyate <quote>‘vividiṣanti yajñene’</quote>tyādiśrutāvāśramadharmāṇāmeva vidyā-
sādhanatvena varṇitatvāt <quote>‘vidyāñcāvidyāñce’</quote>ti śrutāvavidyāśabdasyāpi tatsamānanyāyatve-
nāśramadharmaparatvāt āśramāniyatajapādimātreṇa teṣāṃ vidyānugrahāṅgīkāre bhūyasāmāśrama-
dharmāṇāmeva vidyāsādhanatvena vidhānasya vaiyarthyaprasaṅgāditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । āśramān antarā
vartamānānāmapi snātakavidhurāṇāṃ vidyā sampadyata eva । raikvādiṣu saṃvargavidyādidṛṣṭeriti
siddhāntaḥ ।। nanvanyārthadarśanarūpaliṅgamātraṃ na sādhakamiti pratipādakapramāṇapradarśanārthaṃ
sūtram---<pratika>sū॰ ।। api ca smaryate ।। 37 ।।</pratika> saṃsidhyet brahmavidyāṃ labhata ityarthaḥ । nira-
pekṣaprāpakapramāṇadarśanārthaṃ sūtram---<pratika>sū॰ ।। viśeṣānugrahaśca ।। 38 ।।</pratika> vidyārthaśramadha-
rmavidhivaiyarthyaparihārārthaṃ sūtram---<pratika>sū॰ ।। atastvitarajjyāyo liṅgācca ।। 39 ।। dharmabhūya-
stvāditi ।</pratika> tenābilambitā vidyotkarṣaprāptirlabhyata iti bhāvaḥ । liṅgādityetadvyācaṣṭe---
<pb n="406"/>
dinamekamapi dvijaḥ’ iti smṛteśca । evamanāśramitvādāśramitvaṃ varameva; tathā'pyā-
padviṣaye'nāśramiṇāmapi japyādisādhanena vidyā saṃpadyata eveti ।।
iti antarādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।
atha tadbha‍ūtādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। tadbha‍ūtasya tū nātadbhāvo jaiminerapi niyamāttadrūpābhāvebhyaḥ ।। 40 ।।</sutra>
ihordhvaretasāṃ pūrvāśramāvaroho'sti na veti saṃdehaḥ । <quote>‘brahmacaryaṃ samāpya gṛhī
bhavet gṛhādvā vanī bhūtvā pravrajet’</quote> ityāśramāroho yatha svecchādhīnastathā'varo-
ho'pi ।। iti prāpte siddhāntayāmaḥ---naiṣṭhikādibhūtasyātadbhāvaḥ tataḥ pracyutirna
saṃbhavati । kutaḥ ? niyamāt tadrūpābhāvebhyaḥ । niyacchanti hi <quote>‘atyantamātmānamā-
cāryakule'vasādayan’</quote> iti । <quote>‘araṇyamiyāt tato na punareyāt’</quote> iti <quote>‘saṃnyasyā-
gnīn na punarāvartayet’</quote> iti ca śāstrāṇi niyacchanti । na cāroharūpaśāstravadava-
roharūpaśāstrāṇi santi । atasteṣāmapracyutiniyamaśruteḥ pracyutau śrutyādyabhāvācca
na teṣāṃ vidyā'dhikāraḥ । jaiminerapyevameva matam ।। ārūḍhapatitasya prāyaścittā-
dinā vidyā'dhikāro nāstītyāha---
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>anāśramīti । āpadviṣaya iti</pratika> । āśramāntaraprāptyupāyāsaṃpattiviṣaya ityarthaḥ ।।
iti antarādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।
atha tadbha‍ūtādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।
<pratika>sū ।। tadbha‍ūtasya tu nātadbhāvo jaiminerapi niyamāttadrūpābhāvebhyaḥ ।। 40 ।।</pratika> ū-
rdhvaretasāmāśramaṃ prāpya punardāraparigrahaṃ kṛtavatāṃ vidyādhikāro'sti na veti vidyādhikāra-
viśeṣaṇabhūtaśāstrāparyudāsasampattyasaṃpattibhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvapakṣeḥ । āśramāṇāmārohavadavaro-
ho'pyastu nāma vṛkṣāṇāmiva । tataśca dāraparigraheṇa gārhasthye sati vidyāṅgakarmabhūyastva-
mapi labhyata iti <quote>‘atastvitarajjyāyo liṅgācce’</quote>ti nyāyaḥ pravarteta । yadi tu <quote>‘brahmacaryaṃ samāpya
gṛhī bhave’</quote>diti kramasyoktatvāt vyutkre gṛhasthāśramaprāptirna syāt tadānīṃ teṣāṃ svāśrama-
pracyutānāmanāśramitve'<quote>‘pyantarā cāpi tu tadda‍ṛṣṭeriti’</quote> nyāyaḥ pravarteta । tasmādubhayathāpi
teṣāṃ vidyādhikāro'stīti । neti siddhāntaḥ । yatastadbha‍ūtasya ūrdhvaretasāmāśramaṃ prāptasya
nātadbhāvaḥ tadāśramaparityāgo nāsti । <quote>‘atyantamātmāna’</quote>mityādiśāstraistathā niyamanāt
atadrūpāpattau śāstrābhāvācca । tathā ca niyamollaṅghanena śāstraparyudastānāṃ nāsti vidyā-
dhikāra iti ।। nanu tarhyavaruhya kṛtaprāyaścittānāṃ tatrādhikāro'stvityāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ</p>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha antarādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। antarā cāpi tu tadda‍ṛṣṭeḥ ।। 36 ।। api ca smaryate ।। 37 ।। viśeṣānugrahaśca ।। 38 ।। ata-
stvitarajjyāyo liṅgācca ।। 39 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>vidyāyāmadhikāro vidurādernāstyanāśramiṇaḥ । vidyārthasyābhāvādāśramadharmasya kasyāpi ।। 311 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>raikvādiṣu tadda‍ṛṣṭerasti tu tasyāpi tadadhikṛtiḥ । tadanugrahaśca yukto japaiśca sāmānyadharmaiśca ।। 312 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti antarādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<pb n="407"/>
<p><sutra>sū ।। na cādhikārikamapi patanānumānāttadayogāt ।। 41 ।।</sutra>
yadavakīrṇino gardabhapaśvālambhanam <quote>‘avakīrṇipaśuśca tadvat’</quote> ityadhikārilakṣa-
ṇoktaṃ prāyaścittaṃ, tadapyārūḍhapatitasya na saṃbhavati---<quote>‘ārūḍho naiṣṭhikaṃ dharmaṃ yastu
pracyavate naraḥ । prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmi yena śuddhyetsa ātmahā ।।’</quote> iti tasya
prāyaścittānadhikārasmṛtestadasaṃbhavāt ।।
<sutra>sū ।। upapūrvamapītyeke bhāvamaśanavattaduktam ।। 42 ।।</sutra>
upapātakatvāt prāyaścittamapyeke manyante, madhvaśanaprāyaścittavat । taduktam---
<quote>‘uttareṣāṃ caitadavirodhi’</quote> iti । upakurvāṇasya yaduktaṃ tat svāśramāvirodhyanyeṣāma-
pyāśramiṇāṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ ।।
<sutra>sū ।। bahistūbhayathā'pi smṛterācārācca ।। 43 ।।</sutra>
upapātakatve mahāpātakatve'pi karmādhikārādibahiṣkṛtā ete, ‘prāyaścittaṃ na
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>sūtram ।। sū॰ ।। na cādhikārikamapi patanānumānāttadayogāt ।। 41 ।।</pratika> avakī-
rṇipaśuśca tadvaditi । pūrvatantre adhikārādhyāye yadadhikaraṇaṃ tatrāvakīrṇiprāyaścittarūpa-
paśubandhaprakāraścintitaḥ । avakīrṇipaśuḥ sthapatīṣṭivallaukikāgnau kartavyaḥ niṣādasthapate-
riva brahmacāriṇo'pyādhānāsaṃbhavāditi । evaṃbhūtaṃ prāyaścittamapi teṣāṃ nāsti । <quote>‘ārūḍho
naiṣṭhikaṃ dharma’</quote>miti vratabhraṣṭānāṃ patitatvasmaraṇena prāyaścittānarhatvādityarthaḥ । ato'vakī-
rṇiprāyaścittasmaraṇamupakurvāṇabrahmacāriviṣayamiti bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। upapūrvamapītyeke bhā-
vamaśanavattaduktam ।। 42 ।।</pratika> eke ācāryāḥ naiṣṭhikādīnāṃ brahmacaryapracyavanamupapātakaṃ na
tu mahāpātakaṃ teṣvaparigaṇanāditi manyamānā madhvaśanasyeva prāyaścittasadbhāvaṃ manyante ।
tathaiva smṛtāvuktamityarthaḥ । gautamasmṛtau upanayanādirniyama ityārabhyopakurvāṇasya niya-
mānvidhāyātidiṣṭam <quote>‘uttareṣāṃ caitadavirodhī’</quote>ti । upakurvāṇasya yāvanniyamajātamuktaṃ tatra
yaduttareṣāmāśramāṇāṃ virodhi yathā gṛhasthasya bhaikṣacaraṇaṃ sannyāsino'gnīndhanamityādi ta-
tparityajyānyatsarvaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ । evañcopakurvāṇasyoktaṃ gardabhapaśvālambhanaṃ naiṣṭhikasyāpi
bhavati । vānaprasthasannyāsinostu kṛcchracāndrāyaṇādikaṃ viśiṣya vihitaṃ prāyaścittaṃ bha-
vati । yattu <quote>‘prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmī’</quote>ti smaraṇaṃ tadda‍urbalam । vilambitatvāt । adarśanena hi
prāyaścittābhāvo'numeyaḥ । tena niṣedhaśrutiḥ kalpanīyeti । atastatsmaraṇaṃ prāyaścittagaura-
vakhyāpanārthamiti na tadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ ।। evaṃ ca kṛtaprāyaścittānāṃ teṣāṃ vidyādhikā-
ro'stviti śaṅkāsūtrametat---<pratika>sū॰ ।। bahistūbhayathāpi smṛterācārācca ।। 43 ।।</pratika> pā-
pānāṃ dve śaktī । iha karmādhikāraśiṣṭasaṃsargavirodhinī paratra narakāpādinī ca । naiṣṭhikānāṃ
prāyaścittasadbhāve'pi tena paratra narakāpādinyava pāpaśaktirhīyate na tviha pratyāpattyāpā-
<pb n="408"/>
paśyāmi yena śuddhyet sa ātmahā’ iti smṛteḥ, śiṣṭabahiṣkārācca । ataḥ sarva-
thaivārūḍhapatitānāṃ na vidyā'dhikāraḥ ।।
iti tadbha‍ūtādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।
atha svāmyadhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। svāminaḥ phalaśruterityātreyaḥ ।। 44 ।।</sutra>
uktamudgīthādyupāsanam । tadanuṣṭhānaṃ yajamānasya, uta ṛtvijāmiti saṃśayaḥ ।।
kiṃ prāptam ? udgīthādyupāsanaṃ yajamānasyaivānuṣṭheyam, tasyaiva vīryavattaratvaphalaśrava-
ṇāt, nartvijāmityātreyamatam ।। siddhānta ucyate---
<sutra>sū ।। ārtvijyamityauḍulomistasmai hi parikriyate ।। 45 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘evaṃvidudgātā brūyāt’</quote> iti vākyaśeṣe udgāturupāsakatvaṃ sphuṭaṃ śrūyate । ā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dinī । <quote>‘nāsyāsmil‍m̐loke pratyāpattirvidyate kalmaṣaṃ tu nirhaṇyate’</quote> <quote>‘prāyaścittairapaityeno yada-
jñānakṛtaṃ bhavet । kāmato vyavahāryastu vacanādiha jāyata’</quote>ityādismaraṇāt । ataḥ <quote>‘prāya-
ścittaṃ na paśyāmī’</quote>tyādismaraṇamapyaihikapratyāpattyāpādakaprāyaścittābhiprāyamiti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti tadbha‍ūtādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<head>atha svāmyadhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। svāminaḥ phalaśruterityātreyaḥ ।। 44 ।।</pratika> upāsanānuṣṭhātṛvicāraprasaṅgāgatamidama-
dhikaraṇam ।। phalasya kartṛgāmitvāt ṛtvikparikrayācca saṃśayaḥ । <pratika>tasyaiveti</pratika> । ṛtvikpari-
krayasyāṅgānuṣṭhānārthatvāt pṛthakphalavadupāsanaṃ pradhānamiti phalārthinā yajamānenaivopāsanaṃ
kāryaṃ godohanādeḥ pṛthakphalatve'pi ṛtvikkartṛkapraṇayanādityāśritasya pṛthakkṛtya yajamāne-
nopādātumaśakyatvāt na yājamānatvam । upāsanānāṃ tu kriyārūpāṇāmudgīthādibhyaḥ
pṛthakkṛtya yajamānena kartuṃ śakyatvāt pradhānatvācca yājamānatvameva yuktam । audgātrasamā-
khyādikaṃ tu <quote>‘śāstraphalaṃ prayoktarī’</quote>ti nyāyavirodhānnādaraṇīyamiti bhāvaḥ<pratika>।। sū॰ ।।
ārtvijyamityauḍulomistasmai hi parikriyate ।। 45 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘evaṃvidudgātā brūyāt । kaṃ te
kāmamāgāyānītyeṣa hyeva kāmāgānasyeṣṭe ya evaṃvidvāntsāma gāyatī’</quote>ti । <quote>‘ya eṣo'ntarā-
ditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣo dṛśyata’</quote> ityādyudgīthavidyāprakaraṇe śrūyate । evaṃvidantarāditye'ntara-</p>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha tadbha‍ūtādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। tadbha‍ūtasya tu nātadbhāvo jaiminerapi niyamāttadrūpābhāvebhyaḥ ।। 40 ।। nacādhikārikamapi
patanānumānāttadayogāt ।। 41 ।। upapūrvamapītyeke bhāvamaśanavattaduktam ।। 42 ।। bahistūbhayathāpi

<lg><l>ārohavadavarohānumatyabhāve'pi cāśramiṇām । avaruhya kṛtaniṣkṛtiradhikārī bhavatu vidyāyām ।। 313 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>patitasyāsya na niṣkṛtirasti tu yadi copapātakatvena । vidyādhikārabāhyasmṛtyācārāttathāpyeṣaḥ ।। 314 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti tadbha‍ūtādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<pb n="409"/>
<p>rtvijyameva tadanuṣṭhānamityauḍulomimatam । kathamanyakartṛkamanyagāmiphalaṃ syāditi
cet, ṛtvijāṃ karmasvarūpavadaśeṣāṅgānuṣṭhānāya yajamānena krītatvāt । sāṅgakarmā-
nuṣṭhānāya hi ṛtvijo yajamānena parikriyante । tasmādṛtvikka‍ṛtaṃ yajamānakṛtame-
veti, phalaṃ ca tasya svāmina eveti na virodhaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti svāmyadhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p>kṣiṇi copadiṣṭaṃ parameśvarasvarūpaṃ sarvapāpoditatvādidharmaiḥ devalokakāmāvāptimanuṣyalokakā-
māvāptirūpaphalābhyāṃ ca saha vidvānudgātā yajamānaṃ prati brūyāt । kiṃ te kāmamaihikamāmu-
ṣmikaṃ vā kiṃ phalamuddiśya āgāyāni tatphalānukūlopāsanāsahitaṃ gānaṃ karavāṇīti ।
hi yasmādeva evodgātā kāmāgānasyābhimataphalasādhanopāsanāsahitagānasyeṣṭe । kaḥ । ya evaṃ-
vidvān adhidaivatādhyātmopadiṣṭaparameśvarasvarūpaṃ vidvān sāma gāyatītyarthaḥ । atrodgātṛ-
kartṛkameva vedanamiti spaṣṭam । evaṃ <quote>‘yadeva vidyā karoti’</quote> <quote>‘ya etadevaṃvidvān sāma gāya-
tyubhau sa gāyatī’</quote>tyādikamapyudāharaṇam । na ca yāgadānādīnāṃ phalavatāṃ yajamānakartṛ-
katve prādhānyaṃ prayojakam । kiṃ tu yajamānasya dravye svatvatyāgo nānyena kartuṃ śakya
ityetatprayojakam । ata evāṅgatve'pi dakṣiṇādānaṃ yājamānam । evaṃ ca yadṛtvigbhiḥ
kārayituṃ śakyaṃ tasya sarvasyāpyarthe ṛtvijāṃ parikrītatvādaudgātrādisamākhyānusārācca
udgīthādyupāsanamudgātrādibhireva kartavyam । tadidaṃ hetvantaraṃ <quote>‘tasmai hi parikriyata’</quote> iti
sūtraśeṣeṇa kaṇṭhoktam । tatsūtraśeṣaṃ śaṃkottaratvenāpi yojayati---<pratika>kathamanyakartṛkamiti</pratika> ।
‘sāṅgakarmānuṣṭhānāyetyanena pradhānyaṃ yajamānakartṛkatve prayojakaṃ na bhavati । parikrayasya
dṛṣṭārthatvāya sarvamapi ṛtvigbhireva kartavyamityussargo darśitaḥ । ata eva <quote>‘nirdeśācche-
ṣabhakṣo'nyaiḥ pradhānava’</quote>diti pūrvatantrādhikaraṇe śaṃyuvākakālakartavyaṃ haviśśeṣabhakṣaṇaṃ
ṛtvigbhyo'nyaiḥ kartavyam । sarveṣvapi bhakṣaṇeṣu ṛtvigyajamānakartavyatvena prāpteṣu <quote>‘yajamā-
napañcamā iḍāṃ bhakṣayantī’</quote>ti tairiḍābhakṣaṇameva kāryamiti parisaṃkhyātatvāditi pūrvapakṣaṃ
kṛtvā tadvacanamṛtvijāṃ bhakṣaṇāntaranivṛttyarthaṃ na bhavati । kiṃ tu sarvatrāpi prayoge kartṛ-
tvena prāptānāmṛtvijāmeveḍābhakṣaṇamiti yajamānasyāprāptau tatprāptyartham । ataḥ śaṃyuvāka-
kālabhakṣaṇamṛtvigbhiḥ kartavyamiti siddhāntitam । evaṃ yatra vacanena yājamānasamākhyayā
nyāyena vā yajamānasya kartṛtvaṃ prāpnoti tatraivotsargasyāpavādaḥ । anyatra sarvatra ṛtvi-
jāmeva kartṛtvamityudgīthādyupāsanāsvapi tathaiveti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>

atha sahakāryantaravidhyadhikaraṇam ।। 93 ।।
<sutra>su ।। sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyaṃ tadvatī vidhyādivat ।। 46 ।।</sutra>
kaholabrāhmaṇe śrūyate---<quote>‘tasmādbrāhmaṇaḥ pāṇḍityaṃ nirvidya bālyena tiṣṭhāset

reṇāvatiṣṭheta । tataḥ pāṇḍityabālye niśśeṣaṃ saṃpādyātha muniḥ iti । atra pā-
ṇḍityabālyavanmaunamapi vidhīyate na vā । iti saṃśaye munirityatra bhavedityādi-
vidhiprayogābhāvānna vidhīyate ।। iti prāpte'bhidhīyate---vidyāvato yajñādivat
pāṇḍityabālyayostṛtīyaṃ sahakāryantaraṃ maunaṃ vidhīyata eva, prakṛṣṭamananaśīle mu-

<head>atha sahakāryantaravidhyadhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyaṃ tadvato vidhyādivat ।। 46 ।।</pratika> yajñā-
dīnāṃ śamādīnāṃ ca vidyāsahakāriṇāṃ nirūpaṇānantaraṃ saṃgativiśeṣaprāptāṃ sarvānnānumatyā-
dicintāṃ kṛtvā punarapi vidyāyāmeva sahakāryantaraṃ nirūpyata iti saṃgatiḥ । rāgaprāptatvena
śravaṇamananayoravidheyatvasya prathamādhikaraṇabhāṣye nirūpitatvādiha tayorvidhiśravaṇaṃ tena
virudhyetetyāśaṅkya pāṇḍityabālyaśabdayorarthāntaramāha---<pratika>bahūpaniṣaditi</pratika> । ūhāpohakṣa-
mādiḥ paṇḍā sāsya sañjāteti paṇḍitaḥ tasya karma pāṇḍityaṃ śravaṇamananānantaraṃ tadabhyāsa-
pāṭavavaśāllabdhayā ūhāpohakṣamayā navanavonmeṣaśālinya pratibhayā śrutamatārthānukūlyena
sakalopaniṣattātparyapratiṣṭhāpanaṃ pāṇḍityaṃ tadanukūlapratibhāśaktau satyāmapi bālavadrāgadveṣa-
svamāhātmyaprakhyāpanāhaṃkārādirāhityaṃ bālyaṃ tadubhayaṃ śravaṇamananānantarabhāvividyāsaha-
kāritvena vidheyamiti sampratipannameva । iha punaratha munirityuktaṃ tṛtīyamapi sahakāryantaraṃ
vidhīyate na veti vidhyarhatvānarhatvābhyāṃ saṃśaye śravaṇamananabālyapāṇḍityebhyo'nyasya vi-
dhyarhasya kasyacidadarśanādvidhiśabdāśravaṇācca na vidhīyate kiṃ tu mananamevānūdyata iti
prāpte sautrapadāni vyācakṣāṇa eva siddhāntayati---<pratika>vidyāvata iti</pratika> । tadvata ityasya vyā-
khyānamidam ।<quote>‘vidhyādiva’</quote>dityasya vyākhyānaṃ---<pratika>yajñādivaditi । vidhīyata iti</pratika> ।
vidhiryajñādiḥ śamādiśca । ādiśabdena vidhisarūpavākyābhyāmanūditaṃ śravaṇaṃ mananaṃ ca
gṛhyate । tṛtīyaśabdasyāvadhyapekṣāpūraṇaṃ <pratika>pāṇḍityabālyayoriti</pratika> । tṛtīyaśabdasāmānā-
dhikaraṇyena sahakāryantaravidhipadavyākhyānam---<pratika>sahakāryantaramiti</pratika> । vidhīyata iti
vidhiḥ । sahakāryantaraṃ cāsau vidhiśceti samānādhikaraṇasamāsa iti bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘pakṣeṇe’</quote>ti
padaṃ sādhyāhāraṃ vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>prakṛṣṭeti</pratika> । mananamātraṃ na muniśabdasya pravṛttinimittaṃ kiṃ tu
prakṛṣṭaṃ mananam । prakarṣaśca mananasya snehapūrvakatayā ciravirahitāyā nāyikāyāḥ nāyaka-
viṣayasyeva nirantaramanuvartamānatvarūpa iha pakṣeṇetyanenādhyāhāryapadayuktena vivakṣita iti
bhāvaḥ । tamevaṃ prakarṣaṃ darśayati---<pratika>vidyāniṣpattyarthamiti</pratika> । yasyopāsanānuṣṭhānakālavyati-
riktakāleṣvapi gacchatastiṣṭhataḥ śayānasya vā upāsyaviṣayā cintānuvartate । tasyaivopā-
<pb n="411"/>
tiṣṭhāsediti padānuvṛttyā vidhīyate । tato maunavidhiḥ saṃbhavati vidyāvata iti ।।
iti sahakāryantaravidhyadhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।
atha kṛtsnabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। kṛtsnabhāvāttu gṛhiṇopasaṃhāraḥ ।। 47 ।।</sutra>
iha sarveṣāmāśramāṇāṃ vidyā sādhāraṇī, uta viśeṣo'stīti saṃśayaḥ ।। brahma-
cāriṇo vedābhyāse ācāryaparavaśatvāt gṛhasthasya kuṭumbabharaṇāyāsitvāt vana-
sthasya vaikhānasadharmavyāpṛtatvānna teṣāṃ jñānadhyāne saṃbhavataḥ । <quote>‘vedāntavijñānasu-
niścitārthāssannyāsayogādyatayaśśuddhasattvā’</quote> iti vedāntārthajñānavatāṃ sannyāsa-
yogaśravaṇāt <quote>‘antyāśramasthaḥ’</quote> iti dhyānavidhau darśanāccāntyāśramiṇāmeva jñāna-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
sanākāle'pi tadviṣayacittaikāgryādvidyā dṛḍhībhavati । yasya tūpāsanākāle yathākathaṃci-
dvidyānuṣṭhāne'pi samayāntareṣu cintāntarāveśaḥ tasyopāsanānuṣṭhānakāle'pi cetasi sama-
yāntaracintitaviṣayāntarānupraveśādvidyā na dṛḍhībhavedityupāsyaviṣayābhyāso'pi vidyā-
sahakārītyevaṃrūpaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ mananameva <quote>‘atha muni’</quote>rityatra vidhīyate । śravaṇapratiṣṭhārthasya manana-
mātrasya prāgeva nirvṛttatvena tatrāthaśabdānanvayā<quote>‘ttiṣṭhāse’</quote>diti padānuvṛttyā mananasya vidhe-
yatvasaṃbhavācceti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sahakāryantaravidhyadhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</head>
<head>atha kṛtsnabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। kṛts‍nabhāvāttu gṛhiṇoṣasaṃhāraḥ ।। 47 ।।</pratika> yadi vidyādārḍhyārthamupāsakānāṃ
cetasassarvadopāsyaprāvaṇyena bhāvyaṃ tarhi sannyāsināmeva vidyāsvadhikāraḥ syāt netareṣāmiti
pūrvapakṣotthānātsaṅgatiḥ । itareṣāṃ sārvadikopāsyaprāvaṇyasaṃbhavāsaṃbhavābhyāṃ saṃśayaḥ । itareṣāṃ
tattadāśramavihitakarmānuṣṭhānavaiyagryamāvaśyakamiti tadasaṃbhavena pūrvapakṣaḥ । sannyāsayogā-
dityādiśravaṇaṃ ca tadupodbalakam । <quote>‘atyāśramasthaḥ sakalendriyāṇi nirudhya bhaktyā svaguruṃ
praṇamye’</quote>ti kaivalyopaniṣatpāṭhaḥ prasiddhaḥ । na <quote>‘tvantyāśramastha’</quote> iti । atyāśramasthastu <quote>‘agni-
rityādibhirmantrairbhasmanoddha‍ūlanaṃ tathā । tripuṇḍradhāraṇaṃ caiva vadantyatyāśramaṃ budhā’</quote> iti purā-
ṇoktalakṣaṇassarvāśramasādhāraṇaḥ । tasmā<quote>‘dantyāśramastha’</quote> iti dhyānavidhau <quote>‘darśanācce’</quote>ti</p>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha sahakāryantaravidhyadhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyaṃ tadvato vidhyādivat ।। 46 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>atha munirityatra vidheraśravaṇād jñānamavidheyam । pāṇḍityaśabditaṃ yajjñānaṃ vihitaṃ tadanuvākyam ।। 317 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>pāṇḍityādyanuviditaṃ prakṛṣṭamananātmakaṃ maunam । dhyāne tadakāleṣvapi sahaśīlanamambikāsahāyasva ।। 318 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>pāṇḍityabālyayostu tṛtīyamadhikāriṇo...ṣaḥ । vidyāsahakāritayā yajñādikavadvidheyamiha maunam ।। 399 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti sahakāryantaravidhyadhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</head>
<pb n="412"/>
<p>dhyāne, nāpareṣāmiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।। sarveṣvāśrameṣu vidyā saṃbhavatyeva । chāndogye
<quote>‘kuṭumbe śucau deśā svādhyāyamadhīyānaḥ’</quote> ityārabhya <quote>‘sa khalvevaṃ vartayan yāvadāyuṣaṃ
brahmalokamabhisaṃpadyate na ca punarāvartate’</quote> iti kṛts‍nāśrameṣu vidyāsadbhāvapradarśa-
nāt । tatra gṛhiṇopasaṃhāraḥ sarveṣāṃ pradarśanārthaḥ । evamantyāśramavacanamapi sarve-
ṣāmāśramāṇāṃ pradarśanārtham । ataḥ sarveṣāmāśramiṇāṃ vidyā'styeva । phalatyāgaḥ
sannyāsaḥ । yatitvaṃ jitendriyatvam । sarvamidaṃ sarveṣāṃ saṃbhavatyeva ।।
iti kṛtsnabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।
atha maunavadadhikaraṇam ।। 15 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। maunavaditareṣāmapyupadeśāt ।। 48 ।।</sutra>
atharvaśirasi śrūyate---‘tṛṣṇāṃ chittvā hetujālasya mūlaṃ buddha‍yā saṃcintya sthā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
bhāṣyaṃ śākhāntarapāṭhābhiprāyaṃ draṣṭavyam । evañcāśramadharmāṇāṃ vidyāsādhanatvavacanāni vi-
dyārambhaprākkālānuṣṭheyakarmaviṣayāṇi na tu vidyārambhaprabhṛtyanuṣṭheyakarmaviṣayāṇyapīti pūrvapakṣā-
bhiprāyaḥ ।। nanu chāndogye gṛhiṇāmeva phaladvārā vidyāsadbhāvaḥ pradarśito na tu naiṣṭhikavai-
khānasayorityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>tatra hīti</pratika> । yajñādibahuvyāpāravyagreṇa gṛhiṇopasaṃhāraḥ kaimu-
tikanyānena sarveṣāṃ pradarśanārthaḥ । sarveṣvāśrameṣu mumukṣādividyādhikāriviśeṣaṇasaṃbhavena
vidyādhikārasadbhāvāt sarveṣāmāśramiṇāṃ svasvāśramavihitakarmānuṣṭhānārthavaiyagryagrastakāla-
vyatiriktakāleṣūpāsyaviṣayacetassamādhānasaṃbhavācca karmānuṣṭhānavaiyagryasya cetassamādhā-
navirodhiduritanivṛttyarthatvena tasyopāsanākālapekṣitacetassamādhānavirodhitvāprasaṅgācceti
bhāvaḥ । <pratika>evamantyāśramavacanamapīti</pratika> । yathā <quote>‘jāyamāno vai brāhmaṇastribhirṛṇavā jāyate ।
tasmādbrāhmaṇaḥ pāṇḍityaṃ nirvidya tamevaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣantī’</quote>tyādiṣu brāhma-
ṇagrahaṇamadhikāriviśeṣavattvāviśeṣāt kṣatriyavaiśyayorapyupalakṣaṇam । evamihāpīti bhāvaḥ ।
<quote>‘sannyāsayogādyataya’</quote>ityatra tu nāśramāntaravyavacchedaśaṅketyāha---<pratika>phalatyāga iti</pratika> । <quote>‘kā-
myānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nyāsaṃ sannyāsaṃ kavayo vidu’</quote>riti gītāvacanāt । <quote>‘ye nirjitendriyagrāmā
yatino yatayaśca ta’</quote> iti kośakāravacanācceti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti kṛtsnabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।</head>
<head>atha maunavadadhikaraṇam ।। 15 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। maunavaditareṣāmapyupadeśāt ।। 48 ।।</pratika> dvividhamatyāśramākhyaṃ pāśupatavratam
ekamatharvaśiraḥkālāgnirudropaniṣadādiṣu śrutaṃ bhasmoddha‍ūlanatripuṇḍradhāraṇamātrarūpam । tatsa-</p>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha kṛtsnabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। kṛtsnabhāvāttu gṛhiṇopasaṃhāraḥ ।। 47 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>na gṛhī vidyādhikṛtaḥ karmakuṭuṃbabhṛtivaiyagryāt । nācāryakulanivāsī paratantratvādamuṣyāpi ।। 320 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>kṛtsneṣvapyāśramiṣu syādvidyākarmaṇāṃ chidre । ata eva hi chāndogye dṛṣṭo gṛhiṇopasaṃhāraḥ ।। 321 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti kṛts‍nabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।</head>
<pb n="413"/>
<p>payitvā ca rudre । rudra ekatvamāhuḥ । rudraṃ śāśvataṃ vai purāṇāmiṣamūrjaṃ tapasā niya-
cchata vratametat pāśupatam’ iti । tat pāśupatavratamatharvaśirasi śrutaṃ purāṇeṣu ca
prasiddhameva । tanniṣṭhānāṃ vidyāprāptirmuktiśca saṃbhavati na veti saṃśayaḥ ।। kiṃ prā-
ptam ? āśrameṣvanantarbhāvāt, avasānadarśanāt, putrādyarthaṃ kṛṣṇādibhiranuṣṭhita-
tvāt avāntaraphalasiddhimantareṇa teṣāṃ na mokṣasiddhirasti ।। iti prāpte brūmaḥ---
teṣāmatyantavratadhāriṇāṃ muktireva phalaṃ saṃbhavati । vidyāsaṃpattiśca parabrahmaṇo rudra-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
rvavidyāṅgatvena sarvāśramasādhāraṇamiti <quote>‘prāgaṅgāvabaddhāstvi’</quote>tya <ref>(bra॰ 3—3—53)</ref>dhikaraṇe
vyavasthāpitam । dvitīyaṃ dvādaśābdādyavadhisaṃkalpavirajāhomādipūrvakaṃ yāvatsaṅkalpitā-
vadhi bhasmoddha‍ūlanatripuṇḍradhāraṇaṃ brahmacaryajapadhāraṇādiyuktaṃ vāyusaṃhitādiṣu purāṇeṣu prasi-
ddham । tadadhikṛtya cintā pravartate । sarveṣāmāśramāṇāṃ brahmavidyā tatphalaṃ muktiśca saṃbhava-
tīti varṇitam । ihāśramānantargatatvena pratīyamāne'tyāśrame sthitānāṃ tadubhayaṃ saṃbhavati
na veti muktyarthabhasmoddha‍ūlanatripu1ṇḍrādividyāṅgayogāt putrādiphalaśravaṇācca saṃśaye pūrva-
pakṣaḥ । kimetatpāśupatavrataṃ yāvajjīvikaṃ muktiphalam uta dvādaśābdādyavadhikam । nādyaḥ---
tasyāśrameṣvanantarbhāvāt । taddhi na tāvadbrahmacaryaṃ kaiścitpāramahaṃsyadharmairapi yogāt । nāpi
sannyāsaḥ । agnīndhanādiyogāt । nāpi gārhasthyam । dārāgnihotrādirāhityāt । nāpi
vānaprastham । gārhasthyapūrvakatvābhāvāt agnihotrādyabhāvācca । āśra2mānantarbhāve ca nāśra-
madharmā vidyāsahakāriṇassaṃbhavanti । āśramāniyatadharmairjapādibhirvidyopakārāccādviṣayo
na būddhipūrvaṃ parigrāhya <quote>‘ityatastvitarajjyāyo liṅgācce’</quote>ti <ref>(bra॰ 3—4—39)</ref> sū3tre darśi-
tam । ato na yāvajjīvikasya muktiphalatvaṃ saṃbhavati । nāpi dvādaśābdādyavadhiyuktasya ।
tasyāprāyaṇānuṣṭheyavidyāṅgatvāyogāt tasya putrādyarthaṃ kṛṣṇādibhiranuṣṭhitatvasyānuśāsanika-
vāyusaṃhitādiṣu pratipāditatvācca । kiṃcāsya pāśupatavratasya muktiphalatvaṃ sākṣādvā vi-
dyāṅgatvena vā । nādyaḥ---vidyāsādhyāyā mukteḥ vratamātreṇāsaṃbhavāt । dvitīye sakalavi-
dyāṅgatvena muktiphalatvam uta vidyāviśeṣāṅgatvena । nādyaḥ---gṛhasthādīnāṃ vidyāmātre'na-
dhikāraprasaṅgāt । na dvitīyaḥ । tathābhūtavidyāviśeṣādarśanāditi । evaṃ prāpte siddhāntaḥ
---yāvajjīvikasyāsya vidyāṅgatvena yu4ktaṃ muktiphalatvaṃ maunavaditareṣāmapi vidyāṅgānāmi-
hopadeśāt । atra hi <quote>‘sahakāryantaravidhiri’</quote>tya<ref>(bra॰ 3—4—46 sū)</ref>dhikaraṇe vidyāṅgatvena
nirṇītaṃ prakṛṣṭamananākhyaṃ maunamupadiṣṭam । yathā vāyusaṃhitāyām---<quote>‘yaḥ kṛtvātyantikīṃ
dīkṣāmādehāntamanākulaḥ । suvrataṃ tatprakurvīta sa tu vai naiṣṭhikaḥ smṛtaḥ ।। so'tyāśramī ca
vijñeyo mahāpāśupatastathā । sa eva tapatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sa eva tu mahāvratī । na tena sadṛśaḥ ka-
ścit kṛtakṛtyo mumukṣuṣvi’</quote>tyupakramya <quote>‘śivārpitātmā satataṃ na tena sadṛśaḥ kvaci’</quote>dityu-
ktam । atra <quote>‘hyanākula’</quote> iti vyāpārāntaravaiyagryaṃ niṣidhya <quote>‘śivārpitātmā satata’</quote>miti
prakṛṣṭamananākhyaṃ maunamevoktam । tathā maunavadanyeṣāmapi vidyāṅgānāmupadeśo dṛśyate ।
‘payovratī vā bhikṣāśī bhavedekāśanastathā । naktayuktāśano nityaṃ bhūśayyābhirataḥ śuciḥ ।
<note>(1) <quote>‘tripuṇḍradhāraṇādiyogāt’</quote> iti ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘āśramatvābhāve ca’</quote> iti ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(3) <quote>‘sūtroktarītyā/?/
na yāvajjīvikasya’</quote> iti ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(4) <quote>‘yuktamuktaṃ phalatvamitareṣāmapi vidyāṅganāṃ’</quote> iti ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="414"/>
syānusandhānarūpā । munidharmavaditareṣāmapi bhikṣācaryaśamadamādīnāṃ paradharmāṇāṃ
pāśupatākhye vrate'pyupadeśāt tanniṣṭhānāmapi <quote>‘rudra ekatvamāhuḥ । rudraṃ śāśvataṃ vai
purāṇāmiṣamūrjaṃ tapasā niyacchata vratametat pāśupatam......agnirityādinā bhasma
gṛhītvā vimṛjyāṅgāni saṃspṛśet tasmādvratametat pāśupataṃ paśupāśavimokṣāya’</quote>
iti rudradhyānasya pāśavicchedarūpasya mokṣaphalasya saṃbandhāvagamācca । ato yāva-
dāyuṣaṃ pāśupatavratadhāriṇāṃ muktireva phalam ।। yaduktamāśrameṣvanantarbhāva iti
tatrāha---

bhasmaśāyī tṛṇaśāyī cīrājinaśayo'thavā । brahmacaryarato nityaṃ vratametatsamācaret । kṣa-
mādānadayāsatyāhiṃsāśīlassadā bhavet । santuṣṭaśca praśāntaśca japadhyānaratastathā ।।’ iti ।।
nanu yāvajjīvikasyāpi pāśupatavratasyābhyudayaphalatvamuttararāmāyaṇe pratipāditam । ta1tra
hi kuberavacanam---<quote>“ahaṃ tu himavatpṛṣṭhaṃ gato dharmamupāsitum । raudraṃ vrataṃ samāsthāya niyato
niyatendriyaḥ ।।”</quote> iti ।। <quote>“tato'hamanyadvistīrṇaṃ gatvā tasya girestaṭam । pūrṇaṃ varṣaśatānyaṣṭau
samavāpaṃ mahāvratam ।।”</quote> iti ca ।। tadanantarañca kuberaṃ prāpti śivavacanam---<quote>“prīto'smi tava
dharmajña tapasānena suvrata । mayā caitadvrataṃ cīrṇaṃ tvayā caiva dhanādhipa । tṛtīyaḥ puruṣo
nāsti yaścaredvratamīdṛśam । vrataṃ hi dustaraṃ hyetanmayaivotpāditaṃ purā । tatsakhitvaṃ mayā
saumya rocayasva dhaneśvara ।।”</quote> iti ।। atra yatpaśupateḥ śivasya paritoṣaṇena tatsakhyaprā-
ptiphalaṃ raudravratācaraṇamupakrāntamityuktam । tatra mahāvrataśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ । saca yāvajjī-
vikasya pāśupatavratasya vācaka iti <quote>‘sa eva syānmahāvratī’</quote>ti vāyusaṃhitāvacanenāvagatam ।
satyam । iha mahāvrataśabdo yogena katipayakālāvadhāveva pāśupatavrate netavyaḥ । <quote>‘pūrṇaṃ varṣa-
śatānyaṣṭā’</quote>vityatraivāvadheruktatvāt । pāśupatavratasyāṅgabhūtā vidyāpyatharvaśirasyeva śrutetyāha
---<pratika>tanniṣṭhānāmiti</pratika> । <quote>“vālāgramātraṃ hṛdayasya madhye viśvaṃ devaṃ jātavedaṃ vareṇyam । tamā-
tmasthaṃ ye'nupaśyanti dhīrāsteṣāṃ śāntiśśāśvatī netareṣā’</quote>miti daharapuṇḍarīkāntasthapara-
maśivasākṣātkārānmuktimuktvā tatsākṣātkārasādhanaṃ dhyānamucyate । <quote>‘tṛṣṇāṃ chittve’</quote>tyā-
dinā tṛṣṇāṃ viṣayarāgaṃ nirasya hetujālasya rāgadveṣamadamātsaryādisaṃsārakāraṇajātasya
tāmeva nirasanīyāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ budhdyā saṃcintya buddhiṃ rudre sthāpayitvā rudre ekatvaṃ
tādātmyamāhuḥ । śivo'hamiti bhāvanāmabhyasanīyāmāhurityarthaḥ । śāśvataṃ nityam । purā-
ṇamanādim । iṣamūrjam । <quote>‘sarvo vai rudra’</quote> iti śruteḥ prāṇināmannam । tatprayuktabalātmakaṃ
bhogyānandatadanubhavarūpaṃ vā rudraṃ tapasā satatamālocanarūpeṇa dhyānena niyacchata niyataṃ
kuruta । etatpāśupataṃ nāma vratam । <quote>‘agniriti bhasme’</quote>tyādinā mahāmantrajātena bhasma gṛ-
hītvā aṅgāni śirovadanādīni nimṛjya saṃspṛśet । tasmādbhasmoddha‍ūlanarūpāṅgayogādeta-
tpāśupatavrataṃ yathoktaṃ dhyānarūpaṃ paśūnāṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ pāśasya malamāyādibandhasya mokṣāya
<note>(1)<quote>‘tatra hi kuberavacana’</quote>mityārabhya idamadhikaraṇasamāptiparyanto granthabhāgaḥ ga. pustake nopalabhyate । anyamātṛkāsu
idamadhyāyasamāptiparyanto grantha eva nāsti । diṣṭyā idamadhyāyasamāptiparyantasya granthasya lābhaḥ mahīśūramahārājasaṃsthāna-
prācīnapustakālayāsāditamātṛkāmātrāditi mahadbhāgyamativismayanīyametatsaṅgrāhakasya mameti sānandamāvedaye suhṛdaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="415"/>
<sutra>sū ।। anāviṣkurvannanvayāt ।। 49 ।।</sutra>
āśramāntararūpeṇātmānamanāviṣkurvan avyaktībhavannapi pāśupatāśramo vi-
dyāsādhanabrahmacaryādiyatidharmasamanvayādatyāśramasaṃjñako'yamāśramabhedaḥ svatantraḥ pa-
ramaśivaprāptihetuḥ । <quote>‘yāvaccharīrapātaṃ vā dvādaśābdamathāpi vā’</quote> ityukterātyanti-
kasāvadhitvena pāśupatavratasya vikalpaḥ । tatrātyantikamatyāśramasaṃjñakamapavargahetuḥ,
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
bhavati ityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। anāviṣkurvannanvayāt ।। 49 ।।</pratika> ātmānamityadhyāhṛtapadayukta-
syā<quote>‘nāviṣkurva’</quote>nniti sautrapadasyārthato vivaraṇam---<pratika>avyaktībhavannapīti</pratika> । svatantraḥ <pratika>para-
maśivaprāptiheturiti</pratika> । ayamāśramaviśeṣassaṃvartādiṣu mahāyogiṣu prasiddhaḥ । tathā hyā-
śvamedhike parvaṇi saṃvartacaritaṃ tāvadevaṃrūpaṃ prasiddham । tatra hi---bṛhaspatistu saṃvartaṃ bādhate
sma punaḥ punaḥ । sa bādhyamānassaṃvarto bhrātrā jyeṣṭhena bhārata । arthānutsṛjya digvāsā
vanavāsamarocaya’diti । digvāsastvaliṅgena saṃvartasya pāśupatāśramaparigrahassūcitaḥ । yata-
statra digvāsastvamuktaṃ śivapurāṇe---<quote>“tatastu jaṭilo muṇḍaḥ śikhaikajaṭa eve vā । bhūtvā
snātaḥ punarvītalajjaścetsyāddigambaraḥ ।।”</quote> iti ।। tathā---<quote>“unmattaveṣaṃ bibhratsa caṃkramīti
yathāsukham । vārāṇasīṃ tu nagarīmabhikṣamupasevate ।।”</quote> ityuktam । śivakṣetrasamāśrayaṇamapi
tatra liṅgam---<quote>“yasya nityaṃ viduḥ sthānaṃ mokṣamadhyātmacintakāḥ । yoginastattvamārgasthāḥ
kaivalyaṃ paramaṃ padam । yaṃ vidussaṅganirmuktāssāmānyaṃ samadarśinaḥ । taṃ prapadye jagadyonima-
yoniṃ nirguṇātmakam । asṛjadyastu bhūtādīn saptalokān sanātanān । sthitassatyopari
sthāṇustaṃ prapadye sanātanam । bhaktānāṃ sulabhaṃ taṃ hi durlabhaṃ dūrapātinām । adūrasthamajaṃ
devaṃ prakṛteḥ parataḥ sthita”</quote>miti । saṃvartena maruttāyopadiṣṭe śivastotre śivasyādyasthānameva
mokṣasthānaṃ paramapadamityādipratipādinaṃ ca saṃvartasya śivapadārthitayā pāśupatāśramaparigrahe
liṅgam । tathā <quote>‘māsmaivaṃ tvaṃ punarāgāḥ kathañcidba‍ṛhaspatiṃ paridhātuṃ maruttā mā tvādhakṣe cakṣuṣā
dāruṇena saṃkruddho'haṃ pāvakaṃ taṃ nibodhe’</quote>ti maruttasya yajñe vitate tadīyaṃ yajñaṃ pravartayatā
saṃvartena sakrodhamuktasya bṛhaspatimaruttayossandhānārthamindreṇa preṣitasyāgneḥ <quote>‘tato nākamaga-
maddha‍ūmaketurdāhādbhīto vyathito'śvatthaparṇava’</quote>diti saṃvartakopabhītyā pratyāvṛttimuktvā---
<quote>‘gandharvarāḍyātvayaṃ tatra dūto bibhemyahaṃ vāsava tatra gantum । saṃrambhānmāmuktavāṃstatra tīkṣṇaṃ
saṃvarto vākyaṃ caritabrahmacarya’</quote> ityagnivākye yatsaṃvartasya brahmacaryānuṣṭhānaprayuktamahāmahimava-
rṇanaṃ kṛtaṃ tadapi tatra liṅgam । na hyakhilānāśramānparityajya digambaratayotpathaṃ pratipanna-
syaivaṃvidho mahimā saṃbhāvayitumapi śakyate । tathā jaigiṣavyacaritamapyevaṃrūpaṃ mokṣadharme pra-
siddham । tatra hi <quote>‘arthaḥ ko vārthaśaktiḥ kā bhagavanbrūhi me'rthitaḥ ।।’</quote> ityumāyāḥ praśnam
<quote>‘artho'hamarthaśaktistvaṃ bhoktāhaṃ bhojyameva te । rūpaṃ viddhi mahābhāge prakṛtistvaṃ paro hya-
ham । ahaṃ viṣṇurahaṃ brahmā hyahaṃ yajñastathaiva ca । āvayorna ca bhedo'sti paramārthastato'bale ।
tathāpi vidyate bhedaḥ kiṃ māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasī’</quote>ti parameśvarasyottaraṃ ca varṇayitvā---<quote>‘evamuktā
tataḥ prāha hyadhikaṃ hi tayorvada’</quote> iti punarumāyāḥ praśne---<quote>‘tadantare sthito vidvānasthi-
rūpo mahāmuniḥ । jaigiṣavyaḥ smayanprāha hyartha ityeva nādayan । śreṣṭho'rthastvahamāproktastallīnā
<pb n="416"/>
tadanyadbhogaheturiti vyavasthā । evaṃ bhuktimuktihetutayobhayātmakamidaṃ vrataṃ śiva-
prasādakaraṃ śrutireva vidadhāti । yathā nāprāmāṇyāpāto'syā bhavati tathā yo-
janīyam ।।
iti maunavadadhikaraṇam ।। 15 ।।
atha aihikādhikaraṇam ।। 16 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। aihikamaprastutapratibandhe taddarśanāt ।। 50 ।।</sutra>
uktakramopāsananiṣṭhānāmaihikaṃ muktiphalam, uta janmāntare vā bhavati ।। iti
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śaktikā'varā । mudrikādiviśeṣeṇa vismṛtā saṃhṛteti ce’</quote>ti jaigiṣavyeṇa tasyottaramuktami-
tyuktam । tataḥ parameśvaraṃ prati pṛṣṭe jaigīṣavyeṇottaramuktamiti hetunārtharūpasya parameśvarasya
śraiṣṭhyam arthaśaktirūpāyā umāyāstaddharmatvena sargapralayayorvikāsasaṅkocapariṇāmitvena cā-
varatvamuktamiti hetunā comāyāstasminkopi sati---<quote>‘tataḥ prahasya bhagavān sarvapāpaharo
haraḥ । prāha devīṃ mahādevo jaigiṣavyo mahāmuniḥ । bhakto mama sakhā caiva śiṣyaścātra mahā-
muni’</quote>riti । <quote>‘nirapekṣo muniryogī māmupāśritya saṃsthitaḥ । nirdvandvassatataṃ dhīro mamarūpa-
svabhāvadhṛk । tasmātkṣamasva taṃ devi rakṣitavyastvayā hi sa’</quote> iti ca devyāḥ kopaśāntyarthaṃ
parameśvareṇa tasya caritaṃ varṇitam । tatra <quote>‘mama rūpasvabhāvadhṛ’</quote>gityanena jaigiṣavyasya bhasmoddha‍ū-
lanādirūpapāśupatāśramaniṣevaṇamāviṣkṛtam । kāśīkhaṇḍe'pi tathaiva taccaritaprapañcanaṃ dṛ-
śyate । evamanyeṣāmapi mahāyogināṃ pāśupatāśramaniṣevaṇaṃ purāṇeṣu pra1pañcicatamudāhartavyam ।।</p>
<head>iti maunavadadhikaraṇam ।। 15 ।।</head>
<head>atha aihikādhikaraṇam ।। 16 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>aihikamaprastutapratibandhe taddarśanāt ।। 50 ।।</pratika> vidyāyā muktiḥ phalamityetadupapadyate
vā na veti tasyāstatphalakatve vidyodayadehāvasāna eva muktyavaśyaṃbhāvatadanavaśyaṃbhāvābhyāṃ
saṃśaye pūrvapakṣaḥ । vidyāyā muktiḥ phalamityetannopapadyate । tathā sati ihaiva janmani muktaḥ
syāmityupāsakakāmanānurodhādvidyodayadehāvasāna eva muktyavaśyaṃbhāvena viduṣāṃ janmā-
ntaraśravaṇavirodhāpatteḥ । janmapravāhodvignānāṃ viraktānāmihaiva janmani muktaḥ syāmityeva</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha maunavadadhikaraṇam ।। 15 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। maunavaditareṣāmapyupadeśāt ।। 48 ।। anāviṣkurvannanvayāt ।। 49 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>pāśupataṃ sāvadhikaṃ vratamuditaṃ tanna muktiphalam । putrādyarthaṃ hi purā kṛṣṇaprabhṛtibhiranuṣṭhitaṃ śṛṇumaḥ ।। 322 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>ātyantikaṃ tu tadvratamāśramavargādbahirbhūtam । vidyāṅgameva na syādda‍ūre muktyarthatā tasya ।। 323 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>maivaṃ muktyarthameva śrutimunivacanāditthamātyantikaṃ tadhdyānaṃ rudrasya bhikṣācaraṇaśamadamādyā hi yatropadiṣṭā ।</l>
<l>astyevātyāśramāntargatigativirahe'pyāśramatvaṃ svatantraṃ tasyāpi brahmacaryaprabhṛtiguṇasamāyuktamatyāśramākhyam ।। 324 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti maunavadadhikaraṇam ।। 15 ।।</head>
<p><note>(1)<quote>‘prapañcitamudāhartavyam’</quote> ityasyānantaraḥ pādaśeṣasru/?/ṭhitaḥ ka. kha. ga. mātṛkāsu । mahīśūramahārājapustakālayako-
śamekameva kṣaraṇamavaśiṣṭādhikaraṇadvayasaṃpādane’ iti vedyam ।</note>
<pb n="417"/>
saṃśaye vicāryate---ihaiva me janmani muktirjāyatāmityabhisaṃdhāya puruṣa upāsane
pravartate, na tu janmāntara iti । kaḥ prayojanasya vilambanamīhate । tasmādaihikameva
muktiphalaṃ yadi bhavati । na cet, kadācidapi na bhavati ।। iti prāpte vadāmaḥ
---prabalakarmāntarapratibandhābhāve paropāsanaphalamiha janmani bhavati; tatsadbhāve
tu janmāntare । yathā'bhyudayaphalaṃ svasādhanabhūtapuṇyakarmānantarameva saṃpadyata iti na
niyamaḥ, kiṃtu pratibandhakasadbhāve janmāntare bhavati, tadvat, vāmadevādiṣu janmā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
hi kāmanā natviha janmani janmasahasrānantaraṃ veti । na ca vācyaṃ śrutiṣu muktimātraṃ
phalatvena śrutam । na tvaihikī muktiḥ । ataḥ svatantrā puruṣakāmanānurodhyeti svataḥ pravṛttāṃ
puruṣakāmanāmeba khalvanuvadantyadhikāravākyasthāḥ kamiśrutayaḥ । ato yathāprāptyanuvāda
iti । tāsāṃ śrutīnāmapi tādarthyameva yuktam । na ca <quote>‘manorathānāmagatirna vidyata’</quote> iti
nyāyadanenaiva dehena muktaḥ syāṃ svargī syāmityapi kecana kāmayeranniti tadanurodho'pi
kāryaḥ syāditi vācyam । svargamokṣayorarthasvābhāvyena dehāntaradeśāntaraprāptyavagatyā bā-
dhitaviṣayāyāstathā kāmanāyā ananuroddhavyatvāt ।। nanu tathāpyetaddehāvasāna eva svargī
syāmiti puruṣakāmanānurodhe prabalakarmāntarāpratibandharūpayāgādivīryavattaratvaphalakodgītha-
vidyāvidhānavaiyarthyaṃ syāditi cettarhi karmaphalaśrutiṣu tathā puruṣakāmanānurodho mābhūttathāpi
vidyāphalaśrutau tadanurodhaḥ syādeva । bādhakābhāvāt । nanu atrāpi <quote>‘yāvadadhikārādhika-
raṇo’</quote> <ref>(bra॰ 3—3—31 sū॰)</ref>ktanyāyenānekadehabhogyaprārabdhakarmarūpavidyāphalapratibandhakasa-
dbhāvo bādhako'stīti cenna । karmaphalāpratibandhaphalakodgīthavidyā1vidhānasāmarthyena yāgā-
diphalotpattipratibandhakaprabalakarmāntarakalpane'pi vidyāphaloktipratibandhakakarmakalpanāyāṃ
pramāṇābhāvāt । na ca <quote>‘bhogena tvitare’</quote> <ref>(bra॰ 4—1—19 sū)</ref> ityadhikaraṇanyāyena yāva-
tprārabdhapratibandhakakarmakṣayaṃ vidyāphalavilambaṃ pratipādayantī <quote>‘tasya tāvadeva cira’</quote>miti
śrutiḥ prārabdhasya vidyāphalapratibandhakatvakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇaṃ syāditi vācyam । udgītha-
vidyādisahakṛtatvamātreṇa yāgādīnāṃ prabalakarmāntarapratibadhyatvaśrutisāmarthyādvidyājāteḥ
karmajātyapekṣayā prābalyanirdhāraṇena karmaṇo vidyāpratibandhakatvakalpanasyāyuktatvāt । <quote>‘tasya
tāvadeve’</quote>ti śruteḥ śarīrāvasāne muktiphalakatayā vidyāstāvakatvopapatteḥ । tasmādvidyāyā
muktiphalakatve vidyodayadehāvasāne muktyavaśyaṃbhāvena viduṣāṃ janmāntaraśravaṇavirodhāpatteḥ ।
muktiphalaśravaṇāni rātrisatranyāyena phalavidhiparatayā na vipariṇamayitavyāni । kiṃtu
vidyāstāvakatayaiva netavyāni । brahmavidyānāṃ phalākāṅkṣāyāṃ tu udgīthavidyānāmiva <quote>‘yadeva
vidyaye’</quote>ti śrutyuktaṃ phalaṃ grāhyam । tathā sati tatra vidyāśruteḥ prakaraṇena saṅkoco'pi na
bhaviṣyatīti । siddhāntastu---sarveṣu vedānteṣu kṣayiṣṇutvasātiśayatvābhyāṃ sakalakarmaphala-
nindāpurassaraṃ brahmavidyānāṃ muktiphalaśravaṇāni tāvat tāsāmapratibandhena karmaphalotpa-
ttyarthe tatstāvakatayā netumayuktāni । virodhāt । atastāni phalavidhiparāṇyeva । viduṣāṃ
janmāntaraśravaṇaṃ tu prārabdhasya vidyāphalapratibandhakatayopapādanīyam । vidyāyāḥ karmā-
<note>(1) <quote>‘vidyānuṣṭhānasāmarthyena’</quote> iti mātṛkāntarapāṭhaśśithilamātṛkāntarapariśīlanādavagamyate ।</note>
<pb n="418"/>
ntaraśravaṇādibalena tatphaladarśanāt । tato'naihikatve muktiphalasya niyama iti ।।
iti aihikādhikaraṇam ।। 16 ।।
atha muktiphalādhikaraṇam ।। 17 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। evaṃ muktiphalāniyamastadavasthāvadhṛtestadavasthāvadhṛteḥ ।। 51 ।।</sutra>
kevalakarmaphalābhyudayavanmuktiphalamapi prabalakarmāntarapratibandhābhāve bhavatīti
nirūpitam । tannyāyena karmaphalavat, jñānaphalasyāpi sātiśayatvaniyamo'sti
na veti saṃśayaḥ ।। kiṃ tāvat prāptam ? karmaphalavanmuktiphalamapi sātiśayam---
<quote>‘jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta’</quote> <quote>‘vājapeyena svārājyakāmo yajeta’</quote> ityādibhiḥ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ntarāpekṣayā prābalye'pi prārabdhapratibadhyatvakalpanāyāṃ na kaścidvirodhaḥ । prābalyadaurba-
lyayoḥ phalabalakalpyatvena jātibhedavyavasthitatvābhāvāt । jalavijātīyasyāpi vāḍavā-
gnerjalabhakṣakatvadarśanāt । evaṃ ca prārabdhāvasāne muktaḥ syāmityeva kāmanā brahmavidyādhi-
kāravidhiṣu kamiśrutīnāmartha iti kalpanīyamiti ।।</p>
<head>iti aihikādhikaraṇam ।। 16 ।।</head>
<head>atha muktiphalādhikaraṇam ।। 17 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>evaṃ muktiphalāniyamastadavasthāvadhṛtestadavasthāvadhṛteḥ ।। 51 ।।</pratika> brahmavidyāyāḥ ka-
rmapratibadhyatvena karmaviśeṣāttadvadeva sātiśayaphalatvamapyastviti pratyavasthānātsaṅgatiḥ ।
nyūnādhikaguṇānāmavyavasthitakālaprāyaṇaparyantānuṣṭheyānāṃ ca vidyānāṃ vaiṣamyāt phalavaiṣa-
myamavaśyaṃ kalpanīyam । na ca vaiṣayikānandebhyo viraktasya brahmavidyāsvadhikārāt brahmā-
nande viśeṣābhāvācca phalavaiṣamyakalpanaṃ bādhitamiti vācyam । jīvanmuktidaśāyāṃ yoga-
bhūmikābhedeneva muktidaśāyā puruṣabhedena brahmānande'bhivyaktitāratamyakalpanopapatteḥ ।
ānandamīmāṃsāyāṃ manuṣyagandharvādiparabrahmāntaparyāyeṣu <quote>‘śrotriyasya cākāmahatasye’</quote>ti śru-
tīnāṃ viśeṣe brahmopāsanalabdhamuktikajīvaviṣayatvasaṃbhavenāsāmapi śrutīnāṃ muktau phalavai-
ṣamye pramāṇatopapatteśca । muktānāṃ brahmaṇā paramasāmyaśrutistu---yathā jagadva‍yāpārādva‍yāva-
rtitā tathā sarvātmanā brahmānandabhogādapi vyāvartanīyā । yathārhaṃ brahmānandabhogamātreṇa
brahmasāmyāvalambanā yojanīyeti pūrvapakṣaḥ । evaṃ prāpte siddhāntaḥ---upāsanāvaiṣamyeṇa phala-
vaiṣamyakalpane phalavaiṣamyamanantavidhaṃ kalpanīyam । upāsyaguṇatāratamyenāharaharupāsanā-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha aihikādhikaraṇam ।। 16 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। aihikamaprastutapratibandhe taddarśanāt ।। 60 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>brahmopāsīnānāṃ janmani tatraiva muktiphalam । abhisaṃdhāya tathaiva hyupāsanāyāṃ pravartate puruṣaḥ ।। 325 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>prabalena karmaṇā yadi nāsti pratibadhdyamevaitat । tatsattve janmāntara eva syātkarmaphalarītyā ।। 326 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti aihikādhikaraṇam ।। 16 ।।</head>
<pb n="419"/>
<p>karmaphalasya sātiśayatvamavagamyate । tadvadupāsanajñānaphalasyāpi । iti prāpte'bhi-
dhīyate---karmaphalasyeva jñānopāsanaphalasya na sātiśayatvaniyamaḥ । brahmasvarūpāva-
sthāyā eva phalatvāvadhṛteḥ । sarveṣāmapi vidyāvatāṃ brahmasvarūpasyaikatvānna vaiṣamyaka-
thā'tra saṃbhavati । na caupāsanatāratamyānmuktirūpasya tatphalasya tāratamyaṃ syāditi
vācyam । upāsanakarmaṇāṃ muktiphalavyatirekeṇa phalāntarābhāvāt । brahmaṇa eka-
tvena tadrūpasya muktiphalasyāpyekatvāt । ato na mokṣaphalavaiṣamyamiti ।।
iti muktiphalādhikaraṇam ।। 17 ।।
iti śrīkaṇṭhaśivācāryaviracite brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye tṛtīyādhyāyasya
caturthaḥ pādaḥ ।। 3 ।। 4 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kālatāratamyena tadupāsakajīvanakālatāratamyena ca, upāsanāvaiṣamyasyānantaviṣayatvāt ।
<quote>‘śrautriyasya cākāmahatasye’</quote>ti tu daśaikādaśa vā paryāyāḥ । ataste muktaviṣaye upāsanā-
vaiṣamyaprayuktānandābhivyaktivaiṣamyaviṣayatayā yojayituṃ na śakyante । aparyāptatvāt । di-
ka‍pradarśanārthaśravaṇābhāvācca । śakyante tu yogabhūmikābhedābhivyaktānandatāratamyaviṣaya-
tayā । yogabhūmikābhedānāṃ katipayatvena yogaśāstreṣu prasiddhatvāt । teṣvānandāviśeṣābhi-
vyaktibhedahetavo yogabhūmikābhedā etāvanta eveti śrutiprāmāṇyenābhyupagantuṃ śakyatvāt ।
tasmāduttamaparyāyagataṃ <quote>‘śrotriyasya cākāmahatasye’</quote>ti vākyaṃ muktaviṣayamiti vaktavyam ।
tathā ca tasya sarvamuktasādhāraṇyātparabrahmaṇo yāvānprājāpatyānandāpekṣayā śataguṇatvena
śruta ānandabhogaḥ tāvānsarveṣāmiti siddhau paramāsāmyaśrutirapi tadekārthā syāditi,
śrutibādhitamiha phalavaiṣamyaṃ nyāyasahasreṇāpi kalpayituṃ na śakyam । na hi <quote>‘saptadaśa prā-
jāpatyānpaśūnālabhata’</quote> ityatra saptadaśaśrutibādhitaṃ bahuvacanasya tritve paryavasānaṃ nyāyāva-
lambanena kalpayituṃ śakyam । ataḥ <quote>‘karmabhūyastvātphalabhūyastva’</quote>miti pūrvatantroktanyāyo
yatra satyapi karmatāratamye phalāvaiśeṣyaṃ pramāṇasiddhaṃ tadva‍yatiriktaviṣaya iti kalpayituṃ
yuktam । ata eva dūrātsamīpāccāgatya taṭāke tṛṣṇayā pānīyaṃ pibatāmaviśiṣṭā tṛptiḥ,
dhīśaktipāṭavāttanmāndyādvā cireṇa vedamabhyasyatāṃ vedākṣarāvāptiraviśiṣṭeti naitādṛśeṣu
sthaleṣu karmabhūyastvātphalabhūyastvamiti <pratika>sarvamanavadyam ।। iti muktiphalādhikaraṇam ।। 17 ।।</pratika></p>
<p>iti śivātivādimūrddhanyaśivadarśanasthāpanadhurandharasakaladevabhūdevapratiṣṭhāpaka<pratika>śrīmaccinnabo/?/</pratika>-
mmabhūpālahṛdayakamalakuharabiharamāṇa<pratika>śrīsāmbaśivapreritasya śrībharadvāja</pratika>kulajala-
dhikaustubhaśrīviśva<pratika>jidyājiśrīraṅgarājādhvarivarasūnorappayyadīkṣitasya kṛtau
śrīkaṇṭhācāryaviracitabrahmamīmāṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāyāṃ</pratika> śivārkamaṇi-
dīpikākhyāyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya <pratika>turīyaḥ pādaḥ</pratika> ।। 3 ।। 4 ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha muktiphalādhikaraṇam ।। 17 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। evaṃ muktiphalāniyamastadavasthāvadhṛtestadavasthāvadhṛteḥ ।। 51 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>tarhyevaṃ karmaphalanyāyenaivāstu sātiśayaḥ । apavarge'pi samatvādvihitaphalatvasya tatrāpi ।। 327 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>brahmaṇa eva phalatvāvadhṛterapavargamāptānām । tasyaikarūpyato'sminnātiśayaḥ śakyate prakalpayitum ।। 328 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti muktiphalādhikaraṇam ।। 17 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>iti śrīmadappayyadīkṣitakṛtau adhikaraṇanayamaṇimālākhyatṛtī-
yaparicchede tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya turīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 3 ।। 4 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="420"/>
<head>।। śrīḥ ।।</head>
<head>śivābhyāṃ namaḥ ।</head>
<head>śrīkaṇṭhācāryakṛtau</head>
<head>brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye</head>
<head>caturthādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha āvṛttyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। āvṛttirasakṛdupadeśāt ।। 1 ।।</sutra>
<p>vicāritāḥ khalūpāsakopāsyopāsanabhedāśramadharmādayastṛtīyādhyāye । iha puna-
ścaturthādhyāye prathame pāde upāsanāprakāraḥ dvitīye jīvasyopāsakasyotkrāntidaśā,
tṛtīye'rcirādigatiḥ, caturthe brahmaprāptasyāvasthā ca nirūpyate । prathamādhikaraṇe'tra
<quote>‘brahmavidāpnoti param’</quote> <quote>‘jñātvā śivaṃ śāntimatyantameti’</quote> ityādiṣu mokṣasādhanatayā
vihitaṃ vedanaṃ sakṛdanuṣṭheyam ? utāvartanīyam ? iti saṃśayaḥ ।। kiṃ tāvat prāptam ?</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>śivārkamaṇidīpikāyām</head>
<head>turīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha āvṛttyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ āvṛttirasakṛdupadeśāt ।। 1 ।।</pratika> śrotṛbuddhisaukaryāya vṛttavartiṣyamāṇapādārthā-
nanukīrtayantsaṅgatimāviṣkaroti---<pratika>vicāritā iti</pratika> । sādhananirūpaṇānantaraṃ tadadhīnaṃ
phalaṃ nirūpyata ityadhyāyayoḥ saṅgatirvivakṣitā । tatra tṛtīyādhyāyasya prathame pāde saṃsāra-
vaitṛṣṇyajananāyeha paratra ca paribhramaṇarūpamupāsakasya svarūpaṃ nirūpitam । dvitīyapāde
parabrahmaprāptitṛṣṇājananāya nirdoṣāsaṅkhyamaṅgalaguṇākaratvādistanmahimā nirūpitaḥ । tṛtī-
yapāde mumukṣukartavyopāsanābhedā nirūpitāḥ । caturthe pāde upāsanāṅgānyāśramadharmaśama-
damādīni nirūpitāni । iha caturthādhyāyasya prathamapāde āvṛttyādirūpa upāsanāprakāro
nirūpitaḥ । tasya sādhanāntargatatve'pi phalārthāpattyupajñatvādupāsanāyāḥ prītipūrvakaci-
ntānuvṛttirūpatvena phalāntarbhāvasyāpi sattvācca phalādhyāye nirūpaṇam । dvitīyapādādiṣū-
tkrāntyādayo nirūpyante । viduṣo mūrdhanyanāḍyotkrāntirarcirādigatiḥ brahmaprāptyanantara-
bhāviguṇāvirbhāvaścetyete kramabhāvino vidyāphalaviśeṣā iti phalakramātpādakramaḥ । yadyapi
prathamapāde <quote>“tadadhigama uttarapūrvāghayo’</quote>ri<ref>(bra॰ a॰ 4 pā॰ 1 sū॰ 13)</ref>tyadhikaraṇamā-
rabhba pāpakṣayasya nirūpyamāṇatvātsarvapūrvabhāvikarmakṣayarūpaṃ phalaṃ prathame pāde nirūpyate । vi-
dyāyāḥ karmakṣayahetusākṣātkāraparyantatvopayogidārḍhyasiddha‍yarthamāvṛttyādinirūpaṇamityapi
vaktuṃ śakyaṃ । tathāpi karmakṣayāpekṣayāpyupāsanā ciravirahotkaṇṭhitanāyikāyā nāyakaviṣaya-
cintānuvṛttivattātkālikānandāvirbhāvaparyavasāyitvenātiśayitaphalarūpetyabhipretyopāsa-
nāprakāra eva bhāṣye prathamapādārthatvena varṇitaḥ । ata eva śivabhāvavatāmānandaviśeṣopa-
<pb n="421"/>
sakṛdanuṣṭheyam, <quote>‘sakṛtkṛte kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ’</quote> iti nyāyāt । prayājādivat sakṛda-
nuṣṭhāne'pi vedanajñānaśabdārthasiddheḥ ।। iti prāpte brūmaḥ । <quote>‘brahmavidāpnoti param’</quote>
ityādiṣu mokṣasādhanatayā vihitaṃ vedanamasakṛdāvartanīyam । <quote>‘mano brahmetyupāsīta
...bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda yatsa veda sa mayai-
taduktaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘anu ma etāṃ bhagavo devatāṃ śādhi yāṃ devatāmupāsse’</quote> ityādiśrutiṣūpa-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
labdhiḥ śivapurāṇe śivenaiva varṇitā । <quote>“kampaḥ svedo'śrupātaśca kaṇṭhe ca svaravikriyā ।
ānandābdhyupalabdhiśca bhavedākasmikī muhuḥ ।। etairvyastaiḥ samastairvā liṅgairavyabhicāribhiḥ ।
mandamadhyottamairbhāvairvijñeyāste narottamāḥ ।। yathā'yo'gnisamāveśānnāyo bhavati kevalam ।
tathaiva mama sānnidhyānna te kevalamānuṣāḥ ।।”</quote> iti । evaṃ sākṣātkāraparyantopāsanāprakāranirū-
paṇenaiva prathamapādasya phalādhyāyāntarbhāvaḥ ityabhipretyāgre'pi bhāṣyakāraḥ pāpakṣayapratipā-
dakādhikaraṇānāṃ saṅgatyantaraṃ vakṣyati । viderjñānamātraparatvopāsanāparatvānavadhāraṇātsaṃ
śaye pūrvapakṣamāha---<pratika>sakṛditi</pratika> । na ca kāmyakarmaṇāmiva phalabhūyastvārthamāvṛttiriti vaktuṃ
śakyam । tadvadvedanaphale brahmānandānubhave bhūyastvālpatvaviśeṣābhāvāt । <quote>“tasmātkarmaṇyāra-
mbhabhāvyatvātkṛṣivatpratyārambhaṃ phalāni syu”</quote>riti nyāyasya nāyaṃ viṣayaḥ । kiṃtu yathā pradhā-
nasya sāṅgatvopapādanāya kriyamāṇaṃ prayājādikamaṅgaṃ sakṛdeva kriyate evaṃ vedanamapi sakṛ-
deva kartavyamiti kratuvadvānumānenābhyāsiphalabhūmā syāditi pūrvapakṣanirākaraṇārthasya sa-
kṛdvā kāraṇaikatvāditi nyāyasyaivāyaṃ viṣayaḥ ityabhipretya dṛṣṭāntamāha---<pratika>prayājādiva-
diti</pratika> । nanu mano brahmetyādau vidyupāstyorvyatikareṇa prayogāt jñānasāmānyavācinaśśa-
bdasyāvṛttiguṇaviśiṣṭajñānaviśeṣe paryavasānaṃ syādityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>vedanajñāneti</pratika> । chāgapa-
śunyāyena <quote>‘mano brahme’</quote>tyādivedanānāmupāsanārūpatvaparyavasānamastu nāma । na tāvanmātreṇā-
nandavallyādyuktabrahmavedanānāmāvṛttissidhyati । vidyābhedāt । na hi prativasantaṃ jyoti-
ṣṭomasyāvṛttividhānāt dvādaśāhādīnāmapi prativasantamāvṛttissidhyati । na ca <quote>‘vi/?/di-
dhyāsitavya’</quote> ityādiśruteḥ kāsāṃcidvidyānāṃ muktiphalānāmāvṛttyapekṣā saṃpratipannetyanyā-
sāmapyāvṛttirapekṣaṇīyā । anyathā phalabhūyastvāsaṃbhavena kleśasādhyānāṃ tāsāmananuṣṭhānaprasa-
ṅgāditi vācyam । devatāntaranāmnāmanekāvṛttiviśiṣṭasaṃkīrtane yatphalaṃ tasya sakṛdeva śi-
vādināmasaṅkīrtanena lābhe saṃbhavatyapi devatāntaranāmasaṅkīrtaneṣviva puruṣarucivaicitryeṇa
vidyāntareṣu pravṛttyupatteḥ । na ca vidyānāmupāsyasākṣātkārārthatvena dṛṣṭaphalatvātkriyā-
ṇāmarthaśeṣatvātpratyakṣe tannivṛttyāpravargaḥ syāditi nyāyena yāvatphalodayamavaghātavadāvṛttiḥ
syāditi vācyam । yāsāṃ vidyānāṃ <quote>‘tatastu taṃ paśyati niṣkalaṃ dhyāyamāna’</quote> ityādivaca-
naissākṣātkāraparyantatvamavagataṃ tāsāmāvṛttisiddhāvapyanyāsāmāvṛttyasiddheḥ । na ca sākṣā-
tkāraphalakavidyānāmāvṛttyapekṣāmātreṇa vidyātvasāmānyādatatphalānāmapyāvṛttiḥ sidhyati ।
agnicayane auduṃbaramulūkhalaṃ sarvauṣadhasya pūrayitvāvahantyathaitadupadadhātītyupadheyolūkhalasaṃ-
skārārthatvena vihitasyāpyavaghātasyāvaghātatvasāmānyādāvṛttyapekṣāprasaṅgena <quote>‘dharmamātre tvada-
rśanācchabdārthenāpadā/?/rgaḥ svā/?/’</quote>diti nyāya/?/virodhāpatteriti bhāvaḥ । nanu manobrahme/?/tyādibrahma/?/-
<pb n="422"/>
kramopasaṃhārayorvidyupāstyorvyatikaropadeśena mokṣasādhanarūpasya vedanasyovā/?/sanā-
rūpatvāvagamāt । upāsanaśabdasya ca smṛtisantānavācitvāt । yaduktaṃ ‘prayā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dṛṣṭiprakaraṇe prakrāntopāsanā <quote>‘ya evaṃ vede’</quote>ti vidinopasaṃhṛtā । saṃvargavidyāprakaraṇe <quote>‘yatsa-
vede’</quote>ti haṃsavacane śrutaṃ raikvasya vedanaṃ raikvaṃ prati jānaśrutivacane upāsinopasaṃhṛtamityastu
nāma । evaṃ vidyupāstyorvyatikareṇopadeśasya sarvavidyāsādhāraṇyābhāvādvidyāntareṣu prayā-
javatsakṛdevānuṣṭhānaṃ syādityāśaṅkāmanūdya nirākaroti---<pratika>yaduktamiti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ ।
yāsāṃ vidyānāṃ sākṣātkāraparyantatvaṃ śrutaṃ tāsāmāvartamānatayopāsanarūpatvamavaghātanyāyena
sidhyatīti tāvannirvivādam । tasyāvartamānatvātmakasyopāsanārūpatvasya vidyāntarasādhāra-
ṇyamapyavaghātanyāyenaiva sidhyati । vrīhyuddeśena vihitasyāpyavahananasya yavasādhāraṇyamapekṣā-
sāmarthyādupapādanīyaṃ nopāyāntareṇa । na ca dvitīyāśrutyavagatamavahananādisādhyatvaṃ prā-
ksiddhavrīhitvādyākāreṇa na saṃbhavatīti tadavacchedakāpūrvīyatvalakṣaṇāvaśyaṃbhāvena vrīhitva-
syāpi vivakṣāyāṃ viśiṣṭānuvādadoṣāpatteḥ pravṛttinimittaikyādyavasādhāraṇyasiddhiriti vā-
cyam । sādhyatāvacchedakānupasthitāvapi svargajyotiṣṭomayoriva vrīhyavahananayoḥ śabdena
sādhyasādhanabodhanasaṃbhavāt । na cāvahananavākye vrīhipadasya laukikāpūrvīyasādhāraṇyena
vrīhimātraparatve bhūtabhāviviniyogarahiteṣu laukikavrīhiṣvavahananasyārthakarmatvamapūrvīyavrīhiṣu
viniyuktasaṃskāratayā guṇakarmatvamiti vidhivairūpyāpattiḥ । laukikavrīhimātraparatve dvitīyā-
śrutyavagatadravyaprādhānyabhaṅgāpattirityapūrvīyaparatvāvaśyaṃbhāvādyavasādhāraṇyasiddhiriti vā-
cyam । avahananādivākyajanyaśābdabodhasya vrīhitvaprakārakatve'pi dvitīyāśrutinirdi-
ṣṭavrīhiguṇatayā vidhīyamānamavahananaṃ bhūtabhāvyupayogarahitalaukikavrīhiviṣayaṃ bhavituṃ na
yogyamiti vidheyasāmarthyācchābdabodhānantaramapūrvīyavrīhīṇāṃ viṣayatvāvagatisaṃbhavāt । <quote>‘ya-
syobhāvagnī anugatāvabhinimrocedabhyudiyādvā punarādheyaṃ tasya prāyaścitti’</quote>rityatra havirā-
rtyadhikaraṇanyāyenāgnyubhayatvasyāvivakṣayāgnyanugamamātrasya śābdabodhavelāyāṃ nimittatvāva-
gatāvapi nimitte vidhīyamānamādhānaṃ sahitayorevāgnyorutpādanakṣamaṃ natvekasyāgneriti vidhe-
yasāmarthyādubhayānugama eva nimittatvaparyavasānāṅgīkārāt । <quote>‘tapte payasi dadhyānayatī’</quote>tyatra
śābdabodhasya payastvamātraprakārakatve'pi sā vaiśvadevyāmikṣeti tadanantaravākye tasya pa-
yaso yāgānvayavidhāne sati tatsāmarthyācchābdabodhānantaraṃ tadapūrvasaṃbandhinaḥ payaso
viṣayatvāvagatirityavaśyavaktavyatvācca । avahananādivākyeṣvapūrvīyatvalakṣaṇayā tajjanya-
śābdabodhasyāpūrvīyatvaprakāratve'pi juhvādivyāvartakasya taṇḍuladvārakatvasya vrīhitvasyeva
viśiṣṭānuvādadoṣāpattyā vivakṣitumaśakyatvena śābdabodhānantaraṃ vidheyadṛṣṭaprayojanakāva-
hananasāmarthyādeva taṇḍuladvārakāpūrvīyadravyaviṣayatvāvagatervaktavyatvācca । tasmādanupapattya-
bhāvenāpūrvīyatvalakṣaṇānutthitestatprayuktayavasādhāraṇyābhāvāt । yavānāṃ puroḍāśaprakṛtidra-
vyatvāviśeṣeṇa vrīhivattaṇḍulabhāvādisādhanāpekṣāsattvena tadapekṣāsāmarthyādevāvahananavi-
dheryavasādhāraṇyamupapādanīyam । apūrvīyatvalakṣaṇāyāmapi hyavahananavidherdṛṣṭārthatvāyāvahana-
nāpekṣānapekṣāpūrvīyadravyālocanamāvaśyakam । anyathā tasya juhvādisādhāraṇyaprasaṅgāt ।
<pb n="423"/>
api ca vrīhiṣu vihitamavahananādikamapūrvīyatvalakṣaṇayā yaveṣvapi yadi syāttadā some vi-
hitaṃ krayādi saṃskārajātaṃ phalacamase'pyupadeśata eva prāpnuyāt । haviḥprakṛtitvena soma-
yāgāpūrvasādhanatvasya tatrāpi sattvāt । tathā ca <quote>‘naimittikamatulyatvādasamānavidhānaṃ syā’</quote>-
diti tṛtīyādhyāyādhikaraṇavirodhāpatteḥ । nanu nityasya krayādisaṃskārajātasyādhikārā-
nvaye naimittikaḥ phalacamaso dvāraṃ bhavituṃ nārhati । svayaṃ ca viśeṣyatayā tenānvetuṃ nārhati ।
na khalvabhiṣaveṇa nityaṃ jyotiṣṭomasyopakuryādanityaphalacamasadvāreṇeti yujyate । na vā
nityābhiṣavaviśiṣṭena phalacamasena nimittavānyajeteti yujyate । tasmānnityānityasaṃyoga-
virodhānna phalacamasasya somasāmānavidhyamiti cet । syādetadevaṃ yadi phalacamasatvākāreṇa
sa vākyārthānvayī syāt । <quote>‘somaṃ krīṇātī’</quote> tyādisaṃskāravākyeṣu somapadalakṣitāpūrvasādha-
natvākāreṇa sa vākyārthānvayī cetkaḥ prasaṅgo nityānityasaṃyogavirodhasya । sarvatrāpi hi
jyotiṣṭomaprayoge haviḥprakṛtitve tadapūrvasādhanabhūto homaḥ phalacamaso vāstyeva । evameva
hi <quote>‘yadāhavanīye juhvatī’</quote>tyādiṣvapi nityānityasaṃyogavirodhaḥ pariharaṇīyaḥ । anyathā
tatrāpyāhavanīyasyaiṣṭikasaumikādyapūrvārthatvaṃ nityavadāmnātaṃ nāriṣṭahomādidvāraiva syāditi
bhedanādinimittakahomānāmāhavanīyādhāratvaṃ na sidhyet । kva tarhi nityānityasaṃyogavirodhaḥ ।
yatrānityameva nityavadāmnātasya dvāraṃ bhavati tatraiva yathā <quote>‘bhinne juhotī’</quote>ti । atra hi
homo bhinnādhikaraṇakastatsaṃskāra iti pūrvapakṣe <quote>‘bhinna’</quote> ityasya saṃskāryaparatayā nimittapa-
ratvābhāvena homo nityaḥ syāt । taddvāraṃ tu bhinnamanityamiti nityānityasaṃyogavirodhaḥ ।
etenedamapi nirastam । naimittikasya nityasāmānavidhyābhāvo nityānityasaṃyogaviro-
dhānneṣyate । kiṃtu saṃskāraḥ । vākyānāmāvṛttiprasaṅgāt । tathā hi nityaṃ naimittikaṃ ca
na yugapadvidheyaṃ । kiṃtu nityaṃ somādedravyaṃ sāmānyena vidhāya sarvatra tasyaiva prāptau rāja-
nyādinimitte sati viśeṣarūpeṇa naimittikaṃ phalacamasādi vidheyaṃ । tadyasyāṃ velāyāṃ svābhā-
vikaṃ nityāṅgaṃ vidheyaṃ tasyāmeva saṃskāravidhayastanmātraviśeṣaṇatvena svārthaṃ bidhāya nivṛtta-
vyāpārā na bhūyaḥ śaknuvanti naimittikaviśeṣaṇatvenāpi svārthaṃ vidhātumāvṛttiprasaṅgāt ।
na caivaṃ yavasādhāraṇyasaṃskāravākyānāmāvṛttiḥ prasajyate । yavaśāstrasyāpyanaimittikatvena
vrīhiśāstrasamakālapravṛttikatayā vrīhivadeva yavānāmapyapūrvīyatvena kroḍīkārasaṃbhavāditi ।
āhavanīyaśāstrasyāpi nityahomavidhisamānakālapravṛttikasya naimittikahomasādhāraṇyābhā-
vaprasaṅgāt । yasyāṃ velāyāṃ <quote>‘vrīhibhiryajete’</quote>ti śāstraṃ pravartate tasyāmeva velāyāṃ vrīhyādi
viśeṣaṇatvena saṃskāravākyairavahananādīni samarpyanta ityabhyupagame tadānīṃ vrīhigatāpūrvī-
yatvasyānavagatyā vrīhitvenaivāvahananādyanvayasya vaktavyatayā yavasādhāraṇyābhāvaprasaṅgācca ।
nanu anuvādyasamarpakaśāstrapravṛttyanantaraṃ vidheyasamarpakaśāstrapravṛttiriṣyate । tathā ca <quote>‘yadā-
havanīye juhotī’</quote>tyanārabhyādhītavākye nityanaimittikātmakasya kṛtsnasyāpi homasyānuvā-
dyatvāt naimittikahomaśāstrāṇāmapi pravṛttyanantaramevāhavanīyaśāstrapravṛttirityāhavanīyasya
naimittikahomasādhāraṇyasiddhiḥ । evaṃ vrīhiśāstrapravṛttyanantaramevāhavanīyādiśāstrapravṛttiḥ ।
tataśca vrīhīṇāmapūrvīyatvasyāvagatatvādapūrvīyatvenāvahananānvaye vrīhiśāstrasamakālapravṛtti-
kayavaśāstrāvagatāpūrvasaṃbandhānāṃ yavānāmapi kroḍīkārādavahananāderyavasādhāraṇyasiddhiśceti
<pb n="424"/>
na kaściddoṣa iti cet । evaṃ tarhi saṃskāravākyeṣvapūrvīyatvena vrīhihomādyanuvāde naimitti-
kaphalacamasādyapūrvīyaṃ naimittikahomanyāyenānuvādyamiti phalacamasaśāstrasyāpi pravṛttya-
nantarameva krayādivākyānāṃ pravṛttervaktavyatayā kathaṃ krayādīnāṃ phalacamasasādhāraṇyaṃ na pra-
sajyate । tasmātsaṃskāravākyeṣvapūrvīyatvena saṃskāryānuvāde saṃskārāṇāṃ phalacamasasādhā-
raṇyena vidhānasyāparihāryatvāt tatparihārāya vrīhitvahomatvādirūpeṇaivānuvādo vaktavya
iti nāvahananasya yavasādhāraṇyamapūrvīyatvenānuvādamabhyupetya samarthayituṃ śakyate । kiṃ-
tvitthaṃ samarthanīyam । puroḍāśaprakṛtidravyatvena vihitānāṃ yavānāṃ vituṣībhāvopāyāpe-
kṣāyāṃ yatābhūteṣu vrīhiṣu tadupāyatvena vihitasyāvahananasyaiva grahaṇaṃ yuktam । vaidikeṣu ya-
veṣu vaidikasyaiva tadupāyasya pratyāsannatayā śīghraṃ buddhāvārohāttadgrahaṇena niyamasaṃbhave lauki-
kasyāvahananasya nakhavidalanāderaniyatatadupāyasya grahaṇāyogācca । ataevāśvadānani-
mittakasya vāruṇacatuṣkapālayāgasya pauṇḍarīkādiṣu śrutaṃ vaidikamevāśvadānaṃ nimittaṃ । natu
suhṛdādibhyaḥ snehādyupādhinā kṛtaṃ laukikamaśvadānamiti <quote>‘doṣāttviṣṭirlaukike syādvaidike na
doṣaḥ syā’</quote>diti pūrvatantrādhikaraṇanirṇītam । ata eva <quote>‘paśunā yajeta’</quote> <quote>‘aktāśśarkarā’</quote> ityā-
diṣvanuṣṭhānāya viśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ mantrārthāvādasamarpitaniyataviśeṣagrahaṇe saṃbhavatyākṣepalabhyā-
niyataviśeṣagrahaṇaṃ na kāryamiti chāgapaśvadhikaraṇādiṣu nirṇītam । evaṃ cāvahananapeṣaṇā-
deryavasādhāraṇyaparyavasāne bhaviṣyatyapi vrīhimātre tadvidhānaṃ lāghavārtham । ekatraiva tadvi-
dhāne'pi hyapekṣāsāmarthyādanyatrāpi tadupatiṣṭhata iti । yatra tvekatra vihitamanyatra na ji-
ghṛkṣitaṃ tatra nirdeśabhedena dharmavyavasthā kriyate । yathā rathaṃtare prastūyamāne saṃmīlayedba‍ṛhati
prastūyamāne samudraṃ manasā dhyāyediti । vyavasthāpitaṃ ca tathaiva jaimininā---<quote>‘nirdeśādvā
vyavatiṣṭhera’</quote>nniti । yadi vrīhiṣu vihitamavahananaṃ yaveṣu vituṣībhāvopāyatāṃ na pratipadyeta
tadā vaidikatvena pratyāsannamapi niyatamapi tadapahāya laukikamaniyatamupāyāntaraṃ gṛhyeta ।
yathā <quote>‘tasmiṃtsīdāmṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇāṃ medha sumanasyamānaḥ’</quote> iti vrīhimayapuroḍāśapra-
tiṣṭhāpane viniyukto mantro yavamayapuroḍāśapratiṣṭhāpanopāyatāṃ na pratipadyata iti tatprakā-
śanārthaṃ laukika eva kalpasūtrādiraniyatastadupāyo gṛhyate । pratipadyate tvavahananaṃ vrīhi-
ṣviva yaveṣvapi vituṣībhāvopāyatām । na ca vrīhipratinidhitvena nīvāropādāne nīvāra-
puroḍāśapratiṣṭhāpane'pyevamaniyatopāyānveṣaṇaprasaṅgaḥ । na hi vrīhyalābhe nīvārāssādhana-
tvenopādīyante । kiṃ tu vrīhisadṛśeṣu nīvāreṣvanupraviṣṭā ye vrīhyāraṃbhayogyāvayavāsta eva
kathaṃcidvrīhiśāstrārthasaṃpipādayiṣayopādīyante । tataśca vrīhyabhāve yavabuddha‍yopādīyamānāste
<quote>‘vrīhīṇāṃ medhe’</quote>ti mantrabhāgena prakāśayituṃ yogyā eva । ata eva <quote>‘vrīhīnavahantī’</quote>tyādi-
saṃskāravidhīnāmapi pratinidhisādhāraṇyamaṅgīkriyate । na ca pratinidhīnāmiva yavānāṃ
vrīhisamānavidhānatvābhāve kevalamapekṣāmātreṇa vrīhidharmāṇāṃ yaveṣu prāptyaṅgīkāre yavānāṃ
vrīhivikāratvaṃ syāditi vrīhimantrasya yaveṣūhena prāptiprasaṅgaḥ । avahananādivākyajanyavrīhi-
tvaprakārakaśābdabodhānantaraṃ dvitīyāśrutinirdiṣṭavrīhiprādhānyanirvāhāya taṇḍuladvārā darśa-
pūrṇamāsāpūrvopayogināṃ vrīhīṇāmavahananādisaṃskāryatvamityavagatikāle vrīhiśāstrasamakā-
lapravṛttikena <quote>‘yavairyajete’</quote>ti śāstreṇāvagataṃ yāgīyapuroḍāśasādhanabhūtānāṃ yavānāmapi vi-
<pb n="425"/>
jādivat’ iti, tasyādṛṣṭaphalatvādyuktaṃ sakṛdanuṣṭhānam । vedanaphalasya sākṣātkā-
rasya dṛṣṭatvāt tasyāphalodayamāvṛttiḥ, avaghātādivaditi ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tuṣībhāvādyupāyāpekṣāmālocya saṃskārānvaye vrīhitvaṃ prayojakakoṭau na niviṣṭaṃ । kiṃtūkta-
rūpāpūrvopayogitvamātramityavagatyudayena tadvaśādavahananādisaṃskārāṇāṃ yavasādhāraṇyaprā-
ptyā yavānāṃ vrīhivikāratvāprasaṅgāt । nanvevamuktarūpāpūrvopayogitvamātraṃ saṃskārānvaye pra-
yojakamityetallāghavādevāvagantuṃ śakyeta । vrīhitvasyāpi praveśe gauravaṃ syāt । ato dharmā-
ṇāmapekṣāsāmarthyātsādhāraṇatāyāṃ nedamudāharaṇamiti cet na । gauravamātreṇa śrutavrīhitvapa-
rityāgāyogena yavāpekṣālocanasyāvaśyakatvāt । etena taṇḍuladvārā haviḥprakṛtitvena
yāgāpūrvopayogitvasyāvahananānvayaprayojakatve dṛṣṭārthatvamavahananasya sidhyati । vrīhitvasya
prayojakatve tvadṛṣṭārthatvaṃ syādati dṛṣṭārthatvalobhenādyameva prayojakamabhyupagantavyaṃ । na tu
dvitīyamapi prayojakakoṭau niveśanīyamiti nirastam । śrutānusāreṇa hi dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā
kalpanīyaṃ na । tvadṛṣṭārthatvāpattyā śrutaṃ parityaktuṃ yuktam । tasmāduktarītyā yavānāmavahana-
nādyapekṣayaiva śrutasyāpi vrīhitvasya saṃskārānvayaprayojakakoṭibahirbhāvaḥ kalpanīyaḥ । e-
katra vihitamavahananādikamapekṣāsāmarthyādanyatrāpi bhaviṣyatīti prayojakakoṭyaniviṣṭamapi
vrīhitvaṃ puraskṛtyāvahananādiśāstraṃ pravṛttamiti kalpanīy । yaditvadṛṣṭārthatvāpattyaiva vrī-
hitvasya prayojakakoṭibahirbhāvaḥ kalpanīyaḥ । tadā vrīhimātre'pi tasya tata eva prakāśya-
koṭibahirbhāvāpattyā vrīhimātrasyāpi yavasādhāraṇyāpattiraparihāryā syāt । mantreṣu vrī-
hyādīni dravyāṇyagnyādayo devatāścāpūrvīyāṇīti hi tenatena padena prakāśyaṃte । ata eva
vaikṛteṣu sūryādiṣu nīvārādiṣu cohasiddhiḥ । tasmādyavānāmavaghātena vituṣībhāvasaṃbhavādvi-
tuṣībhāvārthaṃ vaidiketasminnapekṣeti tasya yavasādhāraṇyaṃ yavaprakāśanasya vrīhimantreṇa vrīhipra-
kāśanasya vā saṃbhavādvaidike'pi tasminnanapekṣetyapekṣānapekṣābhyāmevāvaghātavrīhimantrayo-
rvaiṣamyaṃ kalpanīyam । nacāpekṣālocanena sādhāraṇyanirvāhe tadvaśātprokṣaṇasya yavasādhā-
raṇyaṃ na sidhyediti vācyam । nirvāpāvaghātayorapekṣāvaśādapūrvaviśeṣopayuktatvaprayuktatāva-
game tadubhayamadhyagatasya prokṣaṇasyāpi sāhacaryabalāttatprayuktatāvagatissiddha‍yatītyeṣā dik ।
tasmātsthitametadapakṣāvaśādavahananasya yavasādhāraṇyamiti । evamevopāsanārūpatvasya vi-
dyāntarasādhāraṇyam । tathā hi । vidyā sākṣātkāradvārā muktiphaleti kāsucidvidyāsu klṛpta-
tvāditarāsāmapi vidyānāṃ tathaiva dṛṣṭadvāratve saṃbhavati nādṛṣṭadvāratvaṃ kalpayituṃ yuktam ।
evaṃ ca dṛṣṭārthatvalobhādavaghātasya vituṣībhāvadvārakatvasiddha‍yeva vidyāntarāṇāṃ sākṣātkāra-
dvāratvasiddha‍yā tannirvāhārthamāvṛttiḥ kalpanīyeti tāsāmāvṛttiviśiṣṭatvarūpopāsanātmaka-
tvasiddhiriti । evamapekṣāvaśādeva yajñādīnāṃ śamādīnāmuddha‍ūlanatripuṇḍrayorāprāyaṇaṃ vi-
dyānuṣṭhānasya pāpāśeṣavināśayoranyeṣāṃ caivaṃvidhānāṃ sarvavidyāsādhāraṇyamityalaṃ vistareṇa ।
atrāvṛttirityanenaiva sādhyārthasiddhāvasakṛditi viśeṣaṇaṃ yāvatphalodayamāvṛttirdṛṣṭaphalatvā-
diti pradhānahetusūcanārthamuktam । upadeśāditi tadupodbalakaṃ kāsucidvidyāsūpāsanā-
<pb n="426"/>
<sutra>sū ।। liṅgācca ।। 2 ।।</sutra>
asmin viṣaye liṅgaṃ cāsti । <quote>‘kṣetrajñasyeśvarajñānādviśuddhiḥ paramā matā । mahā-
pātakayukto vā yukto vā'pyupapātakaiḥ ।। praviśya rajanīpādaṃ brahmadhyānaṃ samabhya-
set । adhyātmikāna yogānanutiṣṭhet ।। rukmābhaṃ svapnadhīgamyaṃ vidyāttu puruṣaṃ
param ।।’</quote> ityādi । ataśca brahmavedanasyāvṛttiriti ।।
iti āvṛttyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।
atha ātmatvopāsanādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। ātmeti tūpagacchanti grāhayanti ca ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatra brahmaṇa upāsanamāvṛttimadabhihitam । tadātmanastadbhāvenopāsanamuta tada-
rthāntaratveneti vicāraḥ ।। evaṃ sati <quote>‘viśvādhiko rudro maharṣiḥ’</quote> <quote>‘adhikaṃ tu bheda-
nirdeśāt’</quote> ityādiśrutisūtreṣu pratyāgātmanaḥ paśorjīvāt patyuḥ parabrahmaṇo'rthā-
ntaratvena nirūpitatvāt 1sarvajñatvādinā jīvasya brahmabhāvāghaṭanācca brahmopāsanaṃ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
rūpatvapratipādanaṃ liṅgamuktam <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। liṅgācca ।। 2 ।।</pratika> liṅgaṃ smṛtiḥ । śrutyanurūpakatvāt ।
<quote>‘kṣetrajñasye’</quote>ti smṛtāvīśvarajñānaṃ sakalapāpaprāyaścittamṛktam । smṛtyantare tasya yāmaparyantā-
nuvartanīyadhyānarūpatvamuktam । tathaiva smṛṃtyantare tasya jñānasya yogaśabdavācyasamādhirū-
patvamuktam । smṛtyantare svapnadhīgamyamiti śivasya samādhiprāpyatvamuktam । sakalabāhye-
ndriyavyāpāroparamapūrvakatvasāmyātsamādhireva hi svapnadhīśabdena nirdiṣṭaḥ । adhyātmikā-
niti vṛddha‍yabhāvaśchāndasaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti āvṛttyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<head>atha ātmatvopāsanādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। ātmeti tūpagacchanti grāhayanti ca ।। 3 ।।</pratika> vidyāyāssākṣātkāraphalārthā-
pattiprasūtamāvṛttiguṇakatvamupapāditam । idānīṃ paśutvanivṛttirūpaphalārthāpattirūpaṃ śivo-
'hamiti bhāvanārūpatvamupapādyata iti saṅgatiṃ darśayati---<pratika>pūrvatreti । tadātmana iti</pratika> ।
taduktaṃ brahmakarmakopāsanamātmano jīvasya kartustadbhāvena jīvabhāvena uta tadarthāntaratvena
jīvabhinnatveneti brahmaṇo jīvādhikatvopapattyanupapattibhyāṃ saṃśaya ityarthaḥ । bhedanirdeśā-
dityādiśabdena <quote>‘adhikopadeśāttu bādarāyaṇasyaivam’</quote> । <ref>(bra॰3—4—8)</ref> suṣuptyutkra-</p>

<head>atha āvṛttyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। āvṛttirasakṛdupadeśāt ।। 1 ।। liṅgācca ।। 2 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>muktyarthatayā vihitaṃ brahmajñānaṃ sakṛtkāryam । bhavati hi vidhiśāstrārthaḥ kṛta eva sakṛtkṛte'pyasmin ।। 329 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>āvartanīyamasakṛtsākṣātkṛtirūpaphalakatvāt । antarnītāvṛttikatadupāsti......upadeśācca ।। 33 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti āvṛttyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<p><note>(1) <quote>‘ajñatvasarvajñatvādiguṇairnyūnādhikabhāvasya saṃpratipannatvācca’</quote> iti pāṭhāntaram ।</note>
<pb n="427"/>
jīvasya tadbhi(svabhi)nnatvenaiva yujyata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।। siddhāntastu । yadyapi jīvāda-
dhikameva śivākhyaṃ paraṃ brahma, tathā'pyupāsitā'haṃ brahmāsmīti tadupāsīta । yataḥ pūrve'-
pyupāsitāraḥ <quote>‘tvaṃ vā ahamasmi bhagavo devate ahaṃ vai tvamasi’</quote> ityātmetyevāva-
gacchanti । upāsiturarthāntaratve'pi tānupāsitṝnanugṛhṇāti svasvarūpatayā paraṃ brahma ।
te ca punaḥ svātmatayā grāhayanti parānapi śiṣyān <quote>‘tattvamasi’</quote> ityādinā ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ntyorbhedena’ <ref>(bra॰ 1—3—42)</ref> ityādisūtrāṇi gṛhyante । <pratika>tadbhinnatvenaiveti</pratika> । evakā-
reṇa <quote>‘tvaṃ vā āhamasmi’</quote> <quote>‘tattvamasi’</quote> ityādisāmānādhikaraṇyanibandhanaṃ paśutvanivṛttiphalā-
rthāpattinibandhanaṃ cābhedenopāsanaṃ vyāvartyate । sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ śarīraśarīribhāvenopa-
padyate । paśutvanivṛttiphalakatvaṃ svaśarīrakaśivopāsanāyāstādarthyavidhibalenopapadyata iti
bhāvaḥ । <pratika>tvaṃ vā ahamasmīti</pratika> । yadi śarīraśarīribhāvanibandhanaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tadā-
nīmahaṃ vai tvamasīti nirdeśa evopapadyate । tvaṃśabdanirdiṣṭe parameśvare svaśarīrakatvaparyantasyā-
haṃśabdasya vṛttyupapatteḥ । <quote>‘tvaṃ vā ahamasmī’</quote>ti nirdeśastu nopapadyate । ahaṃśabdanirdiṣṭe
parameśvaraśarīrarūpe svasminparameśvaravācinastvaṃśabdasya pravṛttyanupapatteḥ । śarīravācināṃ hi
śarīriparyantatvaṃ vyutpattisiddhaṃ na tu śarīrivācināṃ śarīraparyantatvam । ataḥ karmavyati-
hāreṇa svasminparameśvaradṛṣṭiḥ parameśvare svadṛṣṭiśca vidhitsitātretyavasīyate । nanu tathā
satyutkṛṣṭe nikṛṣṭadṛṣṭirapyatra vidheyā syāt । na ceṣṭāpattiḥ । <quote>‘brahmadṛṣṭirutkarṣā’</quote>diti nyāya-
virodhāt । tasmādvākyadvaye'pi tvaṃśabdau prastutaguṇaviśiṣṭaparameśvaraviṣayau । ahaṃśabdau
svaśarīrakatvaviśiṣṭaparameśvaraviṣayau । asmyasiśabdau tūddeśyasamarpakāhaṃtvaṃśabdamātraprayuktau
na tvahaṃtvaṃśabdayoḥ svātmaparameśvaratvaprayuktāviti vyākhyātumucitamiti cet maivam । tathā
satyekena vākyena svāntaryāmiṇaḥ parameśvarasya cābhedasya siddha‍yā vākyāntaravaiyarthyāpatteḥ ।
na cābhedapratipattidārḍhyārthaṃ vākyadvayaṃ tadubhayabhedabhrāntivāsanānuvṛttyabhāvena taddārḍhyāpā-
danasya niṣprayojanatvāt । tasmā<quote>‘dyadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva ka’</quote>mityatrevātrāpi
vākyadvayasya karmavyatihāreṇāvagatividhānārthatvameva yuktam । <quote>‘brahmadṛṣṭirutkarṣā’</quote>diti sā-
mānyanyāyastu viśeṣavacanenāpodyate । evaṃ jābālavākyadvayava<quote>‘ttadyo'haṃ so'sau yo'sau
so'ha’</quote> mityaitareyavākyadvayamapyanyonyābhedadṛṣṭividhānaparatayaiva mahāvākyavidhayaivaikavā-
kyatvaṃ netavyam । <pratika>upāsituriti</pratika> । yadyapyupāsiturbhinna eva parameśvarastathāpi māntrikādbhinno
garuḍa iva ciraniraṃtarāsevitābhedabhāvanādārḍhyasaṃbandhena prātītikena svasvarūpatvenānugṛ-
hṇāti । yathā garuḍaḥ viṣasaṃharaṇasāmarthyaviśeṣapradānena mantriṇo'nugṛhṇāti tathā parameśvaraḥ
paśutvanivṛttirūpaphalapradānenopāsakānanugṛhṇātītyarthaḥ । <pratika>tattvamasītyādineti</pratika> । <quote>‘tattva-
masī’</quote>tyatra tvaṃśabdanirdiṣṭaprāgvarṇitajagatkāraṇatvādiviśiṣṭaparameśvarābhedo bodhyata i-
tyasiśabdayogādavasīyate । atastatra tvaṃśabdaḥ saṃbodhyajīvamātraparaḥ na tu tadanta-
ryāmipara ityabhyupagantavyam । saṃbodhyaṃ prati svātmana iva svāntaryāmiṇaḥ svānubhavena vā
prācīnopadeśena vā prasiddhatvābhāvena tasya taṃ pratyuddeśyatānarhatvāt prakṛtasya sadrūpasya
parameśvarasya kathaṃcitsvāntaryāmitayā prāgupadiṣṭatvasamarthane tatra tadbhedaśaṅkānudayena tada-
<pb n="428"/>
niravadhikaparamānandamayaniṣkalaṅkaśivatvaprāptirhi muktiḥ । śivatvaprāptirātmanaḥ
paśutvanivṛttimantareṇa na saṃbhavati । paśutvanivṛttiśca na tadbhāvanāṃ vinā । ato
nirantaraṃ śivo'hamiti bhāvanāpravāheṇa śithilitapāśatayā'pagatapaśubhāva
upāsakaḥ śiva eva bhavati । nirastasamastadoṣakalaṅkaśaṅkāniratiśayamaṅgalāspadaṃ
hi śivatvam । paraṃ brahma ca tādṛgeva । tadbhāvanayopāsakaśca tathaiva bhavati । ata
eva tadanyasya mumukṣudhyeyatvaṃ niṣidhyate । <quote>‘śiva eko dhyeyaḥ śivaṃkaraḥ sarvamanyat
parityajya’</quote> ityādiśrutiṣu । nivṛttabrāhmaṇādidehābhimānamayapaśubhāvasya nirati-
śayasvarūpānandasākṣisvaprakāśaśivarūpaparāhaṃbhāvāpattirmuktiriti sarvaśrutitā-
tparyāt । brahmabhāvenopāsanamupāsakasya muktikaram, anyathā saṃsārānivṛ-
ttiriti ।।
iti ātmatvopāsanādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
bhedabodhanānapekṣaṇāt । atastattvamasītivākyaṃ svātmani brahmadṛṣṭividhiparamityevābhyupaga-
ntavyam । na ca tasya vidyāvidhiparatve pratikhaṇḍamabhyāsena vidyābhedaḥ syāditi śaṅkanī-
yam । prathamakhaṇḍa eva svātmani brahmadṛṣṭau vihitāyāṃ dvitīyādikhaṇḍeṣu śaṅkāviśeṣa-
nirākaraṇapūrvakaṃ tadanuvāda iti <quote>‘saiva hi satyādaya’</quote> i<ref>(bra॰ 3—3—38)</ref>tyadhikaraṇe
samarthitatvāt । anuvādaśca sadrūpaṃ brahmāsmīti bhāvanayā tavāpi brahmātmatā sphuṭaḥ bhavi-
ṣyatītyetaddārḍhyārthaḥ । vartamānasāmīpye vartamānārthapratyayaḥ । tattvamasītyādinetyādiśabdena
<quote>‘sa ta ātmā sarvāntaraḥ’</quote> <quote>‘eṣa ta ātmā sarvāntaraḥ’</quote> ityādayo gṛhyante । tatrāpyabhyāso
bhāvanāsādhyābhedadārḍhyārthaḥ । nanu jīvabrahmaṇorbhedā <quote>‘dahaṃ brahmāsmi’</quote> <quote>‘śivo'hamasmi’</quote>
ityādi bhāvanā bhramarūpā syāt । sā kathaṃ muktiheturityāśaṅkānirākaraṇāyāha---<pratika>nira-
vadhiketi</pratika> । yathā kīṭasya kīṭatvanivṛttipūrvakabhramaratvaprāptirbhramarāhaṃbhāvasādhyā evaṃ
paśoḥ paśutvanivṛttipūrvakanirastasamastadoṣakalyāṇaguṇāvirbhāvarūpaśivatvaprāptiśśivāhaṃbhā-
vasādhyeti <quote>‘devo bhūtvā devānapyetī’</quote>ti śruteravasīyate । na ca śrutipratipanne'rthe kāci-
danupapattiriti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>tathaiva bhavatīti</pratika> । anādiśivavattadabhedabhāvanayā tadvatsvayamapi
śiva eva bhavatītyarthaḥ । <pratika>ata eveti</pratika> । yataśśivābhedabhāvanayaiva śivatvaprāptiḥ na tu
śivetarabhāvanayā ata evetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
