<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha ātmatvopāsanādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। ātmeti tūpagacchanti grāhayanti ca ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>viduṣāṃ brahmopāsyaṃ svasmādarthāntaratvena । bhinnaṃ hi jīvavargādviśvādhikamīśvarākhyaṃ tat ।। 331 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>bhinnamapi hyātmatayā tiṣṭhati jīveṣu bhinnamevopāsyam । grahaṇāgrahaṇarītiruditā pūrveṣāmapi sadeva muditā śrutiṣu ।। 332 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti ātmatvopāsanādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<pb n="429"/>
atha pratīkādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
viśeṣamāha---
<sutra>sū ।। na pratīke na hi saḥ ।। 4 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘mano brahmetyupāsīta’</quote> ityādiśrutiṣu manaḥprabhṛtiṣu brahmopāsanamavagamyate ।
teṣvapyātmatvenopāsanamuta bhinnatvena, iti saṃśaye pūrvapakṣaḥ । <quote>‘mano brahmetyu-
pāsīta’</quote> <quote>‘ādityo brahmetyupāsīta’</quote> ityādinā siddheṣu pratīkopāsaneṣu brahmadṛṣṭyā
saṃskṛtaṃ manaḥprabhṛtikamupāsyamavagamyate । ataḥ pratīkamupāsakena brahmatayā bhāvi-
tamityātmatayā tadupāsane ko virodha iti prāpta ucyate । nātmagrahaṇaṃ pratī-
keṣu hi na paraṃ brahmopāsyam, kiṃtu brahmadṛṣṭyā manaḥprabhṛtikamupāsyam । tatra mana-
ādiviśiṣṭasya brahmaṇa evopāsyatvepi manaāderbrahmaguṇatvābhāvāt vikāratvena
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha pratīkādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p>uttarādhikaraṇamavatārayati---<pratika>viśeṣamāheti</pratika> । kāsucidvidyāsu śivābhedabhāvanāyā
apavādamāhetyarthaḥ । <pratika>sū॰ ।। na pratīke na hi saḥ ।। 4 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘mano brahme’</quote>tyādivākyairmana-
ādiṣu brahmadṛṣṭirvidhīyate na tu brahmaṇi manaādidṛṣṭirityuttarādhikaraṇe vakṣyate । tatra
kiṃ manaādiṣu pratīkeṣu brahmabuddhiviṣayatvādbrahmaṇīva svātmadṛṣṭyāpyupāsanaṃ kāryamuta
yathāvidhi brahmadṛṣṭimātreṇeti saṃśaye pūrvapakṣaḥ । pūrvādhikaraṇe hi brahmadṛṣṭyopāsyamānaḥ
svātmā upāsakaṃ prati brahmatvenāvabhāsata ityuktam । evaṃ brahmadṛṣṭyopāsyamānā manaāda-
yo'pi brahmatvenāvabhāseran । tathāvabhāsamāneṣu ca svātmadṛṣṭiḥ kartumucitā । yathā bra-
hmaṇi । tasmātpratīkopāsaneṣvapi svātmadṛṣṭiḥ pravartata iti । siddhāntastu brahmāhamitivat
manaādikamahamityāhatya na śrūyate । arthānmanaādau brahmatvenāvabhānātsvātmadṛṣṭirāpatati
cedāpatatu nāma । naitāvatā teṣu brahmadṛṣṭividhiḥ spṛṣṭo bhavati । na hi tapasyato'rthā-
tkleśo bhavatīti, so'pi vidheyaḥ । kiṃtu yadarthādāpatadvidhyantarākāṃkṣitaṃ tadeva vidheyam ।
yatheṣṭakākaraṇakasthaṇḍilanirvṛttividhyādyākāṃkṣitamiṣṭakopadhānādikam । na ceha śrutāyā
brahmadṛṣṭeḥ svātmadṛṣṭyabhāve'nupapattyā tadākāṃkṣāsti yena svātmadṛṣṭirapi vidhispṛṣṭā
bhavet । tasmādyathāvidhi brahmadṛṣṭimātreṇa manaādipratīkopāsanā kāryāḥ । yadi <quote>‘mano-
brahme’</quote> tyādyupāsanāsu manaādidṛṣṭyā brahmaivopāsyaṃ tathāpi na svātmadṛṣṭividhiḥ sidhyati ।
tadā hi brahma manaādivikārātmanaivāvabhāseta । na ca vikāratayāvabhāsamānaṃ svātma-
tayopāsitumarham । svātmano'pi vikāritvāvabhāsaprasaṅgāt । ata ubhayathāpi pratīko-
pāsaneṣu na svātmadṛṣṭiḥ pravartate । vastutastu vakṣyamāṇādhikaraṇarītyā manaādiṣveva
brahmadṛṣṭirvidheyā । sā ca, manaādīnāṃ brahmaṇaśca na bhedāvabhāsavirodhinī । kāmyānā
pratīkopāsanānāṃ sākṣātkāraparyantatvābhāvena bhāvanāprakarṣakṛtābhedadārḍhyānapekṣaṇāt ।
atha eva tāsāṃ yathākāmaṃ samuccayo'pi prākpratipāditaḥ । tasmādavabhāsato'pi manaā-
dīnāṃ brahmabhāvābhāvādarthādapi teṣu na svātmadṛṣṭirāpatatīti tattvam । sūtrasya manaādau
<pb n="430"/>
tadviśiṣṭe brahmaṇi nātmagrahaṇam । kiṃtu satyasaṃkalpatvādiviśiṣṭe । anyathā
hyātmano'pi vikārāspadatvaṃ syāt । ataḥ pratīke nātmagrahaṇamupāsakānām ।
na hi tatra parameśvaraḥ sākṣādupāsya iti ।।
iti pratīkādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
atha brahmadṛṣṭyadhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। brahmadṛṣṭirutkarṣāt ।। 5 ।।</sutra>
pratīkopāsane manaādityādipratīke brahmadṛṣṭirupāsakena kartavyā, uta brahmaṇi
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pratīke svātmadṛṣṭirna kāryā । na hi pratīko vastutaḥ parameśvaraḥ । parameśvaratvābhāve ca
parameśvaratvabhāvanāprakarṣavaśādarthādāpatantyapi svātmadṛṣṭirvidhyanākāṅkṣitatvānna vidhiviṣaya
iti saiddhāntike prathamaprakāre'rthaḥ । dvitīyaprakāre tu pratīkopāsaneṣu parameśvarasyaiva mana-
ādidṛṣṭyopāsyatve'pi svātmadṛṣṭistasminna kāryā । na hi tathopāsiturupāsyaḥ parameśvara-
tayāvabhāseta । kiṃtu bhāvanāprakarṣavaśātsa manaādivikārarūpatayaiveti na svātmadṛṣṭiḥ
kartumucitetyarthaḥ । vastugatimavalaṃbya prakāradvayopamardena pravṛtte tṛtīye tu prakāre pratīke
manaādau svātmadṛṣṭirna kāryā । na hi tatropāsyaḥ pratīko'vabhāsato'pi parameśvarapratīko-
pāsaneṣu sākṣātkāraparyantabhāvanāprakarṣābhāvena bhedāvabhāsānuvṛtteḥ vidhibalādāhāryāro-
parūpasya parameśvaradṛṣṭimātrasya bhedāvabhāsāvirodhitvāditi prathamaprakāropamardopayogyarthaḥ
pratīkopāsaneṣu svātmadṛṣṭirna kāryā । na hi tatra parameśvaraḥ sākṣādupāsyaḥ parameśvaradṛṣṭisaṃskṛ-
tasya manaādereva sākṣādupāsyatvāt । yatra viśeṣaṇatayānyopasarjanatvaṃ vinā parameśvarasya
sākṣādupāsyatvaṃ tatraiva vyatihāreṇopāsanacodanādityarthaḥ । bhāṣye saṃśayavākyagatasya
tadbhinnatvenetyasya svātmābhedadṛṣṭimantareṇetyarthaḥ । na hi pratīkeṣu svātmabhinnatvamapyupāsya-
mavidhānāt ।।</p>
<head>iti pratīkādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<head>atha brahmadṛṣṭyadhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p>nanu manaādessākṣādupāsyatvamasiddhaṃ । <quote>‘mano brahme’</quote>tyādisāmānādhikaraṇyasyobhayathāpi
saṃbhavāt । ubhayathā saṃbhave ca phalapradānasamarthasya brahmaṇa evopāsanābhirārādhanīyatve
vidhitātparyakalpanaṃ yuktaṃ na tu tadasamarthasya manaādeḥ । tathā ca <quote>‘mano brahme’</quote>tyādiṣu
brahmaṇa eva sākṣādupāsyatvāttatra manaādyabhedabhāvanāprakarṣābhāvena vikāratvāprasaṃkteśca
svātmadṛṣṭiḥ kāryaiveti pūrvādhikaraṇākṣepasamādhānārthamadhikaraṇāntaraṃ pravartate । <pratika>sū॰ ।।
brahmadṛṣṭirutkarṣāt ।। 5 ।।</pratika> spaṣṭo'dhikaraṇārthaḥ । nanu pratīkopāsanaṃ manaādiviṣayamiva</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha pratīkādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। na pratīke na hi saḥ ।। 4 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>evaṃ svātmatvamatiḥ kāryā manasi pratīke'pi । tatra.........dvārāpi kalayituṃ yuktam ।। 333 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>tatra mano yadyupāsyaṃ brahmeti brahma mana iti vā । dvedhāpi svātmatayā nopāsyaṃ tadvikāratvāt ।। 334 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti pratīkādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<pb n="431"/>
<p>tadda‍ṛṣṭiḥ । iti sandehe pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । manaādidṛṣṭiṃ brahmaṇi kṛtvā brahmopāsanīyam,
tasyaiva phaladātṛtvāt ।। ityevaṃ prāpta ucyate । <quote>‘viśvādhiko rudra’</quote> ityādiṣu brahmaṇa
utkṛṣṭatvāvagamāt tadda‍ṛṣṭireva nikṛṣṭeṣu manaādiṣu kartavyā । loke hi nikṛṣṭe
bhṛtyādau rājadṛṣṭiṃ kṛtvā rājavat tamupāsate । na tu bhṛtyadṛṣṭiṃ kṛtvā rājānamupāsate
kecidapi । idameva ca paramaucityaṃ yudutkṛṣṭaṃ vastu tadeva sarve namanti । ataḥ paraṃ
brahma sarvotkṛṣṭatayaiva sarvanamaskāraviṣayo'vagamyate । <quote>‘ṛtaṃ satyam’</quote> iti mantre
uktaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaṃ yat paraṃ brahma, <quote>‘viśvarūpāya tasmā eva namaḥ’</quote> sarvo'pi nama-
skāraḥ, nānyasmai kvacidapīti ।। kiṃcāsya parabrahmaṇa utkṛṣṭatayaiva namaskāraviṣayatvaṃ
lakṣaṇamuktam । tathā hi taittirīyaśrutau <quote>‘yasmai namastacchiro dharmo mūrdhānaṃ brahmo-
ttarā hanuryajño'dharā viṣṇurhṛdayaṃ saṃvatsaraḥ prajananam’</quote> ityādinā śiṃśumārātma-
nirūpaṇe hṛdayādirūpebhyo viṣṇvādibhyaḥ pārthakyena sarvotkṛṣṭatvādevāsya parabra-
hmaṇaḥ śivasya pradhānaśirorūpatvaṃ <quote>‘yasmai namastacchiraḥ’</quote> iti namaskāraviṣayatvena
lakṣaṇenaivānūdyābhihitam । avasāne ca ‘tvaṃ bhūtānāmadhipatirasi tvaṃ bhūtānāṃ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
viriñcanārāyaṇādiviṣayamapi śrutismṛtītihāsādiṣu prasiddham । tatra kiṃ viriñcādaya
utkṛṣṭāḥ kiṃvā parabrahmatvābhimataḥ paramaśiva ityanavadhāraṇādupāsyānirdhāraṇaṃ prāpnuyādi-
tyāśaṃkya sthāpite'pi bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ śivasya sarvotkṛṣṭatve prakārāntareṇāpi tasya tadvya-
vasthāpayitumupakramate---<pratika>idameva ca paramaucityamiti । nānyasmai kvacidapīti ।</pratika> yathākha-
<quote>‘lvimā rudrāya sthiradhanvane gira’</quote> iti mantraḥ śivasya sakalaśrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇādi-
paratattvaviṣayaśabdajālatātparyaparyavasānabhūmitvaṃ <quote>‘smṛtayaśca purāṇāni bhāratādīni sattam ।
śivameva sadā sāṃbaṃ hṛdi kṛtvā bruvanti hī’</quote>ti purāṇopabṛṃhitaṃ pratipādayati । evaṃ <quote>‘viśvarū-
rūpāya vai nama’</quote> iti mantraḥ tasya sarvanamaskāraparyavasānabhūmitvaṃ pratipādayatītyanyatraiva
paryavasitaḥ ko'pi namaskāro nāstītyarthaḥ । kiṃceti । taittirīyāraṇyake dhyānārthaṃ śiṃśu-
māraśarīrakatayā paramātmapratipādena kāsāṃciddevatānāṃ tadīyaśiromūrdhahanudvayahṛdayama-
dhyacaraṇacatuṣṭayapuccharūpasaptāvayavatayā nirūpaṇaṃ kṛtam । tatra viṣṇvādayaḥ svasvanāmabhirni-
rdiṣṭāḥ śivastu namaskāraviṣayatvena dharmeṇa nirdiṣṭaḥ । tena namaskāraviṣayatvaṃ śivasyā-
sādhāraṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vivakṣitamityunnīyata iti bhāvaḥ । nanu namaskāraviṣayatvena nirdiśya
śirorūpapradhānāvayavatvena rūpitaḥ śiva iti kathaṃ jñāyate yena tasya tallakṣaṇaṃ vivakṣita-
mityunnīyetetyāśaṅkāyāmāha---<pratika>avasāne ceti</pratika> । upasaṃhāre bhūtapatitvena <quote>‘śreṣṭho jātasya
rudra śriyāsī’</quote> dityādimantrapratipannena śreṣṭhatvena ca liṅgena śivaṃ prastutya <quote>‘namasta’</quote> iti nama-
skārasāmānyasya tadīyatvamuktvā tadvivaraṇenoktārthadṛḍhīkaraṇāya <quote>‘namassarvata’</quote> iti sarva-
syāpi namaskārasya tadīyatvamuktam । tena prāgapi namaskāraviṣayatvena nirdiṣṭaḥ śiva eveti
niścīyate । <quote>‘namassarvata’</quote> ityupasaṃhāre yasya sarvanamaskāraparyavasānabhūmitvaṃ vakṣyate <quote>‘tacchira’</quote>
iti । etadarthaparatvādupakramavākyasya saṃbhāvitaśivasamānotkarṣayorviṣṇuprajāpatyoḥ <quote>‘viṣṇu-
rhṛdayamagniḥ pucchasya prathamaṃ kāṇḍaṃ tata indrastataḥ prajāpatiriti pṛthaggrahaṇena ca tathā niścīyata
iti bhāvaḥ । śiṃśumārākṛtistu sarvopādānabhūtā śaivī cicchaktiḥ । tadādhāratvena pradhā-
<pb n="432"/>
śreṣṭho'si’</quote> ityasyaiva sarvabhūtaviṣayamādhipatyaṃ śreṣṭhatvaṃ coktvā <quote>‘nasaste namaḥ sarvaṃ te
namaḥ’</quote> iti sakalabhūtotkṛṣṭatvāt siddhamakhilanamaskāraparyavasānabhūmitvamuktam ।
sarvatra ca <quote>‘namaste rudra manyave’</quote> ityādiṣu sarvotkṛṣṭatayaiva punaḥ punarasmai namaḥ prayu-
jyate । aiśvaryādinā hi loke'dhikaṃ namanti । tataḥ sarvanamaskāraviṣayatayā sarvo-
tkṛṣṭamumāsahitaṃ virūpākṣamīśvaraśabdaikaviṣayabhūtaṃ paraṃ brahma । asya sarvotkṛṣṭasya
sarvanamaskāryasya vyāptidṛṣṭyā sarveṣāṃ manaādityādīnāṃ pratīkānāmupāsyatvam ।
ata eva <quote>‘śvabhyaḥ śvapatibhyaśca vo namaḥ’</quote> ityādiṣu śvādiṣvatyantanikṛṣṭeṣvapi sarvo-
tkṛṣṭabrahmavyāptidṛṣṭyā śrutirnamaḥ prayuṅkte । tasmādutkṛṣṭasaṃbandhānnikṛṣṭeṣūpacāradarśanāt
viśvādhikabrahmadṛṣṭyā manaḥ prabhṛtīnāmupāsyatvaṃ siddham ।।
iti brahmadṛṣṭyadhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
natayā śivasya śirastvena nirūpaṇamagre namaskāraśca । vaidikeṣu śivamantreṣu namaskārabhūya-
stvamapi tasya sarvotkarṣe liṅgamityāha---<pratika>sarvatra ceti</pratika> । nanūtkarṣādiva bhayādapi loke
namaskāro dṛśyate śrutāvapi dṛśyate <quote>‘namaste astu mā mā him̐/?/sī’</quote>riti । ataśśive nama-
skārabhūyastvaṃ tasyogratvena bhayabhūyastvādupapannamityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>aiśvaryādineti</pratika> । bhayā-
dapi namaskāraḥ śrutau notkarṣaṃ vinā pravartate <quote>‘namaste harase śociṣe namaste astvarciṣe ।
anyaṃ te asmattapantu hetayāḥ pāvako asmabhyaṃ śivo bhave’</quote>ti mantre <quote>‘namaste astu mā mā
him̐/?/sī’</quote>rityetatsamānaviṣaya eva śrutasya namaskārasya <quote>‘namaste harase śociṣe’</quote> ityūhe <quote>‘nama-
skṛtya hi vasīyāṃsamupacarantī’</quote>ti tanmantrabrāhmaṇenautsargikasvaviṣayotkarṣaprayuktatvāttyā-
gokteḥ śrutau kevalaṃ bhayaprayuktasya namaskārasya saṃbhave'pi namaskārabhūyastvasya bhayabhūya-
stvonnāyakatayaiva sarvotkarṣajñāpakatvasyāparihāryatvācca । mahābhayahetutvaṃ hi parabrahmaliṅgaṃ
<quote>‘bhīṣāsmādvātaḥ pavate, mahadbhayaṃ vajramudyata’</quote> mityādiśravaṇāditi bhāvaḥ । yaduktaṃ brahmaṇa
eva phaladātṛtvādupāsyatvaṃ yuktamiti tatrāha---<pratika>asya sarvotkṛṣṭasyeti</pratika> । manaādīnā-
mapi parameśvararūpatvaprayuktasyopāsyatvaprayojakasyotkarṣasya sattvātteṣāṃ brahmadṛṣṭyopāsyatvaṃ
yuktam । tadrūpatvaprayuktotkarṣādeva hi hīnajātīnāmapi namaskāryatvam । ataḥ pratimā-
rcanayaiva prītaḥ parameśvara eva phalaṃ dadātīti bhāvaḥ । asminpūrvapakṣayuktinirākaraṇe'pi
sūtramāvṛttyā yojanīyam । manaādiṣu brahmadṛṣṭiḥ kartavyā । teṣvapi brahmarūpaprayuktasya
pratimādiṣvivopāsyatvaprayojakasyotkarṣasya sattvāditi ।।</p>

atha ādityādimatyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। ādityādimatayaścāṅga upapatteḥ ।। 6 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatra brahmaṇa utkṛṣṭatvādādityādiṣu tadda‍ṛṣṭirupāsane'bhihitā <quote>‘ya evāsau
tapati tamudgīthamupāsīta’</quote> ityādiṣu karmāṅgopāsaneṣūdgīthādidṛṣṭirādityādiṣu
kāryā, uta viparyāsenaiva iti saṃśayaḥ ।। kiṃ tāvat prāptam? udgīthādīnāmādi-
tyādīnāṃ ca karmāṅgatvabrahmarūpatvāviśeṣādaniyama iti । evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ । ādi
tyādeḥ karmārādhyatvenotkṛṣṭatvāt karmāṅge udgīthādau tadda‍ṛṣṭiḥ kāryā tadda‍ṛṣṭisaṃskṛta-
syodgīthādikarmaṇaḥ phalātiśayasaṃbhavāt । yat khalu svato vīryavat kriyamāṇaṃ
ca, tasyaiva vidyāyā saṃskṛtasya vīryavattaratvarūpaphalātiśayaḥ ‘yadeva vidyāyā karoti
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha ādityādimatyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। ādityādimatayaścāṅga upapatteḥ ।। 6 ।।</pratika> saṅgatiṃ darśayati---<pratika>pūrvatreti</pratika> । u-
tkṛṣṭadṛṣṭyāpakṛṣṭamupāsanīyamityuktam । evaṃ sati <quote>‘ya evāsau tapatī’</quote>tyādau utkarṣaprayojaka-
mekarūpamiti tatrānavadhāraṇaṃ syāt । tatra yadva‍ṛttayogaprāthamyānusaraṇe tvādityādidṛṣṭirevo-
dgīthādiṣu kāryeti viparyāsenopāsanā syādityākṣipyata iti saṅgatiriti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>ani-
yama iti ।</pratika> yadva‍ṛttayogaprāthamyānusaraṇe tu viparyāsenopāsanā syāditi śeṣaḥ । evaṃ pūrva-
pakṣaparyavasānamabhipretyaiva saṃśayavākye koṭidvayamavadhāraṇena darśitam । <pratika>karmārādhyatveneti ।</pratika>
tathā ca karmāṅgatvena samāne'pi devatādhikaraṇanyāyādārādhyatvenotkarṣo'stītyarthaḥ । <quote>‘nanva-
bhimanthati sa hiṅkāro dhūmo jāyate sa prastāvo jvalati sa udgītho'ṅgārā bhavanti sa prati-
hāra upaśāmyati tannidhanamupamantrayate sa hiṅkāro jñapayate sa prastāvaḥ striyā saha śete sa
udgīthaḥ pratistri saha śete sa pratihāraḥ kālaṃ gacchati tannidhana’</quote> mityetadādiṣu rathantara-
vāmadevyādigatahiṅkārādyanubandhinīṣūpāsanāsu devatātvaprasiddhirahitānāmabhimanthanādīnāṃ
na karmārādhyatvenotkarṣa upapādayituṃ śakyate । ādityādīnāmapyudgīthādivatsarvasomayā-
gasādhāraṇyena karmāṅgatvaṃ na vaktuṃ śakyate dūre tattatkarmārādhyatvaṃ tathāpyādityādipadaprāpteḥ
karmaphalatvātkarmaphalarūpatayādityādīnāmutkarṣaḥ syāditi na vācyam । yajñādisiddherapi
puṇyaphalatvena tasyodgīthādisādhāraṇyādityanuśayādutkarṣahetumapahā<quote>‘yopapatte’</quote>riti sautrahe-
tumupādatte---<pratika>tadda‍ṛṣṭisaṃskṛtasyeti ।</pratika> nanūdgīthādikaṃ karmāṅgatvena vīryavatsādhyarūpatayā
kriyamāṇaṃ cāvagatamiti tasya vidyayā kriyamāṇatvanirdeśastayā kriyamāṇasya vīryavattaro-
ktiśca yujyata iti tatrodgītha upāsya iti sidhyatu nāma na tāvatā <quote>‘ya evāsau tapatī’</quote>-
tyādiṣvādityādidṛṣṭyodgītha upāsya ityetadapi sidadhyati । <quote>‘yadeva vidyaye’</quote>tyasya prakṛtāptyā-
diguṇakodgīthavidyāmātraviṣayatvasya, <quote>‘asārvatrikī’</quote>ti sūtravarṇitatvāt । tasyāmādityādi-
sāmānādhikaraṇyāśravaṇenāptyādiguṇaka udgītha evopāsya ityarthasyāsandigdhatvena tadarthama-
dhikaraṇānapekṣaṇāt <quote>‘yadeva vidyaye’</quote>tyasya prakṛtamudgīthamāśritya vidhīyamānāsu sarvāsvapi
vidyāsu sādhāraṇye'pi <quote>‘samastasya khalu sāmna upāsanaṃ sādhvi’</quote>tyādinā vidhīyamānāsu
<pb n="434"/>
tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati’ iti vākyādavagamyate । evaṃ ca brahmātmatvādisāmye'-
pyudgīthādikriyācodanādudgīthādeḥ kriyamāṇatvena phalasādhanatvāt tadviparītasi-
ddhasvabhāvādādityādestathā phalasādhanatvābhāvādādityādidṛṣṭirudgīthādiṣvaṅgeṣviti
nirṇayaḥ ।।
iti ādityādimatyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
atha āsīnādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। āsīnaḥ saṃbhavāt ।। 7 ।।</sutra>
upapāditamupāsanāvyavasthāpanam । tadihopāsanasyāsananiyamo'sti na veti
saṃśayaḥ ।। kvacidapi <quote>‘āsīna upāsīta’</quote> iti niyamāśravaṇānmānasavyāpārarū-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pañcavidhasāmādyupāsanāsu sādhāraṇyābhāvena na tāsvanena nyāyena sāmāvayavā lokāvaya-
vadṛṣṭyopāsyā iti nirṇayassidhyati । evamudgīthādessādhyasya phalasādhanatvaṃ yuktaṃ na siddha-
svabhāvasyādityāderiti nyāyenāpi nirṇayassidhyati । <quote>‘abhimanthati sa hiṅkāraḥ upamantra-
yate sa hiṅkāraḥ abhrāṇi saṃplavante sa hiṅkāraḥ’</quote> ityādiṣu karmāṅgasamānādhikaraṇasyāpi
kriyārūpatvātsarvatrāpyupāsanāyāḥ kriyārūpatvācca । akriyārūpatve'pi godohanādivatkri-
yānurāgeṇa phalasādhanatvasaṃbhavāccetyanuśayādaṅgapadasamabhivyāhṛtena <quote>‘upapatte’</quote>riti sautrapa-
dena darśitaṃ hetutayāviṣkaroti---<pratika>aṅgeṣviti</pratika> । aṅgānaṅgasamabhivyāhāravatīnāṃ vidyānā-
maṅgeṣvanaṅgadṛṣṭirūpatvena pradhānakarmaprayuktāṅgaśrayatvātsvatantraphalānāmapi tāsāṃ pṛthakprayu-
ktirna kalpyeti prayuktilāghavaṃ labhyate । vaiparītye tu prayuktyantarakalpanāgauravaṃ bhavediti
lāghavanyāyo'tra vivakṣitaḥ । <quote>‘ya evāsau tapati pṛthivī hiṅkāra’</quote> ityādiṣu yadva‍ṛttaprātha-
myādikaṃ tvaprayojakam । udgīthamupāsīta samastasya khalu sāmna upāsanaṃ sādhviti tataḥ
prāgeva karmāṅgaviṣayatvenopāsanopakramādityāśayaḥ ।।</p>

<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। āsīnaḥ saṃbhavāt ।। 7 ।।</pratika> avasitamahaṃgrahaprasaktānuprasaktam । paravidyāvi-
ṣaya eva vicāro'nuvartate । paravidyānāṃ pradhānaphalārthāpattimūlāvāvṛttyahaṃgrahaguṇau vicā-

<lg><l>āditye vodgīthassamupāsyastatra vādityaḥ । syādubhayorapi karmāṅgabrahmarūpatādiguṇaiḥ ।। 337 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>prāpyatvenādityaḥ phalarūpatvāddhi devatātvācca । udgīthādutkṛṣṭastasmāttadda‍ṛṣṭirudgīthe ।। 338 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti ādityādimatyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<pb n="435"/>
<p>pasyopāsanasya sarvāvasthāyāmapi saṃbhavānnāstyāsananiyama upāsakasyeti pūrvaḥ
pakṣaḥ ।। siddhāntastu । āsīna eva brahmopāsīta, tasyaivaikāgryasaṃbhavāt । asti
cāsananiyamaśrutirapi---<quote>‘viviktadeśe tu sukhāsanasthaḥ śuciḥ samagrīvaśiraḥ-
śarīraḥ । antyāśramasthassakalendriyāṇi nirudhya bhaktyā svaguruṃ praṇamya । hṛtyu-
ṇḍarīkaṃ virajaṃ viśuddhaṃ vicintya madhye viśadaṃ viśokam । anantamavyaktamaci-
ntyarūpaṃ śivaṃ praśāntamamṛtaṃ brahmayonim । tathā'dimadhyāntavihīnamekaṃ vibhuṃ
cidānandamarūpamadbha‍utam । umāsahāyaṃ parameśvaraṃ prabhuṃ trilocanaṃ nīlakaṇṭhaṃ praśā-
ntam ।। dhyātvā munirgacchati bhūtayoniṃ samastasākṣiṃ tamasaḥ parastāt ।’</quote> iti
kaivalyopaniṣadi । ata āsīna eva brahmopāsīteti ।।
<sutra>sū ।। dhyānācca ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘dhyātvā munirgacchati bhūtayonim’</quote> <quote>‘kāraṇaṃ tu dhyeyaḥ sarvaiśvaryasaṃpannaḥ sarveśvaraḥ
śambhurākāśamadhye’</quote> <quote>‘dhyānanirmathanādeva’</quote> ityādiśrutau pāśavicchedakāraṇasyopāsa-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
viśeṣeṇa tṛtīyādhyāye nirvṛttamiti pariśiṣṭa āsananiyamo'tra vicāryate । paravidyāsvāsana-
niyamo'sti naveti niyāmakasadasadbhāvābhyāṃ saṃśaye niyamakāriṇaḥ śāstrasyābhāvānnā-
stīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । na ca <quote>‘viviktadeśe tu sukhāsanastha’</quote> iti śāstraṃ niyāmakam । dahara-
vidyāprakaraṇāmnāte tena sarvavidyāsādhāraṇasyāsananiyamasyāsiddheḥ । na <quote>‘copaviśyāsane
yuñcyā’</quote>diti smaraṇaṃ niyāmakam । tasyāpi mūlaśrutyanusāreṇa daharavidyāmātrataucityāt ।
anyathā sādhāraṇasūlaśrutikalpanāgauravāpatteḥ । na caikāgryarūpopakārāpekṣayā śrutismṛ-
tyossarvavidyāsādhāraṇyaṃ kalpanīyam । vānāpyāsanaṃ brahmaniṣṭhatopayogicittaikāgryasaṃbhavāt ।
anyathā maunākhyaṃ sahakāryantaraṃ gacchatastiṣṭhato niviṣṭasya śayānasya ca kathamupapadyeta ।
na copāsanā nirantarānussṛtirūpā adhikaṃ cittaikāgryamapekṣata iti vācyam । aṅgāva-
baddhopāsanāvadāsananiyamābhāvepyupāsanopayogicittaikāgryopapatteḥ । nahyaṅgāvabaddhopā-
sanāsu ṛtvikkarmasvāsananiyamaḥ kartuṃ śakyate । tathaiva paravidyāsvapi nāstyāsananiyama
iti । siddhāntastu । asti paravidyāsvāsananiyamaḥ । āsīnasyaiva cittaikāgryasaṃbhavāt ।
keṣāṃcidanāsīnānāmapi kathaṃciccittaikāgryasaṃpādanasaṃbhave'pi daharavidyāyāmāsananiya-
masya cittaikāgryarūpadṛṣṭārthatvena vidyāntarāṇāmapi cittaikagryāpekṣāyāṃ <quote>‘viviktadeśe tu
sukhāsanastha’</quote> iti tatra kvacidvedavihitasyaiva tadupāyasya grahītumucitatvāt । yeṣāmupāsa-
kānāṃ rogavārdhakādibhirāsane na śaktisteṣāmapi bhittyādyāśrayaṇenāsananiyamanirvāhopa-
patteḥ । aṅgāvabaddhopāsanāsvārtvijyānusāreṇāsananiyamābhāve'pi paravidyāsu kvacidvai-
dikopāyatvena klṛptasyāsananiyamasya tyāgāyogāt । atyantāśaktāvārabdhakāmyavadāprāya-
ṇamārabdhāyā vidyāyā yathā kathaṃcinnirvahaṇīyatvena tatra tattyāge satyanyatra tattyāgāyo-
gāditi । atha maunavadupāsanāpyāsananiyamamantareṇa syādityāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ
sūtram <pratika>sū॰ ।। dhyānācca ।। 8 ।।</pratika> dhyānarūpopāsanā vijātīyapratyayāntarāvyavahitā-
vicchinnasmṛtisantānarūpā sākṣātkāraphalotpattyarthaṃ tenānuṣṭheyā yāvadavasaramupāsyaprāva-
<pb n="436"/>
nasya dhyānarūpatvāvagamāt । dhyāyateśca <quote>‘dhyāyati bako dhyāyati proṣitaṃ bandhuḥ’</quote>
ityādau ca praśithilāṅgaceṣṭeṣu pratiṣṭhitadṛṣṭiṣvekaviṣayākṣiptacitteṣu vyavahārāt ।
vijātīyapratyayāntarāvyavahite tailadhārāvadavicchinnasmṛtisaṃtānarūpadhyāne cittai-
kāgryāvaśyaṃbhāvācca dhyānasiddhaye'vaśyamāsananiyam ādartavyaḥ ।।
<sutra>sū ।। acalatvaṃ cāpekṣya ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
pṛthivyādīnāmacalatvamapekṣya <quote>‘dhyāyatīva pṛthivī dhyāyatīvāntarikṣam’</quote> ityā-
diprayogāccāsīna evopāsīta । dhyānasantatirhi pṛthivyādivadacalatvenāsīnasyaiva
saṃbhavati ।
<sutra>sū ।। smaranti ca ।। 10 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiramāsanamātmanaḥ । nātyucchritaṃ nātinīcaṃ celāji-
nakuśottaram ।। tatraikāgraṃ manaḥ kṛtvā yatacittendriyakriyaḥ । upaviśyāsane yu-
ñjyāt yogamātmaviśuddhaye ।।’</quote> ityupāsakānāmāsananiyamādismaraṇāccāsīna eva
brahmopāsīteti siddham ।। iti āsīnādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
atha yatraikāgratādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। yatraikāgratā tatrāviśeṣāt ।। 11 ।।</sutra>
ukta upāsakasyāsananiyamaḥ । tadvaddhi deśakālaniyamo'sti na vā iti
sandehe satyastīti yujyate । yathā codite karmaṇi <quote>‘brahmayajñena yakṣyamāṇaḥ prācyāṃ
diśi’</quote> iti diṅ‌niyamaḥ, <quote>‘prācīnapravaṇe vaiśvadevena yajeta’</quote> iti deśaniyamaḥ <quote>‘aparāhṇe
piṇḍapitṛyajñena caranti’</quote> iti kālaniyamaḥ, tathā'trāpi coditatvāviśeṣādupā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ṇyarūpānmaunādvilakṣaṇeti tasyāmatyantacittaikāgryamapekṣitamiti bhāvaḥ । dhyānasyātyanta-
cittaikāgryāpekṣāyāṃ liṅgapradarśanārthaṃ sūtram । <pratika>sū॰ ।। acalatvaṃ cāpekṣya ।। 9 ।।</pratika> āsana-
niyamaśruteḥ sarvavidyāsādhāraṇyena pravṛttirapi pramāṇamiti pradarśanārthaṃ sūtram । <pratika>sū॰ ।।
smaranti ca ।। 10 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘celājinakuśottara’</quote> mityasya celaṃ sarvottaraṃ ajinaṃ kuśebhya uttaraṃ
kuśā bhūtalamātrāduttarā iti tātparyam । evaṃ hi <quote>‘tatraikāgraṃ manaḥ kṛtve’</quote>ti vākyaśeṣā-
nusaraṇaṃ <quote>‘mṛdvāsane samāsīna’</quote> iti smṛtyantarānusaraṇaṃ ca labhyate ।।</p>
<head>iti āsīnādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<head>atha yatraikāgratādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। yatraikāgratā tatrāviśeṣāt ।। 11 ।। pratyudāharaṇasaṅgatimāha---<pratika>ukta iti</pratika> ।</sutra></p>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha āsīnādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। āsīnaḥ saṃbhavāt ।। 7 ।। dhyānācca ।। 8 ।। acalatvaṃ cāpekṣya ।। 9 ।। smaranti ca ।। 10 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>āsīnastiṣṭhanyāvadgacchanśayāno vā । kurvīta paropāstiṃ tatrāśravaṇādviśeṣasya ।। 339 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>āsīna upāsīta dhyānaṃ.....vāsaḥ bhavati । śayane nidrābhaṅgādanyeṣu ca cittavikṣepāt ।। 340 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti āsīnādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<pb n="437"/>
<p>sane digādiniyamo yukta iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।। siddhāntastu upāsane nāsti
digādiniyamaḥ । aikāgryaṃ hi dhyānasya pradhānasādhanam । na hi tatra digādyapekṣā ।
yatra rāgadveṣādikāluṣyaheturnāsti, tatra hi manasa aikāgryaṃ bhavati । tāvadevāpe-
kṣaṇīyam । <quote>‘viviktadeśe tu sukhāsanasthaḥ’</quote> iti śravaṇāt । <quote>‘anantaṃ śivasannidhau’</quote>
ityādikaṃ japādiviṣayam, na dhyānaviṣayam । tatrāpyaikāgryaṃ yadi mukhyatamaṃ bha-
vati । tasmādaikāgryamātrasādhanakasya dhyānarūpopāsanasya na digdeśakālaniyamaḥ ।।
iti yatraikāgratādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
atha āprāyaṇādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। āprāyaṇāttatrāpi hi dṛṣṭam ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatra brahmopāsanāyāṃ digādiniyamābhāva uktaḥ । uha punastasyopasaṃhāro'sti
na veti vicāre yāvadicchā tāvadupāsanā kartavyā । anyathā tadupasaṃhāra iti
pūrvapakṣe prāpte siddhāntaḥ । āprāyaṇādaharaharupāsanā kāryā । na kadācidapi tadu-
pasaṃhāraḥ, <quote>‘aharaharvā evaṃvit svargaṃ lokameti’</quote> ‘sa khalvevaṃ vartayan yāvadāyuṣaṃ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vihitatvānmānasatvācca saṃśayaḥ । <pratika>digādiniyamo yukta iti</pratika> । diṅniyamaḥ prāṅmukhatvā-
diniyamaḥ deśaniyamaḥ śivālayādyāśrayaṇaniyamaḥ kālaniyamaḥ pūrvāhṇādiniyamaḥ aikāgryaṃ
dhyānasyāntaraṅgasādhanaṃ tadavirodhena sati saṃbhave sāmānyaśāstrasiddho digādiniyamo'pi
grāhyaḥ । asaṃbhave tu na grāhyaḥ । vrīhiśāstravirodhe'śvaśaphaśāstrasyevāntaraṅgasādhanavirodhe
bahiraṅgasādhanasya tyājyatvāditi siddhāntaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti yatraikāgratādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<head>atha āprāyaṇādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p>kālāniyamasya kvacidapavādapradarśanārthamadhikaraṇāntaram । <pratika>sū॰ ।। āprāyaṇāttatrāpi
hi dṛṣṭam ।। 12 ।।</pratika> yathā pūrvāhṇādikāleṣu mano'nukūle kāle kartavyopāsanā tathā mano-
'nukūlakālāvadhi kartavyā na tu yāvadāyuḥ aharaharvā । <quote>‘evaṃvi’</quote>dityādi tu daharavidyā-
mātraviṣayam । na ca sarvāsāṃ paravidyānāṃ sākṣātkāraparyantatvādyāvajjīvamanuṣṭheyatā । a-
ntimadaśāyāmeva sākṣātkāro bhavati, na tataḥ pūrvamityatra pramāṇābhāvāditi pūrvapakṣaḥ ।
dehaviyogakāle mūrdhanyanāḍyotkrāntirarcirādigatiḥ brahmaprāptiḥ svarūpāvirbhāvaścetyevaṃrūpa-
vidyāphalaparaṃparārambhaḥ । sa yadyapi vidyānuvṛttyabhāve'pi tadvyāpārānuvṛttimātreṇa nirvahati ।
tatrāpi vyāpāro vidyānāṃ sākṣātkārarūpaḥ । sa tu bhāvanāprakarṣānuvṛttilabhya iti tadarthama-
pekṣānusāreṇa yāvajjīvamanuvṛttissarvavidyāsādhāraṇīti siddhāntaḥ । <quote>‘sa khalvevaṃ vartayanni’</quote>ti</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha yatraikāgratādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। yatraikāgratā tatrāviśeṣāt ।। 11 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>digdeśakālaniyamo'pyupāsane ko'pi vaktavyaḥ । vihitaṃ hi karma sarvaṃ prāyastanniyamasāpekṣam ।। 341 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>cittaikāgryaṃ tvasya ghyānasya prathamakāraṇaṃ nānyat । tadyatra bhavati puṃsassa eva digdeśakālaḥ syāt ।। 342 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti yatraikāgratādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<pb n="438"/>
<p>brahmalokamabhisaṃpadyate’ ityādāvāprāyaṇādupāsanaśravaṇāt । brahmasvarūpatvāpā-
dinyā brahmabhāvanāyā madhye vicchedo na kāryaḥ । svātmatayā nairantaryeṇa brahmaṇi
bhāvite hi tadrūpamupāsakeṣu prakāśate । ataḥ sarvajñaṃ nityatṛptaṃ svayaṃprakāśaṃ svata-
ntramaluptaśaktikamanantaśaktikaṃ paraṃ brahma nairantaryeṇa bhāvanīyaṃ tatsvarūpaprakāśā-
yeti । tathā śrūyate brahmasvarūpamupāsakeṣu prakāśata iti । <quote>‘yā te rudra śivā tanū-
raghorā'pāpakāśinī । tayā nastanvā śantamayā giriśantābhi cākaśīhi ।।’</quote>
iti । anādimalakarmavāsanārūḍhadevādiśarīrābhimānapravāhasiddhāmadhyātmādi-
bhedabhinnāmasahyāṃ saṃsārarujaṃ drāvayatyupāsakānāmiti rudra ityucyate paraṃ brahma
śivaḥ । tasyāmantraṇaṃ rudreti । he rudra ! parameśvara ! yā te tanūḥ mūrtiḥ śivā nitya-
siddhāpahatapāpmāditvena paramaviśuddhā paramamaṅgalamayī paramamaṅgalapradā aghorā
śivatvayogenaiva sarvahṛdayaṅgamā apāpakāśinī pāpagrahaṇasyopalakṣaṇatvāt jñānā-
gnidagdhanikhilapuṇyaṃpāpā ihāpāpā ityucyante muktātmānaḥ teṣu prakāśamāna-
tvādapāpakāśinī īdṛśī yā te tanūḥ tayā śantamayā <quote>‘sa eko brahmaṇa ānandaḥ’</quote>
ityādiśrutisiddhaniratiśayānandalakṣaṇayā tanvā no'smākamapi saṃsāranimittaṃ
puṇyapāpasaṃcayamapanīya svarūpatayā sākṣādatīva prakāśasveti prārthaneyamupāsakā-
nām । ata upāsakānāmātmani brahmasvarūpasya prakāśanāt tatprakāśakāraṇabhūtā
brahmabhāvanā yāvadāyuṣaṃ kartavyā । na kadācidapi vicchedyeti ।।
iti āprāyaṇādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śrutau yadyapi karmaṇāmeva yāvajjīvānuṣṭheyatvaṃ śrutaṃ na tu vidyāyāḥ । tathāpi tatra yāvajjīvaṃ
karmānuṣṭhānasyāpunarāvṛttiphalakatvamucyamānaṃ vidyā prati svarūpopakārakatvenaivopapādanīyaṃ
nānyatheti taduktisāmarthyādvidyāyā api yāvajjīvānuṣṭheyatvaṃ tatra vivakṣitamunnīyata iti
bhāvaḥ । prāyaṇadaśāyāṃ parameśvarasākṣātkārodaye tatprārthanāmantraḥ pramāṇamityāha---<pratika>tathā
śrūyata iti</pratika> । śivetyasya nirdoṣatvaṃ kalyāṇaguṇākaratvaṃ śivaṃkaratvaṃ vārtha ityābhipretyāha---
<pratika>nityasiddheti</pratika> । giriśantetyapi saṃbodhanam । girau <quote>‘kailāsaśikhare ramye śaṅkarasya śivā-
laye । devatāstatra modantī’</quote>ti śivasaṅkalpamantrapratipādite divyasthānamadhyaniviṣṭe mahā-
kailāse parvate śaṃ svopāsakānāṃ niratiśayamānandaṃ tanotīti tadarthaḥ । svarūpatayetyanena
śivāhaṃbhāvanājanyatvaṃ sākṣātkārasyāviṣkṛtam । abhītyupasargasya vyākhyānaṃ <pratika>sākṣā-
diti । prārthaneyamupāsakānāmiti</pratika> । asya mantrasya śvetāśvataropaniṣadi paravidyāpraka-
raṇe pāṭhā <quote>‘drudraṃ’</quote> <quote>‘giriśante’</quote>ti sakalasāṃsārikānarthanivṛttiniratiśayamahānandānubhavaprada-
tvena saṃbodhanasāmarthyācca mūrdhanyanāḍyutkramaṇādiparaṃparayā tadubhayakāraṇabhūtāntimapratyaya-
prārthanānena mantreṇa kriyata ityunnīyata ityāśayaḥ ।। <pratika>iti āprāyaṇādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</pratika></p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>ata āprāyaṇādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। āprāyaṇāttatrāpi hi dṛṣṭam ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>vihitamupāsanametatkāryaṃ kālaṃ kiyantaṃ cit । āvṛttiviśiṣṭasya hyupāsanārthasya tāvatā siddhiḥ ।। 343 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>kāryaṃ tu yāvadāyuṣamaharaharevaṃvidityādeḥ । antyadaśāyāṃ bhāvini sākṣātkāre hi tadakaraṇam ।। 344 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti āprāyaṇādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<pb n="439"/>
<p>atha tadadhigamādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। tadadhigama uttarapūrvāghayora śleṣavināśau tadvyapadeśāt ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatra prakarṣeṇāpāpānāmupāsakānāṃ brahmasvarūpaṃ prakāśata iti sopapattikamupa-
pāditam । tadihopāsakasya pāpakṣayo'sti na veti saṃśayaḥ । kiṃ tāvat prāptam ?
upāsakānāmapi bhogamantareṇa pāpakṣayo na bhavati, <quote>‘nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate karma kalpa-
koṭiśatairapi’</quote> iti vacanāt । bhogāya śarīrāpattau punarapi karmāpattiriti na
mokṣāvasaraḥ । ityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ---kṣīyate pāpaṃ karmopāsakānāmiti । katham ?
upāsane prārabdhe tatsāmarthyādeva pūrvāghanāśaḥ uttarāghāśleṣaśca bhavati । tathā hi
vyapadiśyate । ‘tadyatheṣīkātūlamagnau protaṃ pradūyetaivaṃ hāsya sarve pāpmānaḥ pradū-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha tadadhigamādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। tadadhigama uttarapūrvāghayoraśleṣavināśau tadvyapadeśāt ।। 13 ।।</pratika> saṅgatimāha
---<pratika>pūrvatreti</pratika> । pūrvādhikaraṇopāttaṃ <quote>‘yāte rudre’</quote>ti mantre <quote>‘apāpakāśinī’</quote>tyanenopāsakānāṃ
pāpakṣaya uktaḥ । sa na saṃbhavatītyākṣipya samādhīyata ityarthaḥ । nanu pūrvādhikaraṇe
paraṃ <quote>‘yāte rudre’</quote>ti mantro'ntimapratyayasadbhāve pramāṇatvenodāhṛtaḥ । sūtropātte <quote>‘tvaharaharvā
evaṃ vi’</quote>dityādiviṣayavākye pāpakṣayoktirnāstīti neyaṃ sūtrakārābhipretā saṅgatiriti cet
ucyate । pūrvādhikaraṇasūtre prāyaṇaparyantaṃ vidyānuṣṭheyetyuktyaiva <quote>‘sa yo havai tadbhagavanmanuṣyeṣu
prāyaṇāntamoṅkāramabhidhyāyīta aharaharvā evaṃ vitsa khalvevaṃ vartaya’</quote>nnityādivākyāni tatra
pramāṇatvena sūcitāni । vidyāviśeṣāmnātānāmeteṣāṃ vākyānāmāprāyaṇamanuṣṭhānasya /?/
vidyāsādhāraṇye kathamarthādapi paryavasānamityākāṅkṣāyāṃ tadupapādako hetustatrāpi hi dṛ/?/
miti sūtraśeṣeṇoktaḥ । hi yasmāttatrāpi prāyaṇadaśāyāmapi dṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ brahmasākṣātkārā-
'sti । tasmāttatsiddhyarthaṃ vidyānuvṛttirapekṣitetyapekṣānusāreṇa dṛṣṭaṃ vākyānāmarthataḥ sarva-
vidyāviṣayatvaparyavasānamiti tasyārthaḥ । tena sūtraśeṣeṇa prāyaṇadaśāyāṃ sākṣātkārasadbhā-
vapratipādanāttatra <quote>‘yā te rudre’</quote>tyantimapratyayaprārthanāmantraḥ pramāṇamiti sūcitam । tadeva
bhāṣye viśadīkṛtamiti sūtrakārāśayasthaiveyaṃ saṅgatiḥ । nanu bhogamantareṇa yadi karmakṣayo na
syāttadā bhogārthaṃ śarīragrahaṇe tatrāpi karmāntarārjanāvaśyaṃbhāvādanirmokṣaḥ syādityāśaṅkya
mokṣasyāpi vidyāphalatvamākṣepyamasminpūrvapakṣa ityāha---<pratika>bhogāyeti । upāsane prārabdha
iti</pratika> । nanūpāsanā yasmindine prārabdhā tataḥprabhṛtyuttarāghāśleṣaḥ tasminneva dine prācīna-
sakalāghanāśa iti neṣyate । tataḥ prabhṛtyeva jīvanmuktatvaprasaṅgāt । kālāntare cetkiṃtatkā-
lāntaramiti nāvasīyate । sākṣātkārodayānantarakāla iti ce<quote>‘dapāpakāśinī’</quote>ti prāgu-
dāhṛtamantravirodha ityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>tatsāmarthyādeveti</pratika> । tasya sāmarthyaṃ dārḍhyaṃ yatsākṣā-
tkārajananopayogi tata evāśleṣavināśau na tu vidyāprārambhamātrānnāpi sākṣātkārādi-
tyarthaḥ । sūtre <quote>‘tadadhigama’</quote> ityadhigamagrahaṇenāyamarthaḥ sūcitaḥ । tatra <quote>‘hyāvṛttirasakṛdupade-
śā’</quote>dityadhikaraṇamārabhya prastutā vidyā tatpadena parāmṛśyata iti tasyāḥ prāptirdārḍhyameva
paryavasyati । na khalu vidyā gavādivattaṭasthā vidyate yena tasyāḥ svasaṃbandharūpā prāptiḥ
pṛthagvaktavyā syāt । udyatyeva hi vidyā svasaṃbandhinyudeti । evaṃ ca pāpāśleṣavināśayoḥ
<pb n="440"/>
yante’ <quote>‘tadyathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyante evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyata’</quote>
iti । tasmādupāsakānāṃ pūrvottarāghayora śleṣavināśau bhavata eva । yaduktam <quote>‘nābhuktaṃ
kṣīyate’</quote> iti, tasyājñāniviṣayatvādavirodhaḥ ।। iti tadadhigamādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
sākṣātkārajananonmukhavidyādārḍhyasādhyatve sati sākṣātkārodayakāla eva pūrvādhavināśaḥ
tataḥprabhṛtyevottarāghāśleṣaśceti । ata eva sākṣātkārodayasya puṇyapāpavidhūnanasya ca
samakālatvaṃ pratipādayati <quote>‘yadā paśyaḥ paśyate rukmavarṇa’</quote>mityādirmantraḥ । tadanusāreṇa
<quote>‘kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmindṛṣṭe parāvare’</quote> iti mantre <quote>‘tasmindṛṣṭe’</quote> iti vyadhikaraṇe sa-
ptamyau । tathā ca tasminparabrahmaṇi yadda‍ṛṣṭaṃ darśanaṃ tasmin jāyamāne karmāṇi kṣīyante yathā
savitaryudayatyeva tamāṃsīti tasyārthaḥ । evaṃ ca sākṣātkārodayakāle tatsamānakālotpattikaḥ
pāpakṣayo'pyastī<quote>‘tyapāpakāśinī’</quote>tyasya na virodhaḥ । yadyapi tadānīmaprārabdhakṣaye'pi prāra-
bdhānuvṛttirasti tathāpyanuvartamānaṃ puṇyapāpamalpam । anādibhavasañcitaḥ kṣīṇaḥ puṇyapāpa-
rāśiratyantamadhika iti tadabhiprāyeṇā<quote>‘pāpakāśinī’</quote>tyuktirupapadyate । ata eva kiñcitpu-
ṇyapāpānuvṛttyā jīvaddaśāyāṃ nātīva prakāśaḥ । dehaviyogakāle tu prārabdhasyāpi nāśāda-
titarāṃ prakāśa ityabhiprāyeṇābhicākaśītīti mantre yaṅluṅantaprayogaḥ । bhṛśārtharūpaḥ
kriyāsamabhihārastatra yaṅo'rthaḥ tadabhiprāyeṇaiva prāgatīva prakāśasyeti bhāṣye tadvyākhyānaṃ
kṛtam । <pratika>tasyājñāniviṣayatvāditi</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । vidhīyamānānāṃ vidyānāṃ phalāpe-
kṣāyāṃ rātrisatranyāyenārthavādiko mokṣaḥ phalamiti tāvadavaśyamabhyupagantavyam । tadvadeva
pāpāśleṣavināśayorapi tatphalatvaṃ bhavannanivāryate । ārthavādikatvāviśeṣāt । anādi-
bhavasañcitānāmanantānāmaniyatakālavipākānāṃ vividhaśarīrabhogyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ krameṇa ba-
hudehairyogaprabhāvādyugapatkāyavyūhena vā bhoge tatkāla eva punarapi karmāntarārjanena tasyā-
pyavaśyabhoktavyatayā karmatatphalapravāhayoḥ kadāpyuparatyabhāvenānirmokṣāpattyā mokṣaphalenā-
pekṣitatvācca । pāpāśleṣavināśavākyānāṃ phalasamarpakatvaṃ parityajya vidyāvaibhavakhyāpana-
mātrārthatvāṅgīkāre <quote>‘na hi karma kṣīyate’</quote> । <quote>‘nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate’</quote> ityādivacanānāmeva karmavaibhava-
khyāpanārthatvamiti vaiparītyasyāpi suvacatvācca । tasmātteṣāṃ vacanānāmavidvadviṣayatvena
saṅkocaḥ kalpayituṃ yuktaḥ । avaśyaṃ ca saṅkocanīyāni tāni vacanāni । anyathā prāya-
ścitte vidhivaiyarthyāpatteḥ । akṛtaprāyaścittaviṣayāṇi tāni vacanānīti cettarhi brahmavi-
dyāpi prāyaścittarūpeti na virodhaśaṅkāvakāśaḥ । <quote>‘kṣetrajñasyeśvarajñānādviśuddhiḥ paramā mate’</quote>-
tyādismṛtiṣu brahmavidyāyāḥ prāyaścittarūpatayāpyupadeśāt prāyaścittarūpatve pāpanivṛtti-
reva phalaṃ syāt na tu mokṣo'pītyetatprayojakamiti <pratika>।। iti tadadhigamādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</pratika></p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha tadadhigamādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। tadadhigama uttarapūrvāghayoraśleṣavināśau tadvyapadeśāt ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>viduṣo'pi ṛte bhogaṃ kathamapi na kṣīyate pāpam । vapurantare tadarthaṃ jāte punarapi tadityanirmokṣaḥ ।। 345 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>vidyāyāssāmarthyātpāpaṃ prārabdhavidyasya । naśyati pūrvamaparaṃ na saṃśliṣyatvevamāmnānāt ।। 346 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti tadadhigamādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<pb n="441"/>
atha itarāsaṃśleṣādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।
<p><sutra>sū ।। itarasyāpyevamasaṃśleṣaḥ pāte tu ।। 14 ।।</sutra>
viduṣaḥ pāpalepo na bhavatīti nirūpitam । iha tadvirodhipuṇyalepo'sti na veti
vicāraḥ । kiṃ prāptam? vidyāvirodhanaḥ pāpasya kṣayo yuktaḥ, na tu puṇyasya, tasya
vidyāṅgatvenānuvṛttyaucityāt ।। ityevaṃ prāpte nirūpyate । viduṣaḥ puṇyasyāpi mokṣa-
virodhitvenāniṣṭaphalatvasāmyādaśleṣavināśau । vidyānuguṇasyārogyādiphalasya</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha itarāsaṃśleṣādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। itarasyāpyevamasaṃśleṣaḥ pāte tu ।। 14 ।।</pratika> ātideśikīṃ saṅgatimāha---<pratika>vi-
duṣa iti</pratika> । atideśavyāvartanīyāmadhikāśaṅkāṃ darśayati---<pratika>vidyāvirodhina iti । vi-
dyāṅgatveneti</pratika> । nanu vidyānaṅgasya puṇyakarmaṇo vidyayā nāśāśleṣau syātāmiti cenna ।
pramāṇābhāvāt । <quote>‘tadyatheṣīkātūlamagnau’</quote> <quote>‘tadyathā puṣkarapalāśa’</quote> iti pūrvādhikaraṇodāhṛta-
śrutyorviśiṣya pāpasyaiva grahaṇāttatra pāpaśabdo mumukṣuṃ pratyaniṣṭaphalatvāviśeṣātpuṇyamapyupa-
lakṣayatīti cet aśleṣavākye tāvattadupalakṣaṇatā nopapadyate viṣayābhāvāt kasya puṇya-
syopalakṣaṇīyatā vācyā । na tāvadvidyāṅgasya nityasya । tasya vidyārthamāśramaparipālanārthaṃ
cāvaśyānuṣṭheyatvāt । nāpi śarīradhāraṇādyupayuktasya dṛṣṭyārogyādi mumukṣvapekṣitaphalakasya
kāmyasya vidyānuṣṭhānasiddha‍yarthaṃ vidyāṅgakarmavadeva tenāpyanuṣṭheyatvāt । nāpi tadanapekṣitapha-
lakasya kāmyasya aihikāmuṣmikaphalaviraktasya mumukṣorbuddhipūrvaṃ tatra pravṛttyasaṃbhavāt । vāsa-
nābalādabuddhipūrvaṃ tatra pravṛttissaṃbhavatīti cenna । phalakāmanayānuṣṭhitasyaiva kāmyasya phala-
paryavasāyitvenābuddhipūrvānuṣṭhānataḥ śleṣāprasakteḥ । tasmādaśleṣavākye pāpaśabdasya pāpamā-
traparatvāt vināśavākye'pi tathātvameva yuktam । nanu <quote>‘tatsukṛtaduṣkṛte vidhūnute na sukṛtaṃ
na duṣkṛtaṃ sarve pāpmāno'to nivartante’</quote> iti viduṣaḥ pāpavatpuṇyasyāpi vināśaḥ śrūyate
iti cet tayorvākyayordehaviyogānantarabhāvipuṇyapāpavināśaviṣayatvena jīvatastatsākṣā-
tkārodayasamaye pāpavināśavatpuṇyavināśe pramāṇābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ । aniṣṭaphalatvasā-
myādityupalakṣaṇam । pāpavatpuṇyasyāpi pāśāntargatatayā jīvajñānaśaktyācchādakatvena
vrahmasākṣātkārakāle puṇyābhāvasyāpyapekṣitatvādityapi draṣṭavyam । ata evā<quote>‘pāpakāśi-
nī’</quote>tyatra pāpagrahaṇaṃ puṇyasyāpyupalakṣaṇamityuktaṃ bhāṣye । na cāśleṣavacanasya viṣayābhāvaḥ ।
yasya vidyāpratibandhakāni duritānyalpāni tannivṛttyarthatvenānuṣṭhitāni karmāṇyadhikāni
tasya prārabdhasamāptipratibandhakavighnādhikasaṅkhyāni maṅgalānīva kānicidanupayuktānyava-
śiṣyante । upāsakasya vītarāgatve'pi bhramāttadabhyudayecchayā putrādibhiranuṣṭhitāni taṭā-
kapratiṣṭhādīni saṃbhāvyante । evaṃbhūtāni karmāṇyaśleṣavacanasya viṣayā bhaviṣyantīti
bhāvaḥ । evamaśleṣaviṣayāsaṃbhavaśaṅkāmūlapūrvapakṣanirākaraṇārthatvamadhikaraṇasya dyotayitumeva
viśiṣyāśleṣagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam । <quote>‘pātetvi’</quote>ti sūtrāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>vidyānuguṇasyeti</pratika> । āro-
gyabalādiphalānāṃ vidyārthaṃ yāvaccharīradhāraṇamapekṣitatvena vidyāvināśyatvābhāvāditi
bhāvaḥ । turavadhāraṇe । śarīrapāta eva laya ityarthaḥ । nanvārogyādyarthatayā vidyāpratiba-
ndhakaduritanivartakatayā cānuṣṭhitaṃ vidyāpekṣitaṃ yatpuṇyaṃ karma tasya śleṣo'styeveti puṇyā-
<pb n="442"/>
puṇyasya śarīrapāte layaḥ । vidyāṅgakarmaṇastu kāmyaphalādisaṃbandhābhāvānna śleṣaḥ ।
ato viduṣaḥ puṇyalepo'pi nāstīti nirṇayaḥ ।। iti itarāsaṃśleṣādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।
atha anārabdhakāryādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। anārabdhakārya eva tu pūrve tadavadheḥ ।। 15 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatra viduṣaḥ puṇyapāpayoruttarapūrvayoraśleṣavināśau nirūpitau । iha prārabdha-
kāryayostayoḥ sthitirasti na veti saṃśayaḥ । <quote>‘sarve pāpmānaḥ pradūyante’</quote> ityaviśe-
ṣaśravaṇāt vidyā'dhikṛteḥ pūrvatvāviśeṣeṇa tayorapi vināśa iti prāpta u-
cyate vidyā'dhikṛteḥ pūrvakṛte puṇyapāpe phaladānāyāpravṛtte eva vinaśyataḥ <quote>‘tasya
tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye atha saṃpatsye’</quote> iti śarīrapātāvadhiḥ śrūyate । ataḥ
prārabdhayorna vilayaḥ <pratika>।। iti anārabdhādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</pratika>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śleṣavacanamevamapyanupapannamityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>vidyāṅgakarmaṇastviti</pratika> । vidyāvirodhikāmya-
karmasaṃbandharūpa eva śleṣo niṣiddha iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti itarāsaṃśleṣādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<head>atha anārabdhakāryādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। anārabdhakārya eva tu pūrve tadavadheḥ ।। 15 ।।</pratika> vidyāyā vināśasya keṣuci-
tpuṇyapāpeṣvapavādapradarśanārthatvena saṅgatimāha---<pratika>pūrvatreti</pratika> । <quote>‘rārve pāpmāna’</quote> ityaviśeṣaśra-
vaṇā<quote>‘ttasya tāvadeva cira’</quote>miti vilaṃbaśravaṇācca saṃśayaḥ । <pratika>tayorapi vināśa iti</pratika> । deha-
dhāraṇaṃ tu vidyānuguṇakarmabhireva bhaviṣyatīti dehadhāraṇaṃ vinā vidyānuṣṭhānānupatteriti
bhāvaḥ । <pratika>phaladānāyāpravṛtte eveti</pratika> । pravṛttayorapi vināśe duḥkhādyanubhavo na syāt ।
tasya vidyānapekṣitatvāditi bhāvaḥ । <pratika>yāvanna vimokṣye iti</pratika> । yāvatprārabdhakarmaṇā na vimo-
kṣyata ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti anārabdhakāryādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha itarāśleṣādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। itarasyāpyevamasaṃśleṣaḥ pāte tu ।। 14 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>vṛṣṭyārogyendriyaguṇacittaviśudhdyādijananena । puṇyaṃ vidyānuguṇau nāśāśleṣau satataṃ ।। 347 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>sattāpi svargasutādyupāsakāniṣṭaphaladasya । śleṣe nāśaśca syāttanupāte tattadanuguṇasya ।। 348 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti itarāśleṣādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha anārabdhakāryādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। anārabdhakārya eva tu pūrve tadavadheḥ ।। 15 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>prārabdhayorapi yāvannāśaḥ syātsukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ । sarve pāpmāna iti hyaviśeṣeṇa śruto nāśaḥ ।। 349 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>na tadā tayork‍ināśaḥ śarīrapātāvadhiśravaṇāt । na hi karma vināśe syāt tasya kṣaṇamapyavasthānam ।। 350 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti anārabdhakāryādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<pb n="443"/>
atha agnihotrādyadhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। agnihotrādi tu tatkāryāyaiva taddarśanāt ।। 16 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatra viduṣaḥ puṇyapāpāśleṣavināśau nirūpitau । yāvadāyuṣamupāsanāvṛttira-
pyupapāditā । iha punaragnihotrādyanuṣṭhānamapi yāvaccharīrapātamanuvartate uta madhye
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha agnihotrādyadhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ agnihotrādi tu tatkāryāyaiva taddarśanāt ।। 16 ।।</pratika> agnihotrādikaṃ vidyāsaha-
kāritvena sākṣātkārodayaparyantamevānuṣṭheyamuta vidyāvadāprāyaṇamiti, sākṣātkārodayānanta-
ramanupayogāśleṣāpattibhyāmupayogāśleṣānāpattibhyāṃ ca saṃśayaḥ । karmaṇāṃ vidyāsvarūpopa-
kāratvena hi tadaṅgatvamiṣyate na tvanūyājādivadārādupakārakatvena yena pradhānasvarūpaniṣpa-
ttyanantaramapi tadanuṣṭhānaṃ śakyeta । ato dṛḍhavidyāyāssākṣātkāraparyantāyā niṣpattau na
tadanuṣṭheyamanapekṣitaphalatvātkṛtasyāpyaśleṣāpatteḥ । na cāprāyaṇamaharaharavicchedena vidyānu-
vṛttisiddhaye agnihotrādikamanuṣṭheyamiti vācyam । karmaṇa iva vidyāyā apyanutiṣṭhāsā-
mātreṇāvicchinnānuvṛttisiddheḥ । na ca vidyānuvṛttipratibandhakaduritanivṛttyarthaṃ tadanuṣṭhānam ।
sākṣātkārodayaprācīnaduritānāṃ vidyayā vinaṣṭatvāttadanantaraṃ prāmādikaduritasaṃbhave'pi
tadaśleṣāt viraktasya buddhipūrvakapāpācaraṇāprasakteḥ kathaṃcitsaṃbhave tannivṛttyarthaṃ vaiśeṣikasya
prāyaścittasyānuṣṭheyatvāt । prārabdhakarmaviśeṣasyaiva kasyacidvidyānuvṛttipratibandhakatve pūrvā-
dhikaraṇanyāyena vidyāyāpyanivartanīyasya tasyāgnihotrādinā nivṛttyasaṃbhavāt । na ca ni-
tyasyāgnihotrāderbuddhipūrvakaṃ parityāge pratyavāyaḥ syāt । pratyavāyadūṣitāntaḥkaraṇasya ca
vidyānuvṛttirna siddha‍yediti vācyam । tāvatā nityatvenāśramadharmānuṣṭhānasiddhāvapi vidyāṅga-
tvena tadanuṣṭhānāsiddheḥ । tathāpi śrutibalādvidyāṅgatvenāprāyaṇaṃ karmānuṣṭhānamiti cetkā
śrutiḥ । natāva<quote>‘dvividiṣanti yajñene’</quote>tyādikā । tasyāḥ vidyāprāraṃbhātprāgvidyāṅgatvenāśramadha-
rmānuṣṭhānaviṣayatvasya <quote>‘vihitatvāccāśramakarmāpī’</quote> <ref>(bra॰ 3-4-8-32)</ref> tyadhikaraṇe darśitatvāt
nāpi <quote>‘vidyāñcāvidyāñce’</quote>ti śrutiḥ । tasyāḥ phalaparyālocanayā sākṣātkārodayātprāgvidyā-
sahakāritvena karmānuṣṭhānaviṣayatvāt । vidyānuvṛttipratibandhakaduritanivṛttyarthaṃ hi tadanu-

rtayituṃ śakyaṃ duritaṃ sākṣātkārodayātprāgeva saṃbhavati na tu tadanantaramapītyuktam । nāpi

śramarakṣaṇam । nāsti kṛtyamakṛtyaṃ ca samādhirvā parāyaṇam । na vidhirna niṣedhaśca teṣāṃ mama yathā-
tathe’</quote>tyādiśivabhūtaprāśastyavādapratītārthaparigraheṇa vairāgyātpracyutairyathākāmamiha bhogānbhu-
ktvānte śāśvataṃ śivapadamapi prāpsyāma iti dhiyā, vidyāyāmapi niṣṭhāvadbhiḥ śaśvadāsevya-
mānamekaṃ kadācidanādidṛḍhavāsanāśeṣo'nmeṣājjāyamānaṃ prāmādikamaparam । tatrādyamaśeṣavaca-
nasya viṣayaḥ । dvitīyaṃ nāvirato duścaritāditi vacanasya । tṛtīyasya mahāphalārthamāprāyaṇaṃ
sarvaviṣayavaimukhyena vidyānuṣṭhāne pravṛttaḥ paramāstiko yogī yathoktaṃ prāyaścittaṃ kuryādeva । yadya-
nuśayānasyāpi tasya prārabdhasamāptikālopanipātātprāyaścittāvasaro na bhavettadā, tadda‍uṣkṛ-
tamavaśiṣyata iti daddviṣadgāmitvavacanasya viṣayaḥ । naivaṃ suhṛdgāmitvavacanasya viṣayatvayogyaṃ
prārabdhasamāptikāle'vaśiṣyamāṇaṃ kiṃcitsukṛtaṃ saṃbhavati । na ca <quote>‘pāte tvi’</quote>ti sūtroktamā-
rogyādiphalakatayā vidyānuguṇaṃ sukṛtamasya viṣayaḥ syāditi vācyam । agnihotrādika-
rmaṇāṃ vidyāsaṃpādanenevārogyādiphalakakarmaṇāmapi vidyopayogyārogyasaṃpādanena caritārthata-
yāvaśeṣāyogāditi । evaṃ prāguktakṣepeṇa pravṛttāyāṃ śaṅkāyāmidaṃ sūtram । <pratika>sū॰ ।। ato'nyāpi
hyekeṣāmubhayoḥ ।। 17 ।।</pratika> vidyāraṃbhātprākpaścāccannārogyacittaśuddha‍yādijananayogyatayā vi-
dyānuguṇaphalāni yāni karmāṇi tāni na vidyāmāhātmyādvinaśyanti na śliṣyanti vā ।
tāni dvividhāni prabalakarmāntarapratibaddhāni tadapratibaddhāni ca । tatrāpratibaddhāni svasva-
phalaṃ dattvā naśyantīti nāvaśiṣyante । yāni tu pratibaddhaphalāni tāni suhṛdgāmitvava-
<pb n="448"/>
vidyā'nuguṇaphalatvāt vidyayā'pyavinaṣṭā । pūrvottarayorubhayorapi karmarāśyossa
viṣayaḥ ।।
<sutra>sū ।। yadeva vidyayeti hi ।। 18 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘yadeva vidyayā karoti’</quote> ityatra karmaphalāpratibandhasyodgīthavidyāphalatvoktyā
prabakarmāntareṇānyakarmaṇāṃ phalapratibandhasadbhāvo'vagamyate । ato vidyānuguṇa-
karmaṇāṃ phalapratibandhocchedāyāpyagnihotrādikamanuṣṭheyamiti bhāvaḥ ।।
iti agnihotrādyadhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।
atha itarakṣapaṇādhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। bhogena tvitare kṣapayitvā'tha saṃpadyate ।। 19 ।।</sutra>
iha vidyāvatāmadhikārapeda sthitānāṃ tadvyatirekeṇa muktaphalamasti na
veti cintāyāṃ prārabdhabhogāya bahujanmasvīkāre pūrvavidyāyāṃ luptāyāṃ yat karma
kriyate, tadapi phalabhogaheturbhavati । ato janmaparamparāyāḥ saṃbhavānna teṣāṃ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
canasya viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ । prabalakarmāntarapratibandhasaṃbhave pramāṇapradarśanārthaṃ । sūtram । <pratika>sū॰ ।।
yadeva vidyayeti hi ।। 18 ।। pratibandhasadbhāvo'vagamyata iti</pratika> । nanu saṃbhavatu pratiba-
ndhakaṃ karma tadvidyānanuguṇatvātprācīnaṃ naśyatyuttaraṃ na śliṣyatīti na । tena pratibandhasaṃbhava
iti cet na । prārabdhasyaiva kasyacitpratibandhakatvasaṃbhavāditi bhāvaḥ । <pratika>ato vidyānuguṇa-
karmaṇāmiti</pratika> । vidyāsahakāritayā yadagnihotrādikamanuṣṭhīyate tasya śakyapratibandhocche-
do'pi phalamityāśayaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti agnihotrādyadhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<head>atha itarakṣapaṇādhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। bhogena tvitare kṣapayitvātha saṃpadyate ।। 19 ।।</pratika> evaṃ viduṣāmāprāyaṇaṃ nira-
ntaraṃ paramapriyaśivacintārūpaṃ tadānuṣaṅgikaṃ pāpakṣayarūpaṃ caihikaṃ phalaṃ cintitam । atha
taduparitanīṃ phalaparaṃparāmuttarapādaiścintayituṃ viduṣāṃ tatprāptiniyamo'nenādhikaraṇena vyava-
sthāpyate । vidyāyoniśarīrāvasānaṃ yeṣāṃ prārabdhaṃ teṣāṃ vidyāphalaprāptirastu nāma । yeṣāmā-
dhikārikāṇāmanyeṣāṃ vānekaśarīrānuyāyiprārabdhaṃ na teṣāṃ tatprāptissaṃbhavati । janmānta-
rasya pūrvasaṃskārapramoṣāpādakatayā vidyāvihīnaistaiśśarīrāntare kriyamāṇakarmaṇāṃ bandhahe-
tutvena tato janmaparaṃparāyā eva prāptiḥ । na ca teṣāṃ janmāntarasaṃskārapramoṣaheturna bhava-
tīti kalpanīyam । dṛṣṭaniyamasaṅkocakalpanākāraṇābhāvāt । na ca yāvanna vimokṣya iti</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha agnihotrādyadhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। agnihotrādi tu tatkāryāyaiva taddarśanāt ।। 16 ।। atonyāpi hyekeṣāmubhayoḥ ।। 17 ।।
yadeva vidyayeti hi ।। 18 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>vidyānuṣṭhānavatā kartavyaṃ cāgnihotrādi । sukṛtatvena kṛtasyāpyaśleṣasyāpi śiṣṭatvāt ।। 351 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>kartavya eva sarvo'pyāśramadharmo'gnihotrādi । tasyāśleṣābhāvādyaḥ khalu vidyāphalāyaiva ।। 352 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti agnihotrādyadhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<pb n="449"/>
<p>muktiḥ । iti prāpte brūmaḥ । prārabdhakarma svaphalaṃ bhojayitṛ kevalam । na tu teṣāṃ
pūrvārjitavidyālopahetuḥ, atasteṣāṃ muktireva । na janmaparamparā, kāraṇābhāvāt
suṣuptivyavadhānavat janmamaraṇavyavadhānaṃ na teṣāṃ vidyālopaheturiti ।।
iti itarakṣapaṇādhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।
iti śrīkaṇṭhaśivācāryaviracite brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye
caturthādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।। 4 ।। 1 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
prārabdhakarmavimokṣāvadhiśravaṇāttathā kalpanaṃ tasya śarīravimokṣāvadhiparatvāt <quote>‘dhūtvā śa-
rīra’</quote>miti śrutyantaradarśanāt । na ca tatra śarīragrahaṇaṃ prārabdhakāryayāvaccharīraparamekava-
canaśravaṇāt । tadavivakṣākalpane pramāṇābhāvāt । <quote>‘asmāccharīrātsamutthāye’</quote>ti śrutya-
ntare'smāditi viśeṣaṇe vidyāyoniśarīrasyaiva vivakṣitatvācca । anyathā tadvaiyarthyāt ।
tathā ca yeṣāmanekaśarīrānuyāyiprārabdhānāṃ vidyāyoniśarīrāvasāne muktirna bhavati teṣāṃ
tayā vidyayā muktirna saṃbhavatyeva । tathā ca prārabdhasyānekaśarīrānuyāyitvaśaṅkyā kasyāpi
vidyānuṣṭhāne pravṛttiśca na saṃbhavatīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu muktyarthavidyānuṣṭhānapratipāda-
kabahuśāstraprāmāṇyāt <quote>‘tasya tāvadeve’</quote>ti vivakṣitāvadhyavasāne muktyavaśyaṃbhāvapratipādanā-
vadhāraṇaprāmāṇyācca <quote>‘yāvanna vimokṣye’</quote>ityasya prārabdhakarmāvadhiparatvaṃ <quote>‘dhūtvā śarīra’</quote>mityatra
<quote>‘asmāccharīrā’</quote>dityatraca śarīravadasya prārabdhakāryaśarīrasāmānyaparatvam । asmāditi vi-
śeṣaṇasya <quote>‘asthisthūṇaṃ snāyubandhaṃ māṃsaśoṇitalepanam । carmāvanaddhaṃ durgandhipūrṇaṃ mūtrapurī-
ṣayoḥ । jarāśokasamāviṣṭaṃ rogāyatanamāturam । rajasvalamanityaṃ ca bhūtāvāsamimaṃ tyaje’</quote>-
diti smṛtiprasiddhatyājyatvahetvanubhavasiddhaheyatvapradarśanārthatvaṃ ca viduṣāṃ janmāntarasya
smṛtipramoṣānāpādakatvaṃ ca kalpanīyam । ato vidyayā phalaprāptirniyataiveti ।।</p>
<head>iti itarakṣapamādhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</head>
<p>iti śrīśivātivādimūrddhanyaśivadarśanasthāpanadhurandharasakaladevabhūdevapratiṣṭhā-
<pratika>pakaśrīmaccinnabommabhūpā</pratika>lakahṛdayakamalakuharaviharamāṇa<pratika>śrīsāmba-
śivapreritasya śrībharadvāja</pratika>kulajaladhikaustubhaśrīviśvajidyā-
<pratika>jiśrīraṅgarājādhvarivarasūnorapyayyadīkṣitasya</pratika> kṛtau
<pratika>śrīkaṇṭhaśivācāryaviracitabrahmamīmāṃsābhā</pratika>-
ṣyavyākhyāyāṃ śivārkamaṇidīpikākhyāyāṃ
vyākhyāyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya
prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।। 4 ।। 1 ।।</p>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha itarakṣapaṇādhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। bhogena tvitare kṣapayitvātha saṃpadyate ।। 19 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>viduṣāmadhikārapade sthitvā bahujanmabhogajuṣām । bahujanmaparaṃparayā vidyālopānna muktiḥ syāt ।। 353 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>maraṇena vyavadhānaṃ na bhavati teṣāṃ suṣuptyeva । vidyāpramoṣahetustasmānmuktirbhavenniyatā ।। 354 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti itarakṣapaṇādhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</head>
<head>iti śrīmadappayyadīkṣitakṛtau adhikaraṇasārasaṅgrahe nayamaṇimālāyāṃ
tṛtīyaparicchede caturthasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।। 4 ।। 1 ।।</head>
<pb n="450"/>
<head>।। śrīḥ ।।</head>
<head>śivābhyāṃ namaḥ ।</head>
<head>śrīkaṇṭhācāryakṛtau</head>
<head>brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye</head>
<head>atha caturthādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha vāksampattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। vāṅmanasi darśanācchabdācca ।। 1 ।।</sutra>
<sutra>sū ।। ata eva ca sarvāṇyanu ।। 2 ।।</sutra>
pūrvamupāsakasyopāsanavyavasthānādikamuktam । iha pāde'sya śarīrādutkrānti-
rnirūpyate । <quote>‘asya somya puruṣasya prayato vāṅmanasi saṃpadyate manaḥ prāṇe prāṇa-
stejasi tejaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyām’</quote> iti śrutau prayato vāgādīnāṃ manasi layo'va-
gamyate । ayamupapanno na veti saṃśayaḥ । kiṃ prāptam ? kāryasya hyupādāne layaḥ ।
mṛddhaṭādau vyāptidarśanāt । vāgādīnāṃ brahmopādānaṃ na manaḥ, ato'sminneva
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>śivārkamaṇidīpikāyām</head>
<head>atha turīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha vāksampattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<p>adhyāyādau pādacatuṣṭayārthānukramaṇena sūcitāṃ vṛttavarttiṣyamāṇayoḥ pādayoḥ saṅgatiṃ
smārayati---<pratika>pūrvatreti</pratika> । upāsanāvyavasthā āvṛttyādirūpā । ādiśabdenāsananiyamā-
dikaṃ gṛhyate । <pratika>asya śarīrādutkrāntiriti</pratika> । upāsakena hi svotkrāntiprakāro'pi ci-
ntanīyaḥ । utkrāntergatyupakramatvāt <quote>‘naite sṛtī pārtha jānanyogī muhyati kaścane’</quote>ti smṛtyāṃ
<quote>‘taccheṣagatyanusmṛtiyogācce’</quote>ti sūtreṇa ca upāsanākāle gaterapyanusmaraṇīyatvapratipādanāt ।
atastadarthamutkrāntiprakāro nirūpyata iti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>sū॰ ।। vāṅganasi darśanācchabdācca
।। 1 ।। ata eva ca sarvāṇyanu ।। 2 ।। vāgādīnāmiti</pratika> । <quote>‘indriyairmanasi sampadyamā-
nai’</quote>riti dvitīyasūtrodāharaṇavākyanirdiṣṭāni cakṣurādīnyapi saṃyojyādigrahaṇaṃ kṛtam ।
<pratika>layovagamyata iti</pratika> । <quote>‘satā somya tadā sampanno bhavatī’</quote>tyuktāyāssampatteḥ <quote>‘svamapīto
bhavatī’</quote>ti layārthenāpītinā nirdeśādihāpi sampattirlayo'vagamyata iti bhāvaḥ । aprakṛti-
tvātsaṃpattiśruteśca saṃśayaḥ । <pratika>atastasminneveti</pratika> । na ca vacanabalādaprakṛtau gavādīnāṃ la-
yo'stviti śaṅkanīyam । <quote>‘prāṇamanūkrāmantaṃ sarve prāṇā anūkrāmantī’</quote>ti vāgādīnāmupa-
kramaṇaśravaṇavirodhena maraṇakāle layābhyupagamāyogāt । na ca tarhi vāgādiśabdānāṃ vā-
gādivṛttilakṣakatvamastviti vācyam । tatrāpyanupapattestulyatvāt । vāgādiprakṛtikānāṃ
vṛttīnāmaprakṛtau manasi layāsaṃbhavāt । tasmādiha sampattiśabdena saṃyogamātraṃ kathaṃcidvā-
<pb n="451"/>
teṣāṃ layo yuktaḥ ।। iti prāpte'bhidhīyate । <quote>‘asya somya puruṣasya prayato vāṅma-
nasi saṃpadyate’</quote> iti <quote>‘indriyairmanasi saṃpadyamānairi’</quote>ti ca vacanādutkrāntau manasaḥ
prāgeva vāgādīnāmuparamadarśanācca vāk manasi prathamaṃ saṃpadyate । tataḥ sarvāṇīndri-
yāṇi manasi saṃpadyante । yaduktamupādāna eva laya iti tanna । svarūpalayasyaivopā-
dānāpekṣā । vāgādīnāṃ manasi na svarūpalaya ucyate, kiṃtu vṛttilaya eva । yathā
jalamadhye kṣiptasyāṅgārasya prakāśādivṛttilayaḥ, tathā anupādāne'pi manasi vā-
gādīnāṃ vṛttilayo yukta eva । vṛttimato vāgāderlayaśrutyā vṛttilayo lakṣyate ।
vṛttivṛttimatorabhedopacāraditi ।।
iti vāksaṃpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।
atha manaḥsaṃpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
sū ।। tanmanaḥ prāṇa uttarāt ।। 3 ।।
<quote>‘manaḥ prāṇe’</quote> iti vāgādisarvendriyayuktasya manasaḥ prāṇe layaḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ kī-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
cyamiti bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘śabdā’</quote>diti hetuṃ sūtradvayanirdiṣṭaṃ sakalabāhyendriyasādhāraṇyena vyācaṣṭe—
<pratika>asya somyeti</pratika> । <quote>‘darśanā’</quote>diti hetumapi vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>utkrāntāviti</pratika> । hetudvayasyāpi
sādhāraṇye vāca indriyāntarāṇāṃ ca sūtradvayena pṛthāṅnirdeśaḥ । kimarthamityākāṅkṣāyāṃ tatprayo-
janamāha---<pratika>prathamamiti</pratika> । sarvendriyasādhāraṇe manassampattivacane satyapi viśiṣyavākyā-
ntarapravṛttistatsampattiprāthamyavivakṣayeti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>kintu vṛttilaya iti</pratika> । sampattiśabdasya
saṃyogārthatvapakṣe'pi tasyātra na saṃyogamātramarthaḥ kintu vāgādivṛttihetusaṃyogabhinnastadva‍ṛ-
ttilayahetussaṃyoga iti vaktavyam । manasi vṛttimatteva vāgādivṛttīnāmuparamadarśanāt ।
tadanuvāditvāccāsya vāṅmanasītyādiśabdasya । tathā ca vāgvṛttiparāmarśasya tallayaparāma-
rśasya cāvaśyaṃ bhāvādyathādṛṣṭānuvādini vākye <quote>‘vāksaṃpadyata’</quote> ityāderdarśanayogyavāgādi-
vṛttilayaparatvamevāṅgīkarttuṃ yuktaṃ । na tu tadayogyavāgādīndriyamanassaṃyogaparatvaṃ tasya cedva‍ṛ-
ttilayasya vāgādyadhikaraṇasya mano'dhikaraṇakatvaṃ na saṃbhavati । <quote>‘kāmaṃ manasī’</quote>ti nirdeśa-
statsaṃyogādhīnatvamātreṇaupacāriko'stu । yathāgnijvālā jale śāmyatītyatra jala iti
nirdeśa iti bhāvaḥ । ata eva <quote>‘darśanācchabdācce’</quote>ti pūrvoktahetvoreva cakṣurādīnīndriyāṇi
vācamanu vāksampattyanantaraṃ manasi sampadyata iti dvitīyasūtrasyārthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti vāksampattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<head>atha manassampattyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। tanmanaḥ prāṇa uttarāt ।। 3 ।।</pratika> atideśādhikaraṇamidamuttaravākyārthanirūpa-</p>
