<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha vāksampattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। vāṅmanasi darśanācchabdācca ।। 1 ।। ata eva ca sarvāṇyanu ।। 2 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>vākśabdalakṣitānāṃ vahirakṣāṇāṃ na manasi layaḥ । brahmopādānānāmanupādānātmake ghaṭate ।। 355 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>vṛttilayastveteṣāmaṅgārāṇāmivodake tasmin । dṛṣṭatvātsaṃghaṭate śrutyāpi vivakṣitaṃ tāvat ।। 356 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti vāksampattyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<pb n="452"/>
<p>dṛśa iti saṃśayaḥ । vāgādīnāmanupādāne manasi vṛttilayo'stu । manasastu prāṇe
svarūpalaya eva, manasaḥ prāṇopādānakatvāt । <quote>‘annamayaṃ hi somya mana āpomayaḥ
prāṇa’</quote> iti śruterannamayatvena pārthivasya manasa āpomayatvenopādāne prāṇe svarūpa-
layasyāvirodhāditi pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu । pūrvavanmanaso'pi prāṇe vṛttilaya
eva, <quote>‘manaḥ prāṇa’</quote> ityuttarādvākyāt na svarūpalayaḥ, prāṇasya mukhyopādānatvā-
bhāvānmanasastatrānutpatteḥ । ataḥ prāṇe manaso vṛttilaya eva nyāyyaḥ ।।
iti manaḥsaṃpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
atha prāṇasaṃpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। so'dhyakṣeṇa tadupagamādibhyaḥ ।। 4 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatra sarvendriyayuktasya manasaḥ prāṇe layaḥ pratipāditaḥ । iha tasya prāṇasya kutra
laya iti saṃśayaḥ ।। kiṃ tāvat prāptam? <quote>‘prāṇastejasi’</quote> iti śruteḥ prāṇasya tejasi
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ṇārtham । abannayoḥ prakṛtivikṛtibhāvaśravaṇāt prāṇamanasorabannaprakṛtikatvaśravaṇācca ।
prāṇākārapariṇatāsvapsu svarūpalayassaṃbhavatīti adhikāśaṅkā । adanīyasyodanādeḥ sā-
kṣātpṛthivīprakṛtikatvena paramparayā prakṛtibhūtāsvapsu layābhāvāt prāṇarūpavikṛtyantarāva-
ṣṭabdhānāmapāṃ kathaṃcidapi manaḥprakṛtikatvāsaṃbhavācca manaso'pi vṛttilaya eva । manaḥprāṇa
ityuttaravākyasya pūrvavākyasamānārthatvasyocitatvāditi tatparihāraḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti manassampattyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<head>atha prāṇasampattyadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। so'dhyakṣeṇa tadupagamādibhyaḥ ।। 4 ।।</pratika> 1udāharaṇavākyakrameṇādhikaraṇakrama iti
saṅgatiḥ <quote>‘prāṇastejasī’</quote>tyatra prāṇasyāpi vṛttilaya eva na svarūpalaya iti pūrvanyāyenaiva
siddham । tasya jīvalīnasya tejasi laya uta prathamameva tejasi laya iti śrutidvaividhyā-
tsaṃśaye pūrvapakṣaḥ । <quote>‘prāṇastejasī’</quote>ti śravaṇāt madhye jīvopagamo na niveśanīyaḥ । nacai<quote>‘va-
mevemamātmāna’</quote>miti śrutāvantakāle jīvopagamaśravaṇāttanniveśa iti vācyam । tejasi
līnasya prāṇasya tejasā saha jīvopagame'pi tadupapatteḥ । na hi sarveṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ dvāraviśe-
ṣamanantarbhāvya sākṣādeva yugapajjīvopagamassamarthayituṃ śakyate । <quote>‘vāṅmanasi sampadyate manaḥ
prāṇa’</quote> iti pūrvavākyānurodhena vāgādīnāṃ manasaśca jīvopagamasya manaḥprāṇalayadvāraka-
tvasyāvaśyavaktavyatvāt । evaṃ prāṇasyā'pi jīvopagamastejolayadvārako'stu । etena ‘sahai-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha manassampattyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। tanmanaḥ prāṇa uttarāt ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>manasastu prāṇe syātsvarūpavilayo yathāśravaṇam । annamayasya hi tasya prāṇopādānamaṃbumayaḥ ।। 357 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>vṛttyuparama evātrāpyanupādānatvasāmyena । nahyaṃbuvikāratve'pyasyopādānatāsti mukhyāyāḥ ।। 358 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti manassampattyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<note>(1) <quote>‘viṣayavākyakramādadhikaraṇa’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="453"/>
<p>laya iti prāpteḥ brūma । sa prāṇastato jīvenādhyakṣeṇa saṃyujyate, na tasya tejasi
layaḥ । <quote>‘evamevemamātmānamantakāle sarve prāṇā abhisamāyanti’</quote> ityādiśrutiṣu tasya
jīvopagamanādiśravaṇāt <quote>‘prāṇastejasi’</quote> iti śrutikramavirodhaṃ pariharati---
<sutra>sū ।। bhūteṣu tacchruteḥ ।। 5 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘prāṇāstejasi’</quote> iti bhūtāntarasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ tejo'bhidhīyate । tataḥ prāṇo jīvena saha
bhūteṣu saṃyujyata iti na virodhaḥ ।।
<sutra>sū ।। naikasmin darśayato hi ।। 6 ।।</sutra>
na tejomātre prāṇalayaḥ, trivṛtkaraṇaśrutirhi bhūtāntarasaṃsṛṣṭiṃ darśayati । ato
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tāvasminśarīre vasatassahotkrāmata’ iti jīvaprāṇayossahavāsotkramaṇaśravaṇājjīvamupaga-
tasya prāṇasya tejasi layaḥ kalpanīya iti śaṅkāpi nirastā । tejasi līnasya jīvopagame-
'pi prāṇasya sthitikāle jīvena saha vāsasya utkramaṇakāle tena sahotkramaṇasya copapatteḥ ।
etenaiva yamunāyā gaṅgayā saha saṃyujya sāgaragamane'pi yathā yamunā sāgaraṃ gacchatyeva tathā
prāṇasya jīvena saṃyujya tejasi laye'pi prāṇastejasi līyata eveti na <quote>‘prāṇastejasī’</quote>ti
śrutivirodha ityapi śaṅkā nirastā । uktadṛṣṭāntenaiva vaiparītyasyāpi samarthayituṃ śakyatvā-
diti । siddhāntastu prāṇaḥ prakaraṇagaṇādhyakṣeṇa jīvena saṃyujyaiva tejasi līyate । jīvo-
pagamatatsahavāsatatsahotkramaṇaśravaṇāt । nanu <quote>‘prāṇastejasī’</quote>ti śrutyanusāreṇa vaiparītyaṃ vā
kimiti na kalpyata ityāśaṅkāyāmidaṃ sūtram ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।। bhūteṣu tacchruteḥ ।। 5 ।।</pratika> tejasīti
na tṛtīyabhūtamātraṃ nirdiśyate kintu bhāvidehārambhārthaṃ jīvapariṣvañjakāni sūkṣmadeharūpāṇi
<quote>‘tadanantarapratipattau raṃhati saṃpariṣvakta’</quote> ityatra nirūpitāni sarvāṇi bhūtānyucyante । ta-
tsampattiḥ prāṇasya jīvena saheti yuktam । <quote>‘sahaitāvasminśarīre vasata’</quote> ityādi śrutyanuro-
dhāditi bhāvaḥ । nanu bāhyendriyavyāpāroparamānantaramapi manovyāpāradarśanāt <quote>‘vāṅma-
nasi sampadyate, indriyairmanasi saṃpadyamānai’</quote>riti śrutiḥ yathā ca bāhyābhyantarajñānoparamā-
nantaramapi śvāsavyāpāradarśanāt <quote>‘manaḥ prāṇa’</quote> iti śrutiḥ tathā śvāsarūpaprāṇavyāpāropara-
mānantaramapi dehe kvacidauṣṇyadarśanāt <quote>‘prāṇastejasī’</quote>ti śrutistadanuvādinyastu । ataste-
jaśśabdasya sūkṣmadehāpannasarvabhūtalakṣakatvaṃ na vaktavyamityāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram ।।
<pratika>sū॰ ।। naikasmindarśayato hi ।। 6 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘tāsāṃ trivṛtaṃ trivṛtamekaikāṃ karavāṇī’</quote>ti trivṛtka-
raṇaśrutiḥ <quote>‘sametyānyonyasaṃyogaṃ parasparasamāśrayāḥ । mahadādyā viśeṣāntā aṇḍamutpādayanti
ta’</quote> iti smṛtiśca sarveṣāmapi bhūtānāṃ prāgeva trivṛtkṛtatvaṃ darśayata iti tejasītyasya tāva-
tkevalatejaḥparatvaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyate । <quote>‘jīvasya sañcarataḥ pṛthivīmaya āpomayo vāyumaya
ākāśamayastejomaya’</quote> iti śrutiḥ <quote>‘aṇvyo mātrā vināśinyo daśārthānāṃ tu yā smṛtāḥ ।
tābhissarvamidaṃ sarvaṃ saṃbhavatyanupūrvaśa’</quote> ityādyā smṛtiśca sarvabhūtapariṣvaṅgaṃ darśayataḥ । ihāpi
jīvasya gatyupapādanāya sarvabhūtapariṣvaṅgo'pi pradarśanīyaḥ । atastejaḥpadaṃ sūkṣmadehāpanna-
sarvabhūtaparamiti tejasyekasminneva layo'tra na vivakṣitaḥ । <quote>‘prāṇastejasī’</quote>tyasya dṛṣṭānuvā-
<pb n="454"/>
bhūteṣu jīvena saha prāṇaḥ saṃpadyata iti na śrutivirodhaḥ ।।
iti prāṇasaṃpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
atha sṛtyupakramādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। samānā cāsṛtyupakramādamṛtatvaṃ cānupoṣya ।। 7 ।।</sutra>
iha nirūpyamāṇotkrāntirarcirādigatyupakramāt prāgvidvadaviduṣoḥ samānā
uta bhinneti saṃśayaḥ । kiṃ tāvat prāptam ? saṃsāraphalasya mokṣaphalasya cātivai-
ṣamyādajñāninorvisadṛśyevotkrāntiriti । evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ---arcirādimārgo-
pakramāt prāgvidvadaviduṣoḥ samānaivotkrāntiḥ । jñāninastu mūrdhanyanāḍyā niṣkrā-
ntiramṛtatvaṃ ca, netarasya iti vaiṣamyam ।। “śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya nāḍyastāsāṃ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ditvaṃ tu prāṇavyāpāroparamānantaramapyanuparatavyāpārasya vyāpāroparamasannikarṣātsaṅkucita-
vṛttessūkṣmadehasya tejassaṃvalanaprayuktaṃ kvācitkauṣṇyadarśanamanuvadatītyevamapi samarthayituṃ śa-
kyate iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti prāṇasampattyadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<head>atha sṛtyupakramādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। samānā cāsṛtyupakramādamṛtatvaṃ ca ।। 7 ।।</pratika> evaṃ viduṣāmupāsanākāle ci-
ntanīya utkrāntiprakāro nirūpitaḥ । asyāpyavidvatsādhāraṇyāt vidvadutkrāntau viśeṣeṇa
bhāvyamityākṣepātsaṅgatiḥ । phalaviśeṣasiddha‍yarthaṃ kāraṇaviśeṣākṣepaṇāt viśeṣāśravaṇācca
saṃśayaḥ । utkrāntirhi vidvadaviduṣoḥ phalaviśeṣāvāptau kāraṇam । tathā ca sampratipannā-
tkāryaviśeṣādaśruto'pi kāraṇe viśeṣaḥ kalpanīyaḥ । yathāgnihotrajyotiṣṭomarūpakāraṇa-
viśeṣāttattatkārye svarge viśeṣaḥ evamaviduṣāmapi tattallokāvāptirūpaphalaviśeṣādutkrāntau
viśeṣaḥ syāditi cet sopyastunāmeti pūrvaḥpakṣaḥ । gatyupakramaparyantaṃ viśeṣābhāve'pi tataḥ
prabhṛti śrutādviśeṣādeva phalaviśeṣopapatterna tataḥ prāgutkrāntāvaśruto viśeṣaḥ kalpanīya
iti siddhāntaḥ । <quote>‘samānāceti’</quote> cakāro'vadhāraṇārthaḥ । gatyupakramaprabhṛtikāraṇe viśeṣaṃ
tatpalaviśeṣañca darśayitumamṛtatvañceti sūtraśeṣaḥ । mūrdhanyanāḍyā gatiścakāreṇa samuccīyate ।
tathā ca mūrdhanyanāḍyā gatiḥ kāraṇaviśeṣaḥ tasyāmṛtatvaṃ phalaviśeṣa ityarthaḥ । evamavidu-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha prāṇasampattyadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। sodhyakṣeṇa tadupagamādibhyaḥ ।। 4 ।। bhūteṣu tacchuteḥ ।। 5 ।। naikasmindarśayato hi ।। 6 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>prāṇasya tejasi layo yathā śrutisyāttadda‍ūṣyadṛṣṭeśca । madhye jīvaniveśe na mānamīkṣāmahe kiṃcit ।। 359 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>tejaḥpadopalakṣitadehātmakabhūtasūkṣmayute । jīve śrutyantarataḥ sendriyamanaso'sya vṛttilayaḥ ।। 360 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti prāṇasampattyadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<pb n="455"/>
<p>mūrdhānamabhinissṛtaikā । tayordhvamāyannamṛtatvameti viṣvaṅṅanyā utkramaṇe bhavanti ।।”
iti śruteḥ । ataḥ prāgutkrāntiḥ samānaiva ।।
iti sṛtyupakramādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
atha tadapītyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। tadāpīteḥ saṃsāravyapadeśāt ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
pūrvamupapāditā mūrdhanyanāḍyā viduṣa utkrāntiḥ, tato'rcirādigatiriti । iha
dehādutkrāntasya viduṣo'rcirādigatirupapadyate na veti sandehaḥ । <quote>“yadā sarve pramu-
cyante kāmā ye'sya hṛdi śritāḥ । ata martyo'mṛto bhavatyatra brahma samaśruta ।।”</quote>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ṣā/?/mapi nāḍīviśeṣeṇa tadgatireva tatphalaviśeṣāvāptau kāraṇam । ata eva mahābhārate mo-
kṣadharme phalabhedānusāreṇa utkramaṇe nāḍībhedāḥ prapañcitāḥ ।।</p>
<head>itisṛtyupakramādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<head>atha tadapītyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ tadāpīteḥ saṃsāravyapadeśāt ।। 8 ।।</pratika> evaṃ viduṣāmutkrāntimaṅgīkṛtya 1tatra kā-
raṇaviśeṣeṇa bhāvyamityākṣepaḥ samāhitaḥ । iha teṣāṃ notkrāntirnavā tatpūrvikā gatirityā-
kṣipya samādhīyata iita saṅgatiḥ । śrutidvaividhyātsaṃśaye pūrvapakṣaḥ । vāgādīnāṃ manaḥprabhṛti-
ṣvaprakṛtitvādva‍ṛttilayamātramityastvetat । tejaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyāmityuktistu svarūpalayo
bhavitumarhati । na ca vācyaṃ vidvadavidvatsādhāraṇyenotkrāntiprakāra ucyate avidvatsaṃba/?/-
ndhināṃ vāgādīnāṃ svarūpalayo vaktuṃ na śakyate ato vidvatsaṃbandhināmapi tadānīṃ vṛttilaya
eva vācyaḥ ekaśabdotpātatvāditi । <quote>‘vāṅmanasi saṃpadyata’</quote> ityādervidyāprakaraṇāmnātatvena
vidvadviṣayatvāt । ato viduṣo vagādimanaḥprāṇabhūtasūkṣmāṇāṃ pravilīnatvena tadapekṣā-
rcirādigatirna saṃbhavatītyupapattisahitā <quote>‘atra brahmasvamaśnuta’</quote> iti śrutiḥ prabaletyarcirādi-
gatiśravaṇaṃ muktiphalaketaravidyāviṣayaṃ yojanīyam । na cātra paraṃ brahma nāsti yena tatprāptyarthaṃ
gatyapekṣā syāditi । siddhāntastu sarvatra paravidyāsu parabrahmaṇaḥsatve'pi deśaviśeṣasthitasya
tasya prāptau satyāmeva dehabandhāpagamaḥ । tatprāptiparyantaṃ dehabandho'nuvartata eva । virajānadī-
matikramya parabrahmalokaprāptau satyāmeva karmabandhakṣayoktyā tāvatparyantaṃ tanmūlasūkṣmadehā-
nuvṛttyavagamāt । atastatra vidyāyāmarcirādiśravaṇaṃ muktiphalaprāptyarthameva । muktiphalaka-
vidyāprakaraṇāmnānāttadapekṣitatvācca <quote>‘atha martyo'mṛto bhavatī’</quote>ti vacanaṃ vartamānasāmī-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha sṛtyupakramādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। samānā cāsṛtyupakramādamṛtatvaṃ ca ।। 7 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>upapāditasvarūpā notkrāntirvidvadaviduṣostulayā । ativisadṛśaphalabhājossāpyevaṃ visadṛśī yuktā ।। 361 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>gamanopakramataḥ prāk‍tulyaivotkrāntyavasthaiṣā । viduṣastu suṣumnāto niṣkāntiramṛtabhāktvaṃ ca ।। 362 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti sṛtyupakramādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<note>(1) <quote>‘tatra viśeṣeṇa bhāvyamityākṣipya samāhitam’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="456"/>
<p>iti dehapātānantaramevāmṛtatvaṃ śruyate । <quote>‘te'rciṣamabhisaṃbhavanti’</quote> ityarcirādiga-
tiśca śrūyate । evamubhayaśravaṇādayaṃ sandehaḥ । tatra brahmaṇi līnānāṃ vāgādīnāṃ
punarutpādāsaṃbhavānmuktasya gatyanupapatterarcirādagatirna muktātmanāmiti prāpte
siddhānta ucyate । arcirādinā brahmaprāpteḥ prāk śarīrasaṃbandhavyapadeśānna saṃsā-
rāpagamaḥ । amṛtatvavacanamāsannāmṛtatvābhiprāyam । ata utkrāntasyārcirādiga-
nirupapannā । yuduktaṃ vāgādivilayāt tasya gatyanupapattiriti tatrāha---
<sutra>sū ।। sūkṣmaṃ pramāṇataśca tathopalabdheḥ ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
śarīrādutkrāntasyāpi sūkṣmaśarīramanuvartate । anyathā gatyanupapattyā candrasaṃvā-
dādyanupapatteḥ । śrūyate hi paryaṅkavidyāyāṃ devayāne pathi viduṣaścandramasā saṃvādaḥ ।
<quote>‘ye vai ke cāsmāllokāt prayanti candramasameva te sarve gacchanti’</quote> ityupakramya
‘etadvai svargasya dvāraṃ yaścandramāḥ taṃ yaḥ pratyāha tamatisṛjate । atha ya enaṃ na pra-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pyābhiprāyamiti । pūrvādhikaraṇārthānuvādabhāṣye arcirādigaterupapāditatvoktirmūrdhanya-
nāḍyā niṣkrāntasyāmṛtatvaphaloktyārthasiddhasyānuvādaḥ । sandehabhāṣye dehādutkrāntasyetye-
tatsandehakoṭimadhye niveśanīyam । viduṣo dehādutkrāntasya sato'rcirādigatirityetadupapa-
dyate navetyarthaḥ । pūrvapakṣe dehamadhye vāṅmanassampattyādyutkrāntyupakramasattve'pi dehādyutkrā-
nterabhāvāt । upasaṃhārabhāṣyasyā'pi dehādutkrāntasya sato'rcirādigatirupapannā । dehādu-
tkrāntistatpūrvikārcirādigatiścetyubhayamupapannamityarthaḥ । sūtre tadamṛtatvaṃ dehādutkrāntasya
sato'rcirādigatipūrvakamityadhyāhāraḥ । apītiḥ apyayo brahmaṇi layaḥ āpīteḥ virajāna-
dyatikramaṇānantarabhāvibrahmasāyujyaprāptyupakramaparyantamityarthaḥ । saṃsāro dehamūlakarmabandhaḥ
tasya vyapadeśāt <quote>‘tatsukṛtaduṣkṛte vidhūnuta’</quote> iti vidhūnanapratiyogitvena nirdeśādityarthaḥ ।
yadvā । <quote>‘tejaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyā’</quote>mityatra tejaśśabdoktaṃ vāgādikaraṇajātamanaḥprāṇabhūtānta-
sahitaṃ sūkṣmadeharūpaṃ teja āpīteranuvartata ityadhyāhāraḥ । tasyokta evārthaḥ । tasya ca
kākākṣinyāyena hetunirdeśe'pyanvayaḥ । āpīteḥ sūkṣmadehamūlakarmavyapadeśādityarthaḥ । pūrva-
pakṣaśaṅkābījottaratvenottarasūtramavatārayati ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।। sūkṣmaṃ pramāṇataśca tathopalabdheḥ ।। 9 ।।</pratika>
sūkṣmaṃ śarīraṃ dehādutkrāntamanuvartata ityadhyāhāraḥ । pramāṇataścandrasaṃvādādivākyarūpāttatho-
palabdheḥ viduṣa utkrāntasya candrasaṃvādādyupayogidehasaṃbandhatvenopalabdherityarthaḥ । cakāre-
ṇedaṃ samuccīyate । <quote>‘vāṅmanasi sampadyata’</quote> ityādivākyaṃ vidyāprakaraṇagatatve'pi na viduṣa
eva <quote>‘vāṅmanassampattyādipratipādanaparaṃ pratīyata’</quote> ityaviśeṣaśravaṇāt vidvadavidvatsādhāra-
ṇye'pi prayato vāṅmanasādikaṃ yasyāṃ paradevatāyāṃ sampadyate <quote>‘tattvamasī’</quote>ti vidyopayogasa-
tvāt anyathā <quote>‘satā somya tadā sampanno bhavatī’</quote>tyādeḥ svāpādivākyajātasyāpi vidva-
nmātraviṣayatvaprasaṅgāt । kiñca । <quote>‘tejaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyā’</quote> mityatra tejaśśabdārthe pūrvavā-
kyanirdiṣṭavāṅmanaḥprabhṛtisāhityamiva <quote>‘evamevemamātmana’</quote>mityādiśrutyantaraprāptajīvasāhi-
tyamapi vivakṣaṇīyam । na ca jīvasya svarūpalayo'sti । atastaṃ deśe vyāpāroparamamā-
traparatvāvaśyaṃbhāvādanyatrāpi tathaiva ekena sampadyata iti śabdenopāttatvāditi । <pratika>taṃ yaḥ
pratyāheti</pratika> । candrapraśnasya ya uttaraṃ vadati vidvān taṃ brahmalokaprāptyarthamūrdhvadeśagamanāya
<pb n="457"/>
tyāha tamiha vṛṣṭirbhūtvā varṣati sa iha kīṭo vā pataṅgo vā śakunirvā śārdūlo
vā siṃho vā matsyo vā parasvān vā puruṣo vā'nyo vaiteṣu sthāneṣu pretyājāyate
yathākarma yathāvidyaṃ tamāgataṃ pṛcchati ko'sīti taṃ prati brūyāt’ ityādi । ataḥ
śarīrādutkrāntasya viduṣo'rcirādigatirupapannā ।।
<sutra>sū ।। nopamardenātaḥ ।। 10 ।।</sutra>
ata uktanyāyāt <quote>‘atha martyo'mṛto bhavati’</quote> ityamṛtatvavacanaṃ na dehasaṃbandho-
pamardena tadānīmevāmṛtatvaṃ vadati ।।
<sutra>sū ।। asyaiva copapatterūṣmā ।। 11 ।।</sutra>
asya sūkṣmaśarīrasya kvacidvidyamānatvopapatteśca na tadupamardena । upalabhyate hyu-
tkrāmato viduṣo'pi kvacit sūkṣmadehaguṇa ūṣmā, na sa sthūladehaguṇaḥ, anyatrā
nupalambhāt । ataśca gatyupapattiḥ ।।
<sutra>sū ।। pratiṣedhāditi cenna śārīrātspaṣṭo hyekeṣām ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
bṛhadāraṇyake <quote>‘tasya haitasya hṛdayasyāgraṃ pradyotate tena pradyotenaiṣa ātmā ni-
ṣkrāmati cakṣuṣo vā mardhno vā anyebhyo vā śarīradeśebhya tamutkrāmantaṃ prāṇo-
nūtkrāmati prāṇamanutkrāmantaṃ sarve prāṇāṃ anūtkrāmanti’</quote> ityādivākyairaviduṣo'-
pyutkrāntyādiprakāramabhidhāya <quote>‘iti tu kāmayamānaḥ’</quote> ityavidvadviṣayaṃ parisamāpya
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vimuñcati yastvavidvānnottaraṃ vadati taṃ yāvatsaṃpātamuṣitaṃ tadatyaye megho bhūtvā varṣajalena
saha muñcatītyarthaḥ । <quote>‘vṛṣṭirbhūtve’</quote>tyukte varṣaṇakāle'pi candrasya meghānupraveśana vyāpāro'stī-
tyavagamyate । athavā nātra candro'nuvartate । vṛṣṭiḥ bhūtvā meghaḥ prādurbhūya varṣatītyarthaḥ ।
parasvānāraṇyo mṛgaviśeṣaḥ । <pratika>sa॰ ।। nopamardenāt ।। 10 ।। tadānīmeveti</pratika> । kintu
pūrvoktaprakāreṇāsannāmṛtatvaṃ vadatītyarthaḥ । <pratika>sū॰ ।। asyaiva copapatterūṣmā ।। 11 ।।</pratika>
evacakārau bhinnakramaṃ yojayanhetoḥ pūrvasūtranirdiṣṭasādhyenānvayaṃ darśayitvā hetvasiddhipari-
hārārthatvanoṣmetipadaṃ sādhyāhāraṃ vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>asyeti</pratika> । utkramaṇakāle kvācitkoṣmada-
rśanena hetunotkramamāṇasūkṣmadehasadbhāvapratipādanaparaṃ sūtrañcet <quote>‘sūkṣmaṃ pramāṇataśce’</quote>ti tatsa-
dbhāvapratipādakasūtrasaṅgatatvāt <quote>‘nopamardene’</quote>ti sūtrataḥ prāgevedamakariṣyat । <pratika>sū॰ ।। pra-
tiṣedhāditi cenna śārīrātspaṣṭo hyekeṣām ।। 12 ।।</pratika> ayamāśayaḥ । <quote>‘tasya hyetasye’</quote>-
tyādisandarbheṇāviraktasyotkrāntimuktvā viraktasya prāṇānāmutkrāntiḥ pratiṣidhyate । na
ca <quote>‘na tasmātprāṇā utkrāmantī’</quote>ti śākhāntarapāṭhā‘ttasyetisambandhasāmānyevihitāṣaṣṭhyapi
<quote>‘naṭasya śṛṇotī’</quote>tivadapānārtheti mucyamānānna viśiśliṣyanta iti tadarthaḥ iti vācyam ।
ubhayatrāpi tacchabdasya śarīraparāmarśitvāt । bṛhadāraṇyaka eva <quote>‘yatrāyaṃ puruṣo mriyate u-
dasmātprāṇāḥ krāmantyāho ne’</quote>tyārtabhāgapraśnene<quote>‘ti hovāca yājñavalkyo'traiva samavalīyante
sa ucchvayannādhmāto mṛtaśśete’</quote> ityādi prāṇotkrāntyapādānasyādhmānena vāyupūraṇena dṛtiva-
ducchvayanasya śarīradharmasya kīrtanāt jīvātprāṇānāmutkrānteraprasaktatvena tatpratiṣedhānupapa-
tteśca । ato'rcirādigatiścandrasaṃvādassukṛtaduṣkṛtavidhūnanamityetatsarvaṃ satyalokaprāptya-
<pb n="458"/>
<quote>‘athākāmayamāno yo'kāmo niṣkāma āptakāma ātmakāmo na tasya prāṇā u-
tkrāmanti brahmaiva san brahmāpyeti’</quote> iti viduṣa utkrāntipratiṣedhādatraiva sākṣāt
brahmaprāptiriti cenna । viduṣa utkramamāṇasyārcirādigamanāya prasthitasya prāṇā-
stasmānna viśliṣyanta iti hyucyate <quote>‘na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanti’</quote> iti । aya-
martho mādyandinānāṃ śākhāyāṃ spaṣṭo'bhidhīyate । <quote>‘yo'kāmo niṣkāma āpta-
kāma ātmakāmo na tasmāt prāṇā utkrāmanti’</quote> iti ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
rthavidyāviśeṣaphalaṃ na tu muktyarthabrahmavidyāphalamiti netavyam । brahmavido maraṇakāle kvā-
citkoṣmadarśanaṃ tu tejaśśabdoktasya sūkṣmadehasya paradevatāsampatteḥ prācīnatvenopapadyata
iti । <pratika>viduṣa utkramamāṇasyeti</pratika> । ayaṃ bhāvaḥ । ārtabhāgapraśne śarīrādutkrāntirna prati-
vidhyate kintu śarīrādevotkrāntipratiṣedhasyāvidvadviṣayatvenāviduṣaḥ prāṇānāṃ śarīrādu-
tkrānteḥ pratiṣeddha‍umaśakyatvāt । avidvadviṣayatvaṃ kathamavasīyata iti cet uttarasandarbhāt ।
uttarasandarbhehi <quote>‘yatrāsya puruṣasya mṛtasyāgniṃ vāgapyeti vātaṃ prāṇaścakṣurādityaṃ manaścandraṃ
diśaḥ śrotraṃ pṛthivīṃ śarīramātmoṣadhīrlomāni vanaspatīnkeśā apsu lohitañca retaśca nidhī-
yate kvāya tadā puruṣo bhavatī’</quote>tyārtabhāgapraśne yājñavalkyenārtabhāgena ca rahasi mantrayitvā
puṇyapāparūpakarma tadāśrayatvena niścitamiti tadanantarasandarbhe śrutyaiva pratipādanāt । tatra
hi śrūyate । tau hotkramya mantrayāñcakrāte tau ha yadūcatuḥ karma haiva tadūcatuḥ ata yatpraśaśaṃ-
satuḥ karmahaiva tatpraśaśaṃsatuḥ puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati pāpaḥ pāpene’ti । na cā<quote>‘papuna-
mṛtyuñjayatī’</quote>ti pūrvavākye saṃsārataraṇarūpaṃ phalamucyate । tena prakṛtavidvadvipa/?/yatvamutkrānti-
pratiṣedhasyāvasīyata iti vācyam । agnirvai mṛtyussopāmannamityapāmannatvenopāsanamuktvāhi
tasya phalamapapunarmṛtyuṃ jayatītyucyate tasmādagnijaya evātra mṛtyujayo na saṃsārataraṇam ।
itaścātra śarīrādevotkrāntiḥ pratiṣidhyate । yato yatrā'yaṃ puruṣo mniyata iti pūrvavākye
puruṣaśabdena prakṛtassaeva tasmātprāṇāutkrāmantītyatra sarvanāmnāparāmarśanīyaḥ । na ca tatra pu-
ruṣaśabdasya śarīraparatvaṃ śaṅkanīyam । <quote>‘yatrāsya puruṣasyāgniṃ vāgapyetī’</quote>tyuttarasandarbhe <quote>‘pṛthivīṃ
śarīra’</quote>miti prakṛtapuruṣasaṃbadhitvena śarīrasya pṛthakkīrtanāt । <quote>‘na cākāśamātme’</quote>tyātmāpi
pṛthakkīrtyata iti vācyam । tatrātmaśabdasya madhyamāvayavavācitvena hṛdayāvakāśaparatvāt ।
prasiddho hi madhyamāvayavepyātmaśabda ānandamayavākyādiṣu । <quote>‘tasmātsa ucchvayannādhmāta’</quote> iti
nirdeśaḥ śarīraśarīriṇorabhedopacārāditi netavyaḥ । śārīrātprāṇānāmutkrāntiraprasaktā na
pratiṣidhyeteti cenna । vidvadviṣaye <quote>‘tasya tāvadeva cira’</quote>miti śarīranāśakāle brahmasampatti-
vacanena viduṣaḥ prāṇānāmapi sthūlaśarīraviyogakāla eva viśleṣa iti śaṅkārūpaprasakti-
satvāt । evaṃ prasaktyā viśiṣya viduṣaśśarīrātprāṇānāmutkrāntipratiṣedhenāviduṣastarhi
śarīrātprāṇānāmutkrāntirastikimityavidvadviṣaye'pi iti śaṅkārūpaprasaktisatvācca । tasmā-
darcirādigatiśruterevānukūlo'yaṃ mārga iti viduṣaḥ śarīrātprāṇānāṃ viśleṣapratiṣedha iti ।
nanu mūrdhanyanāḍyā niṣkramyārcirādimārgeṇa brahmalokaprāptirūpamamṛtatva<quote>‘mābhūtasaṃplavaṃ sthā-
namamṛtatvaṃ hi bhāṣyata’</quote> iti smṛtiprasiddhaṃ muktiphalādanyadevāmṛtatvamiti vaktavyaṃ । cakṣuṣṭo-
vā mūrdhno vetyavidvadviṣayavākyasandarbhamadhya eva mūrdhanyanāḍyā niṣkramaṇasyapi pāṭhādi-
<pb n="459"/>
<sutra>sū ।। smaryate ca ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
viduṣo mūrdhanyanāṅyā gamanaṃ smaryate । <quote>“ūrddhvamekaḥ sthitasteṣāṃ yo bhittvā sūrya-
maṇḍalam । brahmalokamatikramya tena yāti parāṃ gatim ।।”</quote> iti । ato'rcirādi-
gatirupapadye viduṣa utkrāntasya । kecinniranvayopāsakānāmiha śarīrapāt eva
muktirityarcirādigatimaniyatāmāhuḥ ।।
iti tadapītyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
atha parasaṃpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। tāni pare tathā hyāha ।। 14 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatra prāṇasahitasya jīvasya tejaupalakṣiteṣu bhūteṣu laya upapāditaḥ । ‘tejaḥ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tyāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।। smaryate ca ।। 13 ।।</pratika> yassūryamaṇḍalaṃ bhitvordhvaṃ sthita
iti yojanā । tena mūrdhasaṃbandhināḍīviśeṣaṇānmadhye'pi sūryamaṇḍalaparyantaprasṛtanāḍyā ni-
ṣkramaṇasya brahmalokātītadivyasthānaprāptihetutvakīrtanāt । cakṣuṣṭo vā mūrdhno vetyavidvadviṣaye
mūrdhagrahaṇaṃ mūrdhasaṃbandhināḍyantaraviṣayamavasīyata iti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>keciditi</pratika> । teṣāmayamāśayaḥ ।
<quote>‘na tasya prāṇā utkrāmantī’</quote>tyetadanantara <quote>‘matraiva samavanīyanta’</quote> iti prāṇānāmihaiva layaḥ
śrūyate । <quote>‘brahmaiva sanbrahmāpyetī’</quote>ti prāksiddhabrahmabhāvābhivyaktirūpaiva brahmaprāptirbrahmavidyā-
phalatayā śrūyate । ato guṇānvayarahitaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ brahma śravaṇamananānantaraṃ dhyāyatāṃ tatsā-
kṣātkārādihaiva brahmabhāvāvirbhāvarūpā muktiranena saṃdarbheṇocyate । tasmādarcirādigatissa-
guṇavidyāphalaprāptyarthetyevaṃ gatiraniyateti । tadeta<quote>‘daniyamassarveṣāmi’</quote>tyadhikaraṇepyuktam ।।</p>
<head>iti tadāpītyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<head>atha parasampattyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। tāni pare tathā hyāha ।। 14 ।।</pratika> saṅgatiṃ darśayituṃ vṛttamanuvadati---<pratika>pūrvatreti</pratika> ।
nanu <quote>‘so'dhyakṣeṇe’</quote>tyadhikaraṇasiddhasya <quote>‘prāṇastejasī’</quote>ti vākyārthasyānuvādo'yam । tathā ca
tenaiva saṅgatiruktā syānna pūrvādhikaraṇena । uktasaṅgatyā ca tadadhikaraṇānantaramevaitada-
dhikaraṇaṃ yuktaṃ karttum । <quote>‘vāṅmanasi sampadyate manaḥ prāṇe prāṇastejasī’</quote>ti vākyatrayārtho hi
kramikeṇādhikaraṇatrayeṇa cintitaḥ । ataścaturthavākyārtho'pi tadanantarameva cintanīyaḥ ।
na tu vidvadavidvatsāmānyotkrāntiprakāracintāṃ sāvaśeṣāṃ sthāpayitvā viśiṣya vidvadvi-</p>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha tadāpītyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। tadapīteḥ saṃsāravyapadeśāt ।। 8 ।। sūkṣmaṃ pramāṇataśca tathopalabdheḥ ।। 9 ।। nopamardenātaḥ ।। 10 ।।
asyaiva copapatterūṣmā ।। 11 ।। pratiṣedhāditi cenna śārīrātspaṣṭo hyekeṣām ।। 12 ।। smaryate ca ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>viduṣo notkrāntiḥ syādatraiva brahmasampatteḥ । utkramaṇābhāvasya ca tatprāṇānāṃ samāmananāt ।। 363 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>tasyārci...brahmaprāptyavadhidehayogaśravaṇāt । sāstyeva tanniṣedho jīvādbrahmāptivacana...... ।। 364 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti tadāpītyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<pb n="460"/>
<p>parasyāṃ devatāyām’ iti । tasya bhūtāntarasaṃsṛṣṭasya jīvayuktasya tejasaḥ parasyāṃ
devatāyāṃ layo'vagamyate । sa parabrahmaṇi svarūpalaya utāvibhāgāpattimātramiti
saṃśayaḥ । svarūpalaya iti yuktam । tathāhi <quote>‘devāttalū’</quote> iti deva eva devatetyu-
cyate । paraśabdo mahattvavācī । ataḥ paro devo mahādevaḥ । <quote>‘seyaṃ devataikṣata’</quote> <quote>‘dyā-
vābhūmī janayan deva eka’</quote> iti sa mahādeva eva sakalabhūtakāraṇaṃ parabrahma śrūyate ।
atastasminnupādāne sajīvānāṃ bhūtānāṃ svarūpalaya ityeva yukta iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ṣayotkrāntiprakāracintāmārabhya tanmadhye punarapi vidvadavidvatsāmānyaviṣayo'yaṃ cinta-
yituṃ yuktaḥ । kiñca viśiṣya vidvadviṣayotkrānticintā <quote>‘samānā cāsṛtyupakramā’</quote>dityā-
rabhya pravṛttā । tatra gatyupakramātprācīnatvaṃ caturthavākyasyāpi tulyam । atastasminnapi ni-
ṇīṃta eva । tatparyantaṃ viduṣo'pi samānamiti bodhayituṃ śakyam । evaṃ svocitasthāne vidya-
māne tamapahāya kimayamatra cintyate । ucyate । uktabhaṅgyā prāksaṅgatasyāsyādhikaraṇasyā-
trāpyastyevākṣepikī saṅgatiḥ । brahmavidāmutkrāntistatpūrvikā gatiścāstīti pūrvādhikaraṇo-
ktamayuktam । <quote>‘tejaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyā’</quote>miti vāgādimanaḥprāṇasahitasya sūkṣmadehasya sarvapra-
kṛtibhūte parabrahmaṇi svarūpeṇaiva layapratipādanāt । vidyāprakaraṇapaṭhitasya <quote>‘vāṅmanasi sampa-
dyata’</quote> ityādeḥ vidvadviṣayatvena svarūpalayapratipādanopapatteśca । dehendriyādirahitasya candra-
saṃvādādyasaṃbhavena taduktāyā arcirādigateranyaviṣayatvasyāvaśyavaktavyatvāditi । evamu-
bhayatra saṅgataṃ sadidamadhikaraṇamiha kṛtañcet ko'tra doṣaḥ । kiñca । vastuto'sya vākyasya
sāmānyaviṣayatve'pi vidvanmātraviṣayatvena pūrvapakṣaḥ kāryaḥ । anyathā <quote>‘tamutkrānmata’</quote>mityā-
diśruternirviṣayatvāpatteḥ । ato'pi vidvadutkrāntiprakāraviśeṣacintāmadhye saṅgatataramida-
madhikaraṇam । saṅgatibhāṣyaṃ tvevaṃ netavyam । tṛtīyavākyārthaparyantaṃ prāṅnirṇītam । catu-
rthavākyārthastu viśeṣeṇātra nirṇetumavaśeṣita idānī nirṇīyate । bhāvinametadvākyārthanirṇa-
yamapekṣya manasi nidhāyaitatparyantotkrāntirviduṣāmaviduṣāṃ ca samāneti prāguktamiti prasa-
ṅgātparasyāṃ devatāyāmityasya mahādevaśabdārthaviṣayatayā śive paryavasānaṃ darśayan pūrvapakṣamu-
papādayati---<pratika>tathā hīti</pratika> । jīvasyāpi svarūpataḥ kāryatvamaṅgīkṛtyaiva pūrvapakṣo nirvoḍhavyaḥ ।
anyathā parasyāṃ devatāyāmiti vākyagatasyaikasyaiva sampadyata iti śabdasya tejaśśabdopa-
lakṣitaviśiṣṭārthamadhye jīvāṃśe vyāpāroparamaparatvaṃ tadatirikteṣu svarūpalayaparatvamiti vai-
rūpyadoṣasyāparihāryatvādityabhiprāyeṇa <quote>‘sajīvānā’</quote>mityuktam । vāgādivākyeṣu sampadyata
iti śabdasya vṛttilayaparatvaṃ tejovākye svarūpalayaparatvamiti vairūpyantu na doṣaḥ । sūtre-
ṣvanuvṛttapadānāṃ tattatsūtragatapadāntarasamabhivyāhārānusāreṇārthābhedasya dṛṣṭatvāditi bhāvaḥ ।
<quote>‘ityeva yukta’</quote>mityavadhāraṇasyāyamabhiprāyaḥ । <quote>‘tejaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyā’</quote>mityasya vyāpāropara-
maparatve tadvākyamananvitārthaṃ syāt । vāgādimanaḥprāṇajīvasahitasūkṣmadehavyāpāroparamasya
nityasiddhabrahmasambandhādhīnatvābhāvāt । na ca sthānaviśeṣāvacchinnabrahmasaṃbandhaḥ prāgasiddho-
'trābhidhīyate । sthānaviśeṣānuvādanāt । rājñaḥ prasthānopayuktaparivāramelane sati pra-
sthānasyeva jīvasyotkramaṇopayuktasūkṣmadehendriyamanaḥprāṇamelane satyutkramaṇasyaiva vaktavya-
tvena madhye stānaviśeṣāvacchinnabrahmasampattyadhīnakiyatkālaparyantavyāpāroparamoktivaiya-
<pb n="461"/>
siddhāntastu । brahmaṇyupādāne'pi na svarūpalayaḥ । kiṃtu avibhāgamātram, <quote>‘vāṅma-
nasi saṃpadyata’</quote> iti smpattivacanasyaikasyārthāntaraparatve pramāṇābhāvāt । ato
manaḥprabhṛtivat vṛttilaya eveti vadati ।।
<sutra>sū ।। avibhāgo vacanāt ।। 15 ।।</sutra>
saṃpattivacanādavibhāgamātraṃ brahmaṇi bhūtānāmiti yuktameva ।।
iti parasaṃpattyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
rthyācceti । <pratika>avibhāgamātramiti</pratika> । suptipralayayoriva vyāpāroparameṇa sūkṣmarūpatayāvasthā-
namavibhāgaḥ । <pratika>pramāṇābhāvāditi</pratika> । ekasya padasya śravaṇe'nuṣaṅge'pyaikārthyamautsargikam ।
sūtreṣu padāntarasamabhivyāhārādyavagamitavatkramavivakṣārūpeṇa balavatā pramāṇenāpodyate । na ceha
tathā kiñcitpramāṇamasti । na copādānalayaḥ svarūpalaya eveti niyamastatra pramāṇam । suṣu-
ptipralayayorjīvasya brahmaṇi laye vyabhicāreṇāniyamāsiddheḥ । na ca <quote>‘tejaḥ । parasyāṃ deva-
tāyā’</quote>miti vākyavaiyarthyaprasaṅgo'tra pramāṇam । vāgādyutkramaṇakleśāpanayāya kañcitkālaṃ
suṣuptāviva brahmasampatterviśrāntyarthatvena tasya saphalatvāt viśrānteścotkramaṇakleśaprayuktahṛdaya-
kṣobhaśamanena niṣkramaṇārthanāḍīviśeṣavivecanopayuktatvena saphalatvādbrahmaṇi hṛdayākāśarūpe
sampattiriha vivakṣitā । <quote>‘sa etāstejomātrāssamabhyādadāno hṛdayamevānvavakrāmatī’</quote>ti śru-
tyantarāt pratyuta bādhakameva pramāṇamasti jīvāṃśe sampadyata iti kriyāyāḥ vairūpyāpatti-
rūpam । na ca jīvasya svarūpataḥ kāryatvamabhyupagantuṃ yuktam । tathā sati mokṣasyātmanā-
śatvenāpuruṣārthatvāpatteḥ । tathā muktiphalakaparabrahmavidyāprakaraṇeṣvarcirādigatiśravaṇamapi
bādhakaṃ pramāṇamiti । evamācāryaḥ svayameva siddhāntaṃ pradarśya tasminnarthe sūtramavatārayati
<pratika>sū॰ ।। avibhāgo vacanāt ।। 15 ।। bhūtānāmiti</pratika> । bhūtagrahaṇaṃ vāgādimanaḥprā-
ṇajīvānāmapyupalakṣaṇam ।।</p>

atha tadoko'grādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। tadoko'grajvalanaṃ tatprakāśitadvāro vidyāsāmarthyāttaccheṣaga-
tyanusmṛtiyogācca hārdānugṛhītaḥ śatādhikayā ।। 16 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatra vidvadaviduṣorarcirādigatyupakramaparyantamutkrāntiḥ samānetyuktam । ni-
pkramaṇavelāyāmubhayorviśeṣo'sti na veti vicāryate । <quote>‘tejaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyām’</quote>
iti bhūtaiḥ saha paramakāraṇe paradeve pare brahmaṇi paramākāśarūpe vidvānavidvāṃśca
vilīyāvibhāgena kṣaṇaṃ viśramya tiṣṭhatīti samabhihitam । ataḥ samānaivo-
tkrāntiḥ, tayorhṛtpradyotanādeḥ samatvaśravaṇāt । <quote>‘tasya haitasya hṛdayasyāgraṃ pradyotate
tena pradyotenaiṣa ātmā niṣkrāmati cakṣuṣṭo vā mūrdhno vā anyebhyo vā śarīrade-
śebhya’</quote> iti śrūyate, ataḥ samānatvādutkrāntestayoraviśeṣa iti pūrvapakṣe prāpte

<head>atha tadoko'grādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। tadoko'grajvalanaṃ tatprakāśitadvāro vidyāsāmarthyāttaccheṣagatyanusmṛti-
yogācca hārdānugṛhītaśśatādhikayā ।। 16 ।।</pratika> saṅgatiṃ darśayati---<pratika>pūrvatreti</pratika> । gatyupa-
kramātprāk brahmasampattiparyantotkrāntirvidvadaviduṣossamāneti <quote>‘samānā cāsṛtyupakramāt’</quote>
ityadhikaraṇe varṇitam । tataḥ paramutkrāntistatpūrvikā gatiśca svarūpata eva nāsti yasyāṃ
viśeṣamabhipretyāsṛtyupakramādityavadhikriyetetyāśaṅkya tadubhayasadbhāvassamarthitaḥ । ihatvastu
svarūpatastadanantaramapyutkrāntivyāparaḥ nāḍībhirniṣkramaṇarūpaḥ tatra viduṣāṃ viśeṣo nā-
stītyāśaṅkya samādhīyata iti saṅgatirityarthaḥ । viśeṣa1sadbhāvā'sadbhāvābhyāṃ saṃśayaḥ । vi-
śeṣo'pi <quote>‘tejaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyā’</quote>mityetatparyantaṃ madhye vābhavetpaścādvā । nādyāḥ । tāvatpa-
ryantaṃ sāmyāṅgīkārāt । na dvitīyaḥ । tadanantaramapi hṛdayāgraprajvalanaṃ yayākayācinnā-
ḍyā ni2ṣkramaṇamityaviśeṣāt । na ca viduṣāṃ mūrdhanyanāḍyaiva niṣkramaṇamiti viśeṣo vaktuṃ
śakyate । nāḍīnāmatisūkṣmāṇāṃ durvivecatvena tadīyānāṃ mūrdhanyanāḍyāḥ viduṣo'pi vi-
vicyāvagantumaśakyatvāt । na ca vidyānuṣṭhānadaśāyāṃ svayamīdṛśapradeśasthitayaitādṛśyā
nāḍyā niṣkramya brahma prāpnuvānītyanusandhānābhyāsapāṭavāttadānīṃ svaniṣkramanāḍīparijñānaṃ
bhavet utkramaṇakleśaprayuktasya kṣobhasya brahmaṇi viśrāntopaśāntatvena tadānīṃ vivecanakau-
śalasatvāditi vācyam । tathāpi ghanasaṃtamasāvṛtahṛdayāvaraṇagatasya viduṣo nirantarā-
nekasūkṣmatamanāḍīmadhye svaniṣkramaṇa3nāḍīviśeṣasyāvagantumaśakyatvāt । na ca hṛdayāgra-
prakāśena vivecanaṃ syāditi vācyam । adhomukhahṛdayāgraprakāśasya mūrdhābhigatordhvagatāvanu-
payogāt । na ca <quote>‘tayordhvamāya’</quote>nniti śrutirviduṣāṃ mūrdhanyanāḍyaiva niṣkramaṇamiti niyacchati
kintu yo mūrdhanyanāḍyā niṣkrāmati so'mṛtatvaṃ prāpnotītyetāvanmātraṃ vadati । tattu nāḍī-
stutyarthatvenāpyupapadyata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu <quote>‘tayordhvamāyanni’</quote>ti śrutirmūrdhanya-
<note>(1) <quote>‘viśeṣasaṃbhavāsaṃbhavābhyāṃ’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘mityasya tulyatvāt’</quote> ini kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(3) <quote>‘nāḍyā
vivicyāvagantu’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="463"/>
viśeṣo'stīti siddhānta ucyate । tathā hi । hārdasya hṛdayagatasya parameśvarasyā-
rādhanarūpavidyāsāmarthyāt tadaṅgagatyanusaṃdhānācca prītena tena sarvānugrāhakeṇa sva-
svarūpāvaraṇamaladhvaṃsanāvidagdhayā'nugrahadṛṣṭyā nirīkṣitastadanugrahaprakāśitakṣaraḥ
śātādhikayā mūrdhanyanāḍyā vidvānutkrāmati । na tathā paraḥ । kiṃ tu itaranāḍībhireva ।
tathā śrutiḥ । <quote>“śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya nāḍyastāsāṃ mūrdhānamabhinissṛtaikā ।
tayorddhvamāyannamṛtatvameti viṣvaṅṅanyā utkramaṇe bhavanti ।।”</quote> iti । sa eṣa viduṣa
utkramaṇe viśeṣaḥ । etaduktaṃ bhavati । <quote>“rudro janānāṃ hṛdaye sanniviṣṭaḥ । hṛtpu-
ṇḍarīkaṃ virajaṃ viśuddham ।।”</quote> ityādiśrutiṣu <quote>‘īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ hṛddeśe'rjuna ti-
ṣṭhati’</quote> ityādismṛtiṣu ca sarvajanahṛdayagato hi parameśvaro'vagamyate । yatra suṣupto
jīvaḥ svendriyavṛttibhiḥ saha vilīya tadekaraso bhavati, yaśca <quote>‘viśvādhiko rudro
maharṣiḥ’</quote> <quote>‘sarvo vai rudraḥ’</quote> ityādiśrutiṣu nimittatvādviśvādhikatvenopādānatvādvi-
śvātmakatvena cāvagamyate, <quote>‘eko hi rudro na dvitīyāya tasthuḥ’</quote> ityādiśrutiṣu
yasya viśvādhipatyaṃ śrūyate, <quote>‘śiva eko dhyeyaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘yadā carmavadākāśam’</quote> iti yama-
ntareṇa mumukṣūṇāṃ jñeyaṃ vastu nāstīti vijñāyate, <quote>‘atra hi jantoḥ prāṇeṣūtkramamā-
ṇeṣu rudrastārakaṃ brahma vyācaṣṭe yenāsāvamṛtī bhūtvā’</quote> iti ya utkrāntisamaye vi-
duṣāṃ svarūpaprakāśakatārakabrahmopadeṣṭṛtvenāmnāyate, <quote>‘ā vo rājānam’</quote> ityādiṣu
yasyārādhyatvena sarvayajñādhipatyaṃ varṇyate, <quote>‘unno vīrām̐ arpaya bheṣajebhirbhiṣaktamaṃ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nāḍyā niṣkrāntānāmevāmṛtatvaṃ nānyeṣāmiti niyacchantyarthādviduṣāṃ mūrdhanyanāḍyaiva niṣkra-
maṇamityapi niyacchatyeva । anyathā nāḍyantaraniṣkrāntānāṃ viduṣāmapi muktyabhāvaprasa-
ṅgena muktyarthavidyāvidhāyiśāstrā'prāmāṇyaprasaṅgāt । na ca nāḍīnāṃ durdarśatvam । vidyā-
rādhitaparameśvaraprasādāttaddarśanopapatteḥ । na caivaṃ śrutyarthopapādane saṃbhavatyasadarthāvalambana-
tvena pākṣikārthāvalambanatvena vā brahmanāḍīstutyarthatvakalpanaṃ yuktamiti tamimaṃ siddhāntaṃ
sūtrā'rūḍhaṃ kurvannupapādayati---<pratika>tathāhīti</pratika> । sūtreṇa brahmanāḍīdarśanopāyamātraṃ darśyate । tena
tadapekṣasya siddhāntasyārthātsiddhiḥ । vidyāsāmarthyāt vidyāviśeṣabhūtagatyanusandhānapariśī-
lanācca vidvānhṛdayagatena parameśvareṇānugṛhīto bhavatīti । tataśca tasya pa1rameśvarasyokaḥ
sthānaṃ hṛdayaṃ tadagre jvalanaṃ prakāśo bhavati । tena prakāśena brahmanāḍīdvāraṃ prakāśitaṃ bha-
vati । brahmanāḍyāḥ khalu dvāraṃ nābhicakre prasiddhaṃ na tu hṛdayādūrdhvapradeśe hṛdi । nābhyā-
dimūrdhaparyantavyāpitvāttasyāḥ । ato vidvānprakāśamānena hṛdayāgraprakāśena tāvaddeśavyā-
pinā prakāśitaṃ brahmanāḍīdvāraṃ praviṣṭastayā śatādhikayā nāḍyā nīlakamukhaniveśitaśī-
sagulikāvat jhaṭiti niṣkrāmatīti sūtrasyārthaḥ । nanu yasyaivamutkrāntisamaye parameśvarā-
nugrahaikalabhyo hṛdayāgraprakāśo nāsti tasya kathaṃ mūrdhanyanāḍyā niṣkrimaṇaniyamassidhdyedi-
tyāśaṅkya niyamena parameśvarasya tadānīmāvirbhūyānugrāhakatvaṃ tadīyavaibhavaprakhyāpanena sama-
rthayate । <pratika>etaduktamityādinā । anno vīrāniti</pratika> । vīrā devavratādiṣu prasiddhāssadā para-
<note>(1) <quote>‘jīvasya yadokaḥ’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="464"/>
tvā bhiṣajāṃ śṛṇomi’</quote> iti yaḥ saṃsārarogasya bhiṣaktam iti nirūpyate । <quote>‘māyāṃ
tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram’</quote> iti sakalaprapañcavicitrakalikānikuru-
mbāvalambinī māyālakṣaṇā paramaśaktiryasya rūpaikadeśasvabhāvatayā pratipādyate ।
sa khalu hṛdayagato hārdaḥ paraṃ brahma parameśvaraḥ paramamaṅgalasvarūpa umāpatiḥ para-
mātmā svājñārūpaśruticoditeṣu karmasvagnihotrādiṣu svārādhanarūpeṣu niyataṃ nirmu-
ktasakalāvihitakarmalavaṃ svārpitasakalakarmaphalaṃ svāyattacittaṃ svajñānāmṛtaparipūrṇaṃ
nirastasamastakāmyaphalaṃ vivekādisaṃpannaṃ svabhaktimātraikanirataṃ svaprasādākāṅkṣiṇaṃ
vidyāvantaṃ sādhakamavalokya śarīraparityāgasamaye tadviṣayasaṃpannaprasādaḥ tasmin
saṃsāramalakalaṅkāpakarṣiṇīmanugrahadṛṣṭi nidadhāti । tadanugrahaviśeṣeṇāsau viga-
litasāṃsārikamalaḥ prakāśitātmadyotitamūrdhanyanāḍyā nirgatyārcirādinā tadīyaṃ
paraṃ padamaprākṛtaṃ niratiśayānandasvabhāvaṃ prāpya tadākāro bhūtvā nityaniratiśayā-
nandasvarūpo bhavati । tasmādaviduṣo viduṣaśca gativaiṣamyamastīti yuktameva ।।
iti tadoko'grādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
meśvarasannidhāvantaraṅgasevāṃ kurvantaḥ gaṇamāthāḥ । teṣu hi vīraśabdaḥ prasiddhaḥ । <quote>‘kṣayadvīrāya
prabharāmahe matiṃ’</quote> <quote>‘kṣayadvīrāya namasā vidhema te’</quote> <quote>‘divyā gaṇā bahurūpāḥ purāṇāḥ’</quote> <quote>‘āyu-
śchido naḥ prathamaṃ tu vīrā’</quote> ityādimantreṣu prasiddhaḥ । kṣayanto vasanto vīrā yasmin tasmai
kṣayadvīrāyeti parameśvarasya viśeṣaṇam । evaṃbhūtān vīrān sarveṣvapi pārameśvareṣu sarve-
ṣvapi divyasthāneṣu sannihitānprāpya karmabhūtānnaḥ asmān udarpaya ūrddhvadeśe sarvasyāpi
prapañcoparisthite paramapadarūpe divyasthāne prāpaya paramapade māṃ taissaha saṃyojayetyarthaḥ । prakā-
<pratika>śitātmadyotitamūrdhanyanāḍyeti</pratika> । malavigalanopakramāddha‍ṛdayāgre khadyotavatsaṃjātaprakāśo
ya ātmā svāpṛthagbhūtadharmajñānaprabhārūpataḥ tena dyotitayā mūrdhanyanāḍyetyarthaḥ । sarvamidaṃ
prastutavidvadutkrāntyanusāreṇa varṇitam । evamavidvadutkrāntāvapi varṇāśramadharmārādhitaparame-
śvarānugrahavaśātprāpyalokānuguṇanāḍīpraveśārthaḥ tattannāḍīdvārakaprakāśo'nusandheyaḥ ।।</p>

<p>atha raśmyanusāryadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। raśmyanusārī ।। 17 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatra sādhakasya hṛdayagataparameśvarānugṛhītasya mūrdhanyanāḍyā nirgama uktaḥ ।
nirgatasya tadūrddhvagamanaṃ niśi divā ca saṃbhavati na veti saṃśayaḥ । kiṃ tāvat prā-
ptam ? <quote>‘yatraitadasmāccharīrādutkrāmatyathaitaireva raśmibhirūrddhvamākramata’</quote> iti samutkrā-
ntasya raśmisaṃbandhenorddhvadeśākramaṇamavagamyate । raśmisaṃbandhastu divaiva saṃbhavati,
na tu rātrāviti prāpte brūmaḥ । utkrānto vidvān raśmisaṃbandhādevorddhvaṃ gaccha-
tīti satyam । sa tu divā ca rātrau ca saṃbhavati । nidāgheṣūṣmadarśanena niśyapi
raśmisattvāt । tasmāddivā ca rātrau ca raśmyanusārī gacchatyūrddhvamiti nirṇayaḥ ।।
āśaṅkya pariharati---
<sutra>sū ।। niśi neti cenna saṃbandhasya yāvaddehabhāvitvāddarśayati ca ।। 18 ।।</sutra>
niśi mṛtasyāpi raśmisaṃbandhena brahmaprāptirabhihitā । sā na saṃbhavati, <quote>“divā
ca śuklapakṣaśca uttarāyaṇameva ca । mumūrṣatāṃ praśastāni viparītaṃ tu garhitam ।।”</quote>
iti niśāmaraṇanindanāt । iti cenna । saṃsārabandhasya yāvadvidyābhāvi-
tvāt । vidyāyā anārabdhakāryeṣu bandhahetuṣu karmasu nāśiteṣu anuvartamānasya prā-
rabdhasyāpi yāvaccaramadehāvasānabhāvitvāccaramadehāvasāne prārabdhe'pi naṣṭe sati
punarbrahmaprāptivighnahetvabhāvāt । tathā darśayati śrutiḥ ‘tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha raśmyanusāryadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। raśmyanusārī ।। 17 ।।</pratika> mūrdhanyanāḍyā niṣkramaṇe vicārite tadanantarabhāvi-
raśmibhirūrddhvākramaṇamadhikṛtya vicāryata iti saṅgatiḥ । viduṣa ūrddhvadeśākramaṇakāraṇānāṃ
sūryaraśmīnāṃ rātrau satvā'satvābhyāṃ tasya niśāmaraṇanindāviṣayatvā'viṣayatvābhyāñca saṃ-
śayaḥ । viduṣo niśi mṛtasya ūrddhvagatirna saṃbhavati । tatkāraṇānāṃ sūryaraśmīnāmabhāvāt
niśāsvanubhūyamānasyoṣmaṇa āgneyatvenāpyupapatteḥ । jyotiśśāstraprakriyayā candramaṇḍalamanu-
praviṣṭāḥ sūryaraśmaya eva candraraśmaya ityaṅgīkāre'pi darśādirātriṣu teṣāmapyabhāvāt । na
ca niśi mṛtasya viduṣo vināpi sūryaraśmīnūrddhvagatiḥ śaṅkanīyā । etaireva raśmibhirityava-
dhāraṇavirodhāt । na ca niśi mṛtasya viduṣo mūrdhanyanāḍyā niṣkrāntasya yāvadudayaṃ sūrya-
raśmipratīkṣaṇenorddhvagatirvācyā । <quote>‘sa yāvat kṣipyenmanastāvadādityaṃ gacche’</quote>diti śaighyravacana-
virodhāt । tathā niśāmaraṇanindanasya vidvadavidvatsādhāraṇyena pravṛttatvādapi niśi mṛtasya
viduṣo na saṃbhavatyūrddhvagatiriti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu niśyapi vidvānsūryaraśmyanusārī
ūrddhvaṃ gacchati grīṣme divā saurātapoṣmaprakarṣe satyeva rātrāvūṣmadarśanena tasya sūryasaṃbandhitvā-
vāgatyā rātrāvapi sūryaraśmīnāmanuvṛttyavadhāraṇāditi । atha niśāmaraṇanindārūpapūrvapakṣa-
hetvantaranirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram ।।<pratika>sa॰ ।। niśi neti cenna saṃbandhasya yāvaddehabhāvi-
tvāddarśayati ca ।। 18 ।। yāvadvidyābhāvitvāditi</pratika> । vidyāśabdena vidyādeho viva-
<pb n="466"/>
vimokṣye'tha saṃpatsya’ iti । niśānindā tvitarapūruṣaviṣayā । ato niśyapi
mṛtasya brahmaprāptau na virodhaḥ ।।
iti raśmyanusāryadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।
ata dakṣiṇāyanādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। ataścāyane'pi dakṣiṇe ।। 19 ।।</sutra>
ata eva bandhahetvabhāvādeva । dakṣiṇāyanamṛtasyāpi viduṣo brahmaprāptirastyeva ।।
<sutra>sū ।। yoginaḥ prati smaryate smārte caite ।। 20 ।।</sutra>
nanu viduṣa eva mumūrṣūn prati punarāvṛttyapunarāvṛttihetutvena kālaviśeṣaḥ sma-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kṣitaḥ । ata eva <quote>‘yāvaccaramadehāvasānabhāvitvādi’</quote>tyuktam । <pratika>niśānindātviti</pratika> । mu-
ktyarthavidyāvidhāyiśāstraprāmāṇyādavidvadviṣayatvaṃ kalpanīyam । avidvatsvapi yeṣāmiṣṭāpū-
rtādikāriṇāmatiśiṣṭānāṃ niśāmaraṇaṃ dṛśyate, teṣāṃ tato'pi prabalasya prājīnasya duṣka-
rmaṇaḥ phalonmukhatā phalabalātkalpanīyeti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti raśmyanusāryadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<head>atha dakṣiṇāyanādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। ataścāyane'pi dakṣiṇe ।। 19 ।।</pratika> atideśādhikaraṇasyāsyaiyamadhikāśaṅkā ।
<quote>‘ya evaṃ vidvānudagayane pramīyate devānāmeva mahimānaṃ gatvādityasya sāyujyaṃ gacchatyatha yo
dakṣiṇe pramīyate pitṝṇāmeva mahimānaṃ gatvā candramasaḥ sāyujyaṃ salokatāmāpnotī’</quote>ti tai-
ttirīyopaniṣadi puruṣavidyāvasāne pūrvānuvākavihitabrahmavidyāvata uttarāyaṇamṛtasyāditya-
prāptimuktvā dakṣiṇāyanamṛtasya candraprāptiruktā । na ceyamarcirādimārgaparvabhūtacandra-
prāptiḥ । tasyottarāyaṇamṛtavidvatsādhāraṇyena dakṣiṇāyanamṛtāvidvanmātraviṣayatvāyogāt
<quote>‘pitṝṇāmeva mahimānaṃ gatve’</quote>ti pitryabhogānubhavoktivirodhācca । ato viduṣo'pi dakṣi-
ṇāyanamṛtasya dhūmādimārgeṇa candraṃ prāpya punarāvṛttirvivakṣitetyavasīyate । candraloke pi-
tryabhogānubhavasya punarāvṛttiparyantatāyāḥ <quote>‘yāvatsampātamuṣitve’</quote>tyādivākyāvagatatvāditi ।
atrā'yaṃ parihāraḥ । udagayanadakṣiṇāyanamṛtayorubhayorapi viduṣoratra brahmaprāptireva prati-
pipādayiṣitā । <quote>‘brahmaṇo mahimānamāpnotī’</quote>ti vākyaviśeṣāt । uttarāyaṇamṛtasyāditya-
loke divyalokānubhavaḥ dakṣiṇāyanamṛtasya candraloke pitryabhogānubhavaśca mārge viśrānti-
hetutvena vivakṣita ityadhikaraṇadvayākṣepasamādhānārthatvenobhayaśeṣabhūtamidaṃ sūtram ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।।
yoginaḥ prati smaryate smārte caite ।। 20 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘yatra kāle tvanāvṛtti’</quote>miti smṛtau kāla-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha raśmyanusāryadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। raśmyanusārī ।। 17 ।। niśi neti cenna saṃbandhasya yāvaddehabhāvitvāddarśayati ca ।। 18 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>raśmibhirūrddhvākramaṇaṃ niṣkrantasya śrutaṃ viduṣaḥ । tanniśi mṛtasya nāsti brahmāptirgarhitā'pi niśā ।। 369 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>maivaṃ niśyapi sattā raśmīnāmūṣmaṇāvagatā । tadgarhā cāviduṣāṃ nocetpākṣikaphalā bhavedvidyā ।। 370 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti raśmyanusāryadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
﻿<pb n="467"/>
<p>ryate । <quote>“yatra kāle tvanāvṛttimāvṛttiṃ caiva yoginaḥ । prayātā yānti taṃ kālaṃ
vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha ।।”</quote> <quote>“agnirjyotirahaḥ śuklaḥ ṣaṇmāsā uttarāyaṇam । tatra pra-
yātā gacchanti brahma brahmavido janāḥ ।। dhūmo rātristathā kṛṣṇaḥ ṣaṇmāsā dakṣi-
ṇāyanam । tatra cāndramasaṃ jyotiryogī prāpya nivartate ।। śuklakṛṣṇe gatī hyete
jagataḥ śāśvate mate । ekayā yātyanāvṛttimanyayā''vartate punaḥ ।।”</quote> iti । tasmā-
davidvadviṣayā niśādakṣiṇāyananindetyayuktamiti śaṅkottaramidaṃ sūtram । vidu-
ṣāmarcirādigatiḥ, tadviparītā'nyeṣāmiti yogino yogayuktānprati yogāṅgatayā
pratidinamanusmartavye devayānapitṛyānākhye ete gatī iti smaryate <quote>‘yatra kāle tva-
nāvṛttim’</quote> ityādinā । na tu viduṣaḥ prati maraṇakālaviśeṣaḥ smaryate । <quote>“naite sṛtī
pārtha jānan yogī muhyati kaścana । tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu yogayukto bhavārjuna ।।”</quote>
ityupasaṃhārāt, <quote>‘agnirjyotiḥ’</quote> <quote>‘dhūmo rātriḥ’</quote> iti ślokayordevayānapitṛyānaga-
tipratyabhijñānācca । <quote>‘yatra kāle tu’</quote> iti kālaśabdastvātivāhikagaṇasya kāla-
bhimānidevatābhūyastvāt । ataḥ sarvethā viduṣāṃ brahmaprāptau niśādakṣiṇāyanakṛ-
ṣṇapakṣaniṣedho nāstyeva । yadā dehāpagamastadānīmeva tatprāptiriti ।।
iti dakṣiṇāyanādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।
iti śrīkaṇṭhaśivācāryaviracite brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye caturthādhyāyasya
dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 4 ।। 2 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śabdo yogināṃ mumukṣūṇāmevāvṛttyanāvṛttihetuniśādipadaṃ dakṣiṇāyanottarāyaṇarūpamaraṇakā-
larūpaviśeṣaparamityabhiprāyeṇākṣepaḥ । taṃ kālaṃ vakṣyāmīti pratijñāya mārgadvayaparvaṇāmu-
padeśāt kālaśabdaḥ kālābhimānidevatābahulātivāhikagaṇaparaḥ । <quote>‘āvṛttiṃ caiva yo-
ginā’</quote> miti yogiśabdo na mamukṣumātraviṣayaḥ kintvāvṛttyanāvṛttibhājāmaiśvaryārthināṃ mamu-
kṣūṇāṃ ca yogināṃ sādhāraṇa iti parihāraḥ ।। <pratika>iti dakṣiṇāyanādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</pratika></p>
<p>iti śrīśivātivādimūrddhanyaśivadarśanasthāpanadhurandharasakaladevabhūdevapratiṣṭhāpaka-
<pratika>śrīmaccannabommabhūpālahṛdayakamala</pratika>kuharaviharamāṇa<pratika>śrīsāmbaśivapreritasya
śrīma</pratika>dbharadvājakulajaladhikaustubhaśrīviśvajidyāji<pratika>śrīraṅgarājādhvarivara-
sūnorappayyadīkṣitasya</pratika> kṛtau <pratika>śrīkaṇṭhaśivācāryaviracitabrahma-
mīmāṃsābhāṣya</pratika>vyākhyāyāṃ śivārkamaṇidīpikākhyāyāṃ
caturthasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 4 ।। 2 ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha dakṣiṇāyanādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। ataścāyane'pi dakṣiṇe ।। 19 ।। yoginaḥ prati smaryate smārte caite ।। 20 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>evamapi dakṣiṇāyanamṛtasya na brahmalokagatiḥ । kathamanyathottarāyaṇakālaṃ bhīṣmaḥ pratīkṣeta ।। 371 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>vidyāphalanaiyatyāttadā mṛtasyāpi sāstyeva । bhīṣmasya tu pratīkṣā kartuṃ svacchandamṛtyutāprathanam ।। 372 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti dakṣiṇāyanādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<head>iti śrīmadappayyadīkṣitakṛtau adhikaraṇasārasaṅgrahe nayamaṇimālākhye
tṛtīyaparicchede turīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 4 ।। 2 ।।</head>
<pb n="468"/>
<head>।। śrīḥ ।।</head>
<head>śivābhyāṃ namaḥ ।</head>
<head>śrīkaṇṭhācāryakṛtau</head>
<head>brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye</head>
<head>atha caturthādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha arcirādyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū ।। arcirādinā tatprathiteḥ ।। 1 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatropāsakasya hṛdayagataparameśvarānugraheṇa prakāśitadvārasya mūrdhanyanāḍyā de-
hānniṣkrāntirabhihitā । evaṃvidhasya brahmaprāptirarcirādinā mārgeṇaiva, utānya-
thā'pi saṃbhavatīti prathamamiha vicāryate । tathā hi । ekatra ‘yatrāsau keśānto
vivartate । vyapohya śīrṣavāpāle । bhūrityagnau pratitiṣṭhati । bhuva iti vāyau । su-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>śivārkamaṇidīpikāyām</head>
<head>atha turīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha arcirādyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<p>pūrvavṛttārthānuvādena saṅgatisūcanapūrvakamādyādhikaraṇasya vicāryaṃ darśayati---<pratika>pūrvatreti</pratika> ।
mārgaikyopapādakapratyabhijñānasatvā'satvābhyāṃ saṃśayaḥ । nanu yathā bahvīṣu śākhāsu śrutāpi
daharavidyaikā evaṃ mārgo'pyekaḥ syāditi pūrvapakṣa ityāśaṅkya pūrvapakṣamupapādayati---<pratika>tathā
hīti</pratika> । sthānaguṇādipratyabhijñānādyuktaṃ vidyaikyam । iha tathā mārgaikyopapādinī pratya-
bhijñā na dṛśyate । na kha<quote>‘lvantareṇa tāluke । ya eṣa sta ivāvalambate । sendrayoniḥ yatrāsau
keśānto vivartate vyapohya śīrṣakapāle ।’</quote> iti śrutāni tālukāntaravalambamānāvayava-
kesāntaśīrṣakapālāni vyāhṛtividyāyāmiva vidyāntareṣu mārgaparvatvena śrutāni । tatrāgnyā-
dīnāṃ tu brahmaṇa iva prāpyatvenaiva śravaṇaṃ mārgaparvatvena । śaibyapraśne ca <quote>‘sa sāmabhirunnīyate
brahmaloka’</quote>miti sāmavedapaṭhitānāṃ sāmnāmeva brahmalokaparyantaprāpakatvaṃ śrūyate । na tvarci-
rādiparvamadhye kiñcidapyāmnāyate । tathā chāndogye daharavidyāyāṃ <quote>‘yatraitadasmāccharīrā-
dutkrāmatyathaitaireva raśmibhirūrdhvaṃ ākramata’</quote> iti । sūryaraśmīnāmevetaravyavacchedena prāpakatvaṃ
śrūyate <quote>‘sūryadvāreṇa te virajāḥ prayantī’</quote>ti । yatrārcirādimārgāntargatasyādityasya śravaṇaṃ
tatrāpi <quote>‘sa yāvatkṣipyenmanastāvadādityaṃ gacche’</quote>diti śrutyantare tvarāvacanādādityaprāpterarci-
rādipūrvaparvānapekṣatvaṃ pratīyate । kauṣītakiśākhāyāṃ <quote>‘sa etaṃ devayānaṃ panthānamāpadyāgni-
lokamāgacchatī’</quote>ti prathamamādyaparvabhūtāgniśravaṇe'pi tadanantaraṃ <quote>‘sa vāyulokaṃ sa varuṇalokaṃ
sa ādityalokaṃ sa candralokaṃ sa prajāpatiloka’</quote>mityanyānyeva mārgaparvāṇi śrūyante ।
tatra vairūpyabhūyastvātkiñcitpratyabhijñānaṃ sadapyasatkalpaṃ, tathā bṛhadāraṇyake kvacit <quote>‘yadā vai
puruṣo'smāllokātpraiti sa vāyumāgacchatī’</quote>ti vāyuḥ prathamaprāpyaḥ śrūyate । evaṃ mārgaparvabhedā-
<pb n="469"/>
varityāditye । maha iti brahmaṇi । āpnoti svārājyam’ iti brahmaprāpterarcirādi-
gatimantareṇāpyupapattiravagamyate । tasmāt brahmaprāptau nārcirādiniyam iti
prāpte'bhidhīyate । vidvānarcirādinaiva brahma prāpnoti pañcāgnividyādiṣu <quote>‘te'rciṣama-
bhisaṃbhavanti’</quote> ityādinā'rcirāderbrahmaprāpakatvena prasiddhatvāt । <quote>‘bhūrityagnau’</quote> ityā-
diṣu na brahmaprāptimārga ucyate, kiṃtu tattadvibhūtiprāptireva । tataḥ paraprāptirarcirā-
dinaiva । niranvayopāsakānāṃ nārcirādiriti kecit ।।
iti arcirādyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ttatkramabhedācca yathāmnānaṃ prakaraṇabhedena vidyābhedena ca mārgabheda ityeva yuktam । anyathā
sthānaguṇabhede'pyupāsyaṃ brahma sarvatraikamiti sarvāsāmapi daharavaiśvānarādividyānāmaikyaṃ prasa-
jyeteti । evaṃ prāpte siddhāntaḥ । <pratika>sū॰ ।। arcirādinā tatprathiteḥ ।। 1 ।।</pratika> prasiddhastāva-
darcirādimārgaḥ sarvavidyāsādharaṇa iti । chāndogye pañcāgnividyāyāṃ <quote>‘tadya itthaṃ vidu’</quote>riti
prakṛtānpañcāgnividaḥ saṃkīrtya <quote>‘ye ceme'raṇye śraddhāṃ tapa ityupāsata’</quote> iti vidyāntaravatāmapya-
nukīrtanādba‍ṛhadāraṇyake'pi tathaiva <quote>‘ye cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyamityupāsata’</quote> iti vidyāntara-
vatāmapyanukīrtanāt । nanu yāsu vidyāsu na kaścidapi mārgaḥ śrūyate tadviṣayamidaṃ
vidyāntaravadanukīrtanaṃ bhaviṣyati । syādetadevaṃ yadi mārgaikyamaśakyopapādanaṃ syāt ।
śakyate tu tadupapādayituṃ nānāśākhāgatanānāvidyāsu śrutānāṃ parvaṇāmupasaṃhāreṇa lāghavā-
dvādhakābhāvāttatra tatraikadeśapratyabhijñānasatvācca । tathāhi vyāhṛtividyāyāṃ stanākṛti-
nendrasya jīvasya parameśvarasya vā sthānabhūtāvayavena nirgatya keśāntasthānasya śiraḥkapāla-
syātilaṅghanaṃ yaduktaṃ tanmūrdhanyanāḍyā niṣkramaṇameva । agnyādīnācca mārgāparvabhūtānāmeva
kīrtanaṃ । tava yadbrahmaṇīvāgnyādiṣvapi pratiṣṭhitatvaśravaṇaṃ tu teṣu kiyatkālaṃ viśrāntirastī-
tyabhiprāyeṇa । vyāhṛtividyāyāṃ hi caturthavyāhṛtirūpasya brahmaṇa iva vyāhṛtitrayarūpāṇā-
magnyādīnāmastyupāsyatvaṃ tadbalātteṣāṃ lokeṣu viśrāntivacanaṃ yuktam । <quote>‘sa sāmabhirunnīyate
brahmaloka’</quote> mityatra <quote>‘yaḥ punaretaṃ vimātreṇomityetenaivākṣareṇa puruṣamabhidhyāyīte’</quote>tyekamātra-
dvimātrapraṇavasādhanakopāsanānukīrtanānantaraṃ trimātrapraṇavasādhanakopāsanāvidhānāt tatra
praṇavamātrāṇāmṛgyajussāmarūpatayā pratipāditatvācca । vidyāsādhanapraṇavatṛtīyamātrārūpā-
ṇyeva sāmāni vidyāsādhanatvādbrahmaprāpakatvenānukīrtitāni na tu mārgatayā । <quote>‘athaitaireva
raśmibhi’</quote>rityatrāvadhāraṇaṃ raśmividhānārthaprāptatadayogavyavacchedānuvādakaṃ na tvitareṣāmarci-
rādīnāṃ vyavacchedakam । ekasya vākyasya raśmiprāpaṇe taditaravyavacchede ca tātparyāyogāt
tvarāvacanaṃ pitṛyāṇamārgāpekṣayopapannaṃ na pūrvaparvāṇi vyavacchinatti । nāpi viduṣāmeva
mārgāntaramavadhitvenāpekṣate । tatra vāyuvaruṇādiśravaṇaṃ tu vidyāsu guṇopasaṃhāravanmārga-
parvopasaṃhāreṇopapadyata iti na mārgaikyavirodhi । tatpāṭhakramo'pi na tadvirodhī । śrutyādi-
balenaikarūpakramopapādanasambhavāt । tasmāllāghavādbādhakābhāvāccaika eva mārgaḥ । na caivaṃ
daharavaiśvānarādividyānāmaikyamabhyupagantuṃ śakyaṃ guṇānāmānantyenāśakyānuṣṭhānatvāt ।
mārgaparvaṇāṃ tu nānāśākhāsu śrutānāmupasaṃhāre'pi na dvādaśasaṃkhyātilaṅghanamastīti vaiṣa-
myam । <pratika>keciditi</pratika> । teṣāṃ mate <quote>‘arcirādinā tatprathite’</quote>ritīdaṃ sūtraṃ prathitigrahaṇātprāyo'-
<pb n="470"/>
atha vāyvadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
sū ।। vāyumabdādaviśeṣaviśeṣābhyām ।। 2 ।।
atra śrutasyārcirādikramasya madhye śrutyantarasiddhakramo'tra niveśanīyaḥ athavā
ayameva krama iti saṃdihyate । <quote>‘te'rciṣamabhisaṃbhavantyarciṣo'harahna āpūryamāṇa-
pakṣamāpūryamāṇapakṣādyān ṣaḍudaṅṅeti māsāṃstān māsebhyaḥ saṃvatsaraṃ saṃvatsarā-
dādityamādityāccandramasaṃ candramaso vidyutaṃ tatpuruṣo'mānavaḥ sa enān brahma gama-
yati’</quote> ityarcirādikramaśchāndogyasiddhaḥ । bṛhadāraṇyake <quote>‘yadā vai puruṣo'smāllo-
kātpraiti sa vāyumāgacchati tasmai sa tatra vijihīte yathā rathacakrasya khaṃ tena sa
ūrddhvaṃ ākramate sa ādityamāgacchati’</quote> iti saṃvatsarādityayormadhye vāyuḥ śrutaḥ ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
bhiprāyaṃ netavyam । avaśyaṃ ca prāyo'bhiprāyamidamiti sarvairapi vaktavyam । hiraṇyagarbha-
paryantānāṃ devānāṃ svasvalokeṣu mthitvaiva mucyamānānāmarcirādimārgāsaṃbhavāt । na ca bhuvi
vidyāmanuṣṭhāya muvyamānānāṃ manuṣyāṇāmayameka eva mārga iti niyamo vivakṣita iti
vācyam । madhuvidyopāsakānāṃ vasurudrādityamarutsādhyagaṇapadaprāptipūrvikāyāṃ muktau vasvā-
dipadaparvakamārgāntarāvaśyaṃbhāvāditi ।।</p>
<head>iti arcirādyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<head>atha vāyvadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। vāyumabdādaviśeṣaviśeṣābhyām ।। 2 ।।</pratika> yaduktaṃ nānāśākhāśrutasarvaparvayukta
eko mārga iti tanna yuktam । mārgaikye vāyoḥ kvacidapi niveśāsaṃbhavena kāsucicchākhāsu
tadāmnānasyāprāmāṇyaprasaṅgāditi pūrvādhikaraṇasiddhārthākṣepeṇa pratyavasthānātsaṅgatiḥ । <pratika>a-
rcirādikramasya madhya iti</pratika> । arcirādirūpasya kra1mikasyātivāhikagaṇasya madhya
ityarthaḥ । <pratika>śrutyantarasiddho'pi krama iti</pratika> । kramikaḥ, parvaviśeṣa ityarthaḥ । nanu śruto'rci-
rādirātivāhikagaṇastanmadhye niveśanīyatvena vicāraviṣayaḥ parvaviśeṣaḥ ka ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ
tadubhayaṃ vivecayati---<pratika>te'rciṣamiti</pratika> । <quote>‘sa ādityamāgacchatī’</quote>tyanena <quote>‘vāyuḥ śruta’</quote> ityasyā-
nvayaḥ । tatassaṃvatsarādityayormadhye sa niveśyo na vā iti saṃśayavākyaṃ draṣṭavyam ।
vāyossaṃvatsarādityamadhyaniveśanīyadevalokarūpatvatadabhāvābhyāṃ saṃśayaḥ । atreyaṃ viṣaya-
śuddhiḥ । pañcāgnividyāyāmarcirādimārgamāmanantaśca chandogāḥ māsādityayormadhye saṃvatsaraṃ
paṭhanti । vājasaneyinastu <quote>‘māsebhyo devalokaṃ devalokādāditya’</quote>miti tayormadhye devalokaṃ</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha arcirādyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। arcirādinā tatprathiteḥ ।। 1 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>yatrāsau keśāntaśrutau vināpyarcirādikaṃ mārgam । brahmaprāptiśravaṇānnāsau viduṣāṃ gatau niyamaḥ ।। 373 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>yeceme'raṇya iti śravaṇātsarvatra niyata evāsau ।......diti vibhūtyāptiṃ brahmaprāptau netaraṃ mārgam ।। 374 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti arcirādyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<note>1 kramaprāptasyeti. kha. pā.</note>
<pb n="471"/>
<p>sa niveśyo na veti saṃśaye na niveśyo'śravaṇāditi prāpte brūmaḥ । guṇo-
pasaṃhāranyāyena saṃvatsarādūrddhvamādityāt pūrvaṃ vāyurniveśyaḥ । bṛhadāraṇyaka evā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
paṭhanti । mārgaikyapakṣe tāvubhāvubhayatropasaṃhāryau । tayośca saṃvatsaro māsādanantarameva
niveśanīyaḥ । ahaśśuklapakṣottarāyaṇamāsānāmuttarottaramadhikaparimāṇānāṃ kālānāmuparyu-
pari niveśanadarśanāt pariśeṣāddevalokastadanantaraṃ niveśanīyaḥ । tataśca yadi devaloka
eva vāyuḥ syāttadā saṃvatsarādityayormadhye vāyorniveśo labhyate । tallābhe satyeka eva
mārga iti pūrvoktamupapadyate । yadi devalokādanyo vāyussyāttadā tasya na niveśo labhyate ।
tadalābhe ca mārgaikye tasyānyatrāpi niveśāsaṃbhavāt । śākhāviśeṣeṣu tadāmnānaprāmāṇyo-
papādanārthaṃ mārgabhedamabhyupagamya <quote>‘yadā vai puruṣo'smāllokā’</quote>dityādivājasaneyakavākyaśrute
mārge vāyuḥ prathamaparva <quote>‘sa etaṃ devayānaṃ panthānamāpadyāgnilokamāgacchati sa vāyuloka’</quote>miti
kauṣītakivākyaśrute mārge dvitīyaṃ parvetyupapādanīyamityeka eva mārga ityetatpūrvoktaṃ
nopapadyata iti । tatra pūrvapakṣamāha---<pratika>na niveśyo'śravaṇāditi</pratika> । atrāyamāśayaḥ । na ta-
dvājasaneyakavākyānusāreṇa vāyuḥ prathamaparvatayā niveśanīyaḥ । kauṣītakivākyapāṭhakrama-
virodhāt । na ca kauṣītakivākyāmnātāgnyupasaṃhāreṇa vākyadvayāvirodhaṃ saṃpādya dvitīya-
parvatayā niveśanīyaḥ । <quote>‘arciṣo'hari’</quote>ti pañcāgnividyāmnātapañcamīvibhaktiśrutyāgnyanantara-
mahnaḥ prāpteḥ । na cādityātpūrvaṃ niveśanīyaḥ । <quote>‘devalokādāditya’</quote>miti śrautakramavirodhāt ।
nanu <quote>‘sa vāyumāgacchatī’</quote>tyādivājasaneyakavākye nīrandhratayā mārgamāvṛtya sthito vāyuḥ svā-
vayavaprahāṇena rathacakramapramāṇacchidrarūpaṃ mārga dadāti tenādityamāgacchatīti vāyudattamārga-
syādityaprāptau karaṇatvaṃ śrūyate । na cordhvadeśotkaramaṇamātre vāyudattamārgasya karaṇatvaṃ śrutaṃ
natvādityamaṇḍalotkramaṇa iti vācyam । ūrdhvadeśasya viśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ vākyaśeṣaśrutāditya-
maṇḍalarūpatayā paryavasānāditi cet । kiṃ tataḥ । <quote>‘devalokādāditya’</quote>mityapi hi śrutireva ।
<quote>‘saṃvatsarādādityaṃ devalokādāditya’</quote>miti pañcamyoḥ śrutitvāviśeṣe'pi saṃvatsarasya pūrva-
niveśe māsasamabhivyāhāravadvāyudevalokayormadhye devalokasya pūrvaniveśe kiñcidvinigama-
kamasti । na ca <quote>‘saṃvatsarādāditya’</quote>miti vyavahite pañcamī śrūyate <quote>‘tena sa ūrdhvaṃ ākramata’</quote>iti
sādhakatamatvavācini tṛtīyātvavyavadhāna evopapadyata iti vācyam । <quote>‘sa ādityamāga-
cchatī’</quote>tyetadanantaraṃ hi <quote>‘tasmai sa tatra vijihīte yathāḍambarasya khaṃ tena sa ūrdhvaṃ ākramate
sa candramasamāgacchati tasmai sa tatra vijihīte yathā dundubheḥ khaṃ tena sa ūrdhvaṃ ākramate
sa brahmalokamāgacchatyaśokamahimaṃ tasminvasati śāś‍vatīssamā’</quote> iti śrūyate । tatrāditya-
dattasyāḍambarākhyavādyaviśeṣapramāṇasya mārgasya candraprāptāvavyavadhānena kāraṇatvaṃ yadyapi
saṃbhavati tathāpi candradattasya mārgasya śokamahimaśabdoktaduḥkhajñānarahitaparabrahmaloka-
prāptāvavyadhānena kāraṇatvaṃ na saṃbhavati । vidyudādiprāptivyavadhānāt । tathā ca tṛtīyā-
pi vyavahite śrūyata iti naitadvinigamakam । prasiddhaṃ ca jyotiṣṭomādivākyeṣu vyavahita-
karaṇe tṛtīyāśravaṇam । tarhi vinigamakābhāve vāyudevalokayoḥ paurvāparye vikalpo'stviti
cet । mārgabhedaparyāya evāyaṃ vikalpaśabdaḥ । na hi vidyānuṣṭhānamātrārtho mārgopadeśaḥ
kiṃ tu brahmalokaprāptyartho'pi । tathāpi keciddevalokapūrvakeṇa mārgeṇa brahmalokaṃ prāpnuvanti
<pb n="472"/>
nyatra <quote>‘māsebhyo devalokaṃ devalokādādityam’</quote> iti paṭhite'rcirādikrame chāndo-
gyaśrutita upasaṃhāryāt māsādhikakālarūpatvena māsebhya upari niveśanīyāt
saṃvatsarādupari devalokaḥ śrutaḥ, so'pi vāyureva । devalokaśabdo devānāṃ loka
iti vyutpatteraviśeṣeṇa vāyuvācakaḥ । vāyuśabdastasyaiva viśeṣeṇa vācaka itya-
viśeṣaviśeṣābhyāṃ devalokavāyuśabdābhyā vāyureka evābhihita ityabdādūrddhvamā-
dityāt pūrvaṃ vāyurniveśyaḥ । <quote>‘vāyurdevānāmāsanabhūtaḥ’</quote> iti śrūyate । <quote>‘yo'yaṃ pavata
eṣa devānāṃ graha’</quote> iti ।।
iti vāyvadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
atha taṭidadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। taṭito'dhivaruṇaḥ saṃbandhāt ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
kauṣītakināmupaniṣadi śrūyate । ‘sa etaṃ devayānaṃ panthānamāpadyāgnilokamāga-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kecidvāyupūrvakeṇeti mārgabheda evā'śrito bhavati । tadāśrayaṇāvaśyaṃbhāve ca vyarthamāmnā-
nasthānādvāyordevalokasya vā pracyāvanam । yathāpāṭhakramaṃ svasvasthānādapracyutaireva parva-
viśeṣairghaṭitā bahavo mārgāssantu । na ca <quote>‘yo'yaṃ pavate eṣa devānāṃ graha’</quote> iti śravaṇānnānayoḥ
paurvāparyaṃ vyavasthāpanīyamiti vācyam । <quote>‘saṃvatsaraḥ suvargo loka’</quote> ityanuvādāntaraśravaṇā-
tsaṃvatsara eva devaloka ityapi kalpanāsaṃbhavena somādityayormadhye saṃvatsaradevalokau nive-
śanīyau । na tu devalokavāyū ityatra vinigamakābhāvaprasaṅgāt । tasmātsvasvasthānādapracyu-
tairyāvadāmnātaparvaviśeṣairyuktā bahavo mārgā ityeva yuktamiti । siddhāntastu kāsucicchā-
khāsu śravaṇaṃ devalokaparaṃ <quote>‘yo'yaṃ pavata’</quote> ityādiśravaṇāt । na ca <quote>‘saṃvatsarassuvargo loka’</quote>
iti yattadarthavādamātram । divyānāṃ vibhāvānāṃ vāyupāśadhṛtatvena vāyoḥ staṃbhavaddevagṛhānta-
rbhāvopapattyā svārthaparatvasaṃbhavāt । tasmā<quote>‘ddevalokādādityaṃ’</quote> <quote>‘tena sa ūrdhvamākramata’</quote> iti
śrutyorekaviṣayatvāttadubhayavirodhena pāṭhakramo'nādaraṇīya iti saṃvatsarādityamadhyaniviṣṭena
devalokarūpeṇa vāyunā1 yukta eva mārga iti ।।</p>
<head>iti vāyvadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<head>atha taṭidadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। taṭito'dhivaruṇaḥ sambandhāt ।। 3 ।।</pratika> evaṃ vāyupaṭhanaprayuktā mārgabhedaśaṅkā
nirākṛtā । atha tadanantaraśrutavaruṇendraprajāpatipaṭhanaprayuktā sā nirākriyate iti sa-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha vāyvadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। vāyumabdādaviśeṣaviśeṣābhyām ।। 2 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>śrutyantaraprasiddho hyanilo nātropasaṃhāryaḥ । kvacidagnyanantaraṃ kvacidādityātpūrvamāmnānāt ।। 375 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>teneti devalokāditi ca śrautamasya balavattvāt । madhye'bdādityaṃ syādvāyussa hi devaloko'pi ।। 376 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti vāyvadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<note>(1) <quote>‘viśeṣita’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="473"/>
<p>cchati sa vāyulokaṃ sa varuṇalokaṃ sa indralokaṃ sa prajāpatilokaṃ sa brahmalokam’
iti । tatrāgnilokaśabdoktasyārciṣaḥ prāthamyamaviruddham, vāyorādityasya ca śru-
tyantarasiddhaśrautakrameṇātratyapāṭhakramabādhāt saṃvatsarādūrddhvaṃ krameṇa viniveśaḥ ।
atra varuṇādayo'pi śrutāḥ । te'rcirādimārge niveśayituṃ śakyā uta na śakyā
iti saṃśaye niyāmakābhāvādaśakyasaṃniveśā iti prāpte brūmaḥ । varuṇādīnāmapi
saṃniveśaḥ kāryaḥ । tatra vidyullokasyopari varuṇalokasya saṃbandhavaśāt vyavasthā
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ṅgatiḥ । atrāpi kimeka eva mārgaḥ uta bhinnamārga iti prathamaṃ saṃśayaḥ । mārgaikye varu-
ṇādayo niveśayituṃ śakyā na veti bhāṣyoktastadarthasaṃśayaḥ । yathāpāṭhamādityātpūrvaṃ
varuṇasyādityānantaramindraprajāpatyośca niveśo na saṃbhavati । devalokādityacandrāṇāṃ
śrautakrameṇa teṣāṃ pāṭhakramasya bādhāt । anyatrāpi niveśo na saṃbhavati । arcirādividyu-
tparyantānāṃ sarveṣāmapi śrautakramasatvāt । tadanantaramamānavapuruṣasyaiva brahmaparyante gamayi-
tṛtvaśravaṇāt । vidyudanantaraṃ varuṇādisavidyutamārabhya tasya brahmagamayitṛtvābhāvaprasa-
ṅgāt । evaṃ varuṇendraprajāpatisahitasya mārgasya prasiddhārcirādimārgādbhedāvaśyaṃbhāvenāśa-
kyopapādane mārgaikye <quote>‘devalokādāditya’</quote>miti pañcamyā iva <quote>‘saṃvatsarādāditya’</quote>miti pañcamyā
apyavyavahitaviṣayatvaṃ na bhañjanīyam । nāpi yayā kayā cārthavādamātrāvalambanena vāyu-
devalokayoraikyaṃ samāśrayaṇīyamiti saṃvatsarasahito devayānamārga ekaḥ devalokasahi-
to'paraḥ vāyuprathamaparvānyaḥ taddvitīyaparvetara iti catvāro devayānamārgā iti yuktam ।
tathā sa<quote>‘tyārohatho bahudevayānānye panthāno bahavo devayānā’</quote> iti bahuvacanānugṛhītā
<quote>‘ye catvāraḥ pathayo devayānā’</quote> iti devayānacatuṣṭvaśrutirapyupapadyata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।
<pratika>niyāmakābhāvāditi</pratika> । pramāṇābhāvādityarthaḥ । sarvatrāpi sādhakasattvāditi bhāvaḥ ।
<pratika>vidyutpūrvaketi</pratika> । śrutikramavirodhātsvasthānataḥ pracyuteṣu vidyuto'nantaraṃ varuṇasya niveśaḥ
vidyudvaruṇayorvṛṣṭigatanīrasambandhitvādvidyuta upari sa nīrarasitadarśanena nīrādhipatervaru-
ṇasya tata uparibhāvaucityācca । tadanantaramindraprajāpatyorniveśaḥ । pariśeṣā<quote>‘dāgantukā-
nāmante niveśa’</quote> iti nyāyācca atrāmānavapuruṣasya brahmaprāpakatvaṃ varuṇādivyavadhānena ta-
tsāhityena vopapadyata iti na virodhaḥ । evaṃ varuṇādiniveśāsambhavaprayuktamārgabhedaśaṅkā-
nirāse sati mārgaikyaniyame saṃbhavati aniyamāśrayaṇasya vikalpāśrayaṇasya cāyuktatvāt ।
pūrvoktarītyā saṃvatsaradevalokayoḥ kramikaparvatvena vāyudevalokayoraikyena ca mārgaikyasama-
rthanameva yuktam । devayānabahutvaśravaṇaṃ tu <quote>‘tṛptā yāta pathibhirdevayānai’</quote>riti pitṛyāṇe'pi
devayānatvavyavahāradarśanāt । tatra prāpyalokasaṃsthānaviśeṣaprāpyāvāntaramārgabhedasadbhāvācca
pitṛyāṇasāhityena bahutvamupapādanīyam । ata eva <quote>‘ye catvāra’</quote> iti mantre <quote>‘teṣāṃ yo a-
jyānimajītimāvahā’</quote>diti teṣāṃ mārgāṇāṃ madhye ekasyaiva mārgāsyājarāmaratvaprāpakatvamu-
ktam । ata evopakosalavidyāyā <quote>‘meṣa devapatho brahmapatha’</quote> iti varṇitasyārcirādirūpasya
devayānamārgasya brahmamārgatvarūpo viśeṣo darśitaḥ । tena hi viśeṣaṇena brahmamārgavyatiri-
kto'pi devamārgo'stītyavasīyate । tasmādarcirahaśśuklapakṣottarāyaṇasaṃvatsaradevalokāditya-
<pb n="474"/>
yuktā । vidyutpūrvakavṛṣṭigatanīrasya varuṇo'dhipatiḥ prasiddha iti vidyudvaruṇayoḥ
saṃbandhaḥ । tadanantaramindraprajāpatilokau, pariśeṣāt, ityavirodhaḥ ।।
iti taṭidadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
atha ātivāhikādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। ātivāhikāstalliṅgāt ।। 4 ।।</sutra>
kimarcirādayo mārgacihnabhūtāḥ sthānabhedā, uta viduṣāṃ gamayitāro devatā-
viśeṣā iti saṃdehaḥ ।। kiṃ tāvat prāptam ? sthānabhedāḥ, tallāñchanasattvāt । loke
hi grāmārnnirgatya nadīṃ gatvā tato ghoṣaḥ prāptavya iti vyavaharanti । tadvadarcirā-
dayo'pīti prāpte'bhidhīyate । arcirādayo mārgābhimānino viduṣāṃ gama-
yitāro devatāviśeṣā eva । <quote>‘tatpuruṣo'mānavaḥ sa enān brahma gamayati’</quote> iti
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
candravidyudvaruṇendraprajāpatirūpadvādaśaparvaśālyeka eva brahmapatharūpo devayānamārgaḥ । <quote>‘ye
catvāra’</quote> iti mantre devayānacatuṣṭvakīrtanaṃ tu <quote>‘sarva ete puṇyalokā bhavantī’</quote>ti śrutyuktā
mamukṣvāśramatrayaprāpyapuṇyalokaprāptihetumārgāṇāmāśramatritvopādhikayā tritvasaṃkhyayā kro-
ḍīkāreṇa brahmapathasaṃyojanena ca labdhasya catuṣṭvasyānuvādarūpamityupapādanīyamiti na
kaścidvirodha iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti taṭidadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<head>atha ātivāhikādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। ātivāhikāstalliṅgāt ।। 4 ।।</pratika> arcirādīnāṃ kramo nirūpitaḥ tatsvarūpa-
miha cintyata iti saṅgatiḥ । arcirādiśabdānāṃ lokasaṃsthānaviśeṣadevatāviśeṣānyatara-
paratvānavadhāraṇātsaṃśayaḥ । te'rciṣamityādisthāne <quote>‘agnilokamāgacchatī’</quote>tyādikauṣītaki-
śākhāvākyadarśanādarcirādiśabdāssarve lokasaṃsthānaviśeṣaparāḥ । tathā ca mārgopadeśa-
vākyasārūpyānmārgacihnapradarśakānyarcirādivākyānītyarcirādayo mārgacihnabhūtā eva na
tu mucyamānānāmativahane parameśvareṇa niyuktā devatāviśeṣāḥ । na cāmānavapuruṣasyāti-
vāhikatvaṃ devatāviśeṣatvañca sampratipannamityanyairapi tathā bhāvyamityasti niyamaḥ । yāva-
dvacanaṃ vācanikārthapravṛtteḥ । anyathā vidyutamārabhya brahmalokaparyantamamānavapuruṣasya voḍhṛ-
tvoktirvirudhyate । vidyudvaruṇendraprajāpatīnāṃ voḍhṝṇāṃ satvāditi pūrvapakṣaḥ । <quote>‘te'rciṣamabhi-
saṃbhavantī’</quote>tyādivākyeṣu viduṣāmarcirādīnāṃ ca sāmānyena nirdiṣṭasambandha<quote>‘ssa enā’</quote>nitya-
grimavākyanirdiṣṭagamyagamakabhāvarūpa iti yuktam । sāmānyato nirdiṣṭasya viśeṣaparyava-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha taṭidadhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। taṭito'dhivaruṇassaṃbandhāt ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>varuṇādīnāṃ vāyorupari niveśaḥ śrutiviruddhaḥ । nānyatra ca saṃbandhagrāhakamastīti na niveśaḥ ।। 377 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>vidyuta upari niveśo varuṇasya ghaṭeta saṃbandhāt । tatsaṃbandhādindraprajāpatī tadupari syātām ।। 378 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti taṭidadhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<pb n="475"/>
<p>vidyutpuruṣasya gamayitṛtvaliṅgenārcirādīnāmaviśeṣanirdiṣṭānāmapi gamayitṛtva-
meva saṃbandha iti niścaya upapannaḥ ।। vidyutpuruṣasya brahmagamayitṛtve varuṇādibhiḥ
kiṃ phalamityata āha---
<sutra>sū ।। vaidyatenaiva tatastacchruteḥ ।। 5 ।।</sutra>
vaidyutapuruṣāt parastāt sa eva brahma gamayati <quote>‘tat puruṣo'mānavaḥ sa enān
brahma gamayati’</quote> iti śruteḥ । varuṇādīnāṃ tadanugrāhakatvena gamayitṛtvamiti na
virodhaḥ ।।
iti ātivāhikādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
atha kāryādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। kāryaṃ bādarirasya gatyupapatteḥ ।। 6 ।।</sutra>
kimamānavaḥ puruṣaḥ upāsakān sākṣādeva brahma gamayati, utānyamiti saṃśaye
pūrvapakṣaḥ । kāryaṃ hiraṇyagarbhameva gamayati, asya hi gatirupapadyate । na vyāpinaḥ
parabrahmaṇaḥ ।। punarupapattimāha---
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
sānākāṅkṣāsatvāt ‘sa enāniti vākyasya puruṣatvaṃ gamayitṛtvaṃ ca siddhavatkṛtyāmānavatva-
rūpaviśeṣamātrapratipādakatvena pūrveṣāmarcirādīnāmapi 1ātivāhikapuruṣatvāvagateśca lo-
kaśabdopyarcirādiśabdavadabhimānidevatāyāṃ varttitumarhatīti nāsti tadvirodha iti si-
ddhāntaḥ । pūrvapakṣaśaṅkottaratvenottarasūtramavatārayati---<pratika>sū॰ ।। vaidyutenaiva tatastacchrute ।। 5 ।।</pratika>
vidyuti bhavo vaidyutaḥ amānavaḥ puruṣaḥ । vidyullokaprabhṛtiśrutibalādamānavapuruṣasya ga-
mayitṛtve'pi varuṇādīnāṃ tadanugrāhakatvena gamayitṛkoṭiniveśassaṃbhavatīti na tadvaiphalya-
miti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>ityātivāhikādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<head>atha kāryādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। kāryaṃ bādarirasya gatyupapatteḥ ।। 5 ।।</pratika> namayitṛnirūpaṇānantaraṃ gantavyaṃ
nirūpyata iti saṅgatiḥ । <pratika>utānyamiti</pratika> । hiraṇyagarbhaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ vetyarthaḥ । gatyupapattyādikaṃ
mukhyatvādikaṃ ca saṃśayabījam । <pratika>vyāpina iti</pratika> । nacāvyāpitve'pi deśaviśeṣe tadanubhava-
eva puruṣārtha iti vācyam । niratiśayānandarūpasya sarvatra tulyatvāditi bhāvaḥ ।</p>
