<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha ātivāhikādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। ātivāhikāstalliṅgāt ।। 4 ।। vaidyutenaiva tatastacchruteḥ ।। 5 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>gacchāmuṃ nyagrodhaṃ tato nadīparvataṃ tato grāmam । iti nirdeśaupamyātsṛticihnānyarcirādyāḥ syuḥ ।। 379 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>te devatāviśeṣā netāro gatijuṣāṃ viduṣām । upasaṃhāre vaidyutapuruṣe netṛtvavarṇanataḥ ।। 380 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti ātivāhikādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<note>(1) <quote>‘gamayitṛtva’</quote></note>
<pb n="476"/>
<p><sutra>sū ।। viśeṣitatvācca ।। 7 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘prajāpateḥ sabhāṃ veśma prapadya’</quote> iti viśeṣitatvācca hiraṇyagarbhapadameva gamayati ।।
<sutra>sū ।। sāmīpyāttu tadvyapadeśaḥ ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘brahma gamayati’</quote> iti brahmavyapadeśastu hiraṇyagarbhasya tatsāmīpyāt । <quote>‘hiraṇya-
garbhaṃ paśyata jāyamānam’</quote> iti prathamakāryatvaśravaṇādasya sāmīpyam ।।
<sutra>sū ।। kāryātyaye tadadhyakṣeṇa sahātaḥ paramabhidhānāt ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
prathamaṃ hiraṇyagarbhapadaprāptāvapi tadanāvṛttiśrutirna virudhyate । hiraṇyagarbha-
lokātyaye tadadhyakṣeṇa saha ataḥparaṃ kāryabrahmalokāt paraṃ paramapadaṃ gacchantīti ।
tathā'bhidhīyate । <quote>“te brahmaloke tu parāntakāle parāmṛtāt parimucyanti sarve ।।”</quote>
iti śrutyā । ato na virodhaḥ ।।
<sutra>sū ।। smṛteśca ।। 10 ।।</sutra>
<quote>“brahmaṇā saha te sarve saṃprāpte pratisaṃcare । parasyānte kṛtātmānaḥ praviśanti paraṃ
padam ।।”</quote> iti smṛterapyevamavagamyate । ato hiraṇyagarbhapadamarcirādigaṇo nayati
prathamam । tataḥ pralaye paraṃ brahma prāpyate tena saheti ।।
<sutra>sū ।। paraṃ jaiminirmukhyatvāt ।। 11 ।।</sutra>
hiraṇyagarbhāt paramutkṛṣṭaṃ nārāyaṇameva arcirādirgamayati । parabrahmaṇa evo-
pādānāvasthāntaratvena tatra brahmavyapadeśasya mukhyatvāditi jaiminiḥ ।। tatro-
papattimāha---
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>sū॰ ।। viśeṣitatvācca ।। 7 ।। prajāpateḥ sabhāmiti</pratika> । <quote>‘ākāśo ha vai nāma nāmarūpayo-
rnirvahite’</quote>ti brahmavidyāṃ prastutyedamāmnāyate । tasmādiha brahmavida eva brahmaprāptyabhisandhiḥ ।
prajāpateriti ca hiraṇyagarbha evocyate । <quote>‘prajāpatirvai hiraṇyagarbha’</quote> iti śruteriti bhāvaḥ ।
<pratika>sū॰ ।। sāmīpyāttu tadvyapadeśaḥ ।। 8 ।।</pratika> hiraṇyagarbhasya prathamāpatyatvena parabrahmasanni-
kṛṣṭatvāttatra tadvāciśabda aupacārikaḥ । <quote>“tasmādetadbrahma nāmarūpamannañca jāyata”</quote> iti mantra
iveti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>sū॰ ।। kāryātyaye tadadhyakṣeṇa sahātaḥ paramabhidhānāt ।। 9 ।। parā-
ntakāla iti</pratika> । paraṃ hi hiraṇyagarbhasya tanmānena śatavarṣaparimitamāyuḥ tadavasānakāla
ityarthaḥ । parāmṛtāditi lyablope pañcamī । paraṃ brahma prāpyetyarthaḥ ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।। smṛteśca ।। 10 ।।</pratika>
pratisañcaraḥ pralayaḥ । asminpakṣe phalitārthamāha---<pratika>ata iti ।। sū॰ ।। paraṃ jaiminirmu-
khyatvāt ।। 11 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘kāryaṃ bādari’</quote>riti prakṛtahiraṇyagarbhāpekṣāmutkṛṣṭatvaṃ paraśabdārtha iti
vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>hiraṇyagarbhāditi</pratika> । hiraṇyagarbhāpekṣayā pratyāsattyatiśayasatvena mukhyakalpa-
tvādityarthaḥ । <pratika>tatropapattimiti</pratika> । padasya śivaparatve paramamukhyatvasaṃbhave'pi । tadanādareṇa
<pb n="477"/>
sū ।। darśanācca ।। 12 ।।
<quote>‘so'dhvanaḥ pāramāpnoti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam’</quote> iti tatpadasya prāpyatvaṃ dṛśyate ।
ataśca tameva gamayatīti ।।
<sutra>sū ।। na ca kārye pratyabhisandhiḥ ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘prajāpateḥ sabhāṃ veśma prapadya’</quote> iti yaduktam, na tatra kārye hiraṇyagarbhe pratyabhi-
sandhiḥ prajāpatiśabdasya prajāpālanatvena nārāyaṇavācakatvasaṃbhavāt । yaduktam
<quote>‘te brahmaloke tu parāntakāle parāmṛtāt parimucyanti sarve’</quote> iti tatrāpi brahma-
śabdo nārāyaṇaparaḥ । tasya loke pade sthitvā yoginaḥ parāntakāle paścimadeha-
samāptau parāmṛtaṃ viśvādhikaṃ brahma prāpya muktā bhavantīti na virodhaḥ । <quote>‘etāni
ha vā amṛtasya nāmadheyāni’</quote> ityādau śivasya parabrahmaṇo'mṛtaśabdābhidheyatvama-
nādimuktatvaṃ cāvagatam । ato viṣṇupade prārabdhakāryadehāvasāne prārabdhabhoga-
paryantaṃ sthitvā yoginaḥ parāmṛtaṃ viśvādhikaṃ brahma prāpya muktā bhavantīti । ata
siddhānta ucyate---
<sutra>sū ।। apratīkālambanānnayatīti bādarāyaṇa ubhayathā ca doṣātta-
tkratuśca ।। 14 ।।</sutra>
pratīkālambanā hi te, ye cetanamacetanaṃ vā brahmadṛṣṭyā kevalamupāsate । apratī-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nārāyaṇaparatvābhyupagatāvupapattimāhetyarthaḥ ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।। darśanācca ।। 12 ।।</pratika> na cātra viṣṇu-
śabdaśśivaparaḥ iti śaṅkanīyam । <quote>‘tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūraya’</quote> iti prasiddha-
vaiṣṇavamantraikadeśatvena tadarthapratyabhijñāvirodhāditi bhāvaḥ ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।। na ca kārye pratya-
bhisandhiḥ ।। 13 ।।</pratika> prapadyata iti pratyabhisandhiḥ pratyabhisandhiśabdena vivakṣitaḥ ।
<pratika>prajāpālakatveneti</pratika> । patiśabdo hi pāterdhātorḍatipratyayena niṣpannaḥ pālake svarasaḥ ।
<quote>‘atastadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ pada’</quote>miti mantradarśanātprajāpatiśabdasya pālake nārāyaṇe yogassamā-
śrayaṇīya iti bhāvaḥ । parāntakāla ityatra paraśabdena hiraṇyagarbhasyāyurnocyate kiṃtu
viṣṇupade sthitasya viduṣaścaramadeha iti vyācaṣṭe । <pratika>paścimadeheti । prārabdhakāryeti</pratika> ।
virajānadyuttaraṇaparyantaṃ prārabdhaśeṣānuvṛtteḥ prāk‌samarthitatvādviṣṇupade sthitasyāpi prāra-
bdhānuvṛttirastīti bhāvaḥ ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।। apratīkālambanānnayatīti bādarāyaṇa ubhayathā
ca doṣāttatkratuśca ।। 14 ।।</pratika> anyatrānyadṛṣṭireva pratīkopāsaneti prasiddhārthagrahaṇavāra-
ṇāya vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>pratīkālambanā iti</pratika> । sakalacidacitprapañcaviśiṣṭarūpasya brahmaṇaḥ eka-
deśaścidrūpo'cidrūpaśca pratīkaḥ । <quote>“aṅgaṃ 1pratīko'vayava’</quote> iti pratīkaśabdasyāvayavavācitva-
smaraṇāt । tasya yadupāsanasāmānyaṃ tatsarvaṃ pratīkopāsanamucyata iti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>apratī</pratika>-
<note>(1) <quote>‘pratikūle pratīkastriṣvekadeśe tu puṃsyaya’</quote>miti pratīkaśabdasyaikadeśavācitvasmaraṇāditi kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="478"/>
kālambanāstu te, ye viśvādhikaṃ brahma sākṣādupāsate । sākṣād‌brahmopāsakān
puruṣaḥ sākṣād‌brahmaiva gamayati, yadviśvādhikaṃ kṛṣṇāpiḍgalaṃ virupākṣaṃ śrūyate । sā
kṣādbrahmopāsakasya <quote>‘paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate’</quote> <quote>“umāsahāyaṃ
parameśvaraṃ prabhuṃ trilocanaṃ nīlakaṇṭhaṃ praśāntam । dhyātvā munirgacchati bhūtayoniṃ
samastasākṣiṃ tamasaḥ parastāt ।।”</quote> ityādiṣu sākṣāt brahmaprāptyavagamāt । pūrvokta-
pakṣadvaye'pi doṣaḥ śrutivirodhādbhavati । tatkratuḥ brahmopāsako brahmaiva gacchati, na
madhye vilambate, prayojanābhāvāt । sakalakāryasamaṣṭirūpāddhiraṇyagarbhāt paro
nārāyaṇastadupādānatvāt, tato'pi paraṃ śivākhyaṃ nimittaṃ virūpākṣaṃ paraṃ brahma
sarvajñaṃ sarvaśaktikaṃ nityatṛptaṃ svatantraṃ svaprakāśamiti । tathā śivasaṃkalpopani-
ṣadi । <quote>“parāt parataro brahmā tatparāt parato hariḥ । tatparāt paratorīśaḥ”</quote> iti ।
rephaśchāndasaḥ । anyatra ca---<quote>‘nārāyaṇaparaṃ brahma’</quote> iti nārāyaṇāt paratvena brahmā-
bhidhāya tat kīdṛśamityākāṅkṣāyām <quote>‘ṛtaṃ satyam’</quote> iti mantreṇa sarvajñatayā mano-
vāgviparyāsarahitaṃ svaśaktimarīcibhiḥ sakalajagatpūrakaṃ svāvibhaktāyā paraprakṛti-
rūpayā paramānandacidekarasaparamākāśalakṣaṇayā svāvasthābhedaparamacetananārāyaṇā-
rabdhahiraṇyagarbhādisakalakāryaprapañcayā paraśaktyomayā śabalitarūpaṃ nirvikāraṃ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>kālambanāstviti</pratika> । apratīkaśabdena pratīkarūpaprapañcavilakṣaṇaṃ viśvādhikaṃ brahmābhidhīyata
iti bhāvaḥ । nayatītyasya prāpyakarmākāṅkṣāyāmapratīkaśabdoktaṃ tadeva viśvādhikaṃ brahmo
patiṣṭhata iti vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>sākṣādbrahmaiveti । śrutivirodhāditi</pratika> । udāhṛtayā kaivalya-
śrutyā tatra tatrodāhṛtābhiḥ śvetāśvatarādiśrutibhiśca virodhādityarthaḥ । nanu vilambena para-
brahmaprāptyā tadvirodhaḥ parihṛtaḥ syādityāśaṅkottaratvena sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>tatkraturiti</pratika> ।
yathākratuvākyānantaraṃ hi <quote>‘sa kratuṃ kurvīte’</quote>tyārabhya <quote>‘etamitaḥ pretyābhisaṃbhavitāsmī’</quote>tyantena
manomayatvādiguṇakaḥ parameśvaraḥ <quote>‘tamahaṃ prāpnavānī’</quote>tyevaṃrūpakratossaṃkalpasya viṣaya upa-
nyastaḥ । tadanusāreṇa 1yathākratuvākyasyaivamartho labhyate । iha yadga‍uṇaviśiṣṭabrahmaprāptisaṅkā-
lpavānupāsako bhavati itaḥ pretya tadga‍uṇaviśiṣṭabrahmaprāptimānbhavatīti । atastatkratunyā-
yenopāsyabrahmatādavasthyaṃ prāptavyam । tatprāptāveva tadanubhavarūpo bhoga iti na madhye phala-
prāptivirodhivilambaḥ kalpanīyaḥ । kalpakābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ । vyāpinaḥ parabrahmaṇaḥ prāptau
nāsti gatyapekṣeti śaṅkāvyāvṛttyarthaścakāraḥ । deśaviśeṣāvacchinnabrahmaprāptau satyāmeva brahmā
nandānubhavaprayojakaḥ sākalyena svarūpāvirbhāvo bhavatīti śrutibalādavasīyata iti bhāvaḥ ।
nanu brahmopāsako brahmaiva prāpnotītyetadastu tatprāpyaṃ hiraṇyagarbho nārāyaṇo vā kiṃ na
syādityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>sakalakāryasamaṣṭirūpāditi । svaśaktimarīcibhiriti</pratika> । svaśakte-
rmarīcayaḥ tatkāryāṇi jagadbhāsakāḥ vaiṣayikavṛttyavacchinnāstadaṃśā vā । <pratika>nirvikāramiti</pratika> ।
pūrvamūrdhvaretaskavahniretaskaparatayā vyākhyātam । idānīmevamapi saṃbhavatīti tasyārthāntaraṃ
<note>(1) <quote>‘tatkratuvākyasya’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="479"/>
trilocanaṃ paraṃ brahma sarvottaramiti nirūpitam । <quote>‘viśvādhiko rudra’</quote> iti ca viśva-
smādadhikatvena cāvagatam । tasmādvaidikānāmataḥ paraṃ kalpayitumanyāyyameva ।।
<sutra>sū ।। viśeṣaṃ ca darśayati ।। 15 ।।</sutra>
brahmaṇo viśvādhikasya tadavasthābhedasyopādānasya viṣṇostatkāryabhūtasya hi-
raṇyagarbhasya ca viśeṣaṃ darśayati śrutireva <quote>‘parāt parataro brahmā’</quote> <quote>‘hiraṇyagarbhaṃ
paśyata jāyāmānam’</quote> <quote>‘puruṣo vai rudraḥ’</quote> ityādikā । tataśca brahmaviṣṇvoḥ paraṃ parabrahmaṇaḥ
śivasya padaṃ paramākāśarūpaṃ paramānandamayamamānavaḥ puruṣo gamayatītyeva yuktam ।
yacchaṅkitam <quote>‘so'dhvanaḥ pāramāpnoti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam’</quote> iti । tatra viṣṇu-
śabdaḥ parabrahmavācakaḥ । ṣaḍvidhasyādhvanaḥ pāraṃ tadatītaṃ padaṃ hi viśvādhikasya
śivasyaivopapannam । yadvā viṣṇoḥ prapañcāvasthitasya paramutkṛṣṭaṃ padaṃ svarūpaṃ para-
mākāśarūpaṃ paramānandalakṣaṇaṃ śivasya parabrahmaṇaḥ padameva । yatrāsau nihitātmā
prapañcākāro'pi na saṃsarati । ato na kaścana virodhaḥ ।। atra kecit <quote>‘parānta-
kāle parāmṛtāt parimucyanti sarve’</quote> iti śruteḥ parabrahmaṇaḥ śivasya paramavibhūti-
tvena ye viṣṇumupāsate, te tadavasthatvāt brahmaśabdavācyasya tasya lokaṃ prāpya
prādurbhūtatadvibhūtayaḥ parāntakāle caramadehāvasāne parāmṛtaṃ śivaṃ prāpya muktā
bhavantīti viṣṇūpāsakānāmarcirādinā viṣṇupadaprāptipūrvakaṃ vilambena śivapada-
prāptiriti vacanādatra na virodha iti ।।
iti kāryādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
iti śrīkaṇṭhaśivācāryaviracite brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye
caturthādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 4 ।। 3 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
darśitam । ataḥ paraṃ kalpayitumanyāyyameveti <quote>‘sakalakāryasamaṣṭirūpā’</quote>dityārabhyaitāvatparya-
ntamuttarasūtrārthānuvādatvādarthatastadavatārikābhāṣyarūpamiti draṣṭavyam ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।। viśeṣaṃ ca
darśayati ।। 15 ।।</pratika> vaiṣṇavamantraikadeśatvena tadarthapratyabhijñānamanusarannāha---<pratika>yadveti</pratika> । para-
mākāśarūpā parāśaktireva hi śivasya divyasthānarūpatayāvatiṣṭhate । atastadavasthāviśe-
ṣarūpasya viṣṇoḥ svarūpaṃ bhavitumarhati divyasthānamiti bhāvaḥ । yatrāsau nihitātmā yatpadaṃ
prāpto vidvān prapañcākāro'pi prapañcaśarīrako'pi na saṃsarati parameśvaravanniyantṛmātrarūpa-
tvāt । <pratika>ato na kaścana virodha iti</pratika> । śivasyaiva muktaprāpyatva iti śeṣaḥ । <quote>‘te brahmaloke
tvi’</quote>tyādikaṃ vaiṣṇavopāsanāviśeṣaphalapratipādakatvena yojayati---<pratika>atra keciditi</pratika> । hairaṇya-
garbhopāsanāviśeṣaphalapratipādakatvenānye yojayantīti matāntarasūcanārthaṃ kecidgrahaṇam ।
<pratika>vacanādatra na virodha iti</pratika> । avaśyaṃ hi tatra brahmalokaśabdaḥ śivalokātiriktalokaparo
<pb n="480"/>
vācyaḥ । tatra sthitasya kālāntare muktyabhidhānāt । atasteṣāṃ mataviruddhatvādvaiṣṇavopāsanā-
phalaparatve pratyāsattyatiśayalābhācca grāhyamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti kāryādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p>iti śrīśivātivādimūrddhanyaśivadarśanasthāpanadhurandharasakaladevabhūdevapratiṣṭhā-
<pratika>pakaśrīmaccinnabommabhūpālahṛdayakamala</pratika>kuharaviharamāṇa<pratika>śrīsāmba-
śivapreritasya śrībharadvāja</pratika>kulajaladhikaustubha<pratika>śrīviśvajidyā-
jiśrīraṅgarājādhvarivarasūnorappayyadīkṣitasya</pratika> kṛtau
<pratika>śrīkaṇṭhaśivācāryaviracitabrahmamīmāṃsā</pratika>-
bhāṣyavyākhyāyāṃ śivārkamaṇidī-
pikākhyāyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya
<pratika>tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ</pratika> ।। 4 ।। 3 ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha kāryādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। kāryaṃ bādarirasya gatyupapatteḥ ।। 6 ।। viśeṣitatvācca ।। 7 ।। sāmīpyāttu tadvyapadeśaḥ ।। 8 ।।
kāryātyate tadadhyakṣeṇa sahātaḥ paramabhidhānāt ।। 9 ।। smṛteśca ।। 10 ।। paraṃ jaiminirmukhyatvāt ।। 11 ।
darśanācca ।। 12 ।। na ca kārye pratyabhisandhiḥ ।। 13 ।। apratīkālambanānnayatīti bādarāyaṇa ubhayathā
ca doṣāttatkratuśca ।। 14 ।। viśeṣaṃ ca darśayati ।। 15 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>gatyupapatterdruhiṇaṃ nayati hariṃ vā paraṃ tasmāt । yatra śivasyāvasthābhede brahmapadamukhyatvāt ।। 381 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>śivameva tato'pi paraṃ nayati sa puruṣaṃ pratīkarahitadhiyaḥ । śivabhāvanayā hi śivaprāptistatkratutayā vihitā ।। 382 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti kāryādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>iti śrīmadappayyadīkṣitakṛtau adhikaraṇasārasaṅgrahe nayamaṇimālāyāṃ
tṛtīyaparicchede caturthasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 4 ।। 3 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="481"/>
<head>।। śrīḥ ।।</head>
<head>śivābhyāṃ namaḥ ।</head>
<head>śrīkaṇṭhācāryakṛtau</head>
<head>brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye</head>
<head>atha caturthādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha saṃpadyāvirbhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। saṃpadyāvirbhāvaḥ svena śabdāt ।। 1 ।।</sutra>
<p>pūrvatrārcirādinā mārgeṇa vidyāvatāṃ hiraṇyagarbhanārāyaṇapadātītaṃ parabrahmaṇaḥ
śivasya paramasukharūpatayā svargaśabdavācyaṃ padaṃ prāpyamiti nirūpitam । iha
tatprāptānāṃ svarūpāvirbhāvādiprakāro nirūpyate । <quote>‘asmāccharīrātsamutthāya
paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata’</quote> iti paraṃjyotīrūpaṃ mahāprakāśaṃ
parabrahma prāptasya svarūpāvirbhāva ucyate । tat svarūpaṃ tasya tātkālikamuta pūrva-
siddhaṃ veti saṃśayaḥ ।। na pūrvasiddham । kiṃ tvabhiniṣpattiśravaṇāt svargavadāga-
ntukameva । pūrvasiddhatvena ca kuto'sya saṃsāraḥ । atastadupāsanājanyaṃ muktiphala-
rūpamāgantukam ।। iti prāpte'bhidhīyate---brahmaprāptajīvasya malatirohitaṃ brahma-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>śivārkamaṇidīpikāyām</head>
<head>ata caturthasyādhyāyasya turīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha saṃpadyāvirbhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। saṃpadyāvirbhāvaḥ svena śabdāt ।। 1 ।।</pratika> saṅgatiṃ daṃrśayati---<pratika>pūrvatreti</pratika> । pūrvapāde
divyasthānasthitaparabrahmaprāptiparyantaṃ nirūpitam । ihaṃ tatprāptasya svarūpāvirbhāvasadehatvādi-
prakāro nirūpyata iti saṅgatiḥ । abhiniṣpattiśravaṇaṃ <quote>‘svene’</quote> ti viśeṣaṇaṃ ca saṃśayabījam ।
abhiniṣpattiśravaṇasya sveneti viśeṣaṇāpekṣayā prābalyamupapattisāhityena darśayati---<pratika>pūrva-
siddhatve ceti</pratika> । mokṣadaśāyāṃ yatphalarūpatayā prāptavyaṃ rūpaṃ tatpūrvamapyasti cet pūrvamapyayaṃ
mukta eva syāt । na ca pūrvasiddhamapyasya puruṣārthātmakaṃ rūpaṃ saṃsāradaśāyāṃ tirohitaṃ paraṃ-
jyotirupasannasyāvirbhavatīti vācyam । svaprakāśacaitanyarūpasyāhamiti sarvadā bhāsamānasya
tirodhānāyogāt । etenāṇvamalākhyenāvidyāvaraṇena tirohitaṃ jīvasvarūpamiti nirastam ।
tirohitatve saṃsāradaśāyāṃ jīvasvarūpasyānavabhāsaprasaṅgāt । aṇurūpe tasmin kiṃcidavacche-
dena, tirodhānaṃ kiṃcidavacchedena prakāśa iti kalpayitumaśakyatvāt । etenāpahatapāpma-
tvādiguṇāṣṭakaṃ saṃsāradaśāyāṃ tirohitaṃ mokṣadaśāyāmabhivyajyata ityapi nirastam । ti-
rodhānāsaṃbhavādyogadaśāyāmapi, tadabhivyaktyanaṅgīkārācca । tasmātkarmaphalavadvidyāphalamapi
lokaviśeṣaprāptyānantaramutpadyamānaṃ kiṃcidaṅgīkaraṇīyamityupapattisāhityenābhiniṣpatti-
<pb n="482"/>
sadṛśaguṇaṃ svarūpaṃ pūrvaṃ sadeva malāvaraṇāpagamādāvirbhavati । <quote>‘svena rūpeṇa’</quote> iti
śabdāt tathā'vagamyate । anyathā hyāgantukasyāpi rūpasya svāsādhāraṇatvāt
<quote>‘svena’</quote> iti viśeṣaṇamanarthakaṃ syāt । tatra sarvānugrāhakasya śivasya parabrahmaṇaḥ
prasādena svāvaraṇe male vigalite tatsadṛśaguṇamātmasvarūpaṃ prādurbhavati, na karma-
phalavadutpadyate । malasyānāditvāt saṃsāropapattiḥ । ataḥ svābhāvikameva
muktasya svarūpaṃ cidānandaghanaṃ sarvajñatvādiviśiṣṭamāvirbhavati ।।
<sutra>sū ।। muktaḥ pratijñānāt ।। 2 ।।</sutra>
ātmasvarūpamātrasya prāgeva siddhatve'pi malavinirmuktasyāparicchinnānandādyā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śravaṇasya prabalatvāttadanusāreṇa <quote>‘svene’</quote>ti viśeṣaṇamarthasiddhasvakīyatvānuvādakamityupapāda-
nīyamiti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>muktasya svarūpaṃ cidānandaghanaṃ sarvajñatvādiviśiṣṭamāvirbhavatīti</pratika> ।
atredaṃ vivakṣitam । vastuto niratiśayānanda eva jīvaḥ svabhāvataḥ । tasminniratiśaye-
svarūpānande pratiyogiviśeṣāpekṣatāratamyāpannotkarṣarūpā bahavassanti viśeṣāḥ । te sarve
malamāyākarmadehendriyāvaraṇaistirohitāḥ । teṣāmāvaraṇāni teṣvastitvaprakāśamānatvavya-
vahāraṃ nirundhānā malamāyādīnāṃ śaktiviśeṣāḥ । tatrānandatvasāmānyaṃ kadāpi na tirohi-
tamiti saṃsāradaśāyāmapi sarvadaivātmani premānuvartate । suṣuptipralayayordehendriyavyāpāro-
parameṇa tadāvaraṇīyaḥ kiyānviśeṣaḥ prakāśate । kṛtaśravaṇamananādikasya nididhyāsanaṃ
kurvata uparyupari yogabhūmikāsu malamāyādigatānāmasaṃkhyānāmāvaraṇaśaktīnāṃ madhye kā-
citkācitkṣīyata iti tattadāvaraṇīyā viśeṣāḥ krameṇa prakāśante । muktau sarvāsāmāva-
raṇaśaktīnāmavagamānniratiśayasvarūpānandaḥ prakāśate । yathā khalvarocakavyādhiparipūrṇasya
cikitsāviśeṣaiḥ kiṃcitkiṃcidva‍yādhiśaktyapacaye jāyamāne bhojyavasturase tattadāvara-
ṇīyā viśeṣāḥ krameṇa prakāśante । sarvātmanā vyādhyapagame ca raso'pi sarvātmanā prakā-
śate । evameva yogasidhdyārambhadaśāprabhṛtimuktidaśāparyanteṣu daśāviśeṣeṣu sārvajñyāpahatapā-
pmatvādyāvirbhāve'pi viśeṣo'vagantavyaḥ । iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ । svarūpānandasyāvirbhāvaḥ pra-
kāśaḥ ghanatirohitasyeva candrasya ghanāpagame sārvajñyāpahatapāpmatvādīnāṃ tu śaktiviśeṣa-
rūpāṇāṃ svasvakāryaprayojakatvamāvirbhāvaḥ । maṇimantrādipratibaddhānāṃ vahnigatadāhasphoṭādi-
śaktīnāmiva pratibandhakamaṇyādyapāye । evaṃ prāksiddhayorapi svarūpānandasārvajñyādiguṇabṛ-
ndayorāvirbhāvasya samarthayituṃ śakyatvenāpyabhiniṣpadyata ityasya tatparatayārthavattvasaṃbhavānna
tatsvārasyānusāreṇa sveneti viśeṣaṇaṃ sarvathā vaiyarthyamāpādanīyamiti । nanu sveneti viśe-
ṣaṇāvaiyarthyāyābhiniṣpattiraupacārikī netavyetyastunāma । sā svarūpānandāvirbhāvarūpāpa-
hatapāpmatvādyāvirbhāvarūpā ceti kuto'vagamyata ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ tatrobhayathāpi gamakaṃ krameṇa
sūtradvayenocyate---<pratika>sū॰ ।। muktaḥ pratijñānāt ।। 2 ।।</pratika> ātmavividiṣayopasannāyendrāya
prajāpatinā jāgarādyavasthāpannātmasvarūpa upadiṣṭe tena ca <quote>‘nāhamatra bhogyaṃ paśyāmī’</quote>tya-
kṣipuruṣādiṣu vināśabhayadarśanādidoṣādātmano na puruṣārtharūpateti pṛṣṭe <quote>‘caitaṃ tveva te
bhūyo'nuvyākhyāsyāmī’</quote>ti pratijñāya ‘bhagavanmartyaṃ vā idaṃ śarīramāttaṃ mṛtyunā tadasyāmṛ-
<pb n="483"/>
virbhāva ucyate, <quote>‘etaṃ tvena te bhūyo'nuvyākhyāsyāmi’</quote> iti malaprayuktajāgari-
tādyavasthāvinirmuktasyaiva vaktavyatayā pratijñānāt ।। kiṃca---
<sutra>sū ।। ātmā prakaraṇāt ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
tatra <quote>‘bhūyo'nuvyākhyāsyāmi’</quote> iti prakṛtāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇaka ātmā
vaktavyaḥ prakaraṇādavagamyate । <quote>‘ya ātmā'pahatapāpmā’</quote> ityādi prakṛtyaiva <quote>‘bhūyo'nu-
vyākhyāsyāmi’</quote> ityuktatvāt । ataḥ prādurbhūtasvābhāvikāpahatapāpmatvādiko
mukta ātmā brahmasadṛśaguṇasvarūpa iti siddham ।।
iti saṃpadyāvirbhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।
atha avibhāgādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। avibhāgena dṛṣṭatvāt ।। 4 ।।</sutra>
pūrvādhikaraṇe brahmaguṇasvarūpasadṛśaṃ muktasya guṇasvarūpamiti pratijñātam । tatsā-
dṛśyaṃ muktasyopapadyate na veti vicāraḥ । kiṃ prāptam ? <quote>‘eko rudro na dvitīyāya
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tasyātmano'dhiṣṭhāna’</quote>mityādinā yadātmasvarūpamupadiṣṭaṃ tanmalamāyākarmādisakalabandhaprahā-
ṇādāvirbhūtasvarūpānandamātmatattvaṃ bhavitumarhati । anyathā puruṣārtharūpasyātmatattvasyopa-
deṣṭavyatvena pratijñātasyopadeśālābhāt । na ca duḥkhāviśiṣṭatvenaiva puruṣārthatā bhavediti
vācyam । suṣuptidaśāyāṃ duḥkhābhāvavaiśiṣṭye satyapyānandotkarṣasphuraṇābhāvenāpuruṣārthatayā
vināśamevāpīto bhavati । nāhamatra bhogyaṃ paśyāmīti ninditavantamindraṃ prati tato vila-
kṣaṇaṃ puruṣārtharūpamātmatattvaṃ vyākhyāsyāmīti pratijñāya punarapi prāṅninditasyaiva duḥkhā-
bhāvamātraviśiṣṭasyopadeśāyogāt । tasmānmalamāyādibandhavinirmukta āvirbhūtasvarūpānanda-
ātmā prajāpatividyāyāmupadiṣṭa iti pratijñābalādavasīyata iti bhāvaḥ ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।। ātmā
prakaraṇāt ।। 3 ।।</pratika> apahatapāpmatvādiguṇaka ātmā paramaḥ prakṛtaḥ । sa eva bhūyo'nuvyā-
khyāsyāmīti vyākhyeyatvena punaḥ pratijñātaḥ । atassaevāvirbhūtāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇaka
ātmopadiṣṭa iti prakaraṇādavasīyata iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti saṃpadyāvirbhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<head>atha avibhāgādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। avibhāgena dṛṣṭatvāt ।। 4 ।।</pratika> saṅgatipūrvakaṃ saṃśayaṃ darśayati---<pratika>pūrvādhika-
raṇa iti</pratika> । cidānandaghanaṃ sarvajñatvādiviśiṣṭaṃ muktasya yatsvarūpamabhihitaṃ pūrvādhikaraṇe
tadbrahmasāmyarūpameva । brahmaṇo'pi hi tathābhūtameva rūpamatastannopapadyata ityākṣepātpūrvādhi-
karaṇasaṅgatiḥ । <pratika>tadupapadyate na veti</pratika> brahmasāmyavidhiniṣedhaśrutibhyāṃ saṃśayaḥ । tatra pūrvaḥ</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha saṃpadyāvirbhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। saṃpadyāvirbhāvaḥ svena śabdāt ।। 1 ।। muktaḥ pratijñānāt ।। 2 ।। ātmā prakaraṇāt ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>niṣpadyate vimuktaḥ kenacidāgantukena rūpeṇa । āgantukatābhāve niṣpattyartho na saṃghaṭate ।। 383 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>sveneti viśeṣaṇataḥ svarūpamātraṃ prapadyate sahajam । taccānyaśivasamatvaṃ niṣpattirmalatirodhimuktiḥ syāt ।। 384 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti saṃpadyāvirbhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<pb n="484"/>
<p>tasthau’ ityādiṣu brahmaṇaḥ sadṛśasya dvitīyasya niṣedhāt kasyacidapi baddhasya
muktasya vā tatsādṛśyamanupapannamiti ।। evaṃ prāpte siddhānta ucyate । muktasya
brahmaṇā sādṛśyamasti । kutaḥ ? <quote>‘nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaiti’</quote> <quote>‘muktaḥ śivasamo
bhavet’</quote> iti muktasya brahmaguṇasvarūpāvibhāvena brahmasadṛśatayā dṛṣṭatvāt । ataḥ-
<quote>‘brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati’</quote> iti brahmasādṛśyamevocyate । mukta ātmā sādṛśyā-
dbrahmasvarūpāvibhāgena svasvarūpamanubhavati । yaduktam <quote>‘eko rudro na dvitīyāya’</quote>
ityādinā sādṛśyaniṣedhaḥ kriyata iti, tat jīvasya jagadva‍yāpārādyabhāvāt ।
vakṣyati <quote>‘bhogamātrasāmyaliṅgācca’</quote> iti । ato brahmaṇa iva sakalakāmāvāpti-
rasya tatsāmyamucyate । tathā śrūyate---<quote>‘so'śnute sarvān kāmān saha brahmaṇā
vipaścitā’</quote> iti । ato muktasya brahmasādṛśyamupapadyate ।।
iti avibhāgādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pakṣaḥ । <quote>‘eka eva rudraḥ’</quote> <quote>‘ekamevādvitīyaṃ’</quote> <quote>‘na tatsamaścābhyadhikaśce’</quote>tyādiśrutivirodhāt ।
baddha iva mukte'pi brahmasādṛśyamaṅgīkartumayuktam । tasmā<quote>‘tparamaṃ sāmyamupaitī’</quote>tyādiśrutira-
rthavādarūpaivāṅgīkaraṇīyā । avaśyaṃ ca <quote>‘so'śnute sarvānkāmān’</quote> <quote>‘manasaitānkāmānpaśyan
ramate jakṣankrīḍanramamāṇaḥ strībhirvā yānairvā jñātibhirve’</quote>tyādivākyānāmarthavādarūpatvamaṅgī-
karaṇīyam । sakalavaiṣayikasukhavitṛṣṇaṃ brahmānandānubhavaikaprepsuṃ mumukṣuṃ prati kāmāvāptyā-
dīnāṃ puruṣārthatvāsaṃbhavāt apahatapāpmatvavijaratvādīnāmapi kāmabhogopayogināṃ tata
eva puruṣārthatvāsaṃbhavācceti । siddhāntastu muktasya brahmaṇā sāmyamastyeva । <quote>‘sāmyamupaitī’</quote>-
tyādiśrutismṛtibhyāṃ tasya tadavailakṣaṇyena dṛṣṭatvāt । <quote>‘brahmaveda brahmaiva bhavatī’</quote>ti śrutirapi
muktasya brahmasādṛśyamupanayati । tatra hyevakāra ivārthe । yathā<quote>‘vināśamevāpīto bhavatī’</quote>-
tyatra, natvabhedārthe । <quote>‘suṣuptyutkrāntyorbhedene’</quote>tyādi <ref>(bra॰ 1-3-43-12)</ref> sūtrairjīvabrahmaṇo-
rbhedasya prasādhitatvāt । sādṛśyaniṣedhaśrutayastu jagadva‍yāpārāṃśe draṣṭavyāḥ । ata eva sūtra-
kārastasya bhogamātre sāmyaṃ vakṣyati । nacaikenāpyaṃśena sādṛśyābhāve paramasāmyaśravaṇavi-
rodhaḥ । tasya vivakṣitaguṇāṃśe atyantasāmyaviṣayatvāt । na hi tulādhṛtayoḥ svarṇaśilā-
śakalayoḥ paramasāmyoktau varṇasāmyamapi siddha‍yati । yadyapi tasya bhogaḥ svataḥ puruṣārtho
na bhavati । athāpi savibhūtikabrahmānandānubhavasya puruṣārthatvāditaraprapañcavatsvātmānanda-
svabhogyajātādikaṃ sarvaṃ bramhavibhūtitayānubhūyamānaṃ bhavatyeva taṃ prati puruṣārthaḥ । <quote>‘so'śnute
sarvānkāmā’</quote>nityādiśrutayo'pi tadabhiprāyā iti ।।</p>
<head>iti avibhāgādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha avibhāgādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। avibhāgena dṛṣṭatvāt ।। 4 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>muktasyāpi kathaṃ syāt jīvasya brahmaṇā sāmyam । viśvādhikaṃ hi viśvaprapañcaracanādhurīṇaṃ tat ।। 385 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>evamapi so'śnuta iti śravaṇādastyeva bhogatassāmyam । tena brahmasvātmā vibhaktamanubhavati muktimitaḥ ।। 386 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti avibhāgādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<pb n="485"/>
atha brāhmādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। brāhmeṇa jaiminirupanyāsādibhyaḥ ।। 5 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatra svayaṃprakāśamapahatapāpmatvādiguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ brahmasadṛśaṃ muktasya svarūpa-
māvirbhavatītyuktam । tadubhayarūpatvaṃ saṃbhavati na veti saṃśayaḥ ।। evaṃ sati matā-
ntareṇa pūrvapakṣaḥ pravartate । <quote>‘svena rūpeṇa’</quote> iti svarūpāvirbhāvo brāhmeṇāpahatapāpma-
tvādikena । te hi brahmaguṇāḥ pratyagātmano'pi svābhāvikāḥ <quote>‘ya ātmā'pahata-
pāpmā’</quote> ityādyupanyāsāt <quote>‘jakṣan krīḍan ramamāṇa’</quote> ityādiśravaṇāccāva़gamyate ।
ato guṇasāmyamiti jaiminiḥ ।।
<sutra>sū ।। citimātreṇa tadātmakatvādityauḍulomiḥ ।। 6 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘sa yathā saindhavaghano'nantarobāhyaḥ kṛtsno rasaghana evaṃ vā are'yamātmā'na-
ntaro'bāhyaḥ kṛtsnaḥ prajñānaghana eva’</quote> <quote>‘vijñānaghana eva’</quote> ityavadhāraṇāt vijñāna-
svarūpamātreṇa sāmyamityauḍulomiḥ । evamubhayadarśanāt saviśeṣanirviśeṣatve
siddhe yugapadubhayāsaṃbhavāt kālabhedādinā vyavastheti ।। atha siddhānta ucyate---
<sutra>sū ।। evamapyupanyāsāt pūrvabhāvādavirodhaṃ bādarāyaṇaḥ ।। 7 ।।</sutra>
bādarāyaṇastu parasparavirodhābhāvādubhayaśrutyavagatobhayasvarūpamasma pratipāda-
yati । tathā hi <quote>‘vijñānaghana eva’</quote> ityādinā svaprakāśa ityavagate'pi <quote>‘ya ātmā-
'pahatapātmā’</quote> ityupanyāsāt pūrveṣāmapahatapāpmatvādīnāmapi sadbhāvo'vagamyate ।
atha ubhayapramāṇasiddhaṃ rūpadvayaṃ parasparāvirodhītyubhayarūpasamuccayaḥ samucitaḥ ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha brāhmādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। brāhmeṇa jaiminirupanyāsādibhya ।। 5 ।। citimātreṇa tadātmakatvādi-
tyauḍulomiḥ ।। 6 ।।</pratika> yadidaṃ svaprakāśānandasvarūpaṃ guṇabṛndaṃ cāvirbhavatītyuktam । tasyo-
bhayasya yugapadāvirbhāvo na saṃbhavati saṃbhavati veti virodhāvirodhābhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।
apahatapāpmatvādiguṇabṛndenāvirbhāvaḥ svaprakāśacinmātrarūpeṇāvirbhāvaśceti jīvasya dvi-
vidhamapi rūpaṃ dvividhaśrutipratipannaṃ pratyākhyātuṃ na śakyam । nacobhayaṃ yaugapadyena saṃbha-
vati । ataḥ kaṃcitkālaṃ saguṇavidyāphalenāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇabṛndenāvasthānaṃ tataścinmā-
tratayetyevaṃ kālabhedena vā saguṇanirguṇavidyādhikāribhedena vā tadubhayaṃ vyavasthāpanīyamiti
ekasminneva pūrvapakṣe ṛṣidvayasaṃkīrtanapūrvakaṃ sūtradvayapraṇayanaṃ parasparaviruddhamapi śrutiṣu
śrūyamāṇatvādṛṣisaṃpratipannatvāccāvaśyamaṅgīkaraṇīyam । na ca tadubhayaṃ yugapadekasminnaṅgī-
kartuṃ yuktam । ataḥ kālabhedādinā vyavasthāpanīyamiti pūrvapakṣadṛḍhīkaraṇārtham ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।।
evamapyupanyāsātpūrvabhāvādavirodhaṃ bādarāyaṇaḥ ।। 7 ।।</pratika> prajñānaghanatvaṃ hi kārtsnyena
svaprakāśatvaṃ yathā saindhavakhilyasya rasaghanatvaṃ kārtsnyena lavaṇarasatvaṃ tanna guṇāntaravyava-
<pb n="486"/>
virodhe hi kālabhedādyapekṣā । ato jñānarūpatvena svayaṃprakāśamapahatapāpmatvādi-
yogāt kalyāṇaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ ca brahmasadṛśaṃ muktasvarūpamiti yuktam ।।
iti brāhmādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
atha saṅkalpādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। saṅkalpādeva tu tacchruteḥ ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatra muktasya svayaṃprakāśasya satyasaṅkalpatvādyuktam । tadupapannaṃ na veti vici-
kitsā ।। kiṃ prāptam ? muktasya bhogyavastuviṣaye na saṅkalpamātraṃ hetuḥ bāhyahetu-
nairapekṣyeṇa tāvatā tadasaṃbhavāditi ।। evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ । saṅkalpamātreṇa sakalabho-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
cchedakam । ato virodhābhāvādyugapadubhayaṃ saṃbhavatīti na vyavasthāpekṣeti siddhāntaḥ ।
<quote>‘āha ca tanmātra’</quote>miti <ref>(bra॰ 3—2—16)</ref> sūtrasiddhasyaivārthasyāyaṃ prapañcastadda‍ṛḍhīkaraṇārthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti brāhmādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<head>atha saṅkalpādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। saṅkalpādeva tu tacchruteḥ ।। 8 ।।</pratika> evaṃ tribhiradhikaraṇairmuktānāṃ svarūpānandasya
guṇabṛndasya cāvirbhāva uktaḥ । tatra guṇabṛnde satyasaṅkalpatvaṃ na saṃbhavati । taddhi <quote>‘saṅkalpā-
devāsya pitarassamuttiṣṭhantī’</quote>tyādiśrutyuktasaṅkalpamātreṇa pitrādisvabhogopakaraṇasraṣṭṭatvaṃ । ta-
nna saṅgacchate । vimataṃ bhogopakaraṇaṃ saṅkalpādhīnasaṅkalpayitṛvyāpārāntarāpekṣasaṃpādanaṃ sa-
ṅkalpasādhyatvāditi pramāṇavirodhāt । tataśca yathā vijñānaghana evetyavadhāraṇaṃ śrutyantarasi-
ddhasya guṇāntarasya na vyavacchedakamevaṃ <quote>‘saṅkalpādeve’</quote>tyavadhāraṇamapyanumānasiddhasya vyāpā-
rāntarasya na vyavacchedakam । naceśvarasaṅkalpasādhye vyabhicāraḥ । pakṣasamatvāt । <quote>‘upasaṃ-
hāradarśanānneti cenna kṣīravaddhi’</quote> <ref>(bra॰ a 2 pā 1 sū 14)</ref> ityadhikaraṇe parameśvarasya sa-
ṅkalpamātreṇa kāraṇāntaropasaṃhāranirapekṣeṇa sraṣṭṭatvaṃ devādidṛṣṭāntenopapāditaṃ <quote>‘devādivadapi
loke’</quote> iti । yadā muktānāmapi satyasaṅkalpatvaṃ na saṃbhavatītyākṣipyate tadā kuto devānāṃ
tatsiddha‍yet kutastarāṃ ca tadda‍ṛṣṭāntena parameśvarasyeti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu yuktaṃ <quote>‘vijñā-
naghana eve’</quote>tyevakārasya guṇāntarāvyavacchedakatvaṃ <quote>‘paṭo'yaṃ śukla eve’</quote>tivadviśeṣaṇasaṅgata-
tvenāyogavyavacchedaparatvāt । iha tu <quote>‘saṅkalpādeve’</quote>tyevakārassaṅkalpayitṛvyāpārāntaravyava-
cchedaka eva <quote>‘pārtha eva dhanurdhara’</quote> itivadviśeṣyasaṅgatatvenānyayogavyavacchedakatvāt śruti-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha brāhmādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। brāhmeṇa jaiminirupanyāsādibhyaḥ ।। 5 ।। citimātreṇa tadātmakatvādityauḍulomiḥ ।। 6 ।।
evamapyupanyāsātpūrvabhāvādavirodhaṃ bādarāyaṇaḥ ।। 7 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>brāhmeṇāvirbhāvaṃ guṇabṛndena bravītyekā । cinmātreṇānyā śrutirubhayamidaṃ kālabhedato yogyam ।। 387 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>maivaṃ virodhahānerna kālabhedavyavasthitiḥ kāmī । vijñānamātratāsya hi kārts‍nyena svaprakāśatvam ।। 388 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>sā muktasyāmnātā nivartikā netaraguṇānām । saindhavakhilyasya yathā rasaghanatā dhavalādīnām ।। 389 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti brāhmādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<pb n="487"/>
<p>gyavastusiddhirasti । tathāhi śrūyate । <quote>‘sa yadi pitṛlokakāmo bhavati saṅkalpā-
devāsya pitaraḥ samuttiṣṭhanti’</quote> ityādi । ato'sya saṅkalpamātrameva sakalabhogyava-
stusaṃpādane hetuḥ । na bāhyahetvapekṣā ।।
<sutra>sū ।। ata eva cānanyādhipatiḥ ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
yata eva brahmasvarūpāpanno'yaṃ apahatapāpmatvādiguṇakaḥ ata evānanyādhipatiḥ
svatantraḥ । kadācidapi na karmādhīnaḥ । karmaṇo vinaṣṭatvāt । nāsya parameśvaro niyā-
makaḥ । pravāhasiddhatadājñārūpavidhiniṣedhaśāstrapathātītatvāt । kutaḥ ? paśutvavyā-
vṛtteḥ । malāpagamena hi śivatvamevāsya siddham । śivatvaṃ nāma nikhilamalasaṃpa-
rkarahitaniratiśayamaṅgalāspadatvarūpaṃ śivasadṛśasvabhāvatvam । sarvajñatvādiriha
śivasya svabhāvaḥ । ato'sya muktasya śivasadṛśasya sarvajñatvamanādibodhatvaṃ ni-
tyatṛptatvaṃ svatantratvaṃ sarvaśaktimattvamaluptaśaktikatvamanantaśaktitvaṃ ceti । ātma-
jñānasaṅkocarūpo hi saṃsāraḥ । saṅkocakāraṇamalāpagame'sya sarvajñatvam । ata e-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
virodhe ca sāmānyato dṛṣṭānumānasyāpramāṇatvāt । ato yuktaṃ muktānāṃ satyasaṅkalpatva-
miti । <quote>‘saṃpadyāvirbhāva’</quote> iti <ref>(bra॰ a 4 pā 4 sū 1)</ref> sūtre svarūpānandasya sarvajñatvā-
diṣaṭkasyāpahatapāpmatvādyaṣṭakasya cāvirbhāvo vivakṣitaḥ । ata eva tatsūtrabhāṣye cidāna-
ndaghanaṃ sarvajñatvādiviśiṣṭamāvirbhavatītyuktam । tatrāpahatapāpmatvādyāvirbhāvaḥ prāgudāhṛtena
prajāpatividyāvākyenāvagamyate । sarvajñatvādyāvirbhāvaḥ kuto'vagamyata ityākāṅkṣāyāmapaha-
tapāpmatvādita eveti pratipādayituṃ sūtram । <pratika>sū॰ ।। ata eva cānanyādhipatiḥ ।। 9 ।।</pratika>
ananyādhipatiśabdoktaṃ svātantryamaṅgāntarāṇāmapyupalakṣaṇamityabhipretya malādyāvaraṇanivṛ-
ttipūrvakāpahatapāpmatvādyāvirbhāvoktyaiva sārvajñyādiṣaḍaṅgāntarāṇāmapyupalakṣaṇamityabhipretya
malādyāvaraṇanivṛttipūrvakāpahatapāpmatvādyāvirbhāvoktyaiva sārvājñyādiṣaḍaṅgāvirbhāvasiddhimu-
papādayanprathamamapahatapāpmatvoktyā svātantryasiddhimupapādayati---<pratika>ata eveti</pratika> । nanvanta-
ryāmipāratantryaṃ muktidaśāyāmapyastīti <quote>‘tasya ca nityatvā’</quote>diti dvitīyādhyāyasūtreṇāvi-
ṣkṛtaṃ kathaṃ svātantryamityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>kadācidapīti</pratika> । karmādhīnatvarūpaṃ pāratantryamatra
vyāvartyate na tvantaryāmipreraṇādhīnavyāpāratvarūpamiti bhāvaḥ । nanu prācīnakarmaṇāṃ vina-
ṣṭatve'pi parameśvarājñārūpavidhiniṣedhollaṅghanātpuṇyapāpe syātāmityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>nāsya para-
meśvara iti</pratika> ।। śrutismṛtirūpasvājñāviṣayatvāpādanena niyāmako bhavatītyarthaḥ । ata e-
vāha---<pratika>pravāhasiddheti</pratika> । hetvasiddhimāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>paśutvavyāvṛtteriti</pratika> । malamāyādipā-
śabandhaviṣayatvaṃ paśutvaṃ । paśutvavyāvṛttau satyāṃ śivabhāvāvirbhāve tadantargatatayā sārvajñyā-
disiddhimāha---<pratika>malāpagamena hīti</pratika> । muktiśśivatvarūpeti bhāratepyāviṣkṛtam---<quote>‘dharmā-
nveṣī tayaḥ kartuṃ yateta satataṃ priye । amaratvaṃ śivatvaṃ ca tapasaivāpnuyānnara’</quote> iti । saṃpratipa-
nnamuktadharmāntarasiddhihetunaiva tadīyasarvajñatvādisiddhimupapādayati---<pratika>ātmajñānetyādinā ।
asya sarvajñatvāmiti</pratika> । anādibodhatvasyāpi tadupalakṣaṇam । <pratika>ata eva jñānasyeti</pratika> । tatta-
<pb n="488"/>
vājñānasya saṃsāranidānasya samūlanivṛtteḥ paricchinnāparicchinnadehādyabhimānarū-
pabhramanivṛttiḥ । yato hyasya jarāmaraṇaśokarāhityaṃ । ata eva karmavaśyatvābhāvāt
svatantratvaṃ । niratiśayasvarūpānandānubhavaikarasikatayā svātmārāmatvena nityatṛptatvaṃ ।
ata evāsya jighatsāpipāsādirāhityam । aluptasarvaśaktikatvādasya satyakā-
masatyasaṅkalpatvam । tasmādasau parameśvaraśca apahatapāpmatvādiguṇāṣṭakayuktaḥ śrū-
yate । ato muktasya śivasadṛśasya svātantryaṃ yuktameva ।।
iti saṅkalpādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dviṣayāvaraṇabhūtānāmāṇavamalasya śaktiviśeṣāṇāṃ samudāyassaṃsārakāraṇamajñānaṃ tasya sarva-
syāpi mūlam । sārvajñyatvādikaparameśvaraśeṣatvādiyuktanijasvarūpāvaraṇabhūtā tacchaktiḥ
tasya sarvasyāpyāvaraṇaśaktisamudāyasya nivṛttyaiva hi <quote>‘śokaṃ mohaṃ jarāṃ mṛtyumatyetī’</quote>tyasya
mohaśabdoktasya paricchinnadehādyabhimānarūpasya bhramasya nivṛttirabhyupeyate । tata evāsya
sarvajñatvaṃ saṅkucitasyāvṛtasya jñānasya prāgapi sattvāṅgīkārādanādibodhatvaṃ ca siddha‍yatīti
bhāvaḥ । <pratika>yato hyasya jarāmaraṇeti</pratika> । yataḥ karmavaśyatvābhāvādasya jarāmaraṇaśokarāhityam ।
ata eva svatantratvaṃ siddha‍yatītyarthaḥ । <pratika>ata evāsya jighatseti</pratika> । svarūpānandānubhavādeva
hyasya jighatsāpipāsārāhityamupapādanīyam । tata eva nityatṛptatvaṃ siddha‍yatīti bhāvaḥ ।
<pratika>alupteti</pratika> । aluptaśaktikatvamanantaśaktikatvaṃ ca vinā satyakāmatvaṃ satyasaṅkalpatvaṃ ca na
siddha‍yatīti tata eva tadubhayaṃ siddha‍yatītyarthaḥ । <pratika>parameśvaraśceti</pratika> dṛṣṭāntārtham । <pratika>svātantrya-
miti</pratika> । svātantryopalakṣitaṃ sarvajñatvādiṣaṭkaṃ yuktamevetyarthaḥ । keṣucinmūlakośe<quote>‘ṣvata eva
cātmanyadhipati’</quote>riti sūtrapāṭho dṛṣṭaḥ । tatrāpyātmanyadhipatirātmeśvara ityananyādhipatiri-
tyanena samānārthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti saṅkalpādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha saṅkalpādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। saṅkalpādeva tu tacchruteḥ ।। 8 ।। ata eva cānanyādhipatiḥ ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>muktaḥ pitrādīnāṃ sraṣṭā saṅkalpamātreṇa । ityetadanupapannaṃ loke saṅkalpamoghatādṛṣṭeḥ ।। 390 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>asya hi yāthākāmyaṃ śāstraniṣiddhamapi saṃbhavātkiñcit । saṅkalpahatiṃ kuryānmāheśvarājñātilaṅghanatvena ।। 391 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>maivaṃ yannāpekṣā tatsṛṣṭirbrahmasṛṣṭiriva । saṅkalpādeveti śrutiphaṇiteranatiśaṅkyatvāt ।। 392 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>ata evātmanyadhipatirasau svatantro vimuktapaśubhāvaḥ । naitasya bandhakṛdaghaṃ na niyantā tanmaheśvarasso'pi ।। 393 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti saṅkalpādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<pb n="489"/>
atha ābhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। abhāvaṃ bādarirāha hyevam ।। 10 ।।</sutra>
pūrvaṃ muktasya svayaṃprakāśatvaṃ satyasaṅkalpatvādivaiśiṣṭyaṃ copapāditam । iha
tasya saśarīratvamaśarīratvamubhayaṃ veti vicāraḥ pravartate । bādaristāvat muktasya
dehendriyādyupakaraṇābhāvaṃ mene । <quote>‘niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyam’</quote> ityādikaṃ brahmaṇastadabhā-
vamāha hi tatsvarūpasya muktasyāpi tathātvamiti ।
<sutra>sū ।। bhāvaṃ jaiminirvikalpāmnānāt ।। 11 ।।</sutra>
jaiministu <quote>‘sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati’</quote> ityādau dehendriyādibhiḥ vivi-
dhatvaśrutestadbhāvameva mene । tadevaṃ sadehatvaśrutervidehatvaśruteśca kimasya tāttvika-
mita saṃśaye videhatvameva tāttvikam । <quote>‘manasaitān paśyan ramate ya ete brahma-
loka’</quote> iti bāhyendriyādyabhāvo hi muktasya śrūyate । brahma ca bāhyendriyādirahitaṃ
śrūyate <quote>‘satyātma prāṇārāmaṃ manaānandam’</quote> iti । ātmanyevārāmo na bāhye, mana-
syevānando na bāhye karaṇa iti hi tatra niruktiḥ । ato muktasya videhatvameva ।
sadehatvasya tu puruṣabhedādva‍yavastheti । evaṃ prāpte siddhānta ucyate---
<sutra>sū ।। dvādaśāhavadubhayavidhaṃ bādarāyaṇo'taḥ ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
ubhayaśruteḥ saśarīratvamaśarīratvaṃ ca svecchayā muktasyeti bhagavān bādarāyaṇo
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha abhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ abhāvaṃ bādarirāha hyevam ।। 10 ।। bhāvaṃ jaiminirvikalpāmnānāt ।। 11 ।।</pratika>
muktasya svarūpaguṇavicārānantaraṃ dehendriyavicāra iti saṅgatiḥ । muktasya saśarīratvamaśa-
rīratvaṃ ca śrūyamāṇaṃ vidyāviśeṣānuṣṭhātṛpuruṣabhedenopapādanīyamutaikasminneva puruṣe saṅkalpa-
bhedenetyubhayathā saṃbhavātsaṃśayaḥ । tatra pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । muktasya śarīraṃ bhogārthaṃ nāpekṣitaṃ brahma-
sādṛśyaṃ prāptasya tasya brahmaṇa iva bhogasya mānasatvaucityā<quote>‘nmana ānanda’</quote>miti brahmaṇa
iva <quote>‘manasaitānkāmānpaśyanramate’</quote> iti tasyāpi bhogasya mānasatvaśravaṇācca <quote>‘niṣkalaṃ ni-
ṣkriya’</quote>miti mantre brahmaṇo bhogārthaśarīraniṣedhena tasyāpi tathābhūtaśarīrābhāvasyāṅgīkarta-
vyatvācca । tatra hi mantre śarīrāvayavatatkriyayorniṣedhaḥ śarīraniṣedhaḥ paryavasyanbhogopakaraṇaśa-
rīraniṣedho bhavet । sādhakānugrahārthasyomāsahāyatvādiviśiṣṭadivyavigrahasyāṅgīkārāt ।
na ca tadvanmuktasya sādhakānugrahārthaṃ śarīramaṅgīkartavyam । tena kartavyasya sādhakānugraha-
syābhāvāt । tasmādaśarīra eva paramamuktaḥ । <quote>‘sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati’</quote>tyāderacchedye
jīve svato'saṃbhavataḥ śarīrabhedopādhikatvaṃ vaktavyamiti yatsaśarīratvamāpatati tadvidyā-
viśeṣānuṣṭhānādavaramuktiṃ prāptasya kalpanīyamiti <quote>‘brāhmeṇa jaimini’</quote>rityadhikaraṇa <ref>(bra॰ 4-
4-6-3)</ref> iva atrāpi ṛṣidvayasaṅkīrtanaṃ yuktam । sūtradvayaṃ pūrvapakṣadṛḍhīkaraṇārtham ।
dvitīyasūtre vikalpo vividhaprakāraḥ bahudehatvamityarthaḥ । evaṃ prāpte siddhāntaḥ---<pratika>sū॰ ।।
dvādaśāhavadubhayavidhaṃ bādarāyaṇo'taḥ ।। 12 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘yatra nānyatpaśyatī’</quote>tyādivākyaprati-
<pb n="490"/>
manyate । yathā dvādaśāhaḥ ubhayaśruteḥ satramahīnaṃ ca tadvaditi । atra paurāṇikī
phaṇitiḥ <quote>“sarvajñāḥ sarvagāḥ śuddhāḥ paripūrṇāḥ svabhāvataḥ । śivatulyabalopetāḥ
paramaiśvaryasaṃyutāḥ ।। sadehāśca videhāśca bhavantyātmecchayā punaḥ ।।”</quote> ityādikā
śivapadārūḍhaviṣayā । ata ubhayavidhatvaṃ yujyate । ekasyaiva kālabhedādubhayavya-
vasthāmāha---
<sutra>sū ।। tanvabhāve sandhyavadupapatteḥ ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
muktaḥ svecchayā kadācit bahūni śarīrāṇi sṛṣṭvā tadanupraveśena viharati । ka-
dācidupasaṃhṛtaśarīraśca vartate । śarīrādyabhāvāvasthāyāṃ muktaḥ svapne parameśvarasṛṣṭaṃ
rasādikaṃ manasā baddhapuruṣa iva parameśvarasṛṣṭameva rasaṃ bhuṅkte । kimuktaṃ bhavati
svapne puruṣo yathā śarīrendriyādinairapekṣyeṇa kevalena manasaiveśvarasaṃpāditān viṣa-
yān bhuṅkte, tathā mukto'pi svabhūtena manasaiva brahmasvarūparasamanubhuṅkta iti ।।
<sutra>sū ।। bhāve jāgradvat ।। 14 ।।</sutra>
svecchāsṛṣṭaśarīrādyupakaraṇabhāve jāgratpuruṣa iva sarvakāmaṃ bhaṅkte । nanu yadi
muktasya prākṛtavastudarśitvarūpaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ, tarhi apuruṣārthaprapañcadarśino muktasya na
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pannaniratiśayātmakaparabrahmaviṣayāyāṃ bhūmavidyāyāṃ śrutasya <quote>‘sa ekadhā bhavatī’</quote>tyāderavaramu-
ktiviṣayatvaṃ na yuktam । ato yathā <quote>‘dvādaśāhamṛddhikāmāḥ api yaddvādaśāhena prajākāmaṃ
yājaye’</quote>diti śrutidvayānusāreṇa dvādaśāhasya satrāhīnobhayarūpatvam । evaṃ muktasya sadeha-
videhaśrutyanusāreṇa tadubhayarūpatvamaṅgīkaraṇīyam । tacca svasaṅkalpāt <quote>‘sadehāśca videhāśca
bhavantyātmecchayā punaḥ’</quote> ityupabṛṃhaṇāditi । nanu videhāvasthāyāṃ manomātreṇa kathaṃ kāma-
bhogaḥ । yadi sa tanmātreṇāpi muktasya saṃbhavati tarhi kadāciddehāpekṣā kimarthetyāśaṅkāṃ ni-
rākartuṃ videhasadehāvasthayorbhogaviśeṣapratipādanārthamuparitanasūtradvayam । <pratika>sū॰ ।। tanvabhāve
sandhyavadupapatteḥ ।। 13 ।।</pratika> sandhyavatsūkṣmaviṣayopabhoga iti viśeṣopapatterityarthaḥ । śarīra-
syāntaḥ parameśvarasṛṣṭeṣu vāsanāmayeṣu sūkṣmeṣvartheṣu mānasapratyaya eva cākṣuṣatvādyabhimāna-
rūpaḥ svapna ityaṅgīkṛtya sandhyavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ kṛtaḥ । tatra sūkṣmatvāśaṃ iva parameśvarasṛṣṭatvāṃ-
śe'pi sandhyadṛṣṭānta iti tatsvārasyamanusarannāha---<pratika>parameśvasṛṣṭamiti । brahmasvarūparasa-
miti</pratika> । savibhūtikabrahmānandamityarthaḥ । <quote>‘manasaitānkāmānpaśyanramata’</quote> iti śrutau parameśva-
rasṛṣṭamiti prācīnabhāṣyavākye ca kevalamānasānubhave'pi vibhūtyanupraveśavarṇanāt । <pratika>sū॰ ।।
bhāve jāgradvat ।। 14 ।।</pratika> upapatterityanuvartate । tathā ca muktasya śarīrādisadbhāve jāgrata
iva sthūlaviṣayabhogopapatterityarthaḥ । nanu yadā kaścinmuktaḥ sadehaḥ anyaśca videhaḥ tadā
tayā spaṣṭāspaṣṭaviṣayau bhogāviti muktiphale'pyutkarṣāpakarṣau prasajyeyātām । naiva doṣaḥ ।
savibhūtikabrahmānubhavasya sarvānpratyekarūpatvāt । tathāhi yadā kaścidvidehaḥ tadā tasya sva-
pnadṛśa iva vāsamābhiḥ sūkṣmānkāṃścana viṣayānīśvaraḥ sṛjati । te ca sthūlaprapañcāntargata-
viṣayāśceti dvividhairapi vibhūtibhedairviśiṣṭaṃ brahma sadehānāṃ videhānāṃ ca sarveṣāmapi muktā-
nāmāsvādyam । ato na tasyāpi savibhūtikabrahmānubhave viśeṣaḥ । kathaṃ tarhi ‘tanvabhāva
<pb n="491"/>
saṃsāraduḥkhānuṣaṅgābhāvasiddhiriti cenna । muktasyāpuruṣārtharūpeṇa prapañcadarśanā-
bhāvāt । muktena brahmākāraṃ hi dṛśyate । viśvametat । tathā hi śrūyate । <quote>‘etattato
bhavati । ākāśaśarīraṃ brahma । satyātma prāṇārāmaṃ mana ānandam । śāntisamṛ-
ddhamamṛtam’</quote> iti । pūrvatra <quote>‘āpnoti svārājyam । āpnoti manasaspatim’</quote> iti
svārājyasukhaikarasaṃ śivasya parabrahmaṇaḥ padaṃ manasaspatiṃ jñānaśaktyadhiṣṭhātṛbhūta-
māpnoti yogītyuktam । tadā sa kiṃviśiṣṭa ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ <quote>‘vāk‌patiścakṣuṣpatiḥ ।
śrotrapatirvijñānapatiri’</quote>ti vāgādīnāṃ svecchādhīnatvena tadādhipatyamuktatm । tade-
vaṃvidhasya muktasya paramākāśarūpaśivapadādhirūḍhasya svecchādhīnaviśuddhavāgādika-
raṇasya tataḥ tatpadaprāptyanantaraṃ etat viśvajālaṃ bhavati । kiṃ bhavati ? ākāśa-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ityādisūtrābhyāṃ videhatvāvasthāyāṃ sūkṣmabhogaḥ sadehatvāvasthāyāṃ sthūlabhoga iti viśeṣa
uktaḥ । kathaṃcidvidehatvāvasthāyāṃ tadīyavāsanāmayasūkṣmaviṣayasṛṣṭirapyasti na tu sadeha-
tvāvasthāyāmityeva viśeṣassūtrābhyāmukta iti gṛhāṇa । etena kaścinmuktaḥ saṅkalpena bahūni
bhogopakaraṇāni sṛjetkaścidalpānīti tayorbhogatāratamyaṃ syādityapi śaṅkā nirastā । sa-
rvānmuktānprati svasṛṣṭaparasṛṣṭasarvavidhavibhūtiviśiṣṭabrahmānandānubhavasyaikarūpatvāt । <pratika>na-
nviti ।</pratika> yadi muktasya savibhūtikabrahmānubhavaḥ tadā muktānubhavavāsanāsṛṣṭabhogopakara-
ṇānāṃ muktamātrabhogyānāṃ sukhaikarūpatve'pyamuktasādhāraṇasya sathūlaprapañcasya sukhaduḥkhakaraṃ-
vitatvāttadanubhaviturmuktasyāmuktavadda‍uḥkhānubhavo'pi syāt । iyāṃstu viśeṣo bhavet । amu-
ktasya duḥkhahetukatipayaviṣayānubhava ityalpaṃ duḥkhaṃ । muktasya tu yadyāvadda‍uḥkhānubhavahetubhūtaṃ
durgandhādiviṣayajātaṃ tasya sarvasyāpyanubhavo'stītyadhikaṃ duḥkhamiti । tasmādayuktassavibhū-
tikabrahmānubhava iti śaṅkārthaḥ । saṃsāranidānapuṇyapāparūpadoṣākrāntenāmuktena svatantrata-
yānubhūyamāne prapañce katipayasya yathākarma duḥkharūpatve'pi taddoṣarahitena brahmavibhūtitayā-
nubhūyamānasya tasya sukharūpatvameva bhavati । yathā pittopahatarasanenāsvādyamānasya śarkarāde-
rduḥkharūpatve'pi tadrahitenāsvādyamānasya sukharūpatvaṃ yathā ca rājakumāreṇa purataḥ svatantra-
tayānubhūyamānasya mahāsainyasya duḥkharūpatve'pi tatastasyaiva svapitṛvibhūtitayāvagamyamā-
nasya sukharūpatvamiti parihārārthaḥ । muktasya brahmavibhūtitayā prapañcadarśane śrutimudāharati---
<pratika>tathāhi śrūyata iti</pratika> । etadviśvajālamākāśaśarīraṃ brahmaiva bhavatītyetanmuktaṃ pratyucyata
iti darśayituṃ muktasya prakṛtatvamāha---<pratika>pūrvatreti</pratika> । svaḥ svargaḥ <quote>‘devā ha vai svargaṃ lokamagama-
nni’</quote>ti śrutiprasiddhaniratiśayasukhātmakaṃ parabrahmaṇaḥ padaṃ tatra rājatīti svarāṭ tasya bhāvaḥ
svārājyaṃ tatprāpnotītyasya brahmaṇaḥ padaṃ prāpnotītyarthe paryavasānamabhipretya vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>khā-
rājyamiti</pratika> । manaḥ jñānaśaktirūpā pārameśvarī tadadhiṣṭhātā śivo manasaḥ patirityabhipretya
vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>manasaspatimiti</pratika> । brahmabhinnaṃ viśvajālaṃ kathaṃ muktasya brahma bhavedityākāṅkṣāyāṃ
cicchaktyupādānakasya viśvajālasya cicchaktidvārā brahmāpṛthagbhāvāttasya ca muktena sākṣā-
tkṛtatvāditi darśayituṃ <quote>‘ākāśaśarīra’</quote>miti śrutau viśeṣaṇaṃ kṛtam । tatrākāśaśabdasya
<pb n="492"/>
śarīraṃ brahmaiva paramānandalakṣaṇaparamākāśaśarīraṃ brahmaiva bhavati । paraprakṛtirūpā
paramasattā prakāśānandasamarasā । paraśaktirhi brahmaṇaḥ sarūpatayā paramākāśa u-
cyate yā muktānāṃ parameśvarasya ca sākṣādarthakriyāhetuḥ, paramparayā'nyeṣām ।
tathā hi <quote>‘ko hyevānyāt kaḥ prāṇyāt । yadeṣa ākāśa ānando na syāt । eṣa
hyevānandayāti’</quote> <quote>‘raso vai saḥ । rasam̐/?/hyevāyaṃ labdhvā''nandī bhavati’</quote> iti sarvānu-
bhavaviṣayatvamasyāḥ śrūyate । tathā ca <quote>‘sa eko mānuṣa ānanda’</quote> ityārabhya <quote>‘sa
eko brahmaṇa ānanda’</quote> iti brahmaparyantamupādhitirodhānādānandāvirbhāvastārata-
myena śrūyate । nirupādhikatayā brahmaṇi mukte ca paripūrṇo vartate sa ānandaḥ <quote>‘sa
eko brahmaṇa ānandaḥ । śrotriyasya cākāmahatasye’</quote>ti śravaṇāt । brahmārpaṇa-
buddhyā niṣkāmānuṣṭhitāgnihotrādikarmā paravidvānakāmahataḥ śrotriyaḥ । tasya
jīvata eva muktasya brahmaṇaśca tulya evānandaḥ । tasya yogātiśayena tattadbha‍ūmima-
dhirūḍhasya pūrvatra pūrvatra bhūmāvabhyāsaḥ svalpa iti tadanusāreṇa tattadbha‍ūmau tadīyāna-
ndāvirbhāvasya mānuṣādyānandasāmyakṛtiriti na virodhaḥ । ato'yameva paramā-
nandaḥ paraprakṛtiḥ paramākāśaḥ parābhedāt <quote>‘ānando brahmeti vyajānādi’</quote>ti
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
cicchaktirartha ityetaddarśayati---<pratika>paraprakṛtirūpeti । paramasatteti</pratika> । brahmavatprapañcasyāpi
saiva satteti pāramyam । prakāśānandasamarasā cidānandaghanā paraśaktirhi paramākāśaḥ ।
sā parabrahmaṇaḥ svarūpatayocyata ityanvayaḥ । śarīrapadavyākhāyanaṃ <pratika>svarūpatayeti</pratika> । tasyāssa-
rvadā sarvopajīvyatvamāha---<pratika>yati</pratika> । sākṣādva‍ṛttyupadhānamanapekṣyārthakriyāheturakhaṇḍānandata-
yāsvādahetuḥ āsvādanīyeti yāvat । <pratika>paramparayeti</pratika> । puṇyaviśeṣānusāryabhivyaktiviśeṣahetu-
vṛttyupadhānadvāretyarthaḥ । etadevopapādayati---<pratika>tathāhītyādinā</pratika> । ananaṃ prāṇavāyuvyāpāraḥ
prāṇanaṃ cakṣurādivyāpāraḥ । anena laukikavyāpārahetutvamapyastīti darśitam । <quote>‘eṣa hyeve’</quote>ti
vākyābhiprāyaḥ taddhetuvyapadeśāccetyānandamayādhikaraṇe <ref>(bra॰ 1 pā॰ 1 sū॰ 1)</ref> varṇitaḥ ।
<pratika>brahmaparyantamiti</pratika> । brahmaṇaḥ prāgityarthaḥ । <pratika>brahmaṇi mukte ceti</pratika> । anubhāvyatva-
saṃbandho vivakṣitaḥ nādhārādheyabhāvaḥ । tasya muktasādhāraṇyābhāvāt <quote>‘sa eko brahmaṇa’</quote>
iti śrutāvanubhāvyatvasaṃbandha eva ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ । <pratika>tasya jīvata eva muktasyeti</pratika> । tathābhūtaḥ
śrotriyo yadā caramadehāvasāne mukto bhavati tadā tasya parabrahmaṇaśca tulya eva nirati-
śayānandaḥ । sa yadā jīvaddaśāyāṃ yogamabhyasyati tadatasyā yogabhūtikābhedānusāryabhi-
vyañjakatāratamyātkrameṇa mānuṣānandāditulyānandāvirbhāvaḥ । evaṃ satyakāmahataśrotriya-
śabdoktānāṃ muktānāmevānandatāratamyamucyata iti virodho nāśaṅkanīyaḥ । <quote>‘sa eko
brahmaṇa ānanda’</quote> iti paryāya evākāmahataśrotriyaśabdasya muktidaśāviṣayatvāt prācīna-
paryāyeṣu tasya tasya jīvanmuktidaśāviṣayatvādityarthaḥ । astvevaṃbhūtamahimā paramākāśaḥ ।
tathāpi kathaṃ brahmaṇastatsvarūpatvaṃ dharmidharmabhāvena bhedasattvādityāśaṅkya <quote>‘abhedavyapadeśo'-
yamaupacārikaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘ānando brahme’</quote>ti śrutyantara ivetyabhipretyāha---<pratika>ato'yameveti</pratika> । <quote>‘yadyapyā-
kāśaśarīra’</quote>mityatrāyutasiddhaprakāraparaḥ śarīraśabda iti vaktuṃ śakyam । tathāpi tadupādā-
<pb n="493"/>
brahmatvena jagatkāraṇatvena śrūyate । tasyābhivyaktiḥ <quote>‘saiṣā bhārgavī vāruṇī vidyā ।
parame vyoman pratiṣṭhitā’</quote> iti । ato muktānāṃ paramānandarūpaparamākāśaśarīrakaṃ
brahma jagadbhavatīti paramānandānupraviṣṭānāmeṣāṃ brahmaṇa iva duḥkhānuṣaṅgābhāvaḥ ।।
iti abhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
atha pradīpavadāveśādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। pradīpavadāveśastathā hi darśayati ।। 15 ।।</sutra>
sūcitaṃ hi pūrvatra muktātmano'pi svecchayā'nantaśarīraparigrahaṇasāmarthyena vi-
śrutvam । tadiha yujyate na veti vicāryate । <quote>‘sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati’</quote>
<quote>‘imāṃllokān kāmānnīkāmarūpyanusañcaran’</quote> ityādiṣu muktasya paricchinnatayā sa-
ñcārāvagamānna vyāpakatvamucitam । ato bahuśarīraparigrahaṇaṃ krameṇaiva, na yugapa-
diti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।। siddhāntastu । ghaṭādiparicchinnasya pradīpasya paricchedāpāye
svaprabhayā yathā gṛhādivyāptiḥ, tathā muktasya svaśaktitirodhāyakamalāpāye svaśa-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nakatvena tadabhinnasya viśvajālasya viśvajālasya brahmasāmānādhikaraṇyamabhedenopapādayituṃ tasya svarū-
paparatayā vyākhyānaṃ kṛtvā tadaupacārikatvenopapāditam । vastutastasyāyutasiddhaprakārapara-
tve'pi na doṣaḥ । viśvajālasyāpyayutasiddhaprakāratvādeva sāmānādhikaraṇyopapatteḥ । <pratika>tasyeti</pratika> ।
tasya paramākāśasya । abhivyaktiḥ mahimaprakāśanam । bhṛguvallyāmata eva <quote>‘saiṣā bhārgavī’</quote>-
tyādinā tasyāstatparatvamuktamityarthaḥ । avāntaraprameyopasaṃhāreṇādhikaraṇārthaṃ nigamayati---
<pratika>ato muktānāmiti</pratika> ।</p>
<head>iti abhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<head>atha pradīpavadāveśādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। pradīpavadāveśastathā hi darśayati ।। 15 ।।</pratika> <pratika>sūcitaṃ hīti</pratika> । pūrvādhikaraṇe
<quote>‘sa ekadhā bhavatī’</quote>tyādi śrutyudāharaṇena muktasya vibhutvaṃ sūcitam । aṇutve yugapadaneka-
śarīraparigrahānupapattirityarthaḥ । anekaśarīraparigrahaśravaṇādaṇutvaśravaṇācca saṃśayaḥ । saṃca-
raṇādiliṅgenāṇutvasya pratiṣṭhitatvādanekaśarīraparigrahaḥ kramiko vyākhyeya iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।
kramikatāyāmekadhā tridhā pañcadhetyādipakṣabhedopanyāsānupapatteryugapadeva kadācitkadācida-
nekaśarīraparigraho vācyaḥ । sa ca dharmajñānavikāsenopapadyate । avaśyaṃ hi saṃsāradaśāyā-
mapi hastiputtikādiśarīreṣu paribhramato jīvasya tattaddehavyāptyanuguṇasaṅkocavikāsaśā-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha abhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। abhāvaṃ bādarirāha hyevam ।। 10 ।। bhāvaṃ jaiminirvikalpāmananāt ।। 11 ।। dvādaśāhavadubhaya-
vidhaṃ bādarāyaṇo'taḥ ।। 12 ।। tanvabhāve saṃdhyavadupapatteḥ ।। 13 ।। bhāve jāgradvat ।। 14 ।।</pratika>
<lg><l>kvacidasya dehabhāvastadabhāvo vā'vagamyate kvacana । atra śrutidvayasya vyavasthitiḥ puruṣabhedena ।। 394 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>maivaṃ śruterayaṃ syānnijecchayā satanuratanuśca । tadabhāve svapnadṛgiva tadbhāve jāgradiva bhogī ।। 395 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>ityabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<pb n="494"/>
<p>ktyā viśvavyāptiḥ āveśaḥ bhavati । tathā hi darśayati śrutiḥ । <quote>“sa no bandhurja-
nitā sa vidhātā dhāmāni veda bhuvanāni viśvā । yatra devā amṛtamānaśānā-
stṛtīye dhāmānyabhyairayanta ।।”</quote> <quote>“pari dyāvāpṛthivī yanti sadyaḥ pari lokān pari
diśaḥ pari suvaḥ । ṛtasya tantuṃ vitataṃ vicṛtya tadapaśyattadabhavatprajāsu ।।”</quote> iti ।
tatra hi prakaraṇaṃ <quote>‘eṣa hi devaḥ’</quote> iti jagatkartuḥ viśvarūpasya mahādevasya । sa mahā-
devo naḥ asmākaṃ bandhuḥ, janitā pitā, sa vidhātā sakalaśreyasāṃ kartā, dhāmāni
tejorūpāṇyaprākṛtāni bhuvanāni viśvānyapi jānāti । atra bandhutvādiyo-
gyasya dhāmavettṛtvasya ca prayojanamucyate । yatra yasmin mahādeve amṛtaṃ kaivalya-
lakṣmīṃ ānaśānāḥ prāpyānubhavanto devāḥ tadbhāvā devanaśilāḥ tṛtīye dyusaṃjñake
tatpade māyātīte dhāmāni tejaḥpradhānāni svābhimatāni sthānāni abhyairayanta
svīkṛtavantaḥ । kimuktaṃ bhavati । bandhuvajjanakavat sakalahitakāriṇā parabrahmaṇā
mahādevena prasaddhena dalitapāśabandhā amṛtabhāvaṃ gatāḥ muktāḥ tṛtīye paramavyo-
malakṣaṇe svapade kalpitāni dhāmāni prakāśamayāni padāni prāptā vartanta iti ।।
ataḥ parameṣāṃ vyāptirucyate । pari dyāvāpṛthivī yantīti । muktātmānaḥ svaśa-
ktimarīcibhiḥ dyāvāpṛthivī pariyanti vyāpnuvanti । pari lokān hiraṇyagarbhā-
dilokānapi vyāpnuvanti । diśaścatasraśca pariyanti vyāpnuvanti । evaṃ sakalajaga-
dvyāpino vartante । tathāhi te sarvajñā ṛtasya karmaṇo vistīrṇaṃ bhogatantuṃ vicṛtya
chittvā puṇyapāpavinirmuktāḥ santaḥ sarvaprāṇiṣu tadeva mahādevākhyaṃ vastu apa-
śyan sarvātmatayā tadabhavat tatsvabhāvāścābhavan । yatreti saṃbandhaḥ । ato mu-
ktānāṃ śivaikarasānāṃ vyāpakatvamastyeva । etena mahādevasadharmāṇo muktasvabhāvā
jīvā devaśabdāvācyāḥ । dyuprabhṛtivyāpino devavratākhye sāmani śrūyante <quote>‘ye devā
diviṣada’</quote> ityādinā । purāṇe ca---<quote>“te hi sākṣāddiviṣadastvantarikṣasadastathā ।
pṛthivīṣada ityete devā devavrate sthitāḥ ।।”</quote> iti । iha pṛthivīti brahmāṇḍarūpaṃ,
antarikṣamiti dvitīyaṃ māyāpadaṃ, dyauriti tṛtīyaṃ paramākāśaparyāyaṃ śuddhaśakti-
rūpaṃ śivapadamucyate । ato maktānāṃ vibhutvamiti ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
litvaṃ dharmajñānasya vācyam । tathā ca muktidaśāyāmanekaśarīravyāptyanuguṇo vikāso
nānupapannaḥ । saṅkocakāpāye ca saṅkucitasya prabhāmaṇḍalasya vyāpanaṃ dṛṣṭam । śrutirmuktau
tadvyāptiṃ darśayati---<pratika>paridyāvāpṛthivītyādinā</pratika> । sā śrutiḥ pūrvāparamantrodāharaṇapūrvakaṃ
bhāṣye spaṣṭaṃ vyākhyātā । tatra dhāmāni sthānāni । bhāṣye tejorūpatvena sthānaviśeṣaṇaṃ
vastuvṛttamabhipretya na tu dhāmaśabdārthatvamabhipretya । sthānavācino dhāmaśabdasya tejorūpa-
vācitvāyogāttadāvṛttimabhipretya vā tathā vyākhyānam । tadapaśyattadabhavaditi bahuṣveka-
vacanaṃ chāndasatayā neyam । <pratika>dvitīyaṃ māyāpadamiti</pratika> । anena parāvaramāyākāryaṃ śuddhami-
<pb n="495"/>
<sutra>sū ।। svāpyayasaṃpattyoranyatarāpekṣamāviṣkṛtaṃ hi ।। 16 ।।</sutra>
nanu brahmaprāptasyāntarabāhyajñānalopamāha śrutiḥ <quote>‘prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakto na
bāhyaṃ kiṃcana veda nāntarami’</quote> ti । kathaṃ tasya śaktirūpajñānavyāptirucyata iti
nāśaṅkānīyam । idaṃ jīvasya vedanābhāvavacanaṃ suṣuptimaraṇayoranyatarāpekṣaṃ <quote>‘nāhaṃ
khalvayamevaṃ saṃpratyātmānaṃ jānātītyayamahamasmīti no evemāni bhūtāni’</quote> iti
suṣuptau, <quote>‘etebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tānyevānuvinaśyati na pretya saṃjñā'stī’</quote>ti
maraṇe ca śrutyā tathaivāviṣkṛtaṃ hi । tadvilakṣaṇatayā muktestatra nājñatvādi । kintu
malatirodhānāpāyāt sarvajñatvaṃ ca sarvaśaktikatvaṃ ceti na muktau jñānādiniṣe-
dhasaṃbhavaḥ ।।
iti prajīpavadāveśādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
atha jagadvyāpārādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। jagadvyāpāravarjaṃ prakaraṇādasannihitatvācca ।। 17 ।।</sutra>
uktamīśvareṇa sāmyaṃ muktānāṃ svaprakāśatvavyāpakatvasarvajñatvādibhiḥ ।। tathā
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śrapadadvayamapi grāhmam । anyathā paramaśivapadasya tṛtīyatvāyogāt । <pratika>sū॰ ।। svāpyaya-
saṃpattyoranyatarāpekṣamāviṣkṛtaṃ hi ।। 16 ।।</pratika> jñānābhāvaśrutīnāṃ muktadaśāviṣayatve
tadānīṃ jñānavikāsoktiranupapannā syāditi tāsāṃ yathāprakaraṇaṃ suṣuptiviṣayatvaṃ maraṇaviṣa-
yatvaṃ veti pratipādayitumidaṃ sūtramiti śaṅkottarābhyāṃ vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>nanvityādinā</pratika> । <quote>‘vāṅma-
nasi saṃpadyata’</quote> ityādiśrutiprasiddhyanusāreṇa saṃpattiśabdo maraṇe prayuktaḥ । yathā suṣuptimara-
ṇayoḥ śrutyantareṣu jñānābhāvaprasiddhiḥ naivaṃ muktāvastītyāha---<pratika>tadvilakṣaṇatayeti</pratika> । na ke-
valaṃ muktau vedanābhāvaprasiddhyabhāvamātramapi tu <quote>‘sarvaṃ ha paśyaḥ paśyati sarvamāpnoti sarvaśa’</quote>
ityādiśrutiṣu sarvajñatvādiprasiddhirapyastītyāha---<pratika>kiṃtviti</pratika> ।</p>
<head>iti pradīpavadāveśādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<head>atha jagadvyāpārādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। jagadvyāpāravarjaṃ prakaraṇādasannihitatvācca ।। 17 ।।</pratika> saṅgatipūrvakaṃ paramasā-
myaśravaṇātsadṛśadvitīyaśravaṇācca saṃśayaṃ darśayati---<pratika>uktamiti</pratika> । malatirodhānāpagamā-
tsvaprakāśaniratiśayānandasvarūpāvirbhāvena dhīsaṅkocāpagamāttadvikāsāvirbhāvena sārvajñyā-
derapahatapāpmatvādeścāvirbhāvena ca muktasya śivasāmyaṃ prāksamarthitam । tadvajjagadvyāpāre-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha pradīpavadāveśādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। pradīpavadāveśastathā hi darśayati ।। 15 ।। svāpyayasaṃpattyoranyatarāpekṣamāviṣkṛtaṃ hi ।। 16 ।।</pratika>
<lg><l>kāyavyūhasya yugapatkathamadhitiṣṭhedasau muktaḥ । āśritya kālabhedaṃ yojyastasmādanekadhābhāvaḥ ।। 316 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>dīpo ghaṭādirodhāpāye prabhayā yathāviśati gehāntam । muktastathā malasyāpāye jagadidamato'sti kāyavyūhaḥ ।। 317 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti pradīpavadāveśādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<pb n="496"/>
<p>jagatsṛṣṭyādāvapi sāmyaṃ durvāraṃ, <quote>‘paramaṃ sāmyamupaitī’</quote>ti nirviśeṣaśravaṇāt । ja-
gatsṛṣṭyādisāmyābhyupagame ca bahvīśvaratvādīśvarasyādvitīyatvabhaṅgaprasaṅgaḥ । ataḥ
kīdṛśaṃ sāmyamīśvareṇa muktānāṃ vivakṣitam । jagatsṛṣṭyādiyuktaṃ tadvarjaṃ veti
saṃśayaḥ ।। kiṃ prāptam ? <quote>‘sa yadi pitṛlokakāmo bhavatī’</quote>tyādiṣu saṃkalpamātrā-
tpitṛlokādisṛṣṭisāmarthyaśravaṇāt <quote>‘imāṃllokān kāmānnīkāmarūpyanusaṃcaran’</quote>
iti sarvatra vyāpāraśravaṇāt parameśvarasāmye saṅkocāyogācca muktasya jagatsṛṣṭyā-
divyāpṛtirapyastīti prāpte brūmaḥ । muktasya parameśvarasāmye'pi jagatsṛṣṭyādi-
vyāpāravarjameva svātantryamasya bhogavastuṣu । <quote>‘yatau vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante’</quote>
<quote>‘dyāvāpṛthivī janayan deva eka’</quote> ityādiṣu śrutaṃ jagatsṛṣṭyādikaṃ parameśvarasya pra-
karaṇādavagamyate । sṛṣṭyādiprakaraṇeṣvasannihita eva jīvaḥ । ato na muktasya
jagatsṛṣṭyādikamasti ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ṇāpi sāmyaṃ prāptamapodyata iti saṅgatiḥ । tatraivaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ । paramasāmyaśrutermuktasya jaga-
tsraṣṭṛtvādikamaṅgīkaraṇīyam । na ca samaniṣedhaśrutivirodhātsāmyaṃ kenacideva rūpeṇeti
saṅkocanīyamiti vācyam । sāmyaśrutivirodhāttanniṣedhaśrutireva saṃsāriṣu brahmasāmyaniṣe-
dhaviṣayeti saṅkocopapatteḥ । adhikāravākyāvagataphalavirodhena <quote>‘ko hi tadveda yadyamuṣmim̐lloka’</quote>
ityāderiva sāmyaniṣedhaśrutereva stāvakatvakalpanaucityācca । api ca sākṣādevopāsya-
guṇaprāptiḥ phalamavagamyate yathākraturityādiśrutau । na ca parabrahmaṇyaiśvaryamātramupāsyaṃ na tu
niraṅkuśaṃ sarvajagadaiśvaryamato muktasya svasaṅkalpasṛṣṭakatipayavastvaiśvaryasiddhāvapi yathākratu-
vākyamupapadya iti vācyam । <quote>‘sarvasya vaśī sarvasyeśānaḥ eṣa sarveśvaraḥ kāraṇaṃ tu dhyeyaḥ
sarvaiśvaryasaṃpanna’</quote> ityādiśrutiṣu niraṅkuśasya sarvaiśvaryasyopāsyatvāvagamāt । kiṃca muktasya sarveṣu
lokeṣu kāmacāraḥ śrūyate । na tasya tattallokagataphalabhogārthatvakalpanaṃ yuktam । brahmānandama-
nubhavato'pi viṣayāntaralipsayā sañcārābhyupagame tasya niratiśayatvabhaṅgāpatteḥ । ato
muktasya niyamanādilīlārtha eva lokasañcāraḥ । tasmātparamasāmyatatkratunyāyasarvalokasa-
ñcārādipratipādanadarśanānmuktasyāpi parameśvaravaccagatsraṣṭṛtādikamaṅgīkaraṇīyam । na ca
yasya yadga‍uṇaprāptiryadadhīnā tasya sa guṇastato nyūna iti niyamo'sti । gurorvidyāmadhigata-
vatāṃ śiṣyāṇāṃ tadvadeva vyākhyātṛtvaprabandhanirmātṛtvādidarśanāt । na ca sṛṣṭyādiprakaraṇeṣu
parameśvarasyaiva prakṛtatvānmuktānāmasannihitatvācca parameśvarasyaiva sṛṣṭyādivyāpāro na muktā-
nāmiti vācyam । śyenaprakaraṇe śyenavadiṣorasaṃnihitatve'pi <quote>‘samānamitaracchyenene’</quote>ti sā-
myavacanāttadīyavaiśeṣikāṅgānāmiṣāviva muktānāṃ parameśvarasāmyavacanāttadīyasṛṣṭyādivyā-
pārāṇāṃ teṣu siddhyupapatteḥ । gāvāmayanikasvarasāmādiprakaraṇāmnātānāmapi prakaraṇāntarā-
mnātasvarasāmaikakapālāmikṣāṇāṃ sāptadaśyādiliṅgabalāttadīyadharmāntaraprāptivat sarvalo-
kasañcārādiliṅgabalānmuktānāṃ pārameśvarajagadvyāpāraprāptyupapatteśceti । siddhāntastu mu-

<sutra>sū ।। pratyakṣopadeśāditi cennādhikārikamaṇḍalasthokteḥ ।। 18 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘imāṃllokān kāmānnī kāmarūpyanusañcaran’</quote> ityādiṣu mukte jagadvyāpārasya pra-

na jagadvyāpāraḥ । tathā sati tasya bhogānuṣaṅgādvikāritvamityata āha---
<sutra>sū ।। vikārāvarti ca tathā hi sthitimāha ।। 19 ।।</sutra>

evaṃ janmavṛddhyādivikāravatkṣudrabhogalipsayā muktasya lokaparibhramaṇāṅgīkāre tasya nira-

<pratika>raso vai sa iti</pratika> । yadyapyeṣā śrutirmuktāmuktasādhāraṇatvena <quote>‘bhāve jāgradva’</quote>diti sūtre

vindate । atha so'bhayaṃ gato bhavatī’</quote>ti vākyāntarasyopalakṣaṇametat । <pratika>avikṛtameveti</pratika> ।
brahmānantaśabdayoraparicchinnavācitvāditi bhāvaḥ । nanu tattallokagatabhogalipsayā pari-

vādīnāmadhikāriṇāṃ brahmāntānāṃ maṇḍaleṣu khecchayā sañcaramāṇaḥ kāmānnī kāma-

śānte hakārastadidaṃ viduḥ । ahamātmakamadvaitaṃ yatprakāśātmaviśramaḥ ।।”</quote> iti ।
atrānuttarabrahmānandapadānupraviṣṭasya muktasya sakalaprapañcākāraśivābhidhāyakaprā-
sādākṣarānusaṃdhānapūrvakaṃ gānaṃ kartavyatayā na vidhīyate । kiṃtvānandāsvādaparamo-

śeṣaṇataikasvabhāvo yaḥ prapañcaḥ tadavagāhinaṃ taṃ svaviśeṣaṇatvenāpyavagāhamānamityarthaḥ ।
annaśabdena bhogyavarga ucyate annādaśabdena bhoktṛvargaḥ tadubhayagrahaṇaṃ bhogasthānāderapyu-

kintu niratiśayānandāsvādaprayuktaṃ gānamanūdyata ityāha---<pratika>atrānuttareti</pratika> । anuttaraṃ

<sutra>sū ।। darśayataścaivaṃ pratyakṣānumāne ।। 20 ।।</sutra>

ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ’</quote> ityādikā śrutiḥ । <quote>‘apa eva sasarjādā’</quote>vityādikā smṛtiśca ।
ato brahmaṇa eva jagatkāraṇatvādikamiti ।। tathā sati । <quote>“yadā paśyaḥ paśyate
rukmavarṇaṃ kartāramīśaṃ puruṣaṃ brahmayonim । tadā vidvān puṇyapāpe vidhūya nirañjanaḥ
paramaṃ sāmyamupaiti ।।”</quote> <quote>‘muktaḥ śivasamo bhavet’</quote> ityādiṣu muktasya ca brahmaṇā
śivena paramasādṛśyapratipādanāt tasya jagatsṛṣṭyādikaṃ yadyadasti tatsarvamasa-
ṅkucitamasyāpi syāt । anyathā paramasādṛśyahānirityata āha---
<sutra>sū ।। bhogamātrasāmyaliṅgācca ।। 21 ।।</sutra>
muktasya brahmaṇā sāmyaṃ sakalakāmabhogamātrādeva, na jagatsṛṣṭyādinā । tathā
sati bahvīśvaratvaprasaṅgāt । tathā hi śrūyate ‘so'śnute sarvān kāmān saha

<quote>‘ānandodrekāditthaṃ gāyannāsta’</quote> ithi tadānandātiśayastutirityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। darśayataścaivaṃ
pratyakṣānumāne ।। 20 ।। tasmādveti</pratika> । naivaṃ kācana śrutiḥ smṛtirvā muktasya jagadvyāpāraṃ
pratipādayantī dṛśyata ityāśayaḥ । uttarasūtravyāvartyāśaṅkāmāha---<pratika>tathāhīti</pratika> । yadyapi mu-

pādayantī śrutiḥ smṛtiścāstīti tata eva tasya jagadvyāpāraḥ sidhyet । na ca brahmalakṣa-
ṇasya sṛṣṭikṛttvaśruteśca virodhaḥ । anādyanantakalpānuvṛttasarvaprapañcajanmādikāraṇatvaṃ brahma-
lakṣaṇaṃ tathābhūtasarvaprapañcasraṣṭaika iti tadabhiprāyopapatteḥ । sarvo'pi muktaḥ svamuktiprācī-
naprapañcakartā na bhavatīti muktānāṃ svasvamuktyanantarabhāviprapañcasṛṣṭau kulālādīnāṃ kalpā-
dyakālasṛṣṭyanantarabhāvighaṭādisṛṣṭāviva kāraṇatve'pi virodhābhāvādityāśayaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।।
bhogamātrasāmyaliṅgācca ।। 21 ।।</pratika> muktasya brahmaṇā sāmyaṃ yadyananyādhīnatvādināpi tadā
parameśvarānadhīnayā svasvecchayaiva jagatsṛṣṭyādiṣu pravartamānānāṃ muktānāmaikamatyaniyamābhā-
vātkasyacitsisṛkṣāyāmanyasya saṃjihīrṣāpi kadācidbhavediti kimapi kāryaṃ na nirvartyeta ।
athānanyādhīnatvaṃ sarvaśeṣitvaṃ sarvaiśvaryaṃ sarvaprapañcasraṣṭṭatvaṃ tadupādānatvamityādiguṇebhyo
vyāvartya paramasāmyaṃ taditaraguṇeṣu saṅkocyeta tadā jagadvyāpārasāmyādapi vyāvartya <quote>‘so'-
śnute sarvānkāmānsaha brahmaṇe’</quote>ti śrutisiddhasavibhūtikabrahmānubhavarūpe bhoge tatsaṅkoca-
yituṃ yuktam । evaṃ klṛptasaṅkocāyāmeva sāmyaśrutau saṅkocakalpane śrutyantarasiddhabrahmāna-
ndabhogādyatiriktaissarvairapi guṇaissāmyaniṣedhaviṣayatayā <quote>‘tatsamaśce’</quote>tyādiśruterāṃjasyaṃ la-
bhyate । nityamuktasya tasyaiva śivasya viyadādiprapañcasraṣṭṭatayā lāghavaṃca labhyate । etena
tatkratunyāyādapi muktasya jagadvyāpāraprāptirnirastā । ananyādhīnatvādiṣviva jagadvyāpā-
rāṃśe'pi saṅkocasya nyāyyatvāt । apratīkālambanasūtroktarītyā yathākraturityasya tadga‍uṇa-
kabrahmaprāptyarthakatvena svayaṃ tadga‍uṇaprāptyarthakatvābhāvācca । na ca tathā sati śrutau tatkratu-
nyāyopanyāsavaiyarthyam । svargārthopāsanayā hi svargasyaiva prāptiḥ nopāsyaguṇaviśiṣṭasya
brahmaṇaḥ । muktyarthopāsanāyāṃ tu na tatheti tadvaiṣamyapradarśanārthatvopapatterityabhiprāyaṃ sūtraṃ
<pb n="500"/>
brahmaṇā vipaścitā’ iti । vividhaṃ paśyantyā citā jñānaśaktyā yuktaṃ hi brahma
vipaścidityucyate । yayā svābhāvikyā hṛdayabhūtayā paramasattāsphuradrūpayā deśa-
kālaviśeṣaśūnyasya brahmaṇaḥ śivasya sarvajñatvaṃ sarvakāraṇatvaṃ sarvātmatvaṃ sarvaśa-
ktimattvamaluptaśaktitvaṃ svatantratvaṃ nityatṛptatvaṃ niratiśayaiśvaryatvaṃ sarvānugrāhakatvaṃ
sarvamuktayogyarasarūpatvaṃ ca saṃbhavati, tādṛśyā yuktaṃ paraṃ brahmāpi vipaścit । tena
saha samarasātmā mukto'pi sarvān kāmān antaḥkaraṇena svābhāvikena manasā
jñānaviśeṣeṇa samaśnute paśyan ramate । tathā hi <quote>‘manasaivaitān kāmān paśyan ra-
mate’</quote> <quote>‘mano'sya daivaṃ cakṣu’</quote>riti śrūyate । <quote>‘satyātma prāṇārāmaṃ manaānandam’</quote> iti
brahmaṇo'pi manasyānandabhogaḥ, na bāhyakaraṇāpekṣā । brahmaṇo muktasya ca śarīre-
ndriyādigrahaṇamaicchikaṃ vihārārthamityadoṣaḥ । ato yathā brahma sakalān kāmān
bhuṅkte, tathā mukto'pīti bhogamātrasāmyaṃ muktasya brahmaṇeti samīcīnam । loke
katipayadharmasaṃbandhādapi siṃho devadatta ityādiṣu sādṛśyavyavahāradarśanānna ta-
tsādṛśyavacanahāniḥ ।।
iti jagadvyāpārādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
