vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>brahmaṇā saheti । vividhaṃ paśyantyetyādi</pratika> । bhāṣyasaṃdarbhaḥ prāktatra tatra kṛtena
vyākhyānena vyākhyātaprāyaḥ । <pratika>loke katipayeti</pratika> । naca katipayadharmasaṃbandhamātreṇa para-
masāmyavyavahāro na saṃbhavatīti śaṅkanīyam । parimāṇarūpaikadharmasāmyenāpi tulādhṛtayoḥ
suvarṇaśilāśakalayoratyantasāmyavyavahāradarśanādityabhiprāyaḥ । anenaivābhiprāyeṇa sūtre
mātraśabdaḥ । sa hi sākalyārtho natvavadhāraṇārthaḥ । yathā brahma sakalānkāmānbhuṅkte tathā
mukto'pīti bhāṣyadarśanāt । bhogamātra eva sāmyaṃ nānyatreti śruteradarśanātsatyasaṅkalpa-
tvādināpi sāmyasyābhimatatvācca । sa ca sākalyārthaḥ sarvavibhūtiviśiṣṭabrahmānubhavarūpa-
brahmabhogasāmyaviṣayatayā paramasāmyaśrutyupapādanārtha iti ।।</p>
<head>iti jagadvyāpārādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha jagadvyāpārādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। jagadvyāpāravarjaṃ prakaraṇādasannihitatvācca ।। 17 ।। pratyakṣopadeśāditi cennādhikārikama-
ṇḍalasyokteḥ ।। 18 ।। vikārāvarti ca tathā hi sthitimāha ।। 19 ।। darśayataścaivaṃ pratyakṣānumāne ।। 20 ।।
bhogamātrasāmyaliṅgācca ।। 21 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>aiśvaryaṃ muktibhājāmidamakhilajagadvyāpṛtivyāpakaḥ syādāmnātā brahmaṇā yatparamasadṛśatā satyasaṅkalpatā ca ।</l>
<l>kāmānnī kāmarūpī sakalabhuvanasaṃcāraśālī svarāḍityādiṣṭaṃ yattato'pi sphuṭamiha jagatāṃ tādadhīnyaṃ pratīmaḥ ।। 398 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>maivaṃ brahmaprakaraṇagatāssṛṣṭisaṃhāramukhyāḥ saṃbadhyante kathamapi na taissannidhāvaprasaktaiḥ ।</l>
<l>tattallokaprathitaviṣayā bhogabhogyaikabhāvā naivācaṣṭe niyamayitṛtāṃ lokasaṃcārasūktim ।। 399 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>heyā api muktānāṃ vikāralokasthitā bhogāḥ । brahmākāratayā syurbhogyāśśaktyā sahaitadanubhavatām ।। 400 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>sṛṣṭau pitrādinānāvidhanijavapuṣāṃ kāmacārādike ca svātantryokterjitā sā paramaśivadṛśā satyasaṅkalpataiṣām ।</l>
<l>natvākāśādisṛṣṭipravilayakaraṇe śāsane vā khilānāṃ tattvāṃśasyaiva cihnaṃ dhavalamiva mahīnāyakasyātapatram ।। 401 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti jagadvyāpārādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<pb n="501"/>
atha anāvṛttyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। anāvṛttiḥ śabdādanāvṛttiḥ śabdāt ।। 22 ।।</sutra>
uktaṃ brahmaṇā sādṛśyaṃ sāyujyaṃ muktānām, bhogādisādharmyāt । iha teṣāṃ
punarapi kadācit saṃsārāpattirasti na veti saṃśayaḥ । karmaviśeṣeṇendrādipadā-
rūḍhānāmāvṛttidarśanaṃ saṃśayakāraṇam ।। kiṃ tāvat prāptam ? <quote>‘kāmānnī kāmarūpya-
nusaṃcaran’</quote> ityādiṣu bahuśarīrasaṃbandho'vagamyate muktānām । tatsaṃbandhe sati puna-
rapi puṇyapāpakartṛtvaṃ saṃbhāvyate । pūrvakṛtasyopāsanātiśayasya bahudhā bhogena kṣaye
tātkālikakarmavaśāt punarapi hīnasukhasaṃsāraprāptiḥ । tathā hi indrapadādyārū-
ḍhānāṃ puṇyātiśayakṣaye punarāvṛttiḥ, brāhmaṇādiśarīraprāptiśca । ataśca brahmapadaṃ
prāptānāṃ bhogyadraṣṭṭatvādisaṃbandhena bhogasya puṇyātiśayakṣayahetutvena punarāvṛttiḥ
saṃsāra iti prāpte brūmaḥ । sākṣātkṛtabrahmajyotiṣāṃ tatpadānupraviṣṭānāṃ mu-
ktānāṃ na punarāvṛttiḥ saṃsāre । kṛtaḥ ? ‘sa khalvevaṃ vartayan yāvadāyuṣaṃ brahmalo-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha anāvṛttyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। anāvṛttiḥ śabdādanāvṛttiḥ śabdāt ।। 22 ।।</pratika> saṅgatiṃ darśayati---<pratika>ukta-
miti</pratika> । yadibrahmasādṛśyaṃ muktānāṃ bhogādimātreṇa na sarvātmanā jagadva‍yāpārābhāvena tu
saṃsāritulyataiva tarhi svargādiprāptasaṃsārivadeva punarāvṛttirastviti pratyavasthānātsaṅgatiḥ ।
<pratika>sāyujyamiti</pratika> । sādṛśyaṃ vivakṣitam । nanvanāvṛttiśrutau jāgratyāṃ kathamitthaṃ saṃśaya i-
tyāśaṅkya pūrvapakṣakoṭerbījamāha---<pratika>karmaviśeṣeṇete</pratika> । atra pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । puṇyasya tāvadbahu-
kālabhogena kṣayo dṛṣṭaḥ । upāsanāpi puṇyaviśeṣaḥ । alaukikaśreyassādhanatvādanuṣṭheyatvācca ।
ato bahukālabhogena vidyārjitapuṇyakṣaye sati tātkālikakarmatassaṃsārahetubhūtapuṇyapāpe
bhavata eva । <quote>‘evaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyata’</quote> iti vidyāsāmarthyātkhalu puṇyapāpāśleṣa
uktaḥ । tasminbhogena kṣīṇe kutastadaśleṣo bhavet । atastātkālikapuṇyapāpavaśānmuktā-
nāmapi svargiṇāmiva punarāvṛttiranivāryā । iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ । svargiṇāṃ svargārthapuṇyakṣaye
prācīnapuṇyapāpavaśātpunarāvṛttiḥ । muktānāṃ tu tātkālikapuṇyapāpavaśāditi । kiṃcā-
nuvartamāne'pyupāsanāpuṇye keṣāṃcidapacāradoṣānnahuṣavatpracyutissaṃbhāvyate । yadi kaścinmu-
ktassatyasaṅkalpatvābhimānātparabrahmāsādhāraṇaṃ jaganniyamanādikaṃ svasvātantryeṇa saṅkalpaye-
drājāsādhāraṇaṃ rājyaparipālanamiva duṣṭāmātyaḥ tasya parabrahmaṇaśśivasya kopena muktipa-
thātpracyutiḥ syādeva । tasmādapunarāvṛttiśruti <quote>‘rakṣayyaṃ havā’</quote> ityādiśrutivadarthavādarūpā bahukā-
labhogyaphalatvābhiprāyā । ata eva kha<quote>‘lvimaṃ mānavamāvartaṃ nāvartanta’</quote> iti śrutāvimamiti
viśeṣaṇaṃ manvantarāntare punarāvṛtteranumodakaṃ dṛśyata iti । siddhāntastu । brahmasākṣātkā-
rodayakāle keṣāṃcidvirajāmuttīrya śivapadaprāptikāle keṣāṃcicca puṇyapāpānāṃ hānaṃ priyā-
priyeṣu vyayīkaraṇaṃ cāgre tadapekṣāvirahaprayuktamityapunarāvṛttiphaladṛḍhīkaraṇārthaṃ tadāmnā-
nam । anyathā vidyāprakaraṇe tadāmnānavaiyarthyāpatteḥ । tenānāvṛttiśrutervivakṣitārthatvāva-
gatyā tadvirodhātsvargidṛṣṭāntena punarāvṛttyanumānaṃ na pravartate । kāraṇābhāvabādhitaṃ ca
<pb n="502"/>
kamabhisaṃpadyate na ca punarāvartate na ca punarāvartata’ ityādiśabdāt । brahmaviṣṇvā-
dipadamuktvā tadvilakṣaṇatvena śivasya parabrahmaṇaḥ padaṃ purāṇaṃ cābhivyanakti
<quote>“dinakṛtkoṭisaṃkāśaṃ sthānamādyamumāpateḥ । sarvakāmasamāyuktaṃ viśuddhaṃ nitya-
makṣayam ।। saṃprāpya tatpadaṃ divyaṃ samastakleśavarjitāḥ । sarvajñāḥ sarvagāḥ śuddhāḥ
paripūrṇā bhavanti ca ।। viśuddhakāryakaraṇāḥ paramaiśvaryasaṃyutāḥ । sadehāśca videhāśca
bhavantyātmecchayā punaḥ ।। ye saṃprāptāḥ paraṃ sthānaṃ jñānayogaratā narāḥ । na teṣāṃ
punarāvṛttirghore saṃsāramaṇḍale ।।”</quote> ityādibhiḥ ।। asya tātparyamucyate । <quote>‘paraṃ
jyotirūpasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata’</quote> iti paraṃ jyotiḥsvarūpaṃ hi muktaprāpya-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tadanumānam । na ca prācīnapuṇyapāpānāṃ kṣaye'pi tātkālikakarmaṇā punarāvṛttikāraṇe
puṇyapāpe syātāmiti vācyam । tatkāle puṇyapāpahetukarmotpattāvapi kāraṇābhāvāt । na
tāvadvidyāsāmarthyaṃ tatra kāraṇam । tasya cirakālabrahmānandabhogena kṣayokteḥ tasminnanuvarta-
māne jakṣaṇakrīḍādikarmaṇā puṇyapāpaśeṣāsaṃbhavācca । nāpi prācīnapuṇyapāpabṛndam । tasya
śivapadaprāptikāla eva kārtsnyena prahīṇatvātsatyasaṅkalpatvābhimānakṛtādapacārātpracyuti-
rapi na saṃbhāvyate । muktasaṅkalpānāmapi parameśvarapreraṇādhīnatvena sarvajñānāṃ muktānāṃ svalī-
lārūpapitṛlokādisṛṣṭimātre satyasaṅkalpatvaṃ na jagadva‍yāpāre'pīti svakīyasatyasaṅkalpatva-
maryādāvagatisattvena niratiśayabrahmānandāsvādanitāntatṛptānāṃ teṣāṃ kṣudraviṣayabhogābhi-
lāṣarāhityena ca svādhīnapravṛttikasvaśaktimaryādānabhijñaviṣayabhogābhilāṣukaduṣṭāmātya-
nyāyāprasarāt । viṣayabhogābhilāṣābhāve kimarthā pitṛlokādisṛṣṭiḥ । nātra kaimarthyaśaṅkā-
vakāśaṃ labhate । pārameśvarī jagatsṛṣṭiriva niratiśayabrahmānandānubhavaprayuktā līlaiva tadīyā
pitrādisṛṣṭiḥ brahmavibhūtyupabṛṃhaṇārthā vā । te hi savibhūtikabrahmānandamanubhāvamanubhāvaṃ
tṛpyanti । yattvimaṃ mānavamiti śrutāvimamiti viśeṣaṇaṃ tadanubhūyamānabahuduḥkhakarambita-
tvena heyatvaprakaṭanārthaṃ na tu brahmānandabhogasya kālaviśeṣāvacchedārthamiti sarvaṃ samañjasam ।
brahmopendrādipadavilakṣaṇe sarvottare parabrahmaṇaḥ paramaśivasya pade tatsaṃprāptānāṃ punarāvṛttya-
bhāve ca śivadharmottarādipurāṇavacanamapi pramāṇamityāha---<pratika>brahmaviṣṇvādīti</pratika> । purāṇaṃ
<pratika>cābhivyanaktīti</pratika> yaduktaṃ tat <quote>‘ityādibhiḥ ślokai’</quote>rabhivyanaktīti punaḥ kriyopādānena
spaṣṭīkṛtam । <pratika>asya tātparyamiti</pratika> । dinakṛtkoṭisaṅkāśamityādiviśeṣaṇānāṃ yathā stuti-
mātraparatvaśaṅkā na bhavati tathā tātparyamucyata ityarthaḥ । tatrādyaviśeṣaṇaṃ tāvannityasanni-
hitasya śivasya visṛmarābhirniratiśayaprabhābhirvyāptatvenopapādayati <pratika><quote>‘paraṃ jyoti’</quote></pratika>rityā-
dinā <pratika><quote>‘kimu vaktavya’</quote></pratika>mityantena । etadupalakṣaṇam । śivaprabhārūpaparamākāśātmakatvādapi
sthānasya dinakṛtkoṭisaṅkāśatvaṃ draṣṭavyam । ata eva niratiśayatejomātretyādiviśeṣaṇaṃ
vakṣyati । atrodāhṛtāḥ śrutayaḥ prathamādhyāya eva tatra tatra vyākhyātāḥ purastājjyoti-
rityetadarthamatharvaśiraḥśrutyudāharaṇaṃ niratiśayatejomātrasphurattāmayaṃ niratiśayatejorūpeṇaiva
sphuratsvaprakāśaparamākāśarūpamiti yāvat । ata eva tanniratiśayasukhāspadam । bhāvapra-
dhāno nirdeśaḥ । niratiśayasukhatvāspadam । yadvā muktānāṃ niratiśayasukhānubhavasthānamata
eva svargābhidham । svargaśabdo hi niratiśayasukhe tadanubhavasthāne ca prasiddhaḥ । evaṃ‘dinakṛ-
<pb n="503"/>
mumāsahitaṃ paraṃ brahma śrūyate, abhibhūtasūryatejovṛndasya yasya mahāprakāśasya bhāsā
sarvametadvibhāti । tathā ca śrutiḥ <quote>“na tatra sūryo bhāti na candratārakaṃ nemā
vidyuto bhānti kuto'yamagniḥ । tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ
vibhāti ।।”</quote> iti । tathā nirūpitamatharvaśirasi । <quote>‘parameśvaro'haṃ puṣkaramahaṃ pavi-
tramahamagraṃ ca madhyaṃ ca bahiśca purastāt jyotirityahamekaḥ sarve ca māmeva ca māṃ
yo veda sa sarvān devān veda’</quote> iti । tathā smaranti ca । <quote>“sarvataḥ pāṇipādābjaṃ
sarvato'kṣiśiromukham । sarvamāvṛtya tiṣṭhantaṃ tejorāśiṃ śivaṃ smaret ।।”</quote> iti ।
tataḥ paraṃ jyotīrūpamumāsahitaṃ śivākhyaṃ paraṃ brahma, tadadhiṣṭhitaṃ padaṃ dinakṛtko-
ṭisaṃkāśamiti kimu vaktavyam । niratiśayatejomātrasphurattāmayaṃ, tadeva nirati-
śayasukhāspadatayā svargābhidham । <quote>‘svargo loko jyotiṣā vṛtaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘devā ha vai svargaṃ
lokamagamaṃste devā rudramapṛcchan’</quote> ityādiśrutiṣvavagamyate sthānaṃ yat turīyātī-
tam । tathottaragītā । <quote>‘turīyaṃ ca turīyātītaṃ ca śivasthānamanāmayami’</quote>ti ।
<quote>‘ādyaṃ’</quote> sarvalokātītatvāt kāraṇatvācca । <quote>‘śivalokādbahirjñeyānyaṇḍasyāvaraṇāni
ca’</quote> ityādiṣu yasya bahiradhastāt brahmāṇḍasya saptāvaraṇāni । <quote>‘parāt parataro brahmā
tatparāt parato hariḥ । tatparāt parato'pīśa’</quote> iti, brahmādiviśvādhikasya brahmaṇaḥ
tat padaṃ viśvottīrṇamityādyam । <quote>‘umāpateḥ’</quote> parabrahmaṇaḥ śivasya, <quote>‘umāsahāyaṃ para-
meśvaraṃ prabhum’</quote> ityādau tasya hyumāsahitasya nīlakaṇṭhasya trilocanasya śivasya
dhyeyatvaṃ tamasaḥ prakṛteḥ paratvena prāpyatvaṃ cāvagamyate । kiṃ ca <quote>‘sarvo vai rudraḥ’</quote> ityā-
rabhya sarvātmatvaṃ śivasyābhidhāya tadupasaṃhāre <quote>‘hiraṇyabāhave hiraṇyapataye'mbi-
kāpataya umāpataya’</quote> iti śrutam । praṇavaparyāyeṇomāśabdena paraprakṛtirūpā parāśa-
ktirucyate । kṛṣṇapiṅgalaṃ brahmeti ca tatsāmarasyaṃ brahmaṇaḥ samāmnātam । tasmādu-
māpateḥ parabrahmaṇaḥ padaṃ tat । punaḥ kīdṛśam ? <quote>‘sarvakāmasamāyuktam’</quote> sadā saka-
lakāmasamanvitam । ataḥ khalu <quote>‘so'śnute sarvān kāmān saha brahmaṇā vipa-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tkoṭisaṅkāśa’</quote>mityanena śabdato'rthataśca siddhamarthajātaṃ varṇitam । atha sthānisvarūpamucyate---
<pratika>sthānaṃ yatturīyātītamiti । turī yaṃ ceti</pratika> । malinamiśraśuddhabhuvanāpekṣayā turyaṃ śiva-
sthānaṃ tadeva golokāntargatasya viṣṇupadasya pṛthakkaraṇe turyātītam । aparaśivapuraṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ
suvariti trailokyāpekṣayā turyaṃ paraśivapuraṃ tu turyātītamityetaddvedhā vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>ādyamiti</pratika> ।
bhuvanānāmūrdhvalokamārabhya parigaṇane sarvottaratvādādyaṃ paramākāśarūpatayā sarvakāraṇatvā-
dapyādyam । prāthamikamarthamupapādayati---<pratika>śivalokāditi</pratika> । ādyaśabdasya mukhyatvama-
rthāntaraṃ parigṛhya viśvādhikasya parabrahmaṇaḥ sthānatvena mukhyatvamupapādayati---<pratika>parātparatara
iti</pratika> । kaivalyaśrutāvumāsahāyasya prāpyatvena dhyeyatvena ca nirdeśāt savitṛmaṇḍalavidyāyāmu-
māpatitvasyābhyāsāt umāśabdasya vyatyastapraṇavavarṇaniṣpannasya cicchaktivācakeṣvabhyarhi-
tatayomāpatiśabdena tatsāhityanirdeśasyotkṛṣṭatvācca tena śabdenātra viśeṣyanirdeśa ityāha
---<pratika>umāpaterityādinā</pratika> । viśuddhamiti viśeṣaṇamaprākṛtatvātprākṛtalokavadrāgadveṣādyanutpā-
<pb n="504"/>
ścitā’ iti muktasya sakalakāmāvāptiḥ brahmaṇā saha nirūpitā । <quote>‘viśuddhaṃ’</quote> vi-
kārāsaṃspṛṣṭaṃ, <quote>‘samastasākṣiṃ tamasaḥ parastāt’</quote> <quote>‘ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt’</quote>
ityādiṣu prakṛtivikārātītatvāvagamāt । prakṛtivikāravadrāgadveṣalobhādīnāma-
nutpādakatvāt viśuddhaṃ hi tatpadaṃ śivamayamiti । anenāsya paratattvaprakāśama-
yamahānandameduraparamākāśarūpatvamuktaṃ bhavati । prākṛtānāmeva vikārāṇāṃ sṛṣṭyā-
diśravaṇāt, tadatītatvādasya nityatvam । bhūtākāśādiprapañcasyaiva sṛṣṭyādikaṃ ।
paramākāśarūpasyāsya na tadasti ।। <quote>‘yadā tamastanna divā na rātrirna sanna cāsa-
cchiva eva kevala’</quote> iti śravaṇācchivavyatiriktasya sarvasya pralayo'vagamyate ।
kathamasya nityatvaṃ muktānāmapīti cenna । muktānāmasya padasya ca śivatattve'-
ntarbhāvāt । viśuddhibhājanatayā śivatvameṣāṃ samānameva । sṛṣṭyādicakrapatita-
paśupāśavilakṣaṇatvaṃ hi śivatvam । ataḥ paśupāśavilakṣaṇasya śivapadasya nā-
nityatvaprasaṅgaḥ । akṣayaṃ kṣayavṛddhirahitaṃ, kṣayātiśayayuktakarmaphalasvargādivila-
kṣaṇaṃ, tādṛśaṃ hi <quote>‘so'dhvanaḥ pāramāpnoti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam’</quote> iti śrūyate ।
viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ svarūpaṃ hi paramākāśākhyaṃ śivasthānaṃ ṣaḍvidhasyādhvanaḥ pāraṃ tadatī-
tamucyate । <quote>‘brahmalokamabhisaṃpadyate na ca punarāvartate na ca punarāvartate’</quote> ityatrānā-
vṛttilakṣaṇaṃ brahmalokaśabdavācyamidameva sthānam ।। <quote>‘saṃprāpya tat padaṃ divyaṃ sama-
stakleśavarjitā’</quote> ityādinā tadārūḍhānāṃ brahmasadṛśānāṃ lakṣaṇamucyate । mahato
devasya svabhūtaṃ divyamavāṅmanasagocaraṃ svabhāvaṃ padaṃ saṃprāpya tatsaṃbandhinā jñānayo-
genādhigamya muktātmāna eva bhavanti <quote>‘samastakleśavarjitāḥ’</quote> astaṃ vināśaḥ, kleśā
avidyādayaḥ, samyak tadvarjitā bhavanti । anena muktātmanāṃ heyaguṇarāhityamu-
ktam । ataḥ kalyāṇaguṇasāhityamucyate । śivatvaṃ hi te saṃpannāḥ <quote>‘sarvajñāḥ’</quote> jñā-
nāvaraṇasya malasya vināśāt sarvajñā bhavanti । sarvagatajñānaśaktayaśca <quote>‘sarvagāḥ’</quote>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dakatvācceti vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>viśuddhamiti</pratika> । atrāprākṛtatvoktibindumāyāprakṛtikāryaśuddhami-
śramalinaprapañcavilakṣaṇatvaparā । ato'sya sthānasya cidānandaghanaparamākāśarūpatvaṃ phalitaṃ
bhavatītyāha---<pratika>aneneti</pratika> । sthānaviśeṣasya kathaṃ nityatvaṃ śivavyatiriktasya sarvasyāpyani-
tyatvādityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>prākṛtānāmiti</pratika> । prākṛtagrahaṇaṃ baindavādīnāmapyupalakṣaṇam । kathaṃ
tarhi <quote>‘śiva eva kevala’</quote> ityuktirityāśaṅkāmudbhāvya nityamuktānāmidānīṃtanamuktānāmasya
śivapadasya ca viśuddhatayā paśupāśavilakṣaṇaśivapadārthāntarbhāvāttathoktirityāha---<pratika>yadā
tama ityādinā</pratika> । nityamityanena punaruktiṃ pariharannakṣayapadaṃ vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>akṣayamiti</pratika> ।
kṣayagrahaṇaṃ vṛddherapyupalakṣaṇam । tathā ca svargaṃ prāptānāmiva śivapadaṃ prāptānāmānandānu-
bhūtāvutkarṣāpakarṣau na sta ityarthaḥ । idameva sthānaṃ paramākāśarūpatayā vaiṣṇavaparamasvarūpatvena
sarvottaratayā kalātattvabhuvanavarṇapadamantrādhvapāratvenānāvṛttisthānatvena ca śrutiṣu prasiddha-
mityāha---<pratika>tādṛśaṃ hītyādinā</pratika> । sarvagatatvamaṇutve'pi jñānaśaktivikāsenopapādayati---
<pratika>sarvagatajñānaśaktayaśceti</pratika> । <quote>‘astakleśābhyāṃ varjitā’</quote> ityanena sakalaheyaguṇarāhityasyo-
palakṣitatvā<quote>‘tsarvajña’</quote>mityārabhya kalyāṇaguṇokterārabdhatvācca śuddhā ityanena śivatvābhi-
<pb n="505"/>
bhavanti । uktaṃ hi <quote>‘pradīpavadāveśa’</quote> iti । śuddhāśca te malāpāyena prādurbhūtaśiva-
bhāvaḥ śuddhākāśarūpāḥ prajñānaghanā iti । uktaṃ hi <quote>‘pūrvabhāvādavirodhaṃ bādarā-
yaṇā/?/’</quote> iti svayaṃprakāśatvaṃ satyasaṃkalpatvādivaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca । <quote>‘paripūrṇā bhavanti’</quote> ni-
tyatṛptāśca te bhavanti, niratiśayānandasvarūpatvāt, avāptasakalakāmatvācca ।
nirvikāraniratiśayānandānubhavitṛtvaṃ hi teṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ । uktaṃ hi <quote>‘vikārāvartī’</quote>
ti । ataste paripūrṇā <quote>‘viśuddhakāryakaraṇāḥ’</quote> vikārāspṛṣṭaśarīrendriyāḥ । <quote>‘ekadhā
bhavatī’</quote>ti muktasya svecchayā bahuśarīragrahaṇamuktam । ato muktānāmaicchikaṃ
śarīrādikaṃ viśuddhameva । mahāmāyāniṣpannatvāt । viśuddhatvaṃ nāmāśrayavikārāhe-
tutvam । <quote>‘indro māyābhiḥ pururūpa īyata’</quote> itīśvarasyāpi mahāmāyāśaktibhirnīla-
kaṇṭhatvādilakṣaṇabahuśarīraparigrahaṇaṃ śrūyate । <quote>‘sthirebhiraṅgaiḥ pururūpa ugra’</quote> iti
parameśvaraparigṛhītānāṃ śarīrāṇāmaprākṛtānāṃ viśuddhavidyāmayānāṃ sthiratvamāha
mantrabhāgaḥ । yathā parameśvaro viśuddhabahuśarīraparigrahaṃ karoti tathā muktā api ।
<quote>‘paramaiśvaryasaṃyutāḥ’</quote> paramavibhūtisaṃyuktāḥ svādhīnaprattayaḥ parapreṣyatākārpaṇyarahitāḥ ।
uktaṃ hi । <quote>‘ata eva cānanyādhipati’</quote>riti muktasya karmādyavaśyatayā paramasvāta-
ntryam । ataḥ svatantrāḥ paramaiśvaryasaṃyuktāḥ । <quote>‘sadehāśca videhāśca bhavantyātmecchayā
punaḥ’</quote> te śivapadādhirūḍhā īśvarasaṃkalpaṃ vinā kadācit parigṛhītaviśuddhaśarīre-
ndriyopabhogā bhavanti, kadācidvigatadehendriyādayaḥ kevalena svābhāvikena mana-
sā'nubhūyamānasakalakāmā bhavanti । tathā hi nirūpitam । <quote>‘sa ekadhā bhavati
tridhā bhavati’</quote> <quote>‘manasaitān kāmān paśyan ramate’</quote> ityādiśrutyanusāreṇa <quote>‘dvādaśā-
havadubhayavidhami’</quote>ti । ataste sadehā videhāśca bhavanti । śrūyate ca <quote>‘virūpebhyo
viśvarūpebhyaśca vo namo namaḥ’</quote> iti śivasādharmyabhājāṃ vigatarūpatvaṃ bahurūpatvaṃ ca ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vyaktirevocyata iti vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>prādurbhūteti</pratika> । śivatvamatra kila vivakṣitamuktaṃ hi sārvajñyaṃ
dharmajñānavikasanaṃ ca prāgevetyākāṅkṣāyāmāha---<pratika>prakāśarūpā iti</pratika> । tasyaiva vivaraṇaṃ <pratika>prajñā-
naghanā iti</pratika> । abhivyaktacidānandasvarūpā ityarthaḥ । etatsatyasaṅkalpatvādyabhivyakterapyu-
palakṣaṇam । ata evāha---<pratika>uktaṃ hīti । mahāmāyāniṣpannatvāditi</pratika> । mahāmāyāśabde-
nātra paramākāśarūpā śaktirevocyate । evamagre'pi viśuddhavidyāmayānāmityatra viśuddhavi-
dyāśabdenāpi । nanu cicchaktimayatvāddhetormuktaśarīrāṇāmitaraśarīravyāvṛttaṃ kiṃ viśuddha-
tvamityākāṅkṣāyāmāha---<pratika>viśuddhatvaṃ nāmeti</pratika> । prasaṅgādīśvarasyāpi cicchaktimayāni śarīrā-
ṇītyāha---<pratika>indro māyābhirita</pratika> । <quote>‘paramaiśvaryasaṃyutā’</quote>ityasyākarmavaśyatvārthe paryavasānamāha
---<pratika>paramaiśvaryeti । īśvarasaṅkalpaṃ vineti</pratika> । karmānusāramīśvarasaṅkalpamanapekṣyetyarthaḥ । mu-
ktānāmapīśvare niyamyatvamātraṃ <quote>‘tasya ca nityatvā’</quote>diti <ref>(bra॰ 2-4-14-7)</ref> sūtroktaṃ na
<pb n="506"/>
śarīraparigrahe yādṛśānīśvarasya śarīrāṇi nīlakaṇṭhatvādilakṣaṇāni tādṛśāni
tatsādṛśyabhājāmiti । kecit <quote>‘nīlagrīvāḥ śitikaṇṭhā’</quote> ityādiśraya/?/ṇāditi ।
evaṃ jñāne vedāntajanye yoge yamādirūpe parameśvaraviṣaye ye niratā niṣṇātāstā-
dṛśaṃ padaṃ paramaśivasya prāptāsteṣāṃ pūrvoktaguṇānāṃ śivasadṛśānāṃ <quote>‘ghore’</quote> nirati-
śayatāparūpatvāt dussahe <quote>‘saṃsāramaṇḍale na punarāvṛttiḥ’</quote> na punaḥ saṃsāradharmānvaya
iti । tasmāt <quote>‘brahmalokamabhisaṃpadyate na ca punarāvartata’</quote> iti śruteḥ sarvajñasya sarva-
śakteḥ sarvaiśvaryasaṃpannasya sarvānugrāhakasya sarvakarmasamārādhyasya nirastasamastado-
ṣakalaṅkasya niratiśayamaṅgalaguṇaratnākarasya virūpākṣasya parabrahmaṇa umāpaterlokaṃ
niravadhikānandaprakāśaṃ nityamakṣayamabhisaṃpannāḥ sarvajñatvādiyogino'nāvṛttibhayā
vartante tatreti ।। etaduktaṃ bhavati---<quote>‘yatra devā amṛtamānaśānāstṛtīye dhāmānya-
bhyairayanta’</quote> ityādiṣu śrutāni niratiśayānandaprakāśaghane brahmaṇi śive sāmarasya-
mupagatā muktāḥ prakāśavapuṣaḥ sarvajñāḥ sarvagatāḥ śāntā nityaparamaiśvaryādhārā niḥ-
śeṣavigalitamalāvaraṇāḥ sarvatra taddarśinastadātmānastadīye paramākāśalakṣaṇe dhā-
māni svābhimatāni prāpya svecchopagatasakalakāmāstena saha sadā vidyotante
sarvatreti sarvaṃ samañjasameva ।। iti anāvṛttyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।
śvetācāryapadadvandvaśuśrūṣādyotitādhvanā ।
kṛtametanmayā bhāṣyaṃ kevalaṃ bhaktimātrataḥ ।।
iti śrīkaṇṭhaśivācāryaviracite brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye caturthādhyāyasya
caturthaḥ pādaḥ ।। 4 ।। 4 ।।
samāptaścaturtho'dhyāyaḥ ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pratiṣidhyate । sadehatvadaśāyāṃ śivasārūpyaniyamaṃ kiñcidāhurityāha---<pratika>śarīraparigraha
iti</pratika> । uktaṃ purāṇaślokānāmarthaṃ nigamayati---<pratika>tasmāditi</pratika> । <quote>‘etaduktaṃ bhavatī’</quote>tyādinā
tu varṇitaṃ purāṇavacanānāmarthaṃ <quote>‘yatra devā amṛtamānaśānā’</quote>ityāditaittirīyāraṇyakamantratā-
tparyaviṣayatvapradarśanena sthirīkarotītyaśeṣamatimaṅgalam ।। ityanāvṛttyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>iti śrīmadanukūlagotragaṇḍaragaṇḍaprajameccugaṇḍapaṇḍitapuṇḍarīkaṣaṇḍamārtāṇḍapañca-
pāṇḍyapūjāliṅgabalālarāyamanobhayaṃkarabaṃdyavarāyasthāpanācāryanellūruvīrakṣetrabhā-
ratīkamalagaṃḍaragaṃḍakūḍiviccuvaranāyakaragaṇḍaāditappuvaragaṃḍa kūḍikāduvara-
nāyakaragaṇḍarūpanārāyaṇaśivātivādimūrdhanyaśivadarśanasthāpanācāryama-
hādevapratiṣṭhāpariniṣṭhitaśrīcinnabommabhūpālakāritāyāṃśrībharadvā</pratika>-
jakulajaladhikaustubhaśrīviśvajidyāji<pratika>śrīraṅgarājādhvarivarasūnora-
ppayyadīkṣitasya</pratika> kṛtau <pratika>śrīkaṇṭhaśivācāryaviracitabrahmamī-
māṃsābhāṣya</pratika>vyākhyāyāṃ śivārkamaṇidīpikākhyāyāṃ ca-
turthasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ ।। 4 ।। 4 ।।</p>
<head>śrīcinnabommabhūpālakāritā śivārkamaṇidīpikā samāptā ।।</head>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha anāvṛttyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। anāvṛttiśśabdādanāvṛttiśśabdāt ।। 22 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>divyaṃ yaḥ ko'pi mukto yadi paramaśivānanyasāmānyacihnaṃ saṅkalpāmoghabhāvaprathitamadaharaṃ svasya saṅkalpayeta ।</l>
<l>dṛṣṭvāmātyo yathaiva svakavibhavakaṭasvāmisāmrājyalakṣmīṃ syādāvṛttiḥ kathaṃsyātparamaśivapadāttasya kopena na syāt ।। 402 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>na syānmuktā hi tuptā niratiśayamahānandasindhau nimagnāḥ pratyādiṣṭābhilāṣā viṣayavihatiṣu pratyutodyajjugupsāḥ ।</l>
<l>ādyāṭasyāpathijñāḥ paramaśivadṛśā vyañjitasyātmaśakteḥ kasmādete vidadhyurnijaviṣayamatītyālpasādhyeṣvabhidhyām ।। 403 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>līlā pitrādisṛṣṭirnikhilaviracanā śaṅkarasyaiva teṣāṃ yāvatsvecchaiva līlā svarasavisṛmarodeti tallokasiddham ।</l>
<l>nahyetasyāmudīrṇapramadajahasitodgītahastāṃghrimālī vyāpārādyātmikāyāṃ kvacidapi kalitā śaktimullaṅghyalipsā ।। 404 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>tannirdhūtadhvāntamadhvāntamādyaṃ ye saṃprāptā sthānamānandarūpam । saṃbhuṃjānāśśaṃbhuvatsarvakāmānnāvartante nākasannyāyataste ।। 405</l></lg>
<head>ityanāvṛttyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>iti śrīmadappayyadīkṣitakṛtau adhikaraṇasārasaṅgrahe nayamaṇimālāyāṃ
tṛtīyaparicchede caturthasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ ।। 4 ।। 4 ।।</pratika></p>
